C_growth_desc (生长描述): 本文未描述任何具体的微生物系统或其生长生理特性，仅提及人类微生物组的存在及其在营养代谢中的潜在作用，但未指定具体菌株或其生理特征。
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 本文未提及任何基因工程工具、调控回路或遗传改造策略，未描述任何微生物的可编程性或遗传操作。
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 本文未描述任何微生物的感知模块、信号响应机制或逻辑控制回路。
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 本文未提及任何微生物系统的生物安全等级、生物遏制策略或潜在风险，未描述任何工程化微生物的生物安全控制措施。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 本文未提供任何关于微生物系统在疾病治疗或伤口愈合方面的定量或定性疗效数据，仅从宏观角度讨论了微生物组在人类健康中的潜在作用，如营养代谢支持。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Temperature: 37°C; pH: 5.2–4.2 (in FSB); Nutritional requirements: Fermentable carbohydrates (sucrose, dextrose), soy protein, and trace elements from ABP; Growth in plant-based matrix (fermented soy beverage)
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Populations remained above 7.7 log CFU equivalent/mL throughout 28 days of storage at 4°C; Stable viability in vitro over time
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gut microbiota (intestinal lumen, particularly colon)
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Co-culture with Lactobacillus acidophilus LA-5 may enhance survival; potential competition with pathogens for nutrients and adhesion sites
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Resistant to simulated gastric conditions (pH 2.2–2.5) and bile salts; improved survival with ABP and co-culture; tolerates refrigerated storage (4°C) for 28 days
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Acerola by-product (ABP) – provides physical protection and buffering capacity
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Bifidobacterium longum BB-46 exhibits stable growth and viability in a plant-based fermented soy beverage (FSB) at 4°C for 28 days. It maintains high population levels (>7.7 log CFU/mL) and shows enhanced resistance to simulated gastrointestinal (GI) conditions when combined with Lactobacillus acidophilus LA-5 and acerola by-product (ABP). Its growth is supported by the nutrient-rich FSB matrix and ABP, which also improves its survival under low pH and bile stress.
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): No genetic modifications reported; natural chromosomal stability in FSB matrix over 28 days
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in fermented soy beverage (FSB) with ABP; no evidence of plasmid loss or instability
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): Bifidobacterium longum BB-46 is used in its native form without genetic modification. It is naturally adapted to survive in plant-based fermented beverages and shows high stability during refrigerated storage. Its performance is enhanced by co-culture with Lactobacillus acidophilus LA-5 and supplementation with acerola by-product (ABP), which improves GI resistance through physical and biochemical protection.
S_physiochemical_signals (理化信号): ["Low pH (gastric phase, pH ~2.2–2.5)", "Bile salts (enteric phase, pH ~5.0–7.3)"]
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Native membrane and metabolic systems (no specific engineered sensor reported)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No engineered logic gates; natural response to environmental stress (pH, bile) via intrinsic regulatory systems
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): Bifidobacterium longum BB-46 naturally senses and responds to low pH and bile salts through its intrinsic stress response pathways. It does not rely on synthetic genetic circuits but uses native mechanisms to maintain viability under GI stress. The presence of ABP enhances this response by providing a protective matrix.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Native secretion via membrane transporters; no engineered secretion systems
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Natural population dynamics; controlled by storage time and matrix composition
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Highly compatible with fermented soy beverage (FSB) and ABP; no structural disruption observed
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Not applicable – no antibacterial activity reported
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): No antibacterial activity observed; not designed for this function
E_B_mechanism_desc (产氧机制描述): Not applicable – no oxygen-producing capability reported
E_B_crit_evidence (标准B_依据): No evidence of oxygenation function; not engineered for this purpose
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Modulates gut microbiota by reducing Clostridium populations and ammonium ion production; may promote anti-inflammatory environment via SCFA production
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): Short-chain fatty acids (SCFAs), possibly acetate and lactate
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Supports intestinal barrier integrity and epithelial health through SCFA production and competitive exclusion of pathogens; may enhance mucosal healing
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Produces SCFAs (e.g., acetate, lactate) from fermentation of dietary fibers and sugars; regulates host metabolism and gut pH
E_F_mechanism_desc (肿瘤治疗描述): Not applicable – no evidence of tumor-targeting or prodrug conversion
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Natural auxotrophy; no synthetic kill switches or inducible systems
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Non-pathogenic; GRAS status; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; low risk of horizontal gene transfer; no environmental escape risk in food matrix
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Physical confinement in FSB matrix; no release into environment expected
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Bifidobacterium longum BB-46 is a well-established probiotic strain with GRAS status and low pathogenicity. It does not possess antibiotic resistance genes or virulence factors. Its use in a plant-based fermented beverage with acerola by-product poses minimal biosafety risk. No genetic modifications or synthetic containment systems are used, but natural stability and low environmental persistence reduce risk further.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): Bifidobacterium longum BB-46 demonstrated the highest in vitro gastrointestinal resistance among tested strains, maintaining viable cell counts above 8 log CFU equivalent/mL after the enteric phase throughout 28 days of storage at 4°C. When combined with Lactobacillus acidophilus LA-5 and acerola by-product (ABP), it showed enhanced survival under simulated gastric and intestinal conditions, indicating strong potential as a functional probiotic in plant-based synbiotic beverages. Clinical trials are needed to confirm health benefits such as modulation of gut microbiota and improved intestinal barrier function.

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal temperature: 37°C; pH range: 5.5–7.0; Nutritional requirement: Carbohydrates (e.g., glucose, maltose), amino acids, vitamins; Growth in rumen environment with high organic acid content
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time: ~1–2 hours in vitro; In vivo growth supported by ruminal fermentation substrates; Stable colonization observed during 7-day administration
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Rumen (ventral sac), particularly in the context of high-concentrate diet and low pH environment
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive interaction with native ruminal microbiota; Potential symbiosis with lactate-consuming bacteria; No significant disruption of core rumen microbiota reported
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to moderate osmotic stress and low pH (down to pH 5.0); Stable during storage at 4°C; Resistant to lyophilization and rehydration
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Cell wall components, exopolysaccharides, and acid tolerance mechanisms (e.g., F0F1-ATPase)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该多菌株益生菌制剂由乳酸杆菌（L. plantarum）、粪肠球菌（E. faecium）和丁酸梭菌（C. butyricum）组成，可在牛瘤胃中定植并维持稳定生长。其生长受瘤胃环境（如低pH、高乳酸）调控，具有良好的耐酸性和适应性，能有效在高精料日粮诱导的亚急性瘤胃酸中毒（SARA）条件下存活并发挥功能。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Not specified
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): Not specified
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Not specified
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 该益生菌制剂未经过基因工程改造，为天然多菌株组合，通过其固有代谢功能调节瘤胃发酵。各菌株在瘤胃中自然定植，无需外源调控元件。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): FNR promoter (in L. plantarum), lactate permease (in E. faecium), acid shock proteins (in C. butyricum)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No explicit logic gates; likely constitutive or pH-responsive regulation of metabolic pathways
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 各菌株通过感知瘤胃内低pH和乳酸积累等环境信号，激活乳酸代谢相关基因表达，实现对瘤胃酸碱平衡的动态响应。乳酸杆菌和粪肠球菌在低pH下增强乳酸消耗能力，丁酸梭菌则通过丁酸生成调节能量代谢，形成协同调控网络。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Type IV secretion (L. plantarum), bacteriocin release (E. faecium), endospore formation (C. butyricum)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent effect: 20–50 g/day optimal; higher dose (100 g) led to reduced efficacy
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with oral administration and rumen environment; stable in feed matrix
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): 通过竞争性抑制病原菌定植，调节瘤胃微生物群落结构，间接抑制有害菌增殖。
E_A_agent_material (抗菌因子_相关物质): Lactic acid (by L. plantarum), bacteriocins (by E. faecium)
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 乳酸杆菌和粪肠球菌在瘤胃中定植后显著降低乳酸水平，未观察到对宿主细胞或正常菌群的显著毒性，且无过度炎症反应。
E_B_mechanism_desc (产氧机制描述): 无氧代谢相关功能，不产生氧气。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): 未报道免疫调节功能。
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): 未直接参与组织修复，但通过改善瘤胃环境间接支持黏膜健康。
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): 通过乳酸消耗、丁酸生成和VFA代谢调节瘤胃发酵，维持pH稳定，改善能量利用效率。
E_E_metabolite_material (代谢物_相关物质): Lactic acid, Butyric acid, Acetic acid, Propionic acid
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (natural strains, no synthetic kill switches)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no evidence of horizontal gene transfer; low risk of environmental escape
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Oral delivery limits systemic spread; natural attenuation in rumen
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 该益生菌制剂由公认安全（GRAS）的乳酸杆菌、粪肠球菌和丁酸梭菌组成，无基因工程改造，无抗生素抗性基因，且在瘤胃内自然定植后可被正常代谢清除，无环境释放风险，安全性高。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在SARA诱导的奶牛中，连续7天每日饲喂20或50克该多菌株益生菌制剂，可显著提高瘤胃24小时平均pH值（从<5.8升至>5.8），并降低20:00时的乳酸浓度。20克组在第3–7天维持稳定pH（6.4–6.5），且昼夜节律一致，表明其有效缓解瘤胃酸中毒，改善瘤胃发酵环境，减少亚急性瘤胃酸中毒的发生风险。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Temperature: 4–30°C (optimal at 10°C); pH: 5.5–6.5 (optimal at 6.5); Nutritional: MRS broth with linoleic acid (LA) as carbon source; Osmotic: Not specified
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Growth rate not directly measured; fermentation performed over 70 h at 10°C with peak CLA production at 30 h; in vitro growth confirmed at 37°C in MRS broth
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Not applicable (in vitro study; no host niche specified)
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Not applicable (in vitro study; no microbiome context)
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to low temperature (10°C), moderate LA concentrations (up to 30 mg/mL), and presence of surfactants (lecithin, Tween 80); stability under aerobic and micro-aerobic conditions
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Lecithin, Tween 80 (protective surfactants against LA toxicity)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Lactobacillus reuteri ATCC 55739 is a facultative anaerobe capable of growing in MRS broth at temperatures ranging from 4 to 30°C, with optimal CLA production observed at 10°C and pH 6.5. It exhibits tolerance to moderate concentrations of free linoleic acid (LA), especially when emulsified with lecithin or Tween 80, which mitigate LA's antimicrobial effects. The strain maintains viability and metabolic activity under aerobic conditions, which is unusual for lactic acid bacteria, and shows enhanced CLA production under aerobic incubation.
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): No genetic engineering was performed in this study. The strain was used in its wild-type form without modification. The bioconversion of linoleic acid to conjugated linoleic acid occurs naturally through endogenous enzymatic activity.
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Linoleate isomerase (membrane-anchored enzyme; responsible for LA to CLA conversion)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No synthetic genetic circuitry; natural metabolic response to substrate (LA) and environmental conditions (temperature, pH, oxygen) with threshold-dependent enzyme activity
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): Lactobacillus reuteri senses environmental cues such as temperature, pH, oxygen level, and substrate concentration (LA). The enzyme linoleate isomerase is activated under specific conditions—particularly low temperature (10°C), neutral pH (6.5), and aerobic conditions—leading to efficient conversion of LA to CLA. The system exhibits a non-linear response to LA concentration, with optimal conversion at 20 mg/mL, suggesting a threshold-based metabolic regulation. Oxygen acts as a key modulator: aerobic conditions enhance CLA accumulation, while micro-aerobic conditions suppress it, indicating a regulatory logic where oxygen availability gates the isomerization step.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Extracellular secretion (CLA released into medium; some incorporated into cell membrane)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Controlled by substrate concentration (LA), temperature, pH, and oxygen level; no synthetic control system
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with liquid broth and emulsified systems; stable in MRS medium with lecithin micelles; no material encapsulation used
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Lactobacillus reuteri converts free linoleic acid (LA) into conjugated linoleic acid (CLA), a bioactive metabolite with potential health benefits including anti-inflammatory, anti-cancer, and anti-obesity effects.
E_E_metabolite_material (代谢物_相关物质): Conjugated Linoleic Acid (CLA), specifically c9,t11-18:2 isomer
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (wild-type strain used; no synthetic kill switches or auxotrophy introduced)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Lactobacillus reuteri ATCC 55739 is a well-characterized probiotic strain with no known pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; low risk of horizontal gene transfer; no environmental escape risk in controlled lab setting
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): None (no physical material barrier used; in vitro suspension)
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Lactobacillus reuteri ATCC 55739 is classified as Generally Recognized As Safe (GRAS) by regulatory authorities. It is a common probiotic strain used in food and supplements. No genetic modifications were made, and no biocontainment strategies were employed. The risk of pathogenicity, antibiotic resistance, or environmental escape is negligible under laboratory conditions. The strain is non-invasive and non-toxic to human cells.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): Lactobacillus reuteri ATCC 55739 achieved a maximum CLA production of 0.108 mg/mL under optimal conditions (20 mg/mL LA, pH 6.5, 10°C, aerobic incubation for 70 h). This represents a significant yield compared to previous studies using washed cells (0.032 mg/mL) and demonstrates the potential for developing refrigerated functional foods enriched with CLA. The strain maintains metabolic activity under low temperature and aerobic conditions, enabling natural CLA biosynthesis without genetic engineering.

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 6.5–7.0; requires complex nutrients including amino acids, vitamins, and carbohydrates; dependent on host-derived mucosal glycans and dietary prebiotics.
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~2–3 hours in vitro; in vivo colonization is stable but transient without continuous dietary support.
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Large intestine (colon), particularly in the mucosal layer and lumen; preferentially colonizes in the presence of prebiotic fibers.
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competes with pathogenic bacteria; promotes symbiosis by enhancing SCFA production and barrier integrity; may suppress pro-inflammatory microbes.
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Moderate tolerance to bile salts and low pH; sensitive to drying and prolonged storage; stable during refrigeration.
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Bile salts, mucin glycoproteins
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Bifidobacterium longum is a facultative anaerobe that thrives in the human colon, utilizing dietary fibers and mucosal glycans as carbon sources. It exhibits moderate environmental tolerance and is well-adapted to the intestinal niche, where it contributes to immune modulation and gut barrier function.
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Not applicable (natural strain, no genetic modification reported)
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High chromosomal stability; no plasmid-based systems used; minimal metabolic burden; long-term in vivo persistence requires continuous prebiotic supply.
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in oral delivery formats (capsules, fermented dairy); no significant degradation in gastrointestinal transit.
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): Bifidobacterium longum NCC3001 is a naturally occurring strain used in probiotic formulations without genetic modification. Its beneficial effects are attributed to its intrinsic metabolic and immunomodulatory capabilities rather than engineered circuits.
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): FOS/GOS transporters, mucin-binding adhesins, bile acid hydrolases
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Constitutive expression of metabolic and immune-modulating genes; no reported synthetic logic gates.
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): Bifidobacterium longum senses prebiotic substrates (e.g., FOS, GOS) via specific transporters and utilizes them for growth. It responds to host-derived signals like mucin and GLP-1, promoting colonization and immune interaction. No engineered logic circuits are present.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Type IV secretion system (putative), vesicle release
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent effects observed; efficacy linked to daily intake ≥ 5 g prebiotic and 1×10¹⁰ CFU/day of probiotic
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with oral delivery systems (capsules, dairy matrices); stable in gastrointestinal environment
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Not applicable (no direct antibacterial activity reported)
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 无直接抗菌证据
E_B_mechanism_desc (产氧机制描述): Not applicable (no oxygen-producing enzymes or mechanisms reported)
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Modulates immune responses by reducing pro-inflammatory cytokines (e.g., IL-6), enhancing regulatory T-cell activity, and suppressing HPA axis overactivity. Reduces cortisol levels and improves stress resilience.
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): Bifidobacterium longum-derived exopolysaccharides, cell wall components, and secreted metabolites
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Not applicable (no direct evidence of epithelial regeneration or ECM modulation)
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Ferments prebiotic fibers (FOS, GOS) to produce short-chain fatty acids (SCFAs), especially acetate and lactate. These metabolites regulate gut barrier integrity, reduce systemic inflammation, and influence host metabolism via GPR43 and GPR41 receptors.
E_F_mechanism_desc (肿瘤治疗描述): Not applicable (no evidence of prodrug conversion or immune activation in tumor microenvironment)
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (natural strain, no kill-switch or auxotrophy reported)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Non-pathogenic; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; low risk of horizontal gene transfer; no evidence of environmental escape.
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Oral delivery provides physical confinement; transient colonization limits persistence.
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Bifidobacterium longum NCC3001 is classified as GRAS (Generally Recognized As Safe). It is a commensal bacterium with a long history of safe use in food and supplements. No significant pathogenicity or opportunistic risk has been reported.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在6周的临床试验中，Bifidobacterium longum NCC3001显著降低了IBS患者的抑郁评分，但对焦虑评分无显著影响。其作用机制可能与调节HPA轴、降低皮质醇水平及增强免疫稳态有关。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 5.5–6.5; requires carbohydrates (e.g., lactose, glucose); grows well in dairy matrices and gastrointestinal tract.
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~1–2 hours in vitro; in vivo colonization is transient but detectable for several days post-ingestion.
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Small intestine and colon; adheres to epithelial cells and mucosal surfaces.
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competes with pathogens; may enhance gut barrier function; modulates immune responses.
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): High tolerance to bile salts, low pH, and drying; stable during lyophilization and storage at room temperature.
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Bile salts, low pH, desiccation
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Lactobacillus casei Shirota is a facultative anaerobe with strong environmental resilience. It thrives in acidic environments and is well-suited for oral delivery. It colonizes the gut transiently but exerts measurable immunomodulatory effects.
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Not applicable (natural strain, no genetic modification reported)
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High chromosomal stability; no plasmid systems; minimal metabolic burden; long-term in vivo persistence requires repeated dosing.
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in fermented dairy products and capsules; maintains viability during gastrointestinal transit.
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): Lactobacillus casei Shirota is a naturally occurring strain used in probiotic supplements without genetic engineering. Its benefits are due to intrinsic properties such as bile resistance, adhesion, and immune modulation.
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Glucose transporters, bile salt hydrolases, adhesion proteins (e.g., mucus-binding proteins)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Constitutive expression of stress-response and metabolic genes; no synthetic logic circuits reported.
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): Lactobacillus casei Shirota senses glucose and lactose via transporters and uses them for growth. It detects bile acids and low pH, triggering stress-response pathways. It interacts with host immune cells and modulates cortisol release, particularly under psychological stress.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Lysis, vesicle release
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent effects; effective at 1×10¹¹ CFU/day; effects observed after 8 weeks of daily intake.
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Highly compatible with dairy-based delivery systems; stable in oral formulations and gastrointestinal environment.
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Not applicable (no direct antibacterial activity reported)
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 无直接抗菌证据
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Suppresses stress-induced cortisol elevation; reduces anxiety and depression scores in high-stress populations (e.g., medical students). Modulates immune cell activity and maintains gut barrier integrity.
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): Lactobacillus casei Shirota cell wall components, secreted metabolites (e.g., lactic acid)
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Not applicable (no direct evidence of epithelial regeneration or ECM regulation)
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Produces lactic acid from glucose fermentation, lowering local pH and inhibiting pathogenic bacteria. Contributes to SCFA production via cross-feeding. Modulates host metabolism and immune signaling.
E_F_mechanism_desc (肿瘤治疗描述): Not applicable (no evidence of prodrug activation or immune stimulation in tumors)
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (natural strain, no kill-switch or auxotrophy reported)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Non-pathogenic; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; low risk of HGT; transient colonization limits environmental escape.
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Oral delivery and transient colonization provide effective physical confinement.
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Lactobacillus casei Shirota is a GRAS organism with a long history of safe use in fermented foods and supplements. It is not associated with disease in healthy individuals and shows no evidence of pathogenicity or opportunistic infection.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在8周的临床试验中，Lactobacillus casei Shirota显著降低了医学学生在考试压力下的皮质醇水平，并改善了焦虑症状。在慢性疲劳综合征患者中，该菌株也显著降低了焦虑评分，但对健康人群效果不一致，提示其作用具有人群依赖性。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 5.5–6.5; requires carbohydrates; grows well in dairy and gastrointestinal environments.
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~1.5–2 hours in vitro; transient colonization in vivo with detectable presence for several days.
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Colon and small intestine; adheres to mucosal surfaces and epithelial cells.
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competes with pathogens; enhances gut barrier function; modulates immune responses.
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): High tolerance to bile, low pH, and drying; stable during lyophilization and room temperature storage.
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Bile salts, low pH, desiccation
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Lactobacillus rhamnosus HN001 is a robust facultative anaerobe with strong environmental resilience. It is well-adapted to the human gut and exhibits consistent immunomodulatory effects, particularly during pregnancy and postpartum.
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Not applicable (natural strain, no genetic modification reported)
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High chromosomal stability; no plasmid systems; minimal metabolic burden; persistence requires continuous intake.
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in dairy and capsule delivery; maintains viability in gastrointestinal transit.
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): Lactobacillus rhamnosus HN001 is a naturally occurring strain used in probiotics without genetic engineering. Its benefits are due to intrinsic properties such as adhesion, bile resistance, and immune modulation.
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Glucose transporters, bile salt hydrolases, mucus-binding adhesins
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Constitutive expression of metabolic and immune-modulating genes; no synthetic logic circuits reported.
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): Lactobacillus rhamnosus HN001 senses glucose and lactose for growth and detects bile and low pH for stress adaptation. It interacts with host immune cells and modulates cortisol and cytokine levels, particularly during pregnancy and postpartum stress.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Lysis, vesicle release
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent effects; effective at 1×10¹⁰ CFU/day; effects observed over 15 weeks gestation and 6 months postpartum.
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Highly compatible with dairy and capsule delivery; stable in gastrointestinal environment.
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Not applicable (no direct antibacterial activity reported)
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 无直接抗菌证据
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Reduces postpartum depression and anxiety scores in pregnant women. Modulates HPA axis activity and suppresses pro-inflammatory cytokines. Enhances immune tolerance during pregnancy.
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): Lactobacillus rhamnosus HN001 cell wall components, secreted metabolites
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Not applicable (no direct evidence of epithelial regeneration or ECM regulation)
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Ferments lactose and glucose to lactic acid, lowering local pH and inhibiting pathogens. Contributes to SCFA production via cross-feeding. Modulates host metabolism and immune signaling.
E_F_mechanism_desc (肿瘤治疗描述): Not applicable (no evidence of tumor-specific immune activation or prodrug conversion)
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (natural strain, no kill-switch or auxotrophy reported)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Non-pathogenic; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; low risk of HGT; transient colonization limits environmental escape.
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Oral delivery and transient colonization provide effective physical confinement.
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Lactobacillus rhamnosus HN001 is a GRAS organism with a strong safety profile. It is widely used in prenatal and postnatal probiotics and has been shown to reduce anxiety and depression during pregnancy without adverse effects.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在为期15周孕期至产后6个月的临床试验中，Lactobacillus rhamnosus HN001显著降低了产妇的产后抑郁和焦虑评分，提示其在围产期情绪调节中具有重要作用。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Growth at 37°C, pH 6.5–7.0 in MRS broth; tolerant to low pH (pH 2.0) and bile salts (0.3% cholic acid + sodium taurocholate)
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~2–3 hours in MRS broth; viable growth observed after 24 h at 37°C under anaerobic conditions
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gastric mucosa (target niche for H. pylori inhibition)
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of pathogens (E. coli, S. aureus, H. pylori); potential for symbiotic interaction with host microbiota
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): High tolerance to gastric acid (pH 2.0 for 2 h), bile salts (0.3%), and pepsin; stable after lyophilization and storage at -70°C
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): H+-ATPase, exopolysaccharides (EPS), DNA repair proteins
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 这些乳酸菌在37°C下于MRS培养基中生长良好，对胃酸（pH 2.0）和胆盐具有较强耐受性，可在模拟胃肠道条件下保持高存活率（63.2%–96.3%），适合口服递送。
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): No genetic modifications reported; chromosomal stability in natural state; no plasmid-based systems used
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): No material encapsulation reported; natural growth in suspension
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 未进行基因工程改造，所有功能均为天然菌株固有特性，未使用CRISPR、质粒或诱导系统。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): H+-ATPase (for pH homeostasis), bile salt hydrolase (for bile tolerance)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No synthetic logic circuits; natural response to environmental stressors via intrinsic regulatory systems
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 菌株通过H+-ATP酶维持细胞内pH稳态，通过胆盐水解酶抵抗胆汁毒性，响应酸性和胆盐环境，实现天然的环境适应性。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Diffusion of metabolites (lactic acid, acetic acid, H2O2, bacteriocins); no specialized secretion systems reported
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Natural secretion; no external control mechanism; dosage depends on bacterial density and growth phase
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with liquid suspension; no encapsulation reported; may be suitable for oral delivery in capsules or fermented beverages.
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): 通过产生乳酸、乙酸、过氧化氢和细菌素等抗菌物质抑制病原菌生长，尤其对革兰氏阳性菌（S. aureus）和革兰氏阴性菌（E. coli）有效。
E_A_agent_material (抗菌因子_相关物质): Lactic acid, acetic acid, hydrogen peroxide, bacteriocins
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 60%的菌株对E. coli和S. aureus具有抑制活性，且无细胞毒性报告，局部作用，不破坏胃黏膜结构。
E_B_crit_evidence (标准B_依据): 未报道氧气生成能力，不适用于氧疗场景。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): 通过抑制H. pylori的尿素酶活性，降低其在胃酸环境中的生存能力，间接减轻胃黏膜炎症，调节免疫反应。
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): 通过产生乳酸和乙酸调节局部微环境pH，抑制病原菌生长；部分菌株可能通过代谢产物影响宿主代谢。
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): No synthetic kill switches or auxotrophy; natural resistance to vancomycin (intrinsic), no antibiotic resistance genes detected
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no known virulence genes; no horizontal gene transfer (HGT) reported; resistant to vancomycin but not clinically relevant; no antibiotic resistance genes detected
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): No physical barrier used; natural containment via gastrointestinal transit and low persistence
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 所有菌株均为天然乳酸菌，无致病性，对临床常用抗生素敏感（除对万古霉素天然耐药外），无耐药基因转移风险，属于GRAS（公认安全）类别，适合口服应用。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 菌株P24-2和P24-8对H. pylori ATCC 43504表现出完全抑制，且所有菌株均能抑制H. pylori的尿素酶活性，从而降低其在胃酸环境中的存活能力。60%的菌株对E. coli和S. aureus具有抗菌活性，且在模拟胃肠道条件下存活率高达63.2%–96.3%，表明其具有良好的口服应用潜力，可作为辅助治疗H. pylori感染的天然益生菌。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Temperature: 30–37°C; pH: Neutral to slightly acidic (inferred from MRS agar growth); Osmotic tolerance: High NaCl tolerance (up to 3.5% w/v); Nutritional requirements: Complex media (MRS broth), likely requiring amino acids, vitamins, and carbon sources.
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Growth rate: 24 h in MRS broth at 37°C; Doubling time: Not explicitly reported, but typical for LAB is ~1–2 h under optimal conditions.
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gut (inferred from probiotic context); may colonize mucosal surfaces due to adhesion properties.
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Antagonistic toward pathogenic and spoilage bacteria; potential for competitive exclusion in gut microbiota.
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): High tolerance to bile salts (0.3% w/v), simulated gastric juice (pH 2.0), phenol (0.2–0.5% v/v), and NaCl (up to 3.5% w/v); resistant to oxidative and acid stress.
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Bile salt hydrolase (BSH), organic acids (lactic, acetic), catalase (for H₂O₂ detoxification)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Lactiplantibacillus plantarum 41G exhibits robust growth under a wide range of environmental conditions, including high osmotic stress, acidic pH, and bile salt exposure, making it highly adaptable to gastrointestinal transit. It thrives in both 30°C and 37°C, indicating thermal versatility. Its ability to survive in simulated gastric juice and bile salt environments highlights its potential for oral delivery and intestinal colonization.
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): CRISPR-Cas not mentioned; genome sequencing and annotation performed using Illumina MiSeq and PacBio platforms; no genetic modifications reported.
G_circuit_control (回路控制): Constitutive (inferred from natural expression of probiotic traits).
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): Chromosomal integration (inferred from genome sequencing); no plasmid-based systems reported; high stability in food and gastrointestinal environments.
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in MRS broth and simulated GI conditions; no evidence of instability in material environment.
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): No genetic engineering was performed. The strain was isolated and characterized based on natural probiotic traits. Genome sequencing revealed the presence of bacteriocin gene clusters and probiotic markers such as bile salt hydrolase (bsh), fibronectin-binding protein (fbp), and mucin-binding protein (mub), indicating intrinsic probiotic potential.
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Bile salt hydrolase (BSH), acid tolerance systems (e.g., F1F0-ATPase), osmoregulatory transporters
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No synthetic circuits reported; natural sensing via constitutive expression of stress resistance and metabolic pathways.
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): The strain naturally senses and responds to acidic environments (e.g., stomach), bile salts (intestine), and osmotic stress (high salt) through intrinsic regulatory systems. It does not rely on engineered logic gates but uses native mechanisms to survive and function in the host gastrointestinal tract.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Type I secretion (for organic acids), bacteriocin secretion via general secretion pathway; no lysis or vesicle release reported.
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Natural, constitutive secretion; no external control mechanisms reported.
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with MRS broth and simulated GI conditions; no evidence of material disruption.
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Produces organic acids (lactic, acetic) and bacteriocins that inhibit a wide range of Gram-positive and Gram-negative bacteria, including ESKAPE pathogens.
E_A_agent_material (抗菌因子_相关物质): Organic acids (lactic, acetic), bacteriocins (e.g., plantaricin-like compounds)
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): L. plantarum 41G showed strong inhibition zones (up to ++++) against multiple pathogens including Staphylococcus aureus, Pseudomonas aeruginosa, Enterococcus faecium, and Listeria innocua. Inhibition was confirmed via well diffusion assay after neutralization and catalase treatment, ruling out H₂O₂ as the main agent. The strain also produced high levels of lactic and acetic acids, which are known to inhibit pathogen growth.
E_B_crit_evidence (标准B_依据): Not applicable; no oxygen-producing mechanisms reported.
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Produces SCFAs (lactic, acetic, propionic) that modulate host metabolism, immune function, and gut barrier integrity.
E_E_metabolite_material (代谢物_相关物质): Lactic acid, acetic acid, propionic acid
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (natural strain; no kill-switch or auxotrophy reported).
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no evidence of horizontal gene transfer; safe for human consumption.
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): None (no physical confinement reported).
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Lactiplantibacillus plantarum 41G is a GRAS organism with no known pathogenicity. It does not carry antibiotic resistance genes and shows no risk of horizontal gene transfer. It is naturally adapted to food and gut environments, posing minimal risk to human health or the environment.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): L. plantarum 41G demonstrated superior probiotic characteristics, including high survival in simulated gastric juice and bile salts, strong antibacterial activity against ESKAPE pathogens, and high organic acid production. It was identified as the most robust probiotic candidate among all isolates, suggesting strong potential for use in functional foods and gut health applications.

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 7.0–7.4; requires mammalian cell culture (Vero or C6/36 cells); dependent on host cell metabolism and nutrients
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~6–8 hours in vitro; in vivo replication kinetics not fully characterized but shows viremia in humans
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Systemic circulation and lymphoid tissues after injection; no mucosal or tissue-specific colonization
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): None (viral vector, not bacterial; no interaction with host microbiome)
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Moderate stability during freeze-drying; sensitive to heat and UV; requires cold chain storage (2–8°C)
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Lipid envelope, capsid proteins
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 黄热病17D-DENV嵌合病毒为减毒活疫苗，可在Vero或C6/36细胞中高效复制，适宜生长温度为37°C，pH 7.0–7.4。其在体外具有较快的增殖速度（约6–8小时一代），但缺乏在宿主组织中的定植能力，主要通过注射进入人体后在血液和淋巴系统中短暂复制，不形成持续性定植。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Recombinant DNA technology, viral reverse genetics
G_edit_efficiency (编辑效率): High efficiency in generating chimeric viruses; no off-target effects reported (viral genome engineering)
G_circuit_control (回路控制): Constitutive expression of chimeric viral genes; no inducible circuits
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): Stable in vitro and in early clinical trials; attenuating mutations in 17D backbone are stable; no evidence of reversion to virulence
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in liquid formulation and lyophilized form; compatible with standard vaccine delivery systems
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 通过将黄热病17D疫苗病毒的非结构基因与四种登革病毒（DENV-1至DENV-4）的prM和E基因重组，构建出四价嵌合病毒疫苗。该工程策略实现了减毒与免疫原性的平衡，使病毒在人体内可复制但不致病，诱导中和抗体反应。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): None (viral vector does not sense environmental signals)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): None (no synthetic genetic circuitry)
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 该系统为天然病毒载体，不具备环境感应或逻辑控制能力，其复制和免疫原性表达为固有特性，不依赖外部信号调控。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Viral particle release (lysis of infected cells)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent immunogenicity; three doses required over one year; no fine-tuning of output
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with standard vaccine formulations (liquid or lyophilized); stable in syringes and vials
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): None
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 无抗菌功能
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): 诱导针对四种登革病毒的中和抗体和T细胞免疫反应，特别是对NS蛋白的CD8+ T细胞应答，模拟自然感染免疫谱。
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): DENV prM/E proteins, NS1, NS3, NS5
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): None
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): None
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Attenuation via deletion in 17D backbone; no replication in non-permissive cells
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Theoretical risk of enhanced disease in seronegative individuals; potential for reversion to virulence (low); no horizontal gene transfer (viral vector); limited environmental escape risk
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Physical containment via injection; no environmental release
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 该疫苗为减毒活病毒，虽经多处突变减毒，但对未曾感染过登革病毒的旅行者存在抗体依赖性增强（ADE）风险，可能导致严重登革热。因此，不建议在血清阴性人群中使用。其生物安全等级为BSL-2，需在受控环境下生产与使用。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在已感染过登革病毒的人群中，接种三剂后两年内对登革热的保护率可达57%，但对血清阴性者保护效果差，且第三年保护效力显著下降至16.7%。在血清阴性儿童中，接种后出现更高的住院率，提示存在疫苗增强疾病风险。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Grows in mammalian cell lines (Vero, C6/36); optimal at 37°C, pH 7.0–7.4; requires host cell metabolism and nutrients
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Low-level viremia in humans; doubling time ~6–10 hours in vitro; transient replication post-vaccination
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Systemic circulation and lymphoid tissues after injection; no tissue-specific colonization
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): None (viral vector, not bacterial)
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Stable when lyophilized; sensitive to heat and UV; requires cold chain (2–8°C)
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Lipid envelope, capsid proteins
C_growth_desc (生长描述): NIAID TV003疫苗由多个突变登革病毒组成，可在Vero或C6/36细胞中复制，最适生长温度为37°C，pH 7.0–7.4。其在体外增殖速度较快，但进入人体后仅引起短暂的低水平病毒血症，不形成持续感染，无组织定植能力。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Reverse genetics, site-directed mutagenesis, viral chimera construction
G_edit_efficiency (编辑效率): High efficiency in generating stable mutants; no off-target effects reported
G_circuit_control (回路控制): Constitutive expression of viral genes; no synthetic circuits
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): Stable in clinical trials; mutations in 3' UTR (e.g., rDENV-4Δ30) are genetically stable; no reversion observed
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in liquid and lyophilized formulations; compatible with standard vaccine delivery
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 通过在DENV-4的3'非翻译区引入30核苷酸缺失（rDENV-4Δ30），构建出减毒株；再以该株为骨架构建DENV-2/4嵌合体，形成四价疫苗TV003。该策略保留了完整的病毒基因组结构，诱导广谱免疫反应，且无明显免疫逃逸风险。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): None (no synthetic sensing modules)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): None
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 该系统为天然病毒载体，不具备环境感应或逻辑控制能力，其免疫原性表达为固有特性，不依赖外部信号调控。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Viral particle release (lysis of infected cells)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): 单剂接种即可提供对DENV-2的完全保护；免疫反应强度与剂量相关，但无精细调控机制
E_material_match (材料匹配性): 兼容标准疫苗制剂，可在液态或冻干形式下稳定保存
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): None
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 无抗菌功能
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): 诱导强效中和抗体和CD8+ T细胞反应，靶向结构蛋白（E、prM）和非结构蛋白（NS1、NS3、NS5），免疫谱与自然感染相似，且无显著的再激发抗体反应。
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): DENV E, prM, NS1, NS3, NS5 proteins
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): None
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): None
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Genetic attenuation via 3' UTR deletion; no replication in non-permissive cells
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): 无ADE风险；在血清阴性者中未观察到增强疾病；T细胞反应广泛且保守，免疫原性强；无水平基因转移风险；环境逃逸可能性极低
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): 注射给药，无环境释放风险
B_risk_desc (风险描述): NIAID TV003疫苗采用基因减毒策略，安全性高，单剂接种即可提供对DENV-2的完全保护，且无再激发抗体反应，免疫谱接近自然感染。在血清阴性人群中未观察到抗体依赖性增强（ADE）现象，是目前最适合作为旅行者疫苗的候选者。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 单剂接种后6个月，所有受试者均对DENV-2挑战完全免疫，无病毒血症、皮疹或中性粒细胞减少。在血清阴性人群中未见增强疾病，保护效果明确，是目前最理想的旅行者登革热疫苗。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Grows in mammalian cell lines (Vero, C6/36); optimal at 37°C, pH 7.0–7.4; dependent on host cell metabolism
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Low-level viremia in humans; doubling time ~6–8 hours in vitro; transient replication post-vaccination
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Systemic circulation and lymphoid tissues after injection; no tissue-specific colonization
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): None (viral vector)
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Stable when lyophilized; sensitive to heat and UV; requires cold chain (2–8°C)
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Lipid envelope, capsid proteins
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Takeda TDV为四价嵌合病毒疫苗，可在Vero或C6/36细胞中复制，最适生长温度为37°C，pH 7.0–7.4。其在体外增殖速度较快，进入人体后引起短暂的低水平病毒血症，不形成持续感染，无组织定植能力。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Recombinant DNA technology, viral chimera construction
G_edit_efficiency (编辑效率): High efficiency in generating chimeric viruses; no off-target effects reported
G_circuit_control (回路控制): Constitutive expression of chimeric viral genes; no inducible circuits
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): Stable in preclinical and early clinical trials; attenuating mutations in DENV-2 backbone are stable; no reversion observed
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in liquid and lyophilized formulations; compatible with standard vaccine delivery
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 通过将DENV-1、DENV-3、DENV-4的prM和E基因插入到DENV-2（Mahidol University株）的非结构基因背景中，构建出三株嵌合病毒，并加入一株减毒DENV-2病毒，形成四价疫苗TDV。该设计保留了DENV-2的非结构蛋白，可能增强T细胞免疫反应。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): None (no synthetic sensing modules)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): None
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 该系统为天然病毒载体，不具备环境感应或逻辑控制能力，其免疫原性表达为固有特性，不依赖外部信号调控。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Viral particle release (lysis of infected cells)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): 两剂接种，间隔3个月；免疫反应强度与剂量相关，但无精细调控机制
E_material_match (材料匹配性): 兼容标准疫苗制剂，可在液态或冻干形式下稳定保存
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): None
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 无抗菌功能
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): 诱导针对DENV-1、DENV-2、DENV-3的强中和抗体反应，DENV-4反应较弱；诱导CD8+ T细胞反应，靶向NS1、NS3、NS5蛋白，免疫谱较广。
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): DENV prM/E proteins, NS1, NS3, NS5
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): None
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): None
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Attenuation via mutations in non-structural genes; no replication in non-permissive cells
B_containment_material (生物安全_相关物质): DENV-2 attenuating mutations (e.g., in NS genes)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): 无ADE风险报告；T细胞反应广泛；DENV-4免疫反应较弱；无水平基因转移风险；环境逃逸可能性极低
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): 注射给药，无环境释放风险
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Takeda TDV疫苗为四价嵌合病毒，具有良好的免疫原性，但对DENV-4的免疫反应较弱。其安全性尚待Phase III试验验证，目前未见ADE报告，但对血清阴性者的保护效果未知，仍需进一步研究。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 两剂接种后，80%以上受试者对DENV-1、DENV-2、DENV-3产生血清转化，DENV-4为33–77%；在小鼠模型中对DENV-4挑战提供部分保护。在成人和儿童中耐受性良好，但对血清阴性者的保护效果尚不明确，需等待III期试验结果。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 6.5–7.0; requires complex nutrients including amino acids, vitamins, and carbohydrates; dependent on host-derived mucins and dietary fibers in the gut.
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~2–3 hours in vitro; growth rate consistent with in vivo homeostasis in the human colon.
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Colon mucosa, particularly in the large intestine; preferentially colonizes mucus layer and epithelial surfaces.
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competes with pathogenic bacteria for nutrients and adhesion sites; promotes symbiosis by enhancing barrier function and immune tolerance.
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to bile salts and acidic pH (pH 3.0–4.0); moderate resistance to osmotic stress and shear forces in gut lumen.
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Bile salt hydrolase (BSH), acid shock proteins (e.g., GroEL, DnaK), and extracellular polysaccharides.
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Bifidobacterium longum NCC2705 is an obligate anaerobe that thrives in the human colon, where it utilizes mucosal glycans and dietary fibers for growth. It exhibits strong tolerance to gastric acidity and bile, enabling survival through the upper GI tract. Its growth is supported by host-derived nutrients and is stable in the mucus-rich intestinal environment.
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): CRISPR-Cas9 (inferred from genomic studies), Recombination, Transposon mutagenesis (inferred from comparative genomics)
G_edit_efficiency (编辑效率): High efficiency in model strains; off-target risk low due to conserved genome and targeted integration.
G_circuit_control (回路控制): Constitutive expression of key metabolic and stress-response genes; no reported inducible circuits in this paper.
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High chromosomal stability; low plasmid loss rate; minimal metabolic burden; evolutionary stability observed in long-term in vivo studies.
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in gut environment; no reported degradation in mucus or fecal matrix.
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): Bifidobacterium longum NCC2705 has been extensively studied using comparative proteomics and genomics. Its genome is well-characterized, enabling rational strain engineering. Genetic tools such as CRISPR-Cas9 and transposon mutagenesis have been applied in related strains to study stress responses and adhesion mechanisms. The strain exhibits high genetic stability and is suitable for functional studies in the gut.
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Fucose-specific transporters, bile salt hydrolase (BSH), acid shock promoters (e.g., groE, dnaK), mucin-binding adhesins (e.g., MUB proteins)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Threshold-based activation of stress-response pathways; no reported complex logic gates.
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): Bifidobacterium longum senses environmental cues such as low pH and bile salts via specific transporters and stress-response promoters. Upon detection, it activates protective mechanisms including acid shock proteins and bile detoxification enzymes. The system operates with threshold sensitivity and feedback regulation to maintain homeostasis in the dynamic gut environment.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Type I secretion system (T1SS), vesicles (outer membrane vesicles, OMVs)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Self-regulated via nutrient availability and host feedback; no external control reported.
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with mucus and fecal matrix; secretion occurs without structural disruption.
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Not applicable
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): Not applicable
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Modulates host immune system by promoting anti-inflammatory cytokines (e.g., IL-10), enhancing regulatory T-cell activity, and suppressing Th1/Th17 responses. Also supports oral tolerance and gut barrier integrity.
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): Exopolysaccharides (EPS), surface layer proteins (SLPs), peptidoglycan fragments
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Enhances epithelial regeneration and mucus layer integrity by stimulating mucin production and tight junction assembly. Promotes wound healing through growth factor-like activity.
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Produces short-chain fatty acids (SCFAs) such as acetate and lactate via fermentation of dietary fibers and mucins. These metabolites serve as energy sources for colonocytes and regulate host metabolism.
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Auxotrophy (e.g., requirement for specific amino acids or vitamins); no suicide genes reported.
B_containment_material (生物安全_相关物质): Amino acid biosynthesis genes (e.g., ilv, trp)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Non-pathogenic; no known antibiotic resistance genes; low risk of horizontal gene transfer; minimal environmental escape potential.
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Natural gut barrier sufficient; no engineered physical confinement needed.
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Bifidobacterium longum NCC2705 is classified as GRAS (Generally Recognized As Safe) and has been used in probiotic products for decades. It is non-invasive, non-toxic, and does not colonize beyond the gut. Its auxotrophic nature limits survival outside the host, reducing environmental risk.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): Bifidobacterium longum NCC2705 has demonstrated efficacy in improving gut barrier function, reducing inflammation in IBD models, and promoting recovery from antibiotic-associated diarrhea. It enhances immune homeostasis and supports metabolic health through SCFA production. Long-term colonization studies show stable integration into the gut microbiota without adverse effects.

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, requires low water activity (a_w < 0.15) for stability; sensitive to high water activity (a_w = 0.7).
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Not specified in the study; freeze-dried form used for storage. In vivo growth not assessed.
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gastrointestinal tract (implied by probiotic use), but not tested in this study.
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Not assessed in this study.
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Low tolerance to high water activity (a_w = 0.7); moderate tolerance to oxygen and storage stress under low a_w.
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Whey protein and palm oil (used in encapsulation for barrier protection)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Lactobacillus rhamnosus GG is a probiotic strain with optimal viability under low water activity (a_w < 0.15) and elevated temperature (37°C). It shows significant viability loss when exposed to high water activity (a_w = 0.7), indicating poor stability in humid environments. The strain is sensitive to moisture-induced stress, which leads to rapid cell death within two weeks.
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): Not applicable; no genetic modifications were made.
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): No genetic engineering; stability assessed in material environment is limited by encapsulation barrier failure.
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 该研究未对LGG菌株进行基因工程改造。所有实验均使用未经基因修饰的冻干LGG菌株，仅通过物理包埋（微胶囊化）进行保护。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Not applicable; no engineered sensing systems were used.
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Not applicable; no synthetic biological circuits or logic gates were implemented.
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 该系统未包含任何合成传感模块或逻辑控制机制，因此不具备环境响应能力。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Passive release via capsule degradation; no active secretion system engineered.
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Not applicable; no controlled release or dosage regulation was implemented.
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Whey protein and palm oil layers provide partial moisture barrier but failed to prevent viability loss at high a_w; insufficient for long-term protection.
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Not applicable; no antibacterial function was engineered or tested.
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 该系统未设计抗菌功能，因此不满足任何抗菌标准。
E_B_mechanism_desc (产氧机制描述): Not applicable; no oxygen-producing mechanism was implemented.
E_B_crit_evidence (标准B_依据): 该系统未涉及氧气生成或代谢调控，因此不满足氧疗标准。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Not applicable; no immunomodulatory molecules were expressed.
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Not applicable; no tissue repair factors were produced.
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Not applicable; no metabolic regulators or metabolites were engineered.
E_F_mechanism_desc (肿瘤治疗描述): Not applicable; no tumor-targeting or prodrug conversion mechanisms were used.
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None; no kill-switch or auxotrophy was implemented.
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Lactobacillus rhamnosus GG is a well-characterized GRAS (Generally Recognized As Safe) strain with low pathogenicity and no known antibiotic resistance genes. No horizontal gene transfer risk reported.
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Whey protein and palm oil layers provided limited physical confinement; cracks in fat layer allowed water penetration.
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Lactobacillus rhamnosus GG is a safe, non-pathogenic probiotic strain (GRAS status).由于未进行基因改造，无基因逃逸风险。但微胶囊结构在高水活度下失效，导致细胞死亡，因此其在干制品中的长期稳定性不足，需进一步优化包埋材料以提升物理屏障性能。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 该研究未评估治疗效果，仅测试了冻干LGG在不同水活度和储存条件下的存活率。结果显示，在高水活度（a_w = 0.7）下，无论是否包埋，LGG在37°C储存2周内均发生超过10 log10的活菌数损失，表明当前包埋策略无法有效延长其在干燥产品中的货架期。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Temperature: Thermotolerant (up to 30°C and higher); pH: Not specified; Osmotic: Tolerant to osmotic stress; Nutrition: Feeds on bacteria (e.g., E. coli K12, P. aeruginosa), yeast (S. cerevisiae), and organic particles
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Encystment takes 9 hours; Trophozoite motility: 34–92 μm/min; Binary fission for reproduction
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Hospital water networks, hot springs, bottled mineral water, tap water, biofilms in engineered hydric environments (e.g., cooling towers, jacuzzis, swimming pools)
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Acts as a host to pathogenic bacteria (e.g., Legionella pneumophila, Stenotrophomonas maltophilia, Francisella tularensis), fungi (e.g., Exophiala dermatitidis, Aspergillus fumigatus, Candida spp.), and viruses (e.g., Faustovirus, Yasminevirus, Tupanvirus). Can enhance growth of some microbes while inhibiting others (e.g., P. aeruginosa).
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Resistant to classical biocides; cysts survive 16% heat treatment at 50°C; resistant to chlorine up to 4 ppm; capable of surviving in oligotrophic conditions for up to 28 days
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Cyst wall (double-walled, composed of proteins and glucose polymers; endocyst ~50 nm, ectocyst 110–140 nm)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Vermamoeba vermiformis 是一种广泛分布的自由生活阿米巴，具有热耐受性，可在多种极端环境中生存，包括医院供水系统、热水系统、瓶装水和生物膜中。其生命周期包括滋养体（活跃）和包囊（休眠）两种形态，滋养体呈蠕虫状，长约22–24 μm，通过吞噬作用摄食细菌、酵母和有机颗粒。包囊为双层壁结构，直径约6.9 μm，具有高度抗逆性，可在恶劣条件下长期存活。
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 目前未报道对Vermamoeba vermiformis进行基因工程改造。其基因组已测序（59.5 Mb，预测22,483个基因），其中约17.8%的基因与细菌同源，涉及碳水化合物转运、信号转导和细胞壁/膜/包膜生物合成，但这些基因在致病性中的作用尚不明确。
S_metabolite_signals (代谢信号): ["Bacterial toxins", "Volatile organic compounds (e.g., terpenes from bacteria)"]
S_microbial_signals (微生物信号): ["Bacteria (e.g., E. coli K12, P. aeruginosa)", "Fungi (e.g., Candida spp., Aspergillus fumigatus)", "Viruses (e.g., Faustovirus)"]
S_host_signals (宿主信号): ["Proteases (indirectly via host cell damage)", "Cytokines (inferred from immune evasion)"]
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Phagocytic receptors (not specified), encystment-inducing signals (nutrient starvation, stress)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Encystment triggered by multiple environmental cues (nutrient starvation, osmotic stress, pH, temperature, toxins) — likely a complex AND logic gate.
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): Vermamoeba vermiformis通过感知多种环境信号（如营养缺乏、渗透压变化、pH波动、温度变化和细菌毒素）启动包囊化过程，这是一种多输入整合的响应机制，确保在不利条件下生存。其吞噬行为受细菌代谢产物（如萜类）调节，可能涉及正负反馈逻辑。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Phagocytosis, intracellular survival, release via excystment
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Not applicable — no engineered output control
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with biofilm and water-based environments; cysts maintain integrity in materials
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Not applicable — V. vermiformis is not an antibacterial agent.
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 无
E_B_mechanism_desc (产氧机制描述): Not applicable — V. vermiformis does not produce oxygen.
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Not applicable — no reported immune modulators produced.
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Not applicable — no tissue repair factors reported.
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Not applicable — no metabolic regulation via secreted metabolites reported.
E_F_mechanism_desc (肿瘤治疗描述): Not applicable — no tumor-targeting or prodrug conversion reported.
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None reported; relies on natural environmental resistance
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Pathogenicity is debated; may be opportunistic in immunocompromised individuals (e.g., HIV patients). No known antibiotic resistance genes reported. Horizontal gene transfer possible due to bacterial gene homology (17.8%). Risk of environmental escape in water systems.
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Cysts provide physical protection; resistant to disinfectants and heat
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Vermamoeba vermiformis 是一种潜在的人类病原体，可引起角膜炎、脑膜脑炎和肺炎，尤其在免疫功能低下者中。其作为病原体的争议在于其广泛分布，可能为污染源。其包囊对常规消毒剂具有高度抗性，可在医院供水系统中长期存活，构成公共卫生风险。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 目前未用于治疗，但其作为‘特洛伊木马’可传播多种病原体，包括耐药菌（如Stenotrophomonas maltophilia）和病毒（如Faustovirus），在医院环境中构成持续感染风险。其致病性已在角膜炎、脑膜脑炎等病例中被证实，但治疗困难，因对传统消毒剂耐受。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Grown at 37°C in 5% CO₂ atmosphere; MRS medium for L. casei; optimal pH not specified, but growth in physiological conditions (pH ~7.4) is implied.
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Exponential phase harvested after 18 hours of growth; doubling time not specified, but consistent with in vitro culture conditions.
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Inflamed ileal mucosa in Crohn’s disease patients; niche preference is intestinal mucosa, particularly in inflamed regions.
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competes with commensal E. coli; downregulates proinflammatory signals from E. coli, suggesting antagonistic interaction.
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Stable under experimental conditions (37°C, 5% CO₂, sterile saline storage at 4°C); tolerance to antibiotics in culture medium (vancomycin, colistin, gentamicin) implies resistance to these agents.
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Antibiotics in culture medium (vancomycin, colistin, gentamicin)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): L. casei DN-114 001 is a facultative anaerobe that grows in MRS medium at 37°C under 5% CO₂. It maintains viability in experimental settings involving human inflamed intestinal mucosa, demonstrating stability in vitro and compatibility with organ culture conditions.
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 该研究未对L. casei DN-114 001进行基因工程改造，其功能基于天然菌株的免疫调节特性，未使用任何基因编辑工具或合成电路。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Toll-like receptors (TLRs) and potentially other pattern recognition receptors (PRRs) recognizing bacterial components; no specific receptor identified.
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): The strain exhibits a competitive and preventive logic: it downregulates inflammatory signals from E. coli even when present simultaneously or after exposure, suggesting a dominant regulatory logic over proinflammatory stimuli.
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): L. casei DN-114 001 senses proinflammatory signals from commensal E. coli and responds by downregulating key cytokines (TNF-α, IFN-γ, IL-6, IL-2) and chemokines (IL-8, CXCL1). It acts both preventively (pre-treatment) and competitively (co-culture), indicating a robust, context-dependent regulatory logic that suppresses inflammation triggered by other commensals.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Unknown; likely involves cell surface components or secreted factors, but not specified.
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent effects observed: 10⁶ CFU/mL used; effects were consistent across conditions.
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with organ culture system (filter plates, RPMI medium); no structural disruption reported.
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Not applicable; no antibacterial activity reported.
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 无抗菌或抗生物膜作用证据。
E_B_mechanism_desc (产氧机制描述): Not applicable; no oxygenation function reported.
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Live L. casei downregulates secretion of TNF-α, IFN-γ, IL-2, IL-6, IL-8, and CXCL1 from inflamed CD mucosa. It also downregulates gene expression of IL-6, IL-8, and CXCL1, and prevents upregulation of IL-23p19, IL-12p35, and IL-17F induced by E. coli.
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): TNF-α, IFN-γ, IL-2, IL-6, IL-8, CXCL1, IL-23p19, IL-12p35, IL-17F
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Not applicable; no tissue repair or regeneration markers reported.
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Not applicable; no metabolic regulation (e.g., SCFAs, tryptophan metabolites) reported.
E_F_mechanism_desc (肿瘤治疗描述): Not applicable; no tumor therapy function described.
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None; no engineered kill switches or auxotrophy used.
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): L. casei DN-114 001 is a well-characterized probiotic strain with no known pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes or HGT risk reported. Low opportunistic risk.
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Physical confinement via organ culture system (filter plates, sealed wells); no systemic release.
B_risk_desc (风险描述): L. casei DN-114 001 is a GRAS (Generally Recognized As Safe) strain with a strong safety profile. It is not genetically modified, does not carry antibiotic resistance genes, and shows no evidence of pathogenicity. Its use in human mucosal explants under controlled in vitro conditions ensures biosafety. No biocontainment systems were required.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): L. casei DN-114 001 significantly reduced secretion of key proinflammatory cytokines (TNF-α, IFN-γ, IL-2, IL-6) and chemokines (IL-8, CXCL1) in inflamed Crohn’s disease mucosa. It downregulated IL-6, IL-8, and CXCL1 gene expression and counteracted the proinflammatory effects of commensal E. coli, even in post-treatment and co-culture settings. These findings suggest a strong potential for mucosal immune regulation and healing in IBD.

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 6.5–7.0; utilizes various carbohydrates including lactose, glucose, and fructose; requires complex media with vitamins and amino acids
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~1.5–2 hours in vitro; in vivo colonization observed in human gut with moderate persistence
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Human intestinal tract (particularly colon and small intestine), mucosal surface of gastrointestinal epithelium
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of pathogenic bacteria; synergistic interaction with host microbiota; promotes microbial balance and gut barrier integrity
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Moderate tolerance to gastric acid and bile; survives lyophilization and rehydration; stable during storage at 4°C
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Cell wall components (e.g., teichoic acids), stress response proteins (e.g., GroEL, DnaK)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Lactobacillus rhamnosus GG and Bifidobacterium lactis are both well-established probiotic strains with robust growth in the human gastrointestinal tract. They exhibit facultative anaerobic metabolism, tolerate the acidic environment of the stomach, and colonize the intestinal mucosa. Their growth is supported by dietary carbohydrates and complex nutrients, and they demonstrate moderate stability under storage and transit conditions.
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): None reported (natural strains used)
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High chromosomal stability; no plasmid-based systems used; no reported genetic drift in clinical trials
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in capsule formulation; no significant degradation during encapsulation or gastrointestinal transit
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): The microbial system consists of naturally occurring, non-genetically modified strains of Lactobacillus rhamnosus GG and Bifidobacterium lactis. No genetic tools or synthetic circuits were employed. The strains are administered in a standardized capsule form, relying on their intrinsic physiological properties for survival and function in the gut.
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): FNR promoter (hypoxia), Lactose permease (LacS), Bile acid transporters (Bai), AI-2 receptor (LuxP/Q)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No synthetic logic gates; natural sensing with threshold responses to nutrient availability and environmental stress
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): The strains naturally sense changes in pH, bile concentration, and nutrient availability in the gut. They respond to lactose and glucose via inducible transporters and regulate metabolic activity accordingly. Bile resistance is mediated by efflux pumps and membrane modifications. Quorum sensing allows population-level coordination. These responses are not programmable but are intrinsic to their physiology.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Passive diffusion, cell lysis, extracellular vesicles
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent via oral intake (10^10 CFU/day); no feedback control
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with capsule formulation; stable in dry, sealed environment; survives gastric transit
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Not applicable (no engineered antibacterial function)
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 无
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Modulate innate immune responses via TLR4 inhibition; reduce pro-inflammatory cytokine expression; enhance regulatory T-cell activity; promote gut barrier integrity
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): Adiponectin (indirectly via host modulation), Lipoteichoic acid (LTA), Surface proteins (e.g., p40, p75)
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Not applicable (no direct tissue repair function)
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Enhance insulin sensitivity; promote fatty acid oxidation; reduce hepatic gluconeogenesis; improve glucose homeostasis; modulate adiponectin secretion in maternal tissues
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (natural strains with no kill-switches)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no evidence of horizontal gene transfer; no environmental escape risk; safe in healthy adults and pregnant women
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Capsule shell provides physical confinement during transit
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Lactobacillus rhamnosus GG and Bifidobacterium lactis are widely recognized as safe (GRAS) organisms. They are non-pathogenic, do not colonize systemically, and are not associated with adverse events in clinical trials. No genetic modifications or antibiotic resistance markers were used, minimizing biosafety risks.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 本研究显示，孕期补充益生菌联合饮食指导可显著提高初乳中脂联素浓度（几何均值：12.7 ng/mL vs. 10.2 ng/mL，P=0.024）。该结果表明，母体营养状态和饮食对新生儿早期代谢环境具有重要影响。益生菌通过调节肠道菌群和免疫代谢功能，间接促进母体脂联素分泌，从而可能对婴儿长期代谢健康产生积极影响。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): 37°C, pH 7.0–7.5, MRS broth, 20% FBS in culture media
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Growth rate not explicitly quantified; doubling time not reported; in vitro growth confirmed in Caco2 and SK-CO15 cell cultures
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Ileum and colon mucosa (in vivo); apical membrane of intestinal epithelial cells (in vitro)
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Species-specific interaction; no direct competition or symbiosis with other Lactobacillus strains reported; potential niche colonization in distal GI tract
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to centrifugation (3,000 rpm, 10 min), filtration (0.22 μm), and storage in PBS; stability during gavage and in vitro culture not fully characterized
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): 0.22 μm filter, PBS, MRS broth
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Lactobacillus acidophilus (strain 4357) is a facultative anaerobe that grows in MRS broth at 37°C and can survive in cell culture conditions. It colonizes the ileum and colon mucosa in vivo and interacts with intestinal epithelial cells in vitro. The strain is stable during centrifugation, filtration, and suspension in PBS for gavage.
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Not applicable (no genetic modification reported)
G_circuit_control (回路控制): Constitutive (natural expression; no inducible systems used)
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): Not applicable (no plasmid or engineered genetic circuit used)
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Not applicable
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): Lactobacillus acidophilus was used in its native, unmodified form. No genetic tools or synthetic circuits were employed. The observed effects are due to natural secreted factors, not engineered genetic constructs.
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Unknown (no specific receptor or promoter identified)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No logic circuitry; natural response to host environment
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): Lactobacillus acidophilus does not possess engineered sensing circuits. Its response to intestinal environment is passive and mediated by natural secreted factors that modulate host NHE3 expression. No threshold, amplification, or noise suppression mechanisms were reported.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Secreted soluble factors (e.g., metabolites, peptides) in culture supernatant
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent effect (1:10 and 1:50 dilutions of CS effective; higher dilutions ineffective)
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with cell culture media and PBS; effective in in vitro and in vivo models
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Not applicable
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 无
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Not applicable
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Upregulates NHE3 expression and function in intestinal epithelial cells, enhancing Na⁺/H⁺ exchange and promoting electroneutral NaCl absorption, which supports epithelial barrier integrity and fluid homeostasis.
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Stimulates intestinal Na⁺ absorption via upregulation of NHE3, contributing to electrolyte and fluid homeostasis, which is critical in preventing diarrhea.
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (natural strain, no kill-switch or auxotrophy reported)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; non-pathogenic; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no horizontal gene transfer risk mentioned; environmental escape unlikely due to natural gut colonization
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): None (no physical confinement used in study)
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Lactobacillus acidophilus strain 4357 is a well-established probiotic with GRAS status. It is non-pathogenic, does not carry antibiotic resistance genes, and is not known to cause infections. No biocontainment strategies were used, but its natural gut tropism limits environmental persistence.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 口服Lactobacillus acidophilus显著上调小鼠回肠和结肠中NHE3的mRNA和蛋白表达，增强Na⁺/H⁺交换活性，促进肠道电解质吸收，可能通过增强NaCl吸收发挥抗腹泻作用。在体外，LA培养上清液可剂量依赖性地提升Caco2和SK-CO15细胞中NHE3的表达与功能，且该效应由转录机制介导。这些结果表明，LA通过分泌可溶性因子调控宿主肠道离子转运，具有潜在的治疗腹泻的临床价值。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Anaerobic, Gram-positive, gastrointestinal tract environment (pH ~6.5–7.0, nutrient-rich, low oxygen)
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Not explicitly mentioned; typical for Bifidobacterium: moderate growth rate, doubling time ~2–4 hours in vitro
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Intestinal epithelium, particularly colon (apical surface of epithelial cells)
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Commensal interaction; part of natural gut flora; potential for symbiosis with host and competition with pathogens
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Not explicitly mentioned; generally moderate tolerance to bile and low pH, but sensitive to oxygen and drying
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Not specified
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Bifidobacterium 是一种严格厌氧的革兰氏阳性细菌，属于肠道正常菌群，主要定植于结肠上皮细胞表面，通过分泌可溶性因子调节离子转运功能，具有良好的肠道环境适应性。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Not applicable
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): Not applicable
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Not applicable
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 该研究未涉及基因工程改造，仅使用天然存在的 Bifidobacterium 菌株及其培养上清液进行功能研究。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Not specified; likely involves surface receptors or secreted factors interacting with host epithelial cells
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Not applicable
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): Bifidobacterium 通过分泌可溶性因子感知宿主肠道微环境，并通过 ERK1/2 信号通路调控 DRA 基因表达，实现对离子平衡的响应性调节。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Culture supernatant (soluble factors)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Not applicable
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Not applicable
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Not applicable
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 未提及抗菌或抗生物膜功能。
E_B_crit_evidence (标准B_依据): 未涉及氧气生成或氧合功能。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Not applicable
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): 通过上调 DRA（Cl⁻/HCO₃⁻ 交换体）表达，增强肠道上皮细胞对氯离子的重吸收，从而恢复水和电解质平衡，促进肠道屏障功能修复。
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): 通过分泌可溶性因子激活 ERK1/2 信号通路，上调 SLC26A3 基因表达，调节肠道离子代谢，改善腹泻相关的电解质紊乱。
E_E_metabolite_material (代谢物_相关物质): Not specified; likely small molecules or peptides in culture supernatant
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Not applicable
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; non-opportunistic; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no horizontal gene transfer risk in natural strains; safe for human consumption.
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Not applicable
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Bifidobacterium 属于公认安全（GRAS）菌种，广泛用于食品和益生菌制剂，无致病性，无抗生素抗性基因，环境逃逸风险极低，适合用于肠道疾病治疗。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): Bifidobacterium 菌株及其培养上清液可显著增强 Caco-2 细胞中 DRA 基因的表达和 Cl⁻/HCO₃⁻ 交换活性，通过 ERK1/2 信号通路恢复肠道离子平衡，为治疗溃疡性结肠炎和感染性腹泻提供了潜在机制支持。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Temperature: 18–20 °C; pH: neutral (implied by marine conditions); Osmotic: Marine salinity; Nutrition: Marine Broth (MB), microalgae (Isochrysis galbana), organic matter (MB addition)
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time not specified; maintained in biofilter for at least 10 days; released into seawater at 10^3–10^5 CFU/ml and persisted for up to 11 days
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Inert marine surfaces (ceramic biofilters), seawater, biofilm-forming in rearing tanks
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Antagonizes Vibrionaceae (e.g., V. anguillarum); reduces total Vibrionaceae and bacterial carrying capacity; does not colonize larvae or rotifers
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Survives in seawater for at least 11 days; stable under moderate aeration and light; tolerates organic matter (MB) and microalgae
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Ceramic biofilter matrix
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Phaeobacter 27-4 is a marine, biofilm-forming bacterium that colonizes inert surfaces such as ceramic biofilters. It grows under turbot larval rearing conditions (18–20 °C, constant aeration, light) and maintains viability for over 10 days in the biofilter. It is released into seawater at detectable levels (10^3–10^5 CFU/ml) and persists for up to 11 days, contributing to pathogen control without colonizing the host.
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Not specified (no genetic modification reported)
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High stability in biofilter matrix; no evidence of genetic drift or plasmid loss; maintained in biofilter for 10 days without external supplementation
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): High stability within ceramic biofilter; biofilm structure supports long-term viability and function
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): The system uses the naturally occurring probiotic strain Phaeobacter 27-4 without genetic modification. It is immobilized on ceramic biofilters to enable sustained release into seawater, eliminating the need for repeated bioencapsulation. The biofilter acts as a stable, self-replenishing delivery system.
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Not specified (likely native quorum sensing or nutrient-sensing systems)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Not applicable (no engineered logic; function is constitutive antagonism)
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): The system operates via constitutive production of antagonistic compounds (e.g., TDA) in response to environmental cues such as nutrient availability and pathogen presence. No engineered logic gates are used; the response is passive and continuous.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Passive release from biofilm into seawater
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Sustained, continuous release from biofilter; no external control mechanism
E_material_match (材料匹配性): High compatibility with ceramic biofilter; maintains structural integrity and function over 10 days
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Phaeobacter 27-4 produces tropodithietic acid (TDA), which kills and inhibits growth of Vibrio anguillarum and other Vibrionaceae. It also reduces total Vibrionaceae counts in seawater and biofilters.
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): TDA effectively reduced V. anguillarum to undetectable levels by 144 h; total Vibrionaceae were reduced below detection limit; no cytotoxicity or microbiome disruption reported; localized action in biofilter and seawater.
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Not applicable
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Not applicable
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Not applicable
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): No genetic kill-switch or auxotrophy reported; natural inability to colonize host (larvae) acts as biological containment
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; not known to colonize fish larvae; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no horizontal gene transfer risk mentioned; environmental escape unlikely due to non-colonization
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Ceramic biofilter physically confines the strain; prevents uncontrolled release
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Phaeobacter 27-4 is a naturally occurring marine bacterium with low pathogenicity. It does not colonize turbot larvae or rotifers, limiting environmental spread. The ceramic biofilter provides physical containment, and the strain is not genetically modified, reducing biosafety risks. It is classified as GRAS (Generally Recognized As Safe) in aquaculture contexts.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): The probiofilter significantly reduced larval mortality from 76% (infected, no probiofilter) to 35–40% (infected, with probiofilter), matching uninfected controls. It reduced V. anguillarum to undetectable levels by 144 h, decreased total Vibrionaceae, and improved seawater quality by reducing turbidity. The system provides sustained probiotic delivery for at least 10 days with a single application.

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): 37°C, anaerobic conditions, MRS broth; pH 7 for growth, acid and bile tolerance tested
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Growth rate not quantified; viable after 4 h at pH 3, some strains survived pH 1 and 2
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Intestinal epithelium (Caco-2 cells), gastrointestinal tract (stomach, small intestine, cecum, colon)
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Antagonistic to pathogens (E. coli, S. aureus, P. aeruginosa, C. albicans); potential for competition with host microbiota
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): High acid tolerance (pH 1–3), bile resistance (up to 8% bovine bile), mercury resistance (IC50 up to 125 μmol/L), tolerance to osmotic and ionic stress
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Mercuric reductase (merA) gene (in PV012), bile salt hydrolases, acid shock proteins
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该研究从草原田鼠肠道中分离出与Lactobacillus johnsonii高度相似的30株乳酸杆菌。这些菌株表现出良好的耐酸性（在pH 1–3下孵育4小时后仍可存活），对胆汁（最高8%牛胆汁）具有抗性，且部分菌株对无机汞表现出显著抗性（IC50高达125 μmol/L）。它们在37°C、厌氧条件下可在MRS培养基中生长，且部分菌株（如PV012）表现出强黏附能力，适合在肠道环境中定植。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): 16S rRNA gene sequencing, RAPD fingerprinting, PCR-based qPCR
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High (clonal isolates maintained over multiple passages; RAPD confirmed genetic stability)
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Not applicable (no material encapsulation described)
