C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Temperature: 37°C; pH: neutral; Nutritional requirements: standard MRS medium; Growth in zebrafish gut environment
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Colonization achieved at 1.55 × 10⁶ CFU/fish/day; stable in intestinal environment over 28 days
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Intestinal epithelium (small intestine and colon), particularly in the context of alcohol-induced gut barrier dysfunction
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Modulates gut microbiota composition; promotes beneficial bacterial balance; enhances barrier integrity without significant disruption of native microbiome
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to freeze-drying (freeze-dried probiotic used); stable during storage and rehydration; resistant to gastric transit in zebrafish model
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Freeze-dried formulation (Culturelle)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Lactobacillus rhamnosus GG is a facultative anaerobe capable of colonizing the zebrafish intestinal tract under experimental conditions. It thrives at 37°C in a neutral pH environment and demonstrates stability during freeze-drying and rehydration. The strain successfully colonized the gut at a dose of 1.55 × 10⁶ CFU/fish/day, persisting over a 28-day ethanol exposure period, indicating robust adaptation to the host intestinal environment.
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): None (native strain, no genetic modification reported)
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High (no genetic modifications; native strain used; stable colonization observed over 28 days)
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): No genetic material used; strain is naturally stable in the intestinal environment
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): Lactobacillus rhamnosus GG was used in its native, unmodified form. No genetic engineering tools such as CRISPR-Cas, plasmids, or inducible promoters were employed. The strain's natural ability to colonize the gut and exert beneficial effects was leveraged without any synthetic genetic circuits.
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Native receptors (e.g., TLR-4, NLRP3 inflammasome complex); no engineered sensors reported
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No synthetic logic gates; natural response to inflammatory and metabolic signals
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): Lactobacillus rhamnosus GG does not possess engineered sensing circuits. Instead, it naturally responds to host-derived signals such as ethanol-induced gut barrier disruption and LPS translocation. Its activity is triggered by the presence of inflammatory mediators and microbial products, leading to modulation of immune responses and tight junction expression through endogenous pathways.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Passive secretion of metabolites and cell wall components; no engineered secretion systems reported
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent colonization and effect (1.55 × 10⁶ CFU/fish/day effective); no dynamic control mechanisms
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with oral administration and intestinal environment; freeze-dried formulation suitable for delivery
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Not applicable (no antibacterial mechanism reported)
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): Lactobacillus rhamnosus GG was not evaluated for antibacterial or biofilm inhibition activity in this study.
E_B_crit_evidence (标准B_依据): No evidence of oxygenation activity; not a feature of LGG.
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Reduces hepatic expression of pro-inflammatory cytokine IL-1β and modulates inflammasome activation (NLRP3, ASC, caspase-1). Also increases expression of anti-inflammatory IL-10.
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Enhances intestinal barrier integrity by upregulating tight junction proteins, particularly claudin-15a (cldn15a), and improving gut permeability markers.
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Reduces hepatic lipid accumulation (steatosis) in ethanol-exposed zebrafish, indicating modulation of lipid metabolism.
E_F_mechanism_desc (肿瘤治疗描述): Not applicable (no tumor model or prodrug conversion reported)
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (native strain, no kill-switch or auxotrophy reported)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no evidence of horizontal gene transfer; safe for human consumption (GRAS status)
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): None (no physical material barrier used; oral delivery only)
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Lactobacillus rhamnosus GG is a well-established probiotic strain with GRAS status. It is non-pathogenic, does not carry antibiotic resistance genes, and has been safely used in humans and animal models. No genetic modifications or biocontainment strategies were employed, but its natural safety profile supports low risk of environmental escape or adverse effects.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): Lactobacillus rhamnosus GG supplementation significantly reduced hepatic lipid accumulation (steatosis) and decreased expression of pro-inflammatory IL-1β in zebrafish exposed to ethanol. It enhanced intestinal barrier function by upregulating tight junction protein claudin-15a (cldn15a), demonstrating protective effects against alcohol-induced liver injury through modulation of gut permeability and inflammasome activation.

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 6.0–7.0; tolerates bile salts and gastric acidity; utilizes glucose and other carbohydrates as carbon sources
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~1.5–2 hours in vitro; stable transit through gastrointestinal tract in vivo
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Human ileal-cecal region, gastrointestinal tract (GIT)
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Modulates gut microflora; promotes symbiosis with host microbiome; competes with pathogenic bacteria
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to bile, low pH, osmotic stress; survives lyophilization and rehydration; stable under moderate shear stress
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Bile salts, gastric acid, lyophilization buffer
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Lactobacillus salivarius UCC118 is a facultative anaerobe capable of surviving in the harsh conditions of the gastrointestinal tract, including low pH and bile exposure. It exhibits robust growth in vitro and demonstrates stable transit through the human gut, maintaining viability and colonization potential. Its ability to persist in the ileal-cecal region supports its role as a gut-resident probiotic.
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Not specified
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): No plasmid-based systems reported; chromosomal integration not described; no evidence of genetic drift or instability in vivo
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): No engineered material environment described; natural survival in GIT without synthetic encapsulation
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): Lactobacillus salivarius UCC118 has not been genetically modified in the studies referenced. Its probiotic effects are attributed to native physiological traits rather than synthetic genetic circuits. No CRISPR, recombinase, or inducible promoter systems were used.
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): FNR promoter, LasR receptor, AI-2 receptor (LuxP/Q)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No explicit logic gates reported; likely constitutive expression of immune-modulatory genes; threshold-based response to environmental cues
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): Lactobacillus salivarius UCC118 senses changes in gut pH and bile concentration, which trigger adaptive responses. It detects microbial quorum-sensing molecules (AHL, AI-2) and host-derived signals such as proteases and cytokines, enabling it to modulate immune activity in a context-dependent manner. The sensing system appears to operate through native promoters and receptors without engineered logic circuits.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Type IV secretion system (inferred from immune modulation), Vesicles
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Natural colonization-dependent; no external dosage control; persistence limited to duration of intake
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with oral delivery via fermented milk; no synthetic material encapsulation reported
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Modulates immune system by reducing pro-inflammatory cytokines (e.g., TNF-α) and enhancing anti-inflammatory responses; promotes regulatory T-cell activity
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Modulates gut microbiota composition; influences glucose metabolism and lipid profiles; however, no significant effect on fasting glucose in obese pregnancy was observed in clinical trial
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (natural strain, no synthetic kill-switches)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Non-pathogenic; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; low risk of horizontal gene transfer; no evidence of environmental escape
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): None (oral delivery without physical confinement)
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Lactobacillus salivarius UCC118 is classified as Generally Recognized As Safe (GRAS). It has been used in multiple human and animal studies without adverse effects. No evidence of pathogenicity, antibiotic resistance, or horizontal gene transfer was reported. Its natural attenuation and lack of invasive traits make it a low-risk probiotic.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): In a randomized controlled trial, Lactobacillus salivarius UCC118 did not reduce maternal fasting glucose levels in obese pregnancy, despite successful transit through the gastrointestinal tract and modulation of gut microflora. It demonstrated immunomodulatory and metabolic regulatory potential in vitro and in animal models, but failed to show significant metabolic benefits in human clinical settings. Its primary efficacy lies in immune system engagement and gut microbiota modulation rather than direct therapeutic healing.

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Temperature: 37°C; pH: not specified; Osmotic: not specified; Nutrition: not specified; Carbon source: not specified; Host metabolite dependency: not specified
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time: not specified; In vivo vs in vitro: not specified
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Intestinal mucosa (jejunum, ileum, caecum, colon); Hypoxic conditions in gut lumen
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competes with established intestinal flora; Adheres to epithelial cells; Prevents adhesion/invasion of pathogenic bacteria; No significant alteration of intestinal barrier integrity; No major immune cell recruitment at low doses
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerates gastric transit (evidenced by persistence after oral administration); Tolerates storage in glycerol at -70°C; Tolerates lyophilization/rehydration (implied by use of frozen cultures); UV and drying tolerance: not specified
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Glycerol (for cryopreservation)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): EcN is a facultative anaerobe that can colonize the intestinal tract of conventionally reared piglets for at least 4 weeks after oral administration. It adheres strongly to porcine intestinal epithelial cells, prevents pathogen adhesion, and persists in the gut despite competition with resident microbiota. It survives gastrointestinal transit and maintains viability in the intestinal environment, indicating robust growth physiology in the porcine gut.
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Multiplex PCR, GEI II-PCR, PFGE (XbaI), K5 phage spot test
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High chromosomal stability (identical PFGE patterns in re-isolates); Plasmid pMUT1/pMUT2 present in original strain but not confirmed in all re-isolates; No evidence of plasmid loss or mutation in core genome; Long-term in vivo stability demonstrated over 33 days
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in intestinal environment; No disruption of gut structure; Compatible with mucosal colonization
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): No genetic engineering was performed in this study. The strain was used in its native form. Identification and verification of colonization relied on molecular markers (multiplex PCR, GEI II-PCR, PFGE, K5 phage sensitivity) rather than synthetic genetic circuits.
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): F1C fimbriae, ECP (E. coli common pilus), Iha (adherence-conferring molecule); Type 1 fimbriae
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Not applicable (no synthetic logic circuits reported)
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): EcN uses natural adhesion systems (F1C fimbriae, ECP, Iha) to sense and respond to host epithelial surfaces. It forms biofilms on inert surfaces and intestinal mucosa, suggesting a threshold-based colonization mechanism. The strain avoids immune activation by lacking α-hemolysin and producing serum-sensitive LPS, indicating a stealth strategy.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Type I secretion (microcins H47 and M); Adhesion-mediated delivery via fimbriae
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Not applicable (natural colonization; no controllable output)
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with intestinal mucosa; no structural disruption observed
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): EcN secretes microcins H47 and M, which inhibit growth of other bacteria including E. coli and Salmonella. It also prevents adhesion and invasion of pathogenic bacteria by competitive exclusion and biofilm formation.
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): EcN inhibits growth of E. coli and Salmonella spp. via microcins; prevents pathogen adhesion/invasion; no significant inflammation or immune cell recruitment observed; low cytotoxicity; localized retention in gut.
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): EcN strengthens epithelial tight junctions in intestinal T84 cells and enhances barrier integrity. It adheres to intestinal epithelium and prevents pathogen invasion.
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (no synthetic kill switches or auxotrophy reported)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Non-pathogenic; lacks Shiga toxin, heat-labile/stable enterotoxins, cytotoxic necrotizing factor, and α-hemolysin; serum-sensitive due to rough LPS; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; low risk of horizontal gene transfer; no evidence of environmental escape
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): None (no physical confinement used)
B_risk_desc (风险描述): EcN is a well-characterized probiotic strain with a strong safety profile. It lacks major virulence factors, is serum-sensitive, and does not produce recognized toxins. It does not persist in the environment due to rapid inactivation at room temperature. No evidence of pathogenicity or microbiome disruption in piglets. Classified as GRAS (Generally Recognized As Safe) in humans and calves.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): EcN successfully colonized the intestine of conventionally reared piglets for at least 33 days after oral administration. It was detected in faeces and intestinal mucosal swabs up to 33 days post-treatment. Re-isolation from multiple intestinal sites (ileum, colon, caecum) confirmed persistent colonization. The strain maintained genetic stability (identical PFGE patterns) and phenotypic markers (rdar morphotype, K5 phage sensitivity) in re-isolates. No adverse effects on piglet health were observed. Results demonstrate strong colonization potential and long-term persistence in the porcine gut.

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Growth at 30°C on YPG agar; incubation at 37°C in YPG broth; pH 7.3 for washing; tolerance to simulated gastrointestinal conditions including pH 2.0 (gastric), pH 8.0 (intestinal), and presence of bile salts and enzymes.
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time not specified; viable count maintained at ~7.7 log CFU/mL before GIT exposure, with gradual decline after intestinal passage (e.g., W13: 7.66 → 5.87 log CFU/mL after sequential conditions).
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Human gastrointestinal tract (simulated transit through salivary, gastric, and intestinal environments); potential for intestinal colonization due to bile and pH tolerance.
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): No direct interaction data reported; however, S. cerevisiae var. boulardii is recognized as a probiotic yeast with potential symbiotic or competitive interactions with gut microbiota.
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to low pH (pH 2.0), bile salts, proteolytic enzymes (pepsin, pancreatin), and osmotic stress (simulated GI fluids); moderate stability during sequential GI passage.
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Cell wall components (mannoproteins, β-glucans) likely contribute to structural integrity under GI stress.
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该研究中使用的酿酒酵母（S. cerevisiae）和贝氏酵母（S. cerevisiae var. boulardii）在模拟人体胃肠道条件下表现出良好的生长适应性，可在37°C下生长，耐受胃酸（pH 2.0）和肠道环境（pH 8.0）中的胆汁盐与消化酶。尽管在肠道模拟条件下活菌数有所下降，但菌株仍保持较高存活率，尤其贝氏酵母表现出更强的耐受性。
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 本研究未涉及基因工程改造，所有酵母菌株均以天然状态使用，未进行任何遗传修饰或合成回路设计。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Cell wall macromolecules (mannoproteins, β-glucans) – responsible for OTA binding via electrostatic and hydrophobic interactions.
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No engineered logic gates; natural binding behavior is passive and non-regulated.
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 酵母对赭曲霉毒素A的结合是基于细胞壁上带电荷的多糖（如甘露蛋白和β-葡聚糖）与毒素之间的非特异性物理吸附，无主动感知或逻辑调控机制。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Passive binding to cell wall (non-secretory, non-lytic mechanism)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Not applicable – binding is passive and not dose-controllable via genetic circuits.
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with suspension in PBS; stable under simulated GI conditions without structural disruption.
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Not applicable – no antibacterial activity reported.
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 无相关证据。
E_B_mechanism_desc (产氧机制描述): Not applicable – no oxygen production or consumption reported.
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Not applicable – no immune-modulating molecules reported.
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Not applicable – no tissue repair functions reported.
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Yeast cells bind ochratoxin A (OTA) via cell wall components, reducing its bioavailability in the gastrointestinal tract. This detoxification mechanism prevents systemic absorption and reduces toxicity.
E_F_mechanism_desc (肿瘤治疗描述): Not applicable – no anti-tumor activity reported.
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None – no kill-switch or auxotrophy used.
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no horizontal gene transfer risk in natural strains; environmental escape unlikely due to non-invasive nature.
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): None – no physical confinement used in the study.
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 酿酒酵母（S. cerevisiae）和贝氏酵母（S. cerevisiae var. boulardii）均被美国FDA列为GRAS（公认安全）微生物，且在欧盟QPS清单中被认定为安全。研究中使用的菌株未经过基因改造，无致病性或耐药基因，且在模拟胃肠道条件下仍保持一定存活率，表明其具有良好的生物安全性。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在模拟胃肠道条件下，S. cerevisiae W13和S. cerevisiae var. boulardii ATCC MYA-796对赭曲霉毒素A的去除率分别达到21%和30%，且在顺序模拟实验中去除率最高达44%。其中W13菌株表现出最强的稳定结合能力，释放率仅为18%，表明其结合复合物更稳定，具有良好的潜在应用前景。

composition (组成成分): [{"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Bifidobacterium", "strain_id": "Various strains (e.g., B. bifidum S17, B. breve UCC2003, B. adolescentis, B. longum subsp. longum)"}]
C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 6.5–7.0; tolerant to bile salts and intestinal pH; utilizes mucins and complex carbohydrates as carbon sources
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Moderate growth rate; doubling time ~2–3 hours in vitro; persistence in gut environment supported by adaptation to GIT conditions
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gastrointestinal tract (especially colon and mucus layer); preferentially adheres to intestinal epithelial cells and mucus
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of pathogens; symbiotic with host immune system; no evidence of pathogenicity or disruption of native microbiota
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to bile, low pH, osmotic stress, and intestinal transit; stable during lyophilization and storage
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Bile salts, mucin degradation enzymes, stress-responsive promoters
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Bifidobacteria are facultative anaerobes that thrive in the human gastrointestinal tract, particularly in the colon. They exhibit moderate growth rates and are highly adapted to intestinal conditions, including bile tolerance and acid resistance. Their ability to utilize mucins and complex carbohydrates supports long-term persistence in the gut. They are non-pathogenic and maintain stability during manufacturing and storage processes.
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): CRISPR-Cas systems not explicitly mentioned; genetic tools limited in most Bifidobacterium species; heterologous expression in Lactococcus lactis used for functional validation
G_edit_efficiency (编辑效率): Low to moderate; limited by lack of robust genetic tools in native species
G_circuit_control (回路控制): Constitutive expression of adhesive genes; regulated by carbon source and GIT-related stress
G_circuit_inducer_material (电路调控_相关物质): Carbon sources (e.g., starch, cellobiose, maltodextrin); bile salts
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): Chromosomal integration of pilus genes; stable in vivo; no significant drift reported; low metabolic burden
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Genetic constructs remain stable in host tissue and mucus environments
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): Genetic engineering of bifidobacteria is challenging due to limited tools. However, pilus genes (e.g., pil2, pil3 in B. bifidum) are naturally expressed in response to intestinal conditions. Heterologous expression in Lactococcus lactis confirmed functional adhesion, indicating potential for synthetic biology applications. Regulation is primarily environmental (carbon source, bile), not inducible via synthetic circuits.
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Pilus gene promoters (e.g., regulated by carbon source); stress-responsive promoters (e.g., bile-induced); surface-exposed moonlighting proteins (e.g., enolase, transaldolase)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Threshold-based activation; expression increases in response to specific environmental cues (e.g., presence of mucins or IECs); no synthetic logic gates reported
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): Bifidobacteria sense intestinal conditions such as bile, low pH, and availability of complex carbohydrates. Pilus and moonlighting protein expression is upregulated in response to these signals, particularly in the presence of host cells or mucins. This adaptive response enables targeted adhesion and colonization. The system functions as a threshold-based sensor network rather than a programmable logic circuit.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Surface-exposed proteins (pili, moonlighting proteins); no active secretion systems reported
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Not applicable; activity is naturally regulated by environmental cues
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with mucus and intestinal matrix; adhesion is enhanced in physiological environments
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Not applicable; bifidobacteria are not engineered for direct antibacterial activity
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 无
E_B_mechanism_desc (产氧机制描述): Not applicable; bifidobacteria are not used for oxygenation
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Modulates intestinal and systemic immune responses; enhances anti-tumor immunity and supports checkpoint-inhibition therapy
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): Bifidobacterial surface proteins (e.g., pili, enolase, transaldolase) interacting with immune cells
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Not applicable; no direct tissue repair functions reported
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Not applicable; no evidence of metabolic regulation via secreted metabolites
E_F_mechanism_desc (肿瘤治疗描述): Enhances anti-tumor immune responses and supports checkpoint-inhibition cancer therapy
E_F_agent_material (治疗制剂_相关物质): Bifidobacterial cell surface components (e.g., pili, moonlighting proteins) that stimulate immune activation
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): No genetic kill switches; relies on natural non-pathogenicity and auxotrophy
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): No pathogenicity reported; no antibiotic resistance genes identified; low risk of horizontal gene transfer; no environmental escape documented
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Mucus layer and intestinal epithelium act as natural physical barriers
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Bifidobacteria are classified as GRAS (Generally Recognized As Safe) and have no known pathogenic potential. They are naturally adapted to the human gut and do not cause disease. Their use in probiotics is well-established. No engineered safety systems are required due to inherent safety profile.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): Bifidobacteria enhance immune responses, support anti-tumor therapy, and promote gut health. They adhere effectively to intestinal epithelial cells and mucus, enabling colonization and functional persistence. Their ability to modulate immunity and exclude pathogens contributes to improved outcomes in inflammatory bowel disease, irritable bowel syndrome, and cancer immunotherapy.

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Grows at 37°C, utilizes D-glucose, D-fructose, D-mannose, D-ribose, and N-acetylglucosamine as carbon sources; pH 3.95 in culture supernatant
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Rapid growth observed in MRS broth; doubling time not explicitly reported, but growth confirmed within 24 h at 37°C
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Intestinal tract (gut microbiota), particularly in the context of high-fat diet-induced obesity and pathogenic Enterobacter cloacae colonization
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Inhibits growth of pathogenic Enterobacter cloacae; promotes gut microbiota diversity, increases abundance of Verrucomicrobia and Proteobacteria, potentially enriching Akkermansia muciniphila
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to low pH (pH 3.95 in supernatant), stable in vitro culture conditions; no data on UV, drying, or shear stress
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Lactic acid (produced during fermentation, contributes to low pH environment)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Lactobacillus plantarum LMT1-48 is a rod-shaped, non-motile, facultative anaerobic bacterium that grows rapidly in the presence of glucose, fructose, mannose, ribose, and N-acetylglucosamine. It thrives in the intestinal environment under high-fat diet conditions and exhibits strong antimicrobial activity against Enterobacter cloacae. Its growth leads to acidification of the environment, which contributes to its inhibitory effects.
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): Lactobacillus plantarum LMT1-48 was isolated from traditional Korean fermented foods (kimchi) and identified via 16S rRNA sequencing. No genetic modifications were performed; the strain functions naturally through its intrinsic metabolic and antimicrobial properties. No plasmids, CRISPR systems, or synthetic circuits were used.
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Lactic acid production (inferred from pH drop to 3.95), but no specific receptor or promoter identified
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No engineered logic gates or threshold control reported; activity is constitutive and driven by nutrient availability and environmental pH
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): Lactobacillus plantarum LMT1-48 senses available fermentable carbohydrates (glucose, fructose, etc.) and responds by metabolizing them, producing lactic acid and lowering the local pH. This creates an unfavorable environment for pathogenic Enterobacter cloacae. The response is not regulated by external inducers or complex logic; it is a direct metabolic consequence of nutrient utilization.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Secretion of metabolites (e.g., SCFAs, lactic acid) via passive diffusion or membrane transport; no specific secretion system reported
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Oral administration at 10^9 CFU/day; dosage is fixed and not dynamically controlled
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with oral delivery; no encapsulation or material barrier described; functions in natural gut environment
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Inhibits growth of Enterobacter cloacae through production of antimicrobial metabolites (likely short-chain fatty acids and lactic acid), not solely due to low pH. Activity persists even when pH is controlled at 3.95, indicating additional mechanisms.
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): L. plantarum LMT1-48 significantly reduced E. cloacae CFU counts in coculture experiments even at controlled pH (3.95), indicating antimicrobial activity beyond acidification. No cytotoxicity or microbiome disruption reported. Activity is localized to the gut, consistent with safety.
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Reduces serum leptin and total cholesterol levels, indicating modulation of adipokine signaling and lipid metabolism. May indirectly modulate immune responses by reducing inflammation via gut barrier protection and microbiota modulation.
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Regulates lipid and glucose metabolism by reducing body weight, abdominal fat volume, leptin, and total cholesterol levels. Increases gut microbiota diversity, potentially enhancing metabolic homeostasis.
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (natural strain, no synthetic kill switches or auxotrophy reported)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): No pathogenicity or antibiotic resistance genes reported. L. plantarum is generally recognized as safe (GRAS). No horizontal gene transfer or environmental escape concerns mentioned.
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): None (oral delivery without physical confinement)
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Lactobacillus plantarum LMT1-48 is a naturally occurring strain isolated from fermented foods and infant feces. It is classified as GRAS with no reported pathogenicity, antibiotic resistance, or risk of horizontal gene transfer. No biocontainment strategies were implemented, but its natural habitat and low virulence suggest minimal risk.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): L. plantarum LMT1-48 administration significantly reduced body weight and abdominal fat volume in E. cloacae-induced HFD-fed mice. It lowered serum leptin and total cholesterol levels, increased gut microbiota diversity (especially Verrucomicrobia and Proteobacteria), and ameliorated obesity. These effects were associated with inhibition of pathogenic E. cloacae and modulation of metabolic and immune parameters.

spatial_arrangement (空间排布): Peroral consumption (systemic distribution via gastrointestinal tract, potential mucosal colonization)
C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 5.5–6.5, tolerant to bile salts and low pH (gastric conditions), utilizes glucose and other carbohydrates as carbon sources
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~1.5–2 hours in vitro; in vivo colonization ability in gastrointestinal and upper respiratory mucosa demonstrated in prior studies
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gastrointestinal tract and upper respiratory mucosa (nasopharynx), with potential transient colonization at mucosal surfaces
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of pathogens, modulation of host immune response; no significant disruption of resident microbiota reported
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to drying, lyophilization, and moderate shear stress; stable during storage in juice formulation
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Cell wall structure, exopolysaccharides, and stress-response genes (e.g., clp, groEL)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Lactobacillus rhamnosus GG is a facultative anaerobe capable of surviving gastric transit and colonizing the gastrointestinal and upper respiratory mucosa. It exhibits robust growth under physiological conditions, tolerates bile and low pH, and maintains viability during storage in food matrices. Its ability to transiently colonize mucosal surfaces supports its role in immune modulation.
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): Lactobacillus rhamnosus GG was used in its native, unmodified form. No genetic modifications were introduced in this study. The strain was administered as live or heat-inactivated cells in juice, with no engineered circuits or synthetic biology components.
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): FNR-like regulators, two-component systems (e.g., LiaRS), and surface adhesins (e.g., pili, mucus-binding proteins)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No engineered logic gates; natural sensing via receptor-mediated pathways with threshold responses to environmental cues
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): L. rhamnosus GG naturally senses host-derived signals such as pH changes, bile acids, and nutrient availability via membrane-bound receptors and transcriptional regulators. It responds to mucosal environments by upregulating adhesion and immune-modulating factors, but no synthetic logic circuits were implemented.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Type I secretion system (for pili and EPS), passive diffusion of metabolites
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent immune modulation via daily oral intake (10^9 CFU/day); no controllable release mechanism
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with juice formulation; stable during encapsulation and oral delivery; no adverse interaction with matrix
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Modulates innate and adaptive immune responses by enhancing dendritic cell function, increasing IL-10 and TGF-β production, and reducing pro-inflammatory cytokines (e.g., IL-6, TNF-α). Promotes mucosal barrier integrity and IgA secretion.
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): Surface proteins (e.g., pili, p75), exopolysaccharides (EPS), and secreted metabolites (e.g., lactic acid, bacteriocins)
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (naturally occurring, non-pathogenic strain)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Non-pathogenic, no known virulence factors; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; low risk of horizontal gene transfer; no environmental escape concerns
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Oral delivery with natural clearance; no physical confinement required
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Lactobacillus rhamnosus GG is a well-characterized, generally recognized as safe (GRAS) probiotic strain. It has been used in numerous clinical trials without serious adverse events. No genetic modifications were made, and it does not persist long-term in the host, minimizing risks of colonization or gene transfer.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 本研究未发现口服L. rhamnosus GG对实验性鼻病毒（HRV）感染后鼻咽部病毒载量有显著影响。然而，病毒载量与临床症状总评分呈显著正相关（第2天相关系数0.61，p<0.001；第5天相关系数0.28，p=0.034）。提示病毒复制水平与症状严重程度密切相关。尽管未达到统计学差异，但活菌组和灭活菌组的病毒载量均低于安慰剂组，提示潜在的免疫调节作用可能减轻症状，但需更大样本量研究验证。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Temperature: 28°C; pH: 7.0–7.5; Nutritional requirements: Complex media (nutrient broth, MRS agar); Tolerance: Resistant to artificial gastric and intestinal fluids
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Growth rate: 24–48 h for 2–3 doublings in nutrient broth at 28°C; In vitro growth consistent with in vivo gut environment
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gut of juvenile Epinephelus coioides (autochthonous source)
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Potential for competitive colonization in host gut; minor components of total culturable bacterial load in gut (1.0 × 10⁴ to 3.8 × 10⁴ CFU/g)
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Resistant to artificial gastric and intestinal fluids; Stable in diet storage at 4°C for up to 60 days (viability loss: 35.2% for L. lactis, 50.6% for E. faecium)
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Cell wall structure, acid tolerance mechanisms
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Lactococcus lactis MM1 and Enterococcus faecium MM4 are lactic acid bacteria isolated from the gut of juvenile grouper Epinephelus coioides. They grow well at 28°C in nutrient broth and are resistant to simulated gastric and intestinal conditions, indicating their potential to survive in the host gastrointestinal tract. Both strains are autochthonous to the host, enhancing their colonization ability. They maintain viability in feed for up to 60 days when stored at 4°C, though with gradual decline in concentration.
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Not mentioned
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): Not mentioned
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Not mentioned
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): No genetic modifications were performed. The strains were used in their native form as probiotics without any engineered circuits or synthetic biology tools.
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Cell wall and membrane components; acid tolerance systems (e.g., F0F1-ATPase); bile salt hydrolase activity (inferred from resistance)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Not applicable (no engineered logic)
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): No synthetic sensing circuits were implemented. Natural environmental sensing (e.g., pH, bile) enables survival in the host gut, but no specific engineered logic gates or thresholds were described.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Not mentioned (likely passive secretion of metabolites or cell wall components)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose: 1.0 × 10⁸ CFU/g diet; controlled via feed formulation; no dynamic control reported
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with cold-pressed pellet diet; viability maintained in feed for 60 days
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Not applicable (no direct antibacterial mechanism reported)
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): No evidence of antibacterial activity in this study; strains were not tested for direct pathogen inhibition in vivo.
E_B_crit_evidence (标准B_依据): No evidence of oxygenation function; no enzymatic or metabolic pathways for oxygen production described.
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Modulates humoral immune responses: increases serum complement C3 and lysozyme activity in L. lactis-fed fish; decreases lysozyme in E. faecium-fed fish. No effect on phagocytic activity or SOD.
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): Cell wall components (e.g., peptidoglycan, teichoic acids), secreted metabolites (e.g., organic acids, bacteriocins), or surface proteins
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Not applicable (no evidence of tissue repair or regeneration effects)
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Not applicable (no metabolic modulation reported)
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (natural strains used; no kill-switch or auxotrophy reported)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; GRAS status for LAB; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no horizontal gene transfer risk mentioned; environmental escape unlikely due to autochthonous origin
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Physical confinement via feed pellet and controlled aquaculture environment
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Lactococcus lactis MM1 and Enterococcus faecium MM4 are native to the host gut and considered safe. No genetic modifications or antibiotic resistance genes were reported. They are not known pathogens and are used in aquaculture without containment. Their autochthonous origin reduces risk of ecological disruption.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): Dietary administration of L. lactis MM1 and E. faecium MM4 significantly improved feed conversion ratio (FCR) in juvenile grouper Epinephelus coioides over 60 days, despite slight reductions in feed intake and growth rate. Hepatopancreatic protease activity was significantly increased in both probiotic groups, suggesting enhanced protein digestion. Humoral immune parameters were modulated: serum lysozyme activity increased in L. lactis-fed fish and complement C3 levels increased in both groups. No significant effect on cellular immunity (phagocytosis, SOD). The study demonstrates potential for these strains to enhance feed utilization and modulate immune function in aquaculture.

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Growth at 37°C in MRS medium; optimal pH not explicitly stated, but adapted to vaginal niche (pH ~4.5–5.0); utilizes lactose, maltose, rhamnose, ribose as carbon sources
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Growth rate not quantified; exhibits bi-phase growth curve on sorbitol; no growth on glycogen
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Vaginal epithelium (especially in the urethra and vaginal mucosa); capable of temporary colonization in human vagina after oral intake
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competes with uropathogens; does not induce strong pro-inflammatory cytokines (TNF, IL-8) in vaginal epithelial cells; lacks pili-mediated adhesion to intestinal mucus, reducing intestinal persistence but potentially facilitating ascension to vagina
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): High resistance to oxidative stress (H₂O₂); low survival in simulated gastric juice (pH 2.0); moderate tolerance to bile and lysozyme (not explicitly tested, but inferred from context)
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Thioredoxin genes (GR1_00460, GR1_01468, GR1_01733) likely responsible for oxidative stress resistance
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Lactobacillus rhamnosus GR-1 is a facultative anaerobe that grows optimally at 37°C and is adapted to the vaginal niche. It efficiently metabolizes lactose, maltose, rhamnose, and ribose—carbohydrates present in vaginal epithelium—while lacking the ability to utilize fucose or glycogen. It shows enhanced resistance to oxidative stress, which is critical in the vaginal environment, but poor survival under gastric acidity, limiting oral bioavailability. It can temporarily colonize the human vagina after oral administration, suggesting a unique niche adaptation for urogenital health.
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): CRISPR-Cas not used; genome sequenced using Illumina paired-end sequencing; annotation via GeneMark and Glimmer
G_circuit_control (回路控制): Constitutive expression of native genes; no inducible circuits described
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): Chromosomal integration; no plasmids reported; stable in vaginal environment based on temporary colonization; no evidence of genetic drift or instability in vivo
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): No engineered material environment described; natural EPS production may support stability in mucosal matrices
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): Lactobacillus rhamnosus GR-1 was not genetically modified in this study. Its genome was sequenced and compared to other strains to identify niche-specific adaptations. Key features include a unique exopolysaccharide (EPS) cluster for glucose-rich, rhamnose-lacking EPS synthesis and enhanced carbohydrate metabolism genes for lactose, maltose, rhamnose, and ribose utilization. No plasmid-based systems or synthetic circuits were used.
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Lectin-like protein 1 (Lrp1) mediates tissue-specific adherence to vaginal epithelium; thioredoxin genes (GR1_00460, GR1_01468, GR1_01733) involved in oxidative stress sensing/resistance
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No synthetic logic gates; natural regulatory networks control gene expression in response to nutrient availability and stress (e.g., constitutive expression of EPS and sugar metabolism genes)
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): Lactobacillus rhamnosus GR-1 senses nutrient availability (lactose, maltose, rhamnose, ribose) and oxidative stress via intrinsic metabolic and redox-sensitive pathways. It uses lectin-like protein 1 to recognize host epithelial glycans, enabling targeted adhesion. The absence of pili suggests a lack of quorum-sensing or complex signal integration, relying instead on constitutive expression of niche-adapted genes.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Extracellular polysaccharide (EPS) secretion via EPS gene cluster; potential secretion via general secretory pathway; no evidence of lysis or vesicle-based delivery
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Not controllable; natural expression of genes; dosage depends on colonization level and metabolic activity
E_material_match (材料匹配性): EPS is glucose-rich and rhamnose-lacking; may be compatible with mucosal matrices; no evidence of material disruption or gas production
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Disrupts urogenital biofilms via lectin-like protein 1; inhibits adhesion and growth of uropathogens such as E. coli and S. aureus; competes for epithelial binding sites
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): L. rhamnosus GR-1 disrupts biofilms formed by uropathogens in vitro; does not induce strong pro-inflammatory responses (TNF, IL-8), indicating localized, non-damaging activity; maintains structural integrity in vaginal mucosa without causing tissue disruption.
E_B_crit_evidence (标准B_依据): No evidence of oxygen production or oxygenation mechanism in the study.
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Modulates host immune response by inducing IL-6 expression while not inducing TNF or IL-8 in vaginal epithelial cells, suggesting anti-inflammatory or immune-tolerogenic activity
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Enhances host defenses by promoting epithelial integrity and reducing pathogen adhesion; may support mucosal barrier function via EPS and adhesion molecules
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Auxotrophy not reported; no kill-switches or synthetic containment systems; natural attenuation via poor gastric survival
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Non-pathogenic; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; low risk of horizontal gene transfer; no evidence of environmental escape; low opportunistic risk
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Physical confinement not used; natural colonization limited to mucosal surfaces
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Lactobacillus rhamnosus GR-1 is classified as GRAS (Generally Recognized As Safe). It is non-pathogenic, does not carry antibiotic resistance genes, and shows low risk of horizontal gene transfer. Its poor survival in gastric conditions limits systemic spread. It is naturally confined to mucosal surfaces and does not persist long-term in the gut or environment. No synthetic biocontainment systems are used.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): L. rhamnosus GR-1 effectively colonizes the human vagina after oral administration and temporarily persists, reducing uropathogen adhesion and biofilm formation. It modulates immune responses by inducing IL-6 without triggering pro-inflammatory cytokines (TNF, IL-8), suggesting a role in restoring vaginal homeostasis. It is clinically effective in preventing recurrent urinary tract infections and may improve outcomes in bacterial vaginosis and aerobic vaginitis. Vaginal administration may be more effective than oral due to better survival and colonization.

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): 37°C, pH range from initial juice pH (~3.4–3.9) to lower pH after fermentation due to lactic acid production; utilizes fructose as substrate; grows in fruit juices with or without inulin fiber
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Achieved ≥10⁷ CFU/mL within 72 h of fermentation and maintained viability for 30 days of refrigerated storage; growth rate consistent with facultative heterofermentative metabolism
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gastrointestinal tract (specifically urogenital mucosa for UTI prevention); not designed for tissue colonization
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): No direct interaction with host microbiome described; potential to modulate gut microbiota via probiotic activity
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Bile and acid resistant; survives passage through gastrointestinal tract; stable under refrigeration (4°C) for 30 days
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Bile salts, acidic environment (pH ~3.4–3.9), refrigeration
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Lactobacillus rhamnosus GR-1 is a facultative anaerobe capable of surviving in acidic fruit juices, producing lactic acid during fermentation, and maintaining high viability (≥10⁷ CFU/mL) over 72 hours of fermentation and 30 days of refrigerated storage. It is bile and acid resistant, enabling gastrointestinal survival, and thrives in fructose-rich environments such as fruit juices.
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 该研究未对L. rhamnosus GR-1进行基因改造，其功能依赖于天然生理特性，未使用任何遗传工具或合成电路进行编程。
S_physiochemical_signals (理化信号): ["Acidity (pH decrease due to lactic acid production)", "Fructose (substrate availability)"]
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): FNR promoter (implied by anaerobic growth), fructose utilization pathways
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No engineered logic gates; natural metabolic regulation based on substrate availability and environmental pH
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): L. rhamnosus GR-1 naturally senses fructose and low pH environments, triggering fermentation and acid production. Its growth is regulated by substrate availability and acid tolerance, without synthetic sensing circuits.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): None (natural secretion of lactic acid; no engineered secretion systems)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Natural; dependent on fermentation time and substrate availability
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with fruit juice matrix; no structural disruption observed; inulin fiber does not interfere with microbial activity
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): L. rhamnosus GR-1 ferments fructose in fruit juices to produce lactic acid, lowering pH and potentially modulating gut microbiota and host metabolism.
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (no kill-switch or auxotrophy used)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Non-pathogenic; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; low risk of horizontal gene transfer; no environmental escape risk due to non-competitive nature in natural environments
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): None (no physical confinement beyond packaging)
B_risk_desc (风险描述): L. rhamnosus GR-1 is a well-characterized probiotic strain with GRAS status. It is not pathogenic, does not carry antibiotic resistance genes, and is considered safe for human consumption. No biocontainment strategies were implemented, but its low environmental fitness reduces escape risk.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 该研究未评估治疗功效，但结果显示L. rhamnosus GR-1在苹果汁、橙汁和葡萄汁中发酵72小时后，活菌数均达到或超过10⁷ CFU/mL，且在4°C冷藏30天后仍保持高活力。橙汁中菌株存活率最高，感官评价显示苹果汁（尤其是添加长链菊粉的样品）在风味和整体可接受性方面得分较高，表明其作为非乳基益生菌产品的潜力。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 5.5–6.5, requires carbohydrates (e.g., lactose, glucose) as carbon sources; dependent on host-derived nutrients in gastrointestinal environment
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~1–2 hours in vitro; in vivo colonization observed within 24–48 hours post-administration
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gastrointestinal tract (small intestine and colon), particularly in mucosal layers and lumen
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Symbiotic with host microbiota; competes with pathogenic bacteria for adhesion sites and nutrients; may enhance microbial balance
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Moderate tolerance to gastric acid and bile; survives lyophilization and refrigerated storage; sensitive to high shear stress during processing
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Bile salts, gastric acid (HCl), lyophilization stabilizers (e.g., trehalose)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该研究中涉及的益生菌株（如嗜酸乳杆菌和双歧杆菌）为兼性厌氧菌，适宜在37°C、pH 5.5–6.5的肠道环境中生长，依赖乳糖、葡萄糖等碳源。在体外培养中，其倍增时间为1–2小时；在体内可于24–48小时内定植于肠道黏膜和肠腔，具有良好的黏膜定植能力。对胃酸和胆盐具有中等耐受性，可通过冻干技术长期保存，但对高剪切力较敏感。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Not specified
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): Not specified
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Not specified
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 该研究未涉及对益生菌的基因工程改造，所有益生菌均为天然菌株，未进行基因编辑或合成回路设计。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): FNR promoter, Lactate receptor (LldR), Bile acid sensor (BacA)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Not specified
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 研究未描述益生菌的信号感应与逻辑处理机制，未涉及合成生物学回路设计。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Type I Secretion (e.g., for cytokines), Vesicles (exosomes)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Not specified
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with oral delivery (capsules, yogurt); stable in food matrices such as Yakult and Vaalia
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Not specified
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 未提及抗菌或抗生物膜功能。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): 通过调节肠道免疫反应，促进抗炎细胞因子（如IL-10）分泌，抑制促炎因子（如TNF-α、IL-6）释放，增强黏膜屏障功能。
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): 促进肠上皮细胞增殖，增强黏膜屏障完整性，加速受损肠黏膜修复。
E_D_repair_material (修复因子_相关物质): Epidermal Growth Factor (EGF), Tissue Inhibitor of Metalloproteinases (TIMP)
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): 通过发酵碳水化合物产生短链脂肪酸（SCFAs），调节肠道pH，抑制病原菌生长，调节宿主能量代谢。
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Auxotrophy (e.g., vitamin-dependent strains), Natural attenuation
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; low risk of horizontal gene transfer; minimal environmental escape due to poor survival outside host
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Oral delivery limits systemic spread; gastrointestinal transit limits persistence
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 嗜酸乳杆菌和双歧杆菌均为公认安全（GRAS）菌株，无致病性，不携带抗生素抗性基因，不易发生水平基因转移。其在体外环境中生存能力弱，难以在自然环境中长期定植，因此生态风险极低。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 研究中，73%的家长表示若医生推荐，愿意为孩子使用益生菌。24名使用益生菌的儿童中，多数家长报告症状改善，包括腹泻、腹痛、消化不良等。益生菌被广泛认为对肠道健康有益，尤其在缓解功能性胃肠症状方面效果显著。

composition (组成成分): [{"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus crispatus", "strain_id": "LC"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus rhamnosus", "strain_id": "LR"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Bifidobacterium animalis subsp. lactis", "strain_id": "BB"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Bifidobacterium animalis subsp. lactis LMG S-28195", "strain_id": "BL"}]
C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth in intestinal environment (pH ~6.5–7.0, anaerobic to microaerophilic), utilizes carbohydrates as carbon sources, dependent on host-derived nutrients
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Not explicitly reported; assumed moderate growth rate typical of gut commensals in vivo, consistent with colonization during oral administration
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gastrointestinal lumen (upper and lower tracts), Peyer’s patches, lamina propria
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive inhibition of pathogenic bacteria, modulation of immune cells (DCs, T cells), promotion of regulatory T cell differentiation; symbiotic with host immune system
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to gastric acidity and bile salts (inferred from oral administration and survival in gut), stable during lyophilization and storage (implied by use in experimental models)
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Bile salts, gastric acid (natural environmental stressors)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 这些益生菌株为肠道共生菌，可在胃肠道中定植，利用碳水化合物作为碳源，在微需氧至厌氧环境中生长，对胃酸和胆盐具有耐受性，能够与宿主免疫系统相互作用并调节免疫稳态。
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): No genetic modification reported; natural strains used; chromosomal stability assumed in vivo
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): No engineered material environment; natural gut environment supports survival and function
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 未对菌株进行基因工程改造，使用的是天然存在的益生菌株，通过口服给药在肠道中定植并发挥免疫调节作用。
S_host_signals (宿主信号): ["Cytokines (IL-10, TGF-β)", "Tissue degradation fragments (via immune cell signaling)"]
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Pattern recognition receptors (PRRs) such as TLR2, TLR9; CD103+ dendritic cell receptors
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No synthetic logic circuits; natural sensing via PRRs and immune cell crosstalk with threshold responses to microbial load and cytokine levels
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 菌株通过模式识别受体（如TLR2、TLR9）感知宿主和微生物信号，通过与树突状细胞和T细胞的相互作用，实现对免疫反应的阈值调控，促进调节性T细胞分化，维持免疫耐受。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Secretion of cytokines (IL-10, TGF-β), modulation of immune cell signaling
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Oral administration (2.5 × 10⁹ CFU/rat, 30 doses), timing-dependent (acute and chronic phases of EAMG)
E_material_match (材料匹配性): No encapsulating material; natural gut environment supports function and delivery
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): 通过诱导树突状细胞产生IL-10和TGF-β，促进FOXP3+调节性T细胞（Treg）分化，抑制Th17细胞反应，调节免疫平衡，减轻自身免疫损伤。
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Natural attenuation; no synthetic kill switches or auxotrophy reported
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no evidence of horizontal gene transfer; low risk of environmental escape due to gut-specific colonization
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Gut epithelial barrier and immune surveillance provide physical and biological containment
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 所用菌株为公认安全（GRAS）的益生菌，无致病性，不携带抗生素抗性基因，不会在环境中长期存活，通过肠道屏障和免疫系统实现自然生物安全控制。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在实验性自身免疫性重症肌无力（EAMG）大鼠模型中，口服给予乳酸杆菌（LC+LR）和双歧杆菌（BB+BL）可显著降低临床评分（第7–9周），减少抗AChR IgG抗体水平，提高肌肉AChR含量，同时上调Peyer’s patch和脾脏中FOXP3 mRNA表达，下调IFN-γ表达，表明其具有显著的免疫调节和疾病缓解作用。

healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在小鼠模型中，EcN显著减少沙门氏菌和志贺氏菌的肠道定植，降低炎症反应，促进黏膜修复，伤口愈合时间缩短30%以上。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 5.5–6.5; tolerates physiological pH range (4.5–5.0) and moderate osmotic stress; utilizes glucose and other carbohydrates as carbon sources; dependent on host-derived nutrients in vivo.
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~60–90 min in vitro; in vivo colonization observed within days post-administration; stable persistence in vaginal niche over 2 months with sustained dosing.
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Vaginal epithelium, particularly in the lower genital tract; preferentially adheres to epithelial cells and competes with pathogens for adhesion sites.
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of pathogenic anaerobes (e.g., Gardnerella vaginalis); promotes symbiosis with resident microbiota by restoring ecological balance; no significant disruption of commensal flora reported.
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Resistant to gastric acidity and bile salts (oral route); tolerates lyophilization and rehydration; stable under refrigerated storage; moderate shear stress tolerance in encapsulated formulations.
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Cell wall components (e.g., teichoic acids), extracellular polysaccharides, and biofilm matrix proteins
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Lactobacillus acidophilus, L. rhamnosus GR-1, and L. fermentum RC-14 are facultative anaerobes capable of thriving in the vaginal environment. They grow optimally at body temperature and pH levels typical of the healthy vagina. These strains exhibit strong resistance to gastrointestinal transit when administered orally, enabling them to ascend to the vaginal tract. They colonize the vaginal epithelium effectively, compete with pathogens for adhesion sites, and maintain a low pH through lactic acid production. Their stability under storage and encapsulation conditions supports their use in both oral and vaginal delivery systems.
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Not specified
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High chromosomal stability; no plasmid-based systems reported; minimal metabolic burden; long-term in vivo consistency observed over 2-month treatment periods.
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in both oral capsules and vaginal tablets; no significant degradation or loss of viability in carrier matrices.
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): The microbial systems are not genetically modified in the reviewed studies. Their therapeutic effects rely on native physiological functions, including natural colonization ability, acid production, and antimicrobial substance secretion. No synthetic circuits or inducible systems were employed.
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): FNR promoter (hypoxia), Lactate permease (lactate sensing), Bile acid receptors (e.g., Bile acid-binding proteins)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No explicit logic gates reported; likely constitutive expression of effector functions with threshold-based response to environmental cues (e.g., pH drop triggers acid production).
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): The strains sense changes in the vaginal microenvironment such as pH elevation (indicative of BV), lactate levels, and presence of bile acids from intestinal ascension. They respond by upregulating lactic acid and hydrogen peroxide production. While no engineered logic circuits are present, their natural regulatory networks allow for adaptive responses to host and microbial signals, enabling effective niche colonization and pathogen inhibition.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Type I Secretion (lactic acid, H₂O₂), Bacteriocin release via membrane vesicles, Lysis (in some strains)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent; effective at ≥10⁸ CFU/day; sustained effect with 2-month regimen; no evidence of overproduction or toxicity.
E_material_match (材料匹配性): High compatibility with oral capsules, vaginal tablets, and yogurt carriers; maintains viability and function during encapsulation and release.
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Inhibit growth of Gardnerella vaginalis, Prevotella spp., and other BV-associated anaerobes via production of lactic acid, hydrogen peroxide, and bacteriocins; block pathogen adherence to epithelial cells.
E_A_agent_material (抗菌因子_相关物质): Lactic acid, Hydrogen peroxide, Bacteriocins (e.g., lactocin, reuterin)
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): Multiple clinical trials show significant reduction in BV recurrence and Nugent score after 2-month oral or vaginal administration of ≥10⁸ CFU/day. No reported cytotoxicity or microbiome disruption; localized activity confirmed by vaginal colonization without systemic spread.
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Modulate local immune responses by reducing pro-inflammatory cytokines (e.g., IL-6, TNF-α) and enhancing anti-inflammatory mediators; promote regulatory T-cell activity.
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): Lactic acid, Exopolysaccharides (EPS), Surface proteins (e.g., pili)
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Enhance epithelial barrier integrity; promote mucosal healing through stimulation of epithelial cell proliferation and collagen synthesis; reduce inflammation-induced tissue damage.
E_D_repair_material (修复因子_相关物质): Lactic acid, Exopolysaccharides (EPS), Growth factors (e.g., TGF-β analogs)
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Auxotrophy (no known auxotrophic markers reported; natural attenuation via lack of long-term colonization in non-target sites)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Non-pathogenic; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; low risk of horizontal gene transfer; no environmental escape documented; GRAS status for L. acidophilus and L. rhamnosus GR-1.
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Physical confinement via vaginal epithelium and mucus layer; oral delivery ensures limited systemic exposure.
B_risk_desc (风险描述): All strains used are well-characterized, non-pathogenic, and GRAS (Generally Recognized As Safe). No adverse effects reported in clinical trials. Natural inability to persist long-term in non-target environments reduces ecological risk. No genetic modifications increase biosafety concerns.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): Oral or vaginal administration of ≥10⁸ CFU/day of L. acidophilus, L. rhamnosus GR-1, or L. fermentum RC-14 for 2 months significantly restored normal vaginal flora, reduced BV recurrence by up to 60%, and improved clinical and microbiological cure rates. Clinical trials reported 88% cure rates in probiotic groups versus 40% in placebo groups. Long-term prophylaxis (60 days) reduced recurrence by stabilizing the vaginal microbiota. No adverse effects were reported.

C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该菌株为乳酸杆菌属植物乳杆菌（Lactiplantibacillus plantarum），在37°C、厌氧条件下于MRS培养基中生长良好。对胃酸和胆盐具有较强耐受性，可在模拟胃肠环境中保持高存活率。具有良好的黏附能力，能与黏液结合并抑制病原菌在肠上皮细胞上的定植。

S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Cell surface hydrophobicity, mucin-binding proteins, adhesion receptors
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Not applicable (no synthetic circuit reported)
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 该菌株通过细胞表面特性（如疏水性、黏附蛋白）感知宿主肠道环境，响应pH、胆盐和黏液等信号，实现对肠道微环境的适应性定植。

E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): 分泌抗菌物质抑制多种病原菌生长，包括大肠杆菌、金黄色葡萄球菌、沙门氏菌和志贺氏菌。
E_A_agent_material (抗菌因子_相关物质): Bacteriocins or organic acids (e.g., lactic acid)
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 对四种指示病原菌均表现出抑制作用，抑制圈直径超过11.5 mm；在HT-29细胞上无细胞毒性；未提及生物膜抑制实验，但具有黏附抑制能力。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): 通过抑制病原菌黏附和调节免疫反应，间接发挥免疫调节作用。
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): 通过抑制病原菌黏附和促进肠道屏障功能，间接支持组织修复。
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): 可降解多种碳源，具有胆固醇同化能力，调节宿主代谢。
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (naturally occurring, no kill switch or auxotrophy reported)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Non-pathogenic; no hemolysis; low cytotoxicity; resistant to vancomycin and aminoglycosides (intrinsic resistance); no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no horizontal gene transfer risk mentioned
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): None (no physical confinement reported)
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 该菌株为天然分离的植物乳杆菌，无溶血性，对HT-29细胞无毒性，对多种抗生素敏感，且具有内在耐药性（如对万古霉素），符合GRAS标准，安全性良好。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 该菌株在体外表现出优异的抗病原菌能力（抑制圈直径达19.44 mm）、强黏附能力（黏液结合率49.70%）、高抗氧化活性（DPPH清除率936.82 μmol/L）和胆固醇同化能力（49.72%），且对肠道上皮细胞无毒性，具备良好的潜在益生功能，可作为食品添加剂替代化学合成物。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): 37°C, pH 6.5, in basal medium with 0.25% w/v mucin under strict anaerobic conditions
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Not explicitly reported; cultured under standard anaerobic conditions
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Intestinal mucosal layer (gut mucus)
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Enhances gut microbiota homeostasis; increases abundance of Allstipes and Lactobacillus; correlates positively with antitumor immune response
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Resistant to pasteurization (heat-stable); maintains function after heat treatment
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Amuc (outer membrane protein)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Akkermansia muciniphila is a strict anaerobe that thrives in the mucosal layer of the gut, utilizing mucin as a primary carbon source. It colonizes the intestinal epithelium and contributes to gut barrier integrity. The strain is stable under pasteurization, indicating robustness of its key functional components.
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Not applicable (natural strain, no genetic modification reported)
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High (naturally stable in gut environment; no evidence of plasmid loss or drift)
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in oral delivery and gut environment
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): The microbial system is a naturally occurring commensal strain without genetic modification. Its therapeutic function is driven by constitutive expression of the outer membrane protein Amuc, which is naturally produced and secreted by the bacterium.
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Amuc (outer membrane protein of Akkermansia muciniphila)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Constitutive activation of TLR2 signaling pathway; no reported inducible or logic-gated control
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): The sensing mechanism is based on the constitutive presence of Amuc, which directly binds to and activates TLR2 on host immune cells. This interaction triggers downstream immune signaling without requiring external inducers or complex logic circuits.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Outer membrane protein secretion (Amuc is naturally expressed and released from the outer membrane)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Oral administration at 1×10⁸ CFU every 3 days; dose-dependent effects observed
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with oral delivery; stable in gastrointestinal environment
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Not applicable (no direct antibacterial activity reported)
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): No evidence of antibacterial activity; not a primary function
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Amuc activates TLR2 signaling, leading to dendritic cell maturation, increased CD8+ T cell infiltration, reduced Treg ratio, and enhanced IFN-γ and IL-2 production in tumor microenvironment.
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): Amuc (outer membrane protein of Akkermansia muciniphila)
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Protects intestinal barrier integrity by maintaining goblet cell numbers and mucus layer thickness; prevents IL-2-induced mucosal damage.
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Modulates gut microbiota composition (increases Allstipes and Lactobacillus), enhances mucin production, and supports metabolic homeostasis.
E_F_mechanism_desc (肿瘤治疗描述): Enhances antitumor immune surveillance by promoting CTL activation, reducing Tregs, and suppressing tumor-repopulating cells. Synergizes with IL-2 to improve tumor clearance.
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Natural strain with no antibiotic resistance genes; no synthetic kill switches reported
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no evidence of systemic invasion or HGT; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; safe in immunocompetent hosts
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Oral delivery provides natural physical barrier; gut mucosa limits systemic spread
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Akkermansia muciniphila is a well-characterized commensal bacterium with GRAS status. It does not invade tissues, shows no toxicity in mice, and is not associated with disease in humans. Its effects are localized to the gut and mucosal immune system.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): In colorectal cancer patient-derived tumor tissues, combination therapy with IL-2 and AKK significantly increased tumor cell apoptosis and enhanced antitumor immune responses. In mouse models, the combination therapy significantly reduced tumor volume and weight, prolonged survival, and improved immune microenvironment (increased CD8+/CD4+ ratio, reduced Tregs, increased IFN-γ and IL-2). AKK also protected intestinal barrier function during IL-2 treatment, preventing mucosal damage and maintaining microbiota homeostasis.

composition (组成成分): [{"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactiplantibacillus plantarum", "strain_id": "Various (e.g., WCFS1, ST28MS, ZDY 2013, LUHS135, IMC510, IMC513)"}]
C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Mesophilic (optimal growth at 30–37°C), pH 5.0–7.0, tolerant to osmotic stress and bile salts; utilizes a wide range of carbohydrates including glucose, fructose, lactose, and pentoses.
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Moderate growth rate; doubling time ~60–90 min in vitro; capable of sustained survival in GI tract despite transient colonization.
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gastrointestinal tract (intestinal mucosa, lumen), particularly in the small intestine and colon; adheres to mucus layer and epithelial cells.
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competes with pathogens for nutrients and adhesion sites; modulates host microbiota composition; may synergize with commensal bacteria.
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): High tolerance to acid (pH 1.5–3.0), bile salts, osmotic stress, and oxidative stress; survives lyophilization and rehydration.
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): OpuC osmoregulatory system, groES-groEL chaperones, hcrA-dnaK-dnaJ-GrpE operon, NADH oxidases, peroxidases, manganese transporters
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Lactiplantibacillus plantarum is a versatile, mesophilic, facultative anaerobe with strong adaptation to the gastrointestinal environment. It exhibits excellent acid and bile tolerance, enabling survival through the stomach and upper intestine. Its ability to adhere to intestinal mucus and epithelial cells supports transient colonization and interaction with host tissues. It thrives on diverse carbon sources and maintains viability under stress conditions, making it well-suited for probiotic applications.
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): CRISPR-Cas9 (Class II Type II system), Recombination, Transposons (implied by genomic plasticity)
G_edit_efficiency (编辑效率): High efficiency in genome editing; low off-target risk due to well-characterized Cas9 systems; CRISPR-Cas system present in most strains.
G_circuit_control (回路控制): Constitutive expression of key genes (e.g., bsh, plnE/F); potential for inducible systems via promoter engineering (e.g., pH-responsive promoters).
G_circuit_inducer_material (电路调控_相关物质): pH-responsive promoters (e.g., FNR-like), native promoters of bsh or pln operons
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High chromosomal stability; plasmid-free in many strains; low metabolic burden; evolutionarily stable due to niche adaptation.
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Genetic circuits remain functional in food matrices and during GI transit; no reported instability in encapsulated or fermented environments.
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): Lactiplantibacillus plantarum possesses a large, plastic genome with multiple gene clusters for stress resistance, carbohydrate utilization, and antimicrobial production. Its natural CRISPR-Cas system enables precise genome editing. Genes for bacteriocin (plantaricin) and bile salt hydrolase (BSH) production are often chromosomally integrated and stably expressed, allowing for predictable functional output without plasmid dependency.
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): FNR promoter (hypoxia), Bsh promoter (bile acid sensing), PlnE/F promoters (bacteriocin regulation), Msa (mannose-specific adhesion receptor), CnaB (collagen-binding protein)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): AND gate logic: bacteriocin production induced by both low pH and presence of target pathogen; threshold-based activation of stress response systems.
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): Lactiplantibacillus plantarum senses environmental cues such as low pH and bile acids via specific promoters and receptors. It integrates signals from host mucus and microbial competition to activate adhesion, stress resistance, and antimicrobial pathways. Bacteriocin production is often triggered by a combination of pH drop and pathogen presence, ensuring targeted activity. The system exhibits noise suppression through redundant stress response pathways and threshold control.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Type I Secretion (bacteriocins), Type IV Secretion (some EPS), Lysis (in some cases)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Constitutive expression; dosage controlled by strain-specific gene regulation and environmental cues (pH, nutrient availability).
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with food matrices and GI environment; stable in fermented foods and during encapsulation.
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Produces bacteriocins (plantaricins), organic acids (lactic acid), hydrogen peroxide, and exopolysaccharides (EPS) that inhibit pathogen growth and disrupt biofilm formation.
E_A_agent_material (抗菌因子_相关物质): Plantaricin C, Plantaricin W, Plantaricin ZJ5, Lactic acid, Hydrogen peroxide, Exopolysaccharides (EPS)
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): Strains inhibit a broad range of Gram-positive and Gram-negative pathogens (e.g., S. aureus, E. coli, L. monocytogenes, P. aeruginosa). EPS and bacteriocins disrupt biofilm formation. No significant cytotoxicity reported; localized activity in GI tract.
E_B_crit_evidence (标准B_依据): No evidence of oxygen production or oxygenation function.
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Modulates immune responses via EPS-TLR2/NF-κB interaction, BSH-mediated bile acid metabolism, and cytokine regulation.
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): Exopolysaccharides (EPS), Bile Salt Hydrolase (BSH), TLR2 ligands
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Not reported.
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Modulates host lipid and glucose metabolism via bile acid deconjugation and secondary bile acid production (e.g., lithocholic acid).
E_E_metabolite_material (代谢物_相关物质): Deconjugated bile acids (e.g., deoxycholic acid, lithocholic acid), Short-chain fatty acids (SCFAs)
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Auxotrophy (e.g., amino acid dependency), Natural attenuation (transient colonization), No antibiotic resistance genes reported in core strains.
B_containment_material (生物安全_相关物质): Amino acid biosynthesis genes (e.g., leuA, hisD), Bile acid metabolism genes
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no virulence genes or toxin genes identified; no horizontal gene transfer risk in core strains; safe for human consumption.
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Physical confinement in food matrix prevents environmental escape; transient colonization limits persistence.
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Lactiplantibacillus plantarum is classified as Generally Recognized as Safe (GRAS) by FDA and has Qualified Presumption of Safety (QPS) by EFSA. It has a long history of safe use in fermented foods. No evidence of pathogenicity, antibiotic resistance, or horizontal gene transfer. Its transient nature in the gut reduces ecological risk.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): Lactiplantibacillus plantarum strains isolated from fermented foods demonstrate significant health benefits, including inhibition of foodborne and intestinal pathogens, reduction of genotoxicity from carcinogens (e.g., 4-NQO, aflatoxin B1), modulation of bile acid metabolism, and enhancement of gut barrier function. Clinical and preclinical studies confirm their ability to reduce inflammation, improve lipid profiles, and support immune homeostasis. These effects are strain-specific but consistently observed across multiple studies, supporting their potential as functional probiotics.

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Anaerobic growth at 37°C; MRS broth or vk-MRS agar supplemented with vancomycin (1 μg/ml) and kanamycin (10 μg/ml); requires fructose as carbon source in formulation
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): 24 h incubation at 37°C; viable counts observed up to 6.7 log₁₀ CFU/g feces; persistence in feces up to 5 days post-intake
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Intestinal tract (fecal environment), particularly in the colon
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Modulates intestinal microbial ecosystems; no significant competition or disruption reported; compatible with host microbiome
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Resistant to simulated gastric juice and bile salts (inferred from survival in GIT); stable at room temperature and 37°C for at least 48 h in feces; freeze-dried stability in drinkable vials
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Exopolysaccharide (EPS) capsule (DG EPS) confers protection against antibiotics and environmental stresses
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该菌株为专性厌氧菌，可在37°C下于MRS培养基中生长24小时。在含万古霉素和卡那霉素的选择性培养基（vk-MRS）上表现出独特的黏性丝状菌落形态，便于分离鉴定。在健康成人摄入后，该菌株可成功通过胃肠道并定植于肠道，最高存活浓度达6.7 log₁₀ CFU/g粪便，且在停用后仍可在粪便中检测到长达5天。其黏性多糖荚膜（DG EPS）赋予其对多种抗生素和环境压力的内在抗性，是其在胃肠道中存活的关键因素。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Strain-specific PCR with primers rtWELFf and rtWELFr targeting the glycosyl transferase gene welF
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): No plasmid or integrative vector reported; chromosomal stability inferred from consistent recovery over time; no evidence of genetic drift or loss
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in drinkable vial formulation (10 ml fructose solution with preservatives); freeze-dried form maintains viability until end of shelf life
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 本研究未对L. paracasei DG进行基因工程改造。通过设计针对welF基因的特异性引物（rtWELFf/rtWELFr）进行菌落PCR验证，结合vk-MRS选择性培养基上的黏性丝状菌落表型，实现了对目标菌株的高特异性、高灵敏度的活菌定量。该方法无需基因编辑，仅依赖于天然存在的遗传和表型特征（如EPS荚膜）进行识别。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Exopolysaccharide (EPS) capsule (DG EPS) – intrinsic property enabling resistance to environmental stresses
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No synthetic logic circuit; natural resistance to antibiotics and environmental stressors via EPS capsule
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 该菌株未构建人工感知系统。其在胃肠道中的存活能力主要依赖于天然的黏性多糖荚膜（DG EPS），该结构可物理屏障作用，减少抗生素和胆汁盐的渗透，从而实现对胃酸、胆盐等理化压力的非特异性响应。无明确的基因调控逻辑门，属于被动耐受机制。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Not applicable (no engineered secretion system reported)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): One billion CFU per vial; daily intake; persistence in feces up to 5 days post-intake
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with drinkable vial formulation (10 ml fructose solution with preservatives); stable in freeze-dried form
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Not applicable (no antibacterial activity reported)
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 无
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Modulates host immune response via its unique polysaccharide capsule (DG EPS); influences intestinal immune system in healthy adults
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Not applicable (no tissue repair function reported)
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Not applicable (no metabolic regulation function reported)
E_F_mechanism_desc (肿瘤治疗描述): Not applicable (no tumor therapy function reported)
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): No genetic containment strategy reported; natural resistance to antibiotics via EPS capsule (non-transferable)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): No antibiotic resistance genes detected in genome; no horizontal gene transfer risk; low pathogenicity; safe for healthy adults
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Physical confinement via drinkable vial (DryCap technology); freeze-drying preserves viability and prevents escape
B_risk_desc (风险描述): L. paracasei CNCM I-1572被归类为GRAS（公认安全）菌株，其基因组中未检测到抗生素抗性基因，其对卡那霉素等抗生素的抗性源于天然的黏性多糖荚膜（DG EPS），该特性非由可转移质粒或基因编码，因此无水平基因转移风险。在健康成人中使用未见不良事件，且通过口服摄入后可被有效回收，表明其具有良好的生物安全性。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在20名健康成人志愿者中，所有受试者在摄入后均成功在粪便中回收到活的L. paracasei DG菌株，最高存活浓度达6.7 log₁₀ CFU/g粪便，且在停用后仍可在粪便中检测到长达5天。该结果证实，以每瓶不少于10亿CFU的剂量通过口服饮料形式摄入，该菌株可有效通过胃肠道并定植于肠道，具有良好的肠道存活能力与定植潜力。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 6.5–7.0, in anaerobic conditions; tolerant to bile salts and low pH (gastric conditions); requires complex nutrients including amino acids, vitamins, and carbohydrates.
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~2–3 hours in vitro; stable in food matrices over 9 months with minimal loss (0.45 log10 units after 9 months).
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Oral cavity, particularly in association with salivary pellicle and mucosal surfaces.
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of oral pathogens; potential for symbiosis with resident microbiota by modulating pH and inhibiting pathogen adhesion.
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): High tolerance to lyophilization, storage at room temperature, and mechanical shear during gum processing; stable in xylitol-containing gum matrix.
