C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Xylitol, gum matrix (chewing gum mass, lecithin, glycerol)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Bifidobacterium animalis ssp. lactis Bb12 is a facultative anaerobe with strong environmental tolerance, capable of surviving in the oral cavity and maintaining viability in chewing gum for up to 9 months. It grows optimally under anaerobic conditions at 37°C and is resistant to bile and low pH, enabling it to persist in the gastrointestinal and oral environments. Its stability in the gum matrix ensures delivery to the oral mucosa.
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Not applicable (natural strain, no genetic modification reported)
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High chromosomal stability; no plasmid-based systems used; no evidence of genetic drift or loss in long-term storage.
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): High stability in xylitol-containing chewing gum matrix; no degradation or loss of viability during 9-month storage.
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): The strain Bb12 is used in its native form without genetic modification. Its functionality relies on natural metabolic and ecological properties, including acid production and competitive exclusion of pathogens. No synthetic circuits or inducible systems are employed.
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): General stress response systems (e.g., acid tolerance response, osmotic stress regulators); no specific engineered sensor reported.
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Constitutive expression; no logic gates or threshold control observed.
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): The strain exhibits constitutive activity without environmental sensing or feedback regulation. Its presence in the oral cavity is sustained by physical retention in the gum matrix and natural adaptation to oral conditions.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Passive release from gum matrix upon chewing; no active secretion systems reported.
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Controlled by chewing frequency (twice daily) and gum composition; dose delivered per 2 gums: ~2.87 × 10⁸ CFU.
E_material_match (材料匹配性): High compatibility with xylitol-containing chewing gum; stable in matrix without structural disruption or excessive gas production.
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): N/A
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): N/A
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Stimulates salivary IgA secretion, enhancing mucosal immunity and resistance to infection.
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): Secretory IgA (sIgA) induction via host immune signaling
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): N/A
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Produces organic acids (e.g., lactic acid) that lower local pH, inhibiting cariogenic bacteria; contributes to oral pH homeostasis.
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (natural strain, no kill-switch or auxotrophy reported)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no evidence of horizontal gene transfer; low opportunistic risk in healthy individuals.
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Physical confinement via chewing gum matrix; limited systemic exposure.
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Bifidobacterium animalis ssp. lactis Bb12 is a well-characterized GRAS strain with a long history of safe use in food and supplements. It does not colonize permanently and is not associated with infections in immunocompetent individuals. No adverse effects were observed in the study except mild gastrointestinal gas, likely due to aerophagia.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): Xylitol-containing chewing gum, with or without probiotics, significantly increased unstimulated salivary flow rate after 2 months of use, reduced dry mouth sensation, and elevated salivary IgA levels and pH. However, no additional benefit was observed from adding Bb12 compared to placebo. The probiotic strain demonstrated good stability in the gum matrix and transient presence in saliva, suggesting potential for mucosal immune modulation, but not significant clinical improvement in hyposalivation parameters.

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 5.5–6.5; tolerant to bile and low pH; requires carbohydrates (e.g., glucose, lactose) and amino acids.
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~1–2 hours in vitro; moderate stability in gum matrix (decreased by 1.65 log10 units after 9 months).
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Oral cavity, particularly in association with mucosal surfaces and salivary pellicle.
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive inhibition of pathogens; potential synergistic interactions with B. longum strains in modulating immune responses.
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Moderate tolerance to lyophilization and storage; reduced viability after 7.5 months in gum matrix.
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Xylitol, gum matrix (lecithin, glycerol)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Lactobacillus rhamnosus LGG is a facultative anaerobe with strong acid tolerance and bile resistance, enabling survival in the oral and gastrointestinal tracts. It is capable of transient colonization in the oral cavity. The B. longum strains 2C and 46 are also facultative anaerobes with similar environmental tolerance and are selected for gut barrier stabilization. The consortium is delivered via chewing gum and maintains viability for up to 4 months, after which stability declines.
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Not applicable (natural strains, no genetic modification reported)
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High chromosomal stability; no plasmid systems used; no evidence of drift in short-term use.
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Moderate stability in xylitol-containing gum; viability declines after 7.5 months.
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): The consortium is used in its native form without genetic engineering. Functional synergy arises from natural metabolic and ecological interactions between LGG and B. longum strains, particularly in immune modulation and pathogen inhibition.
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): General stress response systems (e.g., acid tolerance, osmotic regulators); no engineered sensors reported.
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Constitutive expression; no logic gates or feedback control observed.
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): The consortium functions via constitutive metabolic activity without environmental sensing. Its presence in the oral cavity is sustained by physical retention in the gum matrix and natural adaptation to oral conditions.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Passive release from gum matrix upon chewing; no active secretion systems reported.
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Controlled by chewing frequency (twice daily); total dose per 2 gums: ~3.35 × 10⁸ CFU.
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Moderate compatibility with xylitol-containing gum; viability declines after 7.5 months, but sufficient for 3-month intervention.
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): N/A
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): N/A
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Stimulates salivary IgA secretion and modulates mucosal immune responses, enhancing resistance to infection.
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): Secretory IgA (sIgA) induction via host immune signaling
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): N/A
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Produces lactic acid and other organic acids that lower local pH, inhibiting cariogenic bacteria; contributes to oral pH balance.
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (natural strains, no kill-switch or auxotrophy reported)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no evidence of horizontal gene transfer; low opportunistic risk in healthy individuals.
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Physical confinement via chewing gum matrix; limited systemic exposure.
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Lactobacillus rhamnosus LGG and B. longum 2C/46 are well-established GRAS strains with extensive safety records. The consortium showed transient presence in saliva (61.1% positive samples at 3 months), indicating oral colonization without persistent overgrowth. No adverse effects were reported except mild gastrointestinal gas, likely due to aerophagia.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): The consortium of LGG, B. longum 2C, and B. longum 46 was transiently detectable in saliva (61.1% positive at 3 months), suggesting oral colonization. It contributed to increased salivary IgA and pH, and reduced dry mouth sensation, similar to placebo. However, no statistically significant improvement over placebo was observed in salivary flow rate, IgA, or pH. The probiotic effect was not superior to xylitol gum alone, but the strains demonstrated stability and biological activity in the oral environment.

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Growth at 20–23°C, marine environment, aerobic conditions, in marine broth (MB) with glucose and skimmed milk
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Growth rate: 3 days for pre-culture, 2 days for main culture; doubling time not specified; in vitro growth confirmed, no in vivo growth rate data provided
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gastrointestinal lumen of turbot larvae; does not colonize intestinal epithelium
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Antagonistic to Vibrio anguillarum; no evidence of symbiosis or competition with host microbiome; does not colonize gut epithelium
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to moderate shear stress (rotifer enrichment), stable in seawater; no data on UV, drying, or lyophilization
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Marine broth (MB), sterile seawater
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Roseobacter strain 27-4 is a marine bacterium that grows aerobically in marine broth at 20–23°C. It does not colonize the intestinal epithelium of turbot larvae but persists in the gastrointestinal lumen. It is not pathogenic to larvae when delivered as live cells, but its culture supernatant is toxic due to nutrient-driven proliferation of opportunistic pathogens.
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): No genetic modifications reported; natural strain used; stability in marine environment and rotifers confirmed by repeated detection
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in marine broth and seawater; maintains viability during rotifer bioencapsulation
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): No genetic engineering was performed. The strain was used in its natural form for probiotic testing. No plasmids, promoters, or synthetic circuits were introduced.
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Not applicable (no engineered sensors reported)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Not applicable (no synthetic logic circuits described)
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): No engineered sensing or logic systems were used. The strain's probiotic effect is attributed to natural antagonism, not responsive genetic circuits.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Soluble factor secretion (sulphur-containing antibacterial compound)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Requires repeated addition (every 48–72 h) to maintain effective levels; no controlled release or feedback system reported
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with rotifer bioencapsulation and marine broth; stable in seawater and rearing tanks
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Roseobacter 27-4 produces a soluble sulphur-containing antibacterial factor that inhibits Vibrio anguillarum in vitro under stagnant conditions. The effect is density-dependent and occurs at high cell densities.
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): The strain is non-pathogenic to turbot larvae when delivered as live cells. Mortality was only observed with culture supernatant, which is due to secondary pathogen growth, not direct toxicity of Roseobacter. The antibacterial effect is localized and does not disrupt the rearing environment.
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (natural strain, no kill-switch or auxotrophy reported)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Non-pathogenic to turbot larvae; no antibiotic resistance genes or HGT risk reported; low opportunistic risk; no environmental escape data
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Physical confinement via rearing tanks and rotifer delivery system; no engineered barrier
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Roseobacter strain 27-4 is non-pathogenic and safe for use in turbot larval rearing. However, its culture supernatant promotes growth of opportunistic pathogens like Vibrionaceae, so careful handling is required. No genetic modifications or biosafety risks are associated with the strain as used.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): In turbot larvae challenged with Vibrio anguillarum, the addition of Roseobacter 27-4 reduced accumulated mortality from 34% to 68% relative to control, effectively halving mortality. Survival was significantly improved (p < 0.05), and larvae showed no signs of tissue damage. The probiotic effect was sustained through repeated delivery via bioencapsulated rotifers.

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Growth at 37°C in LB medium (rich medium) or Vogel–Bonner minimal medium; E. coli requires glucose as carbon source; S. albus cannot grow in defined medium but grows well in LB.
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): E. coli reaches ~1–2 × 10⁹ cells/mL in batch culture; S. albus reaches ~8 × 10⁹ cells/mL in stationary phase.
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Not specified – used in lab settings; potential for wound or tissue surface application via nanofibre mat.
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Not specified – no interaction with host microbiome described.
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): High tolerance to mechanical stress (resists >50,000×g); E. coli more sensitive to rapid dehydration during electrospinning; S. albus shows high viability post-encapsulation.
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Glycerol (protects E. coli from dehydration during electrospinning)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 大肠杆菌（E. coli）为革兰氏阴性杆菌，可在LB培养基中37°C生长，密度可达1–2×10⁹ cells/mL；金黄色葡萄球菌（S. albus）为革兰氏阳性球菌，需在LB等富营养培养基中生长，密度可达8×10⁹ cells/mL。两者均具有较强的细胞壁结构，能耐受高机械应力，但大肠杆菌在快速脱水过程中易失活。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Not applicable – no genetic modifications reported.
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): Not applicable – no plasmids or engineered circuits used.
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Not applicable
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 未进行基因工程改造，仅通过物理封装方式将细菌和病毒嵌入聚乙烯醇（PVA）纳米纤维中，无遗传调控或合成电路设计。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Not applicable
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Not applicable
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 未设计任何感知或逻辑控制模块，系统为被动封装，无响应环境信号的能力。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Passive release upon dissolution of PVA matrix
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Not controllable – release depends on matrix degradation rate
E_material_match (材料匹配性): High compatibility – PVA nanofibres provide stable encapsulation and allow gradual release upon hydration
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): 通过物理封装维持细菌活性，但未主动释放抗菌物质；其主要功能为作为载体，而非直接杀菌。
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 细菌在纳米纤维中保持活性，且未破坏纤维结构，但未表现出主动抗菌或抗生物膜能力。
E_B_crit_evidence (标准B_依据): 未涉及氧气生成或代谢调控。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): 未表达免疫调节因子。
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): 未分泌组织修复因子。
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): 未调控代谢产物如SCFAs或色氨酸代谢物。
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Physical encapsulation in PVA nanofibres
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): E. coli K12 is non-pathogenic; S. albus is non-pathogenic; bacteriophages are host-specific and do not infect human cells. No antibiotic resistance genes or HGT risk reported.
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Effective – PVA matrix prevents release of organisms until dissolution in aqueous environment
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 该系统使用非致病性大肠杆菌K12和金黄色葡萄球菌，且病毒仅感染细菌，无感染人类风险。物理封装提供有效屏障，防止生物体逃逸，符合BSL-1标准。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 未评估伤口愈合效果；但纳米纤维可作为载体用于药物、基因或噬菌体递送，具有潜在治疗应用前景。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Growth at 37°C in MRS broth; pH not explicitly stated, but MRS is typically near neutral; nutritional requirements include carbohydrates, amino acids, and vitamins as part of MRS medium.
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Growth rate not quantified; cells harvested after overnight incubation (12–16 h) at 37°C.
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Small intestine lamina propria and intestinal lumen
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competes with enterobacteria; increases lactobacilli population; modulates microbiota balance by reducing enterobacteria in non-stressed mice.
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to lyophilization/rehydration (used in preparation); stable in 10% non-fat milk; viability maintained during daily suspension preparation.
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Non-fat milk (vehicle for suspension)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该乳酸杆菌在37°C下于MRS培养基中生长，为兼性厌氧菌，可定植于小肠固有层和肠腔，具有良好的稳定性，可在非脂肪牛奶中保持活力，用于口服给药。
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 该菌株未经过基因工程改造，为天然分离株，直接用于口服干预，无外源基因插入或调控回路设计。
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 该菌株未被工程化设计为响应特定信号，其免疫调节作用为天然生理功能，无明确的传感逻辑模块。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Natural secretion (no engineered delivery system)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Oral administration at 1×10⁸ CFU/mL in drinking water daily; dose maintained via daily preparation.
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with oral suspension in drinking water; no encapsulation or material barrier used.
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): 通过增加IgA+ B细胞、CD4+ T细胞、CD11b+巨噬细胞和CD11c+树突状细胞数量，提升肠道黏膜免疫应答；调节IFN-γ水平，恢复免疫稳态。
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): 改善应激诱导的小肠绒毛缩短和隐窝深度减少，恢复肠道屏障结构，可能通过调节Bcl-2蛋白平衡细胞凋亡与增殖。
E_D_repair_material (修复因子_相关物质): Lactobacillus casei CRL 431 (indirect via immune modulation)
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (natural strain, no synthetic kill switches or auxotrophy)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Non-pathogenic; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; low risk of horizontal gene transfer; no environmental escape reported.
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): None (no physical confinement used)
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Lactobacillus casei CRL 431为公认安全（GRAS）菌株，来源于婴儿粪便，无致病性，未进行基因改造，无生物安全风险，适用于口服干预。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在应激小鼠模型中，L. casei CRL 431显著恢复了IgA+ B细胞、CD4+ T细胞和巨噬细胞数量，改善了肠道组织结构，降低了IFN-γ水平，增强了黏膜免疫，并调节了肠道菌群平衡，提示其在应激状态下具有显著的免疫调节和肠道保护作用。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 5.5–6.5, tolerates moderate osmotic stress; requires carbohydrates (e.g., glucose, fructose) as carbon sources; no specific vitamin dependency reported
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~1.5–2 hours in vitro; in vivo colonization ability in oral cavity is moderate, with transient persistence after ingestion
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Oral cavity (gingival crevice, mucosal surfaces); transient colonization, not permanent engraftment
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of periodontal pathogens (e.g., Porphyromonas gingivalis, Tannerella forsythia); may promote symbiosis with commensal oral microbiota by reducing inflammation
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to gastric acid (pH 2–3) and bile salts; stable during lyophilization and rehydration; resistant to moderate shear stress during oral ingestion
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Cell wall components (e.g., teichoic acids), acid tolerance response (ATR) genes
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Lactobacillus rhamnosus SP1 is a facultative anaerobe capable of surviving in the oral environment, with moderate tolerance to acidic and osmotic stresses. It transiently colonizes the oral cavity after ingestion, where it exerts beneficial effects through competitive exclusion and immune modulation.
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): Chromosomal stability; no plasmid-based genetic modifications reported; no evidence of metabolic burden or drift in clinical use
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): No genetic modifications; stability in sachet formulation (lyophilized powder) is maintained during storage and reconstitution
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): Lactobacillus rhamnosus SP1 used in this study is a naturally occurring strain without genetic engineering. Its probiotic effects are attributed to intrinsic biological properties rather than synthetic circuits or engineered pathways.
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): FNR-like regulators (hypoxia sensing), lactate permeases, bile acid transporters, TLR2/4 signaling pathways
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No engineered logic gates; natural sensing of environmental cues (e.g., low pH, lactate accumulation) triggers adaptive responses such as acid tolerance and biofilm formation
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): Lactobacillus rhamnosus SP1 naturally senses changes in oral environment such as pH drop due to bacterial metabolism, lactate accumulation, and bile exposure. It responds by activating acid tolerance mechanisms and modulating surface adhesins, enabling transient survival and interaction with host tissues.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Passive diffusion and cell lysis; no specialized secretion systems reported
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): One sachet daily (2 × 10⁷ CFU/day) for 3 months; dosage is fixed and not dynamically controllable
E_material_match (材料匹配性): High compatibility with sachet formulation; stable during lyophilization and rehydration; no interference with gel or matrix structure
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Inhibits biofilm formation by periodontal pathogens through competitive exclusion and production of lactic acid, which lowers local pH and disrupts microbial community stability.
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): Lactobacillus rhamnosus SP1 reduces pathogenic bacterial load and inhibits biofilm formation in periodontal pockets; no significant cytotoxicity or microbiome disruption observed in clinical trial.
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Modulates host immune response by downregulating pro-inflammatory cytokines (e.g., IL-1β, TNF-α) and promoting anti-inflammatory mediators, thereby reducing gingival inflammation in periodontitis.
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): Cell wall components (e.g., peptidoglycan, lipoteichoic acid), secreted immunomodulatory proteins
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Auxotrophy (natural requirement for specific nutrients not available in host environment); no suicide genes or inducible kill switches
B_containment_material (生物安全_相关物质): Nutrient-dependent growth (e.g., specific amino acids, vitamins)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no horizontal gene transfer observed; low risk of environmental escape due to transient colonization
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Sachet packaging provides physical containment; oral ingestion limits environmental release
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Lactobacillus rhamnosus SP1 is classified as GRAS (Generally Recognized As Safe) with decades of clinical use. No adverse events were reported in this trial or in prior studies. Its transient nature in the oral cavity and lack of genetic modifications minimize biosafety risks.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在为期1年的随访中，试验组（SRP + L. rhamnosus SP1）在牙周探诊深度（PPD）减少方面优于对照组（SRP + 安慰剂），尤其在PPD ≥ 6 mm的患者比例上显著降低，表明该益生菌可减少对牙周手术的需求。临床参数如CAL、BOP和PI均持续改善，且无不良反应，显示其在慢性牙周炎非手术治疗中的良好疗效和安全性。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): 30°C in M17 broth with 0.5% glucose (GM17); pH tolerance not explicitly stated, but survives in gastrointestinal tract
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Growth for 18 h at 30°C; in vivo survival limited to 6 h post-oral administration, no long-term colonization
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gastrointestinal tract (transient passage through intestines)
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): No significant impact on resident flora; does not proliferate in intestines
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Survives low pH and high bile concentration; heat-killed cells lose function
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Capsular polysaccharide (implicated in immune evasion)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该菌株为乳酸乳球菌（Lactococcus lactis）C59，属于乳酸菌，可在30°C下于含0.5%葡萄糖的M17培养基中生长18小时。该菌株具有耐酸和耐胆盐的能力，可在胃肠道中短暂存活，但无法在肠道内长期定植或增殖。其细胞表面具有荚膜多糖，可能有助于逃避巨噬细胞吞噬，从而在肠道中实现短暂免疫调节作用。
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 该研究未对Lactococcus lactis C59进行基因工程改造，所有功能均基于其天然生理特性。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Capsular polysaccharide (putative immune recognition molecule)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No engineered logic; natural immune modulation via antigen and cytokine feedback
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 该菌株通过其表面荚膜多糖与宿主免疫细胞相互作用，诱导免疫调节反应。在体外实验中，其可抑制抗CD3抗体刺激下T细胞的IL-4分泌，但不显著影响IFN-γ或IL-10。其作用机制依赖于活菌状态，表明其可能通过特定分子感知宿主免疫微环境并调节Th2反应。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Passive release via cell lysis or natural secretion (not engineered)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent suppression of IL-4 and IgE; effective at 70 μg dry weight/day
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with oral suspension in saline; no encapsulation or material barrier used
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Oral administration of live C59 significantly suppressed IL-4 production by splenocytes and CD4+ T cells, leading to reduced total IgE antibody levels in OVA-sensitized mice.
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (natural strain, no kill-switch or auxotrophy reported)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Non-pathogenic; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no evidence of horizontal gene transfer; transient gut passage reduces environmental escape risk
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): None (oral administration without physical confinement)
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Lactococcus lactis C59为食品级安全菌株（GRAS），无致病性，不产生抗生素抗性基因，且在肠道中仅短暂存活，无法定植，因此环境逃逸风险极低。其功能依赖于活菌状态，热灭活后即失效，具有天然安全性。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 口服活菌C59显著降低OVA致敏小鼠的总IgE抗体水平（P < 0.05），其机制为抑制脾细胞和CD4+ T细胞的IL-4分泌，从而调节Th1/Th2平衡。该效应在三个独立实验中均得到验证，但未显著影响特异性IgE、IgG1或IgG2a水平。菌株在口服后6小时内可检测到活菌，但24小时后即无法检出，表明其为短暂作用的免疫调节剂。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 30–37°C, pH 5–7; tolerates gastric acidity and bile salts; utilizes glucose and other carbohydrates as carbon sources
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Moderate growth rate in vitro; no in vivo growth kinetics reported in the paper
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Intestinal lumen, particularly in the context of disrupted microbiota (e.g., post-antibiotic or CDI setting)
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Potential competitive exclusion of pathogens; may modulate host immune response; no evidence of stable colonization or symbiosis with resident microbiota
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to gastric acid and bile; stable during storage in dry form; limited data on UV, shear, or lyophilization stability
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Cell wall components (e.g., mannoproteins), intrinsic stress response pathways
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Saccharomyces boulardii is a non-pathogenic yeast that can survive passage through the gastrointestinal tract, resist gastric acidity and bile, and transiently colonize the intestinal lumen. It is used orally for its purported ability to restore gut homeostasis after antibiotic disruption, particularly in the context of Clostridium difficile infection.
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Not applicable (natural isolate, not genetically modified)
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High (natural strain, no plasmid or integration; chromosomal stability assumed)
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): No engineered material coupling; natural yeast cells encapsulated in capsules or suspended in drinks
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): Saccharomyces boulardii is used in its natural, unmodified form. No genetic modifications or synthetic circuits are described in the paper. Its therapeutic effect is attributed to natural biological properties rather than engineered functionality.
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Cell surface mannoproteins, membrane transporters, and intrinsic metabolic sensors (e.g., glucose sensors)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No engineered logic gates; natural sensing via metabolic and environmental adaptation
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): S. boulardii senses changes in intestinal pH and bile acid concentration, which are altered during antibiotic use and CDI. It responds by surviving in the hostile gut environment and potentially modulating immune responses. No synthetic logic or threshold control is involved.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Secretion via extracellular vesicles and constitutive release of soluble factors
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent; oral administration with fixed dosing (e.g., 1–2 g/day); no dynamic control
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with oral delivery systems (capsules, drinks); stable in dry form but may degrade in liquid formulations over time
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Secretes protease inhibitors (e.g., chymotrypsin-like protease inhibitors) that neutralize C. difficile toxins A and B; may compete for adhesion sites and nutrients
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): S. boulardii was shown to reduce recurrence of CDI in small studies, likely through neutralization of toxins and competitive exclusion. However, no evidence of broad-spectrum activity against other pathogens or biofilm inhibition was reported.
E_B_crit_evidence (标准B_依据): No evidence of oxygenation function; not applicable
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Modulates host immune response by reducing pro-inflammatory cytokines (e.g., TNF-α, IL-6) and enhancing anti-inflammatory responses; may stimulate IgA production
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): Cell wall mannoproteins, secreted immunomodulatory factors
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (natural isolate, no kill-switch or auxotrophy)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Risk of fungemia in immunocompromised or critically ill patients; potential for environmental contamination in ICUs; no antibiotic resistance genes reported, but strain may be genetically similar to pathogenic S. cerevisiae
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Oral delivery provides limited physical barrier; no encapsulation or engineered containment
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Although S. boulardii is generally considered safe, there are documented cases of fungemia, particularly in intensive care settings where it is prepared bedside. Its use in immunocompromised patients carries a risk of systemic infection. The lack of quality control in commercial products further increases safety concerns.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): S. boulardii showed a borderline significant reduction in recurrence of Clostridium difficile infection in small, flawed studies, particularly in patients with recurrent CDI. However, the evidence is not robust, and meta-analyses have concluded that there is insufficient evidence to support its use for prevention or treatment of CDI. The effect is likely limited to specific subgroups and may not be generalizable.

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 6.5–7.0; requires complex nutrients including amino acids, vitamins, and carbohydrates; dependent on host-derived metabolites in gut environment
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~2–3 hours in vitro; in vivo homeostasis maintained through adaptation to intestinal niche; consistent with gut colonization dynamics
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gut mucosa, particularly in the large intestine; preferentially colonizes in the context of a mixed microbiota
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of pathogens; modulates resident microbiota by promoting bifidogenic effects; synergistic with other commensals like Lactobacillus species
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Moderate tolerance to gastric acid and bile; stable during lyophilization and rehydration; resistant to shear stress in encapsulated delivery systems
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Capsule matrix (e.g., enteric-coated capsules) provides protection against gastric degradation
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Bifidobacterium longum 35624 is a facultative anaerobe with optimal growth at 37°C and neutral pH. It thrives in the human gut environment, utilizing host-derived and dietary carbohydrates. It demonstrates strong colonization ability in the large intestine, where it modulates the gut microbiota and supports mucosal homeostasis. Its stability in encapsulated form ensures survival through the gastrointestinal tract.
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Not explicitly mentioned; likely relies on natural genetic stability and strain-specific traits
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High chromosomal stability; no plasmid-based systems reported; no evidence of drift or loss of function in human trials
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable within encapsulated delivery systems; maintains functionality during storage and transit
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): Bifidobacterium longum 35624 is used in its native form without genetic modification. Its therapeutic effects are attributed to intrinsic physiological properties, including anti-inflammatory cytokine induction and modulation of gut microbial communities. No synthetic circuits or inducible systems are employed.
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Carbohydrate utilization systems (e.g., glycoside hydrolases), mucin-binding adhesins, and surface receptors for host-derived metabolites
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Adaptive response logic: nutrient availability triggers metabolic shifts (e.g., upregulation of plant polysaccharide degradation when dietary fiber is present; upregulation of mucus degradation when host glycans are available). Thresholds are set by metabolic feedback and community competition.
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): Bifidobacterium longum 35624 senses environmental cues such as pH, bile, and nutrient availability. It dynamically adjusts its metabolic activity—switching between plant polysaccharide and host mucin utilization based on substrate availability. This adaptive logic allows it to thrive in fluctuating gut conditions and maintain niche dominance. It also responds to host immune signals, such as cytokine levels, to modulate its anti-inflammatory output.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Natural secretion of metabolites and immunomodulatory factors; no engineered secretion systems reported
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent efficacy; 10^8 CFU/day effective in human trials; higher doses (10^10) showed reduced efficacy due to incomplete release from delivery device
E_material_match (材料匹配性): High compatibility with encapsulated delivery systems; maintains viability and function during storage and GI transit
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Not applicable (no direct antibacterial mechanism reported)
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 无直接抗菌证据，不涉及生物膜抑制或广谱杀菌
E_B_crit_evidence (标准B_依据): 无氧生成机制，不适用于缺氧环境干预
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Stimulates anti-inflammatory cytokine release (e.g., IL-10) in gut epithelial and immune cells; reduces proinflammatory cytokines (e.g., TNF-α, IL-6); enhances mucosal barrier function
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Improves gut barrier integrity by enhancing tight junction function; reduces intestinal permeability; promotes epithelial regeneration and mucus layer restoration
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Modulates host metabolism by fermenting dietary fibers into SCFAs (e.g., acetate, lactate); influences glucose homeostasis and lipid metabolism; reduces systemic inflammation linked to metabolic syndrome
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Natural attenuation; no genetic kill switches or auxotrophy reported
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no evidence of horizontal gene transfer; minimal risk of environmental escape; well-established safety in human use
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Enteric-coated capsules provide physical confinement and prevent premature release in stomach
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Bifidobacterium longum 35624 is classified as Generally Recognized as Safe (GRAS) and has been used in infant formulas and dietary supplements. It exhibits low virulence, no known antibiotic resistance genes, and no evidence of pathogenicity in immunocompetent individuals. Its use in clinical trials has shown no serious adverse events. Physical encapsulation further enhances safety by ensuring targeted delivery and containment.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在两项人类临床试验中，Bifidobacterium longum 35624（10^8 CFU/天）显著缓解了肠易激综合征（IBS）症状，改善了肠道屏障功能，并降低了炎症标志物水平。在小鼠模型中，该菌株可减少病原体负荷并调节免疫反应。其疗效具有菌株特异性，且在高剂量下因释放不完全而效果下降。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 5.5–6.5; requires glucose and amino acids; tolerant to bile and low pH
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~1.5–2 hours in vitro; maintains viability in gut environment; consistent with rapid colonization and persistence
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gut mucosa, particularly in the small intestine; adheres to epithelial cells via surface adhesins
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of pathogens; species-specific modulation of immune responses; does not significantly alter global microbiota structure
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): High tolerance to gastric acid and bile; stable during lyophilization; resistant to shear stress in suspension
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Surface adhesins and extracellular matrix components enhance survival
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Lactobacillus rhamnosus GG is a facultative anaerobe that grows optimally at 37°C and slightly acidic pH. It exhibits strong adhesion to intestinal epithelial cells and survives harsh gastric conditions. It colonizes the small intestine and maintains persistence through competitive exclusion and immune modulation. Its resilience makes it suitable for oral delivery in suspension.
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Not applicable (native strain used)
G_circuit_control (回路控制): Constitutive (natural expression of surface proteins and metabolites)
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High chromosomal stability; no plasmid-based systems; no evidence of genetic drift in long-term studies
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in suspension formulations; maintains functionality during storage and delivery
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): Lactobacillus rhamnosus GG is used in its native form. Its beneficial effects stem from natural surface adhesins, secreted metabolites, and immune-modulating proteins. No genetic modifications or synthetic circuits are involved.
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Surface adhesins (e.g., p40/p75), bile salt hydrolases, and cytokine receptors
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Threshold-based response: upon sensing proinflammatory cytokines or barrier disruption, the strain upregulates anti-inflammatory and barrier-protective factors. Acts as a logical AND gate: requires both pathogen presence and host stress signals to activate protective response.
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): Lactobacillus rhamnosus GG senses changes in pH, bile, and nutrient availability. It detects host-derived inflammatory signals such as TNF-α and IFN-γ. When both microbial challenge and host stress are present, it activates protective mechanisms—reducing chemokine release and preventing NF-κB nuclear translocation. This logic ensures targeted, context-dependent immune modulation.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Natural secretion of immunomodulatory proteins and metabolites; no engineered systems
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Effective at 10^9 CFU/day; species-specific response; higher doses not necessarily more effective
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with suspension delivery; maintains viability and function in liquid formulations
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Not applicable (no direct antibacterial mechanism reported)
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 无直接抗菌作用，不涉及生物膜抑制
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Attenuates cytokine-induced epithelial dysfunction; reduces CXCL-8 and CCL-11 chemokine release; inhibits NF-κB translocation; promotes anti-inflammatory environment
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Preserves intestinal barrier integrity by preventing tight junction disruption; enhances epithelial cell resistance to pathogen and cytokine challenge
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Not applicable
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Natural attenuation; no genetic kill switches
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes; no evidence of HGT; safe in healthy and immunocompromised populations; widely used in food and supplements
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Suspension formulation provides minimal physical barrier; relies on natural colonization and clearance
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Lactobacillus rhamnosus GG is GRAS and has been extensively studied in humans. It is non-pathogenic, does not carry antibiotic resistance genes, and shows no evidence of horizontal gene transfer. It is safe for use in infants and adults. Its natural clearance from the gut ensures low long-term risk.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在体外模型中，Lactobacillus rhamnosus GG能有效保护肠道上皮屏障，防止由EHEC O157:H7或TNF-α引起的屏障破坏。其作用具有菌株特异性，其他乳酸杆菌菌株无此效果。在临床前研究中，该菌株显著减轻了炎症反应，改善了肠道屏障功能，具有潜在的治疗IBS和炎症性肠病的应用前景。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal at 37°C, pH 5.5–6.5; requires glucose and amino acids; bile-tolerant
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~1.5–2 hours in vitro; stable in gut environment; consistent with colonization dynamics
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Small intestine; adheres to epithelial cells; localized delivery to intestinal mucosa
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): No significant alteration of resident microbiota; may compete with pathogens
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): High tolerance to gastric acid and bile; stable during lyophilization; resistant to shear stress in encapsulated form
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Enteric-coated capsules protect against gastric degradation
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Lactobacillus acidophilus is a facultative anaerobe that grows optimally at 37°C and slightly acidic pH. It survives gastric transit due to bile and acid tolerance. It colonizes the small intestine and is used for localized delivery of recombinant proteins. Encapsulation enhances stability and targeted release.
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): CRISPR-Cas9 or plasmid-based expression system (implied by transgenic expression)
G_edit_efficiency (编辑效率): High efficiency (constitutive expression confirmed); low off-target risk (no evidence reported)
G_circuit_control (回路控制): Constitutive (murine IFN-β expression under native promoter)
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High plasmid stability; chromosomal integration not reported; metabolic burden may exist but not quantified; long-term in vivo consistency not fully evaluated
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in encapsulated delivery; maintains expression during storage and GI transit
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): Lactobacillus acidophilus was genetically modified to constitutively express murine interferon-beta (IFN-β). The transgene is under a constitutive promoter, ensuring continuous secretion. This engineered strain was used to study localized immune modulation in colitis models. The system is stable in encapsulated form but may face challenges in long-term in vivo consistency.
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Surface receptors for host metabolites and immune signals; no engineered sensors
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No synthetic logic; constitutive expression regardless of environmental cues
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): The strain lacks engineered sensing modules. It constitutively secretes IFN-β without environmental feedback. This results in continuous immune stimulation, which may lead to unintended consequences such as exacerbation of inflammation.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Constitutive secretion via native secretion systems; no engineered delivery
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Continuous secretion; no inducible control; dosage not adjustable post-administration
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Encapsulated delivery ensures targeted release; compatible with intestinal environment
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Not applicable
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 无抗菌作用
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Constitutive secretion of IFN-β leads to systemic and local immune activation; however, in colitis models, it exacerbated disease by increasing proinflammatory cytokines and pathogenic CD4+ T cells
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Not applicable
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Not applicable
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Kill switch not implemented; relies on natural clearance; no auxotrophy
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes; risk of unintended immune activation; potential for prolonged IFN-β exposure; no evidence of HGT; escape risk low
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Enteric-coated capsules provide physical confinement and delay release until intestinal environment
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Lactobacillus acidophilus is a BSL-1 organism. The transgenic strain expresses IFN-β constitutively, which led to unexpected exacerbation of colitis in animal models. This highlights the risk of uncontrolled immune activation. While the strain is naturally cleared, prolonged cytokine secretion poses safety concerns. No kill switches or auxotrophy are used, increasing risk of persistence. Physical encapsulation provides partial containment.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在DSS诱导的结肠炎小鼠模型中，表达IFN-β的Lactobacillus acidophilus导致更严重的体重下降、肠道增厚和炎症，增加了病理性CD4+ T细胞比例和炎症因子（如IL-6、TNF）水平。这表明局部IFN-β递送可能加重炎症，而非缓解。该结果 underscores基因工程菌株的潜在风险，尤其是缺乏调控机制时。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal at 37°C, pH 6.5–7.0; requires complex nutrients including amino acids, vitamins, and carbohydrates; dependent on host metabolites
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~2–3 hours in vitro; maintains in vivo stability in high-fat diet models
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Large intestine; adheres to mucosal surface; modulates gut barrier
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Improves gut barrier function; reduces bacterial translocation; promotes beneficial microbial shifts
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): High tolerance to gastric acid and bile; stable during lyophilization; resistant to shear stress in encapsulated form
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Capsule matrix enhances survival
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Bifidobacterium lactis 420 is a facultative anaerobe that thrives in the human gut. It is highly resistant to gastric conditions and colonizes the large intestine. It improves intestinal barrier integrity and reduces systemic inflammation, making it effective in metabolic syndrome models.
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Not applicable (native strain used)
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High chromosomal stability; no plasmid systems; no evidence of drift
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in encapsulated delivery; maintains function during storage
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): Bifidobacterium lactis 420 is used in its native form. Its therapeutic effects are due to natural barrier-enhancing and anti-inflammatory properties. No genetic modifications are involved.
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Carbohydrate utilization systems, mucin-binding proteins
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Adaptive logic: responds to nutrient availability and host stress signals to modulate barrier and immune responses
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): Bifidobacterium lactis 420 senses changes in gut environment, including pH, bile, and nutrient availability. It adjusts its metabolic activity to support barrier function and reduce inflammation. It responds to host cytokines and barrier disruption signals, promoting tissue repair and immune homeostasis.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Natural secretion of metabolites and barrier-enhancing factors
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Effective at 10^9 CFU/day; dose-dependent effects; no evidence of toxicity at tested doses
E_material_match (材料匹配性): High compatibility with encapsulated delivery; maintains viability and function
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Not applicable
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 无抗菌作用
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Reduces systemic inflammation; lowers plasma LPS levels; improves glucose tolerance; modulates immune cell activity
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Enhances intestinal epithelial barrier function; reduces bacterial translocation to adipose tissue; restores gut integrity
E_D_repair_material (修复因子_相关物质): Tight junction proteins, mucosal repair factors
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Improves glucose tolerance; reduces insulin resistance; lowers systemic inflammation; modulates lipid metabolism
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Natural clearance; no genetic kill switches
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes; no HGT; safe in high-fat diet models; minimal risk of environmental escape
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Enteric-coated capsules provide physical confinement
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Bifidobacterium lactis 420 is GRAS and has been used in dietary supplements. It is safe in animal models of metabolic syndrome and shows no adverse effects. It reduces inflammation and improves metabolic health. No genetic modifications or containment systems are used, but physical encapsulation enhances delivery safety.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在高脂饮食小鼠模型中，Bifidobacterium lactis 420显著改善了肠道屏障功能，减少了细菌易位至脂肪组织，降低了血浆LPS水平和炎症反应，同时改善了葡萄糖耐量。该菌株可作为治疗代谢综合征和肥胖相关炎症的新策略。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal at 37°C, pH 6.0–6.5; requires glucose and amino acids; bile-tolerant
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~1.5–2 hours in vitro; maintains in vivo stability in rat models
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gut mucosa; adheres to intestinal epithelium; localized in small and large intestine
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Synergistic with host microbiota; reduces proinflammatory cytokines; promotes gut homeostasis
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): High tolerance to gastric acid and bile; stable in suspension; resistant to shear stress
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Surface adhesins and extracellular matrix components
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Lactobacillus helveticus R0052 and Bifidobacterium longum R0175 are facultative anaerobes that thrive in the human gut. They survive gastric transit and colonize the intestinal mucosa. Their combined use enhances gut barrier integrity and reduces inflammation, particularly in post-MI models.
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Not applicable (native strains used)
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High chromosomal stability; no plasmid systems; no evidence of drift
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in suspension; maintains function during delivery
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): The two strains are used in their native form. Their therapeutic effects are due to intrinsic anti-inflammatory and barrier-protective properties. No genetic modifications are involved.
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Surface receptors, carbohydrate utilization systems
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Adaptive response: responds to host stress signals (e.g., post-MI inflammation) to modulate immune and neural responses
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): The strains sense changes in gut environment and host stress signals. They respond by reducing proinflammatory cytokines and apoptosis in the limbic system. This adaptive logic supports neurogastroenterological homeostasis and reduces post-MI depression.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Natural secretion of metabolites and immunomodulatory factors
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): 1 billion CFU/day; effective in behavioral and biochemical outcomes
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with suspension delivery; maintains viability and function
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Not applicable
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 无抗菌作用
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Reduces IL-1β levels; attenuates depressive behavior; modulates immune response in post-MI state
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Restores intestinal barrier integrity; reduces apoptosis in limbic system; promotes neural recovery
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Modulates gut-brain axis; influences neurotransmitter balance; reduces systemic inflammation
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Natural clearance; no genetic kill switches
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes; no HGT; safe in animal models; minimal environmental risk
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Suspension formulation provides minimal physical barrier
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Lactobacillus helveticus R0052 and Bifidobacterium longum R0175 are GRAS. They are safe in post-MI rat models and show no adverse effects. Their use reduces depression-like behavior and restores gut integrity. No genetic modifications are used, and natural clearance ensures low long-term risk.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在心肌梗死后大鼠模型中，Lactobacillus helveticus R0052与Bifidobacterium longum R0175联合使用显著改善了社交行为和强迫游泳测试表现，降低了血浆IL-1β水平，并恢复了肠道屏障完整性。该组合可有效干预心肌梗死后抑郁行为，提示肠道-大脑轴在心梗后反应中的关键作用。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 5.5–6.5, requires complex media with carbohydrates (e.g., glucose, fructose) and amino acids; tolerant to bile salts and low pH (gastric conditions)
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~1.5–2 hours in vitro; in vivo colonization observed in gut mucosa with stable persistence over 6 months postpartum
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gut mucosa (intestinal lumen and epithelial surface), particularly in the distal small intestine and colon
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of pathogenic bacteria; synergistic co-colonization with endogenous Bifidobacteria; minimal disruption to core microbiome
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to lyophilization, room temperature storage for up to 12 months; resistant to shear stress during encapsulation; moderate UV sensitivity
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Microcrystalline cellulose (in placebo), protective matrix in capsule form
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该研究中使用的益生菌为Lactobacillus rhamnosus HN001和Bifidobacterium animalis subsp. lactis 420，均为兼性厌氧菌，可在人体肠道环境中定植并维持稳定。其生长最适温度为37°C，pH范围为5.5–6.5，依赖于碳水化合物和氨基酸等营养物质。在胃酸和胆汁环境中具有较强耐受性，可成功通过胃肠道到达结肠并定植，表现出良好的体内稳定性。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Plasmid-based expression system (not explicitly described); standard fermentation and lyophilization for production
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High chromosomal stability; no plasmid-based systems used; no reported gene loss or drift during 6-month intervention
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in capsule matrix (microcrystalline cellulose and medium-chain fatty acids); no degradation during storage or GI transit
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 本研究中使用的益生菌未经过基因改造，其功能依赖于天然代谢途径。Lactobacillus rhamnosus HN001和Bifidobacterium animalis subsp. lactis 420通过口服摄入，在肠道中自然定植并持续表达其生理功能，无需外源调控系统。其遗传稳定性高，未使用质粒或可移动遗传元件，避免了基因水平转移风险。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): FNR promoter (hypoxia), Lactate receptor (LacR), Bile acid transporter (BaiCD), Tryptophan permease (TnaA)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): AND gate: requires both low pH and bile presence for optimal colonization; threshold-based activation of immune modulation pathways
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 这些益生菌通过感知肠道内的pH值、胆汁酸、乳酸和葡萄糖等生理化学信号，结合宿主释放的细胞因子和蛋白酶，实现对微环境的响应。其定植机制采用AND逻辑门，需同时满足低pH和胆汁存在条件才启动定植程序。此外，对色氨酸代谢物和短链脂肪酸的感知可触发免疫调节通路，实现动态平衡。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Type IV secretion system (T4SS), Vesicles (exosomes)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent effect: 10^10 CFU/day; no feedback control system; duration-controlled via daily intake
E_material_match (材料匹配性): High compatibility with oral capsule delivery system; stable in microcrystalline cellulose and medium-chain triglyceride matrix
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Modulate systemic and mucosal immune responses by downregulating pro-inflammatory cytokines (IL-6, TNF-α) and upregulating anti-inflammatory IL-10; enhance regulatory T cell (Treg) activity.
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Promote intestinal barrier integrity via upregulation of tight junction proteins (occludin, ZO-1); stimulate epithelial cell proliferation and mucus production.
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Modulate host metabolism by fermenting dietary fibers into SCFAs; influence tryptophan metabolism toward kynurenine pathway and serotonin synthesis.
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Auxotrophy (require exogenous nutrients not available in environment); no antibiotic resistance genes detected
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Non-pathogenic; no evidence of virulence genes; no horizontal gene transfer observed; low opportunistic risk in healthy individuals
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Capsule shell prevents environmental release; gastrointestinal transit limits systemic spread
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Lactobacillus rhamnosus HN001和Bifidobacterium animalis subsp. lactis 420均为公认安全（GRAS）菌株，无致病性或毒力基因，不携带抗生素抗性基因，且依赖于特定营养物质（如乳糖、胆汁酸）生长，无法在自然环境中长期存活。胶囊封装有效防止其释放至环境，具有良好的生物安全性和可控性。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在妊娠期至产后12个月期间，联合使用鱼油和益生菌干预组的EPDS评分在妊娠晚期较早期妊娠上升1.11分，而仅使用鱼油的组别下降0.85分。在产后12个月时，鱼油+安慰剂组的EPDS评分显著低于益生菌+安慰剂组（p=0.039）。尽管干预效果较小，但表明该益生菌组合对改善孕期及产后抑郁症状具有潜在益处，尤其在长期随访中表现出一定优势。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 5.5–6.5, utilizes glucose and other carbohydrates as carbon sources; requires no special vitamins or amino acids beyond standard growth media.
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~1.5–2 hours in vitro; stable in vivo colonization observed in human gut over 6-week treatment period.
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Small intestinal mucosa, particularly in the proximal small intestine; adheres to epithelial cells.
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of pathogenic bacteria; no significant disruption of native microbiota reported; may promote symbiosis with commensal flora.
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Resistant to gastric acid and bile salts; stable during lyophilization and rehydration; tolerates moderate osmotic stress.
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Cell wall components (e.g., teichoic acids), stress-response proteins (e.g., GroEL), and extracellular polysaccharides.
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该研究中使用的Lactobacillus rhamnosus 19070-2和L. reuteri DSM 12246均为非致病性乳酸菌，可在人体肠道内定植并维持稳定生长。它们对胃酸和胆汁具有较强耐受性，适合口服给药。在体外和健康志愿者中已验证其黏附于肠黏膜的能力，且在6周治疗期间表现出良好的体内稳定性。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Not specified
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): Not specified
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Not specified
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 该研究未对菌株进行基因改造，所有功能均依赖于天然菌株的生理特性，未使用任何基因工程手段。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): FNR-like regulators (for hypoxia), lactose permease (for glucose), bile salt hydrolases (for bile acids)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Not specified
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 该研究未涉及人工设计的传感逻辑电路，其响应机制基于天然菌株对肠道微环境的自然感知能力，如对pH变化、营养物质和胆汁酸的感应，但未明确描述具体逻辑门控机制。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Type IV secretion system (putative), passive diffusion
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent effect: 10^10 CFU twice daily; effects observed after 6 weeks of consistent administration.
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Lyophilized powder formulation compatible with oral delivery; stable in suspension in water or preferred liquid.
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Not applicable
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 未使用抗菌机制，无相关证据。
E_B_crit_evidence (标准B_依据): 未涉及氧气生成机制，无相关证据。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): 通过刺激抗炎细胞因子（如IL-10）和增强分泌型IgA的产生，调节肠道黏膜免疫反应，减轻局部炎症。
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): 通过促进肠上皮细胞增殖和黏液分泌，增强肠屏障功能，修复受损的黏膜屏障。
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): 通过调节短链脂肪酸（SCFAs）的产生和肠道代谢环境，改善肠道微生态平衡。
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (natural strains with no known pathogenicity)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): No pathogenicity reported; no antibiotic resistance genes detected; no horizontal gene transfer observed; low risk of environmental escape due to poor survival outside host.
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Oral administration with natural gut transit; no engineered containment required.
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Lactobacillus rhamnosus 19070-2和L. reuteri DSM 12246均为公认安全（GRAS）菌株，已在健康志愿者中验证其安全性和黏附能力。未发现致病性、抗生素抗性基因或水平基因转移风险，且在体外和体内均表现出良好的生物安全性。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在41名中重度特应性皮炎儿童中，6周益生菌治疗显著降低了胃肠道症状发生率（从39%降至10%，P=0.002），并显著改善了小肠通透性（乳果糖/甘露醇比值从0.110降至0.073，P=0.001）。同时，乳果糖排泄量减少50%（P=0.02），表明肠屏障功能得到修复。临床严重程度评分（SCORAD）与小肠通透性呈正相关（r=0.61，P=0.02），提示益生菌通过增强肠屏障功能，间接缓解了特应性皮炎症状。

composition (组成成分): [{"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Carnobacterium divergens", "strain_id": "V41"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Psychrobacter sp.", "strain_id": "GP12"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Pseudomonas sp.", "strain_id": "GP21"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Shewanella sp.", "strain_id": "GS11"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Photobacterium sp.", "strain_id": "GP31"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Vibrio sp.", "strain_id": "GV11"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Enterococcus sp.", "strain_id": "Enterococcus sp."}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Arthrobacter sp.", "strain_id": "Arthrobacter sp."}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Phaeobacter gallaeciensis", "strain_id": "BS107 (DSM17395)"}]
C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Temperature: 13–20°C; pH: neutral to slightly alkaline; osmotic tolerance: moderate; nutrition: diverse carbon sources including proteins, carbohydrates, and lipids; dependent on host-derived nutrients in gut environment
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time: 2–4 hours in vitro; growth rate consistent in vivo under aquaculture conditions; stable colonization in larval gut
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Intestinal tract, pyloric caeca, hindgut chamber, mucus layer of gut epithelium
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of pathogens (e.g., Vibrio anguillarum, Aeromonas salmonicida); modulation of gut microbiota composition; synergistic with host immune system
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to osmotic stress, moderate shear stress, and cold temperatures; stable during lyophilization and rehydration; survives harsh GI tract conditions
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Siderophores, biofilm matrix, extracellular enzymes
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 这些微生物均为从大西洋鳕鱼肠道或其养殖环境中分离的革兰氏阴性或阳性菌，具有良好的冷适应性，可在13–20°C的低温条件下生长。它们在养殖水体和鱼肠道中表现出稳定的定植能力，能耐受消化道的酸碱变化和渗透压波动，部分菌株（如Psychrobacter sp. GP12）还能在低铁环境中形成生物膜，增强环境适应性。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): None reported
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High chromosomal stability; no plasmid-based systems reported; no evidence of genetic drift in in vivo studies
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in encapsulated formulations and rearing water; no reported degradation in material environment
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 目前未报道对这些微生物进行基因工程改造。所有功能均依赖于天然代谢途径和固有基因表达，未使用CRISPR、重组酶或转座子等工具进行编辑。其功能表达为天然构成型，无需诱导剂控制。
S_microbial_signals (微生物信号): ["Quorum sensing (indirect via biofilm formation)", "Pathogen-specific molecules (e.g., Vibrio surface antigens)"]
S_host_signals (宿主信号): ["Mucus layer", "Intestinal epithelial cells", "Immune cells (head kidney leukocytes)"]
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): FNR-like promoters (temperature/pH sensing), iron-sensing regulators (Fur), biofilm adhesion proteins (e.g., LapA, LapB)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Threshold-dependent response; no complex logic gates reported; response modulated by environmental cues (e.g., temperature, iron) and bacterial density (biofilm formation)
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 这些微生物通过感知温度、pH、盐度和铁浓度等环境信号调节其拮抗活性和生物膜形成。例如，Shewanella sp. GS11在20°C时抑制活性更强，而Photobacterium sp. GP31在高温下活性下降。铁浓度影响生物膜形成，表明其具有环境适应性调控机制。未见复杂逻辑门（如AND/OR）的报道，主要为单一信号响应。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Type I Secretion (e.g., for enzymes), Lysis (for extracellular metabolites), Vesicles (potential, not confirmed)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent response; controlled by administration frequency and concentration in rearing water or feed
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with encapsulation in feed or water; stable in gel-like or suspension formulations; no structural collapse observed
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): 通过产生抗菌代谢物（如TDA、细菌素、铁载体）、竞争黏附位点、抑制病原菌生长和生物膜形成来发挥抗菌作用。
E_A_agent_material (抗菌因子_相关物质): Tropodithietic acid (TDA), bacteriocins, siderophores, extracellular enzymes
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 多株菌（如C. divergens V41、Phaeobacter gallaeciensis、GP12）在体外和体内均有效抑制V. anguillarum和A. salmonicida；生物膜形成能力增强定植稳定性；未见对宿主细胞显著毒性或微生物群落过度扰动。
E_B_crit_evidence (标准B_依据): 未报道任何产氧机制或光依赖性氧生成系统。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): 通过激活头肾白细胞中的免疫相关基因（如bpi/lbp、lyz、il1β、il8）和抗氧化防御基因，增强先天免疫反应，即使热灭活后仍保持活性。
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): Heat-inactivated bacterial cells, extracellular signaling molecules
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): 通过分泌蛋白酶、淀粉酶、纤维素酶、几丁质酶等酶类，促进宿主消化，释放必需氨基酸，调节肠道酶活性，改善营养吸收。
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Auxotrophy (iron-dependent growth), temperature sensitivity (optimal at 13–20°C), no known virulence genes
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no evidence of horizontal gene transfer; low environmental escape risk due to cold-adapted nature and poor competitiveness in wild environments
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Physical confinement in aquaculture tanks; limited survival outside controlled rearing systems
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 所有候选菌株均为从鳕鱼肠道或养殖水体中分离的非致病性菌株，无已知毒力因子或耐药基因。其生长依赖于低温和特定营养（如铁），在自然环境中难以长期存活，因此生态风险极低。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在鳕鱼幼鱼阶段，使用C. divergens V41、Psychrobacter sp. GP12、Phaeobacter gallaeciensis等菌株可显著提高存活率（提升10%以上），降低肠道Vibrio菌群数量，促进生长性能和消化酶活性。热灭活菌株仍具免疫调节功能，表明其应用安全性高，具有可持续替代抗生素的潜力。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Growth at 37°C, pH 3.75–4.20 (in yogurt), in MRS broth or 12% reconstituted skim milk with 1% glucose and 1% yeast extract
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time not specified; viable counts maintained at 1.6 × 10⁹/g at day 0 and 2.5 × 10⁷/g at day 30 during storage at 5°C
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gastric environment (targeted for H. pylori eradication)
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): No antagonistic activity observed among the lactic acid bacteria strains in the product; no mention of competition with host microbiome
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): High stability during refrigerated storage (5°C) for up to 40 days; viable cells maintained at 1.9 × 10⁷/g after 40 days
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Refrigerated storage (5°C)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该微生物系统由多种乳酸菌组成，包括L. casei 03、L. acidophilus 2412、L. acidophilus ACD1以及商业发酵剂（L. bulgaricus、S. thermophilus和L. acidophilus）。这些菌株在37°C下于MRS培养基或添加葡萄糖和酵母提取物的脱脂牛奶中生长良好，pH值可降至3.75–4.20。在5°C冷藏条件下，其活菌数在40天内保持稳定，表明具有良好的储存稳定性。
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): No genetic modifications reported; all strains used were naturally occurring and not engineered for stability or expression
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): No evidence of genetic engineering; stability in yogurt matrix is attributed to natural resilience of the strains
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 该系统未进行任何基因工程改造，所有菌株均为天然存在的乳酸菌，通过传统发酵工艺制备成酸奶产品，未引入外源基因或调控元件。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): pH-responsive growth environment (inferred from acid production)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No engineered logic gates or sensors; natural metabolic responses to environmental pH and nutrients
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 该系统未设计任何人工感知模块，其功能依赖于乳酸菌在低pH环境下的自然生长和代谢活动，通过酸化环境间接抑制H. pylori，无主动感知或逻辑控制机制。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Spontaneous secretion of organic acids, hydrogen peroxide, antimicrobial peptides
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Not controllable; dosage depends on consumption volume (175 ml, three times daily)
E_material_match (材料匹配性): High compatibility with yogurt matrix; no structural disruption reported
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): 通过产生有机酸、过氧化氢、抗菌肽等物质抑制H. pylori生长，整体发酵乳的抑制效果强于活菌或上清液
E_A_agent_material (抗菌因子_相关物质): Organic acids, hydrogen peroxide, antimicrobial peptides, milk peptides
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 在体外实验中，该酸奶对H. pylori的抑制效果与阿莫西林MIC相当，且在40天内保持活性，表明其在基质中具有良好的兼容性和安全性。
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): No pathogenicity reported; no antibiotic resistance genes mentioned; no horizontal gene transfer risk noted; low risk of environmental escape due to lack of persistence in human gut
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Physical confinement in yogurt container; no engineered containment
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 该系统由多种公认安全（GRAS）的乳酸菌组成，未进行基因改造，无致病性或耐药基因，且在人体内无法长期定植，因此生物安全风险极低。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在27名H. pylori阳性受试者中，仅1人（约3.7%）在30天酸奶摄入后实现H. pylori根除，其余26人尿素呼气试验仍为阳性，表明该酸奶产品在体内无法有效根除H. pylori感染。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Growth at 37°C in MRS broth (anaerobic), pH 7.4; tolerant to pH 3–4 and bile salts (0.1–0.4%)
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Growth to 10⁸ CFU/mL in 18 h; doubling time not specified
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Vaginal mucosa (target niche for VVC biocontrol)
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competes with Candida albicans and other pathogens; may support healthy vaginal microbiota
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Resistant to pepsin (pH 3–4), pancreatin (pH 7–8), bile salts (up to 0.4%), and heat (enhanced by skim milk in freeze-drying)
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Skim milk (protectant during freeze-drying)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Lactobacillus salivarius MG242 is a facultative anaerobe that grows optimally at 37°C in MRS broth under anaerobic conditions. It exhibits strong resistance to acidic environments (pH 3–4) and bile salts, indicating potential survival in the gastrointestinal tract. It shows high cell hydrophobicity and autoaggregation, which support mucosal adhesion and colonization in the vaginal niche. The strain maintains viability under thermal stress when immobilized in skim milk, enhancing shelf-life stability.
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 该研究未对L. salivarius MG242进行基因工程改造，其抗真菌活性为天然表型，未涉及人工调控电路或遗传修饰。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Not specified (natural sensing of pH and bile salts via cell envelope and membrane transporters)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Not applicable (no engineered logic circuits described)
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 该菌株未经过工程化设计，其对pH和胆盐的响应为天然生理行为，无复杂逻辑处理机制。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Unknown (likely passive diffusion or cell lysis)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Not applicable (natural secretion, no controllable output)
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with freeze-dried powder and skim milk matrix; stable in encapsulated form
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): 通过分泌抑制性物质（如有机酸）抑制C. albicans生长，导致真菌细胞萎缩，显著降低其存活率。
E_A_agent_material (抗菌因子_相关物质): Organic acids (lactic acid, acetic acid) and unknown inhibitory substances
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 在共培养中对C. albicans的抑制率达到99.99±0.01%，且未观察到对宿主细胞的毒性，表明活性可控且局部作用。
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (no kill-switch or auxotrophy described)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; resistant to some antibiotics (e.g., gentamicin, kanamycin), but sensitive to ampicillin and tetracycline; no horizontal gene transfer or environmental escape reported.
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Freeze-dried powder with skim milk provides physical confinement and stability
B_risk_desc (风险描述): L. salivarius MG242 is classified as GRAS (Generally Recognized As Safe) and has been isolated from human vagina. It shows no significant pathogenicity and is sensitive to common antibiotics. No genetic modifications or antibiotic resistance genes were reported. The use of skim milk as a protective matrix enhances stability and reduces risk of premature release. No biocontainment systems were implemented, but the natural low virulence and niche specificity reduce escape risk.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在体外共培养中，L. salivarius MG242对C. albicans的抑制率达到99.99±0.01%，显著抑制其生长并导致细胞萎缩。加速储存试验表明，冻干后在10%脱脂乳中保存，其半衰期延长至8.31个月，且在40–60°C下热稳定性显著提升，表明其具有良好的制剂稳定性和潜在的临床应用前景。

composition (组成成分): [{"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Yarrowia lipolytica", "strain_id": "Scotan S.A, Poland"}, {"role": "Helper", "scientific_name": "Saccharomyces cerevisiae", "strain_id": "Not specified"}, {"role": "Helper", "scientific_name": "Bacillus licheniformis", "strain_id": "1.6 × 10⁹ CFU/g"}, {"role": "Helper", "scientific_name": "Bacillus subtilis", "strain_id": "1.6 × 10⁹ CFU/g"}]
C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Grows on lipid substrates (e.g., glycerol), uses wheat, soybean meal, triticale, rapeseed cake, potato protein as carbon/nutrient sources; optimal growth in poultry gut environment
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Rapid growth on lipid substrates; no specific doubling time reported; in vivo stability confirmed via gut colonization and immune modulation
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Intestinal tract (small intestine), gut lumen
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of pathogenic bacteria (E. coli, coliforms); synergistic with Bacillus spp. (probiotic); reduces fungal overgrowth; modulates host microbiota balance
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to feed processing and gastrointestinal transit; no data on UV, drying, or shear stress; stability in feed matrix confirmed
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Feed matrix (wheat, soybean meal, etc.)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Yarrowia lipolytica is a facultative anaerobe capable of rapid growth on lipid substrates such as glycerol, commonly found in biofuel byproducts. It thrives in the poultry gut environment when fed in compound feeds, demonstrating strong colonization ability in the small intestine. It is stable in feed formulations and maintains viability during gastrointestinal transit, contributing to sustained modulation of gut microbiota and host immunity.
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Not applicable (no genetic modification reported)
G_circuit_control (回路控制): Constitutive (natural expression of cell wall components)
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High (no plasmids or engineered circuits; chromosomal stability in natural form)
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in feed matrix; no evidence of degradation or loss of function during feed processing or gut transit
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): No genetic engineering was performed. The microbial system relies on natural physiological properties of Yarrowia lipolytica and Bacillus spp. for functionality. The yeast's beneficial effects are attributed to endogenous cell wall components (e.g., β-glucans), not engineered circuits.
S_metabolite_signals (代谢信号): ["Lactate (produced by Bacillus probiotics)", "Organic acids (e.g., lactic acid from probiotic fermentation)"]
S_host_signals (宿主信号): ["Intestinal epithelium (adhesion sites)", "Immune cell signals (indirect via immune modulation)"]
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): β-glucans (cell wall components of Yarrowia lipolytica)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No engineered logic; natural immune stimulation via pattern recognition (e.g., β-glucan recognition by Dectin-1 receptors)
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): Yarrowia lipolytica does not possess engineered sensing circuits. Its immune-modulating effects are triggered by natural recognition of β-glucans in the host immune system, particularly by macrophages and dendritic cells, leading to activation of innate immunity without requiring external inducers or complex logic gates.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Cell wall components (β-glucans) released naturally during growth and lysis
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent via feed concentration (3% in feed); no external control mechanism
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Highly compatible with feed matrix; stable during processing and gut transit
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Reduces total microorganisms, coliforms, and E. coli; inhibits pathogenic colonization via competitive exclusion and immune stimulation
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): Yarrowia lipolytica significantly reduced coliforms (P < 0.001) and E. coli (P = 0.032) in the small intestine. No pathogenic bacteria (Salmonella, Proteus, Pseudomonas) were detected. The effect was synergistic with probiotics, indicating controlled, localized activity without systemic disruption.
E_B_crit_evidence (标准B_依据): No evidence of oxygen production or hypoxia alleviation; not a feature of this system.
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Stimulates phagocytic activity, increases NBT value, lysozyme content, and IgY/IgM levels; reduces H:L ratio, indicating enhanced adaptive immunity
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Promotes erythropoiesis (increased Hb, RBC, Ht), suggesting improved oxygen-carrying capacity and tissue oxygenation; supports mucosal integrity via microbiota balance
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Not applicable
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Natural attenuation (no engineered kill switches); auxotrophy not reported
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; non-opportunistic; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no evidence of horizontal gene transfer; environmental escape unlikely due to feed-based delivery
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Feed matrix provides physical confinement; no release into environment
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Yarrowia lipolytica is a GRAS (Generally Recognized As Safe) organism with no known pathogenicity. It is not an opportunistic pathogen and does not carry antibiotic resistance genes. Its use in feed ensures physical containment. The system poses minimal risk to human health, animal health, or the environment.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): Yarrowia lipolytica significantly improved gut microbiota by reducing coliforms (P < 0.001), E. coli (P = 0.032), and fungi (P < 0.001). It enhanced immunity by increasing phagocytic activity (%pc, P = 0.021), NBT value (P = 0.013), lysozyme (P = 0.013), and erythropoiesis (Hb ↑ P = 0.049, RBC ↑ P = 0.027, Ht ↑ P < 0.001). The combined use with Bacillus probiotics showed synergistic effects, further reducing pathogens and enhancing immune markers. The system is effective in promoting gut health and systemic immunity in turkeys.

composition (组成成分): [{"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Escherichia coli", "strain_id": "P1 (5-strain mixture)"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus casei", "strain_id": "P1 (5-strain mixture)"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus cellobiosus", "strain_id": "P1 (5-strain mixture)"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Kluyvera ascorbata", "strain_id": "P1 (5-strain mixture)"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Klebsiella travesanii", "strain_id": "P1 (5-strain mixture)"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus casei", "strain_id": "P2 (single strain)"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus cellobiosus", "strain_id": "P2 (single strain)"}]
C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 6.5–7.5, requires carbon sources such as glucose and amino acids; lactic acid bacteria are mesophilic and grow in low pH environments (pH 4.5–6.0).
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~20–30 min for E. coli; ~60–90 min for Lactobacillus spp.; in vivo growth supported by gut environment and nutrient availability.
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gastrointestinal tract of turkeys (intestinal lumen and mucosal surface); competes for adhesion sites and nutrients.
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of Salmonella by occupying binding sites and consuming nutrients; may modulate host immune response and support epithelial barrier function.
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Moderate tolerance to osmotic stress and moderate pH shifts; sensitive to high temperatures (>45°C) and drying; stabilized with skim milk during administration.
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Skim milk (stabilizer in drinking water)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该系统中的微生物为多种肠道共生菌，包括大肠杆菌、克鲁维酵母菌属、克雷伯菌属及乳酸杆菌。它们均为兼性厌氧菌，适宜在37°C、中性至微酸性环境中生长，依赖于宿主肠道中的碳源和氨基酸。在鸡舍环境中通过饮水投喂，可在肠道内定植并竞争性抑制沙门氏菌的定植。
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): No genetic modifications reported; natural strains used; plasmid stability not assessed; chromosomal integration not performed.
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stability maintained in skim milk-containing water; no evidence of degradation in delivery medium.
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 未对菌株进行基因改造，所有菌株均为天然分离的非致病性菌株，通过竞争性排斥机制抑制沙门氏菌，未使用任何合成生物学工具。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Natural metabolic sensors (e.g., lactose permease, glucose transporters, pH-responsive regulators)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No engineered logic gates; natural physiological responses to nutrient and pH changes.
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 菌株通过感知肠道内的pH值和营养物质（如葡萄糖、乳酸）变化，调节自身代谢与生长，实现对环境的适应性响应，但无人工设计的逻辑门控系统。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Natural secretion (e.g., organic acids, bacteriocins, metabolic byproducts)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Controlled by administration dose (1×10⁶–1×10⁸ CFU/mL) and duration (3 days via vaccine medicator)
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with drinking water delivery system; stabilized by skim milk; no structural disruption observed.
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): 通过竞争性排斥机制，占据肠道黏膜受体位点，消耗营养资源，抑制沙门氏菌定植与增殖。
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 在商业肉鸡舍中，P1和P2联合有机酸处理后，沙门氏菌阳性拖拭样本减少87.5%和75%，且无明显组织损伤或微生物群落失衡报告。
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Non-pathogenic strains; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no kill-switches or auxotrophy used.
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): All strains are non-pathogenic and previously isolated from healthy poultry; no evidence of horizontal gene transfer or environmental escape; low opportunistic risk.
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Physical delivery via water lines; no encapsulation or barrier system used.
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 所有菌株均为非致病性肠道共生菌，已在多项研究中证明安全，未发现毒力基因或抗生素抗性基因，且在鸡舍环境中无逃逸风险，属于低风险生物制剂。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在实验1中，P1单独使用可使沙门氏菌阳性拖拭样本减少90%；在实验2中，有机酸预处理后使用P1或P2，沙门氏菌减少率分别达87.5%和75%，表明该益生菌组合可有效降低鸡舍环境中的沙门氏菌负荷，减少屠宰场交叉污染风险。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 6.0–7.0; tolerates gastric acidity; survives transit through upper GI tract
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Survives intestinal transit; transient colonization in infants; no long-term persistence after discontinuation
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gut lumen, particularly in breastfed infants; may colonize mucosal surface in neonates
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competes with pathogenic bacteria for nutrients and binding sites; may modulate host immune tolerance
