C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerates gastric acid, bile salts, and lyophilization; stable during storage and rehydration
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Cell wall structure and acid tolerance genes (e.g., *dlt* operon)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该菌株为兼性厌氧菌，可在37°C、pH 6.0–7.0条件下生长，能耐受胃酸和胆汁，成功通过上消化道并定植于肠道。在婴儿中可短暂定植，但停用后通常无法长期维持。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Not specified (natural strain used)
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High chromosomal stability; no plasmid-based systems reported
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in oral drops and formula matrices
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 该菌株为天然分离株，未经过基因工程改造，其功能依赖于天然代谢与免疫调节机制。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Lactate permease and pH-sensing regulators (e.g., *gad* system)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No engineered logic; natural response to environmental cues
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 该菌株通过感知肠道pH、胆汁酸、乳酸和葡萄糖等信号，调节自身代谢与黏附行为，响应宿主炎症因子（如IL-8、TNF-α）变化，实现免疫调节。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Constitutive secretion of reuterin and immunomodulatory molecules
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent effect; 10⁸ CFUs/day in drops; efficacy observed at consistent daily dosing
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with oral drops and formula; stable in liquid matrix
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Competes with pathogens for binding sites and nutrients; produces reuterin (antimicrobial compound) in vitro
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 在婴儿中使用安全，未见显著毒性或微生物群落紊乱；在口服滴剂中保持活性。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Downregulates pro-inflammatory cytokines (IL-8, IL-1β, TNF-α); upregulates anti-inflammatory IL-10; modulates mucosal immune response
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Improves mucosal healing in pediatric UC; reduces endoscopic and histologic scores; enhances epithelial barrier function
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Auxotrophy (natural strain with no antibiotic resistance genes in DSM 17938)
B_containment_material (生物安全_相关物质): Tetracycline and lincomycin resistance genes absent in DSM 17938
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no reported cases of sepsis; no horizontal gene transfer risk in this strain
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Oral delivery limits systemic exposure; physical barrier of GI mucosa
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 该菌株为GRAS级，无耐药基因，安全性良好。在健康儿童中耐受性佳，仅偶见胃肠不适。在高危人群（如早产儿、免疫缺陷者）中需谨慎使用。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在母乳喂养婴儿中，每日10⁸ CFU的L. reuteri DSM 17938可显著减少哭闹时间（平均减少42–50分钟/天），改善功能性胃肠疾病症状。在儿童溃疡性结肠炎中，直肠给药可显著降低Mayo评分，改善黏膜愈合。

healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在儿童中用于预防抗生素相关性腹泻（NNT=7）和急性胃肠炎，可缩短腹泻持续时间约1天。在溃疡性结肠炎中可诱导缓解，显著改善疾病活动指数。

C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Intestinal mucosa, particularly in the colon
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of pathogenic bacteria; no significant symbiosis with dominant gut microbiota reported
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to bile salts (up to 1.5% w/v), moderate acid tolerance (pH 4.0), stable during lyophilization and rehydration
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Bile salt hydrolase (BSH) and acid shock proteins
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该菌株为兼性厌氧菌，最适生长温度为37 °C，pH 6.0–7.0，可在pH 4.0–8.0范围内存活，对胆盐（最高1.5% w/v）和酸性环境具有较强耐受性，可在冻干后恢复活性，适合肠道定植。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Plasmid pMG36e-based expression system
G_edit_efficiency (编辑效率): High efficiency (>90%) with low off-target effects; CRISPR-Cas9 used for gene knockout
G_circuit_control (回路控制): Constitutive expression of cholesterol degradation genes
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): Plasmid copy number ~15–20; stable for >100 generations in vitro; no significant metabolic burden observed
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in gel matrix (alginate-based) without loss of function
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 通过pMG36e质粒系统构建了胆固醇降解基因的组成型表达，利用CRISPR-Cas9技术实现关键基因的敲除，确保基因工程菌株在材料环境中长期稳定表达功能蛋白。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Promoter P154 (responsive to cholesterol and bile acids)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): AND gate: requires both cholesterol and bile acid presence for full activation
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 该系统通过P154启动子实现对胆固醇和胆汁酸的双重感应，仅在两种信号同时存在时启动降解基因表达，有效避免在无目标底物时的非特异性代谢消耗。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Type IV secretion system (T4SS) and extracellular vesicles
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Constitutive expression; dosage controlled by host cholesterol levels via sensing system
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with alginate hydrogel; maintains viability and function during encapsulation
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): 降解胆固醇并转化为胆汁酸衍生物，降低血清总胆固醇水平
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Auxotrophy (requires exogenous thymidine)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Non-pathogenic; no antibiotic resistance genes detected; low risk of horizontal gene transfer; no environmental escape reported
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Alginate hydrogel provides physical confinement
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 该菌株为公认安全（GRAS）菌株，通过胸腺嘧啶营养缺陷型实现生物 containment，无致病性、耐药基因或水平基因转移风险，材料屏障有效防止逃逸。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在体外模型中，L. plantarum S1可将胆固醇降解率提高至68.7%，显著降低血清总胆固醇水平，且在肠道模拟环境中保持稳定活性。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Temperature: 37°C; pH: Neutral to slightly acidic; Nutritional requirements: Ferments sucrose slowly, cannot ferment lactose; Requires complex media for growth
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Transient colonization in oral cavity; No long-term persistence; In vitro growth rate not specified, but known to be moderate
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Oral cavity (transiently), particularly in acidic environments such as fissures and interdental spaces
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Antagonizes mutans streptococci and other lactobacilli via antimicrobial substances; Competes for ecological niches without permanent colonization
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Moderate tolerance to gastric conditions; Stable in milk matrix during storage and consumption; No data on UV, drying, or shear stress
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Milk matrix (protective environment)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Lactobacillus rhamnosus GG is a homofermentative lactobacillus that transiently colonizes the oral cavity, particularly in acidic niches. It does not permanently adhere to tooth surfaces but exerts beneficial effects through competitive exclusion and antimicrobial activity. It grows well in milk at 37°C and is stable during consumption, though it does not persist long-term in the oral environment.
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Not applicable (natural strain, no genetic modification reported)
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High (natural strain, no plasmids or integrative vectors used; no evidence of genetic drift or instability in study)
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in milk matrix; no adverse effects on material integrity
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): Lactobacillus rhamnosus GG is used in its natural form without genetic modification. Its probiotic effects are due to inherent biological properties, including production of antimicrobial substances and competitive exclusion of pathogenic bacteria.
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Natural metabolic and adhesion mechanisms; no engineered sensors reported
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No engineered logic; natural competitive behavior based on environmental adaptation and resource competition
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): Lactobacillus rhamnosus GG senses acidic environments and low pH niches in the oral cavity, where it transiently colonizes. It responds to the presence of fermentable sugars (especially sucrose) by producing antimicrobial substances. Its activity is not regulated by external inducers but is constitutive and driven by ecological competition with mutans streptococci and other lactobacilli.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Natural secretion of antimicrobial substances (e.g., pyroglutamic acid); no engineered secretion systems
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent via milk consumption (5–10 × 10⁵ CFU/ml); controlled by daily intake frequency
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Highly compatible with milk matrix; no structural disruption observed; stable during storage and consumption
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): LGG produces antimicrobial substances (e.g., pyroglutamic acid) that inhibit mutans streptococci and other oral lactobacilli. It competes for ecological niches and reduces pathogen load.
E_A_agent_material (抗菌因子_相关物质): Pyroglutamic acid, other unidentified antimicrobial substances
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): LGG significantly reduced mutans streptococci counts (≥10⁵ CFU/ml) and dental caries incidence, especially in 3–4-year-olds. No adverse effects on oral microbiome or host tissues were observed. The effect was localized and transient, indicating safety.
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): LGG modulates oral microbial metabolism by reducing acidogenic bacteria (mutans streptococci), thereby lowering acid production and promoting a less cariogenic environment.
E_E_metabolite_material (代谢物_相关物质): Reduced acid production (indirect effect); modulation of microbial metabolite profile
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (natural strain, no kill-switch or auxotrophy reported)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no horizontal gene transfer risk; no environmental escape risk due to transient colonization
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Milk matrix provides physical confinement; no engineered barriers
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Lactobacillus rhamnosus GG is a well-characterized GRAS (Generally Recognized As Safe) strain. It does not colonize permanently, is not pathogenic, and has no known antibiotic resistance genes. Its transient presence in the oral cavity limits ecological risk. No adverse effects were observed in the study, confirming its safety for long-term use in children.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): Milk containing LGG significantly reduced dental caries risk (OR = 0.51, p = 0.004) and mutans streptococci levels in children, particularly in the 3–4-year-old group. The intervention led to a 6% reduction in caries risk in the LGG group compared to a 4% increase in the control group. The effect was most pronounced in occlusal surfaces and initial caries, indicating strong preventive efficacy in early childhood dental health.

composition (组成成分): [{"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus rhamnosus GR-1", "strain_id": "GR-1"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus reuteri RC-14", "strain_id": "RC-14"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus reuteri", "strain_id": "10^10 cfu/day"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus rhamnosus GG", "strain_id": "GG"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus acidophilus La-5", "strain_id": "La-5"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Bifidobacterium animalis subsp. lactis B-12", "strain_id": "B-12"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Bifidobacterium lactis Bi-07", "strain_id": "Bi-07"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Saccharomyces boulardii", "strain_id": "6 × 10^7 living bacteria"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus casei Shirota", "strain_id": "Shirota"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Bacillus coagulans GBI-30,6086", "strain_id": "GBI-30,6086"}]
C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 5.5–6.5, tolerant to bile salts and low pH; requires fermentable carbohydrates (e.g., lactose, fructooligosaccharides) for growth
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~1–2 hours in vitro; in vivo colonization observed in gut mucosa with transient persistence
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gastrointestinal tract (especially colon and small intestine), mucosal surface of gut epithelium
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of pathogenic bacteria; synergistic interaction with prebiotics (e.g., FOS, GOS); may modulate host microbiota composition
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to gastric acid and bile; stable during lyophilization and rehydration; moderate resistance to shear stress in suspension
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Cell wall components (e.g., teichoic acids), exopolysaccharides, and stress-response proteins
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 这些微生物均为肠道定植型益生菌，具有耐酸耐胆盐特性，可在胃肠道环境中定植并维持一定时间。多数菌株为兼性厌氧菌，适宜在37°C、pH 5.5–6.5的条件下生长，依赖乳糖、果寡糖等可发酵碳源。在宿主肠道中可短暂定植，通过竞争性抑制病原菌和调节免疫反应发挥功能。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Not specified
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): Not specified
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Not specified
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 文中未提及任何基因工程改造，所有微生物均为天然菌株或混合制剂，未进行人工基因编辑或合成回路设计。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): FNR promoter (hypoxia), Lactose permease (glucose), Bile acid receptors (e.g., Bile acid-binding proteins)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Not specified
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 文中未描述任何逻辑门控机制或信号整合系统，微生物的响应主要基于其天然代谢和环境适应能力。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Type I Secretion (e.g., for IL-10, SCFAs), Vesicles (exosomes), Lysis (in some cases)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent effects observed; daily intake of 10^9–10^10 CFU/day; no precise feedback control
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with yogurt, capsules, and fermented milk delivery systems; stable in suspension
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Not applicable
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 未提及抗菌或抗生物膜功能。
E_B_crit_evidence (标准B_依据): 未提及氧气生成或氧合功能。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): 通过调节免疫细胞活性、抑制炎症因子释放、促进调节性T细胞（Treg）分化，改善慢性免疫激活状态。
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): Interleukin-10 (IL-10), Tumor Necrosis Factor-alpha (TNF-α), Interferon-gamma (IFN-γ), Secretory IgA
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): 通过增强肠道屏障功能、减少微生物易位、促进上皮细胞再生，修复HIV感染引起的肠道损伤。
E_D_repair_material (修复因子_相关物质): Mucin, Tight junction proteins (e.g., ZO-1, Occludin), Growth factors (e.g., EGF, TGF-β)
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): 通过发酵膳食纤维产生短链脂肪酸（SCFAs），调节宿主代谢，降低炎症水平，改善肠道微环境。
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (natural strains, no kill-switches or auxotrophy)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no known antibiotic resistance genes; low risk of horizontal gene transfer; no environmental escape reported
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Physical confinement via oral delivery; limited survival in non-gut environments
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 所有使用菌株均为公认安全（GRAS）的益生菌，无致病性，未发现耐药基因或水平基因转移风险。在体外和体内研究中均未观察到异常定植或生态位扩张，安全性良好。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在16项随机对照试验中，益生菌、益生元和合生元干预对HIV感染者CD4+ T细胞计数的总体影响无统计学显著差异（WMD = 3.86, 95% CI: -24.72 to 32.45, P = 0.791）。然而，在高偏倚风险的研究中观察到显著提升（WMD = 188, P ≤ 0.001），提示可能存在研究质量影响结果。尽管未显著提高CD4计数，但部分研究显示其可改善肠道屏障功能、降低微生物易位和炎症标志物，提示潜在的免疫调节和组织修复作用。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Temperature: 37°C; pH: Not specified; Osmotic: Not specified; Nutrition: Not specified, but cultured on Luria-Bertani medium
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Not explicitly reported; growth rate inferred from in vivo administration and colonization effects
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Intestinal tract of grass carp (Ctenopharyngodon idellus), particularly midgut
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Modulates gut microbial community by increasing relative abundance of Proteobacteria and Bacteroidetes; reduces abundance of Aeromonas and Shewanella in co-infection model; antagonistic activity against pathogenic bacteria
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Not explicitly reported; survives intragastric administration and intestinal environment
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Bacillus subtilis H2 is a facultative anaerobe capable of colonizing the intestinal tract of grass carp after oral administration. It thrives in the midgut environment, where it modulates microbial composition and enhances host immunity and fat metabolism. It is resilient enough to survive the gastrointestinal transit and exert functional effects in vivo.
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): The study does not describe any genetic modifications or engineering of Bacillus subtilis H2. The strain was isolated from wastewater and used in its native form without genetic manipulation. All observed effects are attributed to its natural probiotic properties.
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Not applicable; no engineered sensing circuits described
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): No synthetic biological circuits or engineered sensing modules were implemented. The strain's activity is based on natural interactions with the host and microbial environment.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Not specified; likely natural secretion via cell lysis or constitutive secretion, but not engineered.
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Not applicable; administered as a fixed dose (10⁶ CFU/mL) without dynamic control.
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Not applicable; no encapsulation or material delivery system described.
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Not applicable; no direct antibacterial mechanism reported.
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): No evidence of antibacterial activity was reported; the strain's effect is indirect via immune modulation and microbial balance.
E_B_mechanism_desc (产氧机制描述): Not applicable; no oxygen-producing mechanism described.
E_B_crit_evidence (标准B_依据): No evidence of oxygenation function; not a feature of this strain.
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): B. subtilis H2 upregulates key immune-related genes in grass carp, including IL-4, IL-11, IFN-α, CSF, FOSB, MAPK12b, IGHV3-1l, and IGHV3-21, indicating activation of innate and adaptive immune responses.
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): IL-4, IL-11, IFN-α, CSF, FOSB, MAPK12b, IGHV3-1l, IGHV3-21 (host cytokines and immune genes)
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Not applicable; no direct tissue repair or regeneration effects reported.
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): B. subtilis H2 significantly upregulates genes involved in fat digestion and absorption, including Apob-48, ABCG8, and DGAT, enhancing lipid metabolism and potentially improving fat utilization and energy homeostasis.
E_F_mechanism_desc (肿瘤治疗描述): Not applicable; no tumor-targeting or therapeutic mechanism described.
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Not applicable; no engineered kill switches or auxotrophy described.
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Bacillus subtilis is generally recognized as safe (GRAS); no pathogenicity, antibiotic resistance genes, or horizontal gene transfer risks reported. Low opportunistic risk in fish.
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Not applicable; no physical material barrier used.
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Bacillus subtilis H2 is a non-pathogenic, GRAS strain used in aquaculture. It shows no evidence of virulence, antibiotic resistance, or environmental persistence risks. Its use is considered safe for fish and aquatic ecosystems.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): Bacillus subtilis H2 significantly enhanced intestinal microbial diversity, upregulated 824 differentially expressed genes, activated immune responses (e.g., IL-4, IFN-α, CSF), and improved fat metabolism by increasing expression of Apob-48, ABCG8, and DGAT. These effects suggest improved host health, disease resistance, and metabolic efficiency in grass carp.

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): 37°C, pH 6.8, in TYGA broth with 0.5% sodium acetate, utilizing glucose as carbon source
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Growth enhanced with bile concentration; dry weight yield doubled (371.1 mg/L vs 186.7 mg/L) after 5 days in TYGA with 0.3% bile; viable count decreased after 5 days despite higher biomass
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Intestinal tract, particularly in bile-rich environments such as duodenum
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Potential for competitive adhesion due to increased hydrophobicity; may modulate microbial balance via probiotic activity
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Resistant to prolonged culture stress (5 days), reduced cell lysis and maintained rod shape in presence of bile; enhanced tolerance to lysozyme and autolysis
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Bile salts, sodium acetate
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Lactobacillus brevis KB290 exhibits enhanced growth and cell integrity in the presence of bile when cultured in TYGA broth containing sodium acetate. Bile not only improves cell yield and hydrophobicity but also suppresses cell lysis and maintains rod morphology during extended culture, which is beneficial for intestinal survival.
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 本研究未涉及基因工程改造，仅观察了Lactobacillus brevis KB290在不同培养条件下的生理响应，未使用任何遗传工具或合成电路。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Bile resistance mechanism (likely membrane-associated sensors, though not explicitly identified)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No synthetic logic gates; natural adaptation to bile and acetate via metabolic and structural responses
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): Lactobacillus brevis KB290 senses bile and sodium acetate in the environment and responds by enhancing glycolytic flux, increasing lactate production, improving cell hydrophobicity, and suppressing autolysis. This is a natural adaptive response rather than a programmed genetic circuit.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Passive secretion via cell membrane; no active secretion systems reported
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Not applicable (natural response, not controllable via external inducers)
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with liquid broth culture; no encapsulation or material barrier described
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Enhanced immune stimulation via increased cell yield and hydrophobicity, potentially improving interaction with host immune cells.
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): Cell surface components (e.g., EPS, membrane proteins) induced by bile and acetate
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Increased lactate production via enhanced glycolysis in response to bile, improving metabolic efficiency and growth yield.
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (no synthetic kill switches or auxotrophy reported)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes or HGT risk reported; naturally occurring strain with established probiotic use
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): None (no physical confinement described)
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Lactobacillus brevis KB290 is a GRAS (Generally Recognized As Safe) strain with no reported pathogenicity or antibiotic resistance. It is not engineered, so no risk of horizontal gene transfer or environmental escape. No biocontainment strategy is needed.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在含胆汁和醋酸钠的培养基中，Lactobacillus brevis KB290的细胞产量翻倍，细胞形态保持完整，自溶减少，且细胞疏水性增强，这些特性有助于其在肠道环境中的定植和存活，从而支持其作为益生菌的潜在疗效。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH neutral to slightly acidic; utilizes milk substrates (lactose, casein); resistant to bile salts (bshA, bshB genes); tolerates osmotic stress via membrane modification (mprF gene)
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Growth rate not explicitly quantified; cultured at 37°C for 6 hours in MRS-1 medium; in vivo colonization supported by adhesion and biofilm formation
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gastrointestinal mucin layer, particularly in the gut; forms biofilms on mucin; colonizes hypoxic intestinal niches
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Symbiotic with host microbiota; inhibits pathogens and pathobionts via bacteriocin production; competes for nutrients (milk proteins, sugars); enhances host immune response
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Resistant to bile (bshA, bshB), antibiotics (blaZ, pbpX, mprF), and phage infection (CRISPR-Cas I-B); stable under storage and transport conditions (implied by long-term use in probiotic product)
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Bile salt hydrolase (bshA, bshB), lysylphosphatidylglycerol flippase/synthetase (mprF), CRISPR-Cas system
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Lactobacillus helveticus D75 and D76 are facultative anaerobes that grow optimally at 37°C in MRS-1 medium. They exhibit strong adhesion to the gastrointestinal mucin layer, form biofilms, and utilize milk proteins and lactose as primary carbon and nitrogen sources. They are bile-resistant and possess multiple mechanisms for environmental stress tolerance, including CRISPR-Cas immunity and membrane modification. These traits support their colonization and persistence in the gut microbiome.
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): CRISPR-Cas type I-B system (cas1–cas8b1 genes), natural plasmid-based gene clusters
G_edit_efficiency (编辑效率): Not applicable (naturally occurring system; no engineered edits reported)
G_circuit_control (回路控制): Constitutive expression of bacteriocin helveticin J (helJ genes); potential inducible expression of helJ4 (low baseline, likely inducible by unknown signal)
G_circuit_inducer_material (电路调控_相关物质): Unknown (helJ4 expression low in standard medium; likely requires pathogen or environmental signal)
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High; CRISPR arrays with 33 spacers suggest long-term phage resistance; chromosomal integration of key genes; no mobile elements reported in core probiotic genes
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Genes for EPS, adhesion, and bacteriocin are chromosomally integrated and stable in probiotic formulation
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): The strains naturally possess a robust CRISPR-Cas I-B system for phage defense and multiple gene clusters for probiotic functions. Bacteriocin helveticin J is produced via constitutive and potentially inducible pathways. No synthetic genetic circuits are engineered; all functions are native and stable.
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Mucin-binding protein (mucBP), fibronectin-binding protein (fpbA, fpbIII), bile salt hydrolase (bshA, bshB), CRISPR-Cas system (cas genes)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Constitutive expression of adhesion and EPS genes; bacteriocin production likely regulated by quorum sensing (inducible via unknown signal); no synthetic logic gates reported
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): The strains constitutively express adhesion and exopolysaccharide genes to colonize the mucin layer. Bacteriocin helveticin J is produced in a potentially quorum-dependent manner, with helJ4 showing low expression in standard culture, suggesting induction by microbial or host signals. The CRISPR-Cas system provides adaptive immunity, responding to foreign DNA via spacer matching.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Type I secretion (via SlpA domains), extracellular proteases (lactocepin H3, H), and biofilm-mediated delivery
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Constitutive and potentially quorum-regulated; no synthetic control reported
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Stable in probiotic formulations; compatible with encapsulation; biofilm formation enhances retention in mucosal environment
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Produces bacteriocin helveticin J, which disrupts membrane potential of target cells; inhibits growth of pathogens and pathobionts; forms biofilms that protect against host immune factors and microbial competition.
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): Bacteriocin helveticin J is produced constitutively and potentially inducibly; no cytotoxicity reported; biofilm formation enhances localized activity without systemic spread; no pathogenicity genes detected.
E_B_crit_evidence (标准B_依据): No oxygen-producing enzymes or light-dependent systems reported.
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Exopolysaccharides and teichoic acids stimulate host immune system; S-layer proteins enhance immunostimulatory activity; bacteriocin production modulates microbial balance.
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Biofilm formation on mucin layer stabilizes epithelial barrier; proteolytic enzymes (lactocepin H3, H) release bioactive peptides (Ile-Pro-Pro, Val-Pro-Pro) with anti-inflammatory and tissue-protective effects.
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Metabolizes lactose and galactose via Leloir pathway; produces short-chain fatty acids (SCFAs) as byproducts; breaks down casein into digestible peptides and amino acids.
E_E_metabolite_material (代谢物_相关物质): Short-chain fatty acids (SCFAs), Ile-Pro-Pro, Val-Pro-Pro, UDP-glucose
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Natural auxotrophy (no auxotrophy genes reported); no kill-switches; CRISPR-Cas provides phage resistance
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): No pathogenicity genes, virulence factors, or toxin genes detected; low opportunistic risk; moderate antibiotic resistance (blaZ, pbpX, mprF) but not transferable; no HGT risk reported
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Physical confinement in probiotic product (capsule/tablet); limited environmental persistence due to lack of broad survival traits
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Lactobacillus helveticus D75 and D76 are classified as GRAS (Generally Recognized As Safe). No pathogenicity islands or virulence genes were found. They possess moderate antibiotic resistance genes, but these are chromosomal and not linked to mobile elements. The CRISPR-Cas system enhances stability and reduces phage infection risk. No evidence of horizontal gene transfer or environmental escape. The strains are safe for human consumption and have been used in clinical settings for decades.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): Clinically proven efficacy in treating chronic nasopharyngeal disease, H. pylori infection, MALT lymphoma, vulvovaginitis, chemotherapy complications, Klebsiella infection, and inflammatory bowel diseases. Also enhances vaccine efficacy and reduces respiratory infections. Supports mucosal barrier integrity and immune modulation through biofilm formation and bacteriocin production.

spatial_arrangement (空间排布): Oral administration (systemic distribution via gastrointestinal tract)
C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 6.5–7.5, tolerates intestinal pH and bile salts; requires carbon sources such as glucose and amino acids; dependent on host-derived nutrients in vivo.
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): In vitro doubling time not specified; in vivo colonization observed within days of administration, with sustained presence in fecal microbiota.
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Intestinal lumen, particularly colon; preferentially colonizes mucosal surfaces and contributes to gut barrier integrity.
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competes with opportunistic pathogens; promotes symbiosis with commensal microbiota; increases abundance of beneficial bacteria such as Bifidobacterium.
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerates gastric acidity, bile salts, and osmotic stress during transit; stable during lyophilization and storage at room temperature.
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Spore-forming Bacillus mesentericus (TO-A) provides resistance to heat and drying.
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该微生物系统由三种益生菌组成：粪肠球菌T110、丁酸梭菌TO-A和肠球菌TO-A。它们均为耐氧菌，可在人体肠道内定植，适应肠道pH和胆汁环境，依赖宿主提供的碳源和氨基酸生长。其中，丁酸梭菌和肠球菌具有孢子形成能力，增强其在胃肠道中的存活率和稳定性。
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 该系统未经过基因工程改造，为天然益生菌制剂，通过口服给药直接定植于肠道，无需外源性基因调控或合成电路。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Endogenous receptors in bacterial membranes and metabolic pathways responsive to host-derived signals (e.g., bile acid sensors in Clostridium butyricum).
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No engineered logic gates; natural metabolic feedback loops regulate growth and SCFA production based on nutrient availability.
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 三种菌株通过感知肠道环境中的pH、胆汁酸和葡萄糖等信号，调节自身代谢活动。丁酸梭菌在低氧和高胆汁环境中激活丁酸合成通路，粪肠球菌和肠球菌则通过竞争性定植抑制病原体生长，整体表现为对宿主微环境的自然响应，无人工逻辑控制。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Natural secretion of SCFAs and enzymes; no engineered delivery systems.
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Oral administration of fixed-dose tablets (6 tablets/day); dosage not dynamically controlled.
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Oral tablets are stable and compatible with gastrointestinal transit; no encapsulation in biomaterials.
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): 无直接抗菌或抗生物膜功能。
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 未提及抗菌或抗生物膜作用。
E_B_crit_evidence (标准B_依据): 未涉及氧气生成或缺氧缓解机制。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): 通过调节肠道菌群平衡，增强宿主免疫功能，提升CD4+ T细胞ATP水平，抑制术后炎症反应。
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): Adenosine Triphosphate (ATP) from CD4+ T cells (indirectly modulated by probiotics)
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): 通过促进肠道蠕动恢复、增加黏液分泌和上皮细胞增殖，改善肠道屏障功能，加速术后恢复。
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): 丁酸梭菌产生丁酸等短链脂肪酸，调节宿主能量代谢，维持肠道酸性环境，促进上皮细胞代谢。
E_E_metabolite_material (代谢物_相关物质): Butyric acid, Acetic acid, Propionic acid
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): No genetic kill switches; reliance on natural attenuation and host immune clearance.
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; Enterococcus faecalis has potential for antibiotic resistance (vancomycin), but strain T110 not reported to carry resistance genes. No evidence of horizontal gene transfer or environmental escape.
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Oral administration provides physical barrier via gastrointestinal tract; no implanted devices.
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 该系统为GRAS级益生菌组合，无基因工程改造，安全性高。粪肠球菌虽具潜在耐药性，但本研究中未报告耐药基因。菌株在肠道内定植后通过自然代谢和宿主免疫清除，无逃逸风险。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 术后1周内，接受益生菌治疗的患者（B组）排气时间（2.0±1.1天）和进食时间（3.9±1.5天）显著短于对照组（A组，2.8±2.0天和4.7±1.8天）。B组浅表切口感染发生率（6.7%）显著低于A组（19.8%），P=0.016。多变量分析显示，益生菌使用是SIS的独立保护因素（风险比4.10，95%CI 1.34–12.20，P=0.013）。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 5.5–6.5; tolerates gastric acidity (pH 1–2) due to lactic acid production; requires fermentable carbohydrates (e.g., glucose, lactose) as carbon sources
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~1.5–2 hours in vitro; in vivo colonization ability demonstrated in gastric mucosa; stable in gastrointestinal tract during antibiotic therapy
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gastric mucosa, specifically competing for adhesion sites with *H. pylori*
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of *H. pylori*; modulates host immune response; synergistic with other probiotics in restoring gastric microbiota balance
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to gastric acid, bile salts, and osmotic stress; stable during lyophilization and rehydration; resistant to shear stress in suspension
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Lactic acid, cell surface glycolipids
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该菌株为兼性厌氧菌，可在37°C、pH 5.5–6.5条件下良好生长，具有耐受胃酸（pH 1–2）的能力，主要通过产生乳酸降低局部pH值以抑制病原体。其在胃黏膜上具有较强的定植能力，能与幽门螺杆菌竞争结合位点，维持胃内微生态平衡。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): None reported
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High chromosomal stability; no plasmid-based systems reported; low metabolic burden; no evidence of drift in clinical trials
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in oral suspension and yogurt formulations; compatible with gastric delivery systems
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 未进行基因工程改造，其功能依赖于天然生理特性，如黏附能力、乳酸和细菌素的产生，以及对幽门螺杆菌的直接抑制作用。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): FNR promoter (inferred from metabolic adaptation), specific membrane glycolipid receptors
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Constitutive expression; no reported inducible logic gates; threshold-based response to pH and nutrient availability
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 该菌株通过感知胃内酸度和葡萄糖水平，启动乳酸和细菌素的持续分泌，实现对幽门螺杆菌的持续抑制。其黏附机制依赖于对胃上皮细胞表面特定糖脂的识别，属于非诱导性、基础表达型响应系统。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Type I secretion (bacteriocins), passive diffusion (lactic acid)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent effect; 1×10⁸ CFU tid for 14 days in clinical trials; controlled by oral administration schedule
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with oral suspension, yogurt, and lyophilized formulations; stable in gastric environment
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): 通过分泌细菌素（如acidocin、lacticin）和乳酸直接抑制幽门螺杆菌生长；乳酸干扰其尿素酶活性，破坏其在酸性环境中的生存能力
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 在临床试验中，添加L. reuteri可使幽门螺杆菌根除率提高20%，且未报告严重不良反应，表明其抗菌活性可控且局部安全。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): 通过抑制IL-8、TNF-α等促炎细胞因子的分泌，减轻胃黏膜炎症；下调CagA毒力因子表达，减少中性粒细胞募集
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): 通过减少炎症反应和黏膜损伤，促进胃黏膜屏障修复；间接支持上皮再生和组织完整性恢复
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (natural strain, no genetic modifications)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Non-pathogenic; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; low risk of horizontal gene transfer; no environmental escape concerns
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Oral delivery provides natural physical barrier; no systemic dissemination observed
B_risk_desc (风险描述): L. reuteri为公认安全（GRAS）菌株，无致病性，未发现耐药基因，不引起菌血症或生态失衡，临床使用安全。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在一项随机对照试验中，L. reuteri联合左氧氟沙星治疗使幽门螺杆菌根除率提高20%，同时显著减轻腹泻、恶心等副作用，改善患者依从性，支持其作为辅助治疗的有效性。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal at 37°C, pH 5.5–6.5; survives gastric acid via acid tolerance response; requires glucose and lactose as carbon sources
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~1.8 hours in vitro; colonizes intestinal and gastric mucosa; stable during antibiotic therapy
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gastric and intestinal mucosa; competes with *H. pylori* for adhesion sites
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of pathogens; enhances IgA secretion; modulates cytokine expression; supports microbiota homeostasis
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): High tolerance to gastric acid, bile, osmotic stress, and freeze-drying; maintains viability during storage
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Cell wall components, acid tolerance proteins
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该菌株为兼性厌氧菌，可在37°C、pH 5.5–6.5条件下生长，具有强耐酸性，能通过酸耐受机制在胃酸环境中存活。其在胃肠道黏膜上具有良好的定植能力，可抑制幽门螺杆菌定植并调节免疫反应。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): None reported
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High chromosomal stability; no plasmid loss; low metabolic burden; no drift observed in trials
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in oral suspension and capsule formulations; compatible with gastric delivery
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 未进行基因改造，其功能依赖于天然特性，如黏附能力、免疫调节和抗菌物质分泌。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): FNR promoter (inferred), surface adhesins
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Constitutive expression; no inducible circuits; threshold-based response to pH and nutrients
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): LGG通过感知胃内酸度和葡萄糖水平，持续分泌乳酸和免疫调节因子，实现对幽门螺杆菌的抑制和免疫稳态调节，属于基础表达型响应系统。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Type I secretion (bacteriocins), passive diffusion (lactic acid)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): 6×10⁹ CFU bid for 14 days; controlled by oral dosing schedule
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with oral suspension and capsule delivery; stable in gastrointestinal tract
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): 分泌乳酸和细菌素，降低局部pH，抑制幽门螺杆菌生长；通过竞争性黏附阻止其定植
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 在Armuzzi等人的研究中，LGG联合三联疗法显著减轻恶心、腹胀和腹泻，但根除率无显著差异，表明其抗菌活性可控且安全。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): 增强IgA分泌；调节IL-8、TNF-α等细胞因子表达，减轻胃黏膜炎症；促进免疫耐受
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): 通过减少炎症和促进黏液分泌，支持胃黏膜屏障修复和上皮再生
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Non-pathogenic; no antibiotic resistance genes; low HGT risk; no environmental escape
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Oral delivery limits systemic exposure; no evidence of dissemination
B_risk_desc (风险描述): LGG为公认安全菌株，无致病性，未发现耐药基因，不引起菌血症，临床使用安全。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在Armuzzi等人的研究中，LGG联合三联疗法显著减轻胃肠道副作用（如恶心、腹胀、腹泻），提高患者耐受性，虽根除率无显著提升，但支持其作为辅助治疗的潜力。

C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~3–4 hours in vitro; moderate in vivo colonization; stable in fermented foods

C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Exopolysaccharides, acid tolerance proteins

E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 在Chitapanarux等人的研究中，B. longum联合三联疗法显著提高根除率（93.33% vs 73.33%）并减少腹泻，表明其抗菌活性可控且安全。

healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在Chitapanarux等人的研究中，B. longum联合三联疗法显著提高幽门螺杆菌根除率（93.33% vs 73.33%），并显著减少腹泻频率，支持其作为辅助治疗的有效性。

C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Cell wall chitin, heat shock proteins
