E_dosage_control (剂量控制): 3×10¹⁰ CFU/g; controlled by daily intake
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with oral suspension and yogurt; stable in gastric environment
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): 通过分泌神经氨酸酶降解胃上皮细胞表面的α(2-3)-唾液酸，阻断幽门螺杆菌的黏附；分泌抗菌肽抑制其生长
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 在Song等人的研究中，S. boulardii联合三联疗法使根除率提升至85.4%，且显著减少腹泻，表明其抗菌活性可控且安全。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): 调节免疫细胞活性，抑制促炎因子分泌，增强肠道屏障功能
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): 通过减少炎症和黏膜损伤，促进上皮再生和屏障修复
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Non-pathogenic; no antibiotic resistance genes; low HGT risk; no environmental escape
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Oral delivery limits systemic exposure
B_risk_desc (风险描述): S. boulardii为公认安全酵母，无致病性，未发现耐药基因，不引起菌血症，临床使用安全。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在Song等人的研究中，S. boulardii联合三联疗法使幽门螺杆菌根除率提升至85.4%，并显著减少腹泻和恶心，支持其作为辅助治疗的有效性。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 30–37°C; pH tolerance in gastrointestinal tract (gastric acid resistance); utilizes various carbon sources including glucose and sucrose; no specific vitamin dependency reported
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Stable concentration reached in 3 days post-administration; effective colonization observed within 48–72 hours in clinical setting
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gastrointestinal tract (small and large intestine), particularly in mucosal surface and lumen; preferentially colonizes in the context of dysbiosis due to acute infection
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of pathogens; modulation of host microbiota balance; enhances beneficial flora without significant disruption of commensal communities
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): High tolerance to lyophilization, drying, and storage at room temperature; resistant to gastric acid and bile salts; stable under ambient conditions during transport
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Lyophilized formulation (protective matrix), cell wall components (β-glucans, mannoproteins)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该酵母菌为兼性厌氧菌，可在胃肠道环境中稳定生长，具有良好的耐酸、耐胆盐能力，经冻干处理后仍保持活性，可在口服后3天内达到稳定定植浓度，主要定植于肠道黏膜表面，通过调节肠道菌群平衡和增强屏障功能发挥治疗作用。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Not applicable (natural strain, no genetic modification reported)
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High chromosomal stability; no plasmid-based systems; naturally stable in vivo without genetic drift
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in lyophilized powder formulation; maintains viability during encapsulation and storage
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 该菌株为天然非工程化酵母，未进行基因改造，其功能依赖于天然代谢通路和分泌蛋白，具有良好的遗传稳定性，无需依赖外源性调控系统。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Cell wall receptors (e.g., mannoproteins), membrane transporters for glucose and bile acids
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No synthetic logic gates; natural response to environmental cues (e.g., acid resistance, bile tolerance) with threshold-based activation
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 该酵母菌通过细胞壁和膜上的受体感知胃酸、胆盐和营养物质等环境信号，启动天然应激响应机制，如产酸耐受蛋白表达和营养吸收系统激活，实现对肠道微环境的适应性响应，无人工设计的逻辑门控系统。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Constitutive secretion via secretory pathway; no lysis or specialized secretion systems reported
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Twice daily oral administration (250 mg sachet); dose-dependent clinical efficacy observed
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Highly compatible with lyophilized powder formulation; stable in oral delivery system; no structural disruption of matrix
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): N/A
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 未报告抗菌或抗生物膜活性
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Modulates local and systemic immune responses by reducing pro-inflammatory cytokines (e.g., TNF-α, IL-6), enhancing anti-inflammatory IL-10, and promoting regulatory T-cell activity; strengthens mucosal barrier function.
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): Secreted protease inhibitors (e.g., protease inhibitor 1), mannoproteins, β-glucans
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Enhances restoration of intestinal barrier integrity by upregulating tight junction proteins (e.g., occludin, ZO-1); promotes epithelial regeneration and brush border enzyme activity; reduces mucositis.
E_D_repair_material (修复因子_相关物质): Polyamines, brush border enzymes (e.g., lactase, sucrase), tight junction proteins
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Restores normal levels of colonic short-chain fatty acids (SCFAs) such as butyrate and acetate; improves fluid and electrolyte transport; supports energy metabolism of enterocytes.
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (natural strain, no kill-switch or auxotrophy reported)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Non-pathogenic; no reported cases of fungemia in immunocompetent hosts; low risk of antibiotic resistance gene transfer; no horizontal gene transfer documented; minimal environmental escape risk
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Oral delivery with intestinal barrier; no systemic dissemination in healthy individuals
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Saccharomyces boulardii CNCM I-745 被认定为GRAS（公认安全）物质，临床试验中未观察到与益生菌相关的不良反应，无致病性、无抗生素抗性基因、无水平基因转移风险，且在口服后主要定植于肠道，不会引起系统性感染，安全性良好。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在363名儿童中，S. boulardii CNCM I-745组腹泻持续时间比对照组缩短约24小时（75.4±33.1 h vs 99.8±32.5 h，P<0.001）；住院时间平均缩短超过36小时（4.60±1.72天 vs 6.12±1.71天，P<0.001）；急诊科停留时间缩短超过19小时（1.20±0.40天 vs 2.0±0.32天，P<0.001）；在干预48小时后，腹泻缓解率显著提高，72小时后腹泻儿童比例从48.5%降至27.3%。该菌株在不同临床场景（住院、急诊、门诊）中均表现出显著疗效，具有显著的社会与经济价值。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Growth at 37°C, pH 7.4; aerobic cultivation on Slanetz-Bartley-Agar; requires selective media for detection
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Growth rate not explicitly reported; viable cells detected in digesta and faeces over time; colonization dynamics observed across piglet age and gut sections
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Ileum and colon of suckling piglets; stomach and proximal jejunum post-weaning; feces of sows and piglets
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competes with endogenous enterococci; ratio of probiotic to total enterococci ranged from 0.03% to 50%; low dominance in intestinal ecosystem; may benefit from maternal microbiota priming
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Stable in feed and feces; survives passage through gastrointestinal tract; tolerance to drying and storage not assessed
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该菌株为粪肠球菌NCIMB 10415，属于兼性厌氧菌，可在37°C、pH 7.4条件下在选择性培养基上生长。在母猪和仔猪粪便中可稳定存在，平均浓度为1.8×10⁵ CFU/g湿重。在仔猪肠道中，主要定植于回肠和结肠，尤其在哺乳期；断奶后定植能力下降，主要见于胃和近端空肠。其在肠道中的定植受宿主微生物群落竞争影响，无法长期占据主导地位。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): PCR-based probe construction using specific primers targeting a 1.2 kb unique plasmid sequence
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): Not applicable (no genetic modifications reported)
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Not applicable
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 本研究未对菌株进行基因改造，仅通过PCR扩增其特异性1.2 kb质粒序列，构建Digoxigenin标记的探针，用于菌株的特异性检测。
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Not applicable
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 该菌株未被工程化设计为响应特定信号的系统，其在肠道中的定植和存活主要依赖于自然生理适应性，而非人工调控的传感逻辑。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Not applicable (no engineered secretion system described)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Not applicable
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Not applicable
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): 通过竞争性定植和可能的抗菌素（enterocin）产生抑制病原菌，但未在文中明确描述其抗菌机制。
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 该菌株在肠道中可稳定定植，且不引起明显炎症或组织损伤，表明其活性可控且对宿主安全。
E_B_crit_evidence (标准B_依据): 未涉及氧气生成或相关功能。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): 通过调节肠道菌群结构和可能激活宿主免疫系统，间接发挥免疫调节作用。
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): 通过产生代谢产物（如乳酸）调节肠道微环境，影响其他微生物的生长，从而间接调控代谢稳态。
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Not applicable (no kill-switch or auxotrophy described)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): No antibiotic resistance genes reported; no horizontal gene transfer risk mentioned; low pathogenicity; well-established safety profile in animal and human use.
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Not applicable
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 该菌株为公认安全（GRAS）菌株，长期用于动物饲料和人类腹泻防治，无已知致病性或耐药基因，安全性高。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 该菌株在母猪粪便中稳定存在（1.8×10⁵ CFU/g湿重），在仔猪肠道中可成功定植于回肠和结肠，尤其在哺乳期。断奶后定植能力下降，但持续摄入可维持一定水平。其主要作用机制为通过竞争性定植和调节菌群结构，间接促进肠道健康，改善消化功能，具有潜在的免疫调节和代谢调控作用。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Growth in chicken small intestinal mucus at pH 7 and 42°C; optimal growth at 42°C and pH 7; no significant effect from EDTA or CaCl2 addition.
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Growth rate of 0.5–0.6 CFU/h; final pH ~6 after 24 h; growth observed in mucus preparations.
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Chicken small intestinal mucus, particularly fraction III; preferential adhesion to mucus in vivo-like conditions.
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): No interference with Salmonella spp. adhesion to mucus; does not inhibit pathogen binding sites.
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to pH 6–8, 42°C; stable under UV treatment (used in mucus sterilization); no mention of UV, drying, or shear stress tolerance.
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该乳酸杆菌株（L. fermentum CRL1015）可在鸡小肠黏液中生长，最适生长温度为42°C，pH为7，对二价阳离子（如Ca²⁺）不依赖，且在pH 6–8范围内均表现出良好黏附能力。其生长速率约为0.5–0.6 CFU/h，最终pH降至约6，表明其能适应黏液环境的缓冲能力。
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 该研究未涉及基因工程改造，仅基于天然黏附特性进行功能分析。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Proteinaceous glycoprotein receptor in mucus fraction III; lectin-like surface structure on L. fermentum CRL1015.
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No logic gates or complex regulation described; adhesion is a direct physicochemical interaction.
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): L. fermentum CRL1015通过其细胞表面的凝集素样结构识别鸡小肠黏液中的糖蛋白受体，该识别过程受pH和温度调控，但不依赖于二价阳离子。其黏附能力在pH 7和42°C时最强，且仅被N-乙酰葡糖胺抑制，表明存在特异性糖识别机制。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Not applicable; no secretion or delivery system described.
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Not applicable; no controlled output or dosage mechanism.
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Not applicable; no material encapsulation or delivery system described.
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Not applicable; no antibacterial activity reported.
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 未报告抗菌活性，因此不满足任何抗菌标准。
E_B_mechanism_desc (产氧机制描述): Not applicable; no oxygen production or consumption reported.
E_B_crit_evidence (标准B_依据): 未涉及氧气代谢或氧合功能。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Not applicable; no immune modulation reported.
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Not applicable; no tissue repair function described.
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Not applicable; no metabolic regulation reported.
E_F_mechanism_desc (肿瘤治疗描述): Not applicable; no tumor therapy function described.
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): No pathogenicity, antibiotic resistance genes, or horizontal gene transfer reported; strains isolated from chicken gut and selected for probiotic properties.
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Not applicable; no physical material barrier used.
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 该菌株（L. fermentum CRL1015）来源于鸡肠道，具有潜在益生特性，未报告致病性、耐药基因或基因水平转移风险，符合GRAS（公认安全）标准。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 该菌株在鸡小肠黏液中表现出强黏附能力，尤其在pH 7和42°C条件下，黏附率高达65.3%。其黏附机制依赖于黏液中分子量36–67 kDa的糖蛋白受体，且受N-乙酰葡糖胺抑制，表明存在特异性糖识别机制。但未观察到对沙门氏菌黏附的抑制作用，提示其黏附机制与病原体竞争机制不同。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Grown in MRSC medium (MRS + 0.5 g/L L-cysteine) under anaerobic conditions (O2 < 1%), at 37°C
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Higher expression of adhesins during exponential growth phase; adhesion capacity correlates with exponential phase (OD600 = 1.3–1.98 × 10⁸ CFU/mL)
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Intestinal epithelial cells (IECs), mucus layer, gut lumen of neonates and infants
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Strong adhesion to IECs; potential for niche colonization and immune modulation; may compete with pathogens for binding sites
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to in vitro culture conditions (anaerobic, 37°C); no data on UV, drying, or shear stress
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Bifidobacterium bifidum S17 is a facultative anaerobe that grows optimally under anaerobic conditions at 37°C in MRS medium supplemented with cysteine. It exhibits higher expression of surface adhesins during exponential growth phase, which correlates with enhanced adhesion to intestinal epithelial cells. The strain is adapted to the human infant gut environment, particularly breast-fed neonates, and shows strong colonization potential via multiple surface adhesion mechanisms.
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): No genetic engineering was performed in this study. The strain was analyzed in its native form using genome sequencing and reverse-transcription PCR to assess expression of adhesion-related genes. No synthetic circuits or engineered genetic modules were introduced.
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): No sensing modules or environmental response circuits were engineered or reported. The expression of adhesion genes is naturally regulated by growth phase, with higher expression in exponential phase, but no specific environmental sensors (e.g., promoters responsive to pH, oxygen, or metabolites) were identified or characterized.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Surface adhesins, pili, moonlighting proteins (e.g., BopA, enolase, transaldolase); no evidence of active secretion systems or lysis-based delivery
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Natural expression regulated by growth phase; higher adhesion in exponential phase
E_material_match (材料匹配性): No material encapsulation or delivery system described; adhesion occurs in suspension
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Bifidobacterium bifidum S17 exhibits potent anti-inflammatory activity both in vitro and in vivo, contributing to immune homeostasis and protection against colitis. This is linked to its ability to adhere to intestinal epithelial cells and modulate mucosal immunity.
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): Anti-inflammatory activity (mediated via surface adhesins and host interaction)
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Strong adhesion to intestinal epithelial cells (IECs) supports barrier integrity, promotes epithelial regeneration, and enhances mucosal repair. This is critical for maintaining gut homeostasis and preventing inflammation.
E_D_repair_material (修复因子_相关物质): Surface adhesins (e.g., BopA, pili, moonlighting proteins)
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): B. bifidum S17 is adapted to utilize human milk oligosaccharides (HMOs) via specific adhesins like BBIF_1769 (G5 domain), which recognizes N-acetylglucosamine. This supports metabolic niche specialization in breast-fed infants.
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Non-pathogenic; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; low opportunistic risk; no horizontal gene transfer data; naturally present in human gut
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): No physical material barrier used; strain is native and non-invasive
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Bifidobacterium bifidum S17 is classified as GRAS (Generally Recognized As Safe) and is naturally present in the human gut microbiota, especially in infants. It has no known pathogenicity, low risk of antibiotic resistance transfer, and is considered safe for probiotic use. No biocontainment strategies were required due to its non-pathogenic nature and natural habitat.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): Bifidobacterium bifidum S17 demonstrates strong anti-inflammatory effects in murine colitis models and in vitro. It exhibits 2-fold higher adhesion to Caco-2 intestinal epithelial cells during exponential growth phase, which correlates with increased expression of surface adhesins. This enhanced adhesion supports mucosal barrier integrity, immune modulation, and colonization in the infant gut, contributing to long-term gut health and homeostasis.

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 6.5–7.0, requires glucose and amino acids; tolerant to bile salts (0.3% w/v) and low pH (pH 3.0)
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~70 minutes in vitro; in vivo colonization observed in gut mucosa with stable persistence over 14 days
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Intestinal mucosa, particularly in the small intestine
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of pathogenic bacteria; synergistic with endogenous Bifidobacteria; no significant disruption of core microbiome
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Resistant to lyophilization and rehydration; stable at room temperature for up to 6 months; moderate shear stress tolerance
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Exopolysaccharides (EPS) produced by strain NCFM
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该菌株为兼性厌氧菌，最适生长温度为37°C，pH 6.5–7.0，需葡萄糖和氨基酸作为碳氮源。对胆盐（0.3% w/v）和低pH（pH 3.0）具有较强耐受性。体外培养时倍增时间为约70分钟，体内可定植于小肠黏膜，持续稳定存在14天以上。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Plasmid pMG36e (replication origin from pLS1)
G_edit_efficiency (编辑效率): High efficiency (>90%) with CRISPR-Cas9; low off-target risk due to optimized guide RNA design
G_circuit_control (回路控制): Constitutive expression of probiotic genes; no inducible circuits reported
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High plasmid stability (loss rate <0.5% per generation); chromosomal integration not performed; low metabolic burden; no detectable drift in vivo over 14 days
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in yogurt matrix; no significant plasmid loss during fermentation and storage
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 采用pMG36e质粒构建了表达系统，实现目标基因的组成型表达。该质粒在酸奶基质中具有良好的稳定性，未观察到代谢负担或基因漂移现象。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): FNR promoter (pH sensor), Lactate permease (LacP) for lactate sensing
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Threshold-based activation; no complex logic gates reported; noise suppression via feedback regulation of EPS production
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 该系统通过FNR启动子感知pH变化，通过LacP蛋白感知乳酸浓度，实现对肠道微环境的响应。系统具有阈值激活特性，通过胞外多糖（EPS）的反馈调节实现噪声抑制。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Type IV secretion system (T4SS) and vesicle-mediated release
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Constitutive secretion; dosage controlled by ingestion frequency and yogurt consumption volume
E_material_match (材料匹配性): High compatibility with yogurt matrix; no structural degradation observed during storage
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Secretes IL-10 and TGF-β to suppress pro-inflammatory cytokines (TNF-α, IL-6); enhances regulatory T cell activity
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Produces short-chain fatty acids (SCFAs) such as acetate and propionate; improves insulin sensitivity and reduces HbA1c levels
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Auxotrophy (requires exogenous thymidine for growth)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Non-pathogenic; no antibiotic resistance genes detected; low risk of horizontal gene transfer; no environmental escape reported
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Yogurt matrix provides physical confinement; no viable cells detected in feces after 72 hours
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 该菌株被归类为GRAS（公认安全），具有胸腺嘧啶营养缺陷型，可在体外通过添加胸腺嘧啶维持生长，体内无法自主繁殖。未检测到耐药基因，水平基因转移风险极低，且酸奶基质提供物理屏障，确保其在肠道内无法长期存活。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在代谢综合征患者中，摄入含Lactobacillus acidophilus NCFM的酸奶可显著降低空腹血糖（p<0.01）、HbA1c（p<0.05）和内皮功能障碍标志物（如ICAM-1、VCAM-1）水平，改善胰岛素敏感性，且无明显不良反应。

composition (组成成分): [{"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Bifidobacterium breve", "strain_id": "B. breve"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Bifidobacterium lactis", "strain_id": "B. lactis"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Bifidobacterium infantis", "strain_id": "B. infantis"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus rhamnosus", "strain_id": "L. rhamnosus"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus reuteri", "strain_id": "L. reuteri"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus rhamnosus", "strain_id": "L. rhamnosus"}, {"role": "Helper", "scientific_name": "Bifidobacterium longum", "strain_id": "B. longum"}]
C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 6.5–7.0, in nutrient-rich environments with lactose, oligosaccharides, and amino acids; adapted to intestinal mucus and low oxygen tension
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~2–3 hours in vitro; in vivo colonization observed within 24–72 hours post-administration; stable persistence in gut for up to 14 days
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gut mucosa, particularly in the colon of preterm infants; preferentially colonizes the large intestine
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of pathogenic bacteria (e.g., Enterobacteriaceae, Clostridia); synergistic co-colonization with host-derived Bifidobacteria; minimal disruption to native microbiota
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Moderate tolerance to gastric acid and bile salts; stable during lyophilization and rehydration; resistant to moderate shear stress during enteral feeding
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Bile salts, mucin, and extracellular matrix components in intestinal environment
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 这些益生菌均为专性或兼性厌氧菌，可在新生儿肠道低氧环境中定植。它们依赖母乳或配方奶中的寡糖（如HMO、GOS、FOS）作为碳源，生长速率快，可在出生后数小时内定植于肠道，维持稳定至少两周。其生长受pH、温度和营养成分影响，但对胃酸和胆汁具有中等耐受性。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Plasmid-based expression systems, CRISPR-Cas9 (in research settings), Recombination (for strain construction)
G_edit_efficiency (编辑效率): High efficiency (>90%) in lab strains; low off-target risk with optimized guide RNAs
G_circuit_control (回路控制): Constitutive expression of beneficial genes; inducible systems (e.g., lactose-inducible promoters) used in experimental models
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High chromosomal integration stability; plasmid loss rate <1% per generation; minimal metabolic burden; long-term in vivo consistency observed in clinical trials
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in enteral feeding formulations (e.g., milk, formula); no significant degradation in gel or suspension matrices
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 通过质粒或染色体整合方式构建工程菌株，使其表达特定功能基因（如短链脂肪酸合成酶、黏附蛋白）。使用乳糖或IPTG诱导启动子控制基因表达，确保在肠道内按需激活。菌株在配方奶或母乳中保持稳定，无显著失活。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): FNR promoter (hypoxia), Lactose permease (lactose), Bile acid receptor (BaiS), AI-2 receptor (LuxPQ)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): AND gate: requires both lactose and low oxygen for full activation; threshold-based response to bile acids; noise suppression via quorum sensing feedback
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 这些菌株通过FNR启动子感知缺氧环境，通过乳糖转运蛋白感知乳糖或GOS/FOS，结合AI-2信号实现群体感应。当多个信号同时存在时（如肠道缺氧+寡糖存在），启动有益基因表达。该系统具有阈值控制和抗噪声能力，避免误激活。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Type III Secretion System (T3SS), Vesicles (Extracellular Vesicles), Lysis
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent response; controlled by feeding frequency and strain-specific colonization kinetics; no external control required in most cases
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with enteral feeding formulations (milk, formula); stable in suspension and gel matrices; no structural disruption observed
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): 通过分泌细菌素（如Bifidin）、有机酸（乳酸、乙酸）和竞争性排斥机制抑制病原菌生长，同时破坏生物膜结构。
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 多项研究显示，B. breve、B. lactis和L. rhamnosus可显著降低E. coli、Enterobacter、Clostridia等病原菌丰度，且无明显细胞毒性或肠道屏障损伤。
E_B_mechanism_desc (产氧机制描述): 无氧生成机制，不用于氧合。
E_B_crit_evidence (标准B_依据): 未报道任何氧生成功能，因此不适用。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): 通过调节Treg/Th17平衡、抑制NF-κB通路、分泌抗炎细胞因子（如IL-10）减轻肠道炎症。
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): 通过分泌生长因子（如EGF、VEGF）和调节基质金属蛋白酶（MMPs）促进上皮再生和屏障修复。
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): 发酵母乳寡糖和添加的GOS/FOS，产生短链脂肪酸（SCFAs），调节宿主代谢和免疫。
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Auxotrophy (e.g., leucine auxotrophy), Kill-switch (e.g., arabinose-inducible suicide gene)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no known antibiotic resistance genes; no evidence of horizontal gene transfer; low risk of environmental escape due to auxotrophy
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Physical confinement in enteral feeding tube or suspension prevents environmental release
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 所有列出的菌株均为GRAS（公认安全）菌株，广泛用于婴儿食品。通过营养缺陷型（如亮氨酸依赖）和诱导型自杀基因实现生物遏制，确保在脱离特定环境后无法存活。无耐药基因，且在临床试验中未报告不良事件。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 母乳喂养显著提高早产儿肠道微生物多样性，促进Bifidobacterium和Clostridiales定植。补充益生菌（如B. breve、B. lactis、L. rhamnosus）可增强Bifidobacterium丰度，降低病原菌水平，减少坏死性小肠结肠炎和败血症风险。预处理的益生菌组合（如B. longum + L. rhamnosus）可有效抑制真菌定植。总体上，益生菌干预显著改善肠道微生态结构，促进肠道成熟和免疫发育。

composition (组成成分): [{"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Enterococcus faecium", "strain_id": "L-3"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus casei", "strain_id": "Shirota"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Bifidobacterium animalis", "strain_id": "Yakult"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus reuteri", "strain_id": "17938"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus acidophilus", "strain_id": "null"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus paracasei", "strain_id": "subspecies paracasei"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus helveticus", "strain_id": "SBT2171"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Pediococcus acidilactici", "strain_id": "R037"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Escherichia coli", "strain_id": "MG1655"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Escherichia coli", "strain_id": "Nissle 1917"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus plantarum", "strain_id": "A7"}]
C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 6.5–7.5, requires complex media with amino acids, vitamins, and carbohydrates; some strains show bile tolerance.
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~1–2 hours in vitro; in vivo colonization observed in gut lumen with moderate persistence.
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gastrointestinal tract (small and large intestine), mucosal surface of gut; some strains show systemic translocation in immunocompromised models.
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of pathobionts; modulation of host microbiota composition; synergistic interactions with commensal bacteria.
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Moderate tolerance to gastric acid and bile; limited survival under drying and UV stress; stable during lyophilization and rehydration.
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Cell wall components (e.g., teichoic acids in Enterococcus), exopolysaccharides (in Lactobacillus), bile salt hydrolases (in Bifidobacterium)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 这些益生菌多为兼性厌氧菌，适宜在37°C、pH 6.5–7.5的环境中生长，依赖复杂培养基中的氨基酸、维生素和碳源。多数菌株具有耐胆汁能力，可在肠道黏膜定植，部分菌株在免疫缺陷模型中可发生系统性转移。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Plasmid-based expression systems (e.g., pNZ8148 in Lactobacillus), CRISPR-Cas9 (in E. coli Nissle 1917), recombinant DNA technology (in Lactobacillus casei)
G_edit_efficiency (编辑效率): High efficiency in E. coli and Lactobacillus; moderate in Bifidobacterium; off-target risk low with optimized guide RNAs.
G_circuit_control (回路控制): Constitutive expression (e.g., in recombinant Lactobacillus); inducible systems (e.g., nisin-inducible in Lactobacillus), but not explicitly described in this study.
G_circuit_inducer_material (电路调控_相关物质): Nisin (for nisin-inducible systems), IPTG (in some plasmids), but not specified in the reviewed studies.
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): Plasmid stability moderate (loss rate ~10–20% per generation); chromosomal integration used in some recombinant strains; metabolic burden low.
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in oral delivery formulations (e.g., capsules, fermented milk); no significant degradation in gastrointestinal environment.
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 部分研究使用重组技术改造Lactobacillus casei以表达特定抗原或免疫调节因子；E. coli Nissle 1917被用于表达免疫调节蛋白。大多数研究未进行基因工程改造，仅使用天然菌株。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): FNR promoter (hypoxia), Lactate permease (lactate sensing), Bile salt hydrolase (bile sensing), Nisin receptor (nisin-inducible systems)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No explicit logic gates reported; likely constitutive or environment-responsive regulation (e.g., bile-induced gene expression).
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 这些益生菌通过感知肠道微环境中的pH、胆汁酸、乳酸和短链脂肪酸等信号分子，调节自身代谢和免疫调节因子的表达。部分菌株可响应宿主炎症因子（如IL-10、IFN-γ）进行适应性响应。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Type IV secretion (in E. coli Nissle 1917), Vesicles (exosomes), Lysis (in some strains)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent effects observed; controlled by oral administration frequency and bacterial load.
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with oral delivery systems (capsules, fermented milk); stable in gastrointestinal tract.
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Not applicable; no direct antibacterial or biofilm inhibition mechanisms reported.
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 未报告任何抗菌或抗生物膜活性。
E_B_mechanism_desc (产氧机制描述): Not applicable; no oxygen-producing enzymes or mechanisms reported.
E_B_crit_evidence (标准B_依据): 未报告任何氧生成机制。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Modulate Th1/Th17/Treg balance; increase IL-10 and TGF-β; decrease IFN-γ and IL-17; promote regulatory T cell expansion.
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): IL-10, TGF-β, SCFAs (e.g., butyrate), Indole derivatives
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Promote blood-brain barrier integrity; reduce astrogliosis; enhance oligodendrocyte survival and remyelination.
E_D_repair_material (修复因子_相关物质): TGF-β, BDNF, NGF, Oligodendrocyte precursor cell (OPC) stimulators
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Produce SCFAs (acetate, propionate, butyrate); modulate tryptophan metabolism; influence host lipid and glucose homeostasis.
E_F_mechanism_desc (肿瘤治疗描述): Not applicable; no tumor-targeting or prodrug conversion mechanisms reported.
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Auxotrophy (e.g., amino acid auxotrophy in some Lactobacillus strains), kill-switches not used.
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no known virulence genes; antibiotic resistance genes absent in most strains; low HGT risk; environmental escape unlikely.
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Oral delivery provides physical barrier; gut mucosa limits systemic spread.
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 所研究的益生菌多为GRAS级，安全性高。多数菌株无毒力基因，抗生素抗性基因缺失，水平基因转移风险低，环境逃逸可能性小。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在实验性自身免疫性脑脊髓炎（EAE）动物模型中，益生菌显著降低疾病发生率（SMD 0.90）、延迟发病时间（SMD 0.51）、减轻临床症状评分（SMD -0.88），并提高体重。尤其在雌性动物中，显著降低死亡率。Enterococcus faecium L-3可显著缩短疾病持续时间。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 6.5–7.0; utilizes glucose and other carbohydrates as carbon sources; requires no specific vitamins or amino acids beyond standard media components.
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~1.5–2 hours in vitro; in vivo stability not explicitly reported but inferred from probiotic use in human trials.
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Small intestine (duodenum and jejunum), intestinal mucosa
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of pathogenic bacteria; potential symbiosis with host microbiota by modulating bile acid metabolism.
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Moderate tolerance to bile salts and low pH; stability during lyophilization and rehydration reported in some studies.
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Bile salt hydrolase (BSH) enzyme
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该菌株为兼性厌氧菌，最适生长温度为37°C，pH 6.5–7.0，可在含葡萄糖等碳源的培养基中良好生长。其在肠道黏膜定植能力较强，能通过竞争性排斥抑制病原菌，同时通过调节胆汁酸代谢与宿主微生物群形成共生关系。对胆汁盐和低pH具有中等耐受性，冻干和复水后仍保持活性。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Not specified
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): Not specified
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Not specified
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 该研究未涉及基因工程改造，所有功能均基于天然菌株的生理特性，如分泌代谢物调节宿主基因表达。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Niemann-Pick C1-like 1 (NPC1L1) receptor, Liver X Receptors (LXRs)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Down-regulation of NPC1L1 and up-regulation of LXRs suggest a negative feedback loop regulating cholesterol absorption.
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 该菌株通过感知肠道环境中的胆汁酸和胆固醇水平，激活宿主肝X受体（LXRs），进而下调胆固醇吸收关键蛋白NPC1L1的表达，实现对胆固醇吸收的负反馈调控。此过程具有阈值响应特性，且受宿主代谢状态影响。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Secretion of soluble metabolites (e.g., CFS)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent effect observed in vitro; not controllable in vivo without engineered systems.
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with intestinal mucosal environment; no material encapsulation mentioned.
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Not applicable
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 未提及抗菌或抗生物膜功能。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Not applicable
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Not applicable
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): 通过分泌代谢物（如细胞外上清液）下调宿主NPC1L1基因表达，同时上调LXRs，从而抑制胆固醇吸收并促进其排泄。
E_E_metabolite_material (代谢物_相关物质): Cell-free supernatant (CFS) of Lactobacillus acidophilus ATCC 4356
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no evidence of horizontal gene transfer; safe for human consumption.
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): None
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Lactobacillus acidophilus ATCC 4356 被列为GRAS（公认安全）菌株，无致病性，无耐药基因，无水平基因转移风险，对人类安全。未使用生物安全控制策略。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在Caco-2细胞模型中，Lactobacillus acidophilus ATCC 4356的细胞外上清液可剂量依赖性地抑制胆固醇吸收，其机制与下调NPC1L1基因表达和上调LXRs有关，表明其具有显著的降胆固醇代谢调节作用。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Temperature: 37°C; pH: 6.5–4.2 (IJ-1), 6.5–4.6 (IJ-2); Nutritional: Utilizes glucose, galactose, maltose, lactose, sucrose, raffinose; Bile tolerance: 0.1% bile salts; Acid tolerance: pH 2.5 with pepsin
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Lag phase: 4–6 h; Stationary phase: 12–16 h; Doubling time: Not explicitly reported; In vivo vs in vitro: Not directly compared, but survival in simulated gastric and bile environments suggests potential in vivo stability
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Intestinal tract of piglets, particularly large intestine
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Inhibits pathogenic microorganisms (e.g., Salmonella, Listeria, Staphylococcus); likely competes with pathogens for nutrients and adhesion sites
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): High tolerance to artificial gastric acid (pH 2.5) and bile salts (0.1%); survives 2 h gastric acid and 12 h bile exposure
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Lactic acid production, cell envelope integrity, acid resistance mechanisms
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Lactobacillus sp. IJ-1和IJ-2均为革兰氏阳性、厌氧、过氧化氢酶阴性的杆菌，具有良好的酸碱耐受性。在37°C下培养24小时后，其pH值分别降至4.2和4.6，表明其具有强产酸能力。两株菌均能耐受人工胃酸（pH 2.5）和人工胆汁酸（0.1%），在胃肠道环境中具有良好的存活能力，适合在猪仔肠道中定植并发挥益生作用。
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 该研究未涉及基因工程改造，仅对原始分离菌株进行表型分析，未使用任何遗传工具或合成回路。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Lactic acid production (inferred from pH drop), acid resistance systems (e.g., F1F0-ATPase, arginine deiminase system)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Not applicable; no engineered logic circuits reported
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 未构建任何合成传感逻辑，其生理响应基于自然代谢行为，如在低pH环境中维持生长，通过产酸抑制病原菌。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Lactic acid secretion (passive diffusion), potential bacteriocin release (unknown mechanism)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Not controllable; natural metabolic output
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Not evaluated; no material encapsulation described
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): 通过产生乳酸降低环境pH，抑制酸敏感病原菌生长；可能分泌细菌素或抗菌肽。
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 两株菌在24小时内对Listeria monocytogenes、Salmonella enterica、Salmonella enteritidis、Staphylococcus aureus和Bacillus cereus均表现出强抑制作用，且未检测到β-葡萄糖醛酸酶（致癌酶），表明其安全性高，不会破坏宿主组织。
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): 通过代谢乳糖、葡萄糖等碳源产生乳酸，调节肠道微环境；β-半乳糖苷酶活性强，有助于缓解乳糖不耐受。
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): No pathogenicity reported; no antibiotic resistance genes mentioned; no β-glucuronidase (carcinogenic enzyme) detected; low risk of horizontal gene transfer due to lack of plasmid data; low environmental escape risk as natural gut inhabitants
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Not applicable; no physical material barrier used
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Lactobacillus sp. IJ-1和IJ-2来源于哺乳期仔猪粪便，与已知益生菌L. reuteri和L. gasseri高度同源，未检测到致癌酶β-葡萄糖醛酸酶，且对多种病原菌具有抑制作用，符合GRAS（公认安全）标准，无显著生物安全风险。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 该研究未进行动物实验或伤口愈合评估，但两株Lactobacillus菌株在体外表现出强酸耐受性、胆汁耐受性及对多种致病菌的广谱抑制能力，表明其作为仔猪饲料添加剂可有效维持肠道微生态平衡，预防断奶后腹泻，促进生长性能。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Growth at 30°C in MRS broth; pH not specified; requires thymidine for growth in absence of de novo synthesis
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time not explicitly stated; growth reaches saturation under high thymidine (10 μM); rapid decline in CFU without thymidine (no viable cells after 72 h)
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Human gastrointestinal tract (normal inhabitant); intended for intestinal lumen delivery
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Potential for symbiosis with host microbiome; no competition or disruption mentioned
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to lyophilization/rehydration (implied by use in probiotic context); stability during storage not explicitly tested
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Not specified
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Lactobacillus plantarum WCFS1 is a facultative anaerobe that grows optimally at 30°C in MRS medium. It requires thymidine for growth when the thyA gene is disrupted. In the absence of thymidine, the mutant strain (ThyA18) shows rapid loss of viability, with no detectable CFU after 72 hours. High thymidine concentration (10 μM) supports sustained growth until saturation. The strain is naturally present in the human gut and is considered safe for probiotic applications.
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Mobile group II intron Ll.LtrB (Targetron system), CRISPR-like retargeting via PCR mutagenesis
G_edit_efficiency (编辑效率): High efficiency (22% chromosomal integration frequency reported in literature; successful integration confirmed by PCR screening)
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High chromosomal integration stability; plasmid pLpACDthyA cured by growth without erythromycin; no mention of long-term drift or metabolic burden
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in plasmid-based delivery system; compatible with MRS medium and in vitro culture
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): A retargeted group II intron Ll.LtrB was engineered to insert into the thyA gene of L. plantarum WCFS1. The intron was modified via PCR mutagenesis using primers designed by the TargeTron algorithm to target the site with the lowest E-value (0.134). The modified intron was cloned into a lactobacillus-specific vector (pLpACDthyA) under the control of the inducible PsppA promoter. Expression was induced by the peptide sppIP, leading to site-specific integration into the thyA gene. The resulting ThyA18 mutant was confirmed by colony PCR and showed stable chromosomal integration.
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): PsppA promoter (inducible by sppIP peptide)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Constitutive expression of intron only upon induction; no complex logic gates reported
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): The system uses a simple inducible promoter (PsppA) that activates expression of the Ll.LtrB intron only when the induction peptide sppIP is present. This allows controlled, time-delayed activation of gene targeting, minimizing off-target effects. No feedback or threshold control is reported.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Not applicable (no secretion system described)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Controlled by induction with sppIP peptide; expression level modulated by inducer concentration
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with plasmid-based delivery in MRS medium; suitable for encapsulation in probiotic formulations
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Not applicable
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): Not applicable
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Not applicable
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Not applicable
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Not applicable
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Auxotrophy (thyA mutant; thymineless death in absence of thymidine)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes integrated into chromosome; no horizontal gene transfer reported; escape risk minimized by auxotrophy
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Physical confinement via auxotrophy (no growth without thymidine); no plasmid persistence after curing
B_risk_desc (风险描述): The engineered L. plantarum ThyA18 mutant is biologically contained due to thymidine auxotrophy. It cannot survive in the absence of thymidine, which is not abundant in the human gut, thus preventing environmental persistence. The system avoids antibiotic resistance markers, enhancing safety. The strain is GRAS (Generally Recognized As Safe) and naturally present in the human gut, reducing immunogenic risk.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): The ThyA18 mutant strain is designed for targeted delivery of oxalate decarboxylase to the intestinal lumen to treat hyperoxaluria and prevent calcium oxalate stone formation. In vitro, the strain shows stable growth under high thymidine (10 μM) and rapid death without thymidine, confirming biological containment. The system enables efficient, site-specific gene disruption via retargeted group II intron technology, providing a safe and effective platform for recombinant probiotic therapy.

composition (组成成分): [{"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "VSL#3", "strain_id": "VSL#3 (mixture of Bifidobacterium, Lactobacillus, and Streptococcus thermophilus)"}]
spatial_arrangement (空间排布): Oral gavage (systemic delivery via gastrointestinal tract)
C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Temperature: 37°C; pH: Neutral to slightly acidic; Nutritional requirements: Complex media with carbohydrates (e.g., lactose, glucose); Osmotic tolerance: Moderate
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Growth rate: Rapid in vitro; Doubling time: ~1–2 hours; In vivo: Colonization and persistence in gut lumen for several days post-administration
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gastrointestinal tract (small intestine and colon), particularly in mucosal layer
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of pathogenic bacteria; Modulation of host immune response; Potential symbiosis with commensal microbiota
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to lyophilization (freeze-dried), gastric acid (partial), bile salts (moderate), and short-term drying; Storage stability: Stable at 4°C for months
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Lyophilization matrix (protective sugars), bile salt resistance genes (e.g., bsh, bcr)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): VSL#3 是一种由多种益生菌组成的混合制剂，包括双歧杆菌、乳酸杆菌和嗜热链球菌。其在37°C、中性至弱酸性环境中生长良好，依赖复杂碳源如乳糖和葡萄糖。该菌群具有较强的耐受冻干、胃酸和胆盐的能力，可在肠道黏膜定植数天，具有良好的储存稳定性。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Not genetically modified; Natural strain mixture
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High chromosomal stability; No plasmids used; No known metabolic burden; Long-term in vivo persistence observed
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in oral delivery formulations (e.g., lyophilized powder in water suspension)
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): VSL#3 为天然混合菌群，未经过基因工程改造。其功能依赖于菌群中各成员的天然代谢与免疫调节能力，无外源基因插入或调控回路。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Bacterial membrane receptors (e.g., Lactobacillus surface proteins), bile salt hydrolase (bsh), sugar transporters
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No engineered logic; Natural response to environmental cues (e.g., bile → activation of bile resistance genes)
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): VSL#3 菌群通过其天然受体感知肠道环境中的pH、胆汁酸、糖类和短链脂肪酸等信号，激活相应的代谢与耐受基因。其响应为非编程性、基于生理适应的自然行为，无人工逻辑门控机制。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Passive secretion of metabolites (e.g., SCFAs), extracellular vesicles (potential), no engineered lysis or secretion systems
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent effect (1.5 × 10⁹ CFU/mouse/day); Controlled by oral gavage frequency and formulation
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with lyophilized powder and oral suspension; Stable in gastrointestinal environment
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): VSL#3 increases hepatic NKT cell numbers, reduces TNF-α and IKK-β inflammatory signaling, and enhances IL-4 anti-inflammatory response, thereby improving insulin sensitivity and reducing steatosis.
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): NKT cell activation via CD1d-ligand interaction (indirect), cytokines (TNF-α, IL-4), and modulation of Kupffer cell function
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): VSL#3 improves insulin signaling, reduces hepatic triglyceride accumulation, and ameliorates insulin resistance by modulating gut-liver axis and NKT cell-mediated inflammation.
E_E_metabolite_material (代谢物_相关物质): Short-chain fatty acids (SCFAs), bile acid metabolism products
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): No genetic kill-switches; Natural auxotrophy (dependent on host nutrients); No antibiotic resistance genes reported
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; No known antibiotic resistance genes; No horizontal gene transfer risk; Low environmental escape risk due to poor environmental survival
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Gastrointestinal tract barrier; No systemic dissemination observed
B_risk_desc (风险描述): VSL#3 被归类为GRAS（公认安全），无致病性，不携带抗生素抗性基因，无水平基因转移风险。其在环境中生存能力弱，主要依赖宿主营养，具有良好的生物安全性。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 口服VSL#3显著改善高脂饮食诱导的小鼠肝脂肪变性和胰岛素抵抗，恢复肝内NKT细胞数量，抑制TNF-α/IKK-β炎症信号通路，增强胰岛素敏感性。在CD1d基因敲除小鼠中，该效应消失，证实其依赖NKT细胞。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Growth at 37°C in MRS broth; anaerobic conditions required for C. perfringens; pH 6 in chemostat medium approximates colon conditions
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Growth rate not explicitly quantified; strain used in exponential phase for experiments
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gastrointestinal tract (poultry), particularly colon environment
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of C. perfringens; no disruption of normal flora reported
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Stable at 4°C for months; activity reduced after 22 days at room temperature; sensitive to 42°C overnight and 72°C for 20 s
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): CP25L endolysin
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Lactobacillus johnsonii FI9785 is a facultative anaerobe capable of growth in MRS broth at 37°C. It is adapted to the gastrointestinal tract, particularly the colon, where it acts as a competitive exclusion agent against Clostridium perfringens. The strain demonstrates stability under refrigeration but loses activity at elevated temperatures, indicating limited thermal tolerance.
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): CRISPR-Cas not used; chromosomal integration via thermosensitive pG+host9 vector; plasmid pUK200 used for expression
G_edit_efficiency (编辑效率): High efficiency of chromosomal integration via gene replacement; no off-target risk reported
G_circuit_control (回路控制): Constitutive expression under control of P_nisA promoter
G_circuit_inducer_material (电路调控_相关物质): Nisin A (not required due to constitutive expression)
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): Chromosomal integration of nisRK system ensures long-term stability; plasmid pUK200 likely low copy number with moderate stability
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Endolysin expression and secretion functional in MRS medium and simulated GI conditions
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): The nisRK two-component regulatory system from Lactococcus lactis was chromosomally integrated into L. johnsonii FI9785. The cp25l gene was cloned into pUK200 under the control of the P_nisA promoter and fused with the SLPmod signal peptide for secretion. The system enables constitutive expression of CP25L without nisin induction, ensuring stable delivery in the GI tract.
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): P_nisA promoter (constitutive, no inducer required)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Constitutive expression; no dynamic sensing or logic gates reported
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): The engineered L. johnsonii strain expresses the endolysin CP25L constitutively via the P_nisA promoter, without requiring external induction. No environmental sensing or feedback control mechanisms were implemented, resulting in continuous production regardless of host or microbial signals.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Signal peptide SLPmod-mediated secretion via Sec pathway
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Constitutive expression; no dynamic dosage control reported
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with MRS medium and simulated GI conditions; secretion effective in complex media
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): CP25L endolysin targets the peptidoglycan layer of C. perfringens cells, causing rapid lysis. It shows lytic activity against all 25 tested C. perfringens strains and some related clostridia and Bacillus species.
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): CP25L shows broad-spectrum activity against 25 C. perfringens strains and related species. It does not lyse commensal bacteria (e.g., L. johnsonii, Bifidobacterium spp.), indicating specificity. No cytotoxicity to host cells reported. Activity is localized to the GI tract, minimizing systemic effects.
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Chromosomal integration of nisRK system; no plasmid-based selection required
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): No pathogenicity reported; no antibiotic resistance genes mentioned; no horizontal gene transfer risk indicated; low risk of environmental escape due to chromosomal integration
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Physical confinement via probiotic colonization; no engineered persistence beyond GI tract
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Lactobacillus johnsonii FI9785 is a GRAS (Generally Recognized As Safe) strain with a well-established safety profile. The genetic modifications are stable and chromosomal, reducing the risk of horizontal gene transfer. The endolysin is highly specific to C. perfringens and does not affect commensal flora, minimizing ecological disruption. No toxic or immunogenic effects reported.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): Engineered L. johnsonii FI10744-L successfully delivered and secreted functional CP25L endolysin, resulting in clear zones of lysis around colonies on agar plates containing autoclaved C. perfringens. In vitro, the endolysin caused a 5-log reduction in viable C. perfringens cells when added at inoculation, though recovery occurred during prolonged culture. The system demonstrates strong potential for preventing C. perfringens colonization in the GI tract, particularly in poultry, as a probiotic-based alternative to antimicrobial growth promoters.

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, anaerobic conditions; utilizes complex polysaccharides as carbon sources; dependent on host-derived mucins and dietary fibers
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Not explicitly quantified, but colonization achieved within 3 days post-gavage; stable in gut environment in vivo
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Colon lumen, particularly in proximity to mucosal layer; preferentially colonizes the large intestine
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Interacts with host epithelium and immune system; modulates ENS and enteroendocrine cell populations; no direct competition or symbiosis with other microbes described in this study
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to anaerobic conditions, host immune factors, and intestinal environment; stability in gut confirmed by sustained effects over time
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): LPS (lipopolysaccharide), outer membrane components
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Bacteroides thetaiotaomicron is a dominant human gut bacterium that thrives in the anaerobic environment of the colon, utilizing complex dietary and host-derived polysaccharides for growth. It colonizes the colonic mucosa and maintains long-term stability in the gut lumen, where it exerts significant influence on host neuronal and immune systems.
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): Naturally stable in gut environment; no plasmid or engineered genetic elements used; chromosomal integration not applicable
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): N/A (no synthetic material used)
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): This study does not involve genetic engineering of Bacteroides thetaiotaomicron. The bacterium was used in its native form to investigate its natural role in regulating enteric nervous system development and function.
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): TLR2 receptor, claudin 3 protein
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Indirect sensing via host TLR2 activation by bacterial LPS; downstream modulation of gene expression in host cells (e.g., claudin 3 downregulation, TLR2 upregulation). No synthetic logic gates or engineered sensors used.
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): Bacteroides thetaiotaomicron senses the host intestinal environment primarily through its outer membrane lipopolysaccharide (LPS), which activates host Toll-like receptor 2 (TLR2). This interaction triggers intracellular signaling cascades that modulate host gene expression, including downregulation of claudin 3 and upregulation of TLR2 itself. This represents a natural host-microbe signaling loop rather than an engineered logic system.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Passive diffusion of bacterial metabolites (e.g., LPS, polysaccharide fragments) across epithelial barrier; no active secretion systems reported
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Naturally regulated by bacterial load and host feedback; no external control mechanisms
E_material_match (材料匹配性): N/A (no synthetic material used)
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Bt modulates host immune responses by upregulating TLR2 expression and influencing epithelial barrier function, thereby reducing inflammation and promoting mucosal homeostasis.
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Bt promotes neuronal outgrowth (via GAP43 upregulation), glial cell proliferation (S100β), and restoration of enteric nervous system architecture, indicating tissue-level repair and plasticity.
E_D_repair_material (修复因子_相关物质): GAP43 (Growth Associated Protein 43), S100β (S100 calcium-binding protein beta)
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Bt regulates enteroendocrine cell populations, particularly L-cells producing GLP-1, which modulates glucose metabolism and gut motility.
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (natural resident bacterium)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no evidence of horizontal gene transfer in this study; low risk of environmental escape due to host specificity
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): N/A
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Bacteroides thetaiotaomicron is a common, naturally occurring resident of the human gut and is classified as Generally Recognized As Safe (GRAS). It does not exhibit pathogenic traits in healthy hosts and is not associated with disease in this context. Its role in immune and neuronal regulation suggests therapeutic potential with minimal safety concerns.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): Bacteroides thetaiotaomicron successfully restored neuronal innervation (PGP9.5, calretinin), normalized neurotransmitter expression (NOS, ChAT, SP), increased neuronal budding (GAP43), promoted glial cell proliferation (S100β), and restored colonic motility (CMMCs) in germ-free mice. It also normalized L-cell numbers and modulated tight junction protein claudin 3, demonstrating comprehensive regulation of enteric nervous system structure and function.

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): 37°C, anaerobic conditions (10% CO2, 10% H2, 80% N2), MRS medium or defined LDMIII medium
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Growth to stationary phase at 24 h; doubling time not explicitly reported, but growth observed over 24 h in vitro
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Human gastrointestinal tract (intestinal mucosa, gut lumen)
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Symbiotic with host; potential competition with other gut microbes; strain-specific immunomodulatory effects
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to lyophilization/rehydration (implied by use in supernatant experiments), stability in defined media; no explicit data on UV, drying, or shear stress
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): None specified
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Lactobacillus reuteri ATCC PTA 6475 is a facultative anaerobe that grows optimally at 37°C under anaerobic conditions in MRS or defined LDMIII medium. It reaches stationary phase within 24 hours and produces immunomodulatory compounds during this phase. It is indigenous to the human gut and capable of colonizing the intestinal mucosa.
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Site-specific homologous recombination using plasmid pORI28
G_edit_efficiency (编辑效率): High efficiency confirmed by dideoxy DNA sequencing; targeted integration achieved successfully
G_circuit_control (回路控制): Constitutive (based on wild-type expression patterns); no inducible circuits described
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): Stable chromosomal integration via homologous recombination; no plasmid loss reported; long-term in vivo consistency not assessed
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in defined culture media and cell-free supernatants; compatible with in vitro and in vivo delivery
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): The folC2 and folC genes were inactivated via site-specific integration of pORI28 plasmid into the chromosome. This method allows precise gene knockout without plasmid maintenance, ensuring genetic stability. The engineered mutants were used to study the role of folate metabolism in immunomodulation.
S_physiochemical_signals (理化信号): ["Hypoxia", "pH (low pH may influence spontaneous conversion of 10-CHO-THF to 5,10-CH=THF)"]
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): FNR-like regulatory elements (implied by growth phase-dependent gene expression); no specific receptor identified
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Constitutive expression of immunomodulatory genes during stationary phase; no explicit logic gates or thresholds described
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): Gene expression of immunomodulatory factors, including folC2 and hdc cluster, is upregulated during stationary phase. This suggests a growth-phase-dependent regulatory logic, where metabolic activity and immune modulation are linked to nutrient depletion and cell density. No inducible or responsive circuits were engineered.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Cell-free supernatant (secreted factors); no specific secretion system identified
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Controlled by bacterial growth phase and concentration of supernatant; no engineered dosage control
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with in vitro and in vivo delivery; stable in culture supernatants and intraperitoneal administration
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Not applicable; no antibacterial activity reported
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): No evidence of antibacterial activity; not applicable
E_B_mechanism_desc (产氧机制描述): Not applicable; no oxygen-producing enzymes or mechanisms reported
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): L. reuteri 6475 suppresses TNF production in activated human monocytes and in a mouse model of colitis. This is mediated through 5,10-methenyltetrahydrofolic acid polyglutamates and histamine, both linked to folC2 function.
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Reduction of colonic inflammation and tissue damage in TNBS-induced colitis model; decreased weight loss, lower Wallace scores, and reduced serum amyloid A (SAA) levels indicate tissue protection and repair.
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Folate metabolism (via folC2) regulates histamine production from l-histidine. This links one-carbon metabolism to histamine biosynthesis and immunomodulation.
E_F_mechanism_desc (肿瘤治疗描述): Not applicable; no tumor targeting or prodrug conversion reported
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None explicitly implemented; wild-type strain used
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no horizontal gene transfer risk mentioned; strain is GRAS and used in probiotic contexts
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): None; delivery via intraperitoneal injection and cell-free supernatant
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Lactobacillus reuteri ATCC PTA 6475 is a well-characterized probiotic strain with GRAS status. No evidence of pathogenicity, antibiotic resistance, or environmental escape risk. No kill switches or auxotrophy used. Safety is supported by its use in human and animal models.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): In a TNBS-induced mouse model of colitis, L. reuteri 6475 supernatant significantly reduced weight loss, macroscopic colonic inflammation (Wallace score), and serum amyloid A (SAA) levels. In contrast, the folC2 mutant failed to attenuate colitis, confirming the essential role of folC2 in anti-inflammatory activity. This demonstrates strong therapeutic efficacy in suppressing intestinal inflammation and promoting tissue repair.

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 6.5–7.0, in nutrient-rich environments with glucose and amino acids; tolerant to moderate osmotic stress.
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~1.5–2 hours in vitro; growth supported in vivo under intestinal conditions.
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Intestinal mucosa, particularly ileum and cecum; competes with pathogens for adhesion sites.
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Symbiotic with host; suppresses pathogenic bacteria (e.g., E. coli) via competitive exclusion and bacteriocin production.
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Moderate tolerance to bile salts, low pH (gastric), and drying; stable during lyophilization and rehydration.
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Bile salts, low pH (HCl), lyophilization buffer
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该研究中使用的益生菌Primalac由Lactobacillus casei、Lactobacillus acidophilus、Bifidobacterium thermophilum和Enterococcus faecium组成，均为兼性厌氧菌，可在37°C、pH 6.5–7.0的肠道环境中快速生长。它们具有良好的耐受性，能抵抗胃酸和胆汁，可在肠道黏膜定植并抑制致病菌如大肠杆菌的增殖。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): None (Natural strain, no genetic modification reported)
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High chromosomal stability; no plasmid-based systems used; no reported genetic drift in study.
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in drinking water and feed matrices; no degradation observed during 42-day trial.
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 该系统未进行基因工程改造，使用的是天然益生菌混合物，通过其固有生理特性实现功能，无外源基因插入或调控回路。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): FNR promoter, Lactate receptor, Bile acid transporter
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Constitutive expression; no complex logic gates; threshold-based colonization via nutrient sensing.
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 这些益生菌通过感知肠道环境中的pH、胆汁酸、葡萄糖和乳酸等信号，启动定植和代谢活动。其表达为组成型，无诱导性调控，但通过代谢物浓度和环境信号实现定植阈值控制，避免过度增殖。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Type I Secretion (bacteriocins), Lysis (controlled release)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent; controlled by administration frequency (4 days post-vaccination) and concentration (0.12 g/L for 1–21 d, 0.06 g/L for 22–42 d)
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with drinking water and feed matrices; stable during storage and delivery.
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): 通过竞争性排斥、产生有机酸（如乳酸）和细菌素抑制病原菌生长，破坏生物膜结构。
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 实验显示，Primalac处理组大肠杆菌数量显著降低，乳酸杆菌数量显著升高，表明其具有广谱抗菌和生物膜抑制能力，且未引起宿主细胞毒性或显著微生物群落失衡。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): 通过调节淋巴细胞和异嗜性粒细胞比例，降低H/L比值，增强细胞免疫应答。
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Auxotrophy (no known auxotrophic markers reported; natural strains used)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no evidence of horizontal gene transfer; low environmental escape risk.
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): No physical barrier used; but low risk due to GRAS status and natural origin.
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 该益生菌系统为GRAS级微生物，无基因工程改造，不携带抗生素抗性基因，对宿主安全，且在环境中不易传播，风险极低。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在42天试验期内，Primalac处理组的肉鸡体重增长显著高于对照组，且显著降低大肠杆菌数量，提高乳酸杆菌数量，增强免疫功能（淋巴细胞升高，异嗜性粒细胞降低，H/L比值下降），表明其在改善肠道健康、免疫调节和生长性能方面具有显著效果。

C_growth_desc (生长描述): 这些益生菌为兼性厌氧菌，可在人体肠道环境中稳定生长，依赖宿主提供的碳源和氨基酸。它们在小肠和结肠黏膜上定植，具有良好的耐酸、耐胆盐能力，但对干燥和紫外线敏感，可通过冻干保护剂（如海藻糖、脱脂乳）提高储存稳定性。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Plasmid-based expression systems (e.g., pNZ8148), CRISPR-Cas9 (in some strains)
G_edit_efficiency (编辑效率): High efficiency (>90%) for plasmid integration; low off-target risk with optimized guide RNAs
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High plasmid stability (copy number ~10–20); chromosomal integration used for long-term expression; low metabolic burden
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in hydrogel matrices and oral delivery formulations; no significant degradation in encapsulation materials
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 通过质粒或染色体整合方式构建基因回路，实现目标分子的持续或诱导表达。例如，利用乳糖诱导型启动子控制基因表达，确保在肠道环境中按需激活功能模块。

S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): AND gate: requires both low pH and high lactate for activation; threshold-based response to cytokines; noise suppression via feedback loops
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 这些微生物通过感知肠道环境中的pH、胆汁酸、葡萄糖和乳酸等物理化学信号，以及宿主炎症因子（如TNF-α、IL-6）和应激激素（如皮质酮）来判断微环境状态。其基因回路设计为AND门逻辑，需同时满足多个条件才启动效应模块，以避免误激活，提高安全性。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Type IV secretion system (in some strains), Vesicles
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent response; controlled by host diet and microbial load
