E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Not applicable
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 未提及抗菌或抗生物膜功能
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): 调节促炎和抗炎细胞因子平衡，降低TNF-α、IL-6、IFN-γ水平，增强免疫耐受
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Not applicable
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): 调节色氨酸代谢路径，促进5-HT合成，抑制Kynurenine通路，改善神经化学平衡
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Auxotrophy (e.g., auxotrophic for essential amino acids), kill-switch (e.g., arabinose-inducible lysis)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no known antibiotic resistance genes; minimal HGT risk; low environmental escape potential
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Effective in oral delivery systems with pH-sensitive coatings
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 所列菌株均为公认安全（GRAS）菌株，无致病性，不携带耐药基因，且通过营养缺陷型或诱导型自杀基因实现生物遏制，确保在宿主体内安全使用。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在动物模型中，Lactobacillus rhamnosus JB-1和Bifidobacterium infantis可显著降低焦虑样行为，改善抑郁症状；在人类试验中，Lactobacillus helveticus R0052和Bifidobacterium longum R0175可减轻焦虑、抑郁和负面情绪，提升情绪调节能力。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): 37°C, aerobic incubation, blood agar with 5% sterile bovine blood
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Not explicitly reported; assumed moderate growth rate typical of lactic acid bacteria in vitro
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Intestinal tract (distal colon), mucosal surface
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Potential competitive exclusion of pathogenic bacteria; may modulate host microbiota diversity
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Not explicitly reported; likely moderate tolerance to gastric conditions due to probiotic use
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Lactobacillus reuteri DSM 17938 is a facultative anaerobe capable of growing in the intestinal environment of mink kits. It is adapted to survive passage through the gastrointestinal tract and colonize the distal colon, where it may exert beneficial effects on microbial balance and host immunity. Its growth is supported by nutrient-rich intestinal mucus and host-derived metabolites.
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Not applicable (commercial probiotic supplement, no genetic modification reported)
G_circuit_control (回路控制): Constitutive (no inducible or synthetic circuitry reported)
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): Not applicable (naturally occurring strain, no plasmid or engineered integration reported)
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Not applicable (no engineered material environment described)
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): Lactobacillus reuteri DSM 17938 was used as a commercially available probiotic supplement without genetic modification. It was administered orally to mink kits via gavage, relying on its natural ability to survive gastric transit and colonize the intestinal mucosa.
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Native metabolic and adhesion receptors (e.g., mucus-binding proteins, sugar transporters)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No synthetic logic gates; natural sensing of intestinal environment via metabolic and adhesion pathways
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): Lactobacillus reuteri naturally senses the intestinal environment through pH, nutrient availability, and mucosal adhesion. It responds to lactate and glucose levels, which are indicative of host and microbial metabolism. It does not possess engineered logic circuits but relies on intrinsic physiological sensing to colonize and persist in the gut.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Type I secretion (reuterin), passive diffusion, cell lysis
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose administered via oral gavage (manufacturer-recommended for human infants); no dynamic control
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with oral administration; no encapsulation or material barrier used
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Competitive exclusion of pathogenic bacteria via colonization resistance and production of antimicrobial compounds such as reuterin.
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): L. reuteri DSM 17938 is known to inhibit pathogenic bacteria like E. coli and Staphylococcus intermedius group (SIG) through competitive exclusion and reuterin production. It is safe for use in neonatal animals and does not disrupt the intestinal barrier.
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Modulates host immune response by enhancing intestinal barrier function and reducing pro-inflammatory cytokines.
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): Reuterin, cell wall components, secreted immunomodulatory metabolites
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Promotes epithelial regeneration and enhances mucosal integrity through interaction with intestinal epithelial cells.
E_D_repair_material (修复因子_相关物质): Mucosal adhesion proteins, short-chain fatty acids (SCFAs)
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (naturally occurring, non-pathogenic strain)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no evidence of horizontal gene transfer; safe for use in neonatal animals
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): None (oral delivery, no physical confinement)
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Lactobacillus reuteri DSM 17938 is a well-characterized probiotic strain with GRAS status. It is non-pathogenic, does not produce toxins, and is not associated with antimicrobial resistance. It is naturally present in the gut microbiota and poses minimal risk of environmental escape or ecological disruption.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): In mink kits with pre-weaning diarrhea, oral administration of Lactobacillus reuteri DSM 17938 resulted in weight gain and survival rates comparable to amoxicillin treatment. No significant differences were observed in growth or mortality between probiotic-treated and antibiotic-treated groups. The intestinal microbiota at 42 days of age showed no significant clustering differences between treatment groups, indicating that the probiotic did not induce long-term dysbiosis. The strain demonstrated effective colonization and immune modulation, supporting mucosal repair and pathogen exclusion.

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Growth at 37°C, pH 6.5–7.0, in MRS broth; tolerant to pH 2.5–3.5 and 0.5–2% bile salts
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Growth rate: 18 h at 37°C; doubling time not specified; in vitro growth consistent with in vivo conditions
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gastrointestinal tract (intestinal lumen, mucosal surface)
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Potential for symbiosis with host microbiome; cell surface hydrophobicity suggests adhesion to intestinal epithelium
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): High acid tolerance (pH 2.5–3.5), bile tolerance (up to 2% ox bile), moderate osmotic tolerance; stable during fermentation and storage
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Cell surface hydrophobicity (n-hexadecane, xylene, n-octane) and membrane integrity
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该研究中使用的三种乳酸杆菌（L. acidophilus VK2、L. casei NCDC19、L. helveticus NCDC292）均表现出良好的生长生理特性，可在37°C下于MRS培养基中生长18小时，对胃酸（pH 2.5–3.5）和胆汁盐（0.5–2%）具有较强耐受性，表明其具备在胃肠道环境中定植和存活的能力。细胞表面疏水性差异显著，尤其L. acidophilus NCDC15和L. casei NCDC17表现出较高疏水性，提示其具有较强的黏附能力，有利于在肠道黏膜定植。
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 本文未涉及任何基因工程改造，所有乳酸杆菌均以天然菌株形式使用，未进行基因编辑或构建合成回路，仅通过发酵制备功能性乳制品。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Cell surface hydrophobicity (n-hexadecane, xylene, n-octane), acid and bile tolerance mechanisms (not specified at molecular level)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No synthetic logic circuits; natural sensing of environmental stress (pH, bile) via membrane and metabolic adaptation
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 乳酸杆菌通过细胞膜结构和代谢适应性感知胃酸和胆汁盐等生理化学信号，其耐酸和耐胆汁能力由天然生理机制调控，未构建人工逻辑门控系统，属于被动响应型感知。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Cell-free supernatant (secreted metabolites, proteins, exopolysaccharides)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent effect observed in vitro; daily oral administration at 1.5×10⁹ CFU/mouse
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Fermented milk matrix supports microbial viability and delivery of bioactive components; compatible with oral administration
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Enhanced phagocytic activity of peritoneal macrophages and increased release of lysosomal enzymes (β-glucuronidase and β-galactosidase) in mice fed probiotic fermented milk.
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): Cell-free supernatant of fermented milk (bioactive metabolites, peptides, or exopolysaccharides)
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (natural strains, no genetic modifications)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no horizontal gene transfer risk; no environmental escape risk due to natural origin and lack of engineered traits
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Oral delivery with natural fermentation matrix; no physical containment required
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 所用三种乳酸杆菌均为公认安全（GRAS）菌株，未进行基因改造，无生物安全风险。其在肠道内定植后通过分泌生物活性物质调节宿主免疫功能，不会造成病原性感染或生态失衡，适合口服应用。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 喂食由L. acidophilus VK2、L. casei NCDC19和L. helveticus NCDC292发酵制备的乳制品后，小鼠腹腔巨噬细胞的吞噬活性在第2、5、8天显著增强（P < 0.05），β-葡萄糖醛酸酶和β-半乳糖苷酶释放量也显著上升，尤其在第2天达到峰值。结果表明，这些发酵乳制品能有效增强巨噬细胞功能，提升机体先天免疫防御能力。

spatial_arrangement (空间排布): Encapsulated (in vector particles, delivered via intramuscular injection)
C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Temperature: 37°C; pH: ~7.4; Osmotic: Standard mammalian cell culture conditions; Nutrition: Fetal bovine serum, antibiotics, G418 (for Vero 2-2 cells)
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Rapid transduction of mammalian cells (within 24 hours post-infection); no in vivo growth or replication due to deletion of essential genes (ICP27, pac); transient expression only
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Intramuscular injection site (muscle tissue), with potential migration to antigen-presenting cells and lymphoid tissues
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Not applicable (viral vector, not microbial)
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Stable under lyophilization/rehydration and storage at -80°C; resistant to shear stress during purification; sensitive to heat and UV
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Viral capsid proteins (structural components of HSV-1 amplicon)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): HSV-1 amplicon vectors are non-replicating viral vectors derived from herpes simplex virus type 1. They are engineered to deliver transgenes into mammalian cells without producing infectious virus. The vectors are produced in Vero 2-2 cells, which express the HSV-1 ICP27 protein, but the vectors themselves lack essential genes (ICP27, pac), preventing replication. They efficiently transduce a wide range of mammalian cells, including antigen-presenting cells, and are stable during storage and transport. However, they do not colonize or persist in host tissues long-term, and their activity is transient.
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Plasmid-based cloning, restriction enzyme digestion, PCR amplification, transfection (Lipofectamine), bacterial artificial chromosome (BAC) system
G_edit_efficiency (编辑效率): High efficiency in transgene delivery and expression; polycistronic expression via IRES elements (poliovirus, EMCV) allows co-expression of multiple genes with moderate reduction in downstream expression
G_circuit_control (回路控制): Constitutive (driven by HSV-1 IE4/5 promoter); no inducible or logic gate control reported
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High stability in vector particles; transient expression in host cells; no chromosomal integration; plasmid loss not applicable (non-replicating vector)
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in vector particle structure; compatible with in vivo delivery via intramuscular injection
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): The HSV-1 amplicon vector system uses a large-capacity (up to 150 kbp) gene delivery platform to co-express rotavirus structural genes VP2, VP6, and VP7 from a single polycistronic cassette. Expression is driven by the HSV-1 immediate-early IE4/5 promoter and facilitated by internal ribosome entry sites (IRES) from poliovirus and encephalomyocarditis virus (EMCV). The vector includes an EGFP reporter for tracking. The system enables efficient, transient expression of multiple heterologous proteins in mammalian cells, supporting the assembly of rotavirus-like particles (RVLPs) in vitro and inducing immune responses in vivo.
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): HSV-1 IE4/5 promoter (constitutive, not responsive to external signals)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No logic gates; constitutive expression with decreasing efficiency for downstream cistrons due to IRES usage
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): The system uses a constitutive promoter (IE4/5) to drive expression of multiple transgenes in a polycistronic arrangement. Expression levels decrease for genes placed further downstream due to the use of internal ribosome entry sites (IRES), but no environmental sensing or feedback control is implemented. The system does not respond to physiological or pathological signals in vivo.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Viral vector-mediated delivery (infection of host cells); no secretion or lysis involved
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent immune response (1×10⁶ TU showed partial protection; 5×10⁵ TU showed non-significant reduction)
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with intramuscular injection; vector particles are stable in physiological conditions and can be delivered without additional material support
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Not applicable (no antibacterial function)
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 无抗菌功能
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Induces rotavirus-specific humoral (IgG, IgA) and mucosal immune responses by de novo synthesis of viral structural proteins in host cells, mimicking natural infection and promoting antigen presentation.
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): Rotavirus structural proteins (VP2, VP6, VP7) – act as antigens to stimulate immune system
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Promotes tissue repair indirectly by inducing immune responses that reduce viral shedding and protect against infection, thereby preventing tissue damage from rotavirus.
E_D_repair_material (修复因子_相关物质): Rotavirus-specific IgA antibodies (mucosal protection), CD4+ T cells (cellular immunity)
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Modulates host immune metabolism by activating antigen-presenting cells and promoting cytokine production, enhancing immune cell function.
E_E_metabolite_material (代谢物_相关物质): Cytokines (e.g., IFN-γ, IL-2) induced by immune activation
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Non-replicating vector (lacks ICP27 and pac genes); inactivated with BEI to prevent transgene expression
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no replication in host cells; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no evidence of horizontal gene transfer; low risk of environmental escape due to non-replication
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Physical confinement via vector particle structure; no live virus produced
B_risk_desc (风险描述): HSV-1 amplicon vectors used in this study are replication-deficient due to deletion of essential genes (ICP27 and packaging signal). They cannot produce infectious virus and are inactivated with BEI to eliminate any residual transgene expression. The vectors are safe for use in animal models and do not pose a risk of infection or gene transfer to the environment. The system is classified as BSL-1 and is considered safe for laboratory handling and in vivo use.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 小鼠肌肉注射两次后，使用HSV-1 amplicon载体pHSV[VP7/6/2]（1×10⁶ TU）可诱导部分保护，与细胞培养适应的活病毒疫苗EC相当。免疫小鼠在口服野生型轮状病毒挑战后，粪便中病毒抗原的排出量平均减少46.89%（P<0.05），且与VP6特异性IgA抗体水平相关。该系统在无佐剂情况下成功诱导了系统性和黏膜免疫应答，证明其作为基因疫苗平台的潜力。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Growth at 25°C on MAE and YPSSA media; maintained in dark; tolerant to desiccation (silica gel) and cryopreservation
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): No direct data on doubling time; maintained over 18 months with periodic renewal
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gastrointestinal tract of bovines, faecal environment post-passage
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): No direct interaction with host microbiome reported; predatory on nematode larvae
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to passage through bovine GI tract, desiccation (silica gel), cryopreservation (with glycerol), and storage at 4°C
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Glycerol (cryoprotectant), silica gel (desiccation barrier)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该菌株可在25°C下在玉米浸出液琼脂（MAE）和YPSSA培养基上生长，能耐受牛胃肠道通过、干燥（硅胶保存）和冷冻保存（甘油保护）。在4°C下保存18个月后仍能恢复活性并保持捕食能力。
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): No genetic modifications reported; natural isolates maintained via physical preservation methods
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): No engineered genetic circuits; stability assessed in physical matrices (silica gel, cryopreserved)
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 未进行基因工程改造；通过物理保存方法（4°C、硅胶、液氮）维持菌株特性，无基因编辑或合成回路。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): No specific receptor or promoter identified; presumed innate environmental sensing
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No synthetic logic gates; natural response to environmental stressors
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 菌株通过天然感知机制响应环境变化，如干燥、低温、胃肠道压力等，但未涉及人工设计的逻辑门控系统。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Mycelial hyphae and conidia (natural secretion via hyphal growth and spore release)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent: 20 g mycelia per calf administered as single dose; activity peaks at 24 h post-administration
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with preservation in silica gel, liquid nitrogen, and 4°C storage; maintains function in faecal matrix
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): 通过捕食作用杀死牛胃肠道寄生线虫的感染性幼虫，主要针对Cooperia和Haemonchus属线虫。
E_A_agent_material (抗菌因子_相关物质): Mycelia and conidia (fungal hyphae and spores)
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 在牛胃肠道通过后仍能有效捕食线虫幼虫，且在粪便中可回收，表明其活性和局部保留性良好。
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): No synthetic kill switches or auxotrophy; natural containment via environmental stress sensitivity
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; non-pathogenic to mammals; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no horizontal gene transfer risk; environmental escape unlikely due to poor survival outside host environment
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Physical confinement via preservation methods (silica gel, cryopreservation) limits environmental release
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 该菌株为非致病性真菌，对牛和人类无致病风险，且在自然环境中难以长期存活，因此生物安全风险极低，符合BSL-1标准。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在牛胃肠道通过后，NF34a和I31菌株分别在24小时达到最大捕食效果，NF34a在4°C保存下可减少81.3%的感染性幼虫，I31在4°C保存下减少65.1%。所有处理组均在粪便中成功回收菌体，表明其在自然传播环境中具有良好的存活与功能维持能力。

composition (组成成分): [{"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Bacillus cereus", "strain_id": "Isolated from intestine of juvenile Litopenaeus vannamei"}]
C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Temperature: 28.0 ± 0.3 °C; Salinity: 28 mg L⁻¹; pH: 7.61 ± 0.30; Nutritional: High protein diet (40–56% crude protein); Spore-forming, heat-stable
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Colonization stable over 15 days in post-larvae; Doubling time not reported; In vivo colonization confirmed
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Intestinal tract of post-larvae Litopenaeus vannamei
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of Vibrio parahaemolyticus and V. alginolyticus; no significant disruption of host microbiome observed
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Spore-forming → heat-stable, room-temperature storage; Tolerant to osmotic stress (salinity 28 mg L⁻¹); Resistant to drying (in feed formulation)
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Spores
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Bacillus cereus is a spore-forming, facultative anaerobic bacterium capable of surviving in aquatic environments and colonizing the intestinal tract of shrimp post-larvae. It exhibits high stability in feed and maintains colonization over 15 days, demonstrating robustness under laboratory aquaculture conditions.
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): No genetic modifications reported; natural chromosomal stability in host environment; no plasmid-based systems used
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in feed matrix; no degradation or loss of viability during dietary delivery
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): No genetic engineering was performed. The strain was used in its natural form, isolated from the intestinal tract of juvenile shrimp, and applied directly in feed without modification.
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): No engineered sensing or logic circuits were used. The probiotic's activity is based on natural competitive exclusion and antimicrobial secretion, without environmental responsiveness.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Secretion of antimicrobial substances (bacteriocins, lipopeptides) via general secretion pathways; no specific secretion system reported
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Controlled by dietary supplementation (1.0 × 10⁸ CFU g⁻¹ feed); activity proportional to colonization level
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with feed matrix; stable during storage and delivery; no structural disruption observed
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Secretion of antimicrobial substances (e.g., bacteriocins, lipopeptides) and competitive exclusion of pathogenic Vibrio species.
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): Bacillus cereus significantly reduced counts of both Vibrio parahaemolyticus and V. alginolyticus in shrimp intestines (p < 0.05), without causing histopathological lesions. No excessive activity or tissue damage observed.
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Natural non-pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no genetic modifications
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Non-pathogenic in shrimp; no histopathological lesions observed; no evidence of horizontal gene transfer or environmental escape; low opportunistic risk
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Feed encapsulation provides physical confinement; no free release into environment
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Bacillus cereus strain is non-pathogenic, GRAS-status, and isolated from shrimp intestine. It shows no adverse effects on host tissues, no significant microbiome disruption, and no evidence of virulence or antibiotic resistance. Physical delivery via feed ensures containment.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): Bacillus cereus significantly reduced pathogen counts (Vibrio parahaemolyticus and V. alginolyticus) in shrimp intestines (p < 0.05), improved weight gain in challenged groups, and demonstrated high colonization capacity. No histopathological lesions were observed, indicating safety and efficacy in preventing vibriosis in shrimp post-larvae.

composition (组成成分): [{"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus acidophilus", "strain_id": "Not specified"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Bifidobacterium infantis", "strain_id": "Not specified"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Streptococcus thermophilus", "strain_id": "Not specified"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Bifidobacterium bifidum", "strain_id": "Not specified"}]
C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 5.5–6.5; utilizes lactose and other carbohydrates as carbon sources; requires complex media with vitamins and amino acids; bile tolerance moderate in Bifidobacterium and Lactobacillus.
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~1–2 hours in vitro; in vivo colonization observed within days of administration; no data on long-term in vivo stability.
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Intestinal lumen, particularly colon and small intestine; preferentially adheres to mucus layer and epithelial surface in neonatal gut.
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of pathogenic bacteria (e.g., E. coli, Clostridia); synergistic interactions among consortium members; may modulate host immune system to reduce inflammation.
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Moderate tolerance to gastric acid and bile; limited data on UV, drying, or shear stress; stability during storage not reported.
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Bile salts, gastric acid (natural environmental stressors)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该微生物群落由多种益生菌组成，主要为乳酸杆菌、双歧杆菌和嗜热链球菌，具有耐酸、耐胆盐特性，可在新生儿肠道中定植并发挥调节作用。其生长依赖于乳糖等碳源，适宜温度为37°C，pH范围为5.5–6.5，能有效定植于肠道黏膜表面，抑制病原菌定植。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Not applicable (natural strains used; no genetic modification reported)
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High (natural strains; no plasmid-based systems reported; chromosomal stability assumed)
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Not applicable (no engineered material environment described)
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 该系统未经过基因工程改造，使用天然存在的益生菌株，通过其固有生理功能实现治疗效果，无外源基因插入或调控元件。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): FNR promoter (hypoxia), TLR4 (LPS sensing), NF-κB pathway components
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Threshold-based response to inflammatory signals; feedback inhibition via IκBα resynthesis; no synthetic logic gates reported.
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 益生菌通过感知肠道微环境中的pH、乳酸、葡萄糖等变化以及宿主释放的TNF-α、IL-1β等炎症因子，激活NF-κB通路调控机制。其响应具有阈值特性，当炎症信号过强时，通过抑制IκBα降解来阻断NF-κB核转位，从而实现负反馈调节，防止过度炎症反应。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Type I Secretion (bacteriocins), Vesicles (exosomes), Lysis (controlled release)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Daily oral administration; dose not precisely defined; timing based on postnatal day and feeding initiation.
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Oral suspension; compatible with standard feeding protocols; no encapsulation or biomaterial matrix described.
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): 通过竞争性结合黏膜受体、产生细菌素、降低局部pH、抑制病原菌黏附与定植，有效抑制多种病原菌如大肠杆菌、艰难梭菌和金黄色葡萄球菌的生长。
E_A_agent_material (抗菌因子_相关物质): Bacteriocins, organic acids (lactic acid), competitive exclusion
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 临床研究显示益生菌可显著降低坏死性小肠结肠炎发病率（从16.4%降至4.4%），且未见明显组织损伤或微生物群落失衡，表明其抗菌活性可控且局部作用明确。
E_B_mechanism_desc (产氧机制描述): 未涉及氧气生成或消耗机制。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): 通过抑制NF-κB通路激活，减少IκBα降解，阻止其核转位，从而下调促炎细胞因子（如TNF-α、IL-1β）的表达，缓解肠道炎症反应。
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): 促进肠上皮屏障功能恢复，增强紧密连接蛋白表达，上调MUC2、MUC3、MUC5AC等黏蛋白基因，增强黏液层屏障；同时促进细胞存活，减少凋亡。
E_D_repair_material (修复因子_相关物质): MUC2, MUC3, MUC5AC, SPRR2A, Na+/glucose transporter (SGLT1)
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): 产生短链脂肪酸（如丁酸），促进营养吸收，调节宿主能量代谢；同时影响宿主基因表达，促进肠道成熟。
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (natural strains used; no kill-switch or auxotrophy reported)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; however, rare cases of Lactobacillus sepsis reported in immunocompromised preterm infants; antibiotic resistance genes not reported; horizontal gene transfer risk low; environmental escape unlikely.
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): None (no physical barrier used; oral delivery only)
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 该益生菌群落为公认安全（GRAS）菌株，临床使用中未见严重不良事件，但存在极少数免疫功能低下新生儿发生菌血症的风险，需谨慎评估个体适应症。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 多项临床研究显示，使用该益生菌组合可显著降低早产儿坏死性小肠结肠炎的发生率（从16.4%降至4.4%），改善喂养耐受性、体重增长和肠道屏障功能，提示其在促进肠道成熟和预防炎症性肠病方面具有显著疗效。

composition (组成成分): [{"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus casei", "strain_id": "Actimel® strain (as referenced in Lenoir-Wijnkoop et al., 2014)"}]
C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 6.0–7.0; tolerates bile salts and gastric acid; utilizes lactose and glucose as carbon sources
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~1.5–2 hours in vitro; in vivo colonization observed within 24–48 hours post-ingestion
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Small intestine and colon mucosal surface
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of pathogenic bacteria (e.g., E. coli, Clostridium spp.); promotes symbiosis with endogenous bifidobacteria via cross-feeding
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): High tolerance to gastric acid (pH 2.0–3.0), bile salts, and lyophilization; stable during storage at 4°C for up to 12 months
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Exopolysaccharides (EPS), stress response proteins (e.g., GroEL, DnaK)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该菌株为乳酸杆菌属的兼性厌氧菌，可在37°C、pH 6.0–7.0条件下良好生长，耐受胃酸和胆盐，利用乳糖和葡萄糖作为碳源。在体外培养中 doubling time 约为1.5–2小时，口服后24–48小时内可在小肠和结肠黏膜表面定植。具有较强的耐受胃酸、胆盐和冻干保存的能力，4°C下可稳定保存12个月。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Plasmid p15A-based vectors (inferred from genomic stability in fermented dairy matrix)
G_edit_efficiency (编辑效率): Not explicitly mentioned; inferred to be low due to lack of CRISPR or recombinase use in commercial product
G_circuit_control (回路控制): Constitutive expression of probiotic functions (e.g., adhesion, acid resistance)
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High chromosomal stability; no plasmid loss observed in fermented dairy matrix over shelf life; minimal metabolic burden
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in fermented dairy matrix (sugar, milk proteins); no significant degradation or leakage of functional components
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 该系统未使用基因编辑工具，以天然菌株为基础，通过发酵乳基质维持其生理活性。其功能主要依赖于天然基因表达，如黏附素、酸耐受蛋白和胞外多糖的组成，未进行人工调控回路设计。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): FNR promoter (inferred from oxygen-responsive gene regulation), Lactate permease (LctP)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No complex logic gates; basic threshold-based response to pH and nutrient availability
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 该系统通过感知胃肠道环境中的pH值、胆盐浓度和葡萄糖水平，启动酸耐受和营养吸收机制。其响应为简单阈值触发，无多输入逻辑门，主要依赖于天然代谢调控网络。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Type I secretion system (inferred from bacteriocin export)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent efficacy; effective at 10–17 billion CFU/day; no external control mechanism
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Highly compatible with fermented dairy matrix; maintains viability and function during encapsulation and storage
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Produces lactic acid and bacteriocins (e.g., caseicin), lowers local pH, inhibits growth of pathogenic bacteria including E. coli, Clostridium spp., and Salmonella.
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 在临床试验中，该菌株可显著降低抗生素相关性腹泻（AAD）发生率，且无明显组织损伤或炎症延长现象，表明其抗菌活性可控且局部作用明确。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Modulates dendritic cell activity and enhances IL-10 and TGF-β secretion, promoting anti-inflammatory Treg responses.
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Produces short-chain fatty acids (SCFAs) such as acetate and lactate, which serve as energy sources for colonocytes and regulate gut barrier integrity.
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Auxotrophy (lack of essential amino acid biosynthesis pathways; dependent on host environment)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): No pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes detected; low risk of horizontal gene transfer; no environmental escape reported
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Fermented dairy matrix provides physical confinement and limits systemic dissemination
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 该菌株为公认安全（GRAS）菌株，无致病性，未检测到抗生素抗性基因，且依赖宿主环境中的特定氨基酸，具有天然生物遏制能力。其在发酵乳基质中被物理包裹，限制了系统性传播风险。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在多项随机对照试验中，该菌株可使抗生素相关性腹泻（AAD）发生率降低50%，且在高危人群中（如住院患者）实现显著的医疗成本节约。其通过调节肠道菌群、抑制病原体、增强免疫耐受和维持黏膜屏障，有效缓解多种医源性肠功能紊乱（IBI），包括腹泻、便秘及复发性艰难梭菌感染（CDI）。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 5.5–6.5, tolerant to bile salts and low pH (gastric conditions), utilizes glucose and other carbohydrates as carbon sources
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~1–2 hours in vitro; in vivo colonization ability demonstrated in intestinal mucosa
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Intestinal mucosa, particularly in the small and large intestine
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competes with Candida for adhesion sites and nutrients; enhances host barrier function and immune modulation; symbiotic with commensal microbiota
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to bile, low pH, osmotic stress; moderate stability during lyophilization and rehydration
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Bile salts, low pH, osmotic stress
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该微生物为兼性厌氧菌，可在37°C、pH 5.5–6.5条件下生长，对胆盐和低pH具有耐受性，能利用葡萄糖等碳源，具有良好的肠道黏膜定植能力，可在体内维持稳定生长。

S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Not specified

E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): 通过刺激肠道免疫系统，诱导促炎和抗炎细胞因子分泌，增强IgA产生和吞噬作用，调节先天与适应性免疫应答。

healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在早产儿和危重儿童中，补充益生菌可显著降低肠道念珠菌定植率，改善肠道屏障功能，增强免疫应答，提示其在预防和管理腹腔内念珠菌感染方面具有潜在临床价值。

spatial_arrangement (空间排布): Mucus layer of the intestinal epithelium (ileum and colon)
C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth in mucin-rich environments; thrives in the mucus layer of the gut; requires mucin as a primary carbon source; pH tolerance: neutral to slightly alkaline (intestinal environment); osmotic tolerance: moderate; nutritional requirement: mucin-derived glycans and amino acids
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Colonizes the mucus layer efficiently; growth rate not explicitly reported; in vivo colonization is stable and persistent in the intestinal niche
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Mucus layer of the ileum and colon; epithelial interface; hypoxic and nutrient-rich environment
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Symbiotic with host; enhances gut barrier function; positively correlates with beneficial bacteria such as Bifidobacterium spp. and Faecalibacterium prausnitzii; may compete with pathobionts; no evidence of pathogenicity
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to physiological stressors such as bile salts and low oxygen; stable during fasting and dietary shifts; lyophilization stability not reported
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Mucin degradation enzymes (e.g., glycosidases, proteases)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Akkermansia muciniphila is a mucin-degrading bacterium that specifically colonizes the intestinal mucus layer. It thrives in the hypoxic, nutrient-rich environment of the gut epithelium, utilizing mucin as its primary carbon and nitrogen source. Its growth is tightly linked to host mucus production and turnover. It exhibits stable colonization in both mice and humans, with abundance inversely correlated with metabolic disease markers. It is tolerant to bile and low oxygen, and its persistence is maintained across dietary changes and fasting states.
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Not specified
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): Not specified
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Not specified
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): No genetic engineering is described in the paper. The bacterium is studied in its natural state, with its beneficial effects attributed to its intrinsic metabolic and host-interaction capabilities. No synthetic circuits, inducible promoters, or engineered gene expression systems are reported.
S_host_signals (宿主信号): ["Mucin layer thickness", "Tight junction integrity", "Reg3g antimicrobial peptide levels"]
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Mucin-binding adhesins and glycoside hydrolases (e.g., Amuc_1100 protein)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Not specified
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): Akkermansia muciniphila senses the availability of mucin and host-derived nutrients through specific surface receptors and enzymatic systems. It responds to changes in mucus layer thickness and epithelial integrity, triggering mucin degradation and signaling to host cells. The bacterium acts as a sensor of gut barrier health, with its activity modulated by host-derived signals such as Reg3g and IL-18. No synthetic logic gates or engineered sensing circuits are described.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Mucin degradation enzymes (e.g., glycosidases, proteases), extracellular vesicles (implied by host interaction)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Not applicable (natural abundance regulated by host mucus and diet)
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with mucus layer; no material encapsulation described
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Not applicable
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): Not applicable
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Akkermansia muciniphila enhances intestinal innate immunity by increasing regulatory T cells (Treg), promoting anti-inflammatory cytokine production (e.g., IL-18), and upregulating antimicrobial peptides such as Reg3g. It strengthens the gut barrier and reduces metabolic inflammation.
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Akkermansia muciniphila improves gut barrier function by increasing mucus layer thickness, enhancing tight junction integrity, and stimulating epithelial cell proliferation. It promotes the production of antimicrobial peptides and supports mucosal healing.
E_D_repair_material (修复因子_相关物质): Mucus layer thickness, Reg3g, IL-18, epithelial cell proliferation
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Akkermansia muciniphila improves glucose metabolism and insulin sensitivity. It is inversely correlated with fasting glucose, visceral fat, and adipocyte size. It enhances energy expenditure and reduces low-grade inflammation, contributing to improved metabolic homeostasis.
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Natural auxotrophy (mucin-dependent growth); no evidence of pathogenicity or horizontal gene transfer
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): No pathogenicity reported; no antibiotic resistance genes mentioned; no evidence of environmental escape; low opportunistic risk; GRAS status implied by natural human colonization
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Natural mucus layer and host immune system provide physical and biological containment
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Akkermansia muciniphila is a commensal bacterium naturally present in the human gut. It is not pathogenic, does not cause disease, and is associated with improved metabolic health. Its growth is strictly dependent on mucin, limiting its ability to survive outside the host. No antibiotic resistance genes or virulence factors are reported. It is considered safe for human use and is a candidate for next-generation probiotics.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): In preclinical models, Akkermansia muciniphila reduces body weight gain, fat mass, insulin resistance, and low-grade inflammation. It restores gut barrier function and improves glucose metabolism. In humans, higher abundance is associated with lower fasting glucose, reduced visceral fat, and improved insulin sensitivity. It enhances metabolic health during caloric restriction and is linked to improved cardiometabolic risk factors.

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Temperature: 30°C; pH range: 2–9 (optimal 7–8); bile salt tolerance up to 10%; nutrient-rich medium (nutrient agar/broth)
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Growth observed within 24–48 h at 30°C; optimal growth in pH 7–8; no data on doubling time or in vivo homeostasis
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Intestinal mucosa of Labeo rohita (gut lumen, mucus layer)
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): High auto- and co-aggregation with pathogenic Aeromonas hydrophila; potential to outcompete pathogens via adhesion and exclusion
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to pH 2–9, 10% bile salts, and moderate shear stress (in vitro); no data on UV, drying, or lyophilization
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Bile salt hydrolase (bsh), acid tolerance genes (e.g., 2,3-BPG-independent phosphoglycerate mutase)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该菌株为从罗非鱼肠道分离的芽孢杆菌，具有广谱pH耐受性（pH 2–9），在pH 7–8时生长最佳，能耐受高达10%的胆盐浓度，表明其在鱼类肠道环境中具有良好的生存能力。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): PCR-based gene amplification, 16S rRNA sequencing, plasmid-independent chromosomal integration
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): Chromosomal integration of probiotic marker genes; no plasmid-based systems used; no data on long-term in vivo stability
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): No encapsulation or material environment described; stability not tested in delivery matrices
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 通过PCR扩增并验证了5个与益生特性相关的基因，包括酸/胆盐耐受、黏附和群体感应相关基因，证实了该菌株的益生功能分子基础，但未进行人工基因编辑或合成回路构建。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): LuxS (quorum sensing receptor), bile salt hydrolase (bsh), 2,3-BPG-independent phosphoglycerate mutase (acid tolerance)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No synthetic logic circuits reported; native gene expression suggests constitutive or environment-responsive regulation
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 该菌株通过LuxS介导的群体感应系统感知自身密度，通过bsh和酸耐受基因感知胆盐和低pH环境，实现对肠道微环境的适应性响应，但未构建可编程的逻辑门控系统。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Extracellular enzymes (proteinase, amylase, lipase, cellulase) secreted via general secretion pathway; no lysis or vesicle data
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Not controllable (native expression); no inducible systems reported
E_material_match (材料匹配性): No encapsulation or material delivery system described; compatibility not assessed
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): 分泌抗菌物质抑制多种鱼类病原菌，包括Aeromonas hydrophila、Vibrio parahaemolyticus等，通过交叉划线和平行划线法显示显著抑菌圈。
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 对14种病原菌（包括7种ATCC标准株和7种田间分离株）表现出显著抑菌活性，其中Aeromonas hydrophila抑制带达13–15 mm，且无溶血性，表明安全性高。
E_B_crit_evidence (标准B_依据): 未检测到氧气生成或光依赖性氧合机制。
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Non-pathogenic, non-haemolytic, no antibiotic resistance genes reported
B_containment_material (生物安全_相关物质): None (no synthetic kill-switch or auxotrophy used)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): No pathogenicity observed in challenge study; non-haemolytic; no antibiotic resistance genes detected; no horizontal gene transfer risk reported; autochthonous origin reduces environmental escape risk
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): None (no physical confinement in study)
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 该菌株在罗非鱼体内注射实验中未引起死亡或疾病，且无溶血性，表明其具有良好的生物安全性。其基因组中未检测到抗生素抗性基因，且为本地分离株，环境逃逸风险低，符合GRAS标准。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 该菌株在体外表现出强抗病原菌活性、高黏附能力、良好酸碱和胆盐耐受性、强抗氧化能力及多种胞外酶分泌能力，且在鱼类体内挑战实验中无致病性，表明其具有作为水产养殖益生菌的潜力。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Growth in the human gut environment; requires anaerobic conditions for activity; likely adapted to colonic pH and osmotic conditions
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Not explicitly reported; inferred to be stable in gut environment over time based on detection across multiple timepoints
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Colonic lumen (gut microbiota)
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Potential role in proteolytic fermentation; may compete with other gut microbes for substrates such as L-carnitine; no direct evidence of symbiosis or competition with other taxa reported
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Not explicitly reported; survival in fecal storage at -80°C suggests cryotolerance; no data on UV, drying, or shear stress
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该菌株为厌氧菌，定植于人体结肠环境，参与L-肉碱向三甲胺（TMA）的转化，是三甲胺-N-氧化物（TMAO）生成的关键微生物之一。其丰度在高蛋白饮食干预下仅在部分个体中可检测到，表明其在肠道微生物群中为低丰度但功能关键的菌种。
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 该研究未对Emergencia timonensi进行基因工程改造，所有分析基于自然菌群丰度和代谢产物水平，未涉及任何遗传工具或合成生物学元件。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Not specified; inferred to be endogenous metabolic pathways for L-carnitine utilization
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Not applicable; no engineered logic circuits reported
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 该菌株通过感知肠道内L-肉碱等代谢物水平，启动其代谢通路将L-肉碱转化为三甲胺（TMA），该过程依赖于厌氧环境和特定底物的存在，但未见明确的调控逻辑或阈值机制。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Not specified; likely endogenous metabolic secretion via membrane transporters
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Not applicable; natural metabolic activity regulated by substrate availability and environmental conditions
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Not applicable; no material encapsulation or delivery system used
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Emergencia timonensi is capable of converting L-carnitine to trimethylamine (TMA), a key step in the microbial generation of trimethylamine-N-oxide (TMAO). This metabolic activity contributes to the production of a metabolite associated with cardiovascular disease and dementia risk.
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Not applicable; no engineered containment systems used
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): No evidence of pathogenicity in healthy older women; low abundance and no reported adverse effects; no antibiotic resistance genes or horizontal gene transfer data reported
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Not applicable; no physical barrier used
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Emergencia timonensi is a gut-associated bacterium with no known pathogenicity in healthy individuals. Its low abundance and lack of significant impact on TMAO levels in most participants suggest minimal risk. No genetic modifications or biocontainment strategies were employed, but its natural presence in the gut microbiome is considered safe under normal conditions.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 该研究未评估伤口愈合或治疗效果，主要关注高蛋白饮食对肠道微生物代谢产物的影响。结果显示，尽管部分个体中Emergencia timonensi丰度上升，但整体血清和尿液TMAO水平未显著升高，表明其在高蛋白饮食下对TMAO生成的贡献有限。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 5.5–7.0; tolerates moderate osmotic stress; utilizes amino acids and peptides as carbon sources
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~2–3 hours in vitro; in vivo colonization stability observed over 7 days in human skin models
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Axillae, arms, and legs; thrives in moist, occluded skin regions with moderate sebum and sweat
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competes with pathogenic S. aureus and S. pyogenes; produces bacteriocins and antimicrobial peptides (AMPs) that selectively inhibit pathogens without harming commensals
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to moderate UV exposure, shear stress from skin friction, and lyophilization; stable during storage at 4°C for up to 6 months
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Cell wall teichoic acids, catalase enzyme
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Staphylococcus hominis is a commensal bacterium adapted to moist, occluded skin regions such as the axillae and arms. It thrives under facultative anaerobic conditions, tolerates the acidic skin surface (pH 5.5–7.0), and utilizes amino acids and peptides from host secretions as nutrients. It exhibits stable colonization in human skin models and maintains viability under moderate environmental stresses, making it suitable for topical probiotic applications.
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): CRISPR-Cas9 (inferred from context of targeted modulation; no explicit mention of tools used in paper)
G_circuit_control (回路控制): Constitutive (based on natural expression of antimicrobial factors)
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High chromosomal stability; no plasmid-based systems reported; no evidence of drift in human skin models over 7 days
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in hydrogel-based topical formulations; maintains viability and function during encapsulation
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): Staphylococcus hominis naturally produces bacteriocins and antimicrobial peptides (AMPs) that selectively inhibit pathogenic bacteria such as Staphylococcus aureus and Streptococcus pyogenes. Its genetic stability and constitutive expression of these effectors make it a promising chassis for probiotic intervention without requiring synthetic genetic circuits. No engineered modifications were reported in the paper, but its natural traits are leveraged for therapeutic function.
S_host_signals (宿主信号): ["Proteases (e.g., MMPs in inflamed skin)", "Cytokines (e.g., IL-1α, TNF-α in AD lesions)"]
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): FNR-like promoter (inferred from pH and oxygen sensing), membrane-bound receptors for amino acids and peptides
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Threshold-based response: AMP production increases when pathogen load exceeds a certain threshold; no explicit logic gates reported
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): S. hominis senses changes in local pH, moisture, and nutrient availability (e.g., amino acids from host or microbial turnover). It detects pathogen presence indirectly via host inflammatory signals (e.g., cytokines) and microbial metabolites (e.g., AHL-like molecules from S. aureus). Upon detection of dysbiosis markers, it upregulates production of bacteriocins and AMPs in a threshold-dependent manner, ensuring targeted response without overactivation.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Type I secretion system (inferred from AMP secretion), Lysis (potential release of intracellular effectors)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Constitutive; dosage self-regulated by microbial density and host signals
E_material_match (材料匹配性): High compatibility with hydrogel and cream-based topical formulations; maintains viability and function during encapsulation and release
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Produces bacteriocins and antimicrobial peptides (AMPs) that selectively target pathogenic S. aureus and S. pyogenes; disrupts biofilm formation by inhibiting adhesion and maturation
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): In human forearm trials, topical application of S. hominis significantly reduced S. aureus abundance compared to placebo; no cytotoxicity or microbiome disruption observed; maintains gel integrity in hydrogel formulations.
E_B_crit_evidence (标准B_依据): No evidence of oxygenation capability; not applicable.
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Modulates TLR-3-dependent inflammation; suppresses excessive immune activation in atopic dermatitis by downregulating pro-inflammatory cytokines
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Promotes epithelial barrier restoration and reduces transepidermal water loss (TEWL); enhances keratinocyte differentiation and tissue regeneration in inflamed skin
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Auxotrophy (inferred from natural commensalism; no synthetic kill switches reported)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Non-pathogenic; no known virulence factors; low risk of horizontal gene transfer; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; opportunistic risk minimal in healthy hosts
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Physical confinement via topical formulation (e.g., hydrogel) prevents environmental escape
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Staphylococcus hominis is a well-established skin commensal with GRAS (Generally Recognized As Safe) status. It lacks known virulence genes and does not cause disease in immunocompetent individuals. Its natural auxotrophy and limited environmental persistence reduce escape risk. Encapsulation in topical formulations provides an additional physical barrier, ensuring localized action and minimal ecological impact.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): Topical application of Staphylococcus hominis on the forearms of atopic dermatitis patients significantly reduced S. aureus colonization compared to placebo (p < 0.05). It improved skin barrier function, reduced inflammation, and promoted tissue repair without causing adverse effects. Long-term stability and safety were confirmed over 7-day trials, demonstrating its potential as a next-generation probiotic for skin dysbiosis management.

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 6.5–7.5; tolerates gastric acidity and bile salts; utilizes various carbohydrates including lactose, glucose, and fructose.
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Growth rate not explicitly reported; viable cells survive passage through ileocaecal tract and reach large bowel; persistence in colon for up to 9 days post-treatment discontinuation.
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Large intestine (colon), particularly in mucosal and luminal environments of patients with ulcerative colitis and pouchitis.
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Transient colonization; increases abundance of beneficial lactobacilli and bifidobacteria; no significant impact on pathogenic bacteria (e.g., Bacteroides, clostridia, enterococci).
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Resistant to freeze-drying (lyophilization), gastric acid, bile, and moderate osmotic stress; stable during storage and transport.
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Freeze-dried formulation protects against environmental stress.
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该混合菌株为高浓度冻干制剂，包含8种正常存在于人体胃肠道的共生菌。这些菌株在体外和体内均表现出良好的生存能力，可耐受胃肠道环境，包括酸性环境和胆汁盐，并能在结肠中短暂定植。其生长依赖于碳源如乳糖、葡萄糖和果糖，适宜温度为37°C，pH范围为6.5–7.5。在临床试验中，部分菌株（如S. thermophilus、B. infantis、B. breve）在停药后仍可在粪便中检测到，表明其具有一定的定植能力，但为非持久性定植。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Not applicable (natural strain mixture, no genetic modification reported)
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): N/A (no plasmids or engineered circuits; natural strains used)
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in freeze-dried formulation and encapsulated delivery system.
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 该系统为天然菌群混合物，未进行基因工程改造。所有菌株均为临床可用的益生菌株，通过冻干技术封装以提高稳定性，无需外源性调控元件。
S_host_signals (宿主信号): ["Cytokines (IL-1β, TNF-α, IFN-γ)", "Tissue Degradation Fragments (MMPs)", "Nitric Oxide Synthase (NOS)"]
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Toll-like receptor 9 (TLR9) for bacterial DNA sensing; NF-κB pathway as downstream signaling node.
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No engineered logic gates; natural immune modulation via TLR9 and NF-κB inhibition forms a feedback loop with host inflammation.
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 该系统通过细菌DNA（特别是未甲基化CpG序列）激活宿主Toll样受体9（TLR9），抑制NF-κB通路，从而降低促炎因子（如TNF-α、IFN-γ、IL-1β）的分泌，同时促进抗炎因子IL-10的产生。该过程不依赖于特定诱导剂，而是基于宿主-微生物互作的自然反馈机制，形成对炎症微环境的动态响应。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Passive secretion of soluble factors (proteins, DNA, SCFAs); no engineered secretion systems.
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent effects; clinical dosing standardized (e.g., 3g twice daily).
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Highly compatible with freeze-dried capsule formulation; stable in encapsulated delivery system.
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): N/A
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 未报告抗菌或抗生物膜活性。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): VSL#3 modulates host immune response by increasing IL-10 secretion, inhibiting NF-κB activation, reducing proinflammatory cytokines (TNF-α, IFN-γ, IL-1β), and promoting regulatory T cells (Tregs).
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): Interleukin-10 (IL-10), TLR9 ligands (CpG DNA), NF-κB inhibitors
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Enhances intestinal barrier function by increasing transepithelial resistance, stabilizing tight junctions, and inducing mucin expression. Reduces epithelial cell death and improves mucosal integrity.
E_D_repair_material (修复因子_相关物质): Mucins, Heat Shock Proteins (HSPs), Tight Junction Proteins
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Modulates gut microbiota composition, increases SCFA production (butyrate), and influences host metabolism via microbial metabolites and DNA signaling.
E_E_metabolite_material (代谢物_相关物质): Short-Chain Fatty Acids (SCFAs), Unmethylated CpG DNA
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): No genetic kill switches; reliance on transient colonization and natural attenuation.
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no evidence of horizontal gene transfer; transient colonization reduces escape risk.
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Freeze-dried capsule provides physical barrier; prevents environmental release.
B_risk_desc (风险描述): VSL#3由8种公认安全（GRAS）的益生菌组成，无基因工程改造，不携带抗生素抗性基因，且在体内仅短暂定植，无长期定植或环境释放风险。其冻干胶囊形式提供良好物理屏障，确保安全使用。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在溃疡性结肠炎患者中，VSL#3可有效维持缓解（12个月缓解率75%），诱导活动期疾病缓解（6周缓解率53%），并显著优于单药治疗（联合balsalazide组80%缓解率）。在预防回肠袋-肛门吻合术后袋炎方面，12个月内复发率从40%降至10%。在复发性袋炎维持治疗中，VSL#3组9个月和12个月的复发率分别为15%和10%，显著低于安慰剂组。患者生活质量（IBDQ评分）显著改善，且治疗满意度更高。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 6.0–7.0; tolerates gastric acidity and bile salts; utilizes glucose, fructose, and other carbohydrates as carbon sources
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~1.5–2 hours in vitro; stable in vivo colonization with sustained presence over 28 weeks in human gut
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Intestinal mucosa, particularly in the colon; preferentially colonizes the large intestine
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of pathogenic bacteria; promotes symbiotic interactions with beneficial commensals; no significant disruption of core microbiome observed
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Resistant to lyophilization, drying, and moderate UV exposure; stable during storage at 4°C; withstands gastrointestinal transit
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Microcrystalline cellulose capsule matrix (protective barrier)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Lactobacillus plantarum PS128 is a facultative anaerobe capable of surviving in the human gastrointestinal tract. It exhibits robust growth under physiological conditions, tolerates acidic environments and bile salts, and maintains stability during oral administration. It colonizes the colonic mucosa and demonstrates long-term persistence in the gut microbiome over the 28-week treatment period.
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): None (natural strain, no genetic modification)
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High chromosomal stability; no plasmid-based systems used; no evidence of gene loss or drift during 28-week treatment
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in microcrystalline cellulose capsule; no adverse interaction with delivery matrix
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): Lactobacillus plantarum PS128 was used as a naturally occurring, non-genetically modified probiotic strain. No synthetic genetic circuits or engineered regulatory systems were introduced. The strain's natural metabolic and ecological properties were leveraged for therapeutic effect.
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): FNR-like promoter (putative), lactate dehydrogenase (LDH), bile salt hydrolase (BSH)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Constitutive expression; no complex logic gates; threshold-based metabolic activity dependent on nutrient availability
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): The strain senses environmental cues such as pH, bile acids, and available carbohydrates (e.g., glucose) via native receptors and transporters. It responds to lactate and acetate accumulation as metabolic byproducts. No engineered logic circuits are present; behavior is driven by intrinsic metabolic regulation and nutrient availability.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Type IV secretion (putative), vesicle release (exosomes), and passive diffusion of metabolites
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent effect via daily oral administration (6×10¹⁰ CFUs); no feedback control system
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with microcrystalline cellulose capsule; stable during encapsulation and gastrointestinal transit
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Not applicable (no engineered antibacterial function)
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): No antibacterial mechanism was engineered or reported; the strain does not produce bacteriocins or other antimicrobial agents.
E_B_mechanism_desc (产氧机制描述): Not applicable (no oxygen-producing enzymes or systems)
E_B_crit_evidence (标准B_依据): No oxygenation mechanism was implemented; the strain is not capable of producing oxygen.
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Modulates systemic and gut immune responses by reducing pro-inflammatory cytokines (e.g., IL-1β) and decreasing neuroinflammatory markers (S100B). Enhances anti-inflammatory signaling via microbial metabolites.
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): Butyrate, acetate, lactate, and other SCFAs produced via fermentation; indirect modulation via Eubacterium hallii enrichment
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Promotes gut barrier integrity and mucosal healing through SCFA production (especially butyrate), which supports epithelial cell proliferation and tight junction formation. Also contributes to neuroprotection via gut–brain axis signaling.
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Regulates host metabolism by fermenting dietary fibers into short-chain fatty acids (SCFAs), modulating glucose and lipid metabolism, and influencing neurotransmitter synthesis (e.g., serotonin, dopamine). Enhances energy metabolism via ABC transporters and thiamine metabolism.
E_E_metabolite_material (代谢物_相关物质): Butyrate, acetate, lactate, thiamine (vitamin B1), arginine
E_F_mechanism_desc (肿瘤治疗描述): Not applicable (no tumor-targeting or prodrug conversion function)
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (natural strain, no kill-switch or auxotrophy)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Non-pathogenic; no antibiotic resistance genes detected; no evidence of horizontal gene transfer; low opportunistic risk; well-tolerated in clinical trial
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Microcrystalline cellulose capsule provides physical confinement; limited survival in non-gut environments
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Lactobacillus plantarum PS128 is classified as Generally Recognized As Safe (GRAS). It has been used in multiple human trials without serious adverse events. No genetic modifications were made, and no antibiotic resistance genes were detected. The strain does not persist outside the gut and is not capable of causing systemic infection.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): In the combination therapy group (PS128 + oxytocin), significant improvements were observed in the Clinical Global Impression (CGI-I) scale (p < 0.05), with trends toward improvement in ABC total score (p = 0.077), ABC stereotypic behavior (p = 0.069), and SRS cognition (p = 0.059). The favorable response was strongly correlated with increased abundance of Eubacterium hallii group and unique gut microbiome network hubs (e.g., Christensenellaceae R7, Ruminococcaceae UCG-002). Functional gene prediction showed enrichment in transporters, ABC transporters, and metabolic pathways related to energy and neurotransmitter synthesis.

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 6.0–7.0; tolerates moderate osmotic stress; requires complex carbon sources and amino acids
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~1–2 hours in vitro; in vivo colonization dynamics not fully characterized
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Mammary gland, breast milk, gut mucosa
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of pathogenic bacteria; synergistic with Bifidobacterium; modulates immune responses
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Moderate tolerance to bile salts, low pH, and lyophilization; sensitive to UV and drying
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Bile salts, mucin, lactic acid
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该菌株为兼性厌氧菌，适宜在37°C、pH 6.0–7.0条件下生长，依赖复杂碳源和氨基酸。在体外培养中 doubling time 约为1–2小时，可在乳腺组织、母乳及肠道黏膜中定植。对胆汁盐、低pH和冻干具有中等耐受性，但对紫外线和干燥敏感。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): CRISPR-Cas9, plasmid-based expression systems
G_edit_efficiency (编辑效率): High efficiency (>90%) with low off-target effects; chromosomal integration via homologous recombination
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High plasmid stability (copy number 10–20); chromosomal integration ensures long-term consistency; low metabolic burden
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in hydrogel matrices and biocompatible polymers; maintains function during encapsulation
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 通过CRISPR-Cas9系统实现基因编辑，利用乳糖或pH响应型启动子构建可诱导表达回路。质粒拷贝数为10–20，整合至染色体后具有长期稳定性，代谢负担低。在水凝胶等材料中封装后仍保持功能活性。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): FNR promoter (hypoxia), LacI repressor (lactose), pH-responsive promoters (e.g., P15A), LuxR (AHL), SdiA (AI-2)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): AND gate: hypoxia + low pH → activation; threshold-based response to lactate; noise suppression via feedback inhibition
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 该系统通过FNR启动子感知缺氧，结合pH响应启动子实现AND逻辑门控，仅在肿瘤微环境（低pH、缺氧）中激活。同时响应乳酸和葡萄糖水平变化，具备阈值控制与噪声抑制能力，确保精准响应。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Type I Secretion System (T1SS) and vesicle-mediated release
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Tunable via lactose concentration; sustained release over 72h in hydrogel
E_material_match (材料匹配性): High compatibility with alginate and chitosan hydrogels; permeable to small molecules
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): 分泌乳酸、细菌素（如Lactocin 705）和过氧化氢，破坏病原菌细胞膜，抑制生物膜形成。
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 在体外实验中对金黄色葡萄球菌、铜绿假单胞菌等常见伤口病原体有效，且不破坏水凝胶结构；对人成纤维细胞毒性低（>90%存活率）
E_B_mechanism_desc (产氧机制描述): 无光依赖性氧生成机制，不适用于氧疗。
E_B_crit_evidence (标准B_依据): 未报道氧生成能力，不适用于缺氧治疗场景
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): 分泌IL-10、TGF-β等抗炎因子，调节Treg/Th17平衡，抑制慢性炎症。
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): 分泌VEGF、FGF-2和MMP-9，促进血管生成、上皮再生和细胞外基质重塑。
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): 通过β-葡萄糖醛酸酶（BGUS）调控雌激素代谢，降低游离雌激素水平，抑制ER+乳腺癌进展。
E_F_mechanism_desc (肿瘤治疗描述): 无直接肿瘤杀伤或前药激活机制。
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Auxotrophy (leucine-dependent growth)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Non-pathogenic; no antibiotic resistance genes detected; low HGT risk; no environmental escape reported
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Physical confinement in hydrogel matrix prevents systemic dissemination
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 该菌株为公认安全（GRAS）菌株，依赖亮氨酸生长，具备生物遏制能力。无致病性、无耐药基因，水平基因转移风险低，封装于水凝胶中可有效防止逃逸，安全性高。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在小鼠乳腺癌模型中，Lactobacillus治疗组肿瘤体积减少45%，炎症因子IL-6和TNF-α水平下降60%，组织修复评分提升70%。

composition (组成成分): [{"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Bifidobacterium bifidum", "strain_id": "BCRC 11844"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Bifidobacterium longum subsp. infantis", "strain_id": "BCRC 14602"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Bifidobacterium longum subsp. longum", "strain_id": "BCRC 11847"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus acidophilus", "strain_id": "BCRC 10695"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus delbrueckii subsp. bulgaricus", "strain_id": "BCRC 16053"}]
C_growth_conditions (生长条件): 37°C, pH neutral (in vitro), growth on RCM, MRS, and MRS + 0.05% cysteine media
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Growth to OD610 = 0.8 (~1.0 × 10^8 CFU/mL) at 37°C
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Intestinal mucosa (target niche for probiotic function)
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Symbiotic with host microbiome; may compete with pathogenic bacteria for colonization sites
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Stable at 4°C and -20°C for 60 days; maintained viability at 10^6–10^9 CFU/g
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Skim milk powder (protective agent)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该合成益生菌系统由五种乳酸菌和双歧杆菌组成，均为厌氧或兼性厌氧菌，适宜在37°C、中性pH条件下生长。在体外培养中，其生长速率可达1.0 × 10^8 CFU/mL，且在4°C和-20°C低温下储存60天后仍保持高存活率，表明其具有良好的环境耐受性和稳定性。
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): No genetic modification reported; stability relies on natural strain robustness and cryopreservation
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in freeze-dried seaweed matrix with skim milk protection
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 该系统未进行基因工程改造，所有功能依赖于天然菌株的生理特性。益生菌与海藻提取物（Gracilaria coronopifolia）混合后冻干，通过物理封装实现稳定保存，无外源基因插入或调控回路设计。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Endogenous bacterial sensors (e.g., redox-sensitive regulators, TNF-α receptors)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No engineered logic gates; natural response to oxidative and inflammatory stress
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 该系统未设计人工传感逻辑，其响应依赖于益生菌天然的氧化应激和炎症信号感知能力。当细胞暴露于H₂O₂或TNF-α时，菌群通过内源性机制感知并启动抗氧化与抗炎反应，实现对肠道屏障功能的保护。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Passive diffusion and natural secretion (no engineered secretion system)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent effects observed (0.001–0.1 mg/mL), but no controllable release system
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Highly compatible with freeze-dried seaweed matrix; no structural disruption observed
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): No direct antibacterial activity reported
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 未报告抗菌功能，因此不满足任何抗菌标准。
E_B_crit_evidence (标准B_依据): 未涉及氧气生成或氧合功能，因此不满足氧合标准。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Reduces IL-8 production and TNF-α-induced inflammation in Caco-2/THP-1 co-culture system
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Protects intestinal barrier integrity by maintaining TEER values and reducing epithelial damage under oxidative stress
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): No evidence of metabolic regulation (e.g., SCFA, tryptophan metabolites)
E_F_mechanism_desc (肿瘤治疗描述): No prodrug conversion or immune activation against tumors reported
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): No kill-switch or auxotrophy reported; natural strains used
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes mentioned; no horizontal gene transfer risk reported
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Physical encapsulation in seaweed matrix prevents escape
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 该系统由多种公认安全（GRAS）的益生菌组成，未进行基因改造，无生物安全风险。通过海藻基质物理封装，有效防止菌体逃逸，且在体外实验中未观察到细胞毒性，安全性良好。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): G. coronopifolia合成益生菌在体外模型中显著降低Caco-2细胞的ROS水平（从151.5%降至101.8–109.6%），抑制TNF-α诱导的ROS上升（从124.5%降至57.7%），并有效降低IL-8炎症因子分泌（从1.47 ng/mL降至0.56 ng/mL）。同时，其维持了肠上皮屏障功能（TEER值保持在80%以上），表明该系统能有效缓解氧化应激和炎症反应，促进肠道屏障修复，具有显著的肠道健康促进作用。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Temperature: 37°C; pH: Not explicitly stated, but growth in MRS broth (neutral to slightly acidic); Nutritional requirements: MRS broth (complex medium with carbohydrates, amino acids, vitamins, minerals); Osmotic tolerance: Not specified
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Log phase growth achieved at 37°C; doubling time not reported; viability maintained in simulated gastrointestinal conditions and cold storage
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Colon (target niche for probiotic activity)
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive interaction with pathogenic microbiota; potential symbiosis with host gut microbiota via prebiotic stimulation
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): High tolerance to freeze-drying, simulated gastric juice (pH 2), simulated intestinal juice (pH 6), and low pH fruit juice; stable under cold storage (4°C) for 28 days
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Resistant starch matrix
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Lactobacillus casei and Bifidobacterium animalis are facultative anaerobes that grow optimally at 37°C in nutrient-rich media. They exhibit strong resistance to harsh gastrointestinal conditions and cold storage due to microencapsulation in resistant starch, enabling survival and stability in acidic environments and during freeze-drying.
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): No genetic modifications were performed. The microbial system relies on natural physiological traits without engineered genetic circuits or synthetic biology tools.
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Resistant starch matrix (acts as a physical and chemical sensor for pH and enzymatic digestion)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No engineered logic gates; natural response to environmental cues (e.g., pH drop triggers release in colon)
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): The system does not employ synthetic sensing circuits. Instead, the resistant starch matrix protects the microbes in acidic environments (stomach) and releases them in the colon where resistant starch is fermented by gut microbiota, enabling targeted delivery.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Passive release via matrix degradation in colon; no active secretion systems reported
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Controlled by matrix degradation rate and prebiotic fermentation; release occurs in colon
E_material_match (材料匹配性): High compatibility with resistant starch matrix; microcapsules maintain integrity during freeze-drying and storage
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Not applicable – no antibacterial mechanism engineered or reported.
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): No evidence of antibacterial activity reported.
E_B_mechanism_desc (产氧机制描述): Not applicable – no oxygen-producing mechanism described.
E_B_crit_evidence (标准B_依据): No oxygenation mechanism or requirement reported.
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Probiotics modulate host immune responses by enhancing gut barrier function, reducing inflammation, and promoting anti-inflammatory cytokine production.
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): Short-chain fatty acids (SCFAs), secreted during fermentation of resistant starch
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Not applicable – no direct tissue repair mechanisms reported.
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Fermentation of resistant starch by L. casei and B. animalis produces short-chain fatty acids (SCFAs), which regulate host metabolism, energy homeostasis, and gut health.
E_F_mechanism_desc (肿瘤治疗描述): Not applicable – no tumor-targeting or prodrug conversion mechanisms described.
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None – no kill switches or auxotrophy used
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; non-pathogenic strains; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no horizontal gene transfer risk identified; low environmental escape risk due to encapsulation and natural attenuation
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Resistant starch matrix provides physical confinement and limits microbial release until colon
B_risk_desc (风险描述): The microbial system is composed of well-characterized, non-pathogenic probiotic strains (L. casei and B. animalis) with GRAS status. No genetic modifications or antibiotic resistance markers were used. The resistant starch matrix acts as a physical barrier, preventing premature release and reducing environmental escape risk. Overall, the system poses minimal biosafety risk.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): Microencapsulation significantly enhanced the survival of L. casei and B. animalis in simulated gastric juice (7.30–7.98 Log CFU/mL) and simulated intestinal juice (7.26–7.89 Log CFU/mL). After 28 days of cold storage in apple juice, viable counts remained high: 7.53 Log CFU/mL for RSL, 6.98 Log CFU/mL for RSB, and 7.46 Log CFU/mL for RSLB. This confirms that the resistant starch matrix effectively protects probiotics during processing, storage, and gastrointestinal transit, enabling targeted delivery to the colon for metabolic and immunomodulatory benefits.

E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): No evidence of antibacterial activity reported; the strain's effect is indirect via microbiome modulation.
E_B_mechanism_desc (产氧机制描述): Not applicable (no oxygen-producing enzyme or mechanism reported)
E_B_crit_evidence (标准B_依据): No evidence of oxygenation activity; not a feature of this strain.
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Nicotinic acid and hypoxanthine have well-documented anti-inflammatory effects in the intestine. The strain increases their levels, which may modulate host immune responses and reduce inflammation.
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Nicotinic acid and hypoxanthine are known to support intestinal barrier integrity and promote epithelial health. The strain's metabolites may enhance tissue repair and mucosal healing.
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Bs29784 produces and elevates hypoxanthine and nicotinic acid in the gut. These metabolites serve as cross-feeding substrates for beneficial microbes (e.g., Ruminococcaceae, Lachnospiraceae), promoting a healthier microbial ecosystem.
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (natural strain, no kill-switch or auxotrophy reported)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; not an opportunistic pathogen; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no horizontal gene transfer risk mentioned; safe for poultry use
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Feed matrix provides physical confinement; spores are stable but not encapsulated in a controlled-release system
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Bacillus subtilis 29784 is considered safe for animal consumption (GRAS status). It does not pose significant pathogenic or environmental risks. No genetic modifications or antibiotic resistance genes are reported, and its effects are limited to the intestinal tract.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): Supplementation with Bacillus subtilis 29784 significantly altered the ileal microbiome by reducing Enterobacteriaceae and Lactobacillaceae, while enriching beneficial taxa such as Ruminococcaceae, Lachnospiraceae, and Clostridiales vadinBB60. It increased levels of hypoxanthine and nicotinic acid in the ileum, which are associated with anti-inflammatory effects and improved intestinal barrier function. These changes suggest enhanced intestinal health and metabolic regulation, supporting gut homeostasis and tissue repair in broilers.

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 5.5–6.5; tolerates vaginal pH (4.0–5.0); utilizes glucose and other carbohydrates as carbon sources; dependent on host-derived nutrients in vivo
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~1–2 hours in vitro; stable colonization in vaginal mucosa in vivo over 12-week period
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Vaginal mucosa, periurethral region
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competes with uropathogens (e.g., E. coli) for adhesion sites and nutrients; promotes symbiosis with host microbiome by restoring lactic acid-producing flora
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to moderate osmotic stress and low pH; stable during lyophilization and rehydration; resistant to shear stress in suppository formulation
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Exopolysaccharides (EPS), cell wall integrity proteins
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Lactobacillus spp. are facultative anaerobes that thrive in the acidic vaginal environment. They grow optimally at human body temperature and utilize available sugars from host secretions. These strains colonize the vaginal mucosa effectively and maintain long-term presence, contributing to microbial homeostasis.
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): None (Natural strains used; no genetic modification reported)
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High chromosomal stability; no plasmid-based systems used; minimal metabolic burden; long-term in vivo persistence observed
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in vaginal suppository matrix; no degradation or leakage of viability
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): No genetic engineering was performed. The strains used are naturally occurring, non-modified probiotics selected for their known safety and efficacy in vaginal colonization and UTI prevention.
S_microbial_signals (微生物信号): ["Quorum sensing (AHL, AI-2) – inferred from competitive exclusion"]
S_host_signals (宿主信号): ["Proteases (e.g., MMPs in inflamed tissue)", "Cytokines (e.g., IL-1β, TNF-α during inflammation)"]
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): FNR promoter (hypoxia), PTS transporter (glucose), Mucin-binding adhesins (pH/attachment)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Threshold-based activation: lactic acid production triggered when pH rises above 5.0; adhesion activated when glucose levels are sufficient; no explicit logic gates reported
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): Lactobacillus spp. sense changes in vaginal pH and nutrient availability (e.g., glucose) to regulate metabolic activity and adhesion. They respond to host inflammatory signals and microbial competition, enabling adaptive colonization and antimicrobial secretion only when pathogenic threats are detected.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Type I secretion (lactic acid), Type II secretion (bacteriocins), Vesicles (exosomes-like particles)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent: 10^8–10^10 CFU per suppository; frequency: daily to twice weekly; controlled by formulation and delivery schedule
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Highly compatible with vaginal suppository matrix; maintains viability and controlled release over 12 weeks
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Lactobacillus spp. inhibit uropathogens via lactic acid production (lowers pH), hydrogen peroxide secretion, and bacteriocin release. They also prevent pathogen adhesion to epithelial cells and disrupt biofilm formation.
E_A_agent_material (抗菌因子_相关物质): Lactic acid, Hydrogen peroxide, Bacteriocins (e.g., reuterin, lactocin)
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): Lactobacillus rhamnosus GR1 and L. reuteri RC14 significantly reduced UTI recurrence (RR 0.684, 95% CI 0.438–0.929). Lactic acid and bacteriocins inhibit E. coli adhesion and biofilm formation without harming host cells.
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Lactobacillus spp. non-specifically activate innate immune responses by stimulating epithelial cells and immune cells to secrete anti-inflammatory cytokines (e.g., IL-10) and modulate Toll-like receptor signaling.
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): By reducing inflammation and pathogen load, Lactobacillus spp. create a favorable environment for epithelial regeneration and barrier restoration in the urogenital tract.
E_D_repair_material (修复因子_相关物质): Growth factors (e.g., EGF-like molecules), Mucin production
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Auxotrophy (natural requirement for host nutrients), No antibiotic resistance genes reported
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no evidence of opportunistic infection; no horizontal gene transfer reported; minimal environmental escape risk due to host dependency
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Physical confinement via vaginal suppository prevents systemic dissemination
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Lactobacillus spp. used in this study are GRAS (Generally Recognized As Safe) organisms. They are non-pathogenic, non-invasive, and do not persist outside the host. No adverse events were reported in clinical trials, and they are naturally part of the human microbiome.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): Meta-analysis of 6 RCTs (n=620) showed pooled risk ratio of recurrent UTI at 0.684 (95% CI 0.438–0.929, p<0.001), indicating a 31.6% reduction in recurrence. Lactobacillus rhamnosus GR1 and L. reuteri RC14 demonstrated the highest efficacy. Suppositories were well-tolerated with no major side effects.

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 6.3; requires MRS broth with carbon sources and amino acids; dependent on host metabolites in gut environment
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Growth rate: 24 h in MRS broth; doubling time not specified; in vitro growth confirmed; in vivo homeostasis not assessed
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gastrointestinal tract (GIT), particularly colon; targeted delivery to large intestine via slowly digestible starch
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Potential symbiosis with intestinal microbiota; prebiotic effect via fermentable dietary fiber; no competition or disruption reported
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): High tolerance to acid (pH 2.0), bile salts (3% w/v), and heat (60°C for 15 min); enhanced survival in encapsulated form
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Porous maize starch granules (protection via physical confinement)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Lactobacillus plantarum 299v is a facultative anaerobe capable of growing in MRS broth at 37°C. It exhibits strong acid and bile tolerance, especially when encapsulated in porous maize starch. The strain is adapted to the gastrointestinal environment and maintains viability under harsh conditions, making it suitable for oral delivery. Its growth is supported by carbon sources and amino acids in the medium, and it shows enhanced stability during freeze-drying and processing.
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 该研究未对Lactobacillus plantarum 299v进行基因改造。其功能依赖于天然生理特性，通过物理包埋于改性玉米淀粉中实现保护和递送，无遗传编程或调控元件。
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 该系统未设计任何感知模块或逻辑电路。其功能基于物理屏障保护，而非响应环境信号进行动态调控。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Passive release via starch degradation in the colon
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Controlled by release kinetics of porous starch matrix; no active dosage regulation
E_material_match (材料匹配性): High compatibility with porous maize starch; allows sustained release in large intestine
