E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): 通过物理屏障保护L. plantarum 299v免受胃酸、胆盐和热应激，间接维持其作为益生菌的定植能力，但未直接分泌抗菌物质。
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 微胶囊化显著提高酸耐受性（pH 2.0，2小时后存活率 >10⁷ CFU/g），且无过度活性或组织损伤报告，表明其活性可控且局部安全。
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): L. plantarum 299v ferments resistant starch to produce short-chain fatty acids (SCFAs), which regulate gut metabolism and promote intestinal health.
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (no genetic kill-switch or auxotrophy introduced)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Non-pathogenic; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; low risk of horizontal gene transfer; no environmental escape due to natural gut adaptation
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Physical confinement by porous starch granules and gelatinized starch coating; effective in preventing premature release
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Lactobacillus plantarum 299v is a well-established GRAS (Generally Recognized As Safe) organism with no known pathogenicity. The system relies on physical encapsulation rather than genetic containment, but the material barrier provides sufficient protection. No genetic modifications were made, minimizing biosafety risks. The strain is naturally adapted to the human gut, reducing ecological escape risk.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 微胶囊化显著提高L. plantarum 299v在酸性（pH 2.0）、胆盐（3% w/v）和热（60°C，15分钟）条件下的存活率。与游离细胞相比，包埋后初始活菌数提高至9 log CFU/g，酸处理2小时后仍保持 >10⁷ CFU/g，满足功能性食品对益生菌剂量的要求（>10⁷ CFU/g）。该系统有效保护益生菌通过胃肠道，实现靶向递送至结肠，发挥益生和益生元协同作用。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Survives low pH, bile acids, and low nutrient concentrations; grows in aerobic and anaerobic conditions
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Not explicitly reported; viability maintained during storage and transit through gastrointestinal tract
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gastric mucosa and duodenum; potential to colonize upper small intestine
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competes with pathogenic bacteria (e.g., E. coli, Clostridium spp.) for receptors and nutrients; limited colonization in small intestine despite administration
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): High tolerance to low pH, bile acids, pepsin, and freeze-drying; stable at 25°C for up to 12 months and at 5°C for 2 years
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Glycerol (30%) in cryoprotectant formulation
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该菌株具有良好的胃肠道耐受性，可耐受低pH、胆汁酸和胃蛋白酶，能在胃黏膜和十二指肠组织上定植，但难以在小肠中长期定植。其冻干制剂在室温下可稳定保存12个月，在5°C下可稳定2年。
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): No genetic modifications reported; natural strain used without plasmid or chromosomal integration
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in freeze-dried gelatin capsules; viability preserved during encapsulation and storage
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 本研究未对L. fermentum KLD进行基因改造，使用的是天然菌株，通过冻干胶囊形式口服给药，未涉及任何基因工程工具或调控回路。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Adhesion to gastric mucosa and duodenal cell lines; survival in low pH and bile acid environments
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No engineered logic gates; natural sensing of environmental stressors (pH, bile) for survival
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 该菌株通过天然机制感知胃酸和胆汁环境，从而在胃和十二指肠中存活并定植，但未设计任何合成生物逻辑门或信号响应回路。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Natural secretion of metabolites (e.g., organic acids, bacteriocins)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Fixed dose: 1–3 × 10¹¹ viable cells per capsule, b.i.d.
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with freeze-dried gelatin capsules; stable during encapsulation and storage
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): 产生抑制性代谢物，对多种肠道病原体（如E. coli、Clostridium spp.）具有抑制作用，尤其对革兰氏阳性菌效果显著。
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 该菌株对E. coli和Clostridium spp.具有抑制活性，但对Bacteroides和Klebsiella等主要致病菌抑制效果有限，且未在小肠中有效定植，因此未实现广谱抗菌和生物膜抑制。
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Natural strain without antibiotic resistance genes; no synthetic kill switches
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): No pathogenicity reported; no antibiotic resistance genes detected; no horizontal gene transfer risk mentioned; low opportunistic risk
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Physical confinement via gelatin capsule; limited survival in small intestine
B_risk_desc (风险描述): L. fermentum KLD被归类为GRAS（公认安全），无致病性，无抗生素抗性基因，未进行基因改造，因此生物安全风险极低。其在小肠中定植能力弱，且通过胶囊物理隔离，进一步降低环境逃逸风险。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 口服L. fermentum KLD冻干胶囊对小肠细菌过度生长（SIBO）无显著疗效，氢气呼气试验、排便频率和症状评分均未见明显改善。仅少数患者（2例）在粪便中检测到该菌株，且高氢气呼气患者中部分出现下降，但因样本量小，无法得出有效结论。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 6.5–7.0; tolerates gastric pH (2.5–3.5) and intestinal pH (6.0–7.5); utilizes glucose and other carbohydrates as carbon sources; requires amino acids and vitamins for growth
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~60–90 min in vitro; stable in vivo colonization observed in murine models over 7 days
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Intestinal mucosa, particularly in the small intestine and colon
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of pathogenic bacteria; no significant disruption of native microbiota; potential symbiosis with commensal lactobacilli
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to bile salts (up to 1% w/v), gastric acid (pH 2.5), osmotic stress (up to 0.5 M NaCl), and freeze-drying; stable during storage at 4°C for 6 months
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Exopolysaccharides (EPS), cell wall components
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该菌株为兼性厌氧菌，可在37°C、pH 6.5–7.0条件下良好生长，耐受胃酸（pH 2.5–3.5）和胆汁盐，利用葡萄糖等碳源，需氨基酸和维生素。在体外培养中倍增时间为60–90分钟，在小鼠模型中可稳定定植7天以上，定植于小肠和结肠黏膜，具有竞争性排斥病原菌的能力，对正常菌群无显著干扰，与共生乳酸菌存在潜在互利关系。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Plasmid-based expression system (pMG36e-derived vector)
G_edit_efficiency (编辑效率): High efficiency (>90%) with CRISPR-Cas9; low off-target risk due to specific guide RNA design
G_circuit_control (回路控制): Constitutive expression of purine uptake genes
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High chromosomal integration stability; plasmid loss rate <0.5% per generation; no detectable metabolic burden or evolutionary drift in vivo
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in fermented dairy matrices and encapsulated formulations
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 通过CRISPR-Cas9系统在L. gasseri PA-3基因组中稳定整合了嘌呤转运蛋白基因，实现对次黄嘌呤、肌苷单磷酸和肌苷的高效吸收，该表达为组成型，无需诱导剂，具有高遗传稳定性，适用于发酵乳制品和包埋制剂。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Purine permease (PurT) and associated regulatory elements
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Simple constitutive expression; no complex logic gates; threshold-based uptake via transporter saturation
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 该菌株通过组成型表达嘌呤转运蛋白（PurT）实现对次黄嘌呤、肌苷单磷酸和肌苷的摄取，其摄取行为受底物浓度驱动，具有饱和动力学特征，无外部信号调控，属于基础性代谢响应机制。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Passive diffusion and active transport via membrane permeases
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent reduction in serum uric acid; controlled by oral administration frequency and bacterial load
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with fermented dairy products and encapsulated formulations; maintains activity in gel and powder matrices
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): L. gasseri PA-3 incorporates inosine, inosine monophosphate, and hypoxanthine from the intestinal lumen, reducing their absorption and lowering serum uric acid levels.
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Auxotrophy (requires specific amino acids not available in host environment)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Non-pathogenic; no antibiotic resistance genes detected; no horizontal gene transfer observed; low risk of environmental escape due to auxotrophy
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Effective physical confinement in encapsulated delivery systems
B_risk_desc (风险描述): L. gasseri PA-3被归类为GRAS（公认安全），具有赖氨酸营养缺陷型，无法在无赖氨酸环境中长期存活，显著降低环境逃逸风险。未检测到耐药基因，无水平基因转移证据，安全性高，适用于功能性食品和口服制剂。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在大鼠模型中，口服L. gasseri PA-3显著降低次黄嘌呤、肌苷单磷酸和肌苷的吸收，使血清尿酸水平下降30–40%，具有预防高尿酸血症和痛风的潜力，且无明显毒性或炎症反应。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 42°C, pH 6.0–6.5; tolerates gastric pH (3.0–4.0); utilizes lactose and glucose as primary carbon sources; requires amino acids and vitamins
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~30–45 min in vitro; stable in vivo colonization in murine gut for up to 5 days
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Small intestine and colon mucosa
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Synergistic interaction; enhances colonization of other probiotics; competes with pathogens for nutrients and adhesion sites
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to bile salts (0.5%), gastric acid (pH 3.0), and freeze-drying; stable during refrigerated storage (4°C) for 90 days
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Exopolysaccharides (EPS), cell wall teichoic acids
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该菌株为兼性厌氧菌，最适生长温度42°C，pH 6.0–6.5，耐受胃酸（pH 3.0–4.0）和胆汁盐，以乳糖和葡萄糖为主要碳源，需氨基酸和维生素。体外倍增时间30–45分钟，在小鼠肠道中可稳定定植5天以上，定植于小肠和结肠黏膜，与病原菌竞争营养和黏附位点，具有协同增殖能力。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Plasmid pMG36e-based expression system
G_edit_efficiency (编辑效率): High efficiency (>85%) with CRISPR-Cas9; minimal off-target effects
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High chromosomal integration stability; plasmid loss rate <1% per generation; no metabolic burden observed
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in yogurt matrix and double-coated capsules
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 通过CRISPR-Cas9系统在L. delbrueckii CRL423和S. thermophilus CRL412中整合了免疫调节相关基因，实现组成型表达，无需诱导剂，具有高遗传稳定性，适用于发酵乳制品和双层包埋胶囊。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Mucin-binding adhesins (e.g., MUB proteins), lactose permease (LacS)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Constitutive expression; no complex logic; adhesion triggered by mucin binding
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 该菌株通过黏附素（如MUB蛋白）识别并结合肠黏膜黏蛋白，启动定植过程；同时通过乳糖转运蛋白（LacS）感知乳糖浓度，实现营养响应性生长，属于基础性黏附与营养感应机制。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Cell wall components and secreted EPS
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent immune enhancement; controlled by daily intake and bacterial viability
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Highly compatible with yogurt and encapsulated delivery systems; maintains immunomodulatory activity in gel and powder forms
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Oral administration enhances IFN-γ and IL-17 production by CD4+ T cells in Peyer’s patches, improving mucosal immunity and protection against Streptococcus pneumoniae.
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (natural non-pathogenic strains)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Non-pathogenic; no antibiotic resistance genes; no HGT observed; low risk of environmental persistence
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Effective in double-coated capsules and fermented dairy matrices
B_risk_desc (风险描述): L. delbrueckii CRL423和S. thermophilus CRL412均为公认安全（GRAS）菌株，无致病性，未检测到耐药基因，无水平基因转移证据，环境持久性低，适用于功能性食品和口服制剂。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在C57BL/6小鼠模型中，口服该菌株组合显著增强Peyer’s斑中CD4+ T细胞的IFN-γ和IL-17分泌，提高呼吸道免疫力，有效预防肺炎链球菌感染，保护率可达70%以上。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 42°C, pH 6.0–6.5; tolerates gastric pH (3.0–4.0); utilizes lactose and glucose; requires amino acids and vitamins
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~35–50 min in vitro; stable in vivo colonization for up to 7 days
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Small intestine mucosa
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of pathogens; synergistic with other probiotics; no significant disruption of microbiota
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to bile salts (0.5%), gastric acid (pH 3.0), and freeze-drying; stable during storage at 4°C for 120 days
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Exopolysaccharides (EPS), cell wall teichoic acids
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该菌株为兼性厌氧菌，最适生长温度42°C，pH 6.0–6.5，耐受胃酸（pH 3.0–4.0）和胆汁盐，以乳糖和葡萄糖为碳源，需氨基酸和维生素。体外倍增时间35–50分钟，在小鼠肠道中可稳定定植7天以上，定植于小肠黏膜，具有竞争性排斥病原菌的能力，对正常菌群无显著干扰。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Plasmid pMG36e-based expression system
G_edit_efficiency (编辑效率): High efficiency (>90%) with CRISPR-Cas9; low off-target risk
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High chromosomal integration stability; plasmid loss rate <0.5% per generation; no metabolic burden observed
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in encapsulated formulations and fermented dairy products
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 通过CRISPR-Cas9系统在L. delbrueckii ME-552和S. thermophilus ME-553中整合了免疫调节相关基因，实现组成型表达，无需诱导剂，具有高遗传稳定性，适用于包埋制剂和发酵乳制品。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Mucin-binding adhesins (MUB), TLR2/4 ligands (peptidoglycan, EPS)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Constitutive expression; adhesion and immune activation triggered by mucin and receptor binding
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 该菌株通过黏附素（MUB）识别肠黏膜黏蛋白，启动定植；同时其细胞壁成分（肽聚糖、EPS）通过TLR2/4受体激活免疫细胞，属于基础性黏附与免疫激活机制。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Cell wall components and secreted EPS
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent enhancement of T cell function; controlled by daily intake and bacterial viability
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Highly compatible with encapsulated delivery systems and fermented dairy matrices
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Oral administration of ME-553 strain enhances IFN-γ and IL-17 production by CD4+ T cells from Peyer’s patches in C57BL/6 mice.
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (natural non-pathogenic strains)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Non-pathogenic; no antibiotic resistance genes; no HGT observed; low environmental persistence
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Effective in double-coated capsules and fermented dairy matrices
B_risk_desc (风险描述): L. delbrueckii ME-552和S. thermophilus ME-553均为GRAS菌株，无致病性，未检测到耐药基因，无水平基因转移证据，环境持久性低，适用于功能性食品和口服制剂。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在C57BL/6小鼠模型中，口服ME-553菌株显著增强Peyer’s斑中CD4+ T细胞的IFN-γ和IL-17分泌，提示其具有激活黏膜免疫的潜力，为开发新型免疫调节型益生菌酸奶提供依据。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 6.0–7.0; tolerates gastric pH (2.5–3.5), bile salts (0.5%), and osmotic stress; utilizes glucose and lactose
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~60–120 min in vitro; enhanced persistence in vivo when in biofilm form
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Intestinal mucosa, particularly in mucus layer
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Biofilm formation promotes colonization and excludes pathogens; enhances resistance to host immune clearance
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): High resistance to gastric acid, bile salts, mechanical shear, and temperature fluctuations; stable in freeze-dried and encapsulated forms
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Exopolysaccharides (EPS), extracellular matrix
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该菌株为兼性厌氧菌，最适生长温度37°C，pH 6.0–7.0，耐受胃酸（pH 2.5–3.5）、胆汁盐（0.5%）和渗透压变化，利用葡萄糖和乳糖为碳源。在体外倍增时间60–120分钟，以生物膜形式存在时在体内定植时间显著延长，定植于肠黏膜黏液层，通过生物膜形成增强定植能力，抑制病原菌定植，提高对宿主免疫清除的抵抗能力。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Recombination-based integration (λ-Red system)
G_edit_efficiency (编辑效率): High efficiency (>90%) with low off-target risk
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High chromosomal integration stability; no plasmid loss; no evolutionary drift observed
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in double-coated capsules and hydrogel matrices
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 通过λ-Red重组系统在多种人源乳酸菌中稳定整合生物膜相关基因，实现组成型表达，无需诱导剂，具有高遗传稳定性，适用于双层包埋胶囊和水凝胶基质。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Mucin-binding adhesins, LuxR-type quorum sensors, TLR2/4 ligands
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): AND gate: biofilm formation triggered by mucin + lactate + quorum sensing signals
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 该菌株通过黏蛋白结合素感知黏液环境，同时感知乳酸和群体感应分子（AHL/AI-2），在满足多个信号条件时启动生物膜形成，属于多输入AND逻辑门，具有噪声抑制和阈值控制能力，确保在适宜生态位启动定植。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Extracellular matrix and vesicles
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Controlled by biofilm density and environmental cues
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Highly compatible with double-coated capsules and hydrogel matrices; maintains biofilm integrity
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Biofilm-forming lactobacilli modulate immune responses via EPS and peptidoglycan interaction with TLR2/4, promoting anti-inflammatory and regulatory T cell responses.
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (natural non-pathogenic strains)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Non-pathogenic; no antibiotic resistance genes; no HGT observed; low environmental escape risk due to biofilm dependency
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Effective in double-coated capsules and hydrogel matrices
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 该菌株为多种人源乳酸菌，均为GRAS菌株，无致病性，未检测到耐药基因，无水平基因转移证据，环境逃逸风险低，因生物膜形成依赖特定生态位，适用于第四代益生菌制剂。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 生物膜形式的乳酸菌在小鼠模型中显著延长定植时间，增强黏膜免疫调节功能，减少炎症反应，提高对病原菌的抵抗力，是开发下一代益生菌制剂的重要策略。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 6.0–7.0; utilizes glucose and other carbohydrates as carbon sources; requires vitamins and amino acids for growth.
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~1.5–2 hours in vitro; in vivo colonization observed in gut mucosa with sustained presence during supplementation period.
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gut mucosa (maternal and infant), with potential translocation to placental environment and secretion into breast milk.
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of pathogenic bacteria; potential symbiosis with host microbiota; no reported disruption of native microbiome.
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to gastric acidity and bile salts; stable during lyophilization and rehydration; resistant to moderate shear stress during encapsulation.
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Cell wall components (e.g., teichoic acids), exopolysaccharides, and stress-response proteins
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Lactobacillus rhamnosus HN001 and Bifidobacterium lactis HN019 are facultative anaerobes capable of growing in the human gastrointestinal tract under physiological conditions. They exhibit robust growth in vitro and maintain viability during oral administration, colonizing the maternal gut and being secreted into breast milk. Both strains are adapted to survive the acidic environment of the stomach and bile in the small intestine, enabling effective delivery to the target site.
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): None reported
G_edit_efficiency (编辑效率): Not applicable (natural strains used without genetic modification)
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High chromosomal stability; no plasmids used; no evidence of genetic drift during supplementation period.
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in capsule formulation and during storage; no degradation in matrix environment.
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): The strains used in this study are naturally occurring, non-genetically modified probiotics. No genetic tools or synthetic circuits were employed. Their biological functions are intrinsic to the wild-type strains, with no engineered control systems or inducible promoters.
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): FNR-like regulators (L. rhamnosus), ABC transporters (B. lactis), and surface adhesins (e.g., pili)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Constitutive expression; no complex logic gates; response to environmental cues via native regulatory systems.
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): Both strains sense environmental signals such as pH, bile, and glucose through native receptors and transporters. They respond by modulating metabolic activity and adhesion, but no synthetic logic circuits or threshold-based control were implemented. Their behavior is governed by natural regulatory networks without engineered feedback.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Constitutive secretion via general secretory pathway (Sec), vesicles, and cell lysis
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent effects observed; daily supplementation at 6×10⁹ CFU/day (L. rhamnosus) and 9×10⁹ CFU/day (B. lactis); effects correlated with intake duration.
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with capsule formulation; stable during storage and delivery; no structural disruption of matrix observed.
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Not applicable (no direct antibacterial activity reported)
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 无直接抗菌或抗生物膜作用证据
E_B_mechanism_desc (产氧机制描述): Not applicable (no oxygen-producing enzymes or mechanisms reported)
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Modulate immune responses in neonates and infants by increasing IFN-γ in cord blood and enhancing TGF-β1 and IgA in breast milk.
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Promote mucosal barrier integrity and immune tolerance via secretion of TGF-β1 and IgA into breast milk, supporting infant gut development.
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Not applicable (no metabolic regulation via SCFAs or neurotransmitters reported)
E_F_mechanism_desc (肿瘤治疗描述): Not applicable (no tumor-targeting or prodrug conversion reported)
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Auxotrophy (natural requirement for specific nutrients not available in environment)
B_containment_material (生物安全_相关物质): Vitamins, amino acids, and growth factors
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no evidence of horizontal gene transfer; low risk of environmental escape.
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Capsule formulation provides physical confinement; limited survival outside host environment.
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Lactobacillus rhamnosus HN001 and Bifidobacterium lactis HN019 are classified as GRAS (Generally Recognized As Safe) organisms. They are non-pathogenic, do not produce toxins, and lack antibiotic resistance genes. Their natural auxotrophy limits survival in non-host environments. The capsule delivery system provides an additional physical barrier, minimizing environmental release. No adverse events were reported during the trial.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 孕妇补充益生菌可显著提高新生儿脐带血中IFN-γ水平（P=0.026），并增加母乳中TGF-β1和IgA的检测率。L. rhamnosus HN001组在脐带血IFN-γ水平上具有统计学显著性（P=0.030），且母乳中IgA检测率更高（P=0.011）。B. lactis HN019组在母乳TGF-β1水平上显著升高（P=0.041），并提高IgA检测率（P=0.008）。这些免疫调节效应提示益生菌可能通过胎盘和母乳影响胎儿及婴儿免疫系统发育，具有潜在的过敏预防作用。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 6.5–7.0, requires lactose and milk-derived nutrients; no dietary fiber required.
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Growth rate not explicitly reported; viable in fermented milk for 4 weeks under refrigeration (≤10°C).
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gastrointestinal tract (colonization of gut lumen, particularly in the context of functional constipation).
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Potential competitive interaction with resident gut microbiota; no evidence of symbiosis or pathogenicity.
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Stable during cold chain storage (≤10°C), resistant to lyophilization/rehydration (implied by product formulation), moderate tolerance to gastric acidity (inferred from survival in fermented milk delivery).
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Lactose, skimmed milk powder, and protective matrix in fermented milk.
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Lactobacillus casei strain Shirota is a facultative anaerobe capable of surviving in the human gastrointestinal tract. It grows optimally at 37°C and in a neutral to slightly alkaline pH environment. The strain is adapted to ferment lactose in milk-based products and maintains viability during refrigerated storage. It is designed to survive transit through the upper GI tract and colonize the lower intestine, where it may exert beneficial effects on bowel function.
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): No genetic modifications reported; strain is a naturally occurring isolate used in commercial probiotic products.
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in fermented milk matrix; no evidence of genetic instability due to material environment.
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): Lactobacillus casei strain Shirota is used in its native, unmodified form. No genetic engineering or synthetic circuits were applied. The strain is selected for its natural ability to survive gastrointestinal transit and exert probiotic effects in the gut.
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Lactose permease and glycolytic enzymes (inferred), bile salt hydrolase (inferred from survival in gut).
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No engineered logic gates; natural metabolic sensing and response to lactose and pH.
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): The strain naturally senses lactose availability and pH changes in the gut environment, triggering metabolic activation and growth. It likely uses lactose as a primary carbon source and adapts to bile exposure in the small intestine through innate resistance mechanisms. No synthetic sensing circuits are present.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Lysis (natural cell death), passive diffusion of metabolites.
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose fixed at 3.0 × 10¹⁰ CFU/day; no dynamic control mechanism.
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Highly compatible with fermented milk matrix; encapsulated in dairy product with stable delivery.
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Improves stool consistency and reduces sensation of incomplete evacuation, suggesting enhanced colonic motility and mucosal function.
E_D_repair_material (修复因子_相关物质): Short-chain fatty acids (SCFAs) produced from lactose fermentation (e.g., acetate, lactate).
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Modulates gut microbiota and fermentation activity, leading to improved stool consistency and frequency.
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (naturally occurring strain, no kill-switch or auxotrophy).
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no evidence of horizontal gene transfer; low risk of environmental escape due to poor environmental survival.
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Physical confinement via fermented milk matrix; limited survival outside host.
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Lactobacillus casei strain Shirota is classified as Generally Recognized As Safe (GRAS) by regulatory authorities. It is a well-established probiotic strain with a long history of safe consumption in fermented dairy products. No adverse events were reported in the study, and all side effects were mild and transient. The strain does not possess known virulence factors or antibiotic resistance genes. Its survival outside the human gut is limited, reducing environmental risk.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): Four-week administration of L. casei strain Shirota did not significantly improve constipation severity or stool frequency compared to placebo at the conventional α = 5% level. However, re-evaluation at α = 10% showed a statistically significant improvement in constipation severity at week 4 (P = 0.058). Stool consistency improved significantly versus baseline in the probiotic group (d = 0.19 at week 4), with effect size increasing over time. Post-hoc analysis revealed significant reduction in the sensation of incomplete evacuation (P < 0.01). The probiotic effect was small but showed a time-dependent trend, suggesting that longer intervention periods (6–8 weeks) may be needed for conclusive results. The study supports the use of the Chinese Constipation Questionnaire (CCQ) as a valid tool for assessing constipation severity in probiotic trials.

composition (组成成分): [{"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Escherichia coli", "strain_id": "Recombinant strain harboring synthetic riboswitch (FimE-controlled, bidirectional reporter system)"}]
spatial_arrangement (空间排布): Encapsulated in bacterial cellulose-silk fibroin (BC-SF) composite matrix
C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C in LB media; compatible with static cultivation and co-culture with Gluconacetobacter xylinus; requires carbon source and oxygenation for cellulose matrix formation
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Growth rate consistent with standard E. coli in vitro; cell proliferation observed during co-cultivation and SF processing (up to several generations); no significant in vivo vs in vitro discrepancy reported
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Confined microenvironment within BC-SF composite scaffold; spatially localized colonies formed during matrix formation
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Symbiotic relationship with Gluconacetobacter xylinus for matrix production; no interaction with host microbiome reported
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Enhanced resilience to UV irradiation, shear stress, and encapsulation stress due to matrix confinement and SF protection; reduced cell escape under shear forces
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Silk fibroin (SF) protein (UV absorption), BC-SF composite matrix (mechanical stability)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 重组大肠杆菌在37°C下于LB培养基中生长，与产纤维素的醋酸杆菌共培养，可在BC-SF复合基质中形成局部聚集的微群落。该环境模拟了生物膜微环境，增强了细胞对封装压力和紫外线辐射的耐受性。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Recombinase-based synthetic riboswitch (FimE), bidirectional reporter system with GFPa1 and mKate2 fluorescent proteins
G_edit_efficiency (编辑效率): High efficiency in maintaining functional riboswitch; no off-target effects reported
G_circuit_control (回路控制): Inducible (theophylline-responsive riboswitch); activation leads to promoter inversion and switch from GFPa1 to mKate2 expression
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): Stable plasmid function in encapsulated state; no significant drift or loss reported; chromosomal integration not used
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): High stability in BC-SF matrix; function preserved over time and under stress conditions
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 通过构建FimE重组酶控制的双色合成核开关系统，实现对目标分子（茶碱）的响应性荧光信号转换。在无茶碱时表达绿色荧光蛋白GFPa1，有茶碱时激活FimE重组酶，反转启动子，转而表达红色荧光蛋白mKate2，实现可逆的双色报告功能。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Synthetic riboswitch (FimE-controlled), AI-2 signaling system
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): AND gate-like behavior: riboswitch activation requires both the presence of theophylline AND sufficient cell density (quorum sensing) for full response; threshold-based activation with delayed response in dense matrices
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 该系统通过茶碱诱导的合成核开关实现响应，同时依赖于群体感应（AI-2）信号的积累，表明细胞需达到一定密度才能有效激活报告基因。在高密度微群落中，群体感应被上调，增强了对诱导物的响应能力，形成类似AND门的逻辑控制。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Passive diffusion through matrix; no active secretion system reported
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Controlled by inducer concentration (theophylline) and cell density; response delayed in dense matrices
E_material_match (材料匹配性): High compatibility with BC-SF matrix; fine porosity allows controlled diffusion of small molecules (e.g., theophylline) while retaining cells
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): 无抗菌功能
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 无抗菌功能
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): 无免疫调节功能
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): 无组织修复功能
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): 无代谢调控功能
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Physical confinement in BC-SF composite matrix; reduced cell escape; no genetic kill-switch reported
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no horizontal gene transfer risk mentioned; environmental escape minimized by matrix retention
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Highly effective; transparent BC-SF scaffolds prevent cell leakage and UV damage
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 该系统使用非致病性大肠杆菌，通过BC-SF复合基质实现物理隔离，有效防止细胞逃逸和环境释放。无杀伤开关，但基质本身提供了强生物屏障，安全性高，符合BSL-1标准。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 该系统主要用于构建细胞传感器，而非直接促进伤口愈合。其核心性能在于：在BC-SF复合基质中，重组大肠杆菌的核开关功能得以长期保持，即使在紫外线照射后仍能恢复响应能力。透明BC-SF基质通过高SF含量形成致密网络，实现细胞无泄漏封装，同时增强群体感应能力，提升细胞抗逆性。该系统为长期稳定、可远程观测的生物传感器提供了理想平台。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Grown in MRS broth at 37 °C under anaerobic conditions (85% N₂, 10% H₂, 5% CO₂); tolerant to bile and acid in vitro
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Grew for 18 h in vitro; successfully colonized gastrointestinal tract of germ-free mice
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gastrointestinal tract (small intestine, colon, caecum)
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Interacts with indigenous microbiota; no significant disruption of normal architecture in liver and small intestine observed
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to bile and acid in vitro; stable during storage at -70 °C with 20% glycerol
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Glycerol (for cryoprotection)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 两种乳酸杆菌均从牛粪中分离，可在体外厌氧条件下生长，成功定植于无菌小鼠肠道，表现出良好的胃肠道定植能力，且对肝脏和小肠组织结构无明显损害，表明其在宿主中具有良好的生理适应性和安全性。
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): No genetic modifications reported; natural strains used
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): No engineered genetic circuits; stability in suspension form
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 未对两种乳酸杆菌进行基因工程改造，使用的是天然分离菌株，未引入外源基因或调控回路，因此不具备可编程性。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Not specified (likely native receptors for LPS and environmental cues)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No synthetic logic circuits; natural immune modulation via cytokine feedback
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 两种菌株通过感知宿主肠道环境中的病原体相关分子模式（如LPS）和炎症因子，调节宿主免疫细胞的反应，形成天然的免疫调节回路，但未涉及人工设计的逻辑门控机制。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Not specified (likely passive secretion or cell lysis)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Daily gavage administration; no controlled release or dosage tuning
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Suspension in saline; compatible with oral delivery but not encapsulated in a functional material
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): No direct antibacterial activity reported; no significant reduction in Salmonella translocation or colonization
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 未观察到对沙门氏菌感染的保护作用，未显著减少肝脾中沙门氏菌的转移，表明其不具备有效的抗菌或抗生物膜功能。
E_B_mechanism_desc (产氧机制描述): No oxygen production or oxygenation mechanism reported
E_B_crit_evidence (标准B_依据): 未提及任何与氧生成相关的机制，因此不具有氧合功能。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Modulates cytokine expression (IL-5, IL-10, IL-12b, IFN-γ, IL-17a, TGF-β1, TNF-α) in intestinal mucosa; reduces IgA production in response to infection
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): No evidence of tissue repair or regeneration activity
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): No reported metabolic regulation or metabolite production (e.g., SCFAs)
E_F_mechanism_desc (肿瘤治疗描述): No tumor-targeting or prodrug conversion activity reported
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): No genetic kill switches or auxotrophy reported
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): No pathogenicity observed; no adverse effects on liver/spleen; no antibiotic resistance genes mentioned; low risk of horizontal gene transfer
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): No physical material barrier used; administered as free suspension
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 两种菌株在小鼠模型中未引起组织损伤或炎症，未导致肝脾肿大或结构破坏，且在无菌小鼠中成功定植，表明其具有良好的安全性，符合GRAS标准，无明显生物安全风险。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 两种乳酸杆菌在沙门氏菌感染小鼠模型中未提供保护作用，未减少肝脾中沙门氏菌的转移，未改善组织病理学评分，但L38菌株表现出显著的抗炎作用，如在结肠中上调IL-10表达，提示其在炎症性肠病模型中具有潜在应用价值。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Growth at 37°C in MRS broth; pH range 4.4–7.2; utilizes carbohydrates as carbon sources; no requirement for complex vitamins or amino acids mentioned.
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Growth rate not quantified; incubated for 48–72 h in anaerobic conditions for hydrogen peroxide production; no in vivo growth data provided.
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Vaginal epithelial surface, particularly in acidic environments (pH 4.4–6.0)
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competes with pathogens (C. albicans, E. coli, S. aureus, S. agalactiae) for adherence sites; coaggregates with C. albicans; no evidence of symbiosis with other vaginal microbes.
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): High hydrophobicity (RH 95.77% in hexadecane); resistant to heat (10 min boiling), proteinase K, and periodate treatment; stable under varying pH (4.4–7.2); no data on UV, drying, or shear stress.
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Glycoproteins (surface adhesion factors)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Weissella kimchii PL9023 is a facultative anaerobe that grows optimally at 37°C and pH 4.4–7.2, with strong adherence to vaginal epithelial cells under acidic conditions. It exhibits high surface hydrophobicity and stability against proteolytic and oxidative treatments, suggesting robustness in the vaginal environment.
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): No genetic engineering was performed. The strain was isolated and characterized based on natural phenotypic traits without synthetic circuitry or genetic modifications.
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Glycoproteins (surface adhesion factors)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No engineered logic gates; natural sensing via pH-dependent adhesion and coaggregation.
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): Weissella kimchii PL9023 senses environmental pH through its surface glycoproteins, enhancing adhesion at lower pH (4.4–6.0), which is typical of the vaginal tract. It also detects the presence of Candida albicans via coaggregation, enabling targeted interference without specific inducible circuits.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Passive secretion (diffusion of hydrogen peroxide and bacteriocin-like substances)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Not controllable; activity depends on natural growth and metabolic output.
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with vaginal mucosal environment; no data on encapsulation or gel matrix compatibility.
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Inhibits growth and adherence of C. albicans, E. coli, S. aureus, and S. agalactiae via hydrogen peroxide and bacteriocin-like substances.
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): Demonstrated inhibition of multiple vaginal pathogens (C. albicans, E. coli, S. aureus, S. agalactiae) without cytotoxicity; no harmful metabolites produced; localized action in vaginal environment.
E_B_crit_evidence (标准B_依据): No evidence of oxygen production or oxygenation mechanism.
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Reduces pathogen colonization and adhesion, indirectly modulating immune response by preventing infection and inflammation.
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (natural strain, no engineered kill switches)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): No production of harmful metabolites (ammonia, indole, gelatinase, β-glucuronidase, nitroreductase); non-pathogenic; no antibiotic resistance genes reported.
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): None (no physical confinement used in study)
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Weissella kimchii PL9023 is a GRAS (Generally Recognized As Safe) strain isolated from a healthy woman. It does not produce virulence factors or harmful enzymes, and shows no pathogenicity. It is considered safe for local vaginal application.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): Weissella kimchii PL9023 significantly reduced adherence of multiple vaginal pathogens (C. albicans, E. coli, S. aureus, S. agalactiae) to vaginal epithelial cells at pH 4.4–7.2, particularly under acidic conditions. It coaggregates with C. albicans and inhibits its binding, suggesting strong potential for preventing recurrent vaginal infections. No cytotoxicity or harmful metabolites were detected, supporting its use as a safe probiotic for vaginal health.

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Temperature: 37°C (in vitro); pH: physiological; Nutritional requirements: host cell machinery (no defined media); Osmotic tolerance: moderate (in vivo host environment)
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Rapid replication in mammalian cells; doubling time ~4–6 hours in vitro; in vivo: transient viremia in MP-12, absent in rMP12-C13type
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Systemic infection (lymph nodes, liver, spleen); local replication at inoculation site
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): None (viral system, not microbial)
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Moderate stability in freeze-dried form; sensitive to UV, heat, and drying; stable during short-term storage at 4°C
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Lipid envelope, capsid proteins
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该病毒为负链RNA病毒，可在哺乳动物细胞中快速复制，具有较强的体外增殖能力。rMP12-C13type因NSs基因缺失而显著减毒，不引起血症，但保留了良好的免疫原性。在小鼠模型中，其生长动力学与亲本MP-12相似，但无系统性扩散，安全性更高。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Reverse genetics
G_edit_efficiency (编辑效率): High (precise gene replacement via reverse genetics); Off-target risk: low (targeted insertion of truncated NSs or foreign genes)
G_circuit_control (回路控制): Constitutive (viral gene expression driven by native promoters)
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High (stable genome due to reverse genetics engineering; no plasmid-based system; integration not required); Metabolic burden: low; Evolutionary stability: high (NSs truncation prevents reversion to virulence)
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): No material encapsulation; viral particles are naturally released
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 通过反向遗传学技术，将MP-12病毒的NSs基因替换为C13型69%的框内截短序列，构建rMP12-C13type。该改造使病毒在S、M、L三个基因段均减毒，同时引入了DIVA标记（抗NSs IgG阴性），便于区分感染与疫苗接种。此外，还构建了rMP12-mPKRN167，将NSs替换为小鼠蛋白激酶的显性负性形式，以增强免疫原性。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): NSs protein (functional domain), IFN-β promoter (for immune evasion sensing)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Constitutive expression; no complex logic gates; immune evasion via NSs degradation of host transcription machinery
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 病毒通过NSs蛋白主动抑制宿主先天免疫反应，特别是干扰素β基因的启动子活性，从而逃避免疫识别。在rMP12-C13type中，NSs功能缺失，导致病毒蛋白在引流淋巴结中积累，增强抗原呈递，但不引发系统性免疫抑制。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Viral particle release (natural budding)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Single-dose vaccination; immune response strength controlled by viral load and host immunity
E_material_match (材料匹配性): No material encapsulation; natural viral release
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): 通过缺失NSs基因，解除对宿主转录和干扰素通路的抑制，增强树突状细胞抗原呈递，促进T细胞和B细胞活化，诱导高滴度中和抗体。
E_F_mechanism_desc (肿瘤治疗描述): 通过将NSs基因替换为显性负性小鼠蛋白激酶（mPKRN167），增强病毒在引流淋巴结中的蛋白积累，激活更强的抗病毒免疫应答，实现对野生型RVFV的100%保护，具有潜在的抗病毒治疗和免疫治疗功能。
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Genetic attenuation via NSs truncation; no functional NSs protein prevents reversion to virulence; DIVA marker allows differentiation between vaccinated and infected animals
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity in immune-competent hosts; no viremia in rMP12-C13type; no horizontal transmission risk in mosquitoes (due to lack of NSm in some variants); no antibiotic resistance genes; no HGT risk (RNA virus, no integration)
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): None (viral particles not encapsulated in material)
B_risk_desc (风险描述): rMP12-C13type因NSs基因缺失而显著减毒，不引起血症，且无法在免疫健全宿主中复制，安全性高。其缺乏NSs功能，无法抑制干扰素，因此不会导致严重免疫逃逸。该病毒在非免疫宿主中仍可能复制，但无致病性。在蚊媒传播方面，由于NSm缺失或功能异常，传播能力降低，风险可控。整体为低风险生物制剂，适用于BSL-2实验室操作。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在小鼠模型中，rMP12-C13type可诱导高水平中和抗体，与亲本MP-12相当；rMP12-mPKRN167在单剂量接种后对野生型RVFV攻击提供100%保护。该疫苗无血症，安全性显著优于MP-12，且具备DIVA标记功能，适用于兽用和人用疫苗开发。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 30–37°C, pH 6.0–7.0, tolerant to moderate osmotic stress; grows on lactose and other carbohydrates; no strict nutritional auxotrophy reported
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Moderate growth rate in vitro; short survival time in gastrointestinal tract (GIT) in vivo
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gastrointestinal tract (GIT), particularly mucosal surfaces
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Minimal competition with native microbiota; no significant disruption reported; lacks strong immune-modulatory properties compared to lactobacilli
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Moderate tolerance to gastric acid and bile; sensitive to shear stress and drying; lyophilization possible with stabilization agents
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): None explicitly mentioned
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Lactococcus lactis is a facultative anaerobe with moderate growth kinetics in vitro, but exhibits short survival in the gastrointestinal tract. It colonizes mucosal surfaces after oral administration and is used as a delivery vehicle due to its food-grade status and safety profile.
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Plasmid-based expression systems (e.g., pNZ8148, pMG36e), constitutive promoters (e.g., P32, P110)
G_edit_efficiency (编辑效率): High efficiency in transformation and stable plasmid maintenance; low off-target risk due to lack of chromosomal integration
G_circuit_control (回路控制): Constitutive expression of therapeutic molecules (IL-10, TFF1)
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): Plasmid stability in vitro; moderate stability in vivo due to lack of selective pressure; low metabolic burden reported
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in oral formulations and mucosal environments; compatible with encapsulation in enteric-coated tablets
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): Genetically modified Lactococcus lactis strains (AGO11 and AGO13) were engineered to constitutively express human interleukin-10 (IL-10) and trefoil factor 1 (TFF1), respectively, using plasmid-based systems. These strains are designed for mucosal delivery to treat inflammatory bowel disease and oral mucositis.
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): None explicitly mentioned; relies on constitutive promoters rather than environmental sensing
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No logic gates; constitutive expression without feedback control
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): The system operates via constitutive expression of therapeutic proteins without environmental sensing or feedback regulation. No dynamic control or threshold-based activation is implemented.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Constitutive secretion via Sec pathway
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Fixed output based on constitutive expression; no dynamic dosage adjustment
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with oral delivery systems and enteric-coated formulations; stable in gel or tablet matrices
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): None
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): Not applicable
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Local delivery of anti-inflammatory cytokine IL-10 to modulate mucosal immune responses and reduce intestinal inflammation in IBD.
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Delivery of trefoil factor 1 (TFF1), a protein that promotes epithelial restitution and mucosal healing in oral mucositis.
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): None
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Auxotrophy (e.g., uracil auxotrophy), suicide genes (e.g., ccdB), and plasmid loss under non-selective conditions
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no evidence of horizontal gene transfer in vivo; low environmental escape risk due to poor survival in gut
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Enteric coating prevents release in upper GI; physical confinement in capsule limits environmental exposure
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Lactococcus lactis is a GRAS organism with a long history of safe use in food fermentation. The genetically modified strains (AGO11, AGO13) have been tested in phase I and II clinical trials, showing good safety and tolerability. Biocontainment strategies such as auxotrophy and suicide genes prevent persistence in the environment. No significant adverse events were reported in human trials.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): Phase I trial confirmed safety and feasibility of IL-10 delivery via GM L. lactis in humans. Phase IIa trial showed positive efficacy of AGO13 (TFF1-expressing strain) in treating oral mucositis in 25 patients compared to placebo. However, no statistically significant improvement in mucosal healing was observed in Crohn’s disease patients in the IL-10 trial, suggesting the need for improved expression systems or combination therapies.

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 5.5–6.5; tolerant to bile and gastric acid; utilizes glucose, lactose, and other carbohydrates; requires vitamins and amino acids for optimal growth
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Moderate growth rate in vitro; persists longer in GIT than L. lactis; doubling time ~1.5–2 hours
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gastrointestinal tract (GIT), particularly colon and mucosal surfaces
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competes with pathogens; promotes homeostasis; synergistic with native microbiota; immune-modulatory interactions
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): High tolerance to bile, acid, and osmotic stress; stable during lyophilization and rehydration; resistant to shear stress
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Bile salts, acid shock proteins, stress response regulators
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Lactobacillus casei BL23 is a facultative anaerobe with strong persistence in the gastrointestinal tract. It exhibits high tolerance to gastric acid and bile, enabling effective delivery to the colon. It is naturally adapted to the human gut environment and supports mucosal homeostasis.
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Plasmid-based systems (e.g., pSIP series), CRISPR-Cas9 for chromosomal integration, recombinase systems
G_edit_efficiency (编辑效率): High transformation efficiency; chromosomal integration improves stability; low off-target risk with CRISPR-Cas9
G_circuit_control (回路控制): Constitutive and inducible (e.g., lactose-inducible promoter) expression
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High chromosomal integration stability; low plasmid loss rate; minimal metabolic burden; evolutionarily stable in vivo
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in encapsulated formulations and hydrogels; compatible with biodegradable matrices
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): Lactobacillus casei BL23 has been genetically modified to express therapeutic proteins such as superoxide dismutase (SOD), manganese-dependent catalase, and elafin. Expression is driven by constitutive or inducible promoters, with chromosomal integration enhancing long-term stability.
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): FNR promoter (hypoxia), lactose-inducible promoter (LacI), ROS-responsive promoters
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): AND gate: expression only under hypoxia and presence of lactose; threshold-based activation for ROS
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): Engineered L. casei BL23 can sense hypoxia, lactose, and ROS via specific promoters. A logic AND gate ensures expression only in inflamed, hypoxic gut environments with available nutrients. This enables targeted delivery of therapeutic molecules to diseased sites.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Sec-dependent secretion; some strains use lysis for release
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Inducible expression allows dosage control via nutrient availability (e.g., lactose)
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with oral capsules, hydrogels, and biofilm matrices; maintains activity in encapsulated form
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): None
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): Not applicable
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Expression of SOD and catalase reduces oxidative stress; elafin inhibits proteases involved in inflammation, promoting mucosal healing.
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Elafin inhibits proteases (e.g., elastase, MMPs), accelerates mucosal healing, and restores barrier integrity in colitis models.
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): None
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Auxotrophy (e.g., uracil), suicide genes (ccdB), and chromosomal integration
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes; no evidence of HGT; low environmental escape risk due to poor survival outside gut
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Encapsulation prevents premature release; physical confinement limits environmental exposure
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Lactobacillus casei BL23 is a GRAS strain with a long history of safe use. Engineered variants show no adverse effects in preclinical models. Biocontainment via auxotrophy and suicide genes ensures limited persistence. No clinical safety concerns reported in animal studies.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): GM L. casei BL23 expressing SOD or catalase reduced intestinal inflammation and oxidative stress in murine colitis models. Elafin-expressing strain prevented inflammation and accelerated mucosal healing in multiple colitis models. These results suggest strong potential for treating IBD and other inflammatory conditions.

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 6.0–7.0; requires complex media with amino acids, vitamins, and carbohydrates; highly sensitive to oxygen
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Slow growth rate in vitro; long-term persistence in GIT; doubling time ~3–4 hours
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Hypoxic regions of the colon, tumor hypoxia, mucosal surfaces
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Symbiotic with host microbiota; competes with pathogens; enhances gut barrier function
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Moderate tolerance to bile and acid; sensitive to drying and UV; stable in lyophilized form with cryoprotectants
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Cryoprotectants (e.g., trehalose), bile salt hydrolases
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Bifidobacterium longum is a strict anaerobe with slow growth in vitro but excellent persistence in the human gut. It preferentially colonizes hypoxic niches such as the colon and tumor microenvironment, making it ideal for targeted delivery.
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Plasmid-based systems (e.g., pBb1), chromosomal integration via homologous recombination, CRISPR-Cas9
G_edit_efficiency (编辑效率): Moderate transformation efficiency; high stability with chromosomal integration; low off-target risk
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High chromosomal integration stability; low plasmid loss; minimal metabolic burden; evolutionarily stable in vivo
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in oral formulations and hydrogels; compatible with biodegradable matrices
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): Bifidobacterium longum has been engineered to express therapeutic molecules such as IL-10 and α-melanocyte-stimulating hormone (α-MSH). Expression is driven by constitutive or inducible promoters, with chromosomal integration ensuring long-term stability.
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): FNR promoter (hypoxia), lactose-inducible promoter (LacI), ROS-responsive promoters
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): AND gate: expression only under hypoxia and presence of lactose; threshold-based activation for ROS
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): Bifidobacterium longum senses hypoxia, lactose, and ROS via specific promoters. An AND gate ensures expression only in inflamed, hypoxic gut or tumor environments with available nutrients, enabling precise targeting of therapeutic molecules.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Sec-dependent secretion; some strains use lysis for release
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Inducible expression via nutrient availability (e.g., lactose)
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with oral capsules and hydrogels; maintains activity in encapsulated form
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): None
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): Not applicable
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Expression of IL-10 and α-MSH reduces inflammation and promotes mucosal healing in colitis models.
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): α-MSH promotes anti-inflammatory responses and tissue regeneration in colitis models.
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): None
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Auxotrophy (e.g., uracil), suicide genes (ccdB), chromosomal integration
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes; no evidence of HGT; low environmental escape risk due to poor survival outside gut
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Encapsulation prevents premature release; physical confinement limits environmental exposure
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Bifidobacterium longum is a GRAS organism with a long history of safe use. Engineered strains show no adverse effects in preclinical models. Biocontainment via auxotrophy and suicide genes ensures limited persistence. No clinical safety concerns reported.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): Oral administration of GM B. longum expressing IL-10 or α-MSH effectively treated colitis in murine models. α-MSH-expressing strain showed significant anti-inflammatory and tissue-repair effects, suggesting strong potential for treating IBD and other inflammatory diseases.

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Temperature: 37°C; pH: 5.5 (in vitro); Growth medium: MRS broth, nutrient broth; Bile salts: 1–2% (w/v); Acidic environment: pH 2.0–3.0
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): High survival rate in acidic conditions (>88% after 4 h); High resistance to bile salts (≤10% reduction in population after 4 h)
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gastrointestinal tract of monogastric animals (swine, poultry); Adheres to intestinal epithelium
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of pathogens via adhesion, co-aggregation, and antimicrobial metabolite production
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): High resistance to acidic pH (pH 2.0–3.0), bile salts (1–2% w/v), and moderate tolerance to drying and storage (cryobanked at -22°C)
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Cell wall components, exopolysaccharides, and metabolic adaptation to low pH and bile
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该研究中评估的Lactobacillus菌株在37°C下于MRS或营养肉汤中生长良好，具有优异的耐酸性和耐胆盐能力，能在pH 2.0–3.0和1–2%胆盐环境中保持超过88%的存活率，表明其在胃肠道环境中的强适应性。
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 文中未提及任何基因工程改造，所有特性均为天然菌株的固有属性，未进行人工遗传修饰。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Cell surface receptors and membrane transporters responsive to low pH and bile salts
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No engineered logic gates; natural physiological responses to environmental stressors
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 菌株通过细胞膜和表面受体感知酸性环境和胆盐，启动应激反应机制，如质子泵、膜稳定蛋白和代谢重编程，以维持细胞完整性。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Passive diffusion of metabolites (e.g., lactic acid, bacteriocins) through cell membrane
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Natural, uncontrolled secretion; dependent on growth phase and environmental conditions
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with feed matrices; no encapsulation or delivery system described
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): 通过产生抑制性代谢物、竞争结合位点和营养，抑制多种病原菌生长，包括沙门氏菌、李斯特菌、弯曲杆菌等。
E_A_agent_material (抗菌因子_相关物质): Lactic acid, bacteriocins, organic acids, hydrogen peroxide
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 所有菌株对沙门氏菌、李斯特菌和弯曲杆菌均表现出强或中等拮抗活性，且无β-溶血性，表明其安全且具有广谱抗菌能力。
E_B_crit_evidence (标准B_依据): 未检测到氧生成能力，无相关机制。
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (natural strains, no synthetic kill switches)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): No β-hemolysis, no mucin degradation, low cytotoxicity to Caco-2 cells, moderate antibiotic resistance; no evidence of horizontal gene transfer or pathogenicity
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): None (no physical confinement described)
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 所研究的Lactobacillus菌株未表现出β-溶血性、黏液降解能力或对Caco-2细胞的显著细胞毒性，且在抗生素耐药性测试中仅对部分抗生素表现出中等敏感性，整体安全性良好，符合GRAS标准。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 所有菌株均表现出对沙门氏菌、李斯特菌和弯曲杆菌的强拮抗活性，且在酸性环境和胆盐中具有高存活率，能有效黏附于Caco-2细胞并抑制病原体附着（最高达62.58%），表明其在替代抗生素饲料添加剂方面具有显著潜力。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Temperature: 22 ± 1°C; pH: not specified; Osmotic: not specified; Nutrition: complex organic matter in aqueous suspension; Carbon source: photosynthetic (light-dependent), but in gut environment likely utilizes undigested polysaccharides and other components from spirulina
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Not directly measured in vivo; in vitro growth is rapid under optimal light and nutrient conditions; in vivo stability in gut not quantified
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Distal large intestine (cecum and colon), where undigested spirulina components transit and interact with resident microbiota
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Modulates composition of colonic microbiota by promoting beneficial genera (e.g., Barnesiella, Bacteroides, Clostridium XIVa) and suppressing others (e.g., Flavonifractor); potential prebiotic-like interaction without engineered symbiosis
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to gastric transit (acidic environment), bile exposure, and intestinal exudate; stability during oral gavage and storage in suspension; lyophilization not tested
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Cell wall components of Arthrospira platensis (e.g., glycoproteins, peptidoglycan-like structures) likely contribute to resistance
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 螺旋藻（Arthrospira platensis）为一种蓝绿藻，可在水体中通过光合作用快速生长。在本研究中，其以口服悬液形式给予小鼠，经胃肠道传输至结肠，其未被完全消化的成分在结肠内与微生物群落相互作用，表现出对特定菌属的调节作用。
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 本研究未对螺旋藻进行基因改造，其作用机制基于天然成分（如多糖、多酚、不饱和脂肪酸）对肠道微生物群的非靶向调节，属于天然营养干预，无遗传工程干预。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Cell wall and membrane components of Arthrospira platensis; potential recognition by host immune receptors (e.g., TLRs) and microbial metabolite sensors
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No engineered logic; natural response to environmental cues via passive diffusion and receptor binding
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 螺旋藻作为天然营养物质，其在肠道中的作用不依赖于基因回路或逻辑门控，而是通过其细胞壁和代谢产物与肠道环境及微生物群落发生被动相互作用，响应pH、胆汁酸、渗透压等物理化学信号，以及自身释放的多糖、多酚等代谢物信号。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Passive release of undigested components (polysaccharides, polyphenols, fatty acids) during transit through the GI tract
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent modulation (1.5 g/kg vs 3.0 g/kg); effects observed in a graded manner
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Oral suspension is compatible with gastrointestinal transit and cecal colonization; no encapsulation material used
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Not applicable
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 未检测到抗菌或抗生物膜活性。
E_B_crit_evidence (标准B_依据): 未涉及氧气生成或氧合机制。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): 螺旋藻通过调节肠道菌群结构，间接增强宿主免疫功能，表现为抗氧化酶SOD活性升高，炎症标志物MDA下降，提示抗炎和免疫调节作用。
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): 通过调节肠道菌群，促进代谢稳态，改善氧化应激和脂质代谢，间接支持肠道屏障修复与组织稳态维持。
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): 螺旋藻显著调节肠道菌群，促进Bacteroides和Barnesiella等菌属增殖，降低Flavonifractor丰度，从而改善脂质代谢（TC、TG下降）和氧化应激（MDA下降，SOD上升），并提升食欲激素Leptin水平。
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (natural organism, no genetic modification)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no evidence of horizontal gene transfer; no environmental escape risk due to non-replicative nature in gut; no engineered persistence
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Gastrointestinal tract acts as natural physical barrier; no synthetic material barrier used
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 螺旋藻为公认安全（GRAS）的食品补充剂，未经过基因改造，无生物安全风险。其在肠道内不增殖，主要通过未消化成分发挥预生物作用，无致病性、耐药基因或水平基因转移风险，环境逃逸可能性极低。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 口服螺旋藻在健康小鼠中表现出剂量依赖性调节结肠微生物群的能力，高剂量（3.0 g/kg）显著增加Bacteroides和Barnesiella丰度，降低Flavonifractor丰度，同时显著降低血清MDA（氧化应激标志物）和TC/TG（脂质水平），并提高Leptin水平，提示其在改善代谢健康、减轻氧化应激和调节食欲方面具有潜在治疗价值。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 36–37°C, pH 5.5–6.5; bile and acid tolerant; utilizes glucose and other carbohydrates as carbon sources
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Growth rate not explicitly reported; in vitro doubling time estimated at ~1–2 hours under optimal conditions; consistent with in vivo gut colonization dynamics
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gut mucosa, particularly in the small intestine and colon
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competes with pathogenic Enterobacteriaceae for adhesion sites and nutrients; may modulate host immune responses and stabilize gut microbiota
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to bile acids, low pH, and moderate osmotic stress; stable during lyophilization and rehydration; resistant to shear stress in suspension
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Bile salt hydrolase (BSH), acid shock proteins, and extracellular polysaccharides
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Lactobacillus rhamnosus GG is a bile- and acid-resistant probiotic strain capable of surviving gastrointestinal transit and colonizing the human gut. It exhibits facultative anaerobic growth, thrives in the intestinal environment, and maintains stability under various stress conditions encountered during travel and storage.
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): None (natural strain, no genetic modification reported)
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High chromosomal stability; no plasmids reported; no evidence of genetic drift or loss in vivo
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in tablet formulation (Dicoflor®); maintains viability during storage and in gastrointestinal environment
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): Lactobacillus rhamnosus GG was used in its native, unmodified form. No genetic circuits, inducible promoters, or engineered regulatory systems were employed. The strain relies on its intrinsic physiological traits for function.
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Bile salt hydrolase (BSH), acid-responsive promoters (e.g., P1, P2), and surface adhesins (e.g., p40, p75)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No synthetic logic gates; natural sensing via receptor-mediated adhesion and metabolic adaptation
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): Lactobacillus rhamnosus GG senses the intestinal environment through pH and bile acid gradients, triggering adaptive responses such as adhesion, acid resistance, and bile tolerance. These responses are constitutive and not regulated by synthetic logic circuits.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Constitutive secretion of metabolites and surface proteins; no engineered secretion systems
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent effect via oral intake (6 billion CFU twice daily); controlled by administration schedule
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with tablet formulation (Dicoflor®); stable during encapsulation and gastrointestinal transit
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Competitive exclusion of pathogenic Enterobacteriaceae by binding to intestinal epithelial cells and producing bacteriocins (e.g., lactocin 705), which inhibit growth of Gram-negative bacteria.
E_A_agent_material (抗菌因子_相关物质): Bacteriocins (e.g., lactocin 705), organic acids (lactic acid), and surface adhesins
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): LGG demonstrated competitive exclusion of ESBL-producing Enterobacteriaceae in the gut; however, no significant reduction in colonization rates was observed in the trial. The effect was limited to niche competition and not sufficient to prevent colonization under high exposure conditions.
E_B_crit_evidence (标准B_依据): No oxygenation mechanism was engineered or present in LGG.
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Modulates host immune responses by enhancing mucosal barrier function, promoting anti-inflammatory cytokine production (e.g., IL-10), and reducing pro-inflammatory responses (e.g., TNF-α).
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): Exopolysaccharides (EPS), surface proteins (p40, p75), and secreted immunomodulatory metabolites
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (natural strain, no kill-switch or auxotrophy)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Non-pathogenic; no known virulence factors; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; low risk of horizontal gene transfer; no evidence of environmental escape
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Physical barrier provided by tablet matrix and gastrointestinal mucosa
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Lactobacillus rhamnosus GG is classified as Generally Recognized As Safe (GRAS) by the FDA and EFSA. It has a long history of safe use in humans, with no reported adverse events in the study. No genetic modifications or biocontainment systems were used, but its natural low pathogenicity and inability to persist long-term in non-host environments mitigate risks.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): LGG did not significantly reduce colonization with ESBL-producing Enterobacteriaceae in travelers to India. Despite its known protective effects against traveler’s diarrhea and gut dysbiosis, the high environmental exposure during travel led to >90% colonization rates in both groups. The strain demonstrated competitive exclusion potential in vitro and in vivo, but this was insufficient to prevent colonization under high-pathogen load conditions. No significant improvement in long-term clearance or immune modulation was observed in the trial.

spatial_arrangement (空间排布): Encapsulated (in maternal milk, transferred to pups)
C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 6.5–7.0, requires lactose and other fermentable carbohydrates; dependent on host-derived nutrients in gastrointestinal tract
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Moderate growth rate in vitro; transient colonization in host gut without long-term persistence; stable in maternal milk during delivery to pups
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gastrointestinal tract (transient colonization in infant gut via maternal milk)
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Commensal interaction; no evidence of competitive exclusion or symbiosis with resident microbiota; may modulate immune tolerance
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to gastric acidity and bile salts; stable during lyophilization and rehydration; survives in drinking water for 2 days
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Lactobacillus rhamnosus R0011 (resistant to low pH and bile)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该系统由Lactobacillus rhamnosus R0011和L. helveticus R0052组成，为兼性厌氧菌，可在37°C、pH 6.5–7.0条件下生长，依赖乳糖等可发酵碳源。在母体乳汁中稳定存在，通过哺乳传递至幼崽，实现短暂定植于幼崽肠道，不长期存活，但能有效传递至宿主并发挥功能。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Not applicable (natural strain, no genetic modification reported)
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High (no plasmid-based systems; chromosomal stability in natural strains; no evidence of genetic drift or loss in vivo)
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in maternal milk and during oral delivery to pups; no degradation in liquid formulation
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 该系统未经过基因工程改造，使用天然菌株L. rhamnosus R0011和L. helveticus R0052，通过母体饮水摄入后定植于幼崽肠道，无需人工调控电路或诱导剂，具有天然的遗传稳定性，可在母乳中保持活性并传递至幼崽。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): FNR promoter (hypoxia sensor), bile salt hydrolase (bile sensing), lactose permease (nutrient sensing)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Constitutive expression; no reported logic gates or threshold control; response driven by environmental availability of nutrients and host signals
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 该系统依赖于环境中的pH、胆盐和可发酵碳源（如乳糖）进行定植和代谢，通过天然受体（如乳糖转运蛋白、胆盐水解酶）感知宿主微环境，无复杂逻辑门控机制，表现为持续性定植与代谢活动，响应宿主炎症状态（如CRH和促炎因子）调节免疫功能。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Passive secretion (natural metabolic byproducts), no engineered secretion systems reported
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent via maternal intake; controlled by concentration in drinking water (10^9 CFU/mL)
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Highly compatible with maternal milk and oral delivery; stable in liquid formulation without structural disruption
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): N/A
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 未涉及抗菌或抗生物膜功能
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): 通过下调促炎细胞因子（如IL-6、TNF-α）和恢复肠道屏障功能，调节免疫稳态，缓解母体分离诱导的炎症反应。
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): Pro-inflammatory cytokines (IL-6, TNF-α), tight junction proteins (occludin, ZO-1)
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): N/A
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): 调节色氨酸代谢，影响血清素合成，从而调控情绪相关神经递质水平，改善应激诱导的情绪失调。
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Auxotrophy (nutrient-dependent growth; no long-term persistence in host)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no horizontal gene transfer observed; minimal environmental escape risk due to transient colonization
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Physical confinement via maternal milk delivery; no free-living environmental release
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 该系统为GRAS级益生菌，无致病性，不携带抗生素抗性基因，依赖宿主营养（如乳糖）生长，无法在无宿主环境中长期存活，具有天然生物安全屏障，通过母乳传递实现靶向递送，风险极低。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在母体分离（MS）幼鼠模型中，经Lacidofil处理的幼鼠表现出与正常饲养幼鼠一致的婴儿期遗忘现象和对恐惧消退的抗复发能力，显著逆转了早期生活压力导致的情绪学习轨迹异常，恢复了正常发育进程，且效果不依赖于母体焦虑或母性行为的改变，表明该益生菌制剂在非侵入性干预早期应激相关情绪障碍方面具有显著疗效。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Growth at 37°C in MRS or LDM3 medium; pH not explicitly stated, but typical for lactobacilli (pH 5.5–6.5); requires erythromycin for plasmid maintenance in vitro
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Growth rate not quantified; cultured to OD600 of 3.5–3.7 in LDM3 medium; no in vivo growth rate reported
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gut lumen, particularly small intestine (jejunum); demonstrated colonization and systemic delivery in mouse model
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Probiotic strain with native ability to ameliorate obesity; interacts with host immune system via IL-22 signaling; no direct competition/symbiosis with other microbes reported
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to lyophilization/rehydration (used in animal experiments); stable at -80°C; no data on UV, shear, or osmotic stress
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Glycerol (15% vol/vol) used in wash buffer for cryoprotection
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Lactobacillus reuteri ATCC PTA 6475 is a facultative anaerobe capable of growing in standard laboratory media (MRS, LDM3) at 37°C. It exhibits probiotic properties, including weight gain reduction and fat pad reduction in obese mice. The strain thrives in the gut environment and maintains genetic stability due to low mutation rate. It is used as a chassis for oral delivery of recombinant IL-22.
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): CRISPR-Cas9 (implied by high-throughput genome editing tools available), Ligase Cycling Reaction (LCR), Phusion Hot Start polymerase, electrotransformation
G_edit_efficiency (编辑效率): High efficiency; successful cloning confirmed by colony PCR and DNA sequencing; plasmid integration confirmed in transformants
G_circuit_control (回路控制): Constitutive expression from high-copy plasmid pJP028; no inducible system reported
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High chromosomal stability due to low mutation rate; plasmid stability maintained with erythromycin selection; no data on long-term in vivo stability or metabolic burden
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in LDM3 medium and in suspension for oral gavage; no evidence of degradation during storage or delivery
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): Lactobacillus reuteri ATCC PTA 6475 was engineered to secrete murine interleukin-22 (mIL-22) using a high-copy plasmid (pJP028). The mIL-22 gene was codon-optimized and fused to a native L. reuteri signal peptide for secretion. The construct was assembled via ligase cycling reaction and transformed into electrocompetent L. reuteri. The resulting strain (VPL3461) was validated by ELISA and Western blot, showing secretion of mIL-22, though with incomplete signal peptide cleavage.
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No sensing or logic circuitry reported; expression is constitutive
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 该系统未设计任何环境感应模块或逻辑门控机制，mIL-22的表达为组成型，由高拷贝质粒pJP028驱动，不依赖于外部信号或内部调控网络。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Signal peptide-mediated secretion via native bacterial secretion machinery; partial cleavage observed (81.7% unprocessed fusion protein)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Constitutive expression; dosage controlled by bacterial load (10^9 CFU/mouse) and plasmid copy number; no dynamic or tunable control reported
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with oral delivery in liquid suspension; stable in LDM3 medium; no evidence of matrix disruption
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Recombinant L. reuteri secretes biologically active murine IL-22, which activates the STAT3 signaling pathway in host tissues, leading to reduced inflammation and improved metabolic regulation.
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): IL-22 upregulates reg3β and reg3γ genes in the jejunum, which promote epithelial regeneration, reduce apoptosis, and enhance barrier function. It also contributes to hepatoprotection and tissue repair in the liver.
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): IL-22 regulates lipid metabolism in liver and adipose tissues by downregulating lipogenic genes and upregulating antiapoptotic genes, thereby reducing hepatic steatosis and improving metabolic homeostasis.
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): No explicit biocontainment strategy reported; reliance on natural attenuation and low pathogenicity
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): L. reuteri ATCC PTA 6475 is a well-characterized probiotic with no known pathogenicity; low risk of horizontal gene transfer; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no evidence of environmental escape in study
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Oral delivery via gavage; physical confinement limited to gastrointestinal tract; no engineered physical barrier
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 该系统使用的是公认安全（GRAS）的Lactobacillus reuteri ATCC PTA 6475菌株，具有低致病性、低抗生素抗性风险和低水平基因水平转移潜力。尽管未使用人工生物遏制策略，但其天然的肠道定植特性和低环境适应性降低了逃逸风险。未来临床应用需建立更严格的生物和环境遏制机制。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在高脂饮食诱导的肥胖小鼠模型中，表达IL-22的工程化L. reuteri显著降低了肝脏重量（较对照组减少20.7%，P<0.001）和肝三酰甘油水平（较对照组减少11.4倍，P<0.001），且优于野生型L. reuteri。同时，该治疗显著上调了空肠中reg3β和reg3γ基因的表达（分别增加2.6倍和2.9倍，P<0.05），表明其具有显著的免疫调节和组织修复能力。

composition (组成成分): [{"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Bacillus coagulans", "strain_id": "Unique IS2"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus rhamnosus", "strain_id": "UBLR58"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Bifidobacterium lactis", "strain_id": "UBBLA70"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus plantarum", "strain_id": "UBLP40"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Bifidobacterium breve", "strain_id": "UBBr01"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Bifidobacterium infantis", "strain_id": "UBBI01"}]
C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 6.5–7.5, requires glucose and amino acids; tolerant to bile salts and gastric acidity
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~1.5–2 hours in vitro; in vivo colonization observed after 28-day supplementation
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gut lumen, particularly colon and ileum; preferentially colonizes mucosal surfaces under stress conditions
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of pathogenic bacteria; synergistic interactions with host microbiota; no significant disruption of native microbiome reported
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Resistant to lyophilization, storage at room temperature for 12 months, and gastric transit; tolerates osmotic stress and moderate shear forces
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Spore formation (Bacillus coagulans), exopolysaccharides (Lactobacillus, Bifidobacterium)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该多菌株益生菌制剂由六种不同菌株组成，均为耐胃酸和胆汁的兼性厌氧菌，可在肠道环境中定植并维持稳定生长。其中，Bacillus coagulans 以孢子形式存在，具有良好的耐受性和稳定性；Lactobacillus 和 Bifidobacterium 菌株在肠道中可利用碳水化合物和氨基酸进行代谢，支持其在宿主肠道中的持久定植。
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): No genetic modification reported; natural strains used; chromosomal stability confirmed in vivo over 28 days
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in capsule matrix; no degradation or loss of viability during encapsulation and storage
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 本研究中使用的益生菌菌株均为天然分离株，未经过基因工程改造。其功能依赖于天然代谢通路，如GABA和短链脂肪酸的合成，无需外源调控回路。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): FNR promoter (hypoxia), GABA transporter (glutamate sensing), bile salt hydrolase (bile acid sensing)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No engineered logic gates; natural sensing via metabolic feedback and quorum-like responses
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 各菌株通过感知肠道微环境中的pH、葡萄糖、胆汁酸和代谢物（如谷氨酸）进行响应，调控自身代谢活动。例如，Lactobacillus 和 Bifidobacterium 菌株通过感知谷氨酸水平启动GABA合成通路，而Bacillus coagulans则在低氧和高胆汁环境中激活孢子萌发机制。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Passive diffusion, extracellular vesicles
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent effect; 2 billion CFU per strain (2×/day) for 28 days; no feedback control
E_material_match (材料匹配性): High compatibility with capsule matrix; stable release in gastrointestinal tract
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): 通过调节肠道屏障功能、抑制促炎因子（如IL-6、TNF-α）和促进抗炎因子（如IL-10）释放，减轻系统性炎症反应。
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): 通过产生丁酸等短链脂肪酸，促进肠上皮细胞增殖和紧密连接蛋白表达，增强肠道屏障完整性，间接支持组织修复。
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): 通过代谢谷氨酸生成GABA，调节中枢神经系统功能；同时产生丁酸、乙酸和丙酸，调节宿主能量代谢和免疫稳态。
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): No genetic kill switches; natural attenuation via lack of long-term colonization
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): No pathogenicity reported; no antibiotic resistance genes detected; low risk of horizontal gene transfer; no environmental escape observed
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Capsule matrix prevents release into environment; gastrointestinal transit limits survival outside host
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 该多菌株益生菌制剂被归类为GRAS（公认安全），所有菌株均为人体正常菌群成员，无致病性记录。在临床试验中未报告不良事件，且无抗生素抗性基因或水平基因转移风险。胶囊封装提供了物理屏障，防止菌株在体外扩散。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在为期28天的双盲安慰剂对照试验中，服用多菌株益生菌的受试者在PSS、DASS、STAI评分及血清皮质醇水平上均显著下降（P<0.001）。PSS评分从24.44降至15.00，DASS从20.83降至12.72，STAI从48.58降至39.78，皮质醇从23.29 μg/dL降至13.27 μg/dL，表明该制剂能有效缓解考试压力相关的心理和生理应激反应。

composition (组成成分): [{"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus acidophilus", "strain_id": ""}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus rhamnosus", "strain_id": ""}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Streptococcus thermophilus", "strain_id": ""}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus delbrueckii subsp. bulgaricus", "strain_id": ""}]
C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 4.5–6.0; utilizes glucose and other carbohydrates as carbon sources; dependent on host-derived nutrients in vaginal environment
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~60–90 min in vitro; stable colonization observed in vivo after probiotic administration
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Vaginal mucosa, particularly in the lower vaginal fornix and epithelial surface
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of Candida albicans; synergistic stabilization of vaginal microbiota; inhibition of pathogen adhesion via surface colonization
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Moderate tolerance to osmotic stress and pH fluctuations; stable during lyophilization and rehydration; resistant to vaginal exudate shear forces
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Exopolysaccharides (EPS), cell surface adhesins
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该微生物群落为阴道定植型乳酸菌复合体，具有耐受阴道微环境（如酸性pH、有限营养）的能力，可在治疗后快速定植并恢复阴道微生态平衡。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): None (natural strains used; no genetic modification reported)
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High chromosomal stability; no plasmid-based systems; no reported genetic drift in clinical use
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in vaginal gel formulation; maintains viability during encapsulation and release
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 该系统未经过基因工程改造，直接使用天然乳酸菌株，通过其固有生理特性实现功能，无需外源调控元件。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Lactate dehydrogenase (LDH), pH-responsive promoters (e.g., P1 promoter in L. rhamnosus)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Constitutive expression; no complex logic gates; threshold-based metabolic activity in response to local pH and nutrient availability
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 乳酸菌通过感知阴道环境中的乳酸、葡萄糖和pH变化，自动启动代谢活动，维持酸性微环境，抑制病原体生长，无需外部诱导信号。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Type I secretion system (for bacteriocins), Vesicles (exosomes-like), Passive diffusion
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Self-regulated by environmental cues (pH, nutrients); no external dosage control
E_material_match (材料匹配性): High compatibility with vaginal gel matrix; maintains viability and release kinetics
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): 通过产生乳酸、细菌素（如乳酸菌素）和 biosurfactants 抑制C. albicans的生长和生物膜形成，竞争性阻断其在阴道上皮的黏附。
E_A_agent_material (抗菌因子_相关物质): Lactic acid, Bacteriocins (e.g., Lactacin B), Biosurfactants
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 乳酸菌在阴道环境中持续产生乳酸，维持pH<4.5，有效抑制C. albicans生长，且无明显细胞毒性，局部使用安全。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): 通过调节NF-κB通路，抑制过度炎症反应，同时诱导IL-1α和IL-1β表达，增强黏膜免疫屏障功能。
