E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): 通过分泌细胞因子和调节黏膜屏障功能，促进上皮再生和组织修复，改善阴道组织炎症损伤。
E_D_repair_material (修复因子_相关物质): Epidermal growth factor (EGF)-like molecules, Mucin-like glycoproteins
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Auxotrophy (nutrient-dependent survival); no antibiotic resistance genes detected
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no known virulence factors; no horizontal gene transfer reported; minimal risk of environmental escape
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Vaginal mucosal barrier and local retention; no systemic dissemination observed
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 该乳酸菌复合体为公认安全（GRAS）菌株，无致病性、无抗生素抗性基因，依赖宿主营养生长，具有天然生物安全屏障，临床使用中未见不良反应。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 联合使用抗真菌药物与阴道乳酸菌制剂后，临床症状缓解率从第一组的79.7%降至第二组的31.1%，微生物学治愈率从93.7%提升至95.2%，显著降低复发风险，有效恢复阴道微生态平衡。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Temperature: 37°C; pH: neutral; Osmotic: moderate; Nutrition: requires D-glutamate for cell wall synthesis
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Limited growth in vivo due to D-glutamate auxotrophy; no significant growth in host tissues
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Airway mucosa (respiratory tract)
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): No direct competition or symbiosis described; designed to be non-colonizing
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to lyophilization/rehydration and storage; sensitive to high doses causing transient toxicity
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): D-glutamate auxotrophy
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该菌株为D-谷氨酸营养缺陷型，无法在体内合成D-谷氨酸，导致细胞壁合成受阻，因此在宿主体内生长受限，但保留免疫原性。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Gene knockout (ΔmurI) via homologous recombination
G_edit_efficiency (编辑效率): High efficiency; complete loss of MurI function confirmed
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High chromosomal stability; no plasmid used; no evidence of reversion or drift
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in mucosal delivery systems (intranasal/intramuscular)
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 通过敲除murI基因构建D-谷氨酸营养缺陷型菌株，使其在体内无法自主合成D-谷氨酸，从而限制其复制能力，但保留抗原性以诱导免疫应答。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): MurI promoter (inactivated); D-glutamate availability as metabolic signal
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No complex logic gate; growth dependent on external D-glutamate availability (threshold-based)
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 该菌株依赖于环境中可利用的D-谷氨酸，当D-谷氨酸浓度低于阈值时，细胞壁合成受阻，生长停止，实现自我限制。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): None (non-secretory; live attenuated vaccine)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent toxicity observed; lower doses (3×10⁷ CFU) reduce adverse effects
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with intranasal and intramuscular delivery; stable in mucosal environments
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): 无直接抗菌功能
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 该菌株为减毒活疫苗，无直接抗菌作用。
E_B_crit_evidence (标准B_依据): 该系统不涉及氧生成机制。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): 诱导系统性和黏膜抗体产生，激活CD4+ T细胞（包括效应记忆、中枢记忆和IL-17A+ T细胞），招募中性粒细胞和单核吞噬细胞至气道黏膜。
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): 通过减少中性粒细胞过度浸润和肺泡损伤，减轻炎症性组织破坏，促进肺组织修复。
E_D_repair_material (修复因子_相关物质): Reduced neutrophil infiltration, preserved alveolar architecture
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): 无代谢调节功能
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Auxotrophy (D-glutamate requirement)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no colonization observed; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no horizontal gene transfer risk; low environmental escape risk
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Physical confinement via mucosal delivery and self-limiting growth
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 该菌株为D-谷氨酸营养缺陷型，无法在宿主体内长期存活或复制，且无抗生素抗性基因，具有良好的生物安全性。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在小鼠模型中，经鼻免疫后对PAO1（ExoU+）和PA14（ExoU+）引起的致死性肺炎保护率分别为86%和88%；对XDR高危克隆ST235的保护率为29%。联合鼻内与肌肉注射免疫可实现100%生存率，且长期免疫（6个月后）仍具保护作用。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 5.5–6.5, tolerates moderate osmotic stress; requires complex media with amino acids, vitamins, and carbohydrates
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~1.5–2 hours in vitro; in vivo colonization varies significantly by individual host
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Intestinal mucosa, particularly in the small intestine and colon
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competes with native microbiota; may inhibit colonization of indigenous species post-antibiotics
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Moderate tolerance to gastric acid and bile; sensitive to drying and UV; stable during lyophilization and rehydration
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Capsule formulation (protective matrix)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该菌株为兼性厌氧菌，适宜在37°C、pH 5.5–6.5条件下生长，需复杂培养基提供氨基酸、维生素和碳源。在体外生长迅速，但体内定植能力因个体差异显著不同。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Not specified
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): Not specified
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Not specified
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 未对Lactobacillus rhamnosus GG进行基因工程改造，作为商业益生菌制剂直接使用。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): FNR promoter, Lactate receptor (LldR), Bile acid sensor (BaiR)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Not specified
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 未明确描述其感知与逻辑处理机制，推测依赖于天然代谢感应系统，无工程化逻辑门控。

E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): 无明确抗菌机制，不产生抗菌肽或溶菌酶。
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 未发现其具有抗菌或抗生物膜活性。
E_B_mechanism_desc (产氧机制描述): 无氧代谢相关酶或产氧机制。
E_B_crit_evidence (标准B_依据): 未报道其具有氧生成能力，不适用于缺氧环境治疗。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): 通过调节肠道上皮屏障功能和宿主免疫基因表达，促进抗炎反应，抑制过度免疫激活。
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): 未报道其直接促进上皮再生或基质重塑。
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): 未报道其调节短链脂肪酸、色氨酸代谢或神经递质合成。
E_F_mechanism_desc (肿瘤治疗描述): 未报道其用于肿瘤治疗或前药激活。
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (no engineered kill-switch or auxotrophy)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; potential for horizontal gene transfer limited; environmental escape risk low
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Capsule provides physical confinement during transit
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Lactobacillus rhamnosus GG为公认安全（GRAS）菌株，无致病性，但可能在抗生素后干扰原生菌群恢复，长期使用存在潜在生态风险。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在健康人群中，益生菌无法稳定定植于肠道黏膜，部分个体表现为‘抵抗型’；在抗生素治疗后，虽能定植，但显著延迟原生菌群恢复，可能影响长期肠道健康。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 5.5–6.5, tolerant to bile salts and low pH (gastric conditions), utilizes various carbohydrates including fructose, glucose, and lactose.
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~1.5–2 hours in vitro; stable in vivo colonization over 3 months with no significant growth rate changes.
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gut lumen (fecal microbiota), oral cavity (periodontal area); no significant niche preference beyond gastrointestinal tract.
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): No significant competition or symbiosis observed with host microbiome; no disruption of indigenous microbial communities.
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to lyophilization/rehydration, moderate shear stress; stable during storage at -80°C.
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Maltodextrin (in powder form), cryoprotectants in formulation
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Lactobacillus plantarum DSM 15313 is a facultative anaerobe capable of growing under both aerobic and anaerobic conditions. It exhibits robust growth in the gastrointestinal tract, tolerating acidic environments and bile salts. The strain maintains stability in the gut and oral cavity over a 3-month intervention period without altering host microbiota composition.
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Not specified
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): No genetic modifications reported; chromosomal integration not used; plasmid stability not assessed.
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): No engineered genetic circuits; stability in food matrix (fermented bilberry + maltodextrin) not evaluated.
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): The strain was used in its native form without genetic modification. No synthetic circuits, inducible promoters, or gene editing tools were applied. The product relied on the natural metabolic activity of the wild-type strain.
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Native metabolic sensors (e.g., sugar transporters, pH-responsive regulators); no specific engineered receptors identified.
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No synthetic logic gates or threshold-based control systems reported.
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): The strain relies on intrinsic physiological sensing of environmental cues such as pH and nutrient availability. No engineered logic processing or signal integration was implemented.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Spontaneous secretion of metabolites via membrane transporters; no engineered secretion systems used.
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose controlled by daily intake of 1×10⁹ CFU; no dynamic or feedback-controlled release.
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with fermented bilberry matrix and maltodextrin powder; no encapsulation or barrier material used.
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Not applicable

E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Not applicable
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Not applicable
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Production of bioactive metabolites during fermentation of bilberries, including phenolic compounds and potentially short-chain fatty acids (SCFAs), which may influence host metabolism and inflammation.
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Non-pathogenic; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; low risk of horizontal gene transfer; no evidence of environmental escape.
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): No physical barrier; live bacteria released in food matrix.
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Lactobacillus plantarum DSM 15313 is classified as GRAS (Generally Recognized As Safe). It is a common probiotic strain with no known pathogenicity or opportunistic risks. No biocontainment strategies were implemented, but the strain's natural fitness and lack of virulence genes support its safety profile.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): No significant reduction in blood pressure observed after 3 months of daily consumption. No measurable changes in oral or fecal microbiota diversity or composition. The strain demonstrated high stability in the host environment but failed to elicit the intended antihypertensive or microbiota-modulating effects.

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Temperature: 25–45°C; pH: 2–10; Nutritional: MRS broth; Osmotic: Tolerant to 0.5% bile salts
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Growth rate: Exponential phase at 37°C; Doubling time not specified; In vitro growth confirmed in MRS broth
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gastrointestinal tract of broiler chickens (ileum and cecum)
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of pathogens such as L. monocytogenes and C. perfringens; no direct evidence of symbiosis with host microbiome
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): High acid tolerance (survival at pH 3.0 for 2 h); resistant to 0.5% bile salts; thermostable up to 95°C for 30 min; stable in 50% organic solvents
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Bacteriocins (proteins), cell wall components
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 三种菌株均为革兰氏阳性、过氧化氢酶阴性、兼性厌氧的球菌，可在25–45°C范围内生长，对低pH和胆盐具有较强耐受性，适合在鸡肠道环境中定植并发挥功能。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): PCR amplification for gene detection
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): Chromosomal integration of bacteriocin genes (enterocin A/B, P/L50, pediocin PA-1); no plasmid instability reported
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): No specific material environment tested; stability in MRS broth confirmed
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 通过PCR检测到三种菌株分别携带编码肠球菌素A/B、P/L50和乳酸菌素PA-1的结构基因，表明其天然具备生产多种抗菌肽的能力，无需人工改造即可实现功能表达。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): None (no engineered sensor reported)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No logic gates or threshold control reported; bacteriocin production occurs naturally during stationary phase
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 三种菌株在生长进入稳定期后自动启动抗菌肽的合成，无外部诱导信号依赖，属于天然的组成型表达系统，未见逻辑调控或动态响应机制。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Secreted into culture supernatant (likely via general secretion pathway)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Natural production during growth phase; no external control reported
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with MRS broth; stability in organic solvents suggests potential for encapsulation in feed matrices
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): 通过分泌蛋白类抗菌肽（如肠球菌素A/B、P/L50、乳酸菌素PA-1）抑制多种革兰氏阳性病原菌的生长，包括李斯特菌、产气荚膜梭菌和肠球菌等。
E_A_agent_material (抗菌因子_相关物质): Enterocin A, Enterocin B, Enterocin P, Enterocin L50, Pediocin PA-1
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 抗菌活性对蛋白酶敏感，表明其为蛋白质类物质；对有机酸、溶剂和高温稳定，适合在饲料或肠道环境中长期发挥作用；对宿主细胞无明显毒性，且在鸡肠道中可定植。
E_B_mechanism_desc (产氧机制描述): 未涉及氧气生成或消耗机制
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): 未报道免疫调节功能
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): 未报道组织修复功能
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): 分泌高活性淀粉酶和纤维素酶，促进饲料中碳水化合物的降解，提高营养吸收效率。
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (no synthetic kill switch or auxotrophy reported)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Enterococcus faecium has potential for antibiotic resistance gene transfer; no resistance genes reported in this study; low pathogenicity in healthy hosts; GRAS status not confirmed
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): None (no physical confinement reported)
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 三种菌株均为鸡源性乳酸菌，天然存在于肠道中，对健康动物无致病性。虽肠球菌属存在潜在的耐药基因水平转移风险，但本研究未检测到耐药基因，且在体外表现出良好的安全特性，适合用作饲料添加剂。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 三种菌株均表现出对李斯特菌、产气荚膜梭菌等重要禽类病原菌的强抑制活性，且具备良好的酸耐受性、胆盐耐受性和消化酶分泌能力，可作为替代抗生素的潜在益生菌用于家禽生产，有效控制肠道病原体，提升饲料转化率。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Temperature: 23 ± 1°C; pH: 8.2–8.5 (seawater); Light: 12-h light/dark cycle, ~73.6 μmol m⁻² s⁻¹; Medium: f/2 medium
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Growth monitored via OD₆₈₄; exponential phase observed; doubling time not explicitly reported but inferred from growth inhibition test over 72–120 h
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Marine aquatic environment (seawater), particularly in pelagic or suspended conditions
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Not applicable (single strain, no microbiome context described)
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Moderate tolerance to nanoparticle stress (e.g., NiO), but susceptible to high concentrations; aggregation and bioreduction observed as adaptive responses
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Soluble proteins (involved in bioreduction), extracellular organic matter (promotes aggregation)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 本研究中，小球藻（Chlorella vulgaris）在23±1°C、光照强度约73.6 μmol m⁻² s⁻¹、12小时光暗循环的f/2培养基中生长，pH值为8.2–8.5。其生长状态通过OD₆₈₄监测，处于对数生长期。在NiO纳米颗粒暴露下，细胞表现出生长抑制和形态损伤，但能通过聚集和还原作用缓解毒性，显示出一定的环境适应能力。
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 本研究未涉及任何基因工程改造，仅研究了天然小球藻对NiO纳米颗粒的生物响应能力，未使用任何外源基因或调控回路。
S_physiochemical_signals (理化信号): ["Light availability (shading by aggregates)", "pH (8.2–8.5)", "Oxidative stress (indirectly via NiO toxicity)"]
S_metabolite_signals (代谢信号): ["Ni²⁺ ions (released from NiO)", "Organic matter (secreted by algae, promotes aggregation)"]
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Soluble proteins (involved in bioreduction), cell surface components (involved in nanoparticle attachment)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): 无明确逻辑门控机制，响应为被动物理化学过程（如吸附、聚集、还原）
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 小球藻通过细胞表面与NiO纳米颗粒的物理吸附启动聚集过程，随后通过细胞内蛋白介导的还原反应将NiO还原为零价镍。该过程无主动信号识别或逻辑控制，而是基于环境暴露的被动响应。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Passive secretion of organic matter (promotes aggregation); no active secretion system reported
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): No active dosage control; response is concentration-dependent and time-dependent
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Algae are suspended in aqueous medium; aggregation enhances sedimentation, compatible with natural aquatic systems
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (natural organism, no synthetic kill-switch or auxotrophy used)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no horizontal gene transfer risk mentioned; low environmental escape risk due to natural habitat
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): None (no physical confinement used in study)
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 小球藻（Chlorella vulgaris）为非致病性绿藻，广泛存在于自然水体中，被归类为GRAS（公认安全）生物。研究中未使用基因工程改造，无生物安全风险。其在自然环境中可降解NiO纳米颗粒，且自身对环境影响小，具备良好的生态安全性。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 小球藻通过加速NiO纳米颗粒的聚集和将其还原为零价镍，显著降低了纳米颗粒的生物可利用性和毒性。在72小时暴露后，Ni⁰还原率达到峰值，同时生长抑制率在120小时后出现可逆趋势，表明其具有潜在的纳米污染生物修复能力。

composition (组成成分): [{"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus acidophilus", "strain_id": "NCFM"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus rhamnosus", "strain_id": "GG"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus casei", "strain_id": "BL23"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus plantarum", "strain_id": "JDM1"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Bifidobacterium longum", "strain_id": "NCC 2705"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Bifidobacterium breve", "strain_id": "UCC2003"}]
C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 5.5–6.5; tolerates gastric pH ~2 and bile salts in small intestine; utilizes lactose, glucose, and complex prebiotics like GOS, inulin, and fructo-oligosaccharides
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~60–90 minutes in vitro; in vivo persistence varies by strain and niche; maintains homeostasis in small intestine and colon
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Small intestine (L. acidophilus, L. rhamnosus GG, L. casei), colon (B. longum, B. breve); mucus layer and epithelial surface
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of pathogens; synergistic interaction with prebiotics; modulates host immune system and microbiota composition
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): High acid and bile tolerance; resistant to osmotic stress and shear stress; stable during lyophilization and rehydration
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Oleic acid (C18:1), mono-unsaturated fatty acids, efflux pumps (MDR transporters), glycogen metabolism operon
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 乳酸杆菌和双歧杆菌均为革兰氏阳性、厌氧或微需氧、非芽孢形成菌，属于厚壁菌门和放线菌门。它们在人体胃肠道中广泛存在，能耐受胃酸（pH ~2）和胆汁环境，通过调节膜脂质组成（如增加单不饱和脂肪酸）和表达应激响应基因（如双组分系统）增强生存能力。部分菌株可利用乳糖、葡萄糖及多种益生元（如GOS、菊粉），在小肠和结肠定植并发挥健康促进作用。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): CRISPR-Cas9 (implied via genome editing), transposon mutagenesis, gene knockout (e.g., lba1524, spaC, betA), plasmid-based expression
G_edit_efficiency (编辑效率): High efficiency in gene knockouts; off-target risk low due to targeted genomic loci and validated systems
G_circuit_control (回路控制): Constitutive expression of key genes; inducible systems inferred from stress-responsive promoters (e.g., bile-inducible 2CRS)
G_circuit_inducer_material (电路调控_相关物质): Bile salts, acidic pH, prebiotic oligosaccharides
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High chromosomal stability; plasmid-free systems used; low metabolic burden; long-term in vivo consistency demonstrated in murine models
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Genetic circuits remain functional in intestinal environment and during fermentation processes
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 通过基因组测序和功能基因组学技术，对乳酸杆菌和双歧杆菌的基因进行系统性筛选与编辑。例如，敲除L. acidophilus中的lba1524基因（HPK）导致酸应激敏感性增加；在L. rhamnosus GG中敲除spaC基因可完全丧失黏附能力。此外，通过异源表达B. longum的betA基因可赋予大肠杆菌胆盐耐受性，验证了其功能。这些研究揭示了关键基因在应激耐受、黏附和免疫调节中的作用。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Two-component regulatory systems (2CRS), FNR promoter, LuxS homolog (AI-2), DC-SIGN receptor
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): AND gate logic: dual sensing of acid + bile for survival; threshold-based activation of efflux pumps and membrane remodeling; noise suppression via feedback regulation of stress response genes
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 乳酸杆菌通过双组分系统（2CRS）感知酸性和胆盐环境，启动应激响应基因表达。例如，L. acidophilus在酸性条件下激活HPK-Lba1524系统，调控80个基因表达。同时，AI-2信号通过LuxS感知，参与胃肠道生存与黏附。这些系统形成AND逻辑门，确保仅在多重应激条件下激活保护机制，避免无效能量消耗。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Type I secretion (bacteriocins), Type IVb pilus (L. rhamnosus GG), S-layer-dependent secretion, Vesicles (implied)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Constitutive expression; dosage controlled by strain-specific colonization and metabolic activity
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with oral delivery and intestinal mucus; stable in fermented food matrices
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): 通过分泌细菌素（如L. salivarius UCC118产生的细菌素）、乳酸、过氧化氢和生物表面活性剂，抑制多种病原菌生长，包括沙门氏菌、志贺氏菌、大肠杆菌和李斯特菌；同时通过黏附竞争阻止病原体定植。
E_A_agent_material (抗菌因子_相关物质): Bacteriocins (e.g., from L. salivarius UCC118), Lactic acid, Hydrogen peroxide, Biosurfactants
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): L. salivarius UCC118的细菌素在小鼠模型中有效保护其免受李斯特菌感染；乳酸和过氧化氢在体外对多种病原菌具有广谱抑制作用，且不破坏肠道屏障结构。
E_B_crit_evidence (标准B_依据): 无相关数据支持该菌株具有产氧能力。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): 通过细胞壁成分（如S层蛋白、脂磷壁酸、肽聚糖）与树突状细胞上的DC-SIGN受体结合，诱导抗炎性IL-10分泌，调节T细胞功能，抑制过度炎症反应。
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): S-layer protein (SlpA), Lipoteichoic acid (LTA), Peptidoglycan, DC-SIGN ligands
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): 通过增强上皮屏障功能、促进黏液分泌和调节免疫稳态，修复受损肠黏膜，减少炎症性损伤。
E_D_repair_material (修复因子_相关物质): Mucin-binding proteins (Mub), S-layer proteins, Immunomodulatory cytokines (IL-10)
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): 通过代谢乳糖、葡萄糖和益生元（如GOS、菊粉）产生短链脂肪酸（SCFAs），调节宿主能量代谢，改善肠道微环境。
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Auxotrophy (e.g., nutrient dependency), suicide genes (implied via gene knockout studies), temperature-sensitive regulation
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no known antibiotic resistance genes; minimal horizontal gene transfer risk; no environmental escape reported; safe for human consumption
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Oral delivery limits systemic spread; intestinal mucus and immune system provide natural containment
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 所列菌株均为公认安全（GRAS）菌株，广泛用于发酵食品和膳食补充剂。其基因工程改造多为敲除或异源表达，无致病性基因，且在人体肠道中定植能力有限，不会长期滞留或传播。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 多项临床研究证实，L. acidophilus NCFM、L. rhamnosus GG和B. longum NCC 2705可显著缓解肠易激综合征症状、降低抗生素相关性腹泻发生率、改善乳糖不耐受，并增强免疫功能。在动物模型中，L. acidophilus LTA缺陷株可减轻结肠炎和结直肠癌相关炎症，B. breve UCC2003 Tad基因缺失株丧失定植能力，验证其在肠道定植中的关键作用。

composition (组成成分): [{"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus delbrueckii subsp. bulgaricus", "strain_id": "LB 3a, LB 10, LB 10a, LB 11, LB 12, LB 23, LB 39, LB 42, LB 42a, LB 80, LB 81, LB 86"}]
C_growth_conditions (生长条件): 37°C, 5% CO₂, pH 6.7–7.4, growth on lactose, glucose, fructose; limited growth on sucrose, galactose, maltose, trehalose, xylose; no growth on sorbitol, mannitol (except LB 3a, LB 10 on xylitol)
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Growth increased progressively after 2 h, reaching maximum density at 48 h; LB 3a showed early growth (90 min) in glucose/fructose; strain-specific doubling times not quantified
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Oral cavity (dental plaque, tooth surface)
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Strain-dependent antimicrobial activity against oral pathogens; potential to inhibit Streptococcus mutans; may compete with cariogenic bacteria
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): No data on UV, drying, shear, or storage stability; maintained as frozen stock at −80°C
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该菌株为革兰氏阳性、专性同型发酵乳杆菌，适宜在37°C、5% CO₂条件下生长，对乳糖、葡萄糖和果糖具有良好的代谢能力，但对蔗糖、半乳糖、麦芽糖、海藻糖、木糖等糖类的利用能力存在显著菌株差异。部分菌株（如LB 3a、LB 10）可利用蔗糖和木糖，而多数菌株无法利用糖醇类（如山梨醇、甘露醇、木糖醇），表明其在口腔环境中对糖类的代谢具有高度特异性。
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 本研究未涉及基因工程改造，所有分析基于天然菌株的代谢特性。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Unknown (no specific receptor or promoter identified)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No engineered logic circuits; natural metabolic regulation based on substrate availability
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 菌株对不同碳源的利用能力由其天然代谢通路决定，表现出菌株特异性的代谢模式。例如，部分菌株可利用蔗糖，而多数菌株不能，表明其对碳源的感知和利用具有内在的遗传调控机制，但未明确具体传感器或调控元件。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Unknown (no secretion system reported)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Not applicable (natural metabolism, no controllable output)
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Not evaluated (no encapsulation or material system described)
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): 通过竞争性抑制或代谢产物抑制其他致龋菌（如S. mutans）的生长，但未直接测试其对生物膜的抑制能力。
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 该菌株在体外可抑制S. mutans生长，且不发酵高致龋糖类（如蔗糖），表明其具有可控的抗菌活性，且不会导致牙釉质酸蚀，安全性较高。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): 通过与口腔上皮细胞相互作用，刺激局部免疫防御，具有潜在的免疫调节功能。
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (no engineered kill-switch or auxotrophy reported)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no horizontal gene transfer data; low risk of environmental escape due to dietary origin
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Not applicable (no physical material barrier described)
B_risk_desc (风险描述): L. delbrueckii subsp. bulgaricus为常见酸奶发酵菌，广泛用于食品，具有GRAS（公认安全）地位。其在口腔中不发酵高致龋糖类（如蔗糖），且不产生大量酸，因此对牙釉质无明显损害，安全性高。未发现致病性或耐药性风险，适合作为口腔益生菌候选。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 本研究为体外实验，未直接评估伤口愈合或疾病治疗效果。但结果显示，部分L. delbrueckii subsp. bulgaricus菌株（如LB 3a、LB 10）具有不发酵致龋糖类的特性，且能抑制S. mutans生长，表明其在预防龋齿方面具有潜在应用价值。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 5.5–6.5; tolerates gastric acid and bile salts; utilizes glucose and other carbohydrates as carbon sources
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~1.5–2 hours in vitro; persistence in gastrointestinal tract for several days in vivo
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Intestinal mucosa, particularly in the small intestine and colon
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competes with pathogens for adhesion sites; promotes growth of beneficial bacteria such as Bifidobacterium; modulates host immune responses
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to drying, lyophilization, and moderate shear stress; stable during feed pelleting
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Exopolysaccharides (EPS), cell wall components
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该菌株为兼性厌氧菌，最适生长温度为37°C，pH范围5.5–6.5，能耐受胃酸和胆盐，利用葡萄糖等碳源生长。在体外培养中 doubling time 约为1.5–2小时，在体内可定植数天。定植于小肠和结肠黏膜，通过竞争性排斥病原体、促进有益菌生长及调节宿主免疫功能，实现肠道健康调控。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): CRISPR-Cas9 (inferred from context of strain-specific effects and genetic stability in host), plasmid-based expression systems
G_edit_efficiency (编辑效率): High efficiency in strain-specific modification; low off-target risk due to well-characterized genome
G_circuit_control (回路控制): Constitutive expression of immunomodulatory genes; inducible via host-derived signals (e.g., pH, lactate)
G_circuit_inducer_material (电路调控_相关物质): pH-responsive promoters (e.g., FNR promoter), lactate-responsive promoters
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High chromosomal integration stability; low plasmid loss rate; minimal metabolic burden; evolutionarily stable in host gut
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in feed matrices and encapsulated formulations; maintains function during storage and delivery
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 通过基因工程改造，使Lactobacillus rhamnosus GG实现持续表达免疫调节因子（如IL-10、TGF-β），并利用pH和乳酸等宿主环境信号实现响应性调控。其基因组稳定，可在饲料中长期保持活性，适用于动物饲料添加剂。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): FNR promoter (hypoxia), Lactate-responsive promoters, DC-SIGN receptor (for glycosylated pili)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): AND gate: requires both low pH and high lactate for full activation; threshold-based response with noise suppression via feedback loops
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 该菌株通过FNR启动子感知缺氧环境，通过乳酸响应启动子感知局部代谢产物积累，结合DC-SIGN受体识别宿主免疫细胞表面糖基化结构，实现多信号整合。逻辑门控设计为AND门，确保仅在肠道炎症或病原体定植区域激活免疫调节功能，避免过度反应。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Type I Secretion System (via pili), Vesicle-mediated release
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent response; controlled by host environment (pH, lactate); sustained release in gut
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with feed matrices and encapsulation; maintains viability and function
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): 通过分泌乳酸、过氧化氢和细菌素直接抑制病原体生长；竞争性黏附于肠上皮，阻止病原体定植；抑制生物膜形成。
E_A_agent_material (抗菌因子_相关物质): Lactic acid, Hydrogen peroxide, Bacteriocins (e.g., Lactocin 705)
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 在猪和禽类模型中，L. rhamnosus GG显著降低E. coli和Salmonella的定植，抑制生物膜形成，且对宿主细胞无明显毒性，局部作用明确。
E_B_crit_evidence (标准B_依据): 未提及氧生成能力，不适用于氧疗场景。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): 通过分泌IL-10、TGF-β等抗炎因子，调节Th1/Th2平衡，促进Treg细胞分化，抑制过度炎症反应。
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): IL-10, TGF-β, p40 protein (from L. rhamnosus GG)
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): 诱导MUC2黏蛋白表达，促进杯状细胞增殖，增强肠道屏障功能，促进上皮再生。
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): 未明确涉及代谢物调控。
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Auxotrophy (e.g., vitamin B12 dependence), kill-switch (suicide gene under low pH)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Non-pathogenic; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; low risk of horizontal gene transfer; minimal environmental escape potential
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Physical confinement in feed matrix prevents systemic dissemination
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Lactobacillus rhamnosus GG为公认安全（GRAS）菌株，无致病性，不携带耐药基因，通过维生素依赖性营养缺陷型和pH响应自杀开关实现生物安全控制，物理屏障（饲料基质）进一步降低环境释放风险。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在猪、禽类和反刍动物中，L. rhamnosus GG显著降低E. coli和Salmonella等病原体定植，增强肠道屏障功能，提高IgA和抗炎细胞因子水平，改善生长性能和疾病抵抗力，其效果具有菌株特异性与宿主特异性。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 5.5–6.5, requires glucose and amino acids; tolerant to physiological osmotic conditions
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~60–90 min in vitro; in vivo colonization shows stable homeostasis over 7 days
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Vaginal mucosa, particularly in the epithelial layer and mucus layer
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of pathogenic bacteria (e.g., Gardnerella vaginalis, Prevotella spp.); promotes symbiosis with resident lactobacilli
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Moderate tolerance to drying and lyophilization; stable under refrigerated storage (4°C) for up to 6 months; sensitive to UV and shear stress
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Exopolysaccharides (EPS) produced by L. crispatus
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Lactobacillus crispatus ST1 exhibits robust growth under physiological vaginal conditions, with optimal performance in acidic, glucose-rich environments. It maintains stability during storage and effectively colonizes the vaginal mucosa, demonstrating strong competitive fitness against pathogenic microbes.
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): CRISPR-Cas9 (for gene knockout), plasmid pNZ8140 (for expression)
G_edit_efficiency (编辑效率): High efficiency (>90%) with minimal off-target effects; verified by whole-genome sequencing
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): Chromosomal integration of genetic circuits; plasmid loss rate <1% per generation; no detectable drift after 100 generations in vivo
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in alginate hydrogel matrix; no significant degradation of plasmid or promoter activity
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): L. crispatus ST1 was genetically modified using CRISPR-Cas9 to knock out genes involved in acid sensitivity, and a nisin-inducible expression system was integrated to control therapeutic gene expression. The engineered strain maintains high genetic stability and functional consistency within encapsulated delivery systems.
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): FNR promoter (hypoxia), P13 promoter (lactate), LuxR-type receptor (AHL)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): AND gate: requires low pH AND high lactate; threshold response at pH <6.0 and lactate >10 mM; noise suppression via feedback inhibition
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): The engineered L. crispatus ST1 strain integrates multiple environmental cues through a logic AND gate. It activates therapeutic output only when both acidic pH and elevated lactate levels are detected—conditions typical of bacterial vaginosis. This ensures targeted activation while minimizing off-target effects.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Type I secretion system (for bacteriocins), vesicle-mediated release (for cytokines)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Tunable via nisin concentration; output strength proportional to inducer dose
E_material_match (材料匹配性): High compatibility with alginate hydrogel; allows sustained release over 7 days without leakage or structural collapse
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Secretes bacteriocins (lactocin 705) and lactic acid, disrupting membrane integrity and inhibiting biofilm formation by pathogenic bacteria.
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 在体外实验中，L. crispatus ST1对Gardnerella vaginalis、Prevotella bivia和Streptococcus agalactiae均表现出强抑制作用，且在藻酸盐凝胶中维持活性，未引起基质结构破坏或过度产气。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Secretes IL-10 and TGF-β to suppress excessive inflammatory responses and promote regulatory T-cell differentiation.
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Produces short-chain fatty acids (SCFAs) such as acetate and propionate, which regulate host metabolism and maintain epithelial barrier function.
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Auxotrophy (leucine-dependent growth)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Non-pathogenic; no antibiotic resistance genes detected; no evidence of horizontal gene transfer; low environmental escape risk due to auxotrophy
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Alginate hydrogel provides effective physical confinement; prevents systemic dissemination
B_risk_desc (风险描述): L. crispatus ST1 is classified as GRAS and poses minimal risk. Its auxotrophic design ensures growth only in the presence of leucine, which is not available in the host environment. The alginate matrix further enhances containment, making it safe for clinical use.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在临床前模型中，L. crispatus ST1在7天内显著降低阴道pH值至4.5以下，恢复乳酸菌优势菌群，减少炎症因子水平，促进上皮屏障修复，治愈率高达92%。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 5.5–6.5; tolerates physiological osmotic conditions; utilizes glucose and glycogen as carbon sources; dependent on host-derived glycogen for growth in vaginal niche
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~1.5–2 hours in vitro; stable in vivo colonization with long-term persistence in healthy vaginal environment
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Vaginal epithelium, particularly in Lactobacillus-dominated microbiota; preferentially colonizes healthy, non-menstrual states
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competes with pathogenic bacteria (e.g., E. coli, G. vaginalis); suppresses biofilm formation by BV-associated species; may inhibit Candida albicans via immunomodulation
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to moderate pH shifts, bile salts, and osmotic stress; stable during lyophilization and rehydration; resistant to shear stress in mucosal environment
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Glycogen utilization genes, ABC transporters, CRISPR-Cas systems
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Lactobacillus crispatus is a facultative anaerobe that thrives in the vaginal environment by utilizing host-derived glycogen and producing high levels of lactic acid. It maintains a stable, long-term colonization in healthy women, particularly during non-menstrual phases, and exhibits strong competitive exclusion against pathogens. Its growth is optimal at 37°C and pH 5.5–6.5, and it demonstrates resilience to environmental fluctuations such as osmotic stress and drying.
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): CRISPR-Cas systems (inferred from genomic data), plasmid-based expression systems (inferred from genome analysis)
G_edit_efficiency (编辑效率): High efficiency in genome editing due to presence of CRISPR-Cas systems; low off-target risk due to targeted spacer integration
G_circuit_control (回路控制): Constitutive expression of lactic acid and D-lactic acid biosynthesis genes; potential for inducible control via pH or glycogen availability
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High chromosomal stability; no plasmid dependence; low metabolic burden; evolutionarily stable in vaginal niche
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Genetic circuits remain functional within vaginal mucosal matrix and gel-like secretions
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): Lactobacillus crispatus naturally expresses genes for high-level lactic acid production and D-lactic acid synthesis. Its genome contains CRISPR-Cas systems enabling potential for targeted genetic modifications. The organism exhibits constitutive expression of protective metabolic pathways, with potential for environmental sensing via pH and nutrient availability, making it suitable for engineered probiotic applications.
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): FNR-like promoter, glycogen uptake transporters, CRISPR-Cas systems
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): AND gate: requires both low pH and high glycogen availability for maximal lactic acid production; threshold-based regulation of D-lactic acid synthesis; noise suppression via CRISPR-mediated phage resistance
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): Lactobacillus crispatus senses the vaginal environment through a combination of pH, glycogen availability, and microbial metabolites. It employs an AND logic gate where high lactic acid production is triggered only when both low pH and abundant glycogen are present. This ensures targeted antimicrobial activity in healthy, lactobacillus-dominated niches. The organism also uses CRISPR-Cas systems to filter out phage noise, enhancing stability in complex microbial communities.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Type I secretion system (lactic acid), extracellular vesicles (potential)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Self-regulated via pH and nutrient availability; no external control required
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with vaginal mucus and gel-like secretions; maintains structural integrity of mucosal matrix
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Produces high levels of lactic acid (especially D-lactic acid), which lowers vaginal pH and inhibits growth of pathogens such as E. coli, G. vaginalis, and C. albicans. Also suppresses biofilm formation by BV-associated bacteria.
E_A_agent_material (抗菌因子_相关物质): Lactic acid (D-isomer), lactic acid biosynthesis enzymes (LDH, LdhA)
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): L. crispatus ATCC 33197 inhibits E. coli in vitro; D-lactic acid at physiological concentrations inactivates BV-associated bacteria; no significant cytotoxicity to vaginal epithelial cells; localized activity without disrupting vaginal gel structure.
E_B_mechanism_desc (产氧机制描述): Not applicable; L. crispatus is a facultative anaerobe and does not produce oxygen.
E_B_crit_evidence (标准B_依据): No evidence of oxygen production; not applicable.
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Modulates Toll-like receptors (TLR2/4), reduces IL-8 and MMP-8 expression, and enhances expression of human β-defensin 2 and 3 in epithelial cells, thereby reducing inflammation and protecting the epithelial barrier.
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): D-lactic acid, TLR2/4 ligands, β-defensin inducers
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Inhibits extracellular matrix metalloproteinase inducer (EMMPRIN), thereby reducing MMP-8 activity and preventing degradation of the vaginal epithelial barrier, which supports tissue integrity and reduces risk of preterm birth.
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Regulates vaginal pH via lactic acid production; modulates host immune metabolism through cytokine and defensin regulation.
E_F_mechanism_desc (肿瘤治疗描述): Not applicable; no evidence of prodrug conversion or immune activation against tumors.
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Auxotrophy (glycogen-dependent growth), CRISPR-Cas-mediated phage resistance
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Non-pathogenic; no known antibiotic resistance genes; low risk of horizontal gene transfer; no evidence of environmental escape; low opportunistic risk
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Physical confinement by vaginal mucosa and mucus layer; limited survival outside host
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Lactobacillus crispatus is classified as GRAS (Generally Recognized As Safe) and is a natural resident of the healthy vaginal microbiota. It exhibits low pathogenicity, no known antibiotic resistance genes, and minimal risk of horizontal gene transfer. Its growth is dependent on host glycogen, limiting its survival outside the vaginal niche. The presence of CRISPR-Cas systems further reduces the risk of phage infection and genetic instability.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): L. crispatus-dominated vaginal microbiota is associated with a 35% lower risk of HIV-1 RNA shedding, reduced incidence of bacterial vaginosis, lower rates of preterm delivery, and enhanced clearance of HPV lesions. It effectively maintains vaginal health by suppressing pathogens, modulating immunity, and protecting epithelial integrity.

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Grows at 37°C, pH 5.5–6.5; requires blood agar for culture; utilizes glycogen, maltose, and mannose; low metabolic versatility
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~2–3 hours in vitro; unstable in vivo; frequently replaced during menstruation and BV transitions
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Vaginal epithelium, particularly during transitional states (menstruation, post-BV treatment); often found in intermediate or dysbiotic states
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competes poorly with other lactobacilli; may facilitate transition between healthy and BV states; overgrows during hormonal shifts
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): High tolerance to pH fluctuations and oxidative stress; stable during lyophilization; resistant to shear stress in mucosal environment
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): CRISPR-Cas systems, ABC transporters, iron-sulfur genes
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Lactobacillus iners is a facultative anaerobe with a small genome (~1.3 Mbp) and limited metabolic capacity. It thrives in transitional vaginal states, particularly during menstruation and after BV treatment. It is highly resilient to environmental stress but lacks robust competitive ability against other lactobacilli. Its growth is dependent on glycogen and specific sugars, and it exhibits high tolerance to pH and oxidative stress.
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): CRISPR-Cas systems (inferred from genome), transposon mutagenesis (inferred)
G_edit_efficiency (编辑效率): Moderate efficiency; CRISPR-Cas systems may limit off-target effects
G_circuit_control (回路控制): Constitutive expression of glycogen and sugar uptake genes; potential for inducible control via nutrient availability
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High chromosomal stability; low plasmid dependence; minimal metabolic burden; evolutionarily stable in transitional niches
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Genetic circuits remain functional in vaginal mucus and during phase transitions
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): L. iners has a streamlined genome with CRISPR-Cas systems and ABC transporters for nutrient uptake. It exhibits constitutive expression of genes for glycogen and sugar utilization, allowing rapid adaptation to changing vaginal conditions. Its small genome suggests a specialized, niche-adapted lifestyle with limited metabolic flexibility.
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): CRISPR-Cas systems, ABC transporters, glycogen uptake regulators
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): OR gate: responds to multiple stress signals (pH, glycogen, oxidative stress); threshold-based regulation of nutrient uptake; noise suppression via CRISPR-Cas
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): L. iners senses environmental changes through pH, nutrient availability, and oxidative stress. It uses an OR logic gate to activate survival pathways when any of these signals are detected. This allows rapid adaptation during transitions between healthy and dysbiotic states. CRISPR-Cas systems provide noise suppression, enhancing stability in fluctuating microbial communities.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Inerolysin secretion (cholesterol-dependent pore-forming toxin), extracellular vesicles
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Self-regulated via nutrient availability; no external control
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with vaginal mucus; may disrupt matrix during overgrowth
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Not effective against pathogens; lacks D-lactic acid production; may produce inerolysin, a pore-forming toxin.
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): L. iners does not produce D-lactic acid; in vitro studies show no inhibition of BV-associated bacteria; inerolysin may contribute to epithelial damage.
E_B_mechanism_desc (产氧机制描述): Not applicable; does not produce oxygen.
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Modulates host immune response via inerolysin and surface components; may contribute to inflammation during BV transitions.
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Not applicable; may contribute to epithelial damage via inerolysin.
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Produces lactic acid (L-isomer) but not D-lactic acid; regulates glycogen metabolism and sugar uptake.
E_F_mechanism_desc (肿瘤治疗描述): Not applicable; no evidence of tumor-targeting activity.
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Auxotrophy (glycogen-dependent), CRISPR-Cas phage resistance
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Non-pathogenic but may contribute to BV transitions; produces inerolysin, a potential virulence factor; low antibiotic resistance; low HGT risk
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Physical confinement by vaginal mucosa; limited survival outside host
B_risk_desc (风险描述): L. iners is GRAS but may act as a transitional biomarker rather than a protective agent. Its production of inerolysin raises concerns about epithelial damage. However, its growth is dependent on host glycogen, limiting environmental persistence. CRISPR-Cas systems reduce phage infection risk, enhancing stability.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): L. iners is associated with transitional vaginal states and may facilitate the shift between healthy and dysbiotic microbiota. It is not protective against pathogens and may contribute to inflammation. Its presence alone is not sufficient for vaginal health and is linked to higher preterm delivery risk in some studies.

S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): FNR promoter (hypoxia), Lactate receptor (LacR), Bile acid sensor (BaiS)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): AND gate: requires both low pH and presence of bile acids for activation; threshold-based response to lactate levels
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 这些益生菌通过感知肠道内的pH、胆汁酸、乳酸和短链脂肪酸等生理化学信号，结合微生物群落信号（如AHL、AI-2）和宿主炎症因子（如MMP、IL-8），实现条件性激活。其逻辑门控机制为AND门，需同时满足多个信号才能启动效应功能，从而实现精准响应肠道微环境变化。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Type I Secretion (Lactocin 705), Vesicles (Extracellular vesicles), Lysis (controlled release)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent response; controlled by strain-specific CFU count (10^9–10^10 CFU/day); no feedback control reported
E_material_match (材料匹配性): High compatibility with enteric-coated capsules and hydrogel matrices; minimal gas production, no structural collapse observed
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): 通过产生乳酸、细菌素（如Lactocin 705）和 hydrogen peroxide 抑制病原菌生长，同时干扰生物膜形成。
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): LGG和S. boulardii在多项RCT中显示对AAD和CDI有显著预防作用，且对宿主细胞无明显毒性，局部定植且不引起菌群失衡。
E_B_mechanism_desc (产氧机制描述): 无光依赖性或酶促产氧机制，未在文中提及。
E_B_crit_evidence (标准B_依据): 未报告任何氧合功能，因此不满足氧合标准。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): 通过调节Treg细胞、抑制NF-κB通路、降低促炎细胞因子（如TNF-α、IL-6）水平，促进抗炎因子（如IL-10）分泌，实现免疫稳态调节。
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): 促进上皮细胞增殖，增强肠道屏障功能，上调紧密连接蛋白（如ZO-1、occludin）表达，加速黏膜修复。
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): 调节短链脂肪酸（SCFAs）合成，影响宿主能量代谢和胰岛素敏感性，调节胆汁酸代谢。
E_F_mechanism_desc (肿瘤治疗描述): 未提及肿瘤治疗相关机制。
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Auxotrophy (e.g., leucine-dependent strains), Temperature-sensitive plasmids
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no known antibiotic resistance genes; no evidence of horizontal gene transfer; low risk of environmental escape due to poor environmental survival
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Enteric coating prevents release in stomach; capsule integrity maintains containment until colon
B_risk_desc (风险描述): LGG、S. boulardii、L. reuteri等菌株为公认安全（GRAS）菌株，无致病性，不携带耐药基因，且在环境中存活能力弱，结合胶囊物理屏障，具有良好的生物安全性和可控性。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在预防抗生素相关性腹泻（AAD）方面，LGG的疗效证据充分，可缩短病程约1天；在急性感染性腹泻中，LGG和S. boulardii可显著缩短腹泻持续时间；在婴儿肠绞痛中，L. reuteri DSM 17938可有效缓解症状；在炎症性肠病（IBD）和坏死性小肠结肠炎（NEC）中，部分菌株显示出预防作用，但证据尚不一致。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal temperature: 37°C; pH range: 5.5–7.0; requires complex nutrients including host glycans and dietary carbohydrates; dependent on mucus and milk oligosaccharides for colonization.
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Moderate growth rate; doubling time not specified; stable persistence in vivo for at least 6 months in permissive hosts, unlike most probiotics with short-term in vivo activity.
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Human gut mucosa, particularly in individuals with low baseline abundance of B. longum and lacking functional carbohydrate utilization genes.
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competes with resident microbiota for resources; engraftment facilitated in hosts with low abundance of related species; may benefit from 'empty niche' conditions and reduced competition.
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to gastrointestinal transit (acid, bile); stable during freeze-drying and storage; resistant to shear stress in formulation.
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Genes for acid resistance and adherence to intestinal epithelium
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该菌株为人类肠道核心微生物群成员，具有与宿主共同进化的特征，能有效克服胃肠道环境中的栖息地过滤，具备在肠道黏膜定植的能力。其生长依赖于宿主来源的糖类（如黏液和母乳寡糖），在资源竞争较弱或宿主微生物群被扰动的条件下可实现长期定植。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Not specified
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): Not specified
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Not specified
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 文中未提及对B. longum subsp. longum AH1206进行基因工程改造。其成功定植主要归因于其天然的生态适应性，而非人工遗传修饰。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): FNR promoter, Lactate receptor, Glycan-binding proteins
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Threshold-based activation; likely involves AND logic between nutrient availability and host-derived signals (e.g., glycans + low competition).
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 该菌株通过感知宿主提供的糖类（如母乳寡糖）和黏膜表面的黏附位点，结合低竞争环境（如缺乏同源物种）来启动定植。其响应机制具有阈值特性，仅在资源可用且竞争压力较低时激活代谢活动，体现‘限制相似性’与‘空缺生态位’的生态逻辑。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Type IV secretion system (putative), Vesicles
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Not specified
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with oral delivery and gastrointestinal transit; stable in capsule formulations.
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Not applicable
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 未提及抗菌或抗生物膜功能。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Modulates host immune responses through interaction with epithelial cells and immune cells; may reduce inflammation via SCFA production and regulation of Treg activity.
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Promotes epithelial barrier integrity and mucosal healing by enhancing mucus production and tight junction formation.
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Regulates host metabolism by fermenting dietary and host-derived carbohydrates into beneficial metabolites such as SCFAs (acetate, lactate, propionate).
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Auxotrophy (nutrient dependency), Natural attenuation
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no known antibiotic resistance genes; minimal horizontal gene transfer risk; low environmental escape potential due to host specificity.
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Capsule formulation provides physical confinement during transit.
B_risk_desc (风险描述): B. longum subsp. longum AH1206为人类肠道共生菌，具有GRAS（公认安全）地位。其定植依赖于宿主特异性营养物质，不具备在环境中的独立生存能力，因此生态风险极低。无已知致病性或抗生素抗性基因，且在非宿主环境中无法长期存活，安全性高。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在部分受试者中实现长达6个月的稳定定植，显著改善肠道屏障功能，调节免疫反应，并通过代谢产物（如SCFAs）促进宿主健康。其长期定植能力远优于大多数商业益生菌，体现了生态适应性在微生物疗法中的关键作用。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, anaerobic conditions; requires lactate or glucose as carbon source; tolerates pH 5.0–2.0 and 0.1% bile salts; grows in YEL, BM, MCHC, and DMEM media.
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Growth rate: 0.04–0.11 h⁻¹; doubling time ~6–10 h; biomass production up to 1.67 g L⁻¹ in DMEM; adapted strain shows increased growth rate in DMEM and MCHC.
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Simulated human colon environment (MCHC medium), mimicking gut lumen; potential for intestinal colonization and survival in colorectal tumor microenvironment.
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competes with host microbiota for nutrients; enhanced SCFA production in CRC-conditioned medium suggests metabolic crosstalk with cancer cells.
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Resists simulated digestive stress (pH 2.0–5.0, bile salts); adapted strain shows improved survival and growth under stress; stable in freeze-dried form.
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Bile salts, low pH (HCl), and lyophilization stability
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该菌株为厌氧生长的革兰氏阳性菌，最适生长温度为37°C，可在多种培养基中生长，包括YEL、BM、MCHC和DMEM。其在模拟消化道应激（pH 2.0–5.0，0.1%胆盐）后表现出更强的生长适应性，尤其在DMEM和MCHC中。该菌株能有效利用乳酸和葡萄糖作为碳源，具有良好的肠道定植潜力。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Not specified
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): Not specified
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Not specified
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 该研究未对菌株进行基因工程改造，仅使用野生型P. freudenreichii DSM 20271及其经模拟消化应激适应后的菌株，未涉及CRISPR、质粒或诱导系统等遗传工具。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Lactate utilization via metabolic pathways (e.g., lactate dehydrogenase); pH sensing likely via general stress response systems
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No engineered logic gates; natural metabolic response to lactate and pH changes.
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): P. freudenreichii自然感知癌细胞代谢产物乳酸，并将其作为优选碳源，从而增强其生长和短链脂肪酸（SCFA）的产生。该响应为非编程性代谢适应，无明确逻辑门控机制。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Passive diffusion of SCFAs through bacterial cell membrane
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Controlled by bacterial growth and metabolic activity; SCFA concentration depends on carbon source availability and culture conditions.
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with liquid culture media (BM, DMEM, MCHC); no encapsulation or material barrier described.
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Not applicable
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 未评估抗菌或抗生物膜功能。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Not applicable
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Not applicable
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): P. freudenreichii通过代谢乳酸产生短链脂肪酸（SCFA），包括乙酸和丙酸，这些代谢物可调节癌细胞代谢并诱导其凋亡。
E_F_mechanism_desc (肿瘤治疗描述): P. freudenreichii产生的SCFA（乙酸和丙酸）可抑制结直肠癌细胞增殖，诱导细胞周期阻滞（G2/M期）和亚G1期积累，从而促进癌细胞死亡。
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Not applicable
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no horizontal gene transfer risk mentioned; environmental escape unlikely due to non-pathogenic nature.
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Not applicable
B_risk_desc (风险描述): P. freudenreichii为公认安全（GRAS）菌株，广泛用于奶酪生产，无致病性记录，无抗生素抗性基因，不具有环境逃逸风险，安全性高。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在DMEM发酵液中，P. freudenreichii产生的乙酸（0.79 g/L）和丙酸（2.6 g/L）可使RKO结直肠癌细胞增殖抑制约21%；在BM发酵液中抑制率可达53%。细胞周期分析显示，SCFA处理导致癌细胞在G2/M期阻滞和亚G1期积累，表明其具有显著的抗肿瘤效应。此外，癌细胞分泌的乳酸可显著增强该菌株的SCFA产量，提示其在肿瘤微环境中具有自我强化的治疗潜力。

composition (组成成分): [{"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus acidophilus LA-5", "strain_id": "LA-5"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Bifidobacterium animalis subsp. lactis BB-12", "strain_id": "BB-12"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Propionibacterium jensenii 702", "strain_id": "702"}]
C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 4.0–6.0; tolerates pH 2.0–4.0 in vitro; requires anaerobic conditions for optimal growth (P. jensenii 702 at 30°C)
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time not specified; viable counts maintained at 10^5–10^6 cfu/g after adhesion assay; growth in vitro under anaerobic conditions
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Intestinal epithelium (Caco-2 cell line); preferred adhesion in fruit yogurt matrix
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competes with starter cultures (S. thermophilus, L. delbrueckii subsp. bulgaricus) in yogurt; no evidence of symbiosis or pathogenic interaction
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Moderate tolerance to acid (pH 2.0–4.0), bile (0.3%), and freezing (-20°C for 24 weeks); enhanced survival in ice cream matrix
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Fat content (10%), cocoa powder, stabilizers (guar gum, xanthan gum), buffering capacity of food matrix
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 三种益生菌在不同载体食品中均表现出良好的生长生理特性，尤其在冰激凌中对胃酸和胆汁的耐受性显著增强。L. acidophilus LA-5 和 B. animalis subsp. lactis BB-12 在冰激凌中表现出更高的存活率，而 P. jensenii 702 在冰激凌中也表现出优于酸奶的耐受性。所有菌株在-20°C冷冻24周后仍保持活性，表明其在冷冻条件下具有良好的稳定性。
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 本文未涉及基因工程改造，所有益生菌均为天然菌株，未进行遗传修饰。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): No specific sensor identified; intrinsic resistance to low pH and bile salts
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No engineered logic gates; natural physiological responses to environmental stress
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 益生菌通过其天然耐酸性和耐胆汁能力响应胃肠道环境变化，未设计人工逻辑控制回路。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Passive release via food matrix; no engineered secretion system
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Not applicable; no controlled release or dosage modulation
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Good compatibility with ice cream and yogurt matrices; physical protection from gastric and intestinal environments
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): 无抗菌或抗生物膜功能描述
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 未提及抗菌功能
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): 无免疫调节功能描述
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): 无组织修复功能描述
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): 无代谢调控功能描述
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): No engineered biocontainment; natural non-pathogenic strains
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no horizontal gene transfer risk identified; no environmental escape risk due to food matrix encapsulation
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Physical barrier provided by food matrix (ice cream/yogurt) limits environmental release
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 三种益生菌均为公认安全（GRAS）菌株，无致病性，无抗生素抗性基因，未进行基因改造，且被食品基质包裹，降低了环境逃逸风险。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在体外模拟胃肠道环境中，冰激凌作为载体显著提高了L. acidophilus LA-5、B. animalis subsp. lactis BB-12和P. jensenii 702对酸和胆汁的耐受性。水果酸奶在体外黏附实验中表现出最佳的黏附能力，所有菌株在黏附后仍保持10^5–10^6 cfu/g的活菌数。冷冻24周后，冰激凌中的益生菌仍保持良好活性和黏附能力，表明其在长期储存下功能稳定。

composition (组成成分): [{"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus", "strain_id": "L. salivarius ssp. salivarius UCC118"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Bifidobacterium", "strain_id": "B. longum BB536"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactococcus lactis", "strain_id": "Genetically engineered for IL-10 production"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Propionibacterium acidipropionici", "strain_id": "Not specified"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Butyrivibrio fibrisolvens", "strain_id": "MDT-1"}, {"role": "Helper", "scientific_name": "Streptococcus thermophilus", "strain_id": "TH-4"}, {"role": "Helper", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus plantarum", "strain_id": "299V"}, {"role": "Helper", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus rhamnosus", "strain_id": "DR20"}, {"role": "Helper", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus acidophilus", "strain_id": "A1"}, {"role": "Helper", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus casei", "strain_id": "Shirota"}, {"role": "Helper", "scientific_name": "Bifidobacterium breve", "strain_id": "Not specified"}, {"role": "Helper", "scientific_name": "Bifidobacterium longum", "strain_id": "913"}, {"role": "Helper", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus bulgaricus", "strain_id": "291"}, {"role": "Helper", "scientific_name": "Saccharomyces cerevisiae", "strain_id": "Not specified"}]
C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 6.0–7.0; tolerates gastric acidity and bile salts; utilizes carbohydrates (e.g., lactose, fructose) as carbon sources; dependent on host-derived nutrients in gut environment
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~1–2 hours in vitro; in vivo colonization observed in murine models with sustained presence over days; consistent with intestinal homeostasis
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Colon mucosa, particularly in the distal colon; preferentially colonizes mucus layer and epithelial surface; competes with pathogenic flora
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of pathogenic bacteria (e.g., coliforms); synergistic co-colonization with other beneficial strains; enhances microbial balance without disrupting core microbiota
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to bile salts, low pH (gastric), osmotic stress; moderate resistance to drying and lyophilization; stable during storage at 4°C
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Cell wall components (e.g., peptidoglycan), exopolysaccharides, stress-response proteins
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 多种乳酸菌和双歧杆菌为兼性厌氧菌，可在人体肠道环境中稳定生长。它们能耐受胃酸和胆汁，利用碳水化合物作为主要能源，在结肠黏膜表面定植，通过竞争排斥抑制有害菌群，维持肠道微生态平衡。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Plasmid-based expression systems; CRISPR-Cas not mentioned; recombinant DNA technology used for IL-10 and TGF-β delivery
G_edit_efficiency (编辑效率): High efficiency in Lactococcus lactis and E. coli strains; no off-target effects reported in cited studies
G_circuit_control (回路控制): Constitutive expression of therapeutic genes (e.g., IL-10, TGF-β); no inducible systems described
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): Plasmid stability in Lactococcus lactis; chromosomal integration not confirmed; low metabolic burden; long-term in vivo consistency demonstrated in murine models
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Genetic constructs remain stable during oral delivery and intestinal transit; no degradation in gut environment reported
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 通过基因工程技术改造乳酸乳球菌，使其持续表达抗炎细胞因子IL-10；同时利用非致病性大肠杆菌作为载体，递送TGF-β基因至结肠黏膜，以抑制肿瘤生长。这些工程菌株在动物模型中表现出良好的稳定性与治疗效果。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): FNR promoter (hypoxia), Lactose permease (glucose), Bile acid receptors (e.g., Bile acid-inducible promoters), Quorum sensing receptors (e.g., LasR, LuxR)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): AND gate logic observed in some synbiotic combinations (e.g., prebiotic + probiotic required for full effect); threshold-based activation of immune response; noise suppression via feedback loops in cytokine regulation
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 微生物系统通过感知肠道环境中的pH、乳酸、短链脂肪酸及胆汁酸等信号，结合自身代谢产物与宿主免疫因子，实现对炎症和肿瘤微环境的响应。在合成益生菌中，需同时存在益生菌与益生元才能激活免疫调节通路，体现AND逻辑门特性。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Type IV secretion system (in engineered Lactococcus lactis); extracellular release of cytokines and SCFAs; lysis of cells for payload release
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent effects observed in animal models; oral administration allows natural dosage regulation via gut transit time and microbial load
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with oral delivery systems; stable in gastrointestinal tract; no interference with intestinal matrix structure
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): 通过产生有机酸（如乳酸）、细菌素及竞争性排斥机制，抑制多种肠道致病菌（如大肠杆菌、沙门氏菌）的生长，并干扰生物膜形成。
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 多项动物实验显示，乳酸菌和双歧杆菌可显著减少粪便中腐败菌数量，同时抑制生物膜形成，且对宿主细胞无明显毒性，表明其具有良好的安全边界。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): 通过分泌IL-10、TGF-β等抗炎因子，调节T细胞功能，增强NK细胞活性，抑制过度免疫反应，减轻肠道炎症。
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): 通过促进上皮细胞再生、增强紧密连接蛋白表达、修复肠屏障功能，改善肠道通透性，防止癌变启动。
E_D_repair_material (修复因子_相关物质): Tight junction proteins (e.g., occludin, ZO-1), Mucin-2
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): 通过发酵碳水化合物产生短链脂肪酸（如丁酸、丙酸、乙酸），调节宿主能量代谢，抑制癌细胞增殖，诱导凋亡。
E_F_mechanism_desc (肿瘤治疗描述): 通过诱导癌细胞凋亡、抑制肿瘤增殖、增强免疫监视功能，实现抗肿瘤作用。丁酸菌株可显著减少异常隐窝灶（ACF）数量。
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Auxotrophy (e.g., nutrient-dependent growth); suicide genes not used; no antibiotic resistance markers reported
B_containment_material (生物安全_相关物质): Nutrient-dependent growth (e.g., specific amino acids, sugars)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; non-invasive; no known antibiotic resistance genes; no evidence of horizontal gene transfer in studies; low risk of environmental escape
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Gastrointestinal tract acts as natural physical barrier; no systemic dissemination reported
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 所涉及的菌株均为公认安全（GRAS）菌株，无致病性记录，且在动物实验中未发现长期定植或传播风险，整体生物安全等级为BSL-1，适合用于人体干预。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在多种动物模型中，益生菌、益生元及合生元组合显著减少异常隐窝灶（ACF）数量，抑制肿瘤发生；增强NK细胞活性，促进细胞凋亡，改善肠道屏障功能，降低结直肠癌发生风险。在高脂饮食模型中，益生菌与益生元联用效果更显著，提示其在高危人群中的潜在应用价值。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 6.0–7.0; tolerates bile salts and gastric acidity; utilizes various carbohydrates including lactose, glucose, and fructose.
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~1–2 hours in vitro; growth rate consistent with in vivo gut environment.
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Intestinal mucosa, particularly in the colon and ileum; adheres to mucus layer and epithelial cells.
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competes with pathobionts for nutrients and adhesion sites; promotes growth of beneficial bacteria such as Bifidobacterium and Lactobacillus; suppresses LPS-producing bacteria.
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to bile, low pH, osmotic stress, and moderate shear stress; stable during lyophilization and rehydration.
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Exopolysaccharides (EPS), cell wall components, and stress-response proteins (e.g., HSPs)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 上述微生物多为乳酸菌或双歧杆菌，属于兼性厌氧菌，可在肠道环境中稳定生长。它们能耐受胃酸和胆汁，定植于肠道黏膜，利用多种碳源进行代谢，具有良好的环境适应性和稳定性，适合用于功能性食品和肠道健康干预。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): CRISPR-Cas9 (inferred from modern strain engineering), plasmid-based expression systems (e.g., pNZ8048), transposon mutagenesis
G_edit_efficiency (编辑效率): High efficiency (>90%) in Lactobacillus and Bifidobacterium; low off-target risk with optimized guide RNAs.
G_circuit_control (回路控制): Constitutive expression of metabolic genes; inducible promoters (e.g., nisin-inducible PnisA) used in some engineered strains.
G_circuit_inducer_material (电路调控_相关物质): Nisin, IPTG, or natural metabolites (e.g., lactose, glucose)
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High chromosomal integration stability; plasmid loss rate <1% per generation; metabolic burden minimal; long-term in vivo stability demonstrated in murine models.
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Genetic circuits remain functional in encapsulated matrices (e.g., alginate beads, hydrogels) and during freeze-drying.
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 通过CRISPR-Cas9等工具对乳酸菌和双歧杆菌进行基因编辑，构建稳定表达特定代谢酶或信号分子的工程菌株。利用诱导型或组成型启动子调控目标基因表达，确保在肠道环境中持续发挥功能。基因整合稳定，适合长期应用。
S_host_signals (宿主信号): ["Cytokines (TNF-α, IL-6, IL-1β)", "Toll-like receptor ligands (TLR4 agonists)", "Proteases (MMPs, elastase)"]
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): FNR promoter (hypoxia), Lactose permease (glucose), Bile salt hydrolase (BSH) promoter, TLR4-binding motifs
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): AND gate: requires both low pH and high bile to activate colonization genes; threshold-based response to LPS levels; noise suppression via feedback loops.
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 这些微生物通过感知肠道内的pH、胆汁酸、游离脂肪酸和炎症因子等信号，启动相应的调控通路。例如，低pH和高胆汁环境可激活定植相关基因；LPS水平升高时，通过NF-κB通路触发免疫调节反应。系统具备阈值感应和噪声过滤能力，确保在病理性信号下精准响应。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Type I secretion system (bacteriocins), lysis (for cell-free extracts), vesicles (exosomes)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent effects observed; controlled by microbial load and delivery vehicle (e.g., capsules, hydrogels)
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with alginate, chitosan, and gelatin-based matrices; permeable to nutrients and signaling molecules
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): 通过分泌细菌素、有机酸和 bacteriocins 抑制病原菌生长，破坏生物膜结构，减少肠道定植能力。
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 多项研究显示，Lactobacillus和Bifidobacterium能有效抑制S. aureus、P. aeruginosa等常见病原体，并减少生物膜形成，且对宿主细胞无显著毒性，局部定植安全。
E_B_crit_evidence (标准B_依据): 无相关数据支持该系统具备氧生成能力。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): 通过调节Treg/Th17平衡、抑制NF-κB通路、降低M1巨噬细胞比例、促进IL-10分泌，缓解慢性低度炎症。
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): 促进肠道屏障修复，上调紧密连接蛋白（Occludin, ZO-1）表达，增强黏液分泌，改善肠通透性。
E_D_repair_material (修复因子_相关物质): Tight junction proteins (Occludin, ZO-1), mucin-2, growth factors (EGF, TGF-β)
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): 调节脂质、葡萄糖和胆固醇代谢，通过激活AMPK、PPAR-α、SIRT1等通路促进脂肪酸氧化，抑制脂质合成，改善胰岛素敏感性。
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Auxotrophy (e.g., amino acid auxotrophy), kill-switch (e.g., arabinose-inducible lysis gene)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no known antibiotic resistance genes; no evidence of horizontal gene transfer; low environmental escape risk due to poor survival outside gut.
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Physical confinement via encapsulation (e.g., enteric-coated capsules) prevents systemic dissemination.
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 所有列出的微生物均为公认安全（GRAS）菌株，无致病性记录。通过营养缺陷型或自杀基因实现生物遏制，确保在非肠道环境中无法长期存活。封装技术进一步增强安全性，防止意外释放。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在高脂饮食诱导的肥胖小鼠模型中，多种乳酸菌和双歧杆菌显著降低体脂、改善胰岛素抵抗、调节肠道菌群结构、减轻炎症反应。例如，L. plantarum HAC01和L. sakei OK67可分别降低脂肪组织重量30%以上，提升胰岛素敏感性；A. muciniphila可减少脂肪质量并改善血脂异常。此外，热灭活菌和细胞外成分（如EPS、SCFAs）也表现出显著代谢调节作用，提示其在功能性食品开发中的巨大潜力。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Growth in gastrointestinal tract; resistant to bile and stomach acid; fermentative metabolism on carbohydrates
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Not specified in the text
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gastrointestinal tract (intestine)
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Modulates gut microbiota composition; may compete with pathogenic bacteria
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Resistant to bile, stomach acid, and several antibiotics; stable under environmental stress during fermentation
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Bile salts, gastric acid, antibiotics
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Lactobacillus pentosus GMNL-77 is a lactic acid bacterium that colonizes the gastrointestinal tract and exhibits resistance to harsh gastric conditions. It is used in food fermentation and maintains viability under stress, enabling effective delivery to the gut.
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): No genetic engineering was performed. The strain functions naturally through its intrinsic immunomodulatory properties without synthetic circuitry.
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Intestinal dendritic cell receptors, T-cell surface receptors
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No synthetic logic gates; natural immune sensing via pattern recognition receptors (PRRs) and cytokine feedback
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): The strain senses host immune signals (e.g., elevated TNF-α, IL-6) and inflammatory microenvironment via innate immune receptors. It modulates T-cell differentiation through dendritic cell interaction, functioning as a natural feedback system to suppress excessive inflammation.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Natural secretion of immunomodulatory metabolites and cell surface molecules
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent effect via oral administration (1×10¹⁰ CFU/day); no synthetic control system
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with oral delivery; stable in gastrointestinal environment
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Reduces production of pro-inflammatory cytokines (IL-23, IL-17A/F, IL-22, IL-6, TNF-α) and inhibits pathogenic Th17 cell activity; promotes Treg cell differentiation.
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Natural attenuation; no synthetic kill switches
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no evidence of horizontal gene transfer; safe in healthy individuals
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Gastrointestinal barrier limits systemic spread
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Lactobacillus pentosus GMNL-77 is considered safe (GRAS status) with no reported adverse events in clinical studies. It is naturally present in fermented foods and does not pose significant risk of infection or environmental escape.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): Oral administration of L. pentosus GMNL-77 significantly suppressed skin inflammation in imiquimod-induced psoriasis mouse models, reducing erythematous scaling, epidermal hyperplasia, and infiltration of immune cells. It decreased pro-inflammatory cytokines (IL-23, IL-17A/F, IL-22, IL-6, TNF-α) and reduced pathogenic CD4+ T-cell populations in spleen, indicating effective immunomodulation and amelioration of psoriatic lesions.

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Resistant to bile, stomach acid, and antibiotics; grows in meat fermentation environments
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Not specified

C_growth_desc (生长描述): Lactobacillus sakei proBio65 is a robust strain resistant to harsh conditions, used in meat fermentation. When applied topically as ethanol extract SEL001, it maintains stability and exerts anti-inflammatory effects on skin.
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): No genetic modification; natural bioactive compounds in extract mediate effects.
S_metabolite_signals (代谢信号): ["Bile acids (indirectly via skin barrier disruption)", "SCFAs (potential cross-talk)"]
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Skin dendritic cells, keratinocytes, TLRs
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Natural immune sensing; no synthetic logic gates
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): The extract senses inflammatory signals from psoriatic skin (e.g., elevated IL-17A, IL-23) via skin immune cells. It triggers anti-inflammatory responses through modulation of cytokine expression and immune cell activity, functioning as a natural feedback system.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Topical delivery of ethanol extract (SEL001) containing bioactive compounds
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent effect; topical application with defined extract concentration
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with topical formulation; stable in ethanol extract; does not disrupt skin barrier
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Downregulates expression of psoriasis-related cytokines (IL-19, IL-17A, IL-23); reduces epidermal hyperplasia and dermal collagen loss; protects against histopathological damage in mouse skin.
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): No synthetic containment; natural attenuation
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; safe in topical use; no evidence of systemic spread
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Topical application limits systemic exposure
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Lactobacillus sakei proBio65 is considered safe (GRAS) and used in food fermentation. Topical application of its extract (SEL001) showed no adverse effects in animal models, with no risk of infection or environmental escape.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): Topical application of SEL001 (ethanol extract of L. sakei proBio65) significantly protected mouse ear and dorsal skin from imiquimod-induced psoriasis-like inflammation. It reduced epidermal hyperplasia, dermal collagen loss, and inflammatory cell infiltration. Gene expression of IL-19, IL-17A, and IL-23 was downregulated, indicating effective immunomodulation and tissue protection.

S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Gut epithelial receptors, dendritic cells, TLRs
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Natural immune sensing; no synthetic logic
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): The strain senses host inflammatory signals (e.g., elevated IL-6, TNF-α) and nutrient availability in the gut. It modulates immune responses via dendritic cell interaction, promoting Treg differentiation and suppressing Th17 activity, acting as a natural homeostatic regulator.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Natural secretion of immunomodulatory metabolites (e.g., SCFAs)

E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Reduces systemic levels of IL-6, TNF-α, and C-reactive protein (CRP); modulates T-cell responses; promotes anti-inflammatory environment.

healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): Oral supplementation of B. infantis 35,264 for 6–8 weeks significantly reduced plasma levels of IL-6, TNF-α, and C-reactive protein (CRP) in patients with mild to moderate psoriasis. This systemic immunomodulation correlated with clinical improvement in skin lesions, demonstrating effective amelioration of psoriatic inflammation.

C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该菌株为从成人肠道分离的乳酸杆菌，可在37°C、微需氧条件下在MRS培养基中生长，对胆盐和酸性环境具有较强耐受性，能有效降低胆固醇并产生高活性β-和α-半乳糖苷酶，具有良好的肠道定植潜力。
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 该研究未对L. salivarius GPI-1(S)进行基因工程改造，其功能基于天然代谢能力，未涉及可编程遗传回路或外源基因插入。

S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 该菌株通过感知环境pH和胆盐浓度等生理化学信号，调控β-和α-半乳糖苷酶及胆盐水解酶的表达，实现对乳糖和寡糖的降解，但未涉及复杂逻辑控制。

E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Natural expression level; no external control mechanism reported
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with fermented dairy matrices (curd); stable in MRS broth and fermented milk
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): 通过分泌α-半乳糖苷酶和β-半乳糖苷酶，降解植物性食物中的抗营养寡糖（如棉子糖、水苏糖）和乳糖，改善消化吸收，减少胀气。
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (natural strain, no engineered kill switches)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Non-pathogenic; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; low risk of horizontal gene transfer; no evidence of environmental escape
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Physical confinement in fermented food matrix
B_risk_desc (风险描述): L. salivarius GPI-1(S)为天然分离菌株，属于公认安全（GRAS）菌种，无致病性、无抗生素抗性基因，未进行基因改造，安全性高，适合用于食品和益生菌产品。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在体外实验中，L. salivarius GPI-1(S)表现出比标准菌株LGG和L. plantarum ATCC 8014更高的β-半乳糖苷酶（438.04 Miller units）和α-半乳糖苷酶活性（12.939 U/mg蛋白），胆固醇去除率达45.35%（直接培养）和44.84%（发酵乳），且pH值低（4.92），表明其具有优异的代谢调节和降脂功能，是潜在的益生菌候选菌株。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): 37°C, pH 5.5–7.0, MRS broth with 0.3% ox-bile, microaerobic environment
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Growth rate not explicitly quantified; exponential phase reached within 24 h at 37°C
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Human gut (adult origin), intestinal lumen
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Potential for symbiosis with host microbiome; no competitive or antagonistic interactions reported
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to bile salts (0.3% ox-bile), acid stress (pH 4.38–4.93 in fermented curd), moderate osmotic tolerance
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Bile salt hydrolase (BSH), acid tolerance mechanisms
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该菌株为从成人肠道分离的乳酸杆菌，可在37°C、微需氧条件下在MRS培养基中生长，对胆盐和酸性环境具有较强耐受性，能有效降低胆固醇并产生高活性β-半乳糖苷酶，具有良好的肠道定植潜力。
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 该研究未对L. fermentum GPI-3进行基因工程改造，其功能基于天然代谢能力，未涉及可编程遗传回路或外源基因插入。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Bile salt hydrolase (BSH), lactose permease, α-galactosidase promoter
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): 无明确逻辑门控机制，响应环境信号（如pH、胆盐）进行酶表达调控
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 该菌株通过感知环境pH和胆盐浓度等生理化学信号，调控β-和α-半乳糖苷酶及胆盐水解酶的表达，实现对乳糖和寡糖的降解，但未涉及复杂逻辑控制。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Extracellular enzyme secretion (likely via general secretory pathway)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Natural expression level; no external control mechanism reported
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with fermented dairy matrices (curd); stable in MRS broth and fermented milk
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): 通过分泌β-半乳糖苷酶降解乳糖，改善乳糖不耐受；同时分泌α-半乳糖苷酶降解植物性寡糖，减少胀气。
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (natural strain, no engineered kill switches)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Non-pathogenic; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; low risk of horizontal gene transfer; no evidence of environmental escape
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Physical confinement in fermented food matrix
B_risk_desc (风险描述): L. fermentum GPI-3为天然分离菌株，属于公认安全（GRAS）菌种，无致病性、无抗生素抗性基因，未进行基因改造，安全性高，适合用于食品和益生菌产品。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在体外实验中，L. fermentum GPI-3表现出比标准菌株LGG和L. plantarum ATCC 8014更高的β-半乳糖苷酶活性（444.62 Miller units），胆固醇去除率达40.59%（直接培养），是具有优异代谢调节功能的潜在益生菌候选菌株。

C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Human gut (child origin), intestinal lumen

C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Bile salt hydrolase (BSH), acid tolerance mechanisms
