S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 该系统未涉及主动感知或逻辑控制机制，其功能依赖于天然生理特性，而非工程化传感模块。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Natural colonization and secretion (no engineered delivery system)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Daily oral administration for 3 days; dose fixed at 1×10⁸ CFU
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with drinking water delivery; no encapsulation or material matrix used
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): 通过竞争性定植和抑制病原菌生长，减少E. coli O78在肝脏和脾脏的侵袭。
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 在接种E. faecalis-1的组别中，E. coli O78在肝脾中的分离率显著降低（G04: 20%；G05: 0%），且无组织损伤报告，表明其活性可控且安全。
E_B_mechanism_desc (产氧机制描述): 未涉及氧气生成或耗氧调控机制。
E_B_crit_evidence (标准B_依据): 未提及任何与氧代谢相关的功能或工程设计。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): 显著提高血清IgY水平，增强体液免疫应答，从而提升对APEC O78的抵抗力。
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): 通过改善肠道屏障功能、促进营养吸收和减少炎症反应，间接支持组织修复与生长。
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): 未提及代谢产物调控功能。
E_F_mechanism_desc (肿瘤治疗描述): 未涉及肿瘤治疗相关机制。
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Not applicable (natural strain, no kill-switch or auxotrophy described)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): No antibiotic resistance genes reported; no virulence genes detected; low opportunistic risk in poultry; no horizontal gene transfer data provided
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): None (no physical barrier used)
B_risk_desc (风险描述): E. faecalis-1为从健康鸡中分离的天然菌株，未检测到毒力基因，且在鸡群中使用安全，符合GRAS标准，无基因工程改造，风险较低。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): E. faecalis-1显著改善了肉鸡的生长性能（体重、体增重、FCR、热胴体重和屠宰率），降低APEC O78感染后的死亡率（G04和G05为3.4%，G02为16.7%），并显著减少肝脾中病原菌的侵袭（G04: 20%；G05: 0%），同时显著提高血清IgY水平（G06: 1.97±0.1 mg/ml），表明其在免疫调节和抗感染方面具有显著疗效。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Temperature: 37°C; pH: Neutral to slightly acidic; Nutritional requirements: Complex media with carbohydrates (e.g., oligofructose, inulin); Growth in intestinal environment
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Growth rate: Moderate; Doubling time: Not specified; In vivo homeostasis: Maintained in piglet gut during trial; In vitro: Stable in lyophilized form and feed
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Intestinal mucosa, particularly ileum and colon; Preferential niche: Colon
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of Salmonella; Synergistic growth with prebiotic (oligofructose-enriched inulin); No significant disruption of native microbiota reported
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to lyophilization and rehydration; Stable in feed for 24 h; Tolerant to gastric transit (confirmed by colonic detection)
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Lyophilization matrix (maltodextrin); Feed environment
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Bifidobacterium longum subsp. infantis CECT 7210 and Lactobacillus rhamnosus HN001 are facultative anaerobes capable of surviving in the piglet gastrointestinal tract. Both strains maintain viability in feed for at least 24 hours and colonize the colon, with B. infantis detected at 5.75 log cfu/g in colonic content. They thrive in a neutral to slightly acidic environment and utilize complex nutrients, including prebiotics like oligofructose-enriched inulin, which enhances their survival and activity.
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): No genetic modifications reported; Natural chromosomal stability; No plasmid-based systems used; No evidence of genetic drift or loss in vivo
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): No engineered genetic circuits; Stability maintained in feed and gastrointestinal environment
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): The microbial consortium is not genetically modified. The strains are used in their natural form, relying on intrinsic physiological traits for function. No synthetic circuits, inducible promoters, or CRISPR tools were employed. The system functions based on native metabolic and competitive capabilities.
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Native metabolic sensors (e.g., sugar transporters, pH-responsive regulators); No specific engineered receptors reported
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No synthetic logic gates; Natural response to environmental cues (e.g., nutrient availability, pH change) without engineered thresholds or amplification
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): The consortium responds to changes in intestinal pH and nutrient availability (e.g., oligofructose) through native metabolic sensing. The presence of prebiotics enhances growth of Bifidobacterium and Lactobacillus, which in turn modulates SCFA production and immune markers. No engineered logic or feedback control is involved.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Native secretion (e.g., SCFAs, bacteriocins); No engineered secretion systems reported
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Natural dosage based on strain viability and prebiotic availability; No external control mechanisms
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with feed and gastrointestinal environment; No structural disruption observed; Stable in lyophilized form
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Inhibits Salmonella Typhimurium colonization through competitive exclusion of adhesion sites and nutrient competition; L. rhamnosus HN001 produces bacteriocin-like substances.
E_A_agent_material (抗菌因子_相关物质): Bacteriocin-like substances (L. rhamnosus HN001); Competitive exclusion (both strains)
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): L. rhamnosus HN001 produces bacteriocin-like substances; Both strains reduce Salmonella colonization in ileum and colon; No significant cytotoxicity or microbiome disruption reported; PRO group showed faster pathogen clearance; PRE group achieved undetectable Salmonella levels in all samples.
E_B_crit_evidence (标准B_依据): No oxygenation mechanism reported; Not applicable.
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Modulates host immune response by increasing serum Pig-MAP concentration and promoting intraepithelial lymphocyte (IEL) proliferation; Reduces pro-inflammatory cytokine expression.
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): Pig-MAP (acute-phase protein); Intraepithelial lymphocytes (IEL); TNF-α modulation
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Promotes recovery of ileal villi/crypt ratio after Salmonella-induced damage; Enhances mucosal integrity and epithelial regeneration.
E_D_repair_material (修复因子_相关物质): Short-chain fatty acids (SCFAs); Mucosal barrier enhancement
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Alters intestinal fermentation profile by increasing valeric acid and SCFA production; Modulates gut metabolism via prebiotic fermentation.
E_E_metabolite_material (代谢物_相关物质): Valeric acid; Acetic acid; Propionic acid; Butyric acid
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): No engineered kill switches or auxotrophy; Natural attenuation in non-host environment
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; No antibiotic resistance genes reported; No evidence of horizontal gene transfer; Low risk of environmental escape; Safe for use in livestock
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Feed delivery system provides physical confinement; No encapsulation or barrier materials used
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Both strains are classified as GRAS (Generally Recognized As Safe). No genetic modifications or antibiotic resistance markers were introduced. The consortium is naturally attenuated in non-host environments and does not persist beyond the gut. No adverse effects on host or microbiome were observed in the trial.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): The probiotic consortium (PRO) significantly accelerated Salmonella clearance, with 65% of animals becoming negative by day 7 post-inoculation, compared to 0% in the control group. The PRO group also showed faster recovery of ileal villi/crypt ratio. The prebiotic (PRE) treatment led to undetectable Salmonella levels in all samples and significantly increased serum Pig-MAP levels, indicating enhanced immune response. The synbiotic (SYN) group did not show synergistic benefits, suggesting no additive effect in this model. Overall, the system effectively reduced pathogen load, improved intestinal integrity, and modulated immunity.

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): 37°C, 嫌気環境, GAM培地, 炭酸ガス発生袋による嫌気環境
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): 24時間培養で発芽・増殖、30分後小腸上部で発芽、2時間後分裂増殖開始
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): 小腸上部から中央部、腸管内環境
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): 耐性乳酸菌製剤と比較して、抗菌剤存在下でも生存可能。腸内環境に適応し、発芽後に増殖。
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): 芽胞形成により抗菌剤、乾燥、熱、酸性環境などに対する耐性を有する。再増殖が確認された。
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Spore (芽胞)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 芽胞形成性の嫌気性菌であり、消化管内では抗菌剤濃度が低下した際に発芽・増殖し、整腸作用を発揮する。抗菌剤存在下でも芽胞として生存可能。
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): 自然に芽胞形成するため、遺伝子改変なし。安定性は芽胞の物理的耐性に依存。
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): 芽胞は材料（製剤）中に封入され、安定して保存可能。
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 人為的な耐性遺伝子導入は行われていない。自然の芽胞形成能力により、抗菌剤に対する耐性を獲得している。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): FNR promoter (推定), 未明示
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): 芽胞形成は抗菌剤存在下でのストレス応答として制御され、濃度低下時に発芽・増殖を開始する。閾値応答と時間遅延を含む。
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 抗菌剤濃度が高いと発育抑制・芽胞形成。濃度が低下すると芽胞が発芽し、増殖を開始。これは環境の変化（抗菌剤濃度低下）を感知し、生存戦略を切り替える論理制御。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): 未明示（自然分泌、芽胞破壊後発芽による放出）
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): 抗菌剤濃度の低下に応じて発芽・増殖が開始され、自然なフィードバック制御。
E_material_match (材料匹配性): 製剤（ミヤ BM細粒）中に封入され、芽胞として安定。材料の物理的構造に影響を与えない。
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): 芽胞形成により抗菌剤の影響を回避し、腸内環境に再定着・増殖することで、病原菌の定着を抑制。
E_A_agent_material (抗菌因子_相关物质): 未明示（自然の定着能力）
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 芽胞形成により抗菌剤に曝露されても生存し、濃度低下後に発芽・増殖。腸内環境に適応し、病原菌の定着を防ぐ。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): 腸内環境のバランスを回復し、炎症反応を抑制。腸管免疫系を調整。
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): 未明示（酪酸、SCFAsなど代謝産物）
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): 腸粘膜の修復を促進し、上皮細胞の再生を支援。
E_D_repair_material (修复因子_相关物质): 未明示（酪酸、SCFAs、成長因子など）
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): 酪酸（Butyrate）を産生し、腸上皮細胞のエネルギー源として利用。腸内環境のpHを調整。
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): 芽胞形成による自然的生物制御。人為的殺傷スイッチなし。
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): 非病原性。腸内常在菌。耐性遺伝子なし。水平遺伝子移動リスク低。環境逃逸リスク低。
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): 製剤の物理的封入により、腸管外への漏出を防止。
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 芽胞形成性の非病原性菌であり、人為的遺伝子改変なし。耐性遺伝子も持たず、環境中での拡散リスクは極めて低い。臨床使用歴あり。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 抗菌剤投与による下痢予防に有効。芽胞形成により抗菌剤に曝露されても生存し、腸内環境に再定着・増殖。腸粘膜修復・免疫調整・代謝調整により、腸内環境の回復を促進。

composition (组成成分): [{"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus spp.", "strain_id": "Not specified"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Bifidobacterium spp.", "strain_id": "Not specified"}, {"role": "Helper", "scientific_name": "Propionibacterium freudenreichii ssp. shermanii", "strain_id": "JS"}, {"role": "Helper", "scientific_name": "Bifidobacterium breve", "strain_id": "Bb99"}, {"role": "Helper", "scientific_name": "Bifidobacterium animalis ssp. lactis", "strain_id": "Bb12"}]
C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 6.5–7.0; requires complex media with carbohydrates (e.g., lactose, fructose), vitamins, and amino acids; dependent on host-derived nutrients in vivo.
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~1–2 hours in vitro; stable colonization in human gut with moderate in vivo growth rate.
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Intestinal mucosa and lumen; preferentially colonize the colon and small intestine.
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of pathogenic bacteria; synergistic interactions with other beneficial microbes; minimal disruption to native microbiota.
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Moderate tolerance to gastric acid and bile; stable during lyophilization and rehydration; sensitive to high shear stress.
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Cell wall components (e.g., peptidoglycan), exopolysaccharides (EPS), and stress-response proteins (e.g., GroEL, DnaK).
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 这些益生菌为兼性厌氧菌，可在人体肠道内定植，依赖宿主提供的碳源和营养物质生长。它们在胃酸和胆汁环境中具有中等耐受性，适合通过口服途径递送。在体外培养条件下，其倍增时间为1–2小时，体内定植能力稳定。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Plasmid-based expression systems (e.g., pNZ8148), CRISPR-Cas9 (in research settings), Recombination (for chromosomal integration).
G_edit_efficiency (编辑效率): High efficiency (>90%) for plasmid transformation; moderate off-target risk in CRISPR editing.
G_circuit_control (回路控制): Constitutive expression of beneficial genes; inducible systems (e.g., lactose-inducible promoters) used in experimental models.
G_circuit_inducer_material (电路调控_相关物质): Lactose, IPTG (isopropyl β-D-1-thiogalactopyranoside), or native promoters (e.g., P15A, P43).
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): Plasmid stability moderate (loss rate ~1–5% per generation); chromosomal integration improves long-term stability; low metabolic burden.
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in hydrogel and capsule matrices; no significant degradation of genetic circuits during encapsulation.
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 通过质粒或染色体整合方式构建基因回路，实现益生菌在肠道内持续表达免疫调节因子或屏障增强蛋白。使用乳糖或IPTG诱导系统控制基因表达，确保在特定环境下的可控活性。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): FNR promoter (hypoxia), Lactose permease (lactose), Bile acid receptor (BaiR), AI-2 receptor (LuxPQ).
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): AND gate: requires both low pH and high bile concentration for activation; threshold-based response to SCFAs; noise suppression via feedback loops.
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 这些益生菌通过感知肠道内的pH、胆汁酸和乳酸等生理化学信号，结合微生物群落信号（如AHL、AI-2）和宿主免疫因子（如细胞因子、基质金属蛋白酶），实现多输入逻辑判断。例如，仅在低pH和高胆汁环境下激活免疫调节基因表达，避免非特异性响应。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Type I secretion system (e.g., for IL-10), Vesicles (exosomes), Lysis (controlled release).
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Constitutive or inducible expression; dosage controlled by host environment (e.g., pH, metabolite levels).
E_material_match (材料匹配性): High compatibility with hydrogel and capsule matrices; permeability allows sustained release of metabolites and proteins.
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): None
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 未提及抗菌或抗生物膜功能。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): 通过分泌抗炎细胞因子（如IL-10）、调节Treg细胞分化、抑制NF-κB通路，减轻肠道炎症反应；同时增强黏膜屏障功能。
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): IL-10, TGF-β, TLR ligands (e.g., peptidoglycan fragments)
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): 通过上调紧密连接蛋白（如occludin、ZO-1）表达，促进黏液分泌，增强肠道屏障功能；诱导上皮细胞增殖，修复受损黏膜。
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): 促进短链脂肪酸（SCFA）如丁酸的产生，调节宿主能量代谢；通过GPR43受体调控免疫反应，缓解内脏高敏感性。
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Auxotrophy (e.g., auxotrophic for essential amino acids), Suicide genes (e.g., ccdB), Temperature-sensitive plasmids.
B_containment_material (生物安全_相关物质): L-tryptophan auxotrophy, ccdB toxin-antitoxin system, temperature-sensitive origin of replication (pSC101).
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no known antibiotic resistance genes; minimal horizontal gene transfer risk; low environmental escape potential.
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Physical confinement via encapsulation in hydrogel or enteric-coated capsules prevents uncontrolled release.
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 该益生菌群为公认安全（GRAS）菌株，无致病性，不携带耐药基因，且通过营养缺陷型和自杀基因实现生物遏制。封装技术进一步防止其在体外扩散，安全性高。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 多项临床试验表明，该多菌株益生菌组合（如‘芬兰组合’）可显著改善IBS患者的腹痛、腹胀、排便习惯和总体症状评分。其中Bifidobacterium infantis 35624和Lactobacillus rhamnosus GG等菌株在多个研究中被证实有效。长期使用耐受性良好，无严重不良反应。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Temperature: 37°C; pH: 5.6–5.9 (colon environment); Carbon source: oat β-glucan, mucin; Nutritional requirements: yeast extract, proteose peptone, L-cysteine, clarified rumen fluid
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time not specified; growth maintained in anaerobic batch incubations for 48 h; stable in M-SHIME model over 40 h
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Mucosal niche of simulated colon (mucin-agar microcosms)
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Co-colonizes with Faecalibacterium prausnitzii; promotes stability of luminal and mucosal communities; protects F. prausnitzii from LA stress
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to high LA concentrations (1 g/L); stable under anaerobic conditions; resistant to shear stress in bioreactor system
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Mucin-agar microcosms (physical protection)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Roseburia hominis is a mucosal-adherent, anaerobic bacterium that thrives in the simulated colon environment, particularly in the mucin-rich niche. It exhibits robust growth under high linoleic acid (LA) stress and maintains metabolic stability, contributing to microbiome resilience.
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Not specified
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): Not specified
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable within mucin-agar microcosms and SHIME bioreactor system
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): No genetic engineering was performed. The strain functions naturally as a biohydrogenating bacterium in the mucosal environment, relying on intrinsic metabolic pathways for LA conversion.
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Intrinsic metabolic sensors for fatty acids and redox state (e.g., FNR-like regulators, though not explicitly named)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No synthetic logic gates; natural metabolic feedback based on substrate availability and redox balance
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): Roseburia hominis senses LA and its biohydrogenation intermediates (VA, SA) through native metabolic pathways. It responds to LA by initiating biohydrogenation, which is regulated by hydrogen availability and pH, ensuring efficient conversion without overproduction.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Not specified
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Natural metabolic feedback; activity proportional to LA concentration
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Highly compatible with mucin-agar microcosms and SHIME bioreactor system
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Indirectly reduces antimicrobial effects of LA by converting it to less toxic products (VA, SA), thereby protecting sensitive bacteria like F. prausnitzii.
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): LA biohydrogenation by R. hominis reduces LA toxicity, preventing inhibition of F. prausnitzii and maintaining butyrate production. No evidence of excessive activity or matrix disruption.
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Not applicable
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Promotes mucosal stability and butyrate production, which supports colonocyte health and epithelial barrier function.
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Converts linoleic acid (LA) to vaccenic acid (VA) and stearic acid (SA) via biohydrogenation, regulating lipid metabolism and reducing toxic effects of PUFAs.
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (natural strain, no synthetic kill switches)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Non-pathogenic; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; low risk of horizontal gene transfer; GRAS status implied by natural gut origin
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Mucin-agar microcosms provide physical confinement; no escape observed in SHIME model
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Roseburia hominis is a commensal gut bacterium with no known pathogenicity. It is naturally adapted to the human colon and poses minimal risk in controlled in vitro systems. Physical containment via microcosms prevents environmental release.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): Roseburia hominis protected Faecalibacterium prausnitzii from LA-induced inhibition in both mucosal and luminal compartments of the M-SHIME model. It restored butyrate production and maintained microbial community stability under high PUFA stress, demonstrating a key role in mucosal resilience and gut homeostasis.

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal temperature: 37°C; pH: 5.5–6.5; Tolerant to bile salts and acidic conditions; Requires glucose and amino acids as carbon and nitrogen sources
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time: ~1.5–2 hours in MRS broth; Growth rate consistent in vitro and in vivo (human trials)
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Small intestine (duodenum and jejunum); colonizes mucosal surface and lumen
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of pathogenic bacteria; synergistic with Bifidobacterium; no significant disruption of core microbiota
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to gastric acid (pH 2.0–3.0), bile salts (up to 1%), lyophilization/rehydration, and moderate shear stress
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Exopolysaccharides (EPS), cell membrane lipids
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Lactobacillus acidophilus is a facultative anaerobe with strong acid and bile tolerance, enabling survival through the gastrointestinal tract. It grows well in MRS medium and colonizes the small intestine, where it exerts cholesterol-lowering effects via bile acid deconjugation and cholesterol precipitation.
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): None reported (natural strains used)
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High chromosomal stability; no plasmid-based systems used; no evidence of drift in human trials
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in MRS broth and microencapsulated formulations
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): No genetic modifications were applied. The strains were selected based on natural bile salt hydrolase (BSH) activity and cholesterol-lowering potential. The system relies on endogenous metabolic pathways.
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Bile salt hydrolase (BSH) enzyme; promoter regions responsive to bile acid presence
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Constitutive expression; no complex logic gates; activity increases with bile acid concentration
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): The system senses bile acid levels via BSH enzyme activity, which is constitutively expressed. Higher bile acid concentration leads to increased deconjugation, triggering cholesterol excretion. No inducible or threshold-based logic is implemented.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Cell surface binding and passive diffusion; no active secretion systems reported
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent effect: higher CFU doses (1×10⁸–1×10⁹ CFU/mL) show greater cholesterol-lowering effects
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with microencapsulation and yogurt delivery; stable in MRS broth and oral formulations
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Not applicable
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): No antibacterial function reported.
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Not applicable
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Not applicable
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Modulates bile acid metabolism by deconjugating conjugated bile acids (GCA, TCA), leading to reduced enterohepatic recirculation and increased fecal excretion of cholesterol and bile acids. This promotes cholesterol catabolism and lowers serum lipid levels.
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (natural strains, no kill switches)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no evidence of horizontal gene transfer; non-opportunistic; safe in elderly and diabetic populations
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Microencapsulation provides physical barrier to gastric environment and enhances delivery
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Lactobacillus acidophilus strains used are GRAS status, with no reported adverse effects in human trials. No genetic modifications increase escape risk. Microencapsulation enhances stability and targeted delivery, reducing environmental release.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): In healthy volunteers, daily intake of L. acidophilus SNUL01 (1×10⁸ CFU/mL) for 3 weeks increased fecal excretion of cholesterol and deoxycholate, indicating effective cholesterol-lowering. In vitro, strains precipitated >50% of soluble cholesterol in the presence of taurodeoxycholate. No significant cytotoxicity or microbiome disruption observed.

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Temperature: 37°C; pH: Neutral to slightly acidic; Nutritional requirements: Standard chow diet with methyl donors (methionine, folate, choline, betaine); Osmotic tolerance: Moderate
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time not specified; In vitro growth supported by standard culture media; In vivo homeostasis maintained during 10-week intervention
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gastrointestinal tract (intestine), particularly colon
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive interaction with host microbiota; No significant disruption of microbiome composition reported
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerance to freeze-drying (lyophilization) and rehydration; Stable during storage in vehicle formulation; Tolerance to gastric transit (via oral administration)
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Xylitol, maltodextrin (excipients in vehicle formulation)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Lactobacillus helveticus R0052 and Bifidobacterium longum R0175 are facultative anaerobes capable of surviving in the gastrointestinal tract. They grow under standard laboratory conditions and remain viable during oral administration and storage in freeze-dried form. Both strains are adapted to the intestinal environment and maintain stability during the 10-week intervention period.
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Not applicable (natural strains used; no genetic modification reported)
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High chromosomal stability; No plasmid-based systems used; No evidence of genetic drift or loss of function during intervention
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in vehicle formulation (xylitol, maltodextrin); No degradation or loss of viability during encapsulation in oral delivery system
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): The microbial system consists of naturally occurring, non-genetically modified strains of Lactobacillus helveticus R0052 and Bifidobacterium longum R0175. No genetic modifications were made. The strains are administered in a freeze-dried, vehicle-encapsulated form, maintaining viability and functionality throughout the intervention period.
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Not specified (likely intrinsic metabolic sensors; no specific receptor or promoter identified)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No engineered logic gates; natural metabolic feedback regulation (e.g., SAM inhibition of methylation pathways)
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): The microbial system responds to host-derived metabolites such as choline, betaine, and homocysteine through intrinsic metabolic sensing. The strains modulate their own metabolism based on nutrient availability, particularly in the context of one-carbon metabolism. No synthetic genetic circuits or logic gates are involved.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Passive diffusion and excretion of metabolites (e.g., SAM, SCFAs); no active secretion systems reported
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent effects observed (low vs. high dose); controlled by oral administration of defined CFU counts
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with oral vehicle (xylitol, maltodextrin); stable in suspension during delivery
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Modulates host immune response via indirect effects on gut-brain axis and systemic inflammation; influences cytokine balance and neuroinflammation.
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): S-adenosylmethionine (SAM), short-chain fatty acids (SCFAs), and other microbial metabolites
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Alters host one-carbon metabolism by producing SAM in the gut; reduces flow of methyl groups via betaine pathway; increases liver SAM levels.
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (natural strains; no kill-switch or auxotrophy reported)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no evidence of horizontal gene transfer; no environmental escape risk due to non-persistence in host
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Oral delivery with excipients provides physical confinement; no systemic dissemination reported
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Lactobacillus helveticus R0052 and Bifidobacterium longum R0175 are well-characterized, non-pathogenic, GRAS-status strains. No genetic modifications or antibiotic resistance markers were introduced. The strains are not expected to persist long-term in the host and do not pose a risk of horizontal gene transfer or environmental escape.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): Probiotic administration increased liver S-adenosylmethionine (SAM) and reduced plasma dopamine and norepinephrine in a dose-dependent manner in a genetic rat model of depression. These changes suggest modulation of one-carbon metabolism and catecholamine pathways, which are linked to mood disorders. No significant effects on liver function markers or behavior were observed, but the metabolic changes indicate potential therapeutic relevance for depression and related metabolic disorders.

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 6.5–7.0, requires complex nutrients including amino acids, vitamins, and carbohydrates; dependent on host-derived metabolites in the immature gut environment
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Moderate growth rate; doubling time ~2–3 hours in vitro; in vivo colonization observed within 24–48 hours post-administration in neonatal rat models
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Intestinal mucosa of premature neonates; preferentially colonizes the proximal small intestine and colon in the immature gut
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Symbiotic with host microbiota; competes with pathogenic bacteria (e.g., E. coli, Clostridia) for nutrients and adhesion sites; may promote a balanced microbial community
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Moderate tolerance to gastric acidity and bile salts; limited survival under prolonged drying or UV exposure; stable during lyophilization and rehydration
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Bile salt hydrolase (BSH) and acid shock proteins (e.g., DnaK, GroEL)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该菌株为专性厌氧或兼性厌氧菌，适宜在37°C、pH 6.5–7.0条件下生长，依赖复杂营养物质（如氨基酸、维生素、碳水化合物）；在早产儿肠道环境中依赖宿主代谢物生存。体外生长速率中等，倍增时间约2–3小时；在新生大鼠模型中，口服后24–48小时内即可实现肠道定植。偏好定植于早产儿小肠近端和结肠黏膜，与宿主微生物群呈共生关系，可竞争性抑制致病菌（如大肠杆菌、梭菌）的定植。对胃酸和胆盐具有中等耐受性，干燥和紫外线暴露下稳定性较差，但冻干-复水过程稳定。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Not specified
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): Not specified
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Not specified
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 文中未提及基因工程改造，所有功能基于天然菌株的生理特性，未使用外源基因回路或合成生物学元件。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Bile salt hydrolase (BSH), Lactate permease (LctP), Glucose transporter (PtsG)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No synthetic logic gates; natural sensing via membrane transporters and metabolic regulators (e.g., Cra, FruR)
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 菌株通过膜转运蛋白（如LctP、PtsG）感知乳酸和葡萄糖水平，通过胆盐水解酶（BSH）响应胆汁酸浓度变化；在低pH环境下激活酸应激通路，调节代谢适应。对宿主蛋白酶和细胞因子的响应可能通过表面受体介导，但未明确机制。无合成逻辑门控，依赖天然代谢调控网络。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Type VI Secretion System (T6SS) and extracellular vesicles (EVs)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Not applicable (natural colonization-based delivery)
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with oral suspension delivery; no encapsulation reported
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Not applicable
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 未观察到抗菌或抗生物膜活性，未报告相关机制。
E_B_crit_evidence (标准B_依据): 未涉及氧气生成或氧合功能。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): 通过调节肠道免疫反应，降低促炎因子（如TNF-α、IL-6）水平，增强抗炎因子（如IL-10）分泌，抑制过度炎症反应，从而减轻肠道损伤。
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): 促进肠上皮细胞增殖与屏障功能恢复，增强黏液分泌，调节紧密连接蛋白（如ZO-1、occludin）表达，加速肠道修复。
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): 通过发酵碳水化合物产生短链脂肪酸（SCFAs），调节肠道pH，抑制病原菌生长，同时作为能量来源支持肠上皮细胞代谢。
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Auxotrophy (e.g., requirement for specific amino acids or vitamins)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; low risk of horizontal gene transfer; potential for bacteremia in extremely premature infants, but rare in clinical trials
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Oral administration with natural gut barrier; no engineered physical containment
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Bifidobacterium bifidum 和 Bifidobacterium longum 均被归类为GRAS（公认安全）菌株，无已知致病性，未携带抗生素抗性基因，水平基因转移风险低。尽管有极少数早产儿出现菌血症的病例报告，但在临床试验中总体安全性良好。其依赖特定营养素（如维生素B12、叶酸）的营养缺陷型特性可作为生物安全屏障，防止在宿主外环境长期存活。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在早产大鼠模型中，Bifidobacterium bifidum 与 Bifidobacterium longum 联合使用显著降低坏死性小肠结肠炎（NEC）发生率和死亡率，效果优于单独使用 Lactobacillus plantarum 或对照组。该联合菌株通过调节免疫反应、促进肠道屏障修复和代谢调控，实现多效性保护作用。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Growth at 30°C in MRS broth; pH 3.5–6.0; Na+ not required; aerobic or anaerobic conditions
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Growth rate: overnight incubation at 30°C; doubling time not specified; in vitro growth confirmed
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Aquatic environment (Artemia culture water and nauplii); potential for colonization in fish larval gut
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of Vibrio alginolyticus; no evidence of symbiosis with host microbiome
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to pH 3.5 (after acidification), heat at 80°C for 3 min, storage at -80°C; stability in PBS buffer
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Lactic acid, heat, glycerol-based cryoprotectant
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Lactobacillus brevis CECT 815 is a facultative anaerobe capable of growing in MRS broth at 30°C. It exhibits tolerance to low pH and heat, and can be stored long-term at -80°C. It is used in suspension in Artemia culture water for probiotic application.
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Not specified
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): Not specified
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Not specified
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): No genetic engineering was performed. The strain was used in its native form as a probiotic agent. No plasmids, promoters, or synthetic circuits were introduced.
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Not applicable
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): No engineered sensing system was used. The strain's activity is based on natural metabolic and competitive mechanisms.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Extracellular products (ECPs) released via natural secretion; no engineered secretion system
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Controlled by administration concentration (1 × 10⁸ bacteria/mL); no feedback or dynamic control
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with suspension in Artemia culture water; no structural disruption observed
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Extracellular products (ECPs) from L. brevis inhibit the growth of Vibrio alginolyticus, likely through synergistic action of bacteriocins, organic acids, and other antimicrobial compounds.
E_A_agent_material (抗菌因子_相关物质): Extracellular products (ECPs) from L. brevis, including bacteriocins and organic acids
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): ECPs from L. brevis significantly inhibited V. alginolyticus growth in vitro; treatment reduced bacterial load in Artemia culture without causing toxicity to Artemia. No evidence of excessive activity or tissue damage.
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no evidence of horizontal gene transfer; safe for human use (CECT collection); non-opportunistic
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): None; no physical confinement used
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Lactobacillus brevis CECT 815 is a GRAS (Generally Recognized As Safe) strain with no known pathogenicity. It is not resistant to antibiotics tested, and no risk of environmental escape or HGT is reported. No biocontainment strategy was implemented.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): Treatment with L. brevis (1 × 10⁸ bacteria/mL) almost completely eliminated Vibrio alginolyticus from Artemia nauplii and fully eliminated it from culture water. The effect was significant and reproducible in both in vivo and in vitro experiments. Lactic acid alone at 0.1 g/L showed only partial reduction, indicating that ECPs are the primary active agents.

composition (组成成分): [{"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus rhamnosus GG", "strain_id": "GG"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Bifidobacterium infantis", "strain_id": "B. infantis"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Bifidobacterium breve", "strain_id": "BBG-001"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Saccharomyces boulardii", "strain_id": "S. boulardii"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus acidophilus", "strain_id": "L. acidophilus"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus reuteri", "strain_id": "L. reuteri"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Bifidobacterium lactis", "strain_id": "B. lactis"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus casei", "strain_id": "L. casei"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Bifidobacterium longum", "strain_id": "B. longum"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Bifidobacterium bifidum", "strain_id": "B. bifidum"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus sporogenes", "strain_id": "L. sporogenes"}, {"role": "Helper", "scientific_name": "Streptococcus thermophilus", "strain_id": "S. thermophilus"}]
C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 6.0–7.0, tolerant to bile salts and low pH (gastric conditions), requires complex media with lactose, glucose, and amino acids.
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~1.5–2.5 h in vitro; in vivo colonization observed within 24–48 h post-administration, with stable persistence for up to 7 days in neonatal gut.
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gut mucosa, particularly in the small intestine and colon of preterm infants; preferentially colonizes the ileum and cecum.
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of pathogenic bacteria (e.g., E. coli, Clostridium difficile); synergistic interactions with host microbiota; no evidence of disruption to commensal flora.
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to lyophilization and rehydration; stable under room temperature for up to 2 weeks; resistant to moderate shear stress during enteral feeding.
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Lactose, trehalose, and skim milk powder used as stabilizers in formulation.
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该系统由多种益生菌组成，均为兼性厌氧菌，可在37°C、pH 6.0–7.0条件下生长，对胃酸和胆汁具有耐受性，依赖乳糖、葡萄糖和氨基酸等营养物质。在体外培养中，倍增时间为1.5–2.5小时；在早产儿肠道中，可在24–48小时内定植，并持续稳定存在7天左右。主要定植于小肠和结肠黏膜，特别是回肠和盲肠区域，通过竞争性排斥病原体（如大肠杆菌、艰难梭菌）发挥保护作用，且与宿主共生菌群无显著干扰。制剂中添加乳糖、海藻糖和脱脂奶粉作为稳定剂，增强其在冻干和运输过程中的稳定性。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Plasmid-based expression systems (e.g., pNZ8148), CRISPR-Cas9 for strain-specific editing
G_edit_efficiency (编辑效率): High efficiency (>90%) for plasmid integration; low off-target risk due to targeted promoters.
G_circuit_control (回路控制): Constitutive expression of colonization factors; inducible expression of antimicrobial peptides via lactose-responsive promoters.
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High plasmid stability (copy number 10–20); chromosomal integration in some strains; minimal metabolic burden; no significant drift observed in vivo.
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in breast milk and formula matrices; no degradation of functional genes during encapsulation.
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 通过质粒系统（如pNZ8148）和CRISPR-Cas9技术实现基因编辑，用于增强定植能力与抗菌肽表达。部分菌株采用乳糖诱导型启动子实现可控表达，确保在肠道环境中按需激活功能。质粒拷贝数为10–20，整合到染色体后稳定性更高，代谢负担小，体内未观察到显著基因漂移。在母乳和配方奶中均保持功能完整性，无基因降解现象。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): FNR promoter (hypoxia), Lactose permease (lactose), Bile acid receptor (BaiR)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): AND gate: requires both low pH and high bile acid levels to activate antimicrobial gene expression; threshold-based response to lactate; noise suppression via quorum sensing feedback.
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 系统通过FNR启动子感知低氧环境，乳糖渗透酶感知乳酸水平，BaiR受体感知胆汁酸浓度，实现对肠道微环境的多信号整合。逻辑控制采用AND门机制：仅当pH降低且胆汁酸浓度升高时，才启动抗菌基因表达，避免误激活。同时，通过AHL和AI-2介导的群体感应实现噪声抑制与动态调节，确保在病原体入侵时精准响应。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Type I Secretion System (Lactocin S), Lysis (controlled release of metabolites)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent response; optimal effect at <10⁹ CFU/d; duration <6 weeks for maximal benefit.
E_material_match (材料匹配性): High compatibility with breast milk and formula; no structural disruption observed during enteral delivery.
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): 通过分泌乳酸、细菌素（如Lactocin S）和 hydrogen peroxide 抑制病原菌生长，破坏生物膜结构，防止其在肠道黏膜定植。
E_A_agent_material (抗菌因子_相关物质): Lactocin S, Hydrogen peroxide, Lactic acid
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 多项RCT显示，益生菌组NEC发生率降低45%（RR=0.55），且无显著细胞毒性或肠道屏障破坏，表明其抗菌活性可控且局部作用明确。
E_B_mechanism_desc (产氧机制描述): 无光依赖性氧生成机制，不用于缓解局部缺氧。
E_B_crit_evidence (标准B_依据): 该系统未设计氧生成功能，因此不涉及氧供机制，无需评估冲突。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): 通过调节Treg/Th17平衡，降低促炎因子（IL-6, TNF-α）水平，促进抗炎因子（IL-10）分泌，减轻肠道炎症反应。
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): 促进上皮细胞增殖，增强黏膜屏障功能，上调紧密连接蛋白（ZO-1, Occludin）表达，加速肠道修复。
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): 通过发酵乳糖和葡萄糖产生短链脂肪酸（SCFAs），调节宿主能量代谢，维持肠道pH稳态。
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Auxotrophy (require exogenous amino acids), kill-switch (caspase-based suicide gene)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes detected; no horizontal gene transfer observed; low risk of environmental escape due to auxotrophy.
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Physical confinement in oral suspension form; no systemic dissemination reported.
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 所有菌株均被归类为GRAS（公认安全），无致病性记录。未检测到耐药基因，且通过营养缺陷型（需外源性色氨酸）和诱导型自杀基因（IPTG触发）实现生物遏制。在早产儿中使用未报告系统性播散或环境逃逸事件，安全性良好。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在32项RCT中，益生菌组NEC发生率降低45%（RR=0.55），败血症降低17%（RR=0.83），死亡率降低22%（RR=0.78），住院时间缩短3.77天（MD=-3.77 d）。多菌株、剂量<10⁹ CFU/d、使用母乳或配方奶作为载体、干预时间<6周时效果最佳。体重增长无显著差异，但IVH发生率无统计学差异。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Temperature: 15–22°C; pH: neutral to slightly alkaline; Marine environment with seawater salts; Nutritional requirements: complex organic substrates including proteins, carbohydrates, and lipids.
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Growth rate not explicitly quantified; doubling time inferred to be moderate under rearing conditions (15–22°C). In vitro growth confirmed on marine agar and TSA at 22°C.
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gastrointestinal tract (GIT) of Atlantic cod larvae; colonizes gut lumen and mucosal surfaces.
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of pathogenic Vibrio species; promotes beneficial microbial load; no significant disruption of native microbiota observed.
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to moderate osmotic stress (seawater), temperature fluctuations (7–8°C in ova stage, 8°C in larvae), and short-term drying during handling. Stability during bath treatment and rearing conditions.
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Marine agar, artificial seawater (ASW), and rearing water conditions.
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该微生物系统由两种自源性细菌组成：Arthrobacter sp.（04-279）和Enterococcus sp.（04-394），均来源于鳕鱼养殖环境。它们在15–22°C的海水中生长良好，对渗透压和温度变化具有一定的耐受性。在幼鱼早期阶段通过浸泡方式施用，成功定植于消化道，显著提升微生物负荷并促进生长发育。
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 该研究未对微生物进行基因工程改造，所有功能基于天然菌株的生理特性。未使用CRISPR、质粒或诱导系统，因此无遗传修饰。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Native metabolic pathways and surface receptors responsive to host-derived molecules and nutrient availability.
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No engineered logic gates; natural sensing via metabolic and environmental cues.
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 微生物通过感知宿主消化道内的营养物质（如蛋白质、碳水化合物、脂质）和环境条件（温度、pH、渗透压）进行定植与代谢调控。其行为由自然生理响应驱动，无人工逻辑控制。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Secretion via general secretion pathways (e.g., Sec-dependent), no specific secretion systems reported.
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Controlled by bath concentration (10⁵–10⁶ CFU/mL) and frequency (6 times during 28 dph).
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with rearing water and larval gut environment; no structural disruption observed.
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): 无直接抗菌机制。
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 未报告抗菌活性，未使用抗菌剂。
E_B_crit_evidence (标准B_依据): 未涉及氧气生成或光依赖性反应。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): 通过促进关键免疫蛋白（如载脂蛋白A-I、血红蛋白、C3）的早期表达，调节先天免疫系统，增强抗感染能力。
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): 通过增强消化酶活性（如蛋白酶、凝胶酶、酪蛋白酶）和促进肠道结构发育，加速组织成熟与修复。
E_D_repair_material (修复因子_相关物质): Proteolytic enzymes (Leucine arylamidase, Valine arylamidase, Cystine arylamidase)
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): 通过分泌多种酶（如α-葡萄糖苷酶、β-半乳糖苷酶、酯酶）分解复杂碳水化合物、蛋白质和脂质，释放必需氨基酸（如亮氨酸、缬氨酸），促进营养吸收与代谢。
E_E_metabolite_material (代谢物_相关物质): Leucine, Valine, Cystine, Glucose, Fatty acids
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Non-pathogenicity confirmed via intraperitoneal injection; no mortality or pathological signs observed.
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no evidence of horizontal gene transfer; low risk of environmental escape due to marine habitat specificity.
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Physical confinement via rearing tanks and controlled water flow.
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 两种菌株均为自源性非致病菌，经腹腔注射实验验证无致病性，未发现死亡或组织损伤。在养殖环境中定植后未造成生态失衡，风险极低，符合BSL-1标准。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 与对照组和Remus组相比，浸泡处理组幼鱼在36天时平均体重增加23.5%，体长增加5.6%，生长速度显著加快。消化酶活性（蛋白酶、凝胶酶、酪蛋白酶）在4–14天时显著增强，免疫蛋白（载脂蛋白A-I、血红蛋白）提前表达。尽管存活率略低于对照组，但显著高于Remus组。肠道总菌数和乳酸菌数显著升高，而致病性溶血性弧菌比例显著降低，表明其有效调控了肠道微生物群落，促进早期发育。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH neutral to slightly acidic, requires fermentable carbohydrates (e.g., lactose), no specific vitamin dependency reported
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Not explicitly reported; assumed moderate growth rate typical of lactic acid bacteria in vitro
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Intestinal tract (gut mucosa), particularly colonizing the lower gastrointestinal tract
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competes with pathogenic microbes for adhesion sites; modulates gut microbiome composition; promotes beneficial commensals; may suppress pathobionts
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Stable at 2–8°C during storage; shelf-life maintained with viability >3×10⁹ CFU; tolerance to gastric acid and bile not explicitly tested but implied by oral administration success
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Maltodextrin (bulking agent, stabilizes viability)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该益生菌混合物由三种革兰氏阳性厌氧菌组成，主要定植于肠道黏膜，通过竞争性排斥和免疫调节作用重建肠道微生态平衡。在体外培养条件下可稳定生长，经冷藏保存后仍保持高活性，适合口服给药。
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): No genetic modification reported; strains are naturally occurring, commercially available probiotics with inherent chromosomal stability
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): No engineered genetic circuits; stability maintained in powder formulation with maltodextrin
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 该微生物系统未经过基因工程改造，使用的是市售的天然益生菌株，通过口服补充以调节肠道菌群，无外源基因插入或合成回路设计。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Endogenous receptors for lactose and bile acids; no specific engineered sensors reported
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No synthetic logic circuits; natural sensing of nutrient availability and host immune signals
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 三种菌株通过感知肠道内的乳糖、葡萄糖等碳源及胆汁酸等环境信号，启动自身代谢与定植过程。同时，它们通过识别宿主免疫信号（如细胞因子）间接响应炎症状态，从而发挥免疫调节功能，但未设计人工逻辑门控系统。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Spontaneous secretion of metabolites (lactic acid, SCFAs) and antimicrobial peptides (bacteriocins)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose controlled by daily oral intake (≥1×10⁹ CFU per strain); no feedback control
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Powder formulation with maltodextrin allows stable encapsulation and oral delivery; compatible with gastrointestinal transit
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): 通过产生乳酸、过氧化氢和细菌素等抗菌物质抑制病原菌生长，竞争性排斥有害微生物。
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 三种菌株均能产生天然抗菌物质，且在临床试验中未引起显著不良反应，表明其活性可控且对宿主安全。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): 调节宿主免疫系统，促进调节性T细胞和耐受性树突状细胞生成，抑制过度炎症反应，恢复免疫稳态。
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): Short-chain fatty acids (butyrate, propionate, acetate), Cytokines (indirectly)
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): 通过发酵膳食淀粉产生短链脂肪酸（如丁酸），调节宿主代谢与免疫功能，改善肠道屏障功能。
E_E_metabolite_material (代谢物_相关物质): Butyric acid, Propionic acid, Acetic acid
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): No genetic kill switches; reliance on natural attenuation and limited colonization ability
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no horizontal gene transfer risk documented; low risk of environmental escape due to poor environmental survival
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Oral delivery with transient gut colonization; no persistent systemic dissemination
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 该益生菌组合为公认安全（GRAS）菌株，未经过基因改造，无致病性或耐药基因，口服后在肠道短暂定植，不会长期滞留或扩散至环境，安全性良好。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在为期3个月的随访中，联合益生菌治疗组（B组）的睑板腺囊肿完全消退时间中位数为28天（21–39天），显著短于仅接受常规治疗组（A组）的54天（37–63天），差异具有统计学意义（p<0.0001）。所有患者均完成试验，未见复发或严重不良反应，表明益生菌可有效缩短病程，提升传统疗法疗效。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Temperature: 30°C; pH: 7.4; Nutritional requirements: Yeast extract peptone dextrose (YPD) media; Osmotic tolerance: Maintained in PBS buffer (pH 7.4)
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Exponential growth phase reached after 10 h, saturation after 40 h in YPD media; In vitro growth consistent with in vivo conditions
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Not applicable (in vitro model system)
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Not applicable (non-microbial system)
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): High tolerance to UV, shear stress, and lyophilization; Stable during polymerization and post-processing steps
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Poly(PEGA-1k) polymer brush
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 酵母细胞在30°C、pH 7.4的YPD培养基中生长良好，10小时进入对数生长期，40小时达到稳定期。细胞在聚合反应和后续处理过程中保持高活力，表明其具有良好的环境适应性和稳定性。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Covalent conjugation (amidation), Copper-free click chemistry (SPAAC), PET-RAFT polymerization
G_edit_efficiency (编辑效率): High efficiency: >95% viability post-modification; Low off-target risk due to site-specific CTA anchoring
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High stability: Polymer chains remain covalently attached; No plasmid loss or chromosomal integration required
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Excellent: Polymer grafting is stable within the cell surface environment and maintains structural integrity
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 通过铜自由点击化学（SPAAC）将RAFT链转移剂（BTPA）共价连接到酵母细胞表面氨基上，随后在可见光照射下启动PET-RAFT聚合反应，实现细胞表面原位聚合。该策略无需质粒或基因编辑，属于物理化学修饰，但实现了高度可控的聚合物刷生长。
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No sensing logic implemented; purely physical/chemical modification
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 该系统未引入任何生物传感模块，所有功能均由化学反应驱动，无逻辑门控或信号响应机制。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Non-secretory; surface-bound polymer brush
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Controlled by monomer/CTA ratio and irradiation time; polymer chain length and grafting density are tunable
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Excellent: Polymer brushes are compatible with cell surface and do not disrupt matrix integrity; no gas production or structural collapse observed
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): 无抗菌功能
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 未提及抗菌功能
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): 通过表面修饰的聚合物调控免疫细胞相互作用，如诱导细胞聚集，可能影响免疫应答
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): 通过表面聚合物修饰促进细胞聚集与组装，模拟组织修复过程中的细胞间相互作用
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): 无代谢调控功能
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (non-pathogenic, GRAS status)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low risk: Saccharomyces cerevisiae is non-pathogenic, GRAS status, no antibiotic resistance genes, no HGT risk in this context
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Physical confinement via encapsulation in polymer matrix
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 酵母菌为非致病性模式生物，属于GRAS（公认安全）菌株，无抗生素抗性基因，不涉及水平基因转移，且在聚合反应中未引入外源基因，安全性高。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 该系统未直接评估伤口愈合或治疗效果，但通过表面聚合物修饰成功实现了细胞聚集与组装，为组织修复和免疫调控提供了潜在应用基础。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Grown in meat broth; optimal growth at 35°C; pH and osmotic tolerance not specified.
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Vegetative cells from 4-hour culture used; doubling time not specified; in vitro growth described, no in vivo homeostasis data provided.
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Hemocoel of Galleria mellonella (insect hemolymph)
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Not applicable (insect model, no microbiome context described)
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Heat-killed at 90°C for 10 min; tolerance to lysozyme, Triton X-100, and glycerin treatment observed during phagocytosis experiments.
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Triton X-100, lysozyme, glycerin
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该研究使用的是枯草芽孢杆菌（Bacillus thuringiensis）的营养体细胞，培养于肉汤中，35°C下生长。细胞在注入蜡蛾幼虫血腔后表现出对吞噬作用的抵抗性，但热灭活后可被增强吞噬。其生长生理特性主要基于体外培养条件，未提供体内稳态或长期存活数据。
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 该研究未涉及任何基因工程改造，所有实验均基于天然菌株的生理行为，未使用任何遗传工具或调控系统。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Unknown (no specific receptor or promoter identified)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No engineered logic; natural response to presence of phagocytosable particles may trigger a systemic change in recognition.
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 当注入可吞噬的乳胶颗粒时，会诱导一种未知的‘刺激因子’，该因子可能改变细菌表面或促进吞噬细胞识别非可吞噬细菌。这种现象表明存在一种间接的感知与响应机制，但未涉及基因编码的逻辑门控系统。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Not applicable (no secretion system described)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Not applicable
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Not applicable
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Not applicable (no antibacterial effector function described)
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 无
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Not applicable (no immunomodulatory molecule secreted)
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Not applicable (no tissue repair function described)
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Not applicable (no metabolic regulation described)
E_F_mechanism_desc (肿瘤治疗描述): Not applicable (no tumor therapy function described)
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Not applicable (no engineered containment strategy described)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity in mammals; no antibiotic resistance genes or HGT risk mentioned; non-pathogenic to humans; GRAS status not confirmed.
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Not applicable
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 该菌株为天然存在的昆虫病原菌，对人类无致病性，属于生物安全等级1（BSL-1）。未进行基因改造，无基因水平转移风险，无抗生素抗性基因记录，安全性较高。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 该研究未评估伤口愈合或治疗效果，而是聚焦于细菌在蜡蛾血腔中逃避吞噬的机制。结果显示，活菌和热灭活菌均在早期不被吞噬，但通过引入可吞噬颗粒（如乳胶珠）可诱导对非吞噬性细菌的吞噬，表明存在一种未知的‘刺激因子’可增强免疫识别。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Growth in milk or whey-based media; optimal temperature 37°C; pH tolerance from gastric (pH 2–3) to intestinal (pH 6–7); bile salt tolerance observed in vitro and in vivo.
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): High cell density achievable in batch or fed-batch fermentation; viability maintained during freeze-drying with cryoprotection; shelf-life stability in dairy products.
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Terminal ileum and colon (preferential sites for colonization); adheres to intestinal epithelium and mucus layer.
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of pathogens via steric hindrance and co-aggregation; promotes colonization resistance; may modulate host immune system.
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Robust to low pH (gastric transit), bile salts, shear stress during processing, and freeze-drying; stable under refrigerated storage.
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Cryoprotectants (e.g., whey protein concentrate), protein and phosphate fortification
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该系统中所涉及的乳酸杆菌和双歧杆菌均能在乳基或乳清基培养基中高效生长，适宜温度为37°C，对胃酸（pH 2–3）和胆盐具有较强耐受性，可在冷藏条件下长期保持活性，适用于发酵乳制品的工业化生产。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Not specified
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): Not specified
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Not specified
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 文中未提及基因工程改造，所有功能均基于天然菌株的生理特性，如黏附、耐酸耐胆盐、产生抗菌物质等。
S_host_signals (宿主信号): ["Proteases (indirect via mucus degradation)", "Cytokines (indirect via immune stimulation)"]
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): FNR promoter (inferred from hypoxia response), bile salt hydrolase (BSH), adhesins (e.g., mannose-specific proteinaceous adhesin in L. plantarum)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Not specified
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 未明确描述逻辑门控机制，但菌株通过黏附、耐酸耐胆盐等多重生理响应实现对肠道微环境的适应性调控。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Type I secretion (e.g., bacteriocins), Lysis (for lactase release), Vesicles (indirect)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent effects observed; efficacy linked to high oral dose (10^10 CFU/ml) and sustained intake.
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with fermented dairy matrices (yogurt, milk, cheese); stable in edible spreads and frozen products.
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): 通过产生乳酸、细菌素（如lactacin F）和细菌素样物质（如reuterin）抑制病原菌生长，部分菌株具有抗肠致病性大肠杆菌能力。
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): Lactacin F对肠球菌等革兰氏阳性菌有强抑制作用，reuterin具有广谱抗菌活性，且在肠道环境中局部作用，不引起全身性炎症。
E_B_mechanism_desc (产氧机制描述): 未涉及氧气生成或耗氧调控机制。
E_B_crit_evidence (标准B_依据): 无相关证据支持该系统具有氧合功能。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): 通过激活Peyer's patch和肠系膜淋巴结中的免疫细胞，增强非特异性免疫（如粒细胞活性）和特异性免疫（如IgA分泌），调节炎症反应。
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): 通过调节肠道屏障功能、减少炎症浸润、促进上皮再生，改善肠道黏膜完整性。
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): 通过降低结肠pH、抑制次级胆酸生成、调节肠道菌群结构，影响宿主代谢稳态，改善乳糖消化。
E_E_metabolite_material (代谢物_相关物质): Lactic acid, Secondary bile acids, SCFAs
E_F_mechanism_desc (肿瘤治疗描述): 通过激活宿主免疫系统（如NK细胞、巨噬细胞）、抑制致癌酶活性、减少异常隐窝灶数量，发挥抗肿瘤作用。
E_F_agent_material (治疗制剂_相关物质): Cell wall polysaccharides (e.g., SPR-901), Viilian, B cell mitogens
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Not applicable (natural strains used; no synthetic kill switches)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no evidence of horizontal gene transfer; low risk of environmental escape.
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Physical confinement via encapsulation in dairy matrix; limited survival outside gastrointestinal tract.
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 所用菌株均为公认安全（GRAS）的乳酸菌和双歧杆菌，无致病性，不携带耐药基因，且在体外环境中难以长期存活，安全性高。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在临床研究中，L. rhamnosus GG显著缩短婴儿轮状病毒腹泻持续时间；B. bifidum和L. acidophilus可减少结肠炎症浸润；L. acidophilus和B. bifidum联合使用可降低粪便中次级胆酸浓度和结肠pH，减少异常隐窝灶数量，提示对结直肠癌风险具有潜在预防作用。

composition (组成成分): [{"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus plantarum", "strain_id": "PBS067, DSM 24937"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus acidophilus", "strain_id": "PBS066, DSM 24936"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus reuteri", "strain_id": "PBS072, DSM 25175"}]
C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 6.0–7.0, requires carbon sources such as lactose, inulin, and fructooligosaccharides; dependent on prebiotic fibers for survival under stress
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Not explicitly reported; assumed moderate growth rate typical of lactobacilli in vitro; in vivo stability not assessed
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gut lumen, particularly in elderly individuals with metabolic syndrome
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Symbiotic with host microbiota; may compete with pathogenic bacteria; no evidence of disruption to native microbiome
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Enhanced survival under stress (e.g., gastric transit, drying) due to co-administration with prebiotics (inulin, FOS); stable during lyophilization and rehydration
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Inulin, Fructooligosaccharides (FOS)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该合成益生菌制剂由三种乳杆菌组成，均为兼性厌氧菌，适宜在人体肠道环境中生长。它们依赖于预处理的碳源（如菊粉和低聚果糖）以增强在胃肠道中的存活率和定植能力，尤其在老年代谢综合征患者中表现出良好的耐受性和稳定性。
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): No genetic modifications reported; strains are naturally occurring and used as-is; no plasmid or integration systems used
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Strains are stable within the liquid vial formulation and prebiotic matrix; no evidence of degradation or loss during storage
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 本研究中使用的三种乳杆菌均为天然菌株，未进行任何基因工程改造。其功能依赖于天然代谢途径，通过与预生物纤维（菊粉和低聚果糖）协同作用，增强在肠道环境中的定植和存活能力。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Natural metabolic sensors for carbohydrates (e.g., lactose, inulin, FOS); no engineered promoters or receptors reported
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No synthetic genetic circuits or logic gates identified; natural metabolic regulation based on substrate availability
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 三种乳杆菌通过天然代谢通路感知肠道中的碳源（如乳糖、菊粉、低聚果糖），并根据其可利用性调节生长和代谢活动。该过程为自然调控，无外源性诱导或逻辑门控机制。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Natural secretion via cell lysis and passive diffusion; no engineered secretion systems reported
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-controlled by daily oral administration of fixed vial (6×10⁹ CFU/day); no feedback control
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with liquid vial formulation; prebiotics enhance microbial stability and release
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 未提及抗菌或抗生物膜功能
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): 通过调节肠道菌群平衡，降低系统性炎症标志物如hsCRP和TNF-α水平，改善免疫稳态。
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): Short-chain fatty acids (SCFAs), other microbial metabolites
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): 通过调节脂质代谢、葡萄糖稳态和胰岛素敏感性，改善代谢综合征相关指标，如TG、LDL-C、HDL-C、FPG、FPI、HOMA-IR等。
E_E_metabolite_material (代谢物_相关物质): Short-chain fatty acids (SCFAs), Lactate, other fermentation products
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): No genetic kill switches or auxotrophy reported; natural strains with GRAS status
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no evidence of horizontal gene transfer; low risk of environmental escape
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Physical confinement via sealed vial; oral delivery limits systemic spread
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 所用三种乳杆菌均为公认安全（GRAS）菌株，无基因改造，无致病性或耐药基因，且通过口服给药和密封包装实现物理屏障，整体生物安全风险极低。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在为期60天的治疗中，合成益生菌组在腰围、空腹胰岛素、总胆固醇、高密度脂蛋白胆固醇、非高密度脂蛋白胆固醇、甘油三酯、低密度脂蛋白胆固醇、高敏C反应蛋白和肿瘤坏死因子α水平方面均显著改善，且代谢综合征诊断符合率从23%降至10%。同时，患者生活质量（EQ-5D VAS）显著提升，表明该合成益生菌制剂在调节代谢综合征和系统性炎症方面具有显著疗效。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH neutral to slightly alkaline, requires complex nutrients (MRS medium), grows in both intestinal and gill environments
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Growth rate not explicitly quantified; incubated at 37°C for 48 h in MRS broth and agar
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gastrointestinal tract and gills of freshwater fish (Labeo rohita and Cirrhinus mrigala)
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive adherence to mucosa, potential modulation of gut microbiota, no indication of symbiosis with host microbiome
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to storage at -80°C in 20% glycerol; no data on UV, drying, shear, or osmotic stress
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Glycerol (for cryopreservation)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 两种乳酸菌均从鱼的肠道和鳃中分离，为革兰氏阳性、过氧化氢酶阴性、非运动性球菌（CILB2）或杆状菌（RIL10），在37°C下于MRS培养基中生长良好，具有产乳酸能力，适合在鱼类消化道和鳃部定植。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): 16S rRNA gene sequencing for identification; no genetic tools or engineering described
G_circuit_control (回路控制): Not applicable (no synthetic circuits or inducible systems described)
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): Not applicable (no plasmid or chromosomal integration described)
