E_material_match (材料匹配性): Not applicable (no material encapsulation or delivery system described)
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): 通过产生乳酸和可能的其他抑菌物质（如细菌素）抑制病原菌生长，表现为对多种常见鱼类病原菌的抑菌圈。
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): CILB2和RIL10对Streptococcus agalactiae、Staphylococcus aureus和Escherichia coli均表现出显著拮抗活性，抑菌圈直径大于5 mm，且无溶血和明胶酶活性，表明安全性高。
E_B_mechanism_desc (产氧机制描述): 未涉及氧气生成或耗氧调控机制
E_B_crit_evidence (标准B_依据): 未提及任何氧合功能或相关酶。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): 作为潜在益生菌，可能通过调节宿主免疫系统（如NF-κB和MAPK通路）增强鱼体免疫力，支持肠道上皮细胞功能。
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): Probiotic metabolites (e.g., lactic acid, bacteriocins), cell wall components (inferred)
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): 未提及促进组织修复或再生功能
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): 未提及调节宿主代谢（如SCFAs、色氨酸代谢物等）
E_F_mechanism_desc (肿瘤治疗描述): 未涉及肿瘤治疗相关机制
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): No genetic kill-switch or auxotrophy described; natural safety profile based on non-hemolytic, non-gelatinase, and antibiotic-sensitive traits
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no hemolysis or gelatinase activity; sensitive to multiple antibiotics (except CILB2 resistant to gentamicin, RIL10 resistant to ciprofloxacin); no mention of antibiotic resistance genes or HGT risk
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Not applicable (no physical material barrier described)
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 两种菌株均无溶血和明胶酶活性，表明无致病性；对多种常用抗生素敏感，仅个别菌株对特定抗生素耐药，整体生物安全风险较低，符合益生菌使用标准。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): CILB2和RIL10对鱼类常见病原菌Streptococcus agalactiae、Staphylococcus aureus和Escherichia coli均表现出显著拮抗活性，其中RIL10抑菌圈直径最大达36.7 mm，具有良好的抗菌潜力，可作为鱼类饲料添加剂以提升鱼体健康和存活率。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 35–37°C, pH 5.5–6.5; tolerates gastric acidity (pH 2–3) transiently; requires carbohydrate sources (e.g., lactose, glucose) and amino acids; dependent on host-derived nutrients in gut environment.
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~60–90 minutes in vitro; growth rate consistent with in vivo colonization in gastrointestinal tract; maintains viability during oral administration and transit through upper GI tract.
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gastrointestinal tract (bowel), particularly colon; transiently colonizes rectal mucosa; no evidence of long-term engraftment or systemic persistence.
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of pathogens via resource competition and organic acid production; may modulate host immune response; no reported symbiotic or antagonistic interactions with resident microbiota beyond inhibition of MROs.
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to moderate osmotic stress and shear stress during encapsulation; stable during lyophilization and rehydration; resistant to bile salts in intestinal environment; UV and drying tolerance not reported.
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Bile salts (Bifidobacterium BB-12), capsule matrix (protective polymer)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Lactobacillus reuteri RC-14 和 Lactobacillus rhamnosus GR-1 为兼性厌氧菌，可在35–37°C、pH 5.5–6.5条件下生长，依赖碳水化合物和氨基酸，能耐受胃酸短暂暴露，定植于肠道，通过竞争性排斥抑制病原体。Bifidobacterium BB-12 和 Lactobacillus rhamnosus GG 亦为兼性厌氧菌，具有类似生长特性，可在肠道中定植并发挥益生作用。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Not specified (no genetic modification reported)
G_edit_efficiency (编辑效率): Not applicable (natural strains used, no engineered edits)
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High (natural strains with inherent stability; no plasmids or integrative vectors reported; no evidence of genetic drift or loss in vivo)
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in capsule matrix; no degradation or loss of viability during storage and delivery.
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 未对菌株进行基因改造，使用天然存在的益生菌株，通过口服胶囊形式递送，无基因回路或可控表达系统。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): FNR promoter (inferred for oxygen sensing), bile salt hydrolase (Bsh) genes (for bile sensing), lactate permease (LctP) for lactate uptake
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Constitutive expression; no reported logic gates or threshold control; activity driven by environmental availability of nutrients and pH.
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 菌株通过感知肠道环境中的pH、胆汁酸、乳酸和葡萄糖等信号，以组成型方式表达功能蛋白，无复杂的逻辑门控机制，依赖于营养物的可利用性进行定植和抑制病原体。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Type IV secretion (inferred), passive diffusion, lysis (natural release)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-controlled via capsule formulation (5.4 × 10⁹ CFU/capsule for RC14-GR1, 7 × 10⁹ CFU/capsule for LGG-BB12); no feedback control.
E_material_match (材料匹配性): High compatibility with oral capsule matrix; stable during encapsulation and GI transit; no structural disruption observed.
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Production of organic acids (lactic acid, reuterin) and bacteriocins; competitive exclusion of pathogens; inhibition of MROs via metabolic competition and niche exclusion.
E_A_agent_material (抗菌因子_相关物质): Lactic acid, Reuterin (from L. reuteri RC-14), Bacteriocins (from L. rhamnosus GR-1 and GG)
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): RC14-GR1显著降低MRGN新定植风险（OR 0.10），表明其具有可控的抗菌活性，且未引起明显不良反应，局部作用于肠道，未破坏材料结构。
E_B_crit_evidence (标准B_依据): 未使用氧生成机制，无相关证据。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Modulation of host immune response via interaction with dendritic cells and epithelial cells; enhancement of mucosal barrier function; reduction of pro-inflammatory cytokines.
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): Cell wall components (peptidoglycan, lipoteichoic acid), exopolysaccharides (EPS), secreted immunomodulatory proteins
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Production of short-chain fatty acids (SCFAs) such as acetate and lactate; modulation of gut metabolism; influence on host energy homeostasis and immune function.
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Auxotrophy (no evidence of auxotrophic markers reported), no kill-switches
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no horizontal gene transfer documented; low risk of environmental escape; no known virulence factors.
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Capsule provides physical confinement; no systemic dissemination observed.
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 所有菌株均为公认安全（GRAS）菌株，无致病性，无耐药基因，无基因水平转移风险，胶囊封装提供物理屏障，安全性高。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): RC14-GR1显著降低MRGN新定植风险（OR 0.10，P=0.04），但对清除已定植的MRSA、MRGN或VRE无效；IMC膀胱管理方式显著提高MRGN和MRO自由状态（OR 2.80，P=0.009）。

composition (组成成分): [{"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Faecalibacterium prausnitzii", "strain_id": "Not specified"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Akkermansia muciniphila", "strain_id": "Not specified"}, {"role": "Helper", "scientific_name": "Bacteroides thetaiotaomicron", "strain_id": "Not specified"}, {"role": "Helper", "scientific_name": "Bifidobacterium adolescentis", "strain_id": "Not specified"}, {"role": "Helper", "scientific_name": "Clostridium coccoides-Eubacterium rectale cluster", "strain_id": "Not specified"}]
C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 6.5–7.0; requires mucin or complex polysaccharides as carbon sources; sensitive to oxygen and bile salts
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Slow growth rate; doubling time not specified; in vitro culture requires strict anaerobic conditions; in vivo colonization is limited by oxygen gradient and host immune response
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Mucosal layer of the colon; preferentially colonizes the intestinal mucus layer; hypoxic microenvironments in the gut
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competes with pathogenic bacteria for mucin degradation; cross-feeding with Bacteroides and other SCFA producers; suppressed by high levels of oxygen and inflammatory signals
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Low tolerance to oxygen, gastric acid, bile salts, and heat; sensitive to lyophilization and drying; requires protective encapsulation for stability
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Inulin, fructans, resistant starch, alginate, and vitamin B2 (riboflavin) act as protective agents
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该系统中的核心菌株（如Faecalibacterium prausnitzii和Akkermansia muciniphila）均为严格厌氧菌，依赖肠道黏液或复杂多糖作为碳源，在37°C、pH 6.5–7.0的条件下生长。其生长缓慢，对氧气、胃酸、胆汁盐和热敏感，需在严格厌氧环境中培养。在体内，它们定植于结肠黏膜层，偏好缺氧微环境。其定植能力受宿主免疫反应和氧化还原电位影响，需通过辅助菌（如Bacteroides thetaiotaomicron）降低氧化还原电位以促进定植。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Not mentioned
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): Not mentioned
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Not mentioned
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 该系统未涉及基因工程改造，所有功能依赖于天然代谢途径和菌群间互作。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): FNR promoter (hypoxia), riboflavin (vitamin B2) as redox shuttle, mucin-binding adhesins
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): AND gate: requires both mucin presence and low oxygen for optimal growth; threshold-based activation of butyrate production in response to lactate/acetate levels
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 系统通过感知肠道缺氧环境（FNR启动子响应）和黏液基质（黏附蛋白识别）协同激活定植与代谢。同时，通过感知乳酸和乙酸浓度，调控丁酸生成，实现代谢互作。维生素B2作为电子穿梭体，使F. prausnitzii在微氧环境中维持氧化还原平衡，体现了一种天然的抗氧逻辑机制。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Type IV secretion system (inferred from cross-feeding), extracellular release of SCFAs
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Self-regulated by substrate availability (e.g., mucin, lactate); no external control mechanism described
E_material_match (材料匹配性): High compatibility with alginate, inulin, and resistant starch matrices; encapsulation enhances survival and controlled release
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): 通过产生丁酸和抑制病原菌竞争性定植，间接抑制多种肠道病原体生长；同时通过调节黏液屏障减少病原菌附着。
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 丁酸具有广谱抗菌活性，可抑制多种致病菌；通过增强黏液屏障减少生物膜形成；在体内未观察到显著毒性或菌群失衡。
E_B_mechanism_desc (产氧机制描述): 无直接产氧机制，但通过丁酸代谢消耗氧气，间接改善局部缺氧环境。
E_B_crit_evidence (标准B_依据): 无光依赖或非光依赖产氧机制，不适用于氧疗场景。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): 丁酸抑制NF-κB通路，减少促炎细胞因子（如TNF-α、IL-6）释放，促进Treg细胞分化，调节免疫稳态。
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): 丁酸促进肠上皮细胞增殖，增强紧密连接蛋白（如ZO-1、occludin）表达，修复受损肠屏障。
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): 通过产生短链脂肪酸（SCFAs）调节宿主能量代谢，改善胰岛素敏感性，降低肥胖相关代谢紊乱。
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Auxotrophy (e.g., vitamin B2 dependency), oxygen sensitivity
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; F. prausnitzii and A. muciniphila are commensals; potential risk in immunocompromised hosts; no antibiotic resistance genes reported
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Alginate and inulin encapsulation provides physical confinement and protects against premature release
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 该系统为天然共生菌群，无致病性，属于BSL-1等级。其对氧气极度敏感，可作为天然生物遏制机制。维生素B2依赖性进一步限制其在非营养环境中存活。封装材料（如海藻酸钠、菊粉）提供物理屏障，防止逃逸。总体风险极低。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在动物模型中，该系统可显著改善代谢综合征、炎症性肠病和肠道屏障损伤。通过增加Akkermansia和Faecalibacterium丰度，降低F/B比值，提升丁酸水平，促进黏液修复和免疫调节，实现肠道微生态重建和功能恢复。

composition (组成成分): [{"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus rhamnosus", "strain_id": "GG"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Bifidobacterium breve", "strain_id": "Bb-12"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Bifidobacterium infantis", "strain_id": "Bifidobacterium infantis"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus reuteri", "strain_id": "DSM 17938"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Saccharomyces boulardii", "strain_id": "S. boulardii"}]
C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 5.5–6.5; tolerates gastric acidity; thrives in nutrient-rich, low-oxygen intestinal environment; requires prebiotics (e.g., oligosaccharides) for optimal colonization
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~1–2 hours in vitro; stable in vivo colonization in infant gut over weeks; consistent with in vivo homeostasis
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Intestinal mucosa, particularly in the colon; preferentially colonizes breastfed infants; binds to mucus layer and enterocytes
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of pathogenic bacteria; enhances colonization resistance; synergizes with native flora; promotes growth of beneficial bacteria via SCFA production
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to gastric acid, bile salts, and moderate osmotic stress; stable during lyophilization and storage at 4°C; resistant to drying and rehydration
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Mucin-binding adhesins, acid-resistant cell wall components, bile salt hydrolases
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 这些益生菌均为人源性，可在婴儿肠道中定植并增殖，具有良好的耐酸性、耐胆盐性和在低氧环境下的生长能力。它们主要定植于结肠黏膜表面，通过竞争性排斥、产生有机酸和调节免疫等方式维持肠道微生态平衡。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): None reported
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High chromosomal stability; no plasmid-based systems reported; minimal metabolic burden; long-term in vivo persistence observed
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in food matrices and infant formulas; no significant degradation in delivery vehicles
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 未进行基因工程改造，其功能依赖于天然菌株的生理特性，如黏附能力、有机酸分泌和免疫调节活性。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): FNR promoter (hypoxia), Bile salt hydrolase (bile), Mucin-binding adhesins (mucosal attachment)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Constitutive expression; threshold-based response to nutrient availability; feedback inhibition via SCFA accumulation
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 这些菌株通过感知肠道环境中的pH、胆汁酸和低氧条件启动定植过程；通过识别乳糖、寡糖等营养物质激活代谢通路；同时响应宿主免疫信号（如sIgA）和黏蛋白表达，实现对肠道微环境的动态适应。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Constitutive secretion of organic acids, bacteriocins, and immunomodulatory molecules; no lysis or vesicle-mediated delivery reported
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent effects; efficacy observed at 10^9–10^10 CFU/day; no external control mechanisms
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with infant formulas, breast milk, and oral suspensions; stable in encapsulated and lyophilized forms
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): 通过产生乳酸、乙酸等有机酸降低局部pH，抑制病原菌生长；分泌细菌素（bacteriocins）直接杀伤有害菌；竞争性排斥病原体定植。
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): LGG和B. breve在临床试验中显著减少腹泻持续时间，且无明显组织损伤；LGG在新生儿中预防NEC有效，提示其抗菌与生物膜抑制能力安全可控。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): 调节Th1/Th2平衡，降低IL-4、IL-5等Th2型细胞因子，增加IFN-γ等Th1型因子；增强sIgA分泌，促进免疫耐受；抑制Treg细胞功能异常。
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): 通过上调黏蛋白基因表达，促进黏膜屏障修复；增强肠道通透性调节，减少炎症损伤；促进上皮再生。
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): 发酵碳水化合物产生短链脂肪酸（SCFAs），如乙酸、丙酸、丁酸，具有抗炎作用并提供能量；调节肠道pH，抑制有害菌生长。
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Auxotrophy (nutrient-dependent growth); no antibiotic resistance genes reported
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no evidence of HGT; opportunistic infections rare; D-lactate production may cause neurological symptoms in susceptible infants
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Oral delivery limits systemic spread; gastrointestinal barrier prevents escape
B_risk_desc (风险描述): LGG和B. infantis等菌株被广泛用于婴儿，安全性良好。尽管有极少数LGG相关败血症报告，但均发生在有中心静脉导管的住院患儿中，提示与宿主免疫状态相关。D-乳酸可能在代谢缺陷儿童中引起酸中毒，需注意。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): LGG显著缩短急性病毒性腹泻持续时间，降低住院率；预防抗生素相关性腹泻和新生儿坏死性小肠结肠炎（NEC）；在过敏性湿疹患儿中改善临床评分并调节免疫标志物。在有家族过敏史的婴儿中，LGG可降低2岁和4岁时湿疹发生率。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 25–30°C; growth on PGYE and DSM media; efficient sporulation on solid and liquid media.
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Vegetative cells grow to high densities (1.5–1.76 × 10⁹ cfu/ml); spores are stable and germinate in GI tract.
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gastrointestinal tract (colon), particularly in the large intestine; transient colonization without permanent establishment.
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Allochthonous organism; does not permanently colonize; may support beneficial commensals like Faecalibacterium prausnitzii.
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): High heat stability (resists 95°C for 15 min); resistant to simulated gastric fluid (pH 3–4); spores of SG183 resistant to pH 2; resistant to simulated intestinal fluid (SIF).
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Sporulenes (heptaprenyl lipids) in spores; squalene-hopene cyclase enzyme.
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Bacillus pumilus SG43 and Bacillus megaterium SG183 are strict aerobes that grow efficiently at 25–30°C on various media, form spores readily, and exhibit high resistance to heat and gastrointestinal stresses. Spores survive passage through the stomach and are shed in feces within 18 days, indicating transient colonization of the GI tract without permanent establishment.
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Genome sequencing via Illumina mate-paired sequencing; no genetic modification reported.
G_circuit_control (回路控制): Constitutive expression of carotenoid and riboflavin biosynthesis pathways.
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High chromosomal stability; no plasmids reported; intrinsic resistance genes present but not linked to horizontal gene transfer risk.
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Spores maintain stability in encapsulated formulations and during storage.
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): No genetic engineering was performed. The strains naturally produce high levels of riboflavin and C30 carotenoids via constitutive biosynthetic pathways. Genome analysis confirmed the presence of complete carotenoid and riboflavin biosynthesis operons without evidence of plasmid-based or engineered genetic elements.
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Squalene-hopene cyclase (spore-specific enzyme); carotenoid biosynthesis operon (regulated by growth phase and light in SG183).
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Constitutive expression; no synthetic logic circuits. Pigment production is inversely correlated with sporulation (alternative developmental response).
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): Pigment production and sporulation are mutually exclusive developmental pathways in Bacillus pumilus SG43. Sporulation in DSM medium suppresses pigment production, while growth in BTC medium favors pigment accumulation. Light induces pigment production in SG183 but not in SG43. This suggests a natural regulatory logic where environmental cues (light, medium composition) modulate metabolic output via developmental trade-offs.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Spore-mediated delivery; riboflavin excreted into medium; carotenoids embedded in cell wall and spore membrane.
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent increase in Faecalibacterium prausnitzii levels with daily administration of spores.
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Spores are stable in encapsulated formulations and resist GI degradation; suitable for oral delivery.
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Not applicable (no antibacterial effector reported).
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): No evidence of antibacterial activity reported.
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Not applicable (no cytokine or immune modulator reported).
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Promotes growth of Faecalibacterium prausnitzii, a butyrate-producing bacterium associated with improved gut barrier function and mucosal healing.
E_D_repair_material (修复因子_相关物质): Faecalibacterium prausnitzii (indirectly stimulated via antioxidant delivery)
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Delivers riboflavin and carotenoids, which act as antioxidants and redox modulators, lowering intestinal redox potential to support anaerobic commensals.
E_F_mechanism_desc (肿瘤治疗描述): Not applicable (no tumor-targeting or prodrug conversion mechanism reported).
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): No synthetic kill switches; reliance on transient colonization and natural clearance.
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): No pathogenicity genes; no enterotoxin genes (e.g., hbl, nhe); no transposons with antibiotic resistance; intrinsic resistance to antibiotics via efflux pumps; no evidence of horizontal gene transfer risk.
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Spores are physically confined and shed within 18 days; no permanent colonization.
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Both strains are non-pathogenic, lack virulence genes, and do not persist in the gut. They are resistant to gastric and intestinal fluids, but their transient nature and lack of colonization reduce long-term ecological risk. No evidence of genotoxicity or acute toxicity in mice. GRAS status is supported by absence of toxigenic activity and antibiotic resistance genes.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): Daily administration of Bacillus pumilus SG43 spores significantly increased Faecalibacterium prausnitzii levels in mouse colon (p = 0.04), suggesting potential for improving gut barrier function and reducing inflammation in inflammatory bowel disease. Spores were more effective than vegetative cells, likely due to enhanced survival and delivery of antioxidants (riboflavin and sporulenes) to the large intestine.

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Growth in gastrointestinal tract; tolerates pH and osmotic conditions of gut; utilizes sugars (sucrose, glucose, lactose) as carbon sources
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): No specific growth rate or doubling time reported; survives gastrointestinal passage and likely colonizes gut
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Intestinal tract (gut mucosa, particularly in suckling piglets)
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competes with pathogenic E. coli; may stimulate growth of other lactic acid bacteria (LAB) such as lactobacilli
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerates storage at 4°C; survives gastrointestinal transit; stable in gel and liquid formulations
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Peanut oil, sucrose, glucose, lactose (formulation components)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该菌株为肠球菌属，属于革兰氏阳性球菌，为兼性厌氧菌，可在猪小肠环境中存活并定植。其生长依赖于糖类（如蔗糖、葡萄糖、乳糖）作为碳源，能耐受胃肠道的酸性环境和渗透压变化，具有良好的稳定性，可在口服制剂中保持活性。
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 该研究未对 Enterococcus faecium DSM 10663 NCIMB 10415 进行基因工程改造，仅作为天然存在的益生菌株使用，未引入外源基因或调控回路。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): No specific sensor identified; likely relies on native metabolic sensing of nutrients and environmental conditions
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No engineered logic gates; natural metabolic responses to nutrient availability
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 该菌株通过感知肠道中的糖类（如葡萄糖、蔗糖、乳糖）和pH等环境信号，启动自身代谢活动，但未设计任何人工逻辑控制回路，其响应为自然生理行为。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Natural secretion of metabolic products (e.g., lactic acid); no engineered secretion system
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Controlled by defined daily administration (gel and liquid additive); dosage adjusted based on age and health status
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with gel (peanut oil-based) and liquid (sugar-based) formulations; stable in both matrices
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): 通过与携带I型菌毛的致病性大肠杆菌协同作用，抑制其定植；可能通过竞争性排斥或代谢产物抑制病原菌生长。
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 该菌株可显著降低仔猪腹泻发生率（14.8% vs 40.0%），且无明显细胞毒性或微生物群落紊乱，表明其抗菌作用具有可控性和安全性。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): 可能通过刺激宿主免疫系统，增强肠道屏障功能，调节免疫应答，从而减少腹泻发生。
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): Lactic acid, bacterial cell wall components (e.g., peptidoglycan)
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): 通过产生短链脂肪酸（如乳酸）调节肠道代谢环境，促进营养吸收，维持肠道稳态。
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (natural strain, no engineered kill switches)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no horizontal gene transfer documented; low risk of environmental escape due to gut-restricted colonization
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Physical confinement via oral delivery and gut retention; no systemic dissemination reported
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Enterococcus faecium DSM 10663 NCIMB 10415 被广泛用作动物饲料添加剂，具有GRAS（公认安全）地位。其为天然益生菌，无基因工程改造，不携带已知的抗生素抗性基因，且在肠道内定植，不易逃逸至环境，安全性高。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 口服补充该菌株从出生至断奶可显著降低仔猪腹泻发生率（14.8% vs 40.0%），并提高日增重17 g/天（p < 0.05），表明其在改善仔猪健康和生产性能方面具有显著效果。

E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): 通过调节宿主免疫系统，增强黏膜屏障功能，抑制过度炎症反应，促进免疫耐受。
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): 通过分泌生长因子和调节肠道上皮细胞增殖，促进肠黏膜修复和屏障功能恢复。
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): 通过发酵碳水化合物产生短链脂肪酸（SCFAs），调节宿主能量代谢、血糖稳态和脂质代谢。

B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Not applicable
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 传统益生菌如乳酸杆菌、双歧杆菌等已被广泛使用，具有GRAS或QPS认证，安全性高。其在人体内定植能力有限，不易在环境中长期存活，风险较低。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 这些益生菌通过调节肠道菌群、增强免疫功能、促进黏膜修复和代谢平衡，在多种疾病模型中显示出改善肠道健康、缓解炎症性肠病和代谢综合征的潜力。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 6.5–7.5, tolerates moderate osmotic stress; utilizes glucose and other carbon sources; no specific vitamin dependency reported
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): High initial growth post-ingestion; sustained colonization for up to 30 weeks (mean: 18.7 weeks, median: 25.7 weeks); in vivo persistence exceeds in vitro expectations
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Human intestinal lumen, particularly in the colon; capable of competing with host E. coli and establishing long-term presence
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competes with host E. coli strains; may create niche for commensal E. coli recovery post-antibiotics; no significant disruption of overall microbiota reported
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerates gastric transit (acidic environment), bile salts, and moderate osmotic stress; survives lyophilization and storage in product; stable during intestinal transit
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Natural E. coli cell envelope, bile resistance genes (inferred)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该研究中使用的益生菌大肠杆菌（Symbioflor®2）在单次高剂量摄入后，可在人体肠道内长期定植，持续时间长达30周。其生长生理特性包括在37°C、中性pH条件下快速增殖，能耐受胃肠道环境中的酸性和胆盐压力，且在宿主肠道微生物群中具有较强的竞争力，可长期占据生态位。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Not specified (natural genotypes used; no genetic modification reported)
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High chromosomal stability; genotype G1⁺ persisted for months without evidence of plasmid loss or integration; no genetic drift reported
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in oral formulation (lyophilized powder); maintains viability during storage and gastrointestinal transit
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 本研究未对大肠杆菌进行基因工程改造，所用菌株为天然存在的益生菌型大肠杆菌（Symbioflor®2），其长期定植能力源于其固有的生态适应性，而非人工设计的遗传回路。
S_host_signals (宿主信号): ["Proteases (inferred from gut environment)", "Cytokines (indirectly via immune modulation)"]
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Inferred: FNR promoter (hypoxia), Bile acid transporters, Glucose uptake systems (e.g., ptsG), and quorum sensing receptors (e.g., LuxS/AI-2)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Competition-based logic: persistence depends on niche establishment and competitive exclusion; threshold-like behavior in dominance shift (G1⁺ overtakes others after initial phase)
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 该系统通过感知肠道环境中的pH、胆汁酸和渗透压等物理化学信号，以及葡萄糖等代谢物，实现对肠道生态位的适应。其逻辑机制表现为：初期多种基因型共存，随后通过竞争性排斥，G1⁺型菌株在数天后逐渐占据主导地位，表现出类似‘AND门’逻辑——需同时满足环境适应与竞争能力才能长期定植。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Passive secretion (natural metabolic activity); no engineered secretion systems reported
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Not controllable (single high-dose intake; no feedback regulation)
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with oral formulation (lyophilized powder); stable during GI transit
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Not applicable (no engineered antibacterial function)
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 无相关证据
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Indirect immunomodulation via niche occupation and competition with pathogenic strains; may stimulate immune surveillance; self-reported improvement in immune defense by volunteers
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): Inferred: Microbial-associated molecular patterns (MAMPs), e.g., LPS, flagellin, and secreted metabolites
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Not applicable (no direct tissue repair function)
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Modulates gut environment via production of SCFAs and competition for nutrients; may influence host metabolism through microbial community shifts
E_E_metabolite_material (代谢物_相关物质): Short-chain fatty acids (SCFAs), e.g., acetate, propionate
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Natural auxotrophy (inferred); no suicide genes or kill switches reported
B_containment_material (生物安全_相关物质): Inferred: Nutrient dependency (e.g., for specific amino acids or vitamins)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no severe side effects observed; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; low risk of horizontal gene transfer; no environmental escape reported
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Oral formulation provides physical barrier; natural clearance via feces
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 该益生菌大肠杆菌菌株为长期使用的GRAS级产品，未发现严重不良反应。其在人体肠道内长期定植但未引起炎症或菌群失衡，且在抗生素治疗后可被清除，表明其具有良好的生物安全性。无基因工程改造，无耐药基因，无致病性，属于低风险生物制剂。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 该研究未直接评估伤口愈合或疾病治疗效果，但结果显示，单次高剂量摄入后，益生菌大肠杆菌在5名志愿者中均实现长期定植（最长30周，平均18.7周），其中G1⁺型菌株为唯一持续存在的基因型。该菌株在肠道中表现出强竞争力，可替代宿主菌株并促进其恢复，提示其在调节肠道微生态、增强免疫防御方面具有显著潜力。

spatial_arrangement (空间排布): Encapsulated (on skin surface, applied as probiotic treatment)
C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at room temperature (22–25°C), neutral to slightly alkaline pH, moderate osmotic tolerance; dependent on host skin environment (moist, nutrient-rich surface)
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Not explicitly reported; inferred to grow in vitro under standard lab conditions; no in vivo doubling time data available

C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive with resident microbiota; failed to persist in A. zeteki skin, suggesting strong competition from native microbial community
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Not explicitly reported; assumed moderate tolerance to environmental fluctuations due to amphibian skin habitat
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 这些细菌均为从巴拿马蛙类皮肤中分离的革兰氏阴性菌，具有在体外抑制蛙壶菌（Bd）的能力。它们在实验中被应用于金蛙皮肤表面，但未能在体内长期定植，表明其在宿主皮肤微环境中的适应性有限。
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 文中未提及对这些细菌进行基因改造。所有实验均使用原始分离株作为益生菌候选，未进行任何遗传修饰或合成生物学设计。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Not specified (no engineered sensors reported)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Not applicable (no synthetic circuits described)
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 这些细菌未被设计为具有响应性逻辑电路。其功能依赖于天然代谢产物的产生，而非环境信号触发的基因调控。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Unknown (likely passive secretion via outer membrane or lysis; no specific secretion system reported)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Not controllable (no engineered regulation of output; activity depends on natural growth and metabolite production)
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Poor (failed to persist in skin environment; no evidence of stable encapsulation or sustained release)
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): 通过产生抗真菌代谢物抑制蛙壶菌（Batrachochytrium dendrobatidis）的生长，该机制在体外实验中被证实有效。
E_A_agent_material (抗菌因子_相关物质): Antifungal metabolites (e.g., indole derivatives, phenazines, or other unknown compounds)
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 体外实验显示这些细菌能有效抑制蛙壶菌，但体内应用后未能定植，因此无法评估其在生物膜或组织中的实际抗菌效果。
E_B_crit_evidence (标准B_依据): 无相关数据支持该功能。
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (no kill-switches or auxotrophy reported)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no reports of virulence in amphibians or humans; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; potential for horizontal gene transfer not assessed; environmental escape risk low due to lack of persistence.
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): None (no physical barrier used in experiment; probiotics applied directly to skin)
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 这些细菌均为从野生蛙类皮肤中分离的非致病性菌株，未见致病报道，且在体外实验中表现出良好的安全性。但由于其在宿主皮肤上无法定植，因此实际生态风险较低。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 实验结果显示，尽管体外具有强抗蛙壶菌活性，但四种候选益生菌在金蛙皮肤上均未能长期定植。约30%的感染个体成功清除了病原体，但这一结果与益生菌处理无关，而是与初始皮肤微生物群落结构密切相关。这表明宿主皮肤微生物群落的天然组成比外源性益生菌更关键，提示未来应优先筛选与宿主共存且能稳定定植的本土菌株用于益生菌开发。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Temperature: 38°C; pH: 7.2 (PBS); Nutritional requirements: Complex medium (Tryptic soya broth), supplemented with carbon sources and amino acids from basal diet (casein, gelatin, dextrin, starch).
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Growth rate: Not explicitly quantified; doubling time inferred from 48 h incubation at 38°C. In vivo growth supported by gut environment of M. rosenbergii.
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gastrointestinal tract (gut microbiota of Macrobrachium rosenbergii)
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of pathogenic bacteria (Aeromonas spp., Pseudomonas spp.); symbiotic relationship with host via immune modulation.
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Moderate tolerance to storage at 4°C (viability dropped to 35.25% after 30 days); resistant to drying during feed pelletization (45°C, 1–2 h); stable under autoclaving (121°C, 15 psi, 25 min).
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Spore formation (endospore) confers resistance to heat, drying, and chemical stress.
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Bacillus licheniformis is a Gram-positive, endospore-forming bacterium capable of surviving in the aquatic environment and colonizing the gut of giant freshwater prawns. It grows optimally at 38°C and is stable in feed formulations, with viability maintained for up to 30 days at 4°C, though with gradual decline. It successfully colonizes the gastrointestinal tract, where it outcompetes pathogenic bacteria and enhances host growth and immunity.
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): No genetic modifications reported; natural chromosomal stability in host environment. Spore formation ensures long-term survival and persistence.
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in feed matrix (pellets) and during storage; viability maintained in encapsulated form.
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): No genetic engineering was performed. The strain was used in its native form as a probiotic. Its functionality relies on natural traits such as spore formation, enzyme secretion, and competitive exclusion.
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Endospore formation regulated by environmental cues (e.g., nutrient depletion, temperature); no specific receptor or promoter reported.
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No synthetic logic circuits; natural response to nutrient availability and environmental stress.
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): Bacillus licheniformis senses nutrient availability and environmental stress (e.g., temperature, pH) through intrinsic regulatory systems. Upon nutrient depletion, it enters sporulation phase, ensuring survival. It colonizes the gut by sensing host-derived nutrients and outcompeting pathogens via metabolic competition.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Type I–VI secretion systems (inferred from genus), lysis (spore germination), extracellular enzyme secretion
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent response observed; highest effects at 1.0 × 10⁹ cfu/g feed; no synthetic control systems.
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with feed pellet matrix; stable during autoclaving and drying; encapsulated in feed for delivery.
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Secretes bacteriocins (e.g., polymyxin, bacitracin, gramicidin) and extracellular enzymes that degrade biofilms and slime layers, enhancing antibiotic penetration. Competes with pathogens for nutrients and space.
E_A_agent_material (抗菌因子_相关物质): Bacteriocins (polymyxin, bacitracin, gramicidin), extracellular enzymes (proteases, amylases)
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): Significant reduction in pathogenic Aeromonas spp. and Pseudomonas spp. in gut; inhibition of biofilm formation via enzyme secretion; no reported cytotoxicity or microbiome disruption; localized action in gut.
E_B_crit_evidence (标准B_依据): No evidence of oxygen production or oxygenation function.
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Enhances cellular and humoral immunity via cell wall components (β-glucan, lipopolysaccharide) and competitive exclusion of pathogens. Stimulates haemocyte proliferation, phenol oxidase (PO), and superoxide dismutase (SOD) activity.
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Promotes tissue integrity by reducing pathogen load and inflammation. Indirectly supports tissue repair by enhancing immune function and reducing infection burden.
E_D_repair_material (修复因子_相关物质): Immune mediators (PO, SOD), reduced pathogen-induced tissue damage
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Natural auxotrophy (no synthetic kill switches); spore formation limits overgrowth.
B_containment_material (生物安全_相关物质): Spore formation (endospore) acts as natural containment.
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Non-pathogenic; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; low risk of horizontal gene transfer; no environmental escape documented.
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Feed pellet encapsulation provides physical confinement.
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Bacillus licheniformis is classified as GRAS (Generally Recognized As Safe). It is non-pathogenic, does not produce toxins, and lacks antibiotic resistance genes. Its spore-forming nature limits uncontrolled proliferation. Encapsulation in feed ensures localized delivery and reduces environmental release risk.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): Dietary supplementation of Bacillus licheniformis at 1.0 × 10⁹ cfu/g feed significantly improved growth (112.25% weight gain), reduced feed conversion ratio (2.14), enhanced immune parameters (highest THC, PO, SOD, and antibacterial activity), and reduced cumulative mortality by 50% after Vibrio alginolyticus challenge. It successfully colonized the gut, suppressed pathogenic bacteria (Aeromonas, Pseudomonas), and provided dose-dependent protection, indicating strong therapeutic efficacy in prawn health management.

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 6.5–7.0; tolerates pH 3.0 for up to 24 hours; survives 2% bile salt; grows in MRS broth with up to 6% NaCl
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time not reported; viable counts maintained at >4 log CFU/ml after 24 h at pH 3.0; growth rate reduced at 2% bile salt but not abolished
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gastrointestinal tract (small intestine and colon); potential for intestinal mucosal adhesion
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of pathogens via antibacterial metabolites; auto-aggregation may enhance colonization and biofilm formation
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to 60°C for 10 min (up to 86.6% viability); resistant to 6% NaCl; survives 24 h at pH 3.0; tolerates 2% bile salt
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Heat shock proteins (HSPs), membrane integrity, acid tolerance systems (e.g., H+-ATPase)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该研究中分离的植物乳杆菌（Lactobacillus plantarum）具有良好的酸耐受性、胆盐耐受性、热稳定性和高盐耐受性，能够在模拟胃肠道环境中存活，具备作为益生菌候选菌株的生理基础。
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 本文未涉及基因工程改造，所有菌株均为天然分离菌株，未进行人工遗传修饰。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): H+-ATPase, membrane transporters, acid tolerance systems (e.g., F1F0-ATPase)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No engineered logic gates; natural sensing via pH homeostasis and osmotic regulation systems
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 植物乳杆菌通过H+-ATP酶系统维持细胞内pH稳定，响应外部酸性环境；通过膜转运蛋白调节渗透压，实现对胃肠道恶劣环境的自然适应。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Type I secretion (e.g., bacteriocins), passive diffusion of organic acids, hydrogen peroxide
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Not controllable; natural secretion based on growth phase and environmental conditions
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with food matrices; no data on encapsulation or gel compatibility
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): 分泌有机酸、过氧化氢、细菌素等抗菌物质，抑制常见食源性病原菌生长
E_A_agent_material (抗菌因子_相关物质): Organic acids (lactic, acetic), hydrogen peroxide, bacteriocins
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 多数植物乳杆菌对李斯特菌、沙门氏菌、金黄色葡萄球菌等具有显著抑制作用，抑制圈直径达8–17 mm，且未提及对宿主细胞毒性，表明其具有可控且安全的抗菌活性。
E_B_crit_evidence (标准B_依据): 无相关数据支持该菌株具有产氧能力。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): 通过调节宿主免疫反应，增强肠道屏障功能，抑制炎症因子释放
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): Cell surface proteins, exopolysaccharides (EPS), secreted metabolites
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (natural strain, no engineered kill switches)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): No antibiotic resistance genes reported; low pathogenicity; no evidence of horizontal gene transfer; safe for human consumption
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): None (no physical confinement described)
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 植物乳杆菌为公认安全（GRAS）菌种，未发现耐药基因或致病性特征，无基因工程改造，无逃逸风险，适合用于食品和功能性产品。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 该研究评估了植物乳杆菌在模拟胃肠道环境中的存活能力、耐酸耐胆盐能力、热稳定性和抗菌活性，结果显示多个菌株（如0147、0611、0612）在pH 3.0下24小时后仍保持>4 log CFU/ml，且对李斯特菌等病原菌具有强抑制作用，表明其具有良好的益生潜力，可作为功能性食品的候选菌株。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Temperature: 25–37°C; pH: 5.5–9.0; Tolerant to high osmotic stress and extreme pH; Grows on alternative non-expensive ingredients including soybean meal and complex carbohydrates
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Growth rate: Rapid; Doubling time: ~20–30 min in optimal conditions; In vitro growth consistent with in vivo colonization ability
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gut lumen of Litopenaeus vannamei, particularly in the intestine and hepatopancreas
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competes with opportunistic pathogens (e.g., Vibrio spp.) for colonization sites; promotes beneficial bacteria (e.g., Pseudoalteromonas); suppresses pathogenic microbial groups
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): High tolerance to heat, pH extremes, osmotic stress, and drying; Spores survive feed processing and storage; Resistant to UV and shear stress during formulation
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Spore coat proteins (e.g., CotA, SASP)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Bacillus subtilis AQAHBS001 is a robust, spore-forming bacterium with strong environmental resilience. It thrives in variable aquatic conditions typical of shrimp ponds and can germinate in the shrimp gut to exert beneficial effects. Its ability to grow on low-cost, non-expensive feed ingredients like soybean meal and complex carbohydrates makes it ideal for sustainable aquaculture applications.
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Plasmid-based expression systems (implied), CRISPR-Cas not mentioned
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High chromosomal stability; no plasmid loss reported; low metabolic burden; long-term in vivo consistency observed
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Spores remain stable in feed matrix; germination triggered by gut conditions
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): Bacillus subtilis AQAHBS001 is naturally engineered through selection for high enzyme production (e.g., carbohydrases, proteases) and antimicrobial peptide synthesis. It is used in its wild-type form without genetic modification, relying on native gene expression for functional performance in feed.
S_metabolite_signals (代谢信号): ["Soybean meal components", "Complex carbohydrates (starch, non-starch polysaccharides)", "Protein degradation products"]
S_microbial_signals (微生物信号): ["Quorum sensing molecules (AHL, AI-2) – inferred from competition"]
S_host_signals (宿主信号): ["Proteases (e.g., trypsin inhibitors in soy)", "Immune factors (e.g., lysozyme, anti-LPS factors)"]
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): FNR-like regulators, Spo0A, and other sporulation/growth regulators; specific receptors for nutrient uptake (e.g., ABC transporters)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Constitutive expression with threshold-based activation upon nutrient availability; no explicit logic gates reported
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): The strain senses nutrient availability (e.g., complex carbohydrates, proteins) in the shrimp gut and activates metabolic pathways accordingly. Spore germination is triggered by specific gut conditions (pH, nutrients), enabling timely activation of beneficial functions without external induction.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Secretion via Sec pathway and general secretion system (Type I/II); no lysis or vesicle release reported
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent effects observed; higher probiotic concentration leads to greater pathogen suppression and immune enhancement
E_material_match (材料匹配性): High compatibility with feed matrix; spores remain stable during feed processing and encapsulation; no structural degradation of feed observed
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Produces antimicrobial peptides (AMPs) that inhibit pathogenic bacteria such as Vibrio parahaemolyticus, Vibrio alginolyticus, and Vibrio harveyi; competes for colonization sites in the gut
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): Bacillus subtilis AQAHBS001 significantly reduced Vibrio spp. levels in hepatopancreas and intestine; no adverse effects on host cells reported; localized action in gut; no disruption of feed matrix structure
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Enhances immune response by upregulating phagocytic activity, prophenoloxidase, lysozyme, and anti-lipopolysaccharide factor (ALF) genes; increases intestinal wall thickness
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): Immune-stimulating metabolites and surface molecules (e.g., lipoteichoic acid, peptidoglycan fragments)
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Improves intestinal wall thickness and gut integrity; supports epithelial regeneration and barrier function
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Enhances digestion of complex carbohydrates (starch, non-starch polysaccharides) and proteins (soybean meal) via overproduction of carbohydrases and proteases; improves nutrient assimilation
E_E_metabolite_material (代谢物_相关物质): Glucose, amino acids, short-chain fatty acids (SCFAs) – inferred from improved digestion
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Auxotrophy (implied from natural strain use), no kill-switches reported
B_containment_material (生物安全_相关物质): Nutrient-dependent growth (e.g., specific amino acids, vitamins)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no known toxin production in this strain; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; low risk of horizontal gene transfer; environmental escape unlikely due to competitive disadvantage outside host
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Physical confinement via feed encapsulation; spores remain dormant until gut conditions trigger germination
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Bacillus subtilis AQAHBS001 is classified as GRAS by FDA. It has a long history of safe use in animal feed and human probiotics. No evidence of virulence or toxin production in this strain. Its dependence on gut-specific conditions limits environmental persistence, reducing ecological risk.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): Bacillus subtilis AQAHBS001 significantly improved feed conversion ratio, weight gain, survival rate, and immune parameters in Litopenaeus vannamei. It effectively reduced Vibrio spp. colonization in gut and hepatopancreas, enhanced intestinal integrity, and enabled full replacement of fishmeal with soybean meal and complex carbohydrates in aquafeeds, demonstrating high efficacy in sustainable shrimp aquaculture.

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Temperature: 37–45°C; pH: 5.0–8.5; Tolerant to bile salts and gastric conditions; Grows on soybean meal, starch, and non-starch polysaccharides
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Growth rate: Moderate; Doubling time: ~30–40 min; In vitro growth consistent with in vivo performance
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Intestinal tract of Litopenaeus vannamei; preferentially colonizes gut mucosa
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Suppresses opportunistic pathogens (Vibrio, Tenacibaculum, Photobacterium); downregulates Muricauda, Kangiella, Shewanella; promotes Pseudoalteromonas
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): High spore stability under heat, drying, and storage; Resistant to bile and low pH; Tolerant to osmotic and shear stress
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Spore coat proteins, SASP, and heat-shock proteins
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Bacillus coagulans ATCC 7050 is a thermotolerant, spore-forming bacterium with strong resilience to feed processing and gastrointestinal conditions. It effectively colonizes the shrimp gut and modulates microbial balance, making it suitable for functional feed applications.
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Not genetically modified; wild-type strain used
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High chromosomal stability; no plasmid loss; low metabolic burden; consistent in vivo performance
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Spores remain viable in feed matrix; germination triggered by gut conditions
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): Bacillus coagulans ATCC 7050 is used in its native form without genetic modification. Its beneficial effects stem from natural enzyme production and antimicrobial activity, with no synthetic circuits or inducible systems.
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Spo0A, SigH, and other sporulation regulators; nutrient-specific transporters
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Constitutive expression with nutrient-dependent activation; no complex logic gates reported
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): The strain senses nutrient availability (e.g., complex carbohydrates, proteins) and environmental cues (pH, temperature) in the shrimp gut, triggering germination and metabolic activation. Its response is tuned to gut-specific conditions, ensuring targeted activity.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Secretion via Sec pathway; no lysis or vesicle release reported
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent improvement in growth, immune response, and pathogen suppression
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Excellent compatibility with feed matrix; spores stable during processing; no adverse effects on feed structure
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Inhibits Vibrio, Tenacibaculum, Photobacterium, and other opportunistic pathogens; suppresses pathogen colonization through competitive exclusion and antimicrobial compound production
E_A_agent_material (抗菌因子_相关物质): Antimicrobial peptides (AMPs), organic acids (e.g., lactic acid)
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): Bacillus coagulans ATCC 7050 reduced pathogen levels in gut and pond water; improved food conversion ratio; no cytotoxicity reported; localized action; no feed matrix disruption
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Enhances immune responses including enzyme activity (lysozyme, protease), phagocytosis, and immune gene expression
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): Peptidoglycan, lipoteichoic acid, and secreted immunomodulatory metabolites
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Improves intestinal microbiota balance and gut integrity; supports epithelial regeneration
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Overproduces carbohydrases (e.g., alpha-galactosidase, cellulase, pectinase) and proteases to degrade complex carbohydrates and proteins in soybean meal and grains
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Auxotrophy (implied), no kill-switches
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no known toxin production; no antibiotic resistance genes; low HGT risk; environmental escape unlikely due to competitive disadvantage
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Feed encapsulation prevents environmental release; spores remain dormant until gut conditions trigger germination
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Bacillus coagulans ATCC 7050 is GRAS and widely used in animal and human probiotics. It has a strong safety profile with no reported adverse effects in shrimp or consumers. Its dependence on gut-specific conditions limits environmental persistence.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): Bacillus coagulans ATCC 7050 significantly improved growth, food conversion ratio, immune response, and gut microbiota balance in Litopenaeus vannamei. It effectively suppressed pathogenic bacteria, enhanced digestion of vegetable ingredients, and enabled sustainable aquafeed formulations with high levels of non-digestible carbohydrates, demonstrating strong performance in shrimp aquaculture.

C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Growth rate: Rapid; Doubling time: ~25–35 min; In vitro growth consistent with in vivo colonization
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gut lumen of Litopenaeus vannamei post-larvae
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competes with Vibrio parahaemolyticus and Vibrio alginolyticus; prevents pathogen establishment

C_growth_desc (生长描述): Bacillus cereus is a spore-forming, facultative anaerobe with strong environmental resilience. It colonizes the shrimp gut and inhibits pathogen proliferation through competition and antimicrobial activity, though its use requires careful safety evaluation.
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Not genetically modified; wild-type strain used
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High chromosomal stability; no plasmid loss; consistent in vivo performance
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Spores stable in feed; germination triggered by gut conditions
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): Bacillus cereus is used in its native form. Its probiotic function relies on natural antimicrobial peptide production and competitive exclusion, without synthetic genetic circuits.
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Spo0A, SigH, and nutrient-specific transporters
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Constitutive expression with nutrient-dependent activation; no complex logic gates
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): The strain senses gut-specific conditions (pH, nutrients) and germinates to exert antimicrobial and competitive effects. Its activity is naturally regulated by environmental cues.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Secretion via Sec pathway; no lysis or vesicle release reported
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent pathogen inhibition observed
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Good compatibility with feed matrix; spores stable during processing
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Inhibits Vibrio parahaemolyticus and Vibrio alginolyticus through production of antimicrobial peptides and competitive exclusion in the gut
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): Bacillus cereus inhibited pathogen proliferation in post-larvae; colonization capacity confirmed; however, potential for toxin production raises safety concerns; not recommended for commercial use without rigorous safety testing
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Not recommended for use without safety evaluation; potential for toxin production
B_containment_material (生物安全_相关物质): Toxin genes (e.g., cereulide, hemolysin) – not specified
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Moderate pathogenicity; can produce toxins harmful to humans; risk of antibiotic resistance; potential for HGT; environmental escape possible
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Feed encapsulation provides partial physical confinement
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Bacillus cereus is classified as BSL-2 due to its potential to produce toxins. Although it shows probiotic-like effects in shrimp, its use in aquaculture is not recommended without extensive safety testing and regulatory approval due to risks to human health and the environment.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): Bacillus cereus demonstrated strong pathogen inhibition and colonization ability in shrimp post-larvae, but its use is limited by safety concerns. It effectively reduced Vibrio parahaemolyticus and Vibrio alginolyticus levels, but its potential to produce harmful toxins makes it unsuitable for commercial application without rigorous safety validation.

healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): Bacillus licheniformis CIGBC232 effectively reduced Vibrio harveyi levels in shrimp larvae, enhanced immune response, and improved larval quality. It is a promising probiotic candidate for sustainable shrimp aquaculture with strong safety and performance characteristics.

spatial_arrangement (空间排布): Oral supplementation (systemic distribution via GI tract)
C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 35–37°C, pH 5.5–6.5, requires carbohydrates (e.g., lactose) and amino acids; tolerant to bile salts and gastric acidity
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~60–90 min in vitro; in vivo colonization is transient and dependent on host environment and diet
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gastrointestinal tract (small intestine and colon), with potential for transient mucosal adherence
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of pathogens; may modulate host immune response; no evidence of long-term colonization or disruption of native microbiota
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Moderate tolerance to drying, heat, and gastric acid; stable during storage at room temperature; sensitive to high shear stress during processing
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Cell wall components (e.g., peptidoglycan), exopolysaccharides (EPS), and bile salt hydrolases
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该混合益生菌由四种常见乳酸菌组成，均能在人体胃肠道中定植并发挥免疫调节作用。它们为兼性厌氧菌，可在胃酸和胆汁环境中存活，通过发酵碳水化合物产生乳酸，维持肠道酸性环境，抑制病原菌生长。在CF患者中，这些菌株通过口服摄入后定植于肠道，发挥系统性免疫调节作用，但不长期定植，且对肺部病原体无直接作用。
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): No genetic modification reported; natural strains used; plasmid-free or low-copy chromosomal integration; no evidence of genetic drift or instability in vivo
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): No engineered genetic circuits; natural strains used in commercial formulation; stability in oral tablet matrix
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 该研究中使用的益生菌为市售非基因工程混合制剂，未进行任何基因改造。其功能基于天然生理特性，通过调节宿主免疫系统和改善肠道屏障功能发挥作用，而非通过合成生物学回路实现可控表达。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Lactose permease (LacS), bile salt hydrolase (Bsh), pH-responsive promoters (e.g., in L. acidophilus)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No synthetic logic gates; natural metabolic sensing and response to nutrient availability and environmental stress
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 这些益生菌通过天然代谢感应机制感知肠道环境中的乳糖、pH值和胆汁盐等信号，启动糖代谢和应激防御通路。其响应为非编程性、基础生理行为，无逻辑门控或阈值调控，主要依赖于营养物可及性和宿主微环境。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Passive diffusion and cell lysis; secretion of metabolites via general secretion pathways
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent via oral intake (2 tablets/day, 6×10⁹ CFU/day); no feedback control
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with oral tablet formulation; stable during storage and GI transit
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Not applicable; no direct antibacterial activity reported
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 无
E_B_mechanism_desc (产氧机制描述): Not applicable; no oxygen-producing enzymes or mechanisms reported
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Modulate systemic immune response via gut-lung axis; reduce pro-inflammatory cytokines; enhance regulatory T-cell activity; improve intestinal barrier function
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): Secreted metabolites (e.g., SCFAs), cell wall components (e.g., peptidoglycan, lipoteichoic acid), and exopolysaccharides
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Not applicable; no direct tissue regeneration or ECM modulation reported
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Not applicable; no significant metabolic product modulation reported
E_F_mechanism_desc (肿瘤治疗描述): Not applicable; no anti-tumor activity reported
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None; natural strains with no known pathogenicity or antibiotic resistance genes
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no evidence of horizontal gene transfer; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; low risk of environmental escape; safe for immunocompetent individuals
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Oral delivery with natural clearance; no physical confinement required
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 该混合益生菌为公认安全（GRAS）菌株，广泛用于食品和保健品。未进行基因改造，无致病性、无抗生素抗性基因，且在CF患者中使用未引起严重不良反应。其在肠道中为短暂定植，通过自然排泄清除，无长期生态风险。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在10名CF患者中，6个月的益生菌治疗显著降低了肺部急性加重的发生率（P=0.002），与治疗前2年相比，急性加重次数从1.3次/6个月降至0次。尽管肺功能（FEV1）和痰液炎症标志物（中性粒细胞计数、IL-8水平）无显著变化，但患者未发生需要抗生素治疗的急性加重，提示益生菌可能通过免疫调节机制预防肺部恶化，具有潜在的预防性治疗价值。
