spatial_arrangement (空间排布): Encapsulated in feed or rearing water
C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal temperature: 25–37°C; pH: 6.0–8.0; osmotic tolerance: moderate; carbon sources: glucose, lactose, starch; nitrogen sources: peptone, yeast extract; essential amino acids: none required; vitamins: B-complex; host metabolite dependency: none
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time: 20–30 min in vitro; growth rate: high; in vivo homeostasis: stable in fish gut under normal conditions
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gastrointestinal tract (GIT) of freshwater fish, particularly in the intestine and mucus layer
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of pathogens via adhesion site competition and nutrient competition; symbiotic with host microbiota; minimal disruption to native microbiome
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): High tolerance to drying, lyophilization, and storage at 4°C; moderate UV resistance; shear stress tolerance in feed processing; stable in rearing water
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Spore formation (Bacillus spp.), cell wall integrity (Lactobacillus spp.), membrane stability (Saccharomyces spp.)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 这些微生物均为耐受性强的革兰氏阳性菌或酵母，可在淡水鱼肠道中定植并稳定生长。Bacillus 和 Lactobacillus 属具有良好的耐热性和耐干燥性，适合饲料加工和储存。它们在鱼肠道中能快速繁殖，利用碳水化合物产生有机酸，维持肠道微生态平衡，同时对多种病原菌具有抑制作用。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Plasmid-based expression systems, CRISPR-Cas9 (in research strains), Recombination (in lab strains)
G_edit_efficiency (编辑效率): High efficiency (>90%) in lab strains; off-target risk low in well-designed constructs
G_circuit_control (回路控制): Constitutive expression of beneficial genes; inducible systems not commonly used in commercial formulations
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High chromosomal integration stability; plasmid loss rate <1% per generation; metabolic burden low; evolutionary drift minimal in controlled environments
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in feed matrix and rearing water; no significant degradation of encapsulation materials
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 多数研究使用天然菌株，未进行基因改造。部分实验室研究采用质粒系统表达免疫调节因子或抗菌肽，但商业产品多为未经基因工程改造的天然菌株混合物。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): FNR promoter (hypoxia), Lactate dehydrogenase (Ldh), Bile acid-binding proteins, Quorum sensing receptors (LasR, LuxR)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): AND gate logic: activation only when multiple signals (e.g., low pH + high lactate) are present; threshold-based response; noise suppression via feedback loops
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 微生物通过感知肠道环境中的pH、乳酸和胆汁酸等信号，判断是否处于病原菌入侵或炎症状态。当多个信号同时出现时，启动免疫调节或抗菌机制，避免误激活。这种逻辑设计增强了系统对真实病理环境的响应特异性。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Type I-VI secretion systems, Lysis, Vesicles
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent response; controlled by feed concentration (1×10⁶–1×10⁹ CFU/g); timing: 28–63 days
E_material_match (材料匹配性): High compatibility with feed and water delivery systems; stable in encapsulated formulations
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): 通过产生细菌素、有机酸（乳酸、乙酸）、过氧化氢、蛋白酶和铁载体等物质抑制或杀灭病原菌，如Aeromonas hydrophila、Streptococcus agalactiae和Streptococcus iniae。
E_A_agent_material (抗菌因子_相关物质): Bacteriocins, Lactic acid, Acetic acid, Hydrogen peroxide, Proteases, Siderophores
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 多篇研究显示，复合益生菌显著提高鱼对A. hydrophila和S. agalactiae的抵抗力，且未观察到对宿主细胞的显著毒性或微生物组紊乱。
E_B_crit_evidence (标准B_依据): 无相关证据支持该系统具有氧生成能力。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): 增强巨噬细胞吞噬活性，促进抗体（IgM）、溶菌酶（Lysozyme）、酸性磷酸酶（ACP）、补体C3和细胞因子（如IL-1β、TNF-α）的产生，调节先天与适应性免疫反应。
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): IgM, Lysozyme, ACP, C3, IL-1β, TNF-α
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): 促进肠道上皮再生，增强黏膜屏障功能，改善肠道组织结构，减少炎症损伤。
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): 通过发酵碳水化合物产生短链脂肪酸（SCFAs），调节宿主能量代谢，改善营养吸收，维持肠道稳态。
E_E_metabolite_material (代谢物_相关物质): Lactic acid, Acetic acid, Butyric acid, Propionic acid
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Auxotrophy (nutrient dependency), Temperature-sensitive promoters (in research), No suicide genes
B_containment_material (生物安全_相关物质): Amino acid auxotrophy (e.g., leucine), Temperature-sensitive plasmids
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no known antibiotic resistance genes; low horizontal gene transfer risk; minimal environmental escape due to poor survival outside host; GRAS status for multiple strains
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Physical confinement in feed matrix and rearing water; limited survival in open environment
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 所有列出的菌株均被FDA和EFSA列为GRAS（公认安全），在鱼类养殖中长期使用未发现致病性或生态风险。部分菌株（如Bacillus spp.）可形成芽孢，增强环境耐受性，但其在自然水体中存活能力有限，且缺乏致病基因，因此生态风险极低。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 多篇研究证实，复合益生菌可显著提高尼罗罗非鱼、虹鳟、罗非鱼和鲤鱼的生长性能（WG、SGR）、饲料转化率（FCR）和存活率，尤其在Aeromonas hydrophila和Streptococcus agalactiae感染挑战中表现出更强的抗病能力。部分研究显示，复合菌株在免疫指标（IgM、Lysozyme、C3）和肠道组织结构改善方面优于单菌株，但并非所有组合均表现出协同效应，部分组合存在拮抗或非加性反应。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Growth at 37°C in anaerobic conditions (85% N₂, 10% H₂, 5% CO₂); requires MRS broth with peptone water for propagation and maintenance.
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Growth rate not explicitly quantified; subcultured once and incubated for 24 h in MRS broth. Colonization sustained in gnotobiotic pigs for up to 3 weeks post-last feeding.
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Intestinal tract (ileum), oral/nasal cavity, tonsils; effective colonization in neonatal gnotobiotic pigs.
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): No adverse interactions reported; no extraneous bacterial contamination detected. Does not disrupt host microbiome in gnotobiotic model.
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerates freezing at -80°C; stable during storage and rehydration. No mention of UV, shear, or osmotic stress.
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Freezing at -80°C
C_growth_desc (生长描述): L. acidophilus NCFM is a facultative anaerobe that grows well in MRS broth under anaerobic conditions at 37°C. It effectively colonizes the intestinal and upper respiratory tracts of neonatal gnotobiotic pigs without causing adverse effects. Colonization persists for at least 3 weeks after the last feeding, indicating good stability in the host environment.
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Not applicable (no genetic modification reported)
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): Not applicable (no plasmid or chromosomal integration reported)
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Not applicable
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): The study did not involve genetic engineering of L. acidophilus NCFM. The strain was used in its native form as a probiotic to enhance vaccine immunogenicity.
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Not applicable
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Not applicable
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): No engineered sensing or logic circuits were used. The strain's immunomodulatory effects are attributed to intrinsic biological properties rather than synthetic sensing modules.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Not applicable (no engineered secretion system reported)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Oral administration of incremental doses (10³ to 10⁶ CFU) over 5 days; dosage controlled by feeding schedule.
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Not applicable (no material encapsulation reported)
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Not applicable
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): Not applicable
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): L. acidophilus NCFM enhances both mucosal and systemic immune responses by increasing HRV-specific IFN-γ-producing CD8+ T cells, IgA and IgG antibody-secreting cells in the ileum, and serum IgM, IgA, IgG, and virus-neutralizing antibody titers.
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Not applicable
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Not applicable
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (native strain used; no kill-switch or auxotrophy reported)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): No pathogenicity, antibiotic resistance genes, or horizontal gene transfer risks reported. No adverse effects observed in gnotobiotic pigs.
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Not applicable
B_risk_desc (风险描述): L. acidophilus NCFM is a well-documented probiotic strain with a long history of safe use in humans and animals. It caused no diarrhea or side effects in neonatal gnotobiotic pigs, confirming its safety profile. No risk of environmental escape or microbiome disruption was observed.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): L. acidophilus NCFM significantly enhanced the immunogenicity of the oral rotavirus vaccine in gnotobiotic pigs, resulting in higher HRV-specific IFN-γ-producing CD8+ T cell responses in ileum and spleen, increased IgA and IgG antibody-secreting cell responses in the ileum, and elevated serum IgM, IgA, IgG, and virus-neutralizing antibody titers. These findings suggest a strong adjuvant effect that may improve vaccine protection against rotavirus infection.

composition (组成成分): [{"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Bifidobacterium bifidum", "strain_id": "W23"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Bifidobacterium lactis", "strain_id": "W52"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus acidophilus", "strain_id": "W37"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus brevis", "strain_id": "W63"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus casei", "strain_id": "W56"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus salivarius", "strain_id": "W24"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactococcus lactis", "strain_id": "W19"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactococcus lactis", "strain_id": "W58"}]
C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 6.5–7.0, in the presence of lactose and other fermentable carbohydrates; tolerance to gastric pH (2.0–3.0) and bile salts (0.3%)
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~1.5–2.5 hours in vitro; in vivo colonization observed within 24–48 hours post-ingestion, with sustained presence over 26 weeks in trial participants
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Intestinal mucosa, particularly in the colon; preferential niche in the large intestine due to high bifidobacterial and lactobacillal colonization capacity
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of pathogenic bacteria; synergistic co-colonization with native commensals; no evidence of disruption to core microbiota
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): High tolerance to freeze-drying, room temperature storage (up to 2 years), and moderate shear stress during encapsulation; stable during transit through gastric environment
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Lactose and maltodextrin carrier matrix in freeze-dried powder
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该微生物系统由8种益生菌组成，均为兼性厌氧菌，可在37°C、pH 6.5–7.0条件下生长，依赖乳糖等可发酵碳源。对胃酸（pH 2.0–3.0）和胆盐（0.3%）具有耐受性，经冻干处理后可在室温下稳定保存，口服后可在24–48小时内定植于肠道，持续26周。主要定植于结肠黏膜，通过竞争性排斥抑制病原菌，与宿主正常菌群协同定植，不破坏核心菌群结构。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): None (Natural strains, no genetic modification)
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High chromosomal stability; no plasmids used; no evidence of gene loss or drift during 26-week trial
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in freeze-dried powder and carrier matrix (maize starch, maltodextrins); no degradation during storage or in gastrointestinal transit
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 本系统未进行任何基因工程改造，所有菌株均为天然来源，通过冻干粉形式封装，利用其天然代谢特性发挥功能，无需外源调控元件。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): FNR promoter (hypoxia), Lactose permease (lactose), Bile salt hydrolase (bile acids)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Constitutive expression; no complex logic gates; threshold-based activation via nutrient availability and environmental cues
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 各菌株通过天然感知机制响应肠道环境变化，如pH、胆盐、乳糖等，实现定植与代谢活性的动态调节。无外源性逻辑门控，依赖于营养物质浓度和微环境信号的自然感应，实现基础水平的适应性表达。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Type I Secretion (bacteriocins), Lysis (controlled release of metabolites)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent; daily intake of 2 × 2.5 × 10^9 CFU/day; activity modulated by natural growth and persistence in gut
E_material_match (材料匹配性): High compatibility with freeze-dried powder and carrier matrix; stable during gastrointestinal transit; no structural disruption of delivery system
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): 通过产生有机酸（如乳酸）降低肠道pH，抑制病原菌生长；分泌细菌素和过氧化氢，直接杀灭致病菌；竞争性定植于黏膜表面，防止病原菌附着与生物膜形成。
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 在体外实验中，该菌群对常见肠道病原体（如沙门氏菌、大肠杆菌）具有广谱抑制作用，并能有效抑制生物膜形成；临床试验中未报告严重不良事件，表明活性可控且局部作用，无显著组织损伤或菌群失调。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): 诱导抗炎性细胞因子（如IL-10）表达，抑制促炎因子（如TNF-α、IL-6）释放，调节肠道屏障功能，减轻内毒素易位引发的系统性炎症。
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): 调节宿主代谢，降低循环内毒素水平；改善胰岛素敏感性；通过调节短链脂肪酸（SCFAs）生成，影响能量代谢与炎症状态。
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Auxotrophy (nutrient-dependent growth), no antibiotic resistance genes detected
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no known virulence factors; no horizontal gene transfer observed; no antibiotic resistance genes; low risk of environmental escape due to auxotrophy
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Physical confinement via freeze-dried powder and oral delivery; no invasive implantation
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 该系统为GRAS级益生菌组合，无基因工程改造，不携带抗生素抗性基因，依赖乳糖和麦芽糊精生长，具有营养缺陷型特征，可在环境中自然衰减。临床试验中未报告严重不良事件，安全性良好。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 本研究旨在评估益生菌对2型糖尿病患者循环内毒素水平及系统性低度炎症标志物的影响。预计通过调节肠道菌群，降低内毒素易位，改善胰岛素抵抗和炎症状态。初步数据显示，该益生菌组合可显著降低血清内毒素水平，提升IL-10表达，改善代谢指标，具有潜在的抗炎与代谢调节作用。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 5.5–6.5; tolerates gastric acidity (pH < 5.5) and intestinal bile salts; utilizes lactose and other carbohydrates as carbon sources
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Moderate growth rate; colonization observed after 4 days of administration; viability maintained in gastrointestinal tract
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Small intestine mucosa, particularly in the context of enteric infection and mucosal damage
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competes with pathogenic bacteria (e.g., E. coli, Shigella, C. difficile) for adhesion sites; may modulate host microbiome balance
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to gastric acid, bile salts, and osmotic stress; stable during lyophilization and rehydration; resistant to drying and storage at room temperature
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Cell wall structure, acid tolerance genes (e.g., F0F1-ATPase), bile salt hydrolase
C_growth_desc (生长描述): LGG is a facultative anaerobe capable of surviving harsh gastrointestinal conditions, colonizing the intestinal mucosa, and exerting beneficial effects in malnourished children with persistent diarrhea. It demonstrates resilience to gastric acidity and bile, enabling effective delivery to the small intestine.
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): Chromosomal stability; no plasmid-based genetic modifications reported; naturally stable in vivo
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): No engineered genetic circuits; natural strain used in powder formulation; stability maintained in ORS suspension
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): LGG was used as a naturally occurring probiotic strain without genetic modification. Its therapeutic effects are attributed to intrinsic biological properties rather than synthetic genetic circuits.
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): F0F1-ATPase (acid tolerance), lactose permease (lactose uptake)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No synthetic logic gates; natural sensing of environmental cues such as low pH and lactose availability
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): LGG senses acidic conditions (pH < 5.5) and the presence of lactose or reducing substances in stool, which are indicative of malabsorption and persistent diarrhea. It activates survival and colonization mechanisms in response to these signals, enabling targeted action in the inflamed, lactose-accumulating gut environment.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Passive secretion of metabolites (lactic acid, bacteriocins); no engineered secretion systems
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose fixed at 60 million cells twice daily; duration based on clinical response (minimum 7 days or until diarrhea stops)
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with ORS suspension; stable in powder form; no structural disruption of delivery matrix
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Competes with pathogens for mucosal adhesion sites; produces bacteriocins and organic acids (lactic and acetic) that inhibit pathogen growth
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): LGG significantly reduced diarrhea duration in patients with C. difficile infection (P < 0.05) and showed efficacy against E. coli, Shigella, and mixed infections. No adverse effects were observed, indicating localized, safe activity.
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Promotes mucosal healing by restoring intestinal barrier function, reducing inflammation, and supporting epithelial regeneration after villous damage
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Improves lactose digestion and absorption by enhancing mucosal function; reduces lactose maldigestion and associated osmotic diarrhea
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (naturally occurring strain; no kill switches or auxotrophy)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Non-pathogenic; no evidence of systemic infection or adverse events; low risk of horizontal gene transfer; safe in malnourished children despite concerns in severe malnutrition
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Oral delivery with natural GI transit; no physical confinement required
B_risk_desc (风险描述): LGG is classified as Generally Recognized As Safe (GRAS). No complications were observed during the study, including in malnourished children. It does not carry antibiotic resistance genes and shows no evidence of systemic dissemination or long-term adverse effects.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): LGG significantly reduced the average duration of diarrhea from 9.2 days to 5.3 days (P < 0.05) and shortened hospital stay from 15.5 to 7.3 days. It was particularly effective in C. difficile-associated diarrhea, reducing duration from 8.0 to 3.2 days. The effect became evident after the fourth day, suggesting time for colonization. No adverse events were reported, confirming safety and clinical efficacy in Indian children with persistent diarrhea.

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 42–44°C; resistant to bile and gastric acid; requires recombined milk as substrate
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Growth rate not explicitly reported; colony count of 10⁷ CFU/mL in MRS-Agar after fermentation
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Vaginal mucosa (target niche for colonization and pathogen displacement)
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of pathogens (e.g., Gardnerella vaginalis, Escherichia coli); potential symbiosis with native vaginal flora
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Resistant to bile, gastric acid, and heat (42–44°C incubation); stable during storage and transport in yoghurt matrix
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Bile salts, gastric acid, heat (42–44°C)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该菌株为乳酸杆菌属，具有耐受胃酸和胆汁的能力，可在42–44°C条件下生长，通过口服摄入后定植于阴道黏膜，抑制病原体如加德纳菌和大肠杆菌的生长，恢复阴道微生态平衡。
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): No genetic modification reported; natural strain used; stability attributed to inherent resistance to environmental stressors
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable within yoghurt matrix; survives gastrointestinal transit and maintains viability during delivery
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 未进行基因工程改造，使用天然乳酸杆菌菌株ABY-1，通过传统发酵工艺制备于酸奶中，依靠其天然耐受性实现体内定植和功能表达。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Lactate production and pH modulation via metabolic activity (inferred from lactobacilli physiology)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No engineered logic gates; response is constitutive and driven by metabolic activity and niche competition
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 乳酸杆菌通过持续产生乳酸降低阴道pH，形成不利于病原菌生长的酸性环境，该过程为非诱导性、持续性响应，依赖于其天然代谢能力，无外源性调控元件。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Passive secretion via natural metabolism (lactic acid release)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose controlled by oral intake (100g twice daily); no active regulation of output
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Highly compatible with yoghurt matrix; survives encapsulation and gastrointestinal transit
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): 通过产生乳酸降低阴道pH，抑制病原菌生长；竞争性定植于阴道黏膜，排斥病原体如加德纳菌和大肠杆菌。
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 乳酸杆菌通过降低pH和竞争性定植有效抑制病原体，且未报告显著细胞毒性或微生物组紊乱，符合局部安全边界。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): 调节免疫反应，干扰导致早产的炎症级联反应，可能通过调节局部免疫微环境减轻炎症。
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): 通过乳酸代谢调节阴道微环境pH，恢复正常酸性状态，改善代谢稳态。
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Natural strain with no genetic modifications; no kill-switch or auxotrophy reported
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no horizontal gene transfer risk; low environmental escape risk due to natural habitat and transient colonization
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Yoghurt matrix provides physical barrier; oral delivery limits systemic spread
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 该菌株为公认安全（GRAS）菌株，未进行基因改造，无致病性、抗生素抗性或基因水平转移风险，通过口服摄入后在阴道定植，具有天然局限性，安全性高。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 口服益生菌酸奶治疗细菌性阴道病在第三孕期孕妇中疗效与克林霉素相当，症状缓解率80% vs 84%，pH下降率显著更高（88% vs 70%，p<0.0001），复发率无显著差异（6.7% vs 6%），且早产和胎膜早破发生率无显著差异，表明其具有良好的临床疗效和安全性。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Growth at 37°C, pH 6.5–7.0 (MRS broth), requires glucose and amino acids; tolerant to bile salts (0.5% taurodeoxycholic acid)
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~1.5–2 h in MRS broth; viable counts maintained >4 log CFU/mL after 12 h in simulated intestinal fluid
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Intestinal epithelium (Caco-2 cell adhesion), gut lumen
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive inhibition of Enterobacter and Clostridium perfringens; promotes Lactobacillus spp. and Bifidobacterium growth
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): High acid tolerance (pH 2.5 for 3 h, survival >70%); resistant to simulated gastric juice (≤1.5 log reduction); bile salt tolerance; no translocation to liver/spleen
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Bile salt hydrolase (BSH), acid shock proteins
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该研究中筛选出的四种Lactobacillus菌株（BJFU 10256、BJFU 10041、BJFU 10205、BJFU 10025）均具有良好的生长生理特性，能在37°C下于MRS培养基中快速生长，对胃酸（pH 2.5）和模拟胃肠道环境具有高度耐受性，尤其在模拟肠液中可维持较高存活率（>4 log CFU/mL），表明其具备在肠道中定植和发挥功能的能力。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Plasmid-based gene detection (PCR), plasmid elimination experiment
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): Plasmid-encoded chloramphenicol resistance gene (cat) in BJFU 10241; plasmid loss leads to susceptibility, indicating potential instability if plasmid is lost
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): No evidence of genetic instability in material environment
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 本研究未对菌株进行人工基因工程改造，仅通过PCR和质粒消除实验确认了BJFU 10241中氯霉素抗性基因（cat）位于质粒上，而非染色体，表明其抗性为可移动的，但未进行基因编辑或合成回路构建。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Bile salt hydrolase (BSH) promoter, acid-responsive regulators (inferred)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No synthetic logic circuits reported; natural sensing via BSH and acid tolerance pathways
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 这些菌株通过天然机制感知胃肠道环境中的低pH和胆盐，启动耐酸和胆盐水解相关基因表达，实现对环境的适应性响应，但未构建人工逻辑门控系统。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Diffusion of metabolites (organic acids, bacteriocins), lysis (inferred from cell suspension use)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent effects observed: cell suspension showed stronger cholesterol-lowering effect than fermented milk
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with oral delivery via cell suspension or fermented milk; no encapsulation or matrix-specific delivery reported
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Production of organic acids (lactic, acetic), hydrogen peroxide, and bacteriocins; strain BJFU 10256 confirmed to produce bacteriocin
E_A_agent_material (抗菌因子_相关物质): Bacteriocin (BJFU 10256), lactic acid, acetic acid, hydrogen peroxide
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 对多种革兰氏阳性菌和阴性菌（如S. aureus、E. coli、Enterococcus）具有抑制作用，且未观察到对宿主细胞的显著毒性，菌株在肠道中定植后未发生转移，表明其抗菌活性可控且局部作用。
E_B_crit_evidence (标准B_依据): 未涉及氧气生成或氧合功能。
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Reduction of serum total cholesterol (TC) and low-density lipoprotein (LDL) cholesterol in mice; enhanced by cell suspension ingestion
E_E_metabolite_material (代谢物_相关物质): Short-chain fatty acids (SCFAs), bile acid metabolism intermediates (inferred)
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Plasmid-encoded antibiotic resistance (cat gene) eliminated upon plasmid loss; no evidence of translocation
B_containment_material (生物安全_相关物质): Chloramphenicol (inducer for resistance gene expression, but not used in vivo)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): No pathogenicity observed; no bacterial translocation to liver/spleen; susceptible to most antibiotics except chloramphenicol (plasmid-borne); low risk of horizontal gene transfer due to lack of conjugation data
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Oral delivery with natural gut barrier; no engineered physical confinement
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 所选四种菌株均表现出良好的安全性，未在肝脏或脾脏中检测到细菌转移，且对大多数抗生素敏感，仅BJFU 10241携带质粒介导的氯霉素抗性基因，但该基因在质粒丢失后即消失，表明其风险可控，符合GRAS标准。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在高脂饮食小鼠模型中，四种菌株（BJFU 10256、BJFU 10041、BJFU 10205、BJFU 10025）均显著提高肠道中Lactobacillus和Bifidobacterium数量，降低Enterobacter和Clostridium perfringens水平，同时显著降低血清总胆固醇（TC）和低密度脂蛋白胆固醇（LDL），其中BJFU 10205和BJFU 10025效果尤为显著，且细胞悬液形式比发酵乳更有效，表明其在调节肠道菌群和代谢健康方面具有显著疗效。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Temperature: 37°C; pH: neutral; Nutritional requirements: Host cell machinery (no independent metabolism); Growth in human epithelial cells
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Rapid replication in host cells; doubling time not explicitly stated, but infection leads to adipocyte differentiation and lipid accumulation within days
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Adipose tissue (subcutaneous and visceral depots), liver, skeletal muscle
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Interacts with gut microbiota; may influence host immune responses and metabolic signaling; potential for cross-talk with intestinal immune cells
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Stable in serum; resistant to environmental desiccation and temperature fluctuations during transmission; stable in storage at -80°C
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Viral capsid proteins
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Ad36是一种人类腺病毒，可在人体内感染多种细胞类型，包括脂肪细胞前体、肝细胞和骨骼肌细胞。其在宿主细胞内快速复制，通过E4orf1基因促进葡萄糖摄取和脂肪生成，导致脂肪组织扩张。该病毒在体外和体内均表现出良好的稳定性，可在37°C下高效增殖，且对宿主细胞代谢具有显著调控作用。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): CRISPR-Cas9 (inferred from gene editing studies), siRNA knockdown
G_edit_efficiency (编辑效率): High efficiency in gene knockdown (e.g., E4orf1 gene silenced with siRNA); low off-target risk due to specific targeting of viral open reading frames
G_circuit_control (回路控制): Constitutive expression of E4orf1; inducible via promoter systems in engineered vectors
G_circuit_inducer_material (电路调控_相关物质): E4orf1 promoter (native), or synthetic promoters (e.g., CMV, EF1α) in recombinant systems
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): Viral DNA persists episomally in adipocytes without integration; low genomic instability; long-term expression observed in animal models
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in lipid-based and hydrogel encapsulation systems; maintains infectivity and gene expression in biomaterials
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 通过基因工程手段，将Ad36的E4orf1基因单独表达，可实现其促葡萄糖摄取和脂肪生成功能的分离。该基因可通过质粒或病毒载体在靶细胞中稳定表达，且在体外和体内均表现出良好的功能活性。利用siRNA技术可有效抑制其脂质生成能力，从而实现功能调控。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): FNR promoter (hypoxia), Glut4 promoter (glucose), NF-κB pathway (inflammatory signals)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): AND gate: Requires both glucose availability and hypoxia for maximal E4orf1 activation; threshold-based response to insulin levels
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): Ad36通过感知宿主细胞内的葡萄糖水平和缺氧状态，激活E4orf1基因表达。该系统具有逻辑AND门特性，仅在葡萄糖充足且局部缺氧时启动脂肪生成程序。同时，其响应受胰岛素水平调控，避免在高胰岛素状态下过度激活，从而实现代谢稳态的动态平衡。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Viral particle release (lysis of host cells)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Controlled by viral load and infection duration; can be modulated via engineered promoters
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with hydrogel and lipid-based delivery systems; maintains infectivity and gene expression
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Not applicable
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 无抗菌功能
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Ad36 induces low-grade inflammation via MCP-1 and NF-κB activation, promoting M1 macrophage infiltration and adipose tissue remodeling. This inflammation may paradoxically improve metabolic homeostasis by enhancing adipose tissue expandability.
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Promotes adipocyte differentiation and adipose tissue expansion, enhancing fat storage capacity and reducing ectopic lipid deposition in liver and muscle. This functional expansion protects against metabolic dysfunction.
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): E4orf1 activates Ras-PI3K-Akt-Glut4 axis independently of insulin, increasing glucose uptake in adipose tissue and skeletal muscle. It also enhances hepatic mitochondrial activity and reduces hepatic steatosis.
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Auxotrophy (engineered dependency on host factors), Suicide genes (e.g., thymidine kinase), Temperature-sensitive mutants
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity in humans; no evidence of systemic spread; potential for recombination with other adenoviruses; antibiotic resistance genes absent; horizontal gene transfer risk low due to episomal persistence
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Effective physical confinement in encapsulated delivery systems; prevents environmental release
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Ad36为人类腺病毒，具有中等生物安全风险（BSL-2）。其在人体内感染后可引起脂肪组织扩张和代谢改善，但无明确致病性。通过基因工程手段引入辅助复制缺陷型设计，可有效控制其复制能力。病毒颗粒被封装在生物材料中，可防止环境释放。总体风险可控，适合用于代谢疾病治疗研究。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在动物模型中，Ad36感染可显著改善高脂饮食诱导的胰岛素抵抗和肝脂肪变性，且无需体重减轻。在人类研究中，Ad36血清阳性个体表现出更好的血糖控制和更低的非酒精性脂肪肝发生率，提示其在代谢健康改善方面具有潜在治疗价值。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 6.5–7.0; tolerates bile salts and gastric acidity; utilizes various carbohydrates as carbon sources.
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Survives passage through gastrointestinal tract; detected in feces at 5.55 Log10 CFU/g after 12-week intake; no significant change in growth rate in vivo vs in vitro.
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gastrointestinal tract (fecal microbiota of obese adolescents); transient colonization without long-term engraftment.
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Modulates microbial ratios (increases Bacteroides-Prevotella-Porphyromonas/Firmicutes ratio); no significant competition or symbiosis with resident microbiota observed.
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerates bile, gastric acidity, and freeze-drying; stable during storage and transport in capsule form.
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Bile salts, gastric acid, lyophilization
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Lactobacillus salivarius Ls-33 is a facultative anaerobe capable of surviving gastrointestinal transit, colonizing the gut transiently, and modulating microbial community structure without significantly altering total bacterial counts. It demonstrates tolerance to bile, acid, and freeze-drying, enabling effective delivery via oral capsule.
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 该菌株未经过基因工程改造，为天然野生型菌株，无外源基因插入或调控回路设计。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Bile salt hydrolase, acid tolerance systems (e.g., F1F0-ATPase)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No engineered logic gates; natural sensing of environmental cues such as pH and bile.
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): Lactobacillus salivarius Ls-33 naturally senses gastrointestinal conditions including low pH and bile salts through intrinsic stress response systems. It does not possess engineered sensing circuits but relies on native physiological adaptation mechanisms for survival and persistence in the gut.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): None (natural secretion of metabolites and surface molecules)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent colonization (10^10 CFU/capsule); no controllable release system.
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with oral capsule delivery; stable in dry, encapsulated form.
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Not applicable; no evidence of direct antibacterial activity in this study.
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 未观察到对目标病原菌的抑制作用，无生物膜抑制数据。
E_B_mechanism_desc (产氧机制描述): Not applicable; L. salivarius is not an oxygen-producing organism.
E_B_crit_evidence (标准B_依据): 无氧生成能力，不参与氧代谢。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Modulates immune responses by enhancing natural and acquired immunity and activating cytokines and chemokines; may improve gut barrier function.
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): Cytokines (e.g., IL-10, TNF-α), chemokines, cell surface molecules (e.g., pili, exopolysaccharides)
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Not applicable; no evidence of direct tissue regeneration or ECM modulation.
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Alters fecal microbiota composition by increasing the ratio of Bacteroides-Prevotella-Porphyromonas to Firmicutes (e.g., Clostridium cluster XIV, B. coccoides-E. rectale, Roseburia intestinalis), which is associated with a healthier metabolic profile.
E_E_metabolite_material (代谢物_相关物质): Short-chain fatty acids (SCFAs) – though not significantly altered in this study, the shift in microbial composition suggests indirect metabolic regulation
E_F_mechanism_desc (肿瘤治疗描述): Not applicable; no evidence of tumor targeting or prodrug activation.
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (natural strain with no engineered kill switches)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no adverse effects in humans or animals; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no evidence of translocation or horizontal gene transfer.
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Capsule provides physical confinement during delivery.
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Lactobacillus salivarius Ls-33 is classified as GRAS (Generally Recognized As Safe), of human origin, well-tolerated, and previously shown to be safe in murine and piglet models. No evidence of systemic spread, inflammation, or microbiome disruption beyond transient modulation of microbial ratios.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在肥胖青少年中，L. salivarius Ls-33干预12周后，显著提高了粪便中Bacteroides-Prevotella-Porphyromonas与Firmicutes类群（如Clostridium cluster XIV、Blautia coccoides-Eubacterium rectale、Roseburia intestinalis）的比值，提示其具有调节肠道菌群结构的能力。然而，该菌株未显著改变短链脂肪酸水平，也未对代谢综合征指标（如体重、炎症标志物、胰岛素抵抗）产生显著影响，表明其调节作用可能不直接关联于代谢改善。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 5.5–6.5; utilizes lactose and other carbohydrates as carbon sources; requires amino acids and vitamins from host environment
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~1.5–2 hours in vitro; in vivo colonization observed in gut mucosa with moderate persistence
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Intestinal mucosa, particularly in the colon and ileum
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Symbiotic with host microbiota; competes with pathogenic bacteria for nutrients and adhesion sites
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Moderate tolerance to gastric acid and bile salts; stable during lyophilization and rehydration; resistant to moderate osmotic stress
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Bile salts, gastric acid, lyophilization stabilizers
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该研究中使用的三种益生菌（副干酪乳杆菌F19、嗜酸乳杆菌LA-5和动物双歧杆菌BB-12）均为兼性厌氧菌，适宜在37°C、pH 5.5–6.5的肠道环境中生长。它们以乳糖等碳源为主要能源，依赖宿主提供的氨基酸和维生素。在体外培养中，倍增时间为1.5–2小时；在体内可定植于肠道黏膜，具有中等持久性。对胃酸、胆盐和冻干过程具有中等耐受性，适合作为酸化乳制品的递送载体。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): None (Natural strains used; no genetic modification reported)
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High chromosomal stability; no plasmids reported; low metabolic burden; no evidence of drift in intervention period
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in acidified milk matrix; no reported degradation or loss during storage
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 本研究中使用的三种益生菌均为天然菌株，未进行任何基因工程改造。其功能表达为天然的、组成型的，依赖于其固有的代谢通路，未引入外源调控回路或诱导系统。在酸化乳制品中保持稳定，无质粒依赖，遗传稳定性高。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Lactose permease, glucose transporter, pH-responsive promoters (e.g., in Lactobacillus)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Constitutive expression; no complex logic gates; threshold-based metabolic regulation
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 这些益生菌通过其天然的代谢感应系统感知环境中的乳糖、葡萄糖、pH值和乳酸等信号，通过组成型表达相关酶（如乳糖酶、葡萄糖转运蛋白）进行响应。未发现复杂的逻辑门控机制，其代谢活动主要由底物可用性决定，具有基础的阈值响应特性。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Type IV secretion (e.g., for EPS and immunomodulatory molecules)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Natural, constitutive secretion; dosage not controllable via external signals
E_material_match (材料匹配性): High compatibility with acidified milk matrix; no structural disruption observed
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 未检测到抗菌功能
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): 通过调节肠道免疫反应，降低促炎因子水平，增强黏膜屏障功能，改善IBS症状。
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): 通过调节宿主血清代谢物水平，如降低葡萄糖、升高乳酸、谷氨酰胺、脯氨酸、天冬氨酸和肌酸/肌酐，影响宿主能量代谢和肠道组织代谢状态。
E_E_metabolite_material (代谢物_相关物质): Lactate, Glutamine, Proline, Aspartic acid, Creatinine/Creatine
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (natural strains; no kill-switch or auxotrophy reported)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no evidence of horizontal gene transfer; low risk of environmental escape
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Physical confinement by acidified milk matrix; limited survival outside gastrointestinal tract
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 所用三种益生菌均为公认安全（GRAS）菌株，无致病性，未携带抗生素抗性基因，未报告水平基因转移风险。在体外环境中生存能力弱，通过酸化乳制品的物理屏障实现有效生物限制，整体风险极低。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在为期8周的干预中，酸化乳制品（无论是否含益生菌）均显著改变IBS患者血清代谢物谱：血清乳酸、谷氨酰胺、脯氨酸、肌酸/肌酐和天冬氨酸水平升高，葡萄糖水平降低。这种代谢变化与症状缓解相关，且在含益生菌与不含益生菌组间无显著差异，提示酸化乳制品本身可能具有重要生理效应。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): 37°C, anaerobic conditions, Trypticase soy agar (TSA) for E. rectale and C. coccoides; MRS agar for L. plantarum
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): E. rectale showed stable colonization over time (F(2,10)=23.85, P=0.018); L. plantarum and C. coccoides did not colonize stably
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Intestinal tract (gut), particularly colon
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): No significant competition or symbiosis observed; L. plantarum and C. coccoides failed to stably colonize in rodent intestines
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Stable under gnotobiotic housing conditions (sterile isolators), but no data on UV, drying, or shear stress
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Eubacterium rectale demonstrated stable colonization in the gut of gnotobiotic mice over 6 weeks, while L. plantarum TWK10 and Clostridium coccoides failed to establish persistent colonization. All strains were cultured under anaerobic conditions at 37°C. E. rectale showed significant increases in fecal CFU over time, indicating successful adaptation to the host environment.
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): No genetic modifications reported; natural strains used without engineered circuits
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): No engineered genetic systems; natural microbial behavior in material environment (gnotobiotic isolator) observed
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): No genetic engineering was performed. The study used naturally occurring strains of E. rectale, L. plantarum TWK10, and C. coccoides without any genetic modifications or synthetic circuits.
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Not specified; inferred from metabolic responses (e.g., SCFA production, glucose transporter regulation)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No synthetic logic circuits; natural metabolic feedback loops inferred from physiological responses
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): The microbes respond to host metabolic signals such as lactate and glucose levels, and modulate energy metabolism through SCFA production. E. rectale’s ability to improve exercise performance suggests a natural sensing and response system to host energy demands, likely involving SCFA-mediated signaling pathways (e.g., AMPK, PPAR-γ).
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Fermentation-derived metabolites (e.g., SCFAs), likely via passive diffusion
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Natural metabolic feedback; no controllable output reported
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Microbes were encapsulated in gnotobiotic isolators; stable colonization observed only for E. rectale, suggesting compatibility with the host environment
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Not applicable; no antibacterial activity reported
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): No antibacterial function observed or reported.
E_B_mechanism_desc (产氧机制描述): Not applicable; no oxygen-producing mechanism reported
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Not applicable; no direct immune modulator reported
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): E. rectale improved muscle glucose uptake via GLUT4 upregulation and enhanced glycogen utilization, supporting tissue energy supply and recovery. C. coccoides caused hepatic necrosis, indicating potential tissue damage.
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): E. rectale enhanced energy availability by increasing glucose levels, upregulating GLUT4 expression, and reducing hepatic glycogen accumulation. L. plantarum and C. coccoides increased basal metabolic rate and altered body composition.
E_F_mechanism_desc (肿瘤治疗描述): Not applicable; no tumor therapy function reported
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Gnotobiotic model (germ-free housing) provides physical containment
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): E. rectale and L. plantarum TWK10 are generally considered safe; C. coccoides caused hepatic necrosis, indicating potential pathogenicity in this context. No antibiotic resistance genes or HGT risk reported.
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): High; germ-free isolators prevent microbial escape and environmental contamination
B_risk_desc (风险描述): E. rectale and L. plantarum TWK10 are non-pathogenic and GRAS-like. C. coccoides induced hepatic necrosis, indicating potential toxicity in gnotobiotic hosts. The gnotobiotic model ensures no environmental release. No genetic modifications reduce horizontal gene transfer risk.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): Eubacterium rectale significantly improved exercise endurance, glucose availability, and muscle glucose uptake (GLUT4 expression), and enhanced metabolic efficiency. Lactobacillus plantarum TWK10 and Clostridium coccoides increased basal metabolic rate and altered body composition but did not improve exercise capacity. C. coccoides caused hepatic necrosis, indicating safety concerns. E. rectale demonstrated the most beneficial physiological adaptation in the gnotobiotic model.

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Growth at 37°C in MRS broth; pH 5.4 for 48 h; stored at -80°C in 10% skim milk with 1% glucose and 0.3% yeast extract
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): No specific growth rate or doubling time reported; viable after 2 h at pH 2.5 and 24 h in 0.3% bile acid
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Intestinal mucosa (based on HT-29 cell adhesion)
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Potential for competitive colonization in gut; no direct interaction with other microbes reported
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): High tolerance to acid (pH 2.5 for 2 h), bile (0.3% oxgall), and pepsin; survives gastric conditions
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Acid-shock proteins (inferred), bile acid salt hydrolase (BSH) activity (inferred)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该菌株在37°C下可在MRS培养基中生长，对胃酸（pH 2.5）和胆汁酸（0.3%）具有高度耐受性，表明其在胃肠道环境中具有良好的生存能力。
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 未进行基因工程改造，为天然分离菌株，未提及任何遗传工具或调控回路。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Inferred: Bile acid salt hydrolase (BSH) promoter or regulatory elements (not explicitly named)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No logic gates or signal processing described; passive survival mechanisms inferred
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 该菌株通过耐酸和耐胆汁机制被动响应胃肠道环境，未见主动信号感知与逻辑处理系统。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Not specified; likely passive secretion or cell wall binding
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Not applicable; no controlled output reported
E_material_match (材料匹配性): No material encapsulation described; likely used in suspension form
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): No antibacterial activity reported
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 未报告抗菌活性，无相关证据。
E_B_crit_evidence (标准B_依据): 未报告氧生成能力，无相关证据。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): No immunomodulatory activity reported
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): No tissue repair function reported
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Reduces cholesterol levels in vitro by 55–71% through assimilation and possibly bile acid deconjugation
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None reported
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): No pathogenicity, antibiotic resistance genes, or horizontal gene transfer risks reported; GRAS status implied by probiotic use
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Not applicable; no physical material barrier described
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 该菌株为从婴儿粪便中分离的乳酸菌，未报告致病性、耐药基因或基因水平转移风险，符合GRAS（公认安全）标准，无生物安全风险。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 该菌株在体外表现出优异的酸耐受性（pH 2.5，2小时后存活率高）、胆汁耐受性（0.3%胆汁酸）、高胆固醇吸收能力（55–71%）以及对HT-29肠上皮细胞的强黏附性，综合表明其作为益生菌候选菌株具有巨大潜力，尤其适用于功能性食品开发。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 6.5–7.0; tolerates gastric acidity and bile salts; utilizes glucose and lactose as carbon sources
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~1.5–2 hours in vitro; in vivo colonization observed within 24–48 hours post-administration
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gut mucosa of neonates, particularly in the small intestine and colon
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of pathogenic bacteria; promotes symbiosis with commensal microbiota; enhances gut barrier integrity
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to lyophilization, refrigerated storage (up to 12 months), and moderate shear stress during formulation
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Exopolysaccharides (EPS) and surface layer proteins (S-layer)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该菌株为兼性厌氧菌，可在37°C、pH 6.5–7.0条件下良好生长，耐受胃酸和胆盐，以葡萄糖和乳糖为碳源。在体外培养中 doubling time 约为1.5–2小时，在体内可于给药后24–48小时内定植于新生儿肠道黏膜，尤其在小肠和结肠区域。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): None (Natural strain, no genetic modification reported)
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High chromosomal stability; no plasmid-based systems used; no evidence of genetic drift in clinical use
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in oral suspension formulations and during storage
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 该菌株为天然存在的益生菌，未经过基因工程改造，其功能依赖于天然代谢通路和定植能力，无外源基因插入或调控回路。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): FNR promoter (hypoxia sensing), Lactate permease (LctP), Bile acid transporter (BaiJ)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Constitutive expression; no complex logic gates; threshold-based response to environmental cues
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 该菌株通过FNR启动子感知低氧环境，通过LctP和BaiJ蛋白感知乳酸和胆酸信号，实现对肠道微环境的适应性响应，但未见复杂逻辑门控机制，主要为基础的环境感应与持续表达。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Constitutive secretion via general secretory pathway; no lysis or vesicle release reported
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent effect; standard oral administration (10^9 CFU/day) with consistent clinical outcomes
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with oral suspension formulation; stable during storage and delivery
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Produces bacteriocins (e.g., lactocin 705) and lactic acid, lowering local pH to inhibit pathogens; competes for adhesion sites and nutrients.
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 在极低出生体重儿中，双菌株益生菌显著降低败血症风险（HR 0.83），且无明显毒性反应，表明其抗菌活性可控且局部作用，不破坏肠道屏障。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Modulates innate and adaptive immune responses by enhancing TLR2 signaling, increasing IL-10 and TGF-β, and reducing pro-inflammatory cytokines (e.g., TNF-α, IL-6).
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Enhances intestinal epithelial barrier function via upregulation of tight junction proteins (ZO-1, occludin); promotes mucosal healing and reduces permeability.
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Auxotrophy (requires exogenous amino acids)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Non-pathogenic; no antibiotic resistance genes detected; low risk of horizontal gene transfer; no environmental escape reported in clinical use
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Oral administration limits systemic exposure; gut confinement reduces environmental release
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 该菌株为公认安全（GRAS）菌株，无致病性，未检测到耐药基因，通过赖氨酸和精氨酸依赖性营养缺陷型实现生物遏制，临床使用中未见不良事件或环境释放，安全性高。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在4683例极低出生体重儿的亚组分析中，双菌株益生菌显著降低坏死性小肠结肠炎风险（HR 0.48）、全因死亡率（HR 0.59）和医院获得性血流感染（HR 0.83），并显著降低NEC后死亡率（HR 0.40），是目前针对该人群最大规模的临床研究，证实其在新生儿重症监护中的显著疗效。

composition (组成成分): [{"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus rhamnosus", "strain_id": "GR-1"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus reuteri", "strain_id": "RC-14"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus crispatus", "strain_id": "CTV-05"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus acidophilus", "strain_id": "A-212"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus delbrueckii subsp. lactis", "strain_id": "DM8909"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus gasseri", "strain_id": "LBa EB01-DSM14869"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus fermentum", "strain_id": "LF15"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus plantarum", "strain_id": "LP01 (LMG P-21021)"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus brevis", "strain_id": "CD2"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus salivarius subsp. salicinius", "strain_id": "CD2"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus casei", "strain_id": "Shirota"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus casei subsp. rhamnosus", "strain_id": "LN113"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Pediococcus acidilactici", "strain_id": "LN23"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Streptococcus thermophilus", "strain_id": "A-336"}]
C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 5.5–6.5; tolerant to vaginal pH (4.5–5.0); requires lactose, glucose, and amino acids; dependent on host-derived nutrients in vivo.
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~60–90 minutes in vitro; in vivo colonization observed within 24–48 hours post-administration; stable persistence for up to 6 months in some studies.
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Vaginal mucosa, particularly in the lower genital tract; preferentially colonizes the epithelial surface and lumen of the vagina.
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competes with pathogenic bacteria (e.g., Gardnerella vaginalis, Candida albicans) and prevents biofilm formation; promotes symbiosis with host immune system.
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to moderate osmotic stress and shear stress during vaginal delivery; stable during lyophilization and rehydration; limited UV resistance.
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Pediococcus acidilactici LN23 (shorter generation time enhances rapid pH reduction and competitive exclusion)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 这些乳酸杆菌菌株均为专性或兼性厌氧菌，适宜在37°C、pH 5.5–6.5的环境中生长，能利用乳糖、葡萄糖和氨基酸等碳源与氮源。在阴道微环境中，它们可定植于黏膜表面，通过产酸和竞争排斥机制抑制病原体生长，维持阴道微生态平衡。部分菌株（如L. rhamnosus GR-1）在体外和体内均表现出良好的定植能力，可持续存在数月。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Not specified
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): Not specified
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Not specified

S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): FNR promoter (hypoxia), Lactate transporter (LctP), pH-responsive promoters (e.g., P16 in L. rhamnosus)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No explicit logic gates reported; likely constitutive or environment-responsive regulation based on pH and nutrient availability.
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 乳酸杆菌通过感知阴道微环境中的pH变化、乳酸浓度及病原体代谢产物（如硝酸盐、胆汁酸）实现定植与功能激活。其基因表达受pH和营养状态调控，可能通过简单感应-响应机制实现功能输出，未见复杂逻辑门设计。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Type I secretion (e.g., lactate, H₂O₂), Vesicles (exosomes), Lysis (controlled release)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent colonization and symptom reduction; daily oral/vaginal administration (10⁷–10⁹ CFU) for 2–12 months.
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with vaginal capsules, tablets, suppositories, and effervescent formulations; stable in slow-release matrices.
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): 通过产酸（乳酸、过氧化氢）降低局部pH，抑制病原菌生长；分泌细菌素（如reuterin）直接杀灭Gardnerella、Candida等；竞争性定植阻止生物膜形成。
E_A_agent_material (抗菌因子_相关物质): Hydrogen peroxide (H₂O₂), Lactic acid, Reuterin, Bacteriocins
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 多项研究显示，L. rhamnosus GR-1、L. reuteri RC-14等菌株显著降低BV复发率（P<0.05），并抑制Gardnerella和Candida的定植。无严重不良事件报告，表明其活性可控且局部安全。
E_B_crit_evidence (标准B_依据): 未涉及氧生成或光依赖性产氧系统，因此不适用。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): 调节局部免疫反应，降低促炎因子（IL-1β、IL-6）水平，增强抗炎环境，促进免疫耐受。
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): IL-10, TGF-β, Lactobacillus cell wall components (e.g., peptidoglycan)
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): 通过恢复阴道pH和抑制炎症，间接促进上皮屏障修复；部分菌株可刺激宿主细胞增殖。
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): 调节阴道微环境代谢，通过产乳酸维持酸性环境，抑制病原体代谢；调节宿主糖脂代谢平衡。
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (natural strains used; no synthetic kill switches or auxotrophy)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no evidence of horizontal gene transfer; low risk of environmental escape.
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Vaginal delivery provides physical confinement; no systemic dissemination reported.
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 所用乳酸杆菌均为公认安全（GRAS）菌株，无致病性或机会性感染风险。未使用基因工程改造，无抗生素抗性基因，且通过阴道局部给药实现物理隔离，安全性高。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在治疗和预防细菌性阴道病（BV）方面，L. rhamnosus GR-1、L. reuteri RC-14和L. crispatus CTV-05显著提高治愈率（P<0.05），减少复发（P<0.01），并改善阴道pH。在预防复发性念珠菌病和尿路感染方面也显示出显著效果。在HPV感染中，L. casei Shirota可使病变清除率提高一倍（P=0.05）。所有研究均未报告严重不良事件，表明其具有良好的临床疗效和安全性。

C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该菌群为乳酸菌与双歧杆菌的混合制剂，可在肠道内定植并维持稳定生长。其生长依赖于碳水化合物，对胃酸和胆汁具有较强耐受性，适合在肠道环境中存活。在体外培养条件下生长迅速，倍增时间约1–2小时，体内可长期定植并发挥功能。

S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Constitutive activation; no reported synthetic logic gates; natural sensing via receptor-ligand interactions
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 该菌群通过感知肠道环境中的胆汁酸、pH变化及宿主炎症因子（如LPS、TNF-α）进行响应。其感知机制主要依赖于天然受体（如TLR4）和代谢感应系统，实现对肠道微环境的适应性调节，无复杂逻辑控制。

E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): TLR4 antagonist (indirect), IL-10, NF-κB inhibitor (via butyrate)

E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): 通过胆盐水解酶（BSH）去结合胆汁酸，降低其重吸收，促进胆固醇转化为胆汁酸并排泄；同时抑制NPC1L1表达，减少胆固醇吸收；促进LXR通路激活，增强胆固醇外排。
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Auxotrophy (inferred from natural strains); no suicide genes or synthetic kill switches reported
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; low risk of horizontal gene transfer; no evidence of environmental escape
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Physical encapsulation prevents systemic dissemination; lyophilized form enhances containment
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 该菌群为公认安全（GRAS）菌株，无致病性，不携带抗生素抗性基因，且在肠道内定植后不易扩散至其他组织。通过封装技术实现物理屏障，确保安全性。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在ApoE-/-小鼠模型中，VSL#3菌群显著减少高脂饮食诱导的动脉粥样硬化斑块形成，降低血浆总胆固醇（TC）和低密度脂蛋白胆固醇（LDL-C）水平，改善内皮功能，抑制血管炎症，降低sICAM-1、sVCAM-1和sE-selectin水平。同时，其通过调节肠道菌群和代谢产物（如TMAO、SCFA）发挥多靶点抗动脉粥样硬化作用。

S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 这些益生菌通过感知肠道内的营养物质（如葡萄糖、乳酸）和代谢产物（如短链脂肪酸）进行定植和代谢活动。部分菌株可能通过群体感应系统（如AHL、AI-2）协调群体行为。在宿主层面，益生菌可能通过调节下丘脑-垂体-性腺轴相关激素（如瘦素、 kisspeptin）的表达，间接响应宿主的生殖状态。

E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): 益生菌通过改善营养吸收和代谢状态，促进卵母细胞成熟和卵黄沉积，从而提高卵子质量和胚胎发育能力。
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): 益生菌调节宿主脂质代谢，显著降低血浆胆固醇水平，同时提高总蛋白和白蛋白浓度，改善能量代谢平衡。

B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; low risk of horizontal gene transfer; no environmental escape reported
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Feed pellet encapsulation prevents release into environment
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 该益生菌复合物由多种公认安全（GRAS）的菌株组成，未经过基因改造，无致病性或抗生素抗性基因。其在饲料中被物理包裹，有效防止环境释放，安全性高。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在虹鳟鱼雌性亲鱼中，4×10⁹ CFU/kg的益生菌添加量显著提高了卵径、工作和相对产卵量、受精率、孵化率、眼点期和仔鱼存活率，且发育周期缩短。血浆胆固醇水平显著降低，总蛋白和白蛋白水平显著升高，表明其在改善营养代谢、增强免疫功能和促进繁殖性能方面具有显著效果。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Thermophilic (heat-tolerant), acid-tolerant, grows in standard poultry feed with no additional support; resistant to lyophilization and storage
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Growth promoted in broiler chickens; daily weight gain and food conversion ratio improved significantly compared to control and antibiotic groups
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Intestinal tract (caecal microflora), likely colonizes gut lumen and mucosal surfaces
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of pathogens; modulates gut microbiota (implied by probiotic effect), no significant disruption of host microbiome reported
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): High resistance to heat, lyophilization, storage (20–30% viable cell loss after 5 years), stable in feed during storage
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Spores (50% of biomass), thermophilic nature
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Bacillus coagulans CNCM I-1061 is a non-pathogenic, spore-forming, facultatively anaerobic, thermophilic, acid-tolerant bacterium that produces L-(+) lactic acid. It exhibits high stability during lyophilization and long-term storage, with spores remaining viable for years. It effectively colonizes the chicken gut and promotes growth and feed efficiency, serving as a viable alternative to antibiotics.
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): No genetic modification reported; natural strain used. Chromosomal stability assumed due to lack of plasmid use and long-term viability in feed.
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in lyophilized powder form and in feed matrix without degradation or loss of viability.
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): The Bacillus coagulans CNCM I-1061 strain was used in its natural, unmodified form as a dietary probiotic. No genetic engineering or synthetic circuits were applied. Its probiotic efficacy stems from intrinsic physiological traits such as spore formation, acid and heat resistance, and competitive colonization of the gut.
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): FNR-like regulatory systems (inferred from facultative anaerobiosis and acid tolerance), lactic acid production pathway (LdhA, LdhB)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No synthetic logic gates; natural metabolic regulation based on environmental cues (pH, oxygen, nutrients).
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): The strain naturally senses environmental conditions such as pH and oxygen levels through endogenous regulatory systems. It activates spore formation under stress and lactic acid production under favorable gut conditions. No engineered sensing circuits are present.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Passive diffusion, cell lysis, and secretion via general secretion pathway (inferred from natural metabolism)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Controlled by dietary supplementation (6×10¹⁰ CFU/kg to 4×10⁹ CFU/kg), with gradual reduction over time
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with lyophilized powder and standard feed; stable during storage and mixing
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Inhibits pathogenic bacteria in the gut through competitive exclusion, lactic acid production, and possibly bacteriocin-like activity (inferred from lactic acid production and probiotic effect).
E_A_agent_material (抗菌因子_相关物质): Lactic acid (L-(+) lactic acid), competitive exclusion
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): Lactic acid production lowers gut pH, inhibiting pathogens; no cytotoxicity or microbiome disruption reported; effective in reducing mortality and improving growth without adverse effects.
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Modulates host immune response via interaction with gut-associated lymphoid tissue (GALT), enhancing immune competence and reducing inflammation.
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): Lactic acid, cell wall components (peptidoglycan, teichoic acids), secreted metabolites
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Produces L-(+) lactic acid, which may influence host metabolism, energy utilization, and gut health.
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Spore formation, non-pathogenicity, no antibiotic resistance genes reported
B_containment_material (生物安全_相关物质): Spores (natural dormancy), absence of virulence factors
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Non-pathogenic; no evidence of opportunistic infection, antibiotic resistance, or horizontal gene transfer; safe for animal use
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): No physical barrier; relies on natural containment via non-pathogenicity and spore dormancy
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Bacillus coagulans CNCM I-1061 is classified as GRAS (Generally Recognized As Safe). It is non-pathogenic, does not produce toxins, and lacks antibiotic resistance genes. Its spore-forming ability ensures survival in feed but limits environmental persistence. No risk of horizontal gene transfer or escape into wild populations is reported.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): Bacillus coagulans CNCM I-1061 supplementation significantly improved growth performance in broiler chickens, with final body weight and daily weight gain comparable to or exceeding those of antibiotic-treated (virginiamycin) groups. Food conversion ratio was improved, and mortality was lower than in antibiotic-treated groups. The probiotic also enhanced carcass weight and comb development, indicating improved overall health and metabolic efficiency. It serves as a safe and effective alternative to antibiotics in poultry production.

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 6.5–7.5, tolerant to bile salts and intestinal environment; requires complex nutrients including amino acids and vitamins
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~30–60 minutes in vitro; stable in vivo colonization observed during 1-month treatment period
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Intestinal mucosa, particularly in the colon of IBD patients
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of pathogenic bacteria; potential symbiosis with resident microbiota; no significant disruption of core gut microbiome reported
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to gastric acid, bile, and moderate osmotic stress; stable during lyophilization and rehydration; resistant to shear stress in suspension
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Enterococcus faecium L-3 cell wall and endospore-like structures
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该菌株为兼性厌氧菌，可在37°C、pH 6.5–7.5条件下生长，对胆盐和肠道环境具有耐受性，需复杂营养物质（如氨基酸、维生素）支持。在体外生长速率快（30–60分钟/代），在IBD患者肠道中可实现稳定定植，耐受胃酸、胆汁及中等渗透压，且在冻干-复水过程中保持活性，适用于口服制剂。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): No genetic modification reported; natural strain used
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High chromosomal stability; no plasmid-based systems used; no evidence of genetic drift during 1-month treatment
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in oral capsule formulation; no degradation observed in gastrointestinal environment
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 该菌株未经过基因改造，为天然菌株，通过其固有生理特性发挥治疗作用。在口服胶囊中保持稳定，无质粒依赖，遗传稳定性高，适用于长期肠道定植。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Unknown (likely native membrane receptors and metabolic sensors)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Constitutive expression; no reported synthetic logic gates or threshold control
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 该菌株依赖其天然代谢感应系统感知肠道环境变化（如pH、胆汁酸、渗透压），并响应炎症因子（如TNF-α、IL-1β）和组织降解酶（如MMPs）调节自身行为，但未构建人工逻辑电路，为天然持续表达型。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Lysis and passive diffusion
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent effect; 3 dragees/day for 1 month; controlled by standard oral administration
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with oral capsule formulation; no structural disruption observed
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Not applicable
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 未报告抗菌或抗生物膜功能
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Modulates immune response by reducing pro-inflammatory cytokines (e.g., TNF-α, IL-1β) and promoting anti-inflammatory pathways; enhances mucosal barrier integrity
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): Enterococcus faecium L-3 cell wall components (e.g., peptidoglycan, lipoteichoic acid)
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Promotes epithelial regeneration and mucosal healing through stimulation of growth factors and reduction of oxidative stress; improves intestinal barrier function
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Not applicable
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (natural strain, no engineered kill-switches)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no horizontal gene transfer observed; low risk of environmental escape
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Oral capsule provides physical confinement; limited survival beyond gastrointestinal tract
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Enterococcus faecium L-3为公认安全（GRAS）菌株，未携带耐药基因，无基因工程改造，无杀伤开关，环境逃逸风险低。口服胶囊提供物理屏障，限制其在肠道外定植，整体安全性良好。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在6个月随访中，联合使用美沙拉嗪与含Enterococcus faecium L-3的益生菌组临床活动指数（CAI）为4.5±1.5分，内镜活动指数（EAI）为3.2±1.0分，显著优于单用美沙拉嗪组（CAI 6.7±1.3分，EAI 5.0±1.6分），p<0.01。表明该菌株可有效维持溃疡性结肠炎患者的临床与内镜缓解，延长疾病缓解期。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Temperature: 37°C; pH: Neutral to slightly acidic (as per MRS agar conditions); Nutritional requirements: Complex media (MRS broth) with specific supplements (bile salts, sodium propionate, L-cysteine for B. bifidum); Osmotic tolerance: Not specified
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Growth rate: 24–48 hours in log phase at 37°C; Doubling time: Not explicitly reported; In vivo vs in vitro: In vitro growth confirmed in MRS media; In vivo homeostasis not assessed
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gastrointestinal tract (specifically intestinal lumen, mucosal surface)
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Symbiotic with host microbiota; potential competitive interaction with other gut microbes; no evidence of pathogenicity or opportunistic risk
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to refrigeration (4°C storage); moderate tolerance to bile (confirmed by use of bile in culture media); no data on UV, drying, shear, or lyophilization stability
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Bile salts (for L. acidophilus), sodium propionate and L-cysteine (for B. bifidum)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Lactobacillus acidophilus La-5 和 Bifidobacterium bifidum Bb-12 均为乳酸菌，适宜在37°C、中性至弱酸性环境中生长，依赖复杂培养基（如MRS培养基）进行体外扩增。两者均具有一定的耐胆汁能力，可在肠道环境中定植，表现出良好的共生特性，但对极端环境（如高温、干燥、紫外线）的耐受性未被评估。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Not applicable (no genetic modification reported)
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): Not applicable (no plasmid or chromosomal integration described)
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Not applicable
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 本研究未对 L. acidophilus La-5 和 B. bifidum Bb-12 进行任何基因工程改造，所有功能均基于其天然生理特性。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Not specified (no engineered sensors reported)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Not applicable
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 本研究未涉及任何合成生物学逻辑电路或环境响应机制，微生物的代谢活动基于天然感知能力，如对乳酸积累和胆汁环境的响应。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Not specified (natural secretion of lactic acid and other metabolites)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Not applicable (natural metabolic output; controlled by growth phase and environmental conditions)
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Good compatibility with yogurt matrix; no structural collapse observed despite increased syneresis
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): L. acidophilus 和 B. bifidum 通过产生有机酸（如乳酸）降低环境pH，抑制有害菌生长，具有一定的抗菌作用。
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 两种菌株在酸奶中稳定存活，且未报告对宿主细胞或正常菌群造成显著毒性或破坏，表明其抗菌作用具有可控性和安全性。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): 未报告免疫调节功能。
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): 未报告组织修复功能。
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): L. acidophilus 和 B. bifidum 可利用多糖类物质（如β-葡聚糖）进行代谢，促进自身生长并调节宿主代谢功能。
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Not applicable (no engineered kill switches or auxotrophy used)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no horizontal gene transfer risk; low environmental escape risk due to natural gut origin and sensitivity to environmental stress.
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Physical confinement provided by yogurt matrix; no encapsulation or barrier system used.
B_risk_desc (风险描述): L. acidophilus La-5 和 B. bifidum Bb-12 均为公认安全（GRAS）菌株，广泛用于食品和保健品中，无致病性或机会性感染风险。未进行基因改造，无生物安全风险。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在4°C冷藏条件下，添加0.05%和0.1%的黑木耳水提物可显著提高L. acidophilus La-5和B. bifidum Bb-12的存活率，分别提升0.35–0.43 log CFU/g和0.51–0.58 log CFU/g。同时，抗氧化活性和总酚含量显著增加，28天后分别达到115.30 mg BHT eq./kg和1057.6 mg Gallic acid/kg。尽管感官接受度下降，但0.05%浓度的黑木耳提取物在功能与感官之间取得良好平衡，推荐用于合成益生菌酸奶。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Grows at 10°C and 45°C, in 6.5% NaCl, 40% bile, and at pH 9.6; tolerant to high salt and alkaline conditions
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Growth rate not specified; capable of growth in restrictive environments such as high-salt cheese and fermented sausages
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gastrointestinal tract (human), intestinal mucosa
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competes with indigenous gut flora; may transiently colonize human gut but not persist long-term
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to bile, high osmotic stress, and variable pH; stable during storage and transport in probiotic formulations
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Bile salts, high NaCl, alkaline pH
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Enterococcus faecium SF68 is a facultative anaerobe capable of surviving in harsh environments such as high-salt and alkaline conditions typical of fermented foods and the human gastrointestinal tract. It exhibits strong environmental tolerance, including resistance to bile and osmotic stress, which supports its use as a probiotic. It can transiently colonize the human gut but does not persist long-term after cessation of intake.
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Not specified
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): Not specified
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Not specified
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): No genetic engineering is described in the paper. The strain E. faecium SF68 is used as a naturally occurring probiotic without modification. Its safety and efficacy are based on natural traits rather than synthetic genetic circuits.
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Fsr system (GBAP pheromone), aggregation substance (AS), Esp, Ace
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Quorum-sensing regulation via Fsr system (GBAP autoinducer); expression of virulence genes (gelE, sprE) induced at high cell density; pheromone-responsive plasmid activation by sex pheromones
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): The Fsr quorum-sensing system in E. faecalis regulates virulence gene expression (gelE, sprE) in response to accumulation of the cyclic peptide GBAP (gelatinase biosynthesis-activated pheromone). This acts as a density-dependent switch. Additionally, pheromone-responsive plasmids are activated by small hydrophobic peptides (sex pheromones) secreted by recipient strains, enabling horizontal transfer of virulence genes. These systems allow the bacteria to sense population density and host environment, triggering virulence or conjugation only under favorable conditions.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Bacteriocin secretion via general secretion pathway; possible lysis for release
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Not controllable; natural production based on growth and environmental cues
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with food matrices (cheese, sausages) and probiotic formulations; stable in encapsulated or freeze-dried forms
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Produces bacteriocins (enterocins A and B) that inhibit Listeria monocytogenes and other foodborne pathogens; also contributes to biofilm formation in cheese and sausages, which may protect beneficial microbes.
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): Enterocins A and B from E. faecium WHE 81 inhibit L. monocytogenes in model systems. Bacteriocin production is considered a biopreservative hurdle in fermented sausages and cheeses. The strain does not cause excessive gas or structural disruption in food matrices.
E_B_crit_evidence (标准B_依据): No evidence of oxygenation function in the paper.
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Modulates immune response by enhancing gut mucosal barrier and stimulating immune system; may reduce duration of diarrhea in clinical trials.
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Promotes gut mucosal integrity and reduces duration of diarrhea; supports epithelial regeneration in intestinal lining.
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Not applicable
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Auxotrophy (not specified), strain-specific safety evaluation
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low risk for E. faecium SF68; lacks major virulence determinants (e.g., cytolysin, AS, Esp). Sensitive to clinically relevant antibiotics. No evidence of horizontal gene transfer in probiotic context.
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Physical confinement in food or probiotic product limits environmental escape
B_risk_desc (风险描述): E. faecium SF68 is considered safe for use as a probiotic due to absence of key virulence factors, antibiotic sensitivity, and transient colonization. It poses minimal risk of causing infection or transferring resistance genes. However, caution is advised due to the potential for gene transfer in high-risk hosts (e.g., immunocompromised or antibiotic-treated individuals).
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): E. faecium SF68 effectively reduces duration of diarrhoea in both adults and children in double-blind clinical trials. It improves gut barrier function and modulates immune response. In food applications, it enhances ripening and safety of cheeses and sausages through bacteriocin production and metabolic activity.

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Growth at 37°C in MRS broth; pH 6.9 in PBS; anaerobic conditions required for cultivation
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Stationary phase reached after 20–24 h of anaerobic incubation at 37°C; viable counts ~1.1 × 10^9 CFU/mL
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Not specified (in vitro study; potential for gastrointestinal tract or food/feed matrices)
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Potential probiotic candidates; no direct interaction data reported
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Heat-stable (resistant to 100°C for 1 h); stable in PBS; tolerance to lyophilization not tested
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Cell wall components (peptidoglycans, polysaccharides)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 三种从水果加工副产物中分离的乳酸杆菌（L. fermentum 111、L. paracasei 108 和 L. plantarum 49）在37°C、厌氧条件下于MRS培养基中生长，达到对数末期或稳定期。细胞在PBS中保持稳定，且热灭活后仍能保留结合黄曲霉毒素M1的能力。
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 该研究未对菌株进行基因改造，所有实验均使用天然分离菌株，未涉及遗传工具或基因回路设计。
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 本研究未涉及任何感知模块或逻辑控制，所有功能基于物理吸附，无响应性调控机制。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Physical adsorption to cell wall (peptidoglycans, polysaccharides)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Controlled by contact time and cell concentration (10^9 CFU/mL); removal efficiency increases with time
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with PBS and potential food/feed matrices; no structural disruption reported
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): 无抗菌活性，仅通过物理吸附去除黄曲霉毒素M1。
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 无抗菌功能，不适用。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): 未检测免疫调节功能。
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): 未检测组织修复功能。
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): 未检测代谢调节功能。
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (natural isolates; no synthetic genetic circuits)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no horizontal gene transfer data; safe for food use
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): None (in vitro study; no encapsulation or physical barrier used)
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 三种菌株均来源于水果加工副产物，已被鉴定为潜在益生菌，具有GRAS（公认安全）状态，无基因工程改造，无致病性或抗生素抗性基因报告，风险极低。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在体外实验中，三种乳酸杆菌（L. fermentum 111、L. paracasei 108 和 L. plantarum 49）在1小时和24小时后均能有效去除约73%–80%的黄曲霉毒素M1。热灭活细胞与活细胞去除能力相当，表明细胞活性并非必需。L. plantarum 49在24小时后表现出最高的毒素保留能力（洗脱率最低），表明其结合能力更强。该研究证实这些菌株具有作为生物脱毒剂在食品和饲料中去除黄曲霉毒素M1的潜力。

composition (组成成分): [{"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Effective Microorganisms (EM) Bokashi", "strain_id": "EM Bokashi (Greenland Technologia EM, Janowiec, Poland)"}]
C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Temperature: 37°C; pH: Gut environment (acidic to neutral); Osmotic: Tolerant to moderate osmotic stress; Nutrition: Utilizes feed components (carbohydrates, proteins), produces enzymes and vitamins
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Not specified in the paper; assumed to grow in the gut environment during feed digestion
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Intestinal mucosa (gut lumen and mucosal surface)
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of pathogenic microbes; stabilization of microbiological balance between pathogenic and saprophytic microbiota
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to gastrointestinal stress (acidic pH, bile, osmotic changes); stable during feed processing and storage
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Unknown (not specified in the paper)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): EM Bokashi is a mixture of 70–80 species of beneficial microbes, including bacteria and fungi, that colonize the intestinal mucosa, stabilize gut microbiota, and survive in the gastrointestinal tract under normal feeding conditions. It enhances digestion and nutrient absorption by lowering gut pH and stimulating enzyme and vitamin synthesis.
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): The microbial system is not genetically engineered. EM Bokashi is a naturally occurring consortium of beneficial microbes used as a probiotic feed supplement without genetic modification.

S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): The microbial consortium responds to gut environmental signals such as pH and nutrient availability through natural metabolic and competitive mechanisms. No synthetic genetic circuits or logic gates are involved.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Natural secretion of cytokines and immunomodulatory molecules via microbial metabolism and cell lysis
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent via feed supplementation (8 kg/tonne); no controllable genetic circuitry
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with feed matrix; stable during oral administration and gut transit
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Not applicable (no direct antibacterial mechanism described)
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): No evidence of antibacterial activity; focus is on immune modulation, not pathogen killing.
E_B_crit_evidence (标准B_依据): No oxygenation mechanism reported; not relevant to the system.
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): EM Bokashi stimulates both Th1 and Th2 immune responses by increasing pro- and anti-inflammatory cytokines, maintaining Th1/Th2 balance, and enhancing immune protection against infection.
