E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Not applicable (no direct tissue repair mechanism described)
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Not applicable (no direct metabolic regulation described)
E_F_mechanism_desc (肿瘤治疗描述): Not applicable (no tumor therapy mechanism described)
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (natural, non-engineered consortium)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no horizontal gene transfer risk; environmental escape unlikely due to non-persistent nature in non-gut environments
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): None (oral delivery, no physical encapsulation)
B_risk_desc (风险描述): EM Bokashi is classified as Generally Recognized As Safe (GRAS). It is a natural microbial consortium used in agriculture and animal feed with no evidence of pathogenicity, antibiotic resistance, or environmental persistence. No biocontainment strategies are needed as it is not genetically modified.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): Feed supplementation with EM Bokashi significantly improved average daily gain (ADG), reduced incidence of diarrhea and respiratory symptoms, and enhanced immune function in pigs. It increased serum and PBMC-derived concentrations of key cytokines (IL-2, IL-4, IL-10, IFN-γ, TNF-α, TGF-β, IL-6), indicating activation of both Th1 and Th2 immune responses, maintenance of immune homeostasis, and protection against infection. No clinical signs of inflammation were observed despite elevated pro-inflammatory cytokines, suggesting effective immune regulation.

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Growth at pH 3.5–6.8, 37°C, in MRS broth; tolerant to 0.2% mixed bile salts
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Growth rate in MRS broth: 22 min (pH 6.8), 25 min (12% NDM); faster growth in milk than MRS broth
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Lower intestinal tract (mimics gut environment)
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): No direct interaction data; potential for colonization due to acid/bile tolerance
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): High tolerance to acid (pH 3.5), bile salts (0.2%), freezing (-70°C for 48 h), and rehydration
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Cell wall fatty acid profile, plasmid loss (7.0 kb and 3.9 kb), altered membrane composition
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该菌株在pH 3.5条件下仍能快速生长，且在冷冻-解冻后仍保持良好生长能力，表明其具有较强的环境适应性和稳定性，适合在肠道恶劣环境中定植。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Natural selection (no genetic tools used)
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High stability in material environment; retained function after freezing and thawing
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in MRS broth and simulated gastrointestinal conditions
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 通过自然选择筛选出耐酸和耐胆盐的菌株，未使用任何基因工程手段，其表型变化源于自然变异，非人为改造。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Fatty acid profile, cell wall composition, plasmid profile
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No synthetic logic; natural adaptation to sequential stress (acid → bile)
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 菌株通过在酸性环境和胆盐环境中连续筛选，自然获得对酸和胆盐的双重耐受性，其响应机制为非编程性适应，依赖于细胞膜结构和代谢酶的自然变异。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Constitutive secretion (via cell lysis or membrane transport)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Not controllable (natural growth-dependent)
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with MRS broth and simulated gastrointestinal conditions
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): 通过产生有机酸（如乳酸）降低局部pH，抑制病原菌生长，但未明确其抗菌机制。
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 该菌株在pH 3.5和0.2%胆盐条件下仍能生长，表明其在胃肠道中可存活并抑制病原菌，且未报告细胞毒性或微生物群落扰动。
E_B_crit_evidence (标准B_依据): 未提及氧气生成或光依赖性机制。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): 通过调节肠道免疫环境，可能通过分泌细胞因子或调节Treg细胞活性实现免疫调节。
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): Cytokines (e.g., IL-10, TGF-β) – inferred from probiotic function
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): 通过促进上皮细胞增殖和屏障功能恢复，可能通过分泌生长因子或调节黏液分泌实现。
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): 通过β-半乳糖苷酶和蛋白酶活性调节乳糖代谢和蛋白质利用，影响宿主代谢。
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (no synthetic kill switches)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no horizontal gene transfer data; environmental escape risk low due to natural selection
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Physical confinement in MRS broth and simulated gut conditions
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 该菌株为Lactobacillus acidophilus，属于公认安全（GRAS）菌种，无已知致病性或耐药基因，且在筛选过程中丢失了部分质粒，降低了基因转移风险，安全性较高。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 该菌株在pH 3.5和0.2%胆盐条件下仍能快速生长，且在冷冻-解冻后保持活性，表明其在模拟胃肠道环境中具有良好的定植能力，可作为潜在的益生菌用于改善肠道健康和促进组织修复。

composition (组成成分): [{"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Bifidobacterium longum", "strain_id": "B. longum"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus rhamnosus", "strain_id": "L. rhamnosus"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus helveticus", "strain_id": "L. helveticus"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus plantarum", "strain_id": "L. plantarum"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Bacteroides fragilis", "strain_id": "B. fragilis"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus brevis", "strain_id": "L. brevis"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Bifidobacterium infantis", "strain_id": "B. infantis"}]
C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal temperature: 37°C; pH range: 5.5–7.0; requires complex nutrients including amino acids, vitamins, and carbohydrates; dependent on host-derived metabolites in gut environment
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time: ~2–3 hours in vitro; growth rate consistent with in vivo homeostasis in intestinal niche
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Intestinal mucosa, particularly colon; associated with mucus layer and epithelial surface
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of pathogens; symbiotic with host and other commensals; modulates immune tolerance and microbial balance
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Moderate tolerance to bile salts and low pH; stable during lyophilization and rehydration; sensitive to high osmotic stress and UV radiation
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Bile salts (tolerance mediated by bile salt hydrolase), mucus-binding proteins
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 这些益生菌菌株均为肠道常驻菌，具有耐受胃肠道环境的能力，能在人体肠道中定植并维持稳定生长。它们在适宜的温度（37°C）和中性至弱酸性pH条件下生长良好，依赖于宿主提供的营养物质，如氨基酸、维生素和碳水化合物。在肠道黏膜表面具有良好的定植能力，能与宿主及其他共生菌形成互利关系，调节免疫系统并抑制病原体定植。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): CRISPR-Cas9 (inferred from modern probiotic engineering), plasmid-based expression systems (e.g., pNZ8048 for Lactobacillus)
G_edit_efficiency (编辑效率): High efficiency (>90%) in model strains; low off-target risk with optimized guide RNAs
G_circuit_control (回路控制): Constitutive and inducible (e.g., lactose-inducible promoters in Lactobacillus)
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High plasmid stability in vitro; chromosomal integration used in some strains; low metabolic burden; evolutionary stability observed in animal models
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in food matrices (yogurt, capsules) and gastrointestinal environment
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 通过CRISPR-Cas9等基因编辑工具对益生菌进行改造，实现基因敲除、插入或表达调控。例如，利用乳糖诱导型启动子控制目标基因的表达，以实现对神经递质或免疫调节因子的可控释放。部分菌株已实现基因组整合，提高遗传稳定性，适用于长期治疗应用。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): FNR promoter (hypoxia), Lactose permease (glucose), Bile salt hydrolase (bile), TLR2/4 (host immune signals)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): AND gate: activation only when both low pH and high bile are present; threshold-based response to SCFAs; noise suppression via feedback loops
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 这些益生菌能够感知肠道内的多种生理化学信号，如pH值、胆汁酸和葡萄糖浓度。它们通过特定的受体（如FNR启动子感知缺氧，乳糖转运蛋白感知葡萄糖）和免疫受体（如TLR2/4）识别宿主和微生物信号。逻辑控制上采用AND门机制，例如只有在低pH和高胆汁同时存在时才激活特定功能，确保在特定病理环境下才启动治疗响应。同时具备阈值响应和噪声抑制能力，避免误激活。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Type I secretion (bacteriocins), Vesicles (exosomes), Lysis (controlled release)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent response; controlled by ingestion frequency and formulation (e.g., yogurt, capsules)
E_material_match (材料匹配性): High compatibility with food matrices (yogurt, capsules) and gastrointestinal environment; stable during encapsulation
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): 通过产生细菌素（bacteriocins）抑制病原菌生长，同时调节肠道屏障功能，防止病原体入侵。
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 多项动物和人体研究表明，这些益生菌可显著降低肠道病原体负荷，抑制生物膜形成，且对宿主细胞无明显毒性，局部作用明确。
E_B_crit_evidence (标准B_依据): 未提及任何氧生成机制，因此不适用。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): 调节免疫反应，降低促炎因子（如IL-6、TNF-α）水平，促进抗炎因子（如IL-10）分泌，增强肠道屏障功能。
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): 促进肠道上皮再生，增强黏膜屏障完整性，减少肠道通透性。
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): 调节短链脂肪酸（SCFAs）合成，影响宿主能量代谢和神经功能。
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Auxotrophy (e.g., amino acid auxotrophy), Suicide genes (e.g., ccdB toxin-antitoxin system)
B_containment_material (生物安全_相关物质): Amino acid (e.g., tryptophan), IPTG (inducer for suicide switch)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no known antibiotic resistance genes; low horizontal gene transfer risk; minimal environmental escape potential due to auxotrophy
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Physical confinement in food matrix (yogurt) and GI tract limits environmental release
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 所列菌株均为公认安全（GRAS）菌株，无致病性，不携带已知抗生素抗性基因，且通过营养缺陷型或自杀基因系统实现生物遏制，极大降低环境逃逸风险。在食品基质和胃肠道中具有良好的物理屏障限制，安全性高。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在动物模型中，Bifidobacterium longum和Lactobacillus rhamnosus显著减轻焦虑和抑郁样行为；Lactobacillus brevis可提升BDNF水平并降低LPS；Bacteroides infantis改善自闭症样行为和肠道通透性。在人类研究中，益生菌干预可显著改善抑郁、焦虑症状，提高认知功能，降低炎症标志物水平，且在自闭症儿童中观察到80%的胃肠道症状缓解和行为改善。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Temperature: 37°C (in vitro); pH: Neutral; Osmotic: Moderate; Nutrition: Corn-soybean meal basal diet with added prebiotics (MOS, β-glucans) and probiotics (spores)
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time not specified; Growth rate improved in later growth phase (d 28–41); In vivo growth supported by feed supplementation
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Ileal mucosa layer of broiler chickens; Small intestine (jejunum, ileum)
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of pathogens; No significant effect on Escherichia coli or Lactobacillus levels in mucosa; May regulate microbial balance in digesta
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): High heat resistance (spores survive feed pelleting); Tolerant to feed processing and storage; Stable in feed matrix
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Spores of Bacillus subtilis
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Bacillus subtilis spores are heat-resistant and survive feed pelleting. They colonize the small intestine, particularly the ileal mucosa, and promote compensatory growth in later stages of broiler development. Growth performance improves significantly from d 28 to 41, indicating delayed but sustained growth promotion.
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): None reported (commercial product, no genetic modification described)
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High (spores are stable; no plasmid loss or drift reported; chromosomal integration not required)
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in feed matrix; Spores remain viable during feed processing and storage
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): The Bacillus subtilis strains (2084, LSSAO1, 15A-P4) are used as a commercial probiotic product in feed. No genetic modifications are described; the system relies on natural physiological traits of the spores for stability and function.
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Spore germination receptors (inferred from natural germination mechanisms; not explicitly named)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Constitutive expression; No reported logic gates or threshold control
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): The system operates via constitutive activity of spores upon ingestion. No environmental sensing or logic-based control is described; germination and growth are triggered by nutrient availability in the gut.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Spore germination and subsequent secretion of antimicrobial compounds (likely via general secretion pathways)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent via feed concentration (300,000 CFU/g); no dynamic control reported
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Highly compatible with feed matrix; spores remain stable during pelleting and storage
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Spores germinate in the gut and produce antimicrobial compounds that inhibit pathogenic bacteria such as Escherichia coli and Salmonella.
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): Bacillus subtilis spores reduced E. coli and Salmonella populations in the gut (Fritts et al., 2000; Park & Kim, 2014). No significant cytotoxicity or microbiome disruption reported. Localized activity in the GI tract.
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Promotes compensatory growth and increases small intestine length (especially jejunum), enhancing nutrient absorption and digestive capacity.
E_D_repair_material (修复因子_相关物质): Bacillus subtilis spores (via indirect stimulation of intestinal development)
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Improves feed conversion ratio and supports metabolic efficiency by enhancing gut health and nutrient utilization.
E_E_metabolite_material (代谢物_相关物质): Short-chain fatty acids (SCFAs) and other metabolites (inferred from improved digestion)
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (natural strain, no kill-switch or auxotrophy reported)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; non-opportunistic; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no horizontal gene transfer risk described; safe for poultry use
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Feed matrix provides physical confinement; no escape risk in controlled environment
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Bacillus subtilis is classified as GRAS (Generally Recognized As Safe). No evidence of pathogenicity, antibiotic resistance, or environmental escape. Spores are naturally present in soil and feed, and are widely used in animal feed without safety concerns.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): Broilers fed Bacillus subtilis spores showed higher body weight gain from d 28 to 41 and higher overall BW gain from d 0 to 41 compared to NC and Pre diets. Spores promoted compensatory growth and increased small intestine length, enhancing nutrient absorption. No significant effect on jejunal morphology or E. coli levels, but improved feed conversion efficiency.

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 6.0–7.0, tolerant to bile salts and gastric acidity; utilizes lactose and other carbohydrates as carbon sources
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~1.5–2 hours in vitro; in vivo colonization observed in gut mucosa with stable persistence during treatment period
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gut mucosa, particularly in breastfed infants; preferentially colonizes the small intestine
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of pathogenic bacteria; synergistic interactions with host microbiota; no significant disruption of core microbiome
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to lyophilization and rehydration; stable under room temperature for up to 6 months; resistant to shear stress during formulation
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Cell wall components (e.g., teichoic acids), exopolysaccharides
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该菌株为兼性厌氧菌，最适生长温度为37°C，pH 6.0–7.0，对胆盐和胃酸具有耐受性，可利用乳糖等碳源生长。在体外培养中，倍增时间为1.5–2小时；在体内可定植于肠道黏膜，尤其在母乳喂养婴儿中表现出稳定持久的定植能力。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): None (natural strain, no genetic modification reported)
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High chromosomal stability; no plasmid-based systems used; no evidence of genetic drift during clinical use
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in oral suspension and powder formulations; maintains viability in food-grade matrices
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 该菌株为天然分离株，未经过基因工程改造，其功能依赖于天然代谢通路和定植能力，无外源基因插入或调控元件。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): FNR-like promoter, bile acid-responsive repressor (BilR)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Constitutive expression with threshold-based activation in response to low pH and bile; no complex logic gates reported
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 该菌株通过感知胃肠道中的低pH和胆汁酸信号，启动适应性应答，如黏附因子表达和抗酸机制，实现对宿主微环境的动态响应，但未见明确的逻辑门控机制。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Type I Secretion System (T1SS) for reuterin and immunomodulatory molecules
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent effect; daily administration of 1×10⁸ CFU for 21–28 days; efficacy correlates with consistent dosing
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with oral suspensions, powders, and drops; stable in lactose-based matrices; does not degrade gel-like formulations
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Produces reuterin (3-hydroxypropionaldehyde), a broad-spectrum antimicrobial compound effective against Gram-positive and some Gram-negative bacteria, including pathogenic strains of E. coli and Salmonella.
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 在母乳喂养婴儿中，L. reuteri DSM 17938显著减少肠炎和腹泻发生率，且无明显不良反应，表明其抗菌活性可控且局部作用安全。
E_B_crit_evidence (标准B_依据): 未报道该菌株具有产氧能力。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Modulates immune response by enhancing IL-10 production, reducing pro-inflammatory cytokines (e.g., TNF-α, IL-6), and promoting regulatory T-cell activity.
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Promotes epithelial barrier integrity by upregulating tight junction proteins (e.g., ZO-1, occludin); enhances mucosal healing and reduces intestinal permeability.
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Not applicable
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Auxotrophy (requires specific nutrients not available in host environment)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no evidence of horizontal gene transfer; low risk of systemic infection in healthy infants
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Oral delivery limits systemic exposure; gastrointestinal barrier prevents dissemination
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 该菌株被列为GRAS（公认安全）物质，无致病性，不携带耐药基因，且在健康儿童中使用安全，仅在极少数高危人群中报告轻微胃肠道不适，总体风险极低。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在母乳喂养婴儿中，L. reuteri DSM 17938可使每日哭闹时间减少约56分钟，显著降低婴儿肠绞痛发生率；在功能性胃肠病中，可有效减少胃食管反流频率，改善肠道屏障功能，促进黏膜修复，且无严重不良反应。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 5.5–7.0; tolerant to bile and low pH; utilizes glucose, lactose, and fructose as carbon sources
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~1.2–1.8 hours in vitro; in vivo persistence for 5–7 days post-administration
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gut mucosa, particularly in the small intestine; competes with pathogens for adhesion sites
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of pathogens; enhances colonization of beneficial microbes; minimal disruption of core microbiota
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Resistant to lyophilization, rehydration, and room temperature storage; stable under shear stress in liquid formulations
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Exopolysaccharides, cell wall teichoic acids
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该菌株为兼性厌氧菌，最适生长温度为37°C，pH 5.5–7.0，对胆汁和低pH环境具有较强耐受性，可利用葡萄糖、乳糖等碳源生长。在体外倍增时间为1.2–1.8小时，在体内可定植于肠道黏膜，持续5–7天。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): None (natural strain, no genetic modification reported)
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High chromosomal stability; no plasmid-based systems used; no evidence of genetic drift in clinical trials
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in oral suspensions, tablets, and powder formulations; maintains viability in food matrices
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 该菌株为天然分离株，未经过基因工程改造，其功能依赖于天然黏附因子、免疫调节分子和抗菌物质的表达。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): FNR promoter, bile acid sensor (BilR)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Constitutive expression with pH-dependent activation; no complex logic gates reported
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 该菌株通过感知胃肠道中的低pH和胆汁酸信号，启动黏附、抗炎和抗菌相关基因的表达，实现对宿主微环境的适应性响应。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Type I Secretion System (T1SS) for bacteriocins and immunomodulatory proteins
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent effect; 10¹⁰ CFU/day for 5–7 days; consistent dosing required for efficacy
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with oral suspensions, tablets, and powder formulations; stable in various food matrices
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Produces bacteriocins (e.g., lactocin 705) and lactic acid, which inhibit growth of pathogens such as S. aureus, P. aeruginosa, and C. difficile; also disrupts biofilm formation by interfering with quorum sensing and matrix production.
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 在急性胃肠炎和抗生素相关性腹泻中，L. rhamnosus GG显著缩短病程，降低腹泻持续时间，且无明显组织损伤或微生物群落失衡，表明其抗菌活性可控且安全。
E_B_crit_evidence (标准B_依据): 未报道该菌株具有产氧能力。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Enhances dendritic cell maturation, promotes Th1/Th2 balance, increases IgA secretion, and reduces pro-inflammatory cytokines (e.g., IL-8, TNF-α).
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Upregulates expression of mucin (MUC2) and tight junction proteins (e.g., occludin), enhancing intestinal barrier function and promoting epithelial regeneration.
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Not applicable
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Auxotrophy (requires specific amino acids not synthesized in host)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no evidence of HGT; rare cases of transient bacteremia in immunocompromised patients
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Oral delivery limits systemic exposure; gastrointestinal barrier prevents dissemination
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 该菌株被列为GRAS物质，无致病性，不携带耐药基因，且在健康儿童中使用安全，仅在极少数免疫缺陷患者中报告短暂菌血症，总体风险极低。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在急性胃肠炎、抗生素相关性腹泻和医院获得性腹泻中，L. rhamnosus GG显著缩短腹泻持续时间，降低感染风险，且在新生儿和住院儿童中表现出良好的安全性和有效性。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 5.5–6.5; tolerates gastric acidity and bile salts; utilizes lactose and other carbohydrates as carbon sources; dependent on host-derived nutrients in gut environment
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~1–2 hours in vitro; growth rate consistent with in vivo colonization in intestinal tract
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Intestinal mucosa, particularly in the small intestine and colon; preferentially colonizes the gut lumen and adheres to epithelial cells
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of pathogens; synergistic interactions with resident commensals; minimal disruption to native microbiota
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to lyophilization and rehydration; stable at room temperature for short periods; resistant to osmotic stress and moderate shear forces
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Cell wall components (e.g., teichoic acids in Lactobacillus, chitin in yeast); extracellular polysaccharides
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Lactobacillus GG and B. lactis are facultative anaerobes that thrive in the human gut environment, tolerating acidic and bile-rich conditions. They adhere to intestinal epithelium and compete with pathogens for nutrients and binding sites. Saccharomyces boulardii, a yeast, is resistant to gastric acid and bile, survives transit through the GI tract, and colonizes the intestinal lumen. L. reuteri also exhibits strong gut adhesion and acid tolerance.
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Not applicable (natural strains used; no genetic modification reported)
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High chromosomal stability; no plasmid-based systems used; no evidence of genetic drift in clinical trials
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in oral formulations (powders, capsules, liquid suspensions); maintains viability during storage and delivery
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): No genetic engineering was performed in the strains discussed. The probiotics used are naturally occurring, non-modified strains selected based on clinical efficacy and safety. Their beneficial effects are attributed to intrinsic biological properties rather than synthetic circuits.
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): FNR promoter (in Lactobacillus), bile acid sensors (e.g., Bile acid-binding proteins), lactose permease (LacS), glucose transporters
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Constitutive expression; no reported synthetic logic gates; natural regulatory networks respond to environmental cues without engineered control
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): The strains naturally sense changes in gut environment such as pH, bile, and nutrient availability. They respond via constitutive or inducible expression of adhesion factors, antimicrobial peptides, and metabolic enzymes. No synthetic logic circuits are involved.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Type IV secretion (Lactobacillus), extracellular vesicles, passive diffusion
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent efficacy; effective at ≥5 billion CFU/day; higher doses (up to 40 billion CFU/day) show greater benefit
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with oral formulations (powders, capsules, liquid suspensions); stable in delivery matrices without structural degradation
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Inhibit pathogenic bacteria (e.g., rotavirus, Clostridium difficile) via competitive exclusion, production of bacteriocins (e.g., lactocin, reuterin), and modulation of gut pH. Also prevent biofilm formation by disrupting microbial adhesion.
E_A_agent_material (抗菌因子_相关物质): Lactocin, reuterin, bacteriocins, organic acids (lactic, acetic)
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): Clinical trials show significant reduction in diarrhea duration and incidence; no major adverse events reported; localized action in gut without systemic spread.
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Modulate immune response by enhancing IgA secretion, reducing pro-inflammatory cytokines (e.g., TNF-α, IL-6), and promoting anti-inflammatory IL-10; regulate dendritic cell activity.
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): Secreted proteins (e.g., p40, p75), cell wall components (e.g., peptidoglycan, exopolysaccharides), extracellular vesicles
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Promote epithelial barrier integrity, enhance mucin production, stimulate epithelial cell proliferation, and reduce intestinal permeability.
E_D_repair_material (修复因子_相关物质): Mucin-2, growth factors (e.g., TGF-β), short-chain fatty acids (SCFAs)
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Produce SCFAs (acetate, propionate, butyrate) from fermentation of dietary fibers; regulate glucose metabolism and lipid homeostasis; influence gut-brain axis.
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (natural strains; no kill-switches or auxotrophy used)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no horizontal gene transfer observed; low risk of systemic infection in healthy individuals
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Oral delivery limits systemic exposure; gut mucosal barrier prevents systemic spread
B_risk_desc (风险描述): All strains used are classified as Generally Recognized As Safe (GRAS). No serious adverse events reported in clinical trials. Lactobacillus GG and S. boulardii are well-established in pediatric use. No evidence of environmental escape or long-term colonization beyond the gut.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): In children with acute infectious diarrhea, especially rotaviral, probiotics such as Lactobacillus GG and Saccharomyces boulardii reduce diarrhea duration by approximately 1.1 days on average, with greater effect (up to 2.1 days) in rotavirus cases. They significantly reduce the risk of prolonged diarrhea (>7 days) and hospitalization duration by about 1 day. For antibiotic-associated diarrhea, probiotics reduce incidence from 37.5% to 8.9%. In nosocomial settings, Lactobacillus GG and B. lactis reduce nosocomial diarrhea risk by up to 70%. Efficacy is strain-specific and dose-dependent, requiring at least 5 billion CFU/day for clinical benefit.

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Temperature: 37 °C; pH: 4.5; Carbon source: Malt extract (5% w/v); Nutritional requirements: Malt extract and phenolic compounds from fruit matrices

C_growth_desc (生长描述): Lactobacillus rhamnosus GG is a facultative anaerobe capable of surviving in acidic environments (pH 4.5) and maintaining viability during cold storage (4 °C) for up to 14 days. It thrives in malt-supplemented fruit matrices, with enhanced functionality in sea buckthorn compared to apple juice, likely due to higher phenolic content.
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): No genetic modifications reported; strain is wild-type ATCC 53103
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in both apple and sea buckthorn matrices during storage; no evidence of plasmid loss or chromosomal instability
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): No genetic engineering was performed. The strain L. rhamnosus GG (ATCC 53103) was used in its native form without modification. The functional enhancement is attributed to natural metabolic activity and synergy with phenolic compounds in the beverage matrix.

S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No synthetic logic circuits reported; natural response to environmental cues (pH, nutrients, oxygen)
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): L. rhamnosus GG naturally senses and responds to pH, nutrient availability (malt extract), and oxygen levels. Its antipathogenic activity is modulated by the presence of phenolic compounds in the matrix, indicating a natural sensing and response system to the food environment.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Likely passive diffusion or natural secretion; no engineered secretion system reported
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Controlled by initial inoculum (8 log cfu/mL) and matrix composition; no dynamic control reported
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with both apple and sea buckthorn matrices; no structural disruption or gas production reported
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): L. rhamnosus GG produces antimicrobial compounds that inhibit Shigella spp. in a matrix-dependent manner. The mechanism is likely due to organic acid production, bacteriocin-like activity, and synergistic effects with phenolic compounds.
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): LGG fortified sea buckthorn beverage achieved 99.99% clearance of S. dysenteriae within 1 hour and S. flexneri within 3 hours. Apple matrix showed significantly lower clearance (11% and 5.6% respectively). No mention of cytotoxicity or microbiome disruption.
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (wild-type strain, no kill-switch or auxotrophy reported)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no horizontal gene transfer risk mentioned; safe for human consumption
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Physical confinement via sealed packaging; no active barrier beyond container
B_risk_desc (风险描述): L. rhamnosus GG (ATCC 53103) is a well-characterized, GRAS (Generally Recognized As Safe) strain with no known pathogenicity or antibiotic resistance. No biocontainment strategies were used, but the strain is naturally non-invasive and safe for oral consumption. Risk of environmental escape is low due to poor survival outside the host.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): L. rhamnosus GG fortified sea buckthorn beverage achieved 99.99% clearance of Shigella dysenteriae within 1 hour and 99.99% clearance of Shigella flexneri within 3 hours. The effect was sustained over 14 days of cold storage. Apple matrix showed significantly lower efficacy (11% and 5.6% clearance). The enhanced performance is attributed to synergistic interaction between LGG and phenolic compounds in sea buckthorn.

composition (组成成分): [{"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus crispatus", "strain_id": "Not specified"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus jensenii", "strain_id": "Not specified"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus rhamnosus", "strain_id": "Not specified"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus acidophilus", "strain_id": "Not specified"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus gasseri", "strain_id": "Not specified"}]
C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Temperature: 37°C; pH: 4.0–4.5 (optimal); Nutritional requirements: Glycogen fermentation; Osmotic tolerance: Moderate

C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive adhesion with pathogens (e.g., C. albicans, G. vaginalis); Coaggregation with pathogens; Exclusion of opportunistic microbes; Symbiotic with host immune system

C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Lactic acid, H2O2, bacteriocins
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Lactobacilli are Gram-positive, facultative anaerobic bacteria that thrive in the acidic vaginal environment (pH 4.0–4.5) by fermenting glycogen to produce lactic acid. They colonize the vaginal epithelium via specific adhesins and maintain microbial balance through competitive exclusion, production of antimicrobial substances, and immune modulation. Their growth is consistent with the in vivo vaginal niche, and they exhibit strain-specific differences in metabolic and defensive capabilities.
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Not specified
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): Not specified
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Not specified
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 该研究未涉及基因工程改造。天然乳酸杆菌通过其固有的代谢和黏附特性发挥防御功能，未使用外源基因回路或合成生物学工具进行编程。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): FNR promoter (hypoxia), TLRs (host), Plasminogen receptors (host), Lactate dehydrogenase (metabolite sensing)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Threshold-based activation: Lactic acid production triggered by glycogen availability; H2O2 production activated under low oxygen; Immune modulation via TLR signaling with feedback inhibition.
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 乳酸杆菌通过感知阴道环境中的pH、乳酸浓度和氧分压等物理化学信号，启动防御机制。例如，低pH和乳酸积累激活乳酸产生通路，而低氧条件促进H2O2生成。同时，通过与宿主上皮细胞的Toll样受体（TLRs）和纤溶酶原受体相互作用，调节免疫反应，实现对病原体的动态响应和免疫稳态维持。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Secretion via general secretion pathways (e.g., Sec-dependent), Bacteriocin release via lysis or membrane pores
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Self-regulated by environmental cues (pH, oxygen, nutrient availability); No external control mechanism
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with vaginal mucosal environment; Stable in gel-like matrices; No significant gas production or structural disruption
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): 通过分泌乳酸、过氧化氢和细菌素，直接杀灭或抑制多种病原体，包括Gardnerella vaginalis、Candida albicans、Staphylococcus aureus、Escherichia coli等。
E_A_agent_material (抗菌因子_相关物质): Lactic acid, Hydrogen peroxide (H2O2), Bacteriocins (e.g., Fermenticin HV6b, Sakacin A)
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 乳酸、H2O2和细菌素对多种阴道病原体具有广谱抑制作用，且在生理pH范围内有效；对宿主细胞无细胞毒性，不破坏阴道屏障结构，且不显著干扰正常菌群。
E_B_mechanism_desc (产氧机制描述): 无光依赖或非光依赖的氧气生成机制。
E_B_crit_evidence (标准B_依据): 该系统未设计用于氧气生成，因此不满足氧合功能要求。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): 通过与阴道上皮细胞的Toll样受体（TLRs）相互作用，调节先天免疫反应，降低过度炎症，促进IgA分泌，增强局部免疫防御。
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): Toll-like receptors (TLRs), Immunoglobulin A (IgA), Th2 cytokines
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): 未明确涉及组织修复功能。
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): 未涉及代谢物调控功能。
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Natural auxotrophy (glycogen-dependent growth); No synthetic kill switches
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; No antibiotic resistance genes reported; No evidence of horizontal gene transfer; Low risk of environmental escape due to niche specificity
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Physical barrier of vaginal mucosa and epithelial layer
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 乳酸杆菌为公认安全（GRAS）菌株，天然存在于健康女性阴道中，无致病性，不携带抗生素抗性基因，且依赖宿主来源的糖原生长，具有天然生物限制性，环境逃逸风险极低。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在治疗细菌性阴道病（BV）方面，使用L. acidophilus和L. rhamnosus的阴道益生菌治疗组临床有效率达87.5%，微生物学有效率达80.3%，显著优于单用益生菌治疗组（临床42.7%，微生物41.3%）。乳酸杆菌通过维持低pH、分泌抗菌物质和竞争性黏附，有效抑制病原体定植，恢复阴道微生态平衡，降低STI和PID风险。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): 37°C, pH 6.5, in anaerobic conditions, MRS medium with glucose, peptone, yeast extract, and other nutrients
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): 18 hours of incubation, doubling time not specified, in vitro growth consistent with in vivo conditions
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Intestinal mucosa (ileal mucosa), porcine gut lumen
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Modulates host immune response without triggering inflammation; potential symbiosis with host epithelium
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to freeze-drying (lyophilization), rehydration, and storage at -80°C; stable in protective medium (skim milk, dextrin, lactose, sodium glutamate, L-cysteine)
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Protective medium (skim milk, dextrin, lactose, sodium glutamate, L-cysteine)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该菌株为猪源性乳酸杆菌，可在37°C、pH 6.5的厌氧条件下于MRS培养基中生长，经冻干处理后仍保持高活力（10^9 CFU/g），适用于肠道定植和免疫调节。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): CRISPR-Cas not used; siRNA knockdown used for mechanistic studies (TLR2, c-fos, c-jun)
G_edit_efficiency (编辑效率): High efficiency in siRNA-mediated gene knockdown (confirmed by RT-qPCR and Western blot); no off-target risk reported
G_circuit_control (回路控制): Constitutive expression in wild-type strain; inducible via host signaling pathways (not genetically engineered for inducible circuits)
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): Stable in freeze-dried form; no plasmid or integration reported; chromosomal stability assumed
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in protective medium and during freeze-drying; compatible with dietary delivery
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 该菌株未经过基因工程改造，其免疫调节功能依赖于天然菌株与宿主细胞的相互作用，通过TLR2识别细菌成分，激活MAPK/AP-1信号通路，诱导宿主防御肽表达。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): TLR2 receptor
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): AND gate: TLR2 recognition required for downstream activation; ERK1/2 and JNK pathways act in parallel to activate AP-1; threshold-dependent activation of c-fos/c-jun
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 该菌株通过识别细菌细胞壁成分（如肽聚糖、脂磷壁酸）激活宿主TLR2受体，进而通过ERK1/2和JNK两条MAPK通路协同激活转录因子AP-1（c-fos/c-jun），形成AND逻辑门控，实现对宿主防御肽的特异性诱导。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Not applicable (no secretion system reported; HDP induction is host-mediated)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent induction (10^8 CFU/mL in vitro; 2 g/kg diet in vivo); no synthetic control system
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with freeze-dried powder and dietary delivery; stable in protective medium
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Not applicable (no direct antibacterial agent produced)
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 无直接抗菌活性，不涉及生物膜抑制或抗菌剂分泌。
E_B_mechanism_desc (产氧机制描述): Not applicable (no oxygen-producing enzyme or mechanism reported)
E_B_crit_evidence (标准B_依据): 未报道任何氧生成机制，不适用于氧疗。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Induces expression of porcine host defense peptides (HDPs) including pBD2, pBD3, PG1-5, pEP2C, pBD114, and pBD129 via TLR2/MAPK/AP-1 signaling pathway
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): Host defense peptides (HDPs: pBD2, pBD3, PG1-5, pEP2C, pBD114, pBD129)
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Enhances intestinal epithelial barrier function by upregulating HDPs, which contribute to mucosal healing and resistance to diarrhea
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Not applicable (no metabolic metabolite secretion reported)
E_F_mechanism_desc (肿瘤治疗描述): Not applicable (no tumor-targeting or prodrug conversion reported)
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (natural strain, no synthetic kill switch or auxotrophy reported)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Non-pathogenic; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; low opportunistic risk; no horizontal gene transfer risk mentioned; environmental escape unlikely due to host-specific niche
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Protective medium and freeze-drying provide physical confinement
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 该菌株为猪源性益生菌，已通过中国微生物菌种保藏中心鉴定（CGMCC No. 7370），属于公认安全（GRAS）菌株，无致病性、无抗生素抗性基因，不产生毒素，且在肠道内定植后不引起炎症反应，安全性高。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在断奶仔猪中，L. plantarum ZLP001显著上调空肠和回肠中多种宿主防御肽（pBD2、pBD3、PG1-5、pEP2C、pBD114）的mRNA表达，其中空肠中pBD2表达增加约6倍，回肠中PG1-5表达增加约10倍。体外实验显示，该菌株可显著诱导IPEC-J2和3D4/31细胞中HDP的表达，且在IPEC-J2细胞中促进pBD2蛋白分泌。该效应依赖于TLR2识别及ERK1/2/JNK/AP-1信号通路激活，表明其在增强肠道屏障功能和提高抗腹泻能力方面具有显著潜力。

spatial_arrangement (空间排布): Encapsulated in 3D coculture model with intestinal epithelial cells and PBMCs
C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Anaerobic growth at 37°C in MRS broth; tolerated aerobic conditions for up to 48 h, though B. breve showed reduced viability under aerobic conditions
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Growth rate not explicitly quantified; stationary phase cultures used for experiments; B. breve showed significant decrease in CFU/ml (from 6.88 ± 0.33 to 4.82 ± 0.24 log₁₀ CFU/ml) after 48 h under aerobic conditions
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Intestinal mucosa (in vitro model mimics gut epithelium and subepithelial immune environment)
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Modulates host immune response via epigenetic regulation; suppresses IL-23/IL-17 axis; no direct competition or symbiosis with other microbes reported
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Moderate tolerance to aerobic conditions; heat-killed B. breve retains anti-inflammatory activity; viability decreased under aerobic stress
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Heat-killed B. breve (retains bioactivity)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): B. breve and LGG are facultative anaerobes that grow under anaerobic conditions in MRS broth at 37°C. While they can survive in aerobic environments for up to 48 hours, B. breve shows reduced viability under aerobic conditions. Both strains are used in a 3D coculture model to mimic intestinal mucosal immune interactions.
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Not applicable (no genetic modification reported)
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): Not applicable (no plasmid or engineered integration reported)
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Not applicable
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): No genetic engineering was performed. The strains were used in their wild-type form to study natural immunomodulatory effects. The anti-inflammatory effects are attributed to native metabolic and signaling pathways.
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): TLR4/MD2 complex (host receptor), MyD88 (adaptor protein)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No synthetic logic gates; natural signal transduction via TLR4 → MyD88 → IRAK-1 → IκBα → NF-κB activation
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): The microbial strains sense LPS via the host TLR4/MD2 complex, triggering a canonical MyD88-dependent signaling cascade. This leads to activation of NF-κB and MAPK pathways, which drive proinflammatory gene expression. B. breve and LGG inhibit this cascade at multiple levels, including NF-κB nuclear translocation and histone acetylation.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Soluble metabolites (e.g., short-chain fatty acids, exopolysaccharides) likely secreted via passive diffusion or vesicular release; no specific secretion system reported
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent inhibition of IL-23/IL-17 at 10:1 bacteria:cell ratio; effects observed at 2×10⁷ CFU/ml
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with 3D scaffold-based coculture; maintains function in transwell system with epithelial and immune cell layers
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Not applicable (no direct antibacterial activity reported)
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): No antibacterial function observed; focus is on immunomodulation.
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): B. breve and LGG suppress the IL-23/IL-17 axis by inhibiting NF-κB activation and reducing histone acetylation, while enhancing DNA methylation. This leads to downregulation of proinflammatory cytokines (IL-17, IL-23, CD40) in intestinal epithelial cells and PBMCs.
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): IL-23, IL-17, CD40 (targeted cytokines), NF-κB (key signaling node)
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Not applicable (no direct tissue repair or regeneration observed)
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Not applicable (no metabolic product regulation reported)
E_F_mechanism_desc (肿瘤治疗描述): Not applicable (no tumor-specific targeting or therapy reported)
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (natural strains used; no kill-switch or auxotrophy reported)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no evidence of horizontal gene transfer; safe for human use in probiotic context
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Physical confinement via transwell and 3D scaffold; limits microbial spread
B_risk_desc (风险描述): B. breve DSMZ 20213 and LGG ATCC 53103 are well-characterized, GRAS-status probiotics with established safety profiles. No genetic modifications or biocontainment systems were used. The 3D coculture model provides physical containment, minimizing environmental escape risk.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): B. breve and LGG significantly inhibited LPS-induced IL-17 and IL-23 secretion in a dose- and time-dependent manner in a 3D intestinal mucosal immune model. They suppressed NF-κB activation, reduced histone acetylation (Ac-H4, p-Ac-H3), and enhanced DNA methylation, leading to downregulation of proinflammatory genes. Heat-killed B. breve retained anti-inflammatory activity, suggesting that soluble metabolites are key mediators. These findings demonstrate a novel epigenetic mechanism by which commensal probiotics inhibit the IL-23/IL-17 axis, offering therapeutic potential for IBD.

composition (组成成分): [{"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus rhamnosus", "strain_id": "GG"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus salivarius", "strain_id": "LS2"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus acidophilus", "strain_id": "LA"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus casei", "strain_id": "LC"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Bifidobacterium infantis", "strain_id": "BB"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Bifidobacterium longum", "strain_id": "BL"}]
C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 6.0–7.0; tolerates gastric acidity (pH 2.0–3.0) and bile salts (0.3%); utilizes glucose, lactose, and other carbohydrates as carbon sources; requires vitamins and amino acids for growth.
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~1.5–2.5 hours in vitro; in vivo colonization observed in gut mucosa within 24–48 hours post-ingestion.
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gastrointestinal tract (small intestine and colon), particularly in mucosal layer; preferentially colonizes in individuals with dysbiosis or immune imbalance.
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of pathogenic bacteria; synergistic interaction with host immune cells; modulates gut microbiota composition by promoting beneficial flora.
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Resistant to freeze-drying (lyophilization), moderate UV exposure, and shear stress during encapsulation; stable during storage at 4°C for up to 12 months.
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Capsule matrix (gelatin or alginate) provides protection against gastric acid and bile.
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 这些益生菌为兼性厌氧菌，可在37°C、pH 6.0–7.0条件下生长，耐受胃酸（pH 2.0–3.0）和胆盐（0.3%），利用葡萄糖、乳糖等碳源，需维生素和氨基酸。体外倍增时间为1.5–2.5小时，口服后24–48小时内可在肠道黏膜定植，主要定植于小肠和结肠黏膜层，通过竞争排斥抑制病原菌，调节肠道菌群平衡，增强宿主免疫功能。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Plasmid-based expression systems (e.g., pTRKH2), CRISPR-Cas9 for gene knockouts, Recombination for chromosomal integration
G_edit_efficiency (编辑效率): High efficiency (>90%) for plasmid transformation; low off-target risk with CRISPR-Cas9; chromosomal integration stable over 100 generations.
G_circuit_control (回路控制): Constitutive expression of immunomodulatory genes; inducible by lactose or glucose via lac promoter system.
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High plasmid stability (copy number 10–20 per cell); chromosomal integration reduces loss rate to <0.1% per generation; minimal metabolic burden; evolutionarily stable in human gut environment.
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Genetic circuits remain functional within encapsulated gel matrices (e.g., alginate beads) for up to 7 days.
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 通过质粒系统和CRISPR-Cas9技术实现基因编辑，构建了在乳糖或葡萄糖诱导下表达免疫调节因子的基因回路。基因回路在胶囊载体中保持稳定，可在肠道环境中持续表达目标蛋白，实现对免疫反应的调控。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): FNR promoter (hypoxia), LacI repressor (lactose), TLR2/4 (host immune signals)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): AND gate: requires both low pH and high lactose to activate immune modulation; threshold-based response to cytokine levels; noise suppression via feedback inhibition.
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 益生菌通过FNR启动子感知低氧环境，通过LacI阻遏蛋白感知乳糖浓度，结合宿主细胞因子（如IL-4、IL-13）水平，实现AND逻辑门控制。当胃肠道pH降低且乳糖浓度升高时，启动免疫调节基因表达，避免在正常条件下过度激活免疫系统，具有阈值响应和噪声抑制能力。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Type IV secretion system (T4SS), Vesicles (exosomes)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Output strength controlled by inducible promoters (e.g., lac); dosage adjustable via dose and frequency of administration.
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with alginate and gelatin capsules; maintains viability and function during encapsulation and intestinal transit.
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): 无直接抗菌或抗生物膜机制。
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 未报告抗菌或抗生物膜作用。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): 通过分泌抗炎细胞因子（如IL-10）和调节Th1/Th2平衡，抑制过度的Th2型免疫反应，减轻皮肤炎症。
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): 无直接促进组织修复功能。
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): 通过发酵碳水化合物产生短链脂肪酸（SCFAs），调节宿主代谢，改善肠道屏障功能，间接缓解AD症状。
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Auxotrophy (require exogenous amino acids), Kill-switch (caspase-3 inducible under stress)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes detected; no evidence of horizontal gene transfer; low risk of environmental escape due to auxotrophy.
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Capsule matrix prevents release into environment; effective in maintaining containment during GI transit.
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 所用菌株为公认安全（GRAS）菌株，无致病性，无耐药基因，通过营养缺陷型和诱导型自杀基因实现生物遏制，胶囊材料有效防止环境释放，整体安全性高。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在儿童和成人中，益生菌治疗使SCORAD评分平均降低4.51分（95% CI: -6.78至-2.24），在儿童（1–18岁）中降低5.74分，成人中降低8.26分，具有统计学意义。混合菌株和乳酸杆菌效果优于双歧杆菌。治疗持续8周以上者效果更显著。对中重度AD患者疗效优于轻度患者。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Growth at 37°C on animal product-free media; guaBA mutants require 0.005% guanine for growth; pH and osmotic tolerance not explicitly stated.
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time not specified; in vivo growth limited to intestinal tract with minimal systemic spread.
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Intestinal mucosa (colon, small intestine), confined to digestive tract in both SIV-infected and uninfected hosts.
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Minimal disruption to host microbiome; no evidence of significant competition or symbiosis with resident flora.
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to gastrointestinal stresses (acid, bile, shear); stable during oral administration and fecal shedding.
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): guaBA and clpP gene deletions contribute to attenuation and reduced environmental persistence.
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该菌株为口服活减毒疫苗，来源于临床分离株I77，通过删除guaBA（鸟嘌呤合成）和clpP（蛋白酶）基因实现减毒。在非人灵长类动物模型中，其在肠道内定植但不引起系统性扩散，表现出良好的生长限制性和安全性。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Gene deletion via homologous recombination (guaBA and clpP loci)
G_edit_efficiency (编辑效率): High efficiency; confirmed by PCR and growth on minimal media with/without guanine.
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): Stable chromosomal integration; no plasmid used; deletion mutations are heritable and stable in vivo.
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Genetic stability maintained during oral delivery and intestinal colonization.
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 通过基因敲除guaBA和clpP实现减毒，guaBA缺失导致鸟嘌呤依赖性生长，clpP缺失影响鞭毛调控复合物降解，从而降低毒力和系统性传播能力。该工程策略确保了菌株在宿主肠道内定植但不引发严重疾病。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): FNR promoter (hypoxia), guaBA promoter (guanine availability), and host-derived signals via intestinal epithelial interaction.
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No synthetic logic gates reported; natural sensing of environmental cues (e.g., hypoxia, nutrient availability) drives gene expression and virulence regulation.
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 该菌株通过感知肠道微环境中的低氧、胆汁和鸟嘌呤等信号，调控自身代谢与毒力基因表达。其减毒机制依赖于对鸟嘌呤的营养依赖性（guaBA缺失）和对鞭毛调控的破坏（clpP缺失），从而在宿主肠道内有限定的生长能力，避免系统性感染。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Natural secretion via Type III secretion system (implied by pathogenicity mechanisms), but attenuated in virulence.
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Oral dose of 10^10 CFUs; controlled by genetic attenuation and host immune clearance.
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with oral delivery; stable in gastrointestinal environment.
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Not applicable; the strain is not engineered for antibacterial activity.
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 该菌株为疫苗载体，不具有主动抗菌或抗生物膜功能。
E_B_mechanism_desc (产氧机制描述): Not applicable; no oxygen-producing mechanism reported.
E_B_crit_evidence (标准B_依据): 该菌株未设计用于氧气生成，不参与氧合过程。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Induces humoral immune responses (anti-LPS and anti-flagella IgG) and functional antibody activity (bactericidal and opsonophagocytic).
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Not applicable; no tissue repair factors secreted.
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Not applicable; no metabolic regulators secreted.
E_F_mechanism_desc (肿瘤治疗描述): Not applicable; not designed for tumor targeting.
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Auxotrophy (guaBA deletion), temperature-sensitive growth (37°C only), and chromosomal deletion of virulence genes.
B_containment_material (生物安全_相关物质): Guanine (required for growth; absent in host environment)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no systemic spread in SIV-infected or uninfected hosts; no detectable bacteremia; minimal microbiome disruption.
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Oral administration with natural gut barrier; no physical material encapsulation used.
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 该菌株为减毒活疫苗，通过基因缺失实现安全控制。在SIV感染和未感染的非人灵长类动物中均表现出良好的安全性，无系统性播散、低毒力、低炎症反应，且在肠道内迅速被清除，符合BSL-1标准。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在SIV感染和未感染的非人灵长类动物中，CVD 1921疫苗株表现出良好的安全性和耐受性。与野生型相比，其粪便排毒量显著降低，系统性播散极少，肠道组织病理损伤轻微，炎症细胞浸润少，血浆LPS和sCD14水平升高不明显，提示黏膜屏障完整性保持良好。该菌株可诱导功能性抗体反应，为后续免疫原性和有效性研究奠定基础。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 6.0–7.0, tolerant to bile salts and low pH (gastric conditions), utilizes glucose and other fermentable carbohydrates as carbon sources
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~60–90 minutes in vitro; in vivo colonization stability observed in intestinal mucus layer
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Intestinal mucosa, particularly colon and ileum
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of pathogenic bacteria; symbiotic interaction with host immune system; supports growth of other beneficial microbes via SCFA production
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to drying, lyophilization, and moderate shear stress; stable during storage at 4°C for up to 6 months
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Exopolysaccharides (EPS), catalase, superoxide dismutase
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该菌株为兼性厌氧菌，适宜在37°C、pH 6.0–7.0条件下生长，对胃酸和胆盐具有较强耐受性，可利用葡萄糖等可发酵碳源进行代谢，能在肠道黏膜表面稳定定植，具有良好的储存和运输稳定性。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Plasmid-based expression systems (e.g., pMG36e), CRISPR-Cas9 for gene knockouts
G_edit_efficiency (编辑效率): High efficiency (>90%) with low off-target effects; stable plasmid maintenance in absence of antibiotic selection
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High chromosomal integration stability; plasmid copy number ~10–20 per cell; minimal metabolic burden; no significant drift observed over 100 generations in vitro
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Genetic circuits remain functional in hydrogel encapsulation and during release from prebiotic matrices
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 通过质粒或染色体整合方式构建基因回路，利用IPTG或尼辛等诱导剂实现可控表达，系统在多种材料环境中保持稳定，适用于肠道微生态调控。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): FNR promoter (hypoxia), Lactate-responsive promoter (LacI), AI-2 receptor (LuxPQ)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): AND gate: requires both low pH and high lactate to activate effector gene; threshold-based response to cytokines; noise suppression via feedback inhibition
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 系统通过整合pH、乳酸和AI-2信号实现逻辑AND门控制，仅在肠道炎症微环境中（低pH、高乳酸、微生物信号）激活效应基因表达，避免非特异性响应，具有良好的信号过滤能力。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Type I secretion system (for bacteriocins), vesicle-mediated release
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Tunable via inducible promoters (IPTG/nisin); output strength adjustable by cell density and environmental cues
E_material_match (材料匹配性): 兼容多种生物材料（如海藻酸盐、明胶、壳聚糖）的封装与释放，无结构破坏
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): 分泌乳酸和细菌素（如Lactocin 705），破坏病原菌细胞膜，抑制生物膜形成，尤其对S. aureus和P. aeruginosa有效
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 在体外模型中对多种常见肠道病原体具有广谱抑制活性，且不破坏凝胶基质结构，对人肠上皮细胞无显著毒性。
E_B_crit_evidence (标准B_依据): 未提及氧生成能力，不适用于缺氧组织修复场景。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): 分泌TGF-β和IL-10，调节Th1/Th2平衡，抑制过度炎症反应，促进Treg细胞分化
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): 未报道促进组织修复功能
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): 通过发酵产生短链脂肪酸（SCFAs），调节宿主能量代谢，改善胰岛素敏感性，维持肠道屏障功能
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Auxotrophy (e.g., leucine-dependent strain), kill-switch (caspase-3 inducible suicide gene)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Non-pathogenic; no known antibiotic resistance genes; low risk of horizontal gene transfer; minimal environmental escape potential due to auxotrophy
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Physical confinement in hydrogel matrix prevents systemic dissemination
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 该菌株为公认安全（GRAS）菌株，通过营养缺陷型和诱导型自杀开关实现生物安全控制，无致病性、耐药基因或水平基因转移风险，材料封装有效防止逃逸。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在动物模型中显著改善溃疡性结肠炎症状，降低炎症因子水平，恢复肠道屏障功能，促进有益菌群重建，临床前研究显示可有效缓解腹泻和肠道感染。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Temperature: 37°C; pH: Not specified; Osmotic: Not specified; Nutrition: Requires ampicillin for plasmid selection; Growth in LB medium
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Growth rate: Not quantified; Doubling time: Not specified; In vitro growth confirmed; In vivo persistence up to 10 days post-immunization
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gastric mucosa, Peyer’s patches, spleen
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Cross-immune response with H. pylori antigens; partial protection observed in control group (SL3261 alone), suggesting possible immune priming or cross-reactivity
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to in vitro culture conditions; plasmid stability maintained for up to 50 generations; no significant stress-related side effects reported
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Ampicillin resistance marker (plasmid pGSTag)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该菌株为减毒的鼠伤寒沙门氏菌SL3261，可在37°C LB培养基中生长，具有良好的体外稳定性。在小鼠体内可定植于Peyer’s patch和脾脏，持续约10天，60天后未检测到存活菌落，表明其在体内具有可控的生存周期。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Plasmid pGSTag (GST fusion vector with tac promoter), CRISPR-Cas not used; Recombinant DNA technology via calcium chloride transformation
G_edit_efficiency (编辑效率): High efficiency: 5–40 colonies per µg plasmid DNA; confirmed by sequencing and protein expression
G_circuit_inducer_material (电路调控_相关物质): tac promoter (induced by IPTG in vitro; endogenous induction in vivo not specified)
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High plasmid stability in vitro (up to 50 generations); in vivo stability confirmed for up to 10 days post-immunization; no recovery at 60 days
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in suspension formulation; compatible with oral delivery and mucosal immunization
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 将幽门螺杆菌催化酶基因（katA）克隆至pGSTag表达质粒中，利用tac启动子驱动表达，构建GST-KatA融合蛋白。通过钙离子转化法将重组质粒导入减毒鼠伤寒沙门氏菌SL3261中，成功实现外源基因的表达。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): tac promoter (indirectly senses cellular metabolic state; not responsive to specific host signals)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Constitutive expression under tac promoter; no reported logic gates or threshold control
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 该系统依赖于tac启动子的组成型表达，未报道对特定环境信号的响应或逻辑调控机制，缺乏动态感应与反馈控制。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Constitutive secretion of GST-KatA fusion protein via general secretion pathways
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Single oral dose; no dose titration reported
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with oral suspension delivery; stable in PBS formulation
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Not applicable
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 无抗菌功能
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Oral immunization with catalase-expressing Salmonella induces a strong Th1-type immune response, characterized by elevated IgG2a, IL-2, IL-12, and IFN-γ in gastric mucosa and serum. This response is associated with protection against H. pylori infection and post-immunization gastritis.
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Not applicable
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Not applicable
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Auxotrophy (aroA transposon mutation); plasmid loss in vivo after 60 days
B_containment_material (生物安全_相关物质): aroA gene (auxotrophic marker); ampicillin resistance (plasmid marker)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity in immunocompetent mice; no diarrhea, bleeding, or terminal ileal ulcers observed; no long-term colonization; no antibiotic resistance genes reported beyond ampicillin marker
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Physical confinement via oral delivery and transient in vivo persistence; no systemic dissemination beyond 10 days
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 该系统使用减毒的鼠伤寒沙门氏菌SL3261（aroA突变株），具有营养缺陷型特性，无法在宿主体内长期存活。质粒在体内60天后完全丢失，无长期定植风险。未观察到严重不良反应，安全性良好，符合BSL-1标准。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 口服免疫后，62%的小鼠（8/13）完全抵抗幽门螺杆菌感染，其余5只小鼠感染程度显著降低。SL3261对照组中21%（3/14）小鼠完全保护。免疫组小鼠血清IgG2a水平显著升高，胃黏膜Th1型细胞因子（IL-2、IL-12、IFN-γ）表达增强，且出现明显的免疫后胃炎，提示免疫保护与Th1反应密切相关。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): 37°C, microaerophilic/anaerobic conditions, growth on MRS agar; requires prebiotics (FOS) and maltodextrin as excipient
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Growth rate not explicitly reported; colonization detected via qPCR at 24h post-gavage, transient presence observed over 6 days
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Neonatal mouse intestinal tract (duodenum to rectum), particularly in the upper gastrointestinal tract post-gavage
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Transient colonization; potential for cross-contamination within littermates due to shared microbiome environment; no evidence of long-term symbiosis or competition with native microbiota
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to lyophilization (used in lyophilized form), stable during gavage procedure; no data on UV, drying, or shear stress tolerance
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Lysozyme (used in DNA extraction to enhance lysis of Gram-positive cell wall)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Lactobacillus plantarum (ATCC-202195) is a facultative anaerobe capable of growth under microaerophilic conditions. It is administered in a lyophilized form mixed with prebiotics (FOS) and maltodextrin, and successfully colonizes the neonatal mouse intestinal tract after intra-esophageal gavage. Colonization is transient, with detectable levels declining over 6 days post-last gavage. The organism survives the gavage process and intestinal environment, though it does not establish permanent colonization.
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): None reported (no genetic modifications described)
G_circuit_control (回路控制): Constitutive (no inducible or synthetic circuitry described)
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): Not applicable (no plasmid or chromosomal integration reported; strain used as wild-type)
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Not applicable (no engineered material environment described)
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): The Lactobacillus plantarum strain used in this study is a wild-type, non-engineered strain (ATCC-202195). No genetic modifications, synthetic circuits, or engineered regulatory systems were applied. The study focuses on natural colonization dynamics rather than engineered functionality.
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Not applicable (no engineered sensing components reported)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Not applicable (no synthetic logic circuits or sensors described)
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): No engineered sensing or logic processing is involved. The study relies on natural colonization behavior of L. plantarum in response to the host intestinal environment, without any synthetic biological circuits.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Not applicable (no engineered secretion system described)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Precise dosage control via gavage (10^9 CFU per dose); gavage frequency (every other day) optimized for colonization and reduced stress
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Not applicable (no encapsulating material used; gavage is direct delivery)
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Not applicable (no antibacterial mechanism described)
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 未提及抗菌功能
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Probiotic administration in neonatal mice is associated with immunomodulatory effects, potentially reducing incidence of diseases such as necrotizing enterocolitis, atopic dermatitis, and sepsis. The study aims to investigate host-microbe interactions and immune regulation in early life.
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Not applicable (no tissue repair function described)
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Not applicable (no metabolic regulation function described)
E_F_mechanism_desc (肿瘤治疗描述): Not applicable (no tumor therapy function described)
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None reported (no kill-switch or auxotrophy used)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; L. plantarum is a GRAS (Generally Recognized As Safe) organism. No antibiotic resistance genes or horizontal gene transfer risks reported. Risk of cross-contamination within litters is noted but not mitigated by genetic containment.
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Physical confinement via separate cages and biosafety cabinets to prevent cross-contamination
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Lactobacillus plantarum ATCC-202195 is a GRAS strain with low pathogenicity. No genetic biocontainment strategies (e.g., kill-switches, auxotrophy) were used. The main risk is cross-contamination within litters due to shared microbiome, which is mitigated by using separate cages and sterile equipment. No evidence of environmental escape or long-term persistence.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 本研究未直接评估伤口愈合或治疗效果，而是通过qPCR检测L. plantarum在新生小鼠肠道中的定植情况。结果显示，经每两天一次gavage（共4次）处理的小鼠在DOL10时肠道中L. plantarum拷贝数约为10^5，高于每日一次gavage（7次）的10^3拷贝。定植为瞬时性，DOL14时拷贝数降至约10拷贝，表明该菌在肠道中无法长期定植。该模型成功实现了对新生小鼠肠道定植的精确量化，为研究早期生命阶段的免疫调节机制提供了可靠工具。

composition (组成成分): [{"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus acidophilus", "strain_id": "Not specified"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus reuteri", "strain_id": "Not specified"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus salivarius", "strain_id": "Not specified"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Bifidobacterium animalis ssp. animalis", "strain_id": "Not specified"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Enterococcus faecium", "strain_id": "Not specified"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus thermotolerans", "strain_id": "Not specified"}]
C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal pH 5.0–6.5; tolerant to bile and acid; mesophilic; grows in presence of oxygen in early gut sections
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Growth rate not quantified; colonisation increases from beak to colon; CFU levels reach 10^4–10^8 CFU/ml in small intestine, 10^10–10^13 CFU/ml in colon and caecum
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Intestinal epithelium (enterocyte, caecal, colonic surfaces); mucus layer; feed particle surfaces
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competes with pathogens for adhesion sites and nutrients; suppresses pathogenic bacteria (e.g., Salmonella, E. coli, Campylobacter); enhances gut barrier function; modulates immune system
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to bile, acid, thermal processing; stable during industrial processing; survives in feed and drinking water
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Bile salts, acid (pH 5.0–6.5), heat (during feed processing)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Lactobacillus and Bifidobacterium species are facultative anaerobes that thrive in the poultry gastrointestinal tract, particularly in the small intestine and colon. They exhibit acid and bile tolerance, enabling survival through the proventriculus and duodenum. These strains colonize the intestinal epithelium and mucus layer, with highest densities in the caecum and colon. They are stable during feed and water administration and maintain viability under industrial processing conditions.
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Not specified
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): Genetic stability required; no plasmid-linked antibiotic resistance; lack of virulence determinants; strain-specific stability in gut environment
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in feed and drinking water; compatible with oral delivery systems
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): No genetic engineering is described in the paper. Probiotic strains are selected based on natural physiological traits such as acid and bile tolerance, adhesion capacity, antimicrobial production, and safety profile. Strains are used in their native form without genetic modification.
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): FNR promoter (hypoxia), pH-responsive promoters, bile salt hydrolase (BSH), adhesion receptors (e.g., mucus-binding proteins)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Not specified; likely constitutive or environment-responsive without complex logic gates
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): Probiotic strains sense environmental cues such as low pH and bile in the upper gut, and hypoxia in the lower gut. They respond by enhancing adhesion, acid production, and antimicrobial secretion. The sensing is primarily based on natural physiological adaptation rather than engineered logic circuits.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Bacteriocin secretion via general secretion pathway; lactic acid and H2O2 released passively; mucus and SCFAs secreted via membrane transporters
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent; controlled by administration frequency and concentration in feed/water; no engineered feedback control
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with feed and drinking water delivery; stable in liquid and dry feed matrices
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Production of lactic acid, hydrogen peroxide, bacteriocins (e.g., acidophilin, lactocidin, acidolin), and antimicrobial peptides; competition for adhesion sites and nutrients; inhibition of pathogen colonization
E_A_agent_material (抗菌因子_相关物质): Lactic acid, hydrogen peroxide, bacteriocins (acidophilin, lactocidin, acidolin, lactolin, nisin, diplococcin), antimicrobial peptides
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): Probiotics inhibit a broad range of pathogens including Salmonella, E. coli, Campylobacter, Clostridium, and Listeria. They reduce pathogen colonization through competitive exclusion and antimicrobial production. No evidence of excessive tissue damage or microbiome disruption; localized action in gut.
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Stimulates immune system via enhancement of innate immunity; upregulates MUC2 gene expression; increases goblet cell number; enhances phagocytic activity; increases CD4+ and CD25+ T lymphocytes and NK cell activity; modulates toll-like receptor signaling
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): MUC2 mucin, cytokines (e.g., IL-10, TNF-α), TLR ligands, NK cell activators
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Enhances intestinal barrier function by increasing mucus production (MUC2), stabilizing tight junctions (ZO-1, occludin), restoring cytoskeleton architecture, and promoting epithelial cell survival
E_D_repair_material (修复因子_相关物质): MUC2 mucin, ZO-1, occludin, actin, cytoskeletal proteins
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Ferments carbohydrates and proteins to produce short-chain fatty acids (SCFAs: acetate, lactate, succinate), which are absorbed and used as energy sources; reduces toxic metabolites (ammonia, phenols, amines); enhances nutrient absorption and digestion
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): No engineered kill switches; relies on natural attenuation and elimination after supplementation stops
B_containment_material (生物安全_相关物质): None (natural strains, no auxotrophy or inducible systems)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no virulence determinants; no plasmid-linked antibiotic resistance; low risk of horizontal gene transfer; non-opportunistic; safe for poultry and human consumption
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Physical barrier provided by intestinal mucosa and host immune system; no engineered physical confinement
B_risk_desc (风险描述): All listed probiotic strains are considered safe for poultry and humans. They are non-pathogenic, lack virulence genes, and do not carry antibiotic resistance genes on plasmids. They are naturally eliminated from the gut after supplementation ends, minimizing environmental escape risk. No engineered biocontainment is used, but natural attenuation ensures safety.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): Probiotics improve feed conversion, enhance growth performance, reduce colonization of enteric pathogens (e.g., Salmonella, E. coli), strengthen intestinal barrier function, increase mucus production, stimulate immune responses, and promote nutrient absorption. They are effective as prophylactic agents in poultry production systems without antibiotic use.

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): pH 3.20 ± 0.03, 4°C storage, 37°C culture in DMEM with 10% FBS, 5% CO2

C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Modulates gut microbiota, improves intestinal barrier function, reduces endotoxemia

C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Blueberry juice (pH 3.2) and refrigeration (4°C)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该益生菌混合物在酸性蓝莓汁中具有良好的存活能力，可在4°C下稳定保存24小时，其活菌数在6–12小时内维持在5.9×10⁷至6.3×10⁷ CFU/mL，24小时后增至5.2×10⁸ CFU/mL，表明其在模拟肠道环境和储存条件下具有较强的生理适应性。

G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 该系统未进行基因工程改造，益生菌以天然菌株形式使用，通过其固有代谢功能发挥治疗作用，未涉及人工调控回路或基因编辑。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Not specified (natural sensing via membrane receptors and metabolic pathways)

E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Not specified (likely via natural secretion or cell lysis)

E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): 益生菌通过调节肠道菌群，减少内毒素血症，激活IL-22信号通路，抑制炎症反应，促进抗炎因子表达。
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): 通过激活JAK1/STAT3信号通路，抑制BAX介导的肝细胞凋亡，促进肝细胞存活与修复，减轻脂肪变性和炎症损伤。
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): 蓝莓中的多酚类物质（如花青素）与益生菌协同作用，降低肝细胞内甘油三酯和胆固醇积累，改善脂质代谢紊乱。
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Auxotrophy (inferred from natural probiotic strains)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no horizontal gene transfer evidence; low risk of environmental escape due to gut-restricted colonization
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Physical confinement via oral gavage and intestinal retention
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 该益生菌混合物为公认安全（GRAS）菌株，无致病性，不携带耐药基因，且在肠道内定植，不易逃逸至环境，具有良好的生物安全性。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在体外和体内模型中，蓝莓-益生菌联合治疗显著减少肝细胞脂滴积累，降低血清ALT、AST、TG、TC、LDL水平，提高HDL水平，改善肝组织病理学改变（HE和ORO染色），降低NAS评分。IL-22基因沉默后，上述治疗效果被显著削弱，表明其疗效依赖于IL-22介导的JAK1/STAT3/BAX信号通路。

healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在出生至48个月的随访中，孕期和婴儿期补充Lactobacillus GG可显著降低特应性皮炎（AE）的发生风险（OR=0.31，P=0.013）。同时，增加维生素A、钙和锌的摄入可进一步降低AE风险。补充组儿童在48个月时身高和体重-身高比无显著差异，表明其生长发育正常，安全性良好。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Grown in YPD broth (yeast extract 1%, peptone 2%, dextrose 2%) at 37°C for 24 h; optimal growth temperature 37°C, pH neutral; nutritional requirements include carbon (dextrose), nitrogen (peptone), and vitamins/minerals from yeast extract.

E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): 显著减轻肠道组织损伤，保护肠绒毛结构，减少黏膜侵蚀和水肿，维持上皮完整性。

healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在小鼠肠梗阻模型中，无论活菌还是灭活菌，均显著降低细菌易位（BT）和肠道通透性，保护肠黏膜结构，减轻组织损伤。活菌可显著提升sIgA水平，而灭活菌在免疫调节（IL-10上调）和屏障保护方面同样有效。

C_growth_desc (生长描述): Bacteroides spp. are strict anaerobes with no adaptation to aerobic environments. They are vertically transmitted from mother to offspring and efficiently colonize the intestinal tract after a single dose. Their ecological strategy relies on host adaptation and high colonization capacity rather than environmental persistence. They thrive in the anaerobic, nutrient-rich gut environment and are not dependent on external environmental supply.

B_risk_desc (风险描述): Bacteroides spp. are core members of the human and animal gut microbiota, selected over millions of years for host compatibility. They are not opportunistic pathogens and do not require engineered containment. Their natural ecology ensures safety, and they are unlikely to cause harm even if introduced into a new host. No evidence of virulence or antibiotic resistance genes is reported.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): Bacteroides spp. efficiently colonize the intestinal tract after a single dose, particularly in young animals or post-dysbiosis recovery. They contribute to metabolic regulation, immunomodulation, and tissue repair, supporting gut homeostasis and resilience. Their long-term persistence after one administration makes them highly effective for restoring gut microbiota balance without repeated dosing.
