C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该菌株为健康人体皮肤表面常见的凝固酶阴性葡萄球菌（CoNS），在正常皮肤微环境中具有良好的定植能力，可在37℃、中性至弱碱性pH条件下生长，利用葡萄糖和氨基酸作为碳源，具有中等生长速率，可在体外稳定维持，且对干燥、轻微紫外线和剪切力具有较强耐受性，适合在皮肤表面长期定植。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Not specified
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High chromosomal stability; no plasmid-based systems reported; low metabolic burden; no evidence of drift in clinical settings
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in skin surface microenvironment without structural disruption
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 该系统未使用基因工程改造，天然存在的CoNS菌株通过其固有代谢和分泌功能发挥保护作用，无需外源调控元件，具有良好的体内稳定性。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): FNR-like regulatory systems (inferred), quorum sensing receptors (e.g., Agr system homologs)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Threshold-based competition logic: suppresses S. aureus only when CoNS reaches sufficient density; no explicit AND/OR gates reported
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 该系统通过感知局部微生物密度和宿主免疫状态（如Th2细胞因子水平）进行响应，当CoNS菌群达到一定丰度时，启动对金黄色葡萄球菌的抑制机制，体现为密度依赖性竞争调控，具有天然的阈值响应能力，可有效避免过度激活。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Type I secretion system (for AMPs)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Density-dependent; self-regulated by population size and environmental cues
E_material_match (材料匹配性): High compatibility with skin surface microenvironment; does not disrupt epithelial integrity or cause gel collapse
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Produces antimicrobial peptides (AMPs) such as epidermin and lantibiotics that inhibit S. aureus survival and biofilm formation
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 在健康皮肤中，CoNS菌株可有效抑制金黄色葡萄球菌定植和生物膜形成，且不引起明显炎症反应，表明其活性可控且局部安全。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Modulates immune responses by suppressing Th2-mediated inflammation, enhancing Treg cell activity, and reducing IL-4/IL-13 signaling
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Natural auxotrophy (no artificial kill switches)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Non-pathogenic; low opportunistic risk; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no evidence of horizontal gene transfer; minimal environmental escape potential
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Skin epithelial barrier provides effective physical confinement
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 该菌株为健康人体皮肤正常菌群成员，无致病性记录，不携带抗生素抗性基因，不引起机会性感染，且依赖特定营养物质生长，具有天然生物安全屏障，适合用于皮肤微生态修复。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 临床试验显示，应用有益CoNS菌株可显著减少特应性皮炎患者皮肤中金黄色葡萄球菌的定植，降低皮肤炎症水平，改善临床症状，提示其在调节皮肤微生态和缓解过敏性疾病方面具有显著疗效。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Marine environment, temperature range not specified, pH neutral (oceanic), osmotic tolerance to seawater salinity, carbon source likely organic matter from host cell lysis
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Not specified (viral replication cycle inferred from host infection dynamics)
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Marine surface photic zone, associated with microalgae (e.g., Phaeocystis globosa, Chrysochromulina ericina) and microflagellate grazers
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Parasitic on eukaryotic unicellular protists; potential for virophage co-infection (e.g., Sputnik-like virophages); no evidence of symbiosis or competition with bacterial microbiome
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerance to marine environmental stresses (UV, salinity, temperature fluctuations); stable in filtered seawater samples stored at -80°C
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): DNA repair proteins (e.g., MutS), capsid structure
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该系统为海洋巨病毒，主要感染微藻和原生动物，其生长依赖于宿主细胞，通过裂解宿主释放子代病毒颗粒。在海洋环境中，其稳定性高，可在过滤后的颗粒物中长期保存，适应海水的盐度、pH和温度波动。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): PCR-based amplification, degenerate primers, pyrosequencing
G_edit_efficiency (编辑效率): Not applicable (natural viral genome, no genetic modification)
G_circuit_control (回路控制): Constitutive (viral gene expression during infection cycle)
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High (viral genome stable in environmental samples; MutS8 clade conserved across isolates)
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Compatible with environmental DNA extraction and PCR amplification from filters
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 本研究未对病毒进行基因工程改造，而是基于MutS8基因开发特异性PCR引物，用于检测和系统发育分析海洋中的巨病毒。通过设计混合反向引物和简并正向引物，实现对多种巨病毒的扩增，具有良好的特异性和稳定性。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): MutS protein (domain V, ABC ATPase motif)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Not applicable (no synthetic circuit; natural viral infection cycle driven by host cell entry and replication)
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 该系统无人工逻辑控制模块，其感染行为由宿主细胞的生理状态和病毒基因组的自然表达程序驱动。MutS蛋白作为DNA错配修复酶，可能在病毒基因组复制过程中感知复制错误，但未见明确的信号感应与逻辑处理机制。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Lysis (host cell rupture)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Not controllable (natural infection cycle)
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with environmental DNA extraction and PCR amplification from 0.2 μm filters
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): 通过裂解宿主细胞（如微藻）释放子代病毒颗粒，实现对宿主种群的清除，具有广谱抗原生生物活性。
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 该病毒通过裂解微藻宿主实现清除，对多种微藻具有感染能力，但未评估其对非目标生物或生物膜的影响，且无可控性设计。
E_B_crit_evidence (标准B_依据): 该系统不涉及氧气生成或代谢调节功能。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): 未检测到免疫调节因子分泌。
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): 无组织修复因子分泌。
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): 未检测到代谢物调节功能。
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Natural attenuation in marine environment; no engineered kill switches
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity to humans; opportunistic pathogen of Acanthamoeba; no known antibiotic resistance genes; horizontal gene transfer potential via transduction; environmental escape likely but limited by host specificity
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Physical confinement via filtration (0.2 μm) and storage at -80°C
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 该系统为天然海洋巨病毒，对人类无致病性，主要感染微藻和原生动物，不具有广泛传播能力。其基因组稳定，无抗生素抗性基因，但可通过转导介导基因水平转移。在实验中通过过滤和低温保存实现物理隔离，风险较低。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 该研究未评估治疗效果，而是开发了基于MutS8基因的分子诊断工具，用于检测和分析海洋中巨病毒的多样性与分布。在缅因州海岸水样中成功扩增出550 bp的MutS8片段，揭示了多个新发现的病毒类群，表明该标记在揭示巨病毒生态分布方面具有潜力。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 6.5–7.0; tolerant to bile acids and low pH; utilizes various carbohydrates including lactose, fructose, and raffinose; dependent on host-derived nutrients in vivo
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~2–3 hours in vitro; in vivo colonization stable over time with sustained presence in intestinal and tumor niches
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gastrointestinal tract (especially colon), hypoxic tumor core after systemic translocation
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Symbiotic with host microbiota; competes with pathogens like Gram-negative bacteria; no significant disruption of native microbiome reported
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Moderate tolerance to osmotic stress and bile; limited UV and drying resistance; lyophilization stability reported for some strains
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Bile acids, raffinose, osmotic agents
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Bifidobacterium longum is a facultative anaerobe that thrives in the human gut and can translocate from the gastrointestinal tract to solid tumors. It grows optimally at 37°C and pH 6.5–7.0, utilizing various carbohydrates. It exhibits tolerance to bile and low pH, enabling survival in the intestinal environment. Its ability to colonize hypoxic tumor regions after oral administration makes it a promising chassis for targeted delivery. It maintains stability in vivo and shows minimal disruption to the host microbiome.
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Electroporation, CRISPR-Cas (implied), plasmid-based transformation, suicide vectors, in vitro methylation of plasmids
G_edit_efficiency (编辑效率): Low to moderate; transformation efficiencies typically 10²–10⁴ CFU/μg DNA; improved to ~10⁷ CFU/μg in B. breve UCC2003 via methylation of plasmids in E. coli expressing B. breve methyltransferases
G_circuit_control (回路控制): Constitutive (P_hup, P_gap, P_amy, P_16S), inducible (P_raf, bile-inducible, arabinose-inducible P_BAD), logic gates not reported
G_circuit_inducer_material (电路调控_相关物质): Raffinose, bile acids, arabinose, iron (inferred from microarray study)
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): Plasmid stability varies; pTB6, pMB1, pMG1, pBC1 replicons show stable maintenance; chromosomal integration possible but inefficient; metabolic burden observed; long-term in vivo consistency not fully established
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in gel-like matrices and encapsulated delivery systems; no evidence of degradation or loss of function in material environment
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): Genetic engineering of Bifidobacterium longum relies on electroporation and shuttle vectors derived from native plasmids (e.g., pTB6, pMB1, pMG1, pBC1). Promoters such as P_hup and P_gap are used for constitutive expression, while bile- and raffinose-inducible systems allow controlled expression. Methylation of plasmids in E. coli expressing host-specific methyltransferases significantly improves transformation efficiency. Despite progress, transformation remains inefficient in most strains, limiting targeted mutagenesis. Non-antibiotic selection markers (e.g., levansucrase) are being explored to overcome safety and regulatory concerns.
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): P_raf (α-galactosidase promoter), bile-inducible promoter (P_bile), P_BAD (araC-P_BAD system), P_16S rRNA promoter
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): AND gate implied: bile + raffinose induction; threshold-based repression by glucose; no reported noise suppression or dynamic range tuning
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): Bifidobacterium longum can sense environmental cues such as bile acids and raffinose via specific promoters (e.g., bile-inducible and P_raf). The P_raf promoter is induced by raffinose and repressed by glucose, enabling a form of metabolic logic. The arabinose-inducible P_BAD system allows external control, though its use is limited to strains capable of arabinose metabolism. These systems provide basic on/off control, but advanced logic circuits (e.g., AND/OR gates) have not been implemented. Sensing is coupled with material permeability through diffusion of small molecules like bile and sugars.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Type I secretion (Sec pathway), lysis, surface display (limited)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Controlled by promoter strength and inducible systems (e.g., bile, raffinose); dosage not precisely tunable in vivo
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with encapsulation in hydrogels and oral delivery matrices; secretion via Sec pathway allows release into surrounding environment
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Not applicable; no direct antibacterial activity reported
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 无直接抗菌或抗生物膜功能
E_B_mechanism_desc (产氧机制描述): Not applicable; no oxygen-producing enzymes reported
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Expression of human interleukin 10 (IL-10), TNF-related apoptosis-inducing ligand (TRAIL), and endostatin modulates immune responses, promoting anti-inflammatory and anti-tumor immunity
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Not applicable; no direct tissue repair factors reported
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Production of SCFAs (e.g., acetate, lactate) and modulation of host metabolism via secreted enzymes (e.g., cholesterol oxidase) influence host metabolic homeostasis
E_F_mechanism_desc (肿瘤治疗描述): Selective colonization of solid tumors; delivery of prodrug-converting enzymes (e.g., cytosine deaminase), tumor antigens, and therapeutic proteins (e.g., endostatin, TRAIL) for localized cancer therapy
E_F_agent_material (治疗制剂_相关物质): Cytosine deaminase, endostatin, TRAIL, tumor antigens
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Auxotrophy (implied), suicide vectors (used in mutagenesis), non-antibiotic selection markers (levansucrase, glucosamine synthase)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Non-pathogenic; no known virulence factors; low risk of horizontal gene transfer; antibiotic resistance genes avoided via non-antibiotic markers; no environmental escape reported
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Physical confinement via encapsulation prevents systemic spread; oral delivery limits exposure
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Bifidobacterium longum is classified as GRAS and has a long history of safe use in infant formulas and probiotics. It lacks lipopolysaccharides and does not cause disease. Genetic modifications use non-antibiotic selection markers to avoid resistance gene transfer. Encapsulation provides physical containment. No evidence of pathogenicity or environmental escape. Overall, biosafety risk is very low.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): B. longum UCC2003 successfully colonized tumors after oral administration, achieving levels comparable to intravenous delivery. Recombinant strains expressing IL-10, TRAIL, and endostatin showed anti-tumor effects in animal models. Oral delivery of engineered strains enabled systemic targeting without severe side effects. However, protein expression levels remain low, limiting therapeutic potency. Further optimization of promoters and copy number is needed to enhance efficacy.

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Temperature: 25–37°C; pH: 6.0–8.0; Nutritional requirements: Complex medium with carbon sources (e.g., glucose, peptone), nitrogen, minerals; Osmotic tolerance: Moderate; Bile tolerance: Not specified
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time: ~20–30 min in rich medium; In vitro growth well-characterized; In vivo stability not reported
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gut lumen, mucosal surfaces (probiotic niche); Not specified for therapeutic delivery
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Probiotic interaction; No significant competition or pathogenicity reported; Compatible with host microbiota
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): High resistance to heat (up to 80°C), UV, drying, organic solvents, extreme pH; Stable during storage and rehydration
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Spore coat proteins (e.g., CotG, CotA), cortex, exosporium
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Bacillus subtilis is a Gram-positive, facultative anaerobic bacterium with a robust sporulation capability. It grows rapidly in rich media, forms highly stable endospores under nutrient stress, and exhibits excellent resistance to environmental stresses. Its spores are non-pathogenic, GRAS-status, and suitable for oral delivery. The spore structure provides intrinsic stability and protection for immobilized enzymes.
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): CRISPR-Cas9 (implied via plasmid-based engineering), Recombination (homologous double-crossover), Plasmid transformation (pHS, pDHAFB, pCotG-LacZ)
G_edit_efficiency (编辑效率): High efficiency in spore coat protein fusion; Successful expression in multiple strains (DB104, WB700, DB403); Low off-target risk due to targeted integration
G_circuit_control (回路控制): Constitutive (CotG promoter-driven expression); No inducible systems reported
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High chromosomal integration stability; Plasmid pHS is high-copy number but stable in sporulation; No significant drift reported; Long-term in vivo consistency not assessed
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): High stability within spore matrix; Enzyme remains functional after encapsulation and re-use
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): Genetic engineering involves fusing target enzymes (e.g., β-galactosidase, chitinase, nitrilase) to spore coat proteins like CotG via recombinant plasmids. The CotG promoter drives constitutive expression during sporulation, resulting in in situ enzyme display on the spore surface. This method ensures high retention and stability of the enzyme without leakage.
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): CotG promoter (responsive to sporulation signals), Spore coat proteins (CotG, CotB, CotC)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Constitutive expression; No complex logic gates reported; Thresholds not defined; No noise suppression mechanisms described
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): The system relies on constitutive expression of the enzyme during sporulation, driven by the CotG promoter. No environmental sensing or dynamic regulation is involved. The enzyme is displayed on the spore surface as a result of developmental programming, not external stimuli.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): In situ surface display during sporulation; No lysis or secretion systems used
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Controlled by spore concentration and enzyme expression level; No dynamic feedback or tunable output
E_material_match (材料匹配性): High compatibility with spore matrix; Enzymes remain stable and active within the spore coat; No structural disruption observed
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Not applicable
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): Not applicable
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Not applicable
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Not applicable
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Not applicable
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Auxotrophy (implied by sporulation requirement); No kill-switch reported
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; No antibiotic resistance genes reported; No horizontal gene transfer risk in non-pathogenic strains; Environmental escape unlikely due to poor survival outside host
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Spore coat and exosporium provide physical confinement; Resistant to gastric degradation
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Bacillus subtilis spores are widely recognized as safe (GRAS) and non-pathogenic. They are used in probiotics and food applications. The system does not involve pathogenic strains or antibiotic resistance genes. Spore formation acts as a natural containment mechanism. The physical barrier of the spore coat protects the enzyme and limits unintended release.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): Spore-immobilized enzymes show enhanced thermal and pH stability, reusability (up to 10 cycles), and resistance to organic solvents. For example, spore-displayed β-galactosidase retained >45% activity after 2 hours at 40°C, while free enzyme was inactivated. Nitrilase retained >60% activity at 85°C for 60 min. These properties enable efficient enzyme delivery and sustained catalytic activity in harsh environments, making them ideal for therapeutic and industrial applications.

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Growth at 37–39°C, pH 6.10, in reconstituted skim milk with yeast extract and glucose (Bb1); in 10% reconstituted skim milk with sodium glycerophosphate (St10)
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Not explicitly reported; cultures incubated for 16–24 h prior to drying
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Human intestine (implied by probiotic use)
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Typical probiotic strains; no direct interaction data reported
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Moderate tolerance to drying stress; survival decreases with increasing air temperature during drying
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): None explicitly identified
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Bifidobacterium infantis and Streptococcus thermophilus are probiotic bacteria commonly used in dairy products. They grow under controlled conditions (37–39°C, pH 6.10) in milk-based media. Their viability is significantly reduced during drying, especially at high air temperatures (≥90°C), indicating sensitivity to thermal and dehydration stress.
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): No genetic engineering was performed. The study focused on the inactivation kinetics of naturally occurring probiotic strains during drying, without any synthetic genetic circuits or modifications.
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): None explicitly identified
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): None
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): No sensing or logic modules were engineered. The study analyzed natural responses of bacteria to drying-induced stress (temperature and water content changes), not engineered signal processing.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): None
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): None
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Encapsulated in milk droplets; survival depends on drying conditions
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Not applicable
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): Not applicable
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Not applicable
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Not applicable
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Not applicable
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no horizontal gene transfer risk mentioned
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Physical confinement via milk droplet encapsulation
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Bifidobacterium infantis and Streptococcus thermophilus are generally recognized as safe (GRAS) probiotics. No genetic modifications were made, and no biocontainment strategies were employed. The primary risk is loss of viability during drying, not biological hazard.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): The study did not evaluate therapeutic or healing outcomes. It focused on inactivation kinetics during drying, showing that survival of both strains decreases significantly with increasing air temperature, with near-complete inactivation at 110°C after 180 seconds.

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): 37°C, aerobic and anaerobic conditions, MRS agar medium, growth in vitro
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time not specified; growth observed within 24–48 h in vitro
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gut mucosa (intestinal lumen)
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of pathogenic Gram-positive cocci (staphylococci, streptococci), suppression of fungi; promotes beneficial Lactobacillus and Bifidobacterium spp.
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Lyophilized form stable; viability confirmed post-thaw; tolerance to gastric conditions not explicitly stated
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Cell wall components (implied by survival in gut environment)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该菌株为乳杆菌属，可在37°C下在MRS培养基上生长，属于兼性厌氧菌，能定植于小鼠肠道，具有良好的耐受性，可在体外稳定保存。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Not specified
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): Not specified
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Not specified
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 该研究未对L. casei IMV B-7280进行基因改造，其功能基于天然代谢特性，未使用任何遗传工具进行工程化设计。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Bile salt hydrolase (BSH) enzyme (inferred from cholesterol-lowering mechanism)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Not specified
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 该菌株通过感知胆汁酸和胆固醇水平，激活其代谢通路，实现对胆固醇的降解与结合，但未描述明确的逻辑门控机制。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Not specified
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Oral administration at 1×10⁶ cells per animal daily for 7 days
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Suspension in PBS; compatible with oral delivery
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Not applicable
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 未涉及抗菌或抗生物膜功能。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): 调节免疫反应，诱导多种细胞因子，改善肠道免疫稳态，减少炎症反应。
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): 恢复肥胖小鼠肝脏组织结构，减轻肝细胞脂肪变性和坏死，促进肝组织修复。
E_D_repair_material (修复因子_相关物质): Hepatocyte regeneration factors (inferred from histological recovery)
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): 通过胆盐水解酶（BSH）降解胆汁酸，直接结合胆固醇，调节胆固醇代谢，降低血清总胆固醇和游离胆固醇水平。
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Not applicable
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): No pathogenicity reported; no antibiotic resistance genes mentioned; low risk of horizontal gene transfer; no environmental escape reported
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Oral delivery with natural gut colonization; no physical barrier used
B_risk_desc (风险描述): L. casei IMV B-7280为公认安全（GRAS）菌株，无致病性，无耐药基因，无基因水平转移风险，适合用于代谢疾病干预。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): L. casei IMV B-7280显著降低肥胖小鼠体重、血清胆固醇水平，改善肝脏形态，恢复肝组织结构，促进肠道有益菌群（Lactobacillus和Bifidobacterium）增殖，抑制有害菌和真菌，具有显著的代谢调节和组织修复作用。

E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): 有效恢复肥胖小鼠肝脏组织结构，显著减轻肝细胞脂肪变性和坏死，促进肝组织修复。

composition (组成成分): [{"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Bifidobacterium", "strain_id": "Bifidobacterium bifidum, Bifidobacterium longum, Bifidobacterium lactis, Bifidobacterium breve"}]
C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Anaerobic environment; grows in gut lumen; requires complex nutrients including carbohydrates and amino acids
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Not explicitly quantified; established colonization after oral gavage with 1×10⁹ cfu/mouse; persistence in gut microbiota post-administration
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Intestinal lumen, particularly mucosal surface of colon; associated with gut immune homeostasis
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competes with pathogenic bacteria; restores dysbiotic microbiota after vancomycin treatment; may modulate host immune response via cross-talk with immune cells
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Lyophilized form stable; survives gastric transit and intestinal environment; tolerance to bile and low pH not explicitly stated but implied by probiotic use
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Lyophilization (freeze-drying) for storage stability
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Bifidobacterium 是一种革兰氏阳性、专性厌氧的益生菌，主要定植于肠道黏膜表面，通过调节宿主免疫系统来缓解免疫病理损伤。其在口服给药后可有效定植并维持一定水平，尤其在抗生素诱导的菌群失调后表现出显著的恢复能力。
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 该研究未对Bifidobacterium进行基因改造，其功能依赖于天然菌株的生理特性，通过口服给药实现定植与免疫调节作用，无外源基因插入或合成回路设计。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Not specified; likely endogenous receptors for SCFAs (e.g., GPR41/GPR43) and bile acid sensors
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No synthetic logic gates; natural sensing of metabolic and inflammatory signals with threshold-dependent immune modulation
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): Bifidobacterium通过感知肠道微环境中的短链脂肪酸（SCFAs）和胆汁酸等代谢物，以及宿主释放的炎症因子（如IL-6、KC、CSF3），激活免疫调节通路。其响应具有阈值特性，仅在免疫失衡状态下发挥调节作用，避免过度激活。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Passive secretion of metabolites (e.g., SCFAs); no engineered secretion system
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Oral gavage at 300 μL containing 1×10⁹ cfu/mouse; dosage not dynamically controlled
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with oral delivery; survives gastrointestinal transit; no encapsulation material used
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Bifidobacterium ameliorates intestinal immunopathology by enhancing regulatory T cell (Treg) function, particularly in the context of CTLA-4 blockade. It does not increase Treg cell numbers but enhances their metabolic fitness and suppressive capacity.
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): Regulatory T cells (Treg) - functional enhancement via metabolic reprogramming
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (natural probiotic strain; no synthetic kill switches or auxotrophy)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no evidence of horizontal gene transfer; safe for human use in clinical settings
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): None (oral delivery without physical barrier)
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Bifidobacterium 属于公认安全（GRAS）菌株，广泛用于益生菌制剂，无致病性、无耐药基因，且在动物实验中未观察到系统性感染或生态位入侵，安全性高。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在抗CTLA-4抗体联合DSS诱导的结肠炎模型中，Bifidobacterium治疗显著减轻体重下降（从75%恢复至95%初始体重），降低组织病理评分，减少炎症细胞浸润和血清炎症因子（KC、IL-6、CSF3）水平。更重要的是，该治疗不影响抗肿瘤免疫应答，B16F10黑色素瘤生长速率与对照组无显著差异，表明其可有效缓解免疫病理损伤而不削弱抗肿瘤疗效。

composition (组成成分): [{"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus spp.", "strain_id": "Not specified"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Bifidobacterium spp.", "strain_id": "Not specified"}, {"role": "Helper", "scientific_name": "Streptococcus thermophilus", "strain_id": "Not specified"}]
C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 6.0–7.0; tolerates moderate osmotic stress; requires fermentable carbohydrates and amino acids for growth
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~1–2 hours in vitro; in vivo colonization observed in gut mucosa with stable persistence over weeks
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Intestinal mucosa, particularly colon and ileum; preferentially colonizes mucus layer and epithelial surfaces
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of pathogenic bacteria; synergistic interaction with host immune system; supports SCFA-producing commensals
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Moderate tolerance to gastric acid and bile; stable during lyophilization and rehydration; resistant to shear stress in suspension
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Cell wall components (e.g., peptidoglycan), exopolysaccharides (EPS), and intracellular antioxidants
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Lactobacillus and Bifidobacterium strains are facultative anaerobes that thrive in the human gut environment, utilizing dietary fibers and host-derived glycans. They exhibit robust growth under physiological conditions and maintain stability in the intestinal mucosa, contributing to gut barrier integrity and immune modulation.
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Plasmid-based expression systems (e.g., pSMB1), CRISPR-Cas9 for gene knockouts
G_edit_efficiency (编辑效率): High efficiency (>90%) in Lactobacillus; low off-target risk due to minimal genome plasticity
G_circuit_control (回路控制): Constitutive expression of beneficial enzymes; inducible promoters (e.g., lactose-inducible) used in experimental models
G_circuit_inducer_material (电路调控_相关物质): Lactose, xylose, or IPTG (in engineered strains)
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High plasmid stability (copy number 1–5); chromosomal integration used for long-term expression; minimal metabolic burden; stable in vivo over 4–6 weeks
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Genetic circuits remain functional in encapsulated formulations (e.g., alginate beads) and fermented dairy matrices
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): Genetic modifications include deletion of urease and tryptophanase genes to reduce uremic toxin production, and insertion of genes for SCFA biosynthesis (e.g., butyrate kinase). These strains are engineered to enhance colonization and metabolic activity in the CKD gut environment.
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): FNR promoter (hypoxia), Lactose permease (glucose), Tryptophanase promoter (tryptophan/IS), Quorum-sensing receptors (LasR, LuxR)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): AND gate: requires both low pH and high lactate for activation; threshold-based response to urea; noise suppression via feedback inhibition
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): The microbial consortium senses multiple environmental cues: low pH and high lactate indicate inflamed or dysbiotic gut; urea and IS levels signal CKD progression. An AND gate ensures activation only when multiple disease markers are present, minimizing off-target activity. Feedback loops regulate enzyme expression to prevent overproduction and maintain homeostasis.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Type IV secretion system (T4SS), vesicles (outer membrane vesicles), lysis
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Tunable via inducible promoters; output strength modulated by nutrient availability and host signals
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with alginate, chitosan, and fermented dairy matrices; permeability allows SCFA and cytokine diffusion
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Production of bacteriocins (e.g., lactocin, bifidocin) and organic acids (lactic, acetic) that inhibit pathogenic bacteria and disrupt biofilm matrix
E_A_agent_material (抗菌因子_相关物质): Bacteriocins (lactocin, bifidocin), lactic acid, acetic acid
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): In vitro studies show inhibition of S. aureus, P. aeruginosa, and E. coli; no significant cytotoxicity to human intestinal cells; no disruption of gel matrix in encapsulated formulations
E_B_crit_evidence (标准B_依据): No oxygen-producing mechanism reported; not applicable
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Secretion of IL-10 and TGF-β; downregulation of NF-κB and MAPK pathways; inhibition of pro-inflammatory cytokines (TNF-α, IL-6)
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Stimulation of epithelial cell proliferation and migration; enhancement of tight junction proteins (occludin, claudin-1); promotion of collagen synthesis and angiogenesis
E_D_repair_material (修复因子_相关物质): Epidermal growth factor (EGF), Vascular endothelial growth factor (VEGF), Tissue inhibitor of metalloproteinases (TIMP-1)
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Production of short-chain fatty acids (SCFAs: acetate, propionate, butyrate); reduction of uremic toxins (IS, PCS) via metabolic degradation; modulation of tryptophan and phenylalanine metabolism
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Auxotrophy (e.g., leucine auxotrophy), kill-switch (caspase-3 inducible under high urea)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no known antibiotic resistance genes; no evidence of horizontal gene transfer; low environmental escape risk due to auxotrophy
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Physical confinement in encapsulated beads or dairy matrix prevents systemic dissemination
B_risk_desc (风险描述): The microbial consortium is composed of GRAS strains with well-documented safety profiles. Genetic modifications include auxotrophy and kill-switches to prevent persistence in non-target environments. No evidence of virulence or antibiotic resistance. Physical encapsulation ensures localized delivery and containment.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): Clinical trials show significant reduction in plasma IS (28%), PCS (14%), and inflammatory markers (IL-6, TNF-α). In experimental models, improved gut barrier function, reduced fibrosis, and delayed GFR decline. In CKD patients, enhanced nutritional status and reduced oxidative stress. Long-term use associated with improved quality of life and reduced hospitalization for sepsis.

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Microaerophilic conditions (5% CO2, 37°C) in MRS broth; grows in early stationary phase at OD495 = 2.0 × 10^8 CFU/mL
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Growth rate not explicitly quantified; cultivated to early stationary phase for experiments
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Subgingival biofilm environment (oral mucosa, gingival epithelium)
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competes with Porphyromonas gingivalis for adhesion sites; may alter local microbiome balance
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to host glycan-rich, low-oxygen subgingival environment; stability in vitro under standard culture conditions
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): None specified
C_growth_desc (生长描述): L. acidophilus LA-5 is a facultative anaerobe that grows under microaerophilic conditions and can survive in the oxygen-poor, glycan-rich subgingival niche. It maintains viability during co-infection with P. gingivalis and exhibits enhanced adhesion in the presence of the pathogen.
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): None specified
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): Not applicable (no plasmid or chromosomal integration reported)
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Not applicable (no material encapsulation described)
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): No genetic engineering was performed. The strain functions naturally through its intrinsic properties such as adhesion, immune modulation, and competition with pathogens.
S_host_signals (宿主信号): ["Proteases (P. gingivalis gingipains may alter host surface receptors)", "Cytokines (TNF-α, IL-1β, CXCL8)"]
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Surface layer (S-layer) proteins, peptidoglycan, lipoteichoic acid
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No synthetic logic gates; natural sensing via receptor-ligand interactions (e.g., TLR2/4 modulation)
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): L. acidophilus LA-5 senses the host microenvironment through surface molecules like S-layer proteins and peptidoglycan, which interact with host pattern recognition receptors (TLRs). It responds to pathogen presence by modulating TLR4 expression and cytokine production, indicating a natural feedback loop in immune regulation.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): None (no secretion system reported; effects mediated via surface molecules and metabolites)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Not applicable (no controlled release or dosing system described)
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Not applicable (no material encapsulation or delivery system used)
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Reduces adhesion and invasion of P. gingivalis by competing for epithelial receptors and potentially altering pathogen fitness via metabolic byproducts.
E_A_agent_material (抗菌因子_相关物质): None (direct antibacterial activity not reported; effect is indirect via competition and immune modulation)
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): L. acidophilus LA-5 significantly reduced P. gingivalis adhesion and invasion in co-culture with OBA-9 cells, without causing cytotoxicity. It also enhanced host cell viability and did not disrupt the epithelial barrier.
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Downregulates TLR4 expression and reduces synthesis of pro-inflammatory cytokines (TNF-α, IL-1β) while increasing CXCL8 secretion, promoting neutrophil recruitment and resolving inflammation.
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Promotes epithelial cell viability and proliferation; enhances CXCL8 secretion, which supports cell migration and tissue regeneration.
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Not applicable
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (natural strain, no synthetic kill switches or auxotrophy reported)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; GRAS status; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no evidence of horizontal gene transfer; low risk of environmental escape.
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): None (no physical barrier used)
B_risk_desc (风险描述): L. acidophilus LA-5 is a well-characterized, non-pathogenic, GRAS (Generally Recognized As Safe) strain with low risk of adverse effects. It does not possess known virulence factors or antibiotic resistance genes. No synthetic containment systems were used.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): L. acidophilus LA-5 co-infection with P. gingivalis significantly prevented loss of OBA-9 cell viability, reduced pathogen adhesion and invasion, downregulated TLR4 expression, decreased TNF-α and IL-1β levels, and increased CXCL8 secretion. These effects indicate strong immunomodulatory and protective activity in the context of periodontal epithelial defense, suggesting potential for therapeutic use in periodontitis.

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Anaerobic conditions (MRS broth, anaerobic jar with gas pack), 37°C, pH ~6.5–7.0, with L-cysteine and mineral oil for liquid cultures
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Growth rate not explicitly quantified; doubling time not reported; in vitro growth confirmed under anaerobic conditions
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Human intestinal epithelium (Caco-2 cell model), gut mucosal surface
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of VRE; potential synergistic interactions among strains; no direct evidence of symbiosis with host microbiota
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Stable under lyophilization (used in commercial products); tolerance to storage and rehydration not explicitly tested; no data on UV, shear, or osmotic stress
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该四菌株混合物在厌氧条件下于MRS培养基中生长良好，适用于模拟人类肠道环境。Bacillus coagulans 和 Lactobacillus 属菌株均具有良好的体外生长能力，可在肠道模拟环境中抑制VRE的增殖。
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 本研究未对菌株进行基因工程改造，所有功能均依赖于天然代谢与生理特性，未使用CRISPR、质粒或诱导系统。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): FsrABC quorum-sensing system (homologous to Staphylococcus aureus AgrABC)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Coordinated downregulation of multiple virulence genes; potential AND-like logic via quorum-sensing inhibition
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 四菌株混合物通过抑制VRE的FsrABC群体感应系统，协同下调多种黏附相关基因的表达，表现出对宿主环境信号的响应与逻辑调控能力。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Type I/II secretion (bacteriocins), pilus-mediated competition, extracellular vesicles (inferred)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent inhibition observed; efficacy increases with combination ratio
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with suspension in DMEM/MRS; no encapsulation reported
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): 通过竞争性抑制、直接黏附竞争和群体感应干扰，降低VRE在肠道上皮细胞的定植能力。
E_A_agent_material (抗菌因子_相关物质): Bacteriocins, fengycins (from Bacillus coagulans), pilus-mediated competition (LGG)
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 该混合物显著减少VRE在体外共培养中的数量，并抑制其在Caco-2细胞上的黏附，且未观察到对宿主细胞的显著毒性。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Lactobacillus酸化环境，诱导宿主产生抗菌肽LL-37，增强肠道屏障功能。
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): 通过减少病原体黏附和炎症反应，间接促进肠道上皮修复。
E_D_repair_material (修复因子_相关物质): Mucus layer stabilization, epithelial barrier enhancement
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Lactobacillus产生短链脂肪酸（SCFAs），调节肠道微生态平衡，抑制病原体生长。
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (natural strains, no synthetic kill switches)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no evidence of horizontal gene transfer; no environmental escape risk in controlled setting
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): None (no physical confinement used in study)
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 四株菌均为公认安全（GRAS）菌株，未进行基因改造，无致病性或耐药基因风险，适合用于人体肠道定植干预。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 该四菌株混合物在体外显著抑制VRE的增殖，减少其在Caco-2细胞上的黏附，并下调9个黏附相关基因的表达，表明其具有良好的肠道定植抑制与黏膜修复潜力，已进入临床试验阶段（NCT03822819）。

C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time not specified; Temporal colonization observed in healthy volunteers after nasal administration

healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在健康志愿者中，L. casei AMBR2可通过鼻喷雾实现短暂定植，恢复气道上皮屏障功能，抑制病原体黏附，具有潜在的治疗慢性鼻窦炎和过敏性鼻炎的前景。临床研究正在推进中。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 6.5–7.0; utilizes fructose, glucose, and various organic acids as carbon sources; requires vitamins and amino acids for growth.
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~1.5–2 hours in vitro; in vivo stability not explicitly reported, but sustained colonization observed in gut over 3-week treatment.
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gut lumen, particularly colon and small intestine; preferentially colonizes mucosal surfaces in high-fructose environment.
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Modulates gut microbiota composition; may compete with pathogenic bacteria; no evidence of symbiosis with host microbiome.
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to gastric acid (pH 2.0–3.0), bile salts (0.3% bile), and freeze-drying; stable during lyophilization and rehydration.
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Lactose (used as stabilizer in freeze-dried formulation)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该双菌株为兼性厌氧菌，可在37°C、pH 6.5–7.0条件下生长，利用果糖、葡萄糖等碳源，需维生素和氨基酸。在体外培养中倍增时间为1.5–2小时，口服后可在肠道内稳定定植，耐受胃酸和胆盐，冻干后仍保持活性。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Not applicable (natural strains, no genetic modification reported)
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High chromosomal stability; no plasmids reported; no evidence of genetic drift or loss in vivo.
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in freeze-dried formulation with lactose; no degradation during storage.
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 该系统未经过基因工程改造，为天然分离的益生菌株，通过其固有代谢功能发挥治疗作用，无外源基因插入或调控元件。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Fructose transporter (FruA), glucose permease (PtsG), and pH-responsive regulators (e.g., PhoP/PhoR in L. plantarum)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Constitutive expression; no reported logic gates or threshold control; activity driven by substrate availability.
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 菌株通过感知肠道内果糖、葡萄糖等代谢物浓度变化，启动其代谢调控功能，无复杂逻辑门控机制，表现为持续性响应。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Type I secretion (e.g., SCFAs, exopolysaccharides); passive diffusion of metabolites
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent effect: high dose (10¹⁰ cfu/d) more effective than low dose (10⁹ cfu/d); no external control mechanism.
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with freeze-dried formulation; stable in lactose matrix; suitable for oral delivery.
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): N/A
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 未报告抗菌或抗生物膜活性。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Reduces systemic inflammation and oxidative stress; downregulates pro-inflammatory cytokines and enhances antioxidant enzyme activity.
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Improves hepatic lipid metabolism and reduces liver steatosis; promotes β-oxidation and suppresses lipogenesis.
E_D_repair_material (修复因子_相关物质): PPARα, CPT2, CYP7A1 (host gene upregulation via microbial signaling)
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Modulates hepatic lipid metabolism by upregulating β-oxidation genes (PPARα, CPT2) and downregulating lipogenesis genes (SREBP1, FAS, SCD1).
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (natural strains, no kill-switch or auxotrophy reported)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no evidence of horizontal gene transfer; low risk of environmental escape.
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Physical barrier provided by freeze-dried capsule; limited survival in non-gut environments.
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 该双菌株为公认安全（GRAS）菌株，来源于韩国泡菜，无致病性、无耐药基因，未进行基因改造，无生物安全风险，口服后在肠道定植，不易在环境或宿主外长期存活。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 高剂量（10¹⁰ cfu/d）益生菌显著降低高果糖饮食诱导大鼠的血浆葡萄糖、胰岛素、甘油三酯和氧化应激水平，改善胰岛素抵抗（HOMA-IR下降34%），并显著减少肝重和肝胆固醇含量（下降27%）。高剂量处理还显著上调肝脏β-氧化相关基因（PPARα、CPT2）表达，下调脂质合成相关基因（SREBP1、FAS、SCD1）表达，表明其在调节代谢综合征核心特征方面具有显著疗效。

spatial_arrangement (空间排布): Oral gavage (systemic distribution via gut lumen)
C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 6.5–7.0, requires complex nutrients including carbohydrates and amino acids; dependent on host-derived metabolites in gut environment
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Not explicitly quantified; assumed moderate growth rate typical of Lactobacillus spp. in vivo (colonization established within 24–48 h post-administration)
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gut lumen, particularly intestinal mucosa and lamina propria; preferentially colonizes mucosal surfaces in the colon
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competes with pathogenic bacteria; modulates gut microbiota composition by reducing ILC3-promoting microbes; enhances beneficial microbial balance
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to gastric acidity (due to lactic acid production), bile salts, and osmotic stress; stable during oral administration and transit through GI tract
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Lactic acid, hydrogen peroxide, and cell wall components (e.g., teichoic acids) contribute to acid and oxidative stress resistance
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Lactobacillus reuteri is a Gram-positive, rod-shaped, anaerobic bacterium that naturally resides in the gastrointestinal tract. It thrives in the gut environment by utilizing host-derived nutrients and maintaining a stable colonization in the intestinal mucosa. It exhibits strong tolerance to gastric and intestinal stresses, enabling effective delivery and persistence after oral administration.
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Not applicable (natural strain, no genetic modification reported)
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High chromosomal stability; no plasmids or foreign DNA introduced; natural strain maintains identity in vivo
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in physiological gut environment; no material-based genetic instability observed
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): L. reuteri used in this study is a naturally occurring probiotic strain (ATCC PTA 6475) without any genetic engineering. Its immunomodulatory effects are attributed to native metabolic and signaling pathways, including production of tryptophan metabolites and modulation of host immune cells.
S_metabolite_signals (代谢信号): ["Tryptophan (precursor for AhR ligands)", "SCFAs (indirectly via microbiome modulation)"]
S_host_signals (宿主信号): ["Cytokines (IL-23, IL-17, IFN-γ)", "Tissue damage fragments (from DSS-induced epithelial injury)"]
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Aryl hydrocarbon receptor (AhR) ligands derived from tryptophan catabolism; potential involvement of surface receptors for bile acids and cytokines
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Constitutive activity with feedback modulation via host immune signals; no synthetic logic gates; natural sensing of microbial and host-derived cues to regulate immune output
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): L. reuteri senses the gut microenvironment through intrinsic receptors for bile acids and pH, and detects host immune signals such as IL-23 and IL-17. It responds by producing immunomodulatory metabolites (e.g., tryptophan derivatives) that activate AhR in host cells, leading to suppression of ILC3 activation. This represents a natural feedback loop where microbial presence modulates immune cell behavior in response to inflammation.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Secretion of tryptophan metabolites via passive diffusion and membrane transport; no specialized secretion systems reported
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Oral gavage at fixed dose (1×10⁹ CFU/mouse); dosage is not dynamically controlled but effective at standard administration
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with oral delivery; stable in gastrointestinal environment; no material encapsulation used
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Not applicable (no direct antibacterial activity reported in this study)
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): No evidence of antibacterial or biofilm inhibition activity in this study.
E_B_crit_evidence (标准B_依据): No evidence of oxygenation function or related enzymatic activity.
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): L. reuteri suppresses group 3 innate lymphoid cells (ILC3s) by producing tryptophan metabolites that act as ligands for the aryl hydrocarbon receptor (AhR), leading to reduced IL-23 and IL-17 production and decreased intestinal inflammation.
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Not directly involved in tissue repair; indirect benefit via reduced inflammation and ILC3 suppression.
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): No direct evidence of metabolic regulation (e.g., SCFA, neurotransmitter production) reported.
E_F_mechanism_desc (肿瘤治疗描述): No direct tumor-killing or prodrug conversion activity reported.
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (natural probiotic strain with no engineered kill switches)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no evidence of horizontal gene transfer; non-invasive, non-colonizing beyond gut; no environmental escape risk
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): None (no physical confinement used; relies on natural gut barrier)
B_risk_desc (风险描述): L. reuteri ATCC PTA 6475 is a well-characterized, GRAS (Generally Recognized As Safe) probiotic strain. It is non-pathogenic, non-invasive, and does not persist long-term in the gut. No genetic modifications or antibiotic resistance markers were introduced, minimizing biosafety risks. Its natural attenuation and limited colonization reduce the risk of unintended ecological impact.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): Oral administration of L. reuteri (1×10⁹ CFU/mouse) completely abrogated ICB-associated colitis in mice, as evidenced by normalized body weight, improved survival (from 20% to 100%), reduced histological damage, decreased serum levels of pro-inflammatory cytokines (TNF-α, IL-6, IFN-γ, KC), and significant reduction in intestinal ILC3 infiltration. Importantly, this protective effect was achieved without compromising the antitumor efficacy of ICB immunotherapy against B16 melanoma.

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 7.0–7.5; requires carbon sources (e.g., glucose), amino acids, vitamins; compatible with Ca²⁺-mediated gelation
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Growth rate not explicitly stated; viable for up to nine days post-printing in alginate gel
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Not applicable (in vitro engineered system)
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Not applicable
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Moderate tolerance to shear stress during extrusion; sensitive to high temperatures (>65°C)
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Alginate hydrogel provides mechanical protection
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 大肠杆菌（Escherichia coli）为兼性厌氧菌，最适生长温度为37°C，pH 7.0–7.5，可在含碳源、氨基酸和维生素的培养基中生长。在海藻酸钠水凝胶中可维持活性长达九天，适用于3D打印环境。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Chemical induction (rhamnose, IPTG), plasmid-based expression
G_edit_efficiency (编辑效率): High efficiency in protein expression upon induction; no off-target risk mentioned
G_circuit_control (回路控制): Inducible (rhamnose, IPTG, AHL); spatially controlled via multi-ink printing
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): Plasmid-based expression; stability not explicitly quantified, but functional for at least nine days in gel
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable within alginate and Flink hydrogels; no significant degradation observed
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 通过化学诱导剂（如鼠李糖、IPTG、AHL）调控基因表达，实现空间分层的多功能蛋白表达。利用质粒系统在大肠杆菌中实现CsgA和TasA等蛋白的可控表达，支持3D打印生物膜和逻辑门功能。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Rhamnose promoter, IPTG promoter, AHL receptor (LuxR-type)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): AND gate logic demonstrated in multi-ink wearable sensors; response to multiple inducers simultaneously
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 通过多通道打印实现对多种化学信号（鼠李糖、IPTG、AHL）的响应，构建了可编程的逻辑门系统。在柔性可穿戴传感器中，当检测到任一信号时，可触发绿色荧光输出，实现多输入-单输出的逻辑控制。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Secretion via outer membrane vesicles and periplasmic release
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Controlled by inducer concentration and spatial patterning
E_material_match (材料匹配性): High compatibility with alginate, agarose, Flink, and Pluronic F127-DA hydrogels
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Not applicable
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 未涉及抗菌功能
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Not applicable
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Not applicable
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Not applicable
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Physical confinement in hydrogel matrix; no kill-switch or auxotrophy reported
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes mentioned; minimal risk of horizontal gene transfer in controlled environment
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Effective physical barrier via hydrogel encapsulation; prevents cell escape
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 大肠杆菌为公认安全（GRAS）菌株，无致病性，且通过水凝胶物理封装有效防止细胞泄漏，生物安全风险较低。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 未直接评估伤口愈合效果，但3D打印的工程菌可在水凝胶中长期存活并表达目标蛋白，具备用于生物材料制造和可穿戴传感器的潜力。

spatial_arrangement (空间排布): Encapsulated in agarose hydrogel as spores
C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Spores stable at high temperatures (up to 65°C); germinate upon nutrient and oxygen availability; pH 6.0–8.0
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Spores remain dormant during printing; germination occurs post-printing; no doubling time reported
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Hypoxic wound environment (model wound patch)
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive with S. aureus; produces antibiotics to inhibit pathogen
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): High tolerance to heat, drying, UV, and desiccation; stable during long-term storage
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Spore coat proteins, agarose matrix
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 枯草芽孢杆菌（Bacillus subtilis）为兼性厌氧菌，其孢子可耐受高达65°C的高温，可在干燥、紫外线和极端环境中长期存活。在3D打印后，孢子在营养和氧气存在下可萌发，用于响应病原体并释放抗生素。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Spore-based expression system; inducible promoters (e.g., for antibiotic production)
G_edit_efficiency (编辑效率): High efficiency in spore germination and gene expression post-activation; no off-target risk reported
G_circuit_control (回路控制): Inducible (quorum sensing of S. aureus); self-activated upon pathogen detection
G_circuit_inducer_material (电路调控_相关物质): Staphylococcus aureus quorum sensing molecules (e.g., AIP)
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High stability due to spore dormancy; chromosomal integration likely; minimal metabolic burden
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in agarose hydrogel; spores remain viable after rehydration
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 利用枯草芽孢杆菌孢子的高稳定性，将其封装于高温熔融的琼脂糖水凝胶中进行3D打印。孢子在打印后可萌发，并通过感知金黄色葡萄球菌的群体感应信号，启动抗生素（如lysostaphin和thiocillin）的表达，实现靶向抗菌功能。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): AIP receptor (e.g., ComP/ComA system)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): AND gate: requires both germination (oxygen/nutrients) AND pathogen signal (AIP) to activate antibiotic production
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 枯草芽孢杆菌孢子在萌发后，需同时感知氧气和金黄色葡萄球菌的AIP信号，才能启动抗生素合成基因表达，形成双重安全逻辑门，避免误激活。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Lysis of vegetative cells; secretion via Sec pathway
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Controlled by pathogen signal and germination rate
E_material_match (材料匹配性): High compatibility with agarose hydrogel; stable during printing and rehydration
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Spores germinate in wound model, sense S. aureus via AIP, and produce lysostaphin and thiocillin to selectively kill S. aureus
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 选择性杀灭金黄色葡萄球菌，不伤害自身菌株；在3D打印结构中保持活性，无结构破坏；无明显细胞毒性，局部作用明确。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Not applicable
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Not applicable
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Not applicable
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Physical confinement in agarose hydrogel; spore dormancy acts as natural containment
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Non-pathogenic; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; low risk of horizontal gene transfer; no environmental escape due to dormancy
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Highly effective physical barrier via agarose matrix and spore dormancy
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 枯草芽孢杆菌为GRAS菌株，孢子形态赋予其极强的环境耐受性，且在水凝胶中被物理封闭，无逃逸风险，生物安全等级为BSL-1。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在模拟伤口模型中，3D打印的枯草芽孢杆菌孢子可成功萌发并响应金黄色葡萄球菌信号，选择性释放抗生素，有效抑制病原体，具备潜在的伤口感染防控能力。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Requires high oxygen tension; grows at 30°C, pH 5.0–6.0; produces bacterial cellulose at air–water interface
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Growth rate not specified; cellulose production sustained over time
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Air–water interface (simulated skin graft surface)
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Not applicable
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Moderate tolerance to shear stress; sensitive to high temperatures
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Flink hydrogel matrix
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 醋酸杆菌（Acetobacter xylinum）为好氧菌，最适生长温度为30°C，pH 5.0–6.0，可在空气-水界面持续合成细菌纤维素，适用于3D打印个性化皮肤移植物。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Wildtype strain used; no genetic modification reported
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High stability due to wildtype nature; no plasmid loss risk
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in Flink hydrogel; supports long-term cellulose production
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 利用野生型醋酸杆菌在Flink水凝胶中3D打印细菌纤维素，模拟个性化皮肤移植物。无需基因改造，依赖其天然的纤维素合成能力。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Oxygen sensor (e.g., cytochrome oxidase), pH-sensitive regulators
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Constitutive expression; no complex logic
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 野生型醋酸杆菌在氧气和适宜pH条件下持续表达纤维素合成酶，无外部调控，属于基础型表达系统。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Extracellular secretion of cellulose via membrane transporters
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Controlled by oxygen availability and growth duration
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Excellent compatibility with Flink hydrogel; supports high-fidelity printing and structural integrity
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Not applicable
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 未涉及抗菌功能
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Not applicable
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Produces bacterial cellulose, a biocompatible, high-tensile-strength material suitable for wound healing and tissue engineering
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Not applicable
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Physical confinement in Flink hydrogel; no genetic modification
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Non-pathogenic; no antibiotic resistance genes; low risk of environmental escape
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Effective physical barrier via hydrogel encapsulation
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 醋酸杆菌为公认安全菌株，无基因改造，通过Flink水凝胶物理封装，无逃逸风险，生物安全等级为BSL-1。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 成功在3D打印的娃娃面部模型上生成细菌纤维素，模拟个性化皮肤移植物，具备高水保留率、高抗拉强度和生物相容性，适用于伤口愈合和组织工程。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Acid-tolerant, grows in milk, meat, fruits, vegetables, cereal grains; optimal growth at 30–37°C, pH 5.0–6.5; requires fermentable carbohydrates
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~60–90 min in vitro; viability maintained under gastrointestinal transit conditions
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Intestinal tract, vaginal and oral mucosal surfaces of humans and animals
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of pathogens; symbiotic with host microbiota; may modulate immune responses
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Resistant to bile acids, low pH (gastric), osmotic stress; moderate tolerance to drying and shear stress
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Cell wall components (e.g., S-layer proteins), acid tolerance systems (e.g., F1F0-ATPase)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Lactobacillus 是革兰氏阳性、耐酸、兼性厌氧的发酵型细菌，属于厚壁菌门。它们广泛存在于食品相关环境（如牛奶、肉类、水果、蔬菜、谷物）中，常作为发酵食品的启动菌。自然定植于人和动物的肠道、阴道和口腔黏膜表面，具有良好的胃肠道存活能力，能耐受低pH和胆汁环境，是重要的益生菌候选菌属。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): PCR, 16S/23S-5S rRNA sequencing, qPCR, MLST, WGS
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): Not applicable (no engineered plasmids or integration described)
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Not applicable
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 该文未描述对Lactobacillus进行基因工程改造，仅聚焦于其分类鉴定方法。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): FNR promoter (hypoxia), F1F0-ATPase (acid tolerance), S-layer proteins (surface recognition)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Not applicable (no synthetic logic circuits described)
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 文中未描述人工设计的信号感知与逻辑处理系统，仅提及天然生理响应机制。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Type I/II secretion systems (inferred from Gram-positive cell wall structure)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Not applicable (natural secretion, no controllable output described)
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with food matrices (yogurt, fermented vegetables); stable in encapsulated forms
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): 通过产生有机酸（如乳酸）降低局部pH，抑制病原菌生长；部分菌株产生细菌素（bacteriocins）直接杀伤病原体。
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 通过降低pH和产生细菌素抑制病原菌，如沙门氏菌和大肠杆菌，且在肠道中局部作用，不显著破坏正常菌群。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): 通过细胞壁成分（如肽聚糖、脂磷壁酸）和DNA序列（如TTTCGTTT）激活免疫细胞，调节免疫应答，增强黏膜屏障功能。
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): Peptidoglycan, Lipoteichoic acid, Genomic DNA (TTTCGTTT motif)
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): 调节宿主代谢功能，如降低胆固醇、改善乳糖耐受性、调节肠道菌群代谢活动。
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (natural probiotic strains used)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Non-pathogenic, no antibiotic resistance genes reported; low risk of horizontal gene transfer; no environmental escape concerns
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Physical confinement not required; natural colonization limited to mucosal surfaces
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Lactobacillus 属菌株被广泛认为是安全的（GRAS），无致病性，不携带抗生素抗性基因，且在自然环境中定植能力有限，不会造成生态风险。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在临床试验中，含有足够活菌数的强化酸奶可有效改善肠道健康，缩短轮状病毒性腹泻、抗生素相关性腹泻及克罗恩病的病程。部分菌株（如L. rhamnosus GG、L. casei Shirota）已被证实可降低腹泻持续时间与发作频率，增强免疫功能，改善过敏症状。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 6.0–7.0, requires complex nutrients including amino acids and vitamins; dependent on host-derived metabolites in gut environment
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~1.5–2 hours in vitro; in vivo homeostasis maintained through adaptation to intestinal niche
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Intestinal mucosa, particularly in the small intestine and colon
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Symbiotic with host microbiome; competes with pathogenic bacteria for adhesion sites and nutrients
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Moderate tolerance to bile salts and low pH (gastric conditions); stable under lyophilization and rehydration; sensitive to high shear stress
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Bile salts (tolerance mediated by bile salt hydrolase activity)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该菌株为兼性厌氧菌，适宜在37°C、pH 6.0–7.0条件下生长，依赖复杂营养物质（如氨基酸、维生素）及宿主代谢物，在肠道黏膜中定植，具有与肠道微生物群共生并竞争性抑制病原菌的能力。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Not specified
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): Not specified
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Not specified
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 文中未涉及对Lactobacillus gasseri的基因工程改造，仅基于其天然代谢功能进行营养基因组学分析。
S_metabolite_signals (代谢信号): ["Omega-3 fatty acids", "Omega-6 fatty acids", "Free fatty acids"]
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Not specified
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Not specified
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 文中未描述明确的信号感应逻辑或基因调控回路，仅通过基因表达谱分析推断其对ω-3/ω-6脂肪酸的响应。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Not specified
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Not specified
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Not specified
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Not applicable
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 未提及抗菌或抗生物膜功能
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Not applicable
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Not applicable
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): 通过调节与脂质代谢相关的基因（如FADS1、FADS2、PPARα、PPARγ、ADIPOQ、LPL等）影响宿主的脂肪酸代谢和炎症反应，从而参与心血管疾病风险调控。
E_E_metabolite_material (代谢物_相关物质): Omega-3 fatty acids, Omega-6 fatty acids
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Not specified
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): 低致病性，无抗生素抗性基因，无水平基因转移风险，环境逃逸可能性极低
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Not specified
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Lactobacillus gasseri为公认安全（GRAS）菌株，常用于益生菌产品，无已知致病性，不携带抗生素抗性基因，且在自然环境中难以长期存活，安全性高。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 该研究未评估治疗效果，而是通过微阵列分析揭示Lactobacillus gasseri与ω-3/ω-6脂肪酸摄入对心血管疾病相关基因网络（如FADS1、PPARγ、ADIPOQ等）的调控作用，提示其在代谢调节和疾病预防中的潜在价值。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 6.5–7.0, in the presence of lactose and other carbohydrates; adapted to the human gastrointestinal tract.
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Growth rate consistent with in vitro conditions; no significant differences in growth parameters (weight, height, head circumference) observed between probiotic and placebo groups in vivo.
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gut mucosa, particularly in the colon; preferential colonization in the infant gut environment.
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of pathogenic bacteria via nutrient competition and adhesion site occupation; no significant disruption of the native microbiome observed.
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to freeze-drying and rehydration; stable during storage at room temperature; resistant to gastric acidity and bile salts.
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Potato starch (excipient), freeze-drying process
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 三种益生菌均在健康婴儿肠道中表现出良好的生长适应性，无生长抑制现象。在体外培养条件下生长良好，且在口服后能稳定定植于婴儿肠道，未引起生长迟缓或代谢紊乱。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Not specified
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): Not specified
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Not specified
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 该研究未对菌株进行基因工程改造，所有菌株均为天然野生型，未引入外源基因或质粒。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Not specified
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Not specified
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 未涉及合成生物学逻辑电路设计，菌株依赖其天然代谢感应机制响应肠道微环境变化。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Spontaneous secretion of organic acids and immunomodulatory molecules
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent effect via daily intake of 3×10⁹ CFU; no evidence of overactivity or toxicity.
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with powder formulation and oral delivery; stable in excipient (potato starch).
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): 通过产生乳酸、乙酸等有机酸降低肠道pH，抑制病原菌生长；竞争营养和黏附位点。
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 三种菌株均未引起腹泻、发热或严重不良事件，且粪便性状与安慰剂组无差异，表明其抗菌作用可控且安全。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): 调节免疫反应，增强Th1/Th2平衡，促进抗炎因子分泌，降低过敏风险。
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): 促进肠道屏障功能恢复，增强黏膜完整性，改善肠道通透性。
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Not applicable
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (natural strains with no engineered kill switches)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): No pathogenicity reported; no antibiotic resistance genes detected; no horizontal gene transfer observed; low risk of systemic infection in healthy infants.
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Oral administration with natural gut barrier; no physical confinement required.
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 三种菌株均为公认安全（GRAS）菌株，已在婴幼儿中多次使用，未报告严重不良事件或菌血症。在健康婴儿中使用安全且耐受性良好。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在8周干预期内，所有益生菌组与安慰剂组在体重、身高、头围增长方面无显著差异，且不良事件、粪便性状、D-乳酸尿排泄水平均等效，表明其在婴儿中具有良好的安全性和耐受性，可作为安全的肠道定植菌株。

composition (组成成分): [{"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Cecal microflora", "strain_id": "In vivo passaged through broilers and layers"}]
C_growth_conditions (生长条件): 37°C, anaerobic conditions, pH 5.5–6.5, lactose-supplemented diet (5% w/w)
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Growth rate not explicitly stated; maintained via in vivo passage over 2 years with consistent colonization ability

C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Stable through repeated in vivo passage; resistant to storage stress via continuous host maintenance; tolerance to dietary lactose and cecal pH shifts

G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High stability due to continuous in vivo passage; no genetic modifications reported; natural community maintained over time
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable within the cecal environment; no evidence of material-based instability
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 未进行基因工程改造，通过在肉鸡和蛋鸡体内连续传代维持活性微生物群落，确保其竞争性排斥能力的长期一致性。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Lactose utilization pathways (e.g., lactose permease, β-galactosidase); pH-sensing mechanisms in anaerobic gut bacteria
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No explicit logic gates; likely constitutive metabolic activity in response to lactose availability and pH changes
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 微生物群落通过感知乳糖的存在和盲肠pH变化，启动代谢活动，产生大量未解离丙酸，从而抑制沙门氏菌生长。该响应为非诱导性、持续性代谢行为，依赖于宿主环境中的底物供给。

E_material_match (材料匹配性): High compatibility with cecal environment; no artificial material used; natural encapsulation in gut lumen

E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 在乳糖喂养条件下，无论是否为乳糖发酵型沙门氏菌，均能实现10,000倍的沙门氏菌减少，且未见对宿主细胞造成明显毒性，表明其具有局部作用和安全性。
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): 通过乳糖发酵产生大量丙酸，调节盲肠内环境，影响宿主代谢和微生物群落平衡。
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Natural attenuation via host environment; no synthetic kill switches or auxotrophy reported
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no evidence of horizontal gene transfer; environmental escape unlikely due to host dependency

B_risk_desc (风险描述): 该微生物群落为鸡盲肠正常菌群，无已知致病性，不携带抗生素抗性基因，依赖宿主环境生存，无法在体外长期存活，因此生物安全风险极低，属于GRAS（公认安全）类别。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在鸡盲肠中，无论在沙门氏菌感染前或感染后3天内给予，均能将沙门氏菌数量减少10,000倍。乳糖补充显著增强效果，使未解离丙酸浓度从2.4 μmol/g提升至12–16.8 μmol/g，同时盲肠pH显著下降，有效抑制病原菌定植。该系统在体内连续传代超过2年仍保持稳定效能。

G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): No genetic modifications reported; natural strains used; stability maintained via encapsulation and low-temperature storage
