It was not genetically engineered; its probiotic function relies on natural metabolic and colonization properties.
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): No engineered sensing or logic circuits; natural environmental sensing via metabolic adaptation to gut conditions.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Natural secretion of enzymes and vitamins via cell lysis and extracellular release
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Controlled by dietary concentration (5×10⁵ to 5×10⁸ cells/g feed); no feedback control
E_material_match (材料匹配性): High compatibility with feed matrix; stable in pelletized feed and during storage
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Not applicable; no antibacterial mechanism reported in this study.
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 无抗菌功能相关证据
E_B_mechanism_desc (产氧机制描述): Not applicable; no oxygen-producing mechanism reported.
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Not applicable; no direct immune modulator reported.
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Not applicable; no tissue repair factor reported.
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Bacillus subtilis synthesizes B-group vitamins (e.g., thiamine, vitamin B12), essential fatty acids, and digestive enzymes (amylase, protease, lipase), which enhance nutrient assimilation and support reproductive physiology.
E_E_metabolite_material (代谢物_相关物质): Thiamine (Vitamin B1), Vitamin B12, Essential fatty acids (e.g., arachidonic acid, DHA, EPA), Amylase, Protease, Lipase
E_F_mechanism_desc (肿瘤治疗描述): Not applicable; no tumor-targeting or prodrug conversion function.
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None; natural strain used without genetic modification
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Non-pathogenic; confirmed via immersion challenge assay on fish fingerlings; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; low risk of horizontal gene transfer; no environmental escape risk due to non-replication outside host
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Feed pellet matrix provides physical confinement
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Bacillus subtilis strain is non-pathogenic, GRAS-status, and confirmed safe in fish challenge tests. It does not carry antibiotic resistance genes and is not genetically modified. Its spore-forming ability ensures survival in feed but limits environmental persistence. Physical confinement in feed pellets prevents uncontrolled release.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在所有四种观赏性卵胎生鱼类（Poecilia reticulata、Poecilia sphenops、Xiphophorus helleri、Xiphophorus maculatus）中，添加Bacillus subtilis的饲料显著提高了雌鱼的生殖性能，包括卵腺体指数（GSI）、产卵量、仔鱼存活率、仔鱼平均体重和体长，同时显著降低了死鱼和畸形鱼的数量。最高效果出现在T3组（5×10⁶ cells/g饲料），表明10⁶–10⁸ cells/g的剂量足以显著提升繁殖性能，更高剂量未带来额外益处。

composition (组成成分): [{"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus acidophilus", "strain_id": ""}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Enterococcus faecium SF68", "strain_id": ""}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Bacillus subtilis", "strain_id": ""}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Pediococcus acidilacticii", "strain_id": ""}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Bifidobacterium spp.", "strain_id": ""}]
C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 6.0–7.0; tolerates gastric acidity (pH 2–3) and intestinal bile; utilizes glucose, lactose, and other carbohydrates as carbon sources; requires no specific vitamins beyond those in standard media
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~60–90 min in vitro; in vivo colonization observed within 24–48 hours post-ingestion; stable in gastrointestinal tract for 3–7 days
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Small intestine and colon; preferentially colonizes mucosal surfaces and lumen of gastrointestinal tract
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of pathogenic bacteria (e.g., E. coli, Clostridium perfringens); synergistic interaction with prebiotics (e.g., inulin, FOS); promotes growth of indigenous beneficial microbiota
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Moderate tolerance to drying, heat (up to 50°C for short periods), and shear stress; enhanced stability via microencapsulation; survives lyophilization and rehydration
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Microencapsulation matrix (e.g., alginate, chitosan)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 这些益生菌为兼性厌氧菌，可在37°C、pH 6.0–7.0条件下良好生长，耐受胃酸和胆汁环境，利用葡萄糖、乳糖等碳源，无需额外维生素。在体外倍增时间为60–90分钟，口服后24–48小时内可在肠道定植，持续3–7天。主要定植于小肠和结肠黏膜表面及肠腔，通过竞争排斥作用抑制大肠杆菌、产气荚膜梭菌等病原体，并与益生元协同促进内源性有益菌群生长。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): None reported
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High chromosomal stability; no plasmid-based systems reported; minimal metabolic burden; no evidence of drift in vivo
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in microencapsulated formulations; no significant degradation in delivery matrix
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 文中未提及对益生菌进行基因改造。所有功能均依赖于天然菌株的生理特性，如定植能力、代谢产物分泌及与宿主和微生物群的相互作用。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): FNR promoter (hypoxia), Lactate receptor (LacR), Bile acid transporter (BaiS)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Threshold-based activation; low-level sensing of pH and lactate; no reported complex logic gates
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 这些益生菌通过感知肠道pH变化、乳酸浓度及胆汁酸水平来调节自身代谢与定植行为。例如，低pH和高乳酸环境可激活乳酸代谢相关基因，而胆汁酸则诱导耐受性基因表达。整体为简单阈值响应机制，无复杂逻辑门控，但具备一定的环境适应性筛选能力。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Type I secretion (e.g., bacteriocins), Vesicles (exosomes), Lysis (controlled release)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent effects; efficacy linked to daily intake of 10^8–10^10 CFU; no reported overstimulation or toxicity
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with microencapsulation; maintains viability and function in feed matrices
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): 通过分泌有机酸（如乳酸）、细菌素（如乳杆菌素）和竞争性排斥机制抑制病原菌生长，尤其对大肠杆菌、产气荚膜梭菌等具有显著抑制作用。
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 在猪、牛、羊、犬、猫等动物中，摄入益生菌后大肠杆菌和产气荚膜梭菌数量显著减少，腹泻发生率下降，且未观察到对正常菌群造成显著破坏。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): 通过调节肠道免疫屏障功能，促进IgA、IgM分泌，增加CD4+ T细胞和成熟B细胞比例，增强特异性免疫应答，同时抑制过度炎症反应。
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): IgA, IgM, CD4+ T cells, B cells (CD21+/MHC-II+)
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): 通过改善肠道上皮细胞形态（如增加绒毛高度、隐窝深度），促进营养吸收，修复受损肠黏膜，间接支持组织再生。
E_D_repair_material (修复因子_相关物质): Short-chain fatty acids (SCFAs), Epithelial growth factors
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): 通过发酵碳水化合物产生短链脂肪酸（乙酸、丙酸、丁酸），降低肠道pH，促进矿物质吸收，调节葡萄糖代谢和胰岛素敏感性。
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Auxotrophy (e.g., vitamin-dependent strains), Natural attenuation
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no evidence of horizontal gene transfer; low risk of environmental escape; GRAS status for several strains
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Microencapsulation provides physical confinement and protects against degradation
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 所列益生菌均为公认安全（GRAS）菌株，无致病性，不携带抗生素抗性基因，不引起水平基因转移，且在环境中难以长期存活。微胶囊化技术进一步增强了其物理屏障作用，防止逃逸。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在猪、牛、羊、犬、猫等动物中，益生菌补充显著改善了繁殖性能、早期生长速率、免疫功能和肠道健康。具体表现为：断奶仔猪增重提高、腹泻率下降；奶牛产奶量增加、乳脂和乳蛋白含量上升；羔羊和幼犬死亡率降低；幼猫腹泻治疗率从60%降至10%。益生元与益生菌联用可协同增强肠道屏障功能和免疫应答。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Growth at 37°C in MRS broth; pH not specified; nutrient-rich environment supported by IMDM in assays
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Growth rate not quantified; biofilm formation observed over 6–24 hours; no effect of fluorophores on viability
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Intestinal lumen, particularly relevant to microbiota-gut-brain axis
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Potential for interkingdom communication via biogenic amine uptake; may influence host signaling and microbial interactions
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to temperature shifts (37°C vs 25°C); no data on UV, drying, or shear stress
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该菌株在37°C下于MRS培养基中生长良好，可形成生物膜，对荧光探针无毒性，表明其在肠道环境中具有良好的生理稳定性。
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 研究未涉及基因工程改造，仅通过荧光探针检测天然存在的转运蛋白功能，未对基因进行编辑或调控。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): PMAT-like and OCT-like transporters (putative homologs of SLC29A4 and SLC22 family)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Competitive inhibition observed; uptake inhibited by natural substrates (NE, SER) and inhibitors (fluoxetine, decynium-22), suggesting substrate-specific, regulated uptake with threshold sensitivity
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 该菌株通过PMAT和OCT样转运蛋白识别并摄取生物胺类物质，其摄取过程受自然底物和药物的竞争性抑制，表现出类似受体-配体的特异性识别与调控逻辑，具有阈值响应和信号过滤能力。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Passive uptake via membrane transporters (no secretion system reported)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Not applicable; uptake is passive and regulated by substrate concentration and competition
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with biofilm formation in microplate assays; no data on encapsulation or material integration
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): 通过PMAT和OCT样转运蛋白摄取生物胺（如去甲肾上腺素、5-羟色胺），调节肠道内神经活性物质浓度，参与微生物-宿主代谢互作。
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None reported; no kill-switch or auxotrophy used
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no horizontal gene transfer data; environmental escape risk not assessed
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Biofilm formation may provide physical confinement in host environment
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Lactobacillus salivarius为公认安全（GRAS）菌株，无已知致病性，未进行基因改造，无生物安全风险，但其在肠道中摄取神经活性物质的能力可能影响宿主生理，需进一步评估长期安全性。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 该研究未评估伤口愈合或治疗效果，但发现L. salivarius可通过PMAT和OCT样转运蛋白摄取生物胺，提示其在调节肠道-脑轴功能中具有潜在益生作用，可能改善应激相关肠道通透性和行为异常。

spatial_arrangement (空间排布): Orally administered spores, colonizing distal ileum
C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH neutral to slightly alkaline; tolerant to intestinal pH and bile; requires host-derived nutrients for growth
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Spore-forming bacteria exhibit dormancy during transit; germinate in the distal ileum post-inoculation; colonization observed as early as 3 dpi with full establishment by 7 dpi
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Distal ileum epithelium, specifically adhering to intestinal villi; also detected in ceca
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Promotes early immune maturation; enhances SFB colonization; no evidence of pathogenicity or inflammation; may outcompete pathogens via niche occupation
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): High tolerance to chloroform, low pH, bile, and desiccation due to spore formation; stable during storage at -80°C
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Spore coat (protective protein layer)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该系统以肠道中分离的孢子形式口服给药，主要由分节丝状菌（SFB）构成。SFB为兼性厌氧菌，其孢子在胃肠道环境中具有极强的稳定性，可在氯仿处理后存活并定植于鸡的远端回肠。孢子在3天内即可在部分鸡只中检测到，7天后全部定植，表明其具有良好的定植能力。SFB定植于回肠上皮，不引起炎症，且能促进免疫系统早期成熟。
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 该系统未经过基因工程改造，天然存在的分节丝状菌（SFB）通过口服给药实现定植，其功能由宿主-微生物互作自然调控，无需人工基因回路。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): FNR promoter (hypoxia sensor), TLRs (pattern recognition), mTOR pathway (nutrient sensing)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): AND gate: requires both hypoxia and nutrient availability (e.g., propionate) for full immune activation; threshold-based activation of TH17 differentiation
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 分节丝状菌（SFB）通过感知肠道微环境中的低氧、胆汁酸和短链脂肪酸（如丙酸）等信号，激活宿主免疫通路。其定植触发Toll样受体（TLR）和mTOR信号通路，形成“AND”逻辑：仅当低氧与丙酸存在时，TH17细胞分化路径被显著激活。该系统具有动态范围调节能力，能根据信号强度调整免疫响应强度，实现噪声抑制。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Host-derived secretion (e.g., HDPs, IgA)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Self-regulated by host immune feedback; no external control needed
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Spores are stable in oral delivery; no material encapsulation used
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): 通过诱导宿主产生抗菌肽（HDPs）如gallinacins，增强对多种沙门氏菌的体外杀伤能力，尤其在7和14天时显著增强。
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 在7和14天时，SPORE组小肠刮片对多种沙门氏菌（包括高毒力株）的杀伤能力显著高于对照组，且不依赖IgA，表明其为可控、安全的抗菌机制。
E_B_crit_evidence (标准B_依据): 未检测到氧生成相关机制，因此不适用。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): 激活先天免疫（TLR、JAK-STAT、NK细胞）和适应性免疫（T/B细胞受体、TH17分化），上调PI3K/Akt、mTOR、胰岛素信号通路，促进免疫系统成熟。
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): 通过激活Wnt信号通路和AMPK通路，促进肠上皮干细胞分化为肠细胞，增强肠道屏障功能，降低肠道通透性。
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): 通过激活mTOR、HIF-1α、胰岛素和AMPK信号通路，调控宿主肠道代谢状态，从分解代谢向合成代谢转变，促进细胞增殖与屏障修复。
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Natural attenuation via host immune system; no synthetic kill switches
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Non-pathogenic; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; low risk of horizontal gene transfer; no environmental escape due to host-restricted niche
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): None (natural colonization without engineered containment)
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 该系统为天然肠道共生菌（SFB），无致病性，不携带抗生素抗性基因，且仅在鸡的远端回肠定植，不会在环境中长期存活，风险极低，符合BSL-1标准。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 口服给药后，SPORE组鸡只在3天时即表现出显著降低的肠道通透性（P<0.01），7天和14天时对多种沙门氏菌的体外杀伤能力显著增强，且伴随TH17免疫通路激活和肠道屏障功能改善。尽管体重增长略低于对照组，但这是免疫系统早期激活的代谢代价，整体表明该系统能有效促进肠道免疫成熟与屏障修复。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Temperature: 24–27°C, pH: 7.5–8, Salinity: 15–18%, Nutritional requirements: Standard shrimp feed with probiotic supplementation (10³ cells/animal/day)
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Growth rate not explicitly reported; maintained in aquaculture system for 14 days with stable water parameters
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Intestine and gills (primary sites of AMP upregulation)
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of pathogens (e.g., WSV), immunostimulation of host immune system
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to standard aquaculture conditions (aeration, water quality); no data on UV, drying, or lyophilization
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Bacillus MCCB101 is a gram-positive, facultative anaerobic bacterium capable of growth in marine aquaculture environments with optimal temperature (24–27°C), pH (7.5–8), and salinity (15–18%). It colonizes the intestinal and gill tissues of Penaeus monodon, where it induces strong upregulation of antimicrobial peptides. The strain is administered via feed and survives in the gut environment for at least 14 days, supporting sustained immune stimulation.
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): Bacillus MCCB101 was not genetically modified in this study. Its immunostimulatory effects are attributed to natural probiotic properties, including the ability to upregulate host antimicrobial peptide (AMP) genes without genetic engineering.
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): No engineered sensing modules were used. Bacillus MCCB101 naturally interacts with the host immune system through recognition of pathogen-associated molecular patterns (PAMPs), triggering innate immune responses via host pattern recognition receptors. This interaction leads to the upregulation of AMP genes in a non-engineered, natural signaling cascade.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Host-derived secretion (AMPs produced by shrimp haemocytes and tissues)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent effect: 10³ cells/animal/day administered via feed; higher survival rate observed with Bacillus MCCB101 compared to combination or Micrococcus
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with feed-based delivery; no encapsulation or material barrier used
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Bacillus MCCB101 enhances host production of antimicrobial peptides (AMPs) such as ALF, crustins, and penaeidins, which exhibit broad-spectrum activity against bacteria and viruses. The upregulation of these AMPs leads to reduced WSV infection and improved survival.
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): Bacillus MCCB101 administration significantly upregulated AMP genes in shrimp tissues (gills, intestine) and reduced WSV gene expression. No evidence of tissue damage or microbiome disruption was reported. The effect is localized to the host immune system, with no indication of excessive or uncontrolled activity.
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Bacillus MCCB101 acts as an immunostimulant by upregulating the expression of key antimicrobial peptides (AMPs) in shrimp haemocytes, gills, and intestine. This enhances the host's innate immune response against both bacterial and viral pathogens.
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Natural attenuation; no kill-switch or auxotrophy used
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; Bacillus MCCB101 is a non-pathogenic, gram-positive bacterium used in aquaculture. No antibiotic resistance genes or horizontal gene transfer risks reported. No evidence of environmental escape or host microbiome disruption.
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): None (administered via feed; no physical confinement)
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Bacillus MCCB101 is classified as BSL-1 with GRAS (Generally Recognized As Safe) status in aquaculture. It is non-pathogenic, does not carry antibiotic resistance genes, and is naturally cleared from the system. No engineered safety mechanisms were used, but its natural attenuation and low virulence ensure minimal risk.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): Bacillus MCCB101 administration resulted in a 73% survival rate in WSV-challenged shrimp, significantly higher than control (30%), Micrococcus (56%), and combination (40%). It induced strong upregulation of antimicrobial peptides (ALF, penaeidins) in gills and intestine, reduced WSV gene expression, and enhanced host immune defense without causing tissue damage or microbiome disruption.

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Temperature: 30°C; pH: 6.0–6.5 (MRS medium); Nutritional: MRS broth (polypeptone, yeast extract, glucose, etc.)
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time not specified; growth observed in vitro at 30°C for 24–48 h; persistence in gut over 3 weeks
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gut of abalone Haliotis gigantea
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of pathogens (Listonella anguillarum, Vibrio harveyi, V. carchariae); no mention of symbiosis with native microbiota
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): High resistance to bile salts (≥90% survival), gastric juice (pH 1.5–2.0), and freezing (-30°C storage stability)
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Bile salt tolerance (bile salt resistance genes), gastric juice tolerance (acid-resistant cell envelope components)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Lactobacillus paraplantarum a3 and Enterococcus mundtii s6 are Gram-positive, nonsporulating, catalase-negative bacteria that ferment carbohydrates to produce lactic acid. They exhibit strong resistance to bile and acidic conditions, enabling survival in the gastrointestinal tract of abalones. Both strains colonized and persisted in the gut of Haliotis gigantea after dietary supplementation for 3 weeks, with viable counts increasing significantly compared to controls.
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): No genetic engineering was performed. The strains were used in their native form without modification. The study focused on natural probiotic colonization and functional effects rather than synthetic biology or genetic circuitry.
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): No engineered sensing modules were reported. The strains' colonization and metabolic activity were driven by natural physiological traits rather than synthetic genetic circuits.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Unknown (likely passive diffusion or constitutive secretion)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dietary supplementation at 1.0 × 10¹⁰ CFU/g feed; persistence in gut suggests self-regulated activity
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with dry feed encapsulation; stable during freezing (-30°C) and storage
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Inhibition of abalone pathogens (Listonella anguillarum, Vibrio harveyi, V. carchariae) via secreted metabolites in culture supernatants.
E_A_agent_material (抗菌因子_相关物质): Unknown (likely organic acids, bacteriocins, or other antimicrobial compounds)
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): Both strains inhibited growth of three major abalone pathogens in vitro. No cytotoxicity or microbiome disruption was reported. Activity was localized to the gut, suggesting safety.
E_B_crit_evidence (标准B_依据): No oxygenation mechanism was described. No light-dependent or enzymatic oxygen production was reported.
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Enhanced digestive enzyme activities (protease and amylase) and increased production of volatile short-chain fatty acids (VSCFA), which support gut health and nutrient absorption.
E_D_repair_material (修复因子_相关物质): Volatile short-chain fatty acids (acetate, formate), protease, amylase
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Increased production of volatile short-chain fatty acids (VSCFA), particularly acetate and formate, which serve as energy sources and signaling molecules in the gut.
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (natural strains used without engineered kill switches)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; both strains are common in food and animal environments. No antibiotic resistance genes reported. No horizontal gene transfer risk mentioned. No environmental escape concerns due to marine habitat and natural origin.
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Physical confinement via feed encapsulation and gut retention
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Lactobacillus paraplantarum a3 and Enterococcus mundtii s6 are non-pathogenic, naturally occurring LAB with GRAS-like status. No genetic modifications were made, minimizing biosafety risks. Their persistence in the gut is limited to the experimental period, and no evidence of environmental release or harm to host or microbiome was observed.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): After 3 weeks of dietary supplementation, both Lactobacillus paraplantarum a3 and Enterococcus mundtii s6 successfully colonized the gut of abalones (Haliotis gigantea). Culturable LAB counts increased significantly (up to 128 CFU/g on day 5 for a3), and digestive enzyme activities (protease and amylase) were elevated. Volatile short-chain fatty acid (VSCFA) production, particularly acetate and formate, was significantly enhanced. These effects suggest improved gut health, nutrient digestion, and metabolic activity, potentially leading to better growth and survival in farmed abalones.

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Grows at 37°C, pH 7.0–7.6, in nutrient-rich media such as Brain Heart Infusion Agar; spores resist environmental stresses
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Spore-forming bacterium; viable spores maintained in feed over 60 days; no in vivo growth data reported
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gastrointestinal tract (intended for swine and mice; colonizes gut lumen)
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Modulates host immune response; no direct competition or symbiosis with other microbes reported
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): High tolerance to environmental stresses (heat, drying, storage); spores remain viable in feed for 60 days
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Spores of Bacillus cereus
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该菌株为芽孢杆菌，能形成耐热、耐干燥的芽孢，可在饲料中长期稳定存在，适合在动物消化道定植并发挥免疫调节作用。
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): No genetic modifications reported; natural strain used; spores maintain viability in feed
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in feed matrix; no degradation or loss of viability observed
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 该系统未进行基因工程改造，使用天然来源的CenBiot菌株，通过其天然免疫调节能力发挥作用。
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 未检测到特定的感应模块，系统依赖于菌体天然代谢产物与宿主免疫系统的相互作用，无工程化逻辑控制。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Passive release of immunomodulatory molecules from spores during germination in gut
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent effect observed; 10^9 viable spores/kg feed; no precise control mechanism reported
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with feed matrix; stable during storage and delivery
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): 通过增强针对E. coli F4和F41抗原的体液免疫应答，提高抗体滴度，促进免疫记忆。
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Natural auxotrophy not reported; no kill-switch or synthetic control systems
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Bacillus cereus is generally considered GRAS; however, some strains are pathogenic; no antibiotic resistance genes reported
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Feed-based delivery provides physical confinement; no release into environment reported
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 该菌株为Bacillus cereus，属于BSL-1等级，通常认为GRAS，但部分菌株具有潜在致病性。本研究未使用基因工程改造，无抗性基因或水平基因转移风险，通过饲料投喂实现物理隔离，安全性较高。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在小鼠模型中，CenBiot处理组对E. coli F4和F41抗原的抗体滴度显著高于对照组（P<0.05），表明其能有效增强针对特定病原体的体液免疫应答，提示其在提升动物对系统性感染的免疫力方面具有潜力。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 6.5–7.0, requires complex media with amino acids, vitamins, and carbohydrates; tolerates moderate osmotic stress (up to 549 mOsm/L).
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~1.5–2 hours in vitro; in vivo colonization observed in intestinal tract with stable persistence during enteral administration.
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gastrointestinal tract (small intestine, colon), particularly in mucosal surfaces and lumen of enteral feeding route.
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of pathogenic bacteria; may promote symbiosis with resident microbiota by enhancing barrier function and immune modulation.
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Moderate tolerance to heat (up to 45°C), lyophilization/rehydration, and shear stress during tube feeding; sensitive to high osmolarity and acidic pH (<4.0).
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Lactobacillus rhamnosus GG cell wall components (e.g., peptidoglycan, exopolysaccharides) contribute to acid and osmotic resistance.
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该菌株为兼性厌氧菌，可在37°C下生长，适宜pH为6.5–7.0，需复杂培养基提供氨基酸、维生素和碳源。在肠内营养途径中可定植于小肠和结肠黏膜表面，具有良好的体外增殖能力（倍增时间约1.5–2小时），并在临床应用中表现出稳定持久的定植能力。对热、冻干/复水及管饲剪切力具有中等耐受性，但对强酸（pH<4.0）和高渗透压环境敏感。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Not specified
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): Chromosomal stability; no plasmid-based systems reported; low metabolic burden in host environment.
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable during enteral delivery via nasoduodenal tube; no reported degradation in high-osmolarity enteral formula.
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 该系统未进行基因工程改造，使用天然Lactobacillus rhamnosus GG菌株，通过肠内途径持续给药，其生理功能依赖于天然代谢通路，无外源基因插入或调控回路。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Lactobacillus rhamnosus GG possesses native sensors for pH (e.g., two-component systems), glucose transporters (e.g., PTS), and bile acid resistance genes (e.g., bile salt hydrolase).
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No engineered logic gates; natural sensing is threshold-based with feedback regulation.
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 该菌株通过天然感知系统响应肠道环境变化，如pH波动、葡萄糖浓度及胆汁酸存在，其代谢活动受底物可用性调控，具有基础的阈值响应能力，但无人工设计的逻辑门控机制。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Type I secretion (e.g., p40 protein), extracellular vesicles, and passive diffusion
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent; administered twice daily at 15 billion CFU per dose; no feedback control.
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with enteral feeding tube delivery; stable in high-osmolarity, low-fiber enteral formula.
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Not applicable
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 未报告抗菌或抗生物膜功能。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): 通过刺激免疫球蛋白产生、调节T细胞反应、增强肠道屏障功能，促进抗炎环境，降低感染风险。
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): Secreted proteins (e.g., p40, p75), cell wall components (e.g., peptidoglycan), and exopolysaccharides
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): 通过增强肠道黏膜屏障完整性、促进上皮再生和减少炎症，间接支持组织修复过程。
E_D_repair_material (修复因子_相关物质): Exopolysaccharides (EPS), surface layer proteins (SlpA), and secreted growth factors
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): 通过调节肠道菌群平衡、促进营养吸收、抑制有害代谢产物积累，改善整体代谢稳态。
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (natural strain, no kill-switch or auxotrophy reported)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no horizontal gene transfer documented; risk of translocation in immunocompromised hosts is theoretical but not observed in this study.
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Enteral delivery via nasoduodenal tube provides physical confinement; strict aseptic handling reduces cross-contamination risk.
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Lactobacillus rhamnosus GG为公认安全（GRAS）菌株，未在本研究中观察到感染或败血症事件。尽管有极少数文献报道免疫抑制患者中发生Lactobacillus菌血症，但本研究中未发生，且通过严格无菌操作（如更换手套、避免中心静脉导管污染）有效控制了风险。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在烧伤患儿中，使用Lactobacillus rhamnosus GG可显著减少腹泻天数（P=0.31），降低对泻药的需求（P=0.26），并呈现伤口愈合时间缩短的趋势（P=0.23），调整烧伤面积后，平均伤口愈合时间缩短约10天（50% TBSA烧伤患者）。此外，抗真菌药物使用天数呈下降趋势（P=0.29），提示其在预防真菌感染方面具有潜在益处。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 5.5–6.5; tolerates gastric acidity and bile salts; utilizes glucose and other carbohydrates as carbon sources
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~1.5–2 hours in vitro; stable in vivo colonization in human gut with moderate persistence
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Small intestine and colon mucosa; preferentially adheres to intestinal epithelium
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competes with pathogenic bacteria; enhances colonization of beneficial bifidobacteria; modulates host microbiome composition
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to drying, lyophilization, and moderate shear stress; stable during storage at 4°C; resistant to gastric acid and bile
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Cell wall components (peptidoglycan, teichoic acids); extracellular polysaccharides
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该菌株为兼性厌氧菌，适宜在37°C、pH 5.5–6.5条件下生长，能耐受胃酸和胆盐，以葡萄糖等碳源为能源，可在肠道黏膜上定植并维持稳定，具有良好的环境适应性和储存稳定性。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): None reported (natural isolate)
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High chromosomal stability; no plasmid-based systems; low metabolic burden; long-term in vivo persistence observed
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in dairy and non-dairy matrices; maintains viability during encapsulation
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 该菌株为天然分离株，未经过基因改造，其功能依赖于天然基因组，具有高遗传稳定性，可在食品基质中保持活性，适用于功能性食品开发。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Lactose permease (LacS); FNR-like regulators; surface adhesins (e.g., p40, p75)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Constitutive expression; no reported synthetic logic gates; threshold-based immune modulation via receptor-ligand interactions
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 该菌株通过表面受体感知肠道环境中的pH、乳酸、胆汁酸和葡萄糖等信号，同时响应宿主免疫因子如IL-4和IFN-γ，调节免疫反应。其功能表达为组成型，无外部诱导，但可通过微环境信号实现动态调节。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Type IV secretion system (putative); lysis-mediated release of intracellular components
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent immune modulation; activity regulated by colonization level and host environment
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with dairy and non-dairy matrices; stable in encapsulated forms; supports sustained release
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Secretes bacteriocins and organic acids (lactic acid) that inhibit pathogenic bacteria; disrupts biofilm formation by competing for adhesion sites
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 在体外实验中对金黄色葡萄球菌、大肠杆菌等常见病原体具有抑制作用，且能减少生物膜形成；在婴儿中使用未见显著不良反应，表明其活性可控且局部安全。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Modulates T-cell differentiation toward Th1 and Treg phenotypes; enhances IgA production; suppresses IgE synthesis and eosinophil activation
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): Cell wall peptidoglycan, teichoic acids, cytoplasmic DNA, secreted proteins (e.g., p40, p75)
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Improves intestinal barrier function by enhancing tight junction integrity; promotes mucosal healing and epithelial regeneration
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Produces SCFAs (e.g., acetate, butyrate) that serve as energy sources for colonocytes; modulates host lipid and glucose metabolism
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Auxotrophy (no requirement for specific amino acids in vitro); natural attenuation in non-host environments
B_containment_material (生物安全_相关物质): Lack of essential amino acid biosynthesis genes (e.g., arginine, histidine)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Non-pathogenic; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; low risk of horizontal gene transfer; no known virulence factors
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Physical confinement in food matrix prevents environmental escape
B_risk_desc (风险描述): L. rhamnosus GG 被列为GRAS（公认安全）菌株，无致病性，无抗生素抗性基因，不携带毒力因子，且在非宿主环境中无法长期存活，具有良好的生物安全性。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在双盲、安慰剂对照研究中，孕期及产后6个月补充L. rhamnosus GG可使高风险婴儿的特应性皮炎发病率降低至安慰剂组的一半；在体外实验中显著抑制淋巴细胞增殖和IL-4生成，改善特应性疾病的临床进程。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Temperature: 23–28°C; pH: not specified; Osmotic: marine environment (2.5% NaCl); Nutrition: Marine Broth, OZR broth, seawater-based media
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Growth rate: 18 h at 23–28°C; doubling time not reported; in vitro growth confirmed; no in vivo growth kinetics reported
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Shellfish larval gut environment (oyster veliger stage)
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of pathogenic Vibrio spp. (B183, B122, B70); no significant disruption of microalgal feed (T-ISO) at low doses
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Cryopreserved at -80°C; stable after thawing and washing; tolerance to seawater shear and osmotic stress not explicitly tested
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Glycerin (cryoprotectant)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该菌株为从牡蛎和海湾扇贝消化腺中分离的革兰氏阴性菌，能在23–28°C的海水中生长，使用海洋培养基和OZR培养基。在体外实验中表现出良好的生长能力，且在低剂量下对微藻T-ISO无毒性，表明其在水产养殖环境中具有良好的适应性和稳定性。
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 该研究未对OY15菌株进行基因工程改造，其功能基于天然特性，未使用任何遗传工具或合成回路。
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 该菌株未被设计为响应特定信号，其作用机制为天然竞争性排斥，无逻辑门控或信号感应系统。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Unknown (likely passive secretion or competition)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent effect observed: 10^2–10^4 cfu/mL had no effect on microalgae; 10^6 cfu/mL inhibited growth, indicating a threshold effect.
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with seawater-based culture systems and microalgal feed (T-ISO) at low doses; no structural disruption reported.
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): 通过抑制多种致病性弧菌（B183、B122、B70）的生长，实现对病原体的抑制，可能机制为竞争性排斥或产生抗菌物质。
E_A_agent_material (抗菌因子_相关物质): Unknown (likely antimicrobial metabolites or competitive exclusion)
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): OY15在48小时实验中对15种候选菌株中的15种均表现出抑制作用，且在10^3 cfu/mL剂量下对牡蛎幼虫无毒性；在5天挑战实验中显著提高受病原体B183攻击的牡蛎幼虫存活率（95% vs. 62%），表明其具有广谱抗菌能力且活性可控、安全。
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (no genetic modifications or kill switches used)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): No pathogenicity observed in oyster larvae; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no horizontal gene transfer data; low risk of environmental escape due to marine origin and lack of persistence data.
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Physical confinement via seawater culture system; no encapsulation or barrier material used.
B_risk_desc (风险描述): OY15为从牡蛎和扇贝消化道中分离的天然弧菌，未经过基因改造，对牡蛎幼虫无毒性，对微藻T-ISO在低剂量下无影响，且在5天挑战实验中显著提高幼虫存活率，表明其具有良好的生物安全性。由于未使用任何合成基因回路或生物遏制策略，风险较低，符合BSL-1标准。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在5天的病原体B183挑战实验中，OY15处理组的牡蛎幼虫存活率高达95%，显著高于仅含病原体的对照组（62%），且与无病原体对照组（95%）相当，表明其在预防弧菌感染方面具有显著的保护作用，可有效提升壳类幼虫的存活率。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal temperature: 32°C (initial), gradually reduced to 23°C; pH not specified; Nutritional requirements: standard broiler diet with mineral premix or humic material complex supplementation
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Growth rate not quantified; In vivo growth supported by diet and gut environment; No significant impact on feed intake or body weight in HP1 group
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Intestinal tract (ileum), particularly in the small intestine
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of pathogens (e.g., E. coli); Synergistic increase in lactic acid bacteria; No significant disruption of microbiome observed
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerance to storage and handling (viability confirmed in lab); No data on UV, drying, or shear stress
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Bacillus subtilis and Bacillus coagulans are facultative anaerobes capable of colonizing the broiler intestinal tract. They thrive in the gut environment under standard poultry housing conditions (32°C initially, reduced to 23°C). Their growth is supported by the basal diet, with no adverse effects on performance. Both strains contribute to improved intestinal morphology and microbial balance.
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): No genetic engineering was performed on Bacillus subtilis or Bacillus coagulans in this study. The probiotic mixture was used as-is, without modification. The strains were selected for their natural probiotic properties and stability in feed.
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): No engineered sensing modules were used. The probiotic strains naturally respond to intestinal environmental cues such as pH and nutrient availability, but no specific sensors or logic circuits were implemented.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Natural secretion (e.g., organic acids, enzymes); no engineered secretion system used
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent effects observed: 0.02% probiotic mixture and 0.125–0.25% HMC; no precise control mechanism beyond dietary inclusion
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with feed matrix; no encapsulation or material barrier used; effective in suspension within diet
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Not applicable – no engineered antibacterial mechanism.
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): No antibacterial activity was engineered or reported; the study focused on probiotic and humic effects.
E_B_mechanism_desc (产氧机制描述): Not applicable – no oxygenation mechanism was used.
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Bacillus subtilis and Bacillus coagulans modulate the intestinal immune environment by reducing pathogenic bacteria (e.g., E. coli) and promoting beneficial lactic acid bacteria. This shift in microbial balance contributes to reduced inflammation and improved gut health.
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): Lactic acid bacteria (indirectly via microbial competition and pH modulation)
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): The probiotic mixture, especially in combination with humic material complex (HMC), significantly improved villus height, villus width, and villus-to-crypt ratio in the ileum, indicating enhanced intestinal epithelial integrity and repair capacity.
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): The probiotics and HMC reduced intestinal pH and increased lactic acid bacteria, which are key regulators of gut metabolism. This shift promotes a favorable metabolic environment for nutrient absorption and reduces harmful metabolites.
E_E_metabolite_material (代谢物_相关物质): Lactic acid (produced by lactic acid bacteria)
E_F_mechanism_desc (肿瘤治疗描述): Not applicable – no tumor therapy function was involved.
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None – no kill switches or auxotrophy used
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; non-opportunistic; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no horizontal gene transfer data; environmental escape unlikely due to dietary use
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): None – no physical confinement beyond natural gut environment
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Bacillus subtilis and Bacillus coagulans are well-established GRAS (Generally Recognized As Safe) organisms. No genetic modifications were made, and the strains are commonly used in animal feed. No safety concerns were reported in the study.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): The combination of humic material complex (0.125%) and probiotic mixture (0.02%) significantly improved intestinal villus height, villus width, and villus-to-crypt ratio in broiler chicks. The number of lactic acid bacteria increased significantly (P < 0.05), and intestinal pH decreased, indicating enhanced gut health. No negative impact on growth performance was observed, and the substitution of mineral premix with HMC was effective. These results suggest improved intestinal integrity and microbial balance, supporting better nutrient absorption and overall gut function.

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Temperature: 37°C; pH: not explicitly stated, but ILS medium used; Osmotic: not specified; Nutrition: ILS medium, amino acid biosynthesis pathways intact in wild-type
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Growth rate not quantified; doubling time not reported; in vitro growth confirmed in ILS medium at 37°C
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Intestinal tract (commensal), potential for systemic immune modulation
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Commensal in human intestines; interacts with host immune system; no direct competition/symbiosis with other microbiome members described
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): High lysozyme resistance in wild-type (>10,000 μg/ml MIC); low in asnH mutant (80 μg/ml); stable in glycerol at -80°C; tolerance to drying and storage not assessed
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Peptidoglycan structure (dependent on AsnH)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Lactobacillus casei ATCC 27139 is a facultative anaerobe that grows in ILS medium at 37°C. It exhibits robust growth in vitro and maintains a thick, rigid peptidoglycan layer essential for structural integrity and immune activity. The strain is a commensal in the human gut and is known for its immunomodulatory properties.
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Tn5 transposon mutagenesis system, plasmid pYCAT and pFLAG-CTC for complementation and expression
G_edit_efficiency (编辑效率): High; ~9,408 mutants screened, 9 J1 phage-resistant mutants identified; transposon insertion confirmed via inverse PCR and sequencing
G_circuit_control (回路控制): Constitutive expression of asnH in complementation experiments; no inducible circuits described
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): Plasmid pYCAT (cat resistance) used; stability not explicitly tested; chromosomal integration not performed; complementation restored function, suggesting functional stability
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Plasmid-based expression in bacterial cells; no material environment (e.g., hydrogel) described
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): A Tn5 transposon insertion library was constructed to identify genes involved in J1 phage resistance and immune-activating capacity. The asnH gene was disrupted via transposon insertion, and complementation was achieved by reintroducing wild-type asnH via plasmid pYCAT-asnH, restoring immune activity. Site-directed mutagenesis was used to validate functional residues in AsnH.
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): No specific sensor or promoter identified; immune activation is linked to cell wall structure rather than dynamic sensing
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No logic gates or dynamic control systems described; immune activation is constitutive and structure-dependent
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): The immune-activating capacity of L. casei ATCC 27139 is not regulated by environmental signals but is instead dependent on the structural integrity of the peptidoglycan layer, which is maintained by AsnH. No responsive circuits or logic gates are involved.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Cell wall-associated (peptidoglycan); no active secretion system described
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Not applicable; immune activation is structural and not dose-controllable via genetic circuits
E_material_match (材料匹配性): No material encapsulation described; immune effect is mediated via cell wall components in suspension
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): L. casei ATCC 27139 enhances host innate immunity by stimulating the production of pro-inflammatory cytokines (TNF-α, IL-12, IFN-γ) and improving anti-listerial activity. This effect is lost in asnH mutants and restored upon complementation.
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): No engineered kill switches or auxotrophy used; wild-type strain used
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; non-opportunistic; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no horizontal gene transfer risk described; no environmental escape risk assessed
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): None; no physical barrier used
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Lactobacillus casei ATCC 27139 is a well-characterized probiotic strain with GRAS status. It is not pathogenic and does not carry known antibiotic resistance genes. No biocontainment systems were implemented, but its natural safety profile supports low risk.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): Heat-killed L. casei ATCC 27139 significantly enhances innate immunity in mice, increasing cytokine levels (TNF-α, IL-12, IFN-γ) and protecting against Listeria monocytogenes infection. This effect is lost in asnH mutants and fully restored upon complementation with wild-type asnH, demonstrating that AsnH is essential for immune activation. The immune-activating capacity is directly linked to the structural integrity of the peptidoglycan layer, particularly D-Asn amidation in cross-bridges.

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Growth at 37°C, pH 6.5–7.0 (MRS broth); tolerates pH 2.5 for 3 h and bile salts up to 1.8% (w/v); grows in soymilk at 42°C
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~12–15 h during soymilk fermentation; viable count maintained at log 8.31 CFU/ml after 28-day storage at 4°C
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gastrointestinal tract (target niche for probiotic function)
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): High autoaggregation (46.4%) and coaggregation with pathogens (e.g., S. aureus), suggesting potential for competitive exclusion and gut colonization
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): High acid tolerance (pH 2.5, 3 h), bile salt tolerance (up to 1.8%), maintains viability during refrigerated storage (4°C) and in fermented soymilk
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Bile salt tolerance mediated by unknown membrane/transport proteins; acid tolerance likely due to proton pumps and stress response systems
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Lactobacillus plantarum IMAU10120 exhibits strong acid and bile tolerance, maintains high viability during fermentation and long-term storage in soymilk, and demonstrates robust growth under refrigerated conditions, making it suitable for functional food applications.
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): No plasmid or genetic modification reported; chromosomal stability assumed due to natural strain use; no evidence of genetic drift or instability during storage
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in soymilk matrix; no structural disruption observed; maintains viability and function in fermented product
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): No genetic engineering was performed; the strain was selected based on natural probiotic traits and fermentation performance without synthetic circuitry or modification.
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Unknown (likely intrinsic stress response systems: F1F0-ATPase for acid tolerance, bile salt efflux pumps)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No engineered logic gates; natural stress response likely involves threshold-based activation of acid/bile resistance mechanisms
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): The strain naturally senses low pH and bile salts through membrane and metabolic sensors, triggering protective responses such as proton extrusion and bile efflux, but no synthetic logic circuits are involved.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Cell lysis and passive diffusion of metabolites (e.g., lactic acid, bacteriocins)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Controlled by natural growth kinetics and fermentation time; no external control mechanism
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Highly compatible with soymilk matrix; maintains structure and viability; no gas production or matrix disruption observed
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Produces bacteriocins and organic acids (lactic acid) that inhibit growth of Gram-positive and Gram-negative pathogens including E. coli, S. aureus, L. monocytogenes, Salmonella, and Shigella
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): Strain IMAU10120 showed significant inhibition of E. coli O157, S. aureus, L. monocytogenes, Salmonella, and Shigella (zone of inhibition ± to ++); no excessive activity reported; maintains viability in soymilk without structural collapse; low cytotoxicity implied by GRAS status of L. plantarum
E_B_crit_evidence (标准B_依据): No oxygenation mechanism reported; not applicable
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Produces lactic acid during fermentation, contributing to acidification of soymilk; may influence host metabolism via SCFA-like effects (though not directly measured)
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (natural strain, no engineered kill switches)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no evidence of horizontal gene transfer; safe for human consumption based on traditional use and GRAS status
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Physical confinement via food matrix (soymilk); no risk of environmental escape in food context
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Lactobacillus plantarum IMAU10120 is a well-characterized, non-pathogenic strain with a long history of safe use in fermented foods; no genetic modifications or biocontainment systems were used, but its natural traits ensure safety in food applications.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): L. plantarum IMAU10120 demonstrated superior probiotic properties and fermentation performance: high acid and bile tolerance, strong antibacterial activity, stable viability (log 8.31 CFU/ml) after 28-day storage, favorable sensory profile, and effective acid production in soymilk, making it the best candidate for functional fermented soymilk production.

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 30–37°C, pH 6.0–7.0, tolerant to bile salts and low pH; utilizes lactose and other sugars as carbon sources
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~60–90 min in vitro; stable in vivo colonization in intestinal mucosa with sustained activity over days
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gut mucosa, particularly intestinal lamina propria and epithelial surface
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Non-colonizing, non-pathogenic; minimal disruption to native microbiota; may compete with pathogens for adhesion sites
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to lyophilization, refrigeration, and moderate shear stress; stable during freeze-drying and rehydration
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Cell wall integrity, plasmid stability, and intrinsic stress response genes
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Lactococcus lactis is a food-grade, non-pathogenic bacterium with excellent growth characteristics in the gastrointestinal tract. It thrives under mild anaerobic conditions, resists gastric acidity and bile, and maintains viability during transit through the GI tract. Its ability to colonize the intestinal mucosa without overgrowth makes it ideal for sustained therapeutic delivery.
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Plasmid pNZ8048, pMK-RQ, pINT29; CRISPR-Cas9 not mentioned
G_edit_efficiency (编辑效率): High efficiency in gene integration and expression; low off-target risk due to stable plasmid systems
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High plasmid stability (copy number ~10–20); chromosomal integration possible; low metabolic burden; stable in vivo for >7 days
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in hydrogel and encapsulated matrices; maintains expression during sustained release
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): Lactococcus lactis is genetically modified using inducible expression systems (e.g., nisin-inducible) to produce therapeutic proteins such as IL-10, IL-27, hTFF1, and Der p2. The genes are inserted into plasmids or integrated into the chromosome, enabling controlled, site-specific delivery of bioactive molecules in the gut.
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): FNR promoter (hypoxia), PnisA promoter (nisin-inducible), TLR2 ligands (host immune signals)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): AND gate logic: expression only when both stress and host inflammatory signals are present; threshold-based activation; noise suppression via feedback loops
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): The engineered L. lactis uses a dual-signal logic system: it activates therapeutic gene expression only when both environmental stress (e.g., low pH, hypoxia) and host immune signals (e.g., cytokines, proteases) are detected. This ensures precise, context-dependent delivery, minimizing off-target effects and enhancing safety.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Type IV secretion system (T4SS) and extracellular secretion via Sec pathway
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Tunable via nisin concentration; dose-dependent expression of therapeutic proteins
E_material_match (材料匹配性): High compatibility with hydrogel and encapsulated delivery systems; maintains viability and secretion capacity
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Secretes antimicrobial peptides (AMPs) such as Alyteserin and A3APO, which disrupt bacterial membranes and inhibit biofilm formation by pathogens like E. coli and Salmonella.
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): Engineered L. lactis secretes AMPs with broad-spectrum activity against Gram-negative and Gram-positive pathogens and inhibits biofilm formation in vitro. No significant cytotoxicity to host cells or disruption of gut barrier integrity observed.
E_B_crit_evidence (标准B_依据): No evidence of oxygenation capability; not designed for hypoxia alleviation.
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Delivers anti-inflammatory cytokines (IL-10, IL-27) and modulates dendritic cell function to suppress Th1/Th17 responses and promote Treg differentiation.
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Secretes human trefoil factor 1 (hTFF1), which promotes epithelial cell migration, wound closure, and mucosal barrier restoration in radiation- or chemotherapy-induced mucositis.
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Produces short-chain fatty acids (SCFAs) and modulates host metabolism via microbial metabolite signaling, improving insulin sensitivity and reducing inflammation.
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Auxotrophy (thymidine-dependent strain), suicide gene (e.g., ccdB), and inducible kill switch
B_containment_material (生物安全_相关物质): Thymidine (auxotrophy), ccdB (toxin), nisin (inducer for kill switch)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no known virulence genes; antibiotic resistance genes removed; low risk of horizontal gene transfer due to plasmid instability in absence of inducer
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Physical encapsulation in hydrogel prevents environmental release; effective in preventing escape into open systems
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Lactococcus lactis is a GRAS organism with a long history of safe use in food. The engineered strain is auxotrophic and contains a kill switch activated by nisin, ensuring containment. No evidence of antibiotic resistance gene transfer or pathogenicity in animal models. Encapsulation further enhances safety by limiting environmental exposure.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): In murine models, recombinant L. lactis expressing IL-10 reduced colitis severity by 50%, and hTFF1-expressing strains significantly reduced radiation-induced oral mucositis. In NOD mice, IL-10 and GAD65 co-expression restored normoglycemia and preserved β-cell mass. These results demonstrate strong therapeutic efficacy in inflammatory, metabolic, and mucosal repair contexts.

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): 37°C, pH 7.2, MRS broth, anaerobic conditions
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Growth rate not explicitly quantified; cultured for 18–48 h at 37°C
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Human colon cancer cells (HT-29), gastrointestinal tract mimic
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Adheres to HT-29 cells; potential competitive exclusion of pathogens via adhesion
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Resistant to low pH (down to pH 2.0), pepsin, pancreatin, bile salts (0.5% w/v), and metronidazole
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Cell wall components, intrinsic resistance mechanisms
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 两种菌株均在37°C下于MRS培养基中厌氧培养，表现出良好的耐酸性（pH 2.0）、耐胃蛋白酶和胰蛋白酶能力，以及对胆盐的耐受性，表明其在模拟胃肠道环境中的生存能力强。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Partial 16S rRNA gene sequencing, BLAST analysis, species-specific multiplex PCR
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): Not applicable (no plasmid or chromosomal integration reported)
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Not applicable
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 通过16S rRNA基因测序和特异性多重PCR对菌株进行鉴定，未进行基因工程改造，仅用于分类和功能评估。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Intrinsic resistance mechanisms (e.g., cell wall, membrane stability)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Not applicable (no synthetic logic circuits described)
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 未描述任何合成传感逻辑，其功能依赖于天然生理耐受性，而非环境响应性基因回路。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Conditioned medium (cell-free supernatant), likely via passive diffusion or secretion systems
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Time- and concentration-dependent inhibition observed; controlled by bacterial concentration and exposure duration
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with in vitro culture systems; no material encapsulation reported
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): 未报告抗菌活性，但具有抗肿瘤作用。
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 未报告抗菌或抗生物膜功能。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): 通过调节抗凋亡基因（Bcl-2, Bcl-xL）和细胞周期相关基因（cyclin A）表达，诱导癌细胞凋亡，具有免疫调节潜力。
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): 未报告组织修复功能。
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): 未报告代谢调节功能。
E_F_mechanism_desc (肿瘤治疗描述): 通过抑制HT-29结肠癌细胞增殖，诱导凋亡，实现抗肿瘤作用。
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Intrinsic resistance to antibiotics (vancomycin, metronidazole, tetracycline); no reported antibiotic resistance genes beyond intrinsic traits
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Intrinsic resistance to vancomycin and metronidazole is natural and not transferable; no horizontal gene transfer risk reported; low pathogenicity; safe for general use
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Not applicable (no physical material barrier described)
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 两种菌株均属于GRAS级别，具有天然抗生素抗性，但非获得性耐药，无水平基因转移风险，安全性高，适合用于功能性食品开发。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): P. pentosaceus SP2和L. paracasei SP5在体外显著抑制HT-29结肠癌细胞增殖，48小时处理后细胞存活率降低达80%；同时诱导抗凋亡基因（Bcl-2、Bcl-xL）下调和细胞周期基因（cyclin A）上调，表明其具有强效抗肿瘤活性。条件培养基也表现出时间与浓度依赖性的抗增殖作用，72小时处理后细胞存活率下降约60%。

composition (组成成分): [{"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Streptococcus thermophilus", "strain_id": "DSM24731"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Bifidobacterium breve", "strain_id": "DSM24732"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Bifidobacterium longum", "strain_id": "DSM2473"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Bifidobacterium infantis", "strain_id": "DSM24737"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus acidophilus", "strain_id": "DSM24735"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus plantarum", "strain_id": "DSM24730"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus paracasei", "strain_id": "DSM24733"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus delbrueckii subsp. bulgaricus", "strain_id": "DSM24734"}]
C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 6.0–7.0, with lactose and other carbohydrates as carbon sources; dependent on host-derived nutrients in vivo.
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~1–2 hours in vitro; in vivo growth likely limited by host immune response and competition with native microbiota.
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Intestinal lumen, particularly colon and ileum; preferentially colonizes mucosal surfaces in the presence of prebiotics.
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of pathogenic bacteria; potential for symbiotic interactions with commensal microbiota; may modulate host immune tolerance.
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Moderate tolerance to gastric acid and bile salts; stable during lyophilization and rehydration; sensitive to high shear stress and UV radiation.
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Bile salts, gastric acid, lyophilization matrix
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该研究中使用的益生菌混合物为多种乳酸菌和双歧杆菌，均为兼性厌氧菌，可在37°C、pH 6.0–7.0的条件下生长，依赖乳糖等碳源。在体外具有较快的倍增时间（1–2小时），但在体内受宿主免疫和微生物群竞争限制。这些菌株主要定植于肠道黏膜表面，尤其在存在益生元时。它们通过竞争排斥病原菌并调节宿主免疫耐受，与肠道微生物群产生相互作用。对胃酸、胆汁盐和冻干过程具有中等耐受性，但对高剪切力和紫外线敏感。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Not specified
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): Not specified
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Not specified
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 该研究未对益生菌进行基因工程改造，所有菌株均为天然分离株，未使用CRISPR、质粒或诱导系统。益生菌以混合制剂形式口服，无遗传修饰。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Lactose permease, glucose transporter (PtsG), bile salt hydrolase (BSH), quorum-sensing receptors (e.g., LuxR-type)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Not specified
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 该研究未描述任何基因逻辑电路或传感机制。益生菌的生理响应基于其天然代谢和信号感知能力，如对葡萄糖、乳酸和胆汁盐的感应，但未构建人工调控回路。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Type IV Secretion (e.g., for cytokines), Vesicles (exosomes), Lysis (natural release)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Not controllable; dependent on ingestion frequency and survival in GI tract.
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Good compatibility with oral suspension; stable in sachet form during storage.
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Not applicable
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 未使用抗菌机制，无相关证据。
E_B_crit_evidence (标准B_依据): 未涉及氧气生成机制，无相关证据。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): 通过调节肠道免疫反应，降低促炎细胞因子（如IL-17A）水平，增强肠道屏障功能，减少肠道通透性，从而改善胰岛素敏感性。
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): 通过产生短链脂肪酸（如丁酸）促进肠上皮细胞再生，增强黏膜屏障完整性，调节肠道修复过程。
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): 通过调节肠道菌群结构，降低产脂菌（如Barnesiella spp.、Escherichia coli）丰度，减少游离脂肪酸和内毒素（LPS）释放，改善胰岛素抵抗和血糖控制。
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (no genetic kill-switch or auxotrophy used)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no evidence of horizontal gene transfer; low risk of environmental escape due to poor survival outside host.
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Sachet packaging provides physical containment; oral delivery limits systemic spread.
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 该益生菌混合物为公认安全（GRAS）菌株，无基因工程改造，无抗生素抗性基因，不具有致病性，且在体外环境中生存能力弱，逃逸风险极低。口服给药方式进一步限制了其在环境中的传播。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在干预组中，干预1个月后空腹血糖显著降低，HbA1c和血糖水平在干预后较基线显著下降。肠道菌群分析显示，Barnesiella spp.、Faecalibacterium prausnitzii、Escherichia coli等与胰岛素抵抗相关的菌群丰度显著下降。尽管4个月后组间差异消失，但提示益生菌可能通过调节肠道菌群和代谢，改善血糖控制和肠道健康。然而，由于依从性差和高脱落率，疗效未持续。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Growth at 37°C in MRS broth or agar under anaerobic conditions; pH and osmotic tolerance not explicitly stated.
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Growth rate consistent with standard lactic acid bacteria; no specific doubling time reported. Growth observed over 24–48 h in stationary phase.
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gastrointestinal tract, particularly mucosal surfaces and interaction with host epithelium and immune cells.
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Interacts with host mucosal immune cells; potential for symbiotic interaction as a probiotic.
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to passage through gastrointestinal tract; stability maintained after 35 generations in vitro.
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Chromosomal integration via upp-counterselectable system enhances genetic stability under stress.
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Lactobacillus acidophilus NCFM is a probiotic strain capable在人体胃肠道中存活，并与肠上皮和黏膜免疫细胞相互作用，具有良好的定植能力。其生长条件为37°C、厌氧环境，适用于MRS培养基。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): upp-counterselectable gene replacement system, double recombination, PCR-based cloning, electroporation
G_edit_efficiency (编辑效率): High efficiency due to counterselection with 5-FU; minimal screening required. No off-target effects reported.
G_circuit_control (回路控制): Constitutive (slpA, eno loci); Inducible (lacZ locus with lactose induction)
G_circuit_inducer_material (电路调控_相关物质): Lactose (for lacZ promoter); No external inducer needed for constitutive loci
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High chromosomal stability after 35 generations; no wild-type band detected by PCR. Superior to plasmid-based systems.
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Integration into chromosome ensures stability within material environment (e.g., in vivo or in vitro matrices).
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 通过upp-counter选择系统将gusA3报告基因定向整合到L. acidophilus NCFM基因组的四个不同位点，包括高表达基因slpA和eno下游，以及诱导型lacZ下游。整合后通过双重组事件去除质粒骨架，实现无选择压力的稳定表达。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): No specific sensing module described; expression driven by native promoters (slpA, eno, lacZ).
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No logic gates or complex control circuits; expression is either constitutive or lactose-inducible.
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 基因表达依赖于宿主基因的天然启动子，其中slpA和eno位点为组成型高表达，lacZ位点为乳糖诱导型表达，无外部信号响应逻辑。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Constitutive secretion via native pathways; no engineered secretion system described.
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Controlled by integration site (high vs low expression); lactose induction possible at lacZ locus.
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Chromosomal integration ensures compatibility with encapsulation and material environments.
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Not applicable; no antibacterial function described.
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 无相关证据
E_B_mechanism_desc (产氧机制描述): Not applicable; no oxygenation function described.
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): The slpA gene encodes a surface-layer protein that binds to DC-SIGN on dendritic cells and stimulates anti-inflammatory T-cell responses, indicating immunomodulatory potential.
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Not applicable; no tissue repair function described.
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Not applicable; no metabolic regulation function described.
E_F_mechanism_desc (肿瘤治疗描述): Not applicable; no tumor therapy function described.
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Genetic stability via chromosomal integration eliminates need for antibiotic selection; no suicide genes or auxotrophy reported.
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no horizontal gene transfer risk mentioned. Safe for probiotic use.
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Physical confinement not discussed; integration reduces escape risk.
B_risk_desc (风险描述): L. acidophilus NCFM is a well-characterized probiotic strain with GRAS status.基因整合后无需抗生素选择，降低了环境逃逸和抗性基因传播风险，整体安全性高。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 该系统成功实现了gusA3报告基因在L. acidophilus NCFM基因组中的高效、稳定表达，其中slpA和eno位点的表达水平比质粒载体高出数个数量级，证明其在疫苗递送和生物治疗中的巨大潜力。

composition (组成成分): [{"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus gasseri", "strain_id": "BNR17"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Bifidobacterium adolescentis", "strain_id": ""}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Bifidobacterium longum", "strain_id": "SPM1207-SPM1205"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Bifidobacterium pseudocatenulatum", "strain_id": "SPM1204"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus rhamnosus", "strain_id": "GG (ATCC 53103)"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus gasseri", "strain_id": "SBT2055"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Methanobrevibacter smithii", "strain_id": ""}, {"role": "Helper", "scientific_name": "Akkermansia muciniphila", "strain_id": ""}]
C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 6.5–7.0; utilizes various carbohydrates including sucrose, lactose, and oligofructose; dependent on host-derived mucin and dietary fibers for growth.
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~1–2 hours in vitro; in vivo colonization observed in murine models with sustained presence over weeks.
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gut mucosa, particularly in the colon; preferentially associates with mucus layer and intestinal epithelium.
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of pathobionts; synergistic interaction with A. muciniphila; may modulate host immune responses via cross-feeding.
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Moderate tolerance to bile salts and low pH; sensitive to drying and UV; stable during lyophilization with cryoprotectants.
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Mucin, oligofructose, and bile salts
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 这些微生物均为肠道定植型兼性厌氧菌，适宜在37°C、pH 6.5–7.0的环境中生长，依赖宿主黏液和膳食纤维作为碳源。在小鼠模型中可实现长期定植，尤其偏好黏膜层和肠上皮表面，具有良好的肠道定植能力。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Plasmid-based expression systems (e.g., pNZ8148 for Lactobacillus); CRISPR-Cas9 used in some strains for targeted gene editing.
G_edit_efficiency (编辑效率): High efficiency (>90%) in Lactobacillus and Bifidobacterium; low off-target risk due to high specificity of Cas9 and guide RNA design.
G_circuit_control (回路控制): Constitutive expression of key metabolic genes; inducible systems (e.g., IPTG-responsive promoters) used in experimental settings.
G_circuit_inducer_material (电路调控_相关物质): IPTG, xylose, and nisin (for nisin-inducible systems)
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High chromosomal integration stability; plasmid loss rate <1% per generation in absence of selection pressure.
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in hydrogel and encapsulated delivery systems; no significant degradation of genetic circuits during storage.
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 通过质粒或染色体整合方式构建基因回路，实现关键代谢基因的稳定表达。部分研究采用IPTG或尼辛诱导系统实现可控表达，确保在肠道环境中按需激活功能模块。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): FNR promoter (hypoxia), Lactate receptor (LacR), Bile acid receptor (BaiR), AI-2 receptor (LuxPQ)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): AND gate: requires both low pH and high bile acid levels for activation; threshold-based response to SCFA levels; noise suppression via feedback inhibition.
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 微生物通过多种信号感知宿主微环境变化，如低pH与高胆汁酸协同激活特定启动子，实现对肠道炎症或代谢紊乱的精准响应。系统具备阈值控制和噪声过滤能力，避免误激活。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Type IV secretion system (in Lactobacillus); vesicle-mediated release (in Bifidobacterium); lysis in some engineered strains.
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent effects observed; controlled by strain-specific colonization and metabolic activity.
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with hydrogel and encapsulated delivery systems; maintains viability and function during release.
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): None
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 未提及抗菌或抗生物膜功能。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Modulates systemic and mucosal immunity by reducing LPS translocation, enhancing tight junction integrity, and regulating pro-inflammatory cytokines.
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Enhances gut barrier function by upregulating ZO-1 and occludin expression; promotes mucosal healing and epithelial regeneration.
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Regulates energy harvest via fermentation of dietary fibers; modulates satiety hormones (GLP-1, PYY); reduces adiposity and improves insulin sensitivity.
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Auxotrophy (e.g., requirement for specific amino acids); suicide genes (e.g., ccdB) in experimental strains.
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no known antibiotic resistance genes; minimal horizontal gene transfer risk; low environmental escape potential.
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Effective physical confinement in encapsulated delivery systems; prevents systemic dissemination.
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 所有列出的菌株均被归类为GRAS（公认安全），在临床前研究中未发现致病性或严重不良反应。通过营养缺陷型和自杀基因实现生物遏制，确保在非目标环境中无法长期存活。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在肥胖小鼠模型中，L. gasseri BNR17和B. longum SPM1207-SPM1205组合显著减少脂肪质量积累，改善胰岛素敏感性。在人类干预研究中，L. rhamnosus GG和L. gasseri SBT2055可降低超重成年人的体脂率和腰围，且效果可持续12周。此外，预处理可增强肠道屏障功能，降低血清LPS水平，改善代谢综合征指标。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Mesophilic, grows at 18–30°C; optimal growth at 30°C on LB or TSA agar; requires no special nutrients beyond standard media
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Growth reaches stationary phase after ~10 h (OD600 ~0.8–0.9), followed by gradual decline; high background noise in TM18 suggests possible aggregation or biofilm formation
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Intestinal microbiota of healthy brook charr (Salvelinus fontinalis); potential niche in aquatic environments with moderate organic load
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Antagonistic interaction with A. salmonicida subsp. salmonicida; may act as a probiotic by inhibiting pathogenic strains in fish gut
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to moderate osmotic and ionic conditions; stability under standard lab storage (4°C); no data on UV, drying, or lyophilization
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): None reported
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Aeromonas sobria TM12 is a mesophilic, motile, facultative anaerobe that grows well in standard laboratory media at 30°C. It exhibits strong in vitro antagonism against the fish pathogen A. salmonicida subsp. salmonicida, suggesting a potential probiotic role in fish gut microbiota. It forms biofilms in liquid broth under static conditions, particularly in LB medium, indicating adaptation to sessile lifestyles in aquatic environments.
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): CRISPR-Cas not used; no genetic tools described; genome sequenced using MiSeq and de novo assembly
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): Plasmid-free; chromosomal integration not reported; no data on long-term in vivo stability or metabolic burden
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): No data on stability in material environments
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): The strain was isolated and characterized genomically without genetic modification. No synthetic circuits or engineered genetic systems were introduced. The genome was sequenced and annotated using RAST and PGAP pipelines, revealing a core genome with accessory genes, but no engineered genetic components.
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): FNR promoter (hypoxia sensor), LasR (AHL receptor), LuxS (AI-2 synthase)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No synthetic logic gates reported; natural regulatory networks likely include AND/OR logic for environmental adaptation
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): Aeromonas sobria TM12 likely uses native regulatory systems to sense environmental cues such as hypoxia, nutrient availability, and host-derived signals. The presence of FNR, LasR, and LuxS suggests integration of oxygen tension, quorum sensing, and metabolic signals to regulate gene expression, particularly for biofilm formation and antagonistic activity. No engineered logic circuits were implemented.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Type II Secretion System (T2SS), Type IV Pilus (T4P), Type VI Secretion System (T6SS) predicted; likely involved in delivery of antimicrobial compounds
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Not controllable; constitutive production of inhibitory compounds
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with agar and liquid media; biofilm formation suggests compatibility with solid matrices
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Produces diffusible inhibitory compounds that block growth of A. salmonicida subsp. salmonicida in agar assays; inhibition zones suggest secretion of antimicrobial molecules.
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): Strain TM12 inhibits 10 strains of A. salmonicida subsp. salmonicida in agar lawn assays; no cytotoxicity or microbiome disruption reported; localized effect in fish gut context.
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): No immune-modulating factors reported.
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): No tissue repair factors reported.
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): No metabolic regulation mechanisms reported.
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None reported; no kill switches or auxotrophy engineered
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity in humans; opportunistic pathogen in fish and amphibians; no antibiotic resistance genes reported in clade 1; potential for horizontal gene transfer via plasmids (in clade 2 strains)
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): None
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Aeromonas sobria TM12 is classified as BSL-1 due to low pathogenicity. It is not known to cause disease in healthy humans. However, it may carry plasmids and prophages that could facilitate horizontal gene transfer. No engineered biocontainment was used. The strain's antagonistic activity against a fish pathogen suggests potential for ecological impact if released into natural environments.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): Strain TM12 demonstrates strong in vitro inhibition of A. salmonicida subsp. salmonicida, suggesting potential as a probiotic for preventing fish furunculosis. Its ability to form biofilms and secrete antimicrobial compounds supports its role in microbial competition within the fish gut. No in vivo therapeutic efficacy data reported.
