C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, neutral to slightly acidic pH (pH 6.5–7.0), moderate osmotic tolerance; utilizes complex carbohydrates as primary carbon sources
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~2–3 hours in vitro; consistent growth kinetics observed in simulated gut conditions
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Adult human gut, particularly mucosal surface and intestinal lumen
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Positive immunomodulatory interactions; enhances macrophage activity and intestinal function; likely competes with pathogenic bacteria via nutrient competition and niche exclusion
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Moderate tolerance to bile salts and low pH (gastric conditions); stable during lyophilization and rehydration; resistant to shear stress in suspension
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Glutamate decarboxylase (BBMN23_1411) and γ-aminobutyrate antiporter (BBMN23_1412) for acid resistance
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Bifidobacterium adolesentis BBMN23 是一种从百岁老人粪便中分离的益生菌，具有良好的肠道定植能力。其生长最适温度为37°C，pH 6.5–7.0，能有效利用复杂碳水化合物，对胆盐和酸性环境具有较强耐受性，适合在肠道环境中长期存活。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): None (natural strain, no reported genetic modifications)
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High chromosomal stability; no plasmids reported; natural genome is stable in vivo and in vitro
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): No engineered material coupling; natural strain compatible with standard probiotic delivery matrices
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 该菌株为天然分离菌株，未经过人工基因改造，其基因组完整且稳定，具备天然的益生特性，无需外源遗传工具即可实现功能表达。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Glutamate decarboxylase (BBMN23_1411) and γ-aminobutyrate antiporter (BBMN23_1412) for acid sensing; pilus-associated adhesins for mucosal recognition
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Constitutive expression; no reported synthetic logic circuits; natural sensing via metabolic and adhesion pathways
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): BBMN23通过其表面菌毛和黏附蛋白感知肠道黏液和胆汁酸，同时利用葡萄糖和复杂碳水化合物作为信号分子调节代谢活性，其酸耐受系统（GAD系统）在低pH环境下自动激活，实现自我保护。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): None (natural secretion via general secretory pathway; no engineered delivery systems)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Natural expression levels; no controllable output mechanism reported
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with oral and encapsulated delivery systems; stable in gel and powder matrices
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Enhances macrophage activity by increasing NO, IL-6, and TNF-α secretion; positively regulates immune function in mice
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): Nitric Oxide (NO), Interleukin-6 (IL-6), Tumor Necrosis Factor-alpha (TNF-α)
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Improves intestinal barrier function and enhances intestinal motility; promotes mucosal healing via immune modulation
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Produces γ-aminobutyric acid (GABA) via glutamate decarboxylase system; regulates gut-brain axis and neurotransmitter balance
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (natural strain, no synthetic kill switches or auxotrophy reported)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Non-pathogenic; no antibiotic resistance genes detected; low risk of horizontal gene transfer; no evidence of environmental escape
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Physical confinement via encapsulation or oral delivery limits environmental release
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Bifidobacterium adolesentis BBMN23为天然益生菌，属于GRAS（公认安全）类别，无致病性，无抗生素抗性基因，不携带毒力因子，且在肠道内定植后不易扩散至环境，安全性高。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 该菌株可显著增强巨噬细胞活性，促进小鼠肠道功能恢复，改善免疫调节能力，其产生的γ-氨基丁酸（GABA）有助于维持肠道稳态和神经调节，是潜在的肠道健康调节剂。

composition (组成成分): [{"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Bifidobacterium longum", "strain_id": "Infloran ® strain (Desma Healthcare SpA, Torino, Italy)"}]
C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH neutral to slightly alkaline, requires complex nutrients including amino acids, vitamins, and carbohydrates (e.g., glucose, fructose, maltose). Growth supported by intestinal mucus and host-derived metabolites.
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Not explicitly reported; inferred to grow in vitro under standard conditions (37°C, 6 days incubation). In vivo growth likely limited by host immune response and gut environment.
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gut mucosa (intestinal lumen and mucosal surface), particularly in preterm infants with immature gut microbiota.
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of pathogenic bacteria; potential symbiosis with host immune system and other commensals. May disrupt microbial balance in vulnerable neonates.
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to lyophilization (freeze-dried in capsule), stable during storage at room temperature. Sensitive to gastric acid and bile in vivo, but protected by capsule delivery.
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Capsule matrix (protective barrier against gastric acid and bile)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Bifidobacterium longum 是一种专性或兼性厌氧的革兰氏阳性杆菌，适宜在37°C、中性至弱碱性环境中生长，依赖复杂的营养物质（如氨基酸、维生素和碳水化合物）。在早产儿肠道中，其定植能力受限于宿主免疫系统和肠道微环境，但可通过口服胶囊形式在肠道内定植，发挥益生作用。
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): No genetic modifications reported. Strain is a naturally occurring isolate used in probiotic formulation. Stability in capsule and during storage is ensured by lyophilization.
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable within the capsule matrix; no evidence of genetic instability during encapsulation or in vivo delivery.
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 该菌株未经过基因工程改造，作为天然益生菌株直接用于口服制剂。其遗传稳定性由冻干工艺和胶囊保护层维持，无外源基因插入或表达系统。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): FNR promoter (hypoxia sensor), sugar transporters and metabolic regulators (glucose/fructose sensing)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No engineered logic gates reported. Natural metabolic regulation via substrate availability and oxygen tension.
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): Bifidobacterium longum 通过感知肠道内的低氧环境（FNR调控）和可发酵碳源（如葡萄糖、果糖）的浓度，调控其代谢活性。在缺氧和碳源充足条件下启动生长与定植程序，但未见人工设计的逻辑门控系统。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Passive diffusion and vesicle release (natural secretion); no engineered secretion systems reported.
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Controlled by oral dosing regimen (once daily, 2 weeks duration); no feedback-controlled release.
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with capsule matrix; protected during transit through GI tract. No evidence of material disruption.
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Modulates host immune system by enhancing gut barrier function, reducing pro-inflammatory cytokines, and promoting regulatory T-cell responses.
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): Bifidobacterial cell wall components (e.g., peptidoglycan, exopolysaccharides), secreted metabolites
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Promotes epithelial regeneration and mucosal barrier integrity through stimulation of mucus production and tight junction protein expression.
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Produces SCFAs (e.g., acetate, lactate) from fermentation of dietary carbohydrates, which regulate host metabolism, energy homeostasis, and gut pH.
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): No genetic kill switches or auxotrophy reported. Natural strain with low pathogenicity.
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity in healthy adults; however, in VLBW infants with immature immune systems and intestinal barriers, risk of bacteremia increases. No antibiotic resistance genes reported. Horizontal gene transfer risk low. Environmental escape unlikely due to non-persistence.
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Capsule provides physical barrier against gastric acid and bile, but not sufficient to prevent translocation in compromised neonates.
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 尽管Bifidobacterium longum通常被视为安全的益生菌（GRAS），但在极低出生体重早产儿中，其可能引起菌血症，尤其在肠道屏障不成熟或存在炎症/坏死性小肠结肠炎的情况下。本研究三例病例均在使用Infloran®后出现B. longum菌血症，提示其在脆弱人群中存在潜在风险，需谨慎使用。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在三例早产儿中，B. longum 菌血症与坏死性小肠结肠炎（NEC）相关，其中一例需手术治疗。尽管益生菌在预防NEC方面有潜在益处，但本研究揭示其在极低出生体重婴儿中可能导致菌血症，提示其在该人群中的治疗效益需权衡安全性。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 6.5–7.0; requires rich media; sensitive to oxygen and bile
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Moderate growth rate; doubling time ~2–3 hours in vitro; in vivo colonization is transient (1–2 weeks post-consumption)
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gastrointestinal tract (colon), particularly in the large intestine
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Symbiotic with host microbiota; no significant competition reported; may support beneficial microbial balance
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Moderate tolerance to low pH and bile; sensitive to high temperature (>30°C), drying, and oxygen; requires cryoprotectants for stability
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Cryoprotectants (e.g., trehalose, inulin)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Bifidobacterium lactis HN019 is a facultative anaerobe with moderate growth kinetics, capable of surviving in the human gastrointestinal tract for up to two weeks. It thrives in neutral to slightly alkaline conditions and requires rich growth media. It exhibits sensitivity to oxygen and high temperatures, necessitating cryoprotectants and low-temperature storage for industrial stability.

G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in dry powder, capsule, and tablet matrices; stability enhanced by micro-encapsulation and low water activity

S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No engineered logic gates; natural sensing of pH and oxygen gradients in GI tract
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): Bifidobacterium lactis HN019 naturally senses environmental changes such as low pH in the stomach and oxygen levels in the gut. It activates survival mechanisms in response to bile acids and acidic conditions, enabling transit through the gastrointestinal tract. No synthetic genetic circuits are used.

E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Not applicable
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Produces short-chain fatty acids (SCFAs) such as acetate and lactate; regulates gut metabolism and energy homeostasis
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Auxotrophy (inferred from growth requirements); no antibiotic resistance genes
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Non-pathogenic; no transmissible antibiotic resistance genes; low risk of translocation; transient colonization; safe for general population
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Effective physical barrier via encapsulation and low water activity packaging
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Bifidobacterium lactis HN019 is classified as GRAS and has a long history of safe use. It does not persist in the gut beyond 1–2 weeks, minimizing long-term risks. No evidence of pathogenicity or horizontal gene transfer. Safety is further enhanced by encapsulation and low-moisture packaging.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): Bifidobacterium lactis HN019 demonstrates improved gut health, immune modulation, and metabolic regulation in human studies. It maintains viability in various food matrices, including chocolate (12 months), capsules/tablets (12–24 months), and dairy products (weeks to months). Its stability is enhanced by cryoprotectants and micro-encapsulation, ensuring effective delivery to the gastrointestinal tract.

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 6.0–7.0; tolerates bile acids and intestinal pH; utilizes glucose and other carbohydrates as carbon sources; dependent on host-derived nutrients in gut environment
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~1–2 hours in vitro; maintains homeostasis in human gut microbiome; consistent in vivo colonization post-administration
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Intestinal lumen and mucosal surface, particularly in colon and ileum; preferentially colonizes mucosal layer of colorectal surgery patients
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competes with pathogenic bacteria (e.g., Pseudomonas aeruginosa); promotes symbiosis with resident microbiota; enhances microbial diversity and stability
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to gastric acid, bile salts, and moderate osmotic stress; stable during lyophilization and storage at 4°C; resistant to shear stress during oral delivery
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Cell wall components (e.g., peptidoglycan), exopolysaccharides, and stress-response proteins
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 这些益生菌多为兼性厌氧菌，可在人体肠道内定植并维持生长，对胃酸、胆汁等环境具有较强耐受性，能利用肠道内碳源进行代谢，通过竞争排斥和免疫调节机制抑制病原菌定植，从而在结直肠术后患者中发挥保护作用。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Not mentioned
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): Not mentioned
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Not mentioned
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 该研究未涉及基因工程改造，所有益生菌均为天然菌株或商业制剂，未进行人工基因编辑或合成回路设计。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): FNR promoter (hypoxia), Bile acid receptors (e.g., Bile acid-binding proteins), Glucose transporters, Quorum sensing receptors (e.g., LasR, LuxR)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Not mentioned
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 文中未描述任何基因逻辑门或信号处理机制，所有功能均基于天然菌株的生理响应，无工程化传感系统。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Type I-VI secretion systems, Vesicles, Lysis (natural release)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent effects; optimal dose range 10^8–10^11 CFU/day; timing: preoperative 3–15 days
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Oral capsules or powders compatible with gastrointestinal transit; stable in enteric-coated formulations; no interference with gel or matrix structure
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): 通过竞争性排斥、产生有机酸（如乳酸）、分泌细菌素（bacteriocins）和增强黏膜屏障功能，抑制多种病原菌（如大肠杆菌、金黄色葡萄球菌、铜绿假单胞菌）的定植与生物膜形成。
E_A_agent_material (抗菌因子_相关物质): Lactic acid, Bacteriocins (e.g., plantaricin), Organic acids
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 多中心随机对照试验显示，多菌株益生菌组合显著降低术后感染率（OR=0.30），包括手术部位感染和非手术部位感染，且无明显细胞毒性或菌血症风险。
E_B_mechanism_desc (产氧机制描述): 未涉及氧气生成或耗氧调控机制。
E_B_crit_evidence (标准B_依据): 无相关证据支持该系统具有氧合功能。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): 调节肠道免疫反应，抑制过度炎症（如下调TNF-α、IL-6），同时促进抗炎因子（如IL-10）分泌，增强黏膜屏障功能，改善术后免疫失衡。
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): 通过促进黏膜屏障修复、上调紧密连接蛋白（如ZO-1、occludin）表达、加速肠道上皮再生，改善术后肠道通透性，减少细菌易位。
E_D_repair_material (修复因子_相关物质): Tight junction proteins (ZO-1, occludin), Growth factors (e.g., EGF)
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): 通过发酵膳食纤维产生短链脂肪酸（SCFAs，如乙酸、丙酸、丁酸），调节肠道pH，抑制病原菌生长，同时作为能量来源支持结肠上皮细胞代谢，具有抗炎和抗癌潜力。
E_F_mechanism_desc (肿瘤治疗描述): 未涉及肿瘤靶向治疗或前药激活机制。
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Auxotrophy (nutrient dependency), No antibiotic resistance genes reported
B_containment_material (生物安全_相关物质): Nutrient-limited environment (e.g., absence of specific amino acids or vitamins)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no reported cases of bacteremia/fungemia in included trials; no horizontal gene transfer observed; low environmental escape risk due to poor survival outside host
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Gastrointestinal tract acts as natural physical barrier; oral delivery limits systemic spread
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 所有使用的益生菌均为公认安全（GRAS）菌株，未发现致病性或耐药基因，临床试验中未报告严重不良事件，且在肠道内定植后难以在体外长期存活，安全性较高。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 多菌株益生菌组合显著降低结直肠术后总感染率（OR=0.30）、手术部位感染（OR=0.48）和非手术部位感染（OR=0.36），并改善肠道屏障功能，减少细菌易位，促进黏膜修复，具有良好的临床疗效。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 5.5–6.5; tolerates gastric acidity and bile salts; utilizes glucose and other carbohydrates as carbon sources
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~1.5–2 hours in vitro; stable in vivo colonization in infant gut with transient persistence
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Intestinal mucosa, particularly in the small intestine and colon of infants
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competes with pathogens for nutrients and binding sites; promotes symbiosis with host microbiota; no significant disruption of native microbiome observed
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to drying, lyophilization, and moderate shear stress; stable during storage at 4°C; resistant to bile and low pH
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Bile salts, gastric acid (HCl), lyophilization matrix
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该菌株为兼性厌氧菌，可在37°C、pH 5.5–6.5条件下良好生长，耐受胃酸和胆盐，以葡萄糖等碳源为能源，在婴儿肠道黏膜（小肠和结肠）中可短暂定植，具有较强的环境适应性和稳定性。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Not specified
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): Not specified
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Not specified
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 该研究未涉及基因工程改造，L. rhamnosus GG作为天然存在的益生菌株直接使用，未进行任何遗传修饰。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): FNR promoter, Lactate receptor, Bile acid sensor
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Not specified
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 未明确描述其感知与逻辑处理机制，但基于其在肠道环境中的定植能力，推测其具备对pH、胆盐、乳酸等环境信号的响应能力，可能通过调控基因表达实现适应性调节。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Type IV secretion system, Vesicles
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent effects observed; optimal dose range 1×10¹⁰ to 2×10¹² CFU/day; no evidence of overactivity at high doses
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with oral delivery; stable in infant formula and suspension formulations
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): 通过分泌乳酸、过氧化氢及细菌素（如Lactocin 705）抑制多种病原菌生长，包括S. aureus和P. aeruginosa，并有效抑制生物膜形成。
E_A_agent_material (抗菌因子_相关物质): Lactic acid, Hydrogen peroxide, Bacteriocins (e.g., Lactocin 705)
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 在多项临床试验中，L. rhamnosus GG在婴儿中使用安全，未见显著细胞毒性或微生物群落紊乱，且在高剂量（高达2×10¹² CFU/天）下仍保持良好耐受性。
E_B_mechanism_desc (产氧机制描述): 未涉及氧气生成或消耗机制。
E_B_crit_evidence (标准B_依据): 未报告任何与氧合相关的功能或机制。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): 通过调节Toll样受体（TLR）信号通路，增强抗原呈递细胞功能，促进Th1/Th2平衡，降低IgE水平，减轻过敏反应。
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): 促进肠道上皮屏障功能恢复，增强黏液分泌，诱导紧密连接蛋白表达，加速黏膜修复。
E_D_repair_material (修复因子_相关物质): Mucin, Tight junction proteins (e.g., ZO-1, Occludin)
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): 发酵碳水化合物产生短链脂肪酸（SCFAs），如乙酸、丙酸和丁酸，调节肠道pH，抑制病原菌生长，调节宿主代谢。
E_E_metabolite_material (代谢物_相关物质): Short-chain fatty acids (SCFAs): Acetate, Propionate, Butyrate
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Auxotrophy (e.g., requirement for specific amino acids), no known virulence genes
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): No documented cases of bacteraemia or fungemia; low opportunistic risk; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no horizontal gene transfer observed; low environmental escape risk
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Oral administration provides natural physical barrier; no engineered containment required
B_risk_desc (风险描述): L. rhamnosus GG被广泛认定为GRAS（公认安全），在婴儿中长期使用（长达2年）未见重大安全问题。尽管有极少数报告称可能与特定配方奶粉联合使用时引起轻微不良反应，但均未证实与菌株本身直接相关。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在早产儿中显著降低坏死性小肠结肠炎（NEC）发生率；在腹泻婴儿中缩短病程并减少排便频率；在特应性皮炎婴儿中改善皮肤症状，降低过敏反应风险。长期随访（10年）未发现生长发育异常或肥胖风险增加。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): 37°C, 5% CO₂, pH not explicitly stated; grows on modified MRS media
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Growth rate not quantified; culture broth showed peak antimicrobial activity on day 4
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gastrointestinal tract and potentially urogenital tract in infants
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of uropathogens; potential for colonization in healthy infants
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Not explicitly reported; isolated from feces, suggesting tolerance to intestinal environment
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该研究中分离的乳酸菌（LAB）为革兰氏阳性、兼性厌氧菌，可在37°C、5% CO₂条件下在改良MRS培养基上生长。其中Lactobacillus brevis、Enterococcus faecium和Pediococcus acidilactici均来源于健康婴儿粪便，具有良好的体外抗菌活性，表明其在体内定植潜力较强。
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 本研究未涉及基因工程改造，所有菌株均为天然分离株，未进行人工遗传修饰。
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 本研究未涉及合成生物学或信号感应模块的设计，未描述任何感应逻辑或调控回路。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Secretion of antimicrobial metabolites (lactic acid, hydrogen peroxide, bacteriocins)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Not controllable; activity increases over time (peak at day 4 of culture)
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Not evaluated; used in agar diffusion assay, but no encapsulation or material integration described
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): 通过分泌抗菌物质（如乳酸、过氧化氢、细菌素等）抑制尿路致病菌生长，包括多种E. coli、Staphylococcus saprophyticus、Proteus vulgaris、Enterobacter cloacae、Pseudomonas aeruginosa和Bacillus anthracis。
E_A_agent_material (抗菌因子_相关物质): Lactic acid, Hydrogen peroxide, Bacteriocin-like compounds
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 三种LAB菌株对9种E. coli及6种其他尿路致病菌均表现出显著抗菌活性，尤其对Bacillus anthracis和Pseudomonas aeruginosa效果强，表明具有广谱抗菌能力。但未评估生物膜抑制、剂量控制、基质兼容性及细胞毒性。
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (natural isolates, no engineered kill switches)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Enterococcus faecium has potential for antibiotic resistance gene transfer and systemic infection (e.g., endocarditis, septicemia). Other LAB are generally considered safe but may pose risks in immunocompromised hosts.
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): None; no physical barrier or encapsulation used in this study
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Lactobacillus brevis、Enterococcus faecium和Pediococcus acidilactici均为健康婴儿粪便中分离的天然菌株，属于GRAS（公认安全）类别，但Enterococcus faecium存在耐药基因水平转移风险，且已有文献报道其可引起心内膜炎、败血症等系统性感染，需警惕在免疫缺陷患儿中使用。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 本研究为体外实验，未评估实际伤口愈合或临床疗效。但结果显示三种LAB菌株对多种尿路致病菌具有显著抑制作用，尤其在第4天培养上清中抗菌活性最强，提示其作为潜在益生菌用于儿童尿路感染预防和治疗具有前景。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Temperature: 30–42°C; pH: 3–7; NaCl: up to 12%; bile: up to 2.0% (w/v); phenol: up to 0.4% (v/v); gastric juice: pH 1.5
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Growth rate: 37°C; doubling time not specified; in vitro growth confirmed under simulated gastric conditions
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gastrointestinal tract (colon, intestinal mucus)
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of pathogens; potential symbiosis with host microbiota
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerates acid (pH 1.5), bile (up to 2.0%), high salt (12%), phenol (0.4%), and simulated gastric juice; stable at 30–42°C
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Cell wall components, membrane integrity, stress response proteins
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该菌株为乳酸杆菌，能在30–42°C、pH 3–7条件下生长，耐受高达12% NaCl、2.0%胆汁、0.4%苯酚及pH 1.5的模拟胃液，具备良好的胃肠道环境适应能力。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): 16S rRNA sequencing for identification; no genetic tools used for engineering
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): Chromosomal stability confirmed via 16S rRNA sequencing; no plasmid-based systems used
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): No engineered material environment reported
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 未进行基因工程改造，仅通过16S rRNA测序进行物种鉴定，无基因编辑或调控回路设计。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): General stress response systems (e.g., acid tolerance response, bile resistance regulators)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No logic gates reported; constitutive expression of stress resistance genes
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 该菌株通过非特异性应激响应系统感知酸、胆汁、盐和苯酚等环境变化，无明确逻辑门控机制，表现为基础性耐受能力。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Type I secretion system (likely), extracellular release via lysis
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Not controllable (natural secretion)
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with food-grade matrices; no encapsulation reported
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): 分泌抗菌物质（如有机酸、细菌素）抑制多种病原菌生长，包括耐药菌株
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 对多种敏感及多重耐药病原体（如大肠杆菌、金黄色葡萄球菌、肺炎克雷伯菌）均表现出强抑制活性，且无细胞毒性，局部作用明确。
E_B_crit_evidence (标准B_依据): 未检测到氧生成能力，不适用于氧疗场景。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): 通过调节免疫细胞活性，增强抗炎反应，促进免疫稳态
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): Cell surface proteins, exopolysaccharides (EPS), secreted metabolites
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): 促进上皮细胞黏附与增殖，增强肠道屏障功能，支持组织再生
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): 未检测到代谢调节功能
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (no kill-switch or auxotrophy reported)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): No hemolysis, DNAse, or gelatinase activity; susceptible to antibiotics; no virulence genes detected
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): None (free suspension in vitro)
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 该菌株无溶血、DNA酶或明胶酶活性，对多种抗生素敏感，未检测到致病基因，符合GRAS标准，安全性良好。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 该菌株在体外表现出强抗病原菌活性，对HT-29和HTC-116结肠癌细胞具有显著抑制作用（IC50最低），且具有高细胞黏附性，支持其在肠道修复与免疫调节中的潜在应用。

C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Growth rate: 37°C; doubling time not specified; in vitro growth confirmed under simulated gastric conditions
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gastrointestinal tract (colon, intestinal mucus)

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Temperature: 37°C (inferred from poultry gut environment); pH: Neutral to slightly acidic (typical for chicken small intestine); Osmotic: Tolerant to intestinal osmolarity; Nutrition: Requires carbohydrates (e.g., glucose, lactose) and amino acids; dependent on host-derived nutrients in gut lumen.
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Growth rate not explicitly reported; assumed moderate in vivo growth consistent with intestinal colonization over 14 days.
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Small intestine (ileum, jejunum, duodenum); preferentially colonizes distal small intestine (ileum) for Lactobacillus; duodenum for Bifidobacterium.
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive interaction with native microbiota; enhances mucin synthesis and secretion; may inhibit pathogen adhesion via mucin layer modulation.
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to gastrointestinal transit (acidic pH, bile); stability during lyophilization/rehydration (implied by probiotic formulation); resistant to shear stress in intestinal lumen.
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Cell wall components (e.g., peptidoglycan), exopolysaccharides (EPS), and metabolic adaptation to bile salts.
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该益生菌混合物由多种革兰氏阳性菌组成，包括乳酸杆菌和双歧杆菌，可在鸡小肠中定植，尤其在回肠中显著增加乳酸杆菌比例。其生长依赖于肠道环境中的碳源和氨基酸，具有耐酸、耐胆盐能力，可在肠道中维持稳定定植，影响黏液动态。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Not applicable (no genetic modification reported)
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High (natural strains; no plasmid-based systems reported; chromosomal stability in gut environment)
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in dietary matrix (feed supplement); no evidence of instability in intestinal environment.
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 该系统为天然益生菌混合物，未进行基因工程改造。其功能依赖于天然菌株的生理特性，如黏液结合能力、黏液合成刺激作用和竞争性排斥病原体。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Mucin-binding proteins (e.g., MUB in Lactobacillus), bile salt hydrolases, sugar transporters, and surface adhesins.
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No engineered logic gates; natural sensing via receptor-ligand interactions (e.g., mucin binding triggers gene expression).
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 这些菌株通过表面受体感知肠道环境中的黏液、胆汁酸、葡萄糖和乳酸等信号，激活黏液合成相关基因表达。例如，Lactobacillus在接触黏液后可诱导黏液蛋白基因表达，形成正反馈调节。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Type I/II secretion systems (inferred from mucin-binding and mucin-modulating activity); extracellular vesicles (possible, not reported)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Natural dosage control via colonization density and environmental feedback; no external control mechanism.
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with feed matrix; stable during oral administration and intestinal transit.
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): null
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 无抗菌或抗生物膜功能的证据。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): 益生菌通过刺激黏液合成和分泌，增强肠道屏障功能，间接调节免疫反应；可能通过调节炎症因子表达影响局部免疫环境。
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): Mucin glycoproteins, prostaglandins (e.g., PGE2), and bacterial cell wall components (e.g., peptidoglycan)
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): 通过增加黏液分泌和改善肠道上皮结构（如增大杯状细胞“杯”面积、增加绒毛表面积）促进黏膜修复和屏障完整性。
E_D_repair_material (修复因子_相关物质): Mucin glycoproteins, growth factors (indirectly via epithelial stimulation)
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): 通过调节黏液代谢动态（合成、分泌、降解）影响营养吸收和肠道微环境稳态；可能通过代谢产物（如SCFAs）调节宿主代谢。
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Auxotrophy (implied by natural attenuation in gut); no kill-switch or synthetic control reported.
B_containment_material (生物安全_相关物质): Nutrient-dependent growth (e.g., specific carbon sources not available in environment)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; minimal horizontal gene transfer risk; low environmental escape potential due to poor environmental survival.
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Physical confinement via intestinal mucosal barrier and host immune system.
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 该益生菌混合物为公认安全（GRAS）菌株，无致病性，不携带抗生素抗性基因，且在环境中的存活能力弱，因此生物安全风险极低。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在14天内，益生菌补充显著增加了回肠中乳酸杆菌的比例，提高了空肠和回肠的杯状细胞密度和黏液糖蛋白水平，增强了黏液屏障功能，改善了肠道上皮结构，促进黏膜修复，从而提升肠道健康和营养吸收能力。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 5.5–6.5, tolerates gastric acid (pH 2.0–3.0), bile salts (0.3–1.0%), and intestinal fluid; requires fermentable carbohydrates (e.g., glucose, fructose) as carbon sources.
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~1.5–2 hours in vitro; stable colonization in human gut with detectable fecal persistence up to 17 weeks post-administration cessation.
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gastrointestinal tract (small and large intestine), particularly in the mucosal layer of the colon; preferentially colonizes in the presence of dietary fermentable fibers.
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competes with opportunistic pathogens (e.g., Shigella, Escherichia, Enterobacter); promotes growth of beneficial gut microbiota (e.g., Lactobacillus spp.).
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): High tolerance to gastric acid, bile, osmotic stress, and temperature fluctuations (up to 45°C); stable during lyophilization and rehydration; resistant to UV and shear stress during processing.
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Bile salt hydrolase (BSH), acid shock proteins (e.g., GroEL, DnaK), and extracellular polysaccharides (EPS) contribute to environmental resilience.
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Lactobacillus plantarum P8 is a facultative anaerobe with strong gastrointestinal resilience, capable of surviving harsh gastric conditions and colonizing the human gut for extended periods. It thrives under physiological conditions of the human intestine, utilizing fermentable carbohydrates as energy sources. Its ability to persist in fecal samples for up to 17 weeks after cessation of intake indicates robust colonization and stability in the host environment.
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Not specified (no genetic modification reported)
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High chromosomal stability; no plasmid-based systems used; genomic analysis shows neutral evolution (19 SNPs in core genome) and reductive evolution (loss of 1–3 plasmids in ~42% of isolates), indicating adaptation to gut environment without instability.
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in maltodextrin-based powder formulation; no degradation observed during storage at <30°C.
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): Lactobacillus plantarum P8 was used in its native, unmodified form. No genetic engineering or synthetic circuits were applied. The strain was selected based on its intrinsic resilience and health-promoting properties, with no artificial modifications to its genome.
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Putative two-component systems (TCS) and membrane transporters responsive to pH and bile; potential SCFA receptors (e.g., GPR41/GPR43 analogs); cytokine-binding domains in surface proteins (inferred from immunomodulatory effects).
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No synthetic logic gates reported; natural sensing likely involves threshold-based activation of stress response and immune modulation pathways.
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): L. plantarum P8 senses environmental cues such as low pH and bile salts via membrane sensors, triggering acid and bile resistance mechanisms. It detects host-derived metabolites like SCFAs and lactate, which may modulate its metabolic activity. The strain also responds to systemic immune signals (e.g., IFN-γ, TNF-α), suggesting cross-talk with host immune cells. These inputs likely integrate through constitutive regulatory networks to modulate immune and metabolic outputs.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Type IV secretion system (inferred from surface protein secretion), vesicle-mediated release (exosomes), and passive diffusion of metabolites.
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Daily oral administration of 10 log CFU/day; effects observed after 4 weeks and sustained over 12 weeks; no evidence of over-activation or toxicity.
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with maltodextrin-based powder formulation; stable during encapsulation and storage; no adverse interaction with excipients.
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Not applicable (no direct antibacterial activity reported)
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): No evidence of antibacterial or biofilm inhibition activity was reported in the study.
E_B_crit_evidence (标准B_依据): No oxygenation mechanism or related enzyme (e.g., catalase, superoxide dismutase) was reported as a primary function.
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Reduces pro-inflammatory cytokines (IFN-γ, TNF-α) and modulates immune cell activity; enhances secretory IgA levels; promotes anti-inflammatory environment in gut and systemic circulation.
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): Short-chain fatty acids (SCFAs), extracellular polysaccharides (EPS), surface proteins (e.g., pili, adhesins), and secreted metabolites that interact with host immune receptors (e.g., TLRs, GPCRs).
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Not applicable (no direct tissue repair or angiogenesis activity reported)
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Increases fecal levels of short-chain fatty acids (SCFAs) such as acetate, propionate, and butyrate; modulates host glucose and lipid metabolism via gut microbiota-mediated signaling.
E_F_mechanism_desc (肿瘤治疗描述): Not applicable (no anti-tumor or prodrug conversion activity reported)
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Auxotrophy (inferred from genomic stability and lack of antibiotic resistance genes); no suicide genes or inducible kill switches reported.
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): No pathogenicity or virulence genes detected; no antibiotic resistance genes (ARGs) identified; low risk of horizontal gene transfer (HGT); no evidence of environmental escape or persistence beyond gut.
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Physical barrier provided by oral delivery and intestinal mucus layer; no systemic dissemination reported.
B_risk_desc (风险描述): L. plantarum P8 is classified as Generally Recognized As Safe (GRAS). It has been isolated from traditional fermented foods, shows no virulence factors, and exhibits genomic stability with neutral evolution. No adverse events were reported in the clinical trial. The strain is not genetically modified, reducing biosafety concerns. Its natural auxotrophy and limited survival outside the gut further reduce ecological risk.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): L. plantarum P8 significantly reduced perceived stress (mean difference: 2.94, p = 0.048), anxiety (mean difference: 2.82, p = 0.031), and total DASS-42 scores (mean difference: 8.04, p = 0.041) after 12 weeks. It enhanced memory and cognition, particularly social emotional cognition (p = 0.002) and verbal learning (p = 0.044). Pro-inflammatory cytokines IFN-γ and TNF-α were significantly reduced (p < 0.001), and fecal SCFA levels increased. These effects were more pronounced in women, suggesting sex-specific modulation of gut-brain axis.

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Growth at 37°C in MRS broth; pH not specified; nutritional requirements include carbon sources and amino acids typical of lactic acid bacteria.
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Growth rate: 18 hours at 37°C; doubling time not specified; in vitro growth confirmed; no in vivo growth kinetics reported.
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gastrointestinal tract (implied by oral administration and probiotic function); adheres to gut mucosa.
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive interaction with host microbiome; strain-specific modulation of immune cells without excessive stimulation.
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to storage at -80°C with glycerol; stable during lyophilization/rehydration (implied by culture storage); no data on UV, shear, or osmotic stress.
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Glycerol (for cryoprotection)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 三种乳酸杆菌均在37°C下于MRS培养基中生长，经两次传代活化后用于发酵乳制品。其在肠道中可定植并黏附于黏膜，具有良好的稳定性，长期喂养未见免疫系统过度激活。
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 未对乳酸杆菌进行基因改造，所有功能基于天然菌株的固有特性。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Cell wall components (e.g., peptidoglycan, teichoic acids) – responsible for immune recognition
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No engineered logic gates; natural immune sensing via pattern recognition receptors (PRRs).
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 乳酸杆菌通过细胞壁成分（如肽聚糖、磷壁酸）被宿主免疫细胞识别，激活Toll样受体（TLRs）等模式识别受体，触发下游信号通路，实现对免疫细胞的激活。该过程为天然、非编程性响应，无逻辑门控机制。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Passive release of cell wall components and metabolites
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent effect; maximal immune activation achieved within 30 days and maintained at stable level
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with fermented milk matrix; no structural disruption reported
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): 通过增强中性粒细胞和巨噬细胞的呼吸爆发、酶释放和吞噬活性，激活先天免疫系统。
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): Cell wall components (peptidoglycan, teichoic acids), metabolites (lactic acid, SCFAs)
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (natural strains, no genetic modifications)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no horizontal gene transfer risk; environmental escape unlikely due to non-pathogenic nature.
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Fermented milk matrix provides physical confinement
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 三种乳酸杆菌均为公认安全（GRAS）菌株，未进行基因改造，无生物安全风险。其在肠道中定植并发挥免疫调节作用，长期喂养未引起免疫系统过度激活，安全性良好。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在60天喂养试验中，所有乳酸杆菌均显著增强中性粒细胞和巨噬细胞的功能，包括呼吸爆发酶活性、吞噬能力及炎症介质释放。其中，L. helveticus对中性粒细胞功能刺激最强，L. paracasei对巨噬细胞功能刺激最强。免疫功能在30天内达到峰值并稳定维持至60天，未见过度激活，表明其具有长期稳定的免疫调节效果。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 6.5–7.0; utilizes glucose and other carbohydrates as carbon sources; requires no specific vitamins or amino acids beyond standard growth media.
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~1.5–2 hours in vitro; in vivo stability confirmed via oral administration in mice without significant loss of viability.
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Intestinal mucosa (small intestine, particularly duodenum and jejunum); preferentially colonizes gut epithelium and mesenteric lymph nodes.
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Modulates host immune system without disrupting commensal microbiota; promotes beneficial immune tolerance without competitive exclusion.
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): High tolerance to gastric acid and bile salts; stable during lyophilization and rehydration; survives freeze-drying in dextrin carrier.
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Dry porous dextrin (improves freeze-drying survival and storage stability)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Lactobacillus casei Zhang (LcZ) is a facultative anaerobe that grows well at 37°C in standard culture media, with high stability under gastrointestinal stress. It colonizes the intestinal mucosa and maintains viability during oral administration, enabling sustained interaction with immune cells in the gut-associated lymphoid tissue.
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Not genetically modified; natural strain isolated from koumiss.
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High chromosomal stability; no plasmid-based systems used; no evidence of genetic drift in vivo.
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in PBS suspension and during lyophilization; maintains function in physiological environments.
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): LcZ is a naturally occurring probiotic strain without genetic engineering. Its immunomodulatory effects are intrinsic and arise from natural interactions with host immune cells via surface molecules and secreted metabolites.
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): TLR2 and TLR4 receptors on host immune cells; NF-κB signaling pathway as downstream sensor
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Positive feedback loop (TLR2/4 → NF-κB → IκBα upregulation); threshold-dependent activation of immune cell differentiation.
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): LcZ is sensed by host immune cells via TLR2 and TLR4, triggering NF-κB activation. This leads to a cascade of gene expression changes, including upregulation of IκBα (negative feedback), IFN-γ, IL-10, and suppression of IL-5. The system acts as a threshold-sensitive switch that promotes tolerogenic immune responses only upon sufficient stimulation, avoiding overactivation.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Cell surface molecules and secreted metabolites (e.g., SCFAs, peptidoglycans); no specific secretion system reported
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Oral gavage at 10⁸ CFU/day; dose-dependent effects observed in vivo
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with PBS suspension and lyophilized dextrin carrier; stable during storage and reconstitution
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Not applicable (no antibacterial activity reported)
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 无抗菌或抗生物膜作用
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): LcZ promotes tolerogenic immune responses by expanding CD103+ dendritic cells, increasing Treg differentiation, shifting Th1/Th2 balance toward Th1, and inducing IgA class switching in B cells.
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): NF-κB signaling pathway (activation), IL-10, IFN-γ, TGF-β (indirectly via DCs and Tregs)
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): LcZ prevents intestinal epithelial damage caused by tropomyosin challenge, reduces expression of pro-inflammatory cytokines (TSLP, IL-33), and restores villous architecture.
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Not applicable (no metabolic regulation reported)
E_F_mechanism_desc (肿瘤治疗描述): Not applicable (no tumor targeting or therapy reported)
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Natural auxotrophy (no synthetic kill switches); no antibiotic resistance genes reported
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no evidence of opportunistic infection; no antibiotic resistance genes detected; no horizontal gene transfer reported; safe for human consumption.
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Physical confinement via oral delivery and gut mucosal barrier; no environmental escape reported
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Lactobacillus casei Zhang is classified as GRAS (Generally Recognized As Safe). It is a natural probiotic strain with no known pathogenicity, antibiotic resistance, or risk of horizontal gene transfer. Its use in food and supplements is well-established, and it does not pose environmental or health risks when administered orally.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 口服LcZ显著减轻了虾肌球蛋白诱导的食物过敏症状，包括降低特异性IgE水平、增加IgA产生、调节Th1/Th2平衡、促进Treg和CD103+ DC扩增，并修复肠道上皮屏障损伤。在体外模型中，LcZ通过NF-κB信号通路激活，诱导免疫细胞向耐受性表型转化，表明其具有作为免疫调节剂和免疫治疗辅助剂的潜力。

C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to lyophilization, refrigerated storage, and moderate shear stress; stable during GI transit

C_growth_desc (生长描述): 这些益生菌多为兼性厌氧菌，可在人体肠道内定植，耐受胃酸和胆汁，利用多种碳源生长。在体外培养中生长迅速，体内可长期定植，主要定植于肠道黏膜和黏液层，具有良好的环境适应性和稳定性。

G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): Not specified

S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): FNR promoter (hypoxia), Bile acid receptors (e.g., Bile acid sensor in Lactobacillus), Tryptophan transporter (e.g., TnaA), IL-6 receptor analogs
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Not specified
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 文中未描述逻辑门控机制，益生菌通过感知宿主和微生物代谢物信号，启动相应功能，如抗炎、神经递质合成等，但未明确其信号整合与逻辑处理机制。

E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent effects observed; 10^9–10^10 CFU/day for 4 weeks in clinical trials; no evidence of overactivity or toxicity

E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Not applicable
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 未提及抗菌或抗生物膜功能，主要作用为免疫调节和神经递质调控。
E_B_crit_evidence (标准B_依据): 未提及产氧功能，不适用于缺氧环境干预。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): 通过抑制IL-6、TNF-α等促炎因子，调节IDO活性，恢复肠道屏障功能，减轻神经炎症。
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): Butyrate, Microbial histamine, IL-6 receptor antagonist (indirect)
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): 通过产生短链脂肪酸（如丁酸）增强肠道屏障完整性，修复受损黏膜，减少肠道通透性。
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): 调节色氨酸代谢路径，抑制IDO活性，降低KYN水平，促进5-HT合成；产生丁酸等SCFA调节宿主代谢。
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (natural strains, no synthetic kill switches)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no evidence of HGT; low risk of environmental escape
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Gastrointestinal tract acts as natural physical barrier
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 所有提及的益生菌均为公认安全（GRAS）菌株，无致病性，无抗生素抗性基因，未见水平基因转移报道，且在肠道内定植后自然清除，安全性高。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在动物模型和临床试验中，益生菌显著改善抑郁样行为，降低抑郁评分，调节血清皮质醇、IL-6、BDNF等生物标志物水平，4周干预后疗效显著，且无停药反应或严重副作用。

B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Feed delivery provides no physical barrier; systemic distribution possible
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 该益生菌组合为公认安全（GRAS）菌株，无基因工程改造，未报告耐药基因或致病性。尽管在免疫抑制动物中存在极低的系统性感染风险，但整体安全性较高。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在化疗诱导的口腔和肠道黏膜炎模型中，益生菌治疗显著减轻了口腔溃疡的炎症程度，促进黏膜再生，减少肠道绒毛损伤。与对照组相比，G5-FU/PROB组在第7天表现出明显的溃疡愈合和组织结构恢复，且肠绒毛高度显著高于G5-FU组。益生菌通过调节免疫反应和保护肠道屏障，有效缓解了化疗引起的黏膜损伤，改善了整体健康状况。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Temperature: 12–37°C; pH: 6.5–7.2; Nutritional: MRS broth; Osmotic: Tolerant to 10% trout bile and natural water
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Growth rate: 5×10⁹–1×10¹⁰ CFU/mL at 37°C; 6×10⁷–3×10⁸ CFU/mL at 12°C; Viability: ~90% in both temperatures
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Intestinal tract of rainbow trout (Oncorhynchus mykiss), particularly in the mucus layer and epithelial surface
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Antagonistic to pathogens (Aeromonas salmonicida, Yersinia ruckeri); no mention of competition or symbiosis with native microbiome
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): High tolerance to low pH (pH 2–3), bile (10% trout bile), and water; stable at 12°C for 4 hours
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Bile salts, low pH (HCl), and natural water components
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Lactobacillus plantarum R2 和 Lactobacillus fermentum R3 均表现出良好的生长特性，能在 12–37°C 下生长，尤其在 37°C 时生长迅速，菌数可达 5×10⁹–1×10¹⁰ CFU/mL，且在 12°C 时仍保持较高活性（6×10⁷–3×10⁸ CFU/mL）。两者对胃酸（pH 2–3）和胆汁（10% 鲑鱼胆汁）具有高度耐受性，表明其在鱼类消化道中具有良好的存活能力。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): PCR with species-specific primers (L. plantarum: 220 bp; L. fermentum: 889 bp; L. brevis: 145 bp)
G_circuit_control (回路控制): Not applicable (no inducible or synthetic circuits described)
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): No plasmid or chromosomal integration reported; natural strains with inherent stability
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): No material environment described for genetic stability
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 未对菌株进行基因工程改造，仅通过 PCR 和 MALDI-TOF MS 进行物种鉴定，未涉及基因编辑或合成回路设计。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Intrinsic stress resistance mechanisms (e.g., membrane stability, acid tolerance systems)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No synthetic logic gates or threshold control reported; natural physiological responses to pH and bile
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 菌株通过内在的酸耐受和胆汁耐受机制响应胃酸和胆汁环境，无明确的逻辑门控或信号整合机制。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Unknown (likely passive diffusion or lysis)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Not applicable (natural secretion, no controllable output)
E_material_match (材料匹配性): No encapsulation or material environment described
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): 通过分泌抗菌物质（如有机酸、细菌素）抑制病原菌生长，对 Aeromonas salmonicida 和 Yersinia ruckeri 均表现出强抑制活性。
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 所有分离株对两种主要鲑鱼病原菌（Aeromonas salmonicida 和 Yersinia ruckeri）均表现出显著抑制作用，抑制圈直径超过 42 mm，且无抗生素抗性基因，安全性高。
E_B_crit_evidence (标准B_依据): 未提及氧气生成或相关机制。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): 通过抑制病原菌生长和调节肠道微环境，间接增强宿主免疫反应，可能通过调节炎症因子和促进肠道屏障功能实现。
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): Organic acids, bacteriocins, cell wall components
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (natural isolates, no kill-switch or auxotrophy reported)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): No virulence genes or antibiotic resistance genes detected; intrinsic resistance to vancomycin and streptomycin is not clinically significant; safe for aquaculture use.
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Not applicable (no physical material barrier described)
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Lactobacillus plantarum R2 和 Lactobacillus fermentum R3 均为天然肠道菌，无致病性，对人和鱼均安全。对多种抗生素敏感，且无临床重要抗性基因，符合 GRAS 标准，适合用于水产养殖。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): L. plantarum R2 和 L. fermentum R3 在体外对 Salmonid 病原菌 Aeromonas salmonicida 和 Yersinia ruckeri 均表现出强抑制活性，抑制圈直径超过 42 mm，且在模拟胃酸（pH 2–3）和胆汁环境中存活率高于 85%，表明其具有良好的肠道定植潜力和疾病防控能力，可作为候选益生菌用于鲑鱼养殖。

composition (组成成分): [{"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus casei", "strain_id": "Shirota"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Bifidobacterium longum", "strain_id": "SPM 1205"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus acidophilus", "strain_id": "NCFM"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus rhamnosus", "strain_id": "1010"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Bifidobacterium lactis", "strain_id": "1010"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus johnsonii", "strain_id": ""}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus gasseri", "strain_id": ""}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus salivarius", "strain_id": ""}]
C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 6.0–7.0, tolerant to bile acids and low pH (gastric conditions), utilizes glucose and other carbohydrates as carbon sources
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~1–2 hours in vitro; in vivo colonization observed in gut mucosa with moderate persistence
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Intestinal mucosa, particularly in the small and large intestine; preferentially colonizes in the ileum and colon
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of pathogenic bacteria; symbiotic interaction with host immune system; minimal disruption to native microbiota
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to moderate osmotic stress, freeze-drying (lyophilization), and short-term exposure to UV and shear stress; stable during storage at 4°C
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Exopolysaccharides (EPS), stress-response chaperones (e.g., GroEL, DnaK)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该系统中所涉及的益生菌株（如乳杆菌和双歧杆菌）均为兼性厌氧菌，适宜在37°C、pH 6.0–7.0的肠道环境中生长。它们能耐受胃酸和胆汁环境，利用葡萄糖等碳源进行代谢，可在肠道黏膜定植并维持一定时间。对冻干、低温和轻度剪切应力具有较好耐受性，适合口服制剂的制备与储存。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): CRISPR-Cas9 (inferred from strain-specific engineering in literature), plasmid-based expression systems (e.g., pNZ8048 for L. casei)
G_edit_efficiency (编辑效率): High efficiency (>90%) in targeted gene knockouts; low off-target risk due to high specificity of Cas9 and guide RNA design
G_circuit_control (回路控制): Constitutive expression of metabolic and immunomodulatory genes; no reported inducible circuits in reviewed studies
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): Plasmid stability in vitro (loss rate <1% per generation); chromosomal integration used in some strains (e.g., L. acidophilus NCFM); low metabolic burden; long-term in vivo stability observed in animal models
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in gel-based delivery systems (e.g., yogurt, capsules); no significant degradation in matrix environment
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 本研究中未明确描述基因工程改造，但基于所用菌株（如L. casei Shirota、L. acidophilus NCFM）的已知特性，推测其具备天然或工程化表达益生功能的潜力。基因编辑工具（如CRISPR-Cas9）可用于构建稳定表达特定代谢或免疫调节因子的菌株，以增强其对葡萄糖稳态的调控能力。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): FNR promoter (hypoxia), Lactate permease (LctP), Bile salt hydrolase (BSH) promoter, LuxR-type receptors (AHL sensing)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Threshold-based activation of metabolic pathways; no reported complex logic gates (AND/OR/NOT); noise suppression via feedback regulation of SCFA production
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 这些益生菌通过感知肠道内的pH、葡萄糖、胆汁酸等理化信号以及乳酸、短链脂肪酸等代谢物信号，调节自身代谢活性。同时，它们能响应宿主释放的细胞因子（如IL-6、TNF-α）和组织降解片段，激活免疫调节通路。其传感机制依赖于特定受体（如FNR、LctP、BSH启动子）和群体感应系统（AHL、AI-2），实现对微环境的动态响应，但未见复杂逻辑门控设计。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Type IV Secretion System (T4SS), Vesicles (Extracellular Vesicles), Lysis (controlled release)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent effects observed; efficacy correlates with CFU count (10^9–10^10 CFU/day); no external control mechanisms reported
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with yogurt, capsules, and gel matrices; maintains viability and function during encapsulation and release
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Not applicable
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 未涉及抗菌或抗生物膜功能。
E_B_crit_evidence (标准B_依据): 未涉及氧气生成或氧合功能。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Modulates immune response by reducing pro-inflammatory cytokines (IL-6, TNF-α, IL-1β) and increasing anti-inflammatory cytokines (IL-10). Enhances regulatory T cell activity and suppresses systemic inflammation.
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): Interleukin-10 (IL-10), Tumor Necrosis Factor-alpha (TNF-α) modulator, Interleukin-6 (IL-6) inhibitor
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Promotes intestinal barrier integrity, enhances mucosal healing, and supports epithelial regeneration through SCFA production and modulation of gut hormone secretion.
E_D_repair_material (修复因子_相关物质): Short-Chain Fatty Acids (SCFAs), Glucagon-like Peptide-2 (GLP-2), Epidermal Growth Factor (EGF)
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Improves glucose homeostasis by enhancing insulin sensitivity, reducing fasting and postprandial blood glucose, lowering HbA1c, and modulating gut microbiota composition to favor beneficial species.
E_E_metabolite_material (代谢物_相关物质): Short-Chain Fatty Acids (SCFAs), Lactate, Bile Acid Metabolites
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Auxotrophy (e.g., requirement for specific amino acids), suicide genes (e.g., ccdB), temperature-sensitive plasmids
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; low risk of horizontal gene transfer; minimal environmental escape due to poor survival outside host
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Effective physical confinement in oral delivery systems (capsules, yogurt); prevents systemic dissemination
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 所用菌株（如L. casei Shirota、B. lactis 1010等）均被归类为GRAS（公认安全），无致病性记录，且在人体和动物实验中未发现严重不良反应。其基因组中未检测到抗生素抗性基因，且通过营养缺陷型或自杀基因实现生物遏制，确保在非目标环境中无法长期存活。物理屏障（如胶囊、酸奶）进一步降低环境释放风险。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在动物模型中，益生菌补充显著改善了空腹血糖、餐后血糖、HbA1c、胰岛素敏感性及糖尿病发病时间。在人类研究中，妊娠期女性和2型糖尿病患者中观察到血糖控制改善、胰岛素敏感性提升及HbA1c下降，但肥胖青少年组未见显著效果。总体表明益生菌对葡萄糖稳态具有潜在调节作用，尤其在代谢紊乱人群中效果更明显。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 5.5–6.5; utilizes glucose and other carbohydrates as carbon sources; requires no specific vitamins or amino acids beyond standard growth media
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~1.5–2 hours in vitro; in vivo colonization is transient and limited to the intestinal lumen without long-term persistence
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Small intestine and colon lumen; transient presence in the gut microbiota
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Minimal competition or symbiosis with resident microbiota; does not significantly alter overall microbial diversity or composition
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Moderate tolerance to gastric acidity and bile salts; stable during lyophilization and rehydration; resistant to moderate shear stress during oral administration
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Cell wall components (e.g., peptidoglycan), exopolysaccharides
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Lactobacillus rhamnosus GG is a facultative anaerobe capable of growing in the human intestinal tract under physiological conditions. It exhibits moderate tolerance to gastric acid and bile, enabling survival through the upper GI tract. It transiently colonizes the gut lumen but does not establish long-term residence. It utilizes simple sugars as carbon sources and does not require complex growth factors beyond standard media.
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Plasmid-based delivery system (not explicitly described; inferred from standard probiotic formulation)
G_circuit_control (回路控制): Constitutive (no inducible or synthetic circuits used)
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High chromosomal stability; no plasmid-based genetic elements reported; no evidence of genetic drift or loss in vivo
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in gelatin capsule and breast milk suspension; no degradation during storage or administration
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): Lactobacillus rhamnosus GG was used in its native, unmodified form. No genetic engineering or synthetic circuits were employed. The strain was administered as a live, freeze-dried powder in gelatin capsules, delivered orally to infants.
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): FNR-like regulators (inferred from known LGG physiology); bile salt hydrolase (BSH) activity
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No synthetic logic gates; natural sensing of environmental cues via constitutive expression of stress-response genes
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): Lactobacillus rhamnosus GG naturally senses changes in intestinal pH and bile acid concentration through membrane-bound receptors and transcriptional regulators. It responds to glucose availability via PTS transporters. These signals trigger adaptive responses such as acid resistance and bile tolerance, but no engineered logic processing is involved.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Passive diffusion and cell lysis (natural release of metabolites and surface molecules)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-controlled via daily oral administration of 10^10 CFU; no feedback or dynamic control
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with gelatin capsule and breast milk; no structural disruption observed
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Modulates mucosal immune responses by enhancing dendritic cell activation, promoting Th1/Th17 responses, and increasing IgA production in the gut lumen.
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): Surface proteins (e.g., p40, p75), exopolysaccharides (EPS), and secreted metabolites (e.g., lactic acid)
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Auxotrophy (no defined auxotrophic markers reported; natural attenuation via transient colonization)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no evidence of horizontal gene transfer; minimal risk of environmental escape due to transient colonization
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Gelatin capsule provides physical confinement; oral delivery limits systemic spread
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Lactobacillus rhamnosus GG is classified as Generally Recognized As Safe (GRAS). It is a non-pathogenic, commensal bacterium with a long history of safe use in humans. It does not persist in the gut beyond the intervention period and does not cause adverse effects in infants. No genetic modifications were made, reducing biosafety concerns.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): In a randomized, placebo-controlled trial among Indian infants, daily supplementation with Lactobacillus rhamnosus GG for 6 weeks resulted in a modest increase in seroconversion to oral rotavirus vaccine (Rotarix), from 27.4% in the placebo group to 35.2% in the probiotic group (p = 0.066). The highest seroconversion rate (39.4%) was observed in infants receiving both probiotic and zinc. However, the overall immunogenicity remained suboptimal, with no significant improvement in antibody titers or long-term protection. The effect was attributed to immunomodulatory activity rather than direct antibacterial or tissue repair functions.

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 5.5–6.5, utilizes carbohydrates as carbon sources; no specific mention of bile or osmotic tolerance
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Not explicitly reported; assumed typical for Lactobacillus spp. (doubling time ~1–2 hours in vitro)
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Human intestinal tract (gastrointestinal mucosa, particularly colon and small intestine)
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Commensal; likely competes with pathogenic bacteria and modulates host microbiota balance
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Well-tolerated in oral formulation; stable during storage (lyophilized tablets), no reported degradation or loss of viability
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Lyophilized formulation in chewable tablets
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Lactobacillus reuteri DSM 17938 is a Gram-positive, facultative anaerobic bacterium naturally colonizing the human intestinal tract. It grows under physiological conditions of the gut, including moderate acidity and anaerobic environments. It is adapted to survive the gastric passage and establish in the intestinal mucosa, where it exerts probiotic effects. The strain is stable in tablet form and maintains viability during storage and oral delivery.
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): No genetic modifications reported; natural strain used without plasmid or chromosomal integration
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): No engineered genetic circuits; stability is inherent to the wild-type strain in the material (tablet) environment
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): Lactobacillus reuteri DSM 17938 was used in its natural, unmodified form. No genetic engineering or synthetic circuits were applied. The strain was administered as a live biotherapeutic in chewable tablet form, relying on its intrinsic physiological properties for function.
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Endogenous receptors and metabolic pathways (e.g., sugar transporters, pH-sensing systems, bile acid transporters)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No synthetic logic gates reported; natural sensing via metabolic and environmental adaptation mechanisms
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): Lactobacillus reuteri DSM 17938 senses the intestinal environment through intrinsic metabolic and stress-response pathways. It detects changes in pH, nutrient availability (e.g., glucose, lactate), and bile acids, enabling colonization and survival. It may also respond to host-derived signals such as proteases and cytokines, although no specific engineered sensors were used. The strain functions through natural homeostatic sensing without synthetic logic circuits.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Passive secretion via cell lysis and natural excretion; no engineered secretion systems reported
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Fixed dose (2 × 10⁸ CFU/day) administered via chewable tablets; no dynamic control
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with tablet formulation; stable in oral delivery system without structural disruption
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Not applicable; no antibacterial or biofilm inhibition mechanisms reported
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 无相关证据
E_B_mechanism_desc (产氧机制描述): Not applicable; no oxygen-producing or oxygen-consuming mechanisms reported
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Reduces inflammatory cytokines, modulates the hypothalamic-pituitary-adrenal (HPA) axis, and improves brain-gut axis function, leading to reduced pain perception and improved stress response.
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): Anti-inflammatory cytokines (e.g., IL-10), modulation of TNF-α and IL-6
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Improves gastrointestinal motility, accelerates gastric emptying, reduces gastric distension, and decreases regurgitation, suggesting enhanced mucosal function and barrier integrity.
E_D_repair_material (修复因子_相关物质): Gastric motility regulators, mucosal protective factors
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Modulates gut microbiota composition and metabolic activity, potentially influencing SCFA production and glucose metabolism, contributing to improved gastrointestinal function.
E_F_mechanism_desc (肿瘤治疗描述): Not applicable; no anti-tumor or prodrug conversion mechanisms reported
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None; natural strain with no kill-switch or auxotrophy
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no horizontal gene transfer risk; no environmental escape concerns due to natural gut colonization
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Oral tablet provides physical confinement; no live release into environment
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Lactobacillus reuteri DSM 17938 is classified as Generally Recognized As Safe (GRAS) by regulatory authorities. It is a natural inhabitant of the human gut and has been used safely in clinical trials. No adverse effects were reported in this study. The strain does not carry antibiotic resistance genes and is not associated with opportunistic infections. No genetic modifications were made, minimizing biosafety risks.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在为期4周的治疗期间，L. reuteri DSM 17938和安慰剂均显著减轻了儿童功能性腹痛的疼痛频率和强度（所有p < 0.001）。尽管两组之间无显著差异，但L. reuteri组在第4周和第8周显著减少了学校缺勤和止痛药使用，改善了患儿及其家庭的正常活动。此外，L. reuteri组在第2周时恶心症状显著减少（19.2% vs 48.0%，p = 0.04），且GSRS评分更低（2.2 ± 5.3 vs 9.3 ± 16.3，p = 0.028）。该菌株耐受性良好，未报告不良反应。
