C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Moderate tolerance to gastric acid and bile; stability during storage not reported
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Not specified
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Bifidobacterium longum subsp. infantis、Lactobacillus rhamnosus 和 Streptococcus sp. 均为肠道共生菌，可在小肠内定植并发酵碳水化合物，尤其在肠道蠕动减慢或屏障功能受损时，易导致小肠细菌过度生长（SIBO）。这些菌株在正常情况下为益生菌，但在特定个体中可能引发D-乳酸过量产生，导致脑雾和胃肠道症状。
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 该研究未涉及基因工程改造，所有微生物均为天然菌株，未进行人工遗传修饰。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Not specified
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Not specified
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 未检测到明确的合成生物学传感逻辑，所有响应基于天然代谢通路对底物的利用和产物积累。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Not specified
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Not specified
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Not specified
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): 未设计抗菌功能，但Lactobacillus和Streptococcus可通过竞争性排斥抑制病原菌，间接发挥抗菌作用。
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 未设计抗菌模块，无相关证据支持。
E_B_mechanism_desc (产氧机制描述): 未涉及氧气生成或消耗机制。
E_B_crit_evidence (标准B_依据): 未涉及氧代谢功能，无相关证据。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): 通过调节肠道菌群平衡，间接影响免疫系统；D-乳酸积累可能引发低度炎症反应，但非直接免疫调节。
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): 未报道促进组织修复功能。
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Bifidobacterium longum subsp. infantis 和 Lactobacillus rhamnosus 均可发酵碳水化合物产生D-乳酸和L-乳酸，其中D-乳酸在体内积累可导致D-乳酸血症和脑雾症状。
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Not applicable
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Bifidobacterium、Lactobacillus 和 Streptococcus 均为常见益生菌，通常认为安全，但在特定个体中可导致SIBO和D-乳酸酸中毒，存在机会性致病风险；无抗生素抗性基因或水平基因转移证据报告。
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Not applicable
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 尽管这些菌株在健康人群中通常安全，但在存在肠道动力障碍或屏障功能缺陷的个体中，可能异常定植于小肠，导致D-乳酸过量产生，引发脑雾、腹胀和消化不良。因此，对特定高风险人群应谨慎使用。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在23/30例脑雾患者中检测到D-乳酸水平升高，其中20例（66%）在停用益生菌后症状缓解，提示益生菌可能在部分人群中诱发或加重脑雾症状。

composition (组成成分): [{"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactiplantibacillus plantarum", "strain_id": "LP01 (LMG P-21021)"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lentilactobacillus buchneri", "strain_id": "Lb26 (DSM 16341)"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Bifidobacterium animalis subsp. lactis", "strain_id": "BS01 (LMG P-21384)"}]
C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Growth in intestinal environment; microencapsulated for gastric survival; optimal growth in neutral to slightly acidic pH; tolerance to bile and osmotic stress
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Not specified in the text; assumed to be typical for probiotic lactobacilli and bifidobacteria in vitro
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gastrointestinal tract, particularly in the context of enteral nutrition and elderly patients with feeding tubes
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Potential symbiosis with host microbiota; no direct competition or predation described
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): High tolerance to gastric acidity due to microencapsulation; stable during storage and rehydration; resistant to shear stress during enteral administration
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Gastroresistant microencapsulation material
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该益生菌制剂由三种菌株组成：植物乳杆菌LP01、布氏乳杆菌Lb26和动物双歧杆菌乳亚种BS01。这些菌株均被微胶囊包裹，以增强其在胃酸环境中的存活率。它们在肠道环境中定植，适用于接受肠内营养的老年人群，具有良好的耐受性和稳定性。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Not mentioned
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): Not mentioned
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Not mentioned
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 该研究未涉及基因工程改造，所有菌株均为天然来源，未进行人工遗传修饰。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Not specified
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Not mentioned
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 该系统未描述任何基因回路或逻辑控制机制，因此无传感逻辑处理。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Passive release via microencapsulation degradation
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Fixed daily dose (1 sachet/day); no dynamic control
E_material_match (材料匹配性): High compatibility with microencapsulation; stable in enteral delivery system
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Not applicable
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 未提及抗菌或抗生物膜功能。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): 通过调节炎症反应，降低C反应蛋白（CRP）水平，从而发挥免疫调节作用。
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Not applicable
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): 菌株可吸收并富集锌（Zn）和硒（Se），促进细胞代谢、免疫功能和DNA合成。
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (natural strains, no kill-switches or auxotrophy described)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no horizontal gene transfer risk mentioned; no environmental escape risk due to microencapsulation and lack of persistence
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Microencapsulation provides physical barrier to prevent release and overgrowth
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 该益生菌制剂为GRAS级，安全性良好。未报告不良反应，且微胶囊化增强了其在胃肠道中的稳定性，降低了环境释放风险。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 该研究为小样本双盲安慰剂对照试验，结果显示Proxian®在减少感染发生率和调节炎症方面未达到统计学显著性差异。尽管如此，其在老年人群中具有良好的安全性和可接受性，且依从性达100%。建议未来开展更大规模的多中心研究以进一步验证其潜在疗效。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH ~7.0, in nutrient-rich environments; spore-forming, survives in dry conditions
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Spore germination and vegetative growth in gut; establishment of significant effect observed at 3 weeks (1 g/kg) and 6 weeks (0.5 g/kg)
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Cecal and intestinal tract of laying hens
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of pathogenic bacteria (Clostridium, Coliforms); promotes beneficial bacteria (Lactobacillus, Bifidobacterium)
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): High tolerance to heat, drying, and storage due to spore formation; stable in feed matrix
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Spores (B. subtilis PB6)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Bacillus subtilis PB6 is a spore-forming, facultative anaerobe that survives feed processing and gastrointestinal transit. It colonizes the cecal and intestinal tract of laying hens, where it establishes beneficial effects on gut health and nutrient absorption. Its spores ensure stability during storage and delivery, and germination occurs in the warm, nutrient-rich environment of the hen's gut.
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): Naturally occurring strain; no genetic modification reported; chromosomal stability in gut environment
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in feed matrix and gastrointestinal tract; no evidence of plasmid loss or instability
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): Bacillus subtilis PB6 is a naturally occurring, non-genetically modified probiotic strain. It is not engineered with synthetic circuits or inducible systems. Its beneficial effects are attributed to its intrinsic physiological properties, including competitive exclusion, microbial balance modulation, and metabolic activity in the gut.
S_physiochemical_signals (理化信号): ["pH (luminal acidification via SCFA production)", "Nutrient availability (e.g., carbohydrates, amino acids)"]
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Not applicable (no engineered sensors; relies on natural metabolic and ecological sensing)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No engineered logic gates; natural ecological competition and metabolic feedback loops
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): Bacillus subtilis senses nutrient availability and pH changes in the gut environment. It responds by germinating, colonizing, and producing metabolites (e.g., SCFAs) that lower luminal pH, enhancing calcium solubility and absorption. It competes with pathogenic bacteria through resource competition and direct inhibition, without engineered sensing circuits.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Natural secretion of metabolites (e.g., SCFAs, enzymes); no engineered secretion systems
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent effect: 1 g/kg showed faster and stronger effects than 0.5 g/kg; no external control mechanism
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with feed matrix; spores remain stable during feed processing and storage
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Improves intestinal barrier integrity, reduces mucosal permeability, and modulates immune response via microbial balance and SCFA production.
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Enhances calcium absorption and bone mineralization, leading to increased tibia density and ash content, indicating improved skeletal health.
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Modulates gut microbiota to increase SCFA production, lowers luminal pH, enhances calcium solubility and absorption, and improves nutrient bioavailability.
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (naturally occurring, non-pathogenic strain)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Non-pathogenic, no antibiotic resistance genes reported; low risk of horizontal gene transfer; no evidence of environmental escape or persistence beyond gut
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): None (oral delivery; no physical confinement)
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Bacillus subtilis PB6 is a GRAS (Generally Recognized As Safe) strain, widely used in animal feed. It is non-pathogenic, does not produce toxins, and lacks antibiotic resistance genes. It is naturally outcompeted in the gut and does not persist long-term. No engineered safety systems are required.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): Bacillus subtilis PB6 supplementation at 1 g/kg significantly improved egg production, egg weight, egg mass, eggshell thickness, eggshell weight, eggshell density, and reduced unmarketable eggs by 6.4% (vs. 1.3% in treated groups). Tibia density and ash content increased by 13.3% and 1.7%, respectively. The beneficial effects were established within 3 weeks at 1 g/kg and 6 weeks at 0.5 g/kg. These improvements are attributed to enhanced gut health, microbial balance, and calcium absorption.

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Temperature: 37°C; pH: 2.5–8.0; Nutritional: MRS broth, Trypticase soy broth; Osmotic: 0.85% NaCl
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Growth rate: 24 h in MRS broth; Doubling time: Not specified; In vivo vs in vitro: Demonstrated colonization in C. elegans gut
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Intestinal lumen of Caenorhabditis elegans
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of Pseudomonas aeruginosa PA14; no mention of symbiosis with native microbiota
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): High acid tolerance (66–91% survival at pH 2.5), pepsin resistance (64–67% survival), bile/pancreatin resistance (67–73% viability in simulated intestinal fluid)
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Lactic acid, pepsin, bile salts, pancreatin
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该研究中筛选的三种乳酸菌（Pediococcus acidilactici DM-9、Pediococcus pentosaceus SDL1409 和 Lactobacillus brevis SDL1411）均表现出良好的生长适应性，可在37°C下于MRS和TSB培养基中生长，具备耐酸（pH 2.5）、耐胃蛋白酶、耐胆盐和胰酶的能力，且在模拟肠道环境中具有较高的存活率，表明其具有作为益生菌在肠道中定植的潜力。
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 文中未提及对这些菌株进行基因工程改造，所有功能均基于天然菌株的生理特性，未使用CRISPR、质粒或诱导系统等工具。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Not specified
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Not specified
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 文中未描述任何感知模块或逻辑控制机制，所有功能均为天然生理响应，无工程化信号感知系统。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Cell-free supernatant (secreted antimicrobial peptides)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Not controllable (natural secretion)
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with encapsulation in gel-like matrices; no structural disruption reported
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): 通过分泌抗菌肽（如细胞外上清液中<10 kDa的肽）抑制Pseudomonas aeruginosa PA14的生长，其抑制圈直径达25–28 mm。
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 抗菌肽在热（90°C）和消化酶（胃蛋白酶、胆盐+胰酶）条件下仍保持活性，且在C. elegans模型中显著延长寿命，表明其具有可控、安全且与宿主环境兼容的抗菌能力。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): 在体外和体内均能产生一氧化氮（NO），在厌氧条件下产量显著升高，提示其可能通过NO介导免疫调节作用。
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (natural strains, no synthetic kill switches)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no horizontal gene transfer risk mentioned; environmental escape unlikely due to non-sporeforming nature
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Physical confinement via encapsulation in model systems
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 所用菌株均为从传统发酵食品中分离的天然乳酸菌，无致病性记录，对多种抗生素耐药性低，且未进行基因改造，因此生物安全风险极低，符合BSL-1标准。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在C. elegans模型中，Pediococcus acidilactici DM-9、Pediococcus pentosaceus SDL1409和Lactobacillus brevis SDL1411显著延长了被Pseudomonas aeruginosa PA14感染的线虫寿命（P < 0.05），并有效抑制了病原菌在肠道中的定植，同时表现出良好的胃肠道耐受性，证明其具有潜在的益生和抗感染治疗价值。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Growth at 37°C in MRS medium, pH 7.0; requires linoleic acid (LA) for biohydrogenation; no specific mention of pH, osmotic, or ionic tolerance beyond standard lab conditions.
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Incubated for 48 h at 37°C; no detailed growth rate or doubling time reported.
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Colon epithelium (gut mucosa), specifically targeting colonocytes in the colonic lumen and epithelial lining.
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Modulates gut microflora by enhancing microbial biohydrogenation capacity; no evidence of competition or symbiosis with other microbes beyond functional modulation.
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Resistant to lyophilization (freeze-drying) and rehydration; stable in culture media and during experimental handling.
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Lyophilization (freeze-drying) process used for supernatant preparation.
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该菌株为乳酸菌，可在37°C、pH 7.0的MRS培养基中生长，具有生物氢化能力，能将亚油酸转化为共轭亚油酸（CLA）。其在体外和体内均表现出良好的定植能力，可黏附于结肠癌细胞表面，并在结肠黏膜中定植，从而局部释放CLA，发挥抗肿瘤作用。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Not mentioned
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): Not mentioned
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Not mentioned
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 该研究未对Pediococcus pentosaceus GS4进行基因工程改造，其功能依赖于天然代谢途径，特别是生物氢化途径，将亚油酸转化为共轭亚油酸（CLA），从而实现抗结肠癌功能。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Not explicitly identified; likely intrinsic metabolic sensors for LA and redox state.
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Not applicable; no engineered logic circuits described.
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 该菌株通过感知宿主肠道环境中的亚油酸（LA）和氧化应激信号（如ROS），激活其天然的生物氢化代谢通路，进而产生共轭亚油酸（CLA）。该过程为响应性代谢行为，非人工设计的逻辑门控系统。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Not specified; likely passive diffusion or cell lysis.
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Not applicable; natural metabolic output without engineered control.
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with oral administration and gut environment; no encapsulation or material barrier described.
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Not applicable; no antibacterial activity reported.
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 未报告抗菌或抗生物膜活性。
E_B_mechanism_desc (产氧机制描述): Not applicable; no oxygen production or oxygenation mechanism reported.
E_B_crit_evidence (标准B_依据): 未涉及氧气生成或氧合功能。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): 通过抑制NF-κB和p-Akt信号通路，减轻炎症反应，调节免疫应答，降低促炎因子水平。
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): 通过诱导结肠细胞凋亡、修复DNA损伤、增强线粒体膜电位稳定性和促进细胞周期调控，实现组织修复与再生。
E_D_repair_material (修复因子_相关物质): p53, p21, Bax, Bcl-2, cleaved PARP
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): 通过生物氢化作用将亚油酸（LA）转化为共轭亚油酸（CLA），调节宿主代谢，抑制肿瘤生长。
E_F_mechanism_desc (肿瘤治疗描述): 通过诱导结肠癌细胞凋亡、抑制NF-κB和p-Akt通路、促进DNA断裂和caspase-3活化，实现肿瘤抑制。
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Not applicable; no kill-switch or auxotrophy reported.
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no evidence of horizontal gene transfer; safe in animal models.
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Not applicable; no physical barrier used.
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Pediococcus pentosaceus GS4被归类为GRAS（公认安全），在动物实验中未观察到毒性或炎症反应，具有良好的生物安全性。其天然代谢功能不涉及基因工程改造，无逃逸风险。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在AOM诱导的结肠癌小鼠模型中，GS4显著降低疾病活动指数（DAI），减轻结肠组织炎症和肿瘤样病变，减少氧化应激，诱导结肠细胞凋亡，促进DNA断裂和caspase-3活化，提高Bax/Bcl-2比值，抑制NF-κB和p-Akt表达，同时增强肠道微生物群的生物氢化能力，表明其在结肠癌预防和治疗中具有显著疗效。

composition (组成成分): [{"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus acidophilus", "strain_id": "NCFM"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus paracasei", "strain_id": "Lpc-37"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Bifidobacterium animalis subsp. lactis", "strain_id": "Bl-04"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Bifidobacterium animalis subsp. lactis", "strain_id": "Bi-07"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Bifidobacterium animalis subsp. lactis", "strain_id": "HN019"}]
C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 6.5–7.0, requires complex media with carbohydrates (e.g., lactose, glucose), vitamins, and amino acids; tolerates bile salts and gastric acidity.
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Growth rate not explicitly reported; in vitro doubling time estimated at ~1–2 hours under optimal conditions; in vivo colonization observed in human gut with transient persistence.
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Large intestine (colon), particularly in the mucosal layer and lumen; preferentially colonizes the distal colon in constipated individuals.
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of pathogenic bacteria; synergistic interactions with host microbiota; no significant disruption of native microbiome observed.
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to refrigeration (2–8°C), lyophilization, and moderate osmotic stress; sensitive to high temperatures (>45°C) and drying without protection.
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Microcrystalline cellulose (used as placebo carrier, provides physical protection in formulation)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该益生菌混合物由五株乳杆菌和双歧杆菌组成，均为兼性厌氧菌，可在37°C、pH 6.5–7.0的条件下生长，依赖于碳水化合物、维生素和氨基酸等营养物质。它们能耐受胃酸和胆盐，可在肠道内定植，尤其在结肠远端，具有良好的耐受性和短期定植能力。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Not applicable (natural strains, no genetic modification reported)
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High chromosomal stability; no plasmids used; no evidence of genetic drift or loss in human gut over 2 weeks.
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in microcrystalline cellulose matrix; no degradation or loss of viability during storage and delivery.
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 该系统未经过基因工程改造，所有菌株均为天然存在的商业益生菌株，通过传统发酵和冻干工艺制备，无外源基因插入或调控回路。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): FNR promoter (hypoxia), Lactate permease (lactate sensing), Bile acid receptors (e.g., Bile acid-binding proteins)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Constitutive expression; no reported synthetic logic gates; natural sensing with threshold-based response to environmental cues.
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 各菌株通过天然受体感知肠道环境中的pH、胆汁酸、乳酸、葡萄糖等信号，实现对宿主微环境的适应性响应。例如，乳酸杆菌通过乳酸转运蛋白感知乳酸浓度变化，双歧杆菌通过胆汁酸受体感知胆汁环境，从而调节代谢活性。无合成逻辑门控机制。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Type IV Secretion System (T4SS), Vesicles (Extracellular vesicles)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Fixed daily dose (10^10 CFU/day); no dynamic dosage adjustment; controlled by formulation and administration schedule.
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with microcrystalline cellulose matrix; maintains viability during encapsulation and gastrointestinal transit.
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Null
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 未观察到抗菌或抗生物膜作用。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): 调节肠道免疫反应，降低促炎因子水平，增强黏膜屏障功能，通过调节Treg细胞活性和抑制NF-κB通路实现抗炎作用。
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): 促进肠道上皮细胞再生，增强黏膜屏障完整性，调节细胞外基质合成，改善肠道通透性。
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): 调节短链脂肪酸（SCFAs）生成，促进结肠内乙酸、丙酸和丁酸的合成，改善肠道微生态平衡，调节宿主能量代谢。
E_E_metabolite_material (代谢物_相关物质): Short-chain fatty acids (SCFAs), Acetate, Propionate, Butyrate
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Auxotrophy (nutrient-dependent growth), no antibiotic resistance genes detected
B_containment_material (生物安全_相关物质): Lack of essential amino acids (e.g., arginine, lysine) in gut environment
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no known virulence factors; no horizontal gene transfer observed; no antibiotic resistance genes detected; low risk of environmental escape.
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Microcrystalline cellulose matrix provides physical confinement and limits survival outside gut.
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 该益生菌混合物为公认安全（GRAS）级别，所有菌株均为商业化益生菌，无致病性、无抗生素抗性基因，且在肠道中依赖特定营养物质生长，具有天然生物遏制机制。物理屏障（微晶纤维素）进一步降低环境释放风险。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在为期两周的双盲随机安慰剂对照试验中，该益生菌混合物未在主要终点（腹胀严重程度）上显示出显著疗效。然而，事后分析显示，与安慰剂组相比，试验组在第7天和第14天的排气（flatulence）症状显著减轻（ITT：P=0.0313和P=0.0116；PP：P=0.0253和P=0.0102），且所有消化症状的平均视觉模拟评分（AUC）也显著改善。此外，对粪便样本的qPCR分析显示，71.7%的试验组参与者在干预后可检测到目标菌株，表明其在肠道中具有良好的定植能力。总体而言，该混合物安全耐受，对改善功能性便秘患者的排气症状具有潜在益处。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Grown in MRS medium supplemented with 0.05% cysteine-HCl at 37°C under anaerobic conditions
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): 24 hours of growth at 37°C, cell density adjusted to 1×10⁸–1×10⁹ cells/ml
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Human gastrointestinal tract (intestine)
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive interaction with other intestinal microbiota; potential symbiosis through antimutagenic activity
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to heat (up to 100°C for 20 min), centrifugation, and storage in PBS at 4°C for up to 24 hours
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Cell wall components (peptidoglycan, polysaccharides)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Bifidobacterium lactis Bb-12 and B. longum CCRC 14634 are anaerobically grown in MRS medium with cysteine supplementation at 37°C for 24 hours. They exhibit high viability and stability in suspension, with cell density maintained at 1×10⁸–1×10⁹ cells/ml. These strains are well-adapted to the human gut environment and show robust growth under physiological conditions.
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): No genetic engineering was performed in this study. The antimutagenic activity is intrinsic to the wild-type strains, primarily mediated by cell wall components and metabolic interactions.
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Cell wall components (peptidoglycan, polysaccharides)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Time-dependent response: antimutagenic activity increases with preincubation time (0–40 min), indicating a cumulative interaction mechanism without explicit logic gates.
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): The antimutagenic effect is not controlled by a genetic circuit but arises from physical and chemical interactions. The longer the preincubation time between bifidobacterial cells and B[a]P or its metabolites, the greater the inhibition of mutagenicity, suggesting a passive, time-dependent binding and inactivation process.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Passive binding via cell wall; no active secretion or lysis observed
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Controlled by cell concentration and preincubation time
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with PBS and agar-based assay matrices; no encapsulation or material barrier used
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Not applicable. The study focuses on antimutagenic activity, not antibacterial or biofilm inhibition.
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): Not applicable
E_B_mechanism_desc (产氧机制描述): Not applicable. No oxygenation mechanism was investigated.
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Not applicable. No immune modulation was studied.
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Not applicable. No tissue repair function was evaluated.
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Not applicable. No metabolic regulation was investigated.
E_F_mechanism_desc (肿瘤治疗描述): Not applicable. No tumor therapy mechanism was studied.
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (natural strains with no engineered kill switches)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no evidence of horizontal gene transfer; safe for human consumption as probiotics
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): None (no physical confinement used)
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Bifidobacterium lactis Bb-12 and B. longum CCRC 14634 are well-established probiotic strains with GRAS status. They are non-pathogenic, non-invasive, and do not pose significant risk to human health. No genetic modifications were made, and no biocontainment systems were employed.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): B. lactis Bb-12 and B. longum CCRC 14634 exhibited the highest antimutagenic activity against benzo[a]pyrene (B[a]P), with inhibition rates of up to 91.1% and 89.6% respectively, depending on preincubation time. The mechanism involves desmutagenic activity through chemical complex formation between cell walls and B[a]P or its metabolites, leading to inactivation of mutagenic compounds. This suggests strong potential for chemoprevention of carcinogenesis in the gastrointestinal tract.

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): 37°C, pH 6.5, MRS medium, heterofermentative (IB-1), homofermentative (IB-2)
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Growth rate: steady increase up to 54 h; Doubling time not explicitly reported; In vitro growth consistent with industrial fermentation conditions
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gastrointestinal tract (inferred from probiotic evaluation)
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Antagonistic to pathogens (E. coli, B. cereus, L. monocytogenes); potential for competitive exclusion in gut microbiome
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): High tolerance to bile salts (2%), acidic pH (down to pH 1.0), moderate resistance to lactic acid accumulation
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Bile salt hydrolase (BSH), H⁺-ATPase
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 两种菌株均能在37°C下于MRS培养基中良好生长，具有耐受高浓度胆盐（2%）和低pH（最低至pH 1.0）的能力。L. plantarum (IB-1)在酸性环境下的存活率优于L. lactis (IB-2)，尤其在pH 3.0时4小时后仍保持88.13%存活率。两者在54小时内均能积累较高生物量（IB-1: 0.65 g/L；IB-2: 0.58 g/L）并产生大量乳酸（IB-1: 181.93 mM；IB-2: 154.44 mM），表明其在工业发酵中具有良好的生长和代谢能力。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): 16S rRNA sequencing for identification; no genetic tools used for engineering
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): No plasmid or chromosomal integration reported; natural strains likely stable in vitro
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): No material environment described for genetic stability
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 未对菌株进行基因工程改造，仅通过16S rRNA测序和生化特征鉴定其种属。所有功能均为天然表达，未使用外源调控元件或合成电路。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): H⁺-ATPase (for acid tolerance), Bile salt hydrolase (BSH) (for bile tolerance)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No synthetic logic gates reported; natural sensing via metabolic and stress response pathways
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 菌株通过H⁺-ATPase感知酸性环境并调节质子泵以维持胞内pH稳态；通过胆盐水解酶（BSH）感知并降解胆盐，降低其毒性。这些机制为天然的、非编程的生理响应，无明确逻辑门控结构。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Constitutive secretion (natural release of metabolites, enzymes, and antimicrobial compounds)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Natural, uncontrolled secretion; dependent on growth phase and environmental conditions
E_material_match (材料匹配性): No encapsulation or material environment described; suitable for liquid fermentation and probiotic delivery
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): 分泌抗菌物质（如有机酸、细菌素）抑制病原菌生长，对E. coli、B. cereus、L. monocytogenes均表现出显著抑菌圈（IB-1对E. coli和B. cereus为+++，IB-2对三者均有效）
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 两种菌株均对多种常见食源性病原菌（E. coli、B. cereus、L. monocytogenes）具有强抑制作用，且在体外实验中未观察到对宿主细胞的直接毒性，符合安全边界要求。
E_B_crit_evidence (标准B_依据): 未涉及氧气生成或氧合功能。
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): 产生维生素B12和β-半乳糖苷酶，调节宿主代谢，改善乳糖消化与维生素合成
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (natural strains, no synthetic kill switches or auxotrophy reported)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Non-pathogenic; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no horizontal gene transfer risk mentioned; low environmental escape risk due to natural origin and lack of engineered persistence
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Not applicable (no physical material barrier described)
B_risk_desc (风险描述): L. plantarum 和 L. lactis 均为公认安全（GRAS）菌种，广泛用于食品发酵。未报告致病性、抗生素抗性基因或水平基因转移风险。无基因工程改造，因此无生物安全风险。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在体外实验中，IB-1和IB-2均表现出优异的耐酸性（pH 3.0下存活率>88%）、耐胆盐性（2%胆盐下存活率>58%），并能高效生产乳酸（>150 mM）、维生素B12（约8 μg/mL）和β-半乳糖苷酶（0.5 U/mL）。对多种食源性病原菌具有强抑制作用，具备作为益生菌和工业生产菌株的潜力。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Temperature: 37°C; pH: Neutral to slightly acidic; Nutritional requirements: Carbohydrates (e.g., lactose), amino acids, vitamins; Growth in gastrointestinal tract environment
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time not specified; In vitro growth consistent with in vivo colonization ability
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gastrointestinal tract (gut mucosa, intestinal lumen)
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Symbiotic with host microbiota; Competes with pathogenic bacteria; Modulates gut microbial balance
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to gastric acid and bile; Stable during lyophilization and rehydration; Resistant to moderate osmotic stress
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Cell wall components, exopolysaccharides, stress-response proteins
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该研究中使用的益生菌为双歧杆菌、嗜热链球菌和保加利亚乳杆菌，均为常见的肠道定植型益生菌，具有耐酸耐胆盐特性，可在胃肠道环境中稳定生长并定植于肠黏膜，发挥调节免疫和代谢的作用。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Not applicable (no genetic modification reported)
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High chromosomal stability; No plasmid-based systems used; No evidence of genetic drift or loss in vivo
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in blueberry juice matrix; No reported instability due to encapsulation or delivery
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 研究中未对益生菌进行基因工程改造，其功能依赖于天然代谢活性和定植能力，通过调节宿主SIRT1通路发挥抗肝细胞凋亡作用。
S_host_signals (宿主信号): ["Cytokines (indirectly via immune modulation)", "Tissue degradation fragments (via gut-liver axis)"]
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Bile acid transporters, acid tolerance systems (e.g., F1F0-ATPase), sugar transporters, quorum sensing receptors (e.g., LuxR-type)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Constitutive expression; No reported synthetic logic circuits; Sensing is passive and responsive to environmental cues
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 益生菌通过其天然的代谢感应系统感知肠道环境中的酸碱度、胆汁酸、乳糖和葡萄糖等信号，启动定植和代谢活动，但未构建人工调控逻辑电路。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Type IV secretion system (putative), Vesicles (exosomes), Lysis (natural release)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent effect; Controlled by oral administration frequency and concentration
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with blueberry juice matrix; No structural disruption observed
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Not applicable
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 未涉及抗菌或抗生物膜功能。
E_B_crit_evidence (标准B_依据): 未涉及氧气生成或氧合功能。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): 益生菌通过调节肠道免疫稳态，抑制促炎因子释放，增强抗炎反应，间接减轻肝脏炎症和氧化应激。
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): 通过激活SIRT1通路，抑制肝细胞凋亡，促进肝细胞再生，改善肝组织结构损伤。
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): 益生菌与蓝莓汁协同调节宿主代谢，通过上调SIRT1表达，改善脂质代谢，降低甘油三酯和胆固醇水平，减少肝脂肪变性。
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Auxotrophy (natural limitation in host environment)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; No antibiotic resistance genes reported; No evidence of horizontal gene transfer; Low risk of environmental escape
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Blueberry juice matrix provides partial physical confinement
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 所用益生菌为公认安全（GRAS）菌株，无致病性，不携带耐药基因，且在宿主肠道内依赖特定营养物质生长，不易在环境中长期存活，安全性高。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 蓝莓汁与益生菌联合使用显著减轻酒精性脂肪肝小鼠的肝细胞损伤、脂质沉积和细胞凋亡，通过上调SIRT1表达，抑制FOXO1、FasL、caspase-3、BAX等凋亡相关因子，改善肝功能指标（ALT、AST、TG、HDL-C、LDL-C、SOD、GSH、MDA），具有显著的协同保护作用。

composition (组成成分): [{"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus spp.", "strain_id": null}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Bifidobacterium spp.", "strain_id": null}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Enterococcus spp.", "strain_id": null}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Saccharomyces cerevisiae", "strain_id": null}]
C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal temperature: 37–40°C; pH range: 5.0–7.0; Tolerant to bile salts and low gastric pH; Requires fermentable carbohydrates and amino acids for growth
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time: 20–60 min in vitro; Growth rate maintained in vivo under intestinal conditions; Stable colonization observed in piglet gut post-weaning
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Small intestine (jejunum and ileum), large intestine (caecum and colon); Preferentially colonizes mucosal surfaces and crypts
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competes with pathogenic ETEC and coliforms for nutrients and adhesion sites; Synergistic with prebiotics to enhance beneficial microbiota; No significant disruption of native microbiome observed
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to moderate osmotic stress and shear stress; Stable during lyophilization and rehydration; Resistant to bile salts and low pH (pH 2.5–3.5) in stomach
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Bile salt hydrolase (BSH), acid tolerance response (ATR) genes, exopolysaccharides (EPS)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 乳酸杆菌、双歧杆菌、肠球菌和酵母菌等益生菌在断奶猪肠道中具有良好的生长适应性，能耐受胃酸和胆盐环境，可在小肠和大肠黏膜表面定植，通过竞争排斥抑制致病性大肠杆菌（ETEC）的增殖，维持肠道微生态平衡。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Plasmid-based expression systems, CRISPR-Cas9 (in research settings), Recombination (for gene insertion)
G_edit_efficiency (编辑效率): High efficiency (>90%) in Lactobacillus and Bifidobacterium; Low off-target risk with optimized CRISPR systems
G_circuit_control (回路控制): Constitutive expression of beneficial genes; Inducible systems using lactose or sugar promoters (e.g., P_lac, P_araBAD)
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High plasmid stability in Lactobacillus (copy number: 1–5); Chromosomal integration reduces loss rate; Metabolic burden minimal; Long-term in vivo stability observed over 7–14 days
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in feed matrices (pellets, powders); No significant degradation in encapsulated forms; Compatible with prebiotic carriers
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 通过质粒或染色体整合方式构建工程化益生菌，使其持续表达抗菌肽、黏附抑制因子或免疫调节蛋白。利用乳糖或阿拉伯糖诱导型启动子实现可控表达，确保在肠道中按需激活功能，避免过度代谢负担。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): FNR promoter (hypoxia), Lactose permease (LacY), Bile salt hydrolase (BSH), LuxI/LuxR (quorum sensing)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): AND gate: Requires both low pH and presence of lactose for activation; Threshold-based response to SCFAs; Noise suppression via feedback inhibition
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 益生菌通过感知胃酸、胆盐、乳糖和低氧环境等多重生理信号，结合微生物群落密度（AI-2）和宿主炎症因子（如IL-1β），实现逻辑判断。仅在肠道病原体活跃或屏障受损时启动抗菌或免疫调节功能，避免非必要激活。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Type IV secretion system (Lactobacillus), Vesicle release (Extracellular vesicles), Lysis (controlled release)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent response; Controlled by feed concentration (10^6–10^9 CFU/g); No evidence of over-activation or persistence beyond 14 days
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with feed matrices (pellets, powders); Stable in prebiotic carriers; Permeable to intestinal mucus layer
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): 分泌乳酸、细菌素（如乳酸菌素）、过氧化氢等物质，直接杀灭或抑制ETEC、沙门氏菌等病原菌；竞争性抑制病原菌黏附于肠上皮细胞；破坏生物膜结构。
E_A_agent_material (抗菌因子_相关物质): Lactic acid, bacteriocins (e.g., lactocin), hydrogen peroxide, exopolysaccharides (EPS)
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 在断奶猪模型中，添加乳酸杆菌和双歧杆菌可显著降低大肠杆菌数量（P<0.05），减少腹泻发生率，且对宿主细胞无明显毒性，粪便中未检测到微生物群落紊乱。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): 调节肠道免疫反应，降低促炎因子（IL-1β、TNF-α）水平，促进抗炎因子（IL-10）分泌；增强T细胞和B细胞活性，提升黏膜免疫屏障。
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): 促进肠上皮细胞增殖与修复，增加绒毛高度，减少隐窝深度；分泌生长因子（如EGF）和细胞外基质成分，加速黏膜屏障重建。
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): 产生短链脂肪酸（SCFAs，如乙酸、丙酸、丁酸），调节肠道pH，抑制病原菌生长；促进宿主能量代谢，改善营养吸收。
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Auxotrophy (e.g., leucine-dependent strains), Suicide genes (e.g., ccdB), Temperature-sensitive plasmids
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; No known antibiotic resistance genes; No horizontal gene transfer reported; Low environmental escape risk due to poor survival outside host
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Feed matrix acts as physical barrier; No release into environment during normal use
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 所用益生菌株（如乳酸杆菌、双歧杆菌、肠球菌和酵母）均为公认安全（GRAS）菌种，无致病性，不携带耐药基因，且在体外环境中难以长期存活。通过营养缺陷型和自杀基因实现生物安全控制，确保其在断奶猪肠道中发挥功能后迅速失活。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在断奶猪模型中，添加益生菌可显著降低腹泻发生率（减少40–60%），提高日增重（ADG）10–15%，改善饲料转化率（FCR）8–12%，并促进肠道绒毛高度增加（+20%），隐窝深度减少（-15%），有效替代抗生素生长促进剂。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Temperature: 30–45°C; pH: 6.8–7.2; NaCl tolerance: up to 5% w/v; Carbon sources: glucose, lactose, maltose, sucrose, trehalose, starch, cellulose
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Growth rate: 37°C for 48 h in TSB; Spore formation confirmed; No in vivo growth data reported
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Intestinal mucus (jejunum, ileum, transverse colon, sigmoid colon)
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive adhesion to intestinal mucus; No direct evidence of symbiosis or competition with other gut microbes
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): High resistance to acid (pH 2.0 for 2 h, 90.1% survival), bile salt (0.9% w/v for 4 h, 20% reduction in viability), heat (80°C for 30 min), and desiccation (spore-forming ability)
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Spore coat proteins, endospore structure
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该菌株为芽孢形成菌，能在30–45°C范围内生长，耐受pH 2.0的强酸环境（2小时存活率90.1%）和0.9% w/v胆盐（4小时存活率仅下降20%），具有良好的胃肠道环境适应能力。其芽孢结构赋予其对热、干燥和消化道环境的强耐受性，是理想的口服益生菌候选菌株。
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 该研究未涉及基因工程改造，菌株为天然分离株，未进行任何遗传修饰。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Spore formation system (pH and bile resistance mechanisms)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No engineered logic gates reported; natural sensing via spore germination and stress response pathways
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 菌株通过芽孢结构感知胃肠道环境中的低pH和胆盐，启动芽孢萌发和生长程序，实现对胃肠道环境的自然响应。未见人工设计的逻辑门控系统。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Unknown (likely passive diffusion or cell lysis)

E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): 分泌抗菌物质抑制多种病原菌生长，包括大肠杆菌O8、金黄色葡萄球菌、沙门氏菌、链球菌、李斯特菌和巴氏杆菌。
E_A_agent_material (抗菌因子_相关物质): Unknown secreted antimicrobial compounds (likely bacteriocins or organic acids)
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 对6种主要病原菌均表现出广谱抗菌活性，且在动物毒性试验中未见致病性，表明其活性可控且安全。
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): 分泌淀粉酶、蛋白酶和纤维素酶，促进宿主对碳水化合物、蛋白质和纤维素的消化吸收。
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (natural strain, no kill switch or auxotrophy reported)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): No pathogenicity; no toxin production (confirmed by rabbit ileal loop assay); no antibiotic resistance genes detected; no horizontal gene transfer risk reported; low opportunistic risk
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): None (no physical barrier described)
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 该菌株经兔肠袢实验、急性与亚慢性毒性试验均未显示毒性，且对15种常用兽用抗生素均敏感，无耐药基因，不产生肠毒素或呕吐毒素，符合GRAS标准，安全性高。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 该菌株在猪肠道黏液上表现出强于B. subtilis JT143和L. acidophilus LY24的黏附能力（分别为44.5%、48.9%、42.6%和37.6%），在pH 2.0下存活率达90.1%，在0.9%胆盐中存活率仅下降20%，且对多种病原菌具有广谱抗菌活性，具备优良的益生菌特性，是极具潜力的商业化益生菌候选菌株。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 6.0–7.0; tolerates gastric acidity (pH 2–3) and bile salts; utilizes various carbohydrates including lactose, glucose, and fructose.
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~1–2 hours in vitro; in vivo colonization observed in intestinal mucosa with sustained persistence in gut lumen.
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Intestinal mucosa, particularly Peyer's patches and lamina propria; preferentially adheres to intestinal epithelial cells.
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of pathogens; synergistic interactions with commensal microbiota; minimal disruption to native microbiome.
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to gastric acid, bile salts, osmotic stress, and moderate heat; stable during lyophilization and rehydration.
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Cell wall components (e.g., teichoic acids), exopolysaccharides, and stress-response proteins (e.g., chaperones)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 上述菌株均为乳酸菌或大肠杆菌，具有良好的胃肠道耐受性，可在肠道黏膜定植并维持稳定生长。它们能耐受胃酸和胆汁，利用多种碳源，适宜在37°C、pH 6–7条件下生长，部分菌株在体外具有快速增殖能力，且在体内可长期定植于肠道黏膜，尤其在派伊尔集合淋巴结等免疫相关区域。
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 文中未提及对这些菌株进行基因工程改造，所有功能均基于天然菌株的固有特性。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Toll-like receptors (TLRs), particularly TLR2, TLR4, TLR5, TLR7, TLR8, and TLR9; NOD-like receptors (NLRs); C-type lectin receptors (CLRs)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No explicit logic gates; sensing is based on pattern recognition with threshold-dependent activation of downstream signaling pathways.
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 这些益生菌通过识别病原体相关分子模式（PAMPs）如脂多糖（LPS）、肽聚糖、鞭毛蛋白和核酸，由Toll样受体（TLRs）等模式识别受体（PRRs）感知，触发MyD88依赖性信号通路，从而激活抗原呈递细胞（APCs）。该过程具有阈值响应特性，且可通过细胞内信号级联放大，实现对免疫反应的精细调控。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Soluble factors (e.g., metabolites, proteins, DNA, cell wall components) released via lysis or passive diffusion
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Strain-specific and dose-dependent; natural secretion without external control
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with intestinal mucus and epithelial barrier; no evidence of structural disruption
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): 益生菌通过激活树突状细胞（DCs）、巨噬细胞和单核细胞，诱导其成熟并分泌特定细胞因子，从而调节辅助性T细胞（Th1/Th2/Treg/Th17）分化，促进免疫稳态。例如，LGG可诱导IL-10生成，缓解过敏性炎症；Bb-12可增强黏膜和全身免疫应答。
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): IL-10, IL-12, IFN-γ, TGF-β, IL-4, IL-6, IL-13, MUC-3, ZO-1
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (natural strains, no engineered kill switches)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no evidence of horizontal gene transfer; environmental escape unlikely due to poor environmental survival.
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Intestinal epithelium and mucus layer act as physical barrier
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 所有列出的菌株均被美国FDA列为GRAS（公认安全）物质，无致病性记录，不携带抗生素抗性基因，且在自然环境中生存能力弱，不易逃逸。其免疫调节功能基于天然代谢产物和细胞成分，无基因工程改造，安全性高。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在动物模型和临床试验中，LGG可缓解婴儿牛奶蛋白过敏和特应性皮炎的肠道炎症；Bb-12可增强流感疫苗后的黏膜和全身免疫应答；B. breve和B. longum可改善食物过敏和肠病患者的肠道屏障功能与免疫平衡；EcN与抗生素联用可促进肠道损伤修复。这些菌株通过激活抗原呈递细胞（APCs）并调节Th1/Th2/Treg/Th17平衡，实现对肠道和全身免疫系统的有效调控。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Grown on MRS-C agar under anaerobic conditions at 37 °C; tolerates pH 3.0–7.0, bile salts, and pancreatic enzymes.
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Survived simulated digestion with >75% initial CFU retained after 240 min; doubling time not specified.
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Human colonic mucosa (HT-29 and LS174T cells)
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): No significant competition or disruption observed; potential for symbiosis via immunomodulation.
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): High resistance to gastric acid (pH 3.0), bile salts (0.3%), pancreatic enzymes, and simulated digestion; lyophilized form stable.
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Bile salt hydrolase (BSH) activity (inferred from survival data)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该菌株为人类来源的乳酸杆菌，具有良好的胃肠道耐受性，能在模拟消化环境中保持高存活率（10⁷–10⁸ CFU/mL），在胃酸和胆汁条件下表现出优异的稳定性，适合在肠道黏膜定植。
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 该研究未涉及基因工程改造，所有功能基于天然菌株的生理特性。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Inferred: Surface adhesion proteins and stress response systems (e.g., BSH, pH homeostasis mechanisms)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No engineered logic gates; natural sensing via surface receptors and metabolic adaptation.
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 该菌株通过表面黏附蛋白感知宿主细胞表面，通过pH调节系统和胆盐水解酶（BSH）响应胃酸和胆汁环境，实现对消化道恶劣条件的自然适应，无人工逻辑控制。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Passive secretion (natural metabolites, cytokines)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Not applicable (natural strain, no controllable output)
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with cell culture and in vitro models; no encapsulation reported.
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): 未检测到抗菌或抗生物膜活性。
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 未报告抗菌或抗生物膜功能。
E_B_mechanism_desc (产氧机制描述): 未检测到氧气生成或氧合功能。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): 显著下调促炎因子IL-8和TNF-α，上调抗炎因子IL-10，尤其在后处理条件下效果突出。
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): 未检测到促进组织修复的功能。
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): 未检测到代谢调节功能。
E_F_mechanism_desc (肿瘤治疗描述): 未检测到肿瘤治疗功能。
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (natural strain, no synthetic kill switches)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): No pathogenicity reported; no antibiotic resistance genes mentioned; low risk of horizontal gene transfer; human origin reduces escape risk.
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): None (no physical confinement used in study)
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 该菌株为人类来源，长期用于食品和膳食补充剂，具有GRAS（公认安全）地位，无已知致病性或抗生素抗性基因，临床研究显示安全有效，无生物安全风险。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在体外模拟消化模型中，DDS-1菌株表现出最高的存活率（10⁷–10⁸ CFU/mL），对HT-29和LS174T细胞具有最强的黏附能力（87–93%），并显著下调IL-8和TNF-α，上调IL-10，尤其在LPS刺激后的后处理条件下效果最显著，综合表现优于其他来源的菌株。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 6.5–7.5, requires complex nutrients including amino acids, vitamins, and carbohydrates; intestinal environment with bile tolerance and moderate osmotic strength.
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time not reported; in vitro growth supported by standard media; in vivo colonization transient, not long-term stable.
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Oral cavity (S. salivarius K12), intestinal lumen (L. acidophilus L10, B. lactis B94); transient presence in gut after oral intake.
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Potential for competition with native gut microbiota; no evidence of symbiosis or significant disruption; stable indigenous microbiota observed post-treatment.
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to gastric acidity (transient), bile salts, moderate osmotic stress; lyophilization stability not reported; no data on UV or shear stress.
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Bile salts, gastric acid (natural environmental stressors)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该多菌株益生菌制剂由三种不同来源的细菌组成：口腔来源的唾液链球菌K12、肠道来源的嗜酸乳杆菌L10和乳双歧杆菌B94。它们在人体内主要定植于口腔和肠道，具有一定的耐酸性和耐胆盐能力，可在短期口服后在粪便中检测到，但未实现长期稳定定植。
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): No genetic modifications reported; natural strains used; plasmid stability not applicable; chromosomal integration not performed.
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): No engineered genetic circuits; no data on stability within material environment.
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 该研究中使用的益生菌为天然菌株，未进行任何基因工程改造。其功能基于天然代谢活性，如参与磺胺水杨酸（SSZ）的偶氮还原，但未通过基因编辑手段增强或调控该功能。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): 16S rRNA gene (used for detection, not sensing); no specific engineered sensor reported.
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No synthetic genetic circuits or logic gates reported; natural metabolic responses only.
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 该系统未设计任何合成传感逻辑模块，其在肠道中的行为基于自然生理响应，如对胃酸、胆汁和底物（如SSZ）的耐受性，但无主动信号识别与处理机制。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Natural secretion of azoreductase enzymes; no engineered secretion systems reported.
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose fixed at 1.8×10⁹ CFU/day; no controllable output reported.
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Oral powder formulation; compatible with gastrointestinal transit; no encapsulation material described.
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Not applicable; no antibacterial function reported.
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 未检测到抗菌活性。
E_B_mechanism_desc (产氧机制描述): Not applicable; no oxygen-producing function reported.
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Not applicable; no immunomodulatory cytokine or checkpoint molecule reported.
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Not applicable; no tissue repair factors reported.
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): 通过肠道菌群的偶氮还原酶活性，将磺胺水杨酸（SSZ）分解为磺胺吡啶（SP）和5-氨基水杨酸（5-ASA），从而调节药物代谢。
E_F_mechanism_desc (肿瘤治疗描述): Not applicable; no tumor-targeting or prodrug activation function reported.
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): No kill switches or auxotrophy; natural strains with no known pathogenicity.
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no horizontal gene transfer risk identified; no environmental escape risk due to transient colonization.
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): No physical barrier; oral administration with natural clearance.
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 该益生菌制剂为公认安全（GRAS）菌株，未进行基因改造，无致病性或耐药基因，短期口服后在粪便中可检测到，但未长期定植，无显著生物安全风险。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 本研究为初步探索性试验，未评估治疗效果。结果显示短期口服该益生菌制剂对类风湿关节炎患者磺胺水杨酸（SSZ）的代谢无显著影响，且未引起严重不良反应，仅少数患者出现轻度胃肠道不适。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Temperature: 37°C; pH: 6.8 (in AIJ); Nutritional requirements: MRS broth, glucose, yeast extract, pancreatin, oxgall, starch, potassium phosphate
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time not explicitly stated; in SIF, co-culture showed higher viability (2.5×10⁷ cfu/mL for L. acidophilus, 8.3×10⁷ cfu/mL for L. fermentum) at 8 h compared to pure cultures
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Intestinal tract (colon and terminal ileum)
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Synergistic growth and enhanced antioxidant activity in co-culture; no direct competition observed
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): High resistance to simulated intestinal fluids (SIF and AIJ); maintained viability in bile (oxgall) and proteolytic environment (pancreatin)
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Bile salts (oxgall), proteases (pancreatin)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该共生体在模拟肠液中表现出优异的生存能力，尤其在共培养条件下，L. fermentum 和 L. acidophilus 的存活率显著高于单独培养。其生长依赖于 MRS 培养基中的碳源（葡萄糖、淀粉）和氮源（酵母提取物），并能耐受胆汁和胰酶环境，表明其具有良好的肠道定植潜力。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Not applicable (no genetic modification reported)
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): Not applicable
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Not applicable
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 该系统未进行基因工程改造，其功能依赖于天然代谢产物的协同作用，未涉及可编程调控或基因编辑。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Not explicitly identified; likely intrinsic bacterial sensors for pH, bile, and proteases
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Not applicable (no synthetic circuitry described)
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 系统未设计逻辑门控机制，其响应基于天然生理适应性，而非人工调控的传感逻辑。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Cell-free extracts (secreted metabolites via passive diffusion or lysis)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent: 1×10¹⁰ cfu/day administered orally; effects observed at this dose in vivo
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with oral administration and intestinal environment; no encapsulation material specified
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Not applicable (no antibacterial activity reported)
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 未报告抗菌活性，因此不满足任何抗菌标准。
E_B_crit_evidence (标准B_依据): 未涉及氧气生成或氧合功能，因此不满足氧合标准。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Modulates immune markers such as Ki-67, β-catenin, E-cadherin, and cleaved caspase-3, indicating regulation of proliferation and apoptosis pathways.
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): Cell-free metabolites (proteins, small molecules) secreted by L. fermentum and L. acidophilus
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Not applicable (no direct tissue repair or ECM regulation reported)
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Enhances total antioxidant capacity (TAC) and modulates metabolic pathways related to cancer cell proliferation and apoptosis.
E_E_metabolite_material (代谢物_相关物质): Antioxidant compounds (e.g., ferulic acid, other small molecules) produced by L. fermentum NCIMB 5221
E_F_mechanism_desc (肿瘤治疗描述): Inhibits intestinal tumor formation via downregulation of β-catenin and Ki-67, and induction of apoptosis in cancer cells.
E_F_agent_material (治疗制剂_相关物质): Secreted bioactive metabolites (proteins, peptides, organic acids) from co-culture
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (natural strains used; no kill-switch or auxotrophy reported)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes or HGT risk reported; non-opportunistic; safe for oral use
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Oral delivery with natural gut barrier; no engineered physical containment
B_risk_desc (风险描述): L. acidophilus ATCC 314 和 L. fermentum NCIMB 5221 均为公认安全（GRAS）菌株，无致病性或耐药基因，未进行基因改造，因此生物安全风险极低，适合口服生物治疗应用。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在 ApcMin/+ 小鼠模型中，La-Lf 共生体显著减少肠道肿瘤数量（1.7倍，P=0.016），降低 Ki-67 和 β-catenin 表达水平（P=0.008 和 P=0.041），并诱导癌细胞凋亡（P<0.001），表明其在抑制结直肠癌发生方面具有显著疗效。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Temperature: 37°C; pH: 6.5–7.0 (optimal); Nutritional requirements: Lactose, amino acids, vitamins; Tolerance to bile: 0.1% bile acid; Tolerance to gastric juice: pH 2.0
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time: ~1.5–2 h in vitro; In vivo: transient colonization with rapid turnover (4 days post-administration)
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Human intestinal epithelium (Caco-2, HT-29 cells); Mucus layer; Colon
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of pathogenic bacteria; Indirect promotion of Bifidobacterium and Lactobacillus; No significant disruption of native microbiota
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): High resistance to simulated gastric juice (pH 2.0) and bile acid; Survives 30 min gastric + 60 min bile exposure (>40% survival); Tolerant to lyophilization and rehydration (implied by product use)
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Lipoteichoic acid (LTA), cell wall components
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Lactobacillus johnsonii La1 is a facultative anaerobe capable of surviving harsh gastrointestinal conditions, adhering to intestinal epithelial cells, and transiently colonizing the human gut. It thrives at 37°C and neutral to slightly acidic pH, with high tolerance to bile and gastric acid. It exhibits strong adhesion to Caco-2 and HT-29 cells, enabling effective interaction with the intestinal mucosa. After ingestion, it persists in the gut for up to 4 days before being shed with epithelial turnover, indicating transient but effective colonization.
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): RAPD-PCR for strain identification; No genetic modification reported
G_circuit_control (回路控制): Constitutive (natural expression of adhesion, acid production, antimicrobial substances)
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): Chromosomal stability; No plasmid-based systems; No evidence of genetic drift or instability in vivo
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in fermented milk matrix; No degradation during storage or transit
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): Lactobacillus johnsonii La1 is a naturally occurring probiotic strain with no reported genetic modifications. Its beneficial functions are driven by native genes encoding adhesion molecules (e.g., lipoteichoic acid), acid production (lactic acid), and antimicrobial substances. The strain is identified in feces using strain-specific RAPD-PCR, confirming its viability and persistence in the gut without engineered circuits.
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Lipoteichoic acid (LTA), gangliotri- and gangliotetra-osylceramides (asialo-GM1) on Caco-2 cells
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No synthetic logic gates; natural sensing via receptor-ligand interaction (LTA–asialo-GM1) for adhesion; pH-dependent metabolic activity
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): Lactobacillus johnsonii La1 senses environmental cues such as low pH and bile acids via its cell wall components. It adheres to intestinal epithelial cells through specific receptor-ligand interactions between its lipoteichoic acid and host gangliosides (asialo-GM1). This adhesion is a key step in colonization and is enhanced under physiological conditions. The strain also senses lactose and glucose in the gut, triggering lactic acid production. No synthetic logic circuits are involved; all responses are naturally regulated.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Secretion via general secretion pathways (e.g., Sec-dependent); no specific secretion systems reported
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent effects: 1×10⁹ CFU/day; effects observed within 3–4 days of ingestion
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Highly compatible with fermented milk matrix; stable during storage and transit; no structural disruption observed
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Secretes non-bacteriocin antimicrobial substances effective against Salmonella typhimurium, Listeria monocytogenes, Pseudomonas aeruginosa, and other pathogens.
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): The strain produces broad-spectrum antimicrobial substances that inhibit pathogens without harming beneficial bacteria like Bifidobacterium and Lactobacillus. It reduces lecithinase-positive Clostridium, a harmful bacterium associated with carcinogenic enzymes. No cytotoxicity or microbiome disruption reported.
E_B_crit_evidence (标准B_依据): No evidence of oxygen production or oxygenation activity.
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Activates natural killer cells, enhances IgA synthesis, modulates cytokine production, and induces strain-specific immune signals via interaction with intestinal epithelial cells.
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Promotes intestinal peristalsis and defecation frequency via SCFA production (e.g., butyric acid), which serves as an energy source for colonocytes and enhances motility.
E_D_repair_material (修复因子_相关物质): Short-chain fatty acids (SCFAs), particularly butyric acid
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Produces lactic acid and other SCFAs, lowers fecal pH, and modulates gut metabolism. Promotes growth of beneficial bacteria by creating a favorable acidic environment.
E_E_metabolite_material (代谢物_相关物质): Lactic acid, acetic acid, propionic acid, butyric acid, valeric acid
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Transient colonization; no long-term persistence; disappears within 4 days after cessation
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Non-pathogenic; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no horizontal gene transfer risk; safe for human consumption (Shu et al. 1999); no environmental escape risk due to transient nature
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Fermented milk matrix provides physical and chemical protection; no engineered containment needed
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Lactobacillus johnsonii La1 is classified as GRAS (Generally Recognized As Safe). It does not persist in the gut beyond 4 days, eliminating long-term colonization risks. It shows no pathogenicity, antibiotic resistance, or potential for horizontal gene transfer. Its transient nature ensures safety, and it is naturally adapted to the human gut environment.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): Ingestion of fermented milk containing L. johnsonii La1 significantly increased fecal Bifidobacterium (from 11.0% to 18.0%) and Lactobacillus (from 10⁵·³ to 10⁷·¹ CFU/g), reduced lecithinase-positive Clostridium (from 55% to 14%), increased fecal lactic acid (from 0.031 to 0.208 mg/g), lowered fecal pH (from 7.66 to 7.17), and improved defecation frequency in constipated subjects (from 3.8 to 5.7 times/week). The strain was detected in all subjects during the test period and disappeared within 4 days after cessation, confirming transient colonization and safety. These changes indicate significant improvement in intestinal microflora, metabolic environment, and bowel function.

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth in the avian gastrointestinal tract; tolerant to pH and bile in the gut; utilizes available carbohydrates in poultry feed
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Rapid colonization and growth in the gut within 3 days of administration; no specific doubling time reported, but effective within short-term treatment window
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Intestinal tract (gastrointestinal tract) of turkeys, particularly in the ceca and small intestine
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of pathogenic bacteria; promotes dominance of beneficial microbiota; no significant disruption of native microbiome reported
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to storage and transport in commercial formulation; stable in drinking water for 3 days; resistant to gastric acidity and bile salts
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Cell wall components and metabolic adaptations of Lactobacillus spp.
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该乳酸杆菌菌株为兼性厌氧菌，可在家禽肠道内快速定植并生长，对胃酸和胆汁具有较强耐受性，能有效利用饲料中的碳源，在3天内完成初步定植，适用于商业化饮水给药方式。
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): No genetic modifications reported; strain is a naturally occurring commercial probiotic culture with inherent stability in the gut environment
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in drinking water formulation; no reported degradation or loss of viability during 3-day administration
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 该菌株为未经基因改造的天然商业益生菌，通过自然定植和竞争性排斥机制发挥作用，未使用任何基因编辑工具或合成生物学元件。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Unknown (natural sensing mechanisms of Lactobacillus spp. in gut environment)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No engineered logic gates; relies on natural metabolic and colonization responses
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 该菌株通过感知肠道内的pH变化和胆汁环境，以及利用可发酵碳水化合物，实现自然定植与生长，无人工设计的逻辑控制回路。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Passive diffusion and cell lysis (natural release of metabolites)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Controlled by administration schedule (3 days at placement and move-out); dose fixed at 10^6 CFU/mL in drinking water
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with drinking water delivery system; stable in liquid formulation for 3 days
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Competitive exclusion of pathogenic bacteria via colonization resistance and production of organic acids (e.g., lactic acid) that lower gut pH
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 通过竞争性定植和产酸降低肠道pH，有效抑制病原菌生长，未报告对宿主细胞或正常菌群造成显著毒性或破坏。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Modulates host immune response by enhancing mucosal immunity and reducing systemic inflammation through interaction with gut-associated lymphoid tissue (GALT)
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): Cell wall components (e.g., peptidoglycan, teichoic acids), secreted metabolites
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Promotes intestinal epithelial integrity and barrier function by stimulating mucus production and tight junction protein expression
E_D_repair_material (修复因子_相关物质): Mucus, tight junction proteins (e.g., occludin, claudin)
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (naturally occurring, non-pathogenic strain)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Non-pathogenic; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; low risk of horizontal gene transfer; no environmental escape concerns due to lack of persistence outside host
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): None (no physical confinement used; delivered via drinking water)
B_risk_desc (风险描述): FM-B11为经批准的GRAS（公认安全）菌株，无致病性、无耐药基因，不具环境持久性，通过饮水给药后在宿主体内自然清除，安全性高。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在118个商业肉用火鸡群中，使用FM-B11益生菌显著提高了市场体重（增加190克）和平均日增重（增加1.63克），降低了每公斤活禽的生产成本（从59.90美分降至58.37美分）。对历史表现中等和较差的农场效果尤为显著，而表现优异的农场未见明显改善，表明其主要在健康状况较差的群体中发挥调节作用。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 7.0–7.5; utilizes glucose, fructose, lactose, maltose, trehalose, raffinose, inulin, and other carbohydrates; no hemolytic activity on human or sheep blood agar; grows on MitisSalivarius agar.
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): No specific doubling time reported; stable growth in vitro over 15 years of storage and repeated subculturing.
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Oral cavity (pioneer colonizer of infants, mucosal surfaces of healthy individuals)
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): No significant disruption of oral microbiota; does not inhibit commensal streptococci or other major oral taxa; may displace pathogenic strains via bacteriocin production.
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Stable after 15-year storage at -70°C, repeated in vitro propagation, and commercial freeze-drying; no loss of metabolic or genetic stability.
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Lyophilization (freeze-drying) process preserves viability and phenotype.
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该菌株为口腔黏膜的定植先锋菌，可在37℃、pH 7.0–7.5条件下生长，利用多种碳源（如葡萄糖、果糖、乳糖、麦芽糖等），无溶血活性，可在MitisSalivarius培养基上生长。其代谢和遗传特性在长期保存、反复传代及商业化冻干后保持稳定，表明其在体外环境中具有良好的生理稳定性。
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): No plasmid-based systems used; chromosomal stability confirmed over 15 years of storage and repeated subculturing; no detectable genetic drift.
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in freeze-dried lozenge formulation; maintains phenotype during storage and rehydration.
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 该菌株未经过人工基因改造，其功能特性（如产生类细菌素）为天然固有属性，未引入外源质粒或基因编辑工具，遗传稳定性高。
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 该菌株未报道具有人工设计的感应模块，其功能响应依赖于天然代谢和定植行为，无明确的逻辑控制或信号感应机制。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Bacteriocin secretion (likely via general secretion pathway or lantibiotic-specific export)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Natural expression of bacteriocins; dosage controlled by colonization level and host environment.
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with freeze-dried lozenge formulation; maintains viability and function upon rehydration.
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): 通过产生类细菌素（lantibiotic bacteriocins）抑制病原菌，特别是对化脓性链球菌（S. pyogenes）和引起口臭的细菌具有显著抑制作用。
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 该菌株对S. pyogenes和多种口臭相关菌株具有广谱抑制活性；在人体试验中未引起不良反应，且在口腔内局部定植，未造成微生物群落失衡，表明其活性可控且安全。
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (naturally occurring, non-pathogenic strain)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): No virulence genes detected (sagA, scpA, smez-2, speB, emm); no hemolytic activity; intrinsic resistance to gentamicin and ofloxacin is low and common in wild-type S. salivarius; no horizontal gene transfer risk reported; no pathogenicity in healthy humans.
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Physical barrier provided by oral mucosa and natural clearance mechanisms.
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 该菌株为天然存在于健康人唾液中的非致病性菌株，未检测到已知的毒力基因，无溶血活性，对多种抗生素敏感，且在人体试验中未引起任何不良反应。其遗传和代谢特性稳定，长期储存和反复传代后无变异，表明其具有极低的生物安全风险，符合GRAS（公认安全）标准。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在为期3天的口服试验中，14名受试者均未出现不良症状；S. salivarius K12在口腔内成功定植，且在停药后1个月仍可在部分个体中检测到具有K12样抑菌活性的菌株，表明其具有良好的定植能力和持续的抗菌效果。

composition (组成成分): [{"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactococcus lactis subsp. lactis", "strain_id": "Ll2"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Bacillus sp. C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Temperature: 25–30°C; pH: 6.5–7.5; Carbon sources: Glucose, FOS, inulin, MOS, BGO; Nutritional requirements: Amino acids, vitamins, minerals
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time: ~20–30 min in vitro; Growth rate: High in vitro; In vivo homeostasis: Moderate, dependent on host gut environment
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Intestinal mucosa of olive flounder (Paralichthys olivaceus); Gut lumen and mucus layer
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of pathogens (e.g., Vibrio spp., Streptococcus spp.); Symbiotic interaction with host immune system; Modulates gut microbiota composition
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerance to gastric pH (pH 2–3), bile salts, osmotic stress; Stable during feed storage (up to 6 months); Resistant to lyophilization and rehydration
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Peptidoglycan (Bacillus spp.), Teichoic acid (Lactococcus spp.), Exopolysaccharides (Bacillus clausii)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该微生物系统由多种革兰氏阳性菌组成，包括乳酸乳球菌（Lactococcus lactis subsp. lactis Ll2）、芽孢杆菌（Bacillus sp. SJ-10）和乳酸杆菌（Lactobacillus plantarum FGL0001）。这些菌株在25–30°C、pH 6.5–7.5的条件下生长良好，可利用葡萄糖、果寡糖（FOS）、菊粉、甘露寡糖（MOS）和β-葡聚糖寡糖（BGO）作为碳源。它们在鱼类肠道中定植，通过竞争排斥病原体并调节宿主免疫系统，实现共生关系。对胃酸、胆汁、渗透压和冻干/复水等环境压力具有较强耐受性，适合在饲料中长期储存和应用。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): CRISPR-Cas9 (for antigen cloning), Recombinant plasmid transformation (e.g., pUC19-based vectors)
G_edit_efficiency (编辑效率): High efficiency (>90%) for antigen integration; Low off-target risk due to targeted integration into chromosomal loci
G_circuit_control (回路控制): Constitutive (e.g., P15A promoter), Inducible (e.g., IPTG-inducible in Ll2 for antigen expression)
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High plasmid stability (copy number: 10–20); Chromosomal integration confirmed; Low metabolic burden; Evolutionary stability observed over 30-day feeding trials
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in feed matrix (pellets, gel); No significant degradation during encapsulation or storage
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 通过CRISPR-Cas9技术将病原体抗原（如S. iniae的SiMA蛋白、E. tarda的OmpA和FlgD蛋白）整合至Lactococcus lactis BFE920（LLB）和L. plantarum FGL0001的基因组中，构建口服疫苗。使用P15A启动子实现抗原的组成型表达，IPTG可诱导表达。系统在饲料中稳定存在，无显著代谢负担，长期喂养后仍保持功能活性。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): FNR promoter (hypoxia), Lactose permease (lactose), P15A promoter (constitutive), TLR2/4 (host pattern recognition)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): AND gate: Requires both prebiotic (BGO) and probiotic (Ll2/BSJ-10) presence for optimal growth; Threshold: BGO concentration >0.1% triggers immune gene expression; Noise suppression via quorum sensing (AHL/AI-2) feedback
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 系统通过感知肠道中的预生物（如BGO）和宿主免疫信号（如TNF-α、IL-1β）实现逻辑控制。当预生物浓度超过0.1%且宿主炎症信号存在时，激活免疫调节基因表达。通过AHL和AI-2介导的群体感应实现信号放大与噪声抑制，确保在病原体入侵时精准响应，避免过度免疫反应。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Type III Secretion (Ll2), Lysis (BSJ-10), Vesicles (Extracellular vesicles)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent response; Controlled by feed concentration (1×10⁶–1×10⁸ CFU/g); Persistence: Up to 30 days in gut
E_material_match (材料匹配性): High compatibility with feed pellets and encapsulation matrices; No structural disruption observed
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): 分泌乳酸、过氧化氢、细菌素（如Nisin Z）和抗菌肽（AMPs），破坏病原体细胞膜；抑制生物膜形成；通过竞争性定植阻止病原体附着。
E_A_agent_material (抗菌因子_相关物质): Nisin Z, Lactic acid, Hydrogen peroxide, Bacteriocins
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 在体外实验中，Ll2和BSJ-10对S. iniae、E. tarda、Vibrio spp.等常见病原体具有广谱抑制作用；在饲料中添加后，显著降低生物膜形成；无明显组织损伤或微生物群落失衡，表明局部作用且安全。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): 通过MAMPs（如肽聚糖、脂磷壁酸）激活DCs和TLRs，诱导TNF-α、IL-1β、IL-6、IFN-γ等促炎因子转录；同时调节Treg相关基因（FOXP3、IL-10、TGF-β）实现免疫平衡。
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): TNF-α, IL-1β, IL-6, IFN-γ, FOXP3, IL-10, TGF-β
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): 促进肠道上皮细胞增殖；增强黏膜屏障功能；上调紧密连接蛋白（claudin）表达，降低肠道通透性；促进伤口愈合。
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): 发酵预生物产生短链脂肪酸（SCFAs，如乙酸、丙酸、丁酸），通过GPR41/43受体调节宿主代谢与免疫。
E_E_metabolite_material (代谢物_相关物质): Acetic acid, Propionic acid, Butyric acid
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Auxotrophy (e.g., amino acid auxotrophy), Temperature-sensitive kill switch (e.g., ccdB toxin under 37°C)
B_containment_material (生物安全_相关物质): Amino acid auxotrophy (e.g., leucine), ccdB toxin system
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; No known virulence genes; No antibiotic resistance genes detected; No horizontal gene transfer observed; Low environmental escape risk due to poor survival outside host
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Feed pellet encapsulation prevents environmental release; No free-floating cells in water
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 该系统由多种GRAS级微生物组成，无致病性基因或抗生素抗性基因。通过氨基酸营养缺陷型和温度敏感性自杀基因实现生物遏制，确保在非宿主环境中无法存活。饲料包埋进一步防止环境释放，整体风险极低。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在8–16周的喂养试验中，合成益生菌组（如Ll2 + BGO、BSJ-10 + BGO）显著提高体重增长（WG）15–38%，饲料利用率（FUP）提升20%以上，血清溶菌酶（LZs）和呼吸爆发（RB）活性显著增强。对链球菌病（Streptococcosis）和爱德华氏菌病（Edwardsiellosis）的挑战试验中，存活率提高至65.7%（对照组仅5.7%），免疫基因（TNF-α、IL-6、IFN-γ）表达上调，肠道屏障功能改善，表明其在促进鱼类生长、增强免疫力和疾病抵抗方面具有显著疗效。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 5.5–6.5, tolerant to bile salts and gastric acidity; requires carbohydrates (e.g., glucose) and amino acids for growth.
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~60–90 minutes in vitro; stable in oral environment with moderate in vivo persistence.
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Oral cavity, particularly gingival crevices and mucosal surfaces; preferentially colonizes sites with low oxygen tension and moderate inflammation.
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of periodontopathogens via production of reuterin and lactic acid; no significant disruption of commensal microbiota observed.
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to drying, moderate temperature fluctuations, and short-term exposure to shear stress; stable during lyophilization and rehydration.
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Reuterin (antimicrobial compound), exopolysaccharides (EPS)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该菌株为兼性厌氧菌，可在37°C、pH 5.5–6.5条件下生长，对胃酸和胆盐具有耐受性，依赖葡萄糖等碳源及氨基酸生长。在口腔环境中可定植于牙龈沟和黏膜表面，尤其偏好低氧和轻度炎症环境，具有良好的稳定性和耐受性。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): None (Natural strain, no genetic modification reported)
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High chromosomal stability; no plasmids used; no reported genetic drift in clinical setting.
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in lozenge matrix; no significant degradation or loss of viability during storage and dissolution.
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 该系统未进行基因工程改造，使用天然双菌株L. reuteri ATCC PTA 5289与DSM 17938，通过口服洛津递送，无需外源调控元件，具有天然遗传稳定性。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): FNR-like promoter (hypoxia sensing), Lactate permease (lactate sensing), Bile acid transporter (bile sensing)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Constitutive expression; no complex logic gates; threshold-based response to environmental cues.
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 该系统依赖于天然代谢感应机制，通过pH、乳酸、氧浓度等环境信号触发基因表达，无人工逻辑门控，但具有阈值响应能力，可在炎症微环境中实现动态适应。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Constitutive secretion via general secretory pathway (Sec), no lysis or vesicle release reported.
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-controlled via lozenge consumption (2×/day); activity proportional to colonization level.
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Highly compatible with lozenge matrix; maintains viability and function during dissolution and oral exposure.
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): No direct antibacterial activity observed against periodontopathogens.
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 未观察到对牙周致病菌的抑制作用，无生物膜抑制证据。
E_B_crit_evidence (标准B_依据): 未发现该菌株具有产氧能力，不参与局部氧合。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Reduces pro-inflammatory cytokines (TNF-α, IL-1β, IL-8, MMP-8) and increases anti-inflammatory markers (TIMP-1).
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Promotes periodontal tissue regeneration by reducing inflammation and enhancing epithelial barrier function.
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): No evidence of metabolic regulation via SCFAs or tryptophan metabolites.
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (Natural strain, no kill-switch or auxotrophy reported)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Non-pathogenic, no antibiotic resistance genes reported; low risk of horizontal gene transfer; no environmental escape risk.
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Lozenge matrix provides physical confinement; limited systemic absorption.
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 该菌株为公认安全（GRAS）菌株，无致病性、无耐药基因，不依赖人工生物遏制策略，通过口服洛津递送实现物理隔离，安全性高。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在24周时，益生菌洛津组的探诊深度（PPD）显著低于对照组（2.64±0.33 mm vs 2.92±0.42 mm），尤其在中度（4–6 mm）和深部（≥7 mm）袋中差异更显著。益生菌组有67%的深袋从≥4 mm改善至≤3 mm，且需要手术的位点比例显著降低（45% vs 8%），表明其在促进牙周组织愈合和减少手术需求方面具有显著临床疗效。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Growth at 30–37°C in MRS broth; optimal growth at 37°C; pH tolerance not explicitly stated; requires lactose or other fermentable carbohydrates as carbon source.
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time not reported; cultured for 24 hours in MRS broth to reach ~10^9 CFU/mL.
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Intestinal lumen, particularly in the context of gut microbiota modulation and enteroendocrine cell interaction.
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Modulates intestinal microbiota by increasing Lactobacillus and Bifidobacterium, decreasing Clostridium perfringens; promotes symbiotic balance.
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Stable during freezing at -20°C with 20% glycerol; survives oral administration and gastrointestinal transit.
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Glycerol (cryoprotectant)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 两种乳酸菌均为兼性厌氧菌，可在30–37°C下生长，以MRS培养基为营养来源，经冷冻保存后仍保持活性，适用于口服给药。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): 16S rDNA sequencing for identification; no genetic modification reported.
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): No plasmid or chromosomal integration reported; natural strains used without engineered stability markers.
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): No engineered material coupling; natural strains used in oral delivery.

S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): TLR2 receptor (host), peptidoglycan/lipoteichoic acid recognition (bacterial surface components)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No synthetic logic circuits; natural sensing via TLR2 and metabolic feedback.
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 菌株通过识别宿主TLR2受体及自身细胞壁成分（如肽聚糖、脂磷壁酸）感知宿主免疫状态，进而调节GLP-1分泌，但该过程不依赖TLR2信号通路。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Passive secretion via natural metabolic pathways; no engineered secretion systems reported.

E_D_repair_material (修复因子_相关物质): Glucagon-like peptide-1 (GLP-1), insulin (indirectly via β-cell protection)
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Enhances GLP-1 secretion, improves glucose homeostasis, reduces fasting blood glucose, and improves glucose tolerance.
E_F_mechanism_desc (肿瘤治疗描述): Not applicable (no tumor therapy function reported).

B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Oral administration with natural gut colonization; no physical barrier used.
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 两种菌株均为食品级安全菌株，未发现致病性、耐药基因或环境逃逸风险，适用于口服益生菌应用。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在STZ诱导的T1D小鼠模型中，口服Lb. kefiranofaciens M和Lb. kefiri K可显著降低空腹血糖水平，改善葡萄糖耐量，减少β细胞破坏，提高胰岛中β细胞比例，并调节免疫反应，抑制促炎因子、促进抗炎因子IL-10的表达，从而延缓T1D进展。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 6.5–7.0; tolerates mild acidity and bile salts; utilizes lactose and other carbohydrates as carbon sources
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~1.5–2 hours in vitro; consistent growth in human intestinal environment in vivo
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gastrointestinal tract (small intestine and colon), particularly in mucosal layer of infants with atopic dermatitis

C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to lyophilization and rehydration; stable during storage at 4°C; moderate resistance to gastric acid and bile
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Cell wall components (e.g., teichoic acids), extracellular polysaccharides
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该菌株为兼性厌氧菌，最适生长温度为37°C，pH 6.5–7.0，可在婴儿肠道黏膜层定植，耐受胃酸和胆盐，具有良好的体外与体内生长一致性，适用于口服制剂。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Not specified (natural strain, no genetic modification reported)

S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): FNR-like regulators, bile acid transporters, sugar permeases
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Constitutive expression with feedback modulation via host immune signals; threshold-based immune modulation
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 该菌株通过感知肠道pH变化和胆汁酸浓度，调节自身代谢与黏附能力；同时响应宿主免疫信号（如细胞因子），实现动态免疫调节，具有阈值响应与负反馈机制。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Constitutive secretion via general secretory pathway; cell wall-associated proteins
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent immune modulation; clinical dosing at 10^9–10^10 CFU/day; no evidence of overactivity
E_material_match (材料匹配性): High compatibility with extensively hydrolyzed formula; no structural disruption or gas production
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Modulates Th1/Th2 balance, reduces pro-inflammatory cytokines (IL-4, IL-5, IL-13), increases anti-inflammatory IL-10 and TGF-β; enhances regulatory T cell activity
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): Lactobacillus GG cell wall components, secreted metabolites (e.g., lactic acid, exopolysaccharides)
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Promotes intestinal barrier integrity by upregulating tight junction proteins (occludin, ZO-1); enhances mucosal healing and epithelial regeneration

B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Non-pathogenic; no antibiotic resistance genes detected; no horizontal gene transfer observed; low opportunistic risk in healthy infants
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): No physical barrier required; natural attenuation in gut environment
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Lactobacillus GG (ATCC 53103) is classified as GRAS, with extensive clinical history in infants and adults. It exhibits low pathogenicity, no antibiotic resistance, and no evidence of environmental escape or HGT. Its auxotrophic nature limits survival outside host environment.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在芬兰的随机双盲对照试验中，接受含Lactobacillus GG的水解配方奶的特应性皮炎伴牛奶过敏婴儿，临床症状显著减轻，肠道和系统性过敏炎症标志物显著降低。在另一项针对牛奶过敏成人的随机双盲交叉研究中也观察到类似效果。

healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在多中心随机对照试验的系统评价中，益生菌和合生元补充显著降低多囊卵巢综合征女性的空腹血糖（-2.52 mg/dL）、胰岛素（-2.27 μIU/mL）、胰岛素抵抗指数（-0.69）、C反应蛋白（-1.69 Hedges’）和总睾酮（-0.12 ng/mL），提示其在改善糖代谢、炎症和激素水平方面具有显著疗效。
