E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Not applicable
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Not applicable
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Not applicable
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Genetic absence of functional enterotoxin operons; no antibiotic resistance genes reported
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no functional Hbl or Nhe enterotoxin production; no evidence of cytotoxicity or virulence in vitro or in vivo; GRAS status implied by long-term use in animal feed
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Not applicable
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 该菌株虽携带hbl和nhe基因，但其mRNA表达水平显著低于B. cereus参考菌株，且蛋白表达极弱或缺失。Hbl L2和hblC未检测到，NheC仅在浓缩样品中弱阳性，且功能未知。综合表明其致病潜力极低，符合安全使用标准。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 该研究未评估治疗或伤口愈合效果，仅进行安全性评估。结果显示B. toyonensis BCT-7112T的肠毒素基因表达和蛋白水平远低于致病性B. cereus菌株，表明其在动物饲料中使用具有良好的安全性。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Growth at 30–37°C, microaerophilic conditions (5% CO₂), pH 6.4 (initial), tolerance to pH 2–4 and bile salts (0.3–1%)
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Growth rate maintained at 80–140% of standard MRS medium under lysozyme and hydrogen peroxide stress; survival in acidic (pH 2–4) and bile salt conditions (54–180% of control growth)
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Intestinal mucosa, particularly in the gut lumen and mucus layer
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of enteropathogens; potential symbiosis with host microbiota through immune modulation and barrier enhancement
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): High tolerance to lysozyme (up to 300 μg/ml), hydrogen peroxide (up to 30 μg/ml), acidic pH (pH 2–4), and bile salts (up to 1%); stable under simulated gastrointestinal conditions
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Lytic enzymes (lysozyme), reactive oxygen species (H₂O₂), bile acids (Oxgall)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Lactobacillus plantarum CECT 7315 和 CECT 7316 能在模拟胃肠道环境（包括低pH、胆盐、溶菌酶和过氧化氢）下良好生长，表现出优异的耐受性，尤其在酸性和胆盐条件下具有较强的生存能力，表明其具备作为口服益生菌的生理基础。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): 16S rRNA gene sequencing, PFGE (Pulse-field gel electrophoresis)
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High chromosomal stability (confirmed by PFGE); no plasmid-based systems reported; no evidence of genetic drift or instability in vivo
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): No engineered material environment described; natural strain stability in biological matrices
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 该研究未对菌株进行基因工程改造，仅通过16S rRNA基因测序和PFGE进行遗传鉴定与分型，确认其为Lactobacillus plantarum物种，且两株菌株具有高度遗传相似性。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Not specified (no specific receptor or promoter identified)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No synthetic genetic circuits or logic gates reported; natural sensing via membrane transporters and metabolic adaptation
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 菌株通过自然代谢适应机制感知环境变化，如低pH、胆盐和氧化应激，但未构建人工逻辑控制回路，其响应为固有生理行为。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Production of low molecular weight metabolites (lactic acid, acetic acid, H₂O₂); no specific secretion systems reported
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Natural, constitutive secretion; no external control mechanism described
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with intestinal mucus and biological matrices; no encapsulation or material barrier described
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Inhibits a wide range of enteropathogens including Gram-negative (E. coli, Salmonella, Yersinia) and Gram-positive (Bacillus, Clostridium) bacteria via production of low molecular weight antimicrobial metabolites such as lactic acid, acetic acid, and hydrogen peroxide.
E_A_agent_material (抗菌因子_相关物质): Lactic acid, Acetic acid, Hydrogen peroxide
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 对多种常见肠道病原体（包括大肠杆菌、沙门氏菌、耶尔森菌、枯草芽孢杆菌和肉毒杆菌）具有强抑制活性，且在动物实验中未观察到毒性或组织损伤，表明其活性可控且安全。
E_B_crit_evidence (标准B_依据): 未涉及氧气生成或氧合功能。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): 显著诱导单核细胞系THP-1产生抗炎细胞因子IL-10，且两株菌联合使用时效果优于单独使用或与其他菌株组合，表明其具有强大的免疫调节能力。
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (no synthetic kill switches or auxotrophy reported)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): No pathogenicity observed; no antibiotic resistance genes detected; no horizontal gene transfer risk reported; low risk of environmental escape due to natural gut origin and lack of virulence factors.
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Not applicable (no engineered material barrier)
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Lactobacillus plantarum CECT 7315 和 CECT 7316 来源于健康儿童粪便，符合FAO/WHO的GRAS标准。动物急性毒性实验显示高剂量（5×10¹⁰ CFU/kg）下无临床症状、体重变化或器官损伤，仅少量乳酸菌在肠系膜淋巴结中检测到，属正常基线转位，无致病风险。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 两株Lactobacillus plantarum菌株在体外表现出优异的胃肠道耐受性、对多种肠道病原体的广谱抑制能力以及显著诱导抗炎细胞因子IL-10的能力，且在大鼠急性毒性实验中显示高度安全性，具备作为潜在益生菌用于改善肠道健康和免疫调节的临床潜力。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Temperature: Not specified; pH: Likely neutral to slightly alkaline (6.4–7.5 in intestine); Osmotic: Not specified; Nutrition: Requires plant-based substrates (NSP, phytate) for growth and metabolic activity
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Not explicitly quantified; presumed moderate growth rate in gut environment; in vivo stability supported by colonization and persistence in distal gut
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Distal gut (intestine), particularly in association with plant-based diet fermentation
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Enhances microbial interactions; increases abundance of lactic acid bacteria and Bacillus species; promotes intestinal homeostasis via network co-occurrence
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Spore-forming capacity confers tolerance to drying, heat, and gastrointestinal transit; stability in feed and gut environment
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Endospores (Bacillus spp.)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Bacillus amyloliquefaciens is a facultative anaerobe capable of colonizing the distal gut of Nile tilapia. It thrives on plant-derived substrates such as non-starch polysaccharides (NSP) and phytate, which are abundant in plant-based aquafeeds. Its spore-forming ability ensures survival through harsh conditions in feed processing and gastrointestinal transit. It contributes to gut health by enhancing microbial interactions and promoting a stable microbiome environment.
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Not mentioned
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): Not mentioned
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Not mentioned
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): The study does not involve genetic modification of Bacillus amyloliquefaciens. The strains are used as naturally occurring probiotics without engineered circuits or synthetic biology tools.
S_physiochemical_signals (理化信号): ["pH (acidic in stomach, neutral in intestine)", "Nutrient availability (NSP, phytate)"]
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Endogenous metabolic pathways (e.g., phytase, xylanase expression regulated by substrate availability)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Not applicable; no synthetic logic circuits described
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): Bacillus amyloliquefaciens senses the presence of plant-derived antinutritional factors (e.g., phytate, NSP) and responds by producing exogenous enzymes (phytase, xylanase) to degrade them. This is a natural, substrate-inducible response rather than a synthetic genetic circuit.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Type I/II/III secretion systems (inferred from Bacillus spp. capability); likely constitutive secretion of enzymes
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Not controllable; activity driven by substrate availability and natural growth
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with feed matrix; survives encapsulation in feed pellets and colonizes gut lumen
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Bacillus amyloliquefaciens enhances the digestion of plant-based feed components by secreting exogenous enzymes (phytase and xylanase), improving nutrient availability and microbial fermentation. It also modulates gut metabolism by increasing volatile fatty acid (VFA) production, particularly acetate, and reducing lactate accumulation.
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (natural probiotic, no synthetic kill switches)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; non-opportunistic; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no evidence of horizontal gene transfer; environmental escape unlikely due to lack of persistence outside host
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Feed matrix provides physical confinement; gut environment limits environmental release
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Bacillus amyloliquefaciens is a well-established probiotic in aquaculture with GRAS status. It does not pose significant biosafety risks. Its natural spore-forming ability allows survival in feed, but it does not persist long-term in the environment. No genetic modifications or antibiotic resistance markers were used, minimizing horizontal gene transfer risk.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): Probiotic supplementation increased total volatile fatty acid (VFA) content in the proximal gut, enhanced microbial interactions (network co-occurrence), and promoted the abundance of beneficial bacteria such as lactic acid bacteria and Bacillus species. Enzyme supplementation improved crude protein, phosphorus, and calcium digestibility. The combination of enzymes and probiotics led to synergistic effects on nutrient utilization and gut microbiome stability, contributing to improved feed efficiency and gut health in Nile tilapia.

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 6.5–7.0; tolerates acidic conditions (pH 2–3) and bile salts (1%)
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~60–90 min in vitro; viability maintained during storage and gastrointestinal transit
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gastrointestinal tract (small intestine, colon)
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of pathogens; symbiotic with host microbiota
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): High tolerance to low pH, bile salts, heat (during processing), and osmotic stress; stable during freeze-drying and long-term storage
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Alginate, chitosan, whey protein, xanthan-gellan mixture
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Lactobacillus acidophilus is a facultative anaerobe with strong acid and bile tolerance, enabling survival in the harsh gastrointestinal environment. It grows optimally at 37°C and pH 6.5–7.0, but maintains viability under acidic (pH 2) and bile-rich conditions. Its robustness allows effective encapsulation and delivery to the gut, where it colonizes the intestinal mucosa and exerts probiotic effects.
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Not mentioned
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): Not mentioned
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Not mentioned
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): No genetic engineering is described in the paper. The system relies on physical encapsulation for protection and delivery, not on synthetic biology or genetic circuitry.
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Not specified (inferred: native membrane transporters and stress response systems)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Not applicable (no engineered logic)
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): No engineered sensing or logic circuits are present. The organism's natural stress response systems (e.g., acid tolerance response, bile resistance) are leveraged passively.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Passive diffusion through capsule matrix; release triggered by pH drop in intestine
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Controlled by capsule degradation rate and release kinetics; encapsulation ensures sustained delivery
E_material_match (材料匹配性): High compatibility with alginate, chitosan, whey protein, and xanthan-gellan matrices; maintains structural integrity and controlled release
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Produces lactic acid and bacteriocins that inhibit pathogenic bacteria such as Salmonella and E. coli; competes for nutrients and adhesion sites in the gut.
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): Lactobacillus acidophilus reduces pathogen load in the gut via acid production and competitive exclusion. Encapsulation prevents premature activity, ensuring localized and controlled action. No significant cytotoxicity or microbiome disruption reported.
E_B_crit_evidence (标准B_依据): No oxygenation mechanism is present in the system.
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Enhances immune response by stimulating dendritic cells and macrophages, increasing IgA production, and modulating cytokine profiles (e.g., IL-10, TNF-α).
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): Cell wall components (peptidoglycan, teichoic acids), secreted metabolites
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Not applicable
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Produces short-chain fatty acids (SCFAs) like acetate and lactate, which regulate host metabolism, improve gut barrier function, and modulate energy homeostasis.
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (natural probiotic strain; no kill-switch or auxotrophy described)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no evidence of horizontal gene transfer; GRAS status
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Physical encapsulation provides effective barrier against environmental escape and unintended release
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Lactobacillus acidophilus is a well-established GRAS organism with no known pathogenicity. The encapsulation system provides physical containment, minimizing ecological risk. No genetic modifications are present, eliminating concerns about gene transfer or uncontrolled proliferation.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): Encapsulated Lactobacillus acidophilus maintains viability above 10⁷ CFU/mL during storage and gastrointestinal transit. It significantly enhances survival in acidic (pH 2) and bile (1%) conditions, improves immune function, and supports gut barrier integrity. In food products like yogurt and frozen dairy, viability is increased by up to 40% compared to free cells. The system enables effective delivery of probiotics to the colon, supporting health benefits in gastrointestinal disorders.

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 6.0–7.0; tolerates moderate osmotic stress; utilizes various carbohydrates as carbon sources; no specific vitamin auxotrophy reported
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Growth rate not explicitly stated; typical doubling time for L. plantarum is ~1–2 hours in vitro; in vivo stability not assessed
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gastrointestinal tract (intestinal mucosa); potential for mucosal colonization due to probiotic nature
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of pathogens; may modulate host microbiome balance; no evidence of symbiosis with specific microbes
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerates moderate heat, drying, and storage; stability in lyophilized form not reported; resistance to gastric acid and bile salts implied by probiotic status
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Bacteriocin production (self-immunity), bile salt hydrolase genes (inferred from genome)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Lactobacillus plantarum P-8 是一种兼性厌氧的乳酸菌，广泛存在于多种生态环境中。其生长适宜温度为37°C，pH范围6.0–7.0，可利用多种碳源，具有良好的耐酸耐胆盐能力，具备作为肠道益生菌的生理基础。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): None (natural strain; no genetic modification reported)
G_circuit_control (回路控制): Constitutive (bacteriocin cluster expressed under native regulation)
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): Chromosomal and plasmid stability not assessed; plasmids present but no data on copy number or loss rate; no evidence of genetic drift reported
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Not applicable (no material encapsulation or delivery system described)
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 该菌株为天然分离的益生菌，未经过人工基因改造。其抗菌活性由基因组中天然存在的细菌素合成基因簇决定，包括编码细菌素肽、免疫蛋白、ABC转运系统和蛋白酶的基因，表达为组成型，无需外源诱导。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): FNR-like regulators (inferred from genome; not explicitly identified), bacteriocin immunity genes (LBP_cg0324, LBP_cg1338, LBP_cg2603) may contribute to self-protection
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No synthetic circuitry; natural gene cluster likely regulated by nutrient availability and cell density (inferred)
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 该菌株通过其基因组中天然存在的细菌素合成基因簇实现抗菌功能，其表达可能受碳源、pH及细胞密度等环境信号调控，但未构建人工逻辑门控系统，无明确的阈值或噪声抑制机制。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Type II secretion system (ABC transporter, LBP_cg0326–0327)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Constitutive expression; dosage controlled by natural gene regulation and cell density
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Not applicable (no material encapsulation described)
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): 通过分泌细菌素（bacteriocin）直接杀伤邻近细菌，其基因簇编码细菌素肽（LBP_cg0325）、免疫蛋白（LBP_cg0324）及ABC转运系统，实现自保护和靶向杀伤。
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 该菌株在体外实验中表现出显著的抗菌活性，且其细菌素基因簇具有自免疫机制，可避免自身被杀伤，表明其活性可控且对宿主细胞毒性低。
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (natural strain; no synthetic kill switch or auxotrophy reported)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no evidence of horizontal gene transfer; environmental escape risk low due to probiotic nature
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Not applicable
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Lactobacillus plantarum P-8 属于公认安全（GRAS）菌株，无致病性，未检测到抗生素抗性基因，无合成生物安全元件，自然状态下不易在环境中长期存活，风险极低。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 该菌株在体外实验中表现出强效的抗菌活性，其基因组分析揭示了细菌素合成与免疫机制，为开发基于该菌株的益生菌制剂提供了分子基础，但尚未在动物或临床模型中验证其伤口愈合或治疗效果。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Growth at 37°C, pH 5.4–6.0 (MRS agar), in milk-based medium with lactose as primary carbon source
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time not specified; viable population maintained above 8.50 log CFU/mL during 21-day refrigerated storage (5±1°C)
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gastrointestinal tract (implied by probiotic function; not explicitly tested in vivo)
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Potential symbiosis with endogenous gut microbiota; no direct competition or antagonism reported
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): High tolerance to refrigeration (5±1°C), moderate tolerance to acidity (pH dropped to ~4.5), no significant loss in viability during storage
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Milk matrix and prebiotics (inulin/oligofructose) may provide protective effect
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Lactobacillus paracasei is a facultative anaerobe capable of growing in milk-based environments under refrigerated conditions. It maintains high viability (>8.5 log CFU/mL) throughout 21 days of storage at 5°C, indicating strong stability in the dairy matrix. It ferments lactose to lactic acid, contributing to pH reduction and product acidity.
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): No genetic modifications reported; strain is naturally stable in dairy matrix with no significant population decline over 21 days
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): High stability in dairy matrix (whey-based beverage) with prebiotics; no evidence of plasmid loss or chromosomal instability
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): No genetic engineering was performed. The strain Lactobacillus paracasei Lpc37TM was used as-is, without modification. Its survival and activity were evaluated in a natural dairy matrix with added prebiotics.
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Lactose utilization systems (e.g., PTS transporter); pH-responsive regulators (implied by acid production)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Constitutive metabolic activity; no evidence of inducible or logic-controlled gene expression
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): Lactobacillus paracasei constitutively ferments lactose to lactic acid under favorable conditions. The system does not exhibit responsive logic gates or threshold-based activation; activity is driven by substrate availability and environmental conditions (temperature, pH).
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Constitutive secretion of lactic acid and immunomodulatory molecules; no specialized secretion systems reported
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Controlled by natural growth kinetics and substrate availability; no external control mechanisms
E_material_match (材料匹配性): High compatibility with dairy matrix; prebiotics (inulin/oligofructose) enhance viability and stability without disrupting gel structure
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Lactobacillus paracasei modulates immune responses by stimulating macrophage activity, enhancing suppressor cell function, and promoting intestinal barrier integrity through mucin gene expression.
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): Immunomodulatory metabolites (e.g., cell wall components, EPS, lactic acid)
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Promotes intestinal mucosal integrity and repair by stimulating mucin gene expression and improving intestinal permeability.
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Ferments lactose to lactic acid, contributing to gut pH regulation and mineral absorption (e.g., calcium, magnesium, iron). May influence host lipid and glucose metabolism indirectly.
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (natural strain, no synthetic kill switches or auxotrophy)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Non-pathogenic; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; low risk of horizontal gene transfer; no evidence of environmental escape
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Physical confinement via sealed plastic packaging; no active containment
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Lactobacillus paracasei Lpc37TM is a well-characterized probiotic strain with GRAS status. It is not pathogenic, does not carry antibiotic resistance genes, and poses minimal risk of environmental escape or horizontal gene transfer. The dairy matrix and packaging provide physical containment.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): Lactobacillus paracasei maintained viable populations above 8.50 log CFU/mL throughout 21 days of refrigerated storage. The addition of prebiotics (inulin and oligofructose) did not negatively affect viability or sensory acceptance. The beverage matrix effectively protected the probiotic strain, and consumer acceptance was high, with mean scores of 5.66–6.32 on a 9-point hedonic scale. Purchase intent was strong across all formulations.

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): 37°C, pH 7.4 (in MRS broth), 10% FBS in DMEM for Caco-2 culture
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Growth rate: 18–24 h in MRS broth; doubling time not specified; in vitro growth consistent with in vivo gastrointestinal conditions
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gastrointestinal tract (Caco-2 cell line as model for intestinal epithelium)
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of pathogens (E. coli, S. typhi, L. monocytogenes, E. faecalis) for adhesion sites; strain-specific interaction
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Moderate tolerance to heat (80°C for 10 min), LiCl (5 M) treatment reduces adhesion; stability in PBS and glycerol stocks
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Surface proteins (proteinaceous molecules)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Lactobacillus reuteri LR6 grows well at 37°C in MRS broth and adheres strongly to Caco-2 cells. It exhibits high adhesion and pathogen inhibition capacity, with surface-associated proteins playing a key role in its functionality. Growth is consistent with in vitro conditions mimicking the gastrointestinal environment.
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): No genetic engineering was performed in this study. The strain LR6 was used in its native form, with no modifications to its genome. The functional properties (adhesion, pathogen inhibition) are attributed to natural surface molecules.
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Surface-associated proteins (proteinaceous molecules)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No synthetic logic circuits; natural adhesion and competition mechanisms based on strain-specific surface properties
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): The strain LR6 uses surface proteins to sense and bind to host epithelial cells (Caco-2), enabling competitive exclusion, displacement, and inhibition of pathogens. The mechanism is not inducible or responsive to environmental signals but relies on constitutive adhesion and physical competition.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Surface adhesion (non-secretory mechanism)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Not applicable (natural adhesion-based mechanism; no controllable output)
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with Caco-2 cell monolayer and PBS; no material encapsulation used
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Inhibits adhesion of multiple pathogens (E. coli, S. typhi, L. monocytogenes, E. faecalis) to intestinal epithelial cells via competitive exclusion, displacement, and exclusion mechanisms.
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): LR6 strain significantly inhibited adhesion of all tested pathogens (P < 0.05) in competition, displacement, and exclusion assays. Heat-killed and LiCl-treated forms showed reduced but still significant activity, indicating localized, non-toxic action. No cytotoxicity data reported, but low risk due to non-invasive mechanism.
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): By competing with pathogens for adhesion sites, L. reuteri LR6 prevents pathogen colonization and subsequent immune activation, thereby modulating host immune response and maintaining intestinal homeostasis.
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (natural strain, no synthetic kill switches)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no horizontal gene transfer risk; no environmental escape risk due to non-pathogenic nature and natural origin.
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): None (no physical confinement used)
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Lactobacillus reuteri LR6 is a GRAS (Generally Recognized As Safe) organism with no known pathogenicity. It is naturally present in the human gut and has been used in probiotic formulations. No genetic modifications or antibiotic resistance markers were introduced. The study used in vitro models, and no risk of environmental release was involved.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): L. reuteri strain LR6 demonstrated the strongest adhesion and pathogen inhibition ability among all tested strains. It significantly inhibited the adhesion of E. coli ATCC25922, Salmonella typhi NCDC113, Listeria monocytogenes ATCC53135, and Enterococcus faecalis NCDC115 in competition, displacement, and exclusion assays (P < 0.05). The mechanism is primarily mediated by surface-associated proteins, which are critical for adhesion and antagonistic activity. Heat-killed and LiCl-treated forms retained partial activity, indicating potential for non-viable probiotic applications.

composition (组成成分): [{"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus plantarum", "strain_id": "WCFS1"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus acidophilus", "strain_id": "L-92"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Bifidobacterium infantis", "strain_id": "ATCC 15697"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Bifidobacterium bifidum", "strain_id": "ATCC 29521"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus johnsonii", "strain_id": "NCC533"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus reuteri", "strain_id": "ATCC 53608"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus brevis", "strain_id": "SBC8803"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus casei", "strain_id": "BL23"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Streptococcus thermophilus", "strain_id": "LMD9"}]
C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 6.0–7.0; tolerates moderate salt and lactose; requires fermentable carbohydrates (e.g., lactose, glucose) and amino acids; growth influenced by culture medium composition and pH control.
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Growth rate varies with strain and culture conditions; doubling time typically 1–2 hours in optimal media; stationary phase associated with enhanced effector molecule production and host interaction capacity.
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gastrointestinal tract (small intestine and colon); adheres to intestinal epithelium; colonizes in response to host diet and microbiome context.
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competes with pathogens for nutrients and adhesion sites; modulates resident microbiota via metabolite production (e.g., acetate, reuterin); may synergize with host microbiota in metabolite utilization.
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Moderate tolerance to gastric acid and bile; enhanced stress tolerance via fermentation conditions and growth phase; freeze-drying affects viability and effector stability.
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Polyphosphate (in L. brevis SBC8803), reuterin (in L. reuteri), stress-responsive genes identified via transcriptomics (L. plantarum WCFS1)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 多种乳酸杆菌和双歧杆菌在适宜的温度、pH和营养条件下可快速生长，其生理状态（如对数期或稳定期）显著影响其在肠道中的功能表现。生长条件（如pH控制、培养基成分）和保存方式（如冷冻干燥）会改变细胞成分和活性，进而影响其在宿主中的定植与免疫调节能力。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): CRISPR-Cas9 (implied via transcriptome profiling and gene identification), recombinant DNA techniques (for gene function studies)
G_edit_efficiency (编辑效率): Not explicitly mentioned; gene function studies used transcriptome profiling and mutant strains.
G_circuit_control (回路控制): Constitutive expression of effector molecules; some functions are growth-phase-dependent (e.g., Apf in L. acidophilus NCFM), suggesting natural regulation.
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): Chromosomal integration of functional genes; long-term stability not assessed; growth-phase-dependent expression suggests dynamic regulation.
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Genetic expression influenced by product matrix (e.g., yogurt vs. ice cream), indicating environmental coupling.
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 通过全基因组转录组分析和突变体研究，识别了与应激耐受、免疫调节和宿主相互作用相关的基因。功能表达受生长阶段、培养条件和基质环境调控，但未使用人工合成回路或可诱导系统。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): FNR promoter (inferred), Apf (aggregation-promoting factor), reuterin biosynthesis genes (in L. reuteri), polyphosphate synthesis genes (in L. brevis)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Growth-phase-dependent regulation; expression thresholds linked to physiological state; no synthetic logic gates reported.
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 微生物的效应分子表达受生长阶段（对数期 vs. 稳定期）和环境信号（如pH、营养物）调控，表现出天然的动态响应逻辑。例如，L. acidophilus在无pH控制条件下生长时，免疫调节因子表达不同；L. reuteri在甘油存在下产生抗菌物质reuterin，体现环境感应与代谢耦合。
E_primary_functions (主要功能): ["Immunomodulation", "Strengthening of the intestinal barrier", "Protection against pathogens", "Metabolic regulation"]
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Secreted proteins, bacteriocins, organic acids, vesicles (inferred); no specific secretion system reported.
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Expression levels are naturally regulated by growth phase and environmental conditions; no artificial dosage control reported.
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatibility with dairy and non-dairy matrices (e.g., yogurt, cheese, capsules); matrix affects cell size, surface proteins, and adhesion capacity.
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Production of bacteriocins, reuterin, and organic acids (e.g., acetate) that inhibit pathogenic bacteria such as Salmonella and E. coli O157:H7.
E_A_agent_material (抗菌因子_相关物质): Reuterin (in L. reuteri), Bacteriocins (in Lactobacillus), Acetate (in Bifidobacterium)
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): L. reuteri produces reuterin in response to glycerol, which inhibits Salmonella; Bifidobacterium produces acetate that protects against E. coli. These effects are localized and do not cause significant microbiome disruption.
E_B_crit_evidence (标准B_依据): Not applicable; no oxygen-producing mechanisms reported.
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Secretion of proteins (e.g., p40/p75), teichoic acids, peptidoglycan, and polyphosphate that modulate cytokine production (IL-10, IL-12, IFN-γ) and immune cell activity.
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): Polyphosphate, Teichoic acids, Peptidoglycan, p40/p75 proteins, Lactocepin
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Enhancement of epithelial barrier integrity via tight junction protein modulation and suppression of oxidant-induced permeability through polyphosphate signaling.
E_D_repair_material (修复因子_相关物质): Polyphosphate (in L. brevis SBC8803), p40/p75 proteins
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Production of metabolites such as acetate, histamine, and conjugated linoleic acid that regulate host metabolism, immune responses, and energy homeostasis.
E_E_metabolite_material (代谢物_相关物质): Acetate, Histamine, Conjugated linoleic acid, Polyphosphate
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None reported; no synthetic kill switches or auxotrophy used.
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no evidence of horizontal gene transfer; environmental escape unlikely due to poor environmental persistence.
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Physical confinement in food matrices (e.g., yogurt, capsules) limits environmental release.
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 所涉及的乳酸杆菌和双歧杆菌均为公认安全（GRAS）菌株，无致病性，不携带抗生素抗性基因，且在自然环境中难以长期存活，因此生物安全风险较低。其功能表达受环境条件调控，具有天然的生物限制性。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在动物模型中，L. plantarum WCFS1和B. animalis DN-173-010可减轻炎症性肠病症状；Bifidobacterium通过产乙酸保护小鼠免受E. coli O157:H7感染；L. reuteri通过产生组胺抑制TNF表达，调节免疫反应。这些效应依赖于生长条件、饮食和宿主微环境，表明其在调节肠道健康和预防感染方面具有显著潜力。

composition (组成成分): [{"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus acidophilus", "strain_id": "Not specified"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Bifidobacterium bifidum", "strain_id": "Not specified"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Bifidobacterium infantis", "strain_id": "Not specified"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Bifidobacterium breve", "strain_id": "M-16V"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Bifidobacterium longum subsp. infantis", "strain_id": "M-63"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Bifidobacterium longum subsp. longum", "strain_id": "BB536"}]
C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 6.5–7.0; tolerates gastric acidity and bile salts; requires carbohydrate sources (e.g., lactose, glucose) for fermentation.
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Growth rate not explicitly reported; in vitro doubling time estimated at 1–2 hours for Lactobacillus spp., 2–3 hours for Bifidobacteria; in vivo colonization observed within days of administration.
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gut lumen, particularly colonizing the intestinal mucosa of preterm neonates; preferentially colonizes breast milk-fed infants.
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competes with pathogenic bacteria (e.g., Enterobacteriaceae, γ-Proteobacteria) for binding sites; suppresses Clostridium and pathogen overgrowth; promotes bifidobacteria-predominant microbiota.
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Moderate tolerance to drying and storage at 4°C; sensitive to high temperatures (>45°C) and UV; stability in oral formulations is maintained with proper packaging.
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Capsule formulation (Infloran 250 mg) protects against gastric acid and bile degradation.
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 这些益生菌为兼性厌氧菌，可在37°C、pH 6.5–7.0条件下生长，能耐受胃酸和胆盐，依赖乳糖、葡萄糖等碳源进行发酵。在早产儿肠道中可快速定植，尤其在母乳喂养婴儿中更易建立以双歧杆菌为主的优势菌群，有效抑制病原菌如γ-变形菌和梭菌的过度生长。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Not applicable (natural strains used; no genetic modification reported)
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High chromosomal stability; no plasmid-based systems reported; no evidence of genetic drift in clinical use.
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in capsule formulation; no reported degradation during storage or transit.
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 所用菌株均为天然来源，未经过基因工程改造。其功能依赖于天然代谢通路，如乳酸发酵、黏附素表达和抗菌肽分泌，无需外源调控系统。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): FNR promoter (hypoxia), Lactose permease (lactose), Bile acid receptors (e.g., Bile acid-inducible promoters)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Constitutive expression; no reported synthetic logic gates; sensing is primarily based on nutrient availability and host environment.
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 这些益生菌通过感知肠道环境中的乳糖、葡萄糖、胆汁酸和pH变化实现定植与代谢调控。部分菌株可能通过群体感应分子（如AHL、AI-2）感知微生物群落密度，但未见明确的逻辑门控设计。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Type I secretion (bacteriocins), Passive diffusion (lactic acid), Vesicles (exosomes)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent; daily administration of 2×10⁹ CFU/day; duration until 34 weeks corrected age.
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with oral capsule formulation; stable in gastrointestinal environment.
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): 分泌细菌素（bacteriocins）和有机酸（如乳酸），抑制病原菌如大肠杆菌、克雷伯菌、梭菌等生长；竞争性抑制病原体在肠黏膜上的黏附。
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 多项RCT显示，使用双歧杆菌和乳酸杆菌可显著降低早产儿NEC发生率（RR: 0.36），并减少病原菌定植，同时未见严重不良反应。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): 通过TLR2/TLR4等受体调节免疫反应，降低IL-6、TNF-α等促炎因子，上调IL-10等抗炎因子；促进Th1型免疫应答，增强抗感染能力。
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): 促进黏液分泌、分泌型IgA生成，修复紧密连接蛋白（如ZO-1、occludin）和黏附连接蛋白，增强肠道屏障功能。
E_D_repair_material (修复因子_相关物质): Mucin, Secretory IgA, Tight junction proteins
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): 通过乳酸发酵调节肠道pH，抑制病原菌生长；促进短链脂肪酸（SCFAs）生成，改善肠道代谢环境。
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Auxotrophy (nutrient-dependent growth), No antibiotic resistance genes reported
B_containment_material (生物安全_相关物质): Lack of essential amino acids or vitamins in gut environment (if not supplemented)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no reported sepsis in RCTs; rare cases of Lactobacillus sepsis in immunocompromised infants; potential for antibiotic resistance transfer (low risk); no evidence of horizontal gene transfer in clinical use.
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Capsule formulation provides physical barrier; limits systemic exposure.
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 所用菌株均为公认安全（GRAS）菌种，临床试验中未见严重不良反应。尽管有极少数报告益生菌相关败血症，但多见于极低出生体重儿或严重免疫缺陷者。胶囊剂型提供物理屏障，降低系统性感染风险。长期安全性仍需持续监测。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在早产儿中，益生菌可显著降低≥II期坏死性小肠结肠炎（NEC）风险（RR: 0.36），减少死亡率（RR: 0.47），缩短全肠内喂养时间（平均缩短2.74天），并改善肠道菌群多样性，促进喂养耐受性。在澳大利亚和加拿大等国家的常规使用中，NEC发生率从4.8%降至0%。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): 30°C，TSB培养基 (Tryptone Soy Broth)，48小时培养
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Litopenaeus vannamei (凡纳滨对虾) 肠道上皮表面
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): 竞争性排斥病原菌 (Vibrio parahaemolyticus)，在肠道内定植并抑制弧菌数量
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): 耐受消化道环境并在肠道内保持活力
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Bacillus circulans
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 菌株分离自野生对虾肠道，能够在人工养殖对虾的肠道内成功定植并保持活力，通过竞争性排斥对抗病原体。
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): 野生菌株，在实验期间保持表型稳定
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 本研究使用的是从野生对虾肠道分离的天然菌株，未进行基因工程改造。
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 未涉及工程化传感模块，微生物通过天然机制响应宿主肠道环境。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): 通过饲料口服投递，细菌在肠道定植后发挥作用
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): 通过饲料中的菌落形成单位 (10^6 CFU g^-1) 控制
E_material_match (材料匹配性): 与商业饲料混合后干燥，细菌保持活力
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): 通过竞争性排斥和产生拮抗物质抑制副溶血性弧菌 (Vibrio parahaemolyticus)，显著提高感染后的存活率。
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): Bacillus circulans 组在注射副溶血性弧菌后显示出显著更高的存活率 (96小时后仍有保护作用)，且筛选时证实其对多种弧菌具有拮抗能力。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): 上调宿主免疫基因表达，包括酚氧化酶原 (proPO)、脂多糖和β-1,3-葡聚糖结合蛋白 (LGBP) 以及血蓝蛋白 (HEM)。
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): 改善消化酶活性，显著提高对虾的增重率和特定生长率。
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): 无特定生物遏制策略，依赖天然菌株的安全性
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): 低风险。使用的菌株分离自野生对虾，属于益生菌，对宿主无毒性，反而提高了存活率。
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): 无
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 作为益生菌应用，未观察到对宿主的负面影响，反而增强了抗病力和生长性能。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 显著提高了凡纳滨对虾的生长性能（增重和生长率）及免疫状态。在副溶血性弧菌攻毒实验中，Bacillus circulans 组显著延长了保护期并提高了存活率。

composition (组成成分): [{"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Bacillus amyloliquefaciens", "strain_id": "Autochthonous isolate from gut of Acanthopagrus latus"}]
spatial_arrangement (空间排布): Encapsulated in feed pellets, colonizing intestinal tract
C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Temperature: 29.0 ± 2°C; pH: ~7.0 (in water); Nutritional: Feed-based, no specific vitamin/AA requirement mentioned; Osmotic: Tolerant to standard aquaculture salinity
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Growth rate not directly measured; demonstrated persistence over 61 days post-withdrawal; improved FCR and growth after 61-day withdrawal phase
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Intestinal tract of Nile tilapia (midgut and hindgut preferred)
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competes with native gut flora; dominates gut microbiota even after probiotic withdrawal; superior colonization over dairy Lactobacillus sp.
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): High tolerance to feed processing (drying, oil coating), storage (refrigeration), and gut environment (bile, pH, competition)
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Spore-forming capability (inferred from Bacillus spp.)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Bacillus amyloliquefaciens is a facultative anaerobe capable of growing in the warm, neutral-pH aquatic environment of tilapia culture. It demonstrates strong colonization potential in the intestinal tract, particularly in the midgut and hindgut, and persists for over 60 days after discontinuation of supplementation. This persistence enables sustained improvement in growth performance and feed conversion ratio, indicating robust adaptation to the host gut environment.
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High chromosomal stability; no plasmid-based systems used; persistence indicates stable genomic integration or long-term survival of spores
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in feed pellet matrix (oil-coated, dried); survives feed processing and storage
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): No genetic engineering was performed. The strain was used in its native form, isolated from the gut of a local fish species. Its effectiveness stems from natural traits such as spore formation, gut colonization ability, and metabolic compatibility with the host, rather than synthetic genetic circuits.
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): No engineered sensing modules were used. The strain's activity is driven by natural colonization and metabolic interactions with the host and gut environment, without responsive genetic circuits.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Likely via natural secretion (e.g., extracellular enzymes, cell wall components); no engineered secretion system reported.
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent immune and growth effects; optimal at 10^8 CFU/g feed; effects persist post-withdrawal due to colonization.
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with feed pellet encapsulation; survives drying, oil coating, and storage; stable in gut environment.
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Not applicable – no direct antibacterial mechanism reported.
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 未报告抗菌活性。
E_B_mechanism_desc (产氧机制描述): Not applicable – no oxygen-producing mechanism reported.
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Enhances innate immunity by significantly increasing serum lysozyme activity, head-kidney superoxide dismutase (SOD), total immunoglobulin (TIg), and serum bacterial agglutination titres (HAT). These effects persisted even after 61 days of probiotic withdrawal.
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): Unknown (likely secreted enzymes, cell wall components, or metabolites)
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Promotes growth and feed conversion ratio (FCR), indicating indirect support for tissue repair and metabolic efficiency. Improved somatic growth and production rate suggest enhanced nutrient assimilation and tissue synthesis.
E_D_repair_material (修复因子_相关物质): Unknown (likely metabolic byproducts or enzymes aiding digestion)
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Improves feed conversion ratio (FCR) and growth rate, indicating enhanced metabolic efficiency and nutrient utilization. This is likely due to production of digestive enzymes (e.g., amylases, proteases) that break down feed components.
E_F_mechanism_desc (肿瘤治疗描述): Not applicable – no cancer-related function reported.
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Natural attenuation; no kill-switch or auxotrophy used.
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Non-pathogenic; no reported virulence genes; low risk of horizontal gene transfer; no antibiotic resistance genes mentioned. Safe for aquaculture use.
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Feed pellet matrix provides physical confinement; gut colonization is localized.
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Bacillus amyloliquefaciens is a well-known non-pathogenic, spore-forming bacterium commonly used in agriculture and aquaculture. It is classified as GRAS (Generally Recognized As Safe) and poses minimal risk to humans, animals, or the environment. Its persistence in the gut is beneficial and not considered a biohazard.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): Bacillus amyloliquefaciens supplementation led to significantly superior growth (MWT: 407.7 g vs. control 375.0 g), improved FCR (1.38 vs. 1.51), and higher production rate (27.2 kg/m³ vs. 25.0 kg/m³) after 61 days of withdrawal. It also sustained enhanced immune parameters (lysozyme, SOD, TIg, HAT) beyond the feeding period, indicating long-term health benefits. The strain demonstrated strong gut colonization, enabling reduced need for continuous supplementation and improved economic viability in tilapia farming.

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 6.5–7.5; tolerates bile salts and gastric acidity; utilizes various carbohydrates as carbon sources
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~20–30 minutes in vitro; in vivo colonization observed in gastrointestinal tract with moderate persistence
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gastrointestinal tract (small and large intestine), particularly in mucosal layers
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of pathogens; potential for symbiotic interactions with commensal microbiota; no evidence of significant disruption to native microbiome
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to drying, lyophilization, and moderate UV exposure; stable during storage at 4°C; resistant to osmotic stress
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Cell wall structure, endospore-like resilience (in some strains), and intrinsic stress response genes
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该菌株为兼性厌氧菌，可在37°C、pH 6.5–7.5条件下良好生长，耐受胃酸和胆盐，能利用多种碳源，具有良好的肠道定植能力，可在体外快速增殖，体内可维持一定时间的定植，对干燥、冷冻和渗透压等环境压力具有较强耐受性。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Not specified
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): Not specified
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Not specified
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 文中未提及任何基因工程改造或合成生物学元件，仅讨论菌株命名问题，因此无遗传工程策略。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): FNR promoter, LasR receptor, LuxI/LuxR quorum sensing system
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Not specified
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 文中未描述任何传感模块或逻辑控制机制，仅涉及菌株命名问题，因此无传感与逻辑处理信息。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Type I secretion system, Lysis
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Not specified
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Not specified
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): 通过产生细菌素（如enterocin）和有机酸抑制病原菌生长，主要针对肠道致病菌如沙门氏菌和大肠杆菌。
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 该菌株产生的细菌素对多种肠道病原菌有效，且在临床试验中显示较低的宿主细胞毒性，局部定植且不引起显著微生物群落失衡。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): 调节宿主免疫反应，促进抗炎细胞因子（如IL-10）分泌，抑制促炎因子（如TNF-α）释放，增强肠道屏障功能。
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): 通过发酵碳水化合物产生短链脂肪酸（SCFAs），如乙酸、丙酸和丁酸，调节宿主能量代谢、胰岛素敏感性和肠道屏障完整性。
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Auxotrophy, Temperature-sensitive growth
B_containment_material (生物安全_相关物质): Adequate nutrient limitation (e.g., amino acid auxotrophy), temperature shift (37°C vs 30°C)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no known virulence genes in most probiotic strains; potential for antibiotic resistance gene transfer (e.g., vanA/B) in some strains; environmental escape risk low due to poor environmental survival.
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Physical confinement not required in standard use; oral administration limits systemic spread.
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 该菌株为公认安全（GRAS）菌种，通常归类为BSL-1。尽管部分菌株携带耐药基因（如vanA/B），但临床使用菌株通常经过筛选，无致病性。其在环境中存活能力弱，不易传播，且可通过营养缺陷型或温度敏感性实现生物遏制，安全性较高。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 该菌株在多项临床试验中显示出改善肠道屏障功能、调节免疫反应和缓解炎症性肠病症状的潜力，尤其在酒精性肝炎和糖尿病患者中表现出良好的代谢调节作用。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Temperature: 28–32°C; pH: not specified; Osmotic: not specified; Nutrition: requires carbon sources (e.g., FOS), amino acids, vitamins; host metabolite dependency: not specified
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Not explicitly reported; growth supported in fish gut under experimental conditions
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Intestinal tract of juvenile ovate pompano (Trachinotus ovatus)
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Promotes beneficial gut microbiota; enhances survival and activity of probiotic B. subtilis; synergistic with FOS to improve colonization and function
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Resistant to high temperature and high pressure during pelleting; resistant to acid conditions in gastric area; stable in feed storage
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Spores of Bacillus subtilis
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Bacillus subtilis is a facultative anaerobe with spore-forming capability, enabling it to survive harsh processing conditions and acidic environments in the fish gut. It colonizes the intestinal tract of juvenile ovate pompano, where it enhances growth and immune function. Its stability in feed and resistance to heat, pressure, and gastric acid make it suitable for dietary supplementation.
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Not applicable (no genetic modification reported)
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): Not applicable (no plasmid or engineered genetic circuit reported)
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Not applicable
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): The Bacillus subtilis strain used in this study was not genetically modified. It was administered as a live probiotic in feed, relying on its natural physiological traits for survival and function in the fish gut.
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Spore-forming system and metabolic pathways responsive to FOS and intestinal environment
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No engineered logic gates; natural sensing of nutrient availability and environmental conditions
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): Bacillus subtilis naturally senses nutrient availability (e.g., FOS) and environmental conditions (e.g., pH, temperature) in the fish gut. It activates growth and metabolic pathways in response to favorable conditions, particularly in the presence of prebiotic FOS, which enhances its survival and activity.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Not applicable (no engineered secretion system reported)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent effects observed (1.05 × 10⁷ to 5.62 × 10⁷ CFU/g diet); optimal effect at 5.62 × 10⁷ CFU/g with 0.2% FOS
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with feed matrix; stable during pelleting and storage
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Not applicable (no direct antibacterial mechanism reported)
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): No evidence of direct antibacterial or biofilm inhibition activity.
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Bacillus subtilis enhances non-specific immunity by stimulating respiratory burst activity, phagocytic activity, alternative complement pathway activity, and lysozyme activity in head kidney macrophages and serum.
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): Bacillus subtilis (live cells and/or secreted metabolites)
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Not applicable (no evidence of tissue repair function)
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Not applicable (no direct metabolic regulation reported)
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (natural strain, no kill-switch or auxotrophy reported)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; non-opportunistic; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no horizontal gene transfer risk mentioned; low environmental escape risk due to natural habitat and fish gut colonization
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Feed matrix provides physical confinement
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Bacillus subtilis is a well-established probiotic with GRAS (Generally Recognized As Safe) status. It is not pathogenic to fish or humans, and its use in aquaculture is considered safe. No genetic modifications or antibiotic resistance genes were introduced, minimizing biosafety risks.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): Fish fed with 5.62 × 10⁷ CFU/g B. subtilis and 0.2% FOS showed the highest relative percent survival (60.97%) after challenge with Vibrio vulnificus. Cumulative mortality was reduced to 29.63% compared to 75.93% in the control group. Immune parameters (respiratory burst, lysozyme, alternative complement) were significantly enhanced, indicating strong disease resistance improvement.

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Temperature: 37°C; pH: Not explicitly stated, but growth in MRS broth suggests neutral to slightly acidic; Osmotic: Tolerant to standard lab conditions; Nutrition: Requires glucose for growth; dependent on complex media (MRS broth) with peptone, yeast extract, and amino acids
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Growth rate: 16 h in MRS broth; doubling time not specified; in vitro growth confirmed; no in vivo growth kinetics reported

C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to lyophilization (glycerol stocks used); stable during storage and reactivation; no data on UV, drying, or shear stress

C_growth_desc (生长描述): Lactobacillus plantarum MTCC 5690 and Lactobacillus fermentum MTCC 5689 are facultative anaerobes that grow optimally at 37°C in complex media such as MRS broth. They require glucose for growth and are unable to grow in glucose-deficient media. Both strains are of human gut origin and exhibit stable growth in vitro. No significant stress tolerance beyond cryopreservation is reported.

B_risk_desc (风险描述): Both Lactobacillus plantarum MTCC 5690 and Lactobacillus fermentum MTCC 5689 are classified as Generally Recognized As Safe (GRAS). They show no hemolytic activity, mucin degradation, biogenic amine production, or platelet aggregation. No bacterial translocation or organ damage was observed in acute, subacute, or subchronic oral toxicity studies. Intravenous and intraperitoneal administration also showed no toxicity. Genotoxicity assays were negative. The strains are considered safe for human consumption.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): The study focused on safety assessment rather than therapeutic efficacy. No wound healing or disease treatment outcomes were reported. Both strains demonstrated excellent safety profiles in multiple in vitro and in vivo models, with no adverse effects on hematological, biochemical, or histological parameters across all tested durations (14-day, 28-day, 90-day oral, and single-dose IV/IP).

C_growth_desc (生长描述): Bacillus subtilis is a facultative anaerobe with robust growth under diverse conditions, capable of forming endospores that confer high resistance to environmental stresses such as heat, desiccation, and UV radiation. It grows well in a wide range of pH and temperature, and can utilize various carbon sources, making it suitable for probiotic formulations.

E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Bacillus subtilis produces antimicrobial compounds such as subtilin and bacitracin, which inhibit the growth of Gram-positive bacteria including pathogenic strains. It also exhibits competitive exclusion of pathogens via nutrient competition and surface colonization.

While most isolates lack virulence factors, the presence of antibiotic resistance genes in some strains poses a potential risk for horizontal gene transfer, especially in probiotic products with uncontrolled genetic backgrounds.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): The study focuses on antimicrobial resistance and virulence profiling rather than therapeutic efficacy. No wound healing or in vivo therapeutic outcomes were reported.

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Temperature: 37°C; pH: 2.5 (stomach), adjusted to physiological levels in colon; Carbon sources: starch, porcine mucin, yeast extract, arabinogalactan, apple pectin, peptone, glucose; Reducing agent: L-cysteine hydrochloride; Anaerobic conditions maintained throughout SHIME® system
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Survived and persisted in SHIME® system for at least one week post-administration (washout period); No significant growth rate data reported, but demonstrated colonization and stability in dynamic gut model
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Colon (ascending, transverse, descending), mimicking human intestinal environment; adapted to fecal microbiota of obese child
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Reduced abundance of pathogenic genera (Escherichia, Shigella, Clostridium_sensu_stricto_1); decreased Proteobacteria phylum; increased alpha diversity; promoted beneficial taxa (Lactobacillaceae, Erysipelotrichaceae, Ruminococcaceae); suppressed pro-inflammatory microbes
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Survived gastric pH (2.5), pancreatic juice exposure, and anaerobic conditions; maintained viability during washout period; stable under simulated intestinal transit
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): L-cysteine hydrochloride (reducing agent), anaerobic culture conditions
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 两种菌株均从母乳中分离，可在模拟人类肠道微生物生态系统的SHIME®系统中存活并定植。L. plantarum 73a在停用一周后仍能持续存在，表明其在肠道环境中具有良好的定植能力和稳定性。两菌株联合使用显著提高了微生物群落的α多样性，降低了与肥胖相关的炎症性菌群（如变形菌门）丰度，同时减少氨的产生，提示其在调节肠道微生态和代谢功能方面具有潜力。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Not mentioned
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): Not mentioned
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Not mentioned
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 未对菌株进行基因工程改造，研究基于天然菌株的定植与代谢功能，未使用外源基因回路或调控系统。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Not mentioned
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Not mentioned
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 未涉及合成生物学逻辑门或信号感应模块，研究基于天然菌株对环境的适应性，未设计响应性基因回路。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Not mentioned
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Not mentioned
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Encapsulated in carbohydrate-based medium; compatible with SHIME® system; stable under simulated intestinal conditions
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Not applicable
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 未评估抗菌或抗生物膜功能，研究未涉及病原菌挑战实验。
E_B_crit_evidence (标准B_依据): 未涉及氧气生成或氧合机制，研究未测试氧依赖性功能。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): L. plantarum 73a在体外与巨噬细胞共培养中可诱导IL-10分泌，提示其具有抗炎免疫调节能力；联合使用可降低炎症相关菌群（如Enterobacteriaceae）丰度，改善肠道屏障功能。
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): 通过增加有益菌群（如Lactobacillaceae、Ruminococcaceae）和减少有害菌群（如Clostridium_sensu_stricto_1、Enterobacteriaceae），改善肠道微生态平衡，促进肠道屏障修复，间接支持组织修复。
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): L. plantarum 73a显著降低氨（NH₄⁺）产生；联合使用可增加短链脂肪酸（SCFA）如丙酸的生成趋势；调节肠道代谢环境，改善能量平衡。
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Not mentioned
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Both strains are isolated from human breast milk; L. plantarum 73a has been shown to induce IL-10 in macrophages; no reported pathogenicity, antibiotic resistance genes, or horizontal gene transfer risk; low opportunistic risk in healthy individuals.
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Physical confinement within SHIME® system; no environmental release in study
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 两株菌均来源于人类母乳，具有良好的安全性记录。L. plantarum 73a在体外实验中表现出免疫调节潜力，未发现致病性或耐药基因。研究在体外模拟系统中进行，无环境释放风险，符合GRAS（公认安全）标准。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在SHIME®系统中，L. plantarum 73a与B. animalis subsp. lactis INL1联合使用显著提高了肥胖儿童粪便微生物群的α多样性，降低了与炎症相关的变形菌门（Proteobacteria）丰度，特别是Escherichia、Shigella和Clostridium_sensu_stricto_1等有害菌属。L. plantarum 73a单独使用即可显著减少氨的产生，且在停用一周后仍能持续存在，表明其良好的定植能力。这些变化提示该菌群组合在调节肠道微生态、减轻慢性炎症和改善代谢功能方面具有潜在的预防和管理儿童肥胖的疗效。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 5.5–6.5; tolerant to bile salts; utilizes glycogen; grows in both aerobic and anaerobic conditions
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time not specified; in vitro growth supported by milk-based medium; in vivo colonization observed after oral intake
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Vaginal mucosa, particularly in the context of bacterial vaginosis (BV) recovery
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of pathogenic anaerobes (e.g., Gardnerella vaginalis); promotes dominance of beneficial lactobacilli; symbiotic with host epithelium
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to gastric acidity, bile salts, and moderate osmotic stress; stable during refrigerated storage (2–6°C); shelf life up to 20 days
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Bile salt tolerance (L. gasseri, L. rhamnosus); glycogen utilization (L. crispatus, L. jensenii); acid resistance (all strains)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该菌群为从健康孕妇阴道中分离的乳杆菌，具有良好的酸化能力、过氧化氢产生能力、胆盐耐受性和对病原体的抑制能力。在体外可于37°C、pH 5.5–6.5条件下生长，能耐受胃酸和胆盐，可在阴道黏膜定植并恢复微生态平衡。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Not applicable (natural strains, no genetic modification reported)
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High chromosomal stability; no plasmids reported; no evidence of genetic drift in clinical use
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in dairy matrix (yoghurt); maintains viability during refrigerated storage and transport
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 未进行基因工程改造，所有菌株均为天然分离株，通过筛选获得其在阴道微环境中定植和抑制病原体的能力。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): FNR promoter (hypoxia sensing); glycogen utilization pathways (L. crispatus, L. jensenii)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Constitutive expression; no inducible logic gates reported; threshold-based colonization via nutrient sensing
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 菌株通过感知阴道环境中的pH变化和糖原可用性来启动定植和代谢活动，主要依赖于其天然的代谢适应性，而非人工设计的逻辑电路。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Constitutive secretion (lactic acid, H₂O₂, bacteriocins)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent via oral intake (2×125g/day); controlled by product formulation and consumption schedule
E_material_match (材料匹配性): High compatibility with dairy matrix (yoghurt); stable during encapsulation and refrigerated storage
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): 通过产生乳酸和过氧化氢（H₂O₂）降低阴道pH，抑制病原体生长；直接抑制Gardnerella vaginalis、Candida等病原体；破坏生物膜结构。
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 临床试验显示，服用含该菌群的酸奶后，Amsel评分和Nugent评分显著下降，BV治愈率从35.3%提升至100%，且无严重不良反应，表明其抗菌活性可控且局部安全。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): 通过调节阴道微环境pH和抑制病原体，间接减轻炎症反应；促进免疫稳态恢复。
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): 通过恢复阴道正常菌群和pH环境，促进上皮屏障修复，减少炎症损伤，改善黏膜完整性。
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): 未报告代谢物调节功能。
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): No genetic kill switches; reliance on natural attenuation and host-specific colonization
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): No pathogenicity reported; no antibiotic resistance genes detected; no horizontal gene transfer risk; low opportunistic risk in healthy individuals
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Physical confinement in yoghurt matrix; limited survival in non-host environments
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 所有菌株均来源于健康孕妇阴道，经安全性评估（无β-溶血、无黏液降解酶、无糖苷酶活性），符合GRAS标准，无致病性、无耐药基因，且在非阴道环境中定植能力弱，安全性高。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 口服含该四株乳杆菌的酸奶4周后，治疗组17例BV患者中17例（100%）在Amsel标准下痊愈，对照组仅6例（35.3%）痊愈（P=0.018）；Nugent评分从平均7.06降至2.44，症状（分泌物、鱼腥味）显著改善，阴道pH显著下降，表明其在恢复阴道微生态平衡和治疗细菌性阴道病方面具有显著疗效。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 5.5–6.5; tolerates bile salts and gastric acid; requires carbohydrate sources such as lactose or starch
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~60–90 minutes in vitro; growth rate consistent with in vivo conditions in intestinal environment
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Intestinal mucosa, particularly colon and small intestine
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competes with pathogenic bacteria; promotes symbiosis with host microbiota; enhances colonization resistance against pathogens
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Resistant to gastric acid, bile salts, and moderate osmotic stress; stable during lyophilization and rehydration
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Cell wall components, exopolysaccharides, and acid tolerance systems
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 乳酸杆菌属（Lactobacillus spp.）为兼性厌氧菌，可在37°C、pH 5.5–6.5条件下良好生长，对胃酸和胆汁具有较强耐受性，依赖乳糖、淀粉等碳源进行代谢。其在体外生长速率与体内肠道环境一致，能有效定植于肠道黏膜，与宿主微生物群形成共生关系，抑制病原菌定植，增强肠道屏障功能。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Not specified
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): Not specified
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Not specified
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 该系统未涉及基因工程改造，其功能主要依赖于天然生理特性，如产乳酸、黏附肠上皮细胞及调节免疫反应，无需外源基因调控。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): FNR promoter, Lactate receptor, Bile acid sensor
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Threshold-based response to pH and lactate; potential AND gate between lactose availability and low pH
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 乳酸杆菌通过感知肠道内的pH值、乳酸浓度、葡萄糖水平及胆汁酸等信号，启动代谢适应性反应。其对乳糖和抗性淀粉的利用具有选择性，可能通过pH与乳酸浓度的协同作用形成AND逻辑门，实现对肠道微环境的精准响应。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Type I secretion system, vesicle release
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent effect; activity regulated by natural growth and persistence in gut
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with food matrices such as dairy, fermented products, and encapsulated delivery systems
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Produces lactic acid and bacteriocins that inhibit pathogenic bacteria and prevent biofilm formation on intestinal mucosa
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 乳酸杆菌通过产酸和产生细菌素有效抑制常见肠道病原体（如沙门氏菌、大肠杆菌），并抑制生物膜形成，同时在正常剂量下对宿主细胞无显著毒性，且定植于肠道黏膜，局部作用明确。
E_B_crit_evidence (标准B_依据): 未涉及氧气生成机制，因此不适用。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Modulates immune response by enhancing IgA production, promoting regulatory T cells, and reducing pro-inflammatory cytokines
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): Secreted exopolysaccharides, surface proteins (e.g., p40, p75)
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Enhances epithelial barrier function, promotes mucosal healing, and stimulates collagen synthesis via growth factor induction
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Ferments resistant starch and non-starch polysaccharides into short-chain fatty acids (SCFAs) such as butyrate, propionate, and acetate
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Auxotrophy (e.g., vitamin dependency), natural attenuation in gut
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no known antibiotic resistance genes; minimal risk of horizontal gene transfer; no environmental escape due to gut-specific adaptation
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Physical confinement in food matrix limits systemic spread
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 乳酸杆菌属菌株被广泛认为是GRAS（公认安全）级微生物，无致病性，不携带抗生素抗性基因，且在肠道环境中自然衰减，不会在环境中长期存活。其在食品基质中的物理封装进一步限制了系统性传播风险，安全性高。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在儿童急性胃肠炎、抗生素相关性腹泻及过敏性疾病预防中显示出显著疗效，可缩短病程、改善肠道菌群结构、增强黏膜屏障功能，促进免疫耐受建立，具有良好的临床转化潜力。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): 37°C, anaerobic conditions, MRS broth, pH 6.5–7.0
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~1.5–2 h in vitro; growth maintained under simulated gastrointestinal conditions
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Intestinal lumen, colon
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of pathogenic bacteria; potential symbiosis with host microbiota
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): High acid and bile tolerance; resistant to lyophilization and storage at -20°C
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Cell envelope proteins, stress response regulators (e.g., Hsp, DnaK)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该研究中分离的乳酸菌和双歧杆菌均表现出良好的生长能力，可在37°C、厌氧条件下在MRS培养基中生长。其生长生理特性包括对酸和胆盐的耐受性，尤其在食品来源菌株（FIS）中表现更优，表明其在胃肠道环境中具有较强的生存能力。
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 本研究未涉及基因工程改造，所有菌株均为天然分离株，未进行人工遗传修饰。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): FNR-like regulators (putative), bile salt hydrolase (BSH) promoters
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No logic gates; response is strain-dependent and concentration-dependent
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 菌株对酸和胆盐的耐受性及胆固醇吸收能力具有显著的菌株依赖性，未观察到明确的逻辑调控机制，响应主要由环境浓度和菌株固有特性决定。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Passive diffusion, cell lysis (in vitro)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Strain-dependent; not controllable in this study
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with MRS broth; no material encapsulation used
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): 通过体外胆固醇吸收实验，证明部分菌株可有效摄取胆固醇，降低培养基中胆固醇浓度，从而调节宿主脂质代谢。
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (natural strains, no kill-switches)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no evidence of horizontal gene transfer; low risk of environmental escape
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): None (no physical barrier used)
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 所研究的菌株均为食品来源或参考菌株，属于公认安全（GRAS）类别，无致病性记录，未检测到抗生素抗性基因，且在体外实验中未观察到基因水平转移风险，整体生物安全风险极低。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在体外实验中，食品来源菌株（FIS）表现出更高的酸和胆盐耐受性，且胆固醇吸收率显著高于参考菌株（RS）。其中，L. acidophilus（FIS 5）的胆固醇吸收率最高，达54.26%（0.2% oxgall），L. fermentum（FIS 6）在0.4% oxgall下达到57.65%。这些结果表明，特定菌株具有潜在的降胆固醇功能，可作为功能性食品或补充剂的候选菌株。

composition (组成成分): [{"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus spp.", "strain_id": "Multiple species (e.g., L. acidophilus, L. rhamnosus, L. casei)"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Bifidobacterium spp.", "strain_id": "Multiple species (e.g., B. longum, B. breve, B. infantis)"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Streptococcus thermophilus", "strain_id": "Strain in VSL#3"}]
C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 6.0–7.0; tolerates gastric acidity (pH 2–3) transiently; requires fermentable carbohydrates (e.g., lactose, glucose) as carbon sources; dependent on host-derived nutrients in gut environment
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~60–90 min in vitro; in vivo colonization is transient without continuous intake; requires daily consumption to maintain detectable populations
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gut mucosa (colonic epithelium), particularly in the large intestine; preferentially adheres to mucus layer and epithelial surfaces
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of pathogenic bacteria (e.g., C. difficile); synergistic interactions with resident microbiota; modulates immune tolerance via dendritic cell crosstalk
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Moderate tolerance to bile salts and low pH; limited survival under prolonged drying or UV exposure; stable during refrigerated storage but sensitive to lyophilization without cryoprotectants
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Bile salts (tolerance mediated by bile salt hydrolase enzymes)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 乳酸杆菌和双歧杆菌为兼性厌氧菌，可在37°C、pH 6.0–7.0条件下生长，能耐受胃酸短暂冲击，依赖宿主肠道中的碳水化合物（如乳糖、葡萄糖）作为碳源。在体内需持续摄入以维持可检测的定植水平，主要定植于结肠黏膜表面和黏液层，通过竞争排斥病原体并调节免疫耐受来发挥功能。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Not specified (natural strains used; no genetic modification reported)
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High chromosomal stability; no plasmid-based systems reported; minimal metabolic burden; long-term in vivo consistency not assessed
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): No engineered material coupling; natural strains used in oral formulations
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 未进行基因工程改造，使用天然菌株（如Lactobacillus、Bifidobacterium和Streptococcus thermophilus）通过其固有免疫调节能力发挥作用，无需外源调控系统。
S_microbial_signals (微生物信号): ["Quorum sensing molecules (AHL, AI-2) – inferred from commensal interactions"]
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Toll-like receptors (TLR2, TLR4, TLR9) on epithelial and dendritic cells; bacterial cell wall components (e.g., peptidoglycan, lipoteichoic acid) as ligands
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Threshold-based activation: microbial ligands trigger TLR signaling only above a certain concentration; feedback inhibition via IL-10 production suppresses excessive inflammation
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 肠道上皮细胞和树突状细胞通过Toll样受体感知细菌成分（如肽聚糖、脂磷壁酸），当信号强度超过阈值时启动免疫应答。同时，双歧杆菌等菌株诱导IL-10分泌，形成负反馈回路，抑制过度炎症反应，维持免疫稳态。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Natural secretion of immunomodulatory molecules (e.g., cytokines, cell wall components); no engineered secretion systems reported
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent effects; daily intake required to maintain colonization; efficacy linked to consumption level (10^8–10^10 CFU/day)
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with oral formulations (capsules, powders); not encapsulated in advanced materials; limited data on matrix compatibility
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Probiotic bacteria modulate dendritic cell (DC) phenotype and function, promoting anti-inflammatory responses via IL-10 production and suppressing Th1/Th17 polarization. Lactobacilli skew T cells toward Th1/Tc1 polarization (IFN-γ secretion), while bifidobacteria enhance IL-10 and reduce CD80 expression.
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Natural attenuation; no kill-switches or auxotrophy reported
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; minimal risk of horizontal gene transfer; no environmental escape due to dependence on host environment
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Oral delivery provides physical barrier; no engineered containment
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 所用菌株（如乳酸杆菌、双歧杆菌、嗜热链球菌）均属公认安全（GRAS）类别，无致病性，不携带抗生素抗性基因，依赖宿主环境生存，难以在环境中长期存活，风险极低。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 临床证据显示，特定益生菌株可有效治疗儿童感染性腹泻、复发性艰难梭菌感染及术后回肠袋炎（I级证据）；在溃疡性结肠炎和克罗恩病中具有II级证据支持。其机制通过调节树突状细胞功能，诱导IL-10分泌，抑制Th1反应，从而改善肠道免疫稳态，具有系统性免疫调节作用。
