C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 6.5–7.0, in nutrient-rich media; tolerant to intestinal pH and bile salts
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~1–2 hours in vitro; in vivo stability not assessed
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gut mucosa, intestinal lumen
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of pathogenic bacteria; potential symbiosis with host microbiota
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Heat-killed in study; tolerance to gastric acid and bile not explicitly tested
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Heat (80°C, 30 min)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该复合益生菌由多种乳酸杆菌和双歧杆菌组成，具有在肠道环境中定植的能力，其生长依赖于营养丰富的培养基，对胃酸和胆汁具有一定的耐受性，但未在文中明确测试。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Not applicable (killed by heat)
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): Not applicable (heat-killed)
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Not applicable
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 该益生菌复合物经80°C加热30分钟灭活，未进行基因改造，因此不具备可编程性。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Not specified (natural sensing mechanisms of probiotics)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Not applicable
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 该系统未进行基因工程改造，依赖于天然微生物对宿主微环境的响应，无逻辑控制模块。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Not applicable (killed cells)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Oral administration at fixed dose (50 mg/kg probiotic complex, 1 mg/kg zinc, 5 mg/kg CoQ10)
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Suspension in PBS; compatible with oral delivery
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Not applicable (killed in study)
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 无抗菌活性证据，因益生菌已灭活。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): 通过调节Th17/Treg平衡，抑制促炎因子（IL-17, IL-6, TNF-α）表达，促进抗炎因子（IL-10）分泌，从而减轻自身免疫性关节炎。
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Not applicable
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): 通过调节肠道菌群代谢产物，影响宿主免疫代谢，可能涉及短链脂肪酸（SCFAs）等代谢物的调节。
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Heat-killed (no viable cells)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): No pathogenicity reported; no antibiotic resistance genes mentioned; no horizontal gene transfer risk due to inactivation; low environmental escape risk
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Physical barrier not required (non-viable)
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 该益生菌复合物经高温灭活，无活菌存在，因此无生物安全风险，符合GRAS（公认安全）标准。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 该复合物显著减轻了胶原诱导性关节炎（CIA）小鼠的关节炎症、骨破坏和软骨损伤，降低了血清IgG、IgG1和IgG2a水平，抑制了Th17细胞分化，促进了Treg细胞分化，调节了Th17/Treg平衡，从而有效缓解了自身免疫性关节炎。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): 37°C, pH 7.0, anaerobic conditions (80% N₂, 10% CO₂, 10% H₂), growth in RCM-cys broth with l-cysteine hydrochloride monohydrate
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Stationary phase reached at 15 h, cell concentration of 9 log CFU/mL
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Lower gastrointestinal tract (targeted delivery to intestinal environment)
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Supports beneficial gut microbiota; synergistic with prebiotic fructooligosaccharides (FOS)
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): High tolerance to simulated gastric juice (pH 2.0), withstands osmotic stress and drying during encapsulation
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Pea protein isolate–alginate matrix
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Bifidobacterium adolescentis is a strict anaerobe that grows optimally at 37°C under anaerobic conditions. It reaches stationary phase within 15 hours with a cell concentration of 9 log CFU/mL. The strain demonstrates strong survival under simulated gastric conditions due to protection by the pea protein–alginate capsule, indicating robust stress tolerance. It is designed for delivery to the lower gastrointestinal tract where it can exert probiotic effects.
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): The microbial system is not genetically modified. The Bifidobacterium adolescentis strain is used in its native form, with no reported genetic engineering or synthetic circuits. The system relies on physical encapsulation for protection and controlled release rather than programmable genetic circuits.
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): No engineered sensing modules or logic gates are present. The system relies on passive release triggered by environmental conditions (pH and enzymatic degradation) rather than active signal detection or processing.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Passive release via matrix degradation (proteolysis and ion exchange)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Controlled by capsule size, matrix composition, and release kinetics (burst + prolonged release)
E_material_match (材料匹配性): High compatibility with pea protein–alginate matrix; release triggered by Na⁺ and proteases in SIF
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Not applicable – no antibacterial mechanism is engineered or reported.
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 该系统未设计抗菌功能，因此不满足抗菌标准。
E_B_mechanism_desc (产氧机制描述): Not applicable – no oxygenation mechanism is present.
E_B_crit_evidence (标准B_依据): 该系统未涉及氧气生成或氧合功能，因此不满足氧合标准。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Not applicable – no immunomodulatory factors are secreted.
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Not applicable – no tissue repair factors are produced.
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Bifidobacterium adolescentis metabolizes fructooligosaccharides (FOS) to produce short-chain fatty acids (SCFAs), which regulate host metabolism and support gut health.
E_F_mechanism_desc (肿瘤治疗描述): Not applicable – no tumor-targeting or prodrug conversion mechanisms are present.
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (native strain, no kill-switch or auxotrophy reported)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; non-opportunistic; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no horizontal gene transfer risk; safe for human consumption
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Physical barrier provided by pea protein–alginate capsule prevents environmental escape
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Bifidobacterium adolescentis ATCC 15703 is a well-characterized, non-pathogenic probiotic strain classified as BSL-1. It is GRAS (Generally Recognized As Safe) and poses minimal risk. The pea protein–alginate capsule acts as a physical barrier, preventing microbial escape into the environment. No genetic modifications or antibiotic resistance markers are present, reducing biosafety concerns.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 胶囊在模拟胃液（pH 2.0）中保护Bifidobacterium adolescentis，2小时内仅减少1个对数单位（从10⁹降至10⁸ CFU/mL），显著优于游离细胞。在模拟肠液中实现爆发式释放（约5.5 log CFU/mL）和持续释放（1.5小时内达到约7 log CFU/mL），表明其具有良好的靶向递送能力。该系统可有效保护益生菌通过胃酸屏障，并在肠道中释放，支持肠道健康，适用于功能性食品和宠物饲料。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Grown in BHI broth at 37°C under aerobic conditions; supports growth in both aerobic and anaerobic microenvironments within biofilms.
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Growth rate not explicitly quantified; grown overnight in BHI at 37°C with shaking.
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Oral cavity (specifically in biofilm-forming environments with aerobic surface and anaerobic core)
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competes with pathogens (e.g., P. gingivalis, F. nucleatum, T. denticola); promotes commensal bacteria (e.g., Neisseria flava, Lactobacillus) while suppressing pathogenic species.
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Not explicitly reported; however, stability in biofilm matrix and resistance to host immune factors inferred from in vitro persistence.
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Nisin (confers protection against competing pathogens)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该菌株为兼性厌氧菌，可在37°C的BHI培养基中生长，适用于口腔生物膜的微环境，其表面为有氧区，内部为厌氧区。在生物膜形成过程中，该菌株能有效抑制病原体定植并促进健康菌群恢复。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Not explicitly modified; nisin production is native to the strain (L. lactis sp. lactis).
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High (native nisin production stable across experiments; no evidence of loss).
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable within oral biofilm matrix; maintains function during biofilm formation and disruption.
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 该菌株为天然产乳酸菌素（nisin）的菌株，无需基因改造即可持续表达nisin，其遗传稳定性高，可在生物膜环境中保持功能活性。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): FNR promoter (inferred from oxygen sensing in L. lactis; not explicitly stated but contextually relevant)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Constitutive expression; no dynamic logic gates reported.
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 该系统为组成型表达，nisin的产生不依赖于外部信号，而是持续释放，因此不具备响应性逻辑控制，但其在生物膜中可稳定发挥抗菌作用。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Constitutive secretion (naturally secreted nisin via cell lysis or membrane permeabilization)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): CFU-dependent (dose-dependent inhibition observed); not externally controllable.
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with oral biofilm matrix; maintains activity without structural collapse.
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Nisin-producing L. lactis inhibits both biofilm formation and disruption of pre-formed biofilms by killing pathogenic bacteria.
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): nisin对多种口腔病原体（如P. gingivalis、F. nucleatum、T. denticola）具有抑制作用，且对人源口腔细胞无细胞毒性，同时在生物膜中保持局部活性，不破坏基质结构。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): By reducing pathogen load and restoring microbial diversity, the system indirectly modulates host immune response.
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Restoration of healthy biofilm diversity and structure supports natural tissue homeostasis and repair.
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Not reported.
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (natural strain, no synthetic kill switches or auxotrophy reported).
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no evidence of horizontal gene transfer; environmental escape unlikely due to natural habitat.
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Physical confinement within biofilm matrix limits dispersal.
B_risk_desc (风险描述): L. lactis为公认安全（GRAS）菌株，天然存在于口腔和肠道中，无致病性，不携带抗生素抗性基因，且在生物膜中被物理限制，逃逸风险极低。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 该nisin产生产物能有效抑制口腔生物膜的形成与破坏，显著降低病原体（如P. gingivalis、F. nucleatum、T. denticola）水平，并将生物膜多样性恢复至健康对照水平，促进健康菌群重建，改善口腔微生态平衡。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 6.0–7.0; utilizes glucose and other carbohydrates as carbon sources; requires no specific vitamins beyond standard growth media
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~1.5–2 hours in vitro; in vivo colonization observed in infant gut within 3 months of administration
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gut mucosa, particularly in the small intestine and colon of infants
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of pathogenic bacteria such as Staphylococcus aureus; promotes symbiosis with Bifidobacterium and other commensals; no significant disruption of native microbiota reported
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Moderate tolerance to gastric acid and bile; survives lyophilization and rehydration; stable during storage at 4°C for up to 12 months
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Cell wall components (e.g., teichoic acids), acid tolerance response (ATR) genes
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Lactobacillus rhamnosus HN001 is a facultative anaerobe capable of surviving in the human gastrointestinal tract. It grows optimally at body temperature and neutral pH, utilizing available sugars for energy. It demonstrates strong colonization potential in the infant gut, particularly during early life, and maintains stability under standard storage conditions. Its ability to persist in the gut mucosa contributes to its immunomodulatory effects.
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): None (natural strain, not genetically modified)
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High chromosomal stability; no plasmid-based systems used; no evidence of genetic drift in clinical trials
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in oral formulations (capsules, powders); maintains viability in food matrices (e.g., milk, formula)
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): Lactobacillus rhamnosus HN001 is used in its natural, unmodified form. No genetic engineering was performed. Its beneficial effects are attributed to intrinsic biological properties rather than synthetic circuits. The strain is administered as a live microbial supplement without engineered regulatory systems.
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): FNR promoter (hypoxia), Lactate permease (lactate sensing), Bile salt hydrolase (bile sensing)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No engineered logic gates; natural sensing with threshold responses to environmental cues (e.g., acid resistance at low pH)
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): Lactobacillus rhamnosus HN001 naturally senses changes in gut environment such as pH, bile, and nutrient availability. It activates acid tolerance mechanisms in low pH conditions and utilizes lactate and other metabolites as signals for metabolic adaptation. It responds to host-derived cytokines and microbial quorum signals, enabling integration of host and microbial cues. These responses are not programmable but are inherent to its physiology.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Constitutive secretion of immunomodulatory molecules (e.g., cytokines, metabolites); no engineered secretion systems
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent effect; administered once daily; efficacy observed at 10^9 CFU/day
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with oral formulations (capsules, powders, infant formula); stable in gastrointestinal environment
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Not applicable
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 无
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Modulates immune response by increasing IL-10 and IFN-γ production, promoting T-regulatory cell expansion, and reducing IgE levels. In pigs, it reduced skin and respiratory allergic reactions to Ascaris allergens.
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Promotes epithelial barrier integrity and reduces inflammation in the gut and skin. Associated with improved skin condition in infants with eczema.
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Not applicable
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (natural strain, no kill-switches or auxotrophy)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Non-pathogenic; no reports of bacteremia or systemic infection; no antibiotic resistance genes detected; low risk of horizontal gene transfer; no environmental escape concerns
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Oral delivery limits systemic exposure; gastrointestinal transit prevents long-term colonization
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Lactobacillus rhamnosus HN001 is classified as Generally Recognized As Safe (GRAS). It is non-invasive, non-pathogenic, and has a long history of safe use in food and supplements. No adverse events were reported in clinical trials. Its natural presence in the human gut and lack of genetic modifications minimize biosafety risks.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在新西兰和芬兰的临床试验中，L. rhamnosus HN001 显著降低了婴儿湿疹的累积发病率（2岁前为14.8% vs 26.8%），并在4岁时仍显示对湿疹和过敏性结膜炎的长期保护作用。在芬兰研究中，联合使用 L. rhamnosus 和 B. longum 的母亲所生婴儿湿疹风险显著降低（OR 0.17）。这些结果表明，该菌株在预防早期过敏性疾病方面具有显著的临床效果。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 6.0–7.0; utilizes glucose and other carbohydrates; no specific vitamin requirements beyond standard media
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~1.5–2 hours in vitro; colonization observed in infant gut within 3 months
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gut mucosa, particularly in the small intestine and colon
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competes with pathogens like S. aureus; promotes symbiosis with Bifidobacterium; no significant microbiome disruption reported
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to gastric acid and bile; stable during lyophilization and storage at 4°C for up to 12 months
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Teichoic acids, acid tolerance response (ATR) genes
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Lactobacillus rhamnosus GG is a facultative anaerobe with strong survival in the gastrointestinal tract. It grows well at body temperature and neutral pH, using available sugars. It colonizes the infant gut effectively and maintains stability during storage and transit through the stomach.
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): None (natural strain)
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High chromosomal stability; no plasmid loss; no genetic drift observed
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in oral formulations and infant formula
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): L. rhamnosus GG is used in its natural form without genetic modification. Its effects are due to intrinsic biological properties, not engineered circuits.
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): FNR promoter, lactate permease, bile salt hydrolase
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Natural sensing with threshold responses; no synthetic logic gates
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): L. rhamnosus GG senses environmental cues such as pH, bile, and metabolites. It activates acid resistance and bile tolerance mechanisms. It responds to host cytokines and microbial signals, enabling integration of immune and microbial signals. These responses are innate, not engineered.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Constitutive secretion of immunomodulatory molecules
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): 10^9 CFU/day; administered during pregnancy and early infancy
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with oral supplements and infant formula; stable in gastrointestinal environment
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Not applicable
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 无
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Increases IL-10 and IL-12p70 levels; promotes Th1-type immune response; reduces IgE production. In mothers, it improved allergic symptoms and altered serum cytokine profiles.
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Not applicable
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Not applicable
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Non-pathogenic; no antibiotic resistance genes; no HGT risk; no systemic infections reported
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Oral delivery limits systemic exposure
B_risk_desc (风险描述): L. rhamnosus GG is GRAS and has been safely used in infants and pregnant women. No adverse events were reported in clinical trials. Its natural origin and lack of genetic modification ensure low biosafety risk.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在澳大利亚和台湾的研究中，L. rhamnosus GG 对婴儿湿疹的预防效果未达统计学显著性（18% vs 19%），但在母亲中观察到过敏症状改善和Th1型免疫调节。这表明其免疫调节作用可能在母体中更明显，而对婴儿湿疹的直接预防效果有限。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal at 37°C, pH 6.0–7.0; requires lactose and other carbohydrates; B. longum requires specific prebiotics (e.g., GOS/FOS)
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): L. rhamnosus: doubling time ~1.5–2 h; B. longum: doubling time ~3–4 h; both colonize infant gut within 3 months
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gut mucosa, particularly colon and small intestine
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Synergistic interaction: L. rhamnosus produces lactate, which B. longum uses as carbon source; both inhibit pathogens like S. aureus; no competition observed
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): L. rhamnosus: acid/bile tolerant; B. longum: moderate acid tolerance; both stable during lyophilization
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Teichoic acids (L. rhamnosus), exopolysaccharides (B. longum)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): The consortium combines L. rhamnosus HN001 and B. longum, which exhibit complementary metabolic capabilities. L. rhamnosus produces lactate, which B. longum utilizes, enhancing mutual survival. Both strains colonize the infant gut and contribute to immune modulation. The combination shows enhanced stability and efficacy compared to single strains.
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): None
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High chromosomal stability; no plasmid loss; no drift observed in trials
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in oral formulations; compatible with prebiotic-enriched matrices
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): The consortium is administered as a natural mixture of two strains. No genetic engineering is involved. The synergy arises from natural metabolic interactions.
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): FNR promoter, lactate permease, GOS transporter (B. longum)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No engineered logic; natural signal integration via metabolic cross-feeding
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): The consortium senses environmental cues such as pH, bile, and metabolites. L. rhamnosus produces lactate, which B. longum uses as a carbon source, enabling cross-feeding. Both respond to host cytokines and microbial signals. This natural synergy enhances immune modulation and colonization.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Constitutive secretion of immunomodulatory molecules; cross-feeding enhances metabolic output
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Administered once daily; dose not adjusted for individual strain
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with oral supplements and prebiotic-enriched formulas
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Not applicable
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 无
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Synergistic increase in IL-10 and IFN-γ; enhanced T-regulatory cell expansion; reduced IgE. In Finnish trials, risk of eczema reduced by 83% (OR 0.17).
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Promotes gut and skin barrier integrity; reduces inflammation; associated with lower eczema severity.
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Not applicable
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Non-pathogenic; no antibiotic resistance genes; no HGT risk; no systemic infections reported
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Oral delivery limits systemic exposure
B_risk_desc (风险描述): The consortium is composed of two GRAS strains with no genetic modifications. No safety concerns were reported in clinical trials. The combination is safe and well-tolerated in pregnant and lactating women and infants.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在芬兰的双盲随机对照试验中，母亲在孕晚期至哺乳期服用 L. rhamnosus 和 B. longum 的联合制剂，显著降低了婴儿湿疹的累积发病率（OR 0.17），且对慢性湿疹也有显著保护作用。该结果表明，菌株间的协同作用可增强免疫调节和屏障修复效果，优于单一菌株。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C; pH and osmotic tolerance not explicitly stated, but survives in simulated gastrointestinal conditions.
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Not explicitly quantified; viability maintained at ~10^7 CFU/g after 8-week storage at 4°C.
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Intestinal tract (specifically colon, based on DSS colitis model and cecal microbiota analysis)
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Restores lactobacillus-to-coliform ratio in cecum; suggests competitive colonization and modulation of gut microbiota balance.
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): High tolerance to freeze-drying, heat (75°C for 1 min), simulated gastric fluid (pH 2.0), and bile salts.
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Skim milk powder (cryoprotectant), sodium alginate, gellan gum (structural protection)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Lactobacillus kefiranofaciens M1 is a lactic acid bacterium capable of surviving in the harsh gastrointestinal environment, including low pH, bile salts, and temperature fluctuations. Encapsulation significantly enhances its stability during freeze-drying and storage, maintaining high viability (10^7 CFU/g) after 8 weeks at 4°C. It is well-suited for intestinal colonization and exhibits robust growth physiology under simulated in vivo conditions.
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): No genetic modifications reported; natural strain stability preserved through encapsulation.
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Encapsulation matrix (alginate-gellan-skim milk) enhances survival and stability of the native strain in material environment.
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): No genetic engineering was performed. The strain was naturally encapsulated using a mixture of sodium alginate, gellan gum, and skim milk powder, followed by direct freeze-drying. This physical encapsulation strategy preserves viability and function without altering the genome.
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Not specified; likely intrinsic to L. kefiranofaciens M1 (e.g., membrane transporters, stress response regulators).
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No engineered logic circuits; natural response to environmental stressors.
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): The strain naturally senses and responds to low pH and bile salts in the gastrointestinal tract, which are key signals for gut colonization. Its survival under these conditions is attributed to the protective encapsulation, not engineered sensing circuits.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Passive release from microcapsules upon exposure to intestinal conditions (pH, enzymes, bile).
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Controlled by encapsulation dose and release kinetics; no active dosage regulation reported.
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Highly compatible with alginate-gellan-skim milk matrix; microcapsules maintain structural integrity and allow controlled release.
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Modulates immune response by suppressing pro-inflammatory cytokines and enhancing anti-inflammatory cytokines via TLR2-dependent pathway.
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): TLR2-dependent signaling pathway (involves CCL-20 and anti-inflammatory cytokines)
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Restores intestinal barrier function, reduces mucosal permeability, and attenuates tissue damage in colitis.
E_D_repair_material (修复因子_相关物质): Intestinal barrier integrity, mucosal repair via TLR2 signaling
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Natural strain with no engineered kill switches; relies on encapsulation and natural attenuation.
B_containment_material (生物安全_相关物质): None (no synthetic kill-switches or auxotrophy reported)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes or HGT risk reported. Safe for human consumption.
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Physical barrier provided by microcapsule matrix prevents escape and enhances targeted delivery.
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Lactobacillus kefiranofaciens M1 is a GRAS (Generally Recognized As Safe) probiotic strain. No genetic modifications were made, and the encapsulation process enhances safety by protecting the strain during processing and delivery. The material barrier prevents environmental escape and ensures localized action in the gut.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): Encapsulated M1 significantly reduced bleeding score and inflammatory score in DSS-induced colitis mouse model. Histological analysis showed marked improvement in mucosal architecture and reduced inflammatory infiltrate. The strain restored lactobacillus-to-coliform ratio in the cecum, indicating successful modulation of gut microbiota. These results confirm that encapsulation preserves the anti-colitis activity of M1, making it a promising candidate for therapeutic use in inflammatory bowel disease.

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Temperature: Room temperature (20–25 °C), pH: ~7.4 (TAP medium), Osmotic: Physiological (TAP medium), Nutrition: Autotrophic (light-dependent), requires CO₂ and inorganic nutrients
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time: ~12 h (in vitro), growth rate: OD₆₈₀ 0.25–0.5 used for coating; in vivo consistency not assessed
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Not applicable (in vitro model system; potential for tumor microenvironment via light-guided delivery)
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Not applicable (non-microbial system; algal cells not part of host microbiome)
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): High tolerance to centrifugation (300×g, 1.5 min), UV light (used for drug release), and lyophilization (implied by stability over 24 h in suspension)
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Chitosan coating provides mechanical and chemical protection
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 本研究中使用的Chlamydomonas reinhardtii为单细胞绿藻，具有光合自养特性，可在室温下以12小时左右的倍增时间生长。其细胞壁带负电荷，可通过静电作用与带正电的壳聚糖结合，形成稳定涂层。该藻类在TAP培养基中生长良好，对离心和短期UV照射具有较强耐受性，且在24小时内涂层保持稳定，表明其在体外环境中具有良好的物理稳定性。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): None (non-genetically modified organism)
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): Not applicable (no plasmid or chromosomal integration)
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): High stability in chitosan–nanoparticle matrix; coating remains intact during 24 h incubation
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 本系统未对Chlamydomonas reinhardtii进行基因改造，而是通过非共价静电相互作用将壳聚糖包覆的氧化铁纳米颗粒（CSIONPs）均匀地组装在藻细胞壁表面。该策略无需基因工程，仅依赖天然电荷差异实现高效包覆，制造效率高达约90%。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Photoreceptors (e.g., channelrhodopsin-like proteins) in flagella
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Linear phototaxis response within 1–3 min; no complex logic gates; directional steering based on light gradient
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): Chlamydomonas reinhardtii具有快速光趋性响应能力，可在1–3分钟内对可见光刺激做出反应。通过控制光照方向，可实现对藻类的定向引导，使其向光源移动。该系统利用天然光感应机制，无需人工逻辑电路，实现简单而高效的环境响应。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Non-covalent coating with nanoparticles; drug release via photocleavage
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Controlled by light exposure duration and intensity (UV 365 nm); on-demand release with spatiotemporal precision
E_material_match (材料匹配性): High compatibility with chitosan–nanoparticle matrix; coating does not disrupt gel-like structure or cause gas production
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Not applicable
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 无
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Not applicable
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Not applicable
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Not applicable
E_F_mechanism_desc (肿瘤治疗描述): On-demand delivery of doxorubicin (DOX) to SK-BR-3 breast cancer cells via light-triggered release from photocleavable linker on CSIONPs
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (no kill-switch or auxotrophy implemented)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; non-toxic to mammalian cells; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no horizontal gene transfer risk (non-genetically modified); low environmental escape risk due to non-native habitat
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Physical confinement via encapsulation in chitosan–nanoparticle layer; prevents free release of algal cells
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Chlamydomonas reinhardtii为非致病性绿藻，被广泛用于实验室研究，具有GRAS（公认安全）属性。本系统未进行基因改造，无抗生素抗性基因，且通过壳聚糖-纳米颗粒涂层实现物理封装，有效防止细胞逃逸。在体外实验中未观察到细胞毒性，表明其生物安全性良好。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在体外实验中，经UV光照射后，生物杂交微藻成功将阿霉素（DOX）递送至SK-BR-3乳腺癌细胞，并观察到明显的细胞内化现象。该系统实现了高效率（约90%）的制造，保持了藻类的运动性和光趋性，且在24小时内涂层稳定，为靶向肿瘤治疗提供了高效、可控的微机器人平台。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Growth at 37°C, pH 7.0 (buffer), in MRS medium; resistant to bile salts and low pH (in vitro); survives pelleting process (55–60°C for 30–40 s)
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Anaerobic overnight growth at 37°C; doubling time not specified; viable cells detected in feces for up to 6 days post-administration
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gastrointestinal tract (pig intestine), particularly in piglets; persists in feces after administration
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Inhibits Enterobacteriaceae; stimulates growth of endogenous lactobacilli; no significant disruption of native microbiota composition
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Resistant to freeze-drying, heat (pelleting process), bile salts, low pH (in vitro); survives lyophilization and rehydration
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Lyophilization (freeze-drying) and pelleting process (55–60°C, 30–40 s)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Lactobacillus plantarum 4.1 和 Lactobacillus reuteri 3S7 能在猪的胃肠道中存活并持续存在，具有耐受胆盐、低pH、热和冻干的能力。在饲喂后6天内仍可在粪便中检测到，表明其在猪肠道中具有良好的生存能力和持久性。
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 未对菌株进行基因工程改造，仅使用天然分离株进行饲喂试验。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Bile salt resistance and low pH tolerance (in vitro characterized, but specific receptor not identified)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): 未描述逻辑门控机制，无基因回路设计
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 未使用基因工程回路，无主动感知与逻辑处理能力。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Unknown (likely passive secretion of lactic acid and other metabolites)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Daily administration of ~10^10 CFU; activity correlates with dose and duration
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with pelleted feed; survives pelleting process (55–60°C, 30–40 s)
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): 通过抑制病原菌生长，降低 Enterobacteriaceae 数量，间接发挥抗菌作用
E_A_agent_material (抗菌因子_相关物质): Lactic acid (in vitro antimicrobial activity against E. coli and S. enterica)
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 在猪粪便中显著降低 Enterobacteriaceae（2–2.6 log cycles），且无组织损伤或炎症反应，表明活性可控且安全。
E_B_crit_evidence (标准B_依据): 未涉及氧气生成或氧合功能。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): 通过降低 β-葡萄糖醛酸酶活性，减少潜在致癌物的再激活，调节肠道微环境。
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): β-Glucuronidase inhibition (via competitive exclusion or metabolic interference)
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): 通过抑制 β-葡萄糖醛酸酶活性，调节肠道代谢环境，降低致癌风险。
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (no genetic kill-switch or auxotrophy introduced)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Non-pathogenic; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no horizontal gene transfer risk mentioned; low opportunistic risk
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Pelleted feed provides physical confinement during administration
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Lactobacillus plantarum 4.1 和 Lactobacillus reuteri 3S7 均为天然分离株，属于公认安全（GRAS）菌株，无致病性、无抗生素抗性基因，未进行基因改造，无逃逸风险，安全性高。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在猪中，L. plantarum 4.1 和 L. reuteri 3S7 能有效存活于胃肠道，持续6天以上；显著降低粪便中 Enterobacteriaceae 数量（2–2.6 log cycles）；降低 β-葡萄糖醛酸酶活性约23–43%；在猪仔中促进内源性乳酸菌增殖，表明其具有良好的肠道定植与调节功能。

composition (组成成分): [{"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus spp.", "strain_id": "Isolated from healthy C57BL/6 mice"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Bifidobacterium spp.", "strain_id": "Isolated from healthy C57BL/6 mice"}]
spatial_arrangement (空间排布): Encapsulated (in personalized probiotic biobank, administered orally)
C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Anaerobic conditions at 37°C; growth on MRS and BIM-25 media; requires L-cysteine for Bifidobacterium spp.
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time not specified; maintained at ≥8 log10 CFU/mL after 6h in simulated GI conditions
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gut mucosa, particularly in the colon; adapted to host-specific microbiota
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Symbiotic with host; competes with pathobionts; restores dysbiotic microbiota
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): High tolerance to low pH (pH 2.4), bile salts (10 g/L oxgall), and digestive enzymes (pepsin, pancreatin); survives simulated gastric and intestinal phases
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): L-cysteine (for Bifidobacterium spp.), anaerobic growth conditions
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该微生物系统由从健康小鼠粪便中分离的Lactobacillus和Bifidobacterium菌株组成，均为革兰氏阳性、过氧化氢酶阴性，能在厌氧条件下生长。其生长生理特性显示对胃酸、胆盐和消化酶具有高度耐受性，可在模拟胃肠环境中保持稳定存活，表明其具备良好的肠道定植潜力。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Colony-PCR and RAPD-PCR for preliminary identification; no genetic modification tools used
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High chromosomal stability; no plasmid-based systems used; strains maintained viability over time in biobank
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in oral delivery format (biobank storage and gavage administration)
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 本研究未对菌株进行基因工程改造，仅通过传统培养和分子鉴定方法筛选出具有潜在益生菌特性的菌株。所用菌株为宿主自身来源，具有天然的遗传稳定性，无需外源载体即可在肠道中定植。
S_host_signals (宿主信号): ["Inflammatory cytokines (IL-1β, IL-6, TGF-β, IL-10)", "Tissue damage markers (MPO, MDA)"]
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Natural host-microbe interaction; no engineered sensors used
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No synthetic logic gates; natural response to inflammatory environment
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 该系统依赖于宿主-微生物自然互作，通过感知肠道炎症微环境（如低pH、胆盐、炎症因子）触发免疫调节功能，无需人工设计的逻辑门控系统。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Natural secretion (e.g., SCFAs, antimicrobial peptides, cytokine modulation)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Oral gavage (daily, 0.1 mL, ~2.5 × 10^9 CFU); dose based on CFU counts
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with oral delivery and biobank storage; no encapsulation material described
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Not applicable (no direct antibacterial mechanism reported)
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 未报告抗菌或抗生物膜活性
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Modulates host immune response by decreasing pro-inflammatory cytokines (IL-1β, IL-6) and increasing anti-inflammatory cytokines (TGF-β, IL-10)
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): IL-10, TGF-β, IL-6, IL-1β (host cytokines modulated by microbial activity)
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Reduces colonic tissue damage, crypt destruction, and edema; promotes mucosal healing
E_D_repair_material (修复因子_相关物质): Mucosal barrier integrity, epithelial regeneration (indirectly via cytokine modulation)
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Not applicable (no specific metabolic regulation reported)
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (natural strains from host; no kill-switch or auxotrophy used)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes detected except aztreonam resistance; no HGT risk reported; low escape risk due to host-specific origin
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Oral delivery with natural gut colonization; no physical barrier used
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 该系统使用来自宿主自身的益生菌菌株，具有低致病性，且对多种抗生素敏感（除aztreonam外），无水平基因转移风险，宿主特异性降低了环境逃逸的可能性，整体安全性高。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 个性化益生菌组在DSS诱导结肠炎模型中显著降低疾病活动指数（DAI），减轻结肠组织病理损伤（组织学评分降低），并有效调节免疫反应：IL-1β和IL-6表达下降，TGF-β和IL-10表达上升。其疗效优于商业益生菌LGG，表明个性化益生菌在治疗肠道菌群失调相关疾病方面具有显著优势。

spatial_arrangement (空间排布): Encapsulated in diet (spray-dried, freeze-dried, or heat-killed forms)
C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Growth at 30°C on MRS medium; pH 7.0; requires peptone water for washing; viable in feed at -20°C storage
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time not specified; viable forms maintained at ~10^11 CFU/g in diet; no in vivo growth rate data provided
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Intestinal tract (gut), fecal matter, and rearing water; colonizes primary immune tissues (kidney and spleen)
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competes with pathogens; enhances host immunity; no direct symbiosis with host microbiome reported
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to freeze-drying (-20°C), heat inactivation (75°C for 60 min), and storage at -20°C; stable in feed matrix
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Peptone water, MRS medium, freeze-drying process
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该菌株为乳酸杆菌，可在30°C下在MRS培养基上生长，对冷冻干燥和热灭活具有较强耐受性，能稳定存在于饲料中并定植于虹鳟鱼肠道及免疫组织，具有良好的环境稳定性。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Not applicable (no genetic modification reported)
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): No plasmid or chromosomal integration reported; strain is naturally occurring and not engineered
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in freeze-dried and spray-dried feed matrices; no degradation observed during storage
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 该系统未进行基因工程改造，使用天然存在的Lactobacillus rhamnosus JCM 1136菌株，以活菌、冻干或灭活形式直接添加至饲料中，无需基因编辑或调控回路。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Cell wall components (peptidoglycan, lipopolysaccharide) acting as PAMPs
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No synthetic logic gates; natural immune recognition via PRRs (Pattern Recognition Receptors)
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 菌株通过细胞壁成分（如肽聚糖、脂多糖）作为病原相关分子模式（PAMPs），被宿主固有免疫系统中的模式识别受体（PRR）识别，触发免疫信号通路，无需人工设计的逻辑门控系统。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Cell wall components (PG, LPS) released upon bacterial lysis or natural turnover
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Controlled by dietary inclusion rate (~10^11 CFU/g); no dynamic dosage adjustment
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with freeze-dried and spray-dried feed matrices; stable during storage and feeding
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): 通过产生抗菌物质抑制多种鱼类病原菌，如Aeromonas spp.、Vibrio spp.等，表现为清晰的抑菌圈。
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 对13种鱼类病原菌表现出广谱抑制活性，尤其对Aeromonas spp.效果显著，且在饲料中稳定存在，未引起组织损伤或微生物群落紊乱。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): 通过激活宿主免疫系统，上调TNF-α、TGF-β、IFN和Ig等免疫基因表达，增强细胞和体液免疫反应。
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): Peptidoglycan (PG), Lipopolysaccharide (LPS), and other cell wall components
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (no kill-switch or auxotrophy reported)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no horizontal gene transfer evidence; non-invasive in fish; safe for aquaculture use
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Physical confinement via feed encapsulation; no escape from feed matrix
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Lactobacillus rhamnosus JCM 1136被列为GRAS（公认安全）菌株，无致病性，不携带抗生素抗性基因，未见水平基因转移风险，且在饲料中被物理包裹，无环境逃逸风险，安全性高。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在虹鳟鱼中，活菌形式（喷雾干燥和冻干）显著上调了肾脏和脾脏中TNF-α（最高达5000倍）、IFN（最高20倍）、TGF-β和Ig基因的表达，尤其在冻干组中效果更优，表明其具有强大的免疫调节能力，可有效增强宿主非特异性免疫反应。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 6.5–7.0, in the presence of glucose and other fermentable carbohydrates; tolerant to bile salts and low pH (gastric conditions)

G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High chromosomal stability; no plasmids used; no evidence of genetic drift or metabolic burden in vivo
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in lyophilized formulation and physiological saline matrix; no degradation during infusion
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 该系统未经过基因工程改造，使用天然益生菌株，通过冻干制剂在生理盐水中灌注，直接作用于造口回肠袢黏膜，无需外源性调控元件，依赖其天然代谢和免疫调节能力发挥作用。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Native membrane receptors and metabolic sensors (e.g., sugar transporters, bile acid sensors)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Constitutive expression; no complex logic gates; threshold-based response to environmental cues
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 这些益生菌通过其天然的代谢感应系统感知肠道微环境中的pH、胆汁酸和葡萄糖等信号，同时响应宿主释放的蛋白酶和细胞因子。它们在黏膜表面持续表达免疫调节分子，不依赖诱导型启动子，属于基础性、持续性响应机制，无复杂逻辑控制。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Constitutive secretion via cell lysis and extracellular vesicles
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose controlled by infusion volume and frequency (20 days, every 2nd day); no feedback control

E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Not applicable
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 未涉及抗菌或抗生物膜功能。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Probiotics reduce pro-inflammatory cytokines (e.g., TNF-α) and increase anti-inflammatory mediators; modulate immune cell infiltration into lamina propria.
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): Cytokines (e.g., IL-10, TGF-β), SCFAs (butyrate, acetate), and bacterial cell wall components (e.g., peptidoglycan)
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Promote epithelial regeneration, reduce mucosal erosion, and improve crypt architecture by enhancing barrier function and reducing inflammatory damage.
E_D_repair_material (修复因子_相关物质): Short-chain fatty acids (SCFAs), mucin-stimulating factors, growth factors
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Modulate host metabolism by producing SCFAs, which regulate glucose homeostasis and lipid metabolism; influence tryptophan metabolism via microbial enzymes.
E_E_metabolite_material (代谢物_相关物质): Short-chain fatty acids (SCFAs), tryptophan metabolites (e.g., indole derivatives)
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (natural strains, no synthetic kill switches)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no evidence of horizontal gene transfer; low risk of environmental escape
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Physical confinement via catheter infusion and localized mucosal delivery
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 该系统使用的是公认安全（GRAS）的天然益生菌株，未进行基因改造，无致病性、无抗生素抗性基因，且通过导管局部灌注实现物理隔离，风险极低。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在刺激阶段后，实验组（SG）的C反应蛋白（CRP）、中性粒细胞/淋巴细胞比值（NLR）和单核细胞/淋巴细胞比值（LMR）显著下降（p < 0.001），而血清转铁蛋白和血小板/淋巴细胞比值（PLR）显著上升。3个月随访后，CRP、NLR、LMR和PLR均恢复正常，且mGPS评分显著降低。内镜和组织学严重程度与炎症标志物变化相关，提示益生菌刺激可早期改善炎症状态，促进黏膜修复。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 6.0–7.0, tolerant to bile acids and intestinal pH; utilizes glucose and lactose as carbon sources
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~1.5–2 hours in vitro; in vivo colonization observed within 24–48 hours post-administration
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Intestinal lumen, particularly in the small intestine and colon; adheres to mucus layer and epithelial cells
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of pathogenic bacteria; synergistic interactions with host microbiota; no significant disruption of core microbiome observed
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Moderate tolerance to gastric acid and bile; stable during lyophilization and rehydration; resistant to shear stress in enteral delivery systems
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Bile salts, mucin-binding proteins, catalase
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该系统由多种乳酸菌和双歧杆菌组成，均为兼性厌氧菌，可在肠道环境中定植并维持生长。其最适生长温度为37°C，pH范围为6.0–7.0，能耐受胆汁酸和肠道酸性环境。在体外培养中，倍增时间为1.5–2小时；在体内，口服后24–48小时内即可在肠道定植。这些菌株主要定植于小肠和结肠的黏液层及上皮细胞表面，通过竞争性排斥病原菌，与宿主微生物群产生协同作用，且不显著破坏核心菌群结构。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): None reported
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High chromosomal stability; no plasmids reported; no evidence of genetic drift in clinical trials
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in enteral nutrition matrix; no degradation or loss of viability during storage
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 该系统未进行基因工程改造，所有菌株均为天然分离株，通过口服给药进入肠道，其功能依赖于天然代谢途径和定植能力，未引入外源基因或调控回路。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): FNR promoter (hypoxia), Bile acid-responsive promoters (e.g., Bile acid receptor BbrR), Lactate transporter (LctP), Quorum sensing receptors (LasR, LuxR)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No engineered logic gates; natural sensing with threshold responses to environmental cues
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 这些菌株通过天然受体感知肠道内的生理化学信号，如pH变化、胆汁酸浓度、乳酸水平和氧分压。例如，Lactobacillus plantarum 299通过FNR启动子响应低氧环境，而胆汁酸通过BbrR等受体感知。菌群间通过AHL和AI-2信号进行群体感应，调节代谢和定植行为。整体为自然感应系统，无人工逻辑门控，但具有阈值响应和动态范围调节能力。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Type I secretion system (for bacteriocins), Vesicles (exosomes), Lysis (controlled release)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent activity; controlled by administration frequency (twice daily) and total duration (7–28 days)
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with enteral nutrition matrix; maintains viability and function during delivery
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): 通过产生乳酸、细菌素（如plantaricin）和有机酸降低局部pH，抑制病原菌生长；同时分泌抗菌肽，破坏病原菌细胞膜；并抑制生物膜形成。
E_A_agent_material (抗菌因子_相关物质): Lactic acid, Plantaricin, Bacteriocins, Organic acids
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 在多项随机对照试验中，使用该菌群组合的患者胰腺感染率未显著升高，且未报告严重不良事件，表明其抗菌活性可控且局部安全。
E_B_crit_evidence (标准B_依据): 未使用任何氧生成机制，因此不涉及氧合功能。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): 调节宿主免疫反应，促进抗炎因子（如IL-10）分泌，抑制促炎因子（如TNF-α、IL-6）释放，增强肠道屏障功能。
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): 通过分泌生长因子（如EGF、VEGF）和细胞外基质成分，促进上皮细胞再生、血管生成和黏膜屏障修复。
E_D_repair_material (修复因子_相关物质): Epidermal Growth Factor (EGF), Vascular Endothelial Growth Factor (VEGF), Collagen
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): 产生短链脂肪酸（SCFAs），如乙酸、丙酸和丁酸，调节宿主能量代谢、免疫稳态和肠道屏障功能。
E_E_metabolite_material (代谢物_相关物质): Short-chain fatty acids (SCFAs): Acetate, Propionate, Butyrate
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (natural strains, no kill-switches or auxotrophy reported)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no evidence of horizontal gene transfer; potential risk in immunocompromised patients (e.g., PROPATRIA trial showed adverse effects in high-risk subgroup)
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Enteral nutrition delivery provides physical barrier; no systemic dissemination reported
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 该系统由多种被广泛认可为GRAS（公认安全）的益生菌组成，无基因工程改造，未报告耐药基因或水平基因转移。然而，PROPATRIA试验中使用Ecologic 641（含L. acidophilus等）组出现不良反应，提示特定菌株组合在重症患者中可能存在风险。总体风险较低，但需注意个体差异和免疫状态。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在纳入的6项随机对照试验中，益生菌治疗组与安慰剂组在胰腺感染率、总感染率、手术率、住院时间及死亡率方面均无显著差异。然而，亚组分析显示，治疗持续时间≤15天的患者中，益生菌组胰腺感染率显著降低（RR=2.94，95%CI:1.31–6.60，P<0.01），提示短期使用可能具有潜在益处。总体而言，当前证据不足以支持或否定益生菌在预测性重症急性胰腺炎中的疗效，需进一步设计严谨的临床试验验证特定菌株、剂量和疗程的优化方案。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Temperature: 37 ± 2°C; pH: not explicitly stated, but MRS agar with L-cysteine HCl suggests anaerobic conditions; Nutritional requirements: L-cysteine HCl, sugars (FOS, maltodextrin), vitamins, minerals
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Growth rate not quantified; incubation for 48–72 hours under anaerobic conditions; in vitro growth confirmed by colony formation
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Small intestine and colon (survives gastric acid and bile)
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Not explicitly described; assumed to be commensal in human gut microbiome
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerates gastric acid and bile; stability in powder matrix with excipients (sugars, herbal extracts, vitamins, minerals)

C_growth_desc (生长描述): Bifidobacterium animalis subsp. lactis and Lactobacillus acidophilus are lactic acid bacteria that survive gastric acid and bile, grow under anaerobic conditions, and are used in dietary supplements for their probiotic effects. They are stable in powder formulations with excipients and can be quantified using flow cytometry.

G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): Not applicable (no plasmids or engineered circuits used)

S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Not applicable (no synthetic circuitry; detection based on dye exclusion)
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): No synthetic sensing logic; viability is determined by membrane integrity using thiazole orange (TO) and propidium iodide (PI) dyes. Live cells exclude PI but retain TO; dead cells take up PI and lose TO fluorescence.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Not specified (likely passive diffusion or natural secretion)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Not applicable (natural strains; no controllable output)
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with powder matrix and excipients; stable in reconstituted samples
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Produces lactic acid and other metabolites that inhibit pathogenic bacteria; not directly tested for antibacterial activity in this study.
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): The strains are naturally antagonistic to pathogens via acidification and bacteriocin production; no cytotoxicity reported; localized in gut.
E_B_mechanism_desc (产氧机制描述): Not applicable; no oxygen-producing enzymes or mechanisms described.
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Modulates host immune response via interaction with gut epithelium and immune cells; enhances anti-inflammatory cytokine production.
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): Cell wall components (e.g., peptidoglycan, exopolysaccharides), secreted metabolites
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Not tested or reported.
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Produces short-chain fatty acids (SCFAs) such as acetate and lactate, which regulate host metabolism and gut barrier function.
E_F_mechanism_desc (肿瘤治疗描述): Not applicable; no evidence of tumor-targeting or prodrug conversion.
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (natural probiotics; no kill switches or auxotrophy described)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no horizontal gene transfer risk in this context; safe for human consumption.
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Powder matrix provides physical confinement; no live cell release in study
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Both Bifidobacterium animalis subsp. lactis and Lactobacillus acidophilus are classified as GRAS (Generally Recognized As Safe) and widely used in food and supplements. No evidence of pathogenicity, antibiotic resistance, or environmental escape risk in this study.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): The study did not evaluate therapeutic outcomes. However, flow cytometry demonstrated high accuracy, linearity, and precision in quantifying viable probiotic cells compared to plate count, with recovery rates of 96.5–100.9% and strong correlation (R > 0.999). This supports reliable analytical validation for probiotic product quality control.

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Temperature: 37°C; pH: Neutral to slightly acidic (MRS broth); Nutritional requirements: Rich in carbohydrates and amino acids (MRS medium); Bile tolerance: High (up to 10% bile salt); Acid tolerance: Survives at pH 3–4 for 3 hours
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Growth rate: 24–48 hours in MRS broth at 37°C; Doubling time: Not explicitly reported; In vivo vs in vitro: Demonstrated survival in simulated gastric conditions (pH 3–4) and bile salt environments
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gastrointestinal tract (intestinal mucosa), potential for gut colonization
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Shows autoaggregation (48%) and surface hydrophobicity (43–45%), suggesting ability to adhere to intestinal epithelium and interact with host microbiota; no evidence of competition or symbiosis with other microbes reported
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): High tolerance to acid (pH 3–4), bile salts (up to 10%), and moderate resistance to drying (stored at −80°C with glycerol); UV and shear stress not tested
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Glycerol (for cryopreservation), bile salts (for stress resistance testing)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Enterococcus faecium BS5 is a facultative anaerobe capable of growing at 37°C in MRS medium. It exhibits strong resistance to acidic conditions (pH 3–4) and bile salts (up to 10%), indicating its potential to survive gastrointestinal transit. It forms creamy, circular, opaque colonies and appears as gram-positive cocci under microscopy. The strain shows good adhesion properties via autoaggregation and surface hydrophobicity, supporting its potential for intestinal colonization.
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 该菌株未经过基因工程改造，其GABA生产能力源于天然代谢途径。通过16S rRNA基因测序鉴定为Enterococcus faecium BS5，未提及任何基因编辑或合成生物学工具的使用。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Glutamate decarboxylase (GAD) promoter and enzyme system (inferred from GABA production from glutamate)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No synthetic logic circuits reported; natural metabolic regulation via substrate availability (glutamate) and environmental stress (pH, bile) likely controls GAD expression
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): Enterococcus faecium BS5 senses glutamate as a substrate and responds to acidic and bile-rich environments by activating its glutamate decarboxylase (GAD) system, which converts glutamate to GABA. This is a natural physiological response rather than a synthetic genetic circuit. The system is likely constitutively active under favorable conditions (e.g., presence of glutamate and neutral pH), but may be modulated by stress signals such as low pH and bile salts.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Unknown (likely passive diffusion or lysis; not specified)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Not controllable; production depends on substrate (glutamate) availability and growth phase
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with MRS broth and fermented dairy products; no encapsulation or material barrier reported
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Produces antimicrobial substances (e.g., organic acids, hydrogen peroxide) that inhibit growth of pathogenic bacteria.
E_A_agent_material (抗菌因子_相关物质): Organic acids, hydrogen peroxide (inferred from antimicrobial activity assay)
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 对大肠杆菌、枯草芽孢杆菌、铜绿假单胞菌和金黄色葡萄球菌具有抑制作用，但对白色念珠菌无抑制作用，表明其抗菌谱较广且具有选择性，且未报告对宿主细胞的毒性。
E_B_crit_evidence (标准B_依据): 未检测到氧气生成能力，无光依赖或非光依赖的氧生成机制。
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): 通过谷氨酸脱羧酶（GAD）将谷氨酸转化为γ-氨基丁酸（GABA），调节肠道功能、神经递质水平和肠道免疫。
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): No synthetic kill switches or auxotrophy reported; natural non-pathogenicity assumed
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Non-hemolytic (γ-hemolysis), no virulence genes reported; however, resistant to multiple antibiotics (ampicillin, penicillin, streptomycin, kanamycin, erythromycin), raising concern for horizontal gene transfer (HGT) of resistance genes. Enterococcus species are known opportunistic pathogens.
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): None reported; no physical confinement or encapsulation used
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Enterococcus faecium BS5 is non-hemolytic and shows no signs of pathogenicity in vitro. However, its resistance to multiple clinically relevant antibiotics (including ampicillin, penicillin, and erythromycin) raises safety concerns regarding antibiotic resistance gene transfer. While classified as GRAS (Generally Recognized As Safe) in some contexts, its use in food products requires careful monitoring due to potential for HGT and opportunistic infection risk in immunocompromised individuals.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 该菌株在MRS培养基中以2% MSG为底物，通过HPLC检测到GABA产量最高，是9个GABA高产菌株中最优者。其在模拟胃酸（pH 3–4）和高胆汁盐（10%）环境中表现出良好的存活率（76–78%），并具有显著的抗菌活性和良好的黏附能力，表明其具有作为功能性发酵食品益生菌的潜力。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 30–37°C, pH 5.5–6.5, low water activity (a_w < 0.90), tolerance to curing salt (NaCl up to 3%)
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~60–90 min in vitro; in vivo colonization not quantified, but strain detected in feces post-consumption
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gut lumen, colon mucosa (transient colonization)
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of pathogens; no significant disruption of dominant microbiota observed in human trial
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Resistant to gastric acid (pH 2.0), bile salts (0.3%), refrigeration (4°C for 6 weeks), lyophilization/rehydration
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Alginate microencapsulation (protects against gastric and intestinal stresses)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该菌株为兼性厌氧菌，可在发酵香肠的低水分活性和中等盐浓度环境中存活，具有良好的胃酸和胆盐耐受性，适合在肠道中短暂定植。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Not specified
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): No plasmid-based systems reported; chromosomal integration not assessed; strain stability in product confirmed over 6 weeks
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Alginate microencapsulation enhances survival in gastrointestinal tract and maintains viability in fermented sausage matrix
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 未使用基因工程改造，菌株为天然分离株，通过微胶囊化技术增强其在香肠和胃肠道中的存活能力。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): General stress response systems (e.g., acid tolerance response, osmotic shock proteins)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No engineered logic gates; natural sensing of environmental cues via constitutive expression
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 菌株通过天然的酸耐受和渗透压应激系统感知环境变化，无人工设计的逻辑门控机制。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Type I secretion (via cell wall-associated proteins)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent immune modulation; daily intake of 50 g sausage delivers ~10^8 CFU
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Alginate microencapsulation maintains structural integrity and allows controlled release in gastrointestinal tract
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Not applicable
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 未报告抗菌活性。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Modulates host immune response by enhancing phagocytic activity and cytokine production (e.g., IL-10, IFN-γ) in human volunteers
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): Cell wall components (peptidoglycan, teichoic acids), secreted metabolites (e.g., organic acids)
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Not applicable
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Improves lactose digestion and enhances bioavailability of vitamins and minerals; modulates gut microbiota composition
E_E_metabolite_material (代谢物_相关物质): Lactic acid, B vitamins (B1, B2, B6, B12), folate
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (naturally occurring strain, no suicide genes or auxotrophy)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): No pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; low risk of horizontal gene transfer; no environmental escape documented
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Alginate microcapsules provide physical confinement and reduce environmental release
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 该菌株为公认安全（GRAS）菌株，无致病性，未发现抗生素抗性基因，且通过微胶囊化技术实现物理隔离，安全性高。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在健康志愿者中，每日摄入50克含L. casei LTH 2579的发酵香肠，可显著提高免疫功能指标，但对血清胆固醇和甘油三酯水平无显著影响。粪便中可检测到该菌株，表明其在肠道中具有短暂定植能力。

composition (组成成分): [{"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Bifidobacterium", "strain_id": "Golden Bifid (live combined Bifidobacterium and Lactobacillus tablets)"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus", "strain_id": "Golden Bifid (live combined Bifidobacterium and Lactobacillus tablets)"}]
spatial_arrangement (空间排布): Oral supplementation (systemic exposure, transient gut colonization)
C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 6.5–7.0, requires complex nutrients including amino acids, vitamins, and carbohydrates; dependent on host-derived metabolites in the gut environment
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~1.5–2 hours in vitro; in vivo colonization is transient and limited by host immune response and microbiome competition
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gastrointestinal tract (small intestine and colon), particularly in the mucosal layer; transient presence in the gut lumen
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of pathogenic bacteria; potential for symbiotic interaction with resident microbiota; no evidence of long-term engraftment
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Moderate tolerance to gastric acid and bile salts; sensitive to drying, UV, and prolonged storage; stable during short-term oral administration
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Bile salts (protective effect via bile resistance genes), acid tolerance systems (e.g., F0F1-ATPase)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该研究中使用的益生菌为黄金双歧杆菌（含活体双歧杆菌和乳酸杆菌的复合制剂），属于兼性厌氧菌，适宜在37°C、pH 6.5–7.0的环境中生长，依赖宿主提供的复杂营养物质。在体内主要定植于肠道黏膜层，但定植为短暂性，受宿主免疫和微生物群竞争影响。对胃酸和胆盐具有中等耐受性，但对干燥、紫外线和长期储存敏感。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Not applicable (natural strain, no genetic modification reported)
G_circuit_control (回路控制): Constitutive (no inducible or synthetic circuits reported)
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High (natural strains, no plasmids or integrative vectors used; chromosomal stability in vivo)
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): No engineered material environment; natural oral delivery with transient gut exposure
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 本研究中使用的益生菌为天然复合菌株，未进行任何基因工程改造，其功能依赖于天然代谢通路，无合成生物电路或可调控系统。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): FNR promoter (hypoxia), Lactate receptor (LacY), Bile acid transporter (BaiCD), Quorum sensing receptors (e.g., LasR, LuxR homologs)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No synthetic logic gates reported; natural sensing via constitutive receptor systems with threshold responses to environmental cues
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 该益生菌通过天然受体系统感知肠道内的pH、胆盐、乳酸、葡萄糖等理化信号，以及微生物群落的AHL和AI-2信号，实现对微环境的适应性响应。未使用合成逻辑门，其调控依赖于天然信号通路的阈值响应机制。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Passive diffusion and cell lysis (natural secretion of metabolites and cell wall components)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Oral dosing (twice daily, 0.5 g/tablet); no precise control over microbial load or activity in vivo
E_material_match (材料匹配性): No encapsulated material used; oral administration with transient gut exposure
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Not applicable
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 未检测到抗菌或抗生物膜功能。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): 益生菌通过激活巨噬细胞自噬通路，增强先天免疫反应，调节炎症因子表达，从而发挥免疫调节作用。
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): Autophagy-related proteins (LC3, Beclin1), Cytokines (e.g., IL-10, TNF-α)
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Not applicable
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): 益生菌通过调节宿主胎盘细胞的自噬相关蛋白表达，影响细胞代谢稳态，尤其在正常妊娠中可能通过抑制Beclin1 mRNA表达来调节自噬水平。
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (natural strains, no kill-switch or auxotrophy reported)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no evidence of horizontal gene transfer; low risk of environmental escape due to transient colonization
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): None (no physical barrier used)
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 所用益生菌为天然双歧杆菌和乳酸杆菌复合制剂，属于公认安全（GRAS）级别，无致病性，无抗生素抗性基因，无基因水平转移证据，且在体内定植为短暂性，环境逃逸风险极低。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 口服补充益生菌可显著降低正常妊娠自发性分娩胎盘中Beclin1 mRNA的表达水平（P < 0.05），提示其可能通过调节胎盘自噬通路发挥保护作用，但对LC3蛋白表达无显著影响。该效应可能为益生菌介导胎盘保护的新机制，但需进一步大样本随机对照试验验证。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): 37°C, aerobic conditions, brain heart infusion (BHI) broth, pH neutral
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): 24 h growth in BHI broth, harvested at 3×10⁹ CFU/ml; no in vivo growth rate reported
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Intestinal lumen (terminal ileum), gut mucosa
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Modulates gut microbiota by enriching Ruminococcaceae and Peptococcaceae; reduces Parabacteroides, Paraprevotella, Desulfovibrio; enhances gut barrier function
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Resistant to storage at 4°C; survives oral administration and intestinal transit; no data on UV, drying, or shear stress
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Spore-forming capability (inferred from Bacillus genus)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Bacillus cereus ATCC 11778 is a facultative anaerobe that grows aerobically at 37°C in BHI broth. It colonizes the intestinal lumen and mucosa, where it modulates the gut microbiota and enhances intestinal barrier integrity. It survives oral administration and persists in the gut for 2 weeks, contributing to systemic protection against liver injury.
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Not specified (no genetic modification reported)
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): Not applicable (no plasmid or engineered integration reported)
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Not applicable (no encapsulation or material environment described)
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): The strain used is a wild-type, non-engineered Bacillus cereus ATCC 11778. No genetic modifications, synthetic circuits, or engineered regulatory systems were employed. The probiotic effects are attributed to natural physiological functions.
S_metabolite_signals (代谢信号): ["D-Galactosamine (D-GalN) - indirect via host response", "LPS (lipopolysaccharide) - via TLR recognition"]
S_host_signals (宿主信号): ["Toll-like receptors (TLR-2, TLR-3, TLR-4)", "Cytokines (IL-10, IL-13, HMGB-1, TNF-α)"]
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): TLR-2, TLR-3, TLR-4 (host receptors); ZO-1 (tight junction protein) as indirect sensor of barrier integrity
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No synthetic logic gates; natural immune modulation via cytokine feedback loops (e.g., IL-10 suppresses TLR-4 response)
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): B. cereus does not possess engineered sensing circuits. Instead, it responds to host-derived signals (e.g., LPS, cytokines) through natural immune recognition pathways. The strain modulates the host immune system via feedback mechanisms, such as enhancing IL-10 to suppress TLR-4-mediated inflammation, effectively creating a natural negative feedback loop.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Passive secretion via general secretion pathways (no specific secretion system reported)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Oral gavage at 2×10⁹ CFU/ml daily for 2 weeks; dosage is fixed, no dynamic control reported
E_material_match (材料匹配性): No encapsulation or material delivery system used; oral administration in liquid form
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Not applicable (no direct antibacterial activity reported)
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): No evidence of antibacterial or biofilm inhibition activity; not a primary function.
E_B_mechanism_desc (产氧机制描述): Consumes oxygen in the intestinal lumen, creating a local anaerobic environment favorable for beneficial anaerobic bacteria such as Ruminococcaceae and Peptococcaceae.
E_B_oxygen_material (产氧元件_相关物质): Oxygen consumption via aerobic respiration (endogenous metabolic activity)
E_B_crit_evidence (标准B_依据): B. cereus consumes oxygen in the gut, reducing oxygen tension and promoting growth of beneficial anaerobes. This does not promote pathogen growth (e.g., facultative anaerobes), and supports the anti-inflammatory gut environment. No conflict with other mechanisms observed.
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Modulates cytokine balance: increases anti-inflammatory IL-10 in liver and plasma; decreases pro-inflammatory IL-13, HMGB-1, COX-2, and TLR-4. Also reduces RANTES and IL-7.
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Enhances intestinal barrier integrity by upregulating tight junction protein ZO-1, reducing microvilli damage, and improving villus architecture. Also improves liver function (e.g., cholinesterase, albumin).
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Restores cysteine and methionine metabolism disrupted by D-GalN. Modulates bacterial peptidoglycan biosynthesis, RNA polymerase, and nucleotide excision repair pathways.
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (wild-type strain used; no kill-switch or auxotrophy reported)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity in healthy hosts; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no horizontal gene transfer risk mentioned; GRAS status in China (NMPN s10980014)
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): None (no physical barrier used)
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Bacillus cereus ATCC 11778 is a well-characterized, non-pathogenic strain licensed as a probiotic in China. It is classified as BSL-1 with GRAS status. No genetic modifications or antibiotic resistance genes were introduced. No biocontainment systems were used, but the strain is naturally low-risk due to its probiotic history and lack of virulence factors in this context.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): Pretreatment with B. cereus significantly attenuated D-GalN-induced liver injury, as evidenced by reduced serum ALT (P < 0.05), improved cholinesterase levels (P < 0.01), and decreased liver histological damage. It enhanced intestinal barrier function (increased ZO-1 expression, reduced BT), modulated gut microbiota (enriched Ruminococcaceae, Peptococcaceae; reduced Parabacteroides, Paraprevotella, Desulfovibrio), and restored anti-inflammatory cytokine balance (elevated IL-10, reduced IL-13, HMGB-1, TLR-4). These effects collectively improved liver function and reduced systemic inflammation.

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 6.5–7.0; tolerant to bile and acidic environments (pH 2.5–3.0); requires glucose and amino acids as carbon and nitrogen sources
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~1.5–2 hours in vitro; stable in vivo colonization in intestinal mucosa
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Intestinal mucosa, particularly in the small intestine and colon
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of pathogenic bacteria; synergistic with native microbiota; no significant disruption of gut microbiome composition
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): High tolerance to dehydration, freeze-drying, and storage at 4°C; resistant to osmotic stress and oxidative stress
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Trehalose, maltodextrin, soy extract
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Lactobacillus acidophilus La-05 is a facultative anaerobe with strong acid and bile tolerance, capable of surviving in the harsh gastrointestinal environment. It grows optimally at 37°C and pH 6.5–7.0, and can colonize the intestinal mucosa effectively. The strain exhibits high stability during freeze-drying and storage, especially when encapsulated with protective agents like trehalose and maltodextrin.
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): None specified
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High chromosomal stability; no plasmid-based systems used; no evidence of genetic drift in encapsulated form
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in alginate, chitosan, and composite matrices; no significant metabolic burden observed
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): The system relies on natural physiological traits of Lactobacillus acidophilus La-05 without genetic modification. Encapsulation in biomaterials such as soy extract and maltodextrin enhances viability and stability, enabling sustained release in the gastrointestinal tract.
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): FNR promoter (inferred from acid tolerance), bile salt hydrolase (BSH) activity
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No complex logic; constitutive expression of stress resistance genes in response to environmental cues
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): Lactobacillus acidophilus La-05 senses acidic and bile-rich environments through intrinsic membrane transporters and stress response pathways. It activates protective mechanisms such as acid tolerance response (ATR) and bile salt hydrolase (BSH) activity, enabling survival in the stomach and small intestine.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Type I secretion (for bacteriocins), vesicles (for EPS), passive diffusion (for SCFAs)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Controlled release via biomaterial degradation; sustained delivery over 24–72 hours
E_material_match (材料匹配性): High compatibility with alginate, chitosan, and composite hydrogels; maintains structural integrity during release
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Produces lactic acid and bacteriocins that inhibit pathogenic bacteria such as E. coli and Salmonella; competes for adhesion sites on intestinal epithelium
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): Lactobacillus acidophilus La-05 effectively inhibits pathogenic bacteria in vitro and in animal models; no significant cytotoxicity to host cells; localized retention in intestinal mucosa
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Modulates immune response by enhancing IL-10 and TGF-β production; reduces pro-inflammatory cytokines (e.g., TNF-α, IL-6); promotes regulatory T cell differentiation
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Enhances intestinal barrier integrity by upregulating tight junction proteins (ZO-1, occludin); promotes mucus secretion and epithelial cell proliferation
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Produces SCFAs (acetate, lactate) that regulate host metabolism and energy homeostasis; modulates glucose and lipid metabolism
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (naturally occurring strain with no antibiotic resistance genes)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Non-pathogenic; no evidence of opportunistic infection; no horizontal gene transfer reported; low risk of environmental escape
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Physical barrier provided by alginate-chitosan matrix prevents systemic dissemination
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Lactobacillus acidophilus La-05 is classified as GRAS (Generally Recognized As Safe) and has a long history of safe use in food and supplements. No antibiotic resistance genes or virulence factors detected. Encapsulation further reduces the risk of unintended colonization or systemic spread.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): In animal models, encapsulated Lactobacillus acidophilus La-05 significantly improved intestinal barrier function, reduced inflammation in colitis models, and enhanced recovery from antibiotic-induced dysbiosis. In human trials, it demonstrated efficacy in reducing diarrhea duration and improving gut microbiota diversity.

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH < 4.5; thrives in acidic environments typical of healthy vaginal microbiome; utilizes carbohydrates as primary carbon source
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Growth rate not explicitly reported; capable of rapid colonization and dominance in vaginal environment under favorable conditions
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Vaginal and endometrial mucosa; preferentially colonizes reproductive tract niches with low pH and lactobacilli dominance
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of pathogenic bacteria; promotes symbiotic relationship with host by maintaining low pH and producing antimicrobial compounds
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to physiological stressors such as fluctuating pH and osmotic changes; stability during oral and vaginal administration
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Hydrogen peroxide, bacteriocidins
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Lactobacillus strains are well-adapted to the acidic, nutrient-rich environment of the female reproductive tract. They thrive in low pH conditions (pH < 4.5), which they help maintain through lactic acid production. These bacteria are capable of colonizing the vaginal and endometrial mucosa, where they outcompete pathogenic microbes and support a healthy microbiome. Their growth is supported by available carbohydrates and they exhibit resilience to common physiological fluctuations in the reproductive tract.
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Not specified
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): Not specified
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Not specified
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): The study does not describe any genetic modifications or synthetic biology components. The probiotic strains used are naturally occurring and not engineered for specific functions. Their therapeutic effects are attributed to native metabolic and ecological properties rather than synthetic circuits.
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): FNR promoter (inferred from lactate/pH sensing), Lactate dehydrogenase (LDH) activity
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Not specified
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): No synthetic sensing circuits are described. The microbial response is based on natural metabolic sensing of environmental cues such as pH and lactate levels, which regulate growth and metabolic activity in a feedback-driven manner.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Not specified
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Not specified
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Not specified
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Lactobacillus produces hydrogen peroxide and bacteriocidins that inhibit the growth of pathogenic bacteria and prevent biofilm formation in the reproductive tract.
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): Lactobacillus dominance is associated with reduced bacterial vaginosis and improved reproductive outcomes. The production of hydrogen peroxide and bacteriocidins provides broad-spectrum antimicrobial activity without disrupting host tissue or causing systemic toxicity.
E_B_crit_evidence (标准B_依据): No evidence of oxygenation function in the study.
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Lactobacillus modulates local immune responses by promoting anti-inflammatory cytokine profiles and enhancing mucosal barrier integrity, contributing to a favorable environment for embryo implantation.
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): Cytokines (e.g., IL-10, TGF-β), mucosal immune regulators
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): By maintaining a healthy vaginal and endometrial environment, Lactobacillus supports epithelial integrity and facilitates tissue homeostasis, which is essential for successful implantation and pregnancy maintenance.
E_D_repair_material (修复因子_相关物质): Mucosal barrier enhancement, extracellular matrix stabilization
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Not applicable
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Not applicable
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; minimal risk of horizontal gene transfer; no evidence of environmental escape; safe for human use in reproductive contexts
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Not applicable
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Lactobacillus strains used in probiotic therapy are generally recognized as safe (GRAS) and have a long history of safe use in humans. They are non-pathogenic, do not colonize systemically, and are naturally present in the human microbiome. No significant safety concerns were reported in the included studies, and the risk of adverse effects is minimal.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): In women with non-Lactobacillus-dominant microbiota (NLDM), vaginal probiotic therapy increased clinical pregnancy rates from 48.0% to 58.8% (p = 0.47). In men, oral probiotic therapy significantly improved sperm motility (from 6.4% to 28.6% after 6 weeks) and reduced DNA fragmentation index (from 25.8% to 21.6%). These improvements were sustained for up to 6 weeks post-treatment. Lactobacillus dominance was achieved in 53% of NLDM patients treated with probiotics. Overall, probiotic therapy shows promise in optimizing reproductive outcomes, particularly in improving sperm quality and supporting a healthy reproductive microbiome.
