E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 在体外实验中，QQ1和QQ2均显著抑制了V. alginolyticus的生物膜形成和V. harveyi的运动性；在体内实验中，喂食QQ菌的鱼体表现出更高的抗感染能力，且未观察到对宿主细胞的毒性或微生物组失衡。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): 通过调节宿主先天免疫系统，增强抗氧化酶活性和抗菌物质分泌，提升对Vibrio感染的抵抗力。
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): 通过抑制病原菌毒力，间接减轻宿主氧化应激，调节抗氧化系统（如GSH、MDA水平）和代谢稳态。
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Natural auxotrophy (no antibiotic resistance genes reported); Spore formation limits environmental escape
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; No known virulence genes; No antibiotic resistance genes detected; Low risk of horizontal gene transfer; Spores limit environmental persistence
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Gelatin-coated feed provides physical confinement; Prevents uncontrolled release
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Bacillus thuringiensis QQ1 和 Bacillus cereus QQ2 均为非致病性菌株，属于Biosafety Level 1（BSL-1）生物，无已知毒力因子或抗生素抗性基因。其孢子形态限制了在环境中的传播风险，且通过凝胶涂层饲料实现物理隔离，确保了在养殖系统中的安全使用。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 喂食QQ probiotics的亚洲海鲈在Vibrio alginolyticus感染后，累积存活率显著提高（p < 0.05）。体内免疫指标如过氧化氢酶（CAT）、超氧化物歧化酶（SOD）、溶菌酶、髓过氧化物酶（MPO）、呼吸爆发（RB）和杀菌活性均显著增强。抗氧化能力方面，QQ2组GSH水平升高，MDA水平降低，表明氧化应激显著减轻。这些结果表明，QQ probiotics能有效调节宿主免疫与抗氧化系统，提供对Vibrio感染的高水平保护。

composition (组成成分): [{"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus", "strain_id": "Various strains (e.g., L. plantarum, L. rhamnosus GG, L. acidophilus NCK56)"}]
C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Temperature: 30–37°C; pH: 5.5–6.5; requires preformed amino acids, B vitamins, purines, pyrimidines, and a sugar (e.g., glucose) as carbon/energy source; ferments sugar to lactic acid
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Growth rate varies by strain; doubling time typically 1–2 hours in vitro; in vivo persistence limited by host immune clearance and competition with microbiota
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gastrointestinal tract (small intestine, colon), vaginal mucosa; dominant in human vaginal microbiota; minor component in adult feces (0.01–0.6% of total counts)
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competes with pathogenic bacteria; modulates host immune system; may enhance colonization resistance; strain-dependent interactions with commensal microbiota
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Moderate tolerance to bile, low pH, osmotic stress; sensitive to drying, UV, and shear stress; lyophilization possible with cryoprotectants
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Bile salts, low pH, osmotic agents (e.g., NaCl), lysozyme
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 乳酸杆菌为革兰氏阳性、非产孢、兼性厌氧菌，具有有限的生物合成能力，需外源性氨基酸、B族维生素、嘌呤、嘧啶及糖类作为碳源和能量来源，发酵糖类产生乳酸。其在人体肠道、阴道等黏膜表面定植，是肠道微生物群的次要成员，但在婴儿粪便中可高达10⁵–10⁸ CFU/g。在小肠和结肠中，其定植受黏液层、pH、胆汁及微生物竞争等环境因素调控。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): CRISPR-Cas systems not mentioned; likely relies on natural transformation or plasmid-based systems; no specific tools reported
G_circuit_control (回路控制): Constitutive expression of immunomodulatory molecules; no inducible circuits reported
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): Chromosomal integration not reported; plasmid stability not assessed; potential for metabolic burden due to high expression of surface molecules
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): No encapsulation or material-based delivery reported; natural survival in mucosal environment
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 通过基因组比较分析识别与免疫调节相关的基因（如植物杀菌素基因、teichoic acid糖基化酶基因）；利用随机森林算法关联基因缺失与免疫反应差异；通过构建基因敲除突变体验证功能。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): TLR2, TLR9, NOD1, NOD2, CD14, CD36, SRA, PepT1 transporter
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): AND gate: TLR2 + NOD2 signaling required for full DC activation; threshold-dependent cytokine output; noise suppression via negative feedback (e.g., IL-10 inhibition of NF-κB)
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 乳酸杆菌通过多种模式识别受体（TLR2、TLR9、NOD1/2）感知宿主信号，其免疫调节效应依赖于信号整合。例如，TLR2识别脂蛋白和LTA，NOD2识别MDP，两者协同激活NF-κB通路，诱导IL-10和IL-12分泌。当TLR信号与NOD信号同时存在时，可产生协同效应，增强免疫调节能力。此外，IL-10反馈抑制炎症反应，实现动态平衡。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Secretion of immunomodulatory molecules (e.g., EPS, LTA, DNA) via outer membrane or cell lysis; no specific secretion system reported
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Strain-dependent; natural regulation via host environment; no external control reported
E_material_match (材料匹配性): No material encapsulation reported; natural survival in mucosal environment
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Not applicable
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 无
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): 通过TLR2、TLR9、NOD1/2等受体识别MAMPs，激活DC和巨噬细胞，诱导IL-10、TGF-β、RA等抗炎因子，促进Treg细胞扩增，调节Th1/Th2平衡，增强黏膜屏障功能。
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): IL-10, TGF-β, Retinoic acid (RA), Thymic stromal lymphopoietin (TSLP), Indoleamine 2,3-dioxygenase (IDO)
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Not applicable
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Not applicable
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Auxotrophy (e.g., requirement for specific amino acids/vitamins); no kill-switches reported
B_containment_material (生物安全_相关物质): Amino acids, B vitamins, purines, pyrimidines
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; low risk of horizontal gene transfer; environmental escape unlikely due to poor environmental persistence
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Mucus layer, epithelial barrier, immune surveillance
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 乳酸杆菌为公认安全（GRAS）菌株，广泛用于食品和益生菌产品。其致病性极低，不产生毒素，无已知抗生素抗性基因，且在环境中难以长期存活。其免疫调节作用依赖于宿主环境，具有天然的生物限制性，安全性高。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在临床试验中，特定菌株（如LGG）可预防特应性皮炎；在动物模型中，L. plantarum和L. acidophilus可减轻DSS诱导的结肠炎；VSL3混合菌群通过TLR9信号改善IL-10缺陷小鼠的结肠炎症状。在人类中，口服L. plantarum可显著改变小肠黏膜转录组，诱导NF-κB相关基因表达，提示其具有明确的免疫调节活性。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 6.0–7.0; tolerates pH 3.0–4.0 and bile salts; requires glucose and amino acids as carbon and nitrogen sources
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~1.5–2 hours in vitro; in vivo colonization observed in intestinal mucosa with moderate persistence
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Small intestine and colon mucosal surface
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of pathogenic bacteria; synergistic interaction with host microbiota; no significant disruption of commensal balance
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Moderate tolerance to heat (up to 50°C for 30 min), freeze-drying, and osmotic stress; sensitive to prolonged UV exposure
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Hi-Maize starch, alginate, chitosan
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Lactobacillus rhamnosus GG 是一种兼性厌氧菌，可在37°C、pH 6.0–7.0条件下良好生长，对胃酸（pH 3.0–4.0）和胆盐具有较强耐受性，依赖葡萄糖和氨基酸作为碳氮源。在体外其倍增时间为1.5–2小时，在体内可定植于小肠和结肠黏膜表面，通过竞争排斥机制抑制病原菌，与宿主微生物群落协同作用，不显著破坏正常菌群平衡。对冻干、热和渗透压具有中等耐受性，但对紫外线敏感。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Plasmid-based expression systems (e.g., pNZ8148), CRISPR-Cas9 (in research settings)
G_edit_efficiency (编辑效率): High efficiency (>90%) in lab strains; low off-target risk with optimized guide RNAs
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High plasmid stability (copy number ~10–20); chromosomal integration possible; low metabolic burden; stable in vivo for up to 7 days
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in alginate, chitosan, and starch-based matrices; no significant degradation during encapsulation
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): Lactobacillus rhamnosus GG 可通过质粒系统（如pNZ8148）实现基因编辑与表达，CRISPR-Cas9技术在研究中已成功应用。其基因回路可实现组成型或诱导型表达（如尼辛诱导型启动子），编辑效率高，脱靶风险低。质粒拷贝数为10–20，代谢负担小，体内稳定性可达7天。在海藻酸钠、壳聚糖和淀粉基质中均保持稳定，封装过程无显著降解。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): FNR promoter (hypoxia), Lactate receptor (LacR), Bile acid sensor (BaiR)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): AND gate: requires both low pH and bile acid presence for activation; threshold-based response with dynamic range of pH 3.0–5.5
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): Lactobacillus rhamnosus GG 能感知胃酸（pH 3.0–5.5）、胆汁酸、乳酸和短链脂肪酸等代谢物，以及宿主蛋白酶和细胞因子。其传感系统包括FNR启动子（响应缺氧）、LacR受体（乳酸）和BaiR受体（胆汁酸）。逻辑控制采用AND门机制，需同时满足低pH和胆汁酸存在才激活表达，具有明确阈值和动态响应范围，可有效避免在非目标环境误激活。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Type I Secretion System (T1SS), Vesicles
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Tunable via encapsulation density and release kinetics; controlled by pH-responsive matrix degradation
E_material_match (材料匹配性): High compatibility with alginate, chitosan, starch, and gellan gum matrices; maintains structural integrity during release
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Secretes bacteriocins (e.g., lactocin 705) and organic acids (lactic acid) that disrupt membrane integrity of pathogens
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 在模拟胃肠道环境中，微胶囊化L. rhamnosus GG对金黄色葡萄球菌和大肠杆菌的抑制率超过90%，且不破坏凝胶结构；体外细胞毒性试验显示对人肠上皮细胞无显著毒性，且在肠道内局部定植，未引起菌群紊乱。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Secretes IL-10 and TGF-β to suppress pro-inflammatory cytokines (TNF-α, IL-6); enhances regulatory T cell differentiation
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Secretes TGF-β and VEGF to promote epithelial cell proliferation and angiogenesis; enhances mucosal barrier integrity
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Auxotrophy (e.g., leucine-dependent strain), suicide gene (cI repressor)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Non-pathogenic; no known antibiotic resistance genes; low risk of horizontal gene transfer; no environmental escape reported
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Physical barrier provided by alginate-chitosan shell prevents leakage and environmental release
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Lactobacillus rhamnosus GG 被归类为GRAS（公认安全），无致病性，无已知抗生素抗性基因，水平基因转移风险极低，未报告环境逃逸事件。通过亮氨酸依赖型营养缺陷型和cI阻遏子自杀基因实现生物遏制，封装外壳提供物理屏障，确保安全释放。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在临床研究中，微胶囊化L. rhamnosus GG显著改善了抗生素相关性腹泻、肠易激综合征和溃疡性结肠炎患者的症状，缩短病程20–30%，并提高肠道屏障功能。在动物模型中，其可促进伤口愈合，减少炎症因子水平，增强黏膜修复能力。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 6.5–7.0, in the presence of bile salts and various carbon sources including glucose and fructose; capable of surviving gastric acidity (pH 2.0–3.0) and intestinal conditions.
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~1.5–2 hours in vitro; in vivo colonization observed after 12 weeks of daily supplementation with stable persistence in gut microbiota.
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Intestinal lumen, particularly colon and ileum; preferentially colonizes mucosal surfaces in the lower gastrointestinal tract.
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of pathogenic bacteria; no significant disruption of native gut microbiome; potential synergistic interactions with other commensals.
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): High tolerance to bile salts, low pH (gastric), osmotic stress, and freeze-drying; stable during storage at 4°C for up to 12 months.
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Bile salt hydrolase (BSH) enzymes, acid tolerance systems (e.g., F0F1-ATPase), and extracellular polysaccharides.
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该菌株混合物为兼性厌氧菌，可在37°C、pH 6.5–7.0条件下生长，对胃酸（pH 2.0–3.0）和胆汁盐具有较强耐受性，能有效定植于肠道黏膜表面，尤其在结肠和回肠区域。在体外培养中，倍增时间为1.5–2小时；在体内经12周每日补充后，可在肠道微生物群中稳定定植并持续存在。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Not applicable (natural strains, no genetic modification reported)
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High chromosomal stability; no plasmids used; no evidence of genetic drift or loss of function during 12-week supplementation.
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in capsule matrix; no degradation or loss of viability during shelf-life (up to 12 months at 4°C).
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 该系统未进行基因工程改造，所有功能均源于天然菌株的代谢特性。三株L. plantarum（CECT 7527、7528、7529）通过其固有的胆盐水解酶活性、短链脂肪酸（如丙酸、丁酸）产生能力及胆固醇吸收抑制机制发挥功能，无需外源调控元件。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Bile salt hydrolase (BSH) promoter and regulatory systems; acid tolerance response (ATR) genes.
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Constitutive expression; no dynamic logic gates or threshold control observed.
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 该系统依赖于天然的组成型表达机制，通过胆盐水解酶（BSH）和酸耐受系统感知肠道环境中的胆汁盐和低pH，无需外部诱导信号。其功能表达为持续性，不依赖于特定逻辑门控或动态调节。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Type IV secretion system (putative); extracellular release of SCFAs and enzymes.
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent effect; 1.2 × 10⁹ CFU/day for 12 weeks; effect increases progressively over time.
E_material_match (材料匹配性): High compatibility with capsule matrix; no structural disruption or gas production observed during encapsulation and storage.
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): N/A
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): N/A
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): N/A
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): N/A
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): L. plantarum CECT 7527, 7528, and 7529 reduce serum cholesterol via multiple mechanisms: (1) bile salt hydrolase (BSH) activity deconjugates bile acids, reducing enterohepatic circulation and increasing hepatic cholesterol catabolism; (2) production of propionic and butyric acids inhibits hepatic cholesterol synthesis; (3) reduced dietary cholesterol bioavailability through competitive inhibition in micelles.
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (natural strains, no engineered kill switches or auxotrophy)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): No pathogenicity reported; no antibiotic resistance genes detected; no horizontal gene transfer observed; low opportunistic risk; no environmental escape concerns.
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Capsule provides physical confinement; prevents release into environment.
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 该菌株混合物为公认安全（GRAS）级别，未进行基因改造，无致病性、无抗生素抗性基因、无水平基因转移风险，且在体内定植后未引起不良反应。胶囊封装提供了良好的物理屏障，确保生物安全。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在12周干预后，L. plantarum组血清总胆固醇（TC）水平显著降低13.6%（p < 0.05），LDL-C降低14.7%，氧化型LDL-C（OX-LDL）降低13.6%。在高初始胆固醇水平（HIV）患者中，TC、LDL-C和OX-LDL分别降低17.4%、17.6%和15.6%，效果优于低初始水平（LIV）患者（TC降低9.4%）。该效应在停药4周后仍部分维持，表明其具有累积性和持久性。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 7.0–7.5; requires complex nutrients including amino acids, vitamins, and carbon sources; grows in both aerobic and anaerobic conditions.
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~20–30 minutes in vitro; in vivo, transient colonization of intestinal mucosa with limited systemic spread due to attenuation.
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Intestinal mucosa (ileum and colon), particularly in the lamina propria and Peyer's patches.
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competes with resident gut microbiota; no significant symbiosis reported; attenuated strain does not persist long-term.
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Moderate tolerance to gastric acid (due to acid resistance mechanisms), bile salts, and osmotic stress; stable during lyophilization and storage at 2–8°C.
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Acid resistance systems (e.g., acid tolerance response genes), bile resistance genes (e.g., *tolC*, *acrAB*), and osmoprotectant uptake systems.
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Ty21a is a live attenuated oral vaccine strain of *Salmonella Typhi* that colonizes the intestinal mucosa, survives gastric transit, and induces localized immune responses. It grows optimally at 37°C and is facultatively anaerobic, allowing adaptation to the gut environment. It exhibits moderate tolerance to bile, acid, and osmotic stress, enabling survival in the gastrointestinal tract. The strain is genetically stable and does not persist long-term in the host.
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Chromosomal deletion of *aroC* and *aroD* genes (attenuation); no plasmid-based genetic tools used.
G_edit_efficiency (编辑效率): High efficiency due to chromosomal integration; no off-target effects reported.
G_circuit_control (回路控制): Constitutive expression of O-antigens; no inducible circuits or synthetic genetic circuits engineered.
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High chromosomal stability; no plasmid loss; deletion mutations are stable over generations.
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in oral capsule formulation; maintains viability during storage and gastrointestinal transit.
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): Ty21a is a genetically attenuated strain with deletions in the *aroC* and *aroD* genes, which impair its ability to synthesize aromatic amino acids, restricting growth in host tissues. This ensures safety while preserving immunogenicity. The strain retains full O-antigen expression (O-9,12), enabling cross-reactive immune responses. No synthetic circuits or inducible systems are present.
S_host_signals (宿主信号): ["Proteases (e.g., intestinal proteases)", "Cytokines (e.g., IL-1β, TNF-α during inflammation)"]
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): FNR (Fumarate and Nitrate Reduction regulator) for hypoxia; PhoP/PhoQ two-component system for Mg²⁺ and acidic pH; Bile resistance regulators (e.g., *micF*, *ompR*)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No synthetic logic gates; natural sensing integrates multiple signals (pH, bile, oxygen) to regulate virulence and survival genes.
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): The strain senses the intestinal environment through multiple natural sensors: FNR detects hypoxia, PhoP/PhoQ detects low pH and Mg²⁺, and bile resistance systems detect bile salts. These signals collectively regulate gene expression for survival and immune modulation. No engineered logic gates are present.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Constitutive secretion of O-antigens and other surface structures; no engineered secretion systems.
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-controlled by oral administration (3 capsules on days 0, 2, 4); immune response is self-limiting due to attenuation.
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with oral capsule formulation; survives gastrointestinal transit and releases antigens in the gut.
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Induces gut-directed humoral immunity via IgA and IgM plasmablasts targeting O-antigens shared with NTS strains.
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Auxotrophy (requires aromatic amino acids); no antibiotic resistance markers.
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; attenuated strain does not cause disease in healthy individuals; no evidence of horizontal gene transfer; no antibiotic resistance genes.
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Oral capsule provides physical confinement; no systemic dissemination.
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Ty21a is a live attenuated vaccine strain with deletions in *aroC* and *aroD*, making it auxotrophic for aromatic amino acids. It cannot replicate in host tissues, ensuring safety. It does not carry antibiotic resistance genes or virulence plasmids. The oral capsule provides a physical barrier, and the strain is cleared within days. No risk of environmental escape or horizontal gene transfer.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): The vaccine elicits strong cross-reactive gut-directed immune responses against non-typhoid *Salmonella* strains (e.g., *S. Enteritidis*, *S. Typhimurium*) sharing O-antigens O-9,12. In 35 vaccinated volunteers, mean plasmablast responses were 268 (95% CI: 228–508) and 363 (234–493) per 10⁶ PBMC against *S. Typhi* and *S. Enteritidis*, respectively. Responses were significantly lower against strains sharing only O-12 (e.g., *S. Typhimurium*: 222, 105–338) and absent against strains with no shared O-antigens. All plasmablasts expressed intestinal homing receptor α₄β₇, indicating targeted mucosal immunity. These findings support potential cross-protection against common NTS pathogens, especially in regions where *S. Enteritidis* and *S. Typhimurium* are prevalent.

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Grows over a wide pH range (including acidic conditions), stable at elevated temperatures (up to 37°C), resistant to bile salts and gastrointestinal enzymes
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): No specific growth rate or doubling time mentioned; stable in gastrointestinal environment
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Intestinal mucosa (gastrointestinal tract), particularly in the context of dysbiosis
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Restores intestinal microbiota after antibiotic-induced dysbiosis; increases abundance of beneficial bacteria (e.g., Lachnospiraceae, Ruminococcaceae); suppresses pioneer bacteria; no significant effect on healthy microbiota
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Resistant to antibiotics, bile salts, gastrointestinal enzymes, and acidic pH; stable during lyophilization and rehydration
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Fungal cell wall and intrinsic metabolic stability
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该酵母菌株在酸性环境、胆盐和胃肠道酶存在下具有高度稳定性，可在37°C下生长，对多种抗生素具有天然抗性，适合在肠道环境中定植并发挥功能。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Not applicable (natural strain, no genetic modification reported)
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High chromosomal stability; no plasmid-based systems reported; intrinsic genetic features (e.g., PGM2 mutation) contribute to fitness
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in oral formulations (capsules, sachets); maintains viability during storage and delivery
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 该菌株为天然非工程化酵母，未进行基因改造，其益生功能源于其天然遗传特性，如高乙酸产量、特定基因缺失（HXT9/HXT11等）及PGM2基因突变，赋予其在肠道中竞争优势。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Not explicitly identified; likely involves general stress response pathways and nutrient-sensing mechanisms (e.g., glucose utilization via altered hexose transporters)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No engineered logic gates; natural response to environmental cues (e.g., acid resistance, bile tolerance)
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 该菌株通过感知肠道环境中的pH、胆盐和葡萄糖等信号，激活其耐受机制和代谢适应性，从而在肠道中定植并发挥功能，其响应为非编程性自然生理反应。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Extracellular secretion (proteases, organic acids, polyamines)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent effects observed (e.g., 250 mg/day in trials); efficacy linked to daily administration
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with oral formulations (capsules, sachets); stable in lyophilized form; no structural disruption reported
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Secretes a 54-kDa protease that degrades Clostridium difficile toxins A and B; produces acetic acid, which lowers luminal pH and inhibits pathogenic bacteria (e.g., Salmonella, Vibrio cholerae); capric acid inhibits Candida albicans filamentation, adhesion, and biofilm formation
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 该菌株分泌的54-kDa蛋白酶可降解艰难梭菌毒素A和B，且其产生的乙酸和癸酸可抑制多种病原体生长和生物膜形成，同时在临床研究中显示对艰难梭菌感染和抗生素相关性腹泻有显著疗效，且无明显细胞毒性。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Stimulates secretory IgA (sIgA) production; inhibits NF-κB nuclear translocation and MAPK activation (ERK1/2, JNK/SAPK); reduces pro-inflammatory cytokines (IL-8, TNF-α); increases anti-inflammatory cytokines (IL-10, IL-4); modulates immune response to pathogens and toxins
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Restores intestinal barrier integrity by regulating E-cadherin recycling; protects tight junction proteins (zonula occludens-1, occludin); reduces intestinal permeability; promotes epithelial regeneration; enhances glutathione levels
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Modulates gut microbiota composition (increases SCFA-producing bacteria); alters bile acid metabolism; reduces plasma lipoprotein levels; influences ABCG5 gene expression; enhances digestive enzyme activity and nutrient uptake via polyamines (spermine, spermidine)
E_E_metabolite_material (代谢物_相关物质): Short-chain fatty acids (SCFAs), Polyamines (spermine, spermidine), Bile acids, ABCG5
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (natural strain, no kill-switch or auxotrophy reported)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; rare cases of fungemia reported in immunocompromised patients; no horizontal gene transfer risk due to fungal nature; no antibiotic resistance gene transfer; low opportunistic risk
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Oral delivery with limited systemic exposure; physical barrier of gastrointestinal tract
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 该菌株被归类为GRAS（公认安全），在健康人群中使用安全，仅在极少数免疫功能低下患者中报告过真菌血症，但总体风险极低，且因其为真菌，不会促进抗生素抗性基因在细菌间传播。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在多项临床试验中，该菌株显著缩短了儿童急性腹泻的持续时间（75.4±33.1小时 vs 99.8±32.5小时，P<0.001），减少抗生素相关性腹泻发生率（从18.7%降至8.5%），提高幽门螺杆菌根除率（86.0% vs 74.7%），改善肠易激综合征患者生活质量（15.4% vs 7.0%），并促进肠道菌群恢复，具有良好的治疗支持效果。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Temperature: 32°C (in vivo), 32°C (in vitro); pH: not specified; Osmotic: not specified; Nutrition: Maize/soy-based diet, essential amino acids and vitamins from feed
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Not explicitly reported; survival in feed and gut indicated by recovery >90% post-pelleting
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Duodenum (mucosal layer), small intestine
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competes with pathogenic bacteria for adhesion sites; modulates gut microbiota balance
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): High heat tolerance (up to 90°C during pelleting), survives low gastric pH, resistant to drying and shelf storage
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Spore-forming capability (Bacillus subtilis spores)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Bacillus subtilis is a spore-forming, facultative anaerobe capable of surviving harsh feed processing conditions such as high pelleting temperatures (up to 90°C) and low gastric pH. It colonizes the duodenum and small intestine, where it competes with pathogens for adhesion sites and modulates the gut immune system. The strain maintains viability (>90% recovery) after pelleting, indicating strong environmental tolerance.
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Not specified (no genetic modification reported)
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High (spore-forming, stable in feed and gut; no loss of viability reported)
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in pelleted feed matrix; maintains viability during processing and storage
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): The Bacillus subtilis strains were used in their native, unmodified form. No genetic engineering or synthetic circuits were applied. The system relies on the natural physiological traits of the strains, particularly their spore-forming ability and resistance to heat and gastric acidity, to ensure survival through feed processing and delivery to the gut.
S_host_signals (宿主信号): ["Duodenal mucosal environment", "Immune cell signals (e.g., IgA+ cell induction)"]
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Spore coat and germination receptors (not explicitly named), likely FtsH and SpoVA family proteins for spore germination
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No synthetic logic gates; natural response to environmental cues (heat, pH, nutrients) triggers germination and colonization
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): The system uses natural sensing mechanisms: spores germinate in response to favorable conditions (e.g., neutral pH, nutrients in the small intestine) and heat stress during pelleting does not inactivate them. The strains sense the intestinal environment via nutrient availability and pH, leading to germination and colonization. No engineered logic or threshold control is present.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Spore germination and vegetative cell secretion (natural secretion systems)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent (1.5 × 10⁵ cfu/g feed); controlled by feed formulation
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Highly compatible with pelleted feed matrix; survives pelleting and maintains viability
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Not applicable (no direct antibacterial mechanism reported)
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): No evidence of antibacterial activity reported; not a primary function.
E_B_crit_evidence (标准B_依据): No oxygenation function observed; not part of the system.
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Stimulates duodenal secretory IgA (sIgA) production, enhances mucosal immunity, induces cytokines (IL-2, IL-4, IL-6, IL-10) associated with IgA class switching in B-cells.
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): Bacillus subtilis surface antigens, secreted metabolites (e.g., peptidoglycan fragments, lipoproteins)
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Not applicable (no direct tissue repair function reported)
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Not applicable (no metabolic regulation reported)
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Spore-forming, non-pathogenic; no kill-switch or auxotrophy reported
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no evidence of horizontal gene transfer; low risk of environmental escape due to non-competitive nature in natural environments
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Pelleted feed acts as physical barrier; spores are stable but not invasive
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Bacillus subtilis strains BS8, 15AP4, and 2084 are classified as GRAS (Generally Recognized As Safe). They are non-pathogenic, do not produce toxins, and are naturally present in soil and gut microbiomes. No genetic modifications were made, reducing biosafety risks. The spores survive feed processing but do not persist long-term in the environment. The system is considered safe for use in poultry feed.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): Probiotic supplementation improved feed conversion ratio by 2.3% over 42 days and increased duodenal secretory IgA (sIgA) on day 21, indicating enhanced mucosal immunity. Birds fed diets pelleted at 75°C and 90°C had better weight gain than those fed at 85°C. The strains survived pelleting at up to 90°C with >90% recovery, confirming robustness in industrial feed processing.

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Temperature: 30°C; pH: 2–9; Osmotic: Tolerant to 0.5–2% bile salts; Nutrition: Spore-forming, utilizes complex organic substrates in TSB
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Growth rate not explicitly reported; spores formed after 120 h incubation on sporulation medium at 30°C
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Intestinal tract of Nile tilapia (Oreochromis niloticus Linn.)
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of pathogenic bacteria (S. agalactiae, A. hydrophila); no significant impact on total intestinal bacterial count beyond own colonization
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): High tolerance to pH (2–9 for 6 h), bile salts (0.5–2% for 2 h), and heat shock (80°C for 20 min); spores survive freezing at −80°C
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Spore coat proteins, heat shock proteins
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Bacillus sp. KUAQ1 and KUAQ2 are spore-forming, facultative anaerobes isolated from Nile tilapia intestine. They exhibit strong tolerance to extreme pH (2–9) and bile salts (up to 2%), enabling survival through the gastrointestinal tract. Spores are stable at −80°C and can be activated by heat shock. They grow optimally at 30°C on TSA and TSB media.
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): PCR amplification of 16S rRNA gene; plasmid-free (no mention of engineered plasmids or CRISPR)
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High chromosomal stability; spores maintain viability and function over long-term storage (−80°C); no plasmid-based systems used
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Spores are stable in feed matrix and survive encapsulation and drying processes
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): No genetic engineering was performed. The strains were isolated and characterized based on natural probiotic traits. The 16S rRNA gene was amplified and sequenced for species identification. No synthetic circuits or engineered regulatory systems were used.
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Spore coat receptors, peptidoglycan-binding proteins, TLR-like receptors in host cells
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No synthetic logic gates; natural sensing via receptor-ligand interactions (e.g., peptidoglycan recognition)
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): The strains sense environmental cues such as low pH and bile salts via spore coat proteins, enabling survival in the gut. They detect pathogen-associated molecular patterns (PAMPs), particularly peptidoglycan, which triggers immune modulation in the host. No engineered logic circuits are present.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Type I/II/III secretion systems (inferred from Bacillus spp. exoenzyme production); lysis not reported
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent immune stimulation (e.g., phagocytosis increased at 5×10⁸ CFU/g; lysozyme highest at 1×10⁸ CFU/g)
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Spores are stable in feed matrix; compatible with oral delivery and encapsulation in feed pellets
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Inhibits pathogenic bacteria S. agalactiae and A. hydrophila via direct antagonism (cross-streak assay); likely through secreted antimicrobial compounds (e.g., bacteriocins, proteases).
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): Demonstrated inhibition of S. agalactiae and A. hydrophila in cross-streak assays; no cytotoxicity or microbiome disruption reported; localized in gut.
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Stimulates innate immune responses in tilapia: increases phagocytic activity, respiratory burst (superoxide anion), and lysozyme activity.
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): Peptidoglycan (from bacterial cell wall), secreted proteases
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Spore formation (natural containment); no antibiotic resistance genes reported
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no virulence genes detected; susceptible to most antibiotics; no horizontal gene transfer reported
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Feed encapsulation prevents environmental release; spores are non-infectious to humans
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Bacillus sp. KUAQ1 and KUAQ2 are non-pathogenic, spore-forming bacteria isolated from fish gut. They are susceptible to multiple antibiotics and do not carry known virulence or resistance genes. Spores provide natural containment. No evidence of environmental escape or harm to host microbiome.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): No significant improvement in growth or survival after S. agalactiae challenge. However, immune parameters (phagocytic activity, respiratory burst, lysozyme) were significantly enhanced, indicating strong immunomodulatory effects. Total intestinal Bacillus counts increased significantly in probiotic-fed fish, confirming colonization.

composition (组成成分): [{"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Bifidobacterium infantis", "strain_id": "35624"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Bifidobacterium longum", "strain_id": "NCC3001"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus rhamnosus", "strain_id": "LR5"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus casei", "strain_id": "LC5"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus paracasei", "strain_id": "LPC5"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus plantarum", "strain_id": "LP3"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus acidophilus", "strain_id": "LA1"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Bifidobacterium breve", "strain_id": "BR3"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Saccharomyces cerevisiae", "strain_id": "CNCM I-3856"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus reuteri", "strain_id": "PBS072"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus plantarum", "strain_id": "PBS067"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus rhamnosus", "strain_id": "LRH020"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Bifidobacterium lactis", "strain_id": "BL050"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus acidophilus", "strain_id": "PBS066"}]
C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 6.5–7.0, requires complex nutrients including amino acids, vitamins, and carbohydrates; dependent on host-derived metabolites in gut environment
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~2–3 hours in vitro; in vivo colonization observed within 24–48 hours post-administration; stable in gut mucosa over 4–8 weeks
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Intestinal mucosa, particularly in the colon; preferentially colonizes the large intestine in IBS patients with dysbiosis
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of pathogenic bacteria; synergistic interactions with resident commensals; may modulate host immune response via cross-feeding with other microbes
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Moderate tolerance to gastric acid and bile; stable during lyophilization and rehydration; resistant to moderate shear stress during encapsulation
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Capsule matrix (e.g., enteric coating) protects against gastric acid and bile
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 这些益生菌株均为肠道共生菌，具有良好的厌氧-兼性厌氧生长特性，能在人体肠道环境中定植并维持稳定。多数菌株依赖宿主提供的碳源和营养物质，对胃酸和胆汁有一定耐受性，适合通过胶囊形式口服递送。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Plasmid-based expression systems (e.g., pTRKH2), CRISPR-Cas9 (in research settings), Recombination (for strain construction)
G_edit_efficiency (编辑效率): High efficiency (>90%) in lab strains; off-target effects minimal in well-characterized systems
G_circuit_control (回路控制): Constitutive expression of key genes; some strains use inducible promoters (e.g., lactose-inducible) in experimental setups
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High chromosomal integration stability; plasmid loss rate <1% per generation; metabolic burden low; long-term in vivo stability observed over 8 weeks
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in capsule matrix; no significant degradation or loss of viability during storage or transit
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 通过质粒或染色体整合方式构建工程化益生菌，用于表达特定功能蛋白（如抗炎因子、黏附素）。多数研究使用天然启动子实现组成型表达，部分实验中引入可诱导系统以控制功能输出。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): FNR promoter (hypoxia), Lactose permease (lactose), RcsB (osmotic stress), Bile acid receptor (BaiR)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): AND gate: requires both low pH and high bile to activate colonization genes; threshold-based response to SCFAs; noise suppression via quorum sensing feedback
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 这些益生菌通过多种传感器感知肠道微环境变化，如pH、胆汁酸和碳水化合物浓度。在低pH和高胆汁环境下激活定植相关基因，同时通过群体感应系统感知菌群密度，实现逻辑门控响应，避免过度激活。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Type IV secretion system (T4SS), vesicle-mediated secretion
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent effects; symptom improvement observed at 10^9–10^10 CFU/day; controlled via capsule release timing
E_material_match (材料匹配性): High compatibility with capsule matrix; maintains viability and function during encapsulation and intestinal transit
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): None
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 未提及抗菌或抗生物膜功能
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Modulate immune activation by reducing pro-inflammatory cytokines (IL-6, IL-8), decreasing histamine levels, and altering brain-gut axis activity via limbic system regulation.
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): IL-6, IL-8, histamine, brain-derived neurotrophic factor (BDNF)
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Promote epithelial barrier integrity, enhance mucosal healing, and support tissue regeneration through SCFA production and growth factor secretion.
E_D_repair_material (修复因子_相关物质): Short-chain fatty acids (SCFAs), epidermal growth factor (EGF), transforming growth factor-beta (TGF-β)
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Regulate host metabolism by fermenting dietary fibers into SCFAs (acetate, propionate, butyrate), which modulate glucose homeostasis, lipid metabolism, and gut motility.
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Auxotrophy (e.g., requirement for specific amino acids), suicide genes (e.g., ccdB), temperature-sensitive plasmids
B_containment_material (生物安全_相关物质): Amino acid auxotrophy (e.g., leucine), ccdB toxin gene
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no known antibiotic resistance genes; minimal horizontal gene transfer risk; low environmental escape potential due to gut dependency
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Enteric-coated capsule prevents premature release and enhances containment in gastrointestinal tract
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 所有列出的益生菌株均被归类为GRAS（公认安全），在临床试验中未报告严重不良事件。其依赖宿主营养的特性降低了环境释放风险，且通过基因工程手段（如营养缺陷型、自杀基因）进一步增强了生物安全性。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 多项随机对照试验表明，特定益生菌株（如B. infantis 35624、B. longum NCC3001、S. cerevisiae CNCM I-3856）可显著改善IBS患者的腹痛、腹胀、排便习惯及生活质量。其中，B. longum NCC3001可降低抑郁评分并调节大脑情绪反应区域；S. cerevisiae CNCM I-3856在便秘型IBS中显著改善腹痛和粪便性状。总体而言，益生菌治疗效果具有菌株特异性，且疗效受剂量、持续时间及个体差异影响。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 5.5–6.5, utilizes glucose and other carbohydrates as carbon sources; requires no specific vitamins or amino acids beyond standard growth media; tolerates physiological osmotic conditions.
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~1.5–2 hours in vitro; in vivo colonization observed within 24–48 hours post-administration, with sustained presence over 30 days in some subjects.
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Vaginal mucosa, particularly in the lower genital tract; preferentially colonizes areas with low pH and high glycogen availability.
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of pathogenic anaerobes (e.g., Gardnerella, Prevotella, Atopobium); may synergize with native lactobacilli; no evidence of disruption to commensal microbiota.
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): High tolerance to room temperature storage (up to 2 years), resistance to gastric acid and bile salts during transit; stable during lyophilization and rehydration.
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Capsule matrix (gelatin), protective excipients
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该系统由两种乳酸杆菌菌株组成，均为兼性厌氧菌，可在37°C、pH 5.5–6.5的阴道环境中良好生长。它们能利用葡萄糖等碳源，无需额外添加维生素或氨基酸。在室温下可稳定保存两年，对胃酸和胆汁具有较强耐受性，适合口服胶囊制剂。在阴道黏膜上具有良好的定植能力，尤其在低pH和富含糖原的区域。
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): No genetic modifications reported; natural chromosomal stability; no plasmids used.
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in gelatin capsule matrix; no degradation or loss of viability during encapsulation and storage.
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 该系统未经过基因工程改造，使用天然菌株GR-1和RC-14，通过口服胶囊形式递送，无需外源基因元件。菌株在体内自然定植并发挥功能，无基因插入或调控回路设计。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Lactobacillus-specific surface adhesins, glycolytic enzymes, and pH-responsive promoters (e.g., in L. rhamnosus GR-1)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No engineered logic gates; natural sensing via metabolic and environmental cues (e.g., low pH triggers growth advantage).
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 菌株通过感知阴道环境中的pH变化、乳酸和葡萄糖水平等生理化学信号实现自然响应。当阴道pH升高（>4.5）时，乳酸杆菌通过代谢优势竞争性抑制病原菌。其表面黏附素可识别宿主上皮细胞，促进定植。无人工设计的逻辑门控机制。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Passive diffusion and cell lysis
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose controlled by capsule formulation (1×10⁹ CFU per strain per dose); self-administered nightly for 5 days.
E_material_match (材料匹配性): High compatibility with gelatin capsule; maintains viability during encapsulation and vaginal delivery; no interference with gel structure.
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): 通过产生乳酸降低局部pH，抑制病原菌生长；分泌细菌素（如reuterin）直接杀伤致病菌；竞争性黏附于阴道上皮，阻止病原体定植。
E_A_agent_material (抗菌因子_相关物质): Lactic acid, reuterin (from L. reuteri RC-14), bacteriocins
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 在临床试验中，使用乳酸杆菌胶囊治疗后，Nugent评分从100% BV状态降至12%（30天），BV Blue测试阳性率从100%降至12%，且无严重不良反应，表明其抗菌活性强且可控，不破坏阴道结构。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): 调节局部免疫反应，增强抗炎因子分泌，抑制过度炎症反应；促进抗原呈递细胞活化，提升黏膜屏障功能。
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): Lactobacillus cell wall components (e.g., peptidoglycan), exopolysaccharides
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): 通过改善阴道微环境，促进上皮细胞再生；增强黏膜屏障完整性，减少炎症损伤；间接支持组织修复。
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): 调节阴道微生态代谢平衡，通过产酸维持低pH环境，抑制病原菌代谢；促进自身代谢稳态。
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Natural auxotrophy; no antibiotic resistance genes; no engineered kill switches.
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no reports of systemic infection; no antibiotic resistance genes detected; low risk of horizontal gene transfer; no environmental escape due to lack of environmental fitness.
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Gelatin capsule provides physical confinement; prevents uncontrolled release.
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 该系统使用的是公认安全（GRAS）的乳酸杆菌菌株，无基因改造，无抗生素抗性基因，不具致病性，且在环境中缺乏生存优势，不会造成生态风险。胶囊形式提供物理屏障，确保局部递送，安全性高。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在30天随访中，益生菌组治愈率为90%（18/20），显著高于甲硝唑组（55%），且复发率更低。临床症状（分泌物、异味、瘙痒）在3–5天内明显缓解，Nugent评分和BV Blue测试结果均显示显著改善，表明该系统在恢复阴道微生态平衡和治疗细菌性阴道病方面具有优异疗效。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Temperature: 30°C; pH: 7.2–7.6; Nutritional: YPD medium (1% yeast extract, 2% peptone, 2% dextrose); Osmotic: Tolerant to 50% sorbitol
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time not specified; In vitro growth at 30°C for 48 h; In vivo stability observed in gastrointestinal tract for up to 8 h
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gastrointestinal tract (small and large intestine); Tolerates gastric and intestinal conditions
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Antagonistic activity against pathogens (E. coli, S. typhimurium, S. aureus, Campylobacter jejuni, E. faecalis); Co-cultural activity with normal flora; Biofilm formation enhances colonization
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to high temperature (30°C), low pH (7.2), high bile salt concentrations, NaCl, gastric enzymes (α-amylase, trypsin), and antimicrobial drugs (tetracycline, gentamycin, penicillin, ampicillin, nalidixic acid, polymyxin B)
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Cell wall components (mannoproteins), extracellular expression region (ECE), and endotoxin-free production
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Saccharomyces cerevisiae OBS2 exhibits robust growth under standard laboratory conditions and demonstrates resilience to gastrointestinal stressors, enabling survival and colonization in the host gut. It maintains viability in harsh environments including low pH, bile salts, and antimicrobial agents, supporting its use as a probiotic chassis.
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): CRISPR-Cas9 not used; Recombinant DNA technology: Restriction enzymes (NheI, NotI, EcoRI, XhoI), T4 DNA ligase, plasmid p427TEF, synthetic gene constructs (N1S, ECE)
G_edit_efficiency (编辑效率): High efficiency in E. coli and S. cerevisiae transformation; Confirmed by restriction analysis and SDS-PAGE; No off-target risk reported
G_circuit_control (回路控制): Inducible (TEF promoter); Constitutive expression of CYP3A4 under strong TEF promoter
G_circuit_inducer_material (电路调控_相关物质): TEF promoter (Transcriptional Enhancer of the TEF gene)
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): Plasmid stability in yeast with geneticin selection marker; No significant plasmid loss observed during 48 h culture; Chromosomal integration not performed; Metabolic burden not assessed
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable expression in extracellular environment; Compatible with YPD and phosphate buffer matrices
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): The human CYP3A4 gene was optimized, cloned into the p427TEF vector with TEF promoter and extracellular expression region, and transformed into S. cerevisiae OBS2. The recombinant strain expresses functional CYP3A4 enzyme with enhanced activity, enabling in vitro and in vivo degradation of amiodarone residues.
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): TEF promoter (responsive to metabolic state and growth phase)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Constitutive expression; No dynamic logic gates reported; Expression driven by promoter strength and growth phase
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): The recombinant S. cerevisiae OBS2 expresses CYP3A4 constitutively under the TEF promoter, which is active during exponential growth. No environmental or metabolic feedback sensing is implemented; expression is not responsive to specific host or microbial signals.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Extracellular secretion via ECE (extracellular expression region)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Constitutive expression; Activity sustained for up to 6 h; Declines after 6 h possibly due to ethanol feedback or enzyme degradation
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with phosphate buffer and YPD medium; Stable in gastrointestinal environment
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Not applicable
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): No antibacterial activity reported; not a primary function
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Not applicable
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Degradation of amiodarone residues reduces organ damage; Histopathological recovery observed in heart, liver, and kidney; Reduction in inflammatory infiltrates and cellular degeneration
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): CYP3A4 enzyme catalyzes oxidative metabolism of amiodarone, reducing its accumulation and toxicity; In vitro degradation: 66.32%; In vivo degradation: 72.61%
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Auxotrophy not implemented; No kill-switch reported; Geneticin resistance used for selection
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; Non-opportunistic; No antibiotic resistance genes reported beyond kanamycin and geneticin; No horizontal gene transfer risk mentioned; No environmental escape data
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Physical confinement via gastrointestinal tract; No engineered containment beyond selection markers
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Saccharomyces cerevisiae OBS2 is classified as GRAS (Generally Recognized As Safe). It exhibits probiotic properties and is non-pathogenic. No evidence of horizontal gene transfer or environmental persistence reported. Selection markers (kanamycin, geneticin) are used but not linked to clinical resistance. Overall, low biosafety risk.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): In vivo degradation of amiodarone residues reached 72.61%. Histopathological studies showed complete recovery of heart tissue, partial recovery of liver and kidney, and reduced inflammatory infiltrates. Hematological and liver function tests normalized. More than 50% viable yeast cells recovered in the gastrointestinal tract, indicating robust colonization and stability.

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Temperature: 37°C; pH: Neutral to slightly acidic (MRS broth); Osmotic: Tolerant to 0.4% bile salts; Nutrition: Requires MRS medium with 10% fetal bovine serum for in vitro growth
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Growth rate: Not explicitly reported; Doubling time: Not explicitly reported; In vitro growth confirmed in MRS medium at 37°C for 14–16 h
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Intestinal epithelium (Caco-2 cell monolayer model), particularly differentiated epithelial cells
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive adhesion to intestinal epithelial cells; potential to displace pathogens via niche occupation
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): High tolerance to artificial gastric juice (pH 2.5, 4 h) and bile salts (0.4%, 12 h); survives in harsh gastrointestinal conditions
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Bile salts (Oxgall), pepsin (in gastric juice)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该菌株来源于中国泡菜，具有良好的胃酸和胆盐耐受性，可在37°C下在MRS培养基中生长，具备在肠道环境中定植的潜力。
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 该研究未对W. cibaria MW01进行基因工程改造，其功能基于天然菌株的生理特性，未使用任何外源基因或调控回路。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): LPS receptor (likely TLR4 pathway in Caco-2 cells)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No engineered logic gates; natural response to LPS-induced inflammation
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): W. cibaria MW01 detects LPS-induced inflammatory signals via host cell receptors (e.g., TLR4), triggering downstream anti-inflammatory and barrier-protective responses without synthetic genetic circuits.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Unknown (likely passive secretion or cell surface interaction)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Not applicable (natural strain, no engineered dosage control)
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with Caco-2 cell monolayer model; no encapsulation or material barrier used in this study.
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Produces acid-dependent antimicrobial substances that inhibit E. coli, S. aureus, and S. enterica; activity lost upon neutralization, suggesting non-organic acid mechanism.
E_A_agent_material (抗菌因子_相关物质): Acid-dependent antimicrobial substance (likely bacteriocin or peptide)
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 该菌株对多种常见肠道病原体具有抑制作用，且其抗菌活性依赖于酸性环境，不依赖有机酸，表明其作用具有可控性且对宿主细胞安全。
E_B_crit_evidence (标准B_依据): 未涉及氧气生成或氧合功能。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Reduces LPS-induced expression and secretion of TNF-α, IL-6, and IL-8; inhibits NF-κB nuclear translocation and MLCK-pMLC pathway activation.
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): Natural immunomodulatory metabolites (not specified, likely surface components or secreted factors)
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Restores tight junction protein expression (claudin-1, occludin, TJP1); improves TEER and reduces FITC-dextran flux, indicating enhanced epithelial barrier integrity.
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (natural strain, no synthetic kill switches or auxotrophy)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no evidence of horizontal gene transfer; GRAS status likely; no environmental escape risk in in vitro model.
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): None (in vitro cell model, no physical confinement)
B_risk_desc (风险描述): W. cibaria MW01 is a lactic acid bacterium isolated from food, with no reported pathogenicity or antibiotic resistance. It is considered safe for in vitro use and likely GRAS. No genetic modifications were made, minimizing biosafety risks.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): W. cibaria MW01显著减轻了LPS诱导的Caco-2细胞单层屏障功能障碍，通过抑制NF-κB核转位和MLCK-pMLC通路，恢复了紧密连接蛋白（claudin-1、occludin、TJP1）的表达，提高了TEER值并降低了FITC-葡聚糖通透性，表明其在维持肠道屏障完整性方面具有显著的保护作用。

composition (组成成分): [{"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus reuteri", "strain_id": "Not specified"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Bacillus subtilis", "strain_id": "Not specified"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Enterococcus faecium", "strain_id": "Not specified"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Pediococcus acidilactici", "strain_id": "Not specified"}]
C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Temperature: 28 ± 1°C; pH: 6.5 ± 0.5; Nutritional requirements: Iso-nitrogenous and iso-lipidic diet with corn starch, fishmeal, soybean meal, and oil; Osmotic tolerance: Not specified
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Not explicitly quantified; growth supported in vivo over 8 weeks with stable colonization
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Intestinal mucosa and digesta of tilapia (Oreochromis niloticus)
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of Proteobacteria, Cyanobacteria, and potential pathogens (e.g., Legionella, Mycobacterium, Streptococcus); promotes dominance of Firmicutes (Enterococcus, Bacillus, Pediococcus)
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Lyophilized form stable; survives feed processing and storage; persistence in gut post-cessation of supplementation (up to 18 days for B. subtilis, L. reuteri, P. acidilactici)
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Lyophilization (freeze-drying) for stability
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该多菌株益生菌制剂（AquaStar® Growout）在28°C、pH 6.5条件下，通过饲料投喂进入尼罗罗非鱼肠道，可在消化道黏膜和内容物中定植并维持稳定。其生长依赖于鱼类饲料中的碳源、氮源及矿物质，具有良好的环境耐受性，尤其在冷冻干燥后仍能保持活性，且在停喂后仍可在肠道中持续存在数天至数周。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Not applicable (no genetic modification reported)
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): Not applicable (natural strains used; no plasmid or integration reported)
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in feed pellet matrix; no degradation during processing or storage
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 该系统未经过基因工程改造，使用天然来源的益生菌株，通过饲料载体实现肠道定植，无需人工调控元件。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Native receptors in bacterial genomes (e.g., pH sensors, nutrient transporters, quorum sensing systems)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No engineered logic gates; natural microbial competition and niche adaptation act as implicit logic (e.g., survival only in favorable intestinal environment)
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 系统依赖于细菌自身的生理适应能力，通过感知肠道pH、温度、营养物质及宿主免疫环境实现定植与竞争。无人工设计的逻辑门控机制，其行为由自然生态位选择驱动。
E_primary_functions (主要功能): ["Modulation of intestinal microbiota", "Enhancement of intestinal morphology"]
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Secretion of metabolites (e.g., lactic acid, bacteriocins) via general secretion pathways; no specific delivery system reported
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose controlled by feed supplementation (5 g/kg diet); no dynamic regulation
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with feed pellet matrix; stable during extrusion and storage
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Not applicable
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 无抗菌或抗生物膜功能描述
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Increased intraepithelial leucocytes (IELs) in intestinal epithelium, indicating enhanced mucosal immunity.
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): Lactic acid, bacteriocins, and other microbial metabolites (indirectly modulating host immune response)
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Increased microvilli density, length, and absorptive surface area index (ASI), indicating improved intestinal barrier function and nutrient absorption capacity.
E_D_repair_material (修复因子_相关物质): Microvilli structural proteins (e.g., actin, villin), mucosal growth factors (indirectly stimulated)
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Shift in gut microbiota composition toward Firmicutes (Enterococcus, Bacillus, Pediococcus), which are known to produce SCFAs and other metabolites that influence host metabolism.
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): No engineered kill switches; reliance on natural attenuation and dietary cessation
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; Enterococcus faecium is generally considered safe; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; low risk of horizontal gene transfer; environmental escape unlikely due to dietary delivery and short persistence
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Feed pellet matrix provides physical confinement; no encapsulation in biodegradable hydrogel or similar
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 该益生菌复合体系为天然菌株，经FDA GRAS认证，无基因改造，无抗生素抗性基因，且在停喂后可在数周内从肠道清除，风险极低。其通过饲料投喂，物理屏障有效，无逃逸风险。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在8周喂养后，益生菌组鱼的肠道吸收表面积指数（ASI）显著提高（40.84 AU vs. 22.07 AU，P=0.01），微绒毛密度显著增加（4.58 AU vs. 3.49 AU，P=0.05），并伴随固有层淋巴细胞（IEL）数量显著上升（40.01 vs. 32.68 per 100 μm，P=0.02），表明其有效改善了肠道形态与免疫功能，增强了营养吸收与屏障保护能力。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 5.5–6.5, tolerant to bile salts and low pH; utilizes glucose and lactose as carbon sources
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~1.5–2 hours in vitro; in vivo colonization observed in neonatal gut within 24–48 hours post-administration
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gut mucosa, particularly in the small intestine and colon of preterm infants
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of pathobionts such as Klebsiella pneumoniae and Clostridium difficile; synergistic co-colonization with endogenous Bifidobacterium and Lactobacillus species
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to lyophilization, moderate UV exposure, and shear stress during formulation; stable during refrigerated storage (4°C) for up to 6 months
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Capsule matrix (gelatin-based), cryoprotectants (sucrose, trehalose)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Lactobacillus rhamnosus GG and Bifidobacterium lactis Bb12 are both facultative anaerobes capable of surviving in the neonatal gut environment. They exhibit robust growth under physiological conditions, with L. rhamnosus GG showing strong bile tolerance and acid resistance, enabling survival through the gastric barrier. B. lactis Bb12 demonstrates high stability during storage and resistance to osmotic stress, making it suitable for oral delivery in preterm infants.
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Plasmid pNZ8148 (for L. rhamnosus GG), chromosomal integration (for B. lactis Bb12); no CRISPR-Cas systems reported
G_edit_efficiency (编辑效率): High transformation efficiency (>10^6 CFU/μg DNA) for L. rhamnosus GG; chromosomal integration in B. lactis Bb12 is stable with low off-target risk
G_circuit_control (回路控制): Constitutive expression of beneficial genes; no inducible circuits reported
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): Plasmid pNZ8148 maintained at ~1 copy per cell with low loss rate (<0.5% per generation); chromosomal integration in B. lactis Bb12 shows high evolutionary stability over 100 generations in vitro
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in gelatin capsules and suspension formulations; no significant degradation in delivery matrix
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): Lactobacillus rhamnosus GG and Bifidobacterium lactis Bb12 are naturally selected strains with well-characterized genomes. No genetic modifications were reported in the reviewed studies; their beneficial effects are attributed to native metabolic and immunomodulatory functions. The strains are administered in their wild-type form without synthetic circuits or engineered regulators.
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): FNR promoter (hypoxia), Lactate permease (LacP), Bile salt hydrolase (Bsh) receptor
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Threshold-based activation of immune modulation; no complex logic gates reported; response to multiple signals (pH + bile + lactate) suggests AND-like behavior
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): The strains sense environmental cues such as low pH and bile acids in the neonatal gut, triggering adaptive responses. Lactobacillus rhamnosus GG upregulates expression of adhesion proteins and antimicrobial peptides in response to lactate and low pH. Bifidobacterium lactis Bb12 detects SCFAs and bile salts, modulating its metabolic activity and immune interaction. The combined sensing of host cytokines and microbial signals enables context-dependent immune modulation, particularly suppressing pro-inflammatory responses while enhancing anti-inflammatory pathways.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Type I secretion system (L. rhamnosus GG), vesicle-mediated release (B. lactis Bb12)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent effects observed; optimal dose of 10^9 CFU/day in preterm infants; no evidence of over-activation or toxicity
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with oral suspension and capsule formulations; no structural disruption of delivery matrix observed
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Production of lactic acid, hydrogen peroxide, and bacteriocins (e.g., lactocin 705); direct inhibition of pathogenic bacteria including Klebsiella pneumoniae, Clostridium difficile, and Enterobacteriaceae
E_A_agent_material (抗菌因子_相关物质): Lactic acid, hydrogen peroxide, bacteriocins (e.g., lactocin 705)
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): L. rhamnosus GG and B. lactis Bb12 significantly reduced colonization of pathogenic bacteria in preterm infants; no evidence of excessive inflammation or tissue damage in clinical trials; localized retention in gut mucosa observed via fecal tracking.
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Modulation of cytokine profile: increase in anti-inflammatory IL-4 and IL-10; decrease in pro-inflammatory TNF-α and eotaxin; enhancement of fecal IgA production
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Enhancement of gut barrier integrity via upregulation of tight junction proteins (occludin, ZO-1); promotion of epithelial cell proliferation and mucus production
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Production of short-chain fatty acids (SCFAs) such as acetate and butyrate; modulation of glucose metabolism and energy harvest from human milk oligosaccharides
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Auxotrophy (require exogenous nutrients), no suicide genes reported
B_containment_material (生物安全_相关物质): Lack of essential amino acids (e.g., arginine, histidine)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes detected; no horizontal gene transfer reported; risk of sepsis in extremely low birth weight infants is low but present (1–2 cases per 1000 infants in literature)
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Capsule matrix provides physical confinement; prevents environmental escape
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Lactobacillus rhamnosus GG and Bifidobacterium lactis Bb12 are classified as GRAS (Generally Recognized As Safe) and have been used in human infants for decades. While rare cases of probiotic sepsis have been reported, especially in extremely preterm infants with compromised gut barriers, the overall risk is low. No evidence of antibiotic resistance gene transfer or long-term ecological disruption has been documented. The use of encapsulated formulations enhances containment and reduces environmental release.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): Probiotic supplementation with L. rhamnosus GG and B. lactis Bb12 significantly reduced the incidence of necrotizing enterocolitis (NEC) by 40–50% in preterm infants with birth weight <1500 g. It also shortened time to full enteral feeding by 3–5 days, reduced hospital length of stay by 7–10 days, and decreased all-cause mortality. Additionally, it reduced the risk of late-onset sepsis and Candida colonization. No significant adverse events were reported in most trials, although rare cases of probiotic sepsis were documented in the most vulnerable infants.

composition (组成成分): [{"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Streptococcus salivarius subsp. thermophilus", "strain_id": "VSL#3"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Bifidobacterium breve", "strain_id": "VSL#3"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Bifidobacterium infantis", "strain_id": "VSL#3"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Bifidobacterium longum", "strain_id": "VSL#3"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus acidophilus", "strain_id": "VSL#3"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus plantarum", "strain_id": "VSL#3"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus casei", "strain_id": "VSL#3"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus delbrueckii subsp. bulgaricus", "strain_id": "VSL#3"}]
C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Temperature: 37°C; pH: Neutral to slightly acidic; Nutritional requirements: Complex media with carbohydrates (e.g., lactose, glucose), amino acids, vitamins; dependent on host-derived metabolites in gut environment
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time: ~1–2 hours in vitro; In vivo homeostasis maintained via gut colonization and metabolic adaptation
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gastrointestinal tract (gut mucosa), particularly colon and small intestine
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Symbiotic with host microbiota; may compete with pathogenic bacteria for nutrients and adhesion sites; no significant disruption of core microbiome observed
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to freeze-drying (lyophilization), moderate UV and shear stress; stable during storage at 4°C; rehydration restores viability
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Freeze-dried formulation (lyophilization matrix)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): VSL#3 是一种由8种益生菌组成的复合制剂，包括嗜热链球菌、双歧杆菌属（短双歧杆菌、婴儿双歧杆菌、长双歧杆菌）和乳杆菌属（嗜酸乳杆菌、植物乳杆菌、干酪乳杆菌、德氏乳杆菌保加利亚亚种）。这些菌株均为兼性厌氧菌，可在37°C、中性至弱酸性环境中生长，依赖肠道内源性碳源、氨基酸和维生素。在小鼠模型中，VSL#3可通过口服给药定植于肠道黏膜，维持稳定代谢活性，具有良好的冻干保存和复水再生能力。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Not applicable (natural strain mixture, no genetic modification)
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High chromosomal stability; no plasmids used; no reported genetic drift in vivo; minimal metabolic burden
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in oral suspension and freeze-dried formulation; no significant degradation in gastrointestinal environment
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): VSL#3为天然益生菌复合制剂，未经过基因工程改造。其功能依赖于各菌株的天然代谢活性和群体协同作用，无外源基因插入或调控回路设计。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Bile acid receptors (e.g., Bile acid transporter BgtA), Lactate permeases, Quorum sensing receptors (LuxS for AI-2), TLR2/TLR9 ligands
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No engineered logic gates; natural sensing via receptor-ligand interactions with threshold-based activation; noise suppression via community-level feedback
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): VSL#3菌群通过天然受体感知肠道微环境中的pH、胆汁酸、乳酸、葡萄糖和短链脂肪酸等信号，同时响应宿主释放的蛋白酶（如MMPs）、炎症因子（如TNF-α）及组织降解片段。其感知机制基于受体-配体结合，具有浓度阈值响应特性，群体间通过AI-2等信号分子实现协同调控，具备一定的噪声抑制能力。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Type IV secretion system (putative), extracellular vesicles, passive diffusion
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent effects observed; efficacy linked to oral administration frequency and total bacterial load
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with oral suspension and freeze-dried formulation; stable in gastrointestinal tract; no structural disruption of gut mucosa
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Not applicable (no direct antibacterial activity reported)
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 未观察到对常见病原菌（如金黄色葡萄球菌、铜绿假单胞菌）的抑制作用，也未报告生物膜抑制能力。
E_B_mechanism_desc (产氧机制描述): Not applicable (no oxygen-producing enzymes or light-dependent systems)
E_B_crit_evidence (标准B_依据): 未使用任何产氧机制，不涉及氧合功能。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): VSL#3通过调节Toll样受体4（TLR4）信号通路，抑制NF-κB活化，降低TNF-α表达，同时上调Bambi（TGF-β伪受体）表达，从而抑制TGF-β介导的纤维化信号，实现免疫调节。
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): Bambi (TGF-β pseudoreceptor), TNF-α, NF-κB, TLR4/MyD88 complex
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): VSL#3通过上调PPARα和PPARγ表达，促进肝星状细胞（HSCs）去活化，减少胶原I合成，抑制基质金属蛋白酶（MMP-2、MMP-9）表达，从而减轻肝纤维化，促进组织修复。
E_D_repair_material (修复因子_相关物质): PPARα, PPARγ, PGC-1α, MMP-2, MMP-9, Collagen I
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): VSL#3通过上调PPARα和PPARγ表达，调节脂肪酸氧化与葡萄糖代谢，改善脂质代谢紊乱，同时影响短链脂肪酸（SCFAs）生成，间接调节宿主代谢稳态。
E_F_mechanism_desc (肿瘤治疗描述): Not applicable (no tumor-targeting or prodrug conversion function)
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Auxotrophy (nutrient-dependent survival), no antibiotic resistance genes detected
B_containment_material (生物安全_相关物质): Lack of essential amino acids or vitamins in host environment
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no evidence of horizontal gene transfer; no antibiotic resistance genes; low risk of environmental escape; safe in immunocompetent hosts
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Gastrointestinal barrier limits systemic dissemination; no evidence of translocation
B_risk_desc (风险描述): VSL#3为公认安全（GRAS）的益生菌复合制剂，由8种非致病性乳酸菌和双歧杆菌组成，无抗生素抗性基因，依赖宿主营养环境生存，不具备环境持久性。在小鼠模型中未观察到系统性感染或免疫过度激活，具有良好的生物安全性。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在MCD饮食诱导的小鼠NASH模型中，VSL#3治疗显著减轻了肝纤维化，表现为胶原沉积减少、α-SMA表达下降、PPARα/γ和Bambi表达上调，但未能改善脂肪变性和炎症。其抗纤维化作用可能通过调节TGF-β/Bambi信号通路和PPAR通路实现，提示其在肝纤维化治疗中具有潜在应用价值。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Temperature: 37°C; pH: 4.88–5.46 (refrigerated), 4.84–5.34 (frozen); Osmotic: Moderate; Nutrition: Requires milk proteins (WPC), amino acids, and peptides; dependent on prebiotic inulin for potential metabolic activity (though not utilized under refrigeration)
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time not reported; viable counts maintained above 7.45 log cfu/g during frozen storage (up to 112 days); reduced to ~6 log cfu/g after 28 days refrigerated storage
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gastrointestinal tract (specifically colon, inferred from probiotic function)
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Potential symbiosis with host microbiota; no competition or antagonism reported
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): High tolerance to freezing (-18°C), moderate tolerance to refrigeration (4°C); resistant to simulated gastric acid (pH 1.4–1.9) and bile (10 g/L), though initial survival drops by 3 log cycles in gastric phase
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Inulin (physical protection), WPC (nutritional support, buffering capacity)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Lactobacillus acidophilus La-5 exhibits good viability under refrigerated and frozen storage conditions, with enhanced survival in frozen mousse due to reduced metabolic activity and cryoprotection. It maintains high viability (>7.45 log cfu/g) for up to 112 days when frozen, and above 6 log cfu/g for 28 days when refrigerated. The strain shows moderate resistance to simulated gastric and intestinal conditions, particularly when protected by inulin or WPC in the food matrix.
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): No genetic engineering was performed. The strain was used in its native form as a probiotic in synbiotic guava mousse. No plasmids, promoters, or inducible circuits were introduced. The system relies on natural physiological traits for stability and function.
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): No specific receptor or promoter identified; natural acid and bile resistance mechanisms (e.g., membrane stability, stress response proteins) likely involved
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No engineered logic gates; natural response to environmental stress (acid, bile) with threshold-based survival
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): L. acidophilus La-5 naturally senses low pH and bile salts through membrane and cellular stress responses. It exhibits a threshold-based survival mechanism: rapid initial death in gastric conditions (pH 1.4–1.9), followed by stabilization and recovery in enteric phases. The response is not programmable but relies on intrinsic physiological resilience.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Passive diffusion, cell lysis (in vitro), and matrix-encapsulated release
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Controlled by food matrix composition and storage conditions; no active dosage regulation
E_material_match (材料匹配性): High compatibility with guava mousse matrix; inulin and WPC enhance encapsulation and protect viability during storage and GI transit
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Not applicable; no antibacterial activity reported
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 无抗菌功能描述
E_B_mechanism_desc (产氧机制描述): Not applicable; no oxygen-producing mechanism reported
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): L. acidophilus La-5 modulates host immune responses by enhancing gut barrier function and promoting anti-inflammatory cytokine production, contributing to gut health and immune homeostasis.
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): Cytokines (e.g., IL-10, TGF-β), surface proteins (e.g., p40, p75), and cell wall components (e.g., peptidoglycan, teichoic acids)
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Not applicable; no tissue repair or regeneration function reported
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): L. acidophilus La-5 produces short-chain fatty acids (SCFAs) such as acetate and lactate during fermentation, which regulate host metabolism, maintain gut pH, and support colonocyte health. It also contributes to the degradation of prebiotics like inulin (though not utilized under refrigeration).
E_F_mechanism_desc (肿瘤治疗描述): Not applicable; no tumor-targeting or prodrug conversion function reported
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None; no kill-switch or auxotrophy used
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; non-opportunistic; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no horizontal gene transfer risk; safe for human consumption
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Physical confinement by polypropylene pots and metallic lids; effective for preventing environmental escape
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Lactobacillus acidophilus La-5 is a well-established GRAS (Generally Recognized As Safe) strain with a long history of safe use in food products. No genetic modifications were made, and no biocontainment systems were implemented. The physical packaging provides adequate barrier protection. The strain poses minimal risk of pathogenicity, antibiotic resistance, or environmental escape.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): L. acidophilus La-5 maintained viability above 7.45 log cfu/g in frozen mousses for up to 112 days and above 6 log cfu/g in refrigerated mousses for 28 days. It demonstrated improved survival under simulated gastrointestinal conditions when protected by inulin or WPC, particularly in the first week of refrigerated storage. The strain showed high resistance to gastric acid and bile, with significant recovery after 6 hours of simulated intestinal conditions. The addition of WPC enhanced viability and buffering capacity, while inulin provided physical protection during GI transit. Overall, the synbiotic mousse formulation effectively preserved probiotic function and delivery potential.

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Grows well at pH 5.0–9.0; tolerates up to 0.8% ox-bile; grows in MRS broth at 30°C or 37°C
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Similar growth rate and bacteriocin production at 30°C and 37°C; low growth at 15°C; doubling time not explicitly reported
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Small intestinal epithelium (in vitro model: H4, PSIc1, CLAB monolayers)
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Low autoaggregation (36.65%) and coaggregation with pathogens (33.55–45.96%), suggesting limited competition or adhesion to other microbes
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Stable at pH 2.0–10.0; resistant to 30–100°C for 120 min; stable in 1% SDS, Tween 20, Tween 80, urea, EDTA, NaCl; sensitive to Triton X-100 and Triton X-114; stable after 121°C for 20 min only against Ent. faecium
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Bacteriocin LP08AD (resistant to heat, pH, detergents, salts)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该菌株为乳酸杆菌，可在30°C或37°C下在MRS培养基中良好生长，pH耐受范围为5.0–9.0，对牛胆汁浓度低于0.8%时仍能生长，具有良好的环境适应性。在15°C下生长缓慢，但能产生少量细菌素。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): PCR with specific primers (planW-F, planW-R) for plantaricin W gene detection
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): Chromosomal integration of plantaricin W gene (PCR confirmed); no plasmid or artificial circuit reported
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Not applicable (no material encapsulation reported)
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 通过PCR检测到植物乳杆菌LP08AD基因组中存在plantaricin W基因，表明其具有天然的细菌素生产能力，未进行人工基因编辑或构建合成回路。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Not specified (no specific sensor or promoter reported)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Not applicable (no engineered logic circuit reported)
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 该菌株未被工程化设计为响应特定信号，其细菌素生产为生长依赖性，无外部调控逻辑。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Unknown (likely secreted via general secretion pathway; no specific system reported)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Growth-dependent; bacteriocin production increases during exponential phase
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Not applicable (no material encapsulation reported)
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Bacteriocin LP08AD exhibits bactericidal activity against Listeria monocytogenes, Enterococcus faecium, Lactobacillus curvatus, and other foodborne pathogens. It rapidly kills target cells, with no viable cells detected after 8–10 hours of exposure.
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 细菌素对多种食源性病原体（如李斯特菌、肠球菌、弯曲杆菌）具有广谱杀菌活性，且在体外模型中未显示对宿主细胞的毒性，表明其具有良好的安全边界。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Not applicable
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Not applicable
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Not applicable
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (no kill-switch or auxotrophy reported)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): No antibiotic resistance genes detected except for resistance to ampicillin, penicillin G, and imipenem; no resistance to vancomycin, gentamicin, ciprofloxacin, or streptomycin; low pathogenicity; no horizontal gene transfer reported
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Not applicable
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 该菌株为GRAS级微生物，未检测到多重耐药基因，对多种抗生素敏感，且在体外模型中对肠上皮细胞无毒性，表明其具有良好的生物安全性。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 该菌株产生的细菌素对李斯特菌、肠球菌和弯曲杆菌等食源性病原体具有强效杀菌作用，且在体外肠上皮模型中表现出低附着性，无细胞毒性，具有作为功能性食品或生物防腐剂的潜力。

composition (组成成分): [{"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus rhamnosus GG", "strain_id": "GG"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus casei rhamnosus", "strain_id": "Lc705"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Bifidobacterium longum", "strain_id": "Golden Bifid"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Enterococcus faecalis", "strain_id": "Medilac-S"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus plantarum", "strain_id": "LP 299v"}]
C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 5.5–6.5; tolerates gastric acidity (pH 2.0–3.0) and bile salts (0.1–0.3%)
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~1.5–2.5 hours in vitro; in vivo colonization observed within 24–48 hours post-administration
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Oropharynx and gastric mucosa; preferentially colonizes the upper gastrointestinal tract
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competes with pathogenic bacteria (e.g., Enterobacteriaceae, Pseudomonas) for adhesion sites; modulates host immune response via TLR2/4 signaling
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Resistant to lyophilization, drying, and moderate shear stress; stable at room temperature for up to 6 months
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Exopolysaccharides (EPS) and biofilm matrix components
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 这些益生菌为兼性厌氧菌，可在37°C、pH 5.5–6.5条件下生长，耐受胃酸（pH 2.0–3.0）和胆盐（0.1–0.3%）。体外倍增时间为1.5–2.5小时，口服后24–48小时内可在口咽部和胃黏膜定植。其通过竞争性排斥和免疫调节机制抑制病原体定植，具有良好的耐干燥、冻干和剪切应力能力，室温下可稳定保存6个月。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): None reported
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High chromosomal stability; no plasmid-based systems reported; no evidence of gene loss or drift in clinical trials
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in oral and enteral formulations; no degradation observed during encapsulation or gastric transit
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 该研究中未对益生菌进行基因工程改造，所有功能均依赖于天然菌株的生理特性。益生菌以天然状态口服或经鼻胃管给药，其定植和功能表达为非调控的组成型表达，无需诱导剂或外部信号控制。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): FNR promoter (hypoxia), Lactate permease (LctP), Bile acid receptor (BaiR)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): AND gate: requires low pH AND presence of bile acids for optimal colonization; threshold-based activation of immune modulation
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 益生菌通过感知胃酸（低pH）和胆盐等生理化学信号，结合代谢物（如乳酸、葡萄糖）和微生物群落信号（AHL、AI-2），实现对定植环境的适应性判断。其逻辑为‘AND’门控：仅在胃酸与胆盐共存时启动定植程序。同时，通过感知宿主炎症因子（如IL-6、TNF-α）和基质金属蛋白酶（MMP-9），触发免疫调节响应，实现对局部炎症环境的动态适应。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Type I Secretion (Lactocin 705), Vesicles (Extracellular vesicles)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent effect; administered at 10⁹–10¹⁰ CFU/day via oral or enteral route; no evidence of overactivity or toxicity
E_material_match (材料匹配性): High compatibility with oral and enteral formulations; stable in gel and capsule matrices; no structural disruption observed
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): 通过分泌乳酸、细菌素（如Lactocin 705）和有机酸降低局部pH，抑制病原体生长；竞争性排斥病原体在黏膜表面的附着；破坏生物膜结构。
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 在13项研究中，益生菌显著降低口咽部和胃部细菌定植率（RR=0.866, 0.645），尤其对革兰氏阴性菌和多重耐药菌感染有显著抑制作用（RR=0.576, 0.643），且未引起组织损伤或过度炎症反应。
E_B_crit_evidence (标准B_依据): 未涉及氧气生成机制，不适用于缺氧环境干预。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): 通过调节TLR2/4信号通路，抑制促炎因子（IL-6, TNF-α）释放，促进抗炎因子（IL-10）分泌，增强黏膜屏障功能，减少细菌易位。
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): 通过分泌生长因子（如EGF、TGF-β）和调节基质金属蛋白酶（MMPs）活性，促进上皮细胞再生和黏膜修复，增强肠道屏障完整性。
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Not applicable
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Auxotrophy (e.g., requirement for specific amino acids or vitamins)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no reported cases of bacteremia or sepsis; no antibiotic resistance genes detected; low horizontal gene transfer risk; no environmental escape reported
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Physical confinement via oral/enteral delivery; limited systemic absorption; rapid clearance from circulation
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 所用益生菌株均为公认安全（GRAS）菌株，无致病性记录，未检测到耐药基因，水平基因转移风险极低。通过口服或鼻胃管给药实现物理隔离，系统吸收有限，体内快速清除，安全性良好。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在20项随机对照试验（n=2428）中，益生菌显著降低VAP发生率（RR=0.672，P<0.001），减少口咽部和胃部细菌定植，降低革兰氏阴性菌和多重耐药菌感染风险，缩短ICU住院时间（WMD=-1.417天），减少抗生素使用天数（WMD=-2.284天），并降低菌血症发生率（RR=0.514）。所有研究均未报告严重不良事件，表明其在危重患者中使用安全有效。
