C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 5.5–6.5, utilizes glucose and other fermentable carbohydrates; requires no special vitamins or amino acids beyond standard growth media
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~1.5–2 hours in vitro; in vivo colonization ability demonstrated in intestinal tract with moderate persistence
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gastrointestinal tract (small intestine, colon), particularly in mucosal-associated niches
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competes with pathogenic bacteria for nutrients and adhesion sites; may promote symbiosis with resident microbiota by modulating pH and oxygen availability
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Moderate tolerance to gastric acid and bile salts; survives lyophilization and rehydration; stable under room temperature storage for weeks
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Cell wall components (e.g., teichoic acids), extracellular polysaccharides, acid resistance systems (F1F0-ATPase)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该菌株为兼性厌氧菌，可在37°C、pH 5.5–6.5条件下生长，利用葡萄糖等可发酵碳源，无需特殊维生素或氨基酸。在体外生长速率约为1.5–2小时倍增，在体内可定植于肠道黏膜相关区域，具有中等持久性。对胃酸和胆盐具有中等耐受性，可耐受冻干和复水，室温下可稳定保存数周。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Not specified
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): Not specified
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Not specified
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 该系统未涉及基因工程改造，仅作为营养补充剂口服使用，依赖天然生理功能发挥作用。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Not specified
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Not specified
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 该系统未设计人工传感逻辑，依赖天然代谢感应机制响应肠道微环境变化。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Constitutive secretion (via membrane transporters)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent via oral intake; no precise control over output
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with enteral nutrition formulations; stable in liquid and powder forms
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): 通过竞争性定植、降低局部pH值、减少游离氧浓度及调节发酵酶活性，抑制病原菌过度生长。
E_A_agent_material (抗菌因子_相关物质): Lactic acid, bacteriocins (e.g., plantaricin), extracellular polysaccharides
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 在动物模型中，L. plantarum 能有效抑制肠道内致病菌定植，且未引起显著细胞毒性或微生物群落紊乱。
E_B_mechanism_desc (产氧机制描述): 无氧代谢产生活性氧，但不用于主动氧供。
E_B_crit_evidence (标准B_依据): 无相关证据支持其氧供功能。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): 调节肠道免疫反应，增强巨噬细胞和T细胞活性，降低促炎因子水平，促进抗炎因子分泌。
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): Exopolysaccharides (EPS), cell wall components (peptidoglycan), secreted metabolites
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): 通过维持肠道屏障完整性、促进上皮细胞增殖和黏液分泌，支持肠黏膜修复。
E_D_repair_material (修复因子_相关物质): Mucin-stimulating factors, growth factors (e.g., EGF-like molecules), short-chain fatty acids (SCFAs)
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): 通过发酵碳水化合物产生短链脂肪酸（如乙酸、乳酸），调节宿主能量代谢和免疫功能。
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (natural strain, no genetic modifications)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no known antibiotic resistance genes; no evidence of horizontal gene transfer; low risk of environmental escape
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): None (oral delivery, no physical confinement)
B_risk_desc (风险描述): L. plantarum 为公认安全（GRAS）菌株，无致病性，无耐药基因，不具水平基因转移能力，环境逃逸风险极低。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在临床前研究中，L. plantarum 可有效减少肠道细菌过度生长和细菌易位，改善急性胰腺炎患者的免疫状态和肠道屏障功能。尽管大型随机试验（PROPATRIA）结果尚未公布，但现有证据支持其作为抗生素替代策略的潜力，有助于降低感染风险并改善预后。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Temperature: 14 ± 1°C; pH: Not specified; Osmotic tolerance: Not specified; Nutritional requirements: Heterotrophic, rich in omega-3 PUFAs, uses whole-cell microalgae as dietary substrate
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Not explicitly reported; inferred to grow in aquaculture conditions over 15-week trial period
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Distal intestine of farmed rainbow trout (Oncorhynchus mykiss)
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): No direct interaction with host microbiome reported; may serve as fermentable substrate for indigenous LAB (e.g., Streptococcus, Lactobacillus, Weissella)
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Not specified; likely stable under aquaculture conditions (flow-through system, 12h light/dark cycle)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Schizochytrium limacinum is a heterotrophic microalgae that thrives in aquaculture environments and serves as a sustainable dietary supplement. It is partially substituted for fish oil in feed and supports fish growth without disrupting the intestinal microbiome structure. It is digested in the distal intestine, where it may act as a fermentable substrate for beneficial lactic acid bacteria.
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): No genetic engineering was performed on Schizochytrium limacinum in this study. The microalgae were used as a whole-cell dietary supplement without modification.
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Not applicable (no engineered sensing system)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Not applicable
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): No engineered sensing or logic circuits were used. The microalgae function as a dietary component without active environmental sensing.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Whole-cell ingestion; no engineered secretion system
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose controlled by dietary substitution level (5% fish oil replacement)
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with feed pellet matrix; no encapsulation or material barrier used
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Not applicable
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): No antibacterial activity reported.
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Not applicable
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Not applicable
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Schizochytrium limacinum provides omega-3 polyunsaturated fatty acids (PUFAs) and fermentable polysaccharides that are metabolized by the host intestinal microbiome, particularly lactic acid bacteria (LAB), to produce beneficial metabolites such as short-chain fatty acids (SCFAs). This enhances microbial diversity and supports host digestion and health.
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (natural dietary supplement)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; not known to be opportunistic; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no horizontal gene transfer risk; no environmental escape risk due to dietary use in aquaculture
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): None (no physical confinement)
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Schizochytrium limacinum is considered safe for use in aquafeeds. It is a non-pathogenic, heterotrophic microalgae used as a sustainable alternative to fish oil. No genetic modifications were made, and it does not pose a risk to human or environmental health when used in controlled aquaculture settings.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): The 5% dietary supplementation of Schizochytrium limacinum led to a trend toward increased microbial diversity in the distal intestine of rainbow trout, with significant enrichment of lactic acid bacteria (LAB) such as Streptococcus, Lactobacillus, Weissella, Leuconostoc, and Lactococcus. Although no significant difference in growth performance was observed (P = 0.205), the treatment group showed higher mean weight and condition factor. The intestinal microbiome structure remained largely unchanged, indicating minimal disruption. The microalgae serve as a fermentable substrate that supports a more diverse and potentially beneficial microbial community, enhancing digestive capacity and gut health.

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Grows in a wide range of temperatures, pH, and osmotic conditions; utilizes diverse carbon and nitrogen sources including proteins, carbohydrates, and complex lipids from animal and plant origins
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): High growth rate and doubling time suitable for industrial production; stable in vitro and in vivo under aquaculture conditions
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Aquaculture pond water, sediment, and gastrointestinal tract of shrimp and fish
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of pathogenic bacteria; synergistic with host immune system; no significant disruption of native microbiome reported
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): High tolerance to heat, UV light, solvents, cold, and drying; spores remain viable for years
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Spores
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Bacillus subtilis is a versatile, robust bacterium capable of thriving in diverse environmental conditions typical of aquaculture systems. It forms highly resistant spores that withstand extreme temperatures and drying, enabling long-term storage and stable incorporation into feed. It grows under both aerobic and anaerobic conditions and can utilize a broad spectrum of organic substrates, including complex plant-based nutrients, making it ideal for use in functional feeds.
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): CRISPR-Cas systems, plasmid-based expression (e.g., p15A), recombinant DNA technology
G_edit_efficiency (编辑效率): High efficiency; well-characterized genome with established genetic manipulation protocols; low off-target risk due to precise tools
G_circuit_control (回路控制): Constitutive expression of enzymes and antimicrobial compounds; no inducible circuits reported in this study
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High chromosomal stability; plasmid-based systems show moderate stability; no significant metabolic burden reported; long-term in vivo consistency observed in trials
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in feed matrices and during processing; spores maintain viability in feed formulations
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): Bacillus subtilis is genetically well-characterized and amenable to engineering. Its genome is fully sequenced, and it supports high-level secretion of heterologous proteins and enzymes. While no synthetic circuits are described in this paper, its natural ability to produce a wide array of digestive enzymes and antimicrobial peptides is leveraged without genetic modification. The strain is used in its native form, with no reported genetic modifications for this application.
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): FNR promoter (hypoxia), general nutrient-sensing regulators (e.g., CodY, CcpA)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Constitutive expression; no reported logic gates or threshold control; activity driven by nutrient availability and environmental conditions
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): Bacillus subtilis naturally senses nutrient availability and environmental conditions such as oxygen levels and pH. It activates metabolic pathways for enzyme production (e.g., amylases, proteases, lipases) when substrates are present. Its growth and enzyme secretion are primarily regulated by nutrient sensing systems like CodY and CcpA, which repress expression under nutrient-rich conditions. No synthetic logic circuits are used; the system operates via natural regulatory networks.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Secretion of enzymes via Sec pathway; no lysis or vesicle-mediated delivery reported
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Controlled by feed concentration; natural expression levels are self-regulated by nutrient availability
E_material_match (材料匹配性): High compatibility with feed matrices; spores are stable during feed processing and encapsulation
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Produces a variety of peptide antibiotics (e.g., subtilin, bacitracin) that inhibit growth of pathogenic bacteria such as Vibrio, Salmonella, Pseudomonas, and Streptococcus
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): B. subtilis effectively reduces pathogen load in aquaculture ponds without causing harm to host organisms. It prevents disease development in shrimp and fish, and no significant cytotoxicity or microbiome disruption was observed in trials.
E_B_crit_evidence (标准B_依据): No evidence of oxygen production or oxygenation function in this study.
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Enhances host tissue integrity by improving nutrient assimilation and reducing inflammation through bioremediation of pond water and suppression of pathogenic bacteria
E_D_repair_material (修复因子_相关物质): Digestive enzymes (amylases, proteases, lipases), anti-inflammatory metabolites
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Regulates host metabolism by improving digestion of complex plant-based nutrients (proteins, carbohydrates, lipids), leading to better nutrient utilization and energy balance
E_E_metabolite_material (代谢物_相关物质): Glucose, cholesterol, lactate (as metabolic byproducts indicating improved assimilation)
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None reported; relies on natural attenuation and environmental confinement
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no evidence of horizontal gene transfer; non-opportunistic; safe for human and animal consumption
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Physical confinement via feed encapsulation and pond environment; no engineered kill switches
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Bacillus subtilis is generally recognized as safe (GRAS) by the FDA. It has a long history of safe use in food and feed. No toxic metabolites or virulence factors were detected in the strains used. The organism is naturally non-pathogenic and does not persist in the environment beyond the aquaculture system. No biocontainment systems are required due to its low risk profile.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): B. subtilis supplementation in shrimp and fish feeds significantly improves growth, weight gain, survival rate, and feed conversion ratio. It enhances immune responses (e.g., increased SOD, GSH-Px, lysozyme), reduces pathogen load, maintains water quality, and allows replacement of expensive fishmeal and fish oil with plant-based ingredients. Trials show no disease outbreaks and stable pond conditions, demonstrating high efficacy in sustainable aquaculture.

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 6.5–7.0; utilizes lactose, glucose, and other carbohydrates; requires complex media with vitamins and amino acids.
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~1.5–2 hours in vitro; in vivo colonization observed in infant gut with stable persistence over 6 months.
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gut mucosa, particularly in the large intestine; preferentially colonizes the infant gut microbiome.
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of pathogens; synergistic co-colonization with other commensals; no significant disruption of native microbiota observed.
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to gastric acidity (pH 2.0–3.0 for 2 h), bile salts (0.3% bile), and moderate osmotic stress; stable during lyophilization and storage at 25°C/60% RH for 24 months.
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Maltodextrin matrix (protective carrier)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): BB-12和LGG均为专性厌氧或兼性厌氧菌，可在37°C、pH 6.5–7.0条件下生长，利用乳糖、葡萄糖等碳源，需复杂培养基含维生素和氨基酸。在体外培养中，倍增时间为1.5–2小时；在婴儿肠道中可稳定定植，持续6个月。两者均能耐受胃酸（pH 2.0–3.0，2小时）和胆盐（0.3%），在25°C/60%相对湿度下储存24个月仍保持活性，由麦芽糊精基质保护。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): None (natural strains used; no genetic modification reported)
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High chromosomal stability; no plasmids used; no evidence of genetic drift or loss in vivo over 6 months.
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in maltodextrin powder formulation; no degradation or loss of viability during encapsulation and storage.
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 未对BB-12和LGG进行基因改造，使用天然菌株。其功能表达为天然固有特性，无外源调控回路或诱导系统。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): FNR promoter (in B. animalis subsp. lactis), Lactose permease (in L. rhamnosus)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Constitutive expression; no dynamic logic or threshold control; minimal noise filtering.
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): BB-12和LGG通过FNR启动子感知低氧环境，通过乳糖转运蛋白感知乳糖存在，实现基础代谢调控。无复杂逻辑门控机制，表达为组成型，无时间延迟或信号整合能力。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Constitutive secretion via general secretory pathway (Sec); no lysis or vesicle release reported.
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Fixed daily dose (1×10⁹ CFU each strain); no dynamic dosage adjustment.
E_material_match (材料匹配性): High compatibility with maltodextrin powder; stable during encapsulation and oral delivery.
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Not applicable
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 未报告抗菌或抗生物膜活性。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Modulate innate and adaptive immune responses via interaction with dendritic cells and epithelial cells; enhance IgA production and cytokine balance (e.g., IL-10, IFN-γ).
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): Exopolysaccharides (EPS), Surface proteins (e.g., p40, p75), Lipoteichoic acids
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Not applicable
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Not applicable
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (natural strains, no kill-switch or auxotrophy)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no evidence of horizontal gene transfer; low risk of environmental escape.
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Maltodextrin powder provides physical containment; no live microbial release into environment.
B_risk_desc (风险描述): BB-12和LGG均为公认安全（GRAS）菌株，广泛用于婴幼儿食品。无基因工程改造，无致病性或耐药基因，无水平基因转移风险，环境逃逸可能性极低。物理载体（麦芽糊精）提供有效屏障。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在6个月干预期内，BB-12与LGG联合使用未显著减少因呼吸道或胃肠道感染导致的托儿所缺勤天数（中位数11天，P=0.19）。对上/下呼吸道感染、腹泻、发热、呕吐、医生就诊次数、抗生素使用等次要终点均无显著差异。尽管免疫调节功能存在，但未在临床终点上体现预防效果。

composition (组成成分): [{"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Saccharomyces cerevisiae", "strain_id": "S. boulardii 17, S. cerevisiae A-905, S. cerevisiae Sc47, S. cerevisiae L11"}]
C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Growth at 30–37°C in YPD medium; optimal growth at 37°C for probiotics, 30°C for non-probiotics
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time varies between strains (Table S1); all strains reach stationary phase by 24 h
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gastrointestinal tract (GIT), particularly colon after surviving gastric and bile stresses
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Probiotic strains may compete with pathogens; no direct evidence of symbiosis with host microbiome in this study
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): High tolerance to simulated gastric (pH 1.5) and bile salt stresses; survival in vivo confirmed in BALB/c mice
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Lipid droplets (LD), H+ efflux system (in S. boulardii), sterol esterase repression (in 905)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该研究中涉及的酿酒酵母菌株（包括S. boulardii、S. cerevisiae A-905、Sc47和L11）在30–37°C下于YPD培养基中生长，具有良好的耐受胃酸（pH 1.5）和胆盐的能力。所有菌株在24小时内达到稳定期，其中S. boulardii和A-905在模拟胃肠道应激下表现出较高的存活率，表明其具有较强的环境适应能力。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Not applicable (no genetic engineering reported)
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): Not applicable
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Not applicable
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 本文未涉及任何基因工程改造，所有分析基于天然菌株的生理特性。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): H+ efflux system (in S. boulardii), sterol esterase regulation (in 905)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No synthetic logic circuits; natural stress response pathways activated by pH and bile salts
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 酿酒酵母在面对酸性环境（如胃液pH 1.5）或胆盐时，会通过H+外排系统（S. boulardii）或抑制甾醇酯合成（A-905）等机制启动应激反应。这些天然机制可视为一种‘响应性开关’，但未涉及人工设计的逻辑门控系统。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Not applicable
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Not applicable
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Not applicable
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Not applicable
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 无
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Not applicable
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Not applicable
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Not applicable
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Natural auxotrophy and limited environmental persistence; no synthetic kill switches
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no evidence of horizontal gene transfer; GRAS status for S. boulardii
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): None (no encapsulation or physical confinement described)
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 该研究中使用的酿酒酵母菌株（尤其是S. boulardii）为已批准用于人类消费的GRAS菌株，具有低致病性，且无抗生素抗性基因或水平基因转移风险。但由于未使用物理屏障或合成生物安全系统，存在潜在环境释放风险，需在实际应用中注意控制。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在BALB/c小鼠口服实验中，S. boulardii、A-905和Sc47等菌株表现出比非益生菌菌株BY4741更高的结肠存活率，表明其在胃肠道应激条件下具有更强的生存能力。所有益生菌菌株在至少一种模拟胃肠道应激（胃酸或胆盐）下均表现出脂滴水平升高，提示脂滴积累是其应激保护机制的重要组成部分。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 6.0–7.0, requires glucose and amino acids; tolerant to bile salts and gastric acidity
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~1.5–2 hours in vitro; in vivo colonization observed after oral administration
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gastrointestinal tract (intestine), with potential translocation to skin via gut-skin axis
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of pathogenic bacteria; synergistic interactions with host microbiota to restore microbial balance
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to refrigeration, enteric coating protects against gastric acid; stable during lyophilization and rehydration
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Enteric-coated capsule
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该益生菌复合菌株为兼性厌氧菌，可在37°C、pH 6.0–7.0条件下生长，依赖葡萄糖和氨基酸，对胆盐和胃酸具有耐受性。口服后可在肠道定植，并通过肠-皮肤轴可能影响皮肤健康。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Not specified
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): Not specified
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Not specified
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 该益生菌制剂为商业产品，未提及基因工程改造，其功能依赖于天然菌株的生理特性，无外源基因插入或调控回路。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Not specified
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Not specified
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 未报告具体的感知模块或逻辑控制机制，其作用可能基于菌株对宿主微环境的自然响应，而非人工设计的传感回路。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Not specified
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Oral administration of 30 billion CFUs daily; dose is fixed and not dynamically controllable
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Enteric-coated capsule ensures protection during gastric transit and controlled release in intestine
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Not applicable
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 未报告抗菌或抗生物膜功能。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): 通过调节免疫反应，降低促炎细胞因子水平，增强免疫耐受，从而缓解皮肤炎症和瘙痒。
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): 通过促进表皮再生、增强皮肤屏障功能和调节细胞外基质，改善慢性手部皮炎的皮肤结构损伤。
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): 通过产生短链脂肪酸（SCFAs）和色氨酸代谢物，调节宿主免疫代谢，改善皮肤屏障功能。
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Not applicable
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): No known pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; low risk of horizontal gene transfer; no evidence of environmental escape
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Enteric-coated capsule provides physical confinement and prevents premature release
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 该益生菌复合菌株为公认安全（GRAS）级别，无致病性，无抗生素抗性基因，不具有水平基因转移风险，且通过肠衣胶囊实现物理隔离，安全性高。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在30名受试者中，22人完成12周治疗，19人（86%）临床医生评估为症状改善，其中23%达到‘清晰或几乎清晰’状态。瘙痒症状在2周内显著缓解，59%的患者在2周内瘙痒明显减轻。总体治疗效果具有统计学意义（p<0.05），表明该益生菌对慢性手部皮炎具有良好的临床疗效和耐受性。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 5.5–6.5, requires fermentable carbohydrates (e.g., glucose, lactose), dependent on host-derived nutrients in vivo
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~1–2 hours in vitro; in vivo colonization observed within 24–48 hours post-administration
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gastrointestinal tract (small and large intestine), mucosal surface, intestinal lumen
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of pathobionts (e.g., C. perfringens, E. coli), synergistic co-colonization with commensals (e.g., Bifidobacteria), modulation of host immune response
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Moderate tolerance to gastric acidity, bile salts, osmotic stress; lyophilization stability; limited UV and shear stress resistance
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Exopolysaccharides (EPS), cell wall components
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 上述微生物多为乳酸菌或酵母菌，属于兼性厌氧菌，可在人体肠道内定植并利用宿主提供的碳源（如乳糖、葡萄糖）进行生长繁殖。其最适生长温度为37°C，pH范围为5.5–6.5，对胃酸和胆汁具有一定的耐受性，可在肠道黏膜表面定植并参与调节肠道菌群平衡。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Plasmid-based expression systems (e.g., pNZ8048, pSIP), CRISPR-Cas9 (in some strains), Recombination (in L. reuteri, L. salivarius)
G_edit_efficiency (编辑效率): High efficiency (>90%) in L. reuteri and L. salivarius; low off-target risk due to targeted integration
G_circuit_control (回路控制): Constitutive (e.g., P32 promoter), Inducible (e.g., nisin-inducible system in L. reuteri)
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High chromosomal integration stability; plasmid loss rate <1% per generation; low metabolic burden; long-term in vivo persistence observed in murine models
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in gel-based delivery systems (e.g., encapsulated in alginate beads); no significant degradation in matrix
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 通过质粒或染色体整合方式构建基因回路，如在L. reuteri中使用nisin诱导系统实现可控表达，在L. salivarius中利用P32启动子实现组成型表达。部分菌株已实现基因编辑，用于增强其定植能力或功能表达。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): FNR promoter (hypoxia), Lactate receptor (LacR), Bile acid sensor (BaiR), Nisin-inducible promoter (Pnis)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): AND gate (e.g., hypoxia + bile acid), threshold-based activation, noise suppression via feedback loops
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 部分菌株具备多重信号感知能力，如L. reuteri可同时感知低pH和胆汁酸，通过AND门逻辑启动特定基因表达。在炎症环境中，可感知IL-17C等细胞因子并响应，实现精准调控。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Type I secretion (bacteriocins), Vesicles (exosomes), Lysis (controlled release)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent effects; controlled via administration frequency and formulation
E_material_match (材料匹配性): High compatibility with encapsulated delivery systems (e.g., alginate, chitosan); maintains viability and function
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Production of bacteriocins (e.g., reuterin, lactocin), competitive exclusion of pathogens, inhibition of biofilm formation by pathobionts
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 在IL-10基因敲除小鼠模型中，L. salivarius UCC118显著降低C. perfringens和肠球菌水平，且未引起组织损伤或过度炎症。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Modulation of cytokine profile (e.g., IL-10, TGF-β), enhancement of s-IgA production, regulation of Treg/Th17 balance
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Enhancement of intestinal barrier integrity, promotion of epithelial regeneration, reduction of mucosal permeability
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Production of SCFAs (e.g., butyrate, acetate), modulation of GLP-1 and GLP-2 secretion, reduction of metabolic endotoxemia
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Auxotrophy (e.g., amino acid auxotrophy), Suicide genes (e.g., ccdB), Temperature-sensitive plasmids
B_containment_material (生物安全_相关物质): Amino acid auxotrophy (e.g., leucine), ccdB toxin
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no known antibiotic resistance genes; low risk of horizontal gene transfer; minimal environmental escape potential
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Effective physical confinement in encapsulated formulations; prevents systemic dissemination
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 所有列出的菌株均被归类为GRAS（公认安全），无致病性记录，且在临床试验中未报告严重不良事件。部分菌株通过营养缺陷型或自杀基因实现生物遏制，确保在宿主体内安全降解。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在多种动物模型中，如IL-10基因敲除小鼠、高脂饮食诱导肥胖小鼠和结肠癌模型中，益生菌显著改善肠道屏障功能、降低炎症标志物、调节菌群结构并促进代谢健康。在人类临床试验中，L. salivarius UCC118和S. boulardii可有效缓解IBS和腹泻症状，VSL#3可改善UC患者黏膜屏障功能。

spatial_arrangement (空间排布): Encapsulated in food matrix (e.g., dairy, cereal, fruit, vegetable, meat, beverage)
C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal temperature: 30–40 °C; pH: 5.0–6.5; Nutritional requirements: Carbohydrates (lactose, glucose, fructose), amino acids, vitamins (B-complex), minerals; Growth in dairy, cereal, fruit, vegetable, and fermented substrates
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time: 20–60 min in vitro; Growth rate varies by strain and substrate; In vivo survival enhanced by food matrix protection
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gastrointestinal tract (small and large intestine), oral cavity, skin (in some cases)
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Symbiotic with host microbiota; Competes with pathogenic bacteria; Enhances microbial diversity and stability
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to bile salts, low pH (gastric), osmotic stress, moderate heat; Moderate tolerance to drying and lyophilization; Shear stress during processing
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Exopolysaccharides (EPS), cell wall components, biofilm formation
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 多种乳酸菌、双歧杆菌、酵母菌等在乳制品、谷物、果蔬、肉类等基质中通过发酵生长，具有良好的耐酸、耐胆盐和耐受胃肠道环境的能力，可在食品基质中保持活性并促进宿主肠道健康。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Plasmid-based systems, CRISPR-Cas (in research strains), Recombination (in lab settings)
G_edit_efficiency (编辑效率): High in lab strains; Off-target risk low in well-characterized systems
G_circuit_control (回路控制): Constitutive expression; Some inducible systems (e.g., lactose-inducible promoters) in research
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High chromosomal stability; Plasmid loss in some strains; Metabolic burden low; Evolutionary drift observed in long-term cultures
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in food matrices; EPS production enhances stability in gel-like or viscous environments
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 通过质粒或染色体整合方式引入功能基因，如产酸、产抗菌物质、产EPS等；多数工业菌株为天然或选育菌株，基因工程应用主要在研究阶段。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): FNR promoter (hypoxia), Lac promoter (lactose), Rha promoter (rhamnose), Quorum sensing receptors (e.g., LasR, LuxR)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): AND gate (e.g., lactose + low pH), Threshold-based activation, Noise suppression via feedback loops
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 多种微生物通过感知糖类、pH、胆汁酸等信号启动代谢或功能基因表达，部分菌株具备群体感应系统，实现群体行为调控，如生物膜形成、抗菌物质释放等。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Type I, II, III, and VI secretion systems; Lysis; Vesicles (exosomes)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Controlled by food matrix release; Dose determined by CFU/g in product; No external control in commercial products
E_material_match (材料匹配性): High compatibility with dairy, cereal, fruit, vegetable, and fermented matrices; EPS enhances encapsulation and stability
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): 通过产生有机酸（乳酸、乙酸）、细菌素（如乳酸菌素）、过氧化氢等抑制病原菌生长，同时抑制生物膜形成。
E_A_agent_material (抗菌因子_相关物质): Lactic acid, Bacteriocins (e.g., Lactocin, Plantaricin), Hydrogen peroxide
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 多种乳酸菌在体外和体内均表现出对常见致病菌（如沙门氏菌、大肠杆菌、金黄色葡萄球菌）的抑制作用，且在食品基质中不破坏结构，无明显细胞毒性。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): 调节宿主免疫反应，促进抗炎因子（如IL-10）分泌，抑制促炎因子（如TNF-α、IL-6）释放，增强肠道屏障功能。
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): Cytokines (IL-10, TGF-β), Polysaccharides (EPS), Bacterial cell wall components
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): 促进肠道上皮细胞增殖，增强黏膜屏障，调节细胞外基质合成，改善肠道通透性。
E_D_repair_material (修复因子_相关物质): Short-chain fatty acids (SCFAs), Exopolysaccharides (EPS), Growth factors
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): 产生短链脂肪酸（如乙酸、丙酸、丁酸），调节宿主能量代谢、脂质代谢和血糖水平，影响神经内分泌功能。
E_E_metabolite_material (代谢物_相关物质): Short-chain fatty acids (SCFAs), Tryptophan metabolites (e.g., indole derivatives)
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Auxotrophy (e.g., amino acid auxotrophy in some strains), Natural attenuation in gut
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; No known virulence genes; Antibiotic resistance genes absent in most strains; Low HGT risk; No environmental escape reported
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Physical barrier provided by food matrix (e.g., gel, solid, viscous liquid)
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 所列微生物多为GRAS菌株，广泛用于食品工业，无已知致病性，抗生素抗性基因罕见，基因水平转移风险低，且在食品基质中可被有效物理隔离，安全性高。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 多项研究证实，乳酸菌和双歧杆菌等益生菌可显著改善肠道健康，降低胆固醇、血压，增强免疫力，促进营养吸收，改善代谢综合征，具有良好的临床和功能效益。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 6.45–6.62; tolerant to moderate osmotic stress from milk components (lactose, sucrose, casein); requires complex nutrients from milk matrix
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Survival rate of 84.7% after 120 days of frozen storage; initial viability of 8.2 log CFU/g, maintained at 6–7 log CFU/g throughout storage
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gastrointestinal tract (target niche for probiotic function)
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): No direct interaction data reported; assumed neutral or potentially beneficial via competitive exclusion of pathogens
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): High tolerance to freezing (-18°C), moderate tolerance to bile and pancreatin; reduced viability during gastric phase (1.24–1.00 log reduction), significant loss during enteric phase (3.82 log reduction)
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Casein, sucrose, lactose (cryoprotective matrix in ice cream)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Bifidobacterium animalis subsp. lactis BLC1 exhibits good viability in goat’s milk ice cream during processing and frozen storage, with minimal impact on physicochemical properties. It survives freezing and maintains high viability (6–7 log CFU/g) over 120 days, indicating strong cryotolerance. However, it shows moderate resistance to simulated gastrointestinal conditions, particularly bile and pancreatin, with significant viability loss during enteric phase.
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): No genetic modifications were applied. The strain was used in its native form as a probiotic delivery vehicle. No engineered circuits, promoters, or inducible systems were employed.
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): No sensing or logic modules were engineered. The strain relies on intrinsic physiological responses to environmental changes (e.g., pH, bile) without synthetic biological circuitry.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Passive release via cell lysis or natural secretion (inherent to strain); no engineered secretion system used
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): No active dosage control; viability is passively maintained through formulation and storage
E_material_match (材料匹配性): High compatibility with ice cream matrix; cryoprotective components (casein, sucrose, lactose) enhance survival; no structural disruption observed
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Not applicable – no antibacterial mechanism engineered or reported.
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 无抗菌功能
E_B_mechanism_desc (产氧机制描述): Not applicable – no oxygen-producing mechanism reported.
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Not applicable – no immunomodulatory factors reported.
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Not applicable – no tissue repair factors reported.
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Not applicable – no metabolic regulation via secreted metabolites reported.
E_F_mechanism_desc (肿瘤治疗描述): Not applicable – no tumor-targeting or prodrug conversion mechanisms reported.
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None – no kill-switch or auxotrophy used
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no horizontal gene transfer risk identified; low environmental escape risk due to non-native habitat and poor environmental persistence
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Physical confinement via polyethylene packaging and frozen storage; effective in preventing release
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Bifidobacterium animalis subsp. lactis BLC1 is a well-established probiotic strain with GRAS status. It poses minimal biosafety risk (BSL-1). No genetic modifications were made, and no biocontainment strategies were implemented. The physical barrier of packaging and freezing provides adequate containment. No evidence of pathogenicity, antibiotic resistance, or environmental persistence was found.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 该研究未评估治疗功效，但结果显示B. animalis subsp. lactis BLC1在山羊奶冰淇淋中具有良好的存活率（6–7 log CFU/g），在120天冷冻储存后仍保持84.7%的存活率。在模拟胃肠条件下，尽管在胆汁和胰酶作用下有3.82 log的下降，但其存活能力仍优于多数同类研究，表明其作为益生菌载体具有良好的技术潜力和应用前景。

spatial_arrangement (空间排布): Entirely administered enterally (oral), colonizing the gastrointestinal tract
C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 5.5–6.5; tolerates gastric acidity and bile salts; utilizes lactose and other carbohydrates as carbon sources
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Moderate growth rate; doubling time ~1–2 hours in vitro; colonization observed in vivo after oral administration
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gastrointestinal tract (GIT), particularly colonizing the intestinal mucosa and lumen
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of pathogenic bacteria (e.g., Enterobacter, Veillonella); promotes colonization by beneficial commensals; modulates host immune responses
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Resistant to gastric acid and bile; stable during lyophilization and storage at 4°C; tolerates moderate osmotic stress
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Cell envelope components (e.g., exopolysaccharides), acid tolerance systems (e.g., F1F0-ATPase)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Lactobacillus rhamnosus GG and Bifidobacterium spp. are human-origin, non-pathogenic, acid- and bile-tolerant bacteria that can survive gastrointestinal transit and colonize the neonatal gut. They grow under facultative anaerobic conditions and are capable of adhering to intestinal epithelial cells, thereby enhancing mucosal barrier integrity and modulating immune function.
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Not explicitly mentioned; likely natural strains used without genetic modification
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High chromosomal stability; no plasmid-based systems reported; low metabolic burden; long-term in vivo persistence observed in clinical studies
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in oral formulations and enteral feeding preparations
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): No genetic engineering was applied in the described studies. Probiotic strains were used in their natural form, relying on intrinsic biological properties for functionality. The beneficial effects are attributed to native metabolic and immunomodulatory capabilities.
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): FNR-like regulators (pH sensing), bile salt hydrolases (bile sensing), lactose permease (nutrient sensing), TLR2/4 (host immune recognition)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No engineered logic gates; natural sensing and response integration via metabolic and immune pathways
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): The microbes naturally sense environmental cues such as low pH and bile acids in the gut, triggering adaptive responses like acid tolerance and bile resistance. They detect host-derived signals (e.g., cytokines) and microbial metabolites, enabling coordinated immune modulation and competitive exclusion of pathogens through natural regulatory networks.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Type I secretion (e.g., for bacteriocins), passive diffusion (e.g., for SCFAs), and extracellular vesicles
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent effects; efficacy observed at 10^8–10^10 CFU/day; no engineered feedback control
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with oral formulations and enteral feeding tubes; stable in gel-like or powder-based delivery systems
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Production of bacteriocins (e.g., lactocin, reuterin), organic acids (lactic acid), and hydrogen peroxide; competitive exclusion of pathogens from intestinal binding sites
E_A_agent_material (抗菌因子_相关物质): Lactocin, reuterin, lactic acid, hydrogen peroxide
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): Probiotics reduce colonization by pathogenic bacteria (e.g., Enterobacter, Veillonella) and inhibit biofilm formation in neonatal gut models. No significant disruption of gut structure or excessive inflammation reported in clinical trials.
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Modulate host immune responses by enhancing IgA production, increasing anti-inflammatory cytokines (IL-10), decreasing pro-inflammatory cytokines (TNF-α), and promoting Th1/Th2 balance
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Strengthen intestinal tight junctions, increase mucus production, reduce mucosal permeability, and promote epithelial regeneration
E_D_repair_material (修复因子_相关物质): Tight junction proteins (e.g., occludin, ZO-1), mucin (MUC2)
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Produce short-chain fatty acids (SCFAs) such as acetate, propionate, and butyrate, which regulate host metabolism, energy homeostasis, and immune function
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Auxotrophy (natural requirement for specific nutrients), non-pathogenicity, no antibiotic resistance genes reported
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; rare cases of sepsis reported in immunocompromised infants; no evidence of horizontal gene transfer; low environmental escape risk
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Oral administration limits systemic exposure; gut mucosal barrier provides physical confinement
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Lactobacillus rhamnosus GG and Bifidobacterium spp. are generally recognized as safe (GRAS) for neonates. Although rare adverse events (e.g., sepsis) have been reported in immunocompromised infants, no significant safety concerns were observed in large clinical trials. The use of natural, non-engineered strains reduces risks associated with genetic modification.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): Probiotic supplementation significantly reduces the incidence of severe necrotising enterocolitis (Bell Stage ≥2) and all-cause mortality in preterm infants. It improves feeding tolerance, reduces hospital stay, enhances immune maturation, and may prevent atopic eczema in high-risk term infants. Long-term neurodevelopmental outcomes remain under investigation.

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): 37°C, anaerobic environment, MRS broth, pH neutral
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): 36 hours for culture; colonization confirmed in small intestine after oral gavage
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Small intestine (jejunum and ileum)
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of Enterobacteriaceae; increases Lactobacillus spp. and L. johnsonii BS15 abundance; modulates gut microbiota balance
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Stable under oral administration, survives gastric transit and intestinal environment; no data on UV, drying, or shear stress
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该菌株在37°C、厌氧条件下于MRS培养基中培养36小时，通过口服给药可在小鼠肠道（空肠和回肠）成功定植，具有良好的肠道耐受性和定植能力。
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 该研究未对L. johnsonii BS15进行基因改造，其功能依赖于天然生理特性，未使用任何基因编辑工具或合成生物学元件。
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 该菌株未被工程化设计为响应特定信号，其作用机制基于天然生态位适应性，无明确的传感逻辑模块。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Passive secretion via natural metabolism; no engineered secretion system
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Oral gavage at fixed dose (1×10⁹ CFU/mL), daily administration; no feedback control
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with oral suspension delivery; no encapsulation or material barrier used
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): 未涉及抗菌或抗生物膜功能。
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 无抗菌功能证据。
E_B_mechanism_desc (产氧机制描述): 未涉及氧气生成或氧合功能。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): 通过调节肠道黏膜免疫，降低sIgA水平，改善肠道屏障功能，减轻氟中毒引起的免疫过度激活。
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): 促进小肠绒毛高度恢复，增加隐窝深度，提高Vh/Cd比值，改善肠道结构完整性；增加杯状细胞数量，增强黏液屏障。
E_D_repair_material (修复因子_相关物质): Mucin (from goblet cells), intestinal villus structure
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): 调节肠道微生态平衡，抑制有害菌（如Enterobacteriaceae）增殖，促进有益菌（Lactobacillus spp.）定植，改善肠道代谢环境。
E_E_metabolite_material (代谢物_相关物质): Short-chain fatty acids (SCFAs) – inferred from microbiota modulation
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (no synthetic kill-switch or auxotrophy used)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Non-pathogenic, widely used as probiotic; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; low risk of horizontal gene transfer; no environmental escape concerns in this study.
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): None (oral delivery without physical confinement)
B_risk_desc (风险描述): L. johnsonii BS15 is a GRAS (Generally Recognized As Safe) strain with established safety profile in animal models. No genetic modifications were made, and no biocontainment strategies were employed. The risk of pathogenicity, antibiotic resistance, or environmental escape is negligible under the experimental conditions.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): L. johnsonii BS15显著逆转了慢性氟中毒诱导的记忆功能障碍，改善了海马区突触可塑性相关基因（Dbn、MAP-2、NMDAR、SYP）的表达，增强了抗氧化能力（血清和海马组织中T-AOC、SOD、GSH-Px活性升高，MDA含量降低），并有效保护小肠结构（绒毛高度增加、隐窝深度改善、Vh/Cd比值升高、杯状细胞增多），同时调节肠道菌群平衡，抑制Enterobacteriaceae过度增殖，提升肠道屏障完整性，减轻心理应激对记忆功能的负面影响。

composition (组成成分): [{"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus casei", "strain_id": "Not specified"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus acidophilus", "strain_id": "Not specified"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Bifidobacterium bifidum", "strain_id": "Not specified"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Enterococcus faecium", "strain_id": "Not specified"}]
C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 5.5–6.5, requires fermentable carbohydrates (e.g., glucose, lactose), dependent on host-derived nutrients in gut environment
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~1–2 hours in vitro; stable in vivo colonization over 10-week trial
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Intestinal mucosa, particularly in the ceca and small intestine
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Symbiotic with host microbiota; competes with pathogenic bacteria (e.g., Salmonella, E. coli) via competitive exclusion and bacteriocin production
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Moderate tolerance to gastric acid and bile salts; stable during lyophilization and rehydration; resistant to moderate shear stress in feed processing
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Bile salts, mucin-binding proteins, extracellular polysaccharides
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该益生菌混合物由四种乳酸菌和双歧杆菌组成，均为兼性厌氧菌，可在鸡肠道内定植并维持稳定生长。其生长依赖于饲料中的可发酵碳水化合物，对胃酸和胆汁具有中等耐受性，适合在禽类消化道环境中长期存活。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Not mentioned
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): Not mentioned
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Not mentioned
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 该研究未对益生菌进行基因改造，其功能依赖于天然代谢特性，如胆汁酸结合、胆固醇降解和短链脂肪酸生成。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Lactate receptor (LctP), bile acid transporter (BaiS), cholesterol-binding protein (CbiA)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Threshold-based activation of cholesterol metabolism pathways; feedback inhibition by bile acid accumulation
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 这些益生菌通过感知肠道内的乳酸、胆汁酸和胆固醇浓度变化，启动代谢调控机制。当胆固醇水平升高时，菌株通过结合胆汁酸和降解胆固醇来响应，形成负反馈调节回路，维持宿主脂质稳态。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Type I secretion system (for bacteriocins), Lysis (for metabolite release)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent; controlled by dietary inclusion rate (0.1%)
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with feed matrix; stable during pelleting and storage
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): 通过产生乳酸、细菌素（如乳酸菌素）和竞争性排斥机制抑制病原菌生长，防止生物膜形成。
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 益生菌在鸡肠道中有效抑制了有害菌群，未引起组织损伤或炎症反应，且在饲料中稳定存在，无过度活性。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): 调节宿主免疫反应，增强巨噬细胞活性，促进抗炎细胞因子（如IL-10）分泌，抑制促炎因子（如TNF-α）。
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Not applicable
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): 通过发酵纤维产生短链脂肪酸（如乙酸、丙酸、丁酸），调节胆固醇代谢，降低血清和蛋黄胆固醇水平。
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Auxotrophy (e.g., requirement for specific amino acids or vitamins)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no known antibiotic resistance genes; low risk of horizontal gene transfer; no environmental escape reported
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Feed matrix provides physical confinement; no release into environment
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 该益生菌混合物为公认安全（GRAS）菌株，无致病性，不携带耐药基因，且在饲料中被物理限制，不会逃逸至环境。其代谢功能在宿主肠道内可控，安全性高。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 饲喂7.5% Artemisia annua叶片和0.1%益生菌混合物显著降低了蛋黄胆固醇（P<0.01），改善了饲料转化率（FCR），提高了蛋壳厚度和蛋黄颜色，同时增强了血浆抗氧化能力（GSH-Px升高，MDA降低），且未对产蛋性能产生负面影响。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Temperature: 21–30 °C (thermoneutral to heat stress); pH: not specified; Osmotic: not specified; Nutrition: dietary supplementation via feed (3 × 10⁷ cfu/kg); naturally occurring in chicken intestine
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Growth rate not directly measured; spores maintain viability under long-term ambient storage; effective in vivo under heat stress (30 °C) and thermoneutral (21 °C) conditions
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Intestinal lumen of broiler chickens (duodenum, jejunum, ileum)
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of pathogenic bacteria (Clostridium, Coliforms); promotion of beneficial bacteria (Lactobacillus, Bifidobacterium)
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): High tolerance to heat stress (30 °C), long-term ambient storage, and harsh environmental conditions due to spore formation
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Spores of Bacillus subtilis
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Bacillus subtilis PB6 strain is a spore-forming bacterium naturally present in healthy chickens. It maintains viability under heat stress (30 °C) and ambient storage, colonizes the intestinal tract, and supports intestinal health and growth performance in broiler chickens during thermal challenges.
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 该研究未对 Bacillus subtilis 进行基因工程改造，其功能依赖于天然菌株的生理特性，如产生有益代谢物、调节肠道菌群平衡和增强肠道屏障功能。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Not specified (natural sensing of environmental and host signals)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Not applicable (no engineered logic circuits)
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): Bacillus subtilis does not possess engineered sensing circuits. It naturally responds to host physiological changes (e.g., heat stress) and microbial community shifts by modulating its colonization and metabolic activity to restore intestinal homeostasis.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Not specified (likely passive secretion via cell lysis or natural excretion)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent effect: 3 × 10⁷ cfu/kg feed; effective under both thermoneutral and heat stress conditions
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Encapsulated form ensures stability and controlled release in feed; compatible with dietary delivery
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Not applicable (no direct antibacterial mechanism reported)
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 未报告抗菌活性或生物膜抑制作用。
E_B_crit_evidence (标准B_依据): 未报告氧气生成或氧合功能。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Modulates intestinal immune homeostasis by reducing inflammation, enhancing barrier integrity, and promoting beneficial microbiota, indirectly supporting immune function.
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): Not specified (likely via microbial metabolites and structural components)
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Improves intestinal villus height, crypt depth, villus surface area, and absorptive epithelial cell area; enhances skeletal muscle size and tibia traits (weight, length, density, ash content).
E_D_repair_material (修复因子_相关物质): Not specified (likely via growth-promoting metabolites and microbiota modulation)
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Maintains normal serum levels of glucose and cholesterol; reduces abdominal fat pad deposition; enhances insulin-like growth factor-1 (IGF-1) and growth hormone (GH) levels.
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (natural strain, no engineered kill switches)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no horizontal gene transfer risk mentioned; safe for animal use (EFSA, 2007)
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Encapsulation provides physical confinement and protects spores during feed processing and storage
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Bacillus subtilis PB6 是一种被广泛认可的安全菌株（GRAS），天然存在于健康鸡肠道中，无致病性，无抗生素抗性基因，且通过包埋形式使用，具有良好的物理屏障保护，安全性高。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): Bacillus subtilis PB6 能有效缓解热应激对肉鸡的负面影响，显著改善体增重、饲料转化率、肠道绒毛结构、肌肉和骨骼发育，并维持正常血糖、胆固醇水平及生长激素和IGF-1水平，使热应激肉鸡的生长性能接近热中性对照组水平。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 30–37°C, pH 6.0–7.0, tolerant to bile salts and gastric acidity; utilizes lactose and other sugars as carbon sources
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Moderate growth rate; doubling time ~60–90 min in vitro; stable colonization in intestinal lumen in vivo
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gut lumen, particularly inflamed intestinal mucosa in IBD
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of pathogenic bacteria; symbiotic with host microbiota; minimal disruption to native microbiome
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to bile, low pH, osmotic stress; stable during lyophilization and rehydration
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Bile salts, gastric acid, osmotic stressors
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 乳酸乳球菌为兼性厌氧菌，可在胃肠道环境中稳定生长，耐受胃酸和胆汁，适合口服给药。其在炎症性肠病（IBD）患者的肠道黏膜中可定植并持续释放治疗性蛋白，具有良好的生物相容性和安全性。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Plasmid-based expression systems (e.g., pNZ8048), CRISPR-Cas9 for gene editing
G_edit_efficiency (编辑效率): High efficiency (>90%) with low off-target effects; stable plasmid maintenance in gut environment
G_circuit_control (回路控制): Constitutive expression of IL-10; inducible systems under development
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High plasmid stability (copy number ~10–20); no chromosomal integration; low metabolic burden; evolutionarily stable in gut over time
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in oral formulations and intestinal mucus; compatible with mucoadhesive carriers
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 通过质粒系统在乳酸乳球菌中稳定表达抗炎细胞因子IL-10，用于治疗炎症性肠病。该菌株经工程改造后可在肠道炎症部位持续释放IL-10，调节免疫反应，减轻炎症症状。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): FNR promoter (hypoxia), Lactate-responsive promoters, TNF-α-responsive elements
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): AND gate: requires both low oxygen and high TNF-α for optimal IL-10 expression; threshold-based activation in inflamed tissue
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 该系统通过整合低氧和炎症因子（如TNF-α）信号，实现“AND”逻辑门控制，确保仅在炎症性肠病的病灶部位激活IL-10的表达，避免在健康组织中过度表达，从而提高靶向性和安全性。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Constitutive secretion via Sec pathway; no lysis or vesicle release reported
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Tunable via promoter strength and plasmid copy number; in vivo expression self-limited by immune clearance
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with oral tablets, capsules, and mucoadhesive gels; stable in gastrointestinal environment
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Not applicable
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 无抗菌功能
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): 在肠道炎症部位持续分泌抗炎细胞因子IL-10，抑制TNF-α等促炎因子，调节Th1/Th2平衡，减轻肠道炎症反应。
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): 通过分泌IL-10促进上皮细胞再生，增强肠道屏障功能，修复受损黏膜，改善肠道通透性。
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Not applicable
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Auxotrophy (e.g., auxotrophic for essential amino acids); suicide genes under development
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Non-pathogenic; low risk of horizontal gene transfer; no known antibiotic resistance genes; minimal immunogenicity
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Oral delivery with intestinal mucus barrier; limited systemic dissemination
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 乳酸乳球菌为公认安全（GRAS）菌株，无致病性，不产生内毒素，可在肠道内定植并被宿主免疫系统安全清除。其工程改造菌株通过营养缺陷型和自杀基因实现生物遏制，安全性高，已进入I期临床试验。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在小鼠炎症性肠病模型中，口服工程化乳酸乳球菌显著减轻结肠炎症、降低疾病活动指数（DAI），促进黏膜修复，疗效优于传统药物。在I期临床试验中，患者耐受性良好，炎症标志物（如CRP、TNF-α）明显下降。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Grows only in hypoxic environments (e.g., necrotic tumor core); optimal at 37°C, pH 6.5–7.0; requires complex nutrients including amino acids and vitamins
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Slow growth rate; doubling time ~4–6 hours in vitro; limited proliferation in vivo due to immune clearance
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Hypoxic tumor core, necrotic regions of solid tumors
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of commensals; no known symbiosis; may disrupt local microbiome
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): High tolerance to hypoxia, low pH, and osmotic stress; spores are highly stable during lyophilization and storage
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Spore coat proteins, DNA repair enzymes
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 破伤风梭菌NT为严格厌氧菌，其孢子可在肿瘤缺氧核心中萌发并增殖，具有靶向肿瘤组织的能力。孢子对干燥、低温和胃肠道环境具有极强耐受性，适合通过注射或口服给药。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): CRISPR-Cas9, Recombination (λ-Red), Transposon mutagenesis
G_edit_efficiency (编辑效率): High efficiency (>85%); low off-target risk; stable chromosomal integration
G_circuit_control (回路控制): Constitutive expression of therapeutic genes; inducible systems under development
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High chromosomal stability; no plasmid loss; low metabolic burden; evolutionarily stable in tumor microenvironment
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in spore form; compatible with injectable hydrogels and tumor-targeting carriers
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 通过CRISPR-Cas9技术对破伤风梭菌NT进行基因改造，使其在肿瘤缺氧区表达抗肿瘤蛋白（如IL-2）或前药活化酶（如胞嘧啶脱氨酶），实现靶向肿瘤治疗。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): FNR promoter (hypoxia), Lactate-responsive promoters, MMP-9-responsive elements
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): AND gate: requires hypoxia + low pH + high lactate for optimal gene expression; noise suppression via thresholding
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 该系统通过整合缺氧、酸性环境和乳酸积累等肿瘤微环境信号，实现“AND”逻辑门控制，确保仅在肿瘤核心区域激活治疗基因表达，避免在正常组织中非特异性激活，提高安全性。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Spore germination → vegetative growth → secretion of therapeutic proteins; no lysis or vesicle release reported
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Tunable via spore dose; in vivo activity limited by immune clearance and tumor vascularization
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with injectable hydrogels and tumor-targeting carriers; stable in hypoxic matrix
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Not applicable
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 无抗菌功能
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): 在肿瘤内表达IL-2，激活T细胞和NK细胞，增强抗肿瘤免疫反应，诱导免疫记忆。
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Not applicable
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Not applicable
E_F_mechanism_desc (肿瘤治疗描述): 孢子在肿瘤缺氧区萌发并增殖，释放前药活化酶（如胞嘧啶脱氨酶）将5-氟胞嘧啶（5-FC）转化为5-氟尿嘧啶（5-FU），实现局部化疗；同时诱导肿瘤细胞凋亡和免疫原性细胞死亡。
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Auxotrophy (e.g., auxotrophic for threonine); suicide genes (e.g., ccdB); temperature-sensitive replication
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Moderate pathogenicity; potential for systemic infection if immune-compromised; no known antibiotic resistance genes; low HGT risk
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Intratumoral injection limits systemic spread; spores are cleared by immune system
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 破伤风梭菌NT为BLS-2级病原体，虽经减毒改造，但仍具潜在致病性。通过营养缺陷型和自杀基因实现生物遏制，确保在肿瘤外无法增殖。临床试验中采用局部注射，有效控制了系统性风险，安全性可控。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在多种实体瘤小鼠模型中，注射破伤风梭菌NT孢子后，肿瘤体积显著缩小，部分肿瘤完全消退。在I期临床试验中，患者耐受性良好，部分晚期肿瘤患者出现客观缓解，且未见严重不良反应。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Grows in both aerobic and anaerobic conditions; optimal at 37°C, pH 6.5–7.5; tolerates bile and low pH
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Fast growth rate; doubling time ~20–30 min in vitro; moderate in vivo persistence
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Tumor core, hypoxic and necrotic regions; also colonizes lymph nodes
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive with gut microbiota; may disrupt microbiome; no known symbiosis
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to bile, low pH, osmotic stress, and shear stress; stable in blood circulation
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Outer membrane proteins, stress response regulators (e.g., RpoS)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 伤寒沙门氏菌为兼性厌氧菌，可在肿瘤缺氧区增殖，具有良好的系统性靶向能力。其对胃肠道环境和血液中的应激条件具有较强耐受性，适合静脉注射给药。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): CRISPR-Cas9, Recombination (λ-Red), Transposon mutagenesis
G_edit_efficiency (编辑效率): High efficiency (>90%); low off-target risk; stable chromosomal integration
G_circuit_control (回路控制): Inducible (e.g., arabinose promoter); constitutive expression of therapeutic genes
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High chromosomal stability; no plasmid loss; low metabolic burden; evolutionarily stable in tumor

B_risk_desc (风险描述): 伤寒沙门氏菌VNP20009为BLS-2级病原体，经基因改造后安全性提高。通过营养缺陷型和自杀基因实现生物遏制，确保在肿瘤外无法增殖。静脉注射后可靶向肿瘤，临床试验中显示良好耐受性。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在多种实体瘤小鼠模型中，静脉注射VNP20009后，肿瘤生长显著抑制，部分肿瘤完全消退。在I期临床试验中，患者耐受性良好，部分晚期患者出现疾病稳定或部分缓解。

healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 该菌株在体外表现出优异的黏附能力（约20%），显著高于Lactobacillus acidophilus LA-5（6%）和Pediococcus pentosaceus菌株（2%-5%），且对胃酸和小肠环境具有高耐受性，具备良好的肠道定植潜力，是功能性食品中极具前景的候选益生菌。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 5.5–6.5; requires complex media with amino acids, vitamins, and carbohydrates; dependent on host-derived nutrients in vivo
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~60–90 minutes in vitro; in vivo growth limited by host immune response and competition with resident microbiota
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gastrointestinal tract (small intestine), mucosal surface of the gut; transient presence in bloodstream under immunocompromised or invasive device conditions
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Commensal; competes with pathogenic bacteria for adhesion sites and nutrients; may modulate host immune response; minimal disruption to core gut microbiome
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Moderate tolerance to gastric acid and bile; sensitive to drying and UV; stable during lyophilization and rehydration; shear stress sensitivity in liquid formulations
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Cell wall components (e.g., peptidoglycan, exopolysaccharides); intrinsic acid resistance mechanisms
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Lactobacillus GG is a facultative anaerobe capable of growing in the human gut under physiological conditions. It exhibits moderate stress tolerance, particularly to gastric acid and bile, enabling transient survival in the gastrointestinal tract. However, it lacks robust environmental persistence and is sensitive to drying and UV exposure. Its growth in vivo is constrained by host immunity and microbial competition.
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): Chromosomal integration not reported; likely maintained as plasmid or chromosomal copy without artificial selection; no evidence of long-term in vivo stability or engineered genetic circuits
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): No engineered genetic systems; natural strain used without synthetic biology modifications
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): Lactobacillus GG is used in its native form without genetic modification. No synthetic circuits, inducible promoters, or engineered control systems are employed. The strain is administered as a probiotic without any genetic engineering for therapeutic function.
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): FNR-like regulators (hypoxia); bile salt hydrolase (BSH) for bile sensing; lactate permease (LctP) for lactate uptake
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No engineered logic gates; natural sensing via metabolic and environmental cues with threshold-based responses (e.g., acid resistance induction at pH < 5.0)
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): Lactobacillus GG naturally senses environmental cues such as low pH and bile salts through intrinsic regulatory systems. It activates acid resistance mechanisms and bile tolerance pathways upon exposure. These responses are threshold-dependent and do not involve synthetic logic circuits. The strain does not exhibit complex signal integration or noise filtering beyond native physiological adaptation.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Passive diffusion and cell lysis (natural release of metabolites and proteins)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose determined by standard probiotic administration (e.g., 10^10 CFU/day); no dynamic or feedback-controlled release
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with oral suspension and tube feeding; no encapsulation in biomaterials reported
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 未报告抗菌或抗生物膜活性
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): 通过调节肠道免疫反应，增强抗炎细胞因子（如IL-10）分泌，抑制促炎因子（如TNF-α、IL-6），并促进黏膜屏障功能。
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): Exopolysaccharides (EPS), surface proteins (e.g., p40, p75), and secreted metabolites
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (natural strain without engineered kill switches or auxotrophy)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; opportunistic bacteremia in immunocompromised or device-implanted patients; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; low horizontal gene transfer risk; potential for environmental contamination during handling
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): No physical barrier; administration via open room handling increases risk of aerosolization and cross-transmission
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Lactobacillus GG is classified as GRAS (Generally Recognized As Safe) and BSL-1. However, in patients with central venous catheters and feeding tubes, improper handling (e.g., opening capsules in patient room) can lead to environmental contamination and rare cases of bacteremia. The risk is low but clinically significant due to misclassification as CLABSI. No engineered biocontainment is present.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): Lactobacillus GG is used to prevent antibiotic-associated diarrhea in hospitalized patients. While not directly involved in wound healing, its role in maintaining gut barrier integrity and modulating systemic immunity may indirectly support recovery. However, in this case, a single blood culture isolate led to a CLABSI classification, highlighting the need for standardized handling to avoid avoidable infections.

C_growth_desc (生长描述): Lactobacillus rhamnosus GG is a facultative anaerobe that grows optimally at 37°C in MRS broth. It is naturally adapted to the human gastrointestinal tract and exhibits high viability under simulated gastric and intestinal conditions when encapsulated in NaCMC-gelatin water-in-water emulsions. The encapsulation significantly enhances its survival during exposure to harsh digestive environments.
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): No genetic modifications were performed. The system relies on the natural physiology of Lactobacillus rhamnosus GG without any engineered genetic circuits or synthetic biology components. The bacteria are used in their wild-type form for encapsulation and delivery.
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): No sensing or logic modules are present. The system is passive and does not respond to environmental signals. The bacteria are not engineered to detect or react to physiological cues.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Passive release via matrix degradation; bacteria are entrapped in W/W emulsion droplets and released upon digestion.
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Controlled by matrix degradation rate and release kinetics; not actively regulated.
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Highly compatible with the NaCMC-gelatin W/W emulsion matrix; no structural collapse observed; supports viable cell retention.
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Not applicable – no antibacterial mechanism is engineered or inherent in this system.
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): No antibacterial activity is reported or engineered in this system.
E_B_mechanism_desc (产氧机制描述): Not applicable – no oxygen-producing enzymes or mechanisms are present.
E_B_crit_evidence (标准B_依据): No oxygenation function is implemented in the system.

E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Not applicable – no tissue repair factors are produced or delivered.
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Not applicable – no metabolic regulation via SCFAs or other metabolites is reported.
E_F_mechanism_desc (肿瘤治疗描述): Not applicable – no tumor-targeting or prodrug conversion mechanisms are present.
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None – no kill switches or auxotrophy used.
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; non-opportunistic; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no horizontal gene transfer risk; low environmental escape risk due to edible, biodegradable matrix.
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Physical confinement by NaCMC-gelatin matrix prevents uncontrolled release; biodegradable and edible.
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Lactobacillus rhamnosus GG is a well-characterized probiotic strain with GRAS status. The system uses edible, biocompatible materials (gelatin, NaCMC) and does not involve genetic engineering. No safety concerns are reported. The encapsulation provides additional containment and controlled release, minimizing ecological and health risks.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): The encapsulated Lactobacillus rhamnosus GG maintains high viability (>99%) after exposure to simulated gastric fluid and shows 77.5% survival after sequential exposure to gastric and intestinal fluids, compared to 60% for free cells. This demonstrates significant protection and enhanced delivery potential to the intestinal tract, supporting its use in probiotic delivery systems.

spatial_arrangement (空间排布): Oral gavage (systemic delivery via gastrointestinal tract)

C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Growth rate not specified; in vivo homeostasis observed in mouse models after oral administration; in vitro growth confirmed via culture (CFU counts)
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Intestinal mucosa, particularly in the colon; adheres to and degrades mucin layers; preferentially colonizes the mucus layer of the gut epithelium
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive interaction with other gut microbes; enhances gut barrier integrity; may modulate host immune response and reduce inflammation; no evidence of pathogenicity or disruption of microbiome balance
