C_growth_desc (生长描述): Akkermansia muciniphila is a mucin-degrading bacterium that thrives in the intestinal mucus layer, using mucin as its primary nutrient source. It is a facultative anaerobe capable of colonizing the gut and maintaining homeostasis in the host. Its ability to survive pasteurization without loss of function suggests high stability under processing conditions.
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Not applicable (no genetic modification reported)
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): Chromosomal stability; no plasmid-based systems used; natural persistence in gut environment observed in animal models
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in oral delivery formats (e.g., freeze-dried or pasteurized preparations); maintains function in gastrointestinal environment
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): Akkermansia muciniphila is used in its native form without genetic modification. Its beneficial effects are attributed to natural metabolic and immunomodulatory activities, particularly through the secretion of outer membrane protein Amuc_1100 and extracellular vesicles (EVs). No synthetic genetic circuits or inducible systems are employed.
S_host_signals (宿主信号): ["Toll-like receptors (TLR2, TLR4)", "Cytokines (TNF-α, IL-6, IL-10)", "Proteases (indirectly via barrier integrity)"]
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Mucin-binding receptors; TLR2/TLR4 signaling pathways; Amuc_1100 protein (outer membrane protein)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No synthetic logic gates; natural feedback loops via host immune and metabolic signaling (e.g., LPS → TLR4 → inflammation; Amuc_1100 → IL-10 ↑)
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): Akkermansia muciniphila senses the intestinal environment through mucin availability and host immune signals. It responds to mucin degradation by promoting barrier integrity and modulating immune responses. It detects elevated LPS and pro-inflammatory cytokines and counteracts them by upregulating anti-inflammatory mediators like IL-10 and downregulating TLR4 and NF-κB pathways, forming a natural feedback loop to restore homeostasis.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Extracellular Vesicles (EVs), Outer membrane protein Amuc_1100 secretion
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent effects observed (1×10⁸ to 5×10⁹ CFU); effects vary with strain and duration; no synthetic control systems
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with oral delivery; stable in freeze-dried and pasteurized forms; maintains function in gastrointestinal environment
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Not applicable (no direct antibacterial activity reported)
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 无直接抗菌作用证据
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Modulates host immune response by reducing pro-inflammatory cytokines (TNF-α, IL-6, MCP-1) and increasing anti-inflammatory IL-10; downregulates TLR2/TLR4 signaling; inhibits NF-κB and JNK pathways; reduces metabolic endotoxemia via LPS reduction.
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): Amuc_1100 (outer membrane protein), Extracellular Vesicles (EVs), IL-10
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Enhances gut barrier integrity by upregulating tight junction proteins; reduces intestinal permeability; promotes epithelial homeostasis; alleviates adipose tissue whitening and reduces adipocyte size.
E_D_repair_material (修复因子_相关物质): Amuc_1100, Extracellular Vesicles (EVs), Tight junction proteins (e.g., occludin, ZO-1)
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Improves glucose homeostasis and insulin sensitivity; reduces fat mass and body weight gain; enhances energy expenditure; modulates lipid metabolism (reduces triglycerides and cholesterol); increases fecal caloric excretion; upregulates GLP-1 and PYY expression.
E_F_mechanism_desc (肿瘤治疗描述): Not applicable (no direct tumor therapy reported)
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Natural auxotrophy (mucin-dependent growth); no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no evidence of horizontal gene transfer
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Non-pathogenic; no virulence factors reported; low opportunistic risk; no antibiotic resistance genes detected; no environmental escape risk due to mucin dependency
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Gastrointestinal tract barrier; no systemic dissemination reported
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Akkermansia muciniphila is classified as GRAS (Generally Recognized As Safe) due to its natural presence in healthy human gut microbiota. It is non-pathogenic, does not cause disease, and is dependent on mucin for growth, limiting its survival outside the gut. No antibiotic resistance genes or virulence factors have been reported. Its use in animal models shows no adverse effects, supporting its safety profile.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): Akkermansia muciniphila supplementation significantly reduces body weight gain, fat mass, and adipocyte size in high-fat diet-fed mice. It improves glucose homeostasis, insulin sensitivity, and lipid profiles. It enhances gut barrier function, reduces systemic inflammation, and modulates immune responses. These effects are observed with both live and pasteurized forms, with pasteurized preparations showing enhanced stability and efficacy. The outer membrane protein Amuc_1100 and extracellular vesicles are key mediators of these beneficial effects.

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Temperature: 25–37°C; pH: neutral to slightly alkaline; NaCl tolerance: moderate (2.5%); Carbon source: organic matter in biofloc; Nutritional requirements: complex media with amino acids, vitamins, and minerals
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Growth rate: moderate; Doubling time: not specified; In vitro growth confirmed; In vivo colonization observed in hepatopancreas and water
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Hepatopancreas (B. subtilis), Water/biofloc matrix (B. licheniformis)
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of pathogens; colonization of intestinal and aquatic niches; potential symbiosis with host microbiota
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Moderate tolerance to temperature (25–37°C), osmotic stress (2.5% NaCl), and storage (lyophilized probiotic used); no data on UV, drying, or shear stress
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Not specified
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Bacillus subtilis and Bacillus licheniformis are facultative anaerobes capable of growing in both aerobic and anaerobic conditions. They thrive in the biofloc environment of freshwater prawn systems, with B. subtilis preferentially colonizing the hepatopancreas and B. licheniformis dominating in the water column. Both species exhibit moderate tolerance to environmental fluctuations and are stable in commercial probiotic formulations.
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): PCR with species-specific primers (EN1F/EN1R for B. subtilis; ADK-F/ADK-R for B. licheniformis); no evidence of CRISPR, recombinase, or plasmid-based engineering
G_circuit_control (回路控制): Not applicable (no synthetic circuits or inducible systems described)
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): Not applicable (no engineered plasmids or chromosomal integrations reported)
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Not applicable
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): No genetic engineering was performed. The strains were used in their native form, with identity confirmed via PCR using species-specific primers targeting the EN-1 (endoglucanase) and ADK (adenylate kinase) genes. No synthetic circuits or genetic modifications were introduced.
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Not specified (no specific receptor or promoter reported)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Not applicable (no synthetic logic circuits described)
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): No engineered sensing or logic processing was implemented. Natural environmental sensing is inferred from colonization patterns in response to nutrient availability, pH, and oxygen gradients in the biofloc system.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Secretion of enzymes and antimicrobial compounds via general secretion pathways; no evidence of lysis or vesicle-mediated delivery
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Daily addition of probiotics at controlled concentrations (1.08–3.25 × 10⁵ CFU/g); dosage controlled by external administration
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with biofloc matrix; no structural disruption observed
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): B. subtilis produces antimicrobial substances such as bacitracin and bacillin, which inhibit pathogenic bacteria. B. licheniformis also produces enzymes and antimicrobial compounds that suppress harmful microbes.
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): B. subtilis and B. licheniformis are non-pathogenic to humans and do not disrupt the biofloc matrix. They reduce pathogen load by competition and antimicrobial production, with no reported cytotoxicity or microbiome disruption.
E_B_crit_evidence (标准B_依据): No oxygenation mechanism was implemented or reported.
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Probiotics stimulate the immune system of prawns by activating immune cells in the hepatopancreas and gut, enhancing disease resistance.
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Not applicable
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Probiotics enhance digestion by increasing enzymatic activity (e.g., proteases, amylases), improving nutrient absorption and metabolic efficiency.
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Natural non-pathogenicity; no kill-switches or auxotrophy reported
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; not considered human pathogen; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no horizontal gene transfer evidence; low environmental escape risk due to non-native habitat
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Biofloc system acts as physical confinement; no escape into natural water bodies reported
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Both Bacillus subtilis and Bacillus licheniformis are classified as GRAS (Generally Recognized As Safe) and are widely used in aquaculture. They are non-pathogenic to humans and do not pose significant environmental or health risks. No genetic modifications or antibiotic resistance genes were introduced, minimizing biosafety concerns.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): Daily addition of probiotics at concentrations ≥1.08 × 10⁵ CFU/g significantly improved survival of Macrobrachium rosenbergii (p = 0.014) in a 40-day biofloc system. However, no significant differences were observed in final weight, weight gain, biomass gain, specific growth rate, or feed conversion rate. B. subtilis showed better colonization in the hepatopancreas, while B. licheniformis dominated in the water column. The probiotics contributed to microbial balance and pathogen suppression without altering water quality parameters.

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 6.0–7.0; tolerates gastric acidity and bile salts; utilizes various carbohydrates including glucose, fructose, and lactose as carbon sources
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): High growth rate in vitro; survives gastrointestinal tract conditions with high viability; adheres strongly to intestinal epithelial cells
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Mucosal surfaces of the human gut and breast milk; colonizes infant gut and intestinal mucosa
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of pathogens via production of antimicrobial compounds and adhesion to host cells; may support symbiotic gut microbiota development
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): High tolerance to gastric acidity, bile salts, and oxidative stress; survives lyophilization and rehydration; stable under moderate shear stress
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Hydrogen peroxide, lactate, acetate
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Lactobacillus salivarius CECT 5713 is a facultative anaerobe that grows well under physiological conditions, exhibits strong survival in gastrointestinal environments, and adheres effectively to intestinal epithelial cells. It thrives in mucosal niches such as the gut and breast milk, contributing to early gut microbiota establishment in infants.
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Plasmid-based systems (pHN1, pHN2, pHN3); no CRISPR or recombinase tools reported
G_edit_efficiency (编辑效率): Not applicable (no genetic editing reported in this study)
G_circuit_control (回路控制): Constitutive expression of probiotic functions; no inducible circuits described
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): Plasmid pHN3 is stable and carries bacteriocin genes; plasmid copy number not specified; chromosomal integration not performed; no evidence of genetic drift reported
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): No material encapsulation described; stability in biological environments is inherent
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): The strain naturally encodes multiple probiotic traits via chromosomal and plasmid genes. The megaplasmid pHN3 harbors genes for bacteriocin production (salivaricin ABP-118), which are constitutively expressed. No synthetic genetic circuits or engineered modifications were introduced.
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): 6-phospho-β-glucosidase, collagen-binding proteins
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No synthetic logic gates reported; natural sensing via metabolic and adhesion pathways
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): L. salivarius CECT 5713 senses host-derived nutrients (e.g., glucose, lactose) and mucosal surfaces via specific enzymes and adhesins. It responds to pH and oxidative stress through intrinsic stress response mechanisms, enabling colonization and persistence in the gut.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Secretion of metabolites (lactate, acetate, H2O2) and bacteriocins via general secretion pathways; no specific secretion system reported
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Constitutive production; dosage not externally controllable
E_material_match (材料匹配性): No encapsulation described; natural secretion compatible with mucosal environments
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Produces lactate, acetate, and hydrogen peroxide; secretes bacteriocins (salivaricin ABP-118) encoded on megaplasmid pHN3; inhibits biofilm formation by competing for adhesion sites
E_A_agent_material (抗菌因子_相关物质): Lactate, acetate, hydrogen peroxide, salivaricin ABP-118
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 该菌株对多种病原菌具有抗菌活性，能抑制生物膜形成，且在体内外实验中均表现出低细胞毒性，局部作用明确，不显著破坏正常菌群。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Stimulates expression of mucin-encoding genes; modulates immune responses in vitro and in vivo; reduces pro-inflammatory cytokines and enhances anti-inflammatory pathways
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Stimulates mucin gene expression, enhances intestinal barrier function, promotes epithelial cell integrity and regeneration
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (natural strain with no synthetic kill switches)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Non-pathogenic; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; low risk of horizontal gene transfer; no evidence of environmental escape; safe for human consumption
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Not applicable (no engineered material barrier)
B_risk_desc (风险描述): L. salivarius CECT 5713 is a GRAS (Generally Recognized As Safe) strain isolated from human milk and infant feces. It has no known pathogenicity, antibiotic resistance genes, or potential for horizontal gene transfer. Its natural origin and safety profile support its use in probiotic applications.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 口服给药可有效治疗哺乳期妇女的感染性乳腺炎；在体内外实验中均表现出显著的免疫调节、抗炎和抗菌作用，促进肠道屏障功能修复，支持婴儿早期肠道微生物群建立。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 6.0–7.0, utilizes glucose and other carbohydrates as carbon sources; dependent on host-derived nutrients in vivo
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~1–2 hours in vitro; stable colonization in gut mucosa in vivo
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Intestinal mucosa, colon lumen
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of pathogenic bacteria (e.g., E. coli, Enterobacteriaceae); symbiotic with host immune system; modulates commensal balance
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to gastric acid, bile salts, and moderate osmotic stress; stable during lyophilization and storage at 4°C
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Cell wall components, exopolysaccharides, acid resistance systems
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 上述微生物多为乳酸菌，属于兼性厌氧菌，可在肠道环境中定植并维持稳定生长。它们依赖宿主提供的碳源（如葡萄糖）和营养物质，具有良好的胃酸和胆盐耐受性，适合口服给药。在体内可定植于结肠黏膜和肠腔，通过竞争性排斥病原菌和调节免疫系统发挥保护作用。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): None explicitly mentioned; natural strains used
G_circuit_control (回路控制): Constitutive expression of beneficial metabolites and surface adhesins
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High chromosomal stability; no plasmid-based systems reported; low metabolic burden
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in oral formulations and gut environment
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 所有菌株均为天然分离株，未进行基因改造。其功能主要依赖于天然代谢途径和表面结构，如黏附素、乳酸产生酶和抗菌肽，通过定植和代谢调节发挥治疗作用。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Lactate permease, bile acid transporters, TLR2/4, MUC2 promoters
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Threshold-based activation of immune modulation and anti-inflammatory responses; feedback inhibition via SCFA production
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 这些微生物通过感知肠道环境中的pH、胆汁酸、乳酸和短链脂肪酸等信号，结合宿主免疫因子（如IL-17、TNF-α）和黏蛋白表达水平，动态调节免疫反应。当炎症标志物升高时，乳酸菌通过上调MUC2和ZO-1表达，增强屏障功能，同时抑制TLR4/NF-κB通路，形成负反馈调节回路，实现稳态平衡。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Type I secretion (bacteriocins), lysis (controlled release), extracellular vesicles
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent effects observed in animal models; oral administration allows natural regulation
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with oral formulations (capsules, powders); stable in gastrointestinal tract
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): 通过产生乳酸、细菌素和竞争性排斥机制抑制病原菌生长，破坏生物膜结构。
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 在多种动物模型中，LGG、L. casei、L. acidophilus等菌株显著减少E. coli、Enterobacteriaceae等病原菌数量，抑制肿瘤发生，且未见明显细胞毒性或菌群紊乱。
E_B_crit_evidence (标准B_依据): 未提及任何产氧机制，不适用于缺氧环境治疗。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): 调节Th17/Treg平衡，抑制促炎因子（TNF-α, IL-6, COX-2），促进抗炎因子（IL-10, TGF-β）表达，增强黏膜屏障。
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): IL-10, TGF-β, IL-17, IL-22, TLR2/4 modulators
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): 促进黏蛋白（MUC2）、紧密连接蛋白（ZO-1, occludin）生成，增强肠道屏障功能，抑制上皮细胞增殖异常。
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): 产生短链脂肪酸（SCFAs），调节宿主代谢，抑制肿瘤发生。
E_F_mechanism_desc (肿瘤治疗描述): 无直接肿瘤杀伤或前药激活机制。
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Auxotrophy (nutrient-dependent survival), natural attenuation in gut
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no evidence of horizontal gene transfer; low risk of environmental escape
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Gastrointestinal tract acts as physical barrier; no systemic dissemination reported
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 所有菌株均为公认安全（GRAS）菌株，无致病性，不携带耐药基因，不会在环境中长期存活。其在肠道内依赖宿主营养生存，具有天然衰减性，安全性高。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在多种动物模型中，口服益生菌显著降低结直肠癌的发生率、肿瘤数量和体积。例如，LGG可减少DMH诱导大鼠的肿瘤发生率和体积；L. casei可抑制DMH诱导的CRC；B. lactis与抗性淀粉合用可显著降低CRC发病率。此外，这些菌株还能显著增加短链脂肪酸（SCFA）水平，改善肠道屏障功能，抑制炎症和细胞增殖，具有良好的预防和治疗潜力。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, anaerobic conditions for lactobacilli and bifidobacteria; pH tolerance not explicitly stated, but adapted to intestinal environment
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Not explicitly quantified; viable bacteria survive gastric transit and colonize the ileal pouch
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Ileal pouch (post-IPAA), intestinal lumen, mucosal surface
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of pathogenic flora; no significant suppression of endogenous Bacteroides, coliforms, clostridia, or enterococci; promotes beneficial flora (lactobacilli, bifidobacteria, S. thermophilus)
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Resistant to gastric acid and bile; lyophilized formulation enhances stability during storage and transit
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Lyophilization (freeze-drying) process
C_growth_desc (生长描述): VSL#3 is a high-dose, lyophilized probiotic cocktail containing eight bacterial strains that survive gastrointestinal transit and colonize the ileal pouch, increasing beneficial bacterial populations without disrupting the native microbiota.
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): No genetic modifications; natural strains used; stability maintained via lyophilization and host environment
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in lyophilized form; survives encapsulation and gastrointestinal passage
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): VSL#3 is a naturally occurring, non-genetically modified bacterial cocktail. No synthetic genetic circuits or engineered control systems are used. The formulation relies on the inherent physiological properties of the strains.
S_metabolite_signals (代谢信号): ["Bile acids (bile tolerance confirmed)", "Lactate (implied by lactobacilli metabolism)"]
S_host_signals (宿主信号): ["Proteases (bile and gastric acid resistance suggests adaptation to host proteolytic environment)", "Cytokines (indirectly via immune modulation)"]
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Bile acid resistance mechanisms in Lactobacillus and Bifidobacterium strains; acid tolerance systems in Lactobacillus species
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No engineered logic gates; natural sensing of environmental cues (pH, bile, nutrients) drives colonization and metabolic activity
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): The microbial system naturally senses intestinal environmental conditions such as pH and bile concentration. Strains with bile and acid resistance (e.g., Lactobacillus, Bifidobacterium) survive gastric transit and colonize the ileal pouch. No synthetic logic circuits are involved.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Natural secretion of cytokines, SCFAs, and enzymes; no engineered secretion systems
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent: 3600 billion/day for 4 weeks, then 1800 billion/day for maintenance; efficacy correlates with dose and duration
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Lyophilized powder is stable in capsule form; compatible with oral delivery and intestinal environment
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Not applicable; VSL#3 is not designed as an antibacterial agent.
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 无抗菌作用，不适用于抗菌机制。
E_B_mechanism_desc (产氧机制描述): Not applicable; no oxygen-producing enzymes or mechanisms reported.
E_B_crit_evidence (标准B_依据): 无氧生成机制，不适用于氧合功能。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): VSL#3 increases tissue levels of anti-inflammatory IL-10 and decreases pro-inflammatory cytokines (IL-1, TNF-α, IFN-γ), reduces matrix metalloproteinase activity, and modulates dendritic cell function.
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): IL-10, IL-1, TNF-α, IFN-γ, matrix metalloproteinases
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Reduction in histologic inflammation, crypt abscesses, and ulceration; promotion of mucosal healing via immune modulation and barrier enhancement.
E_D_repair_material (修复因子_相关物质): IL-10, reduced MMP activity, improved mucosal integrity
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Increases fecal concentrations of beneficial metabolites such as SCFAs (implied by lactobacilli and bifidobacteria activity); restores microbial balance and reduces luminal pH.
E_F_mechanism_desc (肿瘤治疗描述): Not applicable; no evidence of tumor-targeting or prodrug conversion.
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (natural, non-pathogenic strains; no kill-switches or auxotrophy)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): No pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no evidence of horizontal gene transfer; low opportunistic risk in immunocompetent patients
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Capsule provides physical barrier during transit; no engineered containment
B_risk_desc (风险描述): VSL#3 consists of eight non-pathogenic, GRAS-status bacterial strains. No genetic modifications or biocontainment systems are used. The preparation is well-tolerated with only transient bloating reported. No serious adverse events or microbiome disruption observed.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在23例轻度活动性回肠袋炎患者中，16例（69%）在治疗4周后达到缓解，总PDAI评分从10（9–12）降至4（2–11），临床、内镜和组织学评分均显著改善。6个月维持治疗期间，所有缓解患者均保持缓解状态。生活质量（IBDQ评分）从110（90–140）显著提高至200（95–220）。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 6.0–7.0; requires complex media with carbohydrates (e.g., glucose, lactose) and vitamins; tolerant to intestinal pH and bile salts
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~60–90 minutes in vitro; in vivo colonization observed in human gut with transient persistence post-ingestion
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Intestinal lumen, particularly colon and ileum; competes with pathogens for adhesion sites and nutrients
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Symbiotic with host microbiota; inhibits pathogen overgrowth via competitive exclusion and production of antimicrobial compounds; minimal disruption to core microbiome
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Moderate tolerance to gastric acid and bile; stable during lyophilization and rehydration; resistant to moderate shear stress during formulation
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Bile salts, gastric acid, lyophilization stabilizers (e.g., trehalose)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该益生菌群为乳酸杆菌三联菌株，具有耐酸耐胆盐特性，可在肠道内定植并维持短期活性，适宜在37°C、pH 6.0–7.0条件下生长，依赖碳源和维生素，具备良好的环境适应性。
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): Chromosomal stability; no plasmid-based systems used; low metabolic burden; no reported genetic drift in clinical use
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in oral capsule formulation; maintains viability during storage and transit
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 该菌株组合未经过基因工程改造，其功能依赖于天然代谢通路，通过定植竞争和代谢产物发挥益生作用，无外源基因插入，遗传稳定性高。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Bile salt hydrolase (BSH), pH-responsive promoters (e.g., in L. acidophilus)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Constitutive expression; no complex logic gates; threshold-based activity via nutrient availability
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 菌株通过感知肠道pH变化和胆汁酸环境实现定植适应，依赖葡萄糖和乳酸等代谢物维持生长，无复杂逻辑调控，以基础代谢响应为主。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Constitutive secretion via general secretory pathway
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent effect; standardized capsule formulation (10^10 CFU/capsule); consistent delivery in clinical use
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with oral capsule formulation; stable during storage and gastrointestinal transit
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): 通过竞争性排斥抑制C. difficile在肠道黏膜的定植，产生乳酸降低局部pH，抑制病原菌生长
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 在前瞻性队列研究中，使用该益生菌组合的患者CDI风险比为0.6（95% CI: 0.4–0.9），表明其具有显著保护作用，且未报告严重不良事件。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): 调节肠道免疫反应，增强抗炎细胞因子分泌，抑制过度炎症反应，促进黏膜屏障功能
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): Secreted cytokines (e.g., IL-10), surface proteins (e.g., p75)
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): 促进肠上皮细胞再生，增强黏膜屏障完整性，减少通透性，改善肠道修复能力
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): 调节肠道代谢环境，通过产生SCFAs（如乙酸、丙酸）改善能量代谢，抑制病原菌生长，维持菌群稳态
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Auxotrophy (nutrient-dependent growth), no antibiotic resistance genes detected
B_containment_material (生物安全_相关物质): Nutrient-limited environment (e.g., absence of specific amino acids)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no reports of bacteremia or opportunistic infection; no horizontal gene transfer observed; environmental escape unlikely due to auxotrophy
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Oral capsule provides physical confinement; degradation in GI tract limits environmental persistence
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 该三联益生菌组合被认定为GRAS（公认安全），无抗生素抗性基因，依赖特定营养生长，不具备环境生存能力，临床使用中未发现严重不良反应，安全性良好。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在前瞻性队列研究中，使用该益生菌组合的患者CDI风险比为0.6（95% CI: 0.4–0.9，P=0.01），表明其在预防初级艰难梭菌感染方面具有显著保护作用，且在真实世界医疗环境中具有良好的可实施性。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, neutral to slightly acidic pH (6.0–7.0), requires complex nutrients including carbohydrates (e.g., lactose, oligosaccharides), amino acids, and vitamins; dependent on host-derived metabolites in gut environment
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~2–3 hours in vitro; in vivo colonization observed within 24–48 hours post-administration, with sustained presence over 3-week treatment period
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Small intestinal mucosa, particularly in the ileum; preferentially colonizes the epithelial surface and mucus layer
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of pathogenic bacteria; potential symbiosis with resident commensals; may enhance microbial diversity by promoting a favorable gut environment
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Moderate tolerance to gastric acid and bile salts; stable during lyophilization and rehydration; resistant to moderate shear stress during encapsulation
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Bile salt hydrolase (BSH), acid shock proteins (e.g., DnaK, GroEL)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Bifidobacterium infantis NSL 超菌株为专性或兼性厌氧菌，适宜在37°C、pH 6.0–7.0的肠道环境中生长，依赖乳糖、低聚糖等碳源及氨基酸、维生素等营养物质。在体外培养中倍增时间为2–3小时，在体内可快速定植于小肠黏膜表面，持续存在至少3周。对胃酸和胆盐具有中等耐受性，经冻干和复水后仍保持活性，适用于胶囊制剂封装。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Plasmid-based expression system (not explicitly stated, inferred from strain engineering in literature)
G_edit_efficiency (编辑效率): Not applicable (natural strain, no genetic modification reported)
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High chromosomal stability; no plasmid-based systems reported; no evidence of genetic drift during 3-week trial
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in capsule matrix; no degradation or leakage observed during storage and delivery
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 该菌株为天然分离菌株，未进行基因改造，其功能依赖于天然代谢通路。在临床试验中以胶囊形式口服给药，通过自然定植于小肠黏膜发挥调节作用。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Gliadin-binding proteins (e.g., surface adhesins), bile salt hydrolase (BSH), pH-responsive promoters (e.g., P15A promoter)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Constitutive expression; no reported synthetic logic gates; response to gliadin peptides is likely threshold-based via receptor-mediated binding
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): Bifidobacterium infantis 通过表面黏附蛋白识别并结合胃肠道中的麦胶蛋白肽段，触发其代谢活性。其对pH和胆盐的响应由天然调控系统控制，无合成逻辑门控机制。在炎症环境下，其代谢活动可能受细胞因子水平反馈调节，但未见明确的信号整合逻辑。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Constitutive secretion via general secretory pathway; no lysis or vesicle release reported
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent symptom improvement; 3-week oral administration at fixed dose (not titrated)
E_material_match (材料匹配性): High compatibility with capsule matrix; maintains viability and function during encapsulation and gastrointestinal transit
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Reduces proinflammatory cytokine levels (e.g., IL-6, TNF-α), modulates immune response to gliadin peptides, and decreases intestinal permeability by stabilizing tight junctions.
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): Bifidobacterial cell wall components (e.g., peptidoglycan, lipoteichoic acid), secreted metabolites (e.g., SCFAs)
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Protects intestinal epithelial cells from gliadin-induced damage, reduces epithelial permeability, and promotes barrier integrity.
E_D_repair_material (修复因子_相关物质): Short-chain fatty acids (SCFAs), extracellular matrix-stabilizing proteins
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Metabolizes gliadin peptides into less immunogenic fragments, reduces gluten toxicity in the intestinal lumen.
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Auxotrophy (nutritional dependency on host-derived nutrients)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Non-pathogenic; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; low risk of horizontal gene transfer; no environmental escape due to host dependency
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Capsule provides physical confinement; prevents environmental release
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Bifidobacterium infantis NSL 超菌株为公认安全（GRAS）菌株，无致病性，不携带抗生素抗性基因，依赖宿主营养物质生存，难以在体外长期存活。胶囊封装提供物理屏障，有效防止环境释放，整体风险极低。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在为期3周的双盲随机对照试验中，B. infantis 治疗组患者在胃肠道症状（消化不良、便秘、胃食管反流）方面有临床改善，血清抗tTG IgA和DGP抗体水平下降10%，但未达到统计学显著性。小肠通透性（乳果糖/甘露醇比值）无显著差异。尽管主要终点未达成，但提示其在调节免疫反应和改善症状方面具有潜在价值，需更大样本量和更长疗程研究进一步验证。

composition (组成成分): [{"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus rhamnosus", "strain_id": "LGG, ATCC 53103"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus rhamnosus", "strain_id": "LC705, DSM 7061"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Bifidobacterium breve", "strain_id": "Bb99, DSM 13692"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Propionibacterium freudenreichii ssp. shermanii", "strain_id": "JS, DSM 7076"}]
C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 6.0–7.0, in the presence of galacto-oligosaccharides (prebiotic). Requires complex media with amino acids, vitamins, and carbon sources.
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~1.5–2 hours in vitro; no in vivo growth kinetics reported.
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gastrointestinal tract (infant gut), particularly in the mucosal layer of the small intestine and colon.
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of pathogenic bacteria; potential symbiosis with host microbiota by enhancing microbial diversity and stability.
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to moderate osmotic stress and gastric acidity; stable during lyophilization and rehydration; resistant to shear stress during encapsulation.
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Galacto-oligosaccharides (prebiotic), encapsulation matrix
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该混合菌群为多种益生菌的组合，包括LGG、L. rhamnosus LC705、B. breve Bb99和P. freudenreichii ssp. shermanii JS。这些菌株均为兼性厌氧菌，可在37°C、pH 6.0–7.0的条件下生长，依赖于复杂的营养环境，包括氨基酸、维生素和碳源。在婴儿肠道中定植于黏膜层，具有竞争性抑制病原菌的能力，并可能通过增强微生物群多样性与宿主菌群形成共生关系。在冻干和再水化过程中表现出良好的稳定性，适用于胶囊制剂。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Not specified
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): Not specified
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Not specified
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 该研究未对菌株进行基因工程改造，所有菌株均以天然野生型形式使用，未引入外源基因或调控回路。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Not specified
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Not specified
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 该系统未设计特定的传感逻辑回路，其功能依赖于天然菌株对宿主微环境的响应，如pH变化、营养物质（如低聚糖）的存在以及宿主免疫因子（如细胞因子）的信号。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Not specified
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Not specified
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Encapsulated in capsules with prebiotic syrup; compatible with oral delivery and intestinal release.
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Not applicable
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 未检测到抗菌或抗生物膜活性。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): 通过调节Th1/Th2平衡、诱导Treg细胞分化、抑制促炎细胞因子（如IL-4、IL-5、IL-13）的释放，从而抑制IgE介导的过敏反应。
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): Lactobacillus rhamnosus (LGG, LC705), Bifidobacterium breve (Bb99), Propionibacterium freudenreichii ssp. shermanii (JS)
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): 通过促进肠道屏障功能恢复、增强黏膜免疫、调节上皮细胞增殖与分化，间接支持组织修复。
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): 通过发酵低聚糖产生短链脂肪酸（如乙酸、丙酸、丁酸），调节宿主能量代谢与免疫稳态。
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Not applicable
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): All strains are well-characterized, non-pathogenic, and GRAS (Generally Recognized As Safe). No antibiotic resistance genes reported. Low risk of horizontal gene transfer. No evidence of environmental escape.
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Capsule formulation provides physical confinement and protects against gastric degradation.
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 该益生菌混合物由四种公认安全（GRAS）的菌株组成，均为非致病性、无抗生素抗性基因，且未进行基因改造。胶囊剂型提供物理屏障，防止菌体在胃部失活或逃逸，整体安全性高。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在高风险儿童中，围产期使用该益生菌混合物未显著降低任何过敏原的IgE致敏率。然而，在13岁时，益生菌组对猫/狗皮屑的IgE致敏率显著高于安慰剂组（40.2% vs 31.0%，p=0.03）。在阴道分娩的子群中，该效应更为明显。此外，2岁时，阴道分娩子群中对桦树/黑麦草花粉的IgE致敏率在益生菌组中也更高。这表明该混合菌群可能对特定过敏原（如动物皮屑、花粉）的长期致敏具有潜在促进作用，而非保护作用。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 6.5–7.0, requires lactose and amino acids as carbon and nitrogen sources; tolerates mild bile exposure (0.1–0.3% bile salts).
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~1.5–2 hours in vitro; in vivo stability not assessed, but survival in gastrointestinal tract confirmed via fecal recovery in study.
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gut lumen, particularly colon; transient colonization with no evidence of long-term engraftment.
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): No significant competition or symbiosis reported; no disruption of native microbiota observed in study.
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Resistant to refrigeration (4°C) for up to 3 days; moderate tolerance to gastric acidity (pH 2.0–3.0) due to acid-adaptive mechanisms; no data on UV, drying, or shear stress.
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Cell wall components (e.g., teichoic acids) and acid shock proteins (e.g., Hsp18) likely contribute to acid resistance.
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该菌株为乳酸杆菌属植物乳杆菌A7，属于兼性厌氧菌，可在37°C、pH 6.5–7.0条件下生长，依赖乳糖和氨基酸作为碳氮源。在体外培养中，其倍增时间为1.5–2小时。在本研究中，该菌株在冷藏条件下（4°C）可稳定存活3天，且在肠道中具有一定的定植能力，但未观察到长期定植或对肠道菌群的显著影响。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Not specified
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High chromosomal stability; no plasmid-based systems used; no evidence of genetic drift or loss in 8-week trial.
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in soy milk matrix; no structural degradation or gas production observed during storage.
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 该菌株未经过基因改造，以天然菌株形式使用。其在豆奶中的稳定性良好，未发现质粒或外源基因元件，因此遗传稳定性高，且在材料环境中保持稳定。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): FNR-like promoter (inferred from acid tolerance and bile resistance), Lactose permease (LacS)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Constitutive expression; no reported logic gates or threshold control.
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 该菌株通过基础代谢通路感知乳糖和氨基酸等营养物质，同时利用FNR样调控元件响应pH变化和胆盐压力，实现基础的环境适应性，但未见复杂的逻辑门控或动态调控机制。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Constitutive secretion of metabolites and cell wall components; no specialized secretion systems reported.
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent effect observed: 2×10⁷ CFU/day; no further titration or feedback control.
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Highly compatible with soy milk matrix; no adverse effects on gel structure or stability during 3-day storage.
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Not applicable (no antibacterial activity reported)
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 未报告抗菌活性，因此不满足任何抗菌标准。
E_B_crit_evidence (标准B_依据): 未报告任何氧生成机制，因此不满足氧疗标准。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Modulates systemic inflammation by regulating cytokine profiles; reduces pro-inflammatory markers (TNF-α, CRP) and enhances anti-inflammatory adiponectin signaling.
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Not applicable (no tissue repair function reported)
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Improves lipid metabolism by reducing LDL-C and increasing HDL-C; may influence glucose homeostasis via gut-liver axis.
E_E_metabolite_material (代谢物_相关物质): Low-density lipoprotein (LDL), High-density lipoprotein (HDL), Fasting blood glucose (FBS)
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (natural strain, no kill-switch or auxotrophy reported)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Non-pathogenic; no antibiotic resistance genes detected; low risk of horizontal gene transfer; no environmental escape reported.
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Physical confinement via oral delivery and transient gut passage; no persistent colonization.
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 该菌株为公认安全（GRAS）菌株，来源于健康婴儿粪便，无致病性记录，未携带抗生素抗性基因，且在研究中未观察到对肠道菌群的显著干扰或环境释放风险，安全性良好。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在为期8周的干预中，摄入含植物乳杆菌A7的益生菌豆奶可显著降低低密度脂蛋白（LDL-C）水平（P=0.023），并提高高密度脂蛋白（HDL-C）水平（P=0.017），但对血清脂联素、TNF-α、C反应蛋白及空腹血糖水平无显著影响。表明该菌株在调节血脂方面具有潜在益处，但在抗炎和降糖方面效果不显著。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 6.5–7.0; tolerates gastric pH (2.0–3.0) and intestinal pH (6.0–7.5); requires complex media with carbohydrates (e.g., glucose, lactose) and amino acids.
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~1.5–2 hours in vitro; in vivo colonization confirmed via adherence to IEC-6 epithelial cells; no significant growth rate differences observed between in vitro and in vivo conditions.
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Intestinal mucosa (gut lumen and epithelial surface); adheres to IEC-6 cells in vitro, indicating potential for gut colonization.
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): No direct competition or symbiosis data reported; potential to modulate gut microbiota indirectly via metabolic byproducts.
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Resists gastric acidity (pH 2.0–3.0), bile salts (up to 0.3%), and lyophilization/rehydration; stable during storage at 4°C for 8 weeks.
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Exopolysaccharides (EPS), cell wall components, and intracellular antioxidants (e.g., glutathione precursors)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该菌株为兼性厌氧菌，可在37°C、pH 6.5–7.0条件下良好生长，耐受胃酸（pH 2.0–3.0）和胆汁盐（0.3%），在体外可黏附于IEC-6肠上皮细胞，表明其具有良好的肠道定植潜力。在体外与体内生长速率一致，对干燥、冷冻干燥及再水化具有较强耐受性，适合胶囊制剂封装。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Not applicable (no genetic modification reported)
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): Chromosomal stability; no plasmid-based systems used; no evidence of genetic drift or loss during 8-week supplementation.
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in maltodextrin-based capsules; no degradation or loss of viability during encapsulation and storage.
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 该菌株未经过基因工程改造，以天然菌株形式使用，其遗传稳定性高，无质粒依赖，可在胶囊材料中保持活性，适合长期储存和口服给药。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): FNR-like promoter (inferred from pH/bile tolerance), surface adhesins (e.g., mucus-binding proteins)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Constitutive expression; no inducible logic gates or threshold control reported.
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 该菌株通过其表面黏附蛋白和耐酸/耐胆盐机制感知肠道环境中的pH和胆汁盐变化，但未报告具有可调控的逻辑门控系统，其代谢活动为组成型表达，无外部信号诱导。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): None (no engineered secretion system reported)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Fixed daily dose (1×10⁸ CFU/day); no dynamic or feedback-controlled release.
E_material_match (材料匹配性): High compatibility with maltodextrin-based capsules; maintains viability during encapsulation and storage.
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Not applicable

E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): L. casei O1 may modulate host redox balance by producing antioxidants such as glutathione precursors, reducing oxidative stress markers like MDA, and enhancing antioxidant enzyme activity (e.g., SOD, GPx). In vitro studies show it can convert procyanidins into more bioactive antioxidants.
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (no kill-switch or auxotrophy reported)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no evidence of horizontal gene transfer; no environmental escape risk due to lack of environmental persistence.
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Capsule shell provides physical confinement; prevents release into environment.
B_risk_desc (风险描述): L. casei O1 is classified as GRAS (Generally Recognized As Safe) and has been used in food and supplements.无基因工程改造，无致病性或耐药基因，无生物安全风险。胶囊封装提供物理屏障，防止菌体释放。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在为期8周的临床试验中，L. casei O1补充剂对类风湿性关节炎女性患者的氧化应激指标（MDA、TAC、SOD、GPx、CAT）无显著改善作用。尽管体外研究显示其具有抗氧化潜力，但体内效果未达统计学显著性，可能与剂量（1×10⁸ CFU/天）较低、疗程较短（8周）及菌株本身抗氧化能力较弱有关。建议未来研究采用更高剂量或更长疗程以评估其潜在疗效。

C_growth_desc (生长描述): Bacillus coagulans SCC-19 is a gram-positive, spore-forming, facultative anaerobic bacterium capable of growing in MRS medium at 37°C. It exhibits high tolerance to cadmium (MIC up to 500 mg/L) and can survive lyophilization and refrigeration. It colonizes the intestinal tract of common carp and maintains viability in feed formulations.
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): No genetic modifications reported; natural strain used; chromosomal stability assumed
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in pelletized feed with soybean meal and CMC-Na; maintains viability during drying and storage
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): Bacillus coagulans SCC-19 was isolated from the intestinal contents of common carp and used in its native form without genetic modification. It was incorporated into feed pellets at 10⁸ CFU/g and maintained viability during preparation and storage.
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Unknown (likely intrinsic metal-binding capacity of cell wall and spores)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No engineered logic gates; response is likely constitutive and proportional to Cd exposure
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): Bacillus coagulans SCC-19 senses cadmium in the aquatic environment and intestinal lumen through intrinsic cell wall and membrane components. Its response is not genetically programmed but arises from natural metal-binding and detoxification mechanisms. No inducible or threshold-based logic is reported.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Cell wall/membrane binding and passive adsorption; no active secretion system reported
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dietary supplementation at 10⁸ CFU/g feed; controlled by feed formulation and administration schedule
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with pelletized feed (soybean meal, CMC-Na); stable during drying and storage

E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 无
E_B_mechanism_desc (产氧机制描述): Not applicable; no oxygen-producing mechanism reported.
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Restores immune parameters such as lysozyme (LZM), acid phosphatase (ACP), complement C3/C4, and modulates cytokine expression (TGF-β, TNF-α, IL-1β) in fish kidney.
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): Cytokines (TGF-β, TNF-α, IL-1β) and immune enzymes (LZM, ACP, C3, C4)
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Not applicable; no direct tissue repair or regeneration observed.
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Reduces cadmium bioaccumulation in liver and kidney by binding and removing Cd from water and gut lumen.

B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (natural strain, no engineered kill switches)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no horizontal gene transfer risk mentioned; environmental escape unlikely due to natural habitat origin
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Pelletized feed provides physical confinement; no release into environment reported
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Bacillus coagulans SCC-19 is a naturally occurring probiotic strain isolated from fish gut. It is classified as GRAS (Generally Recognized As Safe) and poses minimal risk. No genetic modifications or antibiotic resistance genes were introduced. The strain is confined within feed pellets and does not persist in the environment beyond the experimental period.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在60天的实验中，补充Bacillus coagulans SCC-19显著恢复了镉暴露鱼的生长性能，降低了肝脏和肾脏中的镉积累，恢复了非特异性免疫和抗氧化能力。与对照组相比，镉暴露组的体重增长显著下降，而添加SCC-19的组体重增长显著提高。镉在肝脏和肾脏中的积累显著减少，抗氧化酶（CAT、GSH-Px、SOD）活性恢复，MDA和ROS水平下降，免疫因子（LZM、ACP、C3、C4）和细胞因子（TGF-β、TNF-α、IL-1β）表达恢复正常。

C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该研究中使用的益生菌株Bifidobacterium longum、Lactobacillus acidophilus和Enterococcus faecalis均为肠道定植型微生物，具有耐酸耐胆盐特性，可在人体肠道内长期定植。其生长依赖于复杂营养，适宜温度为37°C，pH值接近中性。长期摄入后，这些菌株可显著改变肠道菌群结构，促进有益菌如Blautia、Faecalibacterium等的富集，维持肠道微生态平衡。

E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): 通过调节免疫因子如IL-1β、IL-10、TNF-α等，抑制过度炎症反应，促进免疫稳态。Bifidobacterium和Lactobacillus可抑制NF-κB通路，降低促炎因子水平。
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): 通过促进有益菌群（如Faecalibacterium）的富集，间接支持肠道屏障功能修复，增强黏膜完整性，减少通透性损伤。
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): 通过调节短链脂肪酸（SCFAs）代谢，维持肠道能量平衡和免疫调节。尽管SCFA浓度未显著变化，但菌群结构改变提示代谢功能重塑。

B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; Enterococcus faecalis has potential for antibiotic resistance (e.g., vancomycin), but no HGT or environmental escape reported. No evidence of virulence genes.
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Not applicable
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 所用菌株均为公认安全（GRAS）菌株，Bifidobacterium longum和Lactobacillus acidophilus广泛用于食品和保健品。Enterococcus faecalis虽有潜在耐药性风险，但本研究中未发现临床致病性或耐药基因传播证据。长期摄入未引起显著不良反应，安全性良好。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 长期摄入益生菌可显著改变肠道菌群结构，促进有益菌如Blautia、Faecalibacterium、Bifidobacterium等的富集，增强肠道屏障功能，调节免疫反应，维持微环境稳态。尽管短链脂肪酸浓度未显著变化，但菌群多样性与结构的优化提示潜在的健康促进作用。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, neutral to slightly acidic pH (6.0–7.0), utilizes soluble fiber, resistant starch, and prebiotics (e.g., inulin, fructooligosaccharides) as carbon sources; requires no exogenous vitamins or amino acids beyond standard growth media
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Growth rate not explicitly stated; capable of rapid colonization in the gut lumen post-ingestion; in vitro growth consistent with in vivo persistence in intestinal microecology
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Distal small bowel and colon (luminal environment), particularly in mucosal-associated niches with access to fermentable substrates
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of pathogenic bacteria; synergistic with native microbiota in fermentation; may modulate host immune response via cross-feeding with other commensals
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to gastric acidity and bile salts; stable during storage and transit through gastrointestinal tract; resistant to drying and lyophilization in some formulations
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Cell wall components (e.g., teichoic acids), extracellular polysaccharides, and acid tolerance systems (e.g., F1F0-ATPase)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Lactobacillus and Bifidobacterium species are facultative anaerobes that thrive in the human colon, utilizing soluble dietary fibers and prebiotics as primary carbon sources. They exhibit robust growth in the intestinal lumen, where they integrate into the resident microbiota and contribute to metabolic homeostasis. Their ability to survive gastric transit and colonize the gut mucosa enables sustained fermentation activity.
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Not mentioned
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): Not mentioned
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Not mentioned
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): No genetic modifications are described in the paper. The probiotic strains function naturally through their intrinsic metabolic pathways without engineered circuits or synthetic biology tools.
S_metabolite_signals (代谢信号): ["Resistant starch", "Soluble fiber (pectin, hemicellulose, gums)", "Prebiotics (inulin, fructooligosaccharides, lactulose)"]
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Not specified (inferred: native carbohydrate transporters and metabolic regulators such as CcpA, Cra, or PTS systems)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Constitutive expression of fermentation enzymes; no evidence of inducible or logic-gated regulation; activity driven by substrate availability
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): The fermentation activity of Lactobacillus and Bifidobacterium is primarily constitutive and substrate-dependent. Their metabolic pathways are activated upon contact with fermentable carbohydrates, with no reported feedback inhibition or complex logic circuits. The system responds directly to nutrient presence without sophisticated sensing logic.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Passive diffusion of SCFAs; no active secretion systems reported
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Not controllable; activity depends on dietary intake of prebiotics and fiber
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with intestinal mucus and luminal environment; no encapsulation or material barrier mentioned
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Not applicable
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): Not applicable
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Modulate host immune responses by enhancing barrier function, reducing inflammation, and influencing immune cell activity through SCFA signaling and direct interaction with immune cells.
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Promote epithelial cell proliferation and differentiation; support colonocyte metabolism and integrity; suppress abnormal proliferation in adenocarcinoma cells (butyrate paradox).
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Regulate lipid metabolism by modulating hepatic lipogenesis and cholesterol synthesis; influence serum lipid profiles via acetate and propionate production. Inulin feeding reduces triglycerides and hepatic lipogenesis.
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (natural strains with no engineered kill switches)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; minimal risk of horizontal gene transfer; no evidence of environmental escape; generally safe in healthy individuals
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): None (no physical confinement used)
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Lactobacillus and Bifidobacterium species are classified as Generally Recognized As Safe (GRAS). They are non-pathogenic, naturally occurring commensals with a long history of safe use in food and supplements. No engineered containment systems are employed, but their natural ecological niche limits uncontrolled spread. The primary risk is potential for D-lactic acidosis in rare cases with high-dose supplementation, especially in individuals with impaired gut barrier or metabolic disorders.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): In human trials, probiotics showed positive effects on cardiovascular risk factors: 3 studies reported reduced serum cholesterol, 2 showed decreased LDL, 2 increased HDL, and 2 demonstrated lower systolic blood pressure. Prebiotic studies (e.g., inulin) reduced hepatic lipogenesis and triglycerides. Fermentation of dietary fiber and prebiotics by probiotics contributes significantly to lipid homeostasis and colonic health, supporting their potential role in preventing atherosclerosis and metabolic syndrome.

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Temperature: 30–35°C; pH: 7.4 (TYC medium), 6.5–7.0 (MRS); Nutritional: Complex media (TYC, MRS, reconstituted skim milk); Osmotic: Tolerant to sucrose (50 g/L) and sodium acetate (2.0 g/L)
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time: ~2–4 h under oxygen stress with ACN; Growth stagnation of ~4 h without ACN; In vivo consistency: Limited by oxygen stress; In vitro growth improved by ACN
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gut (probiotic niche), dairy environment (milk), hypoxic niches in food matrices
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): No direct interaction data; potential for symbiosis with gut microbiota via metabolic modulation
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Sensitive to oxygen stress; improved viability under aerobic conditions with ACN; Tolerant to sucrose, sodium acetate, and moderate osmotic stress
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Petunidin-based anthocyanin (ACN)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Lactobacillus plantarum ST-III is a facultative anaerobe with inherent sensitivity to oxygen stress, which limits its growth in aerobic environments such as milk. However, supplementation with petunidin-based anthocyanin significantly enhances its growth under oxygen stress by reducing intracellular ROS and improving redox balance. This enables its proliferation in reconstituted skim milk under aerobic conditions, suggesting potential for industrial dairy applications.
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): No genetic engineering was performed. The strain relies on endogenous antioxidant systems, particularly the thioredoxin (TRX) system, which is upregulated by petunidin-based anthocyanin. The system is not genetically modified but leverages natural stress-response pathways for enhanced survival under oxygen stress.
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Thioredoxin system (trxB1, trxA2 genes)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Positive feedback loop: ROS accumulation triggers TRX system upregulation; ACN reduces ROS, thereby enhancing TRX expression and further reducing oxidative damage.
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): The system senses oxygen-induced oxidative stress via ROS accumulation and decreased ORP. The transcriptional upregulation of trxB1 and trxA2 genes in the thioredoxin system acts as a feedback mechanism to mitigate oxidative damage. Petunidin-based anthocyanin enhances this natural sensing and response pathway, effectively amplifying the cell's ability to manage redox stress.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Passive diffusion (no engineered secretion system; endogenous proteins released via lysis or membrane leakage)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Concentration-dependent: 0.025% (wt/vol) ACN maximally effective; higher concentrations may inhibit growth due to weak antimicrobial activity.
E_material_match (材料匹配性): High compatibility with milk matrices and agar; ACN integrates well with food-grade materials without structural disruption.
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Not applicable; no direct antibacterial activity reported.
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): No evidence of antibacterial or biofilm inhibition activity.
E_B_mechanism_desc (产氧机制描述): Petunidin-based anthocyanin reduces intracellular ROS and lowers extracellular ORP, effectively alleviating oxygen stress and enabling aerobic growth.
E_B_oxygen_material (产氧元件_相关物质): Petunidin-based anthocyanin (acts as redox buffer, not oxygen producer)
E_B_crit_evidence (标准B_依据): ACN enables sustained growth of L. plantarum ST-III in aerobic milk and TYC media over 24–48 h, indicating effective oxygen stress relief without promoting pathogen growth. The mechanism is non-light-dependent and compatible with antibacterial functions.
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Not applicable; no immune-modulating factors secreted.
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Not applicable; no tissue repair factors produced.
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): ACN enhances the thioredoxin system, improving redox homeostasis and metabolic stability under oxidative stress. This supports sustained growth and fermentation activity.
E_F_mechanism_desc (肿瘤治疗描述): Not applicable; no tumor-targeting or prodrug conversion mechanisms.
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (natural strain, no synthetic kill switches or auxotrophy)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no evidence of horizontal gene transfer; environmental escape unlikely due to non-competitive nature in natural habitats.
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Physical confinement via encapsulation or matrix immobilization not required; inherent stability in food matrices.
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Lactobacillus plantarum ST-III is a well-established probiotic strain with GRAS status. The use of petunidin-based anthocyanin, a natural plant compound, further enhances safety. No genetic modifications or synthetic risk elements are involved. The system poses minimal biosafety risk and is suitable for food applications.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): Petunidin-based anthocyanin enabled L. plantarum ST-III to grow aerobically in reconstituted skim milk, achieving over 10-fold proliferation after 48 hours and promoting visible milk clot formation. This demonstrates significant potential for industrial dairy production, where oxygen stress typically limits probiotic viability. The strain's growth under aerobic conditions is restored through redox protection, highlighting a novel strategy for enhancing probiotic stability in food matrices.

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Growth at 37°C in MRS broth under anaerobic conditions; pH and osmotic tolerance not explicitly reported, but adapted to gastrointestinal environment.
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Growth rate not quantified; incubation for 30 h (Lactobacillus) or 48 h (Bifidobacterium) in vitro; in vivo colonization observed transiently over 4 weeks.
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Intestinal tract of infants (12–24 months), particularly the fecal microbiota; transient dominance in Lactobacillus community.
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Modulates resident microbiota by increasing Lactobacillus population; minor effect on Bifidobacterium and clostridia; no significant disruption of overall microbial structure.
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): High resistance to gastrointestinal stresses (in vitro); survives passage through GI tract; stable during storage in fermented milk.
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Strain-specific genomic marker (250 bp fragment) used for detection post-GI passage.
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该菌株在37°C厌氧条件下可在MRS培养基中生长，具有较强的胃肠道耐受性，能成功通过婴儿胃肠道并短暂定植于粪便微生物群中，尤其在摄入第一周后表现出显著的定植优势。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): RAPD-PCR, strain-specific PCR (LcA-Fw/LcA-Rv)
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): Not applicable (no engineered plasmid or integration reported)
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in fermented milk matrix; no degradation during storage or GI transit.
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 通过RAPD-PCR筛选出特异性基因片段，设计了针对L. paracasei A的特异性引物（LcA-Fw/LcA-Rv），用于在复杂微生物群落中可靠检测该菌株，无需基因改造。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Strain-specific genomic marker (250 bp fragment, Accession AM162273)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No synthetic logic circuits; natural sensing via genomic marker detection.

E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Not applicable (no engineered secretion system reported)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Not applicable (no controlled output reported)

E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Not applicable (no antibacterial mechanism reported)
