B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Oral delivery with natural gut confinement; no physical barrier required
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Bifidobacterium bifidum OLB6378 is classified as GRAS (Generally Recognized As Safe). It is a commensal bacterium with a long history of safe use in infant nutrition. No genetic modifications or biocontainment systems are used, but its natural gut tropism limits systemic spread and environmental persistence.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): In a rat model of necrotizing enterocolitis (NEC), oral administration of Bifidobacterium bifidum OLB6378 reduced NEC incidence from 57% in the formula-fed group to 17% in the probiotic group. It significantly lowered histologic NEC scores (median 1.0 vs. 2.0), reduced intestinal injury, stabilized the mucus layer, improved intestinal barrier integrity, and decreased epithelial apoptosis. These effects were associated with attenuation of the pathological induction of antimicrobial peptides, suggesting a protective role in the immature gut.

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Temperature: 37°C; pH: Neutral (M9 medium); Osmotic: 0.4% glucose, 0.2% casamino acids, 2 mM MgSO₄, 0.1 mM CaCl₂, 0.34 g/L thiamine; Nutrition: Carbon source: glucose; Nitrogen: casamino acids; Vitamins: thiamine
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Exponential growth phase: OD₆₀₀ ~0.1 after 5 h; Doubling time: ~20–30 min (inferred from growth curve); In vivo vs in vitro: Consistent with standard lab conditions
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Not applicable (in vitro study)
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Not applicable
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Moderate tolerance to shear stress (shaking culture), lyophilization not tested; UV and drying not assessed
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Not applicable
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 大肠杆菌NEB 10-beta在37°C下于M9培养基中生长，以葡萄糖为碳源，具有良好的生长速率和代谢稳定性，适用于基因工程实验。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Plasmid p15A, pSC101, pColE1, pUC; CRISPR-Cas not used; Recombination-based cloning; Transposons not used
G_edit_efficiency (编辑效率): High efficiency for plasmid transformation; No off-target risk reported
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): Plasmid copy number varies by origin (pSC101: 4, p15A: 9, pColE1: 18, pUC: 61); Plasmid loss observed (5% in pSC101, 3% in p15A); Chromosomal integration not used; Metabolic burden due to plasmid replication and protein expression; Evolutionary stability not assessed
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in agarose pads and liquid culture; No degradation of plasmid or reporter proteins during imaging
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 通过在质粒上插入PhlF-RFP结合位点和PP7-RNA结合位点，实现单细胞水平的质粒拷贝数、mRNA转录本和蛋白表达的同步定量。使用aTc诱导表达PhlF-RFP和PP7-CFP，结合荧光显微镜和图像分析，实现绝对单位（RNAP/s）的启动子活性推断。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): P_J23101 promoter (constitutive), aTc-inducible promoter (for PhlF-RFP and PP7-CFP)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Constitutive expression (no logic gate); Inducible expression with threshold control via aTc concentration
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 启动子活性由aTc浓度调控，实现可诱导表达；P_J23101为组成型启动子，无外部信号响应。系统不包含复杂逻辑门，仅用于测量和量化。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Not applicable (no secretion system used)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Controlled by aTc concentration and plasmid copy number; Not tunable in real-time
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with agarose pad and liquid culture; No encapsulation or material barrier
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Not applicable
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 无
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Not applicable
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Not applicable
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Not applicable
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Auxotrophy not used; No kill-switch; Antibiotic resistance genes (ampicillin, kanamycin) present
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; No known virulence factors; Antibiotic resistance genes present; Horizontal gene transfer risk low in lab setting; Environmental escape unlikely in controlled lab
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): None (no physical confinement)
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 该系统为实验室用大肠杆菌NEB 10-beta，属于BSL-1生物安全等级，无致病性，但携带抗生素抗性基因，需在含抗生素的培养基中维持。无生物安全屏障，适用于受控实验环境。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 本研究为方法学开发，不涉及伤口愈合或治疗效果，主要用于单细胞水平的启动子活性、质粒拷贝数和mRNA转录本的绝对定量。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 5.5–6.5; tolerates gastric acidity; utilizes lactose and other carbohydrates as carbon sources; requires no special vitamins beyond those in standard media.
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~1–2 hours in vitro; in vivo colonization observed in gut mucosa with sustained presence over 2–4 weeks in some studies.
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gastrointestinal tract (small intestine and colon), particularly adherent to intestinal epithelium; some strains show mucosal persistence in upper respiratory tract via gut-lung axis.
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of pathogens; modulation of commensal microbiota; synergistic interactions with host immune cells; minimal disruption to native microbiome.
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to lyophilization and rehydration; stable during storage at 4°C; moderate resistance to bile salts and low pH; sensitive to high osmotic stress.
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Bile salts (B. breve YIT4064), gastric acid (L. rhamnosus GG), lyophilization stabilizers (sucrose, trehalose)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 这些益生菌株为兼性厌氧菌，可在37°C、pH 5.5–6.5条件下生长，能耐受胃酸和胆汁环境，利用乳糖等碳源，具有良好的肠道定植能力，部分菌株可通过肠道-肺轴影响上呼吸道免疫，对宿主微生物群落影响较小。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): None (natural strains used; no genetic modification reported)
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High (chromosomal stability; no plasmids used; no evidence of gene loss or drift in trials)
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in oral formulations (capsules, fermented milk); no significant degradation during encapsulation or GI transit.
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 所有菌株均为天然分离株，未进行基因工程改造，其功能依赖于天然代谢和免疫调节能力，无外源基因插入或调控回路设计。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): FNR promoter (L. rhamnosus GG), Lactate permease (L. plantarum), Bile acid receptor (B. breve YIT4064)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No synthetic logic gates; natural sensing via receptor-mediated pathways with threshold responses to environmental cues.
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 菌株通过天然受体感知宿主微环境信号（如pH、胆汁酸、乳酸），激活免疫调节通路，实现对宿主免疫系统的非特异性增强，无人工设计的逻辑门控机制。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Constitutive secretion (natural secretion of metabolites and immunomodulatory molecules)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent effect; controlled by administration frequency and formulation (e.g., daily intake)
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with oral capsules and fermented milk matrices; stable during GI transit.
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): None (not engineered for antibacterial activity)
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 未涉及抗菌或抗生物膜功能，无相关证据。
E_B_mechanism_desc (产氧机制描述): None (no oxygen-producing enzymes or pathways reported)
E_B_crit_evidence (标准B_依据): 未报道任何产氧机制，不适用于缺氧环境调控。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): 增强先天免疫（如中性粒细胞吞噬能力、NK细胞活性）和适应性免疫（如IgG、IgA、IgM水平升高）；调节促炎/抗炎细胞因子平衡（IL-1, IL-6, IL-10, TNF-α, IFN-α）。
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): Lactobacillus GG (L. rhamnosus GG), Bifidobacterium breve YIT4064, L. plantarum HEAL9
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): 通过调节肠道屏障功能和局部免疫反应，间接促进上呼吸道黏膜修复；增强黏膜免疫屏障，减少病原体侵袭。
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): 产生短链脂肪酸（SCFAs）如乙酸、丙酸、丁酸，调节宿主代谢与免疫平衡；影响葡萄糖和脂质代谢。
E_F_mechanism_desc (肿瘤治疗描述): None (no evidence of tumor targeting or prodrug activation)
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (natural strains, no kill-switches or auxotrophy used)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no evidence of horizontal gene transfer; low risk of environmental escape.
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Oral delivery limits systemic spread; gut confinement reduces environmental release.
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 所有菌株均为公认安全（GRAS）菌株，无致病性，未发现耐药基因或基因水平转移证据，口服给药方式提供天然物理屏障，整体风险极低。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在10项纳入研究中，益生菌组相比安慰剂组显著降低急性上呼吸道感染（URTI）发生率（OR 0.58，95% CI 0.36–0.92），减少感染频率（率比 0.88，95% CI 0.81–0.96），并降低抗生素使用率（OR 0.67，95% CI 0.45–0.98）。主要副作用为轻微胃肠道症状（如腹胀、腹泻），无严重不良事件报告。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, anaerobic conditions; pH 6.0–7.0; requires MRS broth with glycerol for maintenance
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time not specified; viable counts maintained at ~8–9 log CFU/mL in suspension; growth observed under anaerobic incubation for 24 h
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gastrointestinal tract (target site for probiotic activity)
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): No direct interaction described; intended to survive and exert health benefits without disrupting host microbiome
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): High tolerance to pH 2–6, NaCl up to 20 g/L, and heat up to 90°C; stable during freeze-drying and refrigerated storage
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Alginate-chitosan microcapsule matrix
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Lactobacillus acidophilus La-05 is a facultative anaerobe that grows optimally at 37°C under anaerobic conditions. It exhibits strong resistance to acidic environments (pH 2–6), high osmotic stress (up to 20 g/L NaCl), and thermal stress (up to 90°C). The strain maintains high viability (>6 log CFU/mL) during freeze-drying, refrigerated storage (7°C for 120 days), and simulated gastrointestinal digestion, indicating robust physiological stability.
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): No genetic modification was performed. The strain was used in its native form, with no engineered circuits or inducible systems. The microencapsulation process serves as a physical protection strategy rather than a genetic engineering approach.
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No sensing logic or genetic circuitry involved; protection is passive and material-dependent.
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): The system does not incorporate active sensing or logic processing. Survival under stress is due to the physical barrier of the alginate-chitosan microcapsule, not to any responsive genetic module.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Passive diffusion through microcapsule matrix; no active secretion system reported
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Controlled by microencapsulation yield and release kinetics; no external control mechanism
E_material_match (材料匹配性): High compatibility with alginate and chitosan matrices; microcapsules maintain integrity and allow controlled release during digestion
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): L. acidophilus La-05 produces lactic acid and other antimicrobial compounds that inhibit pathogenic bacteria in the gut environment.
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): The strain is known to inhibit pathogens via lactic acid production and competitive exclusion. Microencapsulation prevents excessive activity and maintains localized retention in the gut.
E_B_crit_evidence (标准B_依据): No oxygenation mechanism was implemented or reported.
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): L. acidophilus La-05 modulates immune responses by enhancing cytokine production and promoting anti-inflammatory pathways.
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): Secreted exopolysaccharides, cell wall components (e.g., peptidoglycan, teichoic acids)
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): L. acidophilus La-05 produces short-chain fatty acids (SCFAs) such as acetate and lactate, which regulate host metabolism and gut health.
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (native strain, no kill-switch or auxotrophy)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Non-pathogenic; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; low risk of horizontal gene transfer; no environmental escape risk due to lack of persistence outside host
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Alginate-chitosan microcapsule provides physical confinement and limits release
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Lactobacillus acidophilus La-05 is a well-established GRAS (Generally Recognized As Safe) probiotic strain. No genetic modifications were made, and the microencapsulation system acts as a physical barrier to prevent unintended release. The strain is not known to be pathogenic or to carry antibiotic resistance genes. It is unlikely to survive outside the gastrointestinal tract, minimizing environmental risk.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): Microencapsulated L. acidophilus La-05 maintained viable counts above 6 log CFU/mL after 120 days of refrigerated storage, exposure to 90°C, pH 2, and 20 g/L NaCl. In vegan milks, viability remained above 6 log CFU/mL after 7 days of refrigerated storage. During simulated gastrointestinal digestion, microencapsulated strains showed significantly higher survival (4.2–4.4 log CFU/mL) compared to free cells (below detection limit). The alginate-chitosan microcapsule effectively protected the probiotic from environmental stresses and ensured delivery to the gut, demonstrating high functional efficacy as a probiotic carrier.

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Temperature: 4–42°C; pH: 5–11; NaCl: 2.5–7.0% (optimal at 30–37°C, pH 6.8–8.0, 2.5–5.0% NaCl)
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Growth rate: Optimal at 30–37°C; doubling time not specified; in vitro growth confirmed under laboratory conditions
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Intestinal tract of Cirrhinus mrigala (gut microflora niche)
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of pathogens (e.g., Aeromonas hydrophila); potential symbiosis via enzyme supply and gut barrier enhancement
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to moderate osmotic stress (up to 7.0% NaCl), temperature range 4–42°C, and storage at 4°C; spore formation enhances survival
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Endospores
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Bacillus cereus CM2 is a Gram-positive, rod-shaped, spore-forming bacterium capable of growing over a broad range of temperatures (4–42°C), pH (5–11), and salinity (2.5–7.0%). It exhibits strong adaptability to the intestinal environment of Cirrhinus mrigala, with optimal growth at 30–37°C and neutral to slightly alkaline pH. Its ability to form endospores enhances stability during storage and environmental stress, making it suitable for feed-based delivery.
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): No genetic modifications reported; natural chromosomal stability; spore formation ensures long-term viability in feed
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in pelleted feed; survives drying and refrigeration (4°C); no evidence of plasmid loss or instability
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): The strain was isolated and used directly without genetic modification. No synthetic circuits, inducible promoters, or engineered genetic tools were employed. The probiotic function relies on native metabolic and enzymatic capabilities.
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): No engineered sensing or logic circuits reported. The strain's activity is based on natural colonization and metabolic responses to the host gut environment, without responsive genetic circuits.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Extracellular enzyme secretion (protease, amylase, cellulase) via general secretion pathways
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Controlled by feed concentration (2 × 10⁶ cells per 100 g feed); no dynamic feedback or tunable output
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with pelleted feed; stable during drying, storage, and rehydration; no structural disruption observed
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Inhibits growth of Aeromonas hydrophila via production of antimicrobial compounds (e.g., diffusible antibiotics), demonstrated by a 20 mm inhibition zone in well diffusion assay.
E_A_agent_material (抗菌因子_相关物质): Antibiotics (e.g., difficidin, oxydifficidin, bacitracin, polymyxin, subtilin, gramicidin, bacillomycin B)
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): Demonstrated inhibition of Aeromonas hydrophila (a fish pathogen) in vitro; no observed toxicity or mortality in fish; localized effect in gut without systemic spread.
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Enhances tissue growth and repair by improving nutrient absorption and protein retention in fish carcass, likely via extracellular enzyme production and gut health improvement.
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Regulates host metabolism by improving feed utilization, reducing ammonia and phosphate excretion, and enhancing nutrient retention.
E_E_metabolite_material (代谢物_相关物质): Ammonia, orthophosphate (reduced excretion), SCFAs (implied via improved digestion)
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Natural auxotrophy not reported; no kill-switch or synthetic containment; endospore formation limits environmental escape
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Non-pathogenic in fish; no mortality or pathology observed; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; low risk of horizontal gene transfer; no evidence of environmental persistence beyond gut
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Pelleted feed provides physical confinement; no release into water column
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Bacillus cereus CM2 is non-pathogenic to fish and shows no adverse effects in feeding trials. It is naturally adapted to the host gut, reducing risk of overgrowth or ecological disruption. Its use in feed is considered safe and sustainable, with no genetic modifications or antibiotic resistance markers. The pelleted feed format ensures controlled delivery and containment.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): Bacillus cereus CM2 significantly improved growth performance in Cirrhinus mrigala, with 272.4% body weight gain, 79.9% apparent protein digestibility, and 2.89 feed conversion ratio. It enhanced intestinal enzyme activity (protease, amylase, cellulase), increased carcass protein (15.28 g/100g), and reduced ammonia and phosphate excretion, indicating superior nutrient utilization and environmental sustainability.

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37–42°C, pH 5.5–6.5, tolerant to bile salts and low pH; utilizes lactose and other sugars as carbon sources; dependent on amino acids and vitamins from host or environment
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Moderate growth rate (doubling time ~30–60 min in vitro); in vivo colonization is transient, with no sustained long-term persistence
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gut lumen, particularly in the colon; associated with dairy product consumption; more prevalent in adults and westernized populations
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competes with resident gut microbiota; limited evidence of symbiosis; may transiently modulate immune responses
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to gastric acidity and bile; survives lyophilization and refrigerated storage; moderate resistance to shear stress and UV
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Bile salts, low pH, lyophilization agents
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 乳酸菌（LAB）如嗜热链球菌和乳酸乳球菌在发酵食品中广泛存在，摄入后可短暂定植于人类肠道。嗜热链球菌在成人中更常见，与酸奶和奶酪消费相关；乳酸乳球菌在全球范围内普遍存在，但在非西方化人群中更丰富。两者均为兼性厌氧菌，能在胃肠道酸性环境中存活，利用乳糖等碳源生长，但通常为短暂定植，不形成稳定菌群。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Not applicable
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): Not applicable
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Not applicable
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 该研究未对嗜热链球菌或乳酸乳球菌进行基因工程改造，所有分析基于自然存在的菌株。未使用CRISPR、质粒或诱导系统，因此无遗传编程能力。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): FNR promoter, Lactate dehydrogenase (LDH), Bile salt hydrolase (BSH)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No engineered logic gates; natural sensing via metabolic regulators and stress-response pathways
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 嗜热链球菌和乳酸乳球菌通过感知乳酸、pH变化和胆汁酸等环境信号启动代谢适应机制。其基因表达受乳糖操纵子、酸应激响应系统和胆汁耐受基因调控，但无人工设计的逻辑门控系统。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Type I secretion system (for bacteriocins), spontaneous lysis
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Not controllable; dependent on natural growth and death cycles
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with food matrices (e.g., yogurt, cheese); may be encapsulated in delivery systems for enhanced gut survival
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Not applicable
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 未检测到抗菌或抗生物膜活性。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): 通过分泌代谢产物（如乳酸）调节宿主免疫反应，可能增强肠道屏障功能并抑制促炎因子表达。
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Not applicable
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): 通过乳酸发酵调节肠道微环境pH，抑制病原菌生长；产生短链脂肪酸（SCFAs）前体，间接调节宿主代谢。
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no known antibiotic resistance genes; no evidence of horizontal gene transfer; low risk of environmental escape; generally recognized as safe
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Physical confinement not required; natural attenuation in gut environment
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 嗜热链球菌和乳酸乳球菌均为GRAS级微生物，广泛用于食品发酵，无致病性记录。在肠道中为短暂定植，不会长期存活或传播抗性基因，安全性高。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 研究未评估伤口愈合或治疗效果。但发现嗜热链球菌和乳酸乳球菌在人类肠道中具有较高检出率（分别为31.2%和16.3%），且与饮食习惯（如奶制品摄入）密切相关，提示其作为功能性食品成分具有潜在健康益处。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Temperature: 36°C (day 1) to 24°C (day 21), pH: not specified, Osmotic: not specified, Nutrition: Complete basal diet (mash form, maize, soybean meal, fish meal, etc.)
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Growth rate: Not quantified; In vivo growth supported by feed/water supplementation from day 1 to day 42; No significant differences in feed intake across groups
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Intestinal tract (duodenum, jejunum, ileum, caecum)
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of pathogenic bacteria (e.g., Clostridium perfringens), modulation of microbial balance, suppression of coliforms and pathogenic anaerobes
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerance to gastric acidity (enhanced by coating), stability during feed processing and storage (implied by use of coated strains), resistance to osmotic and shear stress in gut environment
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Coated strains (protective matrix for gastric passage)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该益生菌混合物由三种革兰氏阳性菌组成，可在鸡的肠道中定植，通过竞争性排斥和代谢调节维持肠道微生态平衡。其生长依赖于基础饲料提供的碳源、氮源和矿物质，能在鸡的肠道环境中稳定存活并发挥功能。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Not mentioned
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): Not mentioned
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Coated strains designed for targeted delivery and enhanced stability in gastrointestinal environment
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 该益生菌混合物未经过基因工程改造，其功能依赖于天然生理特性。通过包埋技术（涂层）增强其在饲料和饮水中的稳定性及胃酸耐受性，确保有效到达肠道发挥作用。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Not specified (natural sensing mechanisms of native strains)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Not applicable (no engineered logic circuits)
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 该微生物系统未进行基因回路设计，其响应机制基于天然生理适应性，通过感知肠道微环境变化（如pH、营养物浓度、胆汁酸）调节自身代谢与定植行为，实现对病原菌的竞争性抑制。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Type III/IV secretion (inferred from Lactobacillus and Enterococcus), Lysis (possible during competition)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent effects observed: higher inclusion rates (e.g., 5×10⁸ CFU/kg) showed better performance; optimal dose not fully defined
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Coated strains compatible with feed matrix; water-soluble formulation compatible with drinking water delivery
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): 通过竞争性排斥、产生有机酸（如乳酸）、抑制病原菌（如Clostridium perfringens、大肠杆菌）生长，降低肠道病原负荷。
E_A_agent_material (抗菌因子_相关物质): Lactic acid (from Lactobacillus salivarius), bacteriocins (inferred from Enterococcus faecium and Bifidobacterium animalis)
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 益生菌组显著降低C. perfringens和大肠杆菌数量，且未引起明显毒性反应；在饲料和饮水中使用安全，无显著副作用。
E_B_mechanism_desc (产氧机制描述): 无氧代谢调节功能，不涉及氧气生成或消耗。
E_B_crit_evidence (标准B_依据): 未提及氧气生成或相关酶系，不具有氧合功能。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): 通过调节肠道免疫反应，降低炎症因子水平，增强黏膜屏障功能，减轻Eimeria感染引起的肠道损伤。
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): Cytokines (e.g., IL-10, TGF-β; inferred from immunomodulatory effects of Lactobacillus and Bifidobacterium)
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): 促进肠道上皮再生，提高绒毛高度与隐窝深度比，改善肠道吸收功能，修复Eimeria感染导致的组织损伤。
E_D_repair_material (修复因子_相关物质): Epithelial growth factors (inferred from villous height restoration), SCFAs (e.g., butyrate from Bifidobacterium)
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): 调节肠道代谢环境，通过产生短链脂肪酸（SCFAs）改善能量代谢，抑制有害菌代谢产物（如氨、酚类）生成。
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (natural strains, no kill-switches or auxotrophy mentioned)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no horizontal gene transfer risk mentioned; low environmental escape risk due to non-persistence in environment
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Coating enhances survival in feed/water but does not provide physical containment
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 该益生菌混合物为公认安全（GRAS）菌株，无致病性，未报告耐药基因，不涉及基因工程改造，环境释放风险低。其功能依赖于自然定植，无生物安全控制措施。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在混合Eimeria感染模型中，通过饲料或饮水补充益生菌可显著改善鸡只的生长性能（体重、增重率）、肠道形态（绒毛高度增加、隐窝深度减少）、降低病变评分和卵囊排出量，效果接近于抗球虫药lasalocid，且优于未处理感染对照组。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 6.0–7.0; tolerates gastric acidity and bile salts; utilizes various carbohydrates including glucose and fructose.
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~1.5–2 hours in vitro; in vivo colonization observed within 24–48 hours post-administration, with transient persistence in gut lumen.
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Small intestine and colon; preferentially adheres to intestinal epithelium and mucus layer.
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competes with pathogenic bacteria (e.g., rotavirus, enteropathogenic E. coli) via colonization resistance and production of reuterin; no significant disruption of core microbiota reported.
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Resistant to lyophilization and rehydration; stable under room temperature storage for months; moderate tolerance to shear stress during formulation.
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Reuterin (antimicrobial compound), exopolysaccharides (EPS) for mucosal adhesion
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Lactobacillus reuteri DSM 17938 is a facultative anaerobe capable of growing under both aerobic and anaerobic conditions, with optimal growth at 37°C and neutral pH. It demonstrates strong tolerance to gastric acidity and bile, enabling survival through the upper GI tract. It colonizes the intestinal mucosa transiently, competing with pathogens and producing reuterin, which contributes to its antimicrobial activity. The strain is stable during manufacturing and storage, making it suitable for oral probiotic formulations.
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Plasmid-based expression system (pTRKH2), CRISPR-Cas9 not used; strain derived from ATCC 55730 via protoplast formation to remove plasmid-borne antibiotic resistance genes.
G_edit_efficiency (编辑效率): High efficiency in plasmid removal via protoplast formation; no off-target effects reported due to chromosomal integration of key genes.
G_circuit_control (回路控制): Constitutive expression of reuterin biosynthesis genes (rhtA, rhtB); no inducible circuits reported.
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High chromosomal stability; no plasmid retention required; minimal metabolic burden; long-term in vivo consistency observed in clinical trials.
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in oral formulations (e.g., drops, tablets); no significant degradation in delivery vehicles.
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): The DSM 17938 strain was derived from ATCC 55730 by removing plasmid-borne tetracycline and lincomycin resistance genes via protoplast formation. This modification eliminated potential horizontal gene transfer risks while preserving core functional traits such as reuterin production and mucosal adhesion. The strain maintains constitutive expression of beneficial genes without requiring external inducers, ensuring reliable performance in clinical use.
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): FNR-like promoter (pH sensing), Bile acid-responsive repressor (BilR), AI-2 receptor LuxPQ
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Threshold-based activation of reuterin production in response to low pH and bile; positive feedback loop via AI-2 quorum sensing for population-level coordination.
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): L. reuteri DSM 17938 senses environmental cues such as low pH and bile acids in the gastrointestinal tract, triggering the expression of reuterin biosynthesis genes. It also detects AI-2 autoinducers from other microbes, enabling quorum sensing to coordinate antimicrobial activity. This system ensures that reuterin is produced only when the bacterium is in the appropriate niche (e.g., small intestine), minimizing unnecessary metabolic cost and enhancing targeted pathogen inhibition.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Type I secretion system (for reuterin), extracellular vesicles (for immunomodulatory molecules)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent effect; optimal efficacy at 10^10 CFU/day; controlled via oral administration of standardized formulations.
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Highly compatible with oral liquid and tablet formulations; stable in delivery matrices without structural degradation.
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Produces reuterin (3-hydroxypropionaldehyde), a broad-spectrum antimicrobial compound effective against Gram-positive and Gram-negative bacteria, including rotavirus and enteropathogenic E. coli. Also inhibits biofilm formation by competing for adhesion sites.
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): Clinical trials show significant reduction in duration of diarrhea (32.4 h) and increased cure rate on day 3 (RR: 3.85), indicating effective pathogen control without excessive inflammation or tissue damage. No adverse events reported.
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Modulates host immune response by downregulating pro-inflammatory cytokines (e.g., IL-8) and promoting anti-inflammatory IL-10; enhances mucosal barrier integrity.
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): Reuterin, exopolysaccharides (EPS), and secreted immunomodulatory proteins
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Produces short-chain fatty acids (SCFAs) such as acetate and lactate, which regulate gut pH, support epithelial cell metabolism, and modulate host energy homeostasis.
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Auxotrophy (no plasmid-borne antibiotic resistance); no suicide genes or light-controlled systems used.
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Non-pathogenic; no evidence of virulence or invasive potential; no antibiotic resistance genes detected; low risk of horizontal gene transfer due to plasmid removal.
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Oral delivery provides physical confinement; no systemic dissemination observed in clinical trials.
B_risk_desc (风险描述): L. reuteri DSM 17938 has been granted GRAS status by the FDA for use in infant formula. It is non-pathogenic, does not carry antibiotic resistance genes, and shows no evidence of systemic spread or adverse effects in hospitalized children. Its safety profile is well-established, with no serious adverse events reported in multiple RCTs.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在住院儿童中，L. reuteri DSM 17938显著缩短腹泻持续时间（平均减少32.4小时），并提高第3天治愈率（相对风险3.85）。该菌株通过产生reuterin抑制病原体、调节免疫反应并改善肠道代谢，有效缓解急性胃肠炎症状。其疗效与原始菌株ATCC 55730相当，且安全性良好，无严重不良反应。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Temperature: 37°C; pH: Not specified; Osmotic: Tolerant to high osmolarity (sugar syrup); Nutrition: Requires MRS broth with glucose, fructose, or sucrose for optimal growth
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Growth rate: 12 h to reach 10^8 CFU/mL; Doubling time: Not specified; In vivo vs in vitro: In vitro growth confirmed; In vivo consistency not tested
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Honeybee gut (midgut and honey stomach), intestinal lumen
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of pathogenic fungi (Ascosphaera apis); potential symbiosis with host microbiota; may enhance gut barrier function
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to osmotic stress (high sugar), shear stress (sonication), and storage at -20°C; UV and drying tolerance not assessed
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Cell wall and EPS production contribute to stress resistance
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该研究中筛选的Lactiplantibacillus plantarum菌株在37°C下于MRS培养基中培养12小时可达到10^8 CFU/mL，表现出良好的生长能力。这些菌株在高糖环境中（如蜂胶糖浆）具有较强的适应性，且在厌氧条件下生物膜形成能力更强，表明其在蜂类肠道微环境中具有良好的定植潜力。
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 本文未涉及基因工程改造，所有功能基于天然菌株的生理特性，未使用任何遗传工具或合成电路。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Not specified
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Not applicable
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 未检测到特定的信号感应模块或逻辑门控机制，功能依赖于天然代谢产物的分泌，而非环境响应性调控。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Cell lysis (for CL matrix), passive diffusion (for CFS)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Not controllable; activity depends on natural secretion and cell lysis
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with sugar syrup and agar matrices; biofilm formation enhances retention in gut environment
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): 通过细胞裂解物（CL）和培养液（BC）抑制Ascosphaera apis的菌丝生长，可能通过有机酸、脂肪酸、肽类等物质破坏真菌细胞膜或干扰质子梯度。
E_A_agent_material (抗菌因子_相关物质): Organic acids, fatty acids, peptides, bacteriocins
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 所有五株菌株均对A. apis表现出强抗真菌活性，其中LP25菌株对A. apis DSM 3117的抑制率达100%；细胞裂解物和培养液的抑制效果优于细胞上清液，表明其活性物质为胞内或胞外复合物，且未观察到对宿主细胞的毒性。
E_B_crit_evidence (标准B_依据): 未涉及氧气生成或光依赖性机制，无氧代谢为主。
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no evidence of horizontal gene transfer; environmental escape risk low due to natural habitat in bee gut
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Physical confinement not required; natural gut environment provides containment
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Lactiplantibacillus plantarum为公认安全（GRAS）菌种，广泛存在于发酵食品和昆虫肠道中，无致病性记录，且未发现抗生素抗性基因，环境释放风险极低，适合作为蜂类益生菌使用。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在体外实验中，五株L. plantarum菌株（LP8、LP25、LP86、LP95、LP100）均表现出对Ascosphaera apis的强抗真菌活性，其中LP25菌株对A. apis DSM 3117的抑制率高达100%。所有菌株均能产生胞外多糖（EPS）和生物膜，且在厌氧和高糖条件下生物膜形成能力增强，表明其在蜂类肠道中具有良好的定植潜力。此外，所有菌株均表现出抗氧化活性，可减轻氧化应激，有助于提升蜂群健康。

spatial_arrangement (空间排布): Encapsulated (in drinking water, colonizing cecal mucosa)
C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Grows at 37°C in MRS broth; tolerates osmotic, oxidative, and acid stresses in the gastrointestinal tract
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Colonized ceca at 4.0 log10 CFU/g after 12 weeks of supplementation; maintained viability over 11 weeks of administration
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Cecal mucosa of finishing turkeys
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of Salmonella Heidelberg; may promote beneficial gut bacteria such as Bifidobacterium
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerates osmotic, oxidative, and acid stresses in the gastrointestinal tract; survives lyophilization and storage
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Propionic acid, bioactive metabolites (e.g., propionicins)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该菌株为乳酸菌类，来源于奶制品，可在37°C下在MRS培养基中生长，具有较强的耐受胃肠道中渗透压、氧化及酸性环境的能力。在肉鸡盲肠中可长期定植，维持4.0 log10 CFU/g的活菌浓度，表现出良好的肠道定植能力。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Rifampicin resistance marker (Rf) for selective enumeration; no genetic modification reported
G_edit_efficiency (编辑效率): Not applicable (no CRISPR or recombinant tools used)
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High chromosomal stability; no plasmid-based systems used; no evidence of genetic drift or loss in long-term colonization
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in drinking water delivery system and cecal environment
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 未进行基因改造，仅通过筛选耐利福平的菌株用于追踪其在鸡盲肠中的定植情况。该菌株天然具备抑制沙门氏菌的能力，无需外源基因调控。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Not specified (no specific receptor or promoter reported)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Not applicable (no engineered logic circuits reported)
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 该系统未设计人工感知逻辑，其抗菌作用主要依赖于天然代谢产物和竞争性定植，无外部信号响应机制。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Cell-free metabolites (e.g., propionic acid, propionicins)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent: 10^12 CFU/5 gallons water, administered every other day for 11 weeks
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with drinking water delivery system; stable in aqueous environment
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): 通过竞争性排除、抑制沙门氏菌黏附与侵袭、产生抗菌代谢物（如丙酸、丙酸素）实现抗菌作用
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 在12周内持续补充PF，使沙门氏菌在盲肠中的定植减少超过2.0 log10 CFU/g，且未观察到对宿主细胞的毒性或微生物组显著扰动。
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): 通过产生短链脂肪酸（如丙酸）调节肠道微环境，抑制病原菌生长，改善肠道屏障功能
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (no kill-switch or auxotrophy used)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Non-pathogenic; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; low risk of horizontal gene transfer; no environmental escape reported
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Drinking water delivery system provides physical confinement
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 该菌株为FDA批准的GRAS菌株，来源于奶制品，无致病性，不携带抗生素抗性基因，未进行基因改造，无生物安全风险。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在12周龄肉鸡中，连续补充PF可使沙门氏菌在盲肠中的定植减少超过2.0 log10 CFU/g，显著降低其向肝脏和脾脏的播散（P<0.05），表明其在控制多重耐药沙门氏菌传播方面具有显著疗效。

composition (组成成分): [{"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus kefiranofaciens", "strain_id": "Not specified"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus kefir", "strain_id": "Not specified"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Candida kefir", "strain_id": "Not specified"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Acetobacter aceti", "strain_id": "Not specified"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Acetobacter sp.", "strain_id": "Not specified"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus delbrueckii delbrueckii", "strain_id": "Not specified"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus fermentum", "strain_id": "Not specified"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus fructivorans", "strain_id": "Not specified"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Enterococcus faecium", "strain_id": "Not specified"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Leuconostoc spp.", "strain_id": "Not specified"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Candida famata", "strain_id": "Not specified"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Candida krusei", "strain_id": "Not specified"}]
C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Temperature: 22–23°C; pH: ~4.5 (adjusted); Nutritional requirements: Whole milk as carbon and nitrogen source; Osmotic tolerance: Moderate (adapted to milk fermentation environment)
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Not specified in vitro; In vivo: Chronic administration over 60 days in rats; Growth rate not quantified
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gastrointestinal tract (gut microbiota), with potential systemic effects via metabolites
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Symbiotic consortium; coexistence with other lactic acid bacteria and yeasts; potential modulation of host microbiome through competitive exclusion and metabolite production
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to refrigeration and short-term storage; stability during fermentation; lyophilization not tested; shear stress during gavage not assessed
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Not specified
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该研究中的kefir是一种由多种乳酸菌和酵母组成的共生菌群，可在牛奶中发酵生长。其微生物群落包括Lactobacillus kefiranofaciens、Lactobacillus kefir、Candida kefir等，主要在肠道定植并发挥调节心血管自主神经功能的作用。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Not applicable
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): Not applicable
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Not applicable
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 本研究未对kefir菌群进行基因工程改造，其功能依赖于天然微生物群落的共生代谢活动，无外源基因插入或调控回路设计。
S_host_signals (宿主信号): ["Cytokines (indirect via inflammation modulation)", "Tissue degradation fragments (indirect via gut barrier integrity)"]
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Not specified
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Not applicable
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): kefir菌群通过其天然代谢网络感知宿主肠道微环境中的pH、渗透压、乳酸、葡萄糖等信号，通过群体感应和代谢反馈调节自身活性，但未设计明确的逻辑门控系统。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Type I-VI secretion systems, Vesicles, Lysis (natural release)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent effects observed (0.3 mL/100 g body weight); chronic administration over 60 days; no precise control mechanism described
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Encapsulated in milk matrix; compatible with oral delivery and gastrointestinal transit; stable during fermentation and storage
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Not applicable
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 未涉及抗菌或抗生物膜功能。
E_B_crit_evidence (标准B_依据): 未涉及氧气生成或氧合功能。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): 通过调节肠道菌群平衡，减少促炎因子（如TNF-α、IL-6）和氧化应激，增强抗炎反应，改善中枢神经系统的自主神经调节功能。
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): Cytokines (e.g., IL-10, TGF-β), Reactive oxygen species (ROS) scavengers
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): 通过减轻心脏肥厚、改善血管内皮功能、降低血压变异性，从而保护靶器官（如心脏、血管）免受高血压损伤。
E_D_repair_material (修复因子_相关物质): Nitric oxide (NO), Endothelial progenitor cells (EPCs), Anti-oxidant enzymes
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): 通过调节肠道菌群代谢，产生短链脂肪酸（SCFAs）如乙酸、丙酸、丁酸，改善宿主能量代谢和胰岛素敏感性，同时调节血压和自主神经功能。
E_E_metabolite_material (代谢物_相关物质): Short-chain fatty acids (SCFAs), Lactate, Bile acid metabolites
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Natural attenuation; no engineered kill switches or auxotrophy
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no evidence of horizontal gene transfer; low risk of environmental escape due to lack of persistence outside host
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Oral administration with natural gut colonization; physical barrier of intestinal mucosa limits systemic spread
B_risk_desc (风险描述): kefir菌群为公认安全（GRAS）的发酵食品，其多种成分（如乳酸菌和酵母）在人体内广泛存在，无致病性记录。研究中未使用基因工程改造，无生物安全风险，且通过肠道屏障限制了系统性扩散。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 每日口服kefir 60天可显著改善自发性高血压大鼠（SHR）的心脏自主神经张力和压力反射敏感性。具体表现为：基础血压下降12%，心率下降13%，心脏肥厚减轻21%；迷走神经张力从约40 bpm恢复至约90 bpm，交感神经张力从约90 bpm降至约25 bpm；压力反射敏感性（bradycardia）从降低50%恢复至降低40%，tachycardia反应也显著改善。此外，kefir可降低心率变异性（LF成分）和血压变异性，提示其对靶器官损伤具有保护作用。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal temperature: 37°C; pH range: 5.5–7.0; Nutritional requirements: Carbohydrates (e.g., lactose, glucose), amino acids, vitamins (including B vitamins); Host metabolite dependency: Lactose from milk or gut mucosal glycans
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time: ~1.5–2 hours in vitro; In vivo homeostasis maintained under normal gut conditions; Growth rate consistent between in vitro and in vivo
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Intestinal mucosa (colon and small intestine), particularly in the ileum and cecum; Competes with pathobionts in the gut lumen
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Symbiotic with host; Competes with dysbiotic taxa such as Bacteroides and Oscillospira; Enhances colonization resistance without displacing commensals
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to bile salts, low pH (gastric transit), osmotic stress; Stable during lyophilization and rehydration; Resistant to shear stress in gut peristalsis
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Bile salt hydrolase (BSH), acid tolerance systems (e.g., F0F1-ATPase), exopolysaccharide (EPS) capsule
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该菌株为兼性厌氧菌，最适生长温度为37°C，pH范围5.5–7.0，依赖乳糖、葡萄糖等碳源及氨基酸和维生素（尤其是B族维生素）生长。在体外和体内均表现出稳定的生长动力学，可在肠道黏膜定植并抑制病原菌，具有良好的耐受性，包括对胆汁、低pH、渗透压和冻干-复水过程的耐受性。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Plasmid-based expression system (not explicitly stated, inferred from probiotic function)
G_edit_efficiency (编辑效率): Not applicable (natural strain, no genetic modification reported)
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High chromosomal stability; No plasmid-based systems used; No evidence of metabolic burden or drift in vivo
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in intestinal environment; No disruption of gut barrier or mucus structure
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 该菌株为天然分离的益生菌，未经过基因工程改造。其功能通过天然代谢途径实现，如分泌短链脂肪酸、调节免疫反应和抑制有害菌生长。在肠道中保持稳定，无质粒依赖，无代谢负担，长期定植能力良好。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): FNR promoter (hypoxia), BSH receptor (bile), Lactose permease (lactose), TLR2/4 (host cytokines)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No explicit logic gates reported; Likely constitutive expression with threshold-based activation via nutrient sensing
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 该菌株通过感知肠道环境中的pH、胆汁酸、乳糖和短链脂肪酸等信号，激活其定植和免疫调节功能。其响应机制为非诱导型，依赖于营养物质的可利用性，无复杂逻辑门控，但具有阈值响应特性，确保在适宜环境中高效表达功能蛋白。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Type IV secretion system (inferred from immune modulation), Vesicles (exosomes)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent effect (5×10⁸ CFU/day); Controlled by oral administration schedule
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with intestinal mucus and gut barrier; No structural disruption observed
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Not applicable (no direct antibacterial mechanism reported)
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 未报告该菌株具有直接抗菌或抗生物膜活性。
E_B_crit_evidence (标准B_依据): 未报告该菌株具有产氧能力或参与氧代谢。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Downregulates pro-inflammatory cytokines (TNF-α, IL-6, IFN-γ) and upregulates anti-inflammatory cytokines (IL-10); Inhibits NF-κB and MAPK signaling pathways; Enhances CD45+ immune cell regulation
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Promotes intestinal mucosal integrity; Reduces epithelial damage and villi destruction; Enhances mucosal barrier function via tight junction regulation
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Restores carbon metabolism (e.g., pyruvate, glycolysis); Enhances SCFA production (butyrate, propionate); Modulates vitamin B metabolism (biotin, thiamine)
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Auxotrophy (no evidence of auxotrophy reported, but natural attenuation in non-host environments)
B_containment_material (生物安全_相关物质): None (no synthetic kill switch or inducible control)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Non-pathogenic; No antibiotic resistance genes reported; Low risk of horizontal gene transfer; No environmental escape risk due to poor survival outside host
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Intestinal mucus layer and immune surveillance provide effective physical and biological confinement
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 该菌株为公认安全（GRAS）的益生菌，无致病性，不携带抗生素抗性基因，无水平基因转移风险。在宿主外环境中生存能力弱，依赖肠道环境定植，具有天然生物安全屏障。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在FMT诱导的乳腺炎小鼠模型中，Lactobacillus casei Zhang干预组（P组）显著缓解了乳腺、肝脏、小肠和结肠的组织损伤，病理评分显著低于M组（p < 0.01）。免疫组化显示CD45+免疫细胞浸润减少，NF-κB信号通路活性降低57.7%，炎症因子（TNF-α、IL-6、MPO）水平下降。功能宏基因组分析显示，该菌株成功将肠道微生物功能从“疾病型”重塑为“健康型”，尽管菌群结构仍与健康组相似，但代谢功能显著改善，提示其通过功能恢复而非结构重建实现治疗效果。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 6.5–7.0; tolerates pH 3.0–4.0 and bile salts; utilizes glucose, fructose, and lactose as carbon sources
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~1.5–2 hours in vitro; in vivo colonization observed in lower GI tract within 7 days post-administration
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Lower gastrointestinal tract (colon), particularly in mucosal layers
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of pathogens (e.g., Shigella, Salmonella); supports commensal microbiota balance
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Resistant to gastric acid, bile, and simulated intestinal conditions; stable during freeze-drying and ambient storage
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Milk proteins, fats, and carbohydrates in matrix provide physical and metabolic protection
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Lactobacillus rhamnosus GG is a facultative anaerobe with strong acid and bile tolerance, enabling survival through the upper GI tract. It colonizes the lower intestine and exhibits competitive exclusion against pathogens. Its growth is supported by dairy matrices and freeze-dried formulations, with viability maintained under ambient storage conditions.
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Not specified
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): Not specified
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Not specified
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): No genetic modifications are described in the paper. The strain is used in its native form, relying on intrinsic physiological traits for function.
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): FNR promoter (inferred from acid tolerance), bile salt hydrolase (BSH) activity
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Not specified
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): No engineered logic circuits are described. The strain responds to environmental cues such as low pH and bile via intrinsic stress response systems.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Not specified
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent efficacy observed at ≥1×10¹⁰ CFU/day; lower doses (<1×10¹⁰ CFU) showed borderline significance
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Dairy matrices (yogurt, cheese, fermented milk) enhance viability and delivery; freeze-dried powders and capsules also effective
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Inhibits adhesion of pathogens (e.g., Shigella, Salmonella) to colonic mucus via competitive exclusion and production of antimicrobial metabolites.
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): Demonstrated inhibition of pathogen adhesion in vitro; effective at doses ≥1×10¹⁰ CFU/day; no significant cytotoxicity reported; localized action in GI tract.
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Stimulates natural killer (NK) cell activity, secretory IgA, and regulatory T cells (Treg); modulates cytokine profiles.
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Enhances gut barrier integrity; reduces intestinal permeability; supports mucosal healing.
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Not applicable
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Not applicable
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no evidence of translocation in healthy hosts; rare adverse events (e.g., bacteremia in immunocompromised); no antibiotic resistance genes reported
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Encapsulation and matrix protection reduce risk of premature release and environmental escape
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Lactobacillus rhamnosus GG is classified as GRAS and generally safe. No evidence of systemic translocation in healthy individuals. Risk increases in critically ill or immunocompromised patients. No horizontal gene transfer reported. Encapsulation and matrix design enhance safety by limiting premature release.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): In acute gastroenteritis, Lc. rhamnosus GG at ≥1×10¹⁰ CFU/day significantly reduced diarrhea duration and improved immune markers. In obese postmenopausal women, it improved cardiometabolic parameters and gut permeability. In IBS, it improved overall symptom response and quality of life, especially with low-dose, short-duration regimens. Efficacy is influenced by matrix (dairy > dry supplements), timing (early administration post-antibiotics), and regional diet.

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Temperature: 30°C; pH: neutral (not explicitly stated, but inferred from growth medium); Osmotic: Tolerant to PBS wash; Nutrition: Requires soy broth medium for growth
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Growth rate: 48 h in soy broth; Doubling time: Not specified; In vivo vs in vitro: In vitro growth confirmed; In vivo colonization observed in sturgeon gut
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Intestinal lumen of Siberian sturgeon (Acipenser baerii)
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive colonization with native gut microbiota; increases lactic acid bacteria (LAB) load; no significant effect on total aerobic bacteria (TABC) from enzyme-only group
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Lyophilized form stable; withstands centrifugation (4000g, 10 min), PBS washing, and storage at -20°C; tolerance to gut environment (pH, bile, exudate) inferred from successful colonization
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Lyophilization, PBS wash, -20°C storage
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该研究中使用的Pediococcus pentosaceus和Lactococcus lactis为乳酸菌，可在30°C下于大豆肉汤中培养48小时，经离心、PBS洗涤后用于饲料添加。两者均能成功定植于西伯利亚鲟肠道，显著提升肠道乳酸菌数量，表明其具有良好的肠道定植能力。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Not applicable
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): Not applicable
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Not applicable
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 本研究未对菌株进行基因改造，仅使用天然菌株作为饲料添加剂，因此无遗传工程操作。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Not specified
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Not applicable
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 本研究未涉及合成生物学逻辑电路设计，菌株通过自然生理响应环境信号，无人工调控逻辑。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Extracellular enzyme secretion (protease, lipase, phytase)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent: 2 g/kg probiotics mixture; controlled by dietary administration
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with feed matrix; lyophilized form stable in dry feed; no structural disruption reported
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Not applicable
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 未提及抗菌功能，未评估生物膜抑制或毒性。
E_B_crit_evidence (标准B_依据): 未提及氧气生成或氧合功能。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): 通过调节肠道菌群、促进肠道屏障功能、增加杯状细胞数量，间接增强宿主免疫反应。
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): 显著增加肠道绒毛高度、宽度和面积，促进肠道上皮细胞发育，增强营养吸收能力。
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): 提高蛋白质和脂质利用效率，促进蛋白质沉积，减少脂肪积累，调节能量代谢。
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; non-opportunistic; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no horizontal gene transfer risk mentioned; environmental escape unlikely due to aquaculture setting
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Feed matrix provides physical confinement
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Pediococcus pentosaceus和Lactococcus lactis均为公认安全（GRAS）的乳酸菌，常用于水产饲料。研究中未发现致病性、耐药性或基因水平转移风险，且通过饲料摄入，具有物理屏障限制其环境释放。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在10周喂养试验中，P+E组（益生菌+多酶）西伯利亚鲟的终末体重、代谢增重、蛋白效率比和脂质效率比均显著高于对照组（p<0.05）。肠道绒毛高度、宽度和面积显著增加，杯状细胞数量显著提升，消化酶（蛋白酶、脂肪酶）活性增强，表明其在促进生长、改善消化功能和修复肠道屏障方面具有显著效果。

composition (组成成分): [{"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus plantarum", "strain_id": "Not specified"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus acidophilus", "strain_id": "Not specified"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Leuconostoc species", "strain_id": "Not specified"}]
C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH neutral to slightly acidic; utilizes carbohydrates as carbon sources; dependent on host-derived nutrients in gut environment
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Growth rate not explicitly quantified; established in gut within 60 days of feeding; in vitro doubling time not reported
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Intestinal tract (gut mucosa), particularly colon and cecum; niche preference: gastrointestinal lumen and mucosal surface
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of pathogenic bacteria; promotes growth of beneficial genera (e.g., Ruminococcus, Akkermansia, Clostridium); symbiotic with host microbiota
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to gastric pH and bile salts; stable during freeze-drying and storage at -80°C; resistant to osmotic stress in gut environment
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Cell wall components, exopolysaccharides, and metabolic adaptation to low pH
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该复合益生菌由Lactobacillus plantarum、Lactobacillus acidophilus和Leuconostoc物种组成，能在37°C、中性至弱酸性环境中生长，依赖肠道碳源和宿主代谢物。在饲喂60天后，其在森林马麝肠道中成功定植，显著提升有益菌群丰度，表现出良好的肠道定植能力与环境适应性。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Not specified
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): Not reported; assumed chromosomal stability due to natural strain use
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Not applicable (no engineered material environment described)
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 该系统未进行基因工程改造，所有功能依赖于天然菌株的代谢特性，如有机酸分泌、竞争性定植和免疫调节，未使用CRISPR、质粒或诱导系统。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Not specified (natural sensing mechanisms assumed)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Not applicable (no synthetic circuit reported)
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 系统依赖于天然代谢感应机制，如pH变化感应（通过细胞膜电位调节）、葡萄糖利用感应（通过磷酸转移酶系统），以及胆汁酸耐受性，但未构建逻辑门控系统。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Type I Secretion (via cell wall export), Lysis (natural release)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent: higher dose (2×10¹⁰ CFU/mL) showed stronger effects on IgA/IgG and microbiota modulation
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with oral administration; stable in feed matrix; no encapsulation reported
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): 通过分泌有机酸（如乳酸）、过氧化氢、细菌素等抑制病原菌生长，降低肠道pH，破坏病原菌生存环境。
E_A_agent_material (抗菌因子_相关物质): Organic acids (lactic acid), hydrogen peroxide, bacteriocins
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): Lactobacillus代谢产物可有效抑制李斯特菌、沙门氏菌和大肠杆菌，且对自身无影响，说明其具有广谱抗菌性；未见生物膜抑制数据，但通过降低pH和竞争性定植可间接抑制生物膜形成；在动物实验中未观察到组织损伤或炎症延长，表明活性可控且安全。
E_B_crit_evidence (标准B_依据): 未涉及氧气生成或光依赖性系统，无氧合功能。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): 通过调节肠道免疫屏障，促进IgA和IgG分泌，增强体液免疫应答，改善免疫功能。
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Not applicable
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): 通过调节肠道菌群结构，促进短链脂肪酸（SCFA）产生菌（如Clostridium、Ruminococcus）增殖，改善能量代谢与营养吸收。
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Not applicable (natural strains used; no kill-switch or auxotrophy reported)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no horizontal gene transfer evidence; low risk of environmental escape due to gut-restricted colonization
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Oral delivery with natural gut colonization; no physical barrier used
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 所用菌株为公认安全（GRAS）的乳酸菌，无致病性、无耐药基因，未进行基因改造，定植于肠道且不扩散至环境，安全性高。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 复合益生菌显著提高森林马麝的平均日增重（ADG），降低饲料/增重比（F/G），增强体液免疫（IgA、IgG水平显著上升），并显著改善肠道菌群结构，增加α多样性（Chao1、Shannon、Simpson指数上升），促进有益菌（如Ruminococcus、Akkermansia、Clostridium）丰度，表明其在促进生长、调节免疫和维持肠道微生态平衡方面具有显著疗效。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 7.4; tolerates up to 1.9 M NaCl, 11% ethanol, and 0.013% H₂O₂; grows in MRS medium under anaerobic conditions.
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time not specified; viable in vitro at 37°C for 24 h; survives freeze-drying with 36.2% viability post-rehydration.
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Marine aquaculture environment; potential to colonize oyster tissues and gut-like niches.
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Antagonistic toward pathogenic bacteria (V. parahaemolyticus, S. iniae, E. tarda); no evidence of competition with native microbiota.
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): High tolerance to salt (1.9 M NaCl), ethanol (11%), hydrogen peroxide (0.013%), bile salts (up to 0.45%), and acid pH (down to pH 4.0); survives simulated gastric conditions (pH 3–4) for up to 2 h.
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Bile salt hydrolase (BSH) enzyme, cell surface hydrophobicity, and intrinsic membrane impermeability.
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Enterococcus faecium HL7 is a facultative anaerobe with strong environmental stress resistance, including high salt, ethanol, oxidative, bile, and acid tolerance. It maintains viability under simulated gastric and intestinal conditions and survives freeze-drying, making it suitable for industrial formulation and marine aquaculture applications.
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): No genetic modifications reported; natural chromosomal stability assumed.
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): No engineered material coupling described; stability in suspension and freeze-dried form confirmed.
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): No genetic engineering was performed. The strain was selected based on natural phenotypic traits including antimicrobial activity, stress resistance, and survival in simulated GI conditions.
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Bile salt hydrolase (BSH) enzyme, cell surface hydrophobicity, membrane integrity, and pH-responsive metabolic pathways.
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No synthetic logic circuits reported; natural sensing via membrane transporters and metabolic adaptation.
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): The strain senses environmental stressors such as bile salts, low pH, and oxidative stress through intrinsic cellular mechanisms. It responds by activating stress resistance pathways, including bile salt deconjugation via BSH and acid tolerance systems, enabling survival in harsh conditions.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Unknown; likely secretion via general secretion pathways or lysis.
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Not controllable; activity depends on natural growth and metabolic output.
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with suspension and freeze-dried formulations; stable in artificial sea water and oyster tissue.
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Inhibits growth of Vibrio parahaemolyticus, Streptococcus iniae, and Edwardsiella tarda via unknown mechanism; likely due to organic acids, bacteriocins, or pH reduction.
E_A_agent_material (抗菌因子_相关物质): Organic acids (lactic acid), bacteriocin-like substances (uncharacterized), and low pH environment.
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): Demonstrated inhibition zones >15 mm against multiple pathogens; no cytotoxicity or hemolytic activity reported; localized action in oyster model without systemic spread.
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None reported; no kill-switch or auxotrophy engineered.
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Resistant to 10 antibiotics (including vancomycin, ampicillin, gentamicin); potential for horizontal gene transfer (HGT) of resistance genes; no hemolytic activity or biogenic amine production detected.
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Physical confinement via freeze-drying and encapsulation in oyster tissue; limited environmental escape risk in controlled aquaculture.
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Enterococcus faecium HL7 is a GRAS (Generally Recognized As Safe) species with no hemolytic activity. However, its multidrug resistance raises concerns about potential HGT of resistance genes in aquaculture settings. No biocontainment systems are implemented, so environmental release could pose ecological risks.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): In oyster challenge model, E. faecium HL7 reduced Vibrio parahaemolyticus levels from 5.728 log CFU/mL to 5.349 log CFU/mL in tank water and from 5.472 to 4.665 log CFU/mL in oyster juice after 24 hours, demonstrating significant biocontrol efficacy in a marine environment.

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 30°C, aerobic conditions; pH 7.3 for washing and suspension in skim milk powder
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Growth rate not explicitly quantified; cultured for 24 h at 30°C before use
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Intestinal lumen (ileum and ceca), particularly in the context of low-nPP diet and interaction with gut microbiota
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of pathogenic bacteria (E. coli, Clostridium spp.); promotes Lactobacillus spp.; creates low-oxygen environment favoring anaerobic commensals
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to gastric pH changes due to butyric acid; stable in skim milk suspension; viable at 4°C during washing and storage
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Skim milk powder (for suspension), PBS (pH 7.3) (for washing)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Saccharomyces boulardii is a nonpathogenic yeast strain that grows aerobically at 30°C, is stable in skim milk suspension, and colonizes the intestinal lumen. It thrives in the gut environment under low-nPP conditions, where it modulates microbial balance by reducing pathogenic bacteria and enhancing beneficial Lactobacillus populations. Its growth is supported by the acidic environment induced by butyric acid supplementation.
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Not applicable (no genetic modification reported)
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): Not applicable (wild-type strain used)
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Not applicable
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): Saccharomyces boulardii was used in its natural, unmodified form. No genetic engineering or synthetic circuits were employed. The strain was isolated and identified via conventional culturing techniques and used as a probiotic without any genetic modifications.
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Not applicable (no engineered sensor reported)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Not applicable
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): No engineered sensing or logic processing was involved. The organism's behavior is based on natural physiological responses to environmental cues such as pH and nutrient availability.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Not applicable (no engineered secretion system reported)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Not applicable
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with feed matrix; suspended in skim milk powder and added at 1×10⁸ cfu/kg
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Reduces populations of pathogenic bacteria (E. coli, Clostridium spp.) in ileum and ceca by creating a less favorable environment and promoting beneficial flora.
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): S. boulardii supplementation significantly reduced E. coli and Clostridium spp. counts in ileum and ceca without disrupting gut structure or causing adverse effects. It also enhanced Lactobacillus spp. populations, indicating selective antimicrobial action.
E_B_crit_evidence (标准B_依据): No evidence of oxygenation activity; not a feature of S. boulardii.
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Enhances immune function by increasing relative thymus weight, antibody titers against infectious bronchitis virus, and cutaneous basophil hypersensitivity response. Modulates cytokine levels (IL-6, TNF-α, TGF-β).
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Improves intestinal morphology by increasing jejunal villus height and villus height-to-crypt depth ratio, indicating enhanced epithelial regeneration and barrier function.
E_D_repair_material (修复因子_相关物质): Saccharomyces boulardii (indirectly via reduced inflammation and pathogen load)
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Not applicable
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (natural, nonpathogenic strain)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; nonpathogenic yeast; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no evidence of horizontal gene transfer; safe for use in poultry
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Feed matrix provides physical confinement
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Saccharomyces boulardii is a well-established probiotic with GRAS status. It is nonpathogenic, does not colonize permanently, and is safe for use in broiler chickens. No biosafety concerns were reported in the study.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): The combination of butyric acid and S. boulardii significantly improved productive performance, immune response, intestinal microflora balance, and gut morphology in broiler chickens fed a low-nPP diet. It restored thymus weight, reduced pathogenic bacteria (E. coli, Clostridium spp.), increased Lactobacillus spp., enhanced villus height and villus-to-crypt ratio, and lowered corticosterone levels. These effects were comparable to or better than those of adequate phosphorus or phytase supplementation.

composition (组成成分): [{"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus rhamnosus", "strain_id": "Not specified"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Bifidobacterium longum", "strain_id": "Not specified"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Saccharomyces boulardii", "strain_id": "Not specified"}]
C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 6.0–7.0, tolerant to bile salts and low pH (gastric conditions), utilizes glucose and other carbohydrates as carbon sources
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~1–2 hours in vitro; in vivo colonization observed in intestinal mucosa with moderate persistence
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Small intestine and colon; preferentially adheres to intestinal epithelial cells and mucus layer
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of pathogens; synergistic interactions with resident microbiota; no significant disruption of core gut microbiome
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Moderate tolerance to drying and storage at 4°C; sensitive to high temperatures (>50°C) and UV radiation
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Capsule or lyophilized formulation for protection
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 这些益生菌在人体肠道环境中具有良好的适应性，能够在胃酸和胆汁环境中存活，定植于小肠和结肠黏膜，利用葡萄糖等碳源生长，具有良好的生长速率和定植能力。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Not applicable (natural strains used)
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High chromosomal stability; no plasmid-based systems used; minimal metabolic burden
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in oral formulations (capsules, powders) and gastrointestinal environment
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 本研究中使用的益生菌为天然菌株，未经过基因改造，其功能依赖于天然代谢途径和定植能力，无需外源遗传调控系统。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): FNR promoter (hypoxia), Lactate receptor (LacR), Bile acid sensor (BaiS)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Simple constitutive expression; no complex logic gates reported; threshold-based activation via environmental cues
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 益生菌通过感知肠道内的pH、胆汁酸、乳酸等生理化学信号，以及宿主释放的蛋白酶和细胞因子，启动其定植和免疫调节功能。其响应机制为基本的环境感应，无复杂逻辑控制。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Type I Secretion (e.g., for bacteriocins), Vesicles (Extracellular vesicles)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent effects; controlled by oral administration frequency and formulation
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with oral capsules, powders, and liquid formulations; stable in gastrointestinal tract
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): 通过分泌乳酸、细菌素（如乳酸菌素）和竞争性排斥机制抑制轮状病毒复制及病原菌定植，同时破坏生物膜结构。
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 多项临床研究显示，益生菌显著缩短腹泻持续时间，降低病原体负荷，且未引起明显组织损伤或菌群失调。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): 调节肠道免疫反应，增强IgA分泌，促进抗炎细胞因子（如IL-10）释放，抑制促炎因子（如TNF-α、IL-6）过度表达。
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): 促进肠上皮细胞增殖，增强黏膜屏障功能，加速肠道损伤修复，减少通透性。
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): 调节短链脂肪酸（SCFAs）生成，改善肠道微生态平衡，促进能量代谢稳态。
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Auxotrophy (e.g., requirement for specific amino acids), Natural attenuation
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; low risk of horizontal gene transfer; no environmental escape observed
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Oral delivery limits systemic spread; gastrointestinal barrier prevents systemic dissemination
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 所用益生菌均为公认安全（GRAS）菌株，天然存在于人体肠道，无致病性，不携带耐药基因，且通过营养缺陷型设计实现生物安全控制，具有良好的安全性。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): Meta分析显示，益生菌可显著缩短轮状病毒感染患儿的腹泻、发热和呕吐持续时间，降低住院天数，提高治疗有效率。其中，中国研究组效应量更大，提示其在临床应用中具有显著疗效。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 6.5–7.0, requires complex nutrients including amino acids, vitamins, and carbohydrates (e.g., human milk oligosaccharides). Tolerant to mild osmotic stress.
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~2–3 hours in vitro; in vivo colonization observed in neonatal gut with stable persistence over days. Growth rate consistent between in vitro and in vivo conditions.
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Intestinal mucosa of neonates, particularly in the proximal small intestine and colon; preferentially colonizes the gut of preterm infants receiving human milk.
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Symbiotic with host microbiome; competes with pathogenic bacteria (e.g., Enterobacteriaceae) for nutrients and adhesion sites. May modulate immune tolerance.
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Moderate tolerance to gastric acid and bile salts; sensitive to drying and UV radiation. Stable during lyophilization and rehydration in probiotic formulations.
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Bile salts, mucin, and human milk oligosaccharides (HMOs) enhance survival in gastrointestinal tract.
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Bifidobacterium longum subsp. infantis is a facultative anaerobe that thrives in the neonatal gut environment. It grows optimally at body temperature and neutral pH, utilizing human milk oligosaccharides as a primary carbon source. It exhibits strong colonization ability in preterm infants and maintains stability during storage in probiotic capsules. However, its ability to survive systemic circulation and cause bacteremia in immunocompromised neonates highlights a potential safety concern.
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High chromosomal stability; no plasmids reported. No evidence of genetic drift or loss of function during in vitro culture or in vivo colonization. Long-term stability in probiotic formulation.
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable within capsule matrix; no significant degradation or loss of viability during storage.
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): The strains used in this study were not genetically modified. They were isolated directly from commercial probiotic capsules (Infloran) and used in their native form. No synthetic circuits, inducible promoters, or gene editing tools were applied. The observed genetic differences were due to natural SNPs, not engineered modifications.
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): FNR-like transcriptional regulators, HMO transporters (e.g., ABC transporters), bile acid sensors (e.g., Bile acid-binding proteins)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No engineered logic gates. Natural sensing involves threshold-based responses to nutrient availability and environmental stressors. No evidence of noise filtering or signal amplification beyond native physiology.
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): Bifidobacterium longum subsp. infantis senses host-derived nutrients such as human milk oligosaccharides and bile acids through specific membrane transporters and transcriptional regulators. It responds to pH and osmotic changes in the gut lumen, enabling adaptation to the neonatal intestinal environment. In inflamed or necrotic tissues, it may detect host proteases and cytokines, potentially triggering metabolic shifts. However, no synthetic sensing circuits were implemented.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Type IV secretion system (T4SS), extracellular vesicles
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Not controllable; dosage determined by probiotic formulation and administration schedule.
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with capsule matrix; maintains viability during encapsulation and intestinal transit. No significant disruption of capsule integrity.
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Not applicable. The strain is not engineered to produce antibacterial agents.
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 无相关证据。该菌株未被设计用于抗菌或生物膜抑制。
E_B_mechanism_desc (产氧机制描述): Not applicable. The strain does not produce oxygen or utilize oxygen-generating pathways.
E_B_crit_evidence (标准B_依据): 无相关证据。该菌株不具备氧生成能力，也不用于缺氧治疗。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Modulates neonatal immune system by promoting anti-inflammatory cytokine production (e.g., IL-10), enhancing regulatory T-cell activity, and reducing pro-inflammatory responses (e.g., TNF-α, IL-6). May strengthen gut barrier function.
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): Exopolysaccharides (EPS), surface glycoproteins, and secreted metabolites (e.g., acetate, lactate)
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Not applicable. No evidence of direct tissue regeneration or ECM modulation.
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Produces short-chain fatty acids (SCFAs) such as acetate and lactate from fermentation of human milk oligosaccharides. These metabolites regulate host metabolism, support colonocyte health, and influence systemic immune responses.
E_F_mechanism_desc (肿瘤治疗描述): Not applicable. No evidence of tumor targeting or prodrug activation.
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Auxotrophy (nutritional dependency on HMOs), no known kill-switches. Strain is naturally non-pathogenic but can cause bacteremia in immunocompromised hosts.
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity in healthy individuals; however, risk of bacteremia in preterm infants with immature immune systems and intestinal barrier defects. No antibiotic resistance genes detected. No evidence of horizontal gene transfer. Risk of environmental escape is low due to poor environmental survival.
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Capsule matrix provides physical confinement; limits systemic dissemination unless intestinal barrier is compromised.
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 尽管Bifidobacterium longum subsp. infantis被广泛认为是安全的益生菌（GRAS），但在极早产儿中，其可引起菌血症，尤其是在肠道屏障受损或存在坏死性小肠结肠炎的情况下。本研究中两例菌血症均发生在接受益生菌的极早产儿中，基因组分析显示病原菌株与益生菌产品来源一致，提示菌株可能通过受损肠黏膜进入血液。因此，尽管其生物安全等级为BSL-1，但在新生儿重症监护环境中仍需谨慎使用。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 该菌株在预防坏死性小肠结肠炎和降低全因死亡率方面具有显著疗效。然而，在本研究中，尽管使用了益生菌，仍有两例极早产儿发展为坏死性小肠结肠炎（NEC）并出现菌血症，提示其在特定高危人群中可能无法完全预防严重并发症。总体而言，益生菌在促进肠道定植、调节免疫和代谢方面表现良好，但在免疫功能低下或肠道屏障受损的新生儿中存在潜在风险。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Temperature: 37°C; pH: Neutral to slightly alkaline; Nutritional requirements: Standard rich media (e.g., LB), capable of utilizing glucose and other carbon sources; Tolerant to moderate bile salts and intestinal pH gradients
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~20–30 min in vitro; In vivo colonization and persistence supported by mucosal adherence and competitive fitness in gut environment
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Small intestine (duodenum, jejunum, ileum), particularly in the mucosal layer; adapted to survive transit through the stomach and colonize the upper GI tract
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive with resident microbiota; engineered to coexist without disrupting core gut microbiome; designed to avoid overgrowth or pathogenicity
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to gastric acid (pH ~1.5–3.0), bile salts, osmotic stress, and moderate shear stress; enhanced survival via microencapsulation; stable during lyophilization and rehydration
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Microencapsulation matrix (e.g., alginate or chitosan-based coatings)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该工程菌株为大肠杆菌Nissle 1917（EcN），属于兼性厌氧菌，可在37°C下快速生长，具有良好的胃肠道耐受性。其能在小肠黏膜层定植，通过微胶囊化技术增强其在胃酸和胆汁环境中的存活能力，适用于口服递送。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): CRISPR-Cas9, plasmid-based expression systems (e.g., p15A origin), inducible promoters (e.g., IPTG-responsive)
G_edit_efficiency (编辑效率): High efficiency (>90%) for chromosomal integration; low off-target risk due to precise targeting and use of validated promoters
G_circuit_control (回路控制): Inducible (IPTG), with tunable expression levels; constitutive baseline expression of PAL; responsive to metabolic cues via engineered feedback
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High plasmid stability (copy number ~10–20); chromosomal integration reduces loss rate; metabolic burden minimal; long-term in vivo consistency demonstrated in clinical trials
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable within microencapsulation matrix; no significant degradation or leakage of genetic constructs during storage or transit
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 通过CRISPR-Cas9系统将苯丙氨酸氨裂解酶（PAL）基因整合至EcN基因组中，使用IPTG诱导型启动子调控其表达。该系统在口服递送后可在小肠中持续表达PAL，实现对苯丙氨酸的降解，且在微胶囊保护下保持遗传稳定性。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): FNR promoter (oxygen-responsive), Bile acid-responsive promoters (e.g., BglJ), Phe-sensing riboswitches (inferred from metabolic feedback)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): AND gate: PAL expression activated only when Phe is present AND environmental conditions (pH, bile) are favorable; threshold-based activation with dynamic range tuned to physiological Phe levels
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 该系统通过多重信号整合实现智能响应：当苯丙氨酸浓度升高且肠道环境适宜（如pH中性、存在胆汁）时，启动PAL基因表达。该逻辑门控机制确保治疗仅在病理性苯丙氨酸积累时激活，避免不必要的代谢负担。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Constitutive secretion via outer membrane vesicles (OMVs) and passive diffusion
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Tunable via IPTG induction; dosage controlled by bacterial population density and enzyme expression level; persistent activity over 24 hours
E_material_match (材料匹配性): High compatibility with microencapsulation; maintains structural integrity and controlled release; allows sustained delivery across GI tract
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): N/A
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 无抗菌功能
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): N/A
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): N/A
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): 通过表达苯丙氨酸氨裂解酶（PAL），将有毒的苯丙氨酸（Phe）转化为无毒的反式肉桂酸（tCA），从而实现代谢干预，降低血液中苯丙氨酸水平，缓解苯丙酮尿症症状。
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Auxotrophy (e.g., requirement for specific amino acids), kill-switch systems (e.g., temperature-sensitive promoters), microencapsulation as physical barrier
B_containment_material (生物安全_相关物质): IPTG (inducer), amino acid auxotrophy (e.g., leucine requirement)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; non-pathogenic strain; no known antibiotic resistance genes; minimal horizontal gene transfer risk due to chromosomal integration; low environmental escape risk due to microencapsulation and auxotrophy
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Microencapsulation matrix provides effective physical confinement; prevents release into environment
B_risk_desc (风险描述): EcN为公认安全（GRAS）菌株，经过基因工程改造后仍保持低致病性。通过营养缺陷型设计和微胶囊化实现双重生物安全控制，有效防止环境释放和基因水平转移，临床试验中未见严重不良反应。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在成人和儿童PKU患者中，通过口服递送该工程菌株，可显著降低24小时末血浆苯丙氨酸浓度，尤其在1-6个月龄婴儿中，当治疗覆盖率提升至2.5%时，血浆苯丙氨酸水平可降至安全范围（<0.35 mM）。模型预测表明，通过提高PAL酶活性（3.125倍）或降低苯丙氨酸渗透性（225倍），可实现等效治疗效果，验证了该系统在代谢干预中的高效性与可调性。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): 37°C, pH 7.4, aerobic and anaerobic conditions, growth on de Man-Rogosa-Sharpe agar with colistin-nalidixic acid
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Transient colonization in gut; viability confirmed at 10^9 CFU/ml; no significant weight loss or diarrhea observed during 17-day study
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gastrointestinal tract (transiently colonizing the gut lumen)
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of pathogenic bacteria from epithelial binding sites; no mention of symbiosis or significant microbiome modulation beyond exclusion
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Survives in drinking water for 17 days; stable under storage and administration conditions; no data on UV, drying, or shear stress
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该研究中使用的Lactobacillus rhamnosus R0011和Lactobacillus helveticus R0052在37°C下于脱脂牛奶琼脂培养基上生长良好，可耐受厌氧和需氧环境。它们通过饮水途径给药，在大鼠肠道中实现短暂定植，且在整个17天实验期间保持活力，未引起体重下降或腹泻等不良反应。
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 本研究未对菌株进行基因工程改造，所用为天然商业菌粉，仅通过口服饮水方式给予，未涉及任何基因编辑或合成生物学元件。
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 本研究未涉及任何基因回路或信号感应模块，菌株未被工程化以响应特定环境信号，其功能基于天然生理特性。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Natural colonization and competitive exclusion (no engineered secretion system)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Daily oral administration via drinking water at 10^9 CFU/ml; consistent delivery over 17 days
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with drinking water delivery; no encapsulation or material matrix used
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): 通过竞争性排除机制阻止病原菌与肠上皮细胞结合，减少细菌黏附和侵入，从而抑制细菌穿透肠屏障。
E_A_agent_material (抗菌因子_相关物质): Lactobacillus rhamnosus R0011 and Lactobacillus helveticus R0052 (natural colonization and competition)
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 在慢性心理应激大鼠中，益生菌显著减少肠道细菌黏附（p<0.05），并完全阻止细菌向肠系膜淋巴结的易位，表明其具有可控且安全的抗菌作用。
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Transient colonization; no genetic modifications or kill switches
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Non-pathogenic, no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no evidence of horizontal gene transfer; low opportunistic risk; GRAS status
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): None (no physical barrier; delivery via drinking water)
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 所用菌株为商业益生菌产品，已广泛用于动物和人类研究，无致病性记录，属于公认安全（GRAS）类别。其在肠道中为短暂定植，不整合基因组，无生物安全风险。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在慢性心理应激大鼠模型中，益生菌预处理显著减少肠道细菌黏附（p<0.05），完全阻止细菌向肠系膜淋巴结的易位，改善肠道屏障功能，且动物在整个实验期间健康状态良好，未出现体重下降或炎症反应。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at pH 4.5–6.5; tolerates pH as low as 1.5; grows at 37°C (host temperature); resistant to bile salts and GI enzymes
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Grows optimally at 37°C; thermotolerant; survives transit through GI tract; steady-state concentrations in colon achieved within 3 days of repeated administration
