C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Colon (primary site of action); transiently present in stomach and small intestine; not part of autochthonous flora
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): No horizontal gene transfer with bacteria; does not disrupt gut microbiota; may support SCFA production (e.g., butyrate) without altering bacterial composition
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Resistant to gastric acidity (pH 1.5–3.5), bile salts, pancreatic enzymes, temperature fluctuations, lyophilization/rehydration; stable in dry form
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Cell wall components (mannan, glucan, chitin); intrinsic resistance to antibiotics
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Saccharomyces boulardii is a thermotolerant yeast that grows optimally at 37°C, the physiological temperature of the human host. It exhibits strong resistance to acidic environments (pH as low as 1.5), bile salts, and digestive enzymes, enabling it to survive gastrointestinal transit. It is not part of the native gut microbiota but transiently colonizes the colon, where it exerts its probiotic effects. Its cell wall composition confers structural stability and immune-modulating properties.
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): Naturally stable; no evidence of plasmid loss or genetic drift; genetically distinct from S. cerevisiae due to trisomy of chromosome IX and altered gene copy numbers
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in lyophilized form; maintains viability and function during storage and reconstitution
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): Saccharomyces boulardii is not genetically modified in clinical applications. Its probiotic properties arise from natural genetic traits, including overexpression of stress-response and protein synthesis genes, which enhance survival under acidic and thermal stress. It is used as a natural, non-engineered probiotic strain.
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Cell wall mannans and glucans (recognized by TLRs and lectin receptors); potential recognition of host signaling molecules via surface receptors
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No engineered logic gates; natural sensing via cell wall PAMPs and host interaction pathways; response is context-dependent (e.g., toxin presence, inflammation)
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): Saccharomyces boulardii senses the intestinal environment through its cell wall components (mannan, glucan, chitin), which are recognized by host pattern-recognition receptors (TLRs, lectins). It responds to physiological stressors like low pH and bile, and modulates host immune signaling pathways (e.g., NF-κB, MAPK) in response to pathogenic stimuli. Its activity is not controlled by synthetic circuits but by natural interactions with host and microbial signals.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Secretion via extracellular vesicles and soluble factors (e.g., proteases, anti-inflammatory molecules); no lysis or specialized secretion systems reported
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent effects; efficacy observed at 1–3 g/day; clearance from stool within 2–5 days after discontinuation
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with lyophilized formulation; stable in dry form; effective when administered orally in capsule or powder form
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Secretes proteases that degrade bacterial toxins (e.g., C. difficile toxins A/B, cholera toxin) and inhibits pathogen adhesion; produces antitoxin IgA; binds toxins directly
E_A_agent_material (抗菌因子_相关物质): 54 kDa serine protease, <10 kDa anti-inflammatory factor, 120 kDa protein inhibiting cholera toxin
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): S. boulardii reduces C. difficile and E. coli infections in clinical and animal models; neutralizes toxins without harming host cells; no significant microbiome disruption reported; localized action in gut
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Inhibits NF-κB and MAPK pathways; reduces proinflammatory cytokines (TNF-α, IL-8); increases anti-inflammatory factors (PPAR-γ, SAIF); enhances secretory IgA; modulates T-cell migration
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): Saccharomyces anti-inflammatory factor (SAIF), butyrate, PPAR-γ, secretory IgA
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Stimulates brush-border membrane enzymes (sucrase-isomaltase, lactase, maltase-glucamylase); enhances Na+/glucose cotransporter (SGLT-1) expression; promotes epithelial repair and barrier function
E_D_repair_material (修复因子_相关物质): Polyamines (673 nmol/100 mg lyophilized yeast), SGLT-1, brush-border enzymes
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Increases fecal short-chain fatty acid (SCFA) levels, particularly butyrate, in patients on enteral nutrition; enhances glucose absorption and metabolism
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Natural resistance to antibiotics; no horizontal gene transfer; no known pathogenicity in healthy individuals
B_containment_material (生物安全_相关物质): Antibiotics (natural resistance), absence of mobile genetic elements
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; rare fungaemia reported only in immunocompromised patients with indwelling catheters; no antibiotic resistance genes transferred to bacteria; no environmental escape risk due to non-colonizing nature
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Lyophilized formulation provides physical containment; oral delivery limits systemic exposure
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Saccharomyces boulardii is classified as GRAS (Generally Recognized As Safe). It is not pathogenic in healthy individuals and does not colonize the gut long-term. Fungaemia is extremely rare and associated with severe underlying conditions and catheter use. Its natural resistance to antibiotics and lack of horizontal gene transfer make it safe during antibiotic therapy. The lyophilized formulation ensures stability and containment.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): S. boulardii significantly reduces antibiotic-associated diarrhea (from 22% to 10% in trials), prevents relapses in C. difficile infection (50% reduction in recurrence), reduces duration of diarrhea in children by 0.8 days, and improves outcomes in traveler’s diarrhea, tube-feeding-associated diarrhea, and IBS. It enhances mucosal repair, increases SCFA levels, and modulates immune responses, demonstrating broad therapeutic efficacy in gastrointestinal disorders.

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 4.0–4.5; requires lactic acid production for acid tolerance; dependent on host-derived nutrients in vaginal environment
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Growth rate not explicitly reported; in vitro studies show rapid colonization and adherence to vaginal epithelial cells; stable in vivo colonization observed in rat model
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Vaginal mucosa, particularly in the lower reproductive tract; preferentially colonizes areas with low pH and high lactate concentration
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of pathogenic bacteria (e.g., Enterobacter, Enterococcus); synergistic interaction with host epithelial cells to enhance barrier function; no evidence of symbiosis with non-Lactobacillus species
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): High acid tolerance (pH 4.0–4.5), bile salt tolerance, oxidative stress resistance; stable during freeze-drying and rehydration; resistant to shear stress in gel matrix
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Lactate, hydrogen peroxide, bacteriocins
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该菌群由五种乳杆菌组成，均具有良好的酸耐受性、抗氧化活性、对阴道上皮细胞的黏附能力及抑制病原体黏附的能力。在阴道低pH环境下可快速定植并维持稳定，通过产生乳酸和细菌素抑制病原菌生长，恢复阴道微生态平衡。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Not applicable (natural isolates, no genetic modification reported)
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High chromosomal stability; no plasmids reported; no evidence of genetic drift or loss in vivo; long-term colonization observed in rat model
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in gelatin sponge matrix; maintains viability and function during encapsulation and delivery
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 该菌群为从健康女性阴道分泌物中分离的天然乳杆菌组合，未经过基因改造。其功能依赖于天然代谢通路，如乳酸发酵、细菌素合成和黏附因子表达，具有良好的遗传稳定性，可在凝胶海绵中稳定存活并发挥治疗作用。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): FNR promoter (hypoxia response), Lactate-responsive promoters (e.g., LctP), Bile acid sensors (e.g., Bile acid-binding proteins)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Constitutive expression; no reported synthetic logic gates; natural sensing of pH and lactate enables self-regulated colonization and metabolic activity
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 该菌群通过感知阴道环境中的低pH和乳酸浓度，激活自身代谢通路，实现自适应定植。其对胆汁酸和蛋白酶的响应有助于识别宿主炎症状态，从而在病原菌入侵或黏膜损伤时启动防御机制。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Constitutive secretion (lactic acid, bacteriocins); no lysis or vesicle-mediated delivery reported
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent effect; administered via gelatin sponge at 1×10⁹ CFU per strain; controlled by delivery frequency (every 3 days)
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Highly compatible with medical absorbable gelatine sponges; maintains viability and function during encapsulation and sustained release
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): 通过产生细菌素（bacteriocins）和乳酸，直接杀灭或抑制多种病原菌，包括大肠杆菌、金黄色葡萄球菌和β-溶血性链球菌；同时通过竞争性黏附抑制生物膜形成。
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 在大鼠模型中，该菌群组合显著减少大肠杆菌和肠球菌的过度生长，抑制中性粒细胞、淋巴细胞和单核细胞浸润，且未观察到组织损伤或过度炎症反应。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): 通过下调促炎因子（IL-1β、TNF-α）和上调抗炎因子（IL-4）的表达，调节局部免疫反应，减轻炎症损伤，促进免疫稳态恢复。
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): 通过减少细胞凋亡因子（caspase-3、caspase-8、FasL）的表达，促进上皮细胞再生，修复受损的阴道黏膜屏障。
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (natural isolates, no synthetic kill switches or auxotrophy reported)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no evidence of horizontal gene transfer; low risk of environmental escape due to host-specific colonization
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Physical confinement by gelatin sponge prevents systemic dissemination; localized delivery ensures safety
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 该菌群为从健康女性阴道中分离的天然乳杆菌，符合GRAS（公认安全）标准。未发现致病性、耐药基因或水平基因转移风险，且通过凝胶海绵局部递送，具有良好的物理屏障保护，安全性高。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在大鼠阴道菌群失调模型中，该乳杆菌组合显著降低子宫壁中性粒细胞、淋巴细胞和单核细胞浸润，下调IL-1β和TNF-α表达，上调IL-4表达，恢复Lactobacillus丰度并抑制Enterobacter和Enterococcus过度生长，组织病理学显示黏膜修复良好，炎症反应基本消失，表明其在修复阴道微生态和缓解炎症方面具有显著疗效。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 7.0; tolerates pH 2.0–6.0; utilizes various carbohydrates including glucose, fructose, maltose, sucrose, and cellobiose.
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Fast-growing strain; enters log phase at 3 h, reaches stationary phase by 5 h; doubling time not explicitly stated but inferred as rapid based on growth curve.
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gastrointestinal tract (GIT), particularly in the context of food fermentation and potential gut colonization.
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Demonstrates autoaggregation and cell surface hydrophobicity, suggesting ability to adhere to mucosal surfaces and compete with pathogens; may modulate gut microbiota via bacteriocin production.
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): High tolerance to acidic pH (survives pH 2.0 with pepsin), bile salts (taurocholic acid, oxgall), heat (stable up to 121°C for 15 min), organic solvents, surfactants, detergents, and antacids (ENO, Ranitidine).
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Bile salt hydrolase (BSH) activity, proteinaceous bacteriocin (enterocin LD3), cell surface hydrophobicity components.
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该菌株为快速生长的革兰氏阳性球菌，最适生长温度为37°C，pH为7.0。在模拟胃液（pH 2.0）中具有良好的存活能力，对胆盐（如牛磺胆酸和oxgall）耐受，且在高温（121°C）、有机溶剂、表面活性剂和去垢剂中保持稳定。其细胞表面具有较强疏水性，能自发和自聚集，表明其在肠道黏膜定植潜力强。
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 本文未涉及基因工程改造，菌株LD3为天然分离株，未进行人工遗传修饰。其功能主要依赖于天然产生的细菌素（enterocin LD3）和固有生理特性。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Not specified – no engineered sensors reported.
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Not applicable – no synthetic genetic circuits described.
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 该菌株未被工程化设计为响应特定信号，其生理行为（如细菌素产生）与生长阶段相关（中对数期开始产生），但未明确其感知机制或逻辑控制。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Unknown – likely secreted via general secretion pathway or released upon lysis; no specific secretion system reported.
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Not applicable – no controlled release or tunable output described.
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Not evaluated – no encapsulation or material integration reported.
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): 细菌素LD3具有广谱抗菌活性，对多种革兰氏阳性与阴性病原菌均有抑制作用，包括金黄色葡萄球菌、铜绿假单胞菌、沙门氏菌、志贺氏菌、大肠杆菌O157:H7等。其作用机制为杀菌，通过破坏细胞膜完整性导致目标菌快速死亡。
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 该细菌素对多种食品源和人类致病菌具有广谱抑制活性，且在酸性环境和高温下稳定，但未评估其在生物材料中的释放行为、对宿主细胞的毒性或对微生物组的扰动。
E_B_crit_evidence (标准B_依据): 未提及任何产氧机制或相关酶。
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None – no kill-switch or auxotrophy reported.
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Strain LD3 is isolated from food (dosa batter), shows no antibiotic resistance genes (except kanamycin/gentamycin resistance, which is common in enterococci), and has low pathogenicity risk. However, enterococci are known for potential horizontal gene transfer (HGT) and opportunistic infection risk, especially in immunocompromised hosts.
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Not applicable – no physical barrier or encapsulation described.
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 该菌株来源于传统发酵食品，符合GRAS（公认安全）标准，且未检测到可转移的抗生素抗性基因。但作为肠球菌，其具有潜在的基因水平转移能力，且在免疫抑制个体中可能引发感染，需谨慎评估临床应用风险。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 该菌株表现出良好的胃肠道耐受性（耐酸、耐胆盐）、细胞表面疏水性及自聚集能力，可有效抑制多种食源性和人类致病菌，具有作为益生菌和天然抗菌剂的潜力。其细菌素在极端条件下稳定，适用于食品和医药领域。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Grown on MRS agar and broth at 37°C, 72 h; optimal temperature 37°C, pH not specified, requires standard nutrient-rich medium (MRS) with carbon sources such as glucose and lactose.
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Growth rate not quantified; cells harvested after 24 h in MRS broth; doubling time not reported. In vivo colonization observed after oral administration.
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gut lumen, particularly cecum; promotes colonization of Lactobacillus spp. and modulates gut microbiota composition.
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of Enterobacteriaceae and other LPS-producing bacteria; promotes beneficial Lactobacillus and Roseburia spp.; reduces dysbiosis.
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to freeze-drying (lyophilization) and storage at -80°C; stability in glycerol suspension; no data on UV, shear, or osmotic stress.
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Glycerol (for cryoprotection during storage)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Lactobacillus plantarum MTCC 9510 is a facultative anaerobe that grows well in MRS medium at 37°C. It demonstrates strong colonization potential in the murine gut, particularly in the cecum, where it enhances beneficial bacterial populations and suppresses pathobionts. It is stable under cryopreservation and suitable for oral delivery.
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): No genetic engineering was performed. The strain was used in its native form without modification. Its beneficial effects are attributed to natural probiotic properties and metabolic activity.
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): No engineered sensing modules were used. The strain's activity is based on natural interactions with the host and gut environment, including modulation of gut barrier integrity and immune signaling via endogenous metabolites.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Natural secretion of metabolites (e.g., SCFAs, exopolysaccharides); no engineered secretion systems used.
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Oral gavage at 2 × 10¹⁰ CFU/mouse daily; dosage not dynamically controlled.
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with oral delivery in PBS; no encapsulation or material-based delivery system described.
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Reduces systemic and brain inflammation by lowering serum TNF-α, corticosterone, and LPS levels; inhibits NF-κB activation in the hippocampus; enhances anti-inflammatory signaling.
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Improves intestinal and blood-brain barrier integrity by upregulating tight junction proteins (e.g., Claudin-5, ZO-2); reduces permeability induced by stress.
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Modulates gut microbial metabolism by increasing production of short-chain fatty acids (SCFAs), particularly acetic and butyric acid in CUMS mice, and propionic acid in SD mice; supports colonocyte energy metabolism and gut homeostasis.
E_E_metabolite_material (代谢物_相关物质): Acetic acid, Butyric acid, Propionic acid
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (natural strain, no kill-switch or auxotrophy introduced)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Non-pathogenic; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; low opportunistic risk; no evidence of horizontal gene transfer; environmental escape unlikely due to lack of persistence beyond gut.
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): None (no physical material barrier used; oral delivery relies on natural gut transit)
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Lactobacillus plantarum MTCC 9510 is a well-characterized, generally recognized as safe (GRAS) probiotic strain. It is non-pathogenic, does not carry antibiotic resistance genes, and shows no evidence of systemic dissemination or environmental persistence. Its use in oral supplementation poses minimal biosafety risk.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): L. plantarum MTCC 9510 supplementation significantly prevented stress-induced behavioral deficits (depression, anxiety, cognitive impairment), oxidative stress, neuroinflammation, and gut and blood-brain barrier dysfunction in mice exposed to chronic unpredictable mild stress (CUMS) or sleep deprivation (SD). It restored gut microbiota balance by increasing Lactobacillus and Roseburia spp. while reducing Enterobacteriaceae. It enhanced SCFA production (acetic, butyric, propionic acids), improved barrier integrity, and normalized neurochemical markers (BDNF, TNF-α, corticosterone). These effects demonstrate strong neuroprotective and gut-modulating capacity, supporting its potential as a psychobiotic for stress-related disorders.

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Gram-positive, orally administered, persists in human gut; grows in nutrient-rich environments (e.g., intestinal tract); no specific pH or temperature constraints mentioned
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Stably persists in human gut after oral administration; no in vivo doubling time or growth rate provided
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Human gastrointestinal tract (gut mucosa)
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): May modulate gut microbiota composition; potential competitive interaction with pathogenic bacteria; no direct mention of symbiosis with host microbiome
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerates oral passage (gastric acid, bile), stable during storage as drops; no data on UV, drying, or shear stress
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Lactose monohydrate, glucose monohydrate (carrier solution)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该菌株为革兰氏阳性菌，口服后可在人体肠道中稳定定植，属于正常肠道菌群成员，具有良好的耐受性，适用于肠道微生态调节。
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): No genetic modifications reported; natural strain used; chromosomal stability assumed in gut environment
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in liquid drop formulation (carrier: lactose and glucose); no evidence of degradation in delivery medium
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 该系统未进行基因工程改造，使用天然来源的 Enterococcus faecalis DSM 16440 菌株，通过口服滴剂形式递送，无外源基因插入或调控元件。
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 该研究未描述任何感知模块或逻辑控制机制，微生物本身不具有工程化响应系统。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Passive secretion (natural metabolic activity); no engineered secretion system reported
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Fixed dose: 30 drops three times daily for 4 weeks; no dynamic or feedback-controlled dosage
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with liquid drop formulation; stable in lactose/glucose carrier solution; no evidence of material degradation or interference
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): 通过调节肠道菌群，影响免疫系统，可能通过激活或抑制Th1细胞、促进IL-10分泌、降低特异性IgE水平、抑制组胺信号通路等方式实现免疫调节作用。
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (natural strain, no kill-switch or auxotrophy reported)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; generally considered safe; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; potential for horizontal gene transfer not assessed; environmental escape risk low due to gut-restricted persistence
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Physical barrier: oral delivery with transient gut residence; no encapsulation or sustained release system
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Enterococcus faecalis DSM 16440 属于公认安全（GRAS）菌株，为正常肠道菌群成员，无已知致病性。未进行基因改造，无抗生素抗性基因或杀伤开关，安全性较高。其在肠道内定植但不长期滞留，环境释放风险低。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 本研究为随机对照试验设计，旨在评估 E. faecalis 对季节性过敏性鼻炎症状的影响，主要终点为综合症状与用药评分（CSMS）和生活质量问卷（RQLQ）。研究未报告具体疗效数据，但基于既往研究，推测其可能通过免疫调节改善症状，尤其在减少IgE介导的过敏反应和提升生活质量方面具有潜力。

composition (组成成分): [{"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Bifidobacterium bifidum", "strain_id": ""}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Bifidobacterium infantis", "strain_id": ""}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Bifidobacterium longum", "strain_id": ""}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus casei", "strain_id": ""}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus plantarum", "strain_id": ""}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus rhamnosus", "strain_id": ""}]
C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 6.5–7.0, requires complex nutrients including amino acids, vitamins, and carbohydrates; adapted to intestinal environment
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~1.5–2 hours in vitro; in vivo colonization observed within days of administration
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Large intestine (colon), particularly mucosal surface and lumen
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of pathogenic bacteria; potential symbiosis with host microbiota; no reported antagonism
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Moderate tolerance to gastric acid and bile; stable during lyophilization and rehydration; resistant to moderate shear stress
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Cell wall components (e.g., peptidoglycan), exopolysaccharides
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该混合菌群为兼性厌氧菌，可在人体肠道环境中定植，适宜生长温度为37°C，pH值约6.5–7.0，依赖复杂营养物质如氨基酸、维生素和碳水化合物。在体外培养中，倍增时间为1.5–2小时，口服后可在数日内在肠道内定植，主要定植于结肠黏膜表面和肠腔。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Not specified
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): Not specified
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Not specified
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 该研究未对菌株进行基因工程改造，所有菌株均为天然来源，未使用任何基因编辑工具或合成回路。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): FNR-like regulators (in Bifidobacteria), lactose permease (in Lactobacilli)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Not specified
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 该研究未涉及合成生物学逻辑门控系统，菌株通过天然代谢感应机制响应肠道环境变化，如pH下降和营养物质可用性。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Type I secretion (lactic acid), passive diffusion (SCFAs)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent effect: 4 × 10⁹ CFU/day; effects observed after 2 weeks of treatment
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Well compatible with oral suspension formulation; stable in powder form; no reported interference with delivery matrix
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Not applicable
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Probiotics reduce visceral hypersensitivity and inflammation in the enteric mucosa, leading to decreased abdominal pain. B. infantis has been shown to modulate immune responses in IBS.
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Improved colonic motility and reduced transit time may promote mucosal healing and barrier function. Decreased abdominal pain suggests reduced tissue irritation.
E_D_repair_material (修复因子_相关物质): Short-chain fatty acids (SCFAs) produced by fermentation
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Bifidobacteria and lactobacilli ferment dietary fibers to produce lactic acid, acetic acid, and other organic acids, lowering colonic pH. This acidification enhances peristalsis and reduces colonic transit time.
E_E_metabolite_material (代谢物_相关物质): Lactic acid, Acetic acid, Short-chain fatty acids (SCFAs)
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (natural strains, no engineered kill switches)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no horizontal gene transfer risk; no environmental escape concerns; well-tolerated in children
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Oral administration with natural gut barrier; no physical containment required
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 该混合菌群为公认安全（GRAS）菌株，无致病性，未携带抗生素抗性基因，无水平基因转移风险，且在儿童中口服耐受良好，未报告任何不良反应。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 该研究为小样本试点研究，共纳入20名儿童。结果显示，每周排便次数从基线2.0次增加至第2周的4.2次（p=0.10）和第4周的3.8次（p=0.13）。在每周排便少于3次的12名儿童中，排便频率显著增加（第2周p=0.01，第4周p=0.009）。粪便失禁次数显著减少（第2周p=0.007，第4周p=0.001）。腹痛发生率从45%降至20%（p=0.006）。未观察到副作用。结果提示该益生菌混合物对儿童功能性便秘具有积极疗效，但需大样本随机对照试验进一步验证。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 5.5–6.5; resistant to gastric acid and bile salts; utilizes carbohydrates as carbon source
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~1.5–2 hours in vitro; in vivo colonization observed in infant gut within days of administration
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Small intestine and colon; adheres to intestinal epithelium
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competes with pathogenic bacteria; promotes symbiosis with host microbiota by enhancing bifidobacteria and lactobacilli
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to gastric acid, bile salts, and moderate osmotic stress; stable during lyophilization and storage at 4°C
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Cell wall components (e.g., teichoic acids), acid tolerance systems (e.g., F0F1-ATPase)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该菌株为兼性厌氧菌，可在37°C、pH 5.5–6.5条件下生长，对胃酸和胆盐具有较强耐受性，能有效定植于小肠和结肠黏膜，通过竞争性抑制病原菌并促进有益菌群（如双歧杆菌）生长，实现与宿主微生物群的共生关系。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): None reported (natural isolate)
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High chromosomal stability; no plasmid-based systems used; minimal metabolic burden
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in oral formulations (e.g., powder, formula) without significant loss of viability
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 该系统未进行基因工程改造，使用天然分离的Lactobacillus rhamnosus HN001菌株，通过口服给药定植于肠道，无需外源调控元件，具有良好的遗传稳定性。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): FNR promoter (hypoxia), Bile acid-responsive regulators (e.g., Bile acid-binding proteins)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Constitutive expression; no complex logic gates; threshold-based response to environmental cues
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 该菌株通过感知肠道pH变化、胆汁酸浓度及乳酸/葡萄糖水平实现环境适应，其基因表达主要为组成型，无复杂逻辑控制，但可通过代谢产物反馈调节自身活性。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Type I secretion (e.g., for cytokines), Vesicles (exosomes)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent effect; controlled by oral administration frequency and formulation
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with oral formulations (powder, formula); stable in gastrointestinal environment
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Not applicable
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 无抗菌或抗生物膜功能描述
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Modulates immune response by upregulating IFN-γ and IL-10, promoting Th1/Treg balance and suppressing Th2 response; enhances oral tolerance induction.
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Improves intestinal barrier function by increasing tight junction protein expression and IgA production; supports mucosal healing.
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Not applicable
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (natural isolate, non-pathogenic)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no horizontal gene transfer risk; no environmental escape concerns
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Gastrointestinal tract barrier sufficient; no systemic dissemination reported
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Lactobacillus rhamnosus HN001被美国FDA列为GRAS（公认安全），在儿童中使用未报告严重不良事件，无致病性、耐药基因或基因水平转移风险，属于低风险生物制剂。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在预防性试验中，Lactobacillus rhamnosus HN001显著降低2岁儿童特应性皮炎发病率（HR 0.51, 95% CI 0.30–0.85, p=0.01），尤其对IgE相关性AD效果更显著（HR 0.51, 95% CI 0.27–0.97, p=0.04）。在治疗方面，部分研究显示SCORAD评分下降，但总体证据不一致。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 6.0–7.0; requires complex nutrients including amino acids, vitamins, and oligosaccharides; sensitive to bile salts
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~3–4 hours in vitro; slower colonization in vivo due to sensitivity to bile and oxygen
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Colon; preferentially colonizes mucosal layer of large intestine
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Symbiotic with host; promotes growth of other beneficial bacteria; competes with pathogenic species
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Sensitive to bile salts and oxygen; low tolerance to drying and shear stress; requires refrigerated storage
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Exopolysaccharides (EPS), protective capsule layers
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该菌株为专性厌氧菌，最适生长温度37°C，pH 6.0–7.0，依赖复杂营养物质（如氨基酸、维生素、寡糖）生长，对胆汁酸和氧气敏感，主要定植于结肠黏膜层，通过与宿主共生并抑制病原菌实现生态平衡。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): None reported (natural isolate)
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High chromosomal stability; no plasmid systems; minimal metabolic burden
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in oral formulations with prebiotics (e.g., GOS/FOS); enhanced survival in co-administration
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 该系统未进行基因改造，使用天然分离的Bifidobacterium animalis subsp. lactis HN019菌株，通过口服给药定植于结肠，与预生物（GOS/FOS）协同增强定植能力，具有良好的遗传稳定性。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): FOS-responsive promoters (e.g., FOS transporter operons), pH-sensing regulators (e.g., PhoP/PhoQ)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Constitutive expression; no inducible circuits; threshold response to prebiotic availability
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 该菌株通过感知肠道pH、胆汁酸及FOS等寡糖信号实现环境适应，其代谢基因主要为组成型表达，但FOS存在时可激活特定转运系统，实现营养响应性调控。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Vesicles (exosomes), Type IV secretion
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent effect; controlled by oral intake and prebiotic co-administration
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Highly compatible with prebiotic-containing formulations; stable in encapsulated delivery systems
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Not applicable
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 无抗菌或抗生物膜功能描述
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Enhances regulatory T cell (Treg) function; increases IL-10 and TGF-β production; suppresses Th2-mediated inflammation.
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Not applicable
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Ferments prebiotics (GOS/FOS) to produce short-chain fatty acids (SCFAs) such as acetate, propionate, and butyrate, which serve as energy substrates for colonocytes and modulate immune function.
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (natural isolate, non-pathogenic)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes; no HGT risk; no environmental escape reported
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Gastrointestinal barrier sufficient; no systemic dissemination observed
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Bifidobacterium animalis subsp. lactis HN019被列为GRAS，无致病性、耐药基因或基因水平转移风险，安全性高，适用于婴幼儿。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在预防性试验中，Bifidobacterium animalis subsp. lactis HN019未显著降低特应性皮炎发病率（HR 0.98, 95% CI 0.72–1.33），与安慰剂组无显著差异。但其在调节免疫和代谢方面具有潜力，尤其在与预生物联用时可增强益生作用。

C_oxygen_tolerance (氧耐受性): Facultative Anaerobe (L. rhamnosus), Strict Anaerobe (B. lactis)
C_growth_conditions (生长条件): L. rhamnosus: 37°C, pH 5.5–6.5; B. lactis: 37°C, pH 6.0–7.0; both require complex nutrients and prebiotics (e.g., GOS/FOS, HMOs)
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): L. rhamnosus: doubling time ~1.5–2 h; B. lactis: ~3–4 h; co-culture enhances growth via cross-feeding
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Small intestine (L. rhamnosus), Colon (B. lactis); mucosal layer
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Synergistic interaction: L. rhamnosus produces lactate, which B. lactis uses as carbon source; both promote host immune tolerance
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Moderate tolerance to gastric acid and bile; sensitive to drying; requires refrigerated storage
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Exopolysaccharides (EPS), acid tolerance systems
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该共培养系统由Lactobacillus rhamnosus Lcr35（兼性厌氧）和Bifidobacterium lactis Bb-12（专性厌氧）组成，两者在肠道中协同定植，L. rhamnosus产生乳酸供B. lactis利用，形成互惠关系，共同促进免疫调节和屏障修复。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): None reported (natural isolates)
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High chromosomal stability; no plasmid systems; minimal metabolic burden
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in oral formulations with prebiotics; enhanced survival in co-administration
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 该系统未进行基因改造，由两种天然分离菌株组成，通过口服给药在肠道中形成共生关系，无需外源调控，具有良好的遗传稳定性。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Lactate-responsive promoters (e.g., LldR), FOS/HMO transporters (e.g., ABC transporters)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Constitutive expression; no complex logic; cross-feeding enables metabolic synergy
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 该共培养系统通过感知pH、胆汁酸、乳酸、FOS及HMO等信号实现环境适应，L. rhamnosus利用葡萄糖产乳酸，B. lactis利用乳酸和HMOs生长，形成代谢互补，实现协同效应。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Vesicles (exosomes), Type I/IV secretion
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent; controlled by oral administration and prebiotic co-formulation
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Highly compatible with oral formulations containing prebiotics; stable in encapsulated delivery
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Not applicable
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 无抗菌或抗生物膜功能描述
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Synergistically upregulates IL-10, IFN-γ, and TGF-β; enhances Treg differentiation and suppresses Th2 response.
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Enhances intestinal barrier integrity via increased IgA, tight junction proteins, and mucin production.
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Ferments HMOs and FOS to produce SCFAs (acetate, propionate, butyrate), which regulate immune function and energy metabolism.
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (natural isolates, non-pathogenic)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes; no HGT risk; no environmental escape
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Gastrointestinal barrier sufficient; no systemic dissemination reported
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 该共培养系统由两种GRAS菌株组成，无致病性、耐药基因或基因水平转移风险，安全性高，适用于婴幼儿。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在一项小型治疗试验中，该共培养系统（L. rhamnosus Lcr35 + B. lactis Bb-12）与预生物联用，虽未显著优于单独预生物组，但显示出改善AD症状的趋势，尤其在IgE相关性AD中效果更明显，提示其在免疫调节和代谢调控方面具有协同潜力。

C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Moderate tolerance to gastric acidity and bile; stable during feed processing and storage; limited data on UV/shear stability
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Cell wall components (e.g., peptidoglycan, exopolysaccharides); intrinsic resistance to bile salts
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该研究中使用的微生物群落为多种益生菌的复合体，包括乳杆菌属、双歧杆菌属、链球菌属和肠球菌属等。这些微生物在鸡的肠道环境中具有良好的生长适应性，能够在37°C、中性至弱酸性条件下快速增殖，其生长周期约为1–2小时。它们主要定植于肠道黏膜表面和肠腔，通过竞争性排斥病原菌（如大肠杆菌）来维持肠道微生态平衡。该群落对胃酸和胆汁具有中等耐受性，可在饲料加工和储存过程中保持稳定，但未报告其对紫外线或剪切力的耐受性。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Not specified
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): Not specified
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Not specified
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 该研究未对微生物进行基因工程改造，所有微生物均为天然来源的商业益生菌制剂，其功能依赖于自然生理特性，而非人工调控回路。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): FNR promoter (hypoxia); Lactate receptor (LacR); Bile acid transporter (BaiCD); Glucose transporter (PtsG)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Not specified
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 该研究未描述任何基因逻辑门或信号处理机制，微生物的响应主要基于其天然代谢感应系统，如对乳酸、葡萄糖和胆汁酸的感应，通过代谢调控实现功能表达。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Type III Secretion (Lactobacillus), Vesicles (Extracellular vesicles), Lysis (natural turnover)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent; controlled by dietary supplementation rate (0.1–0.15 g/kg); no feedback control
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with feed matrix; stable during feed pelleting and storage
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): 通过产生有机酸（如乳酸）降低肠道pH，抑制病原菌生长；分泌细菌素（如乳杆菌素）直接杀灭革兰氏阳性菌；竞争性黏附于肠黏膜，阻止病原菌定植。
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 研究显示，使用益生菌和合生元的鸡群中，大肠杆菌数量显著降低，且未观察到对正常菌群的显著破坏，表明其抗菌作用具有选择性且可控。
E_B_crit_evidence (标准B_依据): 未涉及氧气生成机制，因此不适用。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): 通过激活肠道相关淋巴组织（GALT）和Peyer’s patches，促进T细胞和B细胞活化，增强免疫球蛋白合成，提高脾脏重量和免疫应答能力。
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): 通过改善肠道形态（如增加绒毛长度、减少隐窝深度）和降低肠壁厚度，促进肠道屏障功能恢复，增强黏膜修复能力。
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): 调节宿主代谢，如降低血清胆固醇、甘油三酯和LDL水平，提高HDL水平，改善脂质代谢平衡。
E_E_metabolite_material (代谢物_相关物质): Short-chain fatty acids (SCFAs), Lactate, Bile acid metabolites
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Auxotrophy (nutrient-dependent growth); no known pathogenicity
B_containment_material (生物安全_相关物质): Lack of essential amino acids (e.g., arginine, lysine)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; low risk of horizontal gene transfer; no environmental escape observed in poultry systems
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Feed matrix provides physical confinement; no release into environment
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 所用微生物均为公认安全（GRAS）菌株，无致病性报告，未检测到抗生素抗性基因，且在饲料中以营养依赖方式存在，降低了环境逃逸风险。物理屏障（饲料基质）有效防止其在环境中扩散。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 与抗生素组相比，合生元组显著提高了日增重（73.6 g/d）、饲料转化率（1.70）和胴体出肉率（78.7%），并显著增加脾脏重量（+115%）和胃重量（+47%），同时降低肾脏重量（-47%）和腹部脂肪含量（0.83%）。此外，合生元显著改善了肠道形态，使小肠壁变薄，且对肠道微生物群具有显著调节作用，促进乳酸菌和好氧菌生长，抑制大肠杆菌。

composition (组成成分): [{"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Bifidobacterium", "strain_id": "Golden bifid (Bifidobacterium, Lactobacillus bulgaricus, Streptococcus thermophilus)"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus bulgaricus", "strain_id": "Golden bifid (Bifidobacterium, Lactobacillus bulgaricus, Streptococcus thermophilus)"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Streptococcus thermophilus", "strain_id": "Golden bifid (Bifidobacterium, Lactobacillus bulgaricus, Streptococcus thermophilus)"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus acidophilus", "strain_id": "Live combined Bifidobacterium and Lactobacillus tablets (Bifidobacterium, L acidophilus, Enterococcus faecalis, Bacillus cereus)"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Enterococcus faecalis", "strain_id": "Live combined Bifidobacterium and Lactobacillus tablets (Bifidobacterium, L acidophilus, Enterococcus faecalis, Bacillus cereus)"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Bacillus cereus", "strain_id": "Live combined Bifidobacterium and Lactobacillus tablets (Bifidobacterium, L acidophilus, Enterococcus faecalis, Bacillus cereus)"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus rhamnosus GG", "strain_id": "Biostime (Bifidobacterium, L rhamnosus GG)"}]
C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 6.5–7.5, tolerant to bile acids and gastric acidity; requires glucose and amino acids as carbon and nitrogen sources
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~1.5–2 hours in vitro; in vivo colonization observed within 24–48 hours post-administration
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Intestinal mucosa, particularly in the colon and ileum; preferentially colonizes mucus layer and epithelial surfaces
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of pathogenic bacteria (e.g., Escherichia coli); synergistic co-colonization with other commensals; no evidence of disruption to core microbiome
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to lyophilization, moderate heat (up to 50°C), and osmotic stress; stable during storage at 4°C for up to 12 months
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Bile salts, gastric acid, and freeze-drying stabilizers (e.g., trehalose)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该系统以多种益生菌（如双歧杆菌、乳酸杆菌、嗜热链球菌等）为底盘，具有良好的肠道定植能力。这些菌株为兼性厌氧菌，可在37°C、pH 6.5–7.5条件下生长，对胃酸和胆汁具有较强耐受性，能利用葡萄糖和氨基酸作为碳氮源。在体外培养中，倍增时间约为1.5–2小时；在体内，口服后24–48小时内即可在肠道黏膜定植。主要定植于结肠和回肠的黏液层及上皮表面，通过竞争性排斥病原菌（如大肠杆菌）维持肠道微生态平衡，且不破坏核心菌群结构。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): None (Natural strains used; no genetic modification reported)
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High chromosomal stability; no plasmid-based systems used; no evidence of genetic drift in clinical trials
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in enteral nutritional suspension; no degradation or loss of viability during encapsulation
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 本研究中使用的益生菌均为天然菌株，未进行基因工程改造。其功能表达为天然固有特性，无需诱导或调控系统。菌株在肠内营养液中保持稳定，无质粒依赖，遗传稳定性高，未观察到基因漂移或功能丧失。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): FNR promoter (hypoxia), Bile acid-responsive promoters (e.g., Bile acid receptor Bsh), Lactate transporter (LctP)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Threshold-based activation; no complex logic gates reported; response to multiple signals (e.g., low pH + bile) may act as AND gate
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 这些益生菌通过感知肠道微环境中的多种信号（如pH、胆汁酸、乳酸、葡萄糖）实现定植与功能激活。例如，双歧杆菌和乳酸杆菌可通过FNR启动子感知低氧环境，通过胆汁酸受体感知胆汁酸浓度，通过LctP转运体感知乳酸水平。在临床研究中，这些菌株在肠道中表现出对炎症相关信号（如细胞因子、蛋白酶）的响应能力，但未报告复杂的逻辑门控机制，主要为阈值依赖型激活。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Type I secretion system (e.g., for sIgA modulation); vesicle-mediated delivery of metabolites
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent effect; administered at 3.5 g/time, 3 times/day; duration 2–4 weeks
E_material_match (材料匹配性): High compatibility with enteral nutritional suspension; no structural disruption or gas production observed
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Not applicable
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 未报告抗菌活性或生物膜抑制功能
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Enhances intestinal mucosal immunity by increasing sIgA production, modulates Th1/Th2 balance, reduces systemic inflammation, and strengthens tight junctions.
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Promotes epithelial regeneration, enhances intestinal barrier integrity, increases villi surface area, and accelerates mucosal healing.
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Regulates glucose and lipid metabolism; produces SCFAs (e.g., acetate, butyrate) that serve as energy substrates and signaling molecules.
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Auxotrophy (e.g., requirement for specific amino acids or vitamins not available in host environment)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no evidence of horizontal gene transfer; low risk of environmental escape
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Enteral delivery limits systemic spread; no physical barrier required
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 所用益生菌均为公认安全（GRAS）菌株，无致病性，未检测到抗生素抗性基因，无水平基因转移证据，且通过营养缺陷型（如亮氨酸、赖氨酸依赖）实现生物遏制，降低环境逃逸风险。肠内给药方式限制其全身扩散，安全性良好。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 早期肠内营养联合益生菌可显著降低严重颅脑损伤患者的感染风险（RR=0.53）、死亡率（RR=0.56）和胃肠道并发症（RR=0.19），并缩短ICU住院时间（MD=-4.55天）。其机制主要通过调节肠道菌群平衡、增强肠道屏障功能、促进免疫调节和组织修复实现。

composition (组成成分): [{"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus spp.", "strain_id": "Not specified"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Bacillus spp.", "strain_id": "Not specified"}, {"role": "Helper", "scientific_name": "Bifidobacterium spp.", "strain_id": "Not specified"}, {"role": "Helper", "scientific_name": "Bacteroides spp.", "strain_id": "Not specified"}, {"role": "Helper", "scientific_name": "Akkermansia muciniphila", "strain_id": "Not specified"}]
C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37–40°C, pH 5.5–7.0, utilizes carbohydrates (e.g., glucose, lactose), requires complex nutrients including amino acids and vitamins; thrives in intestinal environment with mucin and bile salts
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~1–2 hours in vitro; growth rate consistent with in vivo colonization dynamics in broiler chickens
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Small intestine and cecum; preferentially colonizes mucosal surfaces and lumen of gastrointestinal tract
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competes with pathogens (e.g., Salmonella, Campylobacter) for nutrients and adhesion sites; promotes symbiosis with host via SCFA production and immune modulation
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Moderate tolerance to bile salts, osmotic stress, and low pH; limited data on UV, drying, or shear stress; stability in feed formulations reported
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Bile salt hydrolase (BSH) enzymes, mucin-degrading enzymes
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Lactobacillus and Bacillus species are facultative anaerobes that thrive in the chicken gut, utilizing dietary carbohydrates and host-derived mucins. They exhibit robust growth under physiological conditions of the gastrointestinal tract, with strong colonization ability in the small intestine and cecum. Their presence supports gut homeostasis and inhibits pathogen overgrowth through competitive exclusion and metabolic byproduct production.
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Not specified
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): Not specified
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Not specified
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): The microbial consortium is developed through co-culturing of naturally occurring probiotic strains without genetic modification. The design relies on natural metabolic and competitive interactions rather than synthetic genetic circuits. No engineered plasmids or inducible systems are reported.
S_host_signals (宿主信号): ["Proteases (e.g., trypsin, chymotrypsin)", "Cytokines (e.g., IL-1β, TNF-α)", "Tissue degradation fragments"]
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): FNR promoter (hypoxia), BSH receptor (bile salts), mucin-binding adhesins, lactate-sensing regulators
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No explicit logic gates reported; likely constitutive expression of key metabolic and colonization genes; potential threshold-based competition via resource sensing
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): The consortium senses environmental cues such as low pH, bile salts, and mucin availability through native receptors. It responds to nutrient availability (e.g., glucose, lactate) and host-derived signals (e.g., proteases, cytokines) to modulate growth and metabolic activity. The system operates via natural competitive exclusion and metabolic feedback, without synthetic logic circuits.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Type I and II secretion systems, lysis (for bacteriocin release), extracellular vesicles
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Controlled by natural growth dynamics and feed concentration; no synthetic dosage regulation reported
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with feed matrices; stable in dry feed formulations and co-cultured mixtures
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Produces bacteriocins and organic acids (e.g., lactic acid) that inhibit pathogenic bacteria; competes for adhesion sites and nutrients; disrupts biofilm formation by pathogens like Salmonella and Campylobacter.
E_A_agent_material (抗菌因子_相关物质): Bacteriocins, lactic acid, acetic acid, propionic acid
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): Probiotic Lactobacillus and Bacillus strains reduce Salmonella colonization and improve feed conversion ratio without causing tissue damage; no significant disruption of host microbiome reported.
E_B_crit_evidence (标准B_依据): No evidence of oxygenation function; not designed for hypoxia alleviation.
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Stimulates production of secretory IgA, antimicrobial peptides (AMPs), and cytokines; enhances T-cell and B-cell responses; modulates innate immunity via mucin layer integrity and defensin induction.
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): Secretory IgA, defensins, IL-1β, TNF-α, angiopoietin-4
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Promotes epithelial regeneration and barrier enhancement through SCFA production (especially butyrate), which fuels colonocytes and strengthens tight junctions; supports mucosal healing.
E_D_repair_material (修复因子_相关物质): Butyric acid, acetic acid, propionic acid
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Enhances biosynthesis of vitamins (B group, K), amino acids (glutamine, lysine), and secondary bile acids; improves feed conversion ratio (FCR) by increasing energy harvest from dietary fibers.
E_E_metabolite_material (代谢物_相关物质): Short-chain fatty acids (SCFAs), vitamin B12, vitamin K, glutamine, lysine
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Natural attenuation; no engineered kill switches or auxotrophy reported
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes reported in IGC of MCE-fed chickens; minimal risk of horizontal gene transfer; no evidence of environmental escape
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Physical confinement in feed and gut environment; no external release
B_risk_desc (风险描述): The microbial consortium consists of well-characterized, non-pathogenic strains (Lactobacillus, Bacillus, Bifidobacterium, Bacteroides, Akkermansia) with GRAS status. No engineered genes or antibiotic resistance markers are present. The system relies on natural competition and colonization, minimizing risks of unintended spread or ecological disruption.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): The co-cultured probiotic consortium significantly reduces colonization of Salmonella, Campylobacter, and E. coli in broiler chickens, improves feed conversion ratio (FCR) from 1.4 to 2.8, enhances weight gain, and supports gut barrier integrity. It promotes immune maturation and reduces reliance on sub-therapeutic antibiotics, offering a sustainable alternative for poultry production without compromising human health.

S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): FNR promoter, LasR receptor, AI-2 receptor (LuxPQ)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Threshold-based activation; no explicit logic gates reported; likely constitutive or weakly inducible responses

E_B_crit_evidence (标准B_依据): 未报告氧气生成或氧合功能。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Probiotics reduce pro-inflammatory cytokines (TNF-α, IL-1) and modulate immune cell activity via interaction with gut epithelium and dendritic cells.

B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Not applicable
