B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Capsule/sachet provides physical confinement; no live release into environment
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 所用菌株均为公认安全（GRAS）菌株，无致病性，未检测到耐药基因，未报告水平基因转移风险，且通过胶囊或粉剂形式摄入，具有物理屏障保护，整体生物安全风险极低。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): Meta分析显示，益生菌补充可显著提高总抗氧化能力（TAC）（WMD 77.30 μmol/L），降低丙二醛（MDA）水平（WMD -0.31 μmol/L），但对谷胱甘肽（GSH）无显著影响。提示益生菌可通过调节代谢产物（如短链脂肪酸）和免疫反应，改善氧化应激状态，可能对慢性疾病预防具有潜在益处。然而，研究间异质性较高，结果需谨慎解读。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Temperature: 38–42°C; pH: 5.5–7.0; Nutritional requirements: rich in amino acids and sugars (lactose, sucrose); Osmotic tolerance: moderate; Growth in milk-based substrates (cow, soy, coconut)
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time: ~6–9 hours (fermentation to pH 5.5); Growth rate in fermented soy/coconut milk ice cream: 1.29 log10 cfu/g (La-05), 1.2 log10 cfu/g (Bb-12); In vivo consistency: Not evaluated; In vitro growth supported by vegetable milk substrates
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gut (implied by probiotic function); Target niche: Intestinal tract
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): No direct competition/symbiosis data; Probiotic strains may modulate gut microbiota via metabolic activity and immune stimulation
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Freeze tolerance: Survives -20°C storage; Shear stress: Tolerated during homogenization and freezing; UV/drying: Not tested; Lyophilization: Not tested
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Soy and coconut milk proteins (gel-like network) provide physical protection during freezing
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Lactobacillus acidophilus La-05 和 Bifidobacterium bifidum Bb-12 在植物奶（大豆奶、椰奶）冰激凌中表现出比在牛乳冰激凌中更高的生长率。大豆奶和椰奶富含氨基酸和糖类（如乳糖和蔗糖），为益生菌提供了更丰富的生长基质。在冷冻条件下，这两种菌株均能有效存活并增殖，尤其在复合奶（75%大豆奶+25%椰奶）中表现出最佳生长性能。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Not applicable (no genetic modification reported)
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High (natural strains; no plasmid or integration reported; stable in ice cream matrix)
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in ice cream matrix with stabilizers (carrageenan, guar gum, cellulose gum); physical protection from protein network in soy/coconut milk
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 未对菌株进行基因改造。益生菌以天然状态使用，其生长和代谢能力依赖于基质中的营养成分（氨基酸和糖类）。在冰激凌中，菌株通过自然代谢活动实现增殖，无需人工调控电路。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): FNR promoter (inferred from pH-responsive growth), Lactose permease (for sugar uptake)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Constitutive expression; No reported logic gates or threshold control; Growth triggered by nutrient availability and pH drop
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 菌株通过感知基质中的乳糖和蔗糖浓度以及pH变化启动代谢活动。当pH降至5.5时，表明发酵完成，菌体进入稳定期。无外部诱导或复杂逻辑控制，为自然生长响应机制。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Lysis (inferred from natural release during growth and death in matrix)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Natural growth-dependent; No external control; Output strength proportional to substrate availability
E_material_match (材料匹配性): High compatibility with ice cream matrix; Stabilizers (carrageenan, guar gum) and protein network enhance retention and protection
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Lactobacillus acidophilus and Bifidobacterium bifidum produce lactic acid during fermentation, lowering pH and inhibiting pathogenic bacteria.
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 菌株在冰激凌中发酵产生乳酸，降低pH至5.5，抑制潜在病原体生长；未观察到过度酸化或基质破坏，且在-20°C下稳定，表明局部作用且安全。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): 益生菌通过调节肠道免疫系统，增强宿主免疫反应，可能通过分泌细胞因子或调节T细胞活性实现。
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): Cytokines (e.g., IL-10, IFN-γ) (inferred from probiotic function)
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): 益生菌代谢乳糖和蔗糖，产生短链脂肪酸（SCFAs）等代谢产物，调节宿主能量代谢和肠道健康。
E_E_metabolite_material (代谢物_相关物质): Short-chain fatty acids (SCFAs) (e.g., acetate, propionate) (inferred from lactic acid fermentation)
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (natural strains; no kill-switch or auxotrophy reported)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; No antibiotic resistance genes reported; No horizontal gene transfer risk; Environmental escape unlikely due to food vehicle and freezing
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Physical confinement by ice cream matrix and packaging; Freezing at -20°C reduces viability and limits environmental release
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Lactobacillus acidophilus La-05 和 Bifidobacterium bifidum Bb-12 均为公认安全（GRAS）菌株，广泛用于食品中。未进行基因改造，无生物安全风险。在冰激凌中冷冻储存可有效抑制其活性，防止环境释放。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在发酵植物奶冰激凌中，La-05 和 Bb-12 的活菌数显著高于牛乳冰激凌（p < 0.05）。其中，大豆奶冰激凌中 La-05 增长 1.29 log10 cfu/g，Bb-12 增长 1.2 log10 cfu/g；复合奶（75%大豆奶+25%椰奶）中 La-05 和 Bb-12 分别增长 1.55 和 1.07 log10 cfu/g。植物奶富含氨基酸和糖类，显著促进益生菌生长，表明其作为益生菌递送载体具有优异潜力。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Growth at 37°C, pH ~6.5–7.0, in milk-based medium with glucose and sucrose; requires lactose and other fermentable carbohydrates
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~1.5–2 hours in vitro; in vivo colonization likely sustained over 12-week period with daily intake
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gastrointestinal tract (colonization of gut mucosa, particularly in the small intestine and colon)
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of pathogens via binding site competition and nutrient competition; no significant disruption of native microbiota observed
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to lyophilization (stored at -18°C), refrigeration (4°C), and moderate gastric acidity; moderate tolerance to bile salts
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Bile salts (natural tolerance), lyophilization (stabilized by freeze-drying process)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该益生菌群由三种乳杆菌组成，均为兼性厌氧菌，可在37°C下在乳制品基质中生长。它们能耐受冷冻干燥和冷藏储存，具有一定的胃酸和胆汁耐受性，可在肠道黏膜定植，通过竞争性排斥机制抑制病原体定植。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Not specified (no genetic modification reported)
G_edit_efficiency (编辑效率): Not applicable (natural strains used, no editing)
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High (no plasmid loss or instability reported; strains maintained at ≥3×10⁶ CFU/mL after 28 days storage)
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in yogurt matrix; no significant loss of viability during fermentation and storage
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 该系统未进行基因工程改造，使用天然来源的乳杆菌菌株，通过常规发酵工艺制备成酸奶饮料，菌株在基质中保持稳定，无需外源遗传元件。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Natural metabolic sensors (e.g., sugar transporters, pH-responsive promoters in Lactobacillus)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Constitutive expression; no reported logic gates or threshold control
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 该系统依赖于天然代谢感应机制，如葡萄糖和乳糖的转运系统，以及对pH和胆汁酸的自然响应，无人工设计的逻辑门控或动态调控。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Natural secretion (via cell lysis or constitutive release of immunomodulatory molecules)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Daily oral intake (150 mL/day); controlled by consumption frequency and dose
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Highly compatible with yogurt matrix; stable during fermentation and refrigerated storage
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Not applicable (no direct antibacterial mechanism reported)
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 无
E_B_mechanism_desc (产氧机制描述): Not applicable (no oxygen-producing enzymes or systems reported)
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Stimulates Th1 immune response by increasing serum IFN-γ and fecal sIgA levels; enhances mucosal and systemic immunity without affecting Th2 cytokines (IL-4, IL-10) or IgA/IgG/IgM levels.
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Not applicable (no direct tissue repair or regeneration reported)
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Not applicable (no metabolic regulation via SCFAs or tryptophan metabolites reported)
E_F_mechanism_desc (肿瘤治疗描述): Not applicable (no tumor-targeting or prodrug conversion reported)
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (natural strains, no kill-switch or auxotrophy reported)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no horizontal gene transfer risk; minimal environmental escape risk due to lack of persistence outside host
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Yogurt matrix provides physical confinement; no engineered containment required
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 该益生菌群为公认安全（GRAS）菌株，未进行基因改造，无致病性、抗生素抗性或基因水平转移风险，且在体外环境中难以长期存活，安全性高。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 该益生菌组合显著降低了上呼吸道感染的发生率（p < 0.023），减少了发热性流感样症状（p < 0.034），并显著提高了血清IFN-γ水平（p < 0.001）和粪便sIgA水平（p < 0.001），表明其在增强宿主免疫系统方面具有显著疗效。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal temperature: 30–37°C; pH 5.5–6.5; tolerant to moderate salt and bile; grows on lactose, glucose, and other sugars
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~30–60 min in vitro; stable in vivo colonization in gut microbiota
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gut mucosal surface
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of pathogens; synergistic with host microbiota; minimal disruption to native flora
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to freeze-drying, lyophilization, and moderate shear stress; stable during storage at 4°C
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Trehalose, alginate, chitosan (used in encapsulation)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Lactococcus lactis 是一种革兰氏阳性、兼性厌氧、非产孢的球菌或短杆状细菌，广泛用于食品发酵。其在30–37°C、pH 5.5–6.5条件下生长良好，对乳糖、葡萄糖等碳源利用能力强，具有较强的耐酸和耐胆盐能力，可在肠道黏膜表面定植并维持稳定，是理想的益生菌底盘菌株。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Electroporation with self-replicating vectors, NICE system (nisin-induced expression)
G_edit_efficiency (编辑效率): High efficiency (>90% transformation); low off-target risk due to chromosomal integration and controlled promoter use
G_circuit_control (回路控制): Inducible (nisin), controlled expression via synthetic promoters
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High plasmid stability (pNICE vector); chromosomal integration reduces loss rate; low metabolic burden; evolutionarily stable in gut environment
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in alginate/chitosan microcapsules; maintains function during encapsulation and release
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 通过电穿孔将自复制质粒导入Lactococcus lactis，利用NICE（nisin诱导表达系统）实现基因的可控表达。该系统基于nisin诱导的启动子，可实现外源基因的精确调控，广泛用于维生素B族和低热量糖类的高效合成。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Lactose operon promoter, NICE promoter
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Constitutive baseline with inducible amplification; threshold-controlled by nisin concentration
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): Lactococcus lactis 通过乳糖操纵子启动子感知乳糖水平，同时利用NICE系统响应nisin诱导信号，实现基因表达的可编程控制。系统具有阈值响应特性，仅在达到一定nisin浓度时启动表达，避免非必要代谢负担，具备噪声抑制能力。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Type I secretion (for nisin), extracellular release of metabolites
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Controlled by nisin concentration; tunable via induction level
E_material_match (材料匹配性): High compatibility with alginate, chitosan, and carrageenan microcapsules; permeable to nutrients and metabolites
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Produces bacteriocins (e.g., nisin) and organic acids that disrupt pathogen membranes and lower pH
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): Nisin is GRAS-approved and selectively targets Gram-positive pathogens without harming host cells or beneficial microbiota; effective in food matrices and gut environment.
E_B_crit_evidence (标准B_依据): No oxygen-producing mechanism reported; not applicable.
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Cell wall components (peptidoglycans, teichoic acids) stimulate innate immunity and enhance mucosal barrier function
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Produces B vitamins (folate, riboflavin, cobalamin) and low-calorie sugars (mannitol, sorbitol) that regulate host metabolism
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Auxotrophy (e.g., requirement for specific amino acids), nisin-induced kill switch
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Non-pathogenic; no known antibiotic resistance genes; low risk of horizontal gene transfer; no environmental escape reported
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Microcapsule barrier (alginate/chitosan) prevents release into environment
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Lactococcus lactis 被广泛认为是GRAS级微生物，无致病性，不携带抗生素抗性基因，且通过微胶囊封装和诱导型自杀系统实现生物安全控制，可有效防止其在环境中的扩散，安全性高。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 通过代谢工程改造的Lactococcus lactis NIZO9000可高效合成叶酸、核黄素、维生素B12、甘露醇和山梨醇等营养素，显著提升食品的营养价值。其产生的乳酸和nisin可有效抑制沙门氏菌、李斯特菌等食源性病原体，延长食品保质期。在肠道中，该菌株可定植并调节免疫功能，增强黏膜屏障，改善肠道菌群平衡，对腹泻、炎症性肠病和免疫功能低下具有潜在治疗作用。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 6.99, in MRS broth under anaerobic conditions; requires peptone and skimmed milk for viability
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time not specified; viable cell count maintained at 1.24 × 10⁸ after lyophilization; sustained release over 6 h in vivo
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Intestinal tract (ileum), particularly in the context of probiotic supplementation for gut health
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Supplements intestinal flora; may compete with pathogenic bacteria; no direct interaction with other microbes reported
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): High tolerance to lyophilization and rehydration; protected by ovalbumin matrix and GMS coating; stable during gastric transit
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Ovalbumin-genipin crosslinked matrix, glyceryl monostereate (GMS) delayed-release coating
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Lactobacillus acidophilus ATCC 314 is a facultative anaerobe capable of surviving in simulated gastrointestinal conditions. It is lyophilized and encapsulated in a crosslinked ovalbumin matrix with a delayed-release GMS coating, enabling protection during gastric transit and controlled release in the intestine. The strain maintains viability and functionality over 6 hours post-administration, with maximum viability observed at 6 h in vivo.
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Not applicable (no genetic modification reported)
G_circuit_control (回路控制): Constitutive (no inducible or synthetic circuit reported)
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): N/A (no plasmid or chromosomal integration reported; natural strain used)
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): High stability within the ovalbumin-genipin matrix and GMS coating; no genetic drift or loss observed in formulation
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): The Lactobacillus acidophilus strain is used in its native form without genetic modification. The system relies on physical encapsulation and controlled release via a crosslinked ovalbumin matrix and a delayed-release GMS coating to protect the probiotic from antibiotic exposure and ensure timely intestinal delivery.
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Ovalbumin-genipin crosslinked matrix (structural response to pH and enzymatic environment)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No synthetic logic gates; release is triggered by pH shift (gastric to intestinal) and matrix degradation, functioning as a simple 'AND' gate: pH > 6.8 AND enzymatic exposure
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): The system uses a pH-responsive release mechanism. The gastro-resistant gelatin capsule protects the formulation in the acidic gastric environment (pH 1.2). Upon reaching the intestinal environment (pH 6.8), the capsule dissolves, and the GMS coating erodes, allowing controlled release of L. acidophilus. This is a passive, environment-triggered release without synthetic sensing circuits.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Passive release via matrix degradation and capsule dissolution; no active secretion systems reported
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Controlled by delayed-release coating (GMS) and matrix crosslinking; release profile follows Korsmeyer-Peppas model with predictable kinetics
E_material_match (材料匹配性): High compatibility with ovalbumin-genipin matrix and GMS coating; maintains structural integrity and controlled release
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): The system does not directly deliver antibacterial agents; instead, it protects probiotics from antibiotic destruction.
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 该系统不具有直接抗菌功能，而是通过延迟释放机制保护益生菌免受抗生素破坏，因此不满足抗菌模块的任何标准。
E_B_crit_evidence (标准B_依据): 系统中未涉及氧气生成或氧合机制，因此不满足氧合模块标准。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): No immunomodulatory factors secreted.
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Lactobacillus acidophilus restores intestinal flora, supports mucosal barrier integrity, and promotes gut homeostasis, contributing to tissue repair and prevention of antibiotic-associated diarrhea.
E_D_repair_material (修复因子_相关物质): Lactobacillus acidophilus (endogenous metabolites, surface proteins, and competitive exclusion)
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): No specific metabolic regulators reported.
E_F_mechanism_desc (肿瘤治疗描述): No tumor-targeting or prodrug conversion mechanism described.
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (natural strain, no kill-switch or auxotrophy reported)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; non-opportunistic; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no horizontal gene transfer risk; safe for human consumption
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Gastro-resistant gelatin capsule and crosslinked ovalbumin matrix provide physical confinement and protection
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Lactobacillus acidophilus ATCC 314 is a well-characterized, generally recognized as safe (GRAS) strain. It is not pathogenic, does not carry antibiotic resistance genes, and is not known to cause infections in immunocompromised individuals. The physical encapsulation ensures containment during transit, minimizing environmental escape risk.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在大白猪模型中，DBioS系统在口服给药后6小时达到最大Lactobacillus酸杆菌存活率（约455%基线），显著优于同时服用商业抗生素和益生菌产品组（存活率下降75%）。系统实现了96.9%的体外-体内相关性（Level A IVIVC），表明其释放行为可高度预测。益生菌在肠道中成功定植，CFU从基线120 CFU/ml上升至6小时的820 CFU/ml，有效预防了抗生素相关性腹泻。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 5.5–6.5; resistant to bile and gastric acid; utilizes glucose and other carbohydrates as carbon sources
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~1.5–2 hours in vitro; survives intestinal transit but does not permanently colonize in vivo
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Small intestine (duodenum, jejunum), particularly in the context of mucosal adherence
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competes with pathogens for adhesion sites; may modulate resident microbiota by producing lactic acid and bacteriocins
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Resistant to bile, low pH, and drying; stable during freeze-drying and rehydration
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Bile salts, gastric acid (HCl), lyophilization agents
C_growth_desc (生长描述): L. rhamnosus GG is a facultative anaerobe capable of surviving harsh gastrointestinal conditions. It grows optimally at 37°C and pH 5.5–6.5, with resistance to bile and gastric acid enabling it to reach the small intestine. It does not permanently colonize the gut but persists transiently, contributing to barrier function and immune modulation.
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Not explicitly mentioned; likely uses native plasmid systems or chromosomal integration
G_circuit_control (回路控制): Constitutive expression of beneficial factors (e.g., adhesion molecules, secreted proteins)
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): Stable in vivo for several days; no evidence of plasmid loss or significant drift; low metabolic burden
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): No specific material environment described; likely stable in oral formulations (milk, freeze-dried powder)
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): L. rhamnosus GG is used in its native form without genetic modification in most applications. Its beneficial effects are attributed to intrinsic properties such as adhesion, acid/bile resistance, and immune modulation. No recombinant engineering is described in this paper.
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Adhesins (e.g., p40, p75), bile salt hydrolases, pH-responsive promoters
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No complex logic gates reported; likely constitutive or environment-responsive (e.g., pH-dependent gene expression)
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): L. rhamnosus GG senses environmental cues such as low pH and bile salts via surface receptors and transporters, triggering adaptive responses like acid tolerance and bile resistance. It adheres to intestinal epithelium via specific adhesins, which may be regulated by host mucin and epithelial surface molecules. No synthetic genetic circuits or logic gates are described.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Constitutive secretion via general secretory pathway; no specialized secretion systems reported
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent effects; efficacy linked to viable cell count (10^10–10^11 CFU/ml)
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with oral formulations (milk, freeze-dried powder); stable in suspension and lyophilized forms
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Competitive exclusion of pathogens via adhesion to intestinal epithelium; production of lactic acid and bacteriocins inhibits pathogen growth
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): L. rhamnosus GG inhibits pathogen adhesion in vitro and reduces diarrhea duration in children with rotavirus infection. It does not cause excessive inflammation or tissue damage.
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Enhances secretory IgA production, promotes regulatory T-cell activity, modulates cytokine profiles (e.g., reduces TNF-α, increases TGF-β)
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): Secretory IgA, TGF-β, IL-10 (indirectly via host cell induction)
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Stabilizes intestinal barrier function by enhancing tight junction integrity and mucin expression; reduces intestinal permeability
E_D_repair_material (修复因子_相关物质): Mucin, tight junction proteins (e.g., occludin, ZO-1)
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): No engineered kill switches; relies on transient colonization and natural attenuation
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Non-pathogenic; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; low risk of horizontal gene transfer; no evidence of environmental escape
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Oral delivery limits systemic spread; gastrointestinal transit limits persistence
B_risk_desc (风险描述): L. rhamnosus GG is classified as GRAS (Generally Recognized As Safe). It is non-pathogenic, does not persist long-term, and has no known antibiotic resistance genes. Its transient nature and lack of genetic modification reduce biosafety risks.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): L. rhamnosus GG significantly shortens the duration of acute rotavirus diarrhea in children, reduces recurrence of C. difficile colitis, improves intestinal barrier function in experimental models, and enhances immune responses. It is effective in preventing antibiotic-associated diarrhea and improving symptoms in children with persistent diarrhea and food allergy.

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Temperature: 37°C; pH: Acid-tolerant (acid production in gut); Nutrition: Fermentable carbohydrates (lactose, glucose); Bile salt tolerance confirmed
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Growth rate: 24 hours at 37°C; Doubling time: ~1.5–2 hours; In vitro growth consistent with in vivo colonization potential
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Colon mucosa, particularly in the distal colon; associated with mucus layer and epithelial crypts
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of pathogenic bacteria; potential symbiosis with host microbiota; no reported antagonism
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to bile salts, low pH (gastric and intestinal), moderate osmotic stress; stable during lyophilization and rehydration
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Bile salts, low pH (HCl), lyophilization buffer
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该微生物系统由Lactobacillus acidophilus LaVK2和Bifidobacterium bifidum BbVK3组成，均为耐酸、耐胆盐的益生菌，可在37°C下生长，适合在肠道环境中定植。其生长周期约24小时，具有良好的胃肠道耐受性，可在酸性环境和胆盐存在下存活，且在冻干后仍保持活性，适合作为功能性食品载体。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Not applicable (natural strains, no genetic modification reported)
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High chromosomal stability; no plasmids reported; no evidence of genetic drift in long-term culture
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in fermented milk matrix (Dahi); no degradation or loss of viability during encapsulation
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 该系统未经过基因工程改造，使用的是天然分离的Lactobacillus acidophilus LaVK2和Bifidobacterium bifidum BbVK3菌株，通过共培养技术整合至Dahi中，保持其天然生理功能，无需外源调控元件。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Acid tolerance genes (e.g., F1F0-ATPase), bile salt hydrolase (BSH), hypoxia-responsive promoters (e.g., fnr-like)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Constitutive expression; no reported synthetic logic gates; response to environmental cues via native regulatory systems
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 该系统通过天然感知机制响应肠道环境中的低pH、胆盐和缺氧条件，利用酸耐受基因、胆盐水解酶及缺氧感应系统实现定植与功能表达，无需人工设计的逻辑门控，属于基础环境响应型系统。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Constitutive secretion of metabolites (SCFAs), enzymes (BSH, GST), and immunomodulatory factors
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent via dietary intake (20 g/day); no external control mechanism
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Highly compatible with Dahi matrix; stable during fermentation and storage; no structural disruption observed
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): N/A
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 未报告抗菌或抗生物膜功能
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): 调节免疫细胞功能，增强巨噬细胞和淋巴细胞活性，提升抗氧化状态，抑制炎症反应
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): Cytokines (e.g., IL-10, IFN-γ), antioxidant enzymes (SOD, catalase)
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): 促进黏膜屏障修复，减少MDF（黏液缺失灶）形成，增强上皮再生，调节Wnt/β-catenin通路，抑制异常增殖
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): 调节致癌物代谢：抑制肝中细胞色素P450激活酶，上调肝脏和结肠中解毒酶（如GST）；降低β-葡萄糖醛酸酶活性，减少DMH活化；促进短链脂肪酸（SCFA）生成
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Auxotrophy (no evidence of auxotrophy reported, but natural attenuation via gut environment)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Non-pathogenic; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; low risk of horizontal gene transfer; no environmental escape risk due to gut-restricted survival
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Physical confinement in fermented milk matrix (Dahi) prevents systemic dissemination
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 该系统由两种公认安全（GRAS）的益生菌组成，未经过基因改造，无致病性、无抗生素抗性基因，且在肠道环境中定植后无法长期存活于外界，具有天然生物安全屏障，结合Dahi基质的物理隔离，整体风险极低。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在DMH诱导的Wistar大鼠模型中，摄入含Lactobacillus acidophilus LaVK2和Bifidobacterium bifidum BbVK3的益生Dahi可显著减少异常隐窝灶（ACF）数量（32周时减少71.9%），降低黏液缺失灶（MDF）发生率（减少52.3%），并显著抑制PCNA增殖指数，效果优于单独使用吡罗昔康（PXC）。联合使用PXC与益生Dahi时，对ACF和MDF的抑制作用呈协同效应，表明该系统在结直肠癌早期预防中具有显著化学预防潜力。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Temperature: 37°C (in vitro and in vivo); pH: physiological (7.0–7.4); Nutritional requirements: Host cell machinery (no defined media); Osmotic tolerance: Compatible with intracellular environment
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Replication rate: High (typical of RNA viruses); Doubling time: Rapid (hours); In vivo vs in vitro: Similar replication levels in vitro and in vivo, but restricted spread in vivo
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gut (initial site of infection); restricted to original anatomical compartment (e.g., gut, muscle) due to reduced tropism
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): High genetic stability upon serial passage; Tolerant to lyophilization (implied by vaccine potential); UV/drying: Not reported
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该系统基于高保真度RNA聚合酶突变的脊髓灰质炎病毒，其在体外和体内均能高效复制，但因基因组多样性降低而丧失向中枢神经系统等远端组织扩散的能力。病毒在感染初始部位（如肠道或肌肉）持续存在，但无法跨组织传播，表现出显著的局限性。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Site-directed mutagenesis (all possible substitutions at polymerase position), RNAi-based assay for adaptive mutation detection
G_edit_efficiency (编辑效率): High: All possible substitutions at target site were generated; No off-target effects reported
G_circuit_control (回路控制): Constitutive (viral replication driven by native promoters)
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High: Stable upon serial passage; no reversion to wild-type phenotype; chromosomal integration not applicable (viral genome is RNA-based)
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable within host cellular environment; no reported degradation in tissue
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 通过定点突变改造脊髓灰质炎病毒RNA聚合酶，提高其复制保真度，从而降低病毒群体的序列多样性。该策略使病毒丧失跨组织传播能力，但保留免疫原性，实现安全有效的减毒。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Fidelity of RNA polymerase (e.g., L221I, S223T mutations)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No explicit logic gate; phenotype is a direct consequence of reduced sequence diversity
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 病毒的表型由RNA聚合酶保真度决定，而非响应外部信号。高保真度导致群体多样性下降，从而限制其在宿主体内的扩散能力，形成一种‘被动’的生物控制机制。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Viral lysis (natural release from infected cells)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Intrinsic: Replication level controlled by host cell availability and immune response; no external control
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with host tissue environment; no encapsulation material used
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Induces a persistent protective immune response (humoral and cellular) without causing disease.
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): Viral antigens (structural proteins: VP1, VP2, VP3, VP4)
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Genetic attenuation via high-fidelity polymerase mutation; restricted tropism prevents spread to CNS
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no evidence of reversion to virulence; limited shedding in feces; no antibiotic resistance genes; no horizontal gene transfer reported
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): None (no physical material barrier; relies on genetic containment)
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 该病毒因高保真度突变导致基因组多样性显著降低，无法在宿主体内扩散至致病部位，因此具有极高的安全性。虽存在潜在回复突变风险，但实验显示其在多次传代后仍保持稳定，且免疫缺陷小鼠模型中未见毒力恢复。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 该减毒疫苗在小鼠模型中诱导了持久的保护性免疫反应，病毒在感染部位（如肠道或肌肉）持续存在但不扩散，且在粪便中排泄量低于野生型，表明其具有良好的安全性和免疫原性，是潜在的理想活疫苗候选。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Temperature: 33°C (initial), gradually reduced to 24°C; pH: Not explicitly stated, but intestinal environment assumed; Osmotic: Not specified; Nutrition: Requires standard broiler feed components including corn, soybean meal, wheat, and supplements (vitamins, minerals, amino acids).
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Growth rate enhanced in starter and overall periods (ADG increased linearly, P < 0.05); no significant change in feed intake (ADFI).
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Intestinal tract (cecum, ileum, large intestine), excreta
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of pathogens (E. coli, Salmonella, C. perfringens); promotes Lactobacillus proliferation via anaerobic environment creation.
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): High tolerance to heat, pH extremes, and feed processing due to spore form; resistant to drying and storage.
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Spore-forming endospores
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Bacillus subtilis C-3102 spores are metabolically dormant and highly resilient to environmental stressors such as high and low temperatures, and extreme pH. Upon ingestion, they germinate in the intestine, consume oxygen, and create an anaerobic environment that favors the growth of beneficial lactobacilli while inhibiting pathogenic bacteria.
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): Bacillus subtilis C-3102 is used as a direct-fed microbial without genetic modification. Its probiotic effects are attributed to natural physiological traits, including spore formation, germination in the gut, and modulation of intestinal microflora.
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Germination triggers in response to intestinal conditions (e.g., nutrients, low oxygen)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No engineered logic gates; natural germination and growth response to intestinal environment.
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): Bacillus subtilis C-3102 spores remain dormant during feed processing and storage. Upon reaching the intestinal tract, they sense favorable conditions (nutrients, low oxygen) and germinate. This process is not genetically programmed with inducible circuits but relies on natural environmental sensing and metabolic activation.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Spore germination and natural secretion of enzymes (e.g., proteases, amylases) during growth.
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent effects observed (300 and 600 mg/kg feed); linear improvement in ADG, FCR, and microbial balance.
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Spores are stable in feed and survive processing; no adverse interaction with feed matrix.
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Reduces pathogenic bacteria (E. coli, Salmonella, C. perfringens) through competitive exclusion and creation of an anaerobic environment favoring lactobacilli.
E_A_agent_material (抗菌因子_相关物质): Lactic acid produced by Lactobacillus (indirect effect)
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): B. subtilis C-3102 significantly reduced E. coli, Salmonella, and C. perfringens counts in cecum, ileum, large intestine, and excreta without causing tissue damage or microbiome disruption. No cytotoxicity or immune activation observed.
E_B_crit_evidence (标准B_依据): Not applicable – no oxygenation mechanism reported.
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Improves nutrient digestibility (DM, GE) and reduces ammonia emission via modulation of intestinal microflora and metabolic activity.
E_E_metabolite_material (代谢物_相关物质): Lactic acid (indirectly via Lactobacillus), reduced ammonia (NH₃)
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (natural strain, no engineered kill switches)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no horizontal gene transfer risk; no environmental escape concerns due to lack of persistence in non-host environments.
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): None (spores are ingested and pass through the gut without confinement)
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Bacillus subtilis C-3102 is classified as GRAS (Generally Recognized As Safe) and has been used safely in animal feed since 1986. No adverse effects on blood profiles, organ weights, meat quality, or immune parameters were observed. No evidence of pathogenicity or microbiome disruption.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): Bacillus subtilis C-3102 supplementation significantly improved growth performance (increased ADG in starter and overall periods), feed conversion ratio (decreased FCR in grower-finisher and overall periods), nutrient digestibility (higher apparent total tract digestibility of dry matter and gross energy), and reduced ammonia emission in broilers. It effectively modulated intestinal microflora by increasing Lactobacillus and decreasing E. coli, Salmonella, and Clostridium perfringens counts, with no observed side effects.

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 6.5–7.0 (MRS medium), requires carbon sources (glucose, lactose), amino acids, vitamins (B complex), and growth factors; dependent on host metabolites in GI tract.
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Growth rate: ~24 hours to reach stationary phase in MRS broth; doubling time ~60–90 minutes in vitro; in vivo homeostasis not explicitly reported but inferred from GI survival.
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gastrointestinal tract (small intestine, colon); prefers mucosal surface and nutrient-rich environments.
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of pathogens; potential symbiosis with commensal microbiota; no direct evidence of antagonism or cooperation with other strains.
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Moderate tolerance to osmotic stress, bile salts (in vitro), and low pH; enhanced tolerance via encapsulation.
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Sodium alginate and carrageenan hydrogel matrices
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Lactobacillus acidophilus ATCC-4356 is a facultative anaerobe that grows optimally at 37°C in MRS medium. It requires complex nutrients including carbohydrates, amino acids, and vitamins. The strain exhibits moderate intrinsic resistance to acidic and bile conditions but shows significantly improved survival under simulated gastrointestinal and thermal stress when encapsulated in sodium alginate or carrageenan hydrogels.
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): No genetic modifications were performed. The strain was used in its native form; all functional improvements were achieved through physical encapsulation in hydrogel matrices without genetic engineering.
S_physiochemical_signals (理化信号): ["Low pH (gastric conditions)", "High pH (intestinal conditions)", "Bile salts", "Thermal stress (65°C)"]
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Native membrane transporters and stress response systems (e.g., acid tolerance response, bile efflux pumps)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No engineered logic gates; natural physiological responses to environmental cues (e.g., acid resistance, bile tolerance).
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): L. acidophilus naturally senses and responds to changes in pH, bile salts, and temperature through intrinsic regulatory systems. It activates acid tolerance mechanisms in low pH environments and bile efflux pumps in intestinal conditions. These responses are not programmable but are inherent to the strain’s physiology.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Passive diffusion and cell lysis (natural release from encapsulated beads)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Controlled by encapsulation matrix degradation rate and release kinetics; no external control mechanism.
E_material_match (材料匹配性): High compatibility with sodium alginate and carrageenan matrices; maintains structural integrity and allows gradual release of viable cells.
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Produces lactic acid and bacteriocins that inhibit pathogenic bacteria in the gut; enhances gut barrier function.
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): Encapsulation protects L. acidophilus from gastric acid and bile, enabling sustained delivery to the intestine where it exerts antibacterial effects via lactic acid and bacteriocin production. No evidence of excessive activity or tissue damage.
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Modulates immune responses by stimulating dendritic cells and macrophages, promoting anti-inflammatory cytokine production (e.g., IL-10), and enhancing IgA secretion.
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): Cell wall components (peptidoglycan, teichoic acids), exopolysaccharides
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Produces short-chain fatty acids (SCFAs) such as acetate and lactate, which regulate host metabolism, energy homeostasis, and gut barrier integrity.
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (native strain, no engineered kill switches)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Non-pathogenic; no known virulence factors; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; low risk of horizontal gene transfer; GRAS status.
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Hydrogel matrix (sodium alginate/carrageenan) provides physical confinement and limits environmental escape.
B_risk_desc (风险描述): L. acidophilus ATCC-4356 is a well-characterized, non-pathogenic, GRAS strain with no known risks of infection or antibiotic resistance. Encapsulation further reduces the risk of environmental release. No biocontainment systems were used, but the physical barrier of the hydrogel matrix provides sufficient safety for use in food and supplements.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): Encapsulation significantly enhanced the survival of L. acidophilus under simulated gastrointestinal conditions (from 3.11 log cfu/g to 6.26 log cfu/g in gastric juice and 2.85 log cfu/g to 6.84 log cfu/g in intestinal juice) and under thermal stress (65°C for 45 minutes). Viability remained above 10⁶ cfu/g after 15 days of refrigeration, meeting the recommended threshold for probiotic efficacy. The hydrogel matrices (sodium alginate and carrageenan) provided effective protection, ensuring target delivery and sustained functionality in the gut.

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 30–37°C, pH 6.0–7.0; thrives in dairy environments and intestinal tract; requires thymine for growth in vitro
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Moderate growth rate; doubling time ~60–90 min in vitro; survives in gut but does not colonize long-term in vivo
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gut mucosa (large intestine), transient presence
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Non-colonizing; minimal competition with native microbiota; probiotic-like interaction without persistent colonization
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to gastric acidity and bile salts; sensitive to thymine depletion and environmental stressors outside host
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Thymidylate synthase (thyA) gene deletion renders strain vulnerable to thymineless death
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该工程菌为乳酸乳球菌（Lactococcus lactis），属于兼性厌氧菌，可在30–37°C、pH 6.0–7.0条件下生长，具有良好的胃酸和胆汁耐受性，能存活于肠道黏膜但不长期定植。其生长依赖于胸腺嘧啶，一旦脱离宿主环境（缺乏胸腺嘧啶），将因胸腺嘧啶缺乏死亡，从而限制其在环境中的存活能力。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Chromosomal integration via homologous recombination; thyA gene replaced with hIL-10 gene
G_edit_efficiency (编辑效率): High efficiency due to targeted integration; no off-target risk reported
G_circuit_control (回路控制): Constitutive (hIL-10 expression driven by native promoter)
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High chromosomal stability; no plasmid-based vectors; deletion of thyA prevents reversion; no antibiotic resistance genes
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in gastrointestinal environment; no degradation due to material interactions
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 通过将人源白细胞介素10（hIL-10）基因插入乳酸乳球菌的胸苷酸合成酶（thyA）基因位点，实现基因组稳定整合。该策略避免使用质粒、抗生素抗性基因或载体序列，确保遗传元件无法通过水平基因转移传播。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): None (no engineered sensing module)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): None (no logic circuitry)
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 该系统未设计任何响应环境信号的传感模块，其hIL-10表达为组成型，不依赖外部信号触发。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Constitutive secretion via general secretory pathway
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Constitutive; dosage determined by bacterial load and persistence in gut
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with gastrointestinal mucosal delivery; no structural disruption reported
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): 无抗菌功能
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 无抗菌相关描述
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): 工程菌在肠道内持续分泌人源白细胞介素10（hIL-10），调节免疫反应，减轻炎症，适用于炎症性肠病（IBD）治疗。
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): 无组织修复功能
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): 无代谢调控功能
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Auxotrophy (thyA gene deletion); thymine dependence; suicide via thymineless death
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes; no horizontal gene transfer risk due to absence of vector sequences; reversion to wild-type phenotype would result in loss of hIL-10 gene
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Physical confinement via host gut environment; no environmental persistence
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 该工程菌因thyA基因缺失而无法在无胸腺嘧啶的环境中生存，且即使通过同源重组恢复thyA基因，也会同时丢失hIL-10基因，因此无法恢复为功能型转基因菌。该设计极大降低了环境逃逸和基因水平转移的风险，符合GRAS（公认安全）标准。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在猪模型中成功实现肠道内治疗性IL-10的递送，表明其在炎症性肠病（IBD）治疗中具有潜力。该系统在人体临床试验前已通过动物实验验证其安全性和有效性，为未来人类应用提供了坚实基础。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 6.5–7.0, tolerance to bile salts and gastric acidity; requires glucose and amino acids as carbon and nitrogen sources.
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~1.5–2 hours in vitro; in vivo colonization observed after daily oral intake over 60 days.
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gastrointestinal tract (small intestine and colon), particularly in mucosal layers and crypts.
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Symbiotic with host microbiota; competes with pathogenic bacteria for adhesion sites and nutrients; enhances microbial diversity.
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): High tolerance to freeze-drying, rehydration, and storage at room temperature for up to 12 months; resistant to moderate shear stress and gastric acid.
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Freeze-dried formulation with maize starch and maltodextrin as stabilizers
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该混合益生菌由五种冻干菌株组成，均为兼性厌氧菌，可在人体肠道环境中定植并维持稳定生长。其最佳生长温度为37°C，pH值范围为6.5–7.0，对胃酸和胆汁具有较强耐受性，能利用葡萄糖和氨基酸作为碳氮源。在体外培养中，倍增时间为1.5–2小时；在体内经每日口服60天后可实现稳定定植。主要定植于小肠和结肠黏膜层及隐窝区域，与宿主肠道菌群呈共生关系，通过竞争性抑制病原菌定植，促进肠道菌群多样性。冻干制剂在室温下可稳定保存12个月，对剪切力和胃酸具有较强耐受性。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): None (natural strains, no genetic modification reported)
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High chromosomal stability; no plasmids reported; no evidence of genetic drift or loss of viability during 60-day supplementation.
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in freeze-dried sachet formulation with maize starch and maltodextrin; no degradation during storage or rehydration.
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 本研究中使用的益生菌为天然菌株，未进行任何基因工程改造。各菌株均以天然形式存在，通过其固有代谢和定植能力发挥功能。在冻干制剂中保持稳定，无质粒或外源基因，遗传稳定性高，长期口服未见功能丧失或变异。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): FNR promoter (hypoxia), Lactate permease (LacY), Bile acid receptors (BaiR), Quorum sensing receptors (LuxR-type)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): AND gate: requires both low pH and presence of lactate for optimal colonization; threshold-based activation of immune modulation pathways.
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 该益生菌混合系统通过多种传感器感知肠道微环境信号，包括pH值、乳酸、胆汁酸和短链脂肪酸。在低pH和乳酸存在条件下，通过FNR启动子和LacY转运蛋白协同激活定植相关基因。同时，通过LuxR型受体感知群体感应分子（AHL），实现菌群间通讯。在宿主免疫信号（如TNF-α、IL-6）存在时，触发免疫调节通路，形成AND逻辑门控，确保仅在炎症微环境中激活功能，避免非特异性反应。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): None (natural secretion of metabolites and immune modulators)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent effect via daily oral intake (10^9 CFU/g per strain); no external control mechanism.
E_material_match (材料匹配性): High compatibility with freeze-dried sachet formulation; stable during encapsulation and rehydration.
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Not applicable
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 未报告抗菌或抗生物膜功能。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Modulates immune response by promoting regulatory T cell (Treg) differentiation, increasing IL-10 production, and suppressing pro-inflammatory cytokines (TNF-α, IL-6).
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Not applicable
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Enhances production of short-chain fatty acids (SCFAs) such as butyrate and acetate, which regulate host metabolism and immune function.
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (natural strains, no kill-switch or auxotrophy reported)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no evidence of horizontal gene transfer; no environmental escape risk due to natural attenuation.
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Physical confinement via oral ingestion and intestinal mucosal barrier; no systemic dissemination observed.
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 所用五种益生菌均为公认安全（GRAS）菌株，未进行基因改造，无致病性、无抗生素抗性基因，无水平基因转移风险。在口服后主要定植于肠道，通过天然屏障限制其扩散，无环境逃逸风险。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 该混合益生菌在60天干预后显著降低RA患者血浆中TNF-α（p=0.004）和IL-6（p=0.039）水平，减少硝酸盐/亚硝酸盐（NOx）代谢物（p=0.004），并提高血浆总抗氧化能力（TRAP，p=0.019）和蛋白质巯基（SH，p=0.028）水平。但对DAS 28评分、CRP、ESR、脂质过氧化物（LOOH）和蛋白质羰基（PC）无显著影响。表明其在调节炎症和氧化/硝化应激方面具有部分疗效，但未显著改善临床疾病活动度。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): 37°C, pH 7.0, in general probiotic culture broth with 1% glucose or 20 mM phosphate buffer
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Optimal growth at OD600 0.8–1.0, cultured for 24 hours at 37°C
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gut mucosa, particularly colon and intestinal lumen
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Restores gut microbiota balance by increasing Bacteroidetes and Actinobacteria, reducing Proteobacteria
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to centrifugation (10,000 × g, 20 min), saline washing, and storage in glucose/phosphate buffer
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): 1% glucose, 20 mM phosphate buffer (pH 7.0)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Bifidobacterium longum IM55 和 Lactobacillus plantarum IM76 均为从人粪便和泡菜中分离的益生菌，可在37°C、pH 7.0条件下在通用培养基中生长，通过离心和缓冲液洗涤后用于体内实验，具有良好的肠道定植潜力和环境适应性。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Not specified
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): Not specified
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Not specified
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 文中未提及对菌株进行基因改造，所有功能均基于天然菌株的生理特性，未使用CRISPR、质粒或诱导系统等工程化工具。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Not specified
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Not specified
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 未明确描述传感逻辑，但通过调节Th2/Treg平衡和免疫细胞浸润，表现出对炎症微环境的响应性调节能力。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Not specified
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Oral administration at 1×10⁹ CFU/mouse/day for 5 days
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with oral suspension delivery; no encapsulation mentioned
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Not applicable
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 未涉及抗菌或抗生物膜功能。
E_B_crit_evidence (标准B_依据): 未涉及氧气生成或氧合功能。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): 通过抑制Th2细胞分化、促进Treg细胞分化，调节IL-4、IL-5、IL-10等细胞因子表达，恢复Th2/Treg平衡，减轻过敏性鼻炎症状。
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): 通过抑制鼻腔和肺部上皮细胞的破坏与水肿，促进组织结构修复，改善炎症性损伤。
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): 通过调节肠道菌群组成（增加Bacteroidetes、Actinobacteria，减少Proteobacteria），恢复肠道代谢稳态，间接调控宿主免疫代谢。
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Not applicable
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): No pathogenicity reported; no antibiotic resistance genes mentioned; low risk of horizontal gene transfer; no environmental escape reported.
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Oral administration with natural gut colonization; no physical barrier used.
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Bifidobacterium longum IM55 和 Lactobacillus plantarum IM76 均为公认安全（GRAS）的益生菌，未发现致病性、抗生素抗性基因或水平基因转移风险，口服给药后在肠道定植，安全性高。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): IM55、IM76及二者混合物（PM）显著减轻了OVA诱导的小鼠过敏性鼻炎症状，包括打喷嚏、鼻搔抓次数减少；降低鼻腔和血清中IgE、IgG1、IL-4、IL-5水平；抑制嗜酸性粒细胞、肥大细胞和Th2细胞浸润，增加Treg细胞数量；恢复Th2/Treg平衡；改善肺部和鼻腔组织病理损伤；调节肠道菌群结构，恢复Bacteroidetes和Actinobacteria丰度，抑制Proteobacteria过度增殖。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 6.0–7.0, requires carbohydrates (e.g., lactose) as carbon source; tolerates mild bile acid exposure in the small intestine
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~1–2 hours in vitro; in vivo colonization is transient and dependent on dietary substrate availability
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Small and large intestine (luminal surface of mucosa, particularly colon)
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of pathogenic bacteria; potential symbiosis with host immune system via modulation of mucosal immunity
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Moderate tolerance to gastric acid and bile; limited survival under drying or UV stress; stable during refrigerated storage
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Cell wall components (e.g., teichoic acids), extracellular polysaccharides
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该微生物系统为乳酸菌类（如乳杆菌属和双歧杆菌属），属于兼性厌氧菌，适宜在37°C、pH 6.0–7.0的环境中生长，依赖乳糖等碳源。在肠道中可定植于小肠和大肠黏膜表面，具有一定的耐酸耐胆盐能力，但长期定植能力有限，主要依赖饮食中乳糖供给维持活性。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Not specified
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): Not specified
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Not specified
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 文中未提及对所用益生菌进行基因改造，其功能主要依赖于天然代谢特性，如乳糖发酵能力。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Lactose permease (LacS), Lactase (β-galactosidase)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Constitutive expression of lactose metabolism genes upon lactose presence; threshold-based induction via Lac operon-like regulation
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 益生菌通过乳糖转运蛋白（LacS）感知乳糖存在，并启动β-半乳糖苷酶表达，实现乳糖代谢的自适应调控。该系统具有阈值响应特性，仅在乳糖浓度达到一定水平时激活，避免无效代谢消耗。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Passive diffusion, extracellular release
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent effect; efficacy influenced by daily intake amount and duration
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with oral delivery; limited stability in gastrointestinal tract due to gastric acid and bile
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Modulates mucosal immune responses by interacting with dendritic cells and regulatory T cells, reducing pro-inflammatory cytokine production.
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): Secreted metabolites (e.g., SCFAs), surface proteins (e.g., p40, p75)
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Metabolizes lactose into lactic acid, improving lactose digestion and reducing symptoms of lactose maldigestion.
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (natural strains, no engineered kill switches)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; minimal risk of horizontal gene transfer; no evidence of environmental escape
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Gastrointestinal tract mucosal barrier provides physical confinement
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 所用益生菌为公认安全（GRAS）菌株，无基因工程改造，不携带耐药基因，无致病性，且在肠道内定植为短暂性，不会长期滞留，因此生物安全风险极低。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在一项针对10名乳糖不耐受成人的小型研究中，每日摄入1g或4g商业益生菌混合物17天后，对乳糖呼气氢试验结果无显著改善，提示其在缓解乳糖消化不良方面效果有限。然而，研究者指出该研究样本量小，可能存在II型统计误差，且未设安慰剂对照组，因此不能完全排除益生菌潜在作用。未来研究需结合更敏感的指标（如粪便β-半乳糖苷酶活性）评估其定植与代谢功能。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Temperature: 30°C; pH: 5.7–7.8; Salinity: up to 7% NaCl; Carbon sources: glucose, xylose, arabinose, mannitol; Growth on TSB with 1.5% NaCl
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Growth rate: Not explicitly quantified; Doubling time: Not provided; In vitro growth confirmed at 30°C under aerobic conditions
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gastrointestinal tract of healthy white shrimp (Litopenaeus vannamei)
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of pathogens (e.g., Vibrio harveyi, Aeromonas spp.) via antimicrobial activity; no direct evidence of symbiosis or colonization persistence beyond dietary supplementation
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Heat stable (80°C for 10 min); Spore-forming (resistant to drying, UV, and environmental stress); Tolerant to 7% NaCl and pH 5.7
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Spores
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该菌株为芽孢杆菌，具有良好的耐热性（80°C 10分钟）和耐盐性（7% NaCl），可在30°C、pH 5.7–7.8条件下生长，属于兼性厌氧菌，能形成芽孢，具有较强的环境适应能力，适合在水产养殖饲料中作为益生菌使用。
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 该研究未对菌株S12进行基因改造，其益生功能源于天然的抗菌活性和免疫调节能力，未使用任何遗传工具或合成回路。
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 该研究未涉及微生物对环境信号的感知或逻辑控制机制，未构建任何传感模块。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Secretion via general secretion pathway (likely Type I or non-classical secretion); no evidence of lysis or vesicle release
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent immune enhancement; optimal dose at 5×10¹⁰ cfu/kg diet
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with feed matrix; stable during pelleting and storage at -20°C
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): 通过分泌抗菌物质抑制多种水产病原菌的生长，包括革兰氏阴性菌（如Vibrio harveyi、Aeromonas spp.）和部分革兰氏阳性菌。
E_A_agent_material (抗菌因子_相关物质): Antimicrobial compounds (e.g., subtilin, bacitracin, other bacteriocins)
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 该菌株对9种常见水产病原菌（包括Vibrio harveyi、Aeromonas hydrophila等）均表现出显著抑制作用，抑制圈直径达13.9–30.5 mm，且在饲料中添加后未观察到对宿主的毒性或微生物群落失衡，表明其具有良好的安全性和可控性。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): 通过增强宿主非特异性免疫反应，提高血细胞数量（THC）、吞噬率、溶菌酶（LZ）、超氧化物歧化酶（SOD）和抗菌活性，从而提升对病原体的抵抗力。
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): Immune-stimulating metabolites (e.g., EPS, peptidoglycan fragments, secreted enzymes)
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (natural strain, no synthetic kill switches or auxotrophy reported)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no horizontal gene transfer risk mentioned; environmental escape unlikely due to non-native habitat and lack of persistence data
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Feed matrix provides physical confinement; no encapsulation or barrier system used
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Bacillus subtilis S12为从健康对虾肠道分离的天然菌株，具有GRAS（公认安全）地位，未进行基因改造，无抗生素抗性基因，不具致病性，且在养殖环境中无长期定植能力，风险极低。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在8周喂养试验中，添加5×10¹⁰ cfu/kg饲料的S12组（PS2）对Vibrio harveyi感染的相对保护率（RPS）达到51.9%，与抗生素组（47.9%）无显著差异，且显著高于对照组（83.3%死亡率），表明其具有与抗生素相当的疾病抵抗力。同时，该菌株显著提高虾体免疫指标（如SOD、溶菌酶、抗菌活性），并降低体脂含量，促进健康生长。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 6.0–7.0; tolerant to bile salts and gastric acidity; utilizes glucose and lactose as carbon sources; requires vitamins and amino acids for growth.
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~1–2 hours in vitro; in vivo colonization is transient and limited to the gastrointestinal tract; no sustained in vivo growth observed.
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gastrointestinal tract (small and large intestine); preferentially colonizes mucosal surfaces and gut lumen.
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of pathogenic bacteria; minor symbiotic interactions with resident microbiota; no significant disruption of core microbiome composition reported.
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Moderate tolerance to drying and lyophilization; sensitive to high temperatures (>50°C) and UV radiation; stable during storage at 4°C for up to 12 months.
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Capsule or powder formulation provides protection against gastric acid and bile.
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 这些益生菌均为革兰氏阳性、兼性厌氧菌，可在人体肠道环境中定植，但定植能力有限且多为暂时性。它们对胃酸和胆汁具有一定的耐受性，可在肠道内利用葡萄糖和乳糖等碳源生长，但对营养需求较高，需依赖宿主提供的维生素和氨基酸。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): None reported
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): Chromosomal integration not reported; plasmid-based systems not used; no evidence of genetic drift or instability in clinical trials.
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): No genetic modifications; stability in delivery matrices (capsules, powders) is maintained via physical protection.
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 所有研究中使用的益生菌均为天然菌株，未经过基因工程改造。其功能依赖于天然代谢通路和宿主-微生物互作，无外源基因插入或调控回路设计。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): FNR promoter, Lactate receptor, Bile acid transporter, Quorum sensing receptors (e.g., LasR, LuxR)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No engineered logic gates; natural sensing via receptor-ligand binding with threshold responses; no noise filtering or signal amplification reported.
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 这些益生菌通过天然受体感知肠道内的pH、胆汁酸、乳酸等理化信号，以及宿主免疫因子和微生物群落信号。其响应为非编程性、基础性的生理反应，无人工设计的逻辑门控或动态调节机制。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Type IV secretion system, Lysis, Vesicles
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent effects observed; no precise control over output strength.
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with capsule, powder, and sachet delivery systems; no structural disruption reported.
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): No direct antibacterial or biofilm inhibition mechanisms reported.
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 未报告任何抗菌或抗生物膜活性。
E_B_mechanism_desc (产氧机制描述): No oxygen-producing enzymes or mechanisms reported.
E_B_crit_evidence (标准B_依据): 未发现任何产氧机制，不适用于缺氧环境治疗。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): 通过调节T细胞亚群、NK细胞活性、细胞因子平衡（如IL-10升高、IL-12/IL-10比值下降）实现免疫调节，增强抗炎反应。
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): IL-10, IL-12, TNF-α, IFN-γ, IgG, CD4+/CD8+ T cells, NK cells
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): 未报告促进血管生成、上皮再生或基质重塑的直接机制。
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): 通过调节短链脂肪酸（SCFAs）产生、色氨酸代谢及葡萄糖稳态影响宿主代谢功能。
E_E_metabolite_material (代谢物_相关物质): SCFAs (acetate, propionate, butyrate), Tryptophan metabolites, Glucose
E_F_mechanism_desc (肿瘤治疗描述): 未涉及肿瘤免疫激活、前药转化或原位毒素激活。
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None reported
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no evidence of horizontal gene transfer; low risk of environmental escape.
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Capsule and powder formulations provide physical containment.
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 所有研究中使用的益生菌均为公认安全（GRAS）菌株，无致病性记录，未检测到耐药基因，且在人体内定植短暂，无长期生态风险。物理封装形式进一步增强了生物安全性。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在健康成年人中，口服益生菌补充剂对循环免疫和炎症标志物的影响有限。尽管部分研究显示对NK细胞、T细胞亚群、IL-10和CRP等指标有显著调节作用，但整体证据异质性强，难以汇总，且多数研究未观察到一致的临床效应。

spatial_arrangement (空间排布): Encapsulated (in maternal gut and breast milk)
C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 5.5–6.5; utilizes lactose, glucose, and other carbohydrates; dependent on host-derived nutrients in gut environment
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~1–2 hours in vitro; stable colonization in infant gut over first year of life
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gut mucosa, particularly in breastfed infants; preferentially colonizes the small intestine and colon
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of pathogenic bacteria (e.g., S. aureus); promotes symbiosis with host immune system; enhances Bifidobacterium dominance
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to gastric acidity, bile salts, and moderate osmotic stress; stable during lyophilization and rehydration
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Cell wall components (e.g., teichoic acids), extracellular polysaccharides
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Lactobacillus rhamnosus GG and Bifidobacterium lactis are facultative anaerobes that thrive in the infant gut environment, utilizing host-derived oligosaccharides and dietary substrates. They exhibit strong colonization ability in the neonatal gut, especially in breastfed infants, and maintain stability under physiological stress conditions such as low pH and bile exposure. Their growth is supported by maternal milk components, particularly human milk oligosaccharides (HMOs), which selectively promote Bifidobacterium expansion.
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): None explicitly mentioned; natural strains used without genetic modification
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High chromosomal stability; no plasmid-based systems reported; low metabolic burden; long-term persistence in infant gut
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in breast milk and intestinal mucus; no reported degradation in maternal or infant gut environment
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): The strains are used in their natural form without genetic modification. Their beneficial effects stem from intrinsic physiological properties, including adhesion to intestinal epithelium, production of antimicrobial compounds, and modulation of host immune responses. No synthetic circuits or inducible systems are employed.
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): FNR-like regulators (in LGG), HMO transporters (in Bifidobacterium), TLR-2/4 signaling pathways
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Threshold-based activation of immune tolerance and metabolic regulation; no synthetic logic gates reported
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): The strains sense host-derived signals such as HMOs and SCFAs, which trigger metabolic and immune responses. They respond to changes in gut pH and bile levels, enabling adaptation to the intestinal environment. Their interaction with host immune cells involves recognition of microbial patterns via TLRs, leading to anti-inflammatory cytokine production. The system operates through natural sensing mechanisms without engineered logic circuits.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Type I secretion (lactic acid), extracellular vesicles, passive diffusion
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Natural regulation via host diet and microbial competition; no external dosage control
E_material_match (材料匹配性): High compatibility with breast milk and intestinal mucus; stable during encapsulation in maternal gut and infant gut
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Inhibit pathogenic bacteria (e.g., S. aureus) via competitive exclusion, production of lactic acid, and bacteriocins
E_A_agent_material (抗菌因子_相关物质): Lactic acid, bacteriocins (e.g., lactocin 705), hydrogen peroxide
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): LGG and Bifidobacterium lactis reduce S. aureus colonization in infants; no significant disruption of gut barrier or microbiome diversity observed in clinical trials.
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Induce tolerogenic immune responses via TLR modulation, increase IgA production, and promote anti-inflammatory cytokine release (e.g., IL-10, TGF-β)
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): Toll-like receptor (TLR) ligands, secreted immunomodulatory proteins
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Enhance gut barrier integrity by upregulating tight junction proteins (e.g., occludin, ZO-1); promote mucus layer formation
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Modulate host metabolism by producing SCFAs (acetate, propionate), improving insulin sensitivity, and reducing adiposity
E_E_metabolite_material (代谢物_相关物质): Short-chain fatty acids (SCFAs), particularly acetate and propionate
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Auxotrophy (nutrient-dependent survival), natural attenuation in non-host environments
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no evidence of horizontal gene transfer; minimal environmental escape risk
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Breast milk and intestinal mucus provide physical confinement; limited survival outside host
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Lactobacillus rhamnosus GG and Bifidobacterium lactis are well-established probiotics with GRAS status. They are non-pathogenic, do not colonize long-term in non-host environments, and are naturally attenuated. No safety concerns were reported in clinical trials involving pregnant women and infants. Their presence in breast milk and infant gut is transient and dependent on host-derived nutrients.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): Perinatal administration of LGG and Bifidobacterium lactis improved maternal insulin sensitivity and reduced central adiposity postpartum. Infants of supplemented mothers showed increased bifidobacterial diversity, reduced S. aureus colonization, and lower risk of overweight development by age 7. The intervention also reduced the incidence of gestational diabetes and fetal overgrowth. These findings suggest a significant role in preventing early-life metabolic programming toward obesity.

C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该益生菌混合物为兼性厌氧菌，可在37°C、pH 5.5–6.5条件下生长，以葡萄糖和半乳糖为碳源。在婴儿配方中添加半乳寡糖可促进其定植。在6个月龄时可在粪便中检测到，但2岁后定植率下降。对胃酸、胆盐和冻干处理具有较强耐受性，适合口服给药。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): None reported (natural strains used without genetic modification)
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High chromosomal stability; No plasmids used; No evidence of genetic drift or loss of function over 13-year follow-up
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in capsule and syrup formulation; No degradation observed during storage or in gastrointestinal environment
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 未对菌株进行基因改造，使用天然存在的益生菌株。所有菌株均通过冻干技术封装，确保在储存和运输过程中的稳定性。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): FNR promoter (hypoxia sensing), Lactate dehydrogenase (lactate sensing), Bile acid transporters (bile sensing)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Constitutive expression; No reported synthetic logic circuits; Sensing is passive and based on natural metabolic responses
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 各菌株通过其天然代谢通路感知环境信号（如pH、胆汁酸、乳酸和半乳寡糖），并持续表达免疫调节相关因子。未使用人工调控回路，无逻辑门控机制。

E_material_match (材料匹配性): High compatibility with freeze-dried capsule and syrup formulation; No structural disruption observed
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Not applicable
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 未报告抗菌或抗生物膜活性。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Modulates Th1/Th2 balance; Reduces IgE-mediated sensitization; Enhances regulatory T cell activity; Suppresses pro-inflammatory cytokines (e.g., IL-4, IL-5, IL-13)
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): Lactobacillus rhamnosus GG (GG) surface proteins, Bifidobacterium breve Bb99 exopolysaccharides, Propionibacterium freudenreichii metabolites
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Promotes epithelial barrier integrity; Reduces skin inflammation; Improves SCORAD scores in eczema; Enhances mucosal healing in gut and skin
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Produces SCFAs (acetate, propionate) from dietary fiber; Modulates host glucose and lipid metabolism; Influences tryptophan metabolism via AhR pathway
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Auxotrophy (galacto-oligosaccharide dependency)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; No antibiotic resistance genes reported; No horizontal gene transfer observed; Low risk of environmental escape; No adverse events reported in 13-year follow-up
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Physical encapsulation in capsule and syrup prevents environmental release
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 所有菌株均为公认安全（GRAS）菌株，无致病性或耐药基因。依赖半乳寡糖生长，可在肠道外环境中失活。胶囊和口服制剂提供物理屏障，防止逃逸。13年随访中未发现严重不良反应。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在剖宫产子代中，益生菌干预组13岁时过敏性疾病（ISAAC问卷）发生率显著降低（41.5% vs. 67.9%，p=0.006），特应性皮炎发生率也显著降低（18.9% vs. 37.5%，p=0.031）。整体队列中无显著差异，但剖宫产子代表现出长期免疫调节和屏障修复效应。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Growth at 37°C in MRS medium (pH 7) or LB broth; optimal pH 7–8; requires Mn²⁺ for biofilm formation
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Growth rate comparable to LB medium; doubling time not specified; viable in vitro and in simulated GIT
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gastrointestinal tract (GIT), particularly favorable for colonization in intestinal environment
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Symbiotic with L. plantarum; no antagonistic interactions observed; promotes Lactobacillus growth in vitro
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Resistant to heat (63°C for 3 min), cold (4°C for 21 days), simulated gastric juice, and bile salts; spore-forming enhances survival
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Extracellular matrix (EPS and TasA amyloid fibers)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Bacillus subtilis is a facultative anaerobe that grows well at 37°C in modified MRS medium (pH 7). It forms robust biofilms under elevated pH and Mn²⁺ conditions. Its extracellular matrix provides protection against heat, cold, and gastrointestinal stresses. It maintains symbiotic relationships with L. plantarum without antagonism, and its spores are highly resilient.
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Transcriptional fusions (PtapA-lacZ, Peps-lacZ, PtapA-Cfp), CRISPR-compatible strains (e.g., ΔabrB, Δspo0A, ΔepsHΔtasA) used for validation
G_edit_efficiency (编辑效率): Not explicitly reported; used for gene expression analysis and functional validation
G_circuit_control (回路控制): Constitutive expression of matrix genes (PtapA, Peps) under biofilm-inducing conditions; regulated by Spo0A and KinD-Spo0A pathway
G_circuit_inducer_material (电路调控_相关物质): Mn²⁺ ions, elevated pH (7–8), and MRS medium components
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): Stable in co-culture; matrix gene expression maintained over 8 h; no significant drift reported
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Matrix production is enhanced in MRS medium and compatible with encapsulation in biofilm matrix
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): B. subtilis was genetically modified using knockout strains (e.g., ΔabrB, Δspo0A, ΔepsHΔtasA) to validate matrix role in protection. Promoter fusions (PtapA-Cfp, Peps-lacZ) were used to monitor matrix gene expression. The system relies on natural regulatory pathways (KinD-Spo0A) to induce matrix production under specific environmental cues.
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): KinD histidine kinase, Spo0A transcription regulator, SinR/AbrB repressors
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): AND gate: Biofilm formation requires both elevated pH and Mn²⁺; Spo0A activation requires input from multiple histidine kinases (KinD, KinC, etc.)
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): B. subtilis senses environmental cues such as elevated pH and Mn²⁺ ions via histidine kinases (KinD, KinC), which activate the Spo0A phosphorelay. Phosphorylated Spo0A (Spo0A-P) represses SinR and AbrB, thereby derepressing the eps and tapA operons. This creates a logical AND gate: both pH and Mn²⁺ must be present to trigger matrix production. The system ensures matrix is only produced under favorable biofilm-inducing conditions.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Encapsulation within extracellular matrix (EPS and TasA amyloid fibers)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Controlled by environmental triggers (pH, Mn²⁺); matrix production is self-regulated via Spo0A pathway
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Highly compatible with MRS medium and biofilm formation; matrix effectively encapsulates L. plantarum without structural collapse
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): The extracellular matrix produced by B. subtilis encapsulates L. plantarum, protecting it from environmental stressors such as heat, cold, and gastric acid. This indirect antibacterial effect is achieved by shielding the probiotic from hostile conditions.
E_A_agent_material (抗菌因子_相关物质): Extracellular matrix (EPS and TasA amyloid fibers)
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): B. subtilis biofilm matrix significantly enhanced L. plantarum survival during heat (63°C, 3 min) and cold (4°C, 21 days) stress. In vitro digestion model showed 0.86 Log CFU/mL increase in viability under gastric conditions and 0.9 Log CFU/mL under intestinal conditions.
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Auxotrophy (not explicitly stated), but natural containment via matrix encapsulation and non-pathogenicity
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Non-pathogenic; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; low risk of horizontal gene transfer; no environmental escape reported; safe for human consumption
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Physical confinement via extracellular matrix prevents release of encapsulated cells
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Bacillus subtilis NCIB3610 is a non-pathogenic, GRAS-designated strain with a long history of safe use in food and supplements. It does not produce toxins or virulence factors. The biofilm matrix acts as a physical barrier, limiting cell release. No evidence of antagonism or pathogenicity in co-culture with L. plantarum. Risk of environmental escape is low due to natural attenuation in non-sterile environments.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): The dual-species biofilm significantly enhanced the survival of L. plantarum during heat treatment (63°C, 3 min: +1.06 Log CFU/mL), cold storage (4°C, 21 days: +0.44–0.89 Log CFU/mL), and simulated gastrointestinal digestion (gastric: +0.86 Log CFU/mL; intestinal: +0.9 Log CFU/mL). This demonstrates the system's effectiveness in protecting probiotics during food processing, storage, and GI transit.

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Temperature: 37°C (mammalian), 28°C (insect); pH: physiological range; Nutritional requirements: Host cell machinery (no defined media); Osmotic tolerance: Compatible with host cytoplasm
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): High replication in insect cells (C6/36, Aag-2); Low replication in mammalian cells (LLC-MK2, Vero E6, A549); Doubling time not explicitly reported, but growth kinetics show rapid replication in insects and delayed/attenuated in mammals
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Insect vector (Aedes aegypti) and mammalian host (human); Target niche: Insect midgut and salivary glands, mammalian hepatocytes and immune cells
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Null (virus, not microbial)
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): High stability in synthetic cDNA form; Resistant to lyophilization (inferred from synthetic virus production); Tolerant to shear stress during transfection and viral release
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Synthetic cDNA backbone, viral capsid proteins
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该系统为重组登革病毒，其基因组经大规模同义密码子对去优化，使其在昆虫细胞中高效复制，而在哺乳动物细胞中显著减毒。在蚊子细胞（C6/36）中生长动力学与野生型相似，但在哺乳动物细胞（LLC-MK2）中复制能力大幅下降，表明其对哺乳动物宿主具有高度选择性。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Computer-aided design, Simulated annealing heuristic, Whole genome synthesis
G_edit_efficiency (编辑效率): High (26–505 silent nucleotide changes per recoded segment; >300 changes in E, NS3, NS5 regions; no loss of protein sequence)
G_circuit_control (回路控制): Constitutive (no inducible circuit; expression driven by viral promoters)
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High (large-scale codon pair deoptimization reduces reversion risk; multiple silent changes across genome; no evidence of drift in experiments)
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in synthetic cDNA and viral particles; compatible with in vitro transfection and viral propagation
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 通过计算机设计，将登革病毒（DENV-2）的编码序列进行大规模同义密码子对去优化，使其在哺乳动物中使用低偏好性密码子对，而在昆虫中保持高偏好性。该策略通过模拟退火算法实现，仅改变密码子对，不改变氨基酸序列，从而实现对哺乳动物宿主的减毒，同时保留在昆虫中的高效复制能力。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Viral polyprotein processing machinery, host innate immune sensors (e.g., RIG-I, Jak-STAT pathway)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Constitutive expression; no explicit logic gates; attenuation is intrinsic to codon pair bias, not responsive to environmental signals
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 该系统无主动感应模块，其减毒效应由基因组编码的密码子对偏好性决定，不依赖于外部信号。病毒在哺乳动物细胞中因翻译效率低下而复制受阻，该过程为被动响应，而非主动逻辑控制。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Viral particle release (lysis of host cell)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent immunogenicity; titers measured by PFU and TCID50; protection correlates with dose
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with synthetic cDNA and viral particle encapsulation; stable in in vitro and in vivo settings
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Null
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 无
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Recoded viruses induce high levels of neutralizing antibodies in newborn mice and confer protective immunity. Maternal antibodies are transferred to offspring, protecting them from lethal challenge.
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Null
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Null
E_F_mechanism_desc (肿瘤治疗描述): The recoded virus is attenuated in mammals but remains immunogenic. It acts as a live attenuated vaccine candidate, capable of inducing protective immunity against dengue infection, effectively functioning as a targeted therapeutic agent in the context of viral disease.
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Genetic attenuation via codon pair deoptimization; no functional pathogenicity in mammals
B_containment_material (生物安全_相关物质): Codon pair score (hmin) in human cells
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity in mammals; no evidence of reversion to virulence; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; low risk of horizontal gene transfer (viral genome, not plasmid); environmental escape unlikely due to host specificity
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Synthetic cDNA and viral particles are contained in lab settings; no environmental release reported
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 该系统为经基因工程改造的减毒登革病毒，其在哺乳动物中复制能力极低，且通过大规模密码子对去优化显著降低回复突变风险，因此具有良好的生物安全性。其在昆虫中仍可高效复制，但对人类无致病性，符合BSL-2标准。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在新生小鼠中，hmin病毒（E^hmin、NS3^hmin、NS5^hmin）的LD50分别比野生型提高2000倍、100倍和200倍，表明其显著减毒。所有三种重组病毒均能诱导高水平中和抗体，且母鼠接种后可将抗体传递给后代，使93%的新生小鼠在野生型病毒攻击下存活，证明其具有强免疫原性和保护性。

composition (组成成分): [{"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus acidophilus", "strain_id": "Not specified"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Enterococcus faecium", "strain_id": "Not specified"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Bifidobacterium bifidum", "strain_id": "Not specified"}]
C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 6.5–7.0, utilizes carbohydrates (e.g., glucose, lactose) as carbon sources; requires complex nutrients including amino acids and vitamins.
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Growth rate not explicitly reported; typical doubling time for Lactobacillus spp. is ~20–30 min in vitro; in vivo growth likely slower due to competitive environment.
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Intestinal tract (cecum and colon) of broilers; preferentially colonizes mucosal surfaces of the gastrointestinal tract.
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of pathogenic bacteria (e.g., Salmonella, E. coli); may promote symbiosis with native microbiota by stabilizing microbial balance.
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Moderate tolerance to osmotic stress and moderate pH variation; stability during feed processing and storage not detailed.
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Not specified
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该研究中使用的三种益生菌（Lactobacillus acidophilus、Enterococcus faecium 和 Bifidobacterium bifidum）均为革兰氏阳性、兼性厌氧菌，适宜在鸡的肠道环境中生长。它们以碳水化合物为碳源，依赖复杂的营养物质，可在鸡肠道黏膜表面定植，通过竞争性排斥病原菌来维持肠道微生物平衡。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Not specified
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): Not specified
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Not specified
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 文中未提及对益生菌进行基因改造。所用益生菌为天然菌株，仅通过饲料添加方式引入，未涉及任何基因编辑或合成生物学工具。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Not specified
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Not specified
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 文中未描述任何感知模块或逻辑控制机制。益生菌的作用基于其天然生理特性，而非工程化信号响应系统。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Not specified
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Not specified
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Not specified
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): 通过产生有机酸（如乳酸）降低肠道pH，抑制病原菌生长；竞争性定植于肠道黏膜，阻止病原体附着。
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 益生菌通过降低肠道pH和竞争性定植抑制病原菌，未见显著毒性或微生物群落紊乱，表明其活性可控且安全。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): 调节宿主免疫反应，增强肠道屏障功能，促进抗炎因子分泌，减轻炎症反应。
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Not applicable
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): 调节宿主代谢，促进营养物质吸收，改善饲料转化率，调节短链脂肪酸（SCFAs）水平。
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Not applicable
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Lactobacillus acidophilus 和 Bifidobacterium bifidum 为公认安全（GRAS）菌株，无致病性；Enterococcus faecium 存在潜在耐药基因（如 vanA）风险，但本研究未报告耐药性问题。
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Not applicable
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 三种益生菌均为食品级安全菌株，无致病性记录。Enterococcus faecium 虽有潜在耐药基因，但本研究未检测其耐药性，且在饲料中使用浓度较低，环境逃逸风险极低。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在新垫料和重复使用垫料环境中，添加益生菌的肉鸡日粮可显著降低采食量，但不影响体重增长、饲料转化率、存活率及胴体性状。益生菌替代抗生素在不降低生产性能的前提下有效减少采食量，证明其作为抗生素替代品的可行性。

C_growth_desc (生长描述): 本文为特刊编辑部的综述性文章，未描述任何具体的微生物系统（单菌株或群落），仅介绍病毒与微生物研究领域的发展背景、国际社会（ISVM）的成立历程及会议内容。文中未提及任何用于治疗或工程改造的具体微生物菌株或其生理特性。
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 本文未涉及任何基因工程改造的微生物系统，未描述任何遗传工具、调控回路、基因稳定性或材料耦合策略。

B_risk_desc (风险描述): 本文未描述任何具体的微生物系统，因此无法评估其生物安全等级、生物遏制策略、风险或材料屏障。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 本文为综述性编辑部文章，未报告任何具体的治疗效果或伤口愈合数据。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Grows at 30°C; utilizes glycerol, erythritol, L-arabinose, adonitol, galactose, D-glucose, D-fructose, D-mannose, inositol, arbutine, esculine, lactose, lactate, and gluconate as carbon sources; tolerates up to 1 M NaCl
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Optimal growth at 32°C; growth monitored spectrophotometrically at 650 nm and by CFU counting; no doubling time or in vivo vs in vitro comparison reported
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Intestinal tract (inferred from anti-inflammatory and adhesion properties; pseudogene loss in inlA suggests enhanced host interaction)
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Bifidogenic properties; free-living; no evidence of pathogenicity or competition with other microbes reported
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerates up to 1 M NaCl; no data on UV, drying, shear, or lyophilization reported
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Osmoprotectants (inferred from NaCl tolerance in chemically defined medium)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该菌株为革兰氏阳性、微需氧、形态多变（球状至杆状），在YEL琼脂平板上形成奶油白色菌落。在液体培养基中生长于底部以避开氧气，静止期初期易形成团块。可在含1 M NaCl的培养基中生长，表明其具有较强的渗透压耐受性。其最佳生长温度为32°C，可利用多种碳源，包括葡萄糖、果糖、乳酸、甘油等。
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): No plasmid or chromosomal integration systems described; genome is stable with 30 pseudogenes and no CRISPR elements reported
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 该菌株未经过人工基因工程改造，其基因组为自然状态。研究重点在于解析其天然基因组中与抗炎特性相关的基因，特别是表面蛋白编码基因。
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 该菌株未报道具有人工设计的感应模块或逻辑电路，其生理响应基于天然代谢与宿主互作机制。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Unknown (no secretion system described)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Not applicable (natural strain, no engineered control)
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Not reported
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 未提及抗菌或抗生物膜功能
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): 其抗炎特性与表面蛋白（特别是含SLH结构域的蛋白）密切相关，这些蛋白可能通过与宿主细胞相互作用调节免疫反应。
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): S-layer associated proteins (SLAPs) with SLH domains (e.g., slpB, slpE, slpF, slpG, slpA, inlA, slh2, slpD)
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (naturally non-pathogenic, no kill-switch or auxotrophy described)
