B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Non-pathogenic; GRAS and QPS status; no antibiotic resistance genes or HGT risk reported; no evidence of environmental escape
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Not applicable (no encapsulation or material barrier described)
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 该菌株被列为GRAS（普遍认为安全）和QPS（质量安全评估）菌株，无致病性，无抗生素抗性基因，未报告水平基因转移风险，属于安全菌株。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 该菌株具有显著的抗炎潜力，优于已测序的CIRM-BIA1T菌株。其表面蛋白（特别是含SLH结构域的蛋白）与抗炎特性密切相关，可能通过与宿主细胞相互作用调节免疫反应。其基因组中存在与肠道定植相关的基因（如inlA完整），提示其在肠道中具有良好的适应能力。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 6.5–7.5; tolerates bile and acidic environments; utilizes glucose and other carbon sources; dependent on host metabolites in vivo
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~20–30 min in vitro; stable colonization in gut with long-term persistence in vivo
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gut mucosa, intestinal lumen
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive with pathogenic bacteria; minimal disruption to native microbiome; commensal interaction with host
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to osmotic stress, shear stress, and lyophilization; stable during storage and transport
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Capsule-like surface structures, stress-response genes
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 大肠杆菌Nissle 1917是一种耐受性强的肠道共生菌，可在胃肠道中长期定植，对酸性、胆汁和渗透压环境具有良好的耐受性，适合在复杂生理环境中稳定生长。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): CRISPR-Cas9, Plasmid-based systems, Recombination (FimE-DNA recombinase), Transposons
G_edit_efficiency (编辑效率): High efficiency (>90%) with low off-target risk; validated in multiple studies
G_circuit_control (回路控制): Inducible (e.g., IPTG, CAI-1, NO, nitrate, tetrathionate), Logic AND Gate (e.g., dual-signal activation)
G_circuit_inducer_material (电路调控_相关物质): CAI-1, NO, nitrate, tetrathionate, AHL, heme, glucose
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High plasmid stability (copy number ~10–20); chromosomal integration used for long-term expression; low metabolic burden; evolutionarily stable in vivo
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in hydrogel and encapsulated matrices; maintains function during release and colonization
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 通过基因工程改造大肠杆菌Nissle 1917，构建了多种可响应疾病标志物的合成生物传感器和基因电路，实现了对炎症、感染和肿瘤等疾病的精准检测与治疗。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): NorR (NO sensor), NarX-NarL (nitrate sensor), HrtR (heme sensor), CqsS-CAI-1 receptor, AgrC-AIP-I receptor, FimE-DNA recombinase
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): AND gate (e.g., dual biomarker detection), OR gate (e.g., multiple pathogen signals), threshold control, noise suppression via tight promoters
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 通过构建逻辑门电路，实现对多种疾病信号的协同识别，如同时检测硝酸盐和氧化应激信号以确认肠道炎症，避免误报。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Type I secretion (e.g., Usp45 signal), Lysis (E7 protein), Vesicles
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Spatiotemporally controlled via inducible promoters; dosage tuned by signal concentration
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with hydrogel encapsulation; maintains secretion activity and viability
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): 通过分泌pyocin、E7裂解蛋白和dispersin B等抗菌物质，靶向杀灭Pseudomonas aeruginosa等病原菌并破坏生物膜结构。
E_A_agent_material (抗菌因子_相关物质): Pyocin, E7 lysis protein, DspB (dispersin B)
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 在秀丽隐杆线虫和小鼠模型中，工程菌有效减少P. aeruginosa定植，且未引起明显组织损伤或炎症过度。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): 通过分泌IL-10、TGF-β1、IL-17A等细胞因子，调节免疫反应，抑制过度炎症或激活抗肿瘤免疫。
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): 通过分泌KGF-2、TFF1等修复因子，促进上皮细胞增殖和黏膜屏障修复，加速肠道损伤愈合。
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): 通过表达苯丙氨酸降解酶（PAL和LAAD），将过量苯丙氨酸转化为无害代谢物，治疗苯丙酮尿症。
E_F_mechanism_desc (肿瘤治疗描述): 通过分泌IL-17A激活Toll样受体5（TLR5）信号通路，诱导抗肿瘤免疫反应，抑制肺癌转移。
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Auxotrophy, Kill-switch (e.g., CRISPRi-based suicide system), Temperature-sensitive control
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no known antibiotic resistance genes; minimal HGT risk due to controlled plasmid systems; low environmental escape risk
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Physical confinement via hydrogel encapsulation prevents systemic dissemination
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 该系统基于安全的共生菌株，通过基因回路和物理屏障实现双重生物安全控制，临床前研究未发现致病性或基因水平转移风险。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在DSS诱导的小鼠结肠炎模型中，工程菌显著改善了黏膜损伤、减少出血和炎症评分；在苯丙酮尿症模型中，有效降低血清苯丙氨酸水平，达到临床试验阶段（NCT03516487）。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 30–37°C, pH 6.0–7.0; tolerates mild bile and acidic conditions; requires amino acids and sugars for growth
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~30–40 min in vitro; transient colonization in gut; low persistence in vivo
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gut lumen, oral mucosa
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Symbiotic with host; minimal competition with native microbiota; low immunogenicity
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to drying, lyophilization, and moderate shear stress; stable during storage
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Cell wall structure, stress-response operons
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 乳酸乳球菌是一种安全的乳酸菌，可在肠道中短暂定植，对酸性和胆汁环境具有中等耐受性，适合用于局部治疗。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Plasmid-based systems, CRISPRi, Recombination (P1 promoter), Transposons
G_edit_efficiency (编辑效率): High efficiency (>85%) with low off-target risk; well-characterized in L. lactis
G_circuit_control (回路控制): Inducible (P1 promoter, nisin-controlled system), Constitutive, Logic AND Gate
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): Moderate plasmid stability; chromosomal integration used for long-term expression; low metabolic burden
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in alginate and chitosan hydrogels; maintains secretion function
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 通过基因工程改造乳酸乳球菌，构建了多种响应病原信号的传感器和治疗性蛋白表达系统，用于炎症和感染的靶向治疗。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): CqsS-CAI-1 receptor, AI-2 sensor, P1 promoter
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): AND gate (e.g., dual signal detection), threshold control, noise filtering via tight promoters
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 通过双信号识别（如CAI-1与AI-2协同）实现对病原感染的高特异性响应，避免假阳性。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Type I secretion (Usp45 signal), Vesicles
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Controlled by promoter strength and inducer concentration; localized delivery
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Highly compatible with hydrogel encapsulation; maintains viability and secretion
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): 通过分泌抗肠球菌肽、flagellin等物质，抑制病原菌黏附和生物膜形成。
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 在体外和小鼠模型中，工程菌有效抑制了肠球菌和沙门氏菌的定植，且未引起明显毒性反应。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): 通过分泌IL-10、抗TNF纳米抗体、GAD65等，调节免疫反应，治疗自身免疫病和炎症性疾病。
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): 通过分泌TFF1等修复因子，促进口腔黏膜和肠道上皮修复。
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Auxotrophy, Kill-switch (nisin-controlled system), Temperature-sensitive control
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Non-pathogenic; GRAS status; no antibiotic resistance genes; low HGT risk; minimal environmental escape
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Effective physical confinement via hydrogel prevents systemic spread
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 乳酸乳球菌为公认安全（GRAS）菌株，通过可诱导的杀伤开关和物理屏障实现生物安全控制，临床前研究未发现风险。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在结肠炎小鼠模型中，工程菌显著降低炎症评分和组织损伤；在糖尿病和自身免疫病模型中，有效缓解症状，具有良好的治疗潜力。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 6.5–7.5; requires complex polysaccharides (e.g., xylan); highly dependent on host mucosal glycans
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~60–90 min in vitro; long-term colonization (>5 years) in vivo
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Intestinal mucosa, mucus layer
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Symbiotic with host; promotes gut barrier integrity; supports other commensals
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to bile, osmotic stress, and low oxygen; stable during lyophilization
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Mucin-degrading enzymes, capsule polysaccharides
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 拟杆菌属θ菌是一种长期定植于肠道的共生菌，依赖宿主黏液多糖生长，具有极强的生态适应性和免疫耐受性。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): CRISPR-Cas9, Plasmid-based systems, Recombination (synthetic promoters), Transposons
G_edit_efficiency (编辑效率): Moderate to high efficiency; improved with synthetic bioparts; low off-target risk
G_circuit_control (回路控制): Inducible (xylan promoter), Constitutive, Logic NOR Gate (via Cello design)
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High chromosomal integration stability; low metabolic burden; evolutionarily stable in vivo
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in hydrogel; maintains long-term function
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 通过合成生物学工具改造拟杆菌θ菌，构建了响应宿主信号的基因电路，用于代谢疾病和炎症的长期治疗。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Xylan-inducible promoter, bile acid sensor, Cello-designed NOR gate
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): NOR gate (functionally complete), threshold control, noise suppression via synthetic promoters
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 通过Cello软件设计的NOR逻辑门，实现对多种信号的复杂整合，确保治疗输出仅在特定病理条件下激活。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Type I secretion (enterotoxin signal), Vesicles
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Controlled by xylan induction; sustained release over time
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Excellent compatibility with hydrogel encapsulation; maintains long-term activity
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): 通过分泌TGF-β1、KGF-2等因子，调节免疫平衡，抑制慢性炎症。
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): 通过分泌KGF-2和TFF1，促进肠道上皮再生和屏障修复。
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): 通过表达苯丙氨酸降解通路，治疗苯丙酮尿症。
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Auxotrophy, Kill-switch (CRISPRi), Temperature control
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Non-pathogenic; low HGT risk; no antibiotic resistance genes; minimal environmental escape
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Hydrogel encapsulation provides strong physical confinement
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 拟杆菌θ菌为安全共生菌，通过基因回路和物理屏障实现双重控制，临床前研究未发现安全风险。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在苯丙酮尿症小鼠模型中，工程菌显著降低血清苯丙氨酸水平，达到临床试验阶段；在结肠炎模型中，有效修复黏膜损伤，改善疾病活动指数。

composition (组成成分): [{"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus plantarum", "strain_id": "299, 2362"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Pediococcus pentosaceus", "strain_id": "5-33:3"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Leuconostoc mesenteroides", "strain_id": "32-77:1"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus paracasei subsp. paracasei", "strain_id": "19"}]
C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 5.5–6.5; tolerates gastric acidity and bile; requires fermentable carbohydrates (inulin, beta-glucan, pectin, resistant starch) for growth
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~1–2 hours in vitro; stable in vivo colonization observed in gut mucosa after oral administration
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gut mucosa, particularly colon and small intestine; preferentially colonizes in hypoxic regions of the GI tract
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of pathogenic bacteria (e.g., Pseudomonas aeruginosa, Staphylococcus aureus); synergistic with host microbiota; reduces overgrowth of Escherichia coli and Staphylococcal species
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to lyophilization, rehydration, moderate shear stress; stable during storage at room temperature; resistant to bile salts and low pH
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Cell wall components (e.g., teichoic acids), extracellular polysaccharides, and stress-response proteins (e.g., chaperones)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该微生物群落为乳酸杆菌属（Lactobacillus）和乳球菌属（Pediococcus）等兼性厌氧菌的混合体，可在人体肠道内定植，尤其偏好低氧环境。其生长依赖于可发酵纤维（如菊粉、果胶、抗性淀粉），在胃酸和胆汁环境中具有较强耐受性，能有效抑制病原菌过度生长，维持肠道微生态平衡。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): None (natural strains used; no genetic modification reported)
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High chromosomal stability; no plasmids reported; no evidence of genetic drift in clinical trials
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in fiber-based delivery matrix (beta-glucan, inulin, pectin, resistant starch); no significant loss of viability during encapsulation
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 该系统未经过基因工程改造，使用天然分离的乳酸菌株，通过口服或鼻肠管给药，利用其天然代谢能力和定植能力发挥功能。其稳定性依赖于宿主肠道环境和纤维基质的保护作用。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): FNR promoter (hypoxia), Lactate permease (lactate), Bile acid receptors (e.g., Bile acid-binding proteins)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Constitutive expression; no reported synthetic logic gates; natural sensing via metabolic feedback and quorum sensing
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 这些菌株通过感知肠道微环境中的低氧、胆汁酸、乳酸和短链脂肪酸等信号，调节自身代谢和定植行为。它们能响应宿主炎症因子（如IL-6、TNF-α）和组织损伤产物，从而在感染或炎症发生时启动免疫调节功能。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Type IV secretion (bacteriocin release), lysis (controlled release of metabolites)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent effect; standard dose: 40–400 billion CFU/day; efficacy correlates with dose and duration
E_material_match (材料匹配性): High compatibility with fiber matrix (beta-glucan, inulin, pectin, resistant starch); maintains viability and function during encapsulation and delivery
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): 通过产生有机酸（乳酸、乙酸）降低局部pH，抑制病原菌生长；分泌细菌素（如plantaricin）直接杀伤革兰氏阳性菌；竞争性抑制病原菌黏附和生物膜形成。
E_A_agent_material (抗菌因子_相关物质): Lactic acid, acetic acid, plantaricin, bacteriocins
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 在严重创伤和急性胰腺炎患者中，使用Synbiotic 2000 Forte可显著减少肺部感染、中心静脉导管感染和全身性感染，且无明显毒性反应。
E_B_crit_evidence (标准B_依据): 未使用氧生成机制，因此不适用。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): 通过调节Th1/Th2平衡，促进TGF-β和IL-10分泌，抑制过度炎症反应；增强巨噬细胞吞噬功能，减少中性粒细胞浸润和组织损伤。
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): 通过减少肠道通透性、抑制炎症因子释放、促进黏膜屏障修复，加速组织修复过程；在肝硬化患者中改善Child-Pugh评分和肝功能。
E_D_repair_material (修复因子_相关物质): Short-chain fatty acids (SCFAs), mucin, IL-10, TGF-β
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): 通过发酵可溶性纤维产生短链脂肪酸（SCFAs），调节宿主能量代谢、胰岛素敏感性和肠道屏障功能。
E_E_metabolite_material (代谢物_相关物质): Acetic acid, propionic acid, butyric acid
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (natural strains, no kill-switches or auxotrophy reported)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no horizontal gene transfer observed; low risk of systemic infection; no evidence of intestinal ischemia in most trials
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Fiber matrix provides physical confinement and protects microbes from harsh gastric environment
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 该微生物群落由公认安全（GRAS）的乳酸菌组成，未经过基因改造，无致病性或耐药基因。在多项临床试验中未观察到严重不良事件，如菌血症或肠缺血。其物理封装在纤维基质中，增强了生物安全性。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在严重创伤患者中，Synbiotic 2000 Forte显著降低死亡率（5/35 vs. 9/30）、严重败血症（6/35 vs. 13/30）和机械通气天数（15 vs. 26天）。在急性胰腺炎患者中，感染性坏死发生率从30%降至4.5%。在肝硬化患者中，半数患者出现肝性脑病逆转，Child-Pugh评分显著改善。

composition (组成成分): [{"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus rhamnosus", "strain_id": "GG, 299v"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus reuteri", "strain_id": ""}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Bifidobacterium bifidum", "strain_id": ""}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Streptococcus thermophilus", "strain_id": ""}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Escherichia coli", "strain_id": "Nissle 1917"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Saccharomyces boulardii", "strain_id": ""}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Bacillus coagulans", "strain_id": ""}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus acidophilus", "strain_id": ""}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus gasseri", "strain_id": ""}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus coryniformis", "strain_id": ""}]
C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 5.5–6.5, utilizes glucose and lactose as carbon sources; requires vitamins and amino acids; bile tolerance observed in intestinal environment
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~1–2 hours in vitro; in vivo colonization sustained with repeated dosing; stability in gastrointestinal tract confirmed
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Intestinal mucosa, particularly colon and ileum; preferentially adheres to epithelial cells in gut lumen
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of pathogens via nutrient competition, production of organic acids (lactic acid), bacteriocins; synergistic interactions with resident microbiota; minimal disruption to core microbiome
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to gastric acid and bile salts; stable during lyophilization and storage at 4°C; resistant to moderate shear stress during formulation
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Bile salt hydrolases, acid shock proteins, extracellular polysaccharides
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 上述微生物多为乳酸菌或酵母，具有良好的肠道定植能力，能在胃肠道环境中存活并维持活性。其生长依赖于适宜的温度、pH和营养条件，尤其在肠道中能耐受酸性环境和胆汁，具备良好的定植与代谢能力。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Not explicitly mentioned; likely natural strains without genetic modification
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High chromosomal stability; no plasmid-based systems reported; minimal metabolic burden; long-term in vivo persistence observed with repeated dosing
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in food matrices (yogurt, capsules) and oral formulations; no significant degradation during storage
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 文中未提及基因工程改造，所有菌株均为天然分离或商业化的益生菌菌株，通过自然代谢功能发挥免疫调节作用。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): FNR promoter (hypoxia), Lactate-responsive promoters, Bile acid sensors (e.g., Bsh), Quorum sensing receptors (LasR, LuxR homologs)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No explicit synthetic circuits; natural sensing with threshold responses to environmental cues (e.g., low pH triggers acid resistance; bile induces bile salt hydrolase expression)
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 这些益生菌通过感知肠道内的pH、胆汁酸、乳酸和葡萄糖等信号，激活自身防御和代谢通路。部分菌株具备群体感应能力，可响应微生物密度变化。整体为天然感知机制，无人工逻辑门设计。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Type I/II/IV secretion systems (e.g., for bacteriocins), Vesicles (exosomes), Lysis (controlled release)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent effects observed; clinical dosing ranges from 10^9 to 10^12 CFU/day; timing and frequency optimized for sustained effect
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with oral capsules, yogurt, fermented foods, and rectal enemas; stable in food matrices and gastrointestinal environment
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): 通过产生有机酸（如乳酸）、细菌素（bacteriocins）和 biosurfactants 抑制病原菌生长，干扰生物膜形成，竞争营养和黏附位点。
E_A_agent_material (抗菌因子_相关物质): Lactic acid, Bacteriocins (e.g., lactocin, reuterin), Biosurfactants
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 多项研究显示，L. rhamnosus GG 和 L. reuteri 能有效抑制肠道中病原菌定植，减少腹泻发生率，且无明显细胞毒性或菌群紊乱。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): 调节Th1/Th2平衡，促进Treg细胞分化，上调抗炎细胞因子（如IL-10），下调促炎因子（如IL-4、IFN-γ），影响黏膜免疫反应。
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): 促进肠道上皮屏障修复，上调黏蛋白（MUC2）基因表达，增强黏膜屏障功能，减少通透性，改善炎症性肠病症状。
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): 产生短链脂肪酸（SCFAs），调节宿主能量代谢，影响免疫细胞功能，维持肠道稳态。
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Auxotrophy (nutrient dependency), Natural attenuation (no long-term colonization)
B_containment_material (生物安全_相关物质): Amino acid auxotrophy (e.g., leucine, histidine), Vitamin dependency
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no horizontal gene transfer observed; minimal environmental escape risk due to poor environmental survival
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Physical barrier provided by gastrointestinal mucosa and transient colonization; no persistent systemic dissemination
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 所有列出的菌株均为公认安全（GRAS）菌株，无致病性记录。其在人体内为短暂定植，不形成持久感染，且无耐药基因或水平基因转移风险，安全性高。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在HIV患者中，L. rhamnosus GG和L. reuteri可缩短急性腹泻持续时间，提升CD4+ T细胞计数；在溃疡性结肠炎患者中，VSL#3和E. coli Nissle可诱导临床缓解，疗效与美沙拉嗪相当；在儿童过敏性皮炎中，L. rhamnosus和L. reuteri显著改善症状并调节免疫因子水平。总体显示益生菌对免疫相关疾病具有显著临床改善作用。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): 37°C, pH 3.0–7.0, 1–4 g/L bile salts, 2–10 g/L pepsin/trypsin
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Growth rate not specified; viable counts maintained at >10^4 cfu/mL under stress conditions for 24 h
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gastrointestinal tract (GI), particularly resilient in harsh GI environment
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Potential competition with pathogenic bacteria; no data on symbiosis with host microbiome
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): High tolerance to acid (pH 3.0), bile salts (up to 4 g/L), pepsin (up to 10 g/L), trypsin (up to 10 g/L), and moderate tolerance to low pH (pH 2.0)
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Lactic acid production, cell wall integrity, intrinsic resistance mechanisms
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该菌株在模拟胃肠道环境（如低pH、胆盐、蛋白酶）下表现出良好的存活能力，尤其在pH 3.0和高胆盐浓度下仍能维持较高活菌数，表明其具有较强的耐受性，适合作为口服益生菌载体。
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 本文未涉及基因工程改造，所有特性均为天然菌株的生理表现，无外源基因插入或调控系统。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Unknown (no specific receptor or promoter identified)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No logic gates or signal integration reported
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 未检测到特定的信号感应系统或逻辑控制机制，所有响应均为非特异性生理耐受性。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Unknown (likely passive diffusion or cell lysis)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Not applicable (natural production, no controllable output)
E_material_match (材料匹配性): No material encapsulation reported; likely free suspension
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): 通过产生有机酸（主要是乳酸）降低局部pH，抑制病原菌生长；对李斯特菌有抗性，但对金黄色葡萄球菌和大肠杆菌O157:H7无抑制作用。
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 乳酸为主要代谢产物，pH下降可抑制李斯特菌，但对其他常见病原菌无效，且无过度活性或组织损伤报告。
E_B_crit_evidence (标准B_依据): 未检测到氧气生成或光依赖性产氧机制。
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): 通过产生乳酸等短链脂肪酸调节肠道微环境，可能影响宿主代谢和免疫稳态。
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (no engineered kill switches or auxotrophy reported)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Strain MM08 lacks virulence genes (ace, gelE, efaA), but other strains harbor these genes. All strains show resistance to gentamicin, ciprofloxacin, erythromycin, and tetracycline. Horizontal gene transfer risk exists due to antibiotic resistance genes.
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): None (no physical barrier described)
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 尽管E. faecium MM08未检测到毒力基因且抗生素耐药谱较轻，但其他E. faecalis菌株携带ace、gelE、efaA等毒力基因，且普遍存在多重耐药性，存在潜在致病风险和耐药基因传播风险，需进一步评估其在高危人群中的应用安全性。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 该菌株在模拟胃肠道环境中表现出优异的存活能力，尤其在低pH和高胆盐条件下，且能稳定产生乳酸，具有潜在的益生功能。但其对多种病原菌无广谱抑制作用，且部分菌株携带毒力基因和耐药基因，需谨慎评估其临床应用价值。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): 37°C, 5% CO2, pH 7.5, growth on Mitis-salivarius agar with streptomycin (100 μg/ml)
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time not specified; detected in saliva at 7 and 14 days post-treatment; colonization observed in 13/13 subjects
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Oral cavity, particularly dorsal tongue and mucosal surfaces
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of black-pigmented anaerobes (e.g., Prevotella, Porphyromonas); may stimulate indigenous salivaricin production in resident S. salivarius
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to chlorhexidine pretreatment, lozenge dissolution (5 min), and oral environment (pH, shear stress); stability during storage in lozenges not detailed
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Streptomycin resistance (100 μg/ml) in strain K12 variant
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该菌株为口腔常见共生菌，可在37°C、5% CO2条件下生长，对氯己定预处理后的口腔环境具有较强适应性，能成功定植于舌背和黏膜表面，维持至少14天。其生长受营养条件（如Mitis-salivarius培养基）和选择性压力（如链霉素）影响。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Not explicitly modified; strain K12 is a naturally occurring bacteriocin-producing variant
G_circuit_control (回路控制): Constitutive (bacteriocin production is auto-inducible and ongoing)
G_circuit_inducer_material (电路调控_相关物质): Auto-induction via salivaricin production (no external inducer reported)
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High; strain K12 persisted in saliva at days 7 and 14; no evidence of plasmid loss or drift
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in lozenge formulation; maintains viability and function during dissolution and oral exposure
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 该菌株未经过人工基因改造，但其天然具备产生两种乳酸菌素（salivaricin A和B）的能力，且该能力为自诱导型，可在口腔环境中持续表达，无需外源调控。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Auto-induction system for salivaricin production (likely via peptide signaling)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Constitutive expression with auto-induction; threshold-based activation of bacteriocin production upon sufficient population density
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 该菌株通过自诱导机制感知自身种群密度，当达到一定阈值时启动乳酸菌素的持续表达，实现对目标病原菌的抑制，属于自调控的恒定表达系统，具有一定的群体感应逻辑。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Bacteriocin secretion via general secretion pathway (likely constitutive)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent via lozenge administration (2×/day); persistence varies by individual
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Highly compatible with lozenge matrix; stable during dissolution and oral exposure
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): 通过分泌salivaricin A（抑菌）和salivaricin B（杀菌）抑制多种与口臭相关的革兰氏阳性菌，包括Streptococcus anginosus、Eubacterium saburreum、Micromonas micros等。
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 在体外实验中，K12菌株对多种口臭相关菌株（如S. anginosus、E. saburreum）表现出强抑制作用；在唾液样本中，黑素菌属（Prevotella）数量减少92%（Subject A）和62%（Subject B），且未见对宿主细胞明显毒性。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): 通过竞争性定植和抑制病原菌，间接调节局部免疫环境，可能增强宿主免疫应答；同时可能通过刺激内源性乳酸菌素产生，增强局部防御。
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): 通过抑制蛋白水解型细菌（如Prevotella、Porphyromonas）的生长，减少挥发性硫化物（VSC）等代谢产物的生成，从而调节口腔微环境的代谢平衡。
E_E_metabolite_material (代谢物_相关物质): Volatile sulfur compounds (VSC), short-chain fatty acids (SCFAs)
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Auxotrophy (streptomycin resistance; not essential for survival)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; non-invasive; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no evidence of horizontal gene transfer; environmental escape unlikely due to oral niche specificity
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Lozenge formulation provides physical confinement and controlled release
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 该菌株为口腔正常共生菌，无致病性，经链霉素抗性筛选后仍保持安全特性，未见耐药基因或水平基因转移证据，且在口服制剂中具有物理屏障保护，整体风险极低。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在23名口臭患者中，85%的K12治疗组在治疗1周后VSC水平显著下降（>100 ppb），而安慰剂组仅30%。多数受试者在第7天和第14天维持低VSC水平，部分受试者（如S3）持续28天仍保持低水平。DGGE分析显示，VSC降低者唾液中S. salivarius K12条带更明显，且黑素菌属数量显著减少，表明其具有良好的定植和代谢调控能力。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 30–37°C, pH 6.0–7.0; tolerates bile salts, gastric acid, osmotic stress; utilizes lactate, gluconate, propanediol as carbon sources
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Slow growth rate; in vivo metabolic activity sustained via adaptation to intestinal substrates; in vitro doubling time ~3–5 hours
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Intestinal mucosa, particularly colon; transient colonization in human gut
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive adhesion to intestinal epithelium; excludes pathogens (E. coli, S. aureus, P. aeruginosa, Salmonella); modulates gut microbiota by increasing Bifidobacteria and decreasing Bacteroides and Clostridium
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): High tolerance to gastric acid, bile salts, oxidative stress, osmotic stress; survives in fermented dairy matrices; maintains viability during storage
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Trehalose, glycogen, polyphosphate (osmoprotectants); general stress proteins (e.g., DnaK, GroEL)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Propionibacterium freudenreichii is an aerotolerant, non-spore-forming, Gram-positive bacterium with robust digestive stress tolerance. It exhibits slow growth but maintains metabolic activity in the gut by adapting to available substrates such as lactate and propanediol. It survives gastric acid and bile salts through induction of stress response genes and expression of protective proteins. Its ability to colonize the intestinal mucosa transiently enables interaction with host cells and modulation of the gut microbiota.
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): CRISPR-Cas9 (inferred from genome sequencing and strain engineering studies); plasmid-based systems (e.g., p15A origin) used in research
G_edit_efficiency (编辑效率): High efficiency in genome editing; off-target risk not reported but low due to high specificity of CRISPR-Cas9 in actinomycetes
G_circuit_control (回路控制): Constitutive expression of key genes (e.g., for SCFA, DHNA, S-layer proteins); inducible systems not reported
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High chromosomal stability; plasmid-based systems show moderate stability; no significant drift reported in long-term in vivo studies
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in fermented dairy matrices (e.g., yogurt, cheese); maintains function during encapsulation and storage
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): Genome sequencing has enabled identification of genes involved in SCFA production, S-layer protein expression, and DHNA biosynthesis. Strain-specific engineering (e.g., CIRM-BIA 129) has been used to study immunomodulatory effects. No synthetic circuits reported, but natural regulatory systems (e.g., FNR-like regulators for hypoxia response) are functional. Genetic stability is high, especially in chromosomal integration.
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): FNR-like regulators (hypoxia sensing); membrane transporters for lactate/gluconate; S-layer homology (SLH) domains for host cell interaction
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Constitutive expression with threshold-based metabolic adaptation; no reported synthetic logic gates; natural feedback via SCFA and DHNA production
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): P. freudenreichii senses intestinal metabolites (lactate, propanediol) and adapts its metabolism accordingly. It responds to hypoxia via FNR-like regulators and to oxidative stress via general stress proteins. Host cytokines (e.g., TNF-α) may modulate immune interaction, but no direct sensing of cytokines is reported. The system operates through constitutive metabolic pathways with feedback from end-products (SCFAs, DHNA), enabling self-regulated activity in the gut.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Type I secretion (lipopeptide), extracellular release of metabolites (SCFAs, DHNA, CFAs), S-layer protein shedding
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Strain-dependent; dosage controlled by delivery vehicle (e.g., yogurt, capsule); no synthetic control systems reported
E_material_match (材料匹配性): High compatibility with fermented dairy matrices (yogurt, cheese); maintains viability and function during encapsulation and storage
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Produces propionic acid, acetic acid, and bacteriocins; inhibits growth of Gram-positive and Gram-negative pathogens; prevents biofilm formation via competitive adhesion and secretion of anti-adhesive lipopeptides
E_A_agent_material (抗菌因子_相关物质): Propionic acid, acetic acid, bacteriocins (e.g., 2-pyrrolidone-5-carboxylic acid), lipopeptide (anti-adhesive)
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): Propionic acid and acetic acid inhibit growth of E. coli, S. aureus, P. aeruginosa, and Salmonella in vitro. Lipopeptide secretion reduces P. aeruginosa adhesion. No significant microbiome disruption reported. Activity is localized to gut and does not cause systemic toxicity.
E_B_crit_evidence (标准B_依据): No evidence of oxygen production or oxygenation activity; not applicable.
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Induces anti-inflammatory IL-10; suppresses pro-inflammatory cytokines (TNF-α, IL-12, IL-6); activates AhR via DHNA; modulates HDAC activity via SCFAs; S-layer proteins interact with dendritic cells to induce tolerance
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): S-layer proteins (SlpA, SlpB, SlpE), DHNA, SCFAs (acetate, propionate), IL-10
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Produces SCFAs (acetate, propionate) and conjugated fatty acids (CLA, CLNA); modulates host metabolism via PPARγ activation; enhances Bifidobacteria growth via DHNA and ACNQ
E_E_metabolite_material (代谢物_相关物质): SCFAs (acetate, propionate), conjugated fatty acids (CLA, CLNA), DHNA, ACNQ
E_F_mechanism_desc (肿瘤治疗描述): Induces apoptosis in colorectal and gastric cancer cells via mitochondrial depolarization, cytochrome C release, and caspase activation; enhances TRAIL-induced apoptosis; inhibits HDAC, leading to p21 expression and cell cycle arrest
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Auxotrophy (inferred from natural growth requirements); no kill-switches reported
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Non-pathogenic; no reported virulence genes; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; low risk of HGT; no environmental escape documented
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Physical confinement in fermented food matrix (e.g., yogurt, cheese) limits environmental release
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Propionibacterium freudenreichii is GRAS and QPS-listed with a long history of safe use in food. It lacks virulence factors and pathogenicity. No antibiotic resistance genes or horizontal gene transfer risks reported. Encapsulation in food matrices provides physical containment. No adverse effects observed in human trials, even at high doses (45 tablets/day).
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): In human trials, P. freudenreichii consumption increased Bifidobacteria levels and reduced fecal α-glucosidase activity. In animal models, it alleviated colitis, reduced inflammation, and induced apoptosis in cancer cells. In a pilot study, BGS (bifidogenic growth stimulator) improved clinical activity index in ulcerative colitis patients. Yogurt delivery yielded the highest fecal recovery of viable bacteria, indicating enhanced gut persistence and functional delivery.

composition (组成成分): [{"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus plantarum", "strain_id": "CJLP55"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus plantarum", "strain_id": "CJLP56"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus plantarum", "strain_id": "CJLP133"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus plantarum", "strain_id": "CJLP136"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus plantarum", "strain_id": "CJLP243"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Leuconostoc citreum", "strain_id": "CJGN34"}]
C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Growth at 15°C and 37°C, pH 3.8, 3% NaCl
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Growth curve established in MRS broth at 37°C; viable counts determined every hour over 18 h
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Small intestine (based on survival under simulated upper GIT conditions)
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): No evidence of competition or symbiosis with host microbiome; potential for colonization due to bile salt resistance and acid tolerance
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Resistant to 0.4% phenol; survived pH 3.0 for 1 h and bile salts in duodenum simulation
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Bile salt hydrolase (BSH) activity
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 这些乳酸菌株均能耐受模拟胃肠道环境，包括pH 3.0的酸性条件和含胆盐的十二指肠条件，表明其在肠道中具有良好的生存能力。所有菌株在MRS培养基中于37°C下生长良好，且对0.4%苯酚具有抗性，说明其在肠道中可能具有较强的适应性。
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 文中未提及任何基因工程改造或合成生物学元件，所有菌株均为天然分离株，未进行遗传修饰。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Bile salt hydrolase (BSH) enzyme
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): 未提及逻辑门控机制，仅基于生理耐受性进行功能评估。
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 这些菌株通过表达胆盐水解酶（BSH）来感知并适应肠道中的胆汁酸环境，从而在小肠中存活。其对酸性和胆盐的耐受性是其在胃肠道中定植的关键生理特征，但未涉及复杂的信号感知与逻辑处理机制。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): None (natural secretion via cell lysis or passive diffusion)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Not applicable (no engineered control system)
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with food matrices; no encapsulation or delivery system described
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): L. plantarum 和 Leuconostoc citreum 菌株在体外表现出对多种病原菌的抑制作用，但未明确说明其抗菌机制。
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 所有菌株均未表现出溶血或明胶酶活性，且对多种抗生素敏感，表明其具有良好的安全性，不会造成过度组织损伤或微生物群落失衡。
E_B_crit_evidence (标准B_依据): 未提及任何产氧机制或相关工程改造。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Lactobacillus plantarum 菌株具有免疫刺激活性，可增强宿主免疫反应。
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): Lactic acid, exopolysaccharides (EPS), cell wall components
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): L. plantarum 菌株在发酵过程中产生乳酸，调节肠道pH，促进有益菌群生长，同时可能影响宿主代谢。
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (no kill-switch or auxotrophy described)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): All strains except L. fermentum CJCS1 were susceptible to 8 antibiotics tested. L. fermentum CJCS1 showed tetracycline resistance and carried tet(O) gene. No haemolysis, gelatinase activity, or biogenic amine production detected.
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): None (no physical confinement described)
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 除从猪粪中分离的L. fermentum CJCS1携带tet(O)耐药基因外，其余所有菌株均表现出良好的安全性，包括对多种抗生素敏感、无溶血性、无明胶酶活性、不产生生物胺。这些特征支持其作为食品级益生菌的GRAS地位。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 所有菌株在模拟胃肠道条件下表现出良好的存活率，尤其在pH 3.0下1小时后仍保持超过55%的存活率，且在含胆盐的十二指肠模拟环境中具有一定的耐受性，表明其具有作为益生菌在肠道中定植和发挥功能的潜力。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Growth at 30°C in MRS-Cys medium under anaerobiosis (10% H₂, 10% CO₂, 80% N₂); pH not explicitly stated, but typical for Lactobacillus species (pH 5.5–6.5); tolerance to bile salts and mucus adherence reported.
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Growth rate not quantified; exponential growth observed in MRS-Cys medium at 30°C with doubling time inferred as typical for Lactobacillus (approx. 1–2 hours in vitro). In vivo stability not directly measured but high survival in gastrointestinal conditions reported.
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Human milk, infant feces; mucosal surfaces of gastrointestinal tract and oral cavity; potential for translocation via dendritic cells to mammary gland.
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Adheres to intestinal cells and mucus; stimulates mucin gene expression; no significant competition or symbiosis with other microbiota described.
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): High tolerance to bile salts; survives gastrointestinal conditions; resistant to drying and lyophilization (implied by probiotic use); stable under storage conditions.
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Bile salt hydrolase activity, mucus adherence proteins
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Lactobacillus salivarius CECT 5713 is a facultative anaerobe that grows well under anaerobic conditions at 30°C in MRS-Cys medium. It exhibits high survival in gastrointestinal environments, adheres to intestinal and mucus surfaces, and maintains stability during storage and processing, making it suitable for probiotic applications.
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Plasmid-based systems (pHN1, pHN2, pHN3); no CRISPR or recombinase tools used in this study.
G_edit_efficiency (编辑效率): Not applicable; no genetic editing performed in this study.
G_circuit_control (回路控制): Constitutive expression of bacteriocin cluster genes; quorum-sensing regulation (AbpK) disrupted by 4-bp deletion.
G_circuit_inducer_material (电路调控_相关物质): AbpIP (autoinducer peptide), AbpK (histidine kinase), AbpR (response regulator)
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): Plasmids pHN1, pHN2, and pHN3 are stable; no evidence of plasmid loss or chromosomal instability reported. No transmissible antibiotic resistance genes detected.
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in suspension and in vitro culture; no data on encapsulation or material integration.
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): The strain contains a megaplasmid (pHN3) with a complete bacteriocin gene cluster, but a 4-bp deletion in the histidine kinase gene abpK disrupts quorum-sensing regulation, preventing bacteriocin production. The genome includes two intact prophages and no mobile antibiotic resistance elements, contributing to genetic stability.
S_metabolite_signals (代谢信号): ["Bile acids", "Lactate (inferred from lactic acid bacteria metabolism)"]
S_host_signals (宿主信号): ["Dendritic cell surface receptors (via molecular mimetism)", "Mucin-encoding gene expression (host signaling)"]
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): AbpK (histidine kinase), AbpIP (autoinducer peptide), Protein 1230 (DC-SIGN-like receptor mimic)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): AND gate: bacteriocin production requires both AbpIP (signal) and functional AbpK (sensor) for activation. Disruption of AbpK prevents induction.
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): The bacteriocin production system functions as an AND gate: it requires both the presence of the autoinducer AbpIP and a functional histidine kinase AbpK. Due to a 4-bp deletion in abpK, the system is non-functional, preventing bacteriocin synthesis even in the presence of AbpIP. The strain also senses host-derived signals via molecular mimicry, particularly through protein 1230, which mimics DC-SIGN and may bind HIV gp120.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Cell surface proteins, secreted factors (e.g., protein 1230), cell-free supernatants
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Not controllable; activity depends on bacterial viability and concentration.
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with suspension and in vitro culture; no data on encapsulation or material integration.
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): No detectable bacteriocin production due to frameshift mutation in abpK gene.
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 无抗菌活性，因abpK基因缺失导致无法合成细菌素。
E_B_crit_evidence (标准B_依据): 无氧生成功能，不适用于氧合治疗。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Stimulates maturation of immature dendritic cells by upregulating MHC class II and B7.2 (CD86) surface markers, promoting T-cell activation.
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): Protein 1230 (DC-SIGN-like mimic), bacterial cell surface components
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): No direct evidence of tissue repair or ECM regulation.
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): No data on SCFA, tryptophan, or neurotransmitter production.
E_F_mechanism_desc (肿瘤治疗描述): No evidence of tumor targeting or prodrug conversion.
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): No transmissible antibiotic resistance genes; no functional prophage progeny; intrinsic resistance to vancomycin and kanamycin (non-transferable).
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no transmissible resistance genes; intrinsic antibiotic resistance not a health risk; no evidence of horizontal gene transfer.
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): No physical barrier used; relies on intrinsic safety features.
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Lactobacillus salivarius CECT 5713 is considered safe for human use. It lacks transmissible antibiotic resistance genes, has no functional phage progeny, and exhibits intrinsic resistance to certain antibiotics (vancomycin, kanamycin) that are not transferable. It has been shown to be well tolerated in animal models and human clinical trials, supporting its GRAS status.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 该菌株可显著促进树突状细胞成熟，上调MHC II和B7.2表达，抑制HIV-1感染（R5型42.3%，X4型58.9%，R5/X4型49.8%），具有良好的免疫调节和抗感染潜力，适用于肠道和黏膜免疫干预。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 5.5–6.5; tolerates bile salts and gastric acid; utilizes mucin and dietary glycans as carbon sources
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~1.5–2 hours in vitro; transient colonization in adults, long-term persistence in subset of individuals (e.g., B. longum AH1206)
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Ileal epithelium and colonic mucus layers; preferentially colonizes hypoxic regions of the gut
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Synergistic with other commensals via cross-feeding; co-colonization enhanced when related genera are present ('like will to like' rule); competes with resident microbiota for nutrients
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): High tolerance to bile salts, acid, and osmotic stress; stable during lyophilization and rehydration; resistant to shear stress in gut lumen
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Exopolysaccharides (EPS), lipoteichoic acid (LTA), ureC gene (acid resistance)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Lactobacillus and Bifidobacterium strains exhibit species- and strain-specific colonization patterns. They survive harsh gastric conditions due to acid and bile resistance, utilize mucin and dietary glycans for energy, and persist in the gut through surface adhesion and metabolic adaptation. Autochthonous strains like B. longum AH1206 show long-term persistence, while allochthonous strains are typically transient.
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): CRISPR-Cas9 (inferred from genomic analysis), Recombination (plasmid integration), Transposons (inferred from SNP variation)
G_edit_efficiency (编辑效率): High efficiency in Lactobacillus; moderate in Bifidobacterium; low off-target risk due to conserved core genomes
G_circuit_control (回路控制): Constitutive expression of colonization genes; inducible via host-derived signals (e.g., mucin, lactose)
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): Chromosomal integration preferred; plasmid loss observed in L. plantarum during gut transition; metabolic burden minimal; evolutionary drift observed via SNP variation
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in hydrogel matrices and encapsulated delivery systems; EPS production enhances material compatibility
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): Genetic engineering focuses on enhancing carbohydrate metabolism, surface adhesion, and immune tolerance. Key genes (e.g., spaC, ureC, bshA) are targeted to improve colonization. Strains are engineered for improved survival and persistence via metabolic and structural modifications.
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): FNR promoter (hypoxia), LTA-TLR2/6 complex (immune sensing), LuxS (quorum sensing), Mucin-binding pili (SpaC)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): AND gate: requires both nutrient availability and host immune tolerance; threshold-based activation of colonization genes; noise suppression via gene redundancy and metabolic buffering
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): Strains sense hypoxia and nutrient availability (e.g., mucin, lactose) via specific promoters and receptors. Quorum sensing (LuxS) coordinates biofilm formation. Immune tolerance is achieved through mild immunogenicity and IgA coating. The system integrates multiple signals to activate colonization only when environmental and host conditions are favorable.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Type IV secretion (pili), exopolysaccharide (EPS) matrix, lysis (in some strains)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Controlled by host diet and microbiome; dose-dependent colonization; no external control mechanism
E_material_match (材料匹配性): High compatibility with hydrogel and encapsulated delivery systems; EPS enhances matrix stability
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Produces lactic acid and reuterin to inhibit pathogenic bacteria (e.g., E. coli O157, AIEC); bacteriocins (e.g., Abp118) target Listeria monocytogenes
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): L. rhamnosus GG and L. reuteri inhibit AIEC and E. coli O157 via lactic acid and reuterin; bacteriocin Abp118 in L. salivarius protects against Listeria; no significant cytotoxicity or microbiome disruption reported
E_B_crit_evidence (标准B_依据): No evidence of oxygenation activity; not engineered for oxygen production
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Induces Th17 cells in a tolerant manner; modulates NF-κB and Nrf2 pathways; promotes immune tolerance via IgA coating and mild immunogenicity
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): IgA, IL-17F, TLR2 ligands (LTA), tryptophan metabolites (indole derivatives)
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Not applicable
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Produces SCFAs (acetate, propionate) and tryptophan metabolites (indole derivatives) that regulate host metabolism and immune function
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Auxotrophy (e.g., lactose-dependent strains), kill-switch via plasmid loss
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; low risk of horizontal gene transfer; minimal environmental escape due to host-adapted nature
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Physical confinement via encapsulation prevents environmental release
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Lactobacillus and Bifidobacterium strains are generally recognized as safe (GRAS). Autochthonous strains like B. longum AH1206 have low opportunistic risk. No evidence of pathogenicity or antibiotic resistance. Encapsulation ensures physical containment, reducing environmental escape risk.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): L. rhamnosus GG and B. longum AH1206 show long-term persistence in a subset of individuals. They enhance gut barrier function, modulate immune responses, and improve metabolic health. Personalized intervention via machine learning prediction models can optimize colonization success. Clinical trials show improved colonization with diet-tuned prebiotics (e.g., GOSs, FOSs).

composition (组成成分): [{"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus rhamnosus", "strain_id": "Lactobacillus rhamnosus GG (implied by context)"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus casei", "strain_id": "Lactobacillus casei LBC80R (implied by context)"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Bifidobacterium lactis", "strain_id": "Bifidobacterium lactis (implied by context)"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Streptococcus thermophilus", "strain_id": "Streptococcus thermophilus (implied by context)"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus bulgaricus", "strain_id": "Lactobacillus bulgaricus (implied by context)"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus acidophilus", "strain_id": "Lactobacillus acidophilus CL1285 (implied by context)"}]
C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 5.5–6.5, tolerant to bile acids and gastric acidity; utilizes lactose and other carbohydrates as carbon sources
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~1–2 hours in vitro; stable in gastrointestinal tract under host conditions
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gastrointestinal tract (small and large intestine), mucosal surface of the gut
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of pathogens; synergistic interactions with resident microbiota; no significant disruption of core microbiome observed
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to gastric acid, bile salts, osmotic stress; stable during lyophilization and storage at 4°C; resistant to drying and shear stress during processing
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Cell wall components (e.g., teichoic acids), exopolysaccharides, and metabolic adaptation to stress
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该系统由多种乳酸菌和双歧杆菌组成，均为兼性厌氧菌，可在人体胃肠道中定植。它们在37°C、pH 5.5–6.5条件下生长良好，对胃酸和胆汁具有耐受性，能利用乳糖等碳源进行代谢。在体外生长速率快，可在肠道黏膜表面稳定定植，通过竞争性排斥抑制病原体，且不显著破坏正常菌群结构。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): None (Natural strains used; no genetic modification reported)
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High (No plasmid-based systems; chromosomal stability; no reported drift or loss in vivo)
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in yogurt/kefir matrix; no significant degradation during encapsulation or delivery
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 该系统未经过基因工程改造，使用的是天然存在的益生菌株，通过食品载体（酸奶/开菲尔）口服给药，其功能由天然基因组表达，无需外源调控元件。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): FNR promoter (inferred for oxygen sensing), lactose permease (LacY), bile acid receptors (e.g., Bile acid-inducible promoters)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Constitutive expression; no complex logic gates; threshold-based activation via nutrient availability
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 这些益生菌通过感知肠道环境中的pH值、胆汁酸、乳糖和葡萄糖等信号启动代谢活动。其基因表达为组成型，但受底物浓度调控，如乳糖存在时激活乳糖转运系统。无复杂逻辑门控，但可通过底物浓度实现阈值响应，确保在适宜环境中激活功能。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Type I secretion (e.g., reuterin), lysis (controlled release), extracellular vesicles
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent effect; 50 billion CFU per dose; higher doses associated with greater risk reduction
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Highly compatible with yogurt/kefir matrix; stable during storage and delivery; no interference with gel structure or gas production
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Lactobacillus reuteri produces reuterin, a broad-spectrum antimicrobial compound; Lactobacillus species compete for nutrients and adhesion sites; produce organic acids (lactic acid) lowering pH to inhibit pathogens.
E_A_agent_material (抗菌因子_相关物质): Reuterin (from Lactobacillus reuteri), Lactic acid, Bacteriocins
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): Lactobacillus reuteri产生的reuterin对多种病原体有效，包括艰难梭菌；乳酸降低pH值抑制病原体生长；在酸奶/开菲尔中稳定存在，不破坏基质结构；仅1例患者出现亚临床乳酸杆菌菌血症，无感染症状，表明安全性高。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Lactobacillus plantarum WCFS1 enhances tight junction proteins (occludin) and scaffold proteins; modulates immune cell activity via TLR2/4 signaling; reduces pro-inflammatory cytokines (TNF-α, IL-6).
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Lactobacillus plantarum WCFS1 increases expression of tight junction proteins; Lactobacillus rhamnosus GG protects gastric mucosa; promote epithelial barrier integrity and wound healing.
E_D_repair_material (修复因子_相关物质): Occludin, ZO-1, Mucin-2, Growth factors (e.g., EGF)
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (natural strains; no kill-switch or auxotrophy reported)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no known virulence factors; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no horizontal gene transfer observed; low risk of environmental escape
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Physical barrier via oral delivery and gastrointestinal transit; no systemic dissemination in non-immunocompromised patients
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 所用菌株均为公认安全（GRAS）的益生菌，未进行基因改造，无致病性或耐药基因。仅1例患者出现亚临床乳酸杆菌菌血症，无临床症状，表明在非中性粒细胞减少或免疫抑制患者中使用安全。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在2008至2014年期间，创伤患者中艰难梭菌感染（CDI）发生率从每1000例住院患者11.2例降至4.8例（p=0.03）；接受抗生素治疗的患者中CDI发生率从2.2%降至0.7%（p=0.01）。益生菌使用与CDI发生率下降显著相关，且未见严重不良反应，表明该益生菌组合在预防CDI方面具有显著疗效。

composition (组成成分): [{"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus rhamnosus GG", "strain_id": "ATCC 53103"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus rhamnosus LC705", "strain_id": "DSM 7061"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Bifidobacterium breve Bb99", "strain_id": "DSM 13692"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Propionibacterium freudenreichii ssp. shermanii JS", "strain_id": "DSM 7076"}]
C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Growth at 37°C in MRS broth; pH and osmotic tolerance not explicitly stated; requires lactose and other nutrients for growth
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Growth rate not quantified; viable in human GI tract during antibiotic therapy; doubling time not reported
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gastrointestinal tract (colonization of gut mucosa and fecal recovery observed)
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competes with H. pylori for adhesion sites; may restore lactobacilli and bifidobacteria levels disrupted by antibiotics; potential synergistic effects in consortium
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Survives high-dose antibiotic therapy (clarithromycin, amoxicillin, PPI); tolerates freezing and storage; stable during lyophilization/rehydration (implied by product formulation)
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Milk-based drink matrix; cryoprotectants in formulation (implied)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该益生菌群落由四种菌株组成，均能在人体胃肠道中存活，即使在高强度抗生素治疗期间。LGG和PJS在粪便中的浓度显著增加，表明其在胃肠道中具有良好的定植能力。
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): No genetic modifications reported; natural strains used; stability in GI tract confirmed by fecal recovery
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in milk-based drink formulation; survives encapsulation and gastrointestinal transit
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 未对菌株进行基因工程改造，使用天然益生菌株。其功能基于天然生理特性，如竞争性排斥、免疫调节和抗菌作用。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Not specified; likely native receptors for pH, bile, and nutrients
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No engineered logic circuits; natural sensing and response mechanisms
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 各菌株通过天然受体感知胃肠道环境中的pH、胆汁酸、乳糖和葡萄糖等信号，响应宿主炎症因子（如细胞因子）和蛋白酶，调节自身代谢与免疫调节功能。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Natural secretion (e.g., lactic acid, bacteriocins); no engineered delivery systems
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Twice daily intake of 1×10^9 CFU/mL; controlled by formulation and dosing schedule
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Highly compatible with milk-based drink matrix; stable during encapsulation and gastrointestinal transit
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): 通过竞争性排斥、抑制H. pylori黏附、降低尿素酶活性等方式抑制H. pylori生长
E_A_agent_material (抗菌因子_相关物质): Lactobacillus rhamnosus GG, L. rhamnosus LC705, Bifidobacterium breve Bb99, Propionibacterium freudenreichii ssp. shermanii JS
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): LGG和PJS在抗生素治疗期间仍能在粪便中检测到，表明其具有良好的生存能力且不破坏肠道结构；未报告显著毒性或微生物组紊乱。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): 调节免疫反应，增加抗炎细胞因子，改善肠道屏障功能，缓解炎症性肠病症状
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): Cytokines (e.g., IL-10, TGF-β), Mucus secretion factors
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): 调节肠道代谢环境，如通过乳酸、丙酸等短链脂肪酸调节pH，促进有益菌群生长
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (natural strains used; no kill-switches or auxotrophy reported)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no evidence of horizontal gene transfer; low risk of environmental escape
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Physical confinement via oral delivery and intestinal transit; no engineered containment
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 四种菌株均为公认安全（GRAS）的益生菌，未进行基因改造，无致病性或耐药基因。在抗生素治疗期间仍能存活，表明其具有良好的环境适应性和安全性。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在为期7天的H. pylori根除治疗期间，益生菌组的总症状评分显著降低（P=0.038），表明其能有效改善治疗耐受性。H. pylori根除率在益生菌组为91%，对照组为79%，虽无统计学差异，但提示潜在疗效。粪便中LGG和PJS浓度显著上升，证实其在肠道中成功定植并存活。

spatial_arrangement (空间排布): Suspension (electroporated cells in cuvette), followed by monolayer culture on flasks and plates
C_growth_conditions (生长条件): 37°C, 32°C (for virus amplification), in OptiPRO SFM or MEM with 10% gamma-irradiated FBS (BSE-free), supplemented with 4 mM L-glutamine
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Cells passaged 1:6 one day prior to transfection; confluency 70–90% at transfection; virus yield monitored daily post-electroporation; growth kinetics show rHPIV1 > rHPIV3 > rHPIV2 in titer
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to electroporation stress, protease treatment (TrypLE Select), and freeze-thaw cycles (implied by cell banking and long-term culture)
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): TrypLE Select (recombinant protease)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Vero细胞为非洲绿猴肾细胞系，可在37°C下生长，用于病毒复苏与扩增。细胞在无动物源性成分的培养基中维持，仅在传代时使用经辐照的BSE安全胎牛血清。细胞对电穿孔、蛋白酶处理和冻融具有耐受性，适用于临床级疫苗生产。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Electroporation (Amaxa Nucleofector II), plasmid transfection
G_edit_efficiency (编辑效率): High recovery efficiency for rHPIV3 (up to 8/8 with NF), moderate for rHPIV1 (2/2 with cGMP-NF), variable for rHPIV2; PBS buffer showed lower efficiency and cell viability
G_circuit_control (回路控制): Constitutive expression via T7 promoter (pCI-T7 plasmid)
G_circuit_inducer_material (电路调控_相关物质): T7 RNA polymerase (encoded by pCI-T7 plasmid)
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): Stable plasmid expression in Vero cells; virus amplified through multiple passages; biological cloning by terminal dilution ensures clonality
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Plasmid DNA and electroporation buffers (cGMP-NF, NF, PBS) are compatible with Vero cell viability and viral recovery
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 通过电穿孔将编码HPIV抗原基因组、N、P、L蛋白及T7 RNA聚合酶的质粒共转染至Vero细胞，利用T7启动子驱动病毒蛋白表达，实现从cDNA完全恢复活病毒。该方法简化了传统转染流程，避免了病毒载体或恒定表达细胞系的使用，适用于临床试验级疫苗生产。
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 本研究未涉及微生物感知模块或逻辑控制，系统为基于质粒的病毒复苏平台，无环境响应或信号调控机制。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Viral particle release (infectious virus production)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Controlled by plasmid dose and electroporation efficiency; virus amplified via serial passaging
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with cGMP-NF, NF, and PBS electroporation buffers; suitable for encapsulation in clinical-grade vaccine production
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Use of qualified low-passage Vero cell banks, minimal animal product use, and avoidance of recombinant vaccinia-T7 vector
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Vero cells are non-tumorigenic and BSE-free; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no horizontal gene transfer risk due to non-replicating plasmid system; low risk of adventitious agents due to animal product-free reagents
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Physical confinement via cell culture containment and GMP-compliant manufacturing
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 该系统使用经WHO认证的低传代Vero细胞，仅在细胞传代时使用经辐照的BSE安全胎牛血清，其余步骤均采用无动物源性成分试剂。避免了使用重组痘苗病毒或恒定表达T7聚合酶的细胞系，显著降低外源污染风险。系统无致病性，适用于人类临床试验，生物安全等级为BSL-2。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 本研究未评估治疗或伤口愈合效果，其主要目标为开发适用于人类临床试验的重组副流感病毒疫苗候选株的高效、无动物源性复苏方法。该方法成功实现了HPIV1、HPIV2、HPIV3野生型及减毒株的快速恢复，其中HPIV3恢复效率最高（8/8），HPIV1和HPIV2在优化条件下也可高效恢复，为疫苗临床前开发提供了可靠平台。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Temperature: 37°C; pH: 7.2 (PBS); Carbon source: MRS broth; Nutritional requirements: Complex medium (MRS) with amino acids, vitamins, and carbohydrates
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Growth rate: 18–48 h in MRS broth; Doubling time not specified; In vitro growth confirmed; In vivo colonization in fish gut inferred
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gastrointestinal tract of Carassius auratus (goldfish), intestinal mucosa
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of pathogens (E. coli, S. aureus) via co-aggregation; potential modulation of gut microbiota
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to osmotic stress (PBS wash), moderate shear stress (vortexing), and storage at 4°C; lyophilization not tested
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): S-layer proteins (protective surface layer)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该菌株为从虾肠道分离的革兰氏阳性杆菌，能在37°C、pH 7.2的MRS培养基中良好生长，具有较强的自聚集和共聚集能力，能有效黏附于鱼肠道黏膜，具有良好的环境适应性和在宿主肠道定植能力。
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 该研究未对菌株进行基因工程改造，其功能主要依赖于天然的生理特性，如产生细菌素、自聚集、共聚集及分泌消化酶等，未涉及人工基因回路或可调控表达系统。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): S-layer proteins (detected via LiCl₂ treatment)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No synthetic logic gates; natural aggregation behavior follows time-dependent, concentration-dependent kinetics
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 菌株通过S层蛋白介导的细胞表面疏水性实现自聚集和共聚集，该过程随时间推移而增强，无明确的逻辑门控机制，属于自然生理响应。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Constitutive secretion via cell lysis or extracellular release (natural secretion)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Not controllable; activity depends on natural growth and secretion
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with feed pellet matrix; stable during drying at 45°C
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): 通过产生细菌素（bacteriocin）直接杀灭病原菌，同时通过自聚集和共聚集能力抑制病原菌黏附和定植。
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 该菌株对大肠杆菌和金黄色葡萄球菌均表现出显著的共聚集能力（33.15%和32.40%），且能产生天然细菌素，具有广谱抗菌活性；在鱼饲料中使用未见不良反应，表明其活性可控且安全。
E_B_crit_evidence (标准B_依据): 未提及任何产氧机制或光依赖性氧合功能。
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): 通过分泌消化酶（如蛋白酶、淀粉酶、纤维素酶、脂肪酶）促进营养吸收，增强组织蛋白合成，改善肠道屏障功能。
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): 通过分泌多种酶调节宿主代谢，促进碳水化合物、蛋白质、脂肪和纤维素的消化吸收，提高营养利用率。
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (natural strain, no synthetic kill switches)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no known toxins; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no horizontal gene transfer data; environmental escape risk low due to non-native habitat (shrimp gut isolate)
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Feed pellet matrix provides physical confinement
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 该菌株为天然分离的益生菌，属于GRAS（公认安全）类别，未发现致病性、抗生素抗性基因或水平基因转移风险，且通过饲料颗粒封装，具有良好的物理屏障，安全性高。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在30天喂养实验中，实验组鱼体重增长达34.56%，显著高于对照组（11.28%）；特定生长率（SGR）为0.99%，远超对照组的0.35%；总蛋白含量提高至30.56 mg/g，消化酶活性（淀粉酶、蛋白酶、脂肪酶、纤维素酶）均显著增强，抗氧化酶（SOD、CAT）活性也明显提升，表明该菌株能有效促进鱼类生长、改善营养吸收、增强抗氧化能力，具有显著的益生功效。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Temperature: 37°C; pH: Neutral to slightly acidic; Nutritional requirements: Complex media with carbohydrates (e.g., glucose), amino acids, vitamins
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Growth rate: Moderate; Doubling time: ~1–2 hours in vitro; In vivo homeostasis not explicitly reported
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gut lumen, intestinal mucosa; preferred niche: proximal small intestine and colon
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Symbiotic with host microbiota; may compete with pathogenic bacteria; no evidence of antagonism with other commensals
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Moderate tolerance to bile salts, low pH (gastric), and osmotic stress; stability during lyophilization and rehydration reported in product literature
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Bile salts, low pH (HCl), lyophilization stabilizers
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Lactobacillus rhamnosus R0011 and Lactobacillus acidophilus R0052 are facultative anaerobes capable of growing in the human gastrointestinal tract under physiological conditions. They exhibit moderate tolerance to gastric acidity and bile, enabling survival through the upper GI tract. Their growth is supported by fermentable carbohydrates and essential nutrients found in the gut environment. These strains are used in probiotic formulations and are known for their ability to colonize the intestinal mucosa and modulate immune responses.
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Not specified (no genetic modification reported)
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High chromosomal stability; no plasmids reported; no evidence of genetic drift or loss in vivo
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in oral delivery formulations (e.g., capsules, suspensions); no degradation in gastrointestinal environment
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): The microbial system consists of two naturally occurring probiotic strains, Lactobacillus rhamnosus R0011 and Lactobacillus acidophilus R0052, used in their native, unmodified form. No genetic modifications were performed. The strains are administered orally as a suspension in distilled water, relying on their intrinsic physiological properties for function. Their stability in the gastrointestinal tract and resistance to environmental stresses are inherent traits, not engineered.
S_microbial_signals (微生物信号): ["Quorum sensing molecules (e.g., AI-2, AHL – inferred from genus-level behavior)"]
S_host_signals (宿主信号): ["Proteases (e.g., trypsin, chymotrypsin)", "Cytokines (e.g., IL-1β, TNF-α – indirect sensing via immune modulation)"]
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Bile salt hydrolase (BSH), acid tolerance systems (e.g., F0F1-ATPase), two-component systems (e.g., LiaRS, ComDE)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No explicit logic circuits; likely constitutive expression of immune-modulatory factors with threshold-based responses to environmental cues
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): The strains sense environmental signals such as low pH and bile salts via intrinsic stress response systems. They respond to nutrient availability (e.g., glucose, lactate) and microbial metabolites (e.g., SCFAs) through metabolic regulation. While no synthetic genetic circuits are used, their natural behavior includes sensing host and microbial signals to modulate immune responses, particularly through downregulation of proinflammatory cytokines like IL-1β and TNF-α. This suggests a form of innate logic: 'if inflammation is high, reduce it' – though not engineered.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Type IV secretion system (inferred), extracellular vesicles, passive diffusion
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Oral administration at fixed dose (1 mg/mL/day); no feedback control or dynamic regulation reported
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with oral suspension; stable in gastrointestinal environment; no evidence of material degradation or interference with delivery
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Not applicable (no direct antibacterial activity reported)
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 无直接抗菌作用证据
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Downregulates proinflammatory cytokines (IL-1β, TNF-α) in liver tissue; reduces TLR-4 expression; modulates innate immune response via interaction with Kupffer cells and dendritic cells.
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): Lactobacillus cell wall components (e.g., peptidoglycan, lipoteichoic acid), secreted metabolites (e.g., SCFAs), and extracellular vesicles
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Not reported
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Modulates gut-liver axis metabolism; produces SCFAs (e.g., acetate, propionate) via fermentation of dietary fibers; influences host lipid and glucose metabolism.
E_E_metabolite_material (代谢物_相关物质): Short-chain fatty acids (SCFAs), particularly acetate and propionate
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (naturally occurring, non-pathogenic strains)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no evidence of horizontal gene transfer; low risk of environmental escape; safe for human consumption
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Oral delivery with natural gut barrier; no physical confinement required
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Lactobacillus rhamnosus R0011 and Lactobacillus acidophilus R0052 are well-established probiotics with GRAS status. They are non-pathogenic, do not produce toxins, and are not associated with systemic infections. No antibiotic resistance genes were reported. Their use in humans is safe and widely documented. No engineered containment systems are needed.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在酒精性肝病小鼠模型中，Lacidofil（L. rhamnosus R0011 和 L. acidophilus R0052）显著降低了肝脏组织中IL-1β和TNF-α水平，抑制了TLR-4的表达，并减轻了酒精诱导的肝脂肪变性。尽管肝功能指标（如ALT、AST）无显著改善，但病理学结果显示，与酒精组相比，Lacidofil组的肝脂肪变性程度显著降低（p < 0.05）。这表明该益生菌组合在调节免疫反应和改善肝脂肪变性方面具有潜在治疗价值。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 6.0–7.0, in nutrient-rich medium with organic carbon sources (e.g., glucose, lactose); tolerates moderate osmotic stress and bile salts.
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~1.5–2.0 hours in vitro; growth rate consistent with in vivo intestinal environment.
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Intestinal tract (gut mucosa), particularly in the small intestine and cecum of laying hens.
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of pathogenic bacteria (e.g., E. coli); symbiotic with host microbiota by maintaining microbial balance and enhancing gut barrier function.
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Moderate tolerance to drying, lyophilization, and shear stress; stable during feed processing and storage.
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Cell wall components (e.g., peptidoglycan, mannoproteins) and endogenous antioxidants (e.g., superoxide dismutase).
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该微生物系统由Lactobacillus acidophilus和Candida utilis组成，均为兼性厌氧菌，可在鸡肠道内定植并稳定生长。其生长适宜温度为37°C，pH 6.0–7.0，能利用葡萄糖等碳源进行代谢，具有一定的耐胆盐和渗透压能力，适合在饲料中长期稳定存在。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Plasmid-based expression system (implied by patent ZL 2005 1 0040990.2); no explicit CRISPR or recombinase tools mentioned.
G_edit_efficiency (编辑效率): Not specified; likely moderate efficiency based on industrial fermentation practices.
G_circuit_control (回路控制): Constitutive expression of selenium biotransformation genes; no inducible circuits reported.
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High chromosomal stability; plasmid-free system used; no reported gene loss or drift.
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in feed matrix; maintains viability and function during feed processing and storage.
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 通过基因工程改造L. acidophilus和C. utilis，使其具备将无机硒（亚硒酸钠）高效转化为有机硒（如硒代蛋氨酸）的能力。该系统基于专利技术，无需质粒，依赖染色体整合的代谢通路，确保长期遗传稳定性。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Selenite transporter (e.g., selenite-specific ABC transporter); pH-responsive promoters (e.g., P1 promoter in L. acidophilus).
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Constitutive activation; no complex logic gates reported. Thresholds set by metabolic flux control.
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 微生物通过感知环境中的无机硒（亚硒酸钠）和pH变化启动硒的生物转化过程，以维持代谢稳态。该系统为组成型表达，无外部诱导信号，逻辑简单，依赖底物浓度驱动。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Lysis and passive diffusion; no specialized secretion systems reported.
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent via dietary supplementation level (0.2–1.0 mg Se/kg feed); no feedback control.
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with feed matrix; stable during pelleting and storage.
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): L. acidophilus produces lactic acid and bacteriocins that inhibit pathogenic E. coli and other Gram-negative bacteria.
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 研究显示SP可显著拮抗致病性大肠杆菌，且对宿主细胞无明显毒性，表明其抗菌活性可控且安全。
E_B_crit_evidence (标准B_依据): 未涉及氧气生成机制，无相关数据支持。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): 调节肠道免疫反应，增强巨噬细胞活性，促进抗炎因子分泌，抑制过度炎症。
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): Cytokines (e.g., IL-10, TGF-β), cell wall components (e.g., mannoproteins)
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): 通过改善肠道屏障功能、促进上皮细胞再生和减少氧化损伤，间接支持组织修复。
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): 将无机硒转化为有机硒（如硒代蛋氨酸），提高蛋中硒含量，调节宿主抗氧化代谢。
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Auxotrophy (nutrient-dependent growth); no kill-switches reported.
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; low risk of horizontal gene transfer; no environmental escape documented.
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Feed matrix provides physical confinement; no encapsulation or barrier system used.
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 该系统由公认安全（GRAS）的L. acidophilus和C. utilis构成，无致病性，不携带耐药基因，且依赖外源硒生长，具有天然生物安全屏障，适合用于动物饲料和人类营养补充。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): SP显著提高蛋的产蛋率、蛋重、蛋硒含量和谷胱甘肽过氧化物酶（GPX）活性，同时降低饲料/蛋比和蛋胆固醇含量。蛋的哈夫单位（HU）下降速度减缓，表明蛋的新鲜度和货架期延长。该系统可生产富含硒、低胆固醇的营养蛋，适用于高血脂、心血管疾病患者及硒缺乏人群。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 6.0–7.0, requires lactose or other fermentable carbohydrates; no specific mention of bile or osmotic tolerance
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time not reported; growth in vitro under standard conditions; in vivo colonization in infant gut observed
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Infant gastrointestinal tract, particularly in breastfed infants; preferentially colonizes the small intestine
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of pathogenic bacteria; potential symbiosis with host microbiota; no significant disruption of native microbiome reported
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerance to gastric acidity and bile salts (inferred from clinical use); stable during lyophilization and rehydration (implied by commercial formulation)
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Lactobacillus reuteri DSM 17938 (intrinsic properties)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该菌株为兼性厌氧菌，可在37°C下生长，适宜pH为6.0–7.0，依赖乳糖等可发酵碳源。在母乳喂养婴儿中可定植于小肠，具有良好的胃肠道耐受性，能耐受胃酸和胆汁，适用于口服制剂。
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): No genetic modifications reported; naturally stable in human gut; no plasmid or integration systems used
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): No engineered genetic circuits; stability in oral suspension formulation
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 该系统未进行基因工程改造，L. reuteri DSM 17938为天然菌株，通过口服给药在婴儿肠道中定植，无需外源基因调控系统。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Lactose permease and acid tolerance systems (inferred from known physiology)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No synthetic logic circuits; natural metabolic sensing of lactose and pH
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 该菌株通过天然代谢通路感知乳糖和pH变化，调控自身代谢与定植行为，无人工设计的逻辑门控机制。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Passive diffusion and natural secretion
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Fixed daily dose of 10^8 CFU; no dynamic control
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with oral suspension formulation; stable in liquid and lyophilized forms
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Not applicable
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 未评估抗菌功能
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Modulates immune response in infant gut by reducing pro-inflammatory cytokines and enhancing regulatory T-cell activity; may reduce intestinal inflammation associated with colic.
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): Reuterin (antimicrobial and immunomodulatory compound produced by L. reuteri)
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Not applicable
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Produces reuterin and other metabolites that regulate gut microbiota composition and fermentation, reducing gas production and improving gut motility, thereby alleviating colic symptoms.
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): No kill-switch or auxotrophy; relies on natural attenuation in human gut
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Non-pathogenic; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; low risk of horizontal gene transfer; no environmental escape risk due to human-specific adaptation
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Oral administration with natural gut clearance; no physical barrier required
B_risk_desc (风险描述): L. reuteri DSM 17938被列为GRAS（公认安全）菌株，无致病性，不携带抗生素抗性基因，不会在环境中长期存活，安全性高，适用于婴幼儿。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在母乳喂养婴儿中，L. reuteri DSM 17938可使治疗成功率提高67%（RR=1.67），每日哭闹时间平均减少50分钟（MD=-50 min），NNT=5。效果主要在母乳喂养婴儿中显著，对配方奶喂养婴儿无明显疗效。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Growth at 37°C in Job's Tears extract medium with maltodextrin; microaerobic-static conditions.
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time not specified; growth rate maintained under microaerobic conditions.
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gastrointestinal tract (target niche for probiotic function)
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of foodborne pathogens (E. coli O157:H7, Salmonella Typhimurium); no direct interaction with host microbiome described.
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): High tolerance to simulated gastric (pH 2.0) and intestinal (pH 8.0, 0.45% bile salt) conditions; stable under spray drying and storage.
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Protein (soy + milk), trehalose, maltodextrin
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Lactobacillus plantarum TISTR 2075 grows optimally at 37°C under microaerobic conditions in Job's Tears extract medium supplemented with maltodextrin. It exhibits strong resistance to acidic and bile salt environments, making it suitable for gastrointestinal survival. The strain maintains viability after spray drying and during storage under controlled humidity and temperature conditions.
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 该研究未对Lactobacillus plantarum TISTR 2075进行基因工程改造，仅通过喷雾干燥结合保护剂（如蛋白、海藻糖）提高其稳定性和存活率。
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 该研究未涉及微生物的感知模块或逻辑控制机制。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Passive diffusion and cell lysis (inferred from natural secretion of metabolites)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Not controllable; dependent on initial cell count and carrier matrix.
E_material_match (材料匹配性): High compatibility with maltodextrin, protein, trehalose, and acacia gum matrices; stable in glassy state below Tg.
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): 通过分泌抗菌物质抑制食源性致病菌生长，如大肠杆菌O157:H7和沙门氏菌Typhimurium。
E_A_agent_material (抗菌因子_相关物质): Lactic acid and other bacteriocins (inferred from probiotic activity)
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 喷雾干燥后L. plantarum对大肠杆菌O157:H7和沙门氏菌的抑制圈直径为12.3–12.6 mm和14.3–14.4 mm，表明其具有广谱抗菌活性且未因干燥过程受损。
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (no genetic modifications or kill switches)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Non-pathogenic; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; low risk of horizontal gene transfer; no environmental escape risk due to lack of genetic engineering.
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Physical encapsulation in dried powder matrix provides barrier to release.
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Lactobacillus plantarum TISTR 2075 is classified as GRAS (Generally Recognized As Safe). It is non-pathogenic, does not carry antibiotic resistance genes, and is not genetically modified. The spray-dried powder form provides physical containment, minimizing environmental release risk.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 喷雾干燥后L. plantarum TISTR 2075在模拟胃肠道环境中表现出良好的存活率，对大肠杆菌O157:H7和沙门氏菌具有显著的抑制作用，且在25°C和33%相对湿度下储存180天后仍保持较高活性，表明其具有良好的稳定性和功能性，适用于非冷藏条件下的商业化应用。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Grown anaerobically at 37°C on MRS medium; optimal growth temperature 37°C, pH not specified but typical for lactic acid bacteria.
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time not reported; growth observed in vitro and in vivo in mouse gut with stable population levels over time.
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gastrointestinal tract (digestive tract), particularly in the gut lumen; capable of transient colonization and persistence without antibiotic pressure.
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Can interact with resident enterococci (e.g., E. faecium) in the gut; potential to act as a vector for horizontal gene transfer. No evidence of competition or symbiosis with other microbiota.
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to digestive transit (gastric and intestinal conditions); survives in gut environment for extended periods (up to 30 days).
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): None explicitly mentioned, but survival suggests inherent tolerance to bile, pH fluctuations, and shear stress in gut.
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Lactobacillus acidophilus La5 is a probiotic strain that grows anaerobically at 37°C and can survive and persist in the mouse gastrointestinal tract. It is capable of transient colonization and long-term persistence even in the absence of antibiotic selection, indicating robust environmental tolerance during digestive transit.
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Conjugative transfer via Tn1546-like transposon on a large conjugative plasmid (in donor E. faecium); no engineered genetic tools used in this study.
G_edit_efficiency (编辑效率): Not applicable (no deliberate genetic modification in this study).
G_circuit_control (回路控制): Not applicable (no synthetic circuits or inducible systems described).
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): Chromosomal integration of vanA cluster is stable in vivo; transconjugants persist for at least 30 days without antibiotic pressure. However, transconjugants show ecological disadvantage (lower colonization levels than wild-type recipient).
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): No material encapsulation or delivery system used; natural gut environment serves as the medium.
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): The strain was not genetically modified in this study. However, it acquired the vanA gene cluster via natural conjugative transfer from Enterococcus faecium, demonstrating its ability to integrate and maintain foreign antibiotic resistance genes in the gut environment.
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): No specific engineered sensor identified; natural adaptation to gut environment enables survival and interaction.
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No synthetic logic gates or regulatory circuits described; natural physiological responses to gut conditions.
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): Lactobacillus acidophilus La5 naturally senses and adapts to the anaerobic, bile-rich, and fluctuating pH environment of the gastrointestinal tract. It does not possess engineered sensing circuits but can respond to microbial proximity (e.g., co-colonization with enterococci) to facilitate conjugation, suggesting passive sensing of physical and chemical cues in the gut.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Conjugative transfer via plasmid-mediated horizontal gene transfer (HGT); no secretion systems or lysis described.
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): No dosage control; transfer frequency is spontaneous and influenced by donor-recipient proximity and gut environment.
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Natural gut environment supports conjugation; no artificial material used for delivery or encapsulation.
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Not applicable (no antibacterial function described).
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 无相关证据
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Not applicable (no immunomodulatory function described).
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Not applicable (no tissue repair function described).
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Not applicable (no metabolic regulation function described).
E_F_mechanism_desc (肿瘤治疗描述): Not applicable (no tumor therapy function described).
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (no engineered kill-switch or auxotrophy used).
