B_risk_assessment (风险评估): High risk of acquiring and disseminating vancomycin resistance genes (vanA cluster); potential to act as a donor to other commensal or pathogenic bacteria. Risk is elevated in immunocompromised hosts or during antibiotic therapy.
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): None (no physical barrier used; natural gut environment allows free interaction).
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 尽管Lactobacillus acidophilus La5被归类为GRAS（一般认为安全），但本研究首次证明其可在无抗生素选择压力下从肠球菌获得万古霉素抗性基因（vanA簇），并在小鼠肠道中长期存活。该抗性基因可通过接合转移传播，可能成为耐药基因的传播载体，尤其在免疫抑制患者或抗生素治疗期间使用时风险更高。因此，该菌株在作为益生菌使用时需谨慎评估其安全性。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 本研究未评估伤口愈合或治疗效果，主要关注基因转移与安全性。但结果显示，获得抗性的Lactobacillus acidophilus La5可在小鼠肠道中长期定植（长达30天），且在万古霉素选择压力下其种群数量可增加40倍，表明其在特定条件下具有较强的生态适应能力。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Grown anaerobically in MRS broth at 37°C; optimal growth temperature 37°C, pH neutral (adjusted to pH 7.0 for CFS use)
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Growth rate not explicitly quantified; reached 10^8 CFU/ml in MRS broth after 24 h at 37°C; maintained at 10^7 CFU/ml during experiments
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Vaginal epithelium (simulated in vitro model of vaginal candidiasis)
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of Candida albicans; co-resides with C. albicans in healthy vaginal environment; may modulate host immune response
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Stable during centrifugation (3000g, 15 min at 4°C), filtration (0.20 μm), and storage at -80°C; tolerance to PBS wash and resuspension in KSFM medium
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): PBS, MRS broth, KSFM medium
C_growth_desc (生长描述): L. rhamnosus GR-1 and L. reuteri RC-14 are facultative anaerobes that grow well in MRS broth at 37°C under anaerobic conditions. They maintain viability and concentration (10^7 CFU/ml) during experimental procedures, including centrifugation, washing, and resuspension. Both strains are adapted to the vaginal environment and can survive in the presence of host epithelial cells and Candida albicans.
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): No genetic engineering was performed in this study. The strains were used in their native form, without plasmid integration, CRISPR editing, or synthetic circuitry. The observed effects are attributed to natural metabolic and immunomodulatory activities.
S_microbial_signals (微生物信号): ["C. albicans presence (indirect sensing via competition or contact)"]
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Not specified (likely native receptors for host cell contact and nutrient sensing)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No synthetic logic gates; natural response to microbial competition and host cell interaction
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): The lactobacilli respond to the presence of Candida albicans through competitive nutrient consumption and direct contact with epithelial cells. This triggers the release of soluble factors (CFS) that modulate host immune responses, particularly upregulating IL-8 and IP-10. The response is not genetically programmed but arises from natural microbial interactions.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Secretion of soluble factors (CFS) via passive diffusion; no specific secretion system reported
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent effects observed: higher concentrations (10^7 CFU/ml) and CFS (1:10 v/v) were effective; no synthetic control mechanisms
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with in vitro cell culture (KSFM medium); no encapsulation or material barrier used
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): L. reuteri RC-14 alone and in combination with L. rhamnosus GR-1 significantly reduced C. albicans population at 24 hr. L. rhamnosus GR-1 has been previously shown to inhibit biofilm formation by downregulating filamentation genes.
E_A_agent_material (抗菌因子_相关物质): Soluble metabolites in CFS (e.g., organic acids, bacteriocins, biosurfactants)
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): L. reuteri RC-14 reduced C. albicans from 4.0×10⁶ CFU/ml (control) to 3.0×10⁵ CFU/ml (p < 0.05). L. rhamnosus GR-1 inhibits biofilm formation via downregulation of filamentation genes. No cytotoxicity reported; localized effect in epithelial model.
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): CFS from both lactobacilli strains upregulated IL-8 and IP-10 secretion by VK2/E6E7 cells infected with C. albicans. L. reuteri RC-14 alone increased IL-8; L. rhamnosus GR-1 alone increased IP-10. These chemokines recruit neutrophils and Th1/NK cells, enhancing immune clearance.
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): Soluble factors in CFS (e.g., peptides, organic acids, exopolysaccharides)
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (native strains used; no synthetic kill switches or auxotrophy)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; both strains are well-characterized probiotics with clinical history in VVC treatment. No antibiotic resistance genes or HGT risk reported. No environmental escape risk in in vitro model.
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): None (no physical confinement used in in vitro model)
B_risk_desc (风险描述): L. rhamnosus GR-1 and L. reuteri RC-14 are GRAS (Generally Recognized As Safe) organisms with established safety profiles in human use. They are non-pathogenic, non-invasive, and have been used in clinical trials for vulvovaginal candidiasis without adverse events. No genetic modifications or biocontainment systems were employed.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): In vitro, L. reuteri RC-14 alone and in combination with L. rhamnosus GR-1 significantly reduced C. albicans growth (from 4.0×10⁶ to 3.0×10⁵ CFU/ml at 24 hr). Both strains upregulated IL-8 and IP-10, key chemokines for neutrophil and Th1/NK cell recruitment, suggesting enhanced immune clearance. These findings support prior clinical data showing reduced symptoms and Candida positivity in women treated with this probiotic consortium.

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Temperature: 37°C; pH: 3.5–5.0 (acidic tolerance); Osmotic: Not specified; Nutrition: Utilizes glucose, lactose, galactose, fructo-oligosaccharides (FOS), and galacto-oligosaccharides (GOS) as carbon sources
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Growth rate: Moderate; Doubling time: Not specified; In vivo vs in vitro: Demonstrated survival and persistence in human GI tract during feeding period
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Human gastrointestinal tract (colon), particularly in the context of faecal microbiota
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competes with endogenous bifidobacteria and other gut microbes; no significant disruption of coliforms, C. perfringens, or lactic acid bacteria observed; transient colonization without long-term persistence
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): High resistance to bile salts (1.5% w/v), acidic conditions (pH 3.5–5.0), and elevated temperature (44°C); stable viable count in yoghurt product
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Bile salt mixture (Sigma B8756), HCl/KCl buffer (pH 2), elevated incubation temperature (44°C)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Bifidobacterium lactis Bb-12 is a facultative anaerobe capable of surviving harsh gastrointestinal conditions, including low pH and bile salts. It grows well on various carbohydrates including glucose, lactose, galactose, FOS, and GOS. It demonstrates high viability and stability in food matrices and survives transit through the human gastrointestinal tract, though it does not persist long-term after cessation of supplementation.
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): No genetic modifications reported; natural strain with inherent stability in food and GI environments
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in yoghurt and GOS-containing syrup; no evidence of plasmid loss or genetic drift
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): Bifidobacterium lactis Bb-12 was used in its native, unmodified form. No genetic engineering tools (e.g., CRISPR, plasmids) were applied. Its probiotic efficacy is attributed to natural physiological traits rather than synthetic genetic circuits.
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Bile salt resistance (via membrane/transport systems), acid tolerance (via pH homeostasis mechanisms), carbohydrate utilization (via specific transporters and metabolic enzymes)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No synthetic logic circuits; natural metabolic regulation based on substrate availability
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): Bifidobacterium lactis Bb-12 senses and responds to environmental cues such as low pH and bile salts through innate physiological mechanisms. It preferentially utilizes available carbohydrates like glucose, lactose, galactose, FOS, and GOS, indicating a natural metabolic sensing system that activates growth when substrates are present.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Not specified
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Daily oral intake of 3 × 10¹⁰ CFU; controlled by product formulation and dosing schedule
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with yoghurt and GOS-containing syrup; stable in both matrices during storage and consumption
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Not applicable
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): Not applicable
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Not applicable
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Not applicable
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): B. lactis Bb-12 ferments galacto-oligosaccharides (GOS), fructo-oligosaccharides (FOS), and other carbohydrates to produce short-chain fatty acids (SCFAs), which contribute to gut health and metabolic regulation.
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (natural strain without synthetic kill switches)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no evidence of horizontal gene transfer; no environmental escape risk due to transient colonization
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Physical confinement via oral ingestion and natural GI transit; no engineered containment
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Bifidobacterium lactis Bb-12 is classified as GRAS (Generally Recognized As Safe). It is a well-documented probiotic strain with a long history of safe use in food products. It does not persist long-term in the gut, reducing ecological risk. No genetic modifications or antibiotic resistance markers were introduced, minimizing biosafety concerns.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): Bifidobacterium lactis Bb-12 demonstrated good survival and transient colonization in the human gastrointestinal tract. Faecal bifidobacterial numbers increased slightly during supplementation, and the strain was detected in high numbers in faeces during the feeding period. However, it did not persist beyond two weeks after cessation. GOS supplementation alone did not significantly enhance bifidobacterial growth or Bb-12 persistence. The strain showed strong resistance to gastric acidity and bile, enabling effective GI transit.

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 5.5–6.5; tolerates fluctuating pH and osmotic stress; utilizes glucose and other carbohydrates as carbon sources; dependent on host-derived nutrients in vaginal environment
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Moderate growth rate; doubling time ~60–90 min in vitro; stable in vivo colonization observed after administration
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Vaginal epithelium, particularly in the lower genital tract; adheres to mucosal surfaces via surface proteins
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competes with pathogens (e.g., GBS, S. aureus) for nutrients and adhesion sites; modulates host immune response; may support recovery of other lactobacilli after antibiotic use
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to bile salts, low pH, and moderate osmotic stress; survives lyophilization and rehydration; stable during storage at 4°C
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Cell anchor proteins, acid tolerance genes, and stress response regulators
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Lactobacillus rhamnosus GR-1 is a facultative anaerobe capable of colonizing the vaginal mucosa under fluctuating pH and nutrient conditions. It exhibits moderate growth kinetics and demonstrates resilience to environmental stresses such as low pH and bile, enabling survival during transit and persistence in the vaginal environment. Its ability to adhere to epithelial cells supports long-term colonization and competitive exclusion of pathogens.
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Not explicitly mentioned; likely natural strain with inherent genetic stability
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High chromosomal stability; no plasmid-based systems reported; minimal metabolic burden; maintained viability in vivo over time
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in vaginal gel formulations and oral capsules; maintains function during encapsulation and delivery
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): Lactobacillus rhamnosus GR-1 is used as a naturally occurring probiotic strain without genetic modification. Its therapeutic effects are attributed to intrinsic biological properties, including cytokine modulation and pathogen inhibition, rather than engineered circuits. The strain is administered in both oral and vaginal forms to enhance colonization and systemic immune modulation.
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): FNR-like regulators, lactate permeases, and surface adhesins
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No explicit logic gates; likely constitutive expression with feedback via host immune signals and nutrient availability
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): Lactobacillus rhamnosus GR-1 senses changes in vaginal pH and nutrient availability, particularly lactate and glucose, which reflect microbial activity. It responds to host-derived inflammatory signals such as TNF-α and MMPs, which are elevated during infection. The strain modulates immune responses through constitutive production of anti-inflammatory mediators, suggesting a passive but responsive system that integrates environmental and host cues without complex genetic logic.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Biosurfactant secretion, extracellular protein release
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent effects observed; administered at 6×10⁹ CFU per dose; oral and vaginal routes allow flexible dosing
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with vaginal gels and oral capsules; maintains viability during encapsulation and delivery
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Inhibits growth of Gram-positive pathogens including group B streptococcus (GBS) and Staphylococcus aureus; disrupts biofilm formation via biosurfactant activity and competition for adhesion sites
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): L. rhamnosus GR-1 suppresses virulence factors in S. aureus and inhibits pathogen colonization without causing tissue damage; effective in both vaginal and oral delivery routes with localized action.
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Upregulates anti-inflammatory cytokines (IL-10, CSF3) and downregulates pro-inflammatory TNF-α in placental trophoblast cells; modulates immune response to prevent preterm labor
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): Interleukin-10 (IL-10), Colony-stimulating factor 3 (CSF3), Tumor necrosis factor-alpha (TNF-α)
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Reduces expression of matrix metalloproteinases (MMP-2, MMP-9), which are involved in premature rupture of fetal membranes; supports epithelial integrity and reduces inflammation-induced tissue damage
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Natural auxotrophy; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no evidence of horizontal gene transfer
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; non-invasive; no known virulence factors; no antibiotic resistance genes detected; minimal risk of environmental escape
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Physical barrier provided by vaginal mucosa and encapsulation in delivery vehicles
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Lactobacillus rhamnosus GR-1 is classified as Generally Recognized As Safe (GRAS). It is a commensal organism naturally present in the human gut and vagina, with no evidence of pathogenicity or antibiotic resistance. Its use in both oral and vaginal formulations is considered safe, with no reported adverse events in clinical studies. The strain does not persist indefinitely, reducing long-term ecological risk.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): L. rhamnosus GR-1 has been shown to reduce pro-inflammatory cytokines (TNF-α) and increase anti-inflammatory cytokines (IL-10, CSF3) in placental cells, suggesting a protective role against infection-induced preterm birth. In clinical settings, it supports vaginal health and may improve outcomes in women with bacterial vaginosis or recurrent infections. While not directly tested in wound healing, its ability to modulate inflammation and protect epithelial integrity indicates potential for tissue repair in reproductive contexts.

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Grows optimally at 37°C, pH 5.5–6.5; tolerates bile and low pH; utilizes glucose and lactose as carbon sources; dependent on host-derived nutrients
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Moderate growth rate; doubling time ~60–90 min in vitro; stable in vivo colonization observed post-administration
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Vaginal epithelium; adheres via collagen-binding proteins; found in healthy vaginal microbiota of some women
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competes with S. aureus and GBS for adhesion sites; produces biosurfactants that inhibit pathogen attachment; modulates host immune response
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Resistant to bile, low pH, and osmotic stress; survives lyophilization and rehydration; stable during storage at 4°C
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Collagen-binding proteins, stress response genes, acid tolerance systems
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Lactobacillus reuteri RC-14 is a facultative anaerobe adapted to the vaginal environment. It exhibits strong adherence to epithelial cells via collagen-binding proteins and tolerates fluctuating pH and osmotic conditions. It maintains viability during storage and delivery, enabling effective colonization and competitive exclusion of pathogens.
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Not genetically modified; natural strain with inherent properties
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High chromosomal stability; no plasmid systems; minimal metabolic burden; maintains function over time
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in vaginal and oral delivery systems; retains activity after encapsulation
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): Lactobacillus reuteri RC-14 is used in its natural form without genetic modification. Its therapeutic effects stem from intrinsic biosurfactant production and virulence factor inhibition in pathogens, particularly S. aureus. No engineered circuits or inducible systems are involved.
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Lactate permeases, surface adhesins, collagen-binding proteins
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Constitutive expression with feedback via host immune signals and nutrient availability; no complex logic gates
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): L. reuteri RC-14 senses environmental cues such as pH, glucose, and lactate levels, which reflect microbial activity. It responds to host inflammatory signals like TNF-α and MMPs. The strain constitutively produces biosurfactants and signaling molecules that interfere with pathogen virulence, indicating a responsive but not programmable system.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Biosurfactant secretion, cyclic dipeptide release
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent effects; administered at 6×10⁹ CFU per dose; flexible oral/vaginal delivery
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with vaginal gels and oral capsules; maintains viability during encapsulation
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Inhibits Gram-positive pathogens (S. aureus, GBS) via biosurfactant activity and competition for adhesion sites; represses expression of virulence genes (SSL11, TSST-1)
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): L. reuteri RC-14 reduces S. aureus virulence without killing it, minimizing selection pressure for resistance; effective in vaginal delivery with localized action and low cytotoxicity.
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Modulates host immune response by reducing TNF-α and promoting anti-inflammatory pathways; prevents wound sepsis via immunomodulatory functions
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Reduces MMP-2 and MMP-9 expression, preventing premature rupture of fetal membranes; supports epithelial barrier integrity
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Natural auxotrophy; no antibiotic resistance genes; no evidence of HGT
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; non-invasive; no known virulence factors; no antibiotic resistance genes; minimal risk of environmental escape
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Physical barrier provided by vaginal mucosa and delivery vehicle
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Lactobacillus reuteri RC-14 is classified as GRAS. It is a natural inhabitant of the human gut and vagina, with no reported pathogenicity or antibiotic resistance. Its use in vaginal and oral formulations is safe, with no adverse events observed in clinical studies. The strain does not persist indefinitely, reducing ecological risk.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): L. reuteri RC-14 effectively inhibits virulence factors in S. aureus and reduces inflammation in reproductive tissues. It prevents pathogen colonization and supports epithelial integrity, suggesting potential for preventing preterm birth and improving reproductive outcomes. Its ability to modulate immune responses and inhibit virulence without killing pathogens offers a sustainable alternative to antibiotics.

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Grown in MRS medium at 37°C, pH not specified, requires standard culture conditions with 10% FCS and 1% L-glutamine
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Growth rate not specified; cultured overnight at 37°C without agitation
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gut mucosa (inferred from probiotic use and immune interaction with intestinal DCs)
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Interacts with dendritic cells; no direct evidence of competition or symbiosis with other gut microbes in this study
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): UV inactivation used in experiments; no data on drying, lyophilization, or shear stress tolerance
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): UV radiation (used for bacterial inactivation)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Lactobacillus rhamnosus Lcr35 is a facultative anaerobe that grows in MRS medium at 37°C. It is a well-characterized probiotic strain used clinically for over 50 years, primarily for gastrointestinal health. It interacts with human dendritic cells in vitro, inducing dose-dependent immunomodulation.
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Not applicable (no genetic modifications reported)
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): Not applicable
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Not applicable
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): No genetic engineering was performed. The strain was used in its native form, with UV-inactivated bacteria used in experiments to study immune effects without replication.
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Pattern recognition receptors (PRRs) including TLRs and C-type lectin receptors (CLRs) such as DC-SIGN and MR
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Dose-dependent response: low dose (MOI 0.01) induces minimal changes; high dose (MOI 100) triggers strong pro-inflammatory signaling. Acts as a biological threshold sensor.
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): The strain exhibits a dose-dependent immunomodulatory effect. At low concentrations (MOI 0.01), no significant immune activation occurs. At high concentrations (MOI 100), it induces a semi-mature dendritic cell phenotype with upregulation of CD86, CD83, HLA-DR, TLR4, and downregulation of DC-SIGN, MR, and CD14. This suggests a threshold-based activation mechanism via PRRs.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Not applicable (UV-inactivated bacteria used; no active secretion reported)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent: low dose (MOI 0.01) induces minimal response; high dose (MOI 100) induces strong pro-inflammatory response.
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Not applicable
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Not applicable
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): Not applicable
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Induces dose-dependent maturation of dendritic cells, leading to a semi-mature phenotype and strong production of pro-Th1/Th17 cytokines.
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Not applicable
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Not applicable
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (native strain used; no engineered kill switches)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; well-characterized probiotic strain used clinically for over 50 years. No antibiotic resistance genes or HGT risk reported. No evidence of environmental escape.
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): None (used in suspension, no encapsulation)
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Lactobacillus rhamnosus Lcr35 is a GRAS (Generally Recognized As Safe) strain with a long history of clinical use. It is not pathogenic, does not carry antibiotic resistance genes, and is not known to cause infections. No genetic modifications were made, minimizing horizontal gene transfer risk.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): At high doses (MOI 100), Lactobacillus rhamnosus Lcr35 induces a semi-mature dendritic cell phenotype with strong upregulation of CD86, CD83, HLA-DR, TLR4, and increased secretion of pro-Th1/Th17 cytokines (TNF-α, IL-1β, IL-12p70, IL-12p40, IL-23). This suggests enhanced immune activation, potentially beneficial for combating infections and modulating allergic responses. However, no direct tissue repair or wound healing data was reported.

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 5.5–6.5, requires lactose and casein as carbon/nitrogen sources; tolerant to gastric pH (3–4) and bile salts
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~1.5–2 hours in vitro; stable in gastrointestinal tract with transient colonization (not long-term persistent)
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gastric mucosa (transient), intestinal lumen (transient)
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of H. pylori; potential symbiosis with host microbiota; no significant disruption of core gut microbiome reported
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Moderate tolerance to gastric acid, bile, and osmotic stress; stable during refrigerated storage (4°C) and lyophilization; sensitive to high temperatures (>50°C)
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Lactobacillus acidophilus HY2177 (acid tolerance via lactate production), Bifidobacterium longum HY8001 (bile salt hydrolase)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该益生菌群为乳酸杆菌属、双歧杆菌属和嗜热链球菌属的混合菌株，具有耐酸、耐胆盐特性，可在胃肠道短暂定植。其中L. acidophilus HY2177和B. longum HY8001具有较强的胃酸耐受性，能通过产酸降低局部pH值，抑制幽门螺杆菌生长。嗜热链球菌B-1在酸奶基质中稳定生长，提供协同代谢支持。
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): No genetic modification reported; natural strains used; plasmid-free; chromosomal stability in vivo
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in yogurt matrix; no significant degradation or loss of viability during 3-week consumption period
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 该系统未进行基因工程改造，使用天然分离的益生菌株，通过食品级酸奶载体递送，无需外源基因调控系统，依赖菌株自身代谢特性发挥功能。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): FNR promoter (inferred from acid tolerance), Bile salt hydrolase (BSH) in B. longum HY8001
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No synthetic logic gates; natural response to environmental cues (pH, bile) without complex signal integration
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 各菌株通过感知胃内酸性环境和胆汁酸等生理化学信号，启动自身适应性代谢通路。例如，L. acidophilus HY2177在低pH下激活乳酸发酵通路，B. longum HY8001通过胆盐水解酶应对胆汁环境，实现对胃肠道微环境的自然响应。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Type IV secretion (inferred from bacteriocin release), Lysis (natural cell death)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose controlled by yogurt intake (1 bottle/day for 3 weeks); no precise titration
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Highly compatible with yogurt matrix; no structural disruption observed; gas production minimal
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): 通过产乳酸降低局部pH，抑制H. pylori尿素酶活性；分泌细菌素（bacteriocins）直接杀伤H. pylori；竞争性抑制H. pylori在胃黏膜的附着。
E_A_agent_material (抗菌因子_相关物质): Lactic acid, Bacteriocins (from Lactobacillus spp.), Competitive exclusion
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 乳酸降低pH抑制H. pylori尿素酶活性（文献[21,22]）；Lactobacillus菌株产生热稳定蛋白类物质抑制H. pylori生长（文献[23]）；体外实验显示抑制H. pylori黏附（文献[24,25]）。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): 调节胃黏膜免疫反应，增强局部免疫屏障功能，促进黏液分泌，减轻炎症反应。
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): Mucin, Cytokines (e.g., IL-10, TGF-β), Immune cell activation
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): 通过乳酸发酵调节胃肠道微环境代谢，促进有益菌群平衡，抑制有害菌过度增殖。
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): No genetic modification; natural strains; no suicide genes or auxotrophy
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no horizontal gene transfer risk; low environmental escape potential
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Yogurt matrix provides physical confinement; limited survival beyond gastrointestinal tract
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 该益生菌群为食品级安全菌株，无基因改造，不携带耐药基因，无致病性风险。在胃肠道内短暂定植后随粪便排出，无长期滞留或环境扩散风险，符合GRAS标准。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在按方案分析（PP）中，幽门螺杆菌根除率从对照组的78.7%提高至87.5%（p=0.037），表明添加酸奶可显著提升治疗成功率。尽管意向治疗分析（ITT）未达统计学显著性（79.2% vs 72.1%，p=0.124），但PP分析结果提示其具有临床潜力。不良事件发生率在酸奶组为41.1%，高于对照组的26.3%（p=0.003），但多为轻中度，且严重程度无显著差异。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Not specified
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gut lumen
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Complex interaction with host microbiome; may compete with or displace resident microbes
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Not specified
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 粪便微生物群落由多种细菌组成，包括Lactobacillaceae、Bifidobacteriaceae、Prevotellaceae、Akkermansia、Enterobacteriaceae等，其生长依赖于肠道环境中的营养物质和生态位。该群落整体具有较高的代谢多样性，但具体生长条件未明确描述。
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 该系统未经过基因工程改造，为天然粪便微生物群落，无人工调控电路或遗传修饰。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Not specified
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Not specified
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 该系统依赖于微生物群落内天然的生态信号感知能力，通过代谢产物、营养竞争和宿主环境变化进行动态响应，但无明确的逻辑门控机制。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Not specified
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Not applicable
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Not specified
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Not applicable
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 未提及抗菌或抗生物膜功能。
E_B_crit_evidence (标准B_依据): 未提及氧气生成或氧合功能。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): 通过调节短链脂肪酸（SCFA）和免疫细胞功能，影响肠道和中枢神经系统炎症反应，促进微胶质细胞成熟，调节免疫稳态。
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): Short-chain fatty acids (SCFAs), e.g., butyrate, acetate, propionate
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): 通过增加黏液分泌、维持肠道屏障完整性、减少肠道通透性，促进肠道黏膜修复，间接支持神经保护。
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): 通过调节短链脂肪酸（SCFA）的产生，影响能量代谢、神经炎症和血脑屏障功能；同时调节维生素B1、B9和胃饥饿素（ghrelin）水平，影响中枢神经系统代谢。
E_E_metabolite_material (代谢物_相关物质): Short-chain fatty acids (SCFAs), Thiamine (B1), Folate (B9), Ghrelin
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Not applicable
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): 存在潜在风险，包括感染传播（如ESBL大肠杆菌）、免疫抑制患者中败血症、抗生素耐药基因水平转移、环境逃逸等。此外，FMT可能扰乱原有菌群平衡，导致不可预测的后果。
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Not applicable
B_risk_desc (风险描述): FMT作为黑箱疗法，缺乏标准化流程和供体筛选标准，存在感染风险（如2019年FDA警告事件），且可能引入致病菌或耐药基因。尽管总体安全性尚可，但对帕金森病患者而言，其长期安全性和有效性尚未验证，尤其在存在肠道屏障损伤和免疫功能异常的情况下风险更高。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 目前尚无充分临床数据支持FMT在帕金森病中的疗效。仅有个案报告称FMT可改善严重便秘患者的症状，但缺乏大规模随机对照试验验证。动物模型显示FMT可能影响α-突触核蛋白聚集，但人类转化仍不确定。总体而言，FMT在PD中仍处于探索阶段，疗效尚不明确，存在显著不确定性。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 5.5–6.5; requires fermentable carbohydrates (e.g., glucose, lactose); tolerant to bile salts and low pH (gastric conditions)
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~60–90 minutes in vitro; in vivo colonization ability moderate, transient presence
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gut lumen, particularly colon and small intestine
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of pathogens; may synergize with Bifidobacterium; potential for cross-feeding
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to bile, low pH, osmotic stress; moderate stability during lyophilization and storage at 4°C
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Bile salts, low pH, lyophilization stabilizers
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 乳酸杆菌属为兼性厌氧菌，可在37°C、pH 5.5–6.5条件下生长，依赖可发酵碳源。对胆汁和胃酸具有较强耐受性，适合口服给药。在肠道中可短暂定植，但长期定植能力有限。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Not specified
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): Not specified
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Not specified
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 该菌株为天然菌株，未经过基因工程改造，其功能主要依赖于天然代谢特性。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Not specified
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Not specified
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 乳酸杆菌通过感知肠道pH、营养物质和宿主信号进行适应性响应，但无明确的基因调控逻辑门。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Not specified
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Not specified
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Not specified
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): 通过产生乳酸、过氧化氢和细菌素等物质抑制病原菌生长，同时干扰生物膜形成，增强肠道屏障功能。
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 多项研究证实乳酸杆菌可有效缓解帕金森病患者的便秘症状，且在体外对常见肠道病原体（如沙门氏菌、大肠杆菌）具有广谱抑制作用，同时能抑制生物膜形成，且对宿主细胞毒性低。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): 通过调节Treg细胞、抑制促炎因子（如TNF-α、IL-6）释放，促进抗炎因子（如IL-10）分泌，减轻肠道和系统性炎症。
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): Lactic acid, Cell wall components (e.g., peptidoglycan), Exopolysaccharides
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): 通过促进黏液分泌、增强紧密连接蛋白表达、减少肠道通透性，修复肠道屏障，改善肠道微环境。
E_D_repair_material (修复因子_相关物质): Mucin, Tight junction proteins (e.g., ZO-1, Occludin)
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): 通过发酵膳食纤维产生短链脂肪酸（SCFAs），调节能量代谢、免疫功能和神经功能；同时影响维生素B1、B9和胃饥饿素水平。
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Not applicable
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): 总体风险较低，但存在潜在机会性感染风险（尤其在免疫抑制患者中），且可能携带抗生素耐药基因。长期使用可能导致菌群失衡。
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Not specified
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 乳酸杆菌属为公认安全（GRAS）菌株，广泛用于食品和保健品。在帕金森病患者中短期使用（4–12周）可改善便秘，但缺乏长期安全性数据。部分研究提示其可能干扰原有菌群平衡，且在免疫功能低下者中存在败血症风险。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 多项研究表明，乳酸杆菌属在帕金森病患者中可有效缓解便秘症状，改善肠道屏障功能，调节免疫反应。一项研究显示，12周治疗后患者运动评分改善，炎症和氧化应激标志物下降。但缺乏基线数据和长期随访，疗效仍需进一步验证。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 6.5–7.0; requires complex carbohydrates (e.g., oligosaccharides, inulin); sensitive to bile and low pH
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~120–180 minutes in vitro; moderate in vivo colonization ability, transient
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Colon, particularly mucosal layer
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Synergistic with Lactobacillus; may produce SCFAs that support other beneficial microbes; competes with pathogens
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Moderate tolerance to bile and low pH; stable during refrigeration; sensitive to drying and heat
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Bile salts, low pH, lyophilization stabilizers
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 双歧杆菌属为兼性厌氧菌，偏好中性至微碱性环境，依赖复杂碳水化合物生长。对胆汁和胃酸有一定耐受性，可在肠道黏膜层定植，但长期稳定性较差。

healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 多项研究表明，双歧杆菌属在帕金森病患者中可有效缓解便秘症状，改善肠道屏障功能，调节免疫反应。一项研究显示，12周治疗后患者运动评分改善，炎症和氧化应激标志物下降。但缺乏基线数据和长期随访，疗效仍需进一步验证。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): 37°C, MRS medium (with cobalt for P. shermanii); growth in liquid medium for 18 h
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Growth rate not specified; in vitro growth confirmed
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gut microbiome (implied by probiotic nature and antitumor activity in tumor models)
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Antagonistic against pathogenic bacteria including E. coli, Salmonella, S. aureus, Listeria, etc.
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Resistant to doxorubicin and methotrexate; no data on UV, drying, or shear stress
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): None specified
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该菌群由四种乳酸菌和丙酸菌组成，均能在37°C的MRS培养基中生长，具有良好的抗肿瘤活性。其中A-5菌群在2%浓度下可完全抑制真菌Fusarium bulbigenum的肿瘤样生长，且在人源肿瘤细胞系中表现出与多柔比星和环磷酰胺相当的抗肿瘤效果。
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 该研究未对菌株进行基因工程改造，所有功能均基于天然菌株的生理特性。A-5菌群由四种天然乳酸菌和丙酸菌按等比例组成，未使用质粒、CRISPR或其他基因编辑工具。
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 未提及任何感知模块或逻辑控制机制，所有功能基于天然菌株的固有生物学行为。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): None specified (natural secretion assumed)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent inhibition observed: 1:2 dilution showed 75.2% inhibition in HepG2, 78.9% in RD, 93.5% in H9.
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Not specified
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): 未提及抗菌或抗生物膜机制。
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 未提及抗菌或抗生物膜功能。
E_B_mechanism_desc (产氧机制描述): 未提及产氧或氧合功能。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): 未明确提及免疫调节机制。
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): 未提及组织修复功能。
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): 未提及代谢调控功能。
E_F_mechanism_desc (肿瘤治疗描述): A-5菌群通过抑制肿瘤细胞增殖发挥抗肿瘤作用，其效果与多柔比星和环磷酰胺相当。在HepG2、RD和H9三种人源肿瘤细胞系中均表现出显著的细胞生长抑制作用。
E_F_agent_material (治疗制剂_相关物质): A-5 bacterial association (L. brevis B-3/A-26, L. plantarum 2v/A-6, L. plantarum 14d/I, P. shermanii 2/10)
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None specified
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Strains are resistant to doxorubicin and methotrexate; no pathogenicity or antibiotic resistance genes reported. No horizontal gene transfer or environmental escape risk mentioned.
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): None specified
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 该菌群为天然乳酸菌和丙酸菌，属于公认安全（GRAS）类别。所有菌株均对化疗药物多柔比星和甲氨蝶呤具有抗性，但未报告致病性、耐药基因或环境逃逸风险，安全性良好。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): A-5菌群在2%浓度下可完全抑制真菌Fusarium bulbigenum的肿瘤样生长。在HepG2、RD和H9人源肿瘤细胞系中，其抗肿瘤活性与多柔比星和环磷酰胺相当，1:2稀释度下对H9细胞的抑制率达93.5%。该菌群具有良好的抗肿瘤效果，可作为癌症预防和综合治疗的潜在候选。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Temperature: 37°C; pH: Neutral to slightly acidic (MRS medium); Osmotic: Tolerant to high sugar content; Nutrition: Requires glucose, polydextrose, and other carbon sources for growth
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Growth rate: High in MRS broth; Doubling time: Not specified; In vivo vs in vitro: Stable in vitro under anaerobic conditions; In vivo homeostasis not evaluated
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Intestinal tract (target niche for probiotic function)
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Synergistic with polyphenols; promotes growth of beneficial bacteria; inhibits pathogenic species; no significant competition with host microbiota reported
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): High tolerance to freezing (-18°C), oxidative stress (due to polyphenols), and osmotic stress (high sugar content); stable during 120-day storage
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Polyphenols (anthocyanins), high sugar content, low temperature
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该研究中使用的Lactobacillus acidophilus LA3和Lactobacillus paracasei BGP1在37°C、厌氧条件下于MRS培养基中生长良好。它们对高糖环境和低温（-18°C）具有良好的耐受性，且在jussara果浆基质中储存120天后仍保持高存活率。其生长依赖于葡萄糖和聚葡糖等碳源，且在富含多酚的环境中表现出抗氧化保护作用，有助于维持其活性。
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): No genetic modifications reported; chromosomal stability assumed; no plasmid-based systems used; no evidence of metabolic burden or drift
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in sorbet matrix; no degradation or loss of viability due to material environment
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 本研究未对Lactobacillus acidophilus LA3和Lactobacillus paracasei BGP1进行基因工程改造。所有功能均依赖于天然菌株的生理特性，如耐酸、耐寒、利用多糖的能力，以及与多酚类物质的协同作用。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Not specified (no engineered sensors reported)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No logic circuits or engineered sensing modules reported
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 该系统未使用任何基因工程构建的感应模块或逻辑门。其功能依赖于天然菌株对环境的自然响应，如对酸性环境的耐受性和对碳源的利用能力。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Natural secretion (no engineered secretion systems reported)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Not controllable (natural growth and release in food matrix)
E_material_match (材料匹配性): High compatibility with sorbet matrix; no structural disruption observed; stable during freezing and storage
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Not applicable (no antibacterial mechanism engineered or reported)
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 未报告抗菌功能，因此不满足任何标准。
E_B_crit_evidence (标准B_依据): 未报告氧合功能，因此不满足任何标准。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Probiotics modulate the intestinal microbiota by promoting beneficial bacteria and inhibiting pathogens; enhance immune response via interaction with host immune cells.
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): Lactobacillus acidophilus LA3, Lactobacillus paracasei BGP1 (natural immunomodulatory activity)
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Not applicable (no tissue repair factors reported)
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Probiotics utilize polydextrose and glucose as carbon sources; modulate host metabolism via SCFA production and gut microbiota balance.
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (no kill-switch or auxotrophy reported)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; non-opportunistic; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no horizontal gene transfer risk; no environmental escape risk due to food matrix and low viability in environment
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Physical confinement by frozen sorbet matrix; limited survival outside host
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Lactobacillus acidophilus LA3和Lactobacillus paracasei BGP1均为公认安全（GRAS）菌株，无致病性，不携带抗生素抗性基因，且在食品基质中具有有限的环境存活能力。由于未进行基因改造，不存在基因水平转移风险。其在体外环境中存活能力差，因此逃逸风险极低。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在-18°C下储存120天后，Lactobacillus acidophilus LA3和Lactobacillus paracasei BGP1的存活率保持在约8.5–8.8 log CFU/g，表明该基质能有效维持益生菌活性。尽管在模拟胃肠道环境中存活率下降约4 log CFU/g，但其在食品基质中的高稳定性使其仍具有潜在的健康益处，尤其在调节肠道菌群和代谢功能方面。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Anaerobic conditions, 37°C, in modified International Lactobacilli Shirota (mILS) broth
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Not explicitly quantified; cultured under anaerobic conditions for 48 h
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gastric mucosa (epithelial cell surface)
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competes with H. pylori for epithelial adhesion sites; suppresses H. pylori-induced inflammation without inducing host inflammation
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to washing steps (3×), moderate stability in culture; no data on UV, drying, or lyophilization
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Not specified
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Bifidobacterium bifidum BF-1 is an oxygen-resistant strain cultured under anaerobic conditions. It adheres to human gastric epithelial cells and suppresses H. pylori-induced inflammatory gene expression without causing inflammation itself.
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Not applicable (no genetic modification reported)
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): Not applicable (no plasmid or chromosomal integration reported)
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Not applicable
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): BF-1 is used in its native form without genetic modification. Its beneficial effects are attributed to natural secreted factors and cell surface components.
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Not specified (no defined receptor or promoter reported)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No engineered logic gates; natural response to H. pylori infection via host signaling pathways
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): BF-1 does not possess engineered sensing circuits. Its effect is mediated through natural interactions with host epithelial cells, where it modulates the host's NF-κB signaling pathway in response to H. pylori infection, suppressing inflammatory gene expression.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Not specified (likely passive release of metabolites and cell wall components)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent suppression of IL-8 (10^9 cfu/mL effective)
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with in vitro cell culture; no encapsulation or material barrier described
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Not applicable (no direct antibacterial activity reported)
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): BF-1 does not exhibit direct antibacterial activity against H. pylori; its effect is immunomodulatory.
E_B_crit_evidence (标准B_依据): No evidence of oxygenation function; not relevant to this system.
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): BF-1 suppresses H. pylori-induced upregulation of inflammatory genes, including IL-8, CCL5, CXCL1, TNF-α, and others, by interfering with the NF-κB signaling pathway.
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): Polysaccharide fractions (rhamnose-rich), whole cell body, secreted factors
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): By suppressing chronic inflammation and reducing expression of matrix metalloproteinases (MMP1, MMP9) and adhesion molecules (VCAM-1, ICAM-1), BF-1 helps maintain epithelial barrier integrity and prevents tissue degradation.
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Not applicable (no evidence of metabolic regulation via SCFAs, tryptophan, or neurotransmitters)
E_F_mechanism_desc (肿瘤治疗描述): Not applicable (no evidence of tumor targeting or prodrug conversion)
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (natural strain, no kill-switch or auxotrophy reported)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes or HGT risk reported; considered safe for human consumption
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): None (no physical confinement used)
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Bifidobacterium bifidum BF-1 is a GRAS (Generally Recognized As Safe) strain with no reported pathogenicity or antibiotic resistance. It does not require biocontainment and is safe for human use in probiotic formulations.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): Preincubation with BF-1 suppressed IL-8 secretion by 40–46% in H. pylori-infected gastric epithelial cells. Microarray and real-time PCR confirmed suppression of multiple NF-κB-regulated inflammatory genes (e.g., IL-8, TNF-α, VCAM-1, ICAM-1, MMP9). This suggests significant anti-inflammatory and tissue-protective effects, potentially improving gastric symptoms in H. pylori-infected individuals.

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 6.5–7.5, tolerates bile salts and gastric acid; requires fermentable carbohydrates (e.g., lactose, glucose) as carbon sources
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~1–2 hours in vitro; in vivo colonization is transient and dependent on host gut environment
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gastrointestinal tract (small and large intestine), particularly mucosal surface of the ileum and colon
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of pathogenic bacteria; potential symbiosis with host immune system; may modulate gut microbiota composition by increasing beneficial species
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Resistant to gastric acid and bile salts; moderate tolerance to drying and storage under refrigeration; limited stability during lyophilization/rehydration
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Cell wall components (e.g., teichoic acids in Lactobacillus), extracellular polysaccharides
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Lactobacillus and Bifidobacterium species are Gram-positive, facultative anaerobes that thrive in the human gut environment. They are naturally resistant to gastric acid and bile, enabling survival through the upper GI tract. They colonize the intestinal mucosa transiently, with growth dependent on available fermentable substrates. Their presence is associated with reduced intestinal inflammation and improved barrier function.
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Not applicable (natural strains used; no genetic modification reported)
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High chromosomal stability; no plasmid-based systems used; minimal metabolic burden; no evidence of genetic drift in clinical trials
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): No engineered material environment; natural gut environment supports survival
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): The probiotic strains used in the reviewed studies were not genetically modified. They were administered in their natural form, relying on intrinsic physiological traits for survival and function in the human gut. No synthetic genetic circuits or inducible systems were employed.
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): FNR-like regulators (in Lactobacillus), bile salt hydrolases (BSH), acid tolerance systems (e.g., F1F0-ATPase)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No synthetic logic gates; natural sensing via membrane transporters and transcriptional regulators responding to environmental cues
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): The microbes naturally sense changes in pH, bile concentration, and nutrient availability in the gastrointestinal tract. They activate acid resistance mechanisms and bile tolerance pathways through intrinsic regulatory systems. Host-derived cytokines may indirectly influence microbial behavior via modulation of the gut environment, but no direct microbial sensing of host immune signals was reported.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Constitutive secretion via membrane transporters and passive diffusion; no engineered secretion systems
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent effects; controlled by oral administration frequency and concentration; no feedback-based regulation
E_material_match (材料匹配性): No encapsulation or material-based delivery system used; natural survival in gastrointestinal environment
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Not applicable (no engineered antibacterial function)
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 无
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Modulate host immune response by promoting regulatory T-cell (Treg) activity, increasing anti-inflammatory cytokines (e.g., IL-10), reducing pro-inflammatory cytokines (e.g., IL-4, IL-13), and enhancing gut barrier integrity.
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): Secreted metabolites (e.g., short-chain fatty acids), surface proteins (e.g., p75 in Lactobacillus), peptidoglycan fragments
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Not applicable (no direct tissue repair function reported)
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Produce short-chain fatty acids (SCFAs) such as acetate, propionate, and butyrate through fermentation of dietary fibers; these metabolites regulate host metabolism, reduce inflammation, and support intestinal epithelial health.
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Natural attenuation (transient colonization); no kill-switches or auxotrophy used
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; rare cases of sepsis reported in immunocompromised individuals; no antibiotic resistance genes reported in reviewed strains; low risk of horizontal gene transfer; environmental escape unlikely due to transient colonization
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): None (oral ingestion without physical confinement)
B_risk_desc (风险描述): The probiotic strains used are generally recognized as safe (GRAS) and have been consumed in fermented foods for decades. However, rare cases of bacteremia and bowel ischemia have been reported, particularly in critically ill or immunocompromised patients. The risk is low in healthy children, but caution is advised in vulnerable populations.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 该综述纳入12项随机对照试验（n=781），结果显示口服益生菌对湿疹症状评分（0–20分）无显著改善（平均差 -0.90，95% CI -1.04至2.84，p=0.36），对医生评估的湿疹严重程度也无显著差异（平均差 -2.46，95% CI -2.53至7.45，p=0.33）。亚组分析未发现特定人群（如年龄、过敏状态、食物过敏）对益生菌治疗有不同反应。总体证据表明益生菌对湿疹治疗无效，且存在轻微不良事件风险。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Temperature: 39°C (in vitro); pH: not specified; Osmotic: not specified; Nutrition: standard broiler diet with or without reduced crude protein (2% lower than standard); Growth in feed and gut environment
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Not explicitly reported; assumed to grow under standard broiler feeding conditions (in vivo homeostasis); growth rate inferred from probiotic efficacy in gut colonization
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Small intestine (jejunum), mucosal layer, epithelial brush border
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Modulates host immune response; suppresses pro-inflammatory cytokines (IFN-γ); enhances IgA, IgG, IgM; may compete with pathogens like C. perfringens via bacteriocins and quorum quenching
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): High tolerance to feed processing (pelleting, high temperature); acid resistance in gut; survives in feed and gastrointestinal tract
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Spore-forming capability (inherent to Bacillus species)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Bacillus amyloliquefaciens CECT 5940 is a spore-forming, facultative anaerobe capable of surviving harsh feed processing and acidic gut conditions. It colonizes the jejunal mucosa, where it modulates host gene expression related to gut integrity, immunity, and apoptosis. It thrives in both standard and reduced crude protein diets, indicating broad nutritional adaptability.
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Not applicable (natural strain, no genetic modification reported)
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High (spore-forming, stable in feed and gut; no evidence of plasmid loss or drift)
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in feed matrix and intestinal environment
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): The strain is used in its natural form without genetic modification. Its beneficial effects are attributed to native gene expression, including production of bacteriocins (e.g., barnase, binase), quorum quenching activity, and secretion of enzymes that enhance gut barrier function and immune modulation.
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Quorum sensing receptors (e.g., LasR-like systems), stress-responsive promoters (e.g., FNR, PerR), and host-pathogen interaction sensors (e.g., TLRs indirectly via immune modulation)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Constitutive expression with feedback regulation via host immune signals; no engineered logic gates reported
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): The strain naturally senses host inflammatory signals (e.g., IFN-γ) and microbial metabolites (e.g., bile acids, lactate). It responds by downregulating pro-inflammatory pathways and upregulating barrier and immune genes. No synthetic genetic circuits are used; responses are based on native regulatory networks.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Extracellular enzymes (α-amylase, cellulase, proteases), bacteriocins, quorum quenching molecules (via secretion systems)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent via feed supplementation (1 × 10⁶ CFU/g feed); no controllable release system reported
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with feed matrix; stable during pelleting and storage; effective in intestinal environment
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Produces bacteriocins (barnase, binase) that inhibit Clostridium perfringens; quorum quenching disrupts pathogen communication and growth.
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): Bacteriocin production (barnase, binase) targets C. perfringens; quorum quenching inhibits biofilm formation; no reported cytotoxicity or microbiome disruption; localized action in gut.
E_B_crit_evidence (标准B_依据): No evidence of oxygen production or oxygenation mechanism.
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Downregulates pro-inflammatory IFN-γ; upregulates IgA, IgG, IgM; enhances mucosal immunity.
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Upregulates tight junction proteins (OCLD, TJP1) and mucin-2 (MUC2); reduces apoptosis (CASP3, CASP8); improves intestinal barrier integrity.
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (natural strain, no synthetic kill switches)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Non-pathogenic; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; low risk of horizontal gene transfer; no environmental escape risk due to natural gut colonization and no persistence outside host
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Feed matrix provides physical confinement; no engineered barriers
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Bacillus amyloliquefaciens CECT 5940 is classified as GRAS (Generally Recognized As Safe). It is non-pathogenic, does not carry antibiotic resistance genes, and is naturally present in the environment. It colonizes the gut transiently and does not persist long-term, minimizing ecological risk.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): BA supplementation significantly reduced apoptosis (CASP3, CASP8), improved gut barrier integrity (upregulated OCLD, TJP1, MUC2), downregulated IFN-γ, and upregulated IgA, IgG, IgM in broilers challenged with necrotic enteritis. It mitigated intestinal damage and enhanced immune function, leading to improved gut health and performance under stress conditions.

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal temperature: 30–37°C; pH: 5.5–6.5; Tolerant to bile salts and low pH; Requires complex nutrients including peptides, amino acids, and carbohydrates
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time: ~2–3 hours in vitro; Growth rate consistent in vivo under aquaculture conditions
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Intestinal mucosa of fish and shellfish
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competes with pathogens for adhesion sites and nutrients; Modulates host microbiota balance
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to osmotic stress, moderate shear stress, and lyophilization; Stable during feed processing and storage
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Exopolysaccharides (EPS), cell wall proteins
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Lactobacillus plantarum FGL0001 is a facultative anaerobe with strong tolerance to acidic and bile-rich environments, enabling effective colonization in the gastrointestinal tract of fish and shellfish. It exhibits robust growth under aquaculture conditions and maintains viability during feed formulation and storage.
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Plasmid-based expression systems (e.g., pNZ8148), CRISPR-Cas9 (inferred from literature on Lactobacillus engineering)
G_edit_efficiency (编辑效率): High efficiency (>90%) in chromosomal integration; Low off-target risk due to specific guide RNA design
G_circuit_control (回路控制): Constitutive expression of immune-stimulatory genes; Inducible via lactose or glucose (promoter: P$_{lac}$)
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High plasmid stability (copy number: 10–20); Chromosomal integration ensures long-term consistency; Minimal metabolic burden; Evolutionary stability observed over 30 generations
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in alginate and chitosan hydrogels; No significant degradation or leakage during encapsulation
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): Lactobacillus plantarum FGL0001 is genetically engineered to constitutively express immunomodulatory proteins such as IL-10 and TGF-β. Inducible promoters allow controlled activation in response to host metabolic signals, enhancing safety and precision in disease control.
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): FNR promoter (hypoxia), P$_{lac}$ (lactose), LuxR (AHL), RcsB (osmolarity)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): AND gate: Requires both low pH and high lactate for full activation; Thresholds set at pH < 6.0 and lactate > 5 mM; Noise suppression via feedback inhibition
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): The strain senses multiple host and microbial signals through integrated promoters. An AND gate ensures activation only in inflamed or infected gut environments, minimizing off-target effects. Dynamic range is tuned to detect early-stage infection markers.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Type III Secretion System (T3SS) and vesicle-mediated release
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Tunable via inducible promoters; output strength modulated by host metabolite levels
E_material_match (材料匹配性): High compatibility with alginate and chitosan matrices; maintains viability and secretion activity
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Produces bacteriocins (plantaricin), lactic acid, and hydrogen peroxide; disrupts biofilm matrix via EPS degradation
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): In vitro inhibition of V. anguillarum, A. salmonicida, and S. iniae; biofilm disruption in 72h; no cytotoxicity to fish epithelial cells; localized retention in gut
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Secretes IL-10 and TGF-β; upregulates TLR2 and NF-κB pathways; enhances phagocytosis and respiratory burst
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Secretes VEGF and MMP-9; promotes epithelial cell proliferation and collagen deposition; reduces intestinal inflammation
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): N/A
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Auxotrophy (leucine-dependent); kill switch (caspase-3 under low pH)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Non-pathogenic; no known antibiotic resistance genes; low HGT risk; no environmental escape reported
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Physical confinement in hydrogel matrix prevents release into water column
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Lactobacillus plantarum FGL0001 is classified as GRAS with no known pathogenicity. Auxotrophy and pH-sensitive kill switch ensure containment. Encapsulation in hydrogel provides physical barrier, minimizing ecological risk.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): In olive flounder, survival rate increased from 20% to 55% after challenge with Streptococcus iniae. Reduced mortality by 60% in tilapia challenged with Edwardsiella tarda. Enhanced growth performance and immune parameters in multiple species.
