B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no evidence of horizontal gene transfer; environmental escape unlikely due to non-persistent nature in gut
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Physical confinement via oral delivery and gastrointestinal transit; no engineered barriers
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 该系统使用的是公认安全（GRAS）的乳酸菌菌株，未进行基因改造，无致病性或耐药基因风险，且在肠道中定植能力有限，不会长期滞留，因此生物安全风险极低。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 喂食益生菌酸奶（La-Dahi 和 LaBb-Dahi）可显著提升衰老小鼠肝脏和肾脏中CAT和GPx的活性，降低TBARS和蛋白羰基水平，恢复氧化应激平衡。同时显著上调PPAR-α、klotho和SMP-30等衰老标志物的表达，表明其在延缓衰老、改善氧化损伤方面具有显著功效。两种制剂效果相当，主要归因于L. acidophilus LaVK2的作用。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 6.5–7.0, in media containing glucose and amino acids; requires 10% fetal bovine serum for in vitro culture.
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~1.5–2 h in rich media; consistent in vitro growth kinetics; no in vivo homeostasis data provided.
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Intestinal mucosa (gut lumen and mucus layer); potential for colonization in colorectal environment.
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of pathogenic bacteria; synergistic interaction with phenolic compounds to enhance bioavailability and activity.
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Moderate tolerance to gastric acidity and bile salts; stable during freeze-drying and rehydration; limited data on UV, shear, or long-term storage.
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Bile salts, gastric pH (simulated), freeze-drying matrix
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Lactobacillus paracasei BGP1 and Bifidobacterium animalis subsp. lactis BLC1 are facultative anaerobes capable of growing in standard laboratory media under aerobic and microaerophilic conditions. They thrive at 37°C in nutrient-rich environments, particularly those containing glucose and amino acids. Both strains are adapted to the intestinal environment, where they can survive transient exposure to bile and low pH. Their growth is supported by fetal bovine serum in culture media, indicating a dependency on host-derived nutrients. These microbes are designed for oral delivery and intestinal persistence, with potential to modulate the gut microbiota through competitive exclusion and metabolic synergy with dietary phenolics.
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Not specified (no genetic modifications reported)
G_edit_efficiency (编辑效率): Not applicable (no genome editing tools used)
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High chromosomal stability; no plasmids reported; no data on long-term in vivo drift or metabolic burden.
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in aqueous extract suspensions; no evidence of degradation in phenolic-rich matrices.
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): The microbial consortium is used in its native, unmodified form. No genetic engineering or synthetic circuits were applied. The strains are selected for their natural probiotic properties, including survival in the gastrointestinal tract, interaction with dietary polyphenols, and induction of chemopreventive responses in colon cancer cells. The system relies on intrinsic metabolic capabilities rather than engineered genetic circuits.
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Not specified (no specific receptors or promoters identified)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No logic gates or threshold-based control reported; activity is likely constitutive and responsive to environmental cues via native regulatory systems.
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): The system does not employ engineered sensing circuits. Instead, the microbes respond to physiological and chemical cues in the gut environment—such as pH, bile, and nutrient availability—through their native regulatory networks. Their activity is modulated by the presence of phenolic compounds, which may be sensed indirectly via metabolic flux or membrane transporters. No dynamic filtering, noise suppression, or time-delayed responses were reported.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Type I secretion (for organic acids), vesicles (for signaling molecules), lysis (for metabolite release)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Controlled by concentration of extract and probiotic dose; no feedback or dynamic regulation reported.
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with aqueous extract suspensions; no structural disruption observed; stable during freeze-drying and rehydration.
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Probiotics inhibit pathogenic bacteria through competitive exclusion, production of organic acids (lowering pH), and secretion of bacteriocins. They also enhance the bioavailability of phenolic compounds, which have intrinsic antibacterial activity.
E_A_agent_material (抗菌因子_相关物质): Organic acids (lactic, acetic), bacteriocins, phenolic metabolites
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): The probiotics reduce pathogen load via competitive exclusion and acidification. They are safe in the gut environment and do not disrupt the microbiome significantly. The combination with fruit extracts enhances their activity without causing tissue damage.
E_B_mechanism_desc (产氧机制描述): No oxygen-producing enzymes or light-dependent systems were used.
E_B_crit_evidence (标准B_依据): No evidence of oxygenation activity; not part of the system's design.
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Probiotics modulate immune responses by stimulating anti-inflammatory cytokines (e.g., IL-10) and suppressing pro-inflammatory signals (e.g., TNF-α). They also enhance mucosal barrier function.
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Probiotics promote epithelial regeneration and barrier integrity by stimulating mucus production and tight junction proteins. They also reduce inflammation, creating a favorable environment for tissue healing.
E_D_repair_material (修复因子_相关物质): Mucin, tight junction proteins, growth factors
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Probiotics metabolize phenolic compounds into bioactive forms (e.g., deglycosylation), enhancing their antioxidant and anti-cancer effects. They also influence host metabolism via SCFA production.
E_F_mechanism_desc (肿瘤治疗描述): The consortium induces apoptosis and necrosis in colon cancer cells (HT-29, Hepa 1c1c7) through synergistic action with fruit extracts. It enhances quinone reductase (QR) activity, a phase II detoxification enzyme, reducing carcinogen activation.
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Auxotrophy (nutrient dependency), no antibiotic resistance genes reported
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no known virulence factors; no antibiotic resistance genes detected; low risk of horizontal gene transfer; minimal environmental escape potential.
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Physical confinement via oral delivery and gut retention; no engineered containment systems.
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Both Lactobacillus paracasei BGP1 and Bifidobacterium animalis subsp. lactis BLC1 are classified as GRAS (Generally Recognized As Safe) by regulatory agencies. They are non-pathogenic, non-invasive, and do not produce toxins. Their use in food and supplements is well-established. No antibiotic resistance genes were reported. The system relies on natural auxotrophy and gut retention, minimizing escape risk. The combination with fruit extracts enhances safety by promoting beneficial metabolic interactions.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): The consortium, particularly when combined with jabuticaba extract E2 (rich in water-soluble phenolics), significantly increased quinone reductase (QR) activity by 9-fold in HT-29 cells and induced apoptosis and necrosis in both Hepa 1c1c7 and HT-29 cells. The E2 extract with Lactobacillus (JL) showed the highest antiradical and antioxidant activity (DPPH IC50: 211.90 μg/mL), outperforming blueberry anthocyanin-rich extract (B) by over 3-fold. This synergistic effect suggests strong chemopreventive potential against colorectal cancer, with enhanced bioavailability, antioxidant capacity, and induction of programmed cell death.

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37–40 °C, pH 5.5–6.5, tolerant to bile salts and low pH (gastric conditions)
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~1.5–2 h in vitro; stable in vivo colonization in intestinal tract
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Intestinal lumen, particularly in the small intestine and colon
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of pathogenic bacteria; no significant disruption of native microbiota observed
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to lyophilization, freeze-drying, and rehydration; stable under moderate shear stress and storage at 4 °C
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Bile salt hydrolase (BSH) and acid tolerance response (ATR) genes
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该菌株为兼性厌氧菌，可在37–40 °C、pH 5.5–6.5条件下良好生长，对胃酸和胆盐具有较强耐受性，能有效定植于小肠和结肠，具有良好的冻干稳定性和储存稳定性。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): None (natural strain, no genetic modification reported)
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High chromosomal stability; no plasmid-based systems used; no reported genetic drift in vivo
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in lyophilized powder and yogurt matrix
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 该菌株为天然分离菌株，未进行任何基因工程改造，其功能依赖于天然代谢通路和定植能力。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Bile salt hydrolase (BSH), acid tolerance response (ATR) promoters, lactate permease
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Constitutive expression; no reported synthetic logic circuits
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 该菌株通过天然感知系统响应胃酸、胆盐和乳酸等环境信号，维持其在肠道中的存活与定植，无合成逻辑门控机制。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): None (natural secretion of metabolites and cell wall components)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent effect observed in vivo; controlled by dietary intake and viable cell count
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with lyophilized powder and yogurt matrix; stable during freeze-drying and reconstitution
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Not applicable
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 未报告抗菌或抗生物膜功能。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Downregulates pro-inflammatory cytokines and inhibits upregulation of sICAM-1; reduces immune cell infiltration in visceral adipose tissue.
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Not applicable
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Inhibits enlargement of visceral adipocytes; reduces adipocyte size and systemic inflammation associated with obesity.
E_E_metabolite_material (代谢物_相关物质): Short-chain fatty acids (SCFAs) – inferred from metabolic activity
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (natural strain, no kill-switch or auxotrophy reported)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Non-pathogenic; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; low risk of horizontal gene transfer; no environmental escape risk
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Physical confinement via lyophilized powder and yogurt delivery system
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 该菌株为公认安全（GRAS）菌株，无致病性、无抗生素抗性基因，未进行基因改造，无生物安全风险，通过冻干粉和酸奶载体实现物理隔离。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在高脂饮食诱导的肥胖大鼠模型中，Lactobacillus gasseri SBT2055显著抑制了内脏脂肪细胞的增大（P < 0.01），并有效防止了血清sICAM-1水平的升高，表明其具有显著的抗肥胖和抗炎作用。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Temperature: 37°C; pH: Acid-tolerant (survives gastric acidity); Bile tolerance (survives intestinal bile); Nutritional requirements: Lactose, peptides, vitamins (from milk matrix)
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~12–14 hours in vitro; No significant growth rate data in vivo provided
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Small and large intestine epithelial wall (adherent), intestinal lumen (free)
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of coliforms; restoration of microbial balance; symbiotic with host gut environment
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Acid and bile tolerance; survives gastric transit; stable in refrigerated storage (implied by dahi preparation)
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Bile salt deconjugation enzymes (unspecified), acid tolerance mechanisms (e.g., F0F1-ATPase)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Lactobacillus acidophilus and Lactobacillus casei are acid- and bile-tolerant lactic acid bacteria that survive gastrointestinal transit, adhere to intestinal epithelium, and colonize the gut lumen. They maintain stability in fermented dairy products and thrive under physiological conditions of the small and large intestine.
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): No genetic modifications reported; natural strains used; chromosomal stability assumed
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in dahi matrix; no evidence of degradation during storage or delivery
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): No genetic engineering was performed. The strains were selected based on natural probiotic attributes such as acid and bile tolerance, surface hydrophobicity, and bile salt deconjugation. They were used in their native form for preparation of probiotic dahi.
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): FNR-like regulators (inferred from acid/bile tolerance), bile salt hydrolases (BSH), acid shock proteins
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No synthetic logic circuits; natural adaptive responses to environmental stressors
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): The microbes sense acidic and bile-rich environments via intrinsic stress response systems. They activate acid tolerance responses (ATR) and bile resistance mechanisms to survive transit. No engineered logic gates or threshold control are present.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Passive diffusion, cell lysis (inferred), exopolysaccharide secretion
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent effects observed (15 g dahi/rat/day); no precise control mechanism reported
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Highly compatible with dahi matrix; stable during fermentation and storage; supports sustained release in GI tract
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Inhibits coliforms via competitive exclusion, production of bacteriocins, and hydrogen peroxide; reduces free and attached coliform counts in intestine.
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): Probiotic dahi significantly reduced both free and attached coliform counts in small and large intestine (p < 0.05), indicating effective antibacterial activity without causing tissue damage.
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Reduces oxidative stress and inflammation in intestinal tissues; modulates immune response via antioxidant activity.
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Protects intestinal epithelium from oxidative damage; improves mucosal integrity and transit time; supports normal gut motility.
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Reduces glycosylation of hemoglobin (HbA1c) and lipid peroxidation (TBARS), indicating modulation of metabolic stress and glycation pathways.
E_E_metabolite_material (代谢物_相关物质): Lactic acid, acetic acid, antioxidant compounds
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (natural strains used; no kill-switch or auxotrophy)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no evidence of horizontal gene transfer; non-invasive, non-colonizing long-term; safe for human consumption
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Dahi matrix provides partial physical barrier; limited systemic absorption
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Lactobacillus acidophilus and Lactobacillus casei are well-established GRAS organisms with a long history of safe use in fermented dairy products. No genetic modifications or pathogenic traits were introduced. The risk of microbiome disruption is low, as they restore balance rather than dominate.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): Probiotic dahi significantly improved gastrointestinal transit rate (charcoal transit) in diabetic rats, restored intestinal microbial balance (increased lactobacilli, decreased coliforms), reduced oxidative stress (lower TBARS levels), and decreased glycosylation of hemoglobin (HbA1c) without altering blood glucose levels. These effects collectively indicate effective mitigation of diabetic gastropathy.

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Growth at 37°C in MRS medium under anaerobic conditions; tolerates pH 2.5 and 0.3% bile salts.
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): High viability at pH 2.5 (7.5 log cfu/mL) and 0.3% bile salts (6.0 log cfu/mL); survival in acidic and bile salt conditions consistent with in vitro and in vivo gastrointestinal transit.
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Intestinal epithelium (HT-29 cells), gut lumen post-oral administration
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competes with pathogens (e.g., C. albicans) for adhesion sites; enhances total gut microbiota and Lactobacillus population post-infection.
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): High tolerance to low pH (pH 2.5), bile salts (up to 0.5%), and gastric transit conditions.
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Exopolysaccharides (EPS) produced by strain (implied by prior study: Chen et al., 2013)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该菌株在体外表现出良好的酸耐受性和胆盐耐受性，能在pH 2.5和0.3%胆盐条件下保持高存活率，具备在胃肠道中定植并发挥抗病原体定植能力的生理基础。
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 该研究未涉及基因工程改造，菌株为天然分离株，未进行遗传修饰。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Unknown (no specific receptor or promoter reported)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No logic circuitry reported; function is constitutive.
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 该菌株未被工程化设计为响应特定信号，其抗黏附和抗菌功能为天然生理特性，无明确的信号感知与逻辑调控机制。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Unknown (likely passive secretion of metabolites or bacteriocins)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent effect observed in vivo (fermented milk administration); no precise control mechanism reported.
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with fermented milk matrix; survives in milk and maintains function during oral delivery.
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): 通过分泌抗菌物质抑制多种食源性病原体，包括沙门氏菌、金黄色葡萄球菌、克罗诺杆菌、大肠杆菌和白色念珠菌。
E_A_agent_material (抗菌因子_相关物质): Unknown (likely bacteriocins or organic acids, but not specified)
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 在体外对多种常见病原体（包括革兰氏阳性菌、革兰氏阴性菌和真菌）均表现出抑制活性，且在动物实验中未观察到显著毒性或微生物群落紊乱，表明其活性可控且安全。
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (no kill-switch or auxotrophy reported)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Non-pathogenic; no antibiotic resistance genes or horizontal gene transfer risk reported. Low opportunistic risk.
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Fermented milk matrix provides physical confinement during delivery.
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 该菌株为食品级安全菌株（GRAS），未进行基因改造，无生物安全风险，且在动物实验中未引起不良反应，具有良好的安全性。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在小鼠模型中，口服L. paracasei FJ861111.1发酵乳可显著提高粪便中总菌群和乳酸杆菌数量，并显著抑制白色念珠菌在肠道中的定植（从7.5 log cfu/mL降至6.4 log cfu/mL），表明其具有良好的抗定植和肠道微生态调节能力。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, neutral to slightly alkaline pH, requires complex nutrients including bile acids and amino acids; dependent on host-derived metabolites
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Slow growth rate; doubling time not reported, but typical for anaerobic clostridia; in vivo homeostasis consistent with gut environment
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gut lumen, particularly colon; associated with bile acid metabolism in the intestinal tract
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive with other gut microbes; produces secondary bile acids that modulate host immunity and influence microbial community structure
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Sensitive to oxygen; stable under anaerobic conditions; lyophilization stability not reported; shear stress tolerance in gut environment
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): None reported
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Clostridium scindens 是一种严格厌氧的肠道共生菌，主要定植于结肠，依赖于胆汁酸等宿主代谢物进行生长，其代谢活动可显著影响肝脏免疫微环境。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): None reported
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): Chromosomal integration; stable in gut environment; no plasmid-based systems used
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Not applicable (no synthetic material used)
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 未对 Clostridium scindens 进行基因工程改造，其功能依赖于天然代谢通路，特别是将初级胆汁酸转化为次级胆汁酸的能力。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): FNR promoter (inferred from hypoxia response), bile acid receptors (inferred from metabolic sensing)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Threshold-based response: high levels of primary bile acids trigger CXCL16 expression; secondary bile acids suppress it. No explicit logic gate reported.
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): Clostridium scindens 通过感知肠道中初级胆汁酸的浓度，调控其代谢活性，进而影响肝窦内皮细胞表达 CXCL16，从而招募 CXCR6+ NKT 细胞。当次级胆汁酸积累时，该信号被抑制，提示存在负反馈调节机制。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Metabolic secretion (endogenous bile acid transformation)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Self-regulated by host bile acid levels; no external control
E_material_match (材料匹配性): No synthetic material used; natural gut environment
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Not applicable
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 无抗菌功能
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): 通过将初级胆汁酸转化为次级胆汁酸，调节肝窦内皮细胞表达 CXCL16，从而招募并激活 CXCR6+ NKT 细胞，促进 IFNγ 分泌，增强抗肿瘤免疫应答。
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Not applicable
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): 通过胆汁酸代谢调节宿主免疫代谢，影响肝内免疫细胞功能，间接调控肿瘤微环境。
E_E_metabolite_material (代谢物_相关物质): Secondary bile acids (e.g., deoxycholic acid, lithocholic acid)
E_F_mechanism_desc (肿瘤治疗描述): 通过胆汁酸代谢调控肝内 NKT 细胞积累，增强抗肿瘤免疫监视，抑制肝癌原发灶和肝转移灶生长。
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None reported
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; non-invasive; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no evidence of horizontal gene transfer; low environmental escape risk due to gut-specific niche
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): None (natural gut colonization)
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Clostridium scindens 为天然肠道共生菌，无致病性，属于 GRAS 级别，无生物安全风险，其功能依赖于宿主胆汁酸环境，不易在体外或环境中长期存活。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在小鼠模型中，清除肠道菌群或使用抗生素处理后，肝细胞癌（HCC）肿瘤数量和体积显著减少，肝转移灶明显减少；恢复 C. scindens 定植或补充次级胆汁酸后，抗肿瘤效应消失，提示其在调控肝癌免疫微环境中的关键作用。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 6.0–7.0; utilizes glucose and other carbohydrates as carbon sources; no requirement for specific vitamins or amino acids beyond standard culture media.
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~1.5–2 hours in vitro; growth rate consistent with in vitro conditions; no in vivo growth data reported.
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gut mucosa, particularly in the small intestine and colon; associated with mucosal immune modulation.
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Interacts with host immune cells (DCs); no direct competition or symbiosis with other gut microbes reported in this study.
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Gamma-irradiated for experimental use; tolerance to osmotic stress and moderate pH shifts not explicitly tested; stability in culture medium confirmed.
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Gamma irradiation (for inactivation)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Lactobacillus casei DN-114 001 is a facultative anaerobe capable of growing under standard in vitro conditions. It thrives at 37°C and neutral pH, utilizing carbohydrates as primary carbon sources. It does not require exogenous vitamins or amino acids beyond standard culture media. The strain is adapted to the intestinal environment and interacts directly with dendritic cells to modulate immune responses.
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): None reported (natural strain used)
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): Stable in culture; no plasmid or chromosomal integration reported; natural strain used without engineered genetic circuits.
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): No engineered material environment; used in suspension with DCs in vitro.
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): The Lactobacillus casei DN-114 001 strain was used in its natural form without genetic modification. It functions as a chassis for immune modulation through natural interaction with dendritic cells, without engineered genetic circuits or inducible systems.
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Unknown (natural interaction with DCs; no specific receptor identified in this study)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): AND gate: Requires simultaneous or sequential exposure to L. casei and TLR3 signal (poly(I:C)) to trigger IL-12p70 production.
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): Lactobacillus casei alone induces tolerogenic DCs, but when combined with a TLR3 agonist (poly(I:C)), it triggers a synergistic, selective IL-12p70 response. This indicates a logical AND gate: both signals are required for immunogenic activation. The timing of exposure (L. casei prior to poly(I:C)) is critical, suggesting a temporal logic gate with a required sequence.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Direct cell-cell contact (non-lytic, non-secretory; immunomodulation via surface interaction)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Not controllable (natural interaction; no engineered output regulation)
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with in vitro suspension culture; no encapsulation or material barrier used.
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Synergistically enhances IL-12p70 production by dendritic cells when combined with TLR3 agonist (poly(I:C)), driving naive T cells toward Th1 polarization without inducing Th17 responses.
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (natural strain, no kill-switch or auxotrophy reported)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no evidence of horizontal gene transfer; environmental escape not assessed.
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): None (no physical confinement used in study)
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Lactobacillus casei DN-114 001 is a well-characterized probiotic strain with GRAS status. It is not pathogenic, does not carry antibiotic resistance genes, and is not known to transfer genes horizontally. No biocontainment strategies were used in this study, as the strain is considered safe for human use.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): In vitro, the combination of L. casei and poly(I:C) synergistically enhanced IL-12p70 secretion by dendritic cells, leading to robust T helper type 1 (Th1) polarization of naive T cells without inducing Th17 responses. This suggests potential for mucosal vaccine adjuvants and immune modulation in enteric diseases.

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 5.5–6.5; tolerates gastric acidity and bile salts; utilizes glucose and other carbohydrates as carbon sources
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~1–2 hours in vitro; in vivo colonization is transient but functional during antibiotic treatment
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Small intestine, particularly the mucosal surface of the ileum and colon
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competes with pathogenic bacteria for adhesion sites; produces bacteriocins and organic acids that inhibit pathogens; supports commensal microbiota balance
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to gastric acid, bile salts, and moderate osmotic stress; stable during lyophilization and rehydration; moderate resistance to shear stress in suspension
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Bile salt hydrolases (BSH), acid shock proteins (e.g., DnaK), and extracellular polysaccharides
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Lactobacillus GG and Saccharomyces boulardii are facultative anaerobes that survive gastrointestinal transit, colonize the intestinal mucosa transiently, and exert health benefits through competitive exclusion, antimicrobial secretion, and immune modulation. They are resilient to gastric acidity and bile, enabling effective delivery to the gut.
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High chromosomal stability; no plasmid-based systems reported; minimal metabolic burden; no evidence of genetic drift in clinical use
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in powder, capsule, and liquid formulations; maintains viability in encapsulated delivery systems
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): Both Lactobacillus GG and Saccharomyces boulardii are used in their native, non-genetically modified forms. No synthetic genetic circuits or engineered control systems are employed in current clinical applications. Their probiotic effects are intrinsic to their natural physiology.
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): FNR-like regulators (LGG), G-protein coupled receptors (S. boulardii), and surface adhesins (e.g., p40/p75 in LGG)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No engineered logic gates; natural sensing via receptor-ligand interactions with threshold responses to environmental cues (e.g., acid resistance activation at low pH)
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): Lactobacillus GG senses low pH and bile acids via membrane sensors, triggering acid shock response and bile resistance mechanisms. Saccharomyces boulardii detects host-derived signals such as proteases and cytokines, modulating its secretory activity. These natural sensing systems allow context-dependent functional responses without synthetic circuitry.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Type I secretion (LGG), extracellular vesicles (S. boulardii)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent efficacy; optimal range 5–40 billion CFU/day; controlled by formulation and dosing schedule
E_material_match (材料匹配性): High compatibility with capsules, powders, and oral delivery; stable in gelatin capsules and enteric-coated tablets
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): LGG produces bacteriocins (e.g., lactocin S, p40/p75 adhesins) and organic acids (lactic acid) that inhibit pathogens like Clostridioides difficile, Escherichia coli, and Salmonella. S. boulardii secretes protease inhibitors (e.g., plasminogen activator inhibitor) that neutralize bacterial toxins and prevent pathogen adherence.
E_A_agent_material (抗菌因子_相关物质): Lactocin S, p40/p75 adhesins, lactic acid, plasminogen activator inhibitor
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): LGG reduces AAD risk by 75% in children; S. boulardii decreases AAD incidence from 28.5% to 11.97% in meta-analyses. Both strains show low cytotoxicity and minimal disruption to gut microbiome.
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): LGG modulates dendritic cell function and promotes anti-inflammatory cytokine production (e.g., IL-10). S. boulardii enhances IgA secretion and downregulates pro-inflammatory NF-κB signaling.
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): p40/p75 adhesins (LGG), protease inhibitors (S. boulardii), exopolysaccharides
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): LGG enhances intestinal barrier integrity by upregulating tight junction proteins (e.g., occludin, ZO-1). S. boulardii promotes epithelial cell proliferation and wound healing via growth factor stimulation.
E_D_repair_material (修复因子_相关物质): Occludin, ZO-1, epidermal growth factor (EGF)-like molecules
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Auxotrophy (LGG requires specific amino acids), natural attenuation (transient colonization)
B_containment_material (生物安全_相关物质): Amino acid auxotrophies (e.g., histidine), bile acid sensitivity
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no horizontal gene transfer documented; rare cases of fungemia in immunocompromised patients
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Capsule and enteric coating prevent premature release; physical barrier limits environmental escape
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Lactobacillus GG and Saccharomyces boulardii are classified as Generally Recognized As Safe (GRAS). They are non-pathogenic and do not persist long-term in the gut. Rare cases of sepsis have occurred in neonates and immunocompromised individuals, but these are exceptional. No evidence of environmental persistence or gene transfer.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): Probiotics significantly reduce the incidence of antibiotic-associated diarrhea by 75% (LGG) and lower AAD risk from 28.5% to 11.97% (S. boulardii). They shorten diarrhea duration by 0.75–1 day and improve intestinal barrier function, supporting faster recovery and enhanced compliance with antibiotic therapy.

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Temperature: 30 °C, pH: 6.2, in MRS medium (peptone, yeast extract, glucose, etc.)
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Growth rate not explicitly quantified; cells harvested at OD600 corresponding to 10⁹ CFU/mL
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gastrointestinal tract (duodenum, jejunum, ileum, gizzard); intestinal mucosa
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competes with pathogenic bacteria for mucosal adherence; potential symbiosis with host microbiome
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to osmotic stress (in MRS medium), storage stability implied via lyophilization (inferred from preparation method)
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): MRS medium components (e.g., glucose, sodium acetate)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该菌株为从家禽胃肠道分离的乳酸杆菌，可在30°C、pH 6.2条件下在MRS培养基中生长，具有良好的耐受性，能有效定植于肠道黏膜，竞争性抑制病原菌黏附，具有潜在的共生能力。
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 该研究未对L. plantarum TN8进行基因工程改造，其功能基于天然菌株的固有特性，未使用任何外源基因或调控回路。
S_host_signals (宿主信号): ["Proteases (inferred from mucosal environment)", "Cytokines (inferred from immune modulation)"]
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Inferred: native receptors for pH, sugars, and host-derived molecules; no specific sensor gene reported
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No engineered logic gates; natural sensing via metabolic and environmental adaptation
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 该菌株通过感知肠道微环境中的pH、渗透压及营养物质（如葡萄糖）实现定植与代谢适应，其免疫调节功能可能依赖于对宿主免疫信号的自然响应，未涉及人工逻辑控制。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Inferred: natural secretion of immunomodulatory molecules (e.g., IL-10); no engineered secretion system reported
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Oral administration once daily; dose fixed at 1×10⁹ CFU/mL; no dynamic control reported
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Suspension administered orally; compatible with gastrointestinal environment; no encapsulation material used
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Not applicable – no direct antibacterial or biofilm inhibition reported.
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 未报告抗菌或抗生物膜活性。
E_B_mechanism_desc (产氧机制描述): Not applicable – no oxygen-producing mechanism reported.
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Induces IL-10 production, reduces pro-inflammatory cytokines (IL-12, TNF-α), promotes anti-inflammatory immune response.
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Promotes epithelial re-epithelization, reduces crypt loss, attenuates mucosal ulceration and inflammatory infiltration.
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Reduces serum total cholesterol and triglycerides; increases HDL cholesterol levels.
E_F_mechanism_desc (肿瘤治疗描述): Not applicable – no tumor therapy mechanism reported.
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None – no genetic modifications or kill switches used
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Non-pathogenic; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; low risk of horizontal gene transfer; no environmental escape risk due to natural origin and lack of engineering
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): None – oral administration without physical confinement
B_risk_desc (风险描述): L. plantarum TN8为天然分离的益生菌，属于公认安全（GRAS）菌株，未进行基因改造，无生物安全风险，无致病性或耐药基因，适合口服应用。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 口服L. plantarum TN8可显著改善TNBS诱导大鼠结肠炎模型的临床症状，包括体重下降、腹泻、便血、结肠缩短等；组织学显示黏膜损伤减轻、炎症浸润减少、上皮再生；生化指标显示总胆固醇和甘油三酯显著降低，HDL升高；肝肾组织损伤亦明显缓解，表明其在抗炎、组织修复和代谢调节方面具有显著疗效。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 6.5–7.5, in the presence of bile salts and low pH (survives gastric transit), utilizes carbohydrates as carbon sources.
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Moderate growth rate; doubling time ~30–60 min in vitro; stable colonization in gut environment post-oral administration.
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Intestinal lumen and mucosal surface of the distal ileum; transient presence in mesenteric lymph nodes.
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): No significant competition or symbiosis observed with native microbiota; does not alter luminal or tissue-associated bacterial populations.
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to bile salts, low pH (gastric conditions), and moderate osmotic stress; survives lyophilization and rehydration.
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Bile salts, low pH (HCl), and lyophilization buffer
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Enterococcus faecium SF68 is a facultative anaerobe capable of surviving gastrointestinal transit and transiently colonizing the intestinal mucosa. It demonstrates moderate growth kinetics and tolerance to gastric and intestinal stressors, but does not establish long-term colonization or significantly alter the gut microbiota composition.
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): No genetic modifications were applied to Enterococcus faecium SF68 in this study. The strain was used as a naturally occurring probiotic without engineered circuits or synthetic biology components.
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Unknown (native receptors for bile and low pH; likely membrane transporters and stress response regulators)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No engineered logic gates; natural sensing of environmental cues with threshold-based responses.
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): Enterococcus faecium SF68 senses low pH and bile salts via native membrane transporters and stress response systems. It responds to nutrient availability (e.g., glucose, lactate) for growth. No synthetic logic circuits were used. The strain exhibits transient presence in tissues, suggesting natural sensing of host immune signals (e.g., IgG levels), but no engineered feedback control.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Unknown (likely passive diffusion or lysis; no engineered secretion systems reported)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Not controllable – administered at fixed dose (1.4×10⁹ CFU/kg feed); no feedback or regulation.
E_material_match (材料匹配性): No encapsulation or material environment used; delivered in feed as free suspension.
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Not applicable – no antibacterial activity observed.
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 无抗菌活性证据。
E_B_mechanism_desc (产氧机制描述): Not applicable – no oxygen-producing capability reported.
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Enterococcus faecium SF68 tends to reduce serum IgG levels on day 20 post-weaning, suggesting systemic immunomodulatory effects. It may influence cytokine profiles in gut-associated lymphoid tissue (GALT), potentially modulating Th2 responses and IgA production.
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): Secreted metabolites or cell wall components (e.g., peptidoglycan, teichoic acids) that interact with host immune receptors (e.g., TLRs)
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Not applicable – no evidence of tissue regeneration or barrier enhancement.
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Not applicable – no metabolic byproducts (e.g., SCFAs) reported to regulate host metabolism.
E_F_mechanism_desc (肿瘤治疗描述): Not applicable – no anti-tumor activity reported.
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None – no kill-switch or auxotrophy used.
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; non-invasive; no antibiotic resistance genes reported. However, Enterococcus species can transfer resistance genes (HGT risk). Environmental escape possible if excreted.
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): None – no physical confinement used.
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Enterococcus faecium SF68 is classified as GRAS (Generally Recognized As Safe). It is a commensal bacterium with low pathogenicity. However, it has potential for horizontal gene transfer (HGT), particularly for antibiotic resistance genes. No biocontainment strategies were employed. The strain is transient and does not persist in the gut, reducing long-term environmental risk.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在本研究中，Enterococcus faecium SF68未显著改善断奶仔猪的生长性能（ADG、ADFI、FCR）。其主要作用为免疫调节，表现为第20天血清IgG浓度下降（P<0.1），提示其具有系统性免疫调节功能。尽管未改变肠道菌群结构或细菌易位，但其可能通过影响GALT中的细胞因子谱，间接促进黏膜免疫成熟。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): 37°C, in anaerobic chamber with MRS medium
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Growth rate not specified; cultured for 5–7 days
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Oral mucosa, gingival crevice
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive interaction with probiotics; balance maintained via reuterin-mediated LPS neutralization
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Not specified
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该系统由专性厌氧的牙龈卟啉单胞菌和兼性厌氧的罗伊氏乳杆菌组成，两者均在37°C、厌氧条件下生长。牙龈卟啉单胞菌在MRS培养基中培养5–7天，罗伊氏乳杆菌通过超声裂解制备提取物，用于体外和体内实验。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Not applicable
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): Not applicable
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Not applicable
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 本研究未对微生物进行基因改造，仅使用细菌裂解物（sonicated extracts）模拟微生物群落平衡，因此无遗传工程操作。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): LPS (detected via ELISA), NLRP3 inflammasome (detected via WB and RT-PCR)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): AND gate: LPS from P. gingivalis activates NLRP3 inflammasome; reuterin from L. reuteri neutralizes LPS, thereby suppressing inflammasome activation.
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 牙龈卟啉单胞菌释放的LPS激活NLRP3炎症小体，导致间充质干细胞功能障碍；而罗伊氏乳杆菌产生的reuterin可中和LPS，从而抑制炎症小体活化，恢复干细胞功能。该系统通过LPS与reuterin的拮抗作用实现动态平衡调控。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Lysis (via sonication to release intracellular components)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Controlled by concentration of sonicated extracts (e.g., 50 μg/ml P. gingivalis + 25 μg/ml L. reuteri)
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with methylcellulose gel for in vivo delivery; stable in encapsulated form
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Reuterin neutralizes LPS from P. gingivalis, inhibiting NLRP3 inflammasome activation and reducing inflammation, thereby promoting MSC function and wound healing.
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Restores migration, osteogenic differentiation, proliferation, and prevents adipogenic differentiation of gingival MSCs, promoting tissue regeneration and wound healing.
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Use of sonicated extracts instead of live bacteria; no viable cells used in experiments
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): P. gingivalis is a known pathogen associated with periodontitis and systemic diseases; L. reuteri is generally recognized as safe (GRAS). Risk minimized by using non-viable extracts.
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Methylcellulose gel provides physical confinement and prevents microbial escape
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 由于实验使用的是细菌裂解物而非活菌，因此无活菌传播风险。牙龈卟啉单胞菌为潜在致病菌，但通过裂解处理已失活，且在甲基纤维素凝胶中封装，有效防止环境释放。罗伊氏乳杆菌为GRAS菌株，安全性高。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在小鼠腭部伤口模型中，局部接种牙龈卟啉单胞菌与罗伊氏乳杆菌的混合裂解物可显著促进伤口愈合，伤口面积在7天和14天时均显著减小，组织学分析显示再生速度加快。该效果与NLRP3炎症小体抑制和间充质干细胞功能恢复密切相关。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 6.5–7.0; requires complex nutrients including amino acids, vitamins, and carbohydrates; dependent on host-derived metabolites in neonatal gut environment.
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~2–3 hours in vitro; growth rate consistent with in vivo colonization in preterm infants during early feeding.
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Intestinal mucosa of preterm infants, particularly in the colon; preferentially colonizes the lower gastrointestinal tract where bifidobacteria are naturally enriched.
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competes with pathogenic bacteria (e.g., Gammaproteobacteria) for binding sites and nutrients; may promote symbiosis with commensal microbiota by enhancing mucus production and barrier integrity.
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Moderate tolerance to gastric acidity and bile; stable during lyophilization and rehydration; sensitive to high temperatures (>40°C).
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Heat shock proteins (HSPs) induced by probiotic exposure; protective role in stress response.
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Bifidobacterium breve is a facultative anaerobe that thrives in the neonatal gut environment, particularly in preterm infants. It colonizes the intestinal mucosa, competes with pathogens, and supports mucosal barrier function. Its growth is supported by host-derived nutrients and is sensitive to high temperatures, which can compromise viability.
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Not specified
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): Not specified
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Not specified
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): No genetic engineering was reported in the study. The probiotic functions are attributed to native metabolic and immunomodulatory activities of the wild-type strain.
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): FNR promoter (hypoxia-responsive), Lactate permease (lactate sensing), Bile acid receptors
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Threshold-based activation; likely constitutive expression of protective functions under favorable gut conditions; no reported synthetic logic gates.
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): Bifidobacterium breve senses local environmental cues such as low oxygen, bile acids, and lactate, which are indicative of the intestinal niche. It responds by enhancing mucus production and barrier function. The sensing is likely mediated by native receptors and promoters, with no engineered logic circuits.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Type I secretion system (for bacteriocins), passive diffusion (for SCFAs)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent effects; administered once daily at 0.5×10^9 CFU; no controllable genetic circuitry reported.
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with oral delivery in infant formula; stable in suspension but sensitive to heat (>40°C).
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Inhibits pathogenic bacterial adherence through competition for binding sites and secretion of soluble antimicrobial molecules.
E_A_agent_material (抗菌因子_相关物质): Soluble molecules (e.g., bacteriocins, organic acids) secreted by B. breve
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): B. breve reduces colonization by pathogenic bacteria and inhibits biofilm formation in preterm infants; no significant cytotoxicity reported.
E_B_crit_evidence (标准B_依据): No evidence of oxygenation activity in B. breve.
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Strengthens intestinal barrier, reduces bacterial translocation, modulates dendritic cell activity, promotes IgA production, and suppresses NF-κB activation.
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): Secreted metabolites (e.g., SCFAs), surface proteins interacting with dendritic cells
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Enhances mucus production, improves intestinal barrier integrity, reduces ischemic injury via nitric oxide production, and supports epithelial regeneration.
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Ferments oligosaccharides to produce SCFAs (acetate, lactate), which serve as energy sources for colonocytes and modulate innate immunity.
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Auxotrophy (nutrient-dependent survival); no kill-switch reported.
B_containment_material (生物安全_相关物质): Nutrient-dependent growth (e.g., specific amino acids, vitamins)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; however, rare cases of Bifidobacterium sepsis reported in immunocompromised preterm infants. No evidence of antibiotic resistance gene transfer.
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Oral delivery with intestinal mucosal barrier; no physical encapsulation reported.
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Bifidobacterium breve is generally considered safe (GRAS status) and has low pathogenic potential. However, in severely compromised preterm infants with impaired intestinal barrier function, rare cases of sepsis have been reported. No evidence of horizontal gene transfer or long-term ecological disruption.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): Bifidobacterium breve administration in preterm infants significantly reduced the incidence of necrotizing enterocolitis (NEC) and improved gut colonization. It enhanced intestinal barrier function, reduced pathogenic colonization, and supported mucosal immunity. Clinical trials showed a protective effect against NEC (Bell stage ≥2), with no major safety concerns in otherwise healthy preterm infants.

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Grows optimally at 37°C, pH 6.5–7.0; requires complex media including lactose, amino acids, and vitamins; dependent on host-derived oligosaccharides in neonatal gut.
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~2.5–3 hours in vitro; consistent with in vivo colonization in preterm infants.
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Colon of preterm infants; preferentially colonizes the lower gastrointestinal tract.
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competes with pathogenic bacteria; promotes symbiosis by increasing bifidobacterial abundance and reducing pathogen load.
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Moderate tolerance to bile and gastric acid; stable during lyophilization; sensitive to temperatures above 40°C.
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Heat shock proteins (HSPs), bile acid resistance genes
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Bifidobacterium lactis Bb12 is a facultative anaerobe that colonizes the intestinal mucosa of preterm infants. It thrives in the neonatal gut environment, competes with pathogens, and supports mucosal immunity. It is sensitive to high temperatures, which can compromise viability.
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Not specified
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): Not specified
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Not specified
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): No genetic engineering was reported. The probiotic functions are due to native metabolic and immunomodulatory activities.
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): FNR promoter, Lactate permease, Bile acid receptors
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Threshold-based activation; likely constitutive expression under favorable gut conditions.
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): B. lactis senses environmental cues such as bile, lactate, and pH, which are indicative of the intestinal niche. It responds by enhancing barrier function and modulating immune responses through native receptors and promoters.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Type I secretion (bacteriocins), passive diffusion (SCFAs)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent; administered at 6×10^9 CFU/kg/day; no controllable genetic circuitry.
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with oral delivery in infant formula; sensitive to heat (>40°C).
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Inhibits pathogen adherence via competitive exclusion and secretion of antimicrobial compounds.
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): B. lactis reduces colonization by pathogenic bacteria and inhibits biofilm formation in preterm infants; no significant cytotoxicity reported.
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Enhances intestinal barrier, reduces bacterial translocation, modulates dendritic cell function, and promotes IgA production.
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): SCFAs, surface adhesins, secreted immunomodulatory proteins
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Improves intestinal barrier integrity, reduces fecal calprotectin (marker of inflammation), and supports epithelial regeneration.
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Ferments oligosaccharides to produce SCFAs, which serve as energy sources for colonocytes and regulate immune function.
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Auxotrophy; no kill-switch reported.
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no evidence of antibiotic resistance gene transfer. Rare cases of sepsis reported in immunocompromised infants.
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Oral delivery with intestinal mucosal barrier; no physical encapsulation.
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Bifidobacterium lactis Bb12 is generally safe (GRAS status). It has low pathogenic potential, but rare cases of sepsis have been reported in severely ill preterm infants. No evidence of horizontal gene transfer or long-term ecological disruption.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): B. lactis Bb12 supplementation in preterm infants reduced nosocomial infections, improved gut colonization, and decreased intestinal permeability. It enhanced immune function and reduced inflammation markers such as fecal calprotectin. Clinical trials showed protective effects against NEC and improved feeding tolerance.

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Grows at 37°C, pH 5.5–6.5; requires glucose, amino acids, and vitamins; dependent on host-derived nutrients.
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~1.5–2 hours in vitro; consistent with in vivo colonization in preterm infants.
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Intestinal mucosa, particularly in the small intestine; adheres to epithelial cells.
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competes with pathogens for adhesion sites; promotes symbiosis by enhancing barrier function.
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Moderate tolerance to bile and gastric acid; stable during lyophilization; sensitive to temperatures >40°C.
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Heat shock proteins (HSPs), bile salt hydrolases
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Lactobacillus rhamnosus GG is a facultative anaerobe that colonizes the intestinal mucosa of preterm infants. It adheres to epithelial cells, competes with pathogens, and supports mucosal immunity. It is sensitive to high temperatures, which can compromise viability.
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Not specified
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): Not specified
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Not specified
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): No genetic engineering was reported. The probiotic functions are due to native metabolic and immunomodulatory activities.
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): FNR promoter, Lactate permease, Bile acid receptors
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Threshold-based activation; likely constitutive expression under favorable conditions.
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): L. rhamnosus GG senses environmental cues such as bile, lactate, and pH, which are indicative of the intestinal niche. It responds by enhancing barrier function and modulating immune responses through native receptors and promoters.
