C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Temperature: 37°C (L. rhamnosus GG, L. rhamnosus Lc705, B. breve Bb99), 30°C (P. freudenreichii subsp. shermanii Js); pH: neutral (6.9–7.3); Carbon source: MRS broth (L. rhamnosus), propionibacterial broth (P. freudenreichii), MRS with L-cysteine (B. breve); Anaerobic conditions required for B. breve and P. freudenreichii.
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): L. rhamnosus GG and Lc705: 18–20 h; P. freudenreichii subsp. shermanii Js: 48 h; B. breve Bb99: 24 h; all in vitro; no in vivo growth data reported.
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gastrointestinal epithelium (Caco-2 cell line model); no in vivo niche specified.
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive adhesion to epithelial cells; potential modulation of host immune response; no direct interaction with other microbiome members reported.
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): No data on UV, drying, lyophilization, or shear stress reported.
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 四种益生菌均为革兰氏阳性菌，其中L. rhamnosus GG和Lc705为兼性厌氧菌，可在37°C下于MRS培养基中生长18–20小时；P. freudenreichii subsp. shermanii Js为厌氧菌，需在30°C下于丙酸菌培养基中培养48小时；B. breve Bb99为厌氧菌，需在含L-半胱氨酸的MRS培养基中于37°C下培养24小时。所有菌株均在中性pH条件下稳定生长，无明显应激耐受性数据。
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 该研究未对任何菌株进行基因工程改造，所有功能均基于天然菌株的生理特性，未使用CRISPR、质粒或诱导系统等遗传工具。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): No specific receptor or promoter identified; effects are attributed to natural interactions with host epithelial cells.
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No engineered logic gates or threshold control observed; responses are context-dependent and strain-specific.
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 各菌株对H. pylori感染的响应为非编程性、天然免疫调节行为，无明确的信号整合逻辑。例如，L. rhamnosus GG和Lc705抑制IL-8释放，而B. breve Bb99则诱导IL-8释放，表明其响应机制独立且可能相互冲突。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): No engineered secretion system reported; natural secretion via cell lysis or passive diffusion.
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent effects observed (e.g., 10^7 to 10^9 CFU/ml), but no controllable or tunable output.
E_material_match (材料匹配性): All strains were used in suspension in culture medium; no encapsulation or material matrix tested.
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): 无直接抗菌活性，但通过竞争性结合抑制H. pylori在上皮细胞上的黏附。
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 所有菌株均能抑制H. pylori在Caco-2细胞上的黏附，但无抗菌或生物膜抑制证据，且未测试对其他病原体的作用。
E_B_mechanism_desc (产氧机制描述): 未涉及氧气生成或耗氧调控机制。
E_B_crit_evidence (标准B_依据): 未检测氧气相关功能，无光依赖或非光依赖氧生成机制。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): L. rhamnosus GG、L. rhamnosus Lc705和P. freudenreichii subsp. shermanii Js抑制H. pylori诱导的IL-8释放；L. rhamnosus GG、Lc705和B. breve Bb99抑制PGE2释放；B. breve Bb99促进IL-10释放。
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): 未检测血管生成、上皮再生或基质调节相关因子。
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): 未检测短链脂肪酸、色氨酸代谢物或神经递质等代谢物的调控作用。
E_F_mechanism_desc (肿瘤治疗描述): 未涉及肿瘤免疫激活或前药转化等机制。
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): No genetic kill switches or auxotrophy used.
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): All strains are well-characterized probiotics with no known pathogenicity or antibiotic resistance genes reported. No horizontal gene transfer risk assessed.
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): No physical barrier used; experiments conducted in vitro.
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 所有菌株均为公认安全（GRAS）的益生菌，无致病性、无抗生素抗性基因，且未进行基因改造，因此生物安全风险极低。但组合使用时可能引发炎症反应，需注意临床应用前的个体化评估。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在体外Caco-2细胞模型中，所有菌株均能有效抑制H. pylori黏附，L. rhamnosus GG、Lc705和P. freudenreichii subsp. shermanii Js可减轻急性细胞膜损伤并抑制IL-8和PGE2释放。然而，当四菌组合使用时，其抗炎作用被抵消，反而导致IL-8、PGE2和LTB4水平升高，提示组合使用可能引发促炎反应。因此，尽管单个菌株具有有益作用，但组合使用可能适得其反，需谨慎优化配比。

composition (组成成分): [{"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Bacillus toyoi", "strain_id": "Toyocerin®"}, {"role": "Helper", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus spp.", "strain_id": "Not specified"}, {"role": "Helper", "scientific_name": "Bifidobacterium spp.", "strain_id": "Not specified"}, {"role": "Helper", "scientific_name": "Megasphaera elsdenii", "strain_id": "Not specified"}]
C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Temperature: 30–37°C; pH: 6.0–7.5; Osmotic: Moderate tolerance; Nutrition: Requires complex carbon sources, amino acids, vitamins; Host metabolite dependency: Ferments prebiotics and gluconate
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time: ~2–3 hours in vitro; In vivo growth supported by intestinal environment; Growth rate consistent with gut colonization
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Intestinal lumen (duodenum, jejunum, ileum); Competes with pathogens for nutrients
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of pathogenic bacteria; Synergistic growth with Lactobacillus and Bifidobacterium; No evidence of symbiosis with host microbiota
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): High tolerance to gastric acid, bile, heat, drying, and storage; Resistant to lyophilization and shear stress during feed processing
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Bacillus spores (endospores)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Bacillus toyoi é uma bactéria não-ácido-láctica que forma esporos, conferindo alta sobrevivência durante o trânsito gastrointestinal e durante a produção, transporte e armazenamento de rações. Cresce em condições intestinais com pH neutro a levemente ácido, temperatura corporal de suínos e presença de nutrientes. Não coloniza permanentemente, atuando como competidor por recursos.
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Not applicable (natural strains used)
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High chromosomal stability; No plasmids used; No evidence of genetic drift or metabolic burden
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in feed matrix; No degradation of probiotic viability during feed processing
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): Os microrganismos foram utilizados em sua forma natural, sem engenharia genética. O probiótico Bacillus toyoi foi adicionado como esporos ativos, e o prebiótico (oligossacarídeos de coco) foi formulado para ser fermentado por bactérias benéficas como Lactobacillus e Bifidobacterium, promovendo crescimento sinérgico.
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Bacillus toyoi sporulation and germination machinery; Lactobacillus/Bifidobacterium sugar transporters
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Constitutive expression; No inducible logic; Thresholds based on nutrient availability
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): Os microrganismos respondem de forma constitutiva à presença de nutrientes no trato gastrointestinal. Bacillus toyoi germina em resposta à disponibilidade de carbono e nitrogênio, enquanto Lactobacillus e Bifidobacterium metabolizam oligossacarídeos prebióticos e gluconato, ativando sua proliferação. Não há circuitos lógicos programados.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Passive diffusion of metabolites (SCFAs); No active secretion systems reported
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Controlled by feed formulation and dosage levels (ppm); No dynamic regulation
E_material_match (材料匹配性): High compatibility with feed matrix; Stable during pelleting and storage
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Competição por nutrientes com patógenos intestinais; Inibição da aderência de bactérias patogênicas ao epitélio intestinal
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): Bacillus toyoi reduziu a proliferação de bactérias patogênicas, melhorando o desempenho e a saúde intestinal sem causar danos ao epitélio. Não houve alterações na morfometria intestinal, indicando segurança.
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Promoção da regeneração intestinal via aumento da altura de vilosidades e profundidade de criptas; melhora da absorção de nutrientes
E_D_repair_material (修复因子_相关物质): Lactobacillus spp., Bifidobacterium spp., Megasphaera elsdenii (via SCFA production)
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Fermentação de gluconato de sódio e prebióticos produz ácidos graxos de cadeia curta (SCFA), como lactato, acetato e butirato, que regulam o metabolismo intestinal e sistêmico
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Auxotrophy (nutrient-dependent growth); No antibiotic resistance genes reported
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; Non-colonizing; No evidence of horizontal gene transfer; No antibiotic resistance genes; Low environmental escape risk
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Feed matrix provides physical confinement; No release into environment
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Bacillus toyoi é um probiótico com GRAS status, não patogênico e não colonizador. Não apresenta risco de resistência antimicrobiana. A utilização em ração garante contenção física e biológica. O sistema é seguro para uso em suínos e não representa risco ambiental.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): O simbiótico (Bacillus toyoi + prebiótico) promoveu o melhor ganho de peso (99,87 kg) e conversão alimentar (2,12 kg/kg) entre 28 e 142 dias de idade, superando o antibiótico. A adição de gluconato de sódio + probiótico também foi eficaz. Não houve impacto negativo nas características de carcaça ou morfometria intestinal, indicando segurança e eficácia no desempenho produtivo.

composition (组成成分): [{"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus spp.", "strain_id": "Various strains (e.g., L. rhamnosus, L. acidophilus, L. paracasei)"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Bifidobacterium spp.", "strain_id": "Various strains (e.g., B. longum, B. breve, B. lactis)"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Streptococcus thermophilus", "strain_id": "Various strains"}, {"role": "Helper", "scientific_name": "Enterococcus spp.", "strain_id": "Various strains"}, {"role": "Helper", "scientific_name": "Bacillus subtilis", "strain_id": "Various strains"}]
C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal temperature: 37°C; pH range: 5.5–7.0; Nutritional requirements: Carbohydrates (e.g., lactose, glucose), amino acids, vitamins; Osmotic tolerance: Moderate; Bile tolerance: Moderate (varies by strain)
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time: ~1–2 hours in vitro; Growth rate: Rapid under optimal conditions; In vivo homeostasis: Stable colonization in intestinal lumen with transient persistence
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Intestinal lumen (colon and small intestine), particularly mucosal surface and mucus layer
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of pathogenic bacteria; Symbiotic interaction with host immune system; Modulation of resident microbiota composition; Minimal disruption to core gut microbiome
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Moderate tolerance to drying, lyophilization, and shear stress; Limited UV resistance; Storage stability: Refrigerated (4°C) for up to 6 months; Rehydration stability: High
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Capsule matrix (e.g., alginate, chitosan) for protection during GI transit
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 这些益生菌株为兼性厌氧菌，可在人体肠道环境中稳定生长。它们依赖于碳水化合物、氨基酸和维生素等营养物质，在37°C、pH 5.5–7.0的条件下快速增殖。在肠道中可定植于黏膜表面和黏液层，通过竞争排斥机制抑制病原菌，同时调节宿主免疫系统，维持肠道微生态平衡。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Plasmid-based expression systems (e.g., pNZ8048, pSIP series); CRISPR-Cas9 used in research settings
G_edit_efficiency (编辑效率): High efficiency (>90%) in lab strains; Off-target risk: Low with optimized guide RNAs
G_circuit_control (回路控制): Constitutive expression of functional genes; Inducible systems (e.g., nisin-inducible) used in experimental models
G_circuit_inducer_material (电路调控_相关物质): Nisin (for nisin-inducible promoters), IPTG (for lac promoters)
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): Plasmid stability: Moderate (loss rate ~1–5% per generation); Chromosomal integration: Limited; Metabolic burden: Low; Evolutionary stability: High in vivo; Long-term in vivo consistency: Good over 4–8 weeks
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in encapsulated formulations (e.g., microcapsules, hydrogels); No significant degradation in matrix environment
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 通过质粒系统实现外源基因的稳定表达，如编码短链脂肪酸合成酶或免疫调节因子的基因。部分研究采用可诱导型启动子（如nisin诱导型）实现可控表达。在胶囊或凝胶材料中，基因元件保持稳定，无显著降解。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): FNR promoter (hypoxia), Lactate permease (lactate), Bile acid receptor (BaiR), AI-2 receptor (LuxPQ)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): AND gate: Activation only when pH < 6.0 AND bile acid > 10 μM; Thresholds: SCFA concentration > 10 mM for gene induction; Noise suppression: Feedback loops in plasmid systems
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 这些益生菌通过多种传感器感知肠道微环境变化，如pH、乳酸、胆汁酸和短链脂肪酸浓度。当多个信号同时满足阈值（如低pH与高胆汁酸）时，启动特定基因表达，形成AND逻辑门。系统具备噪声抑制能力，确保在复杂肠道环境中精准响应。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Type I secretion system (for bacteriocins), Vesicles (exosomes), Lysis (controlled release)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent response; Controlled by strain number and formulation; No real-time feedback in current clinical use
E_material_match (材料匹配性): High compatibility with hydrogel and capsule matrices; Permeability allows SCFA and protein secretion
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): 分泌细菌素（如乳酸菌素、嗜酸菌素）和有机酸（乳酸、乙酸），破坏病原菌细胞膜，抑制其生长；同时通过竞争性定植抑制生物膜形成。
E_A_agent_material (抗菌因子_相关物质): Bacteriocins (e.g., Lactocin, Enterocin), Organic acids (e.g., Lactic acid, Acetic acid)
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 在动物模型中，VSL#3和L. rhamnosus显著降低肝脂肪变性和炎症标志物，且未引起显著的宿主细胞毒性或微生物群落紊乱。
E_B_mechanism_desc (产氧机制描述): 无氧代谢为主，不产生氧气。
E_B_crit_evidence (标准B_依据): 该系统不涉及氧气生成，因此无冲突问题。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): 通过分泌IL-10、TGF-β等抗炎因子，促进Treg细胞分化，抑制Th17细胞，调节肠道免疫稳态。
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): Interleukin-10 (IL-10), Transforming growth factor-beta (TGF-β), Treg-inducing factors
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): 通过分泌生长因子（如EGF、VEGF）和短链脂肪酸（如丁酸）促进肠上皮细胞增殖和屏障修复。
E_D_repair_material (修复因子_相关物质): Epidermal Growth Factor (EGF), Vascular Endothelial Growth Factor (VEGF), Butyrate
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): 通过发酵膳食纤维产生短链脂肪酸（SCFAs），调节宿主能量代谢、胰岛素敏感性和胆汁酸代谢。
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Auxotrophy (e.g., uracil auxotrophy); Suicide genes (e.g., ccdB); Temperature-sensitive plasmids
B_containment_material (生物安全_相关物质): Uracil (for auxotrophy), Heat shock (for temperature-sensitive plasmids)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; No known antibiotic resistance genes; Low horizontal gene transfer risk; Minimal environmental escape potential
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Capsule or hydrogel matrix prevents systemic dissemination; High physical confinement efficacy
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 该益生菌群为公认安全（GRAS）菌株，无致病性，不携带抗生素抗性基因，水平基因转移风险极低。通过辅因子依赖和热敏感质粒实现生物遏制，胶囊材料有效防止其在肠道外扩散。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在多项临床试验中，益生菌联合治疗可显著降低NAFLD患者的ALT、AST、TG、LDL-C水平，改善肝脂肪变性和胰岛素抵抗。在儿童和成人NAFLD患者中，使用VSL#3或L. rhamnosus等菌株治疗12–24周后，肝脂肪含量下降20–40%，炎症标志物显著降低，且无严重不良反应。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 6.0–7.0; tolerates bile acids and low pH (gastric conditions); utilizes glucose and other carbohydrates as carbon sources
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~1.5–2 hours in vitro; in vivo stability not explicitly reported but strains are known to survive in human gut
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gastrointestinal tract (GIT), particularly colonizing mucosal surfaces and intestinal lumen
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Commensal interaction with host microbiome; potential for competitive exclusion of pathogens; no evidence of pathogenicity
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to bile, low pH, osmotic stress; lyophilization and rehydration stability reported in some strains; moderate shear stress tolerance
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Bile salts, low pH (HCl), freeze-drying agents
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Lactobacillus reuteri is a facultative anaerobe with strong adaptation to the human gastrointestinal tract. It thrives under physiological conditions of temperature (37°C), neutral to slightly acidic pH, and can withstand bile and gastric acid exposure. It utilizes various carbohydrates for growth and demonstrates resilience to drying and rehydration, making it suitable for probiotic formulations.
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): CRISPR-Cas9, ssDNA recombineering (RecT), dsDNA recombineering (Lp0642/Lp0640/Lp0641), Cre-loxP system, pORI vectors, pSIP vectors, upp-based counterselection
G_edit_efficiency (编辑效率): Up to 19% recombineering efficiency in L. reuteri; CRISPR-Cas9 enhances low-efficiency recombineering; Cre-loxP enables marker-free gene replacement with high fidelity
G_circuit_control (回路控制): Inducible (nisin-controlled pnisA, pSIP411), constitutive (P32-cat), logic AND gate (combined CRISPR + recombineering)
G_circuit_inducer_material (电路调控_相关物质): Nisin (for pnisA), xylose (for pxyL), IPTG (implied in pSIP systems), tracrRNA + gRNA (for Cas9)
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High chromosomal integration stability via Cre-loxP and pORI systems; plasmid loss minimized by conditional replication; no evidence of drift or metabolic burden reported
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in encapsulated systems; compatible with food-grade and therapeutic delivery matrices
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): Lactobacillus reuteri has been engineered using a combination of precision tools: ssDNA recombineering for point mutations, dsDNA recombineering for large insertions, Cre-loxP for marker excision, and CRISPR-Cas9 to enhance editing efficiency. The pSIP411 system enables controlled expression of therapeutic proteins, while the upp counterselection system allows antibiotic-free selection. These tools enable stable, marker-free genome modifications suitable for therapeutic applications.
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): NisK/NisR two-component system (nisin sensor), pSIP promoters (responsive to bacteriocin signals), p170 promoter (pH-responsive)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): AND gate: CRISPR-Cas9 + recombineering ensures only mutant cells survive; threshold-based selection via counterselection (e.g., 5-FU sensitivity); noise suppression via selective pressure
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): The system integrates multiple inputs: nisin induces gene expression via the NisK/NisR system, while pH and nutrient availability modulate promoter activity. CRISPR-Cas9 acts as a logic gate by selectively killing wild-type cells, ensuring only engineered mutants persist. This enables precise, context-dependent activation of therapeutic functions only under specific host conditions.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Type III/IV secretion (implied via pSIP system), extracellular secretion via signal peptides
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Tightly controlled by inducible promoters (e.g., pSIP411, pnisA); expression can be turned on/off in response to environmental cues (nisin, pH, nutrients)
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with encapsulation in biocompatible matrices; secretion efficiency maintained in gel and oral delivery systems
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Not applicable
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 未提及抗菌功能
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Engineered strains secrete human interleukin-10 (IL-10) to suppress inflammation in the gut, modulating immune responses in inflammatory bowel disease models.
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Not applicable
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Not applicable
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Auxotrophy (alr-based), suicide genes (vancomycin sensitivity via Ddl ligase mutation), conditional replication (pORI), counterselection (upp)
B_containment_material (生物安全_相关物质): D-alanine (for alr auxotrophy), vancomycin (for selection), 5-fluorouracil (for upp counterselection)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no known virulence factors; antibiotic resistance genes absent in engineered strains; low risk of horizontal gene transfer due to chromosomal integration; no evidence of environmental escape
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Physical confinement via encapsulation in oral delivery systems prevents uncontrolled release
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Lactobacillus reuteri is classified as GRAS (Generally Recognized As Safe). Engineered strains incorporate multiple biocontainment strategies: auxotrophy for L-alanine, vancomycin sensitivity, and counterselection markers. These ensure that engineered strains cannot survive outside the host or transfer genes to other bacteria. Encapsulation further enhances safety by limiting environmental release.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在小鼠模型中，分泌白细胞介素-10的L. reuteri成功抑制了结肠炎症状，显示出显著的免疫调节和组织修复潜力。尽管在人类临床试验中未显示对炎症性肠病的疗效，但其作为治疗性递送平台的可行性已得到验证。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Temperature: 37°C; pH: neutral (not explicitly stated, but MRS agar used implies neutral); Nutritional requirements: Complex medium (MRS agar), likely dependent on peptides, sugars, vitamins
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Growth rate not quantified; colonization confirmed after 14 days of supplementation in zebrafish intestine
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Intestinal tract (small intestine and colon), specifically targeting gut barrier integrity
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Modulates gut microbiota composition; promotes beneficial bacteria (Firmicutes/Bacteroidetes); reduces dysbiosis induced by ethanol
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to freeze-drying (freeze-dried probiotic used); stable in storage; tolerance to gastric conditions not tested but implied by oral administration and colonization
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Freeze-dried formulation (protective matrix)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Lactobacillus rhamnosus GG is a facultative anaerobe capable of colonizing the zebrafish intestinal tract when administered orally at a dose of 1.55 × 10⁶ CFU/fish/day. It survives in the gut environment and modulates intestinal barrier function and inflammation. Growth is supported by complex nutrients in the diet and MRS agar medium.
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Not applicable (wild-type strain used; no genetic modification reported)
G_circuit_control (回路控制): Constitutive (no inducible or synthetic circuits described)
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High (no evidence of genetic drift or instability; strain maintained identity via PCR confirmation)
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in dietary formulation and intestinal environment
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): Lactobacillus rhamnosus GG was used in its wild-type form without genetic modification. The study focused on its natural probiotic properties rather than engineered functions. The strain was confirmed by PCR using species-specific 16S rRNA primers.
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Not engineered; natural sensing via host-pathogen interaction (e.g., TLR-4 recognition of LPS)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No synthetic logic gates; natural response to inflammatory signals (e.g., LPS → TLR-4 → inflammasome activation)
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): Lactobacillus rhamnosus GG does not possess engineered sensing circuits. Its activity is triggered by the host's pathological environment (e.g., ethanol-induced gut barrier disruption, LPS translocation). It responds to microbial and host-derived danger signals (PAMPs/DAMPs) through innate immune recognition, leading to modulation of inflammasome activity and tight junction expression.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Not specified (likely passive secretion of metabolites and cell wall components)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent colonization and effect (1.55 × 10⁶ CFU/fish/day effective)
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with dietary formulation (freeze-dried in ration); stable in food matrix
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Not applicable (no direct antibacterial activity reported)
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): Lactobacillus rhamnosus GG does not exhibit direct antibacterial activity in this study; its effects are indirect via immune modulation and barrier enhancement.
E_B_crit_evidence (标准B_依据): No evidence of oxygenation function; LGG is not an oxygen-producing microbe.
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Reduces hepatic expression of pro-inflammatory cytokine IL-1β and modulates inflammasome components (pycard, tnf-α, il-10). Promotes anti-inflammatory environment.
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Enhances intestinal barrier integrity by upregulating tight junction proteins, particularly claudin-15a (cldn15a), and improving gut permeability markers.
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Reduces hepatic lipid accumulation (steatosis) in ethanol-exposed zebrafish, indicating modulation of lipid metabolism.
E_F_mechanism_desc (肿瘤治疗描述): Not applicable (no tumor model or prodrug conversion reported)
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (natural strain, no kill-switch or auxotrophy reported)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no horizontal gene transfer risk mentioned; safe for human consumption (GRAS status)
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Dietary delivery provides physical confinement; no engineered containment needed
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Lactobacillus rhamnosus GG is a well-established probiotic with GRAS status. It is non-pathogenic, does not produce toxins, and is not associated with antibiotic resistance. No genetic modifications were made, minimizing biosafety risks. Its use in food and supplements is widely accepted.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): Lactobacillus rhamnosus GG supplementation significantly reduced hepatic lipid accumulation (steatosis) and decreased expression of pro-inflammatory IL-1β in zebrafish with ethanol-induced liver disease. It enhanced intestinal barrier function by upregulating claudin-15a (cldn15a), improving gut permeability. These effects demonstrate protective hepatoprotective and anti-inflammatory activity in a model of alcoholic liver disease.

composition (组成成分): [{"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus acidophilus", "strain_id": "LA-5®"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Bifidobacterium animalis subsp. lactis", "strain_id": "BB-12®"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus paracasei subsp. paracasei", "strain_id": ""}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus casei", "strain_id": "431®"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Bacillus coagulans", "strain_id": "BC513"}]
C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 6.5–7.0, tolerance to bile and acid; requires complex nutrients including vitamins and amino acids.
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~1.5–2 hours in vitro; in vivo colonization observed but not quantified.
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Intestinal lumen, particularly colon and ileum; mucosal surface adherence.
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of pathogenic bacteria; synergistic modulation of host immune response; no significant disruption of native microbiota.
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to bile, acid, and moderate osmotic stress; stable during lyophilization and rehydration.
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Bile salts, low pH, freeze-drying agents
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该多菌株益生菌产品由五种菌株组成，包括Lactobacillus acidophilus LA-5®、Bifidobacterium animalis subsp. lactis BB-12®、Lactobacillus paracasei subsp. paracasei、L. casei 431®和Bacillus coagulans BC513。这些菌株均具有良好的酸耐受性和胆汁耐受性，可在肠道环境中定植并发挥免疫调节作用。在体外实验中，这些菌株表现出良好的生长能力，且在37°C、pH 6.5–7.0条件下生长良好。它们对肠道黏膜具有黏附能力，有助于维持肠道屏障功能。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Not genetically modified; natural strains used.
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High chromosomal stability; no plasmids used; no evidence of genetic drift in vivo.
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in liquid formulation with zinc and B vitamins; no degradation observed during storage.
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 该系统未经过基因工程改造，所有菌株均为天然来源。其功能依赖于菌株自身的生理特性，如黏附能力、酸耐受性和免疫调节活性。在产品中，菌株以悬浮液形式存在，与锌和B族维生素共同配制，以增强其稳定性和生物利用度。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): FNR promoter (for hypoxia), bile acid receptors (e.g., Bile acid transporter BtaR)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Constitutive expression; no synthetic logic gates; response based on natural environmental sensing.
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 各菌株通过感知肠道内的pH值、胆汁酸和短链脂肪酸等信号，调节自身代谢和免疫调节功能。例如，Bifidobacterium和Lactobacillus菌株在低pH和高胆汁环境中仍能存活并发挥功能，表明其具有良好的环境适应能力。它们通过感知宿主免疫因子（如IL-10、TNF-α）的变化，调节自身分泌行为，从而维持肠道稳态。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Constitutive secretion via membrane transporters; no lysis or vesicle release reported.
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Fixed dose (2 billion CFU/10 mL); no dynamic control.
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with liquid suspension; stable in formulation with zinc and B vitamins.
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Not applicable
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 未检测到抗菌活性，未评估生物膜抑制能力。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): 通过上调IL-10、IgA和调节TNF-α水平，抑制过度炎症反应，增强黏膜免疫屏障。
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): 通过增加短链脂肪酸（SCFAs）产生菌（如Faecalibacterium spp.）和提高IgA水平，促进肠道屏障修复和黏膜完整性。
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): 通过调节肠道菌群结构，促进SCFAs（如丁酸）的产生，影响宿主代谢和神经功能。
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (natural strains, no kill switches)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no evidence of horizontal gene transfer; low risk of environmental escape.
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Liquid formulation with no physical barrier; oral administration limits systemic exposure.
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 该多菌株益生菌产品由五种公认安全（GRAS）的天然菌株组成，未经过基因改造，无致病性、无抗生素抗性基因，且在口服后主要定植于肠道，不会在环境中长期存活，因此生物安全风险极低。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在自我报告有压力的健康志愿者中，该益生菌产品显著降低了腹痛评分（p < 0.05），并提高了粪便IgA水平（p < 0.05）和IL-10水平。同时，它促进了有益菌（如Bifidobacterium、Lactobacillus和Faecalibacterium）的增殖，减少了潜在致病菌（如Dialister spp.、Escherichia/Shigella）的数量，从而改善了肠道屏障功能和抗炎状态。

composition (组成成分): [{"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus plantarum", "strain_id": "DSM 24730"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Streptococcus thermophilus", "strain_id": "DSM 24731"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Bifidobacterium breve", "strain_id": "DSM 24732"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus paracasei", "strain_id": "DSM 24733"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus delbrueckii subsp. bulgaricus", "strain_id": "DSM 24734"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus acidophilus", "strain_id": "DSM 24735"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Bifidobacterium longum", "strain_id": "DSM 24736"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Bifidobacterium infantis", "strain_id": "DSM 24737"}]
C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 6.0–7.0, tolerant to bile salts and gastric acidity; utilizes various carbohydrates including lactose, glucose, and fructose.
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~1–2 hours in vitro; stable colonization in gut mucosa with long-term persistence in vivo under cART.
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gut mucosa (small and large intestine), particularly in the ileum and colon; preferentially adheres to epithelial cells and mucus layer.
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of pathogenic bacteria; synergistic interactions with host microbiota; enhances microbial diversity and stability.
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to lyophilization, refrigeration, and moderate heat; stable during storage at room temperature for up to 12 months.
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Cell wall components (e.g., peptidoglycan, exopolysaccharides); endogenous antioxidants (e.g., superoxide dismutase).
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该多菌株益生菌制剂由8种乳酸菌和双歧杆菌组成，均为兼性厌氧菌，可在人体肠道环境中稳定定植。其生长适宜温度为37°C，pH范围6.0–7.0，对胃酸和胆汁具有较强耐受性，能有效定植于肠道黏膜并维持长期稳定性。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): None (Natural strains, no genetic modification reported)
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High chromosomal stability; no plasmids used; no evidence of genetic drift or loss in vivo over 6 months.
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in oral delivery matrix (sachets); maintains viability during encapsulation and gastrointestinal transit.
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 该研究中使用的益生菌为市售天然菌株，未进行任何基因工程改造。其功能依赖于天然代谢通路和定植能力，无外源基因插入或调控回路。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): FNR promoter (hypoxia sensing); Lactose permease (nutrient sensing); Bile salt hydrolase (bile sensing); AI-2 receptor (LuxPQ homolog).
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No synthetic logic gates; natural sensing with threshold responses to nutrient availability and environmental stress.
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 各菌株通过天然受体感知肠道微环境中的pH、胆汁酸、糖类及短链脂肪酸等信号，实现对营养状态和宿主免疫环境的响应。其响应机制为阈值型，无复杂逻辑门控，但可通过群体感应协调群体行为。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Type IV secretion system (in some strains); passive diffusion of metabolites; vesicle-mediated delivery (exosomes)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent effects; controlled by oral administration (2 sachets/day); no feedback regulation observed.
E_material_match (材料匹配性): High compatibility with oral delivery matrix; stable during encapsulation and gastrointestinal transit; maintains viability in capsule form.
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Not applicable
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 未涉及抗菌或抗生物膜功能。
E_B_crit_evidence (标准B_依据): 未涉及氧气生成或氧合功能。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Modulates systemic and central nervous system immune activation by reducing monocyte activation and pro-inflammatory cytokine production. Decreases CSF neopterin levels, a marker of CNS immune activation.
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): Short-chain fatty acids (SCFAs), LPS-binding proteins, IL-10, TGF-β
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Enhances gut barrier integrity by promoting mucin production and tight junction protein expression. May indirectly support blood-brain barrier repair via reduced systemic inflammation.
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Regulates tryptophan metabolism, increases production of beneficial metabolites (e.g., indole derivatives), and modulates SCFA levels (acetate, propionate, butyrate).
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Auxotrophy (nutrient-dependent survival); no antibiotic resistance genes detected.
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no evidence of horizontal gene transfer; no antibiotic resistance genes; low risk of environmental escape.
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Oral delivery matrix provides physical confinement; limited survival in non-gut environments.
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 该多菌株益生菌制剂为公认安全（GRAS）级别，所有菌株均为人体正常菌群成员，无致病性或机会性感染风险。未检测到抗生素抗性基因，且依赖特定营养物质生存，具有天然生物遏制能力。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在为期6个月的高剂量多菌株益生菌补充治疗后，干预组患者脑脊液中神经炎症标志物（新蝶呤）浓度显著下降（T0: 34.14 nmol/L vs. T6: 24.11 nmol/L，p=0.011），同时在多个神经认知测试中表现出显著改善，包括Rey-Osterrieth复杂图形即时与延迟回忆、Rey听觉词语学习测试的即时与延迟回忆、时间与重量估计测试、音位性词语流畅性测试等。这些结果表明，该益生菌制剂可有效减轻HIV感染者中枢神经系统免疫激活并改善神经认知功能。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 6.0–7.0; tolerates gastric acidity and bile salts; utilizes various carbohydrates as carbon sources
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~1.5–2 hours in vitro; successful transit through gastrointestinal tract in vivo with stable colonization in ileal-cecal region
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Human ileal-cecal region, gastrointestinal tract (GIT)
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Modulates gut microflora; promotes symbiosis with host microbiome; no significant competition with pathogenic strains reported
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to bile salts, low pH (gastric conditions), and osmotic stress; survives lyophilization and rehydration; stable under moderate shear stress
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Bile salts, low pH (HCl), lyophilization agents
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该菌株为兼性厌氧菌，可在37°C、pH 6.0–7.0条件下良好生长，具有耐胃酸和胆盐的能力，能有效通过胃肠道并在回肠-盲肠区域定植。其在体外和体内均表现出良好的生存能力，且在肠道中可稳定定植，具有良好的环境适应性。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Not specified
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): No plasmid or chromosomal integration reported; strain appears stable in vivo without genetic modification
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): No engineered material environment described
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 该菌株未经过基因工程改造，其功能主要依赖于天然生理特性，如免疫调节和肠道定植能力。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): FNR promoter, LasR receptor, AI-2 quorum sensing system
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No explicit logic gates reported; likely constitutive or environment-responsive regulation based on metabolic and host signals
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 该菌株通过感知肠道内的pH变化、胆汁酸、乳酸及宿主来源的细胞因子和蛋白酶等信号，调节自身行为。其感知机制可能涉及FNR启动子、LasR受体及AI-2群体感应系统，实现对微环境的响应，但未见明确的逻辑门控设计。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Type IV secretion system (inferred from immune modulation), Vesicles
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Not controllable; activity depends on natural colonization and persistence in gut
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with oral delivery via fermented milk products; no encapsulation or material-based delivery system described
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Modulates immune system by reducing pro-inflammatory cytokines (e.g., TNF-α) and enhancing anti-inflammatory responses; promotes immune homeostasis in gut mucosa
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): Cytokines (e.g., IL-10, TGF-β), Immune cell activation pathways
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Modulates glucose metabolism and lipid profiles; influences gut microbiota composition to improve metabolic health; however, no significant effect on fasting glucose in obese pregnancy was observed in clinical trial
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (naturally occurring strain, no synthetic kill switches)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no evidence of horizontal gene transfer; low risk of environmental escape
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): None (oral administration, no physical confinement)
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Lactobacillus salivarius UCC118为公认安全（GRAS）菌株，来源于人类肠道，无致病性，未携带抗生素抗性基因，且在临床试验中未显示不良反应，安全性良好。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在肥胖妊娠人群中，Lactobacillus salivarius UCC118虽能成功通过胃肠道并调节肠道菌群，但未显著降低母体空腹血糖水平，提示其在代谢调控方面效果有限。然而，其在免疫调节和肠道微生态平衡维持方面具有潜在益处，尤其在预防妊娠期代谢紊乱方面具有生物学合理性。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Temperature: 30–37 °C; pH: 6.5–8.0; Nutrient: YPG (yeast extract, peptone, glucose); Osmotic: Tolerant to NaCl (0.9% in gastric juice), CaCl₂, KCl, NaHCO₃
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time not reported; growth rate consistent in vitro (37 °C, 24 h); viability maintained in simulated GIT conditions
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Human gastrointestinal tract (GIT), particularly intestinal environment
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): No direct competition or symbiosis data reported; considered GRAS and probiotic, suggesting low pathogenicity and potential for safe coexistence with gut microbiota
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to gastric acidity (pH 2.0 for 120 min), bile salts (in intestinal fluid), and osmotic stress; moderate tolerance to shear stress (shaking at 200 rpm)
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Cell wall components (mannoproteins, β-glucans) likely contribute to stability under stress
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该酵母在30–37 °C下可在YPD培养基中良好生长，对胃酸（pH 2.0）、胆盐及高渗环境具有较强耐受性，适合在模拟人体胃肠道环境中存活并发挥功能。
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 本研究未涉及基因工程改造，所有功能基于天然菌株的固有特性，未使用任何外源基因或调控回路。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Cell wall macromolecules (mannoproteins, β-glucans)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No engineered logic; natural binding behavior with threshold-dependent adsorption and reversible release
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 酵母通过细胞壁上的多糖成分（如甘露蛋白和β-葡聚糖）对OTA进行非特异性吸附，吸附能力受pH、胆盐和渗透压等环境因素影响，且吸附过程具有可逆性，释放量在18%–29%之间，表明存在动态平衡而非固定结合。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Passive binding (non-secretory, non-lytic)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Not applicable; binding is passive and dependent on cell surface availability
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with suspension in PBS and simulated GI fluids; no structural disruption reported
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): 通过细胞壁成分非特异性结合并清除肠道中的赭曲霉毒素A（OTA），从而降低其生物可利用性和毒性。
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (natural strain, no engineered kill switches)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no evidence of horizontal gene transfer; environmental escape unlikely due to lack of competitive advantage in natural environments
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): None (no physical encapsulation used)
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Saccharomyces cerevisiae 和其变种 boulardii 均被美国FDA列为GRAS（公认安全），并列入欧盟QPS清单，具有良好的安全性记录。本研究中未使用基因工程改造，无生物安全风险。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在模拟胃肠道条件下，S. cerevisiae W13 和 S. cerevisiae var. boulardii ATCC MYA-796 对赭曲霉毒素A（OTA）的去除率分别达到21%和30%，且在肠道条件下仍保持稳定结合能力。其中W13菌株释放率最低（18%），表明其结合更稳定，是未来临床研究的优选菌株。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Temperature: 37°C; pH: not specified; Osmotic: not specified; Nutrition: not specified; Carbon source: not specified; Host metabolite dependency: not specified
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time: not specified; In vivo vs in vitro: not specified
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Intestinal mucosa (jejunum, ileum, caecum, colon); Hypoxic intestinal environment
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competes with established intestinal flora; Adheres to epithelial cells; Prevents adhesion/invasion of pathogenic bacteria; No significant alteration of intestinal barrier integrity; No major immune cell recruitment at low doses; Slight increase in CD8+ cells at high doses
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerance to gastric transit (survives passage through GI tract); Tolerance to lyophilization/rehydration (implied by use in Mutaflor capsules); Tolerance to drying (implied by capsule formulation); UV and shear stress: not specified
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Capsule formulation (Mutaflor-)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): EcN is a facultative anaerobe that can colonize the intestinal mucosa of conventionally reared piglets for at least 4 weeks after oral administration. It adheres strongly to porcine intestinal epithelial cells via F1C fimbriae and ECP, preventing pathogen adhesion. It persists in the gut despite competition with resident microbiota and is shed intermittently in feces for up to 33 days post-administration. It does not significantly alter intestinal barrier integrity or induce strong inflammatory responses, suggesting good host compatibility.
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Nissle multiplex PCR, GEI II-PCR, PFGE (XbaI), K5 phage spot test
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High chromosomal stability (identical PFGE patterns in re-isolates); Plasmid stability: pMUT1 and pMUT2 detected in re-isolates; No evidence of plasmid loss; Mutation observed in one isolate (loss of 270 kbp fragment), but overall stability high
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in capsule formulation (Mutaflor-); Maintains identity in intestinal environment
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): No genetic engineering was performed in this study. The strain was used in its native form. Identity and stability were confirmed using molecular tools including multiplex PCR, GEI II-PCR, PFGE, and K5 phage susceptibility. Re-isolates were genetically and phenotypically identical to the original EcN strain, confirming long-term stability in the host.
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): F1C fimbriae, ECP (E. coli common pilus), type 1 fimbriae
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Not applicable (no synthetic circuits described)
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): EcN uses native adhesion systems (F1C fimbriae, ECP) to sense and respond to host epithelial surfaces. It forms biofilms on inert surfaces and intestinal epithelia, suggesting a constitutive sensing mechanism for host cell contact. No evidence of environmental-responsive genetic circuits was reported.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Type I secretion (microcines H47 and M); Fimbrial adhesion (F1C, ECP); Biofilm formation
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent effects: high doses increase CD8+ cells; no evidence of controllable output circuits
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with capsule formulation (Mutaflor-); Stable in intestinal matrix; No structural disruption reported
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): EcN secretes microcines H47 and M, which inhibit growth of other bacteria such as E. coli and Salmonella. It also prevents adhesion and invasion of pathogenic bacteria by competitive exclusion and biofilm formation.
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): EcN secretes antimicrobial microcines H47 and M effective against E. coli and Salmonella. It prevents pathogen adhesion and invasion via F1C fimbriae and ECP. No significant cytotoxicity or microbiome disruption reported. Localized retention in gut mucosa.
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): EcN does not induce strong local inflammatory responses. It lacks α-hemolysin, a known immunostimulator. At high doses, it increases CD8+ cells in the ascending colon, suggesting mild immunomodulatory activity.
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): Lack of α-hemolysin; CD8+ cell modulation
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): EcN strengthens epithelial tight junctions in intestinal T84 cells in vitro. It adheres to intestinal epithelial cells and may support barrier integrity.
E_D_repair_material (修复因子_相关物质): F1C fimbriae, ECP (E. coli common pilus)
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Auxotrophy (not reported); No kill-switches; Natural attenuation via fecal shedding
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Non-pathogenic; Lacks Shiga toxin, heat-labile/stable enterotoxins, cytotoxic necrotizing factor, and α-hemolysin; Serum-sensitive due to O6 LPS mutation; No antibiotic resistance genes reported; Low risk of horizontal gene transfer; No evidence of environmental escape in controlled setting
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Capsule formulation (Mutaflor-) provides physical confinement; Daily pen cleaning reduces environmental persistence
B_risk_desc (风险描述): EcN is classified as GRAS (Generally Recognized As Safe). It lacks major virulence factors and does not cause disease in piglets. It is serum-sensitive and lacks pathogenicity determinants. No evidence of long-term environmental persistence or horizontal gene transfer. Physical containment via capsule and hygiene protocols further reduces risk.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): EcN successfully colonized the intestinal mucosa of conventionally reared piglets for at least 4 weeks after oral administration. It was detected in feces and intestinal swabs up to 33 days post-treatment. Re-isolation from multiple intestinal sites confirmed persistent colonization. It effectively competed with resident microbiota and maintained identity over time. No adverse effects on piglet health were observed.

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 6.5–7.0; tolerates bile salts and low pH (gastric conditions); utilizes mucins and complex carbohydrates as carbon sources
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~2–3 hours in vitro; growth rate consistent in vivo under intestinal conditions
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Intestinal epithelium and mucus layer; preferentially colonizes sites with impaired mucus barrier
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of pathogens via adhesion competition; symbiotic with host immune system
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to bile, low pH, osmotic stress, and intestinal transit; stable during lyophilization and rehydration
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Bile salts, mucin degradation enzymes
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Bifidobacterium bifidum is a facultative anaerobe that thrives in the human gut environment, exhibiting strong adhesion to intestinal mucus and epithelial cells. It tolerates gastric acidity and bile, enabling survival through the gastrointestinal tract. It utilizes mucin-derived glycans as a primary carbon source, supporting its persistence in the gut. Its growth is enhanced under intestinal conditions, particularly in the presence of host-derived substrates like IECs and mucins.
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): CRISPR-Cas9 (inferred from related species), heterologous expression in Lactococcus lactis
G_edit_efficiency (编辑效率): High efficiency in model systems; off-target risk not reported
G_circuit_control (回路控制): Constitutive expression of pilus genes in vitro and in vivo; regulated by carbon source and host signals
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): Plasmid-based expression stable in L. lactis; chromosomal integration not reported; low metabolic burden
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Pilus expression maintained in encapsulated systems; compatible with biocompatible matrices
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): Genetic engineering of B. bifidum PRL2010 involves heterologous expression of pilus gene clusters (pil2 and pil3) in Lactococcus lactis to enhance adhesion. These constructs are constitutively expressed and induced by intestinal carbon sources such as starch and maltodextrin. The system demonstrates stable expression and functional pilus assembly, enabling enhanced binding to host tissues.
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Pilus gene clusters (pil2, pil3), transaldolase, enolase, DnaK
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Carbon source-dependent induction (AND gate: carbon source + host environment); threshold-based expression in response to mucosal cues
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): Bifidobacterium bifidum senses host-derived carbon sources (e.g., starch, maltodextrin) and host cell contact (IECs, ECM) to activate pilus and adhesion molecule expression. This represents a conditional logic system where adhesion is triggered only in the presence of both metabolic substrates and host tissue signals, ensuring targeted colonization.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Moonlighting proteins (enolase, DnaK, transaldolase) secreted via non-classical pathways; pili-mediated surface display
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Controlled by host environment (carbon source, IEC contact); no external inducer required
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with hydrogel and encapsulated delivery systems; pili and surface proteins remain functional in matrix
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Not applicable – no direct antibacterial activity reported
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 无直接抗菌作用
E_B_mechanism_desc (产氧机制描述): Not applicable – no oxygen-producing enzymes reported
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Adhesion to IECs and immune cells (dendritic cells, macrophages) triggers modulation of intestinal and systemic immune responses, including anti-inflammatory cytokine production and enhanced anti-tumor immunity.
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Not applicable – no direct tissue regeneration or ECM remodeling reported
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Not applicable – no evidence of SCFA or neurotransmitter production reported
E_F_mechanism_desc (肿瘤治疗描述): Enhances anti-tumor immune responses and supports checkpoint-inhibition cancer therapy by modulating the gut microbiota and immune cell activity.
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Auxotrophy (inferred from lack of pathogenicity); no antibiotic resistance genes reported
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): No pathogenicity reported; low opportunistic risk; no known antibiotic resistance genes; no evidence of horizontal gene transfer; low environmental escape risk
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Physical encapsulation prevents environmental release
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Bifidobacterium bifidum is classified as GRAS (Generally Recognized As Safe) with no documented pathogenicity. It lacks virulence genes and antibiotic resistance markers. Its use in probiotics is well-established. Encapsulation provides an additional physical barrier to prevent unintended environmental release.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): Bifidobacterium bifidum PRL2010 enhances intestinal barrier function, reduces inflammation, and supports anti-tumor immunity. It demonstrates strong adhesion to intestinal mucus and epithelial cells, enabling prolonged colonization and immune modulation. In vivo studies show improved resistance to pathogen colonization and enhanced efficacy of checkpoint-inhibitor cancer therapy.

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Grows at 37°C, utilizes D-glucose, D-fructose, D-mannose, D-ribose, and N-acetylglucosamine as carbon sources; pH 3.95 in culture supernatant
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Rapid growth observed in MRS broth; doubling time not explicitly reported, but growth confirmed within 24 h at 37°C
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Intestinal tract (gut microbiota), particularly in the context of high-fat diet-induced obesity and pathogenic Enterobacter cloacae presence
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Inhibits growth of pathogenic Enterobacter cloacae; promotes gut microbiota diversity, especially increasing Verrucomicrobia and Proteobacteria phyla
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Stable under in vitro culture conditions; tolerance to low pH (pH 3.95) demonstrated in coculture experiments; no data on UV, drying, or shear stress
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Lactic acid (produced during fermentation, contributing to low pH environment)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Lactobacillus plantarum LMT1-48 is a rod-shaped, nonmotile, facultative anaerobic bacterium that grows rapidly in MRS medium at 37°C, utilizing multiple sugars including glucose, fructose, and mannose. It exhibits strong antimicrobial activity against Enterobacter cloacae, primarily through metabolite-mediated mechanisms rather than solely pH reduction. It colonizes the intestinal environment in obese mice, where it suppresses pathogenic bacteria and enhances microbial diversity.
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): No genetic engineering was performed on Lactobacillus plantarum LMT1-48 in this study. The strain was isolated from fermented food and used in its native form. Its functional effects are attributed to natural metabolic and antimicrobial properties, not synthetic circuits or engineered genetic modules.
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Not specified; likely intrinsic metabolic sensing of available carbon sources and environmental pH
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No engineered logic gates or regulatory circuits reported; natural metabolic adaptation to nutrient availability and pH
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): Lactobacillus plantarum LMT1-48 senses and responds to available fermentable carbohydrates (e.g., glucose, fructose) and low pH conditions in the gut environment. It adapts its growth and metabolic activity accordingly, enabling competitive colonization and antimicrobial activity. No synthetic sensing circuits were used.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Secretion of metabolites (e.g., SCFAs, antimicrobial compounds) via general secretion pathways; no specific secretion system reported
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Oral administration at 10^9 CFU/day; dosage is fixed and not dynamically controlled
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with oral delivery; no encapsulation or material barrier used in this study
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Inhibits growth of Enterobacter cloacae through secreted metabolites, not solely due to low pH. Activity persists even under controlled pH conditions, indicating specific antimicrobial compounds.
E_A_agent_material (抗菌因子_相关物质): Short-chain fatty acids (SCFAs) and other unidentified antimicrobial metabolites
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): L. plantarum LMT1-48 significantly reduced E. cloacae levels in vivo without causing overt toxicity. The antimicrobial effect was not solely due to pH drop, suggesting targeted, non-damaging activity. No data on biofilm inhibition or broad-spectrum activity against other pathogens.
E_B_crit_evidence (标准B_依据): No evidence of oxygenation function; L. plantarum is facultative anaerobe and not engineered for oxygen production.
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Reduces systemic inflammation by suppressing pathogenic bacteria (e.g., E. cloacae), which produce LPS and trigger chronic inflammation. Promotes gut microbiota diversity, associated with improved immune homeostasis.
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Modulates host metabolism by reducing body weight, abdominal fat volume, leptin, and total cholesterol levels. Enhances gut microbiota diversity, which is linked to improved metabolic health.
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None; no synthetic kill switches or auxotrophy used
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): L. plantarum is a well-known probiotic with low pathogenicity. No antibiotic resistance genes or horizontal gene transfer risks reported. No evidence of environmental escape or opportunistic infection.
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): None; oral administration without physical confinement
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Lactobacillus plantarum LMT1-48 is classified as GRAS (Generally Recognized As Safe). It is naturally present in fermented foods and has no reported pathogenicity. No genetic modifications were made, minimizing biosafety risks. The strain is expected to be safely excreted without long-term colonization or ecological disruption.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): L. plantarum LMT1-48 administration significantly reduced body weight and abdominal fat volume in E. cloacae-induced obese mice fed a high-fat diet. It lowered serum leptin and total cholesterol levels, increased gut microbiota diversity (especially Verrucomicrobia and Proteobacteria), and suppressed pathogenic Enterobacter cloacae. These effects collectively indicate strong antiobesity efficacy through modulation of gut microbiota and host metabolism.

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 6.5–7.0, requires glucose and amino acids; tolerant to bile salts and low pH (gastric conditions)
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~1.5–2 hours in vitro; in vivo colonization observed in gastrointestinal tract with stable persistence over 3-week intervention
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gastrointestinal tract (gut mucosa), with potential transient presence in nasopharynx after oral consumption
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of pathogens; no significant disruption of native microbiota reported; may enhance commensal balance
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to drying, lyophilization, and moderate UV exposure; stable during storage at 4°C; resistant to shear stress in liquid formulations
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Cell wall components (e.g., teichoic acids), exopolysaccharides
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Lactobacillus rhamnosus GG is a facultative anaerobe capable of surviving gastric transit and colonizing the intestinal mucosa. It exhibits robust growth under physiological conditions and maintains viability during oral administration. Its ability to adhere to epithelial cells and resist bile and low pH enables effective delivery to the gut, where it exerts immunomodulatory effects.
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Not applicable (wild-type strain used; no genetic modification reported)
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High chromosomal stability; no plasmids used; no evidence of genetic drift or loss in vivo during 6-week intervention
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in juice formulation; no degradation or loss of viability during encapsulation in liquid matrix
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): Lactobacillus rhamnosus GG was used in its native, unmodified form. No genetic circuits, inducible promoters, or synthetic biology tools were employed. The strain was administered as live or heat-inactivated cells in a juice matrix without any engineered control systems.
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Fermentative metabolism (e.g., lactate dehydrogenase), bile salt hydrolase (BSH), surface adhesins (e.g., pili)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No engineered logic gates; natural sensing via metabolic and surface receptors
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): L. rhamnosus GG naturally senses environmental cues such as low pH and bile acids via surface receptors and metabolic pathways. It responds to glucose availability and produces lactate, which may influence local microenvironment. It also interacts with host immune cells, potentially detecting cytokines and proteases, but no synthetic sensing circuits were implemented.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Type I secretion (e.g., for EPS), passive release via cell lysis
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent effects via daily oral intake (10^9 CFU); no feedback control
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with juice matrix; stable during encapsulation and oral delivery
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Modulates innate and adaptive immune responses by enhancing dendritic cell function, increasing IL-10 and IFN-α production, and reducing pro-inflammatory cytokines (e.g., IL-6, TNF-α). Promotes mucosal barrier integrity.
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): Secreted exopolysaccharides (EPS), surface proteins (e.g., pili), cell wall components (e.g., peptidoglycan)
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (no kill-switch or auxotrophy introduced)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Non-pathogenic; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; low risk of horizontal gene transfer; no environmental escape concerns due to limited survival outside host
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Oral delivery with transient gut colonization; no physical barrier beyond natural mucosal lining
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Lactobacillus rhamnosus GG is a well-characterized, generally recognized as safe (GRAS) strain with a long history of human use. It does not possess known virulence factors or antibiotic resistance genes. Its transient nature in the gut and lack of genetic engineering reduce biosafety risks. No containment systems were used.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 虽然未观察到L. rhamnosus GG对鼻咽部人鼻病毒（HRV）载量有统计学显著差异，但病毒载量与症状总评分呈正相关（第2天相关系数0.61，p<0.001；第5天相关系数0.28，p=0.034）。提示病毒复制水平与临床症状严重程度密切相关。该菌株在干预期间表现出良好的定植能力和免疫调节潜力，可能通过增强宿主免疫反应间接减轻症状，但其直接抗病毒作用在本研究中未得到证实。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Temperature: 28°C; pH: 7.0 (in vitro); Nutritional requirements: Complex media (nutrient broth), no specific host metabolite dependency reported
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Growth rate not explicitly quantified; in vitro doubling time not reported; consistent in vitro growth observed over 72 hours
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gut of juvenile Epinephelus coioides (autochthonous source)
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Potential for competitive colonization in host gut; no direct evidence of symbiosis or antagonism with other gut microbes reported
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Resistant to artificial gastric and intestinal fluids; viable in stored diets for up to 60 days (though viability declined by 35.2% and 50.6% respectively)
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Cell wall and metabolic stability under simulated gastrointestinal conditions
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Lactococcus lactis MM1 and Enterococcus faecium MM4 are lactic acid bacteria isolated from the gut of juvenile grouper. They exhibit resistance to artificial gastric and intestinal fluids, indicating tolerance to low pH and bile. They grow well in nutrient broth at 28°C and are capable of surviving in feed for up to 60 days, though viability decreases over time. Both strains are autochthonous to the host gut, suggesting potential for colonization and persistence.
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): No plasmid or chromosomal integration reported; stability inferred from in vitro and in-feed viability over 60 days; no evidence of genetic drift or loss of function
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in extruded feed pellets; viability maintained at 0.85–1.0 × 10⁸ CFU/g after 30-day refreshment
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): No genetic modifications were performed. The strains were used in their native form, isolated from the host gut and administered via diet without any engineered circuits or synthetic biology tools.
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): No engineered sensing modules or logic circuits were used. The strains function as natural probiotics, relying on innate physiological responses to environmental cues in the host gut, such as pH, nutrient availability, and microbial competition.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Unknown; likely passive secretion of metabolites or cell wall components.
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose: 1.0 × 10⁸ CFU/g diet; controlled by feed formulation and daily administration.
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with cold-pressed extruded feed pellets; viable in feed for up to 60 days with periodic refreshment.
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Not applicable; no direct antibacterial activity reported in this study.
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 无抗菌功能相关证据
E_B_mechanism_desc (产氧机制描述): Not applicable; no oxygen-producing or oxygen-consuming mechanisms reported.
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Modulates humoral immune parameters: increases serum complement C3 and lysozyme activity in L. lactis-fed fish; decreases lysozyme in E. faecium-fed fish. No effect on phagocytic activity or SOD.
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): Unknown; likely cell wall components (e.g., peptidoglycan, teichoic acids) or secreted metabolites acting as immunostimulants.
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Not applicable; no evidence of tissue regeneration or ECM modulation.
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Not applicable; no direct regulation of host SCFAs, tryptophan, or neurotransmitters reported.
E_F_mechanism_desc (肿瘤治疗描述): Not applicable; no cancer-related therapeutic function.
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): No engineered kill switches or auxotrophy reported; natural strains used.
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; both strains are commonly used in aquaculture and food. No antibiotic resistance genes or HGT risk reported. No evidence of environmental escape.
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Physical confinement via feed encapsulation; no release into environment during trial.
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Lactococcus lactis MM1 and Enterococcus faecium MM4 are non-pathogenic, autochthonous strains isolated from grouper gut. They are GRAS (Generally Recognized As Safe) in aquaculture. No genetic modifications or antibiotic resistance genes were detected. They are unlikely to cause harm to host or environment.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 饲料转化率显著改善（FCR从1.03降至0.97和0.98），表明营养利用效率提高。肝胰脏蛋白酶活性显著升高，提示消化功能增强。血清补体C3水平显著上升，表明体液免疫被激活。L. lactis组血清溶菌酶活性显著升高，而E. faecium组则显著降低，显示免疫调节作用具有菌株特异性。尽管生长率和摄食量略有下降，但整体健康和代谢效率提升，支持其作为鱼类益生菌的潜力。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Growth at 37°C in MRS medium; optimal pH not specified, but growth occurs under micro-aerophilic conditions; utilizes lactose, maltose, rhamnose, ribose as carbon sources.
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Growth rate not quantified; exhibits bi-phase growth curve on sorbitol; no growth on glycogen.
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Vaginal epithelium (specifically urogenital tract), with preference for the vaginal niche over intestinal tract.
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Lacks pili-mediated adhesion to intestinal epithelium; does not compete effectively with intestinal microbiota; may promote natural ascension from gut to vagina due to low intestinal adhesion.
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): High resistance to oxidative stress (H₂O₂); low survival in simulated gastric juice (pH 2.0); no data on UV, drying, or shear stress.
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Thioredoxin genes (GR1_00460, GR1_01468, GR1_01733) likely responsible for oxidative stress resistance.
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Lactobacillus rhamnosus GR-1 is a facultative anaerobe that grows optimally at 37°C under micro-aerophilic conditions. It exhibits enhanced metabolic versatility in the vaginal niche, utilizing lactose, maltose, rhamnose, and ribose—carbohydrates relevant to vaginal epithelial tissue. It lacks intestinal adhesion pili, which may facilitate its natural ascension from the gastrointestinal tract to the vagina. However, it shows poor survival in acidic gastric conditions, limiting oral delivery efficacy.
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): CRISPR-Cas not mentioned; genome sequenced using Illumina paired-end sequencing; annotation via GeneMark and Glimmer.
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): No data on plasmid stability or chromosomal integration; natural genome stability inferred from in vivo persistence.
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): No data on stability in material environments.
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): The strain's genome was fully sequenced and compared to other L. rhamnosus strains. No synthetic genetic circuits or engineered modifications were reported. Natural genomic adaptations, such as unique EPS cluster and carbohydrate metabolism genes, underlie its niche-specific functionality.
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Lectin-like protein 1 (Lrp1) mediates tissue-specific adherence to vaginal epithelium; thioredoxin genes (GR1_00460, GR1_01468, GR1_01733) involved in oxidative stress sensing/resistance.
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No synthetic logic gates reported; natural sensing is likely constitutive or threshold-based based on metabolic availability.
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): L. rhamnosus GR-1 senses and responds to vaginal-specific metabolites (lactose, maltose, rhamnose, ribose) and oxidative stress via intrinsic metabolic and redox pathways. It lacks pili-mediated sensing of intestinal mucus, indicating niche-specific signal recognition. The lectin-like protein 1 enables selective adhesion to vaginal epithelium, suggesting a form of environmental discrimination.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Extracellular polysaccharide (EPS) secretion; potential secretion via general secretion pathways.
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Not controllable; natural expression based on environmental cues.
E_material_match (材料匹配性): EPS is compatible with mucosal surfaces; no data on encapsulation or material compatibility.
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Disrupts urogenital biofilms via lectin-like protein 1; antagonizes uropathogens by competitive exclusion and biofilm disruption.
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): L. rhamnosus GR-1 disrupts urogenital biofilms and inhibits pathogen adhesion; no cytotoxicity reported; localized activity in vaginal niche.
E_B_crit_evidence (标准B_依据): No evidence of oxygen production or oxygenation function.
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Modulates host immune response by inducing IL-6 and suppressing TNF and IL-8 expression in vaginal epithelial cells.
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Enhances host defense mechanisms and promotes epithelial integrity via immunomodulation and biofilm disruption.
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None reported; no kill switches or auxotrophy described.
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no evidence of horizontal gene transfer; low risk of environmental escape due to niche specificity.
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Physical barrier not required due to natural niche restriction.
B_risk_desc (风险描述): L. rhamnosus GR-1 is classified as GRAS (Generally Recognized As Safe). It shows no pathogenicity, no antibiotic resistance genes, and low risk of environmental persistence. Its niche-specific adaptation limits ecological spread. No synthetic containment systems are used.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): L. rhamnosus GR-1 effectively colonizes the human vagina after oral administration, temporarily persisting and reducing uropathogen adhesion. It disrupts biofilms, modulates immune responses (suppressing TNF and IL-8), and enhances host defenses. Clinical studies show it can prevent recurrent urinary tract infections and improve vaginal health. However, its poor survival in gastric acid limits oral delivery efficacy, suggesting vaginal administration may be more effective.

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): 37°C, pH range from initial juice pH (~3.4–3.9) to lower pH after fermentation due to lactic acid production; utilizes fructose as substrate; requires anaerobic conditions for optimal growth during fermentation
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Growth rate sufficient to achieve ≥10⁷ CFU/mL within 72 h of fermentation; viable counts maintained at ≥10⁷ CFU/mL during 30 days of refrigerated storage (especially in orange juice); growth rate consistent with in vitro conditions
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gastrointestinal tract (specifically urogenital and intestinal mucosa), as established by prior studies; not designed for tissue-specific colonization in this study
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): No direct interaction with host microbiome reported; potential to support beneficial gut flora via prebiotic synergy with inulin
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to bile and acid; survives passage through gastrointestinal tract; stable under refrigerated storage (4°C) for up to 30 days in orange juice; no significant loss in viability in orange juice over time
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Bile salts, acid resistance mechanisms (intrinsic to L. rhamnosus GR-1)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Lactobacillus rhamnosus GR-1 is a facultative anaerobe capable of fermenting fructose in fruit juices to produce lactic acid, thereby lowering pH. It maintains high viability (>10⁷ CFU/mL) during 72-hour fermentation and 30-day refrigerated storage, particularly in orange juice. It exhibits strong acid and bile tolerance, enabling survival in the gastrointestinal tract. Growth is supported by the natural sugars in fruit juices and enhanced by inulin fiber, though no significant difference was observed between short- and long-chain inulin.
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): No genetic modifications reported; strain is naturally occurring and used in commercial probiotic products; chromosomal stability assumed based on lack of engineered constructs
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): No genetic engineering involved; stability in fruit juice matrix confirmed by consistent viability over time
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): Lactobacillus rhamnosus GR-1 was used in its native form without genetic modification. No synthetic circuits, inducible promoters, or gene editing tools were applied. The strain was selected for its inherent probiotic properties and robustness in food matrices.
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): FNR promoter (implied by metabolic sensing of oxygen and redox state); fructose uptake systems (e.g., FruA transporter)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Constitutive metabolic activity; no reported logic gates or threshold control; growth driven by substrate availability and environmental conditions
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): Lactobacillus rhamnosus GR-1 senses available fructose and low pH via intrinsic metabolic pathways. It grows and produces lactic acid in response to sugar availability, with no reported inducible or regulated circuits. The system operates as a constitutive fermenter without complex logic processing.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): None reported; no engineered secretion systems used
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Controlled by initial inoculum and fermentation time; no dynamic dosage regulation
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with liquid fruit juice matrix; no structural disruption observed; inulin fiber added as a stabilizer and prebiotic
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): L. rhamnosus GR-1 ferments fructose in fruit juices to produce lactic acid, lowering pH and potentially modulating gut microbiota composition. It also utilizes inulin fiber (prebiotic) to enhance its own viability and promote beneficial microbial growth.
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None; no kill switches or auxotrophy introduced
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Non-pathogenic; well-documented safety in human consumption; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no evidence of horizontal gene transfer; low risk of environmental escape due to poor survival outside host
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): None; no physical confinement beyond the sealed juice container
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Lactobacillus rhamnosus GR-1 is classified as GRAS (Generally Recognized As Safe) and has been safely consumed in yogurt and other products, including by HIV/AIDS patients. It is not pathogenic, does not carry antibiotic resistance genes, and is unlikely to persist in the environment. No biocontainment strategies were implemented, but the risk is considered negligible due to its non-invasive nature and lack of virulence factors.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): Lactobacillus rhamnosus GR-1 achieved and maintained viable counts above 10⁷ CFU/mL in all fruit juices (apple cider, orange, grape) during 72-hour fermentation and 30-day refrigerated storage. Orange juice showed the highest stability, with viable counts increasing over time. Sensory evaluation indicated that apple cider fortified with long-chain inulin (ALC) was the most preferred sample, scoring highest in flavor, texture, and overall acceptability. This demonstrates the feasibility of using L. rhamnosus GR-1 in non-dairy probiotic fruit juices as a viable alternative to dairy-based probiotics.

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 6.5–7.0, requires carbohydrates (e.g., lactose, glucose) as carbon sources; tolerates mild bile exposure.
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~1–2 hours in vitro; in vivo colonization observed in intestinal tract with moderate persistence.
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Small intestine and colon; preferentially colonizes mucosal surfaces of the gastrointestinal tract.
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Symbiotic with host microbiota; competes with pathogenic bacteria for nutrients and adhesion sites.
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Moderate tolerance to gastric acid and bile; stable during lyophilization and rehydration; sensitive to high shear stress.
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Bile salts, gastric acid (HCl), lyophilization stabilizers (e.g., trehalose)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Lactobacillus acidophilus 和 Bifidobacterium 属细菌为兼性厌氧菌，可在37°C、pH 6.5–7.0条件下生长，依赖乳糖或葡萄糖等碳源。它们能耐受轻度胆汁环境，在胃肠道黏膜表面定植，具有与宿主微生物群共生的能力，通过竞争营养和黏附位点抑制病原菌生长。在冻干和复水后仍保持活性，但对高剪切应力较敏感。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Not specified
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): Not specified
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Not specified

S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): FNR promoter, Lactate receptor, Bile acid sensor (e.g., Bile salt hydrolase)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Not specified
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 文中未描述任何基因回路或逻辑门控机制，微生物系统未被工程化以响应特定信号。
