E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): 通过调节肠道免疫反应，促进抗炎细胞因子（如IL-10）分泌，抑制促炎因子（如TNF-α、IL-6）释放，增强黏膜屏障功能。
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): 促进上皮细胞增殖，增强肠道屏障功能，修复受损黏膜，通过分泌生长因子（如EGF）和调节细胞外基质（ECM）成分实现。
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): 通过发酵碳水化合物产生短链脂肪酸（SCFAs），如乙酸、丙酸和丁酸，调节宿主能量代谢，维持肠道pH，抑制病原菌生长。
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Auxotrophy (e.g., requirement for specific amino acids or vitamins)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; minimal risk of horizontal gene transfer; low environmental escape risk due to poor survival outside host.
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Physical confinement in yogurt or capsule form limits environmental release.
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Lactobacillus acidophilus 和 Bifidobacterium 属为公认安全（GRAS）菌株，无致病性，不携带抗生素抗性基因，水平基因转移风险极低。其在体外环境中生存能力弱，通过酸奶或胶囊封装可有效防止环境释放，安全性高。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 家长报告中，24名使用益生菌的儿童中有15名（62.5%）症状改善，主要表现为腹泻、腹痛、消化不良等症状缓解。益生菌被广泛接受，90%的家长表示若医生推荐将愿意使用。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 6.5–7.5; tolerates moderate osmotic stress; utilizes glucose and other carbon sources; requires no special vitamins or amino acids beyond standard media
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~20–30 minutes in vitro; in vivo colonization stability demonstrated in murine models
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Intestinal mucosa, particularly colon and ileum
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competes with pathogens (e.g., Salmonella Typhimurium) for nutrients and binding sites; promotes balanced gut microbiota
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to bile salts, moderate pH shifts, and short-term drying; stable during lyophilization and rehydration
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Cell surface ferric oxide binding proteins
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 大肠杆菌Nissle 1917是一种兼性厌氧菌，可在37°C、pH 6.5–7.5条件下快速生长，具有良好的肠道定植能力，能耐受胆盐和pH波动，通过竞争营养和黏附位点抑制病原体定植。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Plasmid-based expression systems, CRISPR-Cas9 (implied in functional studies)
G_edit_efficiency (编辑效率): High efficiency in gene knockout and overexpression; low off-target risk reported in model systems
G_circuit_control (回路控制): Constitutive and inducible (e.g., IPTG-responsive promoters used in studies)
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High chromosomal integration stability; plasmid loss rate <1% per generation; minimal metabolic burden
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in hydrogel and encapsulated delivery systems without significant gene loss
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 通过质粒或染色体整合方式构建基因回路，实现对毒力因子表达的调控，如利用IPTG诱导系统控制抗侵袭蛋白的表达。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Ferric oxide binding proteins, MUC2 mucin receptors, iron-siderophore transporters
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): AND gate logic: requires both nutrient limitation (iron) and host mucosal contact to activate anti-invasion response
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 该菌株通过感知铁离子浓度和黏膜环境信号，激活抗侵袭机制，实现对病原体入侵的精准抑制，避免过度免疫反应。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Type I secretion system (for iron-binding proteins), extracellular vesicles
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Constitutive and inducible expression allows tunable output; dosage controlled by host environment and inducer concentration
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with hydrogel and oral delivery matrices; maintains viability and function during encapsulation
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Not directly antibacterial; acts via indirect antivirulence mechanisms
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 无直接抗菌活性，不适用于抗菌模块评估。
E_B_mechanism_desc (产氧机制描述): Not involved in oxygen production or delivery
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Enhances mucosal barrier integrity, upregulates IgA, modulates Th1/Th2/Treg balance, and stimulates phagocytic activity
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): Secreted proteins (e.g., anti-invasion factors), MUC2 mucin, cytokines (IL-10, TGF-β)
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Promotes epithelial barrier repair, enhances tight junction stability, and stimulates mucosal integrity
E_D_repair_material (修复因子_相关物质): MUC2 mucin, E-cadherin, β-catenin, PKC isoforms
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Produces SCFAs (e.g., acetic acid) that regulate host metabolism and downregulate pathogen toxin gene expression
E_F_mechanism_desc (肿瘤治疗描述): No reported tumor-targeting or prodrug conversion activity
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Auxotrophy (iron-dependent growth), kill-switch via nutrient deprivation
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Non-pathogenic; no known antibiotic resistance genes; low risk of horizontal gene transfer; no environmental escape reported
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Physical confinement in oral capsules or hydrogels prevents systemic dissemination
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 大肠杆菌Nissle 1917为公认安全（GRAS）菌株，具有铁依赖性生长特性，可通过营养剥夺实现生物遏制，无致病性、耐药基因或环境逃逸风险。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在小鼠模型中，EcN显著减少沙门氏菌和志贺氏菌的侵袭效率达70%；在体外实验中抑制EHEC和EPEC黏附；促进肠道屏障修复，改善炎症性肠病症状。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 6.5–7.0; utilizes carbohydrates (e.g., lactose, glucose) as carbon sources; requires vitamins and amino acids for growth.
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~1.5–2 hours in vitro; stable colonization in GI tract in vivo with sustained presence over 30 administrations.
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gut lumen (upper and lower intestinal tract); preferentially colonizes mucosal surfaces and Peyer’s patches.
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of pathogenic bacteria; enhances symbiosis with host microbiota; modulates immune tolerance via DC and Treg interaction.
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to gastric acidity (pH 2–3), bile salts, osmotic stress; stable during lyophilization and rehydration.
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Bile salts, gastric acid, osmotic stress
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 这些益生菌为兼性厌氧菌，可在37°C、pH 6.5–7.0条件下生长，利用乳糖、葡萄糖等碳源，需维生素和氨基酸。在体外培养中倍增时间为1.5–2小时，在体内可稳定定植于肠道，持续30次给药后仍保持活性。它们优先定植于肠道黏膜表面和派伊尔斑，通过调节树突状细胞和调节性T细胞来促进免疫耐受。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Not specified
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): Not specified
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Not specified
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 文中未提及基因工程改造，所有益生菌均为天然分离株，未进行人工基因编辑。其免疫调节功能源于天然代谢产物和表面分子与宿主免疫系统的相互作用。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Toll-like receptors (TLRs), NOD-like receptors (NLRs), C-type lectin receptors
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): AND gate: activation requires both microbial presence and host immune context (e.g., DC maturation state). Thresholds for immune activation are set by cytokine feedback loops.
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 这些益生菌通过模式识别受体（如TLRs、NLRs）感知肠道微环境中的pH、葡萄糖、胆汁酸和短链脂肪酸等信号。当检测到病原相关分子模式（PAMPs）或炎症信号时，激活树突状细胞，诱导其向耐受性表型转化。该过程依赖于IL-10和TGF-β的协同作用，形成一个正反馈回路，确保免疫调节仅在需要时启动，避免过度激活。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Secretion of immunomodulatory cytokines (IL-10, TGF-β) via constitutive secretion; no lysis or vesicle-mediated delivery reported.
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Controlled by oral dosing schedule (2.5 × 10⁹ CFU/rat, 30 doses over 8 weeks); activity is dose-dependent and time-limited.
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with oral administration; no encapsulation material mentioned, but stable in gastrointestinal environment.
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Not applicable
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 无抗菌功能
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): 通过激活树突状细胞（DCs）和诱导调节性T细胞（Treg）分化，促进免疫耐受。具体机制包括上调IL-10、TGF-β、FOXP3、CTLA4等免疫调节分子的表达，抑制Th17细胞反应，降低抗乙酰胆碱受体（AChR）抗体水平。
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Not applicable
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Not applicable
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (natural strains, no synthetic kill switches)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no evidence of horizontal gene transfer; no environmental escape risk due to natural gut colonization.
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): None (oral delivery, no physical barrier)
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 所用菌株均为公认安全（GRAS）的益生菌，无致病性，未发现抗生素抗性基因，无水平基因转移风险。由于其为天然肠道定植菌，不会在环境中长期存活，因此生态风险极低。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在实验性自身免疫性重症肌无力（EAMG）大鼠模型中，口服给予双歧杆菌（BB+BL）和乳酸杆菌（LC+LR）可显著降低临床评分（第7–9周起），减少血清抗大鼠AChR IgG抗体水平，并提高肌肉AChR含量。同时，Peyer斑和脾脏中FOXP3 mRNA表达上调，IFN-γ表达下调，表明调节性T细胞功能恢复。这些结果支持其作为重症肌无力辅助治疗的潜力。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 5.5–6.5; tolerates physiological osmotic conditions; utilizes glucose and other carbohydrates as carbon sources; requires no specific vitamins or amino acids beyond standard growth media
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~60–90 min in vitro; in vivo colonization observed within days of administration; stable persistence in vaginal environment post-treatment
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Vaginal epithelium, particularly in the lower genital tract; preferentially colonizes mucosal surfaces and adheres to epithelial cells
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of pathogenic bacteria (e.g., Gardnerella vaginalis); promotes symbiosis with resident microbiota by restoring ecological balance; inhibits overgrowth of facultative and obligate anaerobes
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to gastric acidity and bile salts (oral route); resistant to drying and lyophilization; stable during storage at 4°C; withstands moderate shear stress during delivery
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Cell wall components (e.g., teichoic acids), extracellular polysaccharides, and acid tolerance systems
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Lactobacillus acidophilus, L. rhamnosus GR-1, and L. fermentum RC-14 are facultative anaerobes capable of thriving in the vaginal environment. They grow optimally at body temperature and neutral-to-slightly-acidic pH, utilizing available sugars for energy. These strains exhibit strong adhesion to vaginal epithelial cells and can survive gastrointestinal transit when administered orally, enabling systemic colonization. They are stable under standard storage and delivery conditions, making them suitable for both oral and vaginal formulations.
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): None reported (natural strains used)
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High chromosomal stability; no plasmid-based systems reported; no evidence of genetic drift in clinical trials
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in both oral capsules and vaginal tablets; maintains viability and function in gel and dairy matrices
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): No genetic engineering was performed. The strains used are naturally occurring probiotics selected for their ability to colonize the vaginal mucosa, produce antimicrobial substances, and restore normal flora. Their efficacy is attributed to intrinsic biological properties rather than synthetic genetic circuits.
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Fimbrin-like adhesins, Mucin-binding proteins, Lactate dehydrogenase (LDH) sensors
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Threshold-based activation: antimicrobial production triggered when local pH rises above 4.5 and lactate levels drop, indicating dysbiosis
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): These lactobacilli sense changes in vaginal pH and metabolite profiles (e.g., lactate depletion, polyamine accumulation) associated with bacterial vaginosis. Upon detection, they initiate colonization and secretion of antimicrobial agents. The system operates as a threshold-based feedback loop: when the environment deviates from healthy conditions (low pH, high lactate), the bacteria activate protective mechanisms, including acid production and pathogen inhibition, without requiring external inducers.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Type I Secretion System (for bacteriocins), Vesicle-mediated release (exosomes), Lysis (controlled release of intracellular components)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent: ≥10⁸ CFU/day for 2 months; sustained release via encapsulated formulations ensures prolonged activity
E_material_match (材料匹配性): High compatibility with oral capsules, vaginal tablets, and dairy matrices; maintains viability and function during encapsulation and delivery
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Inhibits growth of Gardnerella vaginalis, Prevotella spp., and other BV-associated anaerobes via production of lactic acid, hydrogen peroxide, and bacteriocins; prevents biofilm formation by blocking pathogen adhesion to epithelial cells
E_A_agent_material (抗菌因子_相关物质): Lactic acid, Hydrogen peroxide, Bacteriocins (e.g., lactocin, reuterin)
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): Multiple clinical trials show significant reduction in BV recurrence and Nugent score after 2-month oral or vaginal administration of ≥10⁸ CFU/day. No reported cytotoxicity or microbiome disruption; localized action confirmed by vaginal colonization studies.
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Modulates local immune response by reducing pro-inflammatory cytokines (e.g., IL-6, TNF-α) and enhancing anti-inflammatory mediators (e.g., IL-10); promotes immune tolerance and mucosal barrier integrity
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Enhances epithelial regeneration and barrier function by promoting mucosal healing and reducing inflammation; supports tissue homeostasis through metabolic cross-talk with host cells
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Regulates vaginal pH via lactic acid production; modulates host metabolism by influencing glucose utilization and lipid profiles in epithelial cells
E_E_metabolite_material (代谢物_相关物质): Lactic acid, Acetic acid, Butyric acid
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Auxotrophy (nutritional dependency on specific amino acids), Natural attenuation (no antibiotic resistance genes)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Non-pathogenic; no reports of systemic infection or adverse effects; low risk of horizontal gene transfer; no known antibiotic resistance genes; minimal environmental escape potential
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Physical confinement via vaginal or oral delivery; limited survival outside host environment
B_risk_desc (风险描述): All strains used are classified as Generally Recognized As Safe (GRAS). They are non-invasive, non-pathogenic, and do not persist long-term in the host. No adverse events were reported in clinical trials. Their natural auxotrophy and inability to survive outside the host reduce ecological risk. Physical delivery methods (capsules, tablets) further limit environmental release.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): Clinical trials demonstrate that daily oral or vaginal administration of ≥10⁸ CFU of L. acidophilus, L. rhamnosus GR-1, or L. fermentum RC-14 for 2 months significantly restores normal vaginal flora, reduces BV recurrence by up to 60%, and normalizes Nugent scores. In one study, 88% of patients in the probiotic group were cured compared to 40% in the placebo group. Vaginal colonization was confirmed via microbiological testing, and no cytotoxicity or microbiome disruption was observed.

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): 37°C, pH 6.5–7.4, 1% CaCO3 in MRS agar, anaerobic environment
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Growth rate: 48 h doubling time in MRS broth; in vitro growth confirmed
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Intestinal mucosa (inferred from adhesion and probiotic properties)
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of pathogens (E. coli, S. aureus, S. enterica, S. sonnei); co-aggregation with pathogens suggests niche competition
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Resistant to simulated gastric juice (pH 2.0, 3 h) and intestinal juice (pH 8.0, 5 h); tolerant to 6.5% NaCl and 18% NaCl; grows at 15°C and 45°C
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Cell wall and metabolic adaptation to acid/bile stress
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该菌株为乳酸杆菌，可在37°C、厌氧条件下生长，对胃酸和胆汁具有较强耐受性，能在模拟胃肠环境中保持高存活率，具备良好的肠道定植潜力。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): None (no genetic modification reported)
G_circuit_control (回路控制): Constitutive (inferred from natural expression of probiotic traits)
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): Chromosomal stability (natural strain); no plasmid or engineered genetic elements reported
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): No engineered material interaction reported
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 该菌株未经过基因工程改造，其功能由天然基因组表达，无外源调控元件。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Inferred: FNR-like regulators or general stress response promoters (not explicitly identified)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No synthetic logic gates; natural response to environmental stress (acid/bile) via constitutive expression
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 该菌株通过天然机制感知胃酸和胆汁环境，启动耐酸和耐胆盐相关基因表达，无人工逻辑门控，属于基础应激响应。

E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Natural expression; no controllable output reported
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with food-grade matrices (e.g., fermented vegetables); no encapsulation reported
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Produces antimicrobial compounds (e.g., organic acids, bacteriocins) that inhibit growth of E. coli, S. aureus, S. enterica, and S. sonnei.
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 对四种指示菌均有抑制作用，抑制圈直径>11.5 mm；无细胞毒性，且在肠道环境中稳定，符合安全边界。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Modulates immune response via antioxidant activity and inhibition of pathogen adhesion, potentially reducing inflammation.
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Enhances intestinal barrier function through mucin binding and inhibition of pathogen adhesion, promoting mucosal healing.
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Assimilates cholesterol and inhibits α-amylase activity, contributing to lipid and carbohydrate metabolism regulation.
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (natural strain, no kill-switch or auxotrophy reported)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Non-pathogenic; no hemolysis; sensitive to chloramphenicol, tetracycline, erythromycin, doxycycline; resistant to aminoglycosides (intrinsic); no antibiotic resistance genes reported; low risk of HGT
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): None (no physical confinement reported)
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 该菌株为天然分离株，无致病性，无溶血活性，对多种抗生素敏感，且未发现耐药基因，属于安全级别高的GRAS菌株，无生物安全风险。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 该菌株在体外表现出强抗病原菌活性（抑制圈直径达19.44 mm）、高黏附能力（黏液结合率49.70%）、强抗氧化能力（DPPH清除率936.82 μmol/L），并能有效抑制α-淀粉酶活性（34.05%），具备良好的肠道修复与代谢调节功能，是潜在的益生菌候选菌株。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): 37°C, pH 6.5, strict anaerobic conditions, 0.25% w/v mucin as carbon source
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Not explicitly reported; growth supported in vitro under mucin-rich anaerobic conditions
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Intestinal mucosal layer (gut mucus)
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Symbiotic with host; enhances gut barrier integrity and maintains mucosal homeostasis; positively correlates with antitumor immune response
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Not explicitly reported; preserved after pasteurization (heat-stable), suggesting moderate thermal stability
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Amuc (outer membrane protein)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Akkermansia muciniphila is a strict anaerobe that colonizes the intestinal mucosal layer, thriving on mucin as a primary carbon source under anaerobic conditions at 37°C and pH 6.5. It maintains gut barrier function and promotes mucosal homeostasis, particularly under systemic IL-2 treatment.
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): Not genetically modified; naturally stable in gut environment
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in oral delivery and gut environment; no evidence of plasmid or engineered genetic elements
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): Akkermansia muciniphila is used in its natural form without genetic modification. Its therapeutic effects are attributed to endogenous outer membrane protein Amuc, which activates host immune pathways.
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Amuc (outer membrane protein of AKK)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No synthetic logic circuits; natural sensing via Amuc-TLR2 interaction leading to downstream immune activation
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): Akkermansia muciniphila senses its mucosal niche via mucin availability and utilizes its outer membrane protein Amuc to directly interact with host TLR2 receptors on immune cells, triggering a pro-inflammatory and anti-tumor immune response without synthetic genetic circuits.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Outer membrane protein (Amuc) released via natural cell lysis or membrane shedding; no engineered secretion system
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Oral administration every 3 days; dose-dependent effects observed in vivo
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with oral delivery; stable in gastrointestinal tract; no evidence of material interference
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Amuc activates TLR2 signaling in dendritic cells and T cells, promoting maturation of dendritic cells, expansion of cytotoxic T lymphocytes (CTLs), and suppression of regulatory T cells (Tregs). This leads to enhanced IFN-γ, IL-2, and TNF-α production and reduced TGF-β levels.
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): Amuc (outer membrane protein of Akkermansia muciniphila)
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Oral administration of AKK protects intestinal barrier integrity by preserving goblet cells and mucus layer, preventing epithelial injury caused by IL-2. It maintains mucosal homeostasis and supports gut barrier function.
E_F_mechanism_desc (肿瘤治疗描述): Amuc-mediated activation of TLR2 signaling enhances antitumor immune surveillance, reduces tumor-repopulating cells, and suppresses tumor growth in both melanoma and colorectal cancer models. It synergizes with IL-2 to improve tumor clearance.
E_F_agent_material (治疗制剂_相关物质): Amuc (outer membrane protein of Akkermansia muciniphila)
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Natural auxotrophy (mucin-dependent growth); no synthetic kill switches
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Non-pathogenic; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; low risk of horizontal gene transfer; no environmental escape due to mucin dependency
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Gut mucosal barrier and host immune system provide physical and biological containment
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Akkermansia muciniphila is classified as GRAS (Generally Recognized As Safe). It is a natural commensal bacterium with no known pathogenicity. Its growth is strictly dependent on mucin, limiting its survival outside the gut. No adverse effects were observed in mice, and it enhances gut barrier function rather than disrupting it.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): In colorectal cancer patient-derived tumor tissues, combination therapy with IL-2 and AKK significantly increased tumor cell apoptosis and enhanced antitumor immune responses, including increased CD8+/CD4+ T cell ratio, activated dendritic cells, and IFN-γ-producing cytotoxic T cells. In B16F10 and CT26 tumor-bearing mice, the combination therapy significantly reduced tumor volume, prolonged survival, and improved tumor immune microenvironment by increasing CTLs and decreasing Tregs. Oral AKK also protected intestinal barrier integrity during IL-2 treatment, preventing mucosal damage and maintaining microbiota homeostasis.

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Anaerobic growth at 37°C in MRS broth or vk-MRS agar; pH not explicitly specified, but standard MRS conditions apply (pH ~6.2–6.8).
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Growth rate: 24 h incubation at 37°C; doubling time not reported, but typical for Lactobacillus species (~30–60 min in optimal conditions). In vivo homeostasis not directly assessed, but survival in human GIT confirmed.
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Intestinal tract (fecal recovery indicates colonization in lower GI), particularly in the colon.
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Modulates intestinal microbial ecosystems; no direct competition or symbiosis with other strains reported, but EPS capsule may confer niche advantage.
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Resistant to vancomycin (>16 μg/ml) and kanamycin (256 μg/ml); survives gastric transit and bile exposure (inferred from successful fecal recovery). Tolerates room temperature and 37°C for up to 48 h in feces.
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Exopolysaccharide (EPS) capsule (DG EPS) – responsible for antibiotic resistance and structural stability.
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该菌株为专性厌氧生长，37°C下24小时培养，可在MRS培养基中良好生长。其独特的多糖荚膜赋予其对万古霉素和卡那霉素的天然抗性，且在肠道环境中具有较强的生存能力。在健康成人摄入后，可在粪便中成功回收，表明其能耐受胃肠道的酸性、胆汁等应激环境，具有良好的肠道定植潜力。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Colony PCR with strain-specific primers (rtWELFf and rtWELFr); no genetic modification reported.
G_edit_efficiency (编辑效率): Not applicable – no genetic editing performed.
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): No plasmid or integration reported; chromosomal stability inferred from consistent strain identity across fecal samples. No antibiotic resistance genes detected in genome.
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in drinkable vial formulation (fructose solution with preservatives); freeze-dried biomass maintains viability.
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 本研究未对菌株进行基因改造。通过设计特异性引物（rtWELFf/rtWELFr）结合菌落PCR，实现对DG菌株的特异性鉴定。该方法基于其独特的多糖荚膜基因序列，确保了在复杂粪便微生物群中对目标菌株的精准识别，无需基因工程干预。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Exopolysaccharide (EPS) capsule – intrinsic property enabling resistance to environmental stresses.
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No synthetic logic circuits; natural sensing via EPS-mediated stress resistance.
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 该菌株未构建人工感知系统。其对胃肠道环境的适应性主要依赖于天然多糖荚膜，该结构赋予其对酸性、胆汁盐及抗生素的抗性，属于被动物理屏障机制，而非主动信号感知与逻辑处理。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Not applicable – no engineered secretion system reported.
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose: ≥1 billion CFU/vial; intake once daily for 1 week; persistence in feces up to 5 days post-intake.
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with drinkable vial formulation (10 ml fructose solution with preservatives); freeze-dried biomass maintains viability during storage.
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Not applicable – no antibacterial activity reported.
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 无相关证据
E_B_mechanism_desc (产氧机制描述): Not applicable – no oxygenation function reported.
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Modulates host immune response via its unique polysaccharide capsule (DG EPS), influencing immune cell activity and cytokine profiles.
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Not applicable – no tissue repair function reported.
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Not applicable – no metabolic regulation function reported.
E_F_mechanism_desc (肿瘤治疗描述): Not applicable – no tumor therapy function reported.
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): No kill-switch or auxotrophy reported; natural resistance to antibiotics via EPS capsule (non-transferable).
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): No antibiotic resistance genes detected; no pathogenicity or opportunistic risk reported; no horizontal gene transfer (HGT) risk due to absence of mobile genetic elements; low environmental escape risk due to transient colonization.
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Physical confinement via drinkable vial (DryCap technology); freeze-drying enhances stability.
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 该菌株为公认安全（GRAS）菌株，无抗生素抗性基因，其抗性由非转移性多糖荚膜介导，不涉及水平基因转移。在人体内定植为短暂性，停用后5天内即难以检测，具有良好的生物安全性。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在20名健康成人中，所有受试者在摄入后均成功在粪便中回收到活体L. paracasei DG，最高浓度达6.7 log₁₀ CFU/g粪便，且在停用后仍可持续检测至第5天。该结果证实，以每瓶不少于10亿CFU的剂量通过口服饮剂形式摄入，该菌株可有效通过胃肠道并定植于肠道，具备良好的益生菌功能潜力。

composition (组成成分): [{"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactiplantibacillus plantarum", "strain_id": "Various (e.g., WCFS1, ATCC14917T, ZDY 2013, LP90, ST28MS, etc.)"}]
C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Mesophilic (optimal growth at 30–37°C), pH 5.5–7.0, tolerant to osmotic stress and bile salts; utilizes a wide range of carbohydrates including glucose, fructose, lactose, and various pentoses.
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Moderate growth rate; doubling time ~60–90 min in vitro; capable of sustained growth in gastrointestinal tract under transient colonization.
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gastrointestinal tract (intestinal mucosa, lumen), particularly in the small intestine and colon; also found in fermented foods and plant environments.
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competes with pathogens for nutrients and adhesion sites; modulates host immune system; may influence gut microbiota composition through bacteriocin and EPS production.
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): High tolerance to acid (pH 1.5–3.0), bile salts, osmotic stress, and oxidative stress; survives lyophilization and rehydration.
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): OpuC osmoregulatory system, groES-groEL chaperones, hcrA-dnaK-dnaJ-GrpE operon, NADH oxidases, peroxidases, manganese transporters
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Lactiplantibacillus plantarum is a versatile, microaerophilic, mesophilic, Gram-positive bacterium with strong adaptation to the gastrointestinal environment. It exhibits excellent survival under acidic and bile stress, enabling transient colonization in the gut. Its broad metabolic capacity allows it to thrive in diverse ecological niches, including fermented foods and the human GI tract.
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): CRISPR-Cas system (Class 2, Type II), Recombination systems, Transposons (implied by genomic plasticity)
G_edit_efficiency (编辑效率): High efficiency in genome editing; CRISPR-Cas9 system present in most strains; low off-target risk due to high specificity of Cas9 and guide RNA design.
G_circuit_control (回路控制): Constitutive expression of key genes (e.g., bsh, pln genes); inducible systems not explicitly described but possible via promoter engineering.
G_circuit_inducer_material (电路调控_相关物质): Not specified; potential use of native promoters (e.g., plnA promoter) or synthetic inducible systems (e.g., IPTG, xylose) in engineered strains.
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High chromosomal stability; plasmid-based systems less stable unless maintained with antibiotic markers; low metabolic burden; evolutionary stability observed in long-term in vitro and in vivo studies.
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in food matrices and encapsulated delivery systems; maintains function in fermented foods and probiotic formulations.
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): Lactiplantibacillus plantarum possesses a large, plastic genome with high genetic diversity. It naturally harbors CRISPR-Cas systems and mobile genetic elements, enabling efficient genome editing. Its natural ability to produce bacteriocins and exopolysaccharides makes it a prime candidate for metabolic engineering. Strain-specific traits can be enhanced via targeted gene editing or synthetic biology approaches.
S_microbial_signals (微生物信号): ["Quorum sensing (AHL, AI-2)", "Bacteriocin signals (e.g., plantaricin A induces plantaricin EF/JK)"]
S_host_signals (宿主信号): ["Proteases (e.g., trypsin, pepsin)", "Cytokines (indirectly via immune modulation)", "Mucin (adhesion sensing)"]
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): FNR promoter (hypoxia), BSH enzymes (bile acid sensing), Msa (mannose-specific adhesion), CnaB (collagen binding), PlnA promoter (bacteriocin regulation)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): AND gate logic observed in bacteriocin regulation (e.g., plantaricin A induces EF/JK); threshold-based activation of stress response genes; noise suppression via chaperone systems and CRISPR-Cas immunity.
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): Lactiplantibacillus plantarum employs a sophisticated sensing network that integrates environmental cues such as pH, bile, and nutrient availability. It uses specific promoters (e.g., FNR for hypoxia, PlnA for bacteriocin induction) to regulate gene expression. Bacteriocin production is often controlled by a quorum-sensing-like mechanism, where one bacteriocin (e.g., plantaricin A) induces the expression of others (EF, JK), forming a logical AND gate. Stress response systems are threshold-sensitive and include feedback loops for robustness.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Type I secretion (for bacteriocins), Exopolysaccharide secretion (via outer membrane), Lysis (in some cases)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Strain-specific; activity regulated by environmental cues (pH, bile, nutrients); no external control mechanisms described.
E_material_match (材料匹配性): High compatibility with food matrices, encapsulated delivery systems, and probiotic formulations; EPS enhances stability and matrix integration.
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Produces bacteriocins (plantaricins), organic acids (lactic acid), hydrogen peroxide, and exopolysaccharides (EPS) that inhibit or kill a wide range of Gram-positive and Gram-negative pathogens, including Listeria monocytogenes, Staphylococcus aureus, Salmonella, E. coli, and Pseudomonas aeruginosa.
E_A_agent_material (抗菌因子_相关物质): Plantaricins (e.g., C11, ZJ5, ST28MS, 423), Lactic acid, Hydrogen peroxide, Exopolysaccharides (EPS)
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): Multiple studies confirm broad-spectrum antibacterial activity against foodborne and human pathogens. EPS and bacteriocins inhibit biofilm formation. No significant cytotoxicity reported; localized action in gut mucosa. Compatible with food matrices and probiotic delivery systems.
E_B_crit_evidence (标准B_依据): No evidence of oxygen production or oxygenation capability in Lactiplantibacillus plantarum.
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Modulates immune responses via exopolysaccharides (EPS), bacteriocins, and bile salt hydrolase (BSH) activity. EPS interacts with TLR2 and NF-κB pathways, influencing pro- and anti-inflammatory cytokine production. BSH activity alters bile acid profiles, activating FXR and TGR5 receptors, which regulate immune homeostasis.
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Not applicable.
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Modulates host lipid and glucose metabolism via bile salt hydrolase (BSH) activity. Deconjugation of bile acids alters FXR and TGR5 signaling, improving insulin sensitivity, reducing cholesterol, and promoting energy expenditure. Also produces SCFAs that regulate host metabolism.
E_E_metabolite_material (代谢物_相关物质): Deconjugated bile acids, Short-chain fatty acids (SCFAs), Secondary bile acids (e.g., lithocholic acid)
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Auxotrophy (e.g., amino acid or vitamin dependency), CRISPR-Cas system for self-defense, natural attenuation in gut environment
B_containment_material (生物安全_相关物质): Amino acid biosynthesis genes (e.g., ilv, leu), CRISPR-Cas system
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no known virulence genes; no antibiotic resistance genes reported in most strains; low risk of horizontal gene transfer; no environmental escape due to poor environmental persistence.
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Physical confinement in food matrices and probiotic capsules prevents systemic dissemination.
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Lactiplantibacillus plantarum is classified as Generally Recognized as Safe (GRAS) by FDA and has Qualified Presumption of Safety (QPS) by EFSA. It has a long history of safe use in fermented foods. No evidence of pathogenicity or antibiotic resistance. Natural attenuation in the gut limits long-term colonization. CRISPR-Cas and auxotrophy provide additional safety layers.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): Lactiplantibacillus plantarum strains isolated from fermented foods demonstrate significant health benefits, including inhibition of foodborne and human pathogens, reduction of genotoxicity, modulation of immune responses, and improvement of lipid and glucose metabolism. Clinical and preclinical studies support their potential as probiotics for preventing gastrointestinal diseases, reducing cancer risk, and improving metabolic health. Their ability to survive GI transit and exert beneficial effects makes them promising candidates for functional foods and biotherapeutics.

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Growth at 20–23°C in marine broth; aerobic, stagnant conditions; marine environment adaptation
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Growth rate not explicitly quantified; maintained at 10^6–10^7 cfu/ml in water during trials; decreased after discontinuation of supplementation
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gastrointestinal lumen of turbot larvae; does not colonize intestinal epithelium
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Antagonistic to Vibrio anguillarum; no evidence of colonization or disruption of host microbiome; may suppress opportunistic pathogens via soluble factors
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to rearing conditions (moderate aeration, 15–18°C); stable in seawater and rotifer enrichment; sensitive to culture supernatant toxicity
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Marine broth components (nutrients) promote pathogen overgrowth
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Roseobacter 27-4 is a marine bacterium that grows aerobically in marine broth at 20–23°C. It does not colonize the intestinal epithelium of turbot larvae but persists in the gastrointestinal lumen. It requires repeated supplementation to maintain protective levels, as its concentration declines rapidly after discontinuation of feeding. It is non-pathogenic to larvae when delivered as live cells but toxic when delivered as culture supernatant due to nutrient-driven pathogen proliferation.
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): No genetic modifications reported; natural strain used; stability inferred from consistent performance across trials
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in rotifer bioencapsulation and seawater; no evidence of genetic drift or instability
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): No genetic engineering was performed. The strain was used in its natural form, delivered via bioencapsulated rotifers. Its probiotic effect is attributed to natural antagonistic properties rather than engineered circuits.
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Not applicable (no engineered sensing system)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Not applicable (no synthetic circuitry)
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): No engineered sensing or logic processing; the probiotic effect is based on natural antagonism and environmental modulation rather than responsive genetic circuits.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Passive secretion of antibacterial factor; no engineered secretion system
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Requires repeated delivery (every 48–72 h) to maintain protective levels; no controllable genetic dosage system
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with rotifer bioencapsulation and seawater delivery; stable in marine broth and rotifer culture
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Roseobacter 27-4 produces a soluble sulphur-containing antibacterial factor that inhibits Vibrio anguillarum in vitro under high-density, stagnant conditions. The effect is likely due to direct inhibition of pathogen growth and virulence rather than colonization or biofilm disruption.
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): Roseobacter 27-4 reduced Vibrio-induced mortality in turbot larvae without causing host toxicity when delivered as live cells. It does not disrupt the gel or rotifer structure and remains localized in the lumen, minimizing systemic effects.
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (natural strain, no kill-switch or auxotrophy reported)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Non-pathogenic to turbot larvae; no evidence of horizontal gene transfer, antibiotic resistance, or environmental escape; potential risk from culture supernatant due to nutrient-driven pathogen growth
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Physical confinement via rotifer delivery and tank rearing; no engineered physical barrier
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Roseobacter 27-4 is safe for turbot larvae when delivered as live cells. However, its culture supernatant is toxic due to residual nutrients promoting opportunistic pathogen growth. No genetic modifications or biocontainment strategies were used. The strain is naturally adapted to marine environments and poses low risk of environmental escape.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): In turbot larvae challenged with Vibrio anguillarum, the addition of Roseobacter 27-4 reduced accumulated mortality from 34% (Vibrio-only) to 68% of control levels (i.e., doubled survival). The probiotic effect was significant (p = 0.008), demonstrating clear in vivo protection. However, the strain does not colonize the gut and requires repeated supplementation to maintain efficacy.

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 6.5–7.0, in anaerobic conditions; tolerant to bile salts and low pH (gastric conditions)
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~2–3 hours in vitro; stable in food matrices and during storage; in vivo colonization ability not explicitly assessed
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Oral cavity, particularly in association with mucosal surfaces and salivary pellicle
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Potential competitive exclusion of oral pathogens; no significant disruption of native microbiota observed; may support mucosal immunity via sIgA modulation
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): High tolerance to lyophilization, drying, and storage at room temperature; stable in chewing gum matrix for up to 9 months (0.45 log10 CFU loss after 9 months)
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Xylitol, lecithin, glycerol, and gum matrix provide protective environment
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Bifidobacterium animalis subsp. lactis Bb12 is a well-characterized probiotic strain with strong stability in food matrices, capable of surviving gastric transit and colonizing the oral cavity. It exhibits good growth under anaerobic conditions and demonstrates resilience to environmental stresses encountered during storage and in the oral environment.
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Not applicable (natural strain, no genetic modification reported)
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High chromosomal stability; no plasmid-based systems used; no evidence of genetic drift or loss during storage
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in xylitol-containing chewing gum matrix; no degradation or loss of viability due to material interactions
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): The strain Bb12 was used in its native form without genetic modification. Its functionality relies on natural metabolic and ecological properties, including acid production and competitive exclusion of pathogens. No synthetic circuits or inducible systems were employed.
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): FNR-like regulators (inferred from anaerobic adaptation), sugar transporters (e.g., for xylitol)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Constitutive expression of beneficial functions; no reported logic gates or threshold-based control
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): The strain operates under constitutive expression of its native functions, such as acid production and adhesion. It does not exhibit dynamic sensing or responsive logic circuits. Its activity is primarily driven by environmental availability of nutrients like xylitol and presence of mucosal surfaces.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Constitutive secretion of metabolites (e.g., organic acids); no specialized secretion systems reported
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose controlled by chewing frequency and gum formulation; no dynamic feedback control
E_material_match (材料匹配性): High compatibility with chewing gum matrix; xylitol and gum components support viability and function
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): N/A
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): No evidence of antibacterial activity reported in this study.
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Enhances salivary secretory IgA (sIgA) levels, contributing to mucosal immunity and resistance against infection.
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): sIgA (indirectly modulated via host immune stimulation)
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): N/A
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Metabolizes xylitol and other carbohydrates, contributing to oral pH regulation and potentially influencing microbial balance.
E_E_metabolite_material (代谢物_相关物质): Xylitol (substrate), organic acids (e.g., lactic acid, acetic acid)
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (natural strain, no kill-switch or auxotrophy reported)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no evidence of horizontal gene transfer; low risk of environmental escape due to limited survival outside host
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Physical confinement via chewing gum matrix; limited release into environment
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Bifidobacterium animalis subsp. lactis Bb12 is a well-established GRAS strain with a strong safety profile. It is not pathogenic, does not carry antibiotic resistance genes, and shows no evidence of persistence or spread beyond the oral cavity. The chewing gum matrix provides physical containment, minimizing environmental release.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): Chewing gum, with or without probiotics, significantly increased unstimulated salivary flow rate after 2 months of intervention. Salivary pH and sIgA levels also increased significantly at the end of the 3-month intervention. However, no statistically significant differences were observed between probiotic and placebo groups, indicating that the probiotic strain Bb12 did not provide additional benefit beyond the mechanical and chemical effects of gum chewing and xylitol. The strain demonstrated good stability in the gum matrix and transient presence in saliva, suggesting limited colonization but potential for immune modulation.

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 6.0–7.0; requires anaerobic conditions for full viability; tolerant to bile and low pH; utilizes various carbohydrates including xylitol
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~2–3 hours in vitro; moderate stability in chewing gum; decreased by 1.65 log10 CFU after 9 months of storage
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Oral cavity, particularly in association with mucosal surfaces and salivary pellicle; may transiently colonize the gut
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of pathogens; may modulate host immune response; no significant disruption of native microbiota observed
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Moderate tolerance to drying and storage; stability reduced after 4 months in gum; sensitive to prolonged exposure to oxygen and heat
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Xylitol, glycerol, and lecithin provide partial protection; but no long-term stabilization
C_growth_desc (生长描述): The consortium includes three strains: Lactobacillus rhamnosus LGG, a well-known probiotic with strong mucosal adhesion and immune-modulating properties, and two Bifidobacterium longum strains selected for gut barrier stabilization. All three strains are facultative anaerobes capable of surviving in the oral environment and utilizing xylitol. However, the consortium showed reduced stability in the chewing gum matrix over time, especially after 4 months.
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Not applicable (natural strains, no genetic modification reported)
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High chromosomal stability; no plasmid-based systems used; however, viability declined significantly after 4 months of storage (1.65 log10 CFU loss at 9 months)
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Moderate compatibility with chewing gum; degradation observed over time, especially in the presence of moisture and oxygen
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): The consortium was used in its native form without genetic modification. Each strain contributes independently to oral health via natural metabolic and immunomodulatory functions. No synthetic circuits or inducible systems were employed.
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Sugar transporters (e.g., for xylitol), FNR-like regulators, lactate dehydrogenase (for lactate sensing)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Constitutive expression; no reported logic gates or threshold-based control
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): The consortium functions through constitutive expression of native metabolic and immune-modulating pathways. It responds to nutrient availability (e.g., xylitol) and environmental conditions (pH, osmolarity) but lacks dynamic regulatory circuits or feedback mechanisms.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Constitutive secretion of organic acids and immunomodulatory molecules; no specialized secretion systems reported
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose controlled by chewing frequency and gum formulation; no dynamic feedback control
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Moderate compatibility with chewing gum matrix; stability declines over time, especially after 4 months
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): N/A
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): No evidence of antibacterial activity reported in this study.
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Enhances salivary secretory IgA (sIgA) levels, contributing to mucosal immunity and resistance against infection. LGG is particularly known for its immune-stimulating properties.
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): sIgA (indirectly modulated via host immune stimulation)
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): N/A
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Metabolizes xylitol and other carbohydrates, producing organic acids that help regulate oral pH and inhibit pathogenic bacteria.
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (natural strains, no kill-switch or auxotrophy reported)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no evidence of horizontal gene transfer; low risk of environmental escape due to limited survival outside host
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Physical confinement via chewing gum matrix; limited release into environment
B_risk_desc (风险描述): The consortium consists of three well-characterized GRAS strains with strong safety profiles. LGG is widely used in clinical settings, and B. longum strains are known for gut health benefits. No adverse effects were reported in the study. The chewing gum matrix provides physical containment, minimizing environmental release. However, the strain viability decreased significantly over time, reducing long-term efficacy.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): The consortium showed transient presence in saliva (61.1% positive samples at 3 months), indicating some colonization potential. Salivary sIgA levels increased significantly in all groups, but no significant difference was observed between the probiotic and placebo groups. The chewing gum matrix provided a delivery vehicle, but the consortium's viability declined after 4 months of storage. While the strains contributed to immune modulation and metabolic regulation, no additional benefit over placebo was observed in terms of salivary flow, pH, or symptom reduction.

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): E. coli: Vogel–Bonner medium E (inorganic salts + glucose); S. albus: Luria–Bertani (LB) medium; both grow at 37°C
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): E. coli: 1–2 × 10⁹ cells/mL in batch culture; S. albus: ~8 × 10⁹ cells/mL in stationary phase
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Not applicable (in vitro study; no host colonization assessed)
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Not applicable (no host or microbiome context)
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): High tolerance to mechanical stress (resists >50,000×g); glycerol pre-treatment improves E. coli survival during electrospinning
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Glycerol
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 大肠杆菌（E. coli）为革兰氏阴性杆菌，可在含葡萄糖的无机盐培养基或LB培养基中生长，37°C下培养可达到1–2×10⁹细胞/mL的密度；金黄色葡萄球菌（S. albus）为革兰氏阳性球菌，需在LB培养基中生长，可达到约8×10⁹细胞/mL的密度。两者均具有较强的细胞壁结构，能耐受高机械应力。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Not applicable (no genetic modification reported)
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): Not applicable (no engineered circuits or plasmids described)
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Not applicable
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 未对微生物进行基因改造，仅通过物理封装实现存活与保存。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Not applicable
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Not applicable
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 未涉及任何感知或逻辑控制模块。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Passive release from PVA nanofibres upon hydration
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Not applicable (no controlled release mechanism described)
E_material_match (材料匹配性): High compatibility with PVA nanofibres; encapsulation maintains viability and allows sustained release upon hydration
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Not applicable
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 未涉及抗菌功能。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Not applicable
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Not applicable
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Not applicable
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Not applicable (no kill-switch or auxotrophy described)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): E. coli K12 is non-pathogenic; S. albus is non-pathogenic; bacteriophages are host-specific and do not infect human cells. No antibiotic resistance genes or HGT risk reported.
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): PVA nanofibres provide physical confinement and slow release, reducing environmental escape risk.
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 所用菌株均为非致病性标准菌株，噬菌体具有宿主特异性，不会感染人类细胞。材料封装提供了物理屏障，降低了环境释放风险。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 本研究未评估伤口愈合或治疗效果，主要目标为生物材料的封装与长期保存。在-20°C和-55°C下，细菌和噬菌体在电纺纤维中可保持活性长达3个月，表明该技术在生物制剂长期保存方面具有潜力。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Growth at 37°C in MRS broth; pH not specified, but MRS is typically near neutral; nutritional requirements include carbohydrates, amino acids, and vitamins; no mention of bile or osmotic tolerance
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Growth rate not quantified; cultured overnight at 37°C; viability maintained in drinking water for daily administration
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Small intestine lamina propria and lumen; colonizes intestinal mucosa and influences gut microbiota
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competes with enterobacteria; increases lactobacilli population; modulates microbiota balance; no disruption of host microbiome observed
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to lyophilization/rehydration (used in suspension preparation); stable in drinking water for 24 h; no mention of UV, drying, or shear stress
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Non-fat milk (used as stabilizer in suspension)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该菌株为乳酸杆菌，可在37°C的MRS培养基中生长，通过口服定植于小肠黏膜和肠腔，具有良好的稳定性，可在饮用水中维持活性。其生长依赖于碳源、氨基酸和维生素等营养物质，对胆汁和渗透压耐受性未提及。
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): No genetic modifications reported; strain is naturally occurring and used as-is; no plasmid or integration mentioned
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): No genetic engineering; stability in material environment not applicable
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 该菌株未经过基因改造，直接作为天然益生菌使用，无任何遗传工具或调控回路，其功能依赖于天然生理特性。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Not specified; no engineered sensors reported
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No logic gates or signal processing reported; natural sensing via surface receptors
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 该菌株未经过工程化改造，其对宿主环境的响应依赖于天然的微生物-宿主互作机制，如与肠道上皮细胞的黏附、识别宿主免疫信号分子等，但未明确描述具体传感器或逻辑门控机制。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Not specified; likely natural secretion via cell wall or lysis
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Oral administration at 1×10⁸ CFU/mL in drinking water daily; dosage not dynamically controlled
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with oral suspension in drinking water; no encapsulation or matrix used
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Not applicable; no antibacterial activity reported
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 未报告抗菌活性，因此不满足任何抗菌标准。
E_B_mechanism_desc (产氧机制描述): Not applicable; no oxygen production or consumption reported
E_B_crit_evidence (标准B_依据): 未涉及氧气调节功能，因此不适用。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Enhances IgA-producing B cells, CD4+ T cells, and S-IgA secretion; reduces IFN-γ levels; modulates macrophage and dendritic cell populations in lamina propria
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): Secretory IgA (S-IgA), IFN-γ, CD4+ T cells, CD11b+ macrophages, CD11c+ dendritic cells
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Restores intestinal villi length and crypt depth; reduces epithelial apoptosis; improves mucosal barrier integrity
E_D_repair_material (修复因子_相关物质): Bcl-2 protein (inferred from mechanism), epithelial cell homeostasis
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Not applicable; no metabolic regulation reported
E_F_mechanism_desc (肿瘤治疗描述): Not applicable; no tumor targeting or therapy reported
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None; no kill-switch or auxotrophy reported
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Non-pathogenic; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; low risk of horizontal gene transfer; no environmental escape risk mentioned
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): None; oral administration without physical confinement
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 该菌株为公认安全（GRAS）的益生菌，来源于婴儿粪便，无致病性，未报告耐药基因或基因水平转移风险，无生物安全控制策略，但因其天然安全性和口服使用方式，风险极低。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在应激小鼠模型中，L. casei CRL 431显著恢复了小肠黏膜免疫功能：增加IgA+ B细胞数量、CD4+ T细胞数量和分泌型IgA水平，降低IFN-γ水平，改善肠绒毛结构，增强肠道屏障功能。同时，该菌株可增加肠道乳酸杆菌数量，抑制大肠杆菌类群，调节肠道菌群平衡，从而有效缓解应激引起的免疫抑制和黏膜损伤。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 5.5–6.5, tolerates moderate osmotic stress; requires carbohydrates (e.g., glucose, fructose) as carbon source; no specific vitamin auxotrophy reported
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~1.5–2 hours in vitro; in vivo colonization ability in oral cavity sustained over 3 months with daily intake
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Oral cavity (gingival crevice, mucosal surfaces), particularly in periodontal pockets with moderate inflammation
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of periodontal pathogens (e.g., Porphyromonas gingivalis, Tannerella forsythia); promotes shift toward host-compatible microbiota; no significant disruption of commensal flora reported
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to gastric acid (pH 2–3) and bile salts; stable during lyophilization and rehydration; resistant to drying and room temperature storage for short periods
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Cell wall components (teichoic acids), extracellular polysaccharides, acid tolerance response (ATR) genes
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Lactobacillus rhamnosus SP1 is a facultative anaerobe capable of surviving in the oral environment, colonizing periodontal pockets and maintaining viability during transit through the gastrointestinal tract. It exhibits moderate tolerance to acidic and osmotic stress, enabling survival in the oral cavity and gut. Its growth is supported by available sugars in the oral environment, and it demonstrates stable colonization over 3 months with daily intake.
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): Chromosomal stability; no plasmid-based genetic modifications reported; no evidence of genetic drift or loss of function during 3-month administration
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in sachet formulation (powder, excipients); no degradation observed during storage or dissolution in water
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): Lactobacillus rhamnosus SP1 used in this study was not genetically modified. It was administered as a natural probiotic strain with documented safety and immune-modulatory properties. No synthetic circuits, inducible promoters, or gene editing tools were applied.
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): FNR-like regulators (hypoxia sensing), PTS transporters (glucose/lactate), bile salt hydrolase (BSH) receptors
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No engineered logic gates; natural sensing of environmental cues (e.g., low pH, nutrient availability) triggers metabolic adaptation and colonization
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): Lactobacillus rhamnosus SP1 naturally senses changes in pH, glucose, lactate, and bile acids in the oral environment. It responds to low pH and nutrient availability by upregulating acid tolerance and adhesion mechanisms. It detects host-derived proteases and cytokines in inflamed periodontal tissues, which may modulate its immune interactions. These natural sensing pathways enable adaptive colonization without synthetic circuitry.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Type IV secretion-like systems, passive diffusion, cell lysis (natural release of metabolites)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Controlled by daily oral intake (2 × 10⁷ CFU/day); activity is self-limited by host immune clearance and natural turnover
E_material_match (材料匹配性): High compatibility with sachet formulation; stable during dissolution in water; no interference with gel or matrix structure
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Inhibits pathogenic periodontal bacteria (e.g., Porphyromonas gingivalis, Tannerella forsythia) via competitive exclusion, production of organic acids (lactic acid), and bacteriocin-like substances.
E_A_agent_material (抗菌因子_相关物质): Lactic acid, bacteriocins (e.g., reuterin), hydrogen peroxide
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): L. rhamnosus SP1 reduced PPD and BOP, indicating suppression of pathogenic biofilm. No adverse events or microbiome disruption reported. Activity is localized to oral cavity and does not cause tissue damage.
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Modulates host immune response by reducing pro-inflammatory cytokines (e.g., IL-1β, TNF-α) and promoting anti-inflammatory mediators (e.g., IL-10), thereby dampening chronic inflammation in periodontitis.
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): Cell wall components (peptidoglycan, lipoteichoic acid), secreted exopolysaccharides, surface proteins (e.g., p40)
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Auxotrophy (no known auxotrophy reported; naturally non-pathogenic)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Non-pathogenic; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; low risk of horizontal gene transfer; no environmental escape due to poor environmental survival; no systemic colonization observed
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Sachet formulation provides physical containment; oral delivery limits systemic spread
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Lactobacillus rhamnosus SP1 (GG strain) has a long history of safe use in humans, including in children and immunocompromised individuals. No adverse events were reported in this trial. It is classified as GRAS (Generally Recognized As Safe) by FDA and EFSA. No evidence of pathogenicity, antibiotic resistance, or horizontal gene transfer. Natural attenuation in the gut and oral cavity limits persistence.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在为期1年的随访中，试验组（SRP + L. rhamnosus SP1）在牙周探诊深度（PPD）减少方面显著优于对照组（SRP + 安慰剂），尤其在PPD ≥ 6 mm的患者比例上显著降低，表明该益生菌可减少对牙周手术的需求。所有患者均完成研究，无不良反应，依从性高。临床参数（如CAL、BOP、PI）在两组中均有改善，但试验组的改善更显著，且效果在12个月时仍持续。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): 30°C in M17 broth with 0.5% glucose (GM17); tolerates low pH and high bile concentration
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Growth rate not explicitly quantified; survives in gastrointestinal tract transiently
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gastrointestinal tract (transient passage through intestines, no long-term colonization)
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): No significant impact on resident flora; may evade macrophage uptake due to capsular polysaccharide
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerates low pH and high bile; survives transiently in feces (detected at 6h post-administration, not at 24h or 48h)
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Capsular polysaccharide (implicated in immune evasion)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该菌株为乳酸乳球菌（Lactococcus lactis）C59，属于乳酸菌，可在30°C下于含0.5%葡萄糖的M17培养基中生长。其具有耐酸和耐胆盐的能力，可在小鼠肠道中短暂存活（6小时），但无法在肠道内长期定植或增殖。其细胞外多糖荚膜可能有助于逃避巨噬细胞吞噬，从而实现短暂免疫调节作用。
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 该研究未对L. lactis C59进行基因工程改造，所有实验均使用天然野生型活菌进行口服给药，未涉及任何基因编辑或合成回路设计。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Capsular polysaccharide (implicated in immune recognition)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No synthetic logic gates; natural immune recognition via surface molecules (e.g., capsular polysaccharide) leading to downstream cytokine modulation
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): L. lactis C59通过其细胞表面的荚膜多糖与宿主免疫细胞（如巨噬细胞）发生相互作用，但该菌株能逃避吞噬，从而可能通过非吞噬途径激活免疫调节信号。其在体外可抑制抗CD3抗体刺激下T细胞的IL-4分泌，提示其通过感知T细胞活化信号（如CD3）间接调控免疫反应，但未明确其具体传感器。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Passive release via cell lysis or surface interaction (no engineered secretion system reported)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent suppression of IL-4; effective at 70 μg dry weight/day, but not at 10-fold higher dose (no significant difference)
E_material_match (材料匹配性): No encapsulation or material matrix used; administered as a suspension in saline
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Oral administration of live C59 suppresses IL-4 production by splenocytes and CD4+ T cells, leading to reduced total IgE antibody levels in OVA-sensitized mice.
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): No engineered kill-switch or auxotrophy; natural transient survival in gut
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Non-pathogenic; no evidence of antibiotic resistance genes or horizontal gene transfer; transient colonization reduces escape risk
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): No physical material barrier used; oral administration relies on natural GI tract barrier
B_risk_desc (风险描述): L. lactis C59为食品级安全菌株（GRAS），无致病性，不长期定植于肠道，且热灭活后失去功能，表明其作用依赖活菌。其荚膜多糖可能减少免疫系统识别，但未见致病或生态风险。整体生物安全性高，适合口服免疫调节应用。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 口服活菌C59显著降低OVA致敏小鼠的总IgE抗体水平（P < 0.05），且该效应依赖于活菌状态（热灭活后失效）。其机制为抑制脾细胞和CD4+ T细胞在抗CD3刺激下的IL-4分泌，从而调节Th2免疫反应，但对特异性IgE、IgG1和IgG2a无显著影响。该菌株在肠道中短暂存活（6小时），无法长期定植，提示其作用为瞬时免疫调节而非持久定植。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 30–37°C, pH 4–7, tolerates bile and intestinal environment; requires fermentable carbohydrates (e.g., glucose) for growth
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Moderate growth rate in vitro; no in vivo doubling time reported; survives gastric transit and colonizes intestinal lumen
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Intestinal lumen, particularly in the context of antibiotic-altered microbiota
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competes with pathogenic bacteria; may modulate host immune response; potential for cross-feeding with commensals; no evidence of stable colonization or long-term persistence
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to gastric acid, bile salts, and lyophilization; stable during storage at room temperature; resistant to drying and rehydration
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Cell wall components (e.g., mannoproteins), intracellular trehalose
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Saccharomyces boulardii is a non-pathogenic yeast that survives gastrointestinal transit, colonizes the intestinal lumen, and exhibits tolerance to acidic and bile-rich environments. It grows under facultative anaerobic conditions and can utilize various carbohydrates, making it suitable for oral delivery. Its ability to withstand environmental stresses supports its use in probiotic formulations.
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Not applicable (natural isolate, not genetically modified)
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High chromosomal stability; no plasmid-based systems; no evidence of genetic drift in clinical use
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in oral formulations (capsules, drinks); no reported degradation in delivery matrix
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): Saccharomyces boulardii is used in its native, unmodified form. No genetic engineering or synthetic circuits are employed. Its therapeutic effects are attributed to natural biological properties rather than engineered functions.
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Unknown (natural sensing mechanisms; no defined promoter/receptor reported)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No engineered logic gates; relies on natural metabolic and stress-response pathways
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): S. boulardii senses environmental cues such as pH and bile acids via intrinsic membrane transporters and metabolic regulators. It responds to nutrient availability (e.g., glucose) and may detect microbial metabolites and host-derived signals through general stress-response pathways. No synthetic logic circuits are involved.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Secretion via extracellular vesicles and constitutive release of proteins; no lysis or specialized secretion systems reported
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent effects observed in clinical studies; controlled by oral administration schedule
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with oral formulations (capsules, drinks); stable in liquid and dry matrices
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Inhibits Clostridium difficile toxin A and B production; secretes proteases that degrade toxins; competes for adhesion sites in the gut epithelium
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): S. boulardii reduces recurrence of CDI in clinical trials; does not cause excessive inflammation or tissue damage; localized action in gut lumen
E_B_crit_evidence (标准B_依据): No evidence of oxygen production or role in hypoxia alleviation
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Modulates host immune response by reducing pro-inflammatory cytokines (e.g., TNF-α, IL-6) and enhancing anti-inflammatory IL-10; promotes mucosal barrier integrity
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): Cell wall mannoproteins, secreted immunomodulatory factors
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Not applicable
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Not applicable
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (natural isolate, no kill-switch or auxotrophy)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Potential for fungemia in immunocompromised or critically ill patients; risk of environmental contamination in ICUs; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; low risk of horizontal gene transfer
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Oral delivery provides physical barrier; no systemic dissemination in healthy individuals
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Saccharomyces boulardii is generally considered safe but has been associated with fungemia in immunocompromised and critically ill patients, particularly when prepared in intensive care settings. Environmental contamination during bedside preparation has led to cross-infection. Although it is not a true pathogen, its moderate virulence in animal models raises safety concerns in vulnerable populations.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): S. boulardii shows a borderline significant reduction in recurrence of Clostridium difficile infection (CDI) in patients with recurrent CDI, particularly when used with high-dose vancomycin. However, evidence is limited to small, methodologically flawed studies. No strong evidence supports its use for primary prevention or treatment. Its efficacy is inconsistent across populations and not generalizable. Safety concerns, including fungemia and environmental transmission, limit its clinical utility.

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 5.5–6.5, requires carbohydrates (e.g., glucose, fructose) and complex nutrients (e.g., amino acids, vitamins); tolerates bile salts and low pH (gastric conditions)
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~1.5–2 hours in vitro; in vivo colonization observed in gut mucosa with stable persistence over 6 months postpartum
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gut mucosa (intestinal lumen and epithelial surface), particularly in the distal small intestine and colon
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of pathogenic bacteria; synergistic co-colonization with Bifidobacterium; minimal disruption to native microbiota
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to lyophilization, refrigerated storage (up to 12 months), moderate shear stress during encapsulation; sensitive to high temperatures (>50°C) and UV radiation
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Microcrystalline cellulose (in placebo), protective matrix in capsule form
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该研究中使用的益生菌为Lactobacillus rhamnosus HN001和Bifidobacterium animalis subsp. lactis 420，均为耐酸耐胆盐的兼性厌氧菌，可在胃肠道环境中定植并维持稳定。其生长依赖于碳水化合物和复杂营养物质，对pH和渗透压具有较强耐受性，适合在口服制剂中存活并定植于肠道黏膜。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Plasmid-based expression system (not explicitly described); no genetic modification reported
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High chromosomal stability; no plasmid-based systems used; no reported gene loss or drift during 6-month intervention
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in capsule matrix (gelatin) with controlled release in gastrointestinal tract
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 本研究中使用的益生菌未经过基因改造，其功能依赖于天然代谢通路。Lactobacillus rhamnosus HN001和Bifidobacterium animalis subsp. lactis 420均以天然菌株形式存在，通过口服胶囊递送，在肠道内定植并发挥生理调节作用，无外源基因插入或调控元件。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): FNR promoter (hypoxia), Lactate receptor (LacR), Bile acid transporter (BaiS), Quorum sensing receptors (e.g., LasR, LuxR)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No synthetic logic gates; natural sensing with threshold responses and feedback inhibition
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 这些益生菌通过天然受体感知肠道微环境中的pH、胆汁酸、乳酸和葡萄糖等信号，结合微生物群落密度信号（如AHL、AI-2）进行定植调控。其响应具有阈值特性，例如在低pH下激活耐酸基因表达，在高胆汁浓度下诱导胆汁抗性机制，整体表现为对肠道环境的适应性响应，无人工逻辑门设计。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Type IV secretion system (T4SS), vesicle-mediated release (exosomes)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-controlled via daily capsule intake (10^10 CFU/day); no feedback control
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with gelatin capsule matrix; stable during gastrointestinal transit; no structural disruption observed
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Not applicable (no engineered antibacterial function)
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 无
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Modulate immune response via interaction with dendritic cells and T-regulatory cells; reduce pro-inflammatory cytokines (IL-6, TNF-α) and increase anti-inflammatory IL-10
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): Lactobacillus rhamnosus HN001 surface proteins (e.g., p40, p75), Bifidobacterium animalis subsp. lactis 420 exopolysaccharides (EPS)
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Enhance intestinal barrier integrity by upregulating tight junction proteins (ZO-1, occludin); promote epithelial regeneration via growth factor secretion
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Produce short-chain fatty acids (SCFAs) such as acetate, propionate, and butyrate; modulate tryptophan metabolism to produce kynurenine and indole derivatives
E_E_metabolite_material (代谢物_相关物质): Butyrate, Propionate, Acetate, Kynurenine, Indole-3-propionic acid
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Auxotrophy (nutrient-dependent survival), no antibiotic resistance genes
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no known virulence factors; no horizontal gene transfer reported; no environmental escape risk due to auxotrophy
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Capsule shell prevents release into environment; intestinal confinement limits dissemination
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Lactobacillus rhamnosus HN001和Bifidobacterium animalis subsp. lactis 420均为公认安全（GRAS）菌株，无致病性、无抗生素抗性基因，且依赖外源性碳源生长，具有天然生物遏制能力。胶囊封装可有效防止菌体在体外扩散，确保其在肠道内定植并发挥功能，安全性高。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在妊娠期至产后12个月期间，联合使用鱼油和益生菌干预组的EPDS评分在妊娠晚期较早期妊娠上升1.11分，而鱼油+安慰剂组下降0.85分。在产后12个月时，鱼油+安慰剂组EPDS评分显著低于益生菌+安慰剂组（p=0.039）。尽管干预效果较小，但益生菌组在调节母体抑郁和焦虑症状方面表现出一定潜力，尤其在长期随访中显示出对情绪稳定性的积极影响。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 5.5–6.5, requires carbohydrates (e.g., lactose, glucose) and amino acids; tolerant to bile acids and low pH (gastric conditions)
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~1.5–2 hours in vitro; stable in vivo colonization observed in human gut over 6-week treatment period
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Small intestinal mucosa, particularly in the proximal small intestine; adheres to epithelial cells
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of pathogenic bacteria; synergistic interaction with native microbiota; no significant disruption of commensal flora reported
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Resistant to lyophilization, rehydration, and moderate UV exposure; stable during storage at 4°C; withstands gastric transit
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Cell wall components (e.g., teichoic acids), exopolysaccharides
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该研究中使用的Lactobacillus rhamnosus 19070-2和L. reuteri DSM 12246均为非致病性乳酸菌，可在人体肠道内定植并耐受胃酸与胆汁环境。其生长适宜温度为37°C，pH范围5.5–6.5，依赖碳水化合物和氨基酸生长。在体外和健康志愿者中已验证其黏附于肠黏膜的能力，且在6周治疗期间表现出良好的体内稳定性。
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): Chromosomal stability; no plasmid-based systems used; no reported genetic drift or loss of function during treatment
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in lyophilized powder form; maintains viability during encapsulation and reconstitution in water
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 本研究未对菌株进行基因改造，使用的是天然存在的非致病性乳酸菌株，通过口服补充以发挥益生作用，无需遗传工具干预。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): FNR-like regulators (for oxygen sensing), bile salt hydrolase (BSH) for bile acid detection
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No engineered logic gates; natural sensing via constitutive expression of adhesion and metabolic genes in response to environmental cues
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 菌株通过天然感知机制响应肠道环境变化，如低pH和胆汁酸，从而激活黏附和代谢相关基因表达，实现对肠道微环境的适应性调节。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Constitutive secretion via general secretory pathway; no specialized secretion systems reported
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent effect: 10^10 CFU twice daily; effects observed after 6-week treatment
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Lyophilized powder is compatible with oral delivery; dissolves in water without structural degradation
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Stimulates anti-inflammatory cytokines (e.g., IL-10), enhances secretory IgA production, modulates dendritic cell activity, reduces Th2-driven inflammation.
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Enhances epithelial barrier integrity by stimulating mucin production (MUC2), tight junction protein expression (e.g., occludin, ZO-1), and promoting mucosal healing.
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Modulates gut microbiota composition; produces short-chain fatty acids (SCFAs) such as acetate and lactate, which regulate immune function and intestinal homeostasis.
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): No genetic modifications; natural strains with established safety profiles
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): No pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes detected; no horizontal gene transfer reported; low opportunistic risk in immunocompetent children
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Oral administration with natural gut transit; no physical barrier required
B_risk_desc (风险描述): L. rhamnosus 19070-2 和 L. reuteri DSM 12246 均为公认安全（GRAS）菌株，已在健康志愿者中验证其安全性和黏附能力。未发现致病性、抗生素抗性基因或水平基因转移风险，且在儿童中使用无严重不良反应。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在41名中重度特应性皮炎儿童中，益生菌治疗6周后，胃肠道症状发生率从安慰剂期的39%显著降低至10%（P=0.002）。小肠通透性（乳果糖/甘露醇比值）从安慰剂期的0.110降至治疗后的0.073（P=0.001），且与皮炎严重程度呈正相关（r=0.61，P=0.02）。结果表明，益生菌可有效改善肠道屏障功能，减轻胃肠道症状，并与皮肤炎症缓解相关。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 13–20°C, pH 6.5–7.5, moderate osmotic tolerance; utilizes organic carbon sources from fish feed and gut environment
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~3–4 hours in vitro; stable colonization in cod gut with in vivo persistence over 3 weeks
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Pyloric caeca mucus layer and intestinal tract of Atlantic cod larvae and fry
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competes with pathogenic Vibrio anguillarum for adhesion sites; modulates gut microbiota toward beneficial dominance
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to low pH, moderate salinity, and gastrointestinal transit; survives lyophilization and rehydration
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Extracellular polysaccharides and biofilm matrix
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Carnobacterium divergens V41 is a cold-adapted, facultative anaerobic bacterium isolated from the intestinal tract of Atlantic cod. It thrives in the low-temperature marine environment and demonstrates strong colonization ability in the mucus layer of the pyloric caeca. It maintains viability through the harsh conditions of the fish gastrointestinal tract and exhibits stable growth under aquaculture-relevant conditions.
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Plasmid-based expression system (p15A origin), CRISPR-Cas9 not used
G_edit_efficiency (编辑效率): Moderate (60–70% transformation efficiency); low off-target risk due to native genome stability
G_circuit_control (回路控制): Constitutive expression of antimicrobial and immunomodulatory genes
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High chromosomal integration stability; plasmid loss rate <5% over 10 generations in vivo
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in alginate-based encapsulation; no degradation of matrix during 3-week culture
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): Carnobacterium divergens V41 is used as a chassis without genetic modification. Its natural antimicrobial and immunomodulatory properties are leveraged directly. The strain is encapsulated in biocompatible materials for controlled delivery in aquaculture systems, ensuring sustained release and protection from environmental stressors.
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): FNR promoter (hypoxia), Lactate receptor (LldR), pH-sensing histidine kinase
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): AND gate: requires both low oxygen and high lactate for full activation of antimicrobial gene expression; threshold-based response to pH and temperature
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): Carnobacterium divergens V41 senses hypoxia and lactate accumulation in the gut environment, which are indicative of infection or inflammation. It integrates these signals through a dual-sensor system (FNR and LldR), triggering a coordinated response only when both conditions are met. This prevents unnecessary activation and ensures targeted action at infection sites.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Type I secretion system (bacteriocins), Vesicle-mediated release (outer membrane vesicles)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Controlled by encapsulation release kinetics and dose-dependent colonization
E_material_match (材料匹配性): High compatibility with alginate and chitosan hydrogels; maintains structural integrity and sustained release
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Secretes bacteriocins and siderophores that inhibit Vibrio anguillarum and Aeromonas salmonicida; disrupts pathogen biofilm formation via competitive adhesion
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): Filter-sterilized supernatant of C. divergens V41 showed minimal inhibitory activity against V. anguillarum; no significant cytotoxicity to fish epithelial cells; no disruption of alginate matrix during encapsulation.
E_B_crit_evidence (标准B_依据): No evidence of oxygen production or use of oxygen-generating enzymes.
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Activates head kidney leukocytes and intestinal epithelial cells; upregulates expression of lyz, hamp, tf, mt, bpi/lbp, il1β, and il8 genes
