E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): Heat-stable cell wall components (e.g., peptidoglycan, lipopolysaccharide analogs)
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Enhances epithelial barrier integrity and promotes mucosal healing via modulation of defensin gene expression and antioxidant defense
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Not applicable
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Auxotrophy (requires specific amino acids not available in environment)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Non-pathogenic; no known antibiotic resistance genes; low horizontal gene transfer risk; no evidence of environmental escape
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Physical confinement via encapsulation prevents uncontrolled release into aquatic environment
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Carnobacterium divergens V41 is a non-pathogenic, GRAS-status bacterium isolated from Atlantic cod. It exhibits low environmental persistence due to auxotrophy and is effectively contained within encapsulated delivery systems. No evidence of virulence or antibiotic resistance genes has been reported.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): C. divergens V41 significantly improved larval survival by 40–60% during Vibrio anguillarum challenge. It enhanced growth performance, reduced gut pathogen load, and promoted beneficial microbiota colonization. Encapsulated delivery ensured sustained efficacy over 3 weeks in aquaculture systems.

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Growth at 37°C, pH 3.75–4.20 (in yogurt), in MRS broth or reconstituted skim milk with glucose and yeast extract
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Growth rate not specified; viable counts maintained at 1.6 × 10⁹/g at day 0 and 2.5 × 10⁷/g at day 30 during storage
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gastric environment (targeted for H. pylori eradication)
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): No antagonistic activity observed among strains; no competition or inhibition between lactic acid bacteria in the product
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Stable at 5°C for up to 40 days; viable cells maintained throughout storage; tolerance to refrigeration and shelf-life conditions
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Skim milk/glycerol medium, refrigerated storage
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该微生物系统由多种乳酸菌组成，包括L. casei 03、L. acidophilus 2412和ACD1，以及商业发酵剂L. bulgaricus、S. thermophilus和L. acidophilus。这些菌株在37°C下于MRS培养基或添加葡萄糖和酵母提取物的复原脱脂乳中生长良好，pH值维持在3.75–4.20之间。在5°C冷藏条件下，菌体存活率在40天内保持稳定，表明其具有良好的储存稳定性。
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): No genetic modification reported; natural strains used without engineered plasmids or integration
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in yogurt matrix; no loss of viability or function during storage
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 该系统未进行基因工程改造，所有菌株均为天然分离株，直接用于发酵乳制品制备。未使用CRISPR、质粒或重组技术，因此无基因编辑工具或调控回路。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): pH-responsive growth conditions (inferred from acid production)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No logic gates or signal processing reported; activity is constitutive and pH-dependent
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 系统依赖于乳酸菌在发酵过程中产生的低pH环境，通过酸性条件抑制H. pylori生长，无主动感应或逻辑控制机制。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Spontaneous secretion of organic acids, hydrogen peroxide, peptides
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Not controllable; consumption dose fixed at 175 ml three times daily
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with yogurt matrix; no structural disruption reported
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): 通过产生有机酸、过氧化氢、抗菌肽等物质抑制H. pylori生长，整体发酵乳的抑制效果强于活菌或上清液。
E_A_agent_material (抗菌因子_相关物质): Organic acids, hydrogen peroxide, antimicrobial peptides, milk peptides
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 在体外实验中，该发酵乳对H. pylori的抑制效果与阿莫西林MIC相当，且在酸奶基质中保持活性。
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (natural strains, no kill-switch or auxotrophy)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no horizontal gene transfer risk mentioned; environmental escape unlikely due to non-persistence in gut
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Physical confinement in yogurt container; limited survival in gastric environment
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 该系统使用的是公认安全（GRAS）的乳酸菌，无基因改造，无致病性或耐药基因，且在胃部环境中无法长期定植，因此生物安全风险极低。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在27名H. pylori阳性受试者中，仅1人（约3.7%）在30天治疗后实现根除，其余26人尿素呼气试验仍为阳性，表明该酸奶产品在体内无法有效根除H. pylori感染。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 6.5–7.0; requires complex media with prebiotics (e.g., GOS) for sustained growth; tolerant to bile salts and low pH (gastric conditions)
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~2–3 hours in vitro; in vivo colonization observed in human gut with persistence over 4 weeks post-administration
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Large intestine, mucosal layer of colonic epithelium
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of pathogenic bacteria; synergistic interaction with host microbiota; enhances Bifidobacterium dominance in IBS patients
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Resistant to lyophilization and rehydration; stable during storage at 4°C; moderate tolerance to shear stress in delivery systems
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Capsule matrix (enteric-coated) protects against gastric acid and bile
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Bifidobacterium longum 35624 is a facultative anaerobe capable of surviving gastrointestinal transit and colonizing the human colon. It thrives under physiological conditions of the large intestine, exhibits resistance to bile and low pH, and maintains viability during storage and encapsulation. It demonstrates strain-specific colonization and persistence in the gut, particularly in individuals with irritable bowel syndrome.
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): None reported (natural strain, not genetically modified)
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High chromosomal stability; no plasmid-based systems; no evidence of genetic drift in clinical trials
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable within enteric-coated capsules; no degradation of viability during encapsulation
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): Bifidobacterium longum 35624 is a naturally occurring strain used without genetic modification. Its functionality is attributed to intrinsic physiological traits rather than engineered circuits. The strain is delivered via encapsulated formulation to ensure survival through the gastrointestinal tract.
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Natural metabolic sensors (e.g., sugar transporters, bile acid receptors); no engineered promoters reported
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No synthetic logic gates; relies on natural metabolic adaptation and niche competition
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): Bifidobacterium longum 35624 senses environmental cues such as pH, bile, and nutrient availability (e.g., GOS, mucus glycans) through native transporters and regulatory systems. It adapts its metabolism based on substrate availability and host immune signals, promoting colonization and anti-inflammatory responses without synthetic circuitry.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Natural secretion of metabolites and cytokines; no engineered secretion systems
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent efficacy; 10^8 CFU/day effective in human trials; higher doses (10^10) showed reduced efficacy due to incomplete release from capsule
E_material_match (材料匹配性): High compatibility with enteric-coated capsules; maintains viability and functionality during encapsulation and GI transit
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Not applicable (no direct antibacterial mechanism reported)
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 无相关证据
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Stimulates anti-inflammatory cytokine release (e.g., IL-10) in gut mucosa; reduces pro-inflammatory cytokines (e.g., TNF-α, IL-6); modulates dendritic cell activity and T-cell responses
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Improves intestinal barrier function by enhancing tight junction integrity; reduces epithelial permeability; promotes mucosal healing in IBS patients
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Metabolizes prebiotics (e.g., GOS) into short-chain fatty acids (SCFAs); modulates host glucose metabolism and reduces systemic inflammation; improves insulin sensitivity in metabolic syndrome models
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (natural strain, no kill-switch or auxotrophy)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Non-pathogenic; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; low risk of horizontal gene transfer; no evidence of systemic dissemination; well-tolerated in clinical trials
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Enteric-coated capsule prevents premature release and enhances localized delivery
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Bifidobacterium longum 35624 is classified as Generally Recognized as Safe (GRAS) and has been used in infant formulas and dietary supplements. It exhibits low pathogenicity, no antibiotic resistance genes, and minimal risk of environmental escape. The encapsulated delivery system provides physical containment, reducing unintended colonization or systemic exposure.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在两项随机双盲安慰剂对照试验中，Bifidobacterium longum 35624（10^8 CFU/天）显著改善了肠易激综合征（IBS）患者的腹痛、腹胀和排便习惯。在女性患者中，该剂量有效缓解症状，而更高剂量（10^10 CFU）因胶囊释放不完全而无效。该菌株在改善肠道屏障功能、降低炎症标志物（如IL-1β）和调节免疫反应方面表现出显著疗效。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 5.5–6.5; requires glucose and amino acids; tolerant to bile and low pH
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~1.5 hours in vitro; colonizes human gut mucosa with transient persistence
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Small intestine and colonic mucosa
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of pathogens; enhances host immune surveillance; species-specific interaction with resident microbiota
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Resistant to lyophilization; stable at room temperature for months; tolerates shear stress in liquid formulations
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Probiotic matrix (e.g., milk-based suspension) enhances stability
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Lactobacillus rhamnosus GG is a facultative anaerobe with strong tolerance to gastric acid and bile. It grows well in nutrient-rich environments and colonizes the intestinal mucosa transiently. It is stable during processing and storage, making it suitable for use in fermented dairy products and supplements.
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): None reported (natural strain)
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High chromosomal stability; no plasmid loss; no genetic drift observed in long-term studies
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Maintains function in milk-based suspensions and encapsulated forms
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): Lactobacillus rhamnosus GG is a naturally occurring strain used without genetic modification. Its beneficial effects are attributed to intrinsic properties such as adhesion, immune modulation, and barrier protection.
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Natural promoters (e.g., lactate-responsive promoters); surface adhesins (e.g., p40, p75)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No synthetic logic; relies on natural sensing of host and microbial signals to trigger immune and barrier responses
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): Lactobacillus rhamnosus GG senses changes in pH, bile, and nutrient availability through native transporters and regulatory systems. It detects host-derived inflammatory signals (e.g., TNF-α) and responds by modulating immune cell activity and reinforcing epithelial barrier integrity through tight junction stabilization.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Natural secretion of immunomodulatory molecules and surface adhesins
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Effective at 10^9–10^10 CFU/day; dose-dependent barrier protection; no evidence of overactivity
E_material_match (材料匹配性): High compatibility with fermented milk and liquid suspensions; maintains viability and function
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Not applicable
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 无相关证据
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Reduces pro-inflammatory cytokines (TNF-α, IFN-γ); inhibits NF-κB nuclear translocation; enhances anti-inflammatory IL-10 production; modulates dendritic cell function
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Protects intestinal epithelial barrier integrity; prevents disruption of tight junctions induced by pathogens or cytokines; promotes mucosal healing
E_D_repair_material (修复因子_相关物质): Tight junction proteins (ZO-1, occludin), mucin production
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Not applicable
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Non-pathogenic; no antibiotic resistance genes; low risk of HGT; no systemic dissemination; well-tolerated in infants and adults
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Fermented milk matrix provides partial physical barrier
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Lactobacillus rhamnosus GG is a GRAS organism with a long history of safe use in food and supplements. It does not carry antibiotic resistance genes, shows no evidence of horizontal gene transfer, and is not associated with opportunistic infections. Its transient colonization and natural attenuation reduce long-term risks.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在体外肠上皮屏障模型中，Lactobacillus rhamnosus GG预处理显著减轻了由EHEC O157:H7或TNF-α引起的屏障功能破坏。在临床研究中，该菌株可改善肠道屏障功能，降低炎症标志物水平，对肠易激综合征和炎症性肠病具有潜在治疗价值。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal at 37°C, pH 5.5–6.5; requires glucose and amino acids; bile-tolerant
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~1.5 hours in vitro; transient colonization in murine gut
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Small intestine and colonic mucosa
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of pathogens; modulates immune cell activity
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Resistant to lyophilization; stable in encapsulated form; moderate shear tolerance
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Enteric-coated capsule
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Lactobacillus acidophilus is a facultative anaerobe that survives gastric transit and colonizes the intestinal mucosa. It is stable in encapsulated formulations and maintains viability under storage conditions.
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): CRISPR-Cas9 (used for gene knockout in research)
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High chromosomal integration stability; no plasmid loss; no drift observed in animal models
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in enteric-coated capsules; maintains expression during GI transit
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): Lactobacillus acidophilus was genetically modified to constitutively express murine interferon-beta (IFN-β) using a plasmid-based system. The strain was used in animal models to study localized immune modulation, though unexpected exacerbation of colitis was observed.
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Natural promoters responsive to host inflammation; no engineered sensors
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Constitutive expression; no dynamic sensing or feedback control
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): The engineered Lactobacillus acidophilus strain expresses IFN-β constitutively without environmental sensing. It does not respond to physiological signals, leading to uncontrolled cytokine release in the gut.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Constitutive secretion via native secretion pathways
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): High output; no feedback regulation; uncontrolled cytokine release
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with enteric-coated capsules; maintains expression during delivery
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Not applicable
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 无相关证据
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Constitutive secretion of murine IFN-β; activates immune cells; induces pro-inflammatory responses in the gut
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Not applicable
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Not applicable
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (no kill-switch or auxotrophy)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Non-pathogenic; no antibiotic resistance genes; risk of unintended immune activation; IFN-β overexpression may exacerbate inflammation; potential for systemic spread in immunocompromised hosts
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Enteric-coated capsule limits premature release
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 虽然Lactobacillus acidophilus是安全的，但其工程化表达IFN-β导致在DSS诱导结肠炎模型中加重炎症，表现为体重下降、肠道增厚和CD4+ T细胞活化。这表明其免疫调节功能具有双刃剑效应，需严格控制表达水平。无生物安全控制措施，存在潜在风险。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在DSS诱导的结肠炎小鼠模型中，表达IFN-β的Lactobacillus acidophilus导致症状恶化，表现为更严重的体重减轻、肠道短缩和炎症因子升高。这表明局部IFN-β递送可能加剧肠道炎症，而非缓解，提示其在治疗性应用中存在显著风险。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal at 37°C, pH 6.5–7.0; requires complex media; bile-tolerant
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~2.5 hours in vitro; colonizes gut with moderate persistence
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Large intestine
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Enhances gut barrier; reduces bacterial translocation; modulates immune response
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Resistant to lyophilization; stable in capsules; tolerates moderate shear stress
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Enteric-coated capsule
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Bifidobacterium lactis 420 is a facultative anaerobe that survives GI transit and colonizes the large intestine. It is stable in encapsulated formulations and maintains viability during storage.
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): None reported (natural strain)
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High chromosomal stability; no plasmid loss; no drift observed
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in enteric-coated capsules
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): Bifidobacterium lactis 420 is a naturally occurring strain used without genetic modification. Its therapeutic effects are due to intrinsic metabolic and immunomodulatory properties.
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Natural sugar transporters and bile acid receptors
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No synthetic logic; natural adaptation to nutrient and immune signals
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): Bifidobacterium lactis 420 senses nutrient availability (e.g., mucus glycans) and host inflammatory signals (e.g., LPS) through native receptors, adjusting its metabolism and immune modulation accordingly.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Natural secretion of metabolites and immune modulators
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Effective at 10^9–10^10 CFU/day; dose-dependent improvement in metabolic parameters
E_material_match (材料匹配性): High compatibility with enteric-coated capsules; maintains viability and function
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Not applicable
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 无相关证据
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Reduces systemic LPS levels; decreases adipose tissue inflammation; improves insulin sensitivity
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Improves intestinal epithelial barrier function; reduces bacterial translocation; restores gut integrity
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Reduces plasma LPS; improves glucose tolerance; lowers triglycerides; reduces adipose tissue inflammation
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Non-pathogenic; no antibiotic resistance genes; low risk of HGT; well-tolerated in high-fat diet models
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Enteric-coated capsule prevents premature release
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Bifidobacterium lactis 420 is GRAS and safe for long-term use. It reduces metabolic inflammation and improves gut barrier function without causing adverse effects. No biocontainment strategy is needed, but the encapsulated delivery enhances targeted action.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在高脂饮食诱导的肥胖小鼠模型中，Bifidobacterium lactis 420显著改善了肠道屏障功能，减少了细菌易位和血浆LPS水平，降低了炎症反应，并改善了葡萄糖耐量。该菌株可作为代谢综合征和肥胖相关炎症的潜在干预手段。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal at 37°C, pH 6.0–6.5; requires glucose and amino acids; bile-tolerant
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~1.5–2 hours in vitro; transient colonization in rat gut
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Small and large intestine
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Synergistic interaction; enhances gut barrier; reduces inflammation
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Resistant to lyophilization; stable in drinking water suspension; moderate shear tolerance
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Drinking water matrix
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Lactobacillus helveticus R0052 and Bifidobacterium longum R0175 are facultative anaerobes that survive GI transit and transiently colonize the gut. They are stable in liquid formulations and maintain viability during administration.
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): None reported (natural strains)
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High chromosomal stability; no plasmid loss; no drift observed
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in drinking water suspension
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): The two strains are used as a natural combination without genetic modification. Their combined effects are attributed to synergistic immunomodulation and barrier protection.
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Natural receptors for nutrients and immune signals
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No synthetic logic; natural adaptation to host stress
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): The strains sense host stress signals (e.g., IL-1β) and respond by modulating immune activity and reducing apoptosis in the limbic system, contributing to behavioral improvement.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Natural secretion of immunomodulatory molecules
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): 1 billion CFU/day; effective in behavioral tests; no evidence of overactivity
E_material_match (材料匹配性): High compatibility with drinking water delivery
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Not applicable
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 无相关证据
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Reduces IL-1β levels; attenuates apoptosis in limbic system; modulates neuroinflammation
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Restores intestinal barrier integrity; reduces apoptosis in brain regions associated with depression
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Not applicable
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Non-pathogenic; no antibiotic resistance genes; low risk of HGT; well-tolerated in animal models
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Drinking water delivery provides minimal physical barrier
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Lactobacillus helveticus R0052 and Bifidobacterium longum R0175 are GRAS organisms with no genetic modifications. They are safe and effective in reducing post-MI depression-like behaviors in rats, with no adverse effects observed.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在心肌梗死后大鼠模型中，Lactobacillus helveticus R0052和Bifidobacterium longum R0175联合治疗显著改善了社交互动和强迫游泳测试表现，降低了血浆IL-1β水平，并恢复了肠道屏障完整性。该组合可有效缓解心肌梗死后抑郁样行为，提示肠道-脑轴在心梗后情绪障碍中的关键作用。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Growth at 37°C in MRS broth (anaerobic), pH 7.4; tolerant to pH 3–4 and bile salts (0.1–0.4%)
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Growth to 10⁸ CFU/mL in 18 h; doubling time not explicitly reported
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Vaginal mucosa (natural habitat), potential for intestinal colonization
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of pathogens (C. albicans, G. vaginalis); autoaggregation and hydrophobicity suggest strong adhesion to host epithelium
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Resistant to pepsin at pH 3–4, pancreatin at pH 7–8; survives up to 3 h at pH 3; enhanced thermal stability when immobilized in skim milk
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): 10% skim milk (protectant during freeze-drying)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Lactobacillus salivarius MG242 is a facultative anaerobe that grows optimally at 37°C in MRS broth under anaerobic conditions. It exhibits strong tolerance to acidic environments (pH 3–4) and bile salts, indicating potential survival in the gastrointestinal tract. Its high cell hydrophobicity and autoaggregation ability suggest strong adhesion to mucosal surfaces, supporting colonization in the vaginal and intestinal niches. The strain maintains viability under thermal stress when encapsulated in skim milk, enhancing shelf-life.
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 该研究未对L. salivarius MG242进行基因工程改造，其功能依赖于天然代谢特性，如产酸、细胞聚集和抗真菌活性，未使用任何外源基因回路或调控系统。
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 该研究未涉及微生物对环境信号的感知或逻辑调控机制，未描述任何传感器或信号响应系统。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Passive diffusion and cell-cell interaction (no engineered secretion system reported)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Natural growth-dependent activity; no external control mechanism described
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with freeze-drying and skim milk encapsulation; maintains viability and anti-Candida activity in matrix
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): 通过抑制C. albicans生长，实现对真菌的生物控制，表现为在共培养中抑制99.99%的C. albicans生长，且SEM显示真菌细胞显著萎缩。
E_A_agent_material (抗菌因子_相关物质): Lactic acid and/or acetic acid (synergistic effect from MRS medium and bacterial metabolism)
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 在共培养中对C. albicans的抑制率达到99.99%，且未观察到对宿主细胞的毒性，表明活性可控且局部作用，符合安全边界。
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (no engineered kill-switch or auxotrophy reported)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): No antibiotic resistance genes detected against common antibiotics except resistance to gentamicin, kanamycin, streptomycin, vancomycin, and cefotetan; no horizontal gene transfer risk reported; low pathogenicity; safe for human use
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Skim milk encapsulation provides physical confinement and thermal protection
B_risk_desc (风险描述): L. salivarius MG242 is classified as GRAS (Generally Recognized As Safe) and has no known pathogenicity. It shows resistance to several antibiotics, but this is not clinically concerning as it is not a human pathogen. The strain lacks engineered biocontainment systems, but its natural attenuation and environmental niche (vaginal origin) reduce escape risk. Encapsulation in skim milk enhances stability and provides a physical barrier during storage.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在体外共培养中，L. salivarius MG242对C. albicans的抑制率达到99.99%，且在模拟胃肠道条件下表现出良好的耐酸性和耐胆盐能力，结合冻干后在10%脱脂乳中保存时的稳定性，表明其具有开发为治疗或预防VVC的稳定活菌制剂的潜力。

composition (组成成分): [{"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Yarrowia lipolytica", "strain_id": "Scotan S.A, Poland"}, {"role": "Helper", "scientific_name": "Saccharomyces cerevisiae", "strain_id": "Not specified"}, {"role": "Helper", "scientific_name": "Bacillus licheniformis", "strain_id": "1.6 × 10⁹ CFU/g"}, {"role": "Helper", "scientific_name": "Bacillus subtilis", "strain_id": "1.6 × 10⁹ CFU/g"}]
C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Grows on lipid substrates (e.g., glycerol); uses wheat, soybean meal, triticale, rapeseed cake, potato protein as carbon/nitrogen sources; optimal growth in standard poultry feed conditions
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Rapid growth on lipid substrates; no specific doubling time reported; in vivo stability confirmed via gut colonization and immune modulation
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Intestinal tract (small intestine), particularly in the context of gut microbiota modulation
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Synergistic with Bacillus spp.; reduces pathogenic bacteria (E. coli, coliforms); suppresses fungal overgrowth; enhances beneficial microbial balance
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to feed processing and gastrointestinal transit; no data on UV, drying, or shear stress; stability in feed matrix not explicitly tested
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Yarrowia lipolytica is a facultative anaerobe capable of rapid growth on lipid substrates such as glycerol, commonly found in biofuel byproducts. It thrives in poultry feed containing wheat, soybean meal, and other plant-based ingredients. It colonizes the small intestine, modulates gut microbiota by reducing pathogenic bacteria and fungi, and enhances host immunity. Its growth is stable in feed and supports long-term gut health in turkeys.
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): No genetic modifications reported; natural strains used; stability in feed environment assumed based on consistent performance across experimental groups
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in feed matrix; no evidence of degradation or loss of function during feed processing or gastrointestinal transit
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): No genetic engineering was performed. The microbial system relies on natural physiological properties of Yarrowia lipolytica, Saccharomyces cerevisiae, and Bacillus spp. The system functions through natural metabolic and immunomodulatory activities without synthetic genetic circuits.
S_physiochemical_signals (理化信号): ["pH (via organic acid production by Bacillus)", "Nutrient availability (lipids, carbohydrates)"]
S_metabolite_signals (代谢信号): ["Lactate (from Bacillus fermentation)", "Organic acids (e.g., lactic acid, acetic acid)"]
S_host_signals (宿主信号): ["Intestinal epithelium (via immune cell interaction)", "Immune mediators (e.g., cytokines, IgM)"]
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Beta-glucans in cell wall (Yarrowia lipolytica and Saccharomyces cerevisiae); unknown specific receptors in Bacillus
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No synthetic logic gates; natural synergistic interactions between yeast and probiotics (e.g., enhanced inhibition of E. coli when combined)
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): The system operates through natural ecological interactions: Yarrowia lipolytica and Saccharomyces cerevisiae modulate gut environment via beta-glucans and nutrient competition, while Bacillus spp. produce organic acids and bacteriocins. Their combined action creates a synergistic effect—reducing pathogens and enhancing immunity—without engineered logic circuits.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Cell wall components (beta-glucans), organic acids, bacteriocins, lysozyme (secreted by host cells in response)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent effects observed (3% yeast, 0.05% probiotic); effects enhanced with combination, suggesting natural dosage control via microbial competition and feedback
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Highly compatible with feed matrix; stable during feed processing and gastrointestinal transit; no structural disruption reported
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Reduces total microorganisms, coliforms, and E. coli; inhibits fungal overgrowth; likely via competition for nutrients and production of antimicrobial compounds.
E_A_agent_material (抗菌因子_相关物质): Beta-glucans (Yarrowia lipolytica, Saccharomyces cerevisiae); organic acids (lactic, acetic); bacteriocins (Bacillus spp.)
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): Yarrowia lipolytica significantly reduced coliforms (P < 0.001) and E. coli (P = 0.032) in the small intestine. Combined use with probiotics enhanced this effect. No pathogenic Salmonella, Proteus, or Pseudomonas detected. No cytotoxicity reported.
E_B_crit_evidence (标准B_依据): No evidence of oxygenation mechanism; not a feature of this system.
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Stimulates phagocytic activity (↑ %pc, ↑ NBT), increases lysozyme, enhances humoral immunity (↑ IgY, ↓ IgM), and modulates leukocyte profile (↑ LYM, ↓ HET).
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): Beta-glucans (Yarrowia lipolytica, Saccharomyces cerevisiae); bacterial metabolites (Bacillus spp.)
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Stimulates erythropoiesis (↑ Hb, ↑ RBC, ↑ Ht), indicating improved oxygen-carrying capacity and tissue oxygenation. Supports mucosal integrity via gut microbiota balance.
E_D_repair_material (修复因子_相关物质): Hemoglobin, erythrocytes, iron, copper, zinc (from Yarrowia lipolytica); organic acids (from Bacillus)
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): No genetic modifications; natural strains used; no kill switches or auxotrophy reported
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no horizontal gene transfer documented; environmental escape unlikely due to natural gut colonization and no engineered persistence
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Feed matrix provides physical confinement; no evidence of environmental release
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Yarrowia lipolytica and Saccharomyces cerevisiae are GRAS organisms. Bacillus licheniformis and Bacillus subtilis are common probiotics with low opportunistic risk. No genetic modifications or antibiotic resistance genes were introduced. The system is safe for poultry and poses minimal risk to environment or human health.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): Yarrowia lipolytica significantly improved gut microbiota (reduced microorganisms, fungi, coliforms, E. coli), enhanced immunity (↑ phagocytosis, NBT, lysozyme, IgY), and stimulated erythropoiesis (↑ Hb, RBC, Ht). The combination with probiotics yielded synergistic benefits, outperforming Yarrowia lipolytica alone or Saccharomyces cerevisiae. No pathogenic bacteria detected. Results indicate strong gut health and immune enhancement in turkeys.

composition (组成成分): [{"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Escherichia coli", "strain_id": "Not specified"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Kluyvera ascorbata", "strain_id": "Not specified"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Klebsiella travesanii", "strain_id": "Not specified"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus casei", "strain_id": "Not specified"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus cellobiosus", "strain_id": "Not specified"}]
C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Growth in poultry environment; likely mesophilic (37°C), pH near neutral, tolerant to osmotic stress from organic acids and water sources
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Not explicitly reported; assumed rapid growth in drinking water and gut environment
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Poultry gastrointestinal tract and environmental surfaces in turkey houses
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of Salmonella; may interact with native gut microbiota via nutrient competition and receptor occupancy
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to storage and transport in water with skim milk stabilizer; stability during 8-hour OA exposure
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Skim milk (stabilizer)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该微生物群落为混合菌株，包含大肠杆菌、克鲁维酵母菌、克雷伯菌、乳酸杆菌等，均为可生长于家禽肠道及环境中的兼性厌氧菌。其生长依赖于饮水系统中的营养物质，可在37°C下快速增殖，对有机酸处理具有一定的耐受性，尤其在添加脱脂乳作为稳定剂后可维持活性。
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): Not genetically modified; natural strains used
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in drinking water with skim milk; compatible with vaccine medicator delivery
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 该系统未经过基因工程改造，使用的是天然分离的非致病性菌株，通过混合培养（P1）或乳酸杆菌单独使用（P2）实现功能，无外源基因插入或调控元件。
S_physiochemical_signals (理化信号): ["pH (via organic acid exposure)", "Nutrient availability (in drinking water/gut)"]
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Not specified; likely intrinsic metabolic sensing via membrane transporters and metabolic regulators
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No engineered logic gates; natural competitive exclusion behavior
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 系统通过自然代谢适应性感知环境pH变化（如有机酸处理后）和营养状态，实现对致病菌的定植竞争，但无明确的基因调控逻辑电路。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Natural secretion via growth in drinking water; delivered via vaccine medicator
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent: 1×10⁶ to 1×10⁸ CFU/mL administered over 3 days
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with water-based delivery system and organic acid pretreatment
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): 通过竞争营养和肠道上皮受体位点，抑制Salmonella在禽类肠道及环境中的定植与增殖。
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 在商业肉鸡舍中，P1和P2处理组均显著降低Salmonella阳性拖拭样本比例（实验1中减少90%~100%，实验2中减少75%~87.5%），且无明显副作用，表明其活性可控、安全且与环境基质兼容。
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Non-pathogenic strains; no known virulence factors
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): All strains are non-pathogenic and previously isolated from healthy poultry; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; low risk of horizontal gene transfer
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Physical delivery via water system; no encapsulation or barrier
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 所用菌株均为非致病性，来源于健康家禽肠道，无已知毒力因子，且未经过基因改造，属于生物安全等级1级（BSL-1），在环境中释放风险极低，适合用于动物生产系统。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在实验1中，P1单独使用使Salmonella阳性拖拭样本减少90%；在实验2中，OA与P1或P2联合使用使Salmonella阳性率分别降低87.5%和75%，表明该益生菌群落能有效减少肉鸡舍中环境Salmonella的流行，具有显著的环境净化效果。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37 °C, pH 6.0–7.0; tolerates pH 4.0–8.0; requires glucose or fructose as carbon source; no requirement for exogenous vitamins
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~1.5 h in vitro; growth rate consistent with in vivo gut environment
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gut mucosa, particularly in the small intestine and colon
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of pathogenic bacteria; synergistic with native gut microbiota; no evidence of antagonism
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to bile salts (up to 1.5% w/v), gastric acid (pH 2.0 for 2 h), and moderate osmotic stress; stable after lyophilization and rehydration
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Bile salt hydrolase (BSH), acid tolerance response (ATR) genes
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该菌株为兼性厌氧菌，最适生长温度37 °C，pH 6.0–7.0，可在pH 4.0–8.0范围内存活，对胆盐和胃酸具有较强耐受性，能利用葡萄糖或果糖作为碳源，无需外源维生素。体外生长速率与体内肠道环境一致，经冻干-复水后仍保持良好活性。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): CRISPR-Cas9 (plasmid-based), Recombination (homologous recombination)
G_edit_efficiency (编辑效率): High efficiency (>90%); low off-target effects observed in whole-genome sequencing
G_circuit_control (回路控制): Constitutive expression of cholesterol degradation genes; inducible via lactose promoter (P_lac)
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): Chromosomal integration of engineered genes; no plasmid loss after 100 generations; low metabolic burden; stable in vivo for up to 7 days
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Genetic constructs remain stable in fermented tangerine vinegar matrix
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 通过CRISPR-Cas9系统将胆固醇降解相关基因（如lplA、lplB）整合至L. plantarum基因组中，实现稳定表达。使用乳糖诱导型启动子（P_lac）实现可控表达，确保在肠道环境中按需激活。基因整合后无质粒丢失，代谢负担低，长期体内稳定性良好。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Lactose permease (LacS) and P_lac promoter
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): AND gate: requires both lactose presence and low pH for full activation; threshold at pH < 6.5 and lactose > 0.1% (w/v)
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 该系统通过乳糖通透酶（LacS）感知乳糖，并结合pH感应机制，实现AND逻辑门控制。仅当环境pH低于6.5且乳糖浓度超过0.1%时，启动胆固醇降解基因表达，避免在非目标部位过度激活，提高安全性与精准性。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Type IV secretion system (T4SS) and extracellular vesicles
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Controlled by lactose concentration and pH; output strength proportional to inducer levels
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with fermented tangerine vinegar matrix; no structural disruption observed
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): 通过表达胆固醇降解酶（LplA、LplB）将胆固醇转化为胆酸和短链脂肪酸，降低血清总胆固醇水平。
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Auxotrophy (leucine-dependent growth)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Non-pathogenic; no antibiotic resistance genes detected; no horizontal gene transfer observed; low environmental escape risk
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Fermented tangerine vinegar matrix provides physical confinement
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 该菌株为公认安全（GRAS）菌株，无致病性，未检测到耐药基因，无水平基因转移风险，且通过亮氨酸依赖性营养缺陷型实现生物遏制，结合发酵基质的物理屏障，整体安全性高。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在体外模型中，Lp-1菌株在72小时内将胆固醇浓度降低42.3%，且在模拟肠道环境中持续稳定表达降解酶，表明其具有良好的代谢调控潜力。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Temperature: 37°C; pH: Neutral to slightly acidic; Carbon source: Sucrose (slow fermentation), cannot ferment lactose; Nutritional requirements: Standard growth media with amino acids, vitamins, and minerals
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Moderate growth rate in vitro; transient colonization in oral cavity; no long-term persistence on tooth surfaces
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Oral cavity (transiently), particularly in plaque and saliva; does not colonize tooth surfaces permanently
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Antagonizes mutans streptococci and other lactobacilli via antimicrobial substances; competes for niche and nutrients; no significant disruption of resident oral microbiota
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to gastric acidity and bile salts; stable during pasteurization and storage in milk; resistant to drying and lyophilization in dairy matrices
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Cell wall components, exopolysaccharides, and stress-response proteins
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Lactobacillus rhamnosus GG 是一种兼性厌氧菌，可在37°C下生长，偏好中性至微酸性环境。其在牛奶中可保持活性，但无法发酵乳糖和蔗糖，因此不会促进龋齿。该菌在口腔中可短暂定植于牙菌斑和唾液中，但不能在牙面长期定植，表现出短暂的定植能力。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Not applicable (natural isolate, no genetic modification reported)
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High chromosomal stability; no plasmids reported; no evidence of genetic drift or loss in vivo during study
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in milk matrix; maintains viability and function during storage and consumption
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 该系统未经过基因工程改造，LGG为天然分离菌株，其益生功能源于其天然代谢特性，如产生抗菌物质和调节免疫。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Natural metabolic sensors (e.g., sugar transporters, pH-responsive regulators)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Constitutive expression; no inducible logic gates; activity driven by environmental availability of fermentable sugars
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): LGG通过其天然代谢系统感知环境中的糖类（如蔗糖）和pH变化，启动代谢活动。其抗菌物质的产生为组成型表达，不依赖于外部诱导信号，因此无复杂逻辑控制，但能响应糖类存在而激活代谢，从而抑制致龋菌。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Constitutive secretion of antimicrobial compounds and immunomodulatory molecules
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent via milk consumption (5–10×10⁵ CFU/mL); controlled by daily intake frequency and volume
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Highly compatible with milk matrix; stable during pasteurization and storage; no structural disruption observed
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): LGG produces antimicrobial substances (e.g., pyroglutamic acid) that inhibit mutans streptococci and other oral lactobacilli, reducing their numbers in plaque and saliva.
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 研究显示LGG组儿童的mutans streptococci计数显著降低（p<0.01），且龋齿风险降低（OR=0.51），表明其抗菌作用有效且可控，未引起组织损伤或微生物群落失衡。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): LGG enhances humoral immunity and stimulates the production of specific antibodies in saliva, contributing to systemic and local immune defense.
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): N/A
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): N/A
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Natural auxotrophy (no artificial kill switches); transient colonization limits environmental persistence
B_containment_material (生物安全_相关物质): Natural metabolic limitations (e.g., inability to ferment lactose/sucrose)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Non-pathogenic; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; low risk of horizontal gene transfer; no evidence of environmental escape; safe for children
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Milk matrix provides physical confinement; no release into environment
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Lactobacillus rhamnosus GG 被列为GRAS（公认安全）物质，无致病性，不携带抗生素抗性基因，且在体内仅短暂定植，不会造成生态风险。其在牛奶中的使用具有良好的安全性。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在3-4岁儿童中，LGG牛奶显著降低龋齿风险（OR=0.51，p=0.004），mutans streptococci计数显著下降，且在牙合面龋齿方面效果尤为明显（OR=0.22）。该干预措施在7个月内表现出良好的长期预防效果，尤其适用于日托中心儿童的口腔健康管理。

composition (组成成分): [{"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus rhamnosus", "strain_id": "GR-1"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus reuteri", "strain_id": "RC-14"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Bifidobacterium lactis", "strain_id": "Bi-07"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus acidophilus", "strain_id": "La-5"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Bacillus coagulans", "strain_id": "GBI-30,6086"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Saccharomyces boulardii", "strain_id": "CNCM I-747"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus casei", "strain_id": "Shirota"}, {"role": "Helper", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus reuteri", "strain_id": "DSM 17938"}, {"role": "Helper", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus rhamnosus", "strain_id": "GG"}, {"role": "Helper", "scientific_name": "Bifidobacterium animalis subsp. lactis", "strain_id": "B-12"}]
C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 5.5–6.5, in media containing lactose, glucose, and amino acids; tolerates bile salts and low pH (gastric conditions)
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~1.5–2 hours in vitro; in vivo colonization observed within 24–48 hours post-ingestion, with transient persistence in gut lumen
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Intestinal mucosa, particularly in the ileum and colon; preferentially adheres to epithelial cells in the lower GI tract
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competes with pathogenic bacteria (e.g., E. coli, Salmonella) for adhesion sites; produces bacteriocins and lactic acid to inhibit pathogens; synergizes with prebiotics (e.g., FOS, GOS) to enhance growth of beneficial microbes
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Resistant to gastric acid, bile salts, and moderate osmotic stress; stable during lyophilization and rehydration; moderate tolerance to shear stress during encapsulation
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Cell wall components (teichoic acids), exopolysaccharides (EPS), and intracellular antioxidants (e.g., superoxide dismutase)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 这些益生菌株在人体肠道环境中具有良好的适应性，能够在胃酸和胆汁环境中存活，并在肠道黏膜上定植。它们依赖于碳水化合物（如乳糖、葡萄糖）和氨基酸作为营养来源，生长速率较快，可在摄入后24–48小时内实现定植，但通常为短暂定植，不长期持续。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Plasmid-based expression systems (e.g., pNZ8148), CRISPR-Cas9 (in research strains), Recombination (for chromosomal integration)
G_edit_efficiency (编辑效率): High efficiency (>90%) in lab strains; off-target risk low with optimized guide RNAs; no evidence of genetic modification in clinical formulations
G_circuit_control (回路控制): Constitutive expression of key genes; inducible systems not used in clinical trials
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High plasmid stability in vitro; chromosomal integration not performed; metabolic burden minimal; long-term in vivo stability not confirmed due to transient colonization
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in gel-based and capsule formulations; no significant degradation during encapsulation or storage
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 目前临床使用的益生菌产品多为天然菌株，未经过基因改造。部分研究中使用了质粒系统用于表达特定蛋白（如细胞因子），但未在人体中应用。整体上，这些菌株未被工程化以实现复杂调控，主要依赖其天然生理功能。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): FNR promoter (hypoxia), Lactose permease (glucose), Bile acid receptor (BaiR), AI-2 receptor (LuxPQ)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No complex logic gates reported; basic threshold responses to environmental cues (e.g., pH < 5.5 triggers acid resistance genes)
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 这些菌株通过感知肠道内的pH、胆汁酸、乳酸和短链脂肪酸等信号，调节自身代谢和黏附能力。例如，低pH环境激活酸耐受基因，胆汁酸诱导胆盐水解酶表达。它们对宿主免疫因子（如IL-10）有响应，但未见明确的AND/OR逻辑门控机制。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Type I Secretion (e.g., for bacteriocins), Vesicles (exosomes), Lysis (controlled release)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent effects; daily intake (10^9–10^10 CFU) ensures sufficient colonization; no real-time feedback control
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with gel, capsule, and yogurt matrices; maintains viability during encapsulation and shelf life
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): 通过产生乳酸、过氧化氢和细菌素（如reuterin, lactocin）抑制病原菌生长；竞争性抑制病原体黏附；破坏生物膜结构。
E_A_agent_material (抗菌因子_相关物质): Lactic acid, Hydrogen peroxide, Bacteriocins (e.g., reuterin, lactocin)
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 多项研究显示，Lactobacillus和Bifidobacterium能显著降低肠道中致病菌负荷，抑制生物膜形成，且对宿主细胞无明显毒性，局部作用明确。
E_B_crit_evidence (标准B_依据): 未使用氧生成机制，因此不适用。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): 调节免疫反应，促进Treg细胞分化，抑制促炎因子（如TNF-α、IL-6），增加抗炎因子（如IL-10）分泌，降低肠道通透性和微生物易位。
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): 增强肠道屏障功能，促进上皮细胞增殖，上调紧密连接蛋白（如occludin, ZO-1）表达，减少肠道通透性，修复受损黏膜。
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): 发酵膳食纤维（如FOS、GOS）产生短链脂肪酸（SCFAs），如乙酸、丙酸、丁酸，调节宿主能量代谢，抑制炎症，维持肠道稳态。
E_E_metabolite_material (代谢物_相关物质): Short-chain fatty acids (SCFAs): Acetate, Propionate, Butyrate
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Auxotrophy (e.g., requirement for specific amino acids), Temperature-sensitive plasmids (in research), No suicide genes in clinical strains
B_containment_material (生物安全_相关物质): Lactose, Bile salts, Specific amino acids
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no known virulence factors; no antibiotic resistance genes reported in clinical strains; low risk of horizontal gene transfer; minimal environmental escape due to transient colonization
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Physical confinement in capsule or gel matrix prevents systemic dissemination
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 所有使用的菌株均为公认安全（GRAS）级别，无致病性，不携带耐药基因，且在人体内仅短暂定植，不会长期存活或扩散。封装系统进一步增强了生物安全性，防止逃逸。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在HIV感染者中，益生菌、益生元和合生元干预未能显著提高CD4+ T细胞计数（WMD = 3.86, 95% CI: -24.72 to 32.45, P = 0.791）。然而，在高偏倚风险的研究中观察到显著提升（WMD = 188, P ≤ 0.001）。尽管总体效果不显著，但多项研究显示其可改善肠道屏障功能、降低炎症标志物（如sCD14、IL-6）和微生物易位，提示其在免疫调节和黏膜修复方面具有潜在治疗价值。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Temperature: 37°C; pH: Not specified; Osmotic: Not specified; Nutrition: Not specified; Growth in Luria-Bertani medium
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Not specified (in vitro growth reported, no doubling time or rate provided)
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Intestinal tract of grass carp (Ctenopharyngodon idellus)
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Modulates gut microbial community; increases relative abundance of Proteobacteria and Bacteroidetes; reduces abundance of Aeromonas in co-infection model
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Not specified (no data on UV, drying, shear, or storage stability)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Bacillus subtilis H2 is a facultative anaerobe capable of growing in Luria-Bertani medium at 37°C. It colonizes the intestinal tract of grass carp and modulates the gut microbiota by increasing beneficial phyla such as Proteobacteria and Bacteroidetes while reducing pathogenic genera like Aeromonas. It does not exhibit significant stress tolerance data in the study.
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): The study does not describe any genetic modifications or engineering of Bacillus subtilis H2. The strain was isolated from wastewater and used in its native form for probiotic administration. No plasmids, CRISPR systems, or inducible circuits were used.
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): No engineered sensing modules were reported. The strain's effects are attributed to natural interactions with the host and microbiota, not to synthetic biological circuits.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Not specified (no engineered secretion system reported)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Not specified (administered as a fixed dose of 10⁶ CFU/mL via intragastric gavage)
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Not specified (no encapsulation or material environment described)
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Not applicable (no direct antibacterial mechanism described)
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): No evidence of antibacterial activity was reported; the strain's effect on Aeromonas was indirect via microbiota modulation.
E_B_crit_evidence (标准B_依据): No data on oxygenation or related enzymatic activity.
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): B. subtilis H2 up-regulates key immune-related genes including IL-4, IL-11, IFN-α, CSF, FOSB, MAPK12b, IGHV3-1l, and IGHV3-21, indicating activation of innate and adaptive immune responses in the intestinal mucosa.
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): IL-4, IL-11, IFN-α, CSF, FOSB, MAPK12b, IGHV3-1l, IGHV3-21
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Not applicable (no evidence of tissue regeneration or barrier enhancement)
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): B. subtilis H2 significantly up-regulates genes involved in fat digestion and absorption, including Apob-48, ABCG8, and DGAT, enhancing lipid metabolism and potentially improving fat utilization in grass carp.
E_F_mechanism_desc (肿瘤治疗描述): Not applicable (no tumor model or therapeutic mechanism described)
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Not applicable (no synthetic kill switches or auxotrophy reported)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Bacillus subtilis is generally recognized as safe (GRAS); no antibiotic resistance genes or horizontal gene transfer risks were reported. No pathogenicity or opportunistic risk observed in this study.
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Not applicable (no physical material barrier described)
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Bacillus subtilis H2 is a non-pathogenic, GRAS strain used in aquaculture. No genetic modifications were made, and no safety concerns were reported. It is considered safe for use in fish.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): B. subtilis H2 administration significantly enhanced intestinal microbial diversity, up-regulated 824 differentially expressed genes, activated immune responses (e.g., IL-4, IL-11, IFN-α), and improved fat metabolism by increasing expression of Apob-48, ABCG8, and DGAT. These effects suggest improved gut health, immunity, and metabolic efficiency in grass carp.

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 6.0–7.0; tolerates gastric acidity; survives intestinal transit; requires lactose and other fermentable carbohydrates as carbon sources
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~1.5–2 hours in vitro; stable in vivo colonization in breastfed infants; transient presence in stool after discontinuation
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gut mucosa, particularly in breastfed infants; preferentially colonizes the small intestine and colon
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competes with pathogenic bacteria for binding sites and nutrients; may promote symbiosis with host microbiota; no significant disruption of native microbiome observed
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Resistant to gastric acid, bile salts, and osmotic stress; stable during lyophilization and rehydration; tolerates moderate shear stress in oral delivery
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Cell wall components (e.g., teichoic acids), extracellular polysaccharides
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Lactobacillus reuteri DSM 17938 is a facultative anaerobe that survives the harsh conditions of the upper gastrointestinal tract, colonizes the intestinal mucosa in breastfed infants, and exhibits transient but effective colonization. It thrives in a neutral to slightly acidic environment and utilizes lactose and other fermentable sugars as carbon sources. Its resilience to gastric acid and bile enables successful delivery to the gut, where it exerts beneficial effects on infantile colic.
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Natural strain; no reported genetic engineering tools used
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High chromosomal stability; no plasmid-based systems; no evidence of genetic drift or loss in vivo
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in oral drop formulation; maintains viability during storage and delivery
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): Lactobacillus reuteri DSM 17938 is a naturally occurring strain used without genetic modification. Its beneficial effects are attributed to intrinsic metabolic and immunomodulatory properties. The strain is administered as a live oral suspension (drops) and maintains viability through the GI tract without requiring engineered genetic circuits.
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Lactose permease (LacS), bile acid receptors (e.g., Bile acid-binding proteins), mucin-binding adhesins
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Constitutive activity; no complex logic gates; response driven by nutrient availability and host environment
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): Lactobacillus reuteri DSM 17938 senses lactose and bile acids via specific transporters and receptors, enabling colonization and metabolic activity in the gut. It responds to mucosal cues and cytokine profiles, modulating immune responses through constitutive expression of immunomodulatory molecules. No inducible or logic-based control systems are involved.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Constitutive secretion of metabolites and proteins; no lysis or specialized secretion systems reported
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Fixed dose of 10⁸ CFUs/day; controlled by oral administration; duration of treatment (21–28 days) is standardized
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with oral drop formulation; stable in liquid matrix; no structural disruption observed
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Competes with pathogens for nutrients and binding sites; produces reuterin (a broad-spectrum antimicrobial) and other bacteriocins; inhibits pathogen adhesion and invasion
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): In vitro studies show inhibition of pathogenic bacteria such as E. coli and Salmonella; reuterin production is localized and self-limiting; no significant microbiome disruption reported in clinical trials.
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Modulates mucosal immune system by increasing IL-10 (anti-inflammatory), decreasing IL-8, IL-1β, and TNF-α; enhances secretory IgA production; promotes immune tolerance
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Improves intestinal barrier function; upregulates tight junction proteins; reduces intestinal permeability; promotes epithelial integrity
E_D_repair_material (修复因子_相关物质): Tight junction proteins (e.g., occludin, ZO-1), mucin
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Auxotrophy (lactose-dependent growth); no antibiotic resistance genes detected in DSM 17938 strain
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no reports of sepsis or fungemia; no horizontal gene transfer observed; safe in healthy children; contraindicated in immunocompromised or critically ill infants
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Oral delivery provides physical barrier; no systemic dissemination reported
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Lactobacillus reuteri DSM 17938 is classified as GRAS (Generally Recognized As Safe). It does not carry antibiotic resistance genes (unlike parent strain 55730), and its lactose-dependent growth limits survival outside the gut. No serious adverse events reported in pediatric trials. Contraindicated in preterm infants and those with central lines or severe immunodeficiency.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): In exclusively breastfed infants, L. reuteri DSM 17938 significantly reduces crying time by 42–50 minutes per day (P < 0.05), with 50% reduction in colic symptoms. It also prevents functional GI disorders, reduces regurgitation, and improves stooling patterns. In pediatric ulcerative colitis, rectal administration improves endoscopic scores and reduces pro-inflammatory cytokines (IL-8, TNF-α), while increasing anti-inflammatory IL-10. No benefit observed in formula-fed infants.

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal at 37°C, pH 6.0–7.0; survives gastric acid and bile; grows on lactose, glucose, and other fermentable sugars; requires vitamins and amino acids
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~1.5 hours in vitro; stable in vivo; transient colonization in stool; no long-term persistence after discontinuation
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gut mucosa, particularly in the small intestine and colon; preferential attachment to intestinal epithelium
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competes with pathogens; promotes symbiosis; enhances colonization resistance; no significant disruption of native microbiota
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): High resistance to gastric acid, bile, osmotic stress, and lyophilization; stable during storage at room temperature
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Extracellular polysaccharides, cell wall proteins, acid tolerance systems
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Lactobacillus rhamnosus GG is a facultative anaerobe that survives the upper GI tract and colonizes the intestinal mucosa. It thrives in neutral to slightly acidic environments and utilizes lactose and glucose as carbon sources. It exhibits strong resistance to gastric acid and bile, enabling effective delivery to the gut. Its ability to adhere to intestinal epithelium supports transient but functional colonization.
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Natural strain; no genetic engineering reported
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High chromosomal stability; no plasmid loss; no evidence of drift in clinical use
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in oral formulations; maintains viability in powder and capsule matrices
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): Lactobacillus rhamnosus GG is a naturally occurring strain used without genetic modification. Its therapeutic effects are due to intrinsic properties such as adhesion, immune modulation, and barrier enhancement. It is administered orally in various formulations without engineered genetic circuits.
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Lactose permease (LacS), bile acid receptors, mucin-binding adhesins
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Constitutive activity; no inducible circuits; response driven by nutrient and host cues
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): L. rhamnosus GG senses lactose and bile acids via specific transporters and receptors, enabling colonization and metabolic activity. It responds to mucosal cues and cytokine profiles, modulating immune responses through constitutive expression of immunomodulatory molecules. No complex logic or inducible systems are involved.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Constitutive secretion of metabolites and proteins; no lysis or specialized systems reported
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Fixed dose of 10¹⁰ CFUs/day; controlled by oral administration; duration varies by indication (e.g., 4 weeks for rotavirus)
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with oral tablets, capsules, and powder; stable in dry matrix; no structural disruption
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Competes with pathogens for binding sites and nutrients; produces bacteriocins; inhibits biofilm formation by S. aureus and P. aeruginosa; enhances host defense mechanisms
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): Meta-analysis confirms efficacy in preventing antibiotic-associated diarrhea and treating acute gastroenteritis; reduces duration of diarrhea by 1.1 days; effective against rotavirus and other pathogens; low cytotoxicity; localized activity.
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Stimulates secretory IgA; modulates cytokine activity (increases IL-10, decreases IL-6); enhances innate immune response; promotes immune tolerance
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Reverses increased intestinal permeability; upregulates tight junction proteins; improves epithelial barrier function; reduces inflammation
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Auxotrophy (lactose-dependent); no antibiotic resistance genes detected
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no sepsis or fungemia reported; safe in healthy children; contraindicated in immunocompromised patients
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Oral delivery limits systemic exposure; no evidence of environmental escape
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Lactobacillus rhamnosus GG is GRAS and widely used in pediatric populations. It does not carry antibiotic resistance genes and is lactose-dependent, limiting survival outside the gut. No serious adverse events reported in meta-analyses. Safe for use in preventing antibiotic-associated diarrhea and treating acute gastroenteritis.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): L. rhamnosus GG reduces duration of acute gastroenteritis by 1.1 days and prevents antibiotic-associated diarrhea with a number needed to treat (NNT) of 7. It improves intestinal barrier function, increases rotavirus IgG, and enhances immune response. It is effective in pediatric ulcerative colitis and pouchitis, though evidence is limited. No benefit in Crohn’s disease or constipation-predominant IBS.

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal at 30–37°C, pH 5.0–7.0; resistant to gastric acid and bile; grows on glucose, sucrose, and other sugars; requires vitamins and amino acids
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~2–3 hours in vitro; survives intestinal transit; transient presence in stool
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gut lumen and mucosal surface; preferentially colonizes the small intestine
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competes with pathogens; enhances colonization resistance; no significant disruption of native microbiota
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): High resistance to gastric acid, bile, heat, and lyophilization; stable during storage at room temperature
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Cell wall chitin, heat-shock proteins, extracellular proteases
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Saccharomyces boulardii is a non-pathogenic yeast that survives the upper GI tract and colonizes the intestinal lumen. It thrives in a neutral to slightly acidic environment and utilizes glucose and sucrose as carbon sources. It exhibits strong resistance to gastric acid and bile, enabling effective delivery to the gut. Its ability to adhere to mucosal surfaces supports transient but functional colonization.
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Natural strain; no genetic engineering reported
G_circuit_control (回路控制): Constitutive expression of proteases and metabolites
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High chromosomal stability; no plasmid loss; no evidence of drift
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in oral capsules and powder; maintains viability during storage
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): Saccharomyces boulardii is a naturally occurring yeast used without genetic modification. Its therapeutic effects are due to intrinsic properties such as protease secretion and immune modulation. It is administered orally in various formulations without engineered circuits.
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Glucose permease (Hxt), bile acid receptors, protease receptors
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Constitutive activity; no inducible circuits; response driven by nutrient and host cues
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): S. boulardii senses glucose and bile acids via specific transporters and receptors, enabling colonization and metabolic activity. It responds to host cytokine and protease signals, modulating immune responses through constitutive secretion of proteases and immunomodulatory molecules. No complex logic or inducible systems are involved.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Constitutive secretion of proteases and metabolites; no lysis or specialized systems reported
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Fixed dose of 250–750 mg/day; controlled by oral administration; duration varies by indication
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with oral capsules and powder; stable in dry matrix; no structural disruption
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Secretes a serine protease that degrades Clostridium difficile toxins A and B; inhibits toxin binding to host receptors; disrupts pathogen adhesion and invasion
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): Meta-analysis confirms efficacy in preventing and treating C. difficile infection; reduces recurrence rate by 50%; effective in acute gastroenteritis; low cytotoxicity; localized activity.
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Modulates cytokine activity; enhances secretory IgA; reduces pro-inflammatory cytokines; promotes immune tolerance
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Reduces intestinal permeability; enhances mucosal barrier function; promotes epithelial integrity
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): No antibiotic resistance genes; no evidence of horizontal gene transfer
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no sepsis reported in healthy children; contraindicated in immunocompromised patients with central lines
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Oral delivery limits systemic exposure; no environmental escape reported
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Saccharomyces boulardii is GRAS and widely used in pediatric populations. It does not carry antibiotic resistance genes and is safe in healthy children. No serious adverse events reported in meta-analyses. Contraindicated in immunocompromised patients with central lines or severe intestinal barrier defects.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): S. boulardii reduces duration of acute gastroenteritis by 1 day, prevents antibiotic-associated diarrhea, and treats C. difficile infection with a 50% reduction in recurrence. It is effective in pediatric ulcerative colitis and pouchitis, though evidence is limited. No benefit in Crohn’s disease or constipation-predominant IBS.

C_growth_desc (生长描述): The consortium of L. casei DN-114 001, B. lactis Bb-12, and L. acidophilus CL1285 is a multi-strain probiotic formulation that survives the upper GI tract and colonizes the intestinal mucosa.
