E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with fermented dairy matrix; stable in liquid formulation; no structural disruption
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Competes with pathogens for binding sites and nutrients; produces bacteriocins; inhibits biofilm formation; enhances host defense mechanisms
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): Meta-analysis confirms efficacy in preventing acute gastroenteritis in daycare settings; reduces incidence by 19%; effective in preventing C. difficile infection; low cytotoxicity; localized activity.
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Modulates cytokine activity; enhances secretory IgA; promotes immune tolerance; reduces inflammation
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Improves intestinal barrier function; upregulates tight junction proteins; reduces intestinal permeability
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): No antibiotic resistance genes detected; no evidence of horizontal gene transfer
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no sepsis reported in healthy children; contraindicated in immunocompromised patients
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Oral delivery limits systemic exposure; no environmental escape reported
B_risk_desc (风险描述): The consortium is GRAS and safe in healthy children. It does not carry antibiotic resistance genes and is lactose-dependent, limiting survival outside the gut. No serious adverse events reported in clinical trials. Contraindicated in immunocompromised patients with central lines or severe intestinal barrier defects.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): The consortium reduces incidence of acute gastroenteritis by 19% in daycare settings and prevents C. difficile infection. It improves intestinal barrier function, enhances immune response, and reduces inflammation. No benefit in Crohn’s disease or constipation-predominant IBS.

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): 37°C, pH 6.8, in TYGA broth with 0.5% sodium acetate and 0.3% bile
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Growth rate increased with bile concentration; after 5 days, cell yield (dry weight) doubled compared to bile-free conditions
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Intestinal tract (duodenum and small intestine), particularly under bile-rich conditions
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Potential for competitive colonization due to enhanced adhesion and survival; may modulate microbial balance via immune stimulation
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): High tolerance to bile, prolonged culture stress, and osmotic stress; maintains cell integrity under long-term culture
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Cell-bound exopolysaccharide (EPS), fatty acid composition changes, sodium acetate
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Lactobacillus brevis KB290 exhibits enhanced growth, cell yield, and morphological stability in the presence of bile and sodium acetate. It maintains an intact rod shape during extended culture (5 days), unlike in bile-free conditions where cell lysis and shortening occur. Growth efficiency is improved via increased lactate production from glycolysis, and hydrophobicity is elevated, promoting epithelial adhesion. The strain can assimilate fructose and xylose but not glucose without sodium acetate. It shows high bile resistance, especially in TYGA medium, with growth increasing up to 268% at 0.5% bile after 5 days.
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 该研究未涉及基因工程改造。Lactobacillus brevis KB290的生理特性（如胆汁耐受性、细胞形态维持、生长效率提升）由培养条件（胆汁浓度、钠乙酸存在）调控，而非遗传修饰。其适应机制依赖于代谢重编程（如糖酵解增强）和细胞膜结构变化，而非人工基因回路设计。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Fatty acid composition, cell surface hydrophobicity, cell wall integrity
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No engineered logic gates; natural response to bile and sodium acetate as environmental cues
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): Lactobacillus brevis KB290 senses bile and sodium acetate as environmental signals, triggering a physiological adaptation response. This includes enhanced glycolytic flux, increased lactate production, improved cell membrane stability, and elevated hydrophobicity. The response is not regulated by synthetic genetic circuits but by intrinsic metabolic and structural adaptations. The system acts as a passive sensor with a threshold-like response: bile above a certain concentration (0.3%) induces growth enhancement and morphological protection, particularly in the presence of sodium acetate.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Passive secretion via cell membrane and lysis (autolysis), with potential release of EPS and metabolites
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Controlled by bile concentration and culture duration; no external control mechanism
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with liquid broth systems; no encapsulation or material barrier described
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Enhanced cell yield and stability in bile-rich environments may indirectly suppress pathogen colonization by improving probiotic persistence and competitive exclusion.
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): Lactobacillus brevis KB290 maintains high cell yield and structural integrity in bile, which enhances its ability to colonize the intestine and potentially outcompete pathogens. Lactate production is increased, which may inhibit pathogen growth. No evidence of excessive activity or tissue damage is reported. The system is localized to the intestinal tract and does not show systemic toxicity.
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Lactobacillus brevis KB290 has been previously shown to stimulate immune function and modulate intestinal microbial balance.
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Enhanced cell yield and epithelial adhesion (via increased hydrophobicity) may support mucosal barrier integrity and promote tissue repair.
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Bile induces increased glycolytic flux and lactate production, improving growth efficiency and energy metabolism.
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (natural strain, no synthetic kill switches)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no horizontal gene transfer risk mentioned; environmental escape unlikely due to natural habitat and lack of engineered persistence
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): None (no physical confinement described)
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Lactobacillus brevis KB290 is a well-characterized probiotic strain with GRAS status. It is not pathogenic, does not carry antibiotic resistance genes, and shows no evidence of horizontal gene transfer. Its survival in the gut is naturally limited by environmental conditions. No synthetic biocontainment systems are used. The risk of environmental escape is low, as the strain is naturally adapted to the human gut and lacks engineered survival advantages.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): Lactobacillus brevis KB290 demonstrates enhanced intestinal survival under bile stress, with doubled cell yield, improved morphological stability, and increased hydrophobicity after 5-day culture in bile-containing medium. These properties support its potential as a probiotic for gut health, immune modulation, and mucosal barrier repair. The strain maintains viability and structural integrity even under prolonged culture, suggesting strong resilience in the gastrointestinal environment.

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH range not explicitly stated but inferred as neutral to slightly acidic (typical for Lactobacillus), utilizes milk substrates (lactose, casein), requires no special carbon sources beyond those in MRS-1 medium
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Growth rate not quantified; cultured for 6 hours at 37°C on MRS-1 medium. In vivo homeostasis not directly assessed, but strains are used in probiotic formulations suggesting adaptation to gastrointestinal tract.
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gastrointestinal mucin layer, particularly in the gut lumen and mucus layer; capable of forming biofilms on mucin.
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Symbiotic relationship between D75 and D76 strains enhances viability, stress resistance, and pathogen antagonism. Competes with pathogens and pathobionts via bacteriocin production and biofilm formation.
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Resistant to bile (via bshA and bshB genes), moderate antibiotic resistance (e.g., β-lactamase blaZ, penicillin-binding proteins), resistant to bacteriophages (via CRISPR-Cas I-B system), and tolerates osmotic stress (via membrane modifications).
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Bile salt hydrolase (bshA, bshB), lysylphosphatidylglycerol flippase/synthetase (mprF), CRISPR-Cas I-B system
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Lactobacillus helveticus D75 and D76 are facultative anaerobes capable of growing at 37°C on standard MRS medium. They exhibit strong adhesion to mucin and fibrinogen, form biofilms, utilize milk proteins and sugars, resist bile and antibiotics, and are genetically equipped for survival in the gastrointestinal environment.
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): CRISPR-Cas I-B system (cas1–cas8b1 genes), natural genomic stability; no synthetic genetic tools reported.
G_edit_efficiency (编辑效率): Not applicable – no engineered edits reported; natural CRISPR system provides adaptive immunity.
G_circuit_control (回路控制): Constitutive expression of bacteriocin helveticin J genes confirmed; expression of helJ4 gene detected at low levels, suggesting potential inducible regulation (likely absent inducer in culture).
G_circuit_inducer_material (电路调控_相关物质): Unknown; helJ4 expression low in absence of known inducer.
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High chromosomal stability; no plasmids reported. CRISPR arrays (3 blocks, 33 spacers) suggest long-term evolutionary adaptation and resistance to foreign DNA. No evidence of plasmid loss or horizontal gene transfer.
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Genetic stability maintained in natural environment; no synthetic material environment tested.
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): The strains possess a native CRISPR-Cas I-B system for phage defense and intrinsic resistance to antibiotics and bile. Bacteriocin helveticin J is produced constitutively or conditionally, with gene clusters suggesting complex regulation. No synthetic genetic circuits or engineered modifications are present.
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Mucin-binding protein (mucBP), fibronectin-binding protein (fpbA, fpbIII), bile salt hydrolase (bshA, bshB), CRISPR spacers (for phage detection)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Bacteriocin production likely follows a quorum-sensing logic (AND gate: presence of target pathogen + sufficient cell density). No explicit logic gates reported beyond this inference.
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): The strains sense host mucosal surfaces (via mucBP, fpbA) and nutrient availability (lactose, casein). Bacteriocin production is likely triggered by microbial competition signals (quorum sensing), with CRISPR system acting as a surveillance mechanism for foreign DNA. The system integrates environmental cues to activate defense and colonization mechanisms.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Type I secretion (via SlpA domains), extracellular enzyme secretion (lactocepin H3/H), and passive diffusion of metabolites.
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Constitutive or quorum-dependent secretion; no external control reported.
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with probiotic formulations (e.g., oral supplements); biofilm formation enhances retention in gastrointestinal tract.
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Produces bacteriocin helveticin J, which disrupts membrane potential of target cells. Also forms biofilms that protect against host immune factors and competing microbes.
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): Bacteriocin helveticin J is produced and shown to inhibit pathogens. Biofilm formation enhances colonization without causing tissue damage. No pathogenicity genes detected. Low cytotoxicity confirmed.
E_B_mechanism_desc (产氧机制描述): Not applicable – no oxygen-generating enzymes or mechanisms identified.
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Exopolysaccharides (EPS) and teichoic acids stimulate host immune system. S-layer proteins (SlpA) enhance immunostimulatory activity.
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Biofilm formation on mucin layer stabilizes epithelial barrier. Proteolytic enzymes (lactocepin H3, H) release bioactive peptides (e.g., Ile-Pro-Pro, Val-Pro-Pro) with anti-inflammatory and tissue-protective effects.
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Metabolizes lactose and galactose via Leloir pathway. Produces SCFAs and bioactive peptides during milk fermentation. Regulates host metabolism via peptide signaling.
E_E_metabolite_material (代谢物_相关物质): Lactose, Galactose, UDP-glucose, SCFAs, Ile-Pro-Pro, Val-Pro-Pro
E_F_mechanism_desc (肿瘤治疗描述): Not applicable – no evidence of immune activation against tumors or prodrug conversion.
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Auxotrophy not reported; no kill-switches. Natural resistance to phages and antibiotics reduces risk of horizontal gene transfer.
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): No pathogenicity genes, virulence factors, or toxin-encoding genes detected. Hemolysin gene present but non-functional. No antibiotic resistance genes on mobile elements. Low risk of environmental escape.
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Oral delivery limits systemic spread; gastrointestinal confinement reduces environmental release risk.
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Lactobacillus helveticus D75 and D76 are classified as GRAS (Generally Recognized As Safe). No pathogenicity genes or virulence factors identified. Natural CRISPR system and antibiotic resistance genes are chromosomal and not transferable. Strains are well-tolerated in clinical use since 1997.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): Strains have demonstrated clinical efficacy in treating chronic nasopharyngeal disease, H. pylori infection, MALT lymphoma, vulvovaginitis, chemotherapy complications, Klebsiella infection, and inflammatory bowel diseases. They enhance vaccine efficacy and reduce respiratory infections by 2.5–4.1-fold. Promote mucosal barrier integrity and immune modulation.

spatial_arrangement (空间排布): Oral administration (systemic distribution via gastrointestinal tract)
C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 6.5–7.5; utilizes various carbon sources including glucose and amino acids; requires no special growth factors beyond standard media
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Growth rate not specified; in vivo colonization observed post-administration; stable in gastrointestinal tract
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gastrointestinal tract (colon), particularly in the context of colorectal surgery and postoperative recovery
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of opportunistic pathogens; promotes symbiosis with beneficial microbiota; increases ratio of Bifidobacterium
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to gastric acid and bile; stable during oral administration and intestinal transit; resistant to drying and storage under refrigeration
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Cell wall structure, spore formation (Bacillus mesentericus), bile salt hydrolase activity (Clostridium butyricum)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该益生菌制剂由三种菌株组成：粪肠球菌T110、丁酸梭菌TO-A和肠膜明串珠菌TO-A。三者均为耐酸耐胆盐的兼性厌氧菌，可在肠道内定植并维持稳定。粪肠球菌在肠道中可快速增殖，丁酸梭菌可产生丁酸，肠膜明串珠菌具有良好的耐受性和定植能力，三者协同改善肠道微生态平衡。
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): No genetic modification reported; natural strains used; chromosomal stability in vivo; no plasmid-based systems
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): No engineered genetic circuits; natural strains used; stability in oral formulation and gastrointestinal environment
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 该益生菌制剂为天然菌株组合，未进行基因工程改造。三种菌株均为临床常用益生菌，通过口服给药后在肠道内定植，发挥调节免疫和改善肠道菌群的作用。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Bile salt hydrolase (Clostridium butyricum), pH-responsive promoters (inferred), host immune signals (CD4+ T cell activation)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No engineered logic gates; natural sensing of host and microbial environment; threshold-based activation of immune response
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 三种菌株通过感知肠道pH、胆汁酸等环境信号，以及宿主免疫因子（如细胞因子）的动态变化，调节自身代谢与免疫调节功能。丁酸梭菌可感知肠道环境变化并产生丁酸，粪肠球菌和肠膜明串珠菌则通过与宿主免疫细胞互作，响应免疫信号，实现对免疫系统的调节。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Natural secretion (e.g., SCFAs, enzymes); no engineered secretion systems
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Oral administration (6 tablets/day); dose controlled by regimen; no feedback control
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Oral tablet formulation; stable in gastrointestinal environment; compatible with intestinal mucosa
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 未报告抗菌或抗生物膜功能。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): 通过调节CD4+ T细胞功能，增强细胞介导免疫，降低术后炎症反应，提升免疫应答能力。
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): Adenosine triphosphate (ATP) from CD4+ T cells (measured via ImmuKnow assay), cytokine modulation (inferred)
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): 通过促进肠道蠕动恢复、改善肠黏膜屏障功能、增强上皮细胞增殖，加速术后肠道功能恢复。
E_D_repair_material (修复因子_相关物质): Short-chain fatty acids (SCFAs), mucin secretion, epithelial proliferation
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): 丁酸梭菌产生丁酸等短链脂肪酸，调节肠道代谢环境，维持肠道酸性，促进上皮细胞能量代谢。
E_E_metabolite_material (代谢物_相关物质): Butyric acid, Acetic acid, Propionic acid
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): No genetic modification; natural strains; no kill-switches or auxotrophy reported
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no horizontal gene transfer risk; low risk of environmental escape
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Oral administration with natural gut colonization; no physical barrier required
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 该益生菌制剂由三种公认安全（GRAS）的菌株组成，未进行基因改造，无抗生素抗性基因，无致病性报告。在临床试验中未观察到不良反应，安全性良好。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 口服益生菌治疗可显著降低结直肠癌手术患者浅表切口手术部位感染（SSI）的发生率（组B为6.7%，组A为19.8%，P=0.016）。术后首次排便时间（2.0天 vs 2.8天）和进食时间（3.9天 vs 4.7天）显著缩短。粪便中双歧杆菌比例显著升高（4.6%至9.1%）。CD4+ T细胞ATP水平在术后第一天未显著升高（组B），提示炎症反应减轻。多变量分析显示，益生菌使用是SSI的独立保护因素（风险比4.10，95%CI 1.34–12.20，P=0.013）。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 30–37°C, pH 5–7; tolerates gastric acidity and bile salts; utilizes glucose and other carbohydrates as carbon sources
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Stable colonization in gastrointestinal tract; detectable live yeast within 24–48 h of administration; peak clinical efficacy observed at day 3 of intervention
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gastrointestinal tract (small and large intestine), particularly in mucosal surface and lumen
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competes with pathogenic bacteria for adhesion sites; modulates gut microbiota balance; enhances beneficial flora
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): High tolerance to lyophilization, storage at room temperature, gastric acid, bile salts, and osmotic stress; stable during rehydration
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Lyophilized formulation (protective matrix)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该酵母菌为兼性厌氧菌，可在30–37°C、pH 5–7条件下生长，耐受胃酸和胆汁，利用葡萄糖等碳源。其冻干制剂具有良好的稳定性，可在室温下长期保存，口服后可在肠道内定植并维持稳定浓度，约3天达到峰值疗效。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Not applicable (natural strain, no genetic modification reported)
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High chromosomal stability; no plasmids or foreign DNA reported; no evidence of genetic drift in clinical use
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in lyophilized powder formulation; maintains viability during encapsulation and rehydration
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 该菌株为天然非基因工程改造的酵母菌，未使用任何基因编辑工具。其功能依赖于天然生理特性，如定植能力、分泌酶类及免疫调节作用，无需人工调控电路。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Natural receptors for pH, glucose, bile acids, and host-derived molecules (e.g., surface lectins, nutrient transporters)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No engineered logic gates; natural sensing integrated with homeostatic feedback in host-microbe interaction
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 该菌株通过天然受体感知肠道环境中的pH、葡萄糖、胆汁酸及宿主蛋白酶、细胞因子等信号，实现对肠道微环境的响应。其功能表达为非诱导性、持续性，无人工设计的逻辑门控机制。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Constitutive secretion via cell wall and extracellular vesicles; no lysis or specialized secretion systems reported
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Twice daily oral administration (250 mg sachet); dose-dependent efficacy observed in clinical trials
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Highly compatible with lyophilized powder formulation; stable during encapsulation and oral delivery
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Not applicable (no direct antibacterial activity reported)
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 无直接抗菌或抗生物膜作用证据。
E_B_crit_evidence (标准B_依据): 无氧生成功能，不适用于氧疗场景。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Modulates local and systemic immune responses by reducing pro-inflammatory cytokines (e.g., TNF-α, IL-6) and enhancing anti-inflammatory mediators; promotes regulatory T-cell activity.
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): Cytokines (e.g., IL-10, TGF-β), secreted immunomodulatory proteins
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Enhances intestinal barrier integrity by strengthening enterocyte tight junctions; promotes epithelial regeneration and restoration of fluid transport pathways.
E_D_repair_material (修复因子_相关物质): Tight junction proteins (e.g., occludin, ZO-1), brush border enzymes, polyamines
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Restores normal levels of colonic short-chain fatty acids (SCFAs); regulates glucose and lipid metabolism via microbial fermentation and host signaling.
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (natural strain, no kill-switch or auxotrophy reported)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): No pathogenicity; low opportunistic risk; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no horizontal gene transfer observed; no environmental escape risk due to non-replication in non-host environments
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Oral delivery with intestinal mucosal barrier; no systemic dissemination reported
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 该菌株为公认安全（GRAS）的益生菌，未发现致病性、耐药基因或水平基因转移风险。其在肠道内定植但不侵入血液或组织，无环境释放风险，安全性良好。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在363名儿童中，S. boulardii CNCM I-745组腹泻持续时间比对照组缩短约24小时（75.4±33.1 h vs 99.8±32.5 h，P<0.001）。在住院、急诊科和门诊患者中，腹泻持续时间分别缩短约31 h、31 h和30 h。第72小时，接受益生菌的儿童中仅27.3%仍有腹泻，而对照组为48.5%（P<0.001）。住院时间平均缩短超过36小时（4.60±1.72天 vs 6.12±1.71天，P<0.001），急诊科停留时间缩短超过19小时（1.20±0.40天 vs 2.0±0.32天，P<0.001）。未观察到与益生菌相关的不良反应。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): 37°C, pH 7.4, aerobic cultivation on Slanetz-Bartley-Agar
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Growth rate not specified; doubling time not reported; in vivo viability confirmed in intestinal tract of piglets and sows
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Ileum and colon of suckling piglets; stomach and proximal jejunum post-weaning; feces of sows and piglets
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competes with native enterococci; ratio of probiotic to total enterococci ranged from 0.03% to 50%, indicating limited dominance; no significant disruption of microbiome observed
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to storage and transport in feed; viable in gastrointestinal tract despite stressors such as diet change and weaning; stability in feces maintained over time
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): None explicitly mentioned
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该菌株为粪肠球菌NCIMB 10415，属于兼性厌氧菌，可在37°C、pH 7.4条件下在选择性培养基上生长。在母猪粪便中保持稳定存在（约1.8×10⁵ CFU/g湿重），在仔猪肠道中可定植于回肠和结肠，尤其在哺乳期。尽管在断奶后定植能力下降，但持续摄入可维持肠道和粪便中一定水平的活菌数，表明其在动物消化道中具有良好的生存与定植能力。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): PCR-based probe development using specific primers targeting a 1.2 kb unique plasmid sequence
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): Not applicable (no plasmid or chromosomal integration described)
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Not applicable
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 本研究未对菌株进行基因改造，仅通过PCR扩增其特异性1.2 kb质粒序列，构建Digoxigenin标记的探针用于菌株特异性检测。该方法基于分子杂交技术，实现对粪肠球菌NCIMB 10415在饲料、消化道内容物和粪便中的选择性定量，无需基因工程改造。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): None (no engineered sensing system)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Not applicable
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 该系统未设计任何合成生物学传感模块，因此无逻辑控制或信号响应机制。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Not specified (no engineered secretion system reported)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Not applicable (no controlled delivery system)
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Not applicable
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): 未检测到抗菌活性
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 未报告抗菌或抗生物膜功能
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): 通过调节肠道菌群结构和免疫反应，可能激活宿主免疫系统，改善肠道健康
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): Enterocin-like substances (bacteriocin-like compounds), host immune response-activating substances
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): 未检测到组织修复功能
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): 可能通过产生代谢产物（如乳酸）调节肠道微环境，影响菌群平衡，但绝对数量低，代谢产物浓度可能不足以主导生态位
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (no kill-switch or auxotrophy described)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no horizontal gene transfer risk mentioned; environmental escape unlikely due to lack of competitive advantage in native microbiota
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): None (no physical confinement used)
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 粪肠球菌NCIMB 10415为公认安全（GRAS）菌株，广泛用于动物饲料和人类健康产品。研究中未发现其具有致病性或抗生素抗性基因，且在肠道中定植能力有限，难以形成优势菌群，因此生态风险较低。无基因工程改造，无生物安全控制策略，但其天然特性决定了其在环境中不易扩散，安全性较高。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 该菌株在母猪粪便中稳定存在（约1.8×10⁵ CFU/g湿重），在哺乳仔猪肠道中可成功定植于回肠和结肠，尤其在断奶前。断奶后定植能力下降，但持续摄入可维持肠道和粪便中10³–10⁴ CFU/g水平。研究证实其可通过母体传递实现早期定植，具有良好的肠道定植潜力和稳定性，支持其作为益生菌在动物营养中的应用效果。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Growth in chicken small intestinal mucus; optimal pH 7, temperature 42°C; no significant effect from EDTA or CaCl2; growth rate 0.5–0.6 CFU/h
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Growth rate: 0.5–0.6 CFU/h; final pH ~6; growth observed in mucus preparations
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Chicken small intestinal mucus
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): No interference with Salmonella spp. adhesion to mucus; does not inhibit pathogen binding sites
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to pH 6–8, 30–42°C; stable under UV treatment (used in mucus sterilization)
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): None explicitly mentioned
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该乳酸杆菌株可在鸡小肠黏液中生长，最适生长温度为42°C，pH为7，对二价阳离子（如钙）无依赖性，且在黏液中表现出良好的生长能力。
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 未对菌株进行基因工程改造，其黏附特性源于天然表面结构（如凝集素样蛋白），未涉及人工遗传回路或调控元件。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Lectin-like protein (surface receptor), glycoprotein receptor in mucus (36–67 kDa)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No synthetic logic gates; natural adhesion mediated by specific receptor-ligand interaction with threshold dependence on N-acetyl-glucosamine
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 菌株通过细胞表面的凝集素样蛋白识别黏液中的糖蛋白受体，其黏附行为受pH和温度调控，且仅被N-乙酰氨基葡萄糖特异性抑制，表明存在特定的分子识别机制。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Not specified
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Not specified
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Not specified
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): 未检测到对沙门氏菌黏附的抑制作用，表明无直接抗菌或抗生物膜功能。
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 未观察到对沙门氏菌黏附的抑制作用（P > 0.05），表明该菌株不具备抗菌或抗黏附功能。
E_B_mechanism_desc (产氧机制描述): 未提及氧气生成或代谢相关功能。
E_B_crit_evidence (标准B_依据): 未提及任何氧合机制或相关酶。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): 未提及免疫调节因子分泌或免疫激活功能。
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): 未提及促进组织修复或细胞再生的因子。
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): 未提及代谢产物（如短链脂肪酸、色氨酸代谢物）的调控功能。
E_F_mechanism_desc (肿瘤治疗描述): 未涉及肿瘤靶向或药物激活功能。
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): No pathogenicity reported; no antibiotic resistance genes mentioned; low risk of horizontal gene transfer; naturally occurring in chicken gut.
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): None
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 该菌株为鸡源性乳酸杆菌，属于公认安全（GRAS）类别，无致病性报道，未发现抗生素抗性基因，且未进行基因改造，环境逃逸风险极低。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 该菌株在鸡小肠黏液中表现出强黏附能力（65.1%），尤其在pH 7和42°C条件下，其黏附受黏液中糖蛋白受体调控，且不干扰沙门氏菌的黏附，表明其具有良好的定植潜力，但未显示直接治疗或修复功能。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 5.5–6.5; tolerates gastric acidity (pH 1–2) due to lactic acid production; requires fermentable carbohydrates (e.g., glucose) as carbon source
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~1.5–2 hours in vitro; in vivo colonization observed in gastric mucosa with sustained persistence during treatment
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gastric mucosa, specifically competing for adhesion sites with *H. pylori*
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of *H. pylori*; modulates host immune response; may support beneficial gastric microbiota recovery post-eradication
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to gastric acid, bile salts, and moderate osmotic stress; stable during lyophilization and rehydration; resistant to shear stress in suspension
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Lactic acid, cell wall components, biofilm-like matrix
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该菌株为兼性厌氧菌，可在37°C、pH 5.5–6.5条件下良好生长，具备在胃酸（pH 1–2）环境中存活的能力，主要通过产生乳酸降低局部pH值，抑制*H. pylori*生长。其在胃黏膜上具有较强的定植能力，可与病原体竞争结合位点，维持治疗期间的持续存在。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): None reported
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High chromosomal stability; no plasmid-based systems used; no evidence of genetic drift in clinical trials
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in oral suspension and yogurt delivery systems
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 未进行基因工程改造，其功能依赖于天然生理特性，如黏附能力、乳酸和细菌素的产生，以及对*H. pylori*的直接抑制作用。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): FNR-like regulators, lactate-sensing promoters, surface glycolipid receptors
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Constitutive expression; no complex logic gates; threshold-based response to acid and nutrient availability
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 该菌株通过感知胃酸环境和可利用碳源（如葡萄糖）实现定植，其乳酸和细菌素的产生为持续性表达，不依赖外部诱导信号。对炎症因子（如IL-8）的调节作用可能通过感知宿主免疫信号间接实现。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Type I secretion (bacteriocins), passive diffusion (lactic acid)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent efficacy (1×10⁸ CFU tid); controlled by oral administration schedule
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with oral suspension, yogurt, and lyophilized powder delivery systems
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): 通过分泌细菌素（如reuterin）和乳酸直接抑制*H. pylori*生长，乳酸还可抑制其尿素酶活性，破坏其碱化环境。
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 在临床试验中，L. reuteri联合疗法显著提高*H. pylori*根除率（+20%），且未报告严重不良反应，表明其活性可控且对宿主细胞低毒性。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): 通过下调IL-8、TNF-α等促炎细胞因子的分泌，减轻胃黏膜炎症反应；抑制CagA毒力因子表达，减少中性粒细胞浸润。
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): 通过减少炎症和黏膜损伤，促进胃黏膜屏障功能恢复；间接支持上皮再生和组织修复。
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (natural strain, no genetic modifications)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Non-pathogenic; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; low risk of horizontal gene transfer; no environmental escape concerns
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Oral delivery provides natural physical barrier; no systemic dissemination reported
B_risk_desc (风险描述): L. reuteri为公认安全（GRAS）菌株，无致病性，不携带耐药基因，无基因水平转移风险，口服给药后主要定植于胃肠道，无系统性扩散，安全性高。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在随机对照试验中，L. reuteri（1×10⁸ CFU tid）联合左氧氟沙星治疗可使*H. pylori*根除率提高20%，显著降低腹泻、恶心等抗生素副作用，且无严重不良反应，表明其在辅助根除治疗中具有显著疗效。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal at 37°C, pH 5.5–6.5; survives gastric acid (pH 1–2) via acid tolerance response; requires glucose and amino acids
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~1.8 hours in vitro; in vivo persistence during 14-day treatment
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gastric and intestinal mucosa; competes with *H. pylori* for adhesion sites
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of pathogens; enhances IgA secretion; modulates cytokine expression; supports microbiota balance
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Resistant to gastric acid, bile, osmotic stress, and freeze-drying; stable during storage at 4°C
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Cell wall polysaccharides, acid shock proteins
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该菌株为兼性厌氧菌，可在37°C、pH 5.5–6.5条件下生长，具备在胃酸环境中存活的能力，主要通过酸耐受机制和黏附能力实现定植。在临床试验中表现出良好的体内持久性。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): None reported
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High chromosomal stability; no plasmid loss observed; no genetic drift in trials
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in oral suspension and capsule formulations
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 未进行基因改造，其功能依赖于天然黏附、免疫调节和抗菌特性。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Lactate-sensing promoters, acid-responsive regulators, surface adhesins
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Constitutive expression; no inducible circuits; threshold response to acid and nutrients
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): LGG通过感知胃酸和营养物质实现定植，其黏附和免疫调节功能为持续性表达，不依赖外部信号。对宿主炎症因子的调节可能通过感知免疫信号间接实现。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Type I secretion (bacteriocins), passive diffusion (lactic acid)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent (6×10⁹ CFU bid); controlled by oral administration
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with oral suspension and capsule delivery
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): 通过分泌细菌素和乳酸抑制*H. pylori*生长；其黏附能力可占据*H. pylori*结合位点，实现竞争性排斥。
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 在Armuzzi等人的研究中，LGG联合三联疗法显著减轻恶心、腹胀和腹泻，但根除率无显著差异，表明其抗菌活性可控且安全。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): 显著降低胃肠道症状，包括味觉障碍、腹胀和腹泻；通过调节细胞因子（如IL-8）表达减轻炎症反应。
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): 通过减少炎症和黏膜损伤，促进胃黏膜屏障修复，间接支持组织再生。
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Non-pathogenic; no antibiotic resistance genes; low HGT risk; no environmental escape
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Oral delivery limits systemic exposure
B_risk_desc (风险描述): LGG为公认安全菌株，无致病性，不携带耐药基因，无基因水平转移风险，口服给药后主要定植于胃肠道，安全性高。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在Armuzzi等人的研究中，LGG联合三联疗法显著减轻胃肠道副作用（如味觉障碍、腹胀、腹泻），但根除率无显著提升，表明其在缓解治疗副作用方面具有明确疗效。

C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~2.5 hours in vitro; in vivo persistence during 4-week treatment

G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High chromosomal stability; no plasmid loss; no drift observed
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in oral suspension and yogurt
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 未进行基因改造，其功能依赖于天然黏附抑制、免疫调节和抗菌特性。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Mannoprotein receptors, acid-responsive promoters
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Constitutive expression; no complex logic; threshold-based response
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): S. boulardii通过感知胃酸和营养物质实现定植，其抑制*H. pylori*黏附的能力为持续性表达，不依赖外部诱导信号。对宿主炎症因子的调节可能通过感知免疫信号间接实现。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Secretion of neuraminidase, passive diffusion of metabolites
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent (3×10¹⁰ CFU/g); controlled by oral administration
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with yogurt and oral suspension
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): 通过分泌神经氨酸酶（neuraminidase）降解宿主细胞表面α(2-3)-唾液酸，阻断*H. pylori*黏附受体，从而抑制其定植。
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 在Song等人的研究中，S. boulardii联合三联疗法显著减少腹泻发生率（p<0.05），且根除率提高至85.4%，表明其活性可控且安全。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): 显著减少抗生素治疗引起的腹泻和恶心；通过调节细胞因子表达减轻炎症反应。
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): 通过减少炎症和黏膜损伤，促进胃黏膜屏障修复，支持组织再生。
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Non-pathogenic; no antibiotic resistance genes; low HGT risk; no environmental escape
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Oral delivery limits systemic exposure
B_risk_desc (风险描述): S. boulardii为公认安全酵母菌株，无致病性，不携带耐药基因，无基因水平转移风险，口服给药后主要定植于胃肠道，安全性高。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在Song等人的研究中，S. boulardii联合三联疗法显著减少腹泻发生率（p<0.05），并提高根除率至85.4%，表明其在缓解副作用和辅助根除治疗中具有显著疗效。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Grown in MRSC medium (MRS + 0.5 g/L L-cysteine) under anaerobic conditions (O2 < 1%) at 37°C
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Higher expression of adhesins during exponential growth phase; adhesion capacity correlates with exponential phase (OD600 = 1.3–1.98 × 10⁸ CFU/mL)
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Intestinal epithelial cells (IECs), mucus layer, gut lumen of neonates and infants
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Strong adhesion to IECs; potential for niche colonization and immune modulation; may compete with pathogens for binding sites
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to in vitro culture conditions; no data on UV, drying, shear, or long-term storage stability
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Bifidobacterium bifidum S17 is a facultative anaerobe that grows optimally under anaerobic conditions at 37°C in MRS-based medium supplemented with cysteine. It exhibits higher expression of surface adhesins during exponential growth phase, which correlates with enhanced adhesion to intestinal epithelial cells. The strain is adapted to the human infant gut environment, particularly breast-fed neonates, and shows strong colonization potential via multiple surface adhesion mechanisms.
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): No genetic engineering was performed in this study. The strain was used in its native form, with genomic analysis identifying potential adhesion genes and pilus clusters. No synthetic circuits, inducible promoters, or CRISPR tools were applied.
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): No engineered sensing modules were reported. The strain's adhesion behavior is naturally regulated by growth phase, with higher expression of adhesins in exponential phase, but no specific environmental sensors or logic gates were identified or engineered.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Unknown (no evidence of secretion systems or lysis reported)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Not applicable (no engineered control; natural expression regulated by growth phase)
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Not applicable (no material encapsulation or delivery system described)
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): B. bifidum S17 exhibits potent anti-inflammatory activity both in vitro and in vivo, contributing to immune homeostasis and protection against colitis. This is linked to its strong adhesion to intestinal epithelial cells, which may facilitate immune signaling.
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): Adhesion proteins (e.g., BopA, pili, moonlighting proteins) and secreted metabolites (implied, though not specified)
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Strong adhesion to intestinal epithelial cells (IECs) supports mucosal barrier integrity and may promote epithelial regeneration and tissue repair by stabilizing host-microbe interactions.
E_D_repair_material (修复因子_相关物质): Surface adhesins (e.g., BopA, pilus subunits, G5 domain protein BBIF_1769)
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (natural strain, no synthetic kill switches or auxotrophy reported)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no evidence of horizontal gene transfer; considered safe for human consumption as a probiotic
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Not applicable (no material-based confinement used)
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Bifidobacterium bifidum S17 is a well-characterized probiotic strain with GRAS status. It is non-pathogenic, does not carry known antibiotic resistance genes, and is naturally adapted to the human gut. No biocontainment strategies were implemented, but its natural niche restriction and lack of virulence factors support low environmental and clinical risk.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): B. bifidum S17 demonstrates strong anti-inflammatory effects in murine colitis models and in vitro. It exhibits 2-fold higher adhesion to Caco-2 intestinal epithelial cells during exponential growth phase (29.8% vs. 14.6% in stationary phase), which is linked to its ability to colonize the gut and modulate host immunity. The strain's extensive repertoire of surface adhesins, including pili and moonlighting proteins, supports long-term colonization and mucosal barrier stabilization, contributing to intestinal health and tissue repair.

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 5.5–6.5, tolerant to bile salts (0.3% w/v) and osmotic stress (up to 6% NaCl)
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~70 minutes in vitro; in vivo colonization observed in intestinal mucosa with stable persistence over 14 days
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Intestinal mucosa, particularly in the proximal small intestine
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of pathogenic bacteria; no significant disruption of native microbiota; synergistic with Bifidobacterium spp.
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): High tolerance to lyophilization and rehydration; stable at room temperature for up to 6 months; resistant to gastric acid (pH 2.0 for 2 h)
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Exopolysaccharides (EPS) and acid tolerance response (ATR) genes
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该菌株为兼性厌氧菌，最适生长温度为37°C，pH 5.5–6.5，对胆盐（0.3% w/v）和高渗环境（最高6% NaCl）具有耐受性。体外培养时倍增时间为约70分钟，在体内可定植于小肠黏膜并持续14天以上。对胃酸（pH 2.0，2小时）具有较强耐受性，且在冻干-复水后仍保持高存活率。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Plasmid pNZ8148 (nisin-inducible system)
G_edit_efficiency (编辑效率): High efficiency (>90%) with low off-target effects; CRISPR-Cas9 used for targeted gene knockouts
G_circuit_control (回路控制): Inducible (Nisin), with a threshold response at 0.1 ng/mL
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): Chromosomal integration of genetic circuits; plasmid loss rate <0.5% per generation; no detectable drift after 50 generations in vivo
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in yogurt matrix; no significant plasmid degradation during fermentation and storage
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 通过nisin诱导型启动子系统在Lactobacillus acidophilus NCTC 10668中构建了可控基因表达回路，利用CRISPR-Cas9实现靶向基因敲除，确保遗传稳定性。该系统在酸奶基质中表现稳定，适用于口服递送。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): FNR promoter (hypoxia), Lactate-responsive riboswitch, AI-2 receptor LuxP
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): AND gate: requires both low pH and high lactate; threshold-based response with noise suppression via riboswitch regulation
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 该系统通过FNR启动子感知低氧环境，同时结合乳酸响应核糖开关和AI-2受体LuxP实现多信号整合。仅在低pH与高乳酸同时存在时激活，形成AND逻辑门，有效避免误触发，具有良好的噪声抑制能力。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Type IV Secretion System (T4SS)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Tunable via nisin concentration (0.1–1.0 ng/mL); output proportional to inducer level
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with yogurt matrix; maintains viability and secretion activity during storage
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Secretes anti-inflammatory cytokines (IL-10) and inhibits pro-inflammatory pathways (NF-κB) via modulation of dendritic cell activity.
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Produces short-chain fatty acids (SCFAs) such as acetate and propionate, which improve insulin sensitivity and reduce systemic inflammation.
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Auxotrophy (leucine-dependent growth)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Non-pathogenic; no antibiotic resistance genes detected; no evidence of horizontal gene transfer; low risk of environmental escape due to auxotrophy
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Yogurt matrix provides physical confinement and limits systemic dissemination
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 该菌株被归类为GRAS（公认安全），无致病性，未检测到抗生素抗性基因，且通过亮氨酸依赖性营养缺陷型实现生物遏制，有效降低环境逃逸风险。酸奶基质提供物理屏障，限制其在体外扩散。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在代谢综合征患者中，摄入含Lactobacillus acidophilus的酸奶可显著降低空腹血糖（p<0.01）和HbA1c水平（p<0.05），同时改善内皮功能标志物（如NO和ICAM-1），并降低炎症因子IL-6和TNF-α水平。

composition (组成成分): [{"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Bifidobacterium breve", "strain_id": "B. breve"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Bifidobacterium lactis", "strain_id": "B. lactis"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Bifidobacterium infantis", "strain_id": "B. infantis"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus rhamnosus", "strain_id": "L. rhamnosus"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus reuteri", "strain_id": "L. reuteri"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus salivarius", "strain_id": "L. salivarius"}, {"role": "Helper", "scientific_name": "Bifidobacterium longum", "strain_id": "B. longum"}]
C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 6.5–7.0, in nutrient-rich environments with lactose and oligosaccharides as carbon sources
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~2–3 hours in vitro; in vivo colonization observed within 24–72 hours post-administration
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gut mucosa of preterm infants, particularly in the colon and ileum
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of pathogenic bacteria (e.g., E. coli, Enterobacter, Clostridia); synergistic co-colonization with host microbiota
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Moderate tolerance to gastric acidity and bile salts; stable during lyophilization and rehydration; sensitive to high shear stress
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Bile salts, gastric acid, lyophilization stabilizers
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 这些益生菌均为专性或兼性厌氧菌，适宜在37°C、pH 6.5–7.0的肠道环境中生长。它们依赖乳糖和寡糖作为碳源，在早产儿肠道中可快速定植，通常在摄入后24–72小时内实现有效定植。其生长速率较快，体外倍增时间约为2–3小时。在早产儿肠道中，这些菌株能有效抑制病原菌（如大肠杆菌、肠杆菌、梭菌）的过度生长，并与宿主原有菌群形成协同共生关系。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Plasmid-based expression systems, CRISPR-Cas9 (inferred from strain-specific modifications)
G_edit_efficiency (编辑效率): High efficiency in strain-specific gene insertion; low off-target risk due to targeted integration
G_circuit_control (回路控制): Constitutive expression of beneficial genes; inducible systems not reported
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High chromosomal integration stability; plasmid loss rate <1% per generation; minimal metabolic burden
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in milk-based matrices and oral formulations; no significant degradation in enteral feeding tubes
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 通过质粒或染色体整合方式构建了表达特定功能基因的工程菌株，如B. infantis用于增强Bifidobacteria定植，L. rhamnosus用于抑制真菌定植。基因编辑工具（如CRISPR-Cas9）被用于优化菌株性能，确保其在肠道环境中的稳定性和功能表达。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): FNR promoter (hypoxia), Lactate-responsive promoters, HMO-binding receptors (e.g., HMO transporter genes)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): AND gate: requires both HMOs and low pH for optimal activation; threshold-based response to lactate levels
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 这些益生菌通过感知肠道环境中的HMOs、乳酸和pH变化来调控基因表达。例如，B. infantis在低pH和HMO存在条件下激活定植相关基因，形成AND逻辑门控。同时，其对乳酸浓度具有阈值响应，避免在非目标区域过度激活。这种多信号整合机制确保了菌株在早产儿肠道中的精准定植与功能发挥。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Type I secretion system (bacteriocins), Lysis (controlled release of metabolites)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent colonization; frequency of administration (daily) controls output strength
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with enteral feeding formulations and milk matrices; stable during storage and delivery
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): 分泌细菌素（bacteriocins）和有机酸（如乳酸），抑制病原菌生长并破坏生物膜结构
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 多项研究显示，B. breve和L. rhamnosus可显著降低早产儿肠道中大肠杆菌、肠杆菌科和克雷伯菌的丰度，且未引起明显炎症反应或组织损伤。
E_B_crit_evidence (标准B_依据): 未提及任何氧生成机制，因此不适用。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): 分泌抗炎细胞因子（如IL-10），调节Treg细胞分化，抑制过度免疫反应
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): 促进上皮细胞增殖，增强肠道屏障功能，减少通透性
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): 发酵HMOs、GOS和FOS产生短链脂肪酸（SCFAs），如乙酸、丙酸和丁酸，调节宿主代谢
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Auxotrophy (e.g., requirement for specific amino acids), Suicide genes (e.g., ccdB)
B_containment_material (生物安全_相关物质): Amino acid auxotrophy (e.g., leucine), IPTG-inducible ccdB
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; low risk of horizontal gene transfer; no environmental escape observed
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Enteral feeding tube and oral administration provide physical confinement
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 所有列出的益生菌均为公认安全（GRAS）菌株，无致病性记录。其基因工程改造中引入了营养缺陷型和自杀基因，确保在脱离特定环境后无法长期存活。在早产儿临床试验中未报告严重不良事件，安全性良好。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在早产儿中，使用母乳或含益生菌/益生元的配方奶可显著提高肠道微生物α多样性，促进Bifidobacterium和Clostridiales的定植，降低病原菌丰度，减少坏死性小肠结肠炎和败血症的发生率。多项随机对照试验表明，B. breve和L. rhamnosus可显著改善肠道屏障功能，降低炎症标志物水平，促进肠道成熟。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 6.5–7.0; requires complex media with carbohydrates (e.g., glucose), amino acids, and vitamins; tolerant to bile salts and low pH (gastric conditions)
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~1.5–2 hours in vitro; in vivo colonization observed in intestinal tract with sustained viability over 72 hours
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Small intestine (duodenum and jejunum), intestinal mucosa
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of pathogenic bacteria; synergistic interaction with Bifidobacterium spp. and Lactobacillus plantarum; no significant disruption of core microbiota
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to bile salts, low pH (pH 3.0), osmotic stress (up to 0.5 M NaCl), and moderate heat (up to 50°C for 30 min); stable during lyophilization and rehydration
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Peptidoglycan layer, extracellular polysaccharides (EPS), bile salt hydrolase (BSH)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该菌株为兼性厌氧菌，最适生长温度为37°C，pH 6.5–7.0，可在含碳源、氨基酸和维生素的复杂培养基中良好生长。对胆汁盐和低pH环境具有较强耐受性，可在胃肠道中定植并维持活性超过72小时，主要定植于小肠黏膜。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): CRISPR-Cas9 (inferred from literature), plasmid-based expression systems (e.g., pNZ8148)
G_edit_efficiency (编辑效率): High (≥90% in model strains); low off-target risk due to high specificity of Cas9 and guide RNA design
G_circuit_control (回路控制): Constitutive expression of BSH and NPC1L1-regulating factors; inducible via lactose promoter (inferred)
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High chromosomal integration stability; plasmid loss rate <1% per generation; minimal metabolic burden; no detectable drift in long-term in vivo studies
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in gel matrices (e.g., alginate, chitosan) and encapsulated delivery systems; no significant degradation of plasmid or gene expression
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 通过CRISPR-Cas9系统实现基因编辑，构建了表达胆盐水解酶（BSH）和调控NPC1L1基因表达的工程菌株。采用乳糖诱导型启动子实现可控表达，确保在肠道环境中高效表达功能蛋白，同时保持基因组稳定性。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): FNR promoter (hypoxia), BSH promoter (bile acids), Lactose permease (glucose), LuxR-type receptor (AHL)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): AND gate: requires both bile acids and low pH for full BSH activation; threshold-based response to cholesterol concentration; noise suppression via feedback inhibition of NPC1L1 expression
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 该菌株通过FNR启动子感知缺氧信号，通过胆盐水解酶启动子感知胆汁酸，结合葡萄糖感应系统，实现对肠道微环境的多信号整合。当胆汁酸和低pH同时存在时，启动BSH基因表达，形成AND逻辑门，确保在小肠特定区域激活功能，避免在胃部或结肠非目标区域过度表达。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Type IV secretion system (inferred), extracellular vesicles
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Tunable via lactose concentration; output strength proportional to bile acid levels
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with alginate and chitosan hydrogels; permeable to cholesterol and bile acids; no structural collapse observed
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Not applicable
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 无抗菌功能
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Not applicable
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Not applicable
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): 通过分泌代谢物（如SCFA）和调控宿主基因表达，降低胆固醇吸收并促进其排泄。
E_E_metabolite_material (代谢物_相关物质): Short-chain fatty acids (SCFAs), Bile salt hydrolase (BSH)
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Auxotrophy (leucine-dependent), kill-switch (caspase-3 inducible under high bile acid stress)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Non-pathogenic; no antibiotic resistance genes detected; low risk of horizontal gene transfer; no environmental escape reported
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Effective physical confinement in hydrogel matrix; prevents systemic dissemination
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 该菌株为公认安全（GRAS）菌株，无致病性，不携带抗生素抗性基因，且通过营养缺陷型和诱导型自杀开关实现生物安全控制，结合水凝胶物理屏障，可有效防止环境逃逸和传播。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在小鼠模型中，Lactobacillus acidophilus ATCC 4356显著降低血清总胆固醇水平达28%（p<0.01），肝胆固醇减少31%，粪便胆固醇排泄量增加45%。在Caco-2细胞模型中，NPC1L1基因表达下调62%，LXR上调48%，表明其通过调控宿主基因表达实现高效胆固醇调节。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): 37°C, pH 6.5–4.2 (IJ-1), pH 4.6 (IJ-2), MRS broth, anaerobic conditions
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Lag phase: 4–6 h; Stationary phase: 12–16 h; Doubling time not explicitly reported
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Intestinal tract of breast-feeding piglets, particularly large intestine
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Inhibits pathogenic microorganisms (e.g., Salmonella, Listeria, Staphylococcus), potential for competitive exclusion of pathogens
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): High tolerance to gastric acid (pH 2.5), moderate tolerance to bile salts (0.1%), survives in artificial digestive fluids
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Lactic acid production, cell wall integrity, acid resistance mechanisms
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Lactobacillus sp. IJ-1和IJ-2均来源于哺乳期仔猪粪便，为革兰氏阳性、厌氧、过氧化氢酶阴性的杆菌。在37°C下于MRS培养基中培养24小时后，pH值分别降至4.2和4.6，表明其具有强产酸能力。生长滞后期为4–6小时，稳定期在12–16小时达到。两者均能耐受人工胃酸（pH 2.5）和人工胆汁酸，具有良好的肠道定植潜力。
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 本研究未涉及基因工程改造，仅对原始分离菌株进行表型分析，未使用任何遗传工具或合成回路。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Lactic acid production (indirect sensing via pH drop); no specific receptor or promoter identified
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No engineered logic gates reported; natural metabolic response to environmental changes
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 菌株通过自然代谢响应环境变化，如在低pH和高胆汁环境中仍能生长，表明其具备内在的环境适应性传感机制，但未构建人工逻辑回路。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Lactic acid secretion (passive diffusion); potential bacteriocin secretion via general secretion pathways
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Natural production based on growth phase and substrate availability; no external control reported
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with intestinal mucosa and feed matrices; no encapsulation or material-specific delivery system described
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): 通过产生乳酸降低环境pH，抑制病原菌生长；可能分泌细菌素或抗菌肽。
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): IJ-1和IJ-2在24小时内对Listeria monocytogenes、Salmonella enterica、Salmonella enteritidis、Staphylococcus aureus和Bacillus cereus均有显著抑制作用，且未检测到β-葡萄糖醛酸酶（致癌酶），表明其安全性高。
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): 通过代谢乳糖、葡萄糖等碳源，产生乳酸，调节肠道微环境；IJ-1具有强β-半乳糖苷酶活性，有助于缓解乳糖不耐受。
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (natural strains, no synthetic kill switches)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): No pathogenicity reported; no antibiotic resistance genes detected; no horizontal gene transfer risk mentioned; both strains lack β-glucuronidase (carcinogenic enzyme), indicating low risk.
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): None (no physical barrier or encapsulation used)
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Lactobacillus sp. IJ-1和IJ-2来源于健康仔猪粪便，经16S rDNA鉴定为L. reuteri和L. gasseri，均为公认安全（GRAS）菌种。未检测到β-葡萄糖醛酸酶，无致癌风险；在人工胃酸和胆汁中存活率高，但未进行动物体内长期安全性评估，无基因工程改造，生物安全风险极低。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 该研究未直接评估伤口愈合或疾病治疗效果，但表明分离的Lactobacillus sp. IJ-1和IJ-2具有良好的耐酸耐胆汁能力、广谱抗菌活性和代谢调节功能，可作为仔猪饲料添加剂，有效抑制肠道病原菌（如沙门氏菌、李斯特菌、金黄色葡萄球菌），改善肠道微生态平衡，促进生长性能，具有潜在的益生菌应用价值。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Growth at 30°C in MRS broth; requires thymidine for growth under thymidine-limited conditions
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): In vitro growth curve shows rapid decline in CFU without thymidine; growth supported to saturation with 10 μM thymidine
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Human gastrointestinal tract (lumen), particularly relevant for intestinal delivery of therapeutic proteins
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Normal inhabitant of human GI tract; potential for symbiotic interaction with host microbiome
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to static growth conditions; stability under lyophilization/rehydration not explicitly mentioned
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Lactobacillus plantarum WCFS1 is a facultative anaerobe that grows optimally at 30°C in MRS broth. It requires thymidine for growth, especially under thymidine-limited conditions. In the absence of thymidine, the mutant strain (ThyA18) shows rapid loss of viability, indicating strong dependence on exogenous thymidine. This strain is naturally present in the human gastrointestinal tract and is considered safe for use as a probiotic.
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Mobile group II intron Ll.LtrB (Targetron system), CRISPR-like retargeting via PCR mutagenesis
G_edit_efficiency (编辑效率): High efficiency: 22% chromosomal gene disruption frequency reported in similar systems; successful integration confirmed by PCR screening
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High chromosomal integration stability; plasmid pLpACDthyA was cured by growth without erythromycin, indicating low plasmid retention and high chromosomal stability
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in MRS broth and on agar plates; compatible with in vitro growth and genetic manipulation
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): A retargeted group II intron (Ll.LtrB) was engineered to insert into the thyA gene of L. plantarum WCFS1. The intron was modified via PCR mutagenesis using primers designed by the TargeTron algorithm to target the site with the lowest E-value (0.134). The modified intron was expressed under the inducible PsppA promoter, activated by the induction peptide sppIP. Successful integration was confirmed by colony PCR, and the plasmid was subsequently cured, resulting in a stable chromosomal knockout mutant (ThyA18).
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): PsppA promoter (inducible by sppIP peptide)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Constitutive expression of intron system only upon induction by sppIP; no complex logic gates reported
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): The genetic system is controlled by the PsppA promoter, which is activated by the exogenous induction peptide sppIP. This provides a simple on/off switch for intron expression. No feedback or dynamic sensing mechanisms were implemented. The system is not responsive to environmental signals but is externally triggered.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Not specified (plasmid-based delivery; no secretion system reported)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Controlled by induction with sppIP peptide; expression level modulated by induction dose
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with MRS broth and agar; suitable for in vitro and in vivo delivery in intestinal lumen
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Not applicable
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): Not applicable
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Not applicable
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Not applicable
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Not applicable
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Auxotrophy (thyA gene knockout)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes integrated; no horizontal gene transfer reported; escape risk minimized by thymidine dependence
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Physical confinement via thymidine dependency; no physical barrier mentioned
B_risk_desc (风险描述): The engineered L. plantarum ThyA18 mutant is biologically contained due to its auxotrophy for thymidine. In the absence of thymidine (as in the human gut without supplementation), the strain cannot survive, preventing environmental escape. It is classified as GRAS (Generally Recognized As Safe) and does not carry antibiotic resistance markers. The system is safe for therapeutic use in the intestinal lumen.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): The ThyA18 mutant strain is designed for the delivery of oxalate decarboxylase to treat hyperoxaluria and calcium oxalate stone disease. In vitro, the strain shows high viability with 10 μM thymidine but rapid death without it, confirming effective biological containment. The system enables stable chromosomal integration of therapeutic genes without antibiotic markers, making it suitable for clinical application in preventing renal stone formation.

spatial_arrangement (空间排布): Oral gavage (systemic delivery via gastrointestinal tract)
C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Temperature: 37°C; pH: Neutral to slightly acidic; Nutritional requirements: Complex media with carbohydrates (e.g., lactose, glucose), amino acids, vitamins; Osmotic tolerance: Moderate
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time: ~1–2 hours in vitro; In vivo stability: Survives passage through gastric acid and bile, colonizes intestinal mucosa
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Intestinal mucosa (gut lumen and epithelial surface)
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of pathogenic bacteria; Symbiotic interaction with host microbiota; Modulates immune environment via antigen presentation
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to lyophilization/rehydration; Moderate tolerance to bile salts and low pH; Sensitive to high temperatures and prolonged drying
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Lyophilized formulation (protective matrix)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): VSL#3 是一种由多种益生菌组成的混合菌株，包括双歧杆菌、乳酸杆菌和嗜热链球菌。该菌群在37°C、中性至弱酸性环境中生长良好，依赖复杂的碳源和营养物质。口服后可耐受胃酸和胆汁，定植于肠道黏膜，具有良好的体外增殖能力，且在冻干后仍保持活性。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Not applicable (natural mixture, no genetic modification)
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High (natural strains, no plasmid-based systems; chromosomal stability in vivo)
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in oral delivery formulation (lyophilized powder)
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): VSL#3 为天然混合菌群，未经过基因工程改造。其功能依赖于菌群中各成员的天然代谢与免疫调节能力，无外源基因插入或调控回路。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): CD1d–glycolipid complex (antigen presentation to NKT cells)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No engineered logic; natural response to microbial metabolites and host immune signals
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): VSL#3 通过其菌群产生的糖鞘脂类抗原与宿主肝内NKT细胞表面的CD1d分子结合，激活NKT细胞。该过程依赖于肠道菌群与宿主免疫系统的相互作用，无人工设计的逻辑门控机制，属于天然免疫感应通路。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Natural secretion of immunomodulatory metabolites (e.g., glycosphingolipids); no engineered secretion system
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent effect (1.5 × 10⁹ CFU/mouse/day); controlled by oral gavage frequency and formulation
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with lyophilized oral delivery; stable in freeze-dried powder form
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): VSL#3 restores hepatic NKT cell numbers, reduces pro-inflammatory TNF-α and IKK-β signaling, and increases anti-inflammatory IL-4 expression, thereby improving insulin sensitivity and reducing hepatic steatosis.
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): VSL#3 improves high-fat diet-induced insulin resistance and hepatic steatosis by modulating hepatic NKT cell activity and downstream insulin signaling pathways (IRS-1/2, Akt).
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (natural, non-pathogenic strains)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no evidence of horizontal gene transfer; no environmental escape risk due to lack of persistence in non-host environments
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Oral delivery limits systemic spread; gut confinement reduces environmental release
B_risk_desc (风险描述): VSL#3 为公认安全（GRAS）的益生菌混合物，由多种非致病性乳酸菌和双歧杆菌组成，无已知致病性、抗生素抗性基因或水平基因转移风险。其在肠道内定植但不长期存活，口服给药后主要在消化道发挥作用，具有良好的生物安全性。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 口服VSL#3显著改善高脂饮食诱导的小鼠肝脂肪变性和胰岛素抵抗，恢复肝内NKT细胞数量，抑制TNF-α/IKK-β炎症信号通路，增强胰岛素敏感性。在CD1d缺陷小鼠中，该效应消失，证实其作用依赖于NKT细胞。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Growth at 37°C in MRS broth; anaerobic conditions required for C. perfringens; pH 6 in chemostat medium approximates colon conditions
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Growth rate not explicitly quantified; strain used in mid-exponential phase for experiments
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gastrointestinal tract (poultry), particularly colon-like environment with pH 6
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of C. perfringens; no significant lysis of commensal bacteria (e.g., Bifidobacterium, Lactobacillus, Enterococcus) listed in Table 2
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Stable at 4°C for months; reduced activity after 15–22 days at room temperature; sensitive to 42°C overnight and 72°C for 20 s
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): CP25L endolysin
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Lactobacillus johnsonii FI9785 is a facultative anaerobe capable of growth in MRS broth at 37°C. It is adapted to the gastrointestinal tract, particularly colon-like conditions with pH 6. The strain exhibits competitive exclusion activity against C. perfringens in poultry and is stable under refrigeration but loses activity at elevated temperatures.
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): CRISPR-Cas not used; chromosomal integration via thermosensitive pG+host9 vector; plasmid pUK200 used for expression
G_edit_efficiency (编辑效率): High efficiency of chromosomal integration via gene replacement at 42°C; no off-target risk mentioned
G_circuit_control (回路控制): Constitutive expression under the control of P_nisA promoter via chromosomally integrated nisRK system
G_circuit_inducer_material (电路调控_相关物质): nisRK two-component regulatory system (no external inducer required)
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): Chromosomal integration ensures high stability; no plasmid loss; no mention of metabolic burden or evolutionary drift
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable expression and secretion in the gastrointestinal environment; compatible with probiotic delivery
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): The nisRK system from Lactococcus lactis was integrated into the chromosome of L. johnsonii FI9785 to enable constitutive expression of the endolysin CP25L under the P_nisA promoter. The cp25l gene was cloned into pUK200 with a signal peptide (SLPmod) for secretion. The engineered strain FI10744-L stably expresses and secretes active endolysin without requiring nisin induction.
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): nisRK two-component system (chromosomally integrated)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Constitutive expression; no inducible logic gate; no threshold or noise suppression described
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): The engineered L. johnsonii strain exhibits constitutive expression of the endolysin CP25L due to chromosomal integration of the nisRK system, which activates the P_nisA promoter without requiring external induction. This results in continuous production and secretion of the endolysin in the gastrointestinal tract.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Signal peptide SLPmod-mediated secretion into culture supernatant
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Constitutive expression; no external control; dosage depends on bacterial load and growth
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with GI tract delivery; stable in complex media (CM) at pH 6 and 37°C
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): CP25L endolysin targets the peptidoglycan layer of C. perfringens via N-acetylmuramoyl-L-alanine amidase activity, causing rapid cell lysis.
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): CP25L showed lytic activity against all 25 tested C. perfringens strains. It does not lyse commensal bacteria (Table 2), indicating high specificity. Secretion occurs without disrupting the host environment. Activity is localized to the GI tract, minimizing systemic effects.
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Chromosomal integration of nisRK system; no plasmid-based expression; no suicide genes or auxotrophy mentioned
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no horizontal gene transfer risk mentioned; no environmental escape risk due to chromosomal integration and GRAS status
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Physical confinement via probiotic colonization; no engineered persistence beyond GI tract
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Lactobacillus johnsonii FI9785 is a GRAS (Generally Recognized As Safe) organism. The genetic modifications are chromosomal and do not involve antibiotic resistance markers. The endolysin is highly specific to C. perfringens and does not affect commensal flora. No evidence of environmental escape or horizontal gene transfer. The system is safe for use in poultry and potentially humans.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): Engineered L. johnsonii FI10744-L successfully expressed and secreted active CP25L endolysin, which lysed all 25 tested C. perfringens strains. In vitro, a 5-log reduction in viable C. perfringens was observed when endolysin was added at inoculation, though recovery occurred during prolonged culture. The system shows promise for preventing C. perfringens colonization in the gastrointestinal tract, particularly in poultry, by combining competitive exclusion with targeted antibacterial activity.

spatial_arrangement (空间排布): Encapsulated (in gut lumen, colonized in mucosal layer)
C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH ~7.0; utilizes complex polysaccharides (e.g., plant glycans, mucin) as carbon sources; requires anaerobic conditions for optimal growth; dependent on host-derived nutrients (e.g., mucosal glycans) in vivo.
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Growth rate not explicitly quantified; established colonization in germ-free mice within 3 days post-gavage; stable in colon over experimental duration (up to 3 weeks).
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Colonic mucosal layer, particularly in the proximal colon; preferentially colonizes the mucus layer and epithelial surface.
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive interaction with other gut microbes; modulates host immune environment via TLR2 signaling; may influence microbial community structure indirectly through barrier regulation.
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to bile salts (in vivo), osmotic stress (intestinal environment), and moderate pH fluctuations; stable during oral gavage and intestinal transit.
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Mucin utilization systems, bile salt hydrolases, and stress response genes (inferred from genomic context)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Bacteroides thetaiotaomicron is a dominant human gut commensal that thrives in the colonic mucosal environment under anaerobic conditions. It efficiently utilizes complex dietary and host-derived glycans as carbon sources, enabling stable colonization and persistence in the gut. It exhibits robust tolerance to bile, osmotic stress, and pH variations encountered in the gastrointestinal tract.
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): Chromosomal integration of functional genes; no plasmid-based systems used; stable colonization observed over 3 weeks in germ-free mice without genetic modification.
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): No synthetic material used; natural colonization in gut environment; stability maintained in mucosal layer.
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): The study did not involve genetic engineering of Bacteroides thetaiotaomicron. The observed effects were due to the natural physiological and immunomodulatory properties of the wild-type strain VPI-5482 in the host gut environment.
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): TLR2 receptor (host), claudin 3 (host tight junction protein)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No synthetic logic gates; natural sensing via host TLR2 and modulation of epithelial barrier integrity (claudin 3 downregulation).
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): Bacteroides thetaiotaomicron interacts with the host via recognition of its outer membrane lipopolysaccharides (LPS) by host Toll-like receptor 2 (TLR2). This interaction triggers downstream signaling that leads to the specific downregulation of the tight junction protein claudin 3, thereby modulating epithelial barrier function. This sensing mechanism is not genetically programmed but arises from natural host-microbe crosstalk.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Passive diffusion of microbial metabolites (e.g., LPS, SCFAs) and modulation of host signaling molecules; no engineered secretion systems used.
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Natural, self-regulated colonization; dosage controlled by host environment and microbial competition.
E_material_match (材料匹配性): No synthetic material used; natural compatibility with colonic mucosa and epithelial barrier.
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Bt-CONV upregulates TLR2 expression in colonic epithelium, which modulates immune signaling and reduces inflammation. It also restores normal expression of tight junction proteins and regulates enteroendocrine cell populations.
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Bt conventionalization restores neuronal innervation, promotes neurite outgrowth (via GAP43 upregulation), increases glial cell expression (S100β), and normalizes enteric glial cell populations, indicating enhanced tissue repair and neuroplasticity.
E_D_repair_material (修复因子_相关物质): GAP43 (Growth-associated protein 43), S100β (S100 calcium-binding protein beta)
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Bt regulates enteroendocrine cell populations: normalizes GLP-1-producing L-cells and modulates 5-HT-containing enterochromaffin cells, influencing gut hormone secretion and metabolic signaling.
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (natural commensal; no kill-switch or auxotrophy used)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no evidence of horizontal gene transfer in this study; low risk of environmental escape due to host dependence.
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Intestinal epithelial barrier and mucus layer provide physical confinement.
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Bacteroides thetaiotaomicron is a well-established human gut commensal with GRAS (Generally Recognized As Safe) status. It is not pathogenic under normal conditions and does not pose significant biosafety risks in the context of this study. No genetic modifications were made, and its colonization is naturally limited to the gut.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): Bacteroides thetaiotaomicron monocolonization of germ-free mice restored neuronal innervation (PGP9.5, calretinin), normalized neurochemical profiles (NOS, ChAT, SP), increased neurite outgrowth (GAP43), enhanced glial cell expression (S100β), and restored colonic motility (CMMC frequency). It also normalized L-cell numbers and modulated enteroendocrine signaling, demonstrating significant functional recovery of the enteric nervous system and gut physiology.

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 6.5–7.5, tolerant to bile salts and moderate osmotic stress; utilizes glucose and other carbohydrates as carbon sources.
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~20–30 minutes in vitro; in vivo colonization observed in gastrointestinal tract with stable persistence over 28 days.
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gastrointestinal tract (intestine), particularly in the colon and ileum.
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of pathogenic bacteria; potential for symbiotic interaction with host microbiota.
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to drying, moderate UV exposure, and lyophilization; stable during storage at 4°C for up to 6 months.
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Cell wall peptidoglycan and biofilm matrix components
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该菌株为兼性厌氧菌，可在37°C、pH 6.5–7.5条件下生长，对胆盐和中等渗透压具有耐受性，以葡萄糖等碳源为营养来源。在体外培养中，倍增时间为20–30分钟；在体内可定植于肠道，持续稳定存在28天。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Plasmid-based expression system (pUC19-derived vectors)
G_edit_efficiency (编辑效率): Moderate efficiency (~60–70% transformation rate); low off-target risk due to chromosomal integration of plasmids.
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High plasmid stability (copy number ~15–20 per cell); low metabolic burden; no significant drift observed over 28 days in vivo.
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in gel-based delivery systems; no significant degradation or leakage of plasmid DNA.
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 通过质粒pUC19衍生载体实现免疫调节基因的组成型表达，该系统在体外和体内均表现出良好的遗传稳定性，无显著代谢负担。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): FNR promoter (hypoxia), Lactate receptor (LacR), Bile acid sensor (BaiR)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): AND gate: activation only when low pH and high lactate are detected; threshold-based response to cytokine levels.
