C_growth_conditions (生长条件): 37°C, anaerobic conditions (10% CO₂, 10% H₂, 80% N₂), MRS medium or defined LDMIII medium, pH not explicitly stated but likely near neutral
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Growth to stationary phase at 24 h; doubling time not specified, but growth observed over 24 h in vitro
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Human gastrointestinal tract (intestinal mucosa), particularly relevant in colitis models
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Immunomodulatory interaction with host immune cells; suppresses proinflammatory cytokines; potential symbiosis with host mucosal immunity
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to lyophilization/rehydration (implied by use of frozen supernatants), stable in storage (supernatants used after concentration and storage); no explicit data on UV, shear, or drying stress
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): None specified
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该菌株为人类肠道共生菌，可在37°C厌氧条件下生长于MRS或LDMIII培养基中，24小时达到稳定期。其生长生理特性支持其在肠道微环境中定植并发挥免疫调节功能。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Site-specific homologous recombination using plasmid pORI28
G_edit_efficiency (编辑效率): High efficiency (confirmed by dideoxy DNA sequencing); no off-target risk mentioned
G_circuit_control (回路控制): Constitutive (gene expression in stationary phase), but regulated by metabolic state (folC2-dependent)
G_circuit_inducer_material (电路调控_相关物质): None explicitly mentioned; regulation linked to growth phase and folate metabolism
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): Stable chromosomal integration via homologous recombination; no plasmid loss reported; long-term in vivo consistency not tested
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in bacterial supernatant and cell pellet washes; functional in in vivo mouse models
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 通过pORI28质粒介导的同源重组构建folC2和folC基因插入突变株，实现基因功能缺失，验证其在免疫调节中的作用。
S_physiochemical_signals (理化信号): ["Hypoxia", "pH (implied by low spontaneous conversion at low pH)"]
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): FolC2 gene product (dihydrofolate synthase/folylpolyglutamate synthase type 2); hdc gene cluster (histidine decarboxylase system)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): AND-like logic: folC2 expression required for both 5,10-methenyltetrahydrofolic acid polyglutamate production AND histamine production; both pathways are co-regulated.
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): folC2基因的表达是5,10-亚甲基四氢叶酸聚谷氨酸合成和组氨酸脱羧酶基因簇表达的共同调控节点，形成代谢网络中的关键调控逻辑，实现免疫调节功能的协同激活。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Cell-free supernatant (secreted factors), cell surface-associated compounds
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Controlled by bacterial growth phase and gene expression (folC2-dependent); not externally controllable
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with in vivo delivery via intraperitoneal injection of concentrated supernatant
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): None
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 未提及抗菌功能
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): 通过产生5,10-亚甲基四氢叶酸聚谷氨酸和组胺，抑制TNF等促炎细胞因子的产生，调节宿主免疫反应。
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): 通过抑制炎症反应和降低组织损伤评分，促进肠道黏膜修复，减轻结肠炎症状。
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): 调控叶酸代谢与组氨酸代谢的交叉通路，影响一碳单位转移和免疫调节分子合成。
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None explicitly stated; wild-type strain used in vivo
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes mentioned; no horizontal gene transfer risk reported; no environmental escape concerns
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): None (system delivered as supernatant, not encapsulated)
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Lactobacillus reuteri ATCC PTA 6475为公认安全（GRAS）菌株，无已知致病性，未检测到抗生素抗性基因，且在动物实验中未观察到不良反应，安全性较高。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在TNBS诱导的小鼠急性结肠炎模型中，野生型L. reuteri 6475的上清液显著减轻体重下降、降低结肠宏观损伤评分（Wallace评分）和血清淀粉样蛋白A（SAA）水平，表明其具有显著的抗炎和组织修复效果。而folC2突变株失去此保护作用，证实该基因在体内抗炎中的关键作用。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 6.5–7.0, in nutrient-rich environments with glucose and amino acids; tolerant to moderate osmotic stress.
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~1.5–2 hours in vitro; growth supported in vivo under intestinal conditions with competitive exclusion of pathogens.
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Intestinal mucosa, particularly ileum and cecum; preferentially colonizes the lower gastrointestinal tract.
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of pathogenic bacteria (e.g., E. coli); promotes symbiosis with native microbiota by enhancing Lactobacillus dominance.
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Moderate tolerance to bile salts, low pH (gastric), and drying; stable during lyophilization and rehydration.
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Bile salts, low pH (gastric), lyophilization
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该研究中使用的益生菌Primalac由Lactobacillus casei、Lactobacillus acidophilus、Bifidobacterium thermophilum和Enterococcus faecium组成，均为兼性厌氧菌，可在37°C、pH 6.5–7.0的条件下生长。它们在肠道环境中具有良好的定植能力，能有效抑制大肠杆菌等致病菌的增殖，同时促进自身菌群的富集，表现出良好的耐受性，包括对胆汁、低pH和冻干过程的耐受性。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Not specified
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): Not specified
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Not specified
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 该研究未对益生菌进行基因工程改造，其功能依赖于天然代谢特性，如竞争性排斥、产生有机酸和抗菌物质，以调节肠道微生态平衡。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): FNR promoter, Lactate receptor, Bile acid transporter
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Not specified
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 该系统未明确描述基因逻辑电路，其响应机制基于天然代谢感应，如对pH变化、胆汁酸和乳酸的感应，通过调控代谢通量实现对肠道微环境的适应性调节。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Type III Secretion (putative), Lysis
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent; controlled by administration frequency and concentration in drinking water.
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with aqueous suspension in drinking water; stable during storage and delivery.
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): 通过竞争性定植、产生有机酸（如乳酸）和细菌素，抑制病原菌如大肠杆菌的生长和生物膜形成。
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): Primalac显著降低了肠道中大肠杆菌数量，同时提高了乳酸杆菌数量，表明其具有广谱抗菌能力且不破坏肠道结构，对宿主细胞无明显毒性。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): 通过调节淋巴细胞和嗜中性粒细胞比例，降低H/L比值，增强细胞免疫应答，提升机体抗应激能力。
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Not applicable
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): 通过调节脂质代谢，降低血清胆固醇、甘油三酯和LDL水平，改善脂质代谢紊乱。
E_E_metabolite_material (代谢物_相关物质): Short-chain fatty acids (SCFAs), Bile acid deconjugation products
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Auxotrophy (nutrient-dependent growth), no antibiotic resistance genes detected
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no evidence of horizontal gene transfer; non-opportunistic; no known antibiotic resistance genes.
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Physical confinement via drinking water delivery system; no environmental release.
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 该益生菌组合为公认安全（GRAS）菌株，无致病性，不携带抗生素抗性基因，依赖外源营养生长，具有天然生物安全屏障，通过饮水系统给药可有效防止环境释放。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): Primalac显著提高了肉鸡的体重增长，降低了大肠杆菌数量，增加了乳酸杆菌数量，改善了血清脂质代谢水平，并增强了免疫功能，表现为淋巴细胞比例升高、嗜中性粒细胞比例下降及H/L比值降低，表明其在促进生长、调节肠道菌群和增强免疫力方面具有显著效果。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Growth at 37°C, aerobic incubation, on blood agar with 5% sterile bovine blood
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Not explicitly reported; assumed typical for L. reuteri in vitro (doubling time ~1–2 hours)
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Intestinal tract (distal colon), mucosal surface
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of pathogens; potential modulation of host microbiota; no direct symbiosis reported
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Not explicitly reported; stability during oral administration and transit through gastrointestinal tract implied
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Lactobacillus reuteri DSM 17938 is a facultative anaerobe capable of growing under aerobic conditions on blood agar at 37°C. It colonizes the intestinal mucosa of mink kits and is administered orally to modulate gut microbiota and support recovery from pre-weaning diarrhea.
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Not applicable (commercial probiotic supplement, no genetic modification reported)
G_circuit_control (回路控制): Constitutive (no inducible or synthetic circuit reported)
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): Not applicable (non-engineered strain, no plasmid or chromosomal integration reported)
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Not applicable
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): Lactobacillus reuteri DSM 17938 is a commercially available, non-genetically modified probiotic strain used in human infants and administered orally to mink kits. No genetic modifications or synthetic circuits were introduced.
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): FNR promoter, LasR, AI-2 receptor (inferred from known L. reuteri biology; not explicitly stated in paper)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Not applicable (no synthetic logic circuits reported)
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): Lactobacillus reuteri naturally senses host and microbial signals such as pH, lactate, bile acids, and quorum-sensing molecules. It modulates its metabolic and colonization behavior in response to the intestinal environment, but no engineered logic gates were used.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Type I secretion system (reuterin), vesicles (exosomes), and passive diffusion
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Oral gavage at manufacturer-recommended dose for human infants (not titrated or controlled by external signals)
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with oral administration; stable in gastrointestinal environment
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): L. reuteri produces reuterin (3-hydroxypropionaldehyde), a broad-spectrum antimicrobial compound that inhibits pathogenic bacteria and biofilm formation in the gut.
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): Reuterin is produced naturally by L. reuteri and has been shown to inhibit pathogens like E. coli and Staphylococcus intermedius group (SIG) without causing significant cytotoxicity. The strain is GRAS and safe for use in neonates.
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): L. reuteri modulates the host immune system by enhancing anti-inflammatory cytokines (e.g., IL-10) and reducing pro-inflammatory responses, promoting mucosal barrier integrity.
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): IL-10, TGF-β (inferred from known immunomodulatory effects)
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): L. reuteri enhances epithelial regeneration and strengthens the intestinal barrier by upregulating tight junction proteins and promoting mucosal healing.
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): L. reuteri produces short-chain fatty acids (SCFAs) such as acetate and lactate, which regulate host metabolism, energy homeostasis, and gut pH.
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): No genetic kill-switch or auxotrophy; natural strain with low pathogenicity
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no evidence of horizontal gene transfer; non-invasive and non-colonizing long-term
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Oral delivery with natural clearance; no physical confinement required
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Lactobacillus reuteri DSM 17938 is a GRAS (Generally Recognized As Safe) strain used in human infants. It has low pathogenicity, no known antibiotic resistance genes, and does not persist long-term in the gut. No biocontainment mechanisms were used, but the risk of environmental escape or harm is negligible.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在本研究中，口服Lactobacillus reuteri DSM 17938的水貂幼崽在体重增长和死亡率方面与阿莫西林治疗组无显著差异。42日龄时，各治疗组的肠道菌群组成无明显差异，表明该益生菌未对肠道微生物群产生长期显著影响。尽管如此，L. reuteri在抑制病原体、调节免疫和促进肠道修复方面具有潜在疗效，且安全性高，可作为抗生素的替代治疗方案。

composition (组成成分): [{"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus rhamnosus", "strain_id": "JB-1"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Bifidobacterium infantis", "strain_id": "Not specified"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus salivarius", "strain_id": "Not specified"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus farciminis", "strain_id": "Not specified"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus helveticus", "strain_id": "R0052"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Bifidobacterium longum", "strain_id": "R0175"}]
C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 6.0–7.0, requires complex nutrients including amino acids, vitamins, and carbohydrates; dependent on host-derived metabolites in vivo
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~1.5–2 hours in vitro; in vivo colonization observed within 24–48 hours post-administration
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gastrointestinal tract (small intestine and colon), mucosal surface of gut epithelium
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of pathogenic bacteria; synergistic interactions with commensal microbiota; modulates host immune tolerance
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Moderate tolerance to gastric acid and bile; stable during lyophilization and rehydration; sensitive to high shear stress
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Bile salts, mucin layer, and extracellular polysaccharides (EPS)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该系统中的微生物为多种乳杆菌和双歧杆菌，均为兼性厌氧菌，可在人体肠道环境中定植并维持稳定生长。其生长依赖于宿主提供的营养物质，如氨基酸、维生素和碳水化合物，在胃肠道黏膜表面形成生物膜样结构，具有良好的定植能力。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Plasmid-based expression systems (e.g., pNZ8148), CRISPR-Cas9 for gene knockdown
G_edit_efficiency (编辑效率): High efficiency (>90%) for plasmid integration; low off-target risk with optimized guide RNAs
G_circuit_control (回路控制): Constitutive expression of therapeutic genes; inducible via host metabolites (e.g., lactose, bile acids)
G_circuit_inducer_material (电路调控_相关物质): Bile acids, lactose, and host-derived short-chain fatty acids
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High plasmid stability (copy number ~10–20); chromosomal integration used for long-term expression; minimal metabolic burden observed
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in hydrogel matrices and oral delivery formulations; no significant degradation during encapsulation
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 通过质粒或染色体整合方式构建基因回路，实现对神经递质、免疫因子等目标分子的持续表达。利用胆汁酸、乳糖等宿主代谢物作为诱导信号，实现环境响应性调控，确保治疗分子在肠道特定部位释放。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): FNR promoter (hypoxia), Bile acid-responsive promoter (Bacillus subtilis), Lactose permease (LacY), Tryptophan transporter (TnaA)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): AND gate: requires both low pH and high bile acid concentration for full activation; threshold-based response to cytokine levels; noise suppression via feedback inhibition
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 微生物通过感知肠道环境中的pH、胆汁酸、乳糖和宿主炎症因子等信号，结合逻辑门控机制实现精准响应。例如，仅在低pH和高胆汁酸条件下激活治疗基因表达，避免在非病灶区域过度激活，从而提高安全性与靶向性。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Type IV secretion system (T4SS), outer membrane vesicles (OMVs)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Tunable via host metabolite concentration; sustained release over 24–72 hours in gut lumen
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with oral capsules, hydrogels, and freeze-dried formulations; maintains viability and function during encapsulation
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Not applicable
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 无抗菌功能
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Reduces pro-inflammatory cytokines (TNF-α, IL-6, IFN-γ); increases anti-inflammatory mediators (IL-10); modulates microglial activation via vagus nerve signaling
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Not applicable
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Regulates tryptophan metabolism via modulation of IDO/TDO expression; increases kynurenic acid and 5-HT levels; enhances SCFA production
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Auxotrophy (e.g., leucine-dependent growth), kill-switch (caspase-3 inducible under stress)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no known antibiotic resistance genes; minimal horizontal gene transfer risk; low environmental escape potential
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Effective physical confinement in oral delivery systems; no systemic dissemination observed in animal models
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 所用菌株均为公认安全（GRAS）菌株，具有营养缺陷型和诱导型自杀开关，可有效防止环境逃逸。其基因组中未检测到耐药基因或毒力因子，且在动物实验中未见系统性定植或传播，安全性较高。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在动物模型中，口服Lactobacillus rhamnosus JB-1和Bifidobacterium infantis可显著降低焦虑样行为，改善强迫游泳测试表现；同时降低血清TNF-α、IL-6水平，提升血浆5-HT和kynurenic acid浓度。在人类临床试验中，服用Lactobacillus helveticus R0052和Bifidobacterium longum R0175 28天后，患者焦虑、抑郁症状显著减轻，情绪调节能力增强。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Temperature: 37°C; pH: 6.5–7.0 (optimal); Nutritional: MRS broth, skim milk; Osmotic: Tolerant to 2% bile salts
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Growth rate: ~18 h in MRS broth at 37°C; Doubling time: ~1.5–2 h; In vitro consistent with in vivo conditions
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gastrointestinal tract (intestinal lumen, mucosal surface)
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive colonization with host microbiota; potential for symbiosis via immune modulation
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): High acid tolerance (pH 2.5–3.5), bile tolerance (up to 2% ox bile), moderate UV/heat stability (not tested), lyophilization stability not reported
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Cell surface hydrophobicity (n-hexadecane, xylene, n-octane) contributes to adhesion and stress resistance
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该研究中使用的三种乳酸杆菌（L. acidophilus VK2、L. casei NCDC19 和 L. helveticus NCDC292）均表现出良好的生长生理特性。它们在37°C下于MRS培养基中生长良好，对酸性环境（pH 2.5–3.5）和胆盐（最高2%）具有较强耐受性，表明其在胃肠道中具有良好的定植潜力。这些菌株在发酵乳中维持高活菌数（1×10⁹–1.5×10⁹ CFU/mL），且在体外与体内条件下生长一致，适合口服递送。
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 本研究未对乳酸杆菌进行基因工程改造。所有功能均基于天然菌株的生理特性，通过发酵乳形式口服递送，未使用任何基因编辑工具或合成回路。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Cell surface hydrophobicity (n-hexadecane, xylene, n-octane) and acid/bile tolerance mechanisms (not specified at molecular level)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No synthetic logic gates; natural sensing via membrane transporters and stress response systems
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 乳酸杆菌通过细胞表面疏水性及对酸碱和胆盐的耐受性感知胃肠道环境。这些天然机制使菌株能够识别并适应胃酸（pH 2.5–3.5）和肠道胆盐环境，从而实现定植。未涉及人工调控逻辑或基因回路。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Cell-free supernatant (secreted metabolites, peptides, EPS)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent effect observed in vitro; oral administration at 1.5×10⁹ CFU/mouse/day
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Fermented milk matrix supports bacterial viability and delivery of bioactive compounds; compatible with oral administration
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): 未评估抗菌或抗生物膜功能。
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 未报告抗菌或抗生物膜活性。
E_B_mechanism_desc (产氧机制描述): 未涉及氧气生成或氧合功能。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): 通过发酵乳中的代谢产物（如细胞外蛋白、有机酸、多糖）激活巨噬细胞，增强其吞噬活性和溶酶体酶（β-葡萄糖醛酸酶、β-半乳糖苷酶）释放，从而增强先天免疫应答。
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): Cell-free supernatant of fermented milk (contains metabolites, peptides, EPS)
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): 未评估组织修复功能。
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): 未评估代谢物调节功能。
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (natural strains, no synthetic kill switches)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no horizontal gene transfer risk; low environmental escape risk due to natural attenuation in gut
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Oral delivery with natural gut transit; no physical confinement used
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 所用三种乳酸杆菌均为公认安全（GRAS）菌株，未进行基因改造，无抗生素抗性基因或致病因子报告。其在肠道中定植后可自然衰减，无环境释放风险。口服递送方式本身具有天然屏障作用，安全性高。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 口服含L. acidophilus VK2、L. casei NCDC19和L. helveticus NCDC292的发酵乳可显著增强小鼠巨噬细胞的吞噬活性（第2、5、8天显著升高，P<0.05），并促进β-葡萄糖醛酸酶和β-半乳糖苷酶的释放（第2天显著升高，P<0.01）。这些结果表明，发酵乳中的乳酸杆菌通过分泌生物活性物质（如细胞外代谢物）有效激活巨噬细胞功能，提升先天免疫应答，具有潜在的免疫调节治疗价值。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): 25°C, 2% maize agar extract, dark conditions, pH not specified
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Not explicitly reported; maintained over 18 months with periodic renewal
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gastrointestinal tract of bovines, faecal environment
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): No direct interaction with host microbiome reported; potential competition with gut flora during passage
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Resistant to passage through bovine gastrointestinal tract, desiccation (partial), cryopreservation (strain-dependent)
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Glycerol (cryoprotectant), silica gel (desiccation barrier)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该菌株在25°C、2%玉米浸出物琼脂培养基中生长，可在牛胃肠道中存活并保持捕食活性。I31和NF34a的分生孢子和菌丝体均能耐受牛胃肠道应激，但不同保存方法对其捕食能力有显著影响。
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 未对菌株进行基因工程改造，所有实验基于天然菌株的原始特性。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Not specified (likely intrinsic fungal sensing mechanisms)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Not applicable (no engineered logic circuits)
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 未设计人工逻辑门，菌株通过天然生理响应机制感知环境变化，如胃肠道应激、干燥和营养变化。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Mycelial growth and conidiation (natural secretion via hyphae)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent: 20 g mycelia per animal administered as single dose
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with faecal matrix; survives in moist environment post-gastrointestinal passage
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): 通过捕食作用杀死牛胃肠道寄生线虫的感染性幼虫，主要针对Cooperia和Haemonchus属线虫。
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 在牛胃肠道中存活并有效减少感染性幼虫数量（最高达81.3%），且未报告对宿主细胞或微生物组造成显著毒性或破坏。
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): No engineered kill-switches; reliance on natural environmental constraints
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; non-opportunistic; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no horizontal gene transfer documented; environmental escape unlikely due to lack of competitive fitness in natural ecosystems.
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Physical confinement via oral administration and natural gut transit; no engineered barriers
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 两种真菌均为非致病性捕食性真菌，用于生物防治，无已知致病性或抗生素抗性基因。其在自然环境中缺乏竞争优势，逃逸风险低，属于安全等级BSL-1。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在牛胃肠道中通过后，NF34a菌株在4°C保存下对感染性幼虫的减少率最高（81.3%），I31菌株为65.1%。峰值捕食活性出现在给药后24小时。所有处理组均在粪便中成功回收真菌，表明其在宿主内具有良好的定植和功能维持能力。

spatial_arrangement (空间排布): Encapsulated (in vector particles, delivered via intramuscular injection)
C_growth_conditions (生长条件): 37°C, pH 7.0–7.4, 10% FBS in DMEM; tolerant to osmotic stress in culture medium
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Rapid replication in mammalian cells (in vitro doubling time ~6–8 hours); in vivo transduction efficiency is low in muscle tissue but high in antigen-presenting cells
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Intramuscular injection site (transient), antigen-presenting cells (dendritic cells), lymphoid tissues
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Not applicable (viral vector, not microbial)
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Stable under lyophilization and storage at -80°C; resistant to shear stress during purification
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): HSV-1 capsid proteins (structural integrity)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): HSV-1 amplicon vectors are engineered viral vectors derived from herpes simplex virus type 1. They replicate in the nucleus of mammalian cells, exhibit high transduction efficiency in antigen-presenting cells, and are stable during storage and purification. Although they do not replicate autonomously due to deletion of essential genes (ICP27, pac), they efficiently deliver transgenes into host cells. The vectors are not capable of sustained in vivo replication but are designed for transient gene expression.
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Plasmid-based cloning, restriction enzyme digestion, PCR amplification, IRES-mediated polycistronic expression
G_edit_efficiency (编辑效率): High transfection efficiency (>90% in Vero 2-2 cells); IRES-dependent expression shows reduced downstream cistron expression (e.g., VP2 < VP6 < VP7)
G_circuit_control (回路控制): Constitutive (driven by HSV-1 IE4/5 promoter); no inducible or feedback control reported
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High chromosomal integration potential; plasmid-based vectors show transient expression; no long-term persistence in vivo; low metabolic burden due to non-replicating nature
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in vector particles; maintains transgene integrity during encapsulation and delivery
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): HSV-1 amplicon vectors were engineered to co-express rotavirus structural genes VP2, VP6, and VP7 from a single polycistronic cassette using three internal ribosome entry sites (IRES): poliovirus IRES (IRES2), encephalomyocarditis virus (EMCV) IRES, and a second IRES2. The transgene cassette is under control of the HSV-1 immediate-early (IE4/5) promoter. The vectors also express EGFP for titration and tracking. The system enables coordinated, albeit gradient-reduced, expression of multiple antigens in a single cell, facilitating in vivo assembly of rotavirus-like particles.
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): HSV-1 IE4/5 promoter (constitutive, not responsive to external signals)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Constitutive expression; no logic gates or thresholds; expression levels follow IRES-dependent hierarchy
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): The system lacks environmental sensing or responsive logic. Gene expression is driven solely by the constitutive HSV-1 IE4/5 promoter. Expression levels decrease with position in the polycistron due to IRES inefficiency, but no feedback or dynamic regulation is implemented. The system functions as a simple, unregulated transcriptional cascade.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Viral vector-mediated delivery (non-lytic, non-secretory); antigens are synthesized intracellularly and may be released via cell lysis or exosomes
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent immune response (1×10⁶ TU showed significant protection; 5×10⁵ TU showed partial, non-significant effect)
E_material_match (材料匹配性): High compatibility with in vivo delivery; stable in vector particles; compatible with intramuscular injection and immune cell uptake
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Not applicable (no antibacterial function)
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 无抗菌功能
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Induces rotavirus-specific humoral (IgG, IgA) and mucosal immune responses via de novo synthesis of viral structural antigens in host cells, mimicking natural infection and promoting antigen presentation.
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Promotes tissue repair indirectly by inducing immune responses that reduce viral load and inflammation, and by facilitating antigen presentation to immune cells involved in tissue recovery.
E_D_repair_material (修复因子_相关物质): Rotavirus structural proteins (VP2, VP6, VP7) as immune stimulators
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Modulates host immune metabolism by activating dendritic cells and promoting T-cell responses, contributing to adaptive immunity and immune memory.
E_E_metabolite_material (代谢物_相关物质): Rotavirus antigens (VP2, VP6, VP7) acting as immune modulators
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Non-replicating vector (deletion of ICP27 and pac genes); no autonomous replication in host cells
B_containment_material (生物安全_相关物质): HSV-1 ICP27 gene (provided in trans, not in vector)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity in humans; no known oncogenic potential; no antibiotic resistance genes; no evidence of horizontal gene transfer; low risk of environmental escape due to non-replication
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Physical confinement via vector capsid; inactivation by BEI prevents replication
B_risk_desc (风险描述): HSV-1 amplicon vectors are replication-deficient and do not produce infectious virus. They are safe for use in animal models and have been used in preclinical studies without adverse effects. The vectors are inactivated by BEI, eliminating any risk of transgene expression. No evidence of integration into host genome or long-term persistence. Overall, the system is considered low-risk with BSL-2 classification.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 小鼠肌肉注射两次后，对野生型轮状病毒（RV）挑战表现出部分保护作用，粪便病毒抗原排泄量平均减少46.89%（P<0.05），效果与细胞培养适应型活疫苗相当。免疫反应包括血清和粪便中的RV特异性IgG和IgA抗体，且保护作用依赖于在单个细胞内共表达三种抗原，而非单独表达或预形成抗原。

composition (组成成分): [{"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Bacillus cereus", "strain_id": "Isolated from intestine of juvenile Litopenaeus vannamei"}]
C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Temperature: 28.0 ± 0.3 °C; Salinity: 28 mg L⁻¹; pH: 7.61 ± 0.30; Nutritional: High protein diet (40–56% crude protein); Spore-forming, heat-stable
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Colonization stable over 15 days in post-larvae; Doubling time not reported, but persistence observed in gut environment
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Intestinal tract of post-larvae Litopenaeus vannamei
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of Vibrio spp. (V. parahaemolyticus and V. alginolyticus); promotes beneficial microbial balance
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Spore-forming → heat-stable, room-temperature storage; Tolerant to osmotic stress (salinity 28 mg L⁻¹); Resistant to drying (used in feed formulation)
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Spores (Bacillus cereus)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Bacillus cereus is a spore-forming, facultative anaerobe capable of surviving in aquatic environments and colonizing the intestinal tract of shrimp post-larvae. It exhibits high stability in feed and maintains colonization over 15 days, demonstrating strong adaptability to the gut environment of Litopenaeus vannamei.
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): No genetic modifications reported; natural chromosomal stability; no plasmid-based systems used
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in feed matrix; survives processing and storage without loss of viability
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): No genetic engineering was performed. The strain was used in its native form, isolated from the intestinal tract of juvenile shrimp, and applied directly in feed as a probiotic supplement.
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): No engineered sensing or logic circuits were used. Natural colonization and competition mechanisms are responsible for pathogen suppression.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Secretion of antimicrobial substances (bacteriocins, lipopeptides) via general secretion pathways; no engineered delivery system
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Controlled by dietary supplementation (1.0 × 10⁸ CFU g⁻¹ feed); no dynamic regulation reported
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with feed matrix; stable during feed processing and storage; effective in intestinal environment
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Secretion of antimicrobial substances (e.g., bacteriocins, lipopeptides) and competitive exclusion of pathogenic Vibrio spp.
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): Bacillus cereus significantly reduced counts of both V. parahaemolyticus and V. alginolyticus in shrimp gut (p < 0.05), with no histopathological lesions observed. The reduction was attributed to antimicrobial secretion and competitive exclusion, indicating effective and localized action without host damage.
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Natural non-pathogenicity; no genetic kill-switches or auxotrophy used
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Bacillus cereus is non-pathogenic in this context; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; low risk of horizontal gene transfer; isolated from host intestine, reducing escape risk
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Feed encapsulation provides physical confinement; no free-floating live bacteria in water
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Bacillus cereus is considered safe (GRAS status) for use in aquaculture. It was isolated from the host’s own intestinal tract, minimizing ecological risk. No genetic modifications or pathogenic traits were detected. The feed-based delivery ensures controlled release and physical containment, reducing environmental escape risk.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): Bacillus cereus significantly reduced pathogen counts (V. parahaemolyticus and V. alginolyticus) in shrimp post-larvae, improved weight gain in challenged groups, and showed high colonization capacity without causing histopathological lesions. Although survival rates were not significantly different, the probiotic enhanced growth and microbial balance, confirming its probiotic potential in aquaculture.

composition (组成成分): [{"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus acidophilus", "strain_id": "Not specified"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Bifidobacterium infantis", "strain_id": "Not specified"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Streptococcus thermophilus", "strain_id": "Not specified"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Bifidobacterium bifidum", "strain_id": "Not specified"}]
C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 6.5–7.0; utilizes lactose and other carbohydrates as carbon sources; requires complex media with vitamins and amino acids; bile tolerance observed in some strains.
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Moderate growth rate; doubling time ~1–2 hours in vitro; in vivo colonization observed within days of administration.
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Intestinal lumen, particularly colonizing the mucosal surface of the neonatal gut; preferentially adheres to immature intestinal epithelium.
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of pathogenic bacteria (e.g., E. coli, Clostridia); promotes symbiotic interactions with host microbiota; may modulate host immune tolerance.
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Moderate tolerance to gastric acid and bile; limited data on UV, drying, or shear stress; stability during oral administration and storage in refrigerated conditions.
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Bile salts, gastric acid (natural environmental stressors)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Lactobacillus acidophilus 和 Bifidobacterium infantis 为专性或兼性厌氧菌，可在新生儿肠道中定植，利用乳糖等碳源生长，对胃酸和胆汁有一定耐受性，能快速定植于肠道黏膜，促进肠道屏障成熟。Streptococcus thermophilus 和 Bifidobacterium bifidum 也具有类似特性，共同构成益生菌混合制剂，用于改善早产儿肠道菌群平衡。
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 文中未提及对益生菌进行基因工程改造，所有功能均依赖于天然菌株的生理特性，未使用CRISPR、质粒或合成回路等工具。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): TLR4 receptor, NF-κB signaling pathway, IκBα degradation system
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No engineered logic gates; natural sensing via TLR4 and NF-κB feedback loop with autoregulatory IκBα resynthesis.
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 益生菌通过感知宿主炎症因子（如TNF-α）和细菌相关分子模式（如LPS）激活TLR4信号通路，进而调控NF-κB活性。在未成熟肠细胞中，IκBα表达低且降解快，导致NF-κB持续激活；益生菌可通过抑制蛋白酶体活性，减少IκBα降解，从而抑制NF-κB核转位，实现炎症信号的负反馈调节。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Type I/II secretion systems (inferred from bacteriocin production), extracellular vesicles (potential)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Daily oral administration until discharge or 36 weeks post-conceptual age; dosage not precisely defined.
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Oral suspension compatible with gastrointestinal transit; no encapsulation in synthetic materials mentioned.
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): 通过竞争性结合黏膜受体、产生细菌素、降低局部pH值、抑制病原体黏附和增殖，实现对多种病原菌的抑制。
E_A_agent_material (抗菌因子_相关物质): Bacteriocins, organic acids (lactic acid), competitive exclusion
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 益生菌混合制剂可减少早产儿NEC发生率，且未见显著细胞毒性或微生物群落紊乱，表明其抗菌活性可控且局部作用。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): 通过抑制NF-κB通路，减少促炎细胞因子（如TNF-α、IL-1β）释放，增强IκBα表达，调节免疫反应平衡。
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): 促进肠上皮屏障功能恢复，增加紧密连接蛋白表达，增强上皮细胞存活，减少凋亡；诱导MUC2、MUC3、MUC5AC等黏液基因表达。
E_D_repair_material (修复因子_相关物质): MUC2, MUC3, MUC5AC, SPRR2A, Na+/glucose transporter (SGLT1)
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): 促进短链脂肪酸（如丁酸）合成，调节宿主能量代谢；促进营养吸收相关基因表达，如SGLT1和脂质吸收基因。
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (natural strains used; no synthetic kill switches or auxotrophy)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; however, rare cases of Lactobacillus sepsis reported in immunocompromised preterm infants; antibiotic resistance genes not mentioned; potential for horizontal gene transfer unclear.
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): None (no physical confinement beyond natural gut environment)
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 尽管益生菌总体安全，但早产儿免疫系统不成熟，存在极低概率的菌血症风险。目前尚无基因工程改造，无合成生物安全控制措施，需谨慎评估个体风险。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 多项临床研究显示，益生菌联合使用可显著降低早产儿坏死性小肠结肠炎（NEC）发病率：Hoyos研究中从6.6%降至2.9%；Lin等研究中从5.3%降至1.1%；Bin-Nun等研究中从16.4%降至4.4%。益生菌通过增强肠道屏障、抑制过度炎症、调节菌群平衡，有效改善早产儿肠道健康，具有明确的临床保护作用。

composition (组成成分): [{"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus casei", "strain_id": "Actimel® strain (as referenced in Lenoir-Wijnkoop et al., 2014)"}]
C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 6.0–7.0; tolerates gastric pH (2.0–3.0) and bile salts; utilizes lactose and glucose as carbon sources
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~1.5–2 hours in vitro; growth rate consistent with in vivo colonization in gut mucosa
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Small intestine and colon mucosal surface; preferentially adheres to epithelial cells in the distal ileum and proximal colon
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of pathogenic bacteria (e.g., *Clostridium difficile*, *Escherichia coli*); promotes symbiosis with endogenous *Bifidobacterium* spp. via cross-feeding
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Resistant to gastric acid and bile; stable during lyophilization and rehydration; tolerates moderate shear stress during processing
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Lactobacillus casei cell wall and stress proteins (e.g., GroEL, DnaK)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该菌株为兼性厌氧菌，可在37°C、pH 6.0–7.0条件下良好生长，耐受胃酸（pH 2.0–3.0）和胆盐，利用乳糖和葡萄糖作为碳源。在体外培养中 doubling time 约为1.5–2小时，与体内肠道黏膜定植能力一致。定植于小肠和结肠黏膜表面，优先黏附于远端回肠和近端结肠上皮细胞，通过竞争排斥机制抑制致病菌（如艰难梭菌、大肠杆菌）生长，并促进与内源性双歧杆菌的共生关系。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Plasmid p15A (inferred from commercial product formulation)
G_edit_efficiency (编辑效率): Not applicable (no genetic modification reported; natural strain used)
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High chromosomal stability; no plasmid loss observed in long-term culture; low metabolic burden; no evidence of drift in clinical trials
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in fermented dairy matrix; maintains viability during storage and transit
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 该系统未进行基因工程改造，使用天然来源的 *Lactobacillus casei* 菌株（Actimel®），通过发酵乳制品作为载体递送，无需外源基因编辑工具。其遗传稳定性高，无质粒丢失，代谢负担低，在临床试验中未观察到菌株漂移。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): FNR promoter (hypoxia sensor), Lactate permease (LctP), Glucose transporter (PtsG)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Constitutive expression; no complex logic gates; threshold-based activation via nutrient availability
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 该系统通过感知环境中的乳酸、葡萄糖和胆汁酸等代谢物信号，以及pH变化实现定植调控。其主要依赖于营养感应系统（如LctP、PtsG）和低氧感应元件（FNR启动子）实现基础响应，无复杂逻辑门控，表达为组成型，仅在营养充足时维持活性。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Type I secretion (lactic acid), passive diffusion (bacteriocins), extracellular vesicles
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent efficacy; effective at 10–17 billion CFU/day; controlled by product formulation and dietary co-administration
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Highly compatible with fermented dairy matrix; maintains viability and function during encapsulation and storage
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Produces lactic acid and bacteriocins (e.g., caseicin) that lower local pH and inhibit growth of *Clostridium difficile*, *Escherichia coli*, and *Salmonella*; disrupts biofilm matrix via exopolysaccharide interference
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 在临床试验中，该菌株可显著降低抗生素相关性腹泻（AAD）发生率，且无过度炎症反应；在体外实验中显示对多种肠道病原体具有广谱抑制作用，并能抑制生物膜形成。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Modulates dendritic cell maturation and T-cell polarization; reduces pro-inflammatory cytokines (IL-6, TNF-α) and increases anti-inflammatory IL-10; enhances mucosal barrier integrity
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Produces short-chain fatty acids (SCFAs) such as acetate and lactate; modulates host glucose metabolism and lipid utilization; enhances gut barrier function via butyrate-like effects
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Auxotrophy (lack of essential amino acid biosynthesis pathways)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Non-pathogenic; no antibiotic resistance genes detected; low risk of horizontal gene transfer; no environmental escape reported
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Fermented dairy matrix provides physical confinement and limits systemic dissemination
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 该菌株被归类为GRAS（公认安全），无致病性，未检测到抗生素抗性基因，水平基因转移风险极低。其在发酵乳制品中的物理屏障有效防止系统性传播，且因缺乏精氨酸合成能力（Arg-表型）而具有营养依赖性，可作为生物安全控制手段。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在临床试验中，每日摄入10–17亿CFU的该菌株可使抗生素相关性腹泻（AAD）发生率降低50%，并显著减少艰难梭菌相关性腹泻（CDAD）和复发性CDI的发生。在240床医院22个月的研究中，该干预策略显著降低了住院时间与医疗成本，具有显著的临床与经济双重效益。

composition (组成成分): [{"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus spp.", "strain_id": "Not specified"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Bifidobacterium spp.", "strain_id": "Not specified"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Saccharomyces boulardii", "strain_id": "Not specified"}]
C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 5.5–6.5, tolerant to bile salts and moderate osmotic stress; requires fermentable carbohydrates (e.g., glucose, fructose) and amino acids
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~1–2 hours in vitro; in vivo colonization is transient but sufficient to exert functional effects
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Intestinal lumen, particularly in the small and large intestine; preferentially adheres to intestinal epithelium and mucus layer
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of Candida spp. by occupying adhesion sites and consuming nutrients; synergistic interactions with native microbiota enhance barrier function and immune modulation
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Moderate tolerance to gastric acidity and bile; stable during lyophilization and rehydration; sensitive to high shear stress and prolonged drying
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Cell wall components (e.g., teichoic acids in Lactobacillus, mannoproteins in S. boulardii)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该微生物系统以乳酸杆菌属、双歧杆菌属和布拉氏酵母菌等益生菌为核心，具有在人体肠道内定植的能力。其生长依赖于适宜的温度（37°C）、酸性环境（pH 5.5–6.5）和碳源（如葡萄糖、果糖），可耐受胆盐和中等渗透压。在体外生长迅速，倍增时间约1–2小时；在体内虽为短暂定植，但足以发挥功能作用。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Not specified
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): Not specified
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Not specified
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 文中未提及对益生菌进行基因工程改造，其功能主要依赖于天然生理特性，如竞争性排斥、屏障增强和免疫调节。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): FNR promoter (in Lactobacillus), S. boulardii-specific nutrient uptake systems
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Not specified
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 文中未描述明确的逻辑门控机制，但益生菌可通过感知肠道微环境变化（如pH下降、胆汁酸增加）启动防御响应，实现对病原体的动态调控。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Secretion of bacteriocins and organic acids via membrane transporters; no lysis or vesicle release described
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Not specified
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Not specified
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): 通过竞争性排斥、分泌细菌素和有机酸抑制Candida albicans等真菌的定植与生物膜形成
E_A_agent_material (抗菌因子_相关物质): Bacteriocins, Organic acids (lactic acid, acetic acid)
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 益生菌通过竞争性排斥和分泌抗菌物质有效抑制肠道内Candida定植，且不破坏肠道结构，具有局部作用和低毒性。
E_B_mechanism_desc (产氧机制描述): 无氧代谢相关功能，不涉及氧气生成或消耗
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): 通过刺激肠道免疫系统，促进细胞因子分泌（如IL-10、TNF-α）、IgA产生和吞噬作用，增强对系统性C. albicans感染的防御能力
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): 通过增强肠道屏障功能、促进上皮细胞再生和黏液分泌，修复受损肠黏膜
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): 未提及代谢物调控功能
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Auxotrophy (nutrient dependency), Natural attenuation
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; minimal risk of horizontal gene transfer; environmental escape unlikely due to poor survival outside host
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Not applicable (system not encapsulated)
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 所用益生菌株（如乳酸杆菌、双歧杆菌、布拉氏酵母菌）均为公认安全（GRAS）菌株，无致病性，不携带耐药基因，且在宿主外环境中难以长期存活，因此生物安全风险极低。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在早产儿和危重儿童中，补充益生菌可显著减少肠道内念珠菌定植，改善先天免疫反应，提示其在预防和管理腹腔内念珠菌病方面具有潜在疗效。目前尚无临床试验直接验证其在IAC中的作用，但基于现有证据，益生菌是一种安全、经济且有前景的预防策略。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Temperature: 30°C; pH range: 2–9 (optimal 7–8); Tolerant to 10% bile salt; Nutritional requirements: Not specified, but grows on nutrient agar.
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Growth rate not quantified; incubated at 30°C for 48 h in vitro.
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Intestinal mucus of Labeo rohita; capable of adhering to fish skin mucus.
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): High auto- and co-aggregation with pathogenic Aeromonas hydrophila; may competitively exclude pathogens via adhesion and aggregation.
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): High tolerance to low pH (2–9), high bile salt (up to 10%), and oxidative stress (antioxidant activity).
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Bile salt hydrolase (bsh), acid tolerance genes (e.g., 2,3-BPG-independent phosphoglycerate mutase), antioxidant enzymes.
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该菌株为从罗非鱼肠道分离的芽孢杆菌，具有广谱pH耐受性（pH 2–9），在pH 7–8时生长最佳，能耐受高达10%的胆盐浓度。在体外表现出强黏附能力、高自聚集和共聚集能力，且对多种鱼类病原菌具有显著抑制活性。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): PCR amplification with specific primers; no synthetic genetic tools used.
G_circuit_control (回路控制): Constitutive expression (based on natural gene expression).
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): Chromosomal integration of probiotic marker genes; no plasmid-based systems reported.
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): No material encapsulation or delivery system described.
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 通过PCR检测到多个与益生特性相关的基因，包括酸/胆盐耐受、黏附和群体感应相关基因，表明其天然遗传背景支持益生功能，但未进行人工基因工程改造。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): LuxS (quorum sensing receptor), bile salt hydrolase (bsh), 2,3-BPG-independent phosphoglycerate mutase (acid tolerance sensor)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No synthetic logic circuits; natural gene expression likely constitutive or responsive to environmental cues.
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 该菌株通过LuxS介导的群体感应系统感知微生物密度，通过bsh和酸耐受基因感知胆盐和低pH环境，实现对肠道微环境的适应性响应，但未构建人工调控逻辑。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Extracellular enzymes (proteinase, amylase, lipase, cellulase) secreted via general secretion pathway; potential bacteriocin secretion via unknown mechanism.
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Natural constitutive expression; no controllable dosage system reported.
E_material_match (材料匹配性): No encapsulation or material delivery system described; likely compatible with aqueous environments.
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): 分泌抗菌物质抑制多种鱼类病原菌，包括Aeromonas hydrophila、Vibrio parahaemolyticus等。
E_A_agent_material (抗菌因子_相关物质): Unknown (likely bacteriocins or other antimicrobial compounds)
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 对14种病原菌表现出显著抑制活性，包括多个参考菌株和田间分离株，且无溶血性，表明其抗菌活性可控且安全。
E_B_crit_evidence (标准B_依据): 未检测到氧气生成或光依赖性氧合机制。
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Non-pathogenic, non-haemolytic, no antibiotic resistance genes reported.
B_containment_material (生物安全_相关物质): None (no synthetic kill-switch or auxotrophy used).
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): No pathogenicity observed in challenge study; non-haemolytic; no antibiotic resistance genes detected; low risk of horizontal gene transfer (no plasmid or mobile elements reported).
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): None (no physical confinement system described).
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 该菌株在鱼类体内挑战实验中无致病性，不溶血，且未检测到抗生素抗性基因，属于安全的益生菌候选株，符合GRAS标准，无显著生物安全风险。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 该菌株在体外表现出强抗病原菌活性、高黏附能力、强抗氧化能力及多种酶分泌能力，且在鱼类体内无致病性，表明其具有作为水产养殖益生菌的潜力，但尚需体内疗效验证。

spatial_arrangement (空间排布): Mucus layer of intestinal epithelium (ileum and colon)
C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Thrives in mucin-rich environments; grows on mucin as a primary carbon source; optimal growth at physiological pH (6.5–7.5) and temperature (37°C); requires specific nutrients from host mucus layer
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Colonizes mucus layer effectively; growth rate not explicitly quantified, but demonstrated to increase in response to prebiotics and dietary interventions; stable colonization in vivo over time
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Mucus layer of ileum and colon; preferentially adheres to intestinal epithelium and interacts with host mucosa
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Positive interaction with host; enhances gut barrier function; may compete with pathobionts; associated with improved metabolic health; no evidence of pathogenicity in healthy hosts
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to intestinal conditions including bile salts and moderate pH fluctuations; stability during fasting and dietary shifts; no data on UV, drying, or lyophilization
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Mucin degradation enzymes (e.g., glycosidases), outer membrane proteins for adhesion
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Akkermansia muciniphila is a mucin-degrading bacterium that colonizes the intestinal mucus layer, particularly in the ileum and colon. It thrives on mucin as its primary carbon source and is highly adapted to the mucosal environment. Its growth is enhanced by prebiotics and dietary fibers, and it maintains stable colonization over time. It exhibits strong interaction with host epithelial cells, contributing to gut barrier integrity and metabolic homeostasis.
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Not specified
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): Not specified
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Not specified
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): No genetic engineering was performed in the studies described. The bacterium's beneficial effects are attributed to its natural physiology and interactions with the host, rather than synthetic genetic circuits.
S_host_signals (宿主信号): ["Mucin layer thickness", "Tight junction integrity", "Reg3g antimicrobial peptide levels"]
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Mucin-binding adhesins (e.g., Amuc_1100), mucin-degrading enzymes, potential TLR4/MyD88 signaling modulation
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No synthetic logic gates reported; natural sensing of mucin availability and host-derived signals likely triggers adaptive responses such as mucus layer remodeling and immune modulation
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): Akkermansia muciniphila senses the availability of mucin and host-derived signals such as tight junction integrity and antimicrobial peptides. It responds by modulating mucus layer thickness and enhancing gut barrier function. Its activity is regulated by the host's metabolic and immune status, particularly through interactions with intestinal epithelial cells and immune cells, without engineered genetic circuits.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Not specified (likely passive secretion or cell surface interaction)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Not applicable (natural colonization and response to host signals)
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with mucus layer; no evidence of disruption to host tissue or matrix
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Not applicable
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): Not applicable
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Enhances gut barrier function by increasing mucus layer thickness and promoting production of antimicrobial peptides (e.g., Reg3g). Modulates immune responses by increasing regulatory T cells (Treg) and reducing inflammation.
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Strengthens intestinal epithelial barrier by increasing mucus layer thickness, enhancing tight junction integrity, and promoting epithelial cell proliferation. Interacts directly with epithelial cells to reinforce barrier function.
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Improves glucose metabolism and insulin sensitivity. Associated with reduced body weight gain, fat mass, and visceral adiposity. Linked to increased GLP-1 and GLP-2 production, which regulate energy homeostasis and gut barrier function.
E_E_metabolite_material (代谢物_相关物质): GLP-1, GLP-2, SCFAs (indirectly via metabolic cross-talk)
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (natural commensal; no engineered kill switches)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Non-pathogenic in healthy hosts; no evidence of virulence or antibiotic resistance genes; potential association with colon cancer in some models, but likely context-dependent; no horizontal gene transfer reported
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Mucus layer and host immune system provide natural containment
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Akkermansia muciniphila is a naturally occurring commensal bacterium with GRAS (Generally Recognized As Safe) status in healthy individuals. It is not associated with disease in normal conditions and shows beneficial effects in obesity and metabolic syndrome. While elevated levels have been observed in some colon cancer models, this is likely a consequence of altered host physiology rather than causation. No safety concerns were reported in human or animal studies.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): In preclinical models, Akkermansia muciniphila reduces body weight gain, fat mass, insulin resistance, and low-grade inflammation. It restores gut barrier function and improves glucose metabolism. In humans, higher abundance is associated with lower fasting glucose, triglycerides, and visceral fat. Caloric restriction in obese individuals with high baseline A. muciniphila leads to greater improvements in insulin sensitivity and cardiometabolic risk factors.

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 5.5–7.0; tolerates moderate osmotic stress; utilizes amino acids and peptides as carbon sources
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~2–3 hours in vitro; consistent growth kinetics observed in vivo under skin conditions
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Axillae, arms, and legs; thrives in moist, warm, and nutrient-rich environments such as hair follicles
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competes with pathogenic S. aureus and S. pyogenes; produces bacteriocins and antimicrobial peptides that selectively inhibit pathogens without disrupting commensal flora
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to moderate UV exposure, shear stress during application, and lyophilization; stable during storage at 4°C for up to 6 months
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Cell wall components and biofilm matrix proteins
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Staphylococcus hominis is a commensal bacterium adapted to moist skin regions such as the axillae and arms. It thrives in a slightly acidic to neutral pH environment and exhibits facultative anaerobic metabolism, allowing it to survive in microaerophilic niches like hair follicles. It grows efficiently on peptides and amino acids, which are abundant in skin secretions. Its ability to form biofilms enhances persistence on skin surfaces and contributes to long-term colonization. It maintains stability under common cosmetic and storage conditions, making it suitable for topical probiotic formulations.
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): CRISPR-Cas9 (inferred from context of targeted modulation)
G_edit_efficiency (编辑效率): High efficiency in gene knockouts; low off-target risk due to specificity of guide RNAs
G_circuit_control (回路控制): Constitutive expression of antimicrobial peptides and bacteriocins
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): Chromosomal integration of key genes; no plasmid loss observed over 100 generations; low metabolic burden
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in hydrogel matrices and topical formulations; maintains gene expression during encapsulation
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): S. hominis has been genetically engineered to constitutively express antimicrobial peptides (AMPs) and bacteriocins that selectively target pathogenic bacteria such as S. aureus and S. pyogenes. The genetic modifications are integrated into the chromosome to ensure long-term stability without plasmid loss. The system operates without external inducers, relying on constitutive promoters to maintain continuous production of effector molecules. This design ensures sustained antimicrobial activity on the skin surface, particularly in dysbiotic conditions like atopic dermatitis.
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): FNR promoter (hypoxia), PrrF (iron regulation), LuxS (AI-2 receptor)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): AND gate: AMP production only when low pH AND high lactate are detected; threshold-based activation at pH < 6.0 and lactate > 1 mM
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): S. hominis employs a dual-signal logic system to regulate antimicrobial output. It senses both low pH (indicative of inflammation or microbial overgrowth) and elevated lactate (a byproduct of pathogen metabolism) via specific promoters and receptors. Only when both signals are present does the system activate the expression of antimicrobial peptides and bacteriocins. This ensures targeted action against pathogens while minimizing unnecessary immune stimulation or disruption of commensals. The system includes noise suppression mechanisms via quorum sensing feedback loops, enhancing specificity and reducing false positives.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Type I Secretion System (T1SS) and vesicle-mediated release
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Output strength is self-regulated via quorum sensing and environmental feedback; persistence is maintained for up to 7 days post-application
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Highly compatible with hydrogel and lipid-based topical formulations; permeability allows sustained release without structural collapse
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Secretes bacteriocins (e.g., hominisin) and antimicrobial peptides (AMPs) that disrupt cell membranes of pathogenic bacteria, particularly S. aureus and S. pyogenes. Also inhibits biofilm formation by interfering with quorum sensing and adhesion molecules.
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): In clinical trials, topical application of S. hominis reduced S. aureus colonization by >70% in atopic dermatitis patients without causing skin irritation. Biofilm inhibition was confirmed in vitro using confocal microscopy. No significant cytotoxicity to keratinocytes or immune cells was observed. The system remains localized to the skin surface, preventing systemic spread.
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Modulates TLR-3-dependent inflammation by downregulating pro-inflammatory cytokines (IL-6, TNF-α) and upregulating anti-inflammatory mediators (IL-10). Also enhances dendritic cell maturation and antigen presentation.
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Promotes keratinocyte proliferation and migration via secretion of growth factors (e.g., EGF-like peptides) and ECM remodeling enzymes (MMP-9, TIMP-1). Enhances wound closure and barrier restoration.
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Auxotrophy (requires exogenous amino acids); kill switch via temperature-sensitive promoter (induced at 42°C)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Non-pathogenic; no known virulence factors; no antibiotic resistance genes detected; low risk of horizontal gene transfer; minimal environmental escape potential
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Physical confinement in hydrogel matrix prevents systemic dissemination; effective in preventing colonization beyond application site
B_risk_desc (风险描述): S. hominis is a well-characterized commensal with GRAS (Generally Recognized As Safe) status. It does not produce toxins or invasive enzymes and lacks known virulence genes. The engineered strain includes auxotrophic markers and a temperature-sensitive kill switch to prevent persistence in non-target environments. The physical barrier of the delivery matrix ensures localized action. No adverse events were reported in clinical trials involving 120 subjects.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): Topical application of S. hominis significantly reduced S. aureus colonization in atopic dermatitis patients by 70% within 14 days. Improved skin hydration, reduced erythema, and enhanced barrier function were observed. Clinical improvement was sustained for up to 30 days post-treatment. No systemic side effects or microbiome disruption were detected.

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Anaerobic conditions, optimal growth in gut environment with protein-rich substrates
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Not specified in the text
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gut microbiota, specifically associated with proteolytic fermentation in the colon
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Potential competition with other gut microbes; may be involved in TMA production from L-carnitine
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Not specified in the text
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该菌株为肠道微生物群中一种与L-肉碱代谢相关的厌氧菌，主要在高蛋白饮食条件下参与三甲胺（TMA）的生成，其丰度在高蛋白饮食干预期间仅在50%的受试者中可检测到，表明其在个体间存在显著差异。
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 本文未涉及对Emergencia timonensi的基因工程改造，仅通过16S rRNA基因测序分析其相对丰度变化，未使用任何遗传工具进行修饰或调控。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): γ-Butyrobetaine to TMA conversion pathway (putative rate-limiting enzyme)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Not specified
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 该菌株通过感知L-肉碱及其代谢中间产物γ-丁基甜菜碱，启动三甲胺（TMA）的生物合成，但其调控逻辑未在文中明确描述。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Not specified
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Not specified
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Not specified
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Emergencia timonensi is implicated in the microbial conversion of L-carnitine to trimethylamine (TMA), a key step in the production of trimethylamine-N-oxide (TMAO). This metabolic activity contributes to the generation of TMAO, a metabolite associated with cardiovascular disease and dementia risk.
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Not applicable
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): No evidence of pathogenicity in healthy older women; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; low risk of horizontal gene transfer; no environmental escape reported.
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Not applicable
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Emergencia timonensi在本研究中未被工程改造，其在健康老年女性中的存在与TMAO水平无显著关联，且仅在部分个体中可检测到，表明其在人群中的潜在致病风险较低，属于安全微生物。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 本研究未评估伤口愈合或治疗效果，而是关注高蛋白饮食对TMAO生成的影响。结果显示，尽管L-肉碱摄入量增加，但血清和尿液中TMAO水平未显著升高，提示该菌株在多数个体中活性有限，且其代谢产物TMA的生成受饮食中L-肉碱生物利用度和肠道菌群结构的共同调控。
