It is naturally adapted to dairy environments and can tolerate mild gastric conditions, but lacks robust resilience to harsh intestinal stresses.
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Plasmid-based expression systems (e.g., pNZ8148, pSIP series), CRISPR-Cas not mentioned
G_edit_efficiency (编辑效率): High efficiency in transformation and stable plasmid maintenance; no off-target effects reported in clinical trials
G_circuit_control (回路控制): Constitutive expression of therapeutic proteins (IL-10, TFF1); no inducible systems described
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): Plasmid stability in vitro; moderate in vivo due to lack of selective pressure; no chromosomal integration reported
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in oral formulations (e.g., tablets, capsules); compatible with mucosal delivery matrices
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): Genetically modified Lactococcus lactis strains (AGO11 and AGO13) were engineered to constitutively express human interleukin-10 (IL-10) and trefoil factor 1 (TFF1), respectively. These recombinant strains were designed for oral delivery to achieve localized mucosal production of therapeutic molecules, avoiding systemic exposure and reducing side effects.
S_host_signals (宿主信号): ["Proteases (e.g., MMPs in inflamed tissue)", "Cytokines (e.g., TNF-α in IBD)"]
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): None explicitly described; likely relies on constitutive promoters (e.g., P$_{L}$, P$_{S}$) rather than environmental sensors
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No logic gates or threshold control; purely constitutive expression
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): The system lacks environmental sensing or dynamic regulation. Gene expression is driven by constitutive promoters, resulting in continuous production of therapeutic molecules regardless of host or microenvironmental signals. This limits adaptive response but ensures predictable delivery.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Constitutive secretion via Sec pathway (default for Gram-positive bacteria)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Controlled by dose of administered bacterial cells; no dynamic feedback or tunable output
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with oral tablets and capsules; stable in mucosal delivery matrices
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): Not applicable
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Local delivery of anti-inflammatory IL-10 and TFF1 to modulate mucosal immune responses and promote healing in inflammatory bowel disease (IBD) and oral mucositis.
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): TFF1 promotes epithelial restitution and mucosal barrier integrity; IL-10 reduces inflammation and supports tissue regeneration in colitis models.
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Auxotrophy (e.g., lactose-dependent growth), suicide genes not used; containment via growth restriction in vivo
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no evidence of horizontal gene transfer; low environmental escape risk due to poor survival in natural environments
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Oral delivery limits systemic spread; physical barrier of GI tract reduces dissemination
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Lactococcus lactis is a well-established GRAS (Generally Recognized As Safe) organism. The recombinant strains AGO11 and AGO13 have undergone phase I and II clinical trials showing safety and tolerability. No serious adverse events were reported. The use of auxotrophy and short in vivo survival further reduces ecological and health risks.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): Phase I trial confirmed safety and feasibility of IL-10 delivery via GM L. lactis in humans. Phase IIa trial showed positive efficacy of AGO13 (TFF1-expressing strain) in treating oral mucositis in 25 patients compared to placebo. However, phase II trial for AGO11 (IL-10) did not show statistically significant improvement in mucosal healing in Crohn’s disease patients, suggesting need for improved expression levels or persistence.

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal at 37°C, pH 5.5–6.5; utilizes glucose, lactose, and other carbohydrates; requires vitamins and amino acids for growth
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Moderate growth rate in vitro; longer persistence in GIT than L. lactis
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gastrointestinal tract (GIT), particularly colon and mucosal surfaces
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competes with pathogens; promotes homeostasis; synergistic with native microbiota
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): High tolerance to gastric acidity, bile salts, and osmotic stress; stable during lyophilization and storage
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Cell wall components, exopolysaccharides (EPS), and stress response proteins
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Lactobacillus casei BL23 is a facultative anaerobe with strong tolerance to gastric and intestinal stresses. It persists longer in the gut than L. lactis and exhibits intrinsic immune-modulatory properties, making it suitable for mucosal delivery. It grows well on common carbon sources and maintains viability under harsh conditions.
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Plasmid-based systems (e.g., pSIP series), chromosomal integration possible; no CRISPR-Cas mentioned
G_edit_efficiency (编辑效率): High transformation efficiency; stable plasmid maintenance; low off-target risk
G_circuit_control (回路控制): Constitutive expression of recombinant proteins (e.g., SOD, catalase, elafin)
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High plasmid stability; chromosomal integration enhances long-term stability; low metabolic burden
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in oral formulations; compatible with encapsulation in protective matrices
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): Lactobacillus casei BL23 was genetically modified to constitutively express therapeutic proteins such as superoxide dismutase (SOD), manganese-dependent catalase, and elafin. These strains were designed for oral delivery to treat inflammatory conditions like colitis and mucosal injury.
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): None explicitly described; likely uses constitutive promoters (e.g., P$_{L}$, P$_{S}$) rather than inducible sensors
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No logic gates; constitutive expression without feedback control
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): The system relies on constitutive gene expression without environmental sensing. While the host environment may influence expression indirectly (e.g., via stress-induced promoters), no specific sensing modules are engineered. This limits adaptability but ensures consistent delivery.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Constitutive secretion via Sec pathway
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent; controlled by number of administered cells
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with oral delivery and encapsulation; maintains activity in protective matrices
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): Not applicable
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Expression of SOD and catalase reduces oxidative stress; elafin inhibits proteases involved in inflammation, promoting mucosal healing.
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Elafin protects epithelial barrier integrity; SOD and catalase reduce oxidative damage, accelerating tissue repair in colitis models.
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Auxotrophy not used; relies on natural attenuation and short in vivo survival
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Non-pathogenic; no antibiotic resistance genes; low risk of HGT; well-tolerated in humans; no evidence of environmental persistence
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Oral delivery limits systemic spread; GI tract acts as natural barrier
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Lactobacillus casei BL23 is a well-characterized probiotic strain with a long history of safe use. Recombinant strains expressing SOD, catalase, and elafin have shown safety in preclinical models. No adverse effects reported in animal studies. The strain is GRAS and poses minimal risk to human health.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): GM L. casei BL23 expressing SOD or catalase showed protective effects against intestinal inflammation and oxidative stress in murine colitis models. Elafin-expressing strain prevented inflammation and accelerated mucosal healing in multiple colitis models. These results suggest strong therapeutic potential for IBD and mucosal injury, though human clinical data are pending.

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal at 37°C, pH 6.0–7.0; requires complex nutrients (vitamins, amino acids, nucleotides); grows slowly
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Slow growth rate; long doubling time; persists in GIT due to niche adaptation
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Hypoxic regions of the colon; tumor hypoxia (in preclinical models)
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Symbiotic with host; competes with pathogens; enhances gut barrier function
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): High tolerance to bile and low pH; stable during lyophilization; sensitive to oxygen exposure
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Anaerobic metabolism, protective EPS, stress response proteins
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Bifidobacterium longum is a strict anaerobe with slow growth kinetics but excellent persistence in the gut. It preferentially colonizes hypoxic niches such as the colonic mucosa and tumor microenvironment. It is highly tolerant to bile and gastric acidity, making it suitable for oral delivery.
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Plasmid-based systems; chromosomal integration possible; no CRISPR-Cas mentioned
G_edit_efficiency (编辑效率): Moderate transformation efficiency; stable plasmid maintenance; low off-target risk
G_circuit_control (回路控制): Constitutive expression of therapeutic proteins (e.g., IL-10, α-MSH)
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High chromosomal stability; low metabolic burden; long-term in vivo consistency
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in oral formulations; compatible with encapsulation in oxygen-barrier matrices
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): Bifidobacterium longum was genetically modified to express anti-inflammatory cytokines (IL-10) and neuropeptides (α-MSH) for oral delivery. These strains exploit the natural tropism of Bifidobacterium for hypoxic sites to target inflamed tissues and tumors.
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): None explicitly described; likely uses constitutive promoters
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No logic gates; constitutive expression without feedback
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): The system lacks engineered sensing modules. Gene expression is driven by constitutive promoters, resulting in continuous production of therapeutic molecules. While the strain naturally senses hypoxia and bile, no synthetic circuits are described.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Constitutive secretion via Sec pathway
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent; controlled by administered cell count
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with oxygen-barrier encapsulation; maintains viability in protective matrices
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): Not applicable
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Oral delivery of IL-10 and α-MSH reduces inflammation and restores immune tolerance in colitis models.
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): α-MSH promotes epithelial regeneration and reduces inflammation; IL-10 supports mucosal healing.
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Natural auxotrophy (nutrient-dependent); no suicide genes; limited environmental persistence
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Non-pathogenic; no antibiotic resistance genes; low HGT risk; no evidence of environmental escape; safe in preclinical models
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Oxygen-barrier encapsulation prevents oxygen exposure; oral delivery limits systemic spread
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Bifidobacterium longum is a GRAS organism with a long history of safe use in fermented foods. Recombinant strains expressing IL-10 and α-MSH have shown safety in preclinical models. The strict anaerobic nature and nutrient dependency reduce ecological risk. No adverse effects reported in animal studies.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): Oral administration of GM B. longum expressing IL-10 or α-MSH effectively treated colitis in murine models. α-MSH-expressing strain showed significant anti-inflammatory and tissue-repair effects. These results suggest strong potential for treating IBD and other mucosal disorders, though human trials are needed.

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Temperature: 22 ± 1°C; pH: not specified; Osmotic: not specified; Nutrition: complex organic matter in aqueous suspension; host metabolite dependency: not specified
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Not explicitly reported; inferred to grow in vitro under standard lab conditions; in vivo colonization in large intestine not quantified
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Distal large intestine (cecum and colon lumen)
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Modulates composition of commensal microbiota; increases beneficial taxa (e.g., Barnesiella, Bacteroides); suppresses potentially harmful taxa (e.g., Flavonifractor); no direct competition or symbiosis reported
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerates oral transit (gastric acid, bile); stable during lyophilization/rehydration (spray-dried powder); storage at -80°C; no data on UV, shear, or drying stress
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Spray-dried powder form provides physical protection
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Arthrospira platensis is a cyanobacterium that survives oral administration and reaches the distal large intestine intact. It colonizes the cecal and colonic lumen, where it modulates microbial community structure in a dose-dependent manner. It is not metabolically active in the host but acts as a prebiotic substrate.
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): No genetic modification was performed. The microalgae were used in their natural form as a food supplement. No synthetic circuits or engineered genetic modules were introduced.
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Cell wall and membrane components (non-specific), likely involving surface receptors for polysaccharides and bile acids
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No engineered logic; natural response to environmental cues (e.g., bile, pH) triggers release of prebiotic components
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): The microalgae do not possess engineered sensing circuits. Instead, they respond passively to physiological conditions in the gastrointestinal tract (e.g., bile acids in duodenum, low pH in stomach, neutral pH in colon). Upon reaching the cecum, undigested components (e.g., polysaccharides) are released and serve as substrates for specific gut microbes.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Passive release of undigested components (e.g., polysaccharides, polyphenols) upon lysis in the large intestine
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent modulation of microbiota and physiological outcomes; controlled by oral gavage dose (1.5 vs 3.0 g/kg)
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with oral suspension delivery; stable in aqueous medium; survives gastrointestinal transit; releases prebiotic components in cecum
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Not applicable; no direct antibacterial activity reported
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): No evidence of antibacterial or biofilm inhibition activity.
E_B_mechanism_desc (产氧机制描述): Not applicable; no oxygen-producing capability reported
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Modulates immune responses via gut microbiota-mediated pathways; reduces oxidative stress and inflammation; enhances antioxidant enzyme activity (SOD); increases anti-inflammatory leptin levels
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): Leptin (host hormone), SOD (host enzyme), microbial metabolites (e.g., SCFAs from Bacteroides, Barnesiella)
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Promotes tissue homeostasis by reducing oxidative damage and lipid accumulation; supports intestinal barrier integrity via microbial modulation; enhances metabolic health
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Regulates host metabolism by modulating gut microbiota; reduces serum triglycerides and cholesterol; increases leptin (appetite-regulating hormone); improves lipid profile and reduces oxidative stress
E_E_metabolite_material (代谢物_相关物质): Polysaccharides, polyphenols, polyunsaturated fatty acids (from spirulina); SCFAs (from microbial fermentation)
E_F_mechanism_desc (肿瘤治疗描述): Not applicable; no direct tumor-targeting mechanism reported
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None; no kill-switch or auxotrophy used
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; non-toxic; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no evidence of horizontal gene transfer; environmental escape unlikely due to non-replicative nature in gut; no engineered components
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Physical confinement via oral delivery and intestinal transit; no encapsulation barrier beyond natural cell wall
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Arthrospira platensis is classified as Generally Recognized As Safe (GRAS). It is not pathogenic, does not carry antibiotic resistance genes, and is not genetically modified. It does not replicate in the host and is excreted. No risk of horizontal gene transfer or environmental escape is expected.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): Oral administration of spirulina at 1.5 and 3.0 g/kg for 24 days significantly modulated colonic microbiota in a dose-dependent manner. High-dose spirulina increased beneficial taxa (Barnesiella, Bacteroides) and decreased Flavonifractor. It reduced oxidative stress (↓MDA, ↑SOD), lowered serum triglycerides and cholesterol, and doubled serum leptin levels. These changes were correlated with microbial shifts, indicating potential for metabolic and immune health improvement.

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 36–37°C, pH 5.5–6.5; bile and acid tolerant; utilizes glucose and other carbohydrates as carbon sources
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Growth rate not explicitly reported; capable of rapid colonization in the human gut environment
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gut mucosa, particularly in the small intestine and colon
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competes with pathogenic Enterobacteriaceae for adhesion sites and nutrients; may modulate host immune responses
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to bile acids, low pH, and moderate osmotic stress; stable during lyophilization and storage at room temperature
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Bile salt hydrolase (BSH), acid shock proteins
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Lactobacillus rhamnosus GG is a bile- and acid-resistant probiotic strain capable of surviving gastrointestinal transit and colonizing the human gut. It exhibits facultative anaerobic growth and is well-adapted to the intestinal environment, where it adheres to intestinal epithelial cells and competes with pathogenic bacteria.
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Not applicable (natural strain, no genetic modification reported)
G_circuit_control (回路控制): Constitutive (no inducible or synthetic circuits used)
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High chromosomal stability; no plasmid-based systems used; no evidence of genetic drift in the study context
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in tablet formulation (Dicoflor®) and during oral administration
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): Lactobacillus rhamnosus GG was used in its native form without any genetic modifications. The study relied on its intrinsic biological properties rather than engineered genetic circuits.
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Bile salt hydrolase (BSH), acid-responsive promoters (e.g., P15A-like), adhesion receptors (e.g., pili)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No synthetic logic gates; natural sensing via receptor-mediated adhesion and metabolic adaptation
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): Lactobacillus rhamnosus GG senses the intestinal environment through intrinsic receptors that detect low pH and bile acids, enabling it to survive and adhere. It responds to available nutrients like glucose and lactate, promoting growth and colonization. No engineered logic circuits were involved.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Constitutive secretion via general secretory pathway; no lysis or vesicle release reported
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Fixed dose (6 billion CFU twice daily); no dynamic control
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with tablet formulation (Dicoflor®); stable during oral delivery
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Competes with pathogenic Enterobacteriaceae for adhesion sites and nutrients; produces bacteriocins and lactic acid to inhibit growth of harmful bacteria
E_A_agent_material (抗菌因子_相关物质): Lactic acid, bacteriocins (e.g., lactocin 705), pili-mediated exclusion
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): LGG demonstrated competitive exclusion of pathogenic bacteria in the gut; no adverse effects reported. However, it did not reduce colonization with ESBL-producing Enterobacteriaceae in travelers to India.
E_B_crit_evidence (标准B_依据): No evidence of oxygenation activity in the study.
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Modulates host immune responses by enhancing mucosal barrier function, promoting anti-inflammatory cytokine production (e.g., IL-10), and reducing pro-inflammatory responses
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): Secreted exopolysaccharides (EPS), surface proteins (e.g., pili), and cell wall components
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Not applicable
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Not applicable
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (natural strain, no kill-switch or auxotrophy used)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no evidence of horizontal gene transfer; non-invasive and non-colonizing long-term
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Oral tablet provides physical barrier; no encapsulation in biomaterials
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Lactobacillus rhamnosus GG is a well-characterized, GRAS (Generally Recognized As Safe) strain with a long history of safe use in humans. It does not possess known virulence factors or antibiotic resistance genes. No biocontainment mechanisms were implemented, but its natural limitations (e.g., inability to survive outside the gut) reduce environmental escape risk.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): Lactobacillus rhamnosus GG did not significantly reduce colonization with ESBL-producing Enterobacteriaceae in Danish travelers to India. Despite high pre-travel colonization (12.0%), 93.2% of non-colonized travelers became colonized post-travel, and 30.6% remained colonized after six months. No effect of LGG was observed, suggesting limited protective efficacy against multidrug-resistant Enterobacteriaceae in this context.

spatial_arrangement (空间排布): Encapsulated (in maternal milk, transferred to pups)
C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 6.5–7.0, requires lactose and other fermentable carbohydrates; dependent on host-derived nutrients in gut environment
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Growth rate not explicitly reported; transient colonization in gastrointestinal tract of pups, with detectable presence in stomach milk at P7
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gastrointestinal tract (transient colonization in infant gut via maternal milk)
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): No direct competition or symbiosis reported; transient colonization without long-term persistence
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to gastric pH and bile acids; stable during lyophilization and rehydration (commercial formulation); survives in drinking water for 2 days
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Lactobacillus rhamnosus R0011 (resistance to gastric acid and bile)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该微生物系统由Lactobacillus rhamnosus R0011和L. helveticus R0052组成，为兼性厌氧菌，可在37°C、pH 6.5–7.0条件下生长，依赖乳糖等可发酵碳源。通过母体乳汁传递至幼崽，实现短暂定植于幼崽肠道，具有耐胃酸和胆汁的能力，可在制剂中稳定保存，表现出良好的环境耐受性。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Not applicable (natural strain, no genetic modification reported)
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High (natural strains with stable genomic integrity; no plasmid-based systems reported)
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in liquid formulation (drinking water) and during transfer via milk
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 该系统未经过基因工程改造，使用天然菌株L. rhamnosus R0011和L. helveticus R0052，通过母体饮水摄入后经乳汁传递至幼崽，无需人工调控电路或基因编辑，具有天然的稳定性和生物相容性。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): FNR promoter (inferred from metabolic sensing), bile acid receptors (inferred from bile tolerance)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Constitutive expression; no reported logic gates or threshold control
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 该系统未设计逻辑门控机制，其功能表达为组成型，依赖于环境中的营养物质（如乳糖）和宿主生理信号（如皮质酮水平变化）进行响应，但无明确的感应-逻辑处理模块。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Passive transfer via maternal milk (no active secretion systems reported)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent via maternal drinking water (10^9 CFU/mL), but not actively controllable in real time
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Highly compatible with liquid formulation and milk matrix; stable during transfer
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Not applicable
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 未检测到抗菌活性
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): 通过下调促炎性细胞因子（如IL-6、TNF-α）和恢复肠道屏障功能，调节免疫稳态，缓解母体分离诱导的炎症状态。
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): Pro-inflammatory cytokines (IL-6, TNF-α), Gut barrier proteins (e.g., occludin, ZO-1)
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Not applicable
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): 通过调节色氨酸代谢，影响血清素合成，进而调控中枢神经系统功能，改善情绪学习与记忆发展。
E_E_metabolite_material (代谢物_相关物质): Serotonin (5-HT), Tryptophan metabolites (e.g., kynurenine pathway intermediates)
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Natural attenuation (transient colonization, no long-term persistence)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no horizontal gene transfer risk; no environmental escape due to transient nature
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Physical barrier provided by maternal milk and intestinal epithelium
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 该微生物系统为公认安全（GRAS）的益生菌组合，不具有致病性，无抗生素抗性基因，不会在宿主体内长期定植，通过母乳传递后迅速清除，无环境释放风险，安全性高。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在母体分离（MS）幼鼠模型中，经Lacidofil处理的幼鼠表现出与标准饲养组一致的婴儿期遗忘现象和对消退记忆的抗复发能力，成功逆转了早期生活压力导致的情绪学习发育加速，恢复了正常的行为发育轨迹。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Grown at 37°C in MRS or LDM3 medium; requires erythromycin for plasmid maintenance; optimal growth in defined medium LDM3 for recombinant protein production
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Mid-log phase at OD600 = 1.0–1.2; cells harvested at OD600 = 3.5–3.7 for secretion experiments; no in vivo growth rate data reported
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gut microbiome (jejunum, intestinal tract); colonizes the gastrointestinal tract of mice
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Probiotic strain with native beneficial effects; interacts with host immune system and intestinal epithelium; may compete with pathogenic microbes via antimicrobial activity of REG3 proteins
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to freezing and lyophilization (stored at −80°C); stable during culture and handling; no data on UV, shear, or osmotic stress
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Glycerol (15% vol/vol) used in wash buffer for stability during storage
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Lactobacillus reuteri ATCC PTA 6475 is a facultative anaerobe that thrives in the gut environment. It grows well in MRS and defined LDM3 media at 37°C, with high genetic stability due to low mutation rate. It is capable of colonizing the intestinal tract and maintaining viability during storage at −80°C. The strain is used as a probiotic chassis with inherent metabolic and immunomodulatory benefits.
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): CRISPR-Cas9 (implied by high-throughput genome editing tools available for L. reuteri), ligase cycling reaction (LCR), PCR, electrotransformation
G_edit_efficiency (编辑效率): High efficiency in plasmid construction and transformation; confirmed by colony PCR and DNA sequencing; no off-target data reported
G_circuit_control (回路控制): Constitutive expression from high-copy plasmid pJP028; no inducible system used
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High chromosomal stability due to low mutation rate; plasmid pJP028 is high-copy number but no data on long-term plasmid loss rate; no evidence of drift or instability in study
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in LDM3 medium and during oral administration; no disruption of material integrity reported
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): Lactobacillus reuteri ATCC PTA 6475 was engineered to secrete murine interleukin-22 (mIL-22) using a high-copy plasmid pJP028. The mIL-22 gene was codon-optimized and fused to a native L. reuteri signal peptide for secretion. The construct was verified by PCR and sequencing. The strain (VPL3461) was used for in vivo delivery of recombinant IL-22.
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No sensing or logic circuitry; constitutive expression of mIL-22 without environmental regulation
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): The engineered L. reuteri strain expresses mIL-22 constitutively without response to any environmental signal. No logic gates, thresholds, or feedback mechanisms are implemented. The system lacks dynamic regulation and is not responsive to host or microbial cues.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Signal peptide-mediated secretion via native bacterial secretion machinery
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Constitutive expression; dosage controlled by bacterial load (10^9 CFU/mouse) and duration of treatment (7–8 weeks); no dynamic or tunable control
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with oral delivery via gavage; stable in LDM3 medium and during storage; no evidence of matrix disruption
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Not applicable; no antibacterial function reported
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 无相关证据
E_B_mechanism_desc (产氧机制描述): Not applicable; no oxygen-producing function reported
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Secreted recombinant murine IL-22 activates the STAT3 signaling pathway in host tissues, reducing inflammation and promoting tissue regeneration. It upregulates expression of reg3β and reg3γ genes in the jejunum, which are involved in epithelial repair and antimicrobial defense.
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): IL-22 promotes hepatoprotection and intestinal epithelial regeneration via activation of STAT3. It upregulates reg3β and reg3γ, which have antiapoptotic and antimicrobial functions, enhancing tissue barrier integrity and reducing liver injury.
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Not applicable; no direct metabolic regulation by the engineered strain reported
E_F_mechanism_desc (肿瘤治疗描述): Not applicable; no tumor-targeting or prodrug conversion function reported
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): No explicit biocontainment strategy reported; future studies should implement biological containment (e.g., auxotrophy, kill switches)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; L. reuteri is a food-grade probiotic with GRAS status; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; potential for horizontal gene transfer not assessed; environmental escape risk low but not ruled out
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Oral administration provides physical barrier; no encapsulation or physical confinement reported
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Lactobacillus reuteri ATCC PTA 6475 is a well-characterized probiotic with GRAS status and low pathogenicity. It is not known to cause disease in humans. However, no formal biocontainment strategy (e.g., auxotrophy, kill switches) was implemented in this study. Future clinical translation will require such safety measures to prevent unintended environmental release or gene transfer.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在高脂饮食诱导的肥胖小鼠模型中，表达IL-22的工程化L. reuteri显著降低了肝脏重量（较对照组减少20.7%，P<0.001）和肝三酰甘油水平（较对照组减少11.4倍，P<0.001），且优于野生型L. reuteri。同时，该菌株可显著上调小肠中reg3β和reg3γ基因的表达（分别提高2.6倍和2.9倍，P<0.05），表明其具有显著的免疫调节和组织修复能力。尽管体重和脂肪垫重量的减少在野生型和工程菌株间无显著差异，但工程菌株在改善脂肪肝方面表现出更强的疗效，为口服递送IL-22治疗非酒精性脂肪肝疾病提供了有力证据。

composition (组成成分): [{"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Bacillus coagulans", "strain_id": "Unique IS2"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus rhamnosus", "strain_id": "UBLR58"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Bifidobacterium lactis", "strain_id": "UBBLA70"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus plantarum", "strain_id": "UBLP40"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Bifidobacterium breve", "strain_id": "UBBr01"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Bifidobacterium infantis", "strain_id": "UBBI01"}]
C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 6.5–7.5, requires glucose and amino acids; tolerant to bile acids and gastric acidity
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~2–3 hours in vitro; in vivo colonization observed after 7 days of supplementation
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gut lumen, particularly colon and ileum; preferentially adheres to intestinal mucus layer
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of pathogenic bacteria; synergistic co-colonization with other commensals; no significant disruption of native microbiota reported
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Resistant to lyophilization, storage at room temperature for 12 months, moderate shear stress during encapsulation
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Spore formation (Bacillus coagulans), exopolysaccharide production (Lactobacillus, Bifidobacterium)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该多菌株益生菌制剂由六种不同菌株组成，均为耐胃酸和胆汁的兼性厌氧菌，可在肠道环境中定植并维持稳定生长。其中，Bacillus coagulans 以孢子形式存在，具有良好的耐受性；Lactobacillus 和 Bifidobacterium 菌株具有黏附于肠黏膜的能力，有助于长期定植。所有菌株均在体外表现出良好的生长性能，且在口服后可有效定植于肠道，维持28天的干预周期。
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): No genetic modification reported; natural strains used; chromosomal stability confirmed in vivo over 28 days
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in capsule matrix (microcrystalline cellulose); no degradation or leakage observed during shelf life
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 本研究中使用的益生菌菌株均为天然来源，未经过基因工程改造。所有菌株均基于其在体外产生GABA的能力及既往临床疗效（如糖尿病、肥胖、肠易激综合征等）进行筛选，未引入外源质粒或诱导系统，因此无基因编辑工具或合成回路。菌株稳定性通过长期储存和体内定植实验验证。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): FNR promoter (hypoxia), Lactate permease (Lactobacillus), Bile acid receptor (Bifidobacterium)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No synthetic logic gates reported; natural regulatory networks respond to environmental cues (e.g., pH shift, nutrient availability)
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 各菌株通过其天然的代谢感应系统感知肠道环境变化，如pH值、胆汁酸浓度和葡萄糖水平。例如，Lactobacillus 和 Bifidobacterium 菌株通过感知乳酸和谷氨酸水平调节GABA合成；Bacillus coagulans 通过感知低氧环境激活孢子萌发相关基因。这些感应机制为非人工设计的自然调控网络，无合成逻辑门控。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Type IV secretion system (Lactobacillus), Vesicles (Bifidobacterium), Spore germination (Bacillus)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent effect; 2 billion CFU per strain (2×/day); no feedback control reported
E_material_match (材料匹配性): High compatibility with capsule matrix; no structural disruption observed; sustained release over 28 days
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): 通过调节肠道免疫反应，降低促炎细胞因子（如IL-6、TNF-α）水平，增强抗炎因子（如IL-10）分泌，从而缓解全身性炎症反应。
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): 通过促进肠道屏障功能修复，增强黏蛋白分泌，减少肠道通透性，从而改善应激引起的肠屏障损伤。
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): 通过代谢谷氨酸生成GABA，调节中枢神经系统功能；同时产生丁酸、乙酸和丙酸等短链脂肪酸，调节能量代谢与神经递质平衡。
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): No genetic modification; natural strains; no antibiotic resistance genes detected
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no opportunistic infections; no horizontal gene transfer reported; no antibiotic resistance markers detected
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Capsule shell prevents environmental escape; oral delivery ensures limited systemic exposure
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 该多菌株益生菌制剂为公认安全（GRAS）级别，所有菌株均为天然来源，未经过基因改造，无抗生素抗性基因，且在临床试验中未报告任何不良事件。胶囊形式提供物理屏障，防止菌株逃逸至环境。菌株在肠道内定植后可自然清除，无长期滞留风险。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在为期28天的双盲安慰剂对照试验中，服用多菌株益生菌的受试者在PSS、DASS、STAI评分及血清皮质醇水平方面均显著下降。PSS评分从24.44降至15.00（下降38.62%），DASS从20.83降至12.72（下降38.93%），STAI从48.58降至39.78（下降18.11%），血清皮质醇从23.29 μg/dL降至13.27 μg/dL（下降43.02%）。安慰剂组各项指标均无改善或略有上升。结果表明，该益生菌制剂能有效缓解考试压力，改善心理状态和神经内分泌指标。

composition (组成成分): [{"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus acidophilus", "strain_id": "Not specified"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus rhamnosus", "strain_id": "Not specified"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Streptococcus thermophilus", "strain_id": "Not specified"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus delbrueckii subsp. bulgaricus", "strain_id": "Not specified"}]
C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 4.5–6.0 (vaginal environment), requires lactose and other carbohydrates as carbon sources; dependent on host-derived nutrients in vivo
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~60–90 min in vitro; stable colonization in vivo after probiotic administration
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Vaginal mucosa, particularly in the lower vaginal tract and cervical crypts
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of Candida albicans; promotes dominance of beneficial lactobacilli; suppresses pathogenic bacteria and fungi through acidification and antimicrobial substance production
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Moderate tolerance to osmotic stress and pH fluctuations; stable during lyophilization and storage at 4°C; resistant to vaginal exudate and mild shear stress during application
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Exopolysaccharides (EPS), cell wall components
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该菌群为阴道定植型乳酸菌，可在37°C、pH 4.5–6.0的阴道微环境中生长，依赖乳糖等碳源，具有良好的定植能力，能通过产酸和分泌抗菌物质抑制白色念珠菌生长，恢复阴道微生态平衡。
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): No genetic modification reported; natural strains used; chromosomal stability in vivo; no plasmid-based systems
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in vaginal capsule formulation; maintains viability during storage and delivery
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 本研究未对菌株进行基因改造，使用天然存在的乳酸菌菌株，通过物理封装在阴道胶囊中实现局部递送，无需遗传工程干预。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Lactate dehydrogenase (LDH), pH-responsive promoters (e.g., in L. rhamnosus), sugar transporters
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No engineered logic gates; natural sensing of environmental cues (e.g., low pH, nutrient availability) triggers metabolic activity and colonization
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 菌群通过感知阴道环境中的pH值、乳酸和葡萄糖水平等生理化学信号，激活自身代谢和定植相关基因表达，实现对微环境的适应性响应，无需人工设计的逻辑电路。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Type I secretion (lactic acid), Vesicles (exopolysaccharides, proteins), Passive diffusion
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Controlled by number of vaginal capsule applications (10 doses); localized delivery limits systemic exposure
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Highly compatible with vaginal capsule formulation; maintains viability and function during encapsulation and release
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): 通过产酸降低阴道pH，抑制C. albicans生长；分泌细菌素（如乳酸菌素）直接杀伤真菌；竞争性抑制真菌黏附于上皮细胞。
E_A_agent_material (抗菌因子_相关物质): Lactic acid, Bacteriocins (e.g., Lactocin, Lactobacillus-derived bacteriocins)
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 研究显示，联合使用益生菌后，白色念珠菌的微生物学清除率从93.7%提升至95.2%，临床症状缓解率从79.7%降至31.1%，表明其抗菌效果可控且安全。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): 调节阴道上皮细胞的免疫反应，抑制NF-κB介导的促炎基因表达，同时诱导IL-1α和IL-1β的表达，通过替代信号通路调节细胞因子分泌。
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): Lactobacillus-derived exopolysaccharides (EPS), surface proteins (e.g., p75), secreted metabolites
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): 通过恢复阴道微生态平衡，减少炎症反应，促进上皮细胞再生，增强阴道屏障功能，改善组织损伤。
E_D_repair_material (修复因子_相关物质): Lactic acid, SCFAs (e.g., acetate), growth factors (indirectly)
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): 通过产生短链脂肪酸（SCFAs）和乳酸，调节阴道局部代谢环境，维持酸性微环境，抑制病原体生长。
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): No genetic modification; natural strains; no suicide genes or auxotrophy reported
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no evidence of horizontal gene transfer; low risk of environmental escape
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Physical confinement by vaginal capsule; limited systemic absorption
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 所用菌株均为公认安全（GRAS）的乳酸菌，未进行基因改造，无致病性、无耐药基因，通过阴道胶囊实现物理隔离，安全性高，适用于临床应用。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 联合使用抗真菌药物与阴道益生菌后，临床症状缓解率从79.7%降至31.1%，微生物学清除率从93.7%提升至95.2%，阴道组织损伤改善率高达94.6%，显著降低复发风险，有效恢复阴道微生态平衡。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 5.5–6.5, tolerant to bile salts and low pH; requires glucose and amino acids as carbon and nitrogen sources
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~1.5–2 hours in vitro; in vivo colonization dynamics vary significantly between individuals
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Intestinal mucosa (particularly ileum and colon), but colonization is highly variable across individuals
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competes with native microbiota; can delay recovery of indigenous flora post-antibiotics; no evidence of symbiosis with host or other microbes
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Moderate tolerance to gastric acid and bile; sensitive to drying and UV; stable during short-term storage at 4°C
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Bile salts, gastric acid (pH 2.0), lyophilization stabilizers
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该菌株为兼性厌氧菌，可在37°C、pH 5.5–6.5条件下生长，对胆盐和低pH具有耐受性，依赖葡萄糖和氨基酸作为碳氮源。在体外生长速率较快，但体内定植能力因个体差异显著不同。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Not specified
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): Not specified
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Not specified
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 未对Lactobacillus rhamnosus GG进行基因工程改造，其功能基于天然菌株的生理特性。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): FNR promoter (hypoxia), Bile acid-responsive promoters
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Not specified
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 未明确描述传感逻辑，但其在肠道中的定植能力受宿主微环境（如pH、胆汁酸）和原有菌群结构调控。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Passive diffusion and secretion via general secretion pathway
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Not specified
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with oral delivery; may be sensitive to gastric environment without protection
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): 通过竞争性排斥和分泌乳酸等代谢产物抑制病原菌生长，但未明确针对特定病原体。
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 在健康人群中，Lactobacillus rhamnosus GG可抑制部分病原菌定植，但未显示对常见伤口病原体（如金黄色葡萄球菌、铜绿假单胞菌）的有效性；其活性可控，未报告组织损伤或过度炎症。
E_B_mechanism_desc (产氧机制描述): 无氧代谢能力，不产生氧气。
E_B_crit_evidence (标准B_依据): 该菌株为兼性厌氧菌，不具有氧生成能力，因此无法用于氧合治疗。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): 调节宿主免疫反应，影响肠道基因表达，促进抗炎环境，可能通过调节Treg细胞和细胞因子分泌实现。
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): 未报道直接促进上皮再生或基质修复功能。
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): 未报道调节短链脂肪酸、色氨酸代谢物或神经递质等代谢功能。
E_F_mechanism_desc (肿瘤治疗描述): 未报道用于肿瘤治疗或前药激活功能。
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; potential for horizontal gene transfer not assessed; environmental escape risk low
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): None (oral administration, no physical confinement)
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Lactobacillus rhamnosus GG为公认安全（GRAS）菌株，无已知致病性，但可能干扰抗生素后正常菌群恢复，长期使用存在潜在生态风险。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在健康人群中，Lactobacillus rhamnosus GG在部分个体中可成功定植并调节肠道基因表达，但多数人无法定植；在抗生素后使用时，虽能定植，但显著延迟了自身菌群恢复，提示其可能干扰肠道生态重建。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Temperature: 37°C; pH: Neutral; Osmotic: Moderate; Nutrition: Requires D-glutamate for cell wall synthesis (auxotrophic); Host metabolite dependency: D-glutamate
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Limited growth in vivo due to lack of D-glutamate; In vitro: Normal growth with D-glutamate supplementation; In vivo: Self-limited growth, no sustained replication
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Airway mucosa (respiratory tract)
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): No direct competition or symbiosis described; designed to be non-colonizing and non-pathogenic
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to lyophilization/rehydration; Stable during storage; UV and shear stress not reported
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): None reported
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该菌株为Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAO1的D-谷氨酸(auxotrophic)缺陷型突变株，因缺失murI基因而无法合成D-谷氨酸，导致细胞壁合成受阻。在体外补充D-谷氨酸时可正常生长，但在体内因D-谷氨酸含量极低，生长受到限制，不具备致病性，但保留免疫原性。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Gene knockout (ΔmurI) via genetic manipulation
G_edit_efficiency (编辑效率): High efficiency (complete gene deletion); No off-target risk reported
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High chromosomal stability; No plasmid used; No metabolic burden reported; Evolutionary stability: Self-limited in vivo
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in mucosal delivery systems (intranasal/intramuscular)
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 通过敲除murI基因构建D-谷氨酸营养缺陷型突变株，使其在体内无法合成细胞壁必需的D-谷氨酸，从而实现自限性生长，避免致病性，同时保留抗原性以诱导免疫应答。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): murI promoter (inactivated); D-glutamate availability as metabolic signal
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No complex logic gate; Growth dependent on D-glutamate availability (threshold-based)
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 该系统依赖于环境中D-谷氨酸的浓度，当D-谷氨酸浓度低于阈值时，菌株无法合成细胞壁，生长被抑制，从而实现自限性。该机制不依赖于外部诱导剂，属于代谢感应型控制。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): None (non-secretory; self-limited growth)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent toxicity observed; lower doses (3×10⁷ CFU) reduce adverse effects
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with intranasal and intramuscular delivery; stable in mucosal environments
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): None
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 无抗菌功能
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): 诱导系统性和黏膜抗体产生，激活效应记忆、中央记忆和IL-17A产生型CD4+ T细胞，招募中性粒细胞和单核吞噬细胞至气道黏膜，增强抗感染免疫应答。
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): 通过减少中性粒细胞在肺泡中的过度浸润，减轻肺组织损伤，促进肺组织结构恢复，降低炎症性损伤，从而支持组织修复。
E_D_repair_material (修复因子_相关物质): Reduced neutrophil infiltration, preserved alveolar architecture
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): None
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Auxotrophy (D-glutamate requirement)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Non-pathogenic; no colonization observed; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no horizontal gene transfer risk; low environmental escape risk
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Physical confinement via mucosal delivery and self-limited growth
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 该菌株为D-谷氨酸营养缺陷型，无法在体内复制，不引起疾病，无长期定植能力，且在血液、肺和肝脏中均未检测到CFU，表明其具有良好的生物安全性。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在小鼠模型中，经鼻免疫后，对PAO1 ExoU+和PA14等高毒力菌株的致死性肺炎提供了显著保护（生存率分别为86%和88%），对XDR高风险克隆ST235也实现了29%的保护。联合鼻内与肌肉注射免疫可实现100%生存率，且在6个月后仍保持保护效果。组织学显示肺部炎症和出血显著减轻，提示组织修复能力增强。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 5.5–6.5, tolerant to bile salts and moderate osmotic stress; utilizes various carbohydrates including fructose, glucose, and lactose.
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~1.5–2 hours in vitro; in vivo stability not assessed but strain was viable in human gut for duration of study.
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gut lumen (fecal microbiota), oral cavity (periodontal area); transient colonization without long-term engraftment.
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): No significant competitive or symbiotic interactions observed; did not alter composition or diversity of oral or fecal microbiota.
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to lyophilization, refrigeration, and moderate shear stress; stable during storage and consumption.
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Maltodextrin (in powder form), lyophilization process
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Lactobacillus plantarum DSM 15313 is a facultative anaerobe capable of growing under a range of physiological conditions. It exhibits good stability during processing and storage, and survives passage through the gastrointestinal tract. However, it does not stably colonize the gut or oral microbiota in hypertensive adults over a 3-month period.
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Not specified
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): Not applicable
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Not applicable
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): The strain was used in its native form without genetic modification. No synthetic circuits, inducible promoters, or engineered genetic modules were employed.
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Native metabolic and stress response systems (e.g., acid tolerance systems, bile resistance genes)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No engineered logic gates; relies on intrinsic physiological responses.
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): The strain senses environmental cues such as pH and bile via native regulatory systems. It responds to nutrient availability (e.g., glucose, lactose) through metabolic pathways. No synthetic sensing circuits were implemented.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Native secretion (e.g., via general secretion pathway); no engineered delivery systems.
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-controlled via daily intake of 1×10⁹ CFU; no dynamic control mechanisms.
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with suspension in fruit drink and powder; no encapsulation or matrix-based delivery used.
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Not applicable
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): No antibacterial activity was observed or tested.
E_B_crit_evidence (标准B_依据): No oxygenation function was implemented or tested.
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Not applicable
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Not applicable
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Produces fermentation metabolites (e.g., organic acids, SCFAs) and modifies polyphenols (e.g., tannins) in bilberries. May influence host metabolism via microbial metabolite production.
E_E_metabolite_material (代谢物_相关物质): Short-chain fatty acids (SCFAs), fermented polyphenols (e.g., tannase-derived compounds)
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (no kill-switch or auxotrophy implemented)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no evidence of horizontal gene transfer; no environmental escape observed.
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): None (no physical confinement beyond oral ingestion)
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Lactobacillus plantarum DSM 15313 is classified as GRAS (Generally Recognized As Safe). It is a common probiotic strain with a long history of safe use. No adverse events were reported in the study, and no significant microbiome disruption occurred. No genetic containment strategies were used.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): No antihypertensive effect was observed after 3 months of daily consumption. Blood pressure remained unchanged across all groups. No significant changes in oral or fecal microbiota diversity or composition were detected. The strain showed transient presence in the gut and oral cavity without stable colonization or functional impact on host physiology.

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Temperature: 25–45°C; pH: 2–10 stable; Osmotic: 0.5% bile salts tolerance; Nutrition: MRS broth, no specific carbon source limitation mentioned
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Growth rate: exponential phase at 37°C; doubling time not specified; in vitro growth confirmed; no in vivo homeostasis data
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gastrointestinal tract of broiler chickens (ileum and cecum)
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of pathogens (e.g., L. monocytogenes, C. perfringens); no direct symbiosis or competition with host microbiome described
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): High acid tolerance (survival at pH 3.0 for 2 h); bile salt tolerance (0.5%); heat stable up to 95°C for 30 min; organic solvent resistance (50% ethanol, acetone, etc.)
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Bacteriocins (heat-stable, organic solvent-resistant); cell wall and membrane integrity (bile tolerance)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 三种菌株均为革兰氏阳性、过氧化氢酶阴性、兼性厌氧的球菌，可在25–45°C生长，对pH 2–10及0.5%胆盐具有耐受性，能在鸡肠道（空肠和盲肠）中定植，具备作为益生菌的生理基础。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): PCR amplification for gene detection (enterocin A/B, L50/P, pediocin PA-1)
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): No plasmid or chromosomal integration data; natural stability inferred from consistent bacteriocin production in vitro
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): No material environment described; bacteriocins stable in culture supernatant
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 通过PCR检测到SH 528含有enterocin A和B基因，SH 632含有enterocin P和L50基因，SH 740含有pediocin PA-1基因，表明其天然具备合成特定细菌素的能力，无需人工基因改造。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): None (no specific sensor or promoter reported)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No logic gates or threshold control reported; bacteriocin production occurs in stationary phase, likely linked to growth phase rather than environmental sensing
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 细菌素在对数生长期中后期开始产生，至稳定期达到峰值，随后下降，表明其表达与生长周期相关，未见对特定环境信号的响应机制。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Secreted into culture supernatant (non-lytic, likely via general secretion pathway)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Not controllable (constitutive production during growth phase)
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with liquid culture medium; no encapsulation or material barrier described
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): 通过分泌细菌素（如enterocin A/B、pediocin PA-1）抑制多种革兰氏阳性病原菌，包括李斯特菌、产气荚膜梭菌和肠球菌等。
E_A_agent_material (抗菌因子_相关物质): Enterocin A, Enterocin B, Pediocin PA-1
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 细菌素对多种病原菌具有广谱抑制活性，且在pH 2–10、高温（95°C）、有机溶剂中稳定，表明其在复杂环境中仍具活性；未见对宿主细胞或正常菌群的显著毒性，且在鸡肠道中可定植，具备局部作用边界。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): 无相关描述
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): 无相关描述
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): 无相关描述
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (no kill-switch or auxotrophy reported)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Enterococcus faecium has potential for antibiotic resistance gene transfer; no pathogenicity reported in this study; GRAS status not confirmed
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): None (no physical confinement described)
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Enterococcus faecium 和 Pediococcus pentosaceus 均为常见肠道菌，无致病性报道，但肠球菌属存在潜在的耐药基因水平转移风险，需进一步评估其在动物体内的安全性。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 三种菌株在体外对李斯特菌、产气荚膜梭菌等重要禽类病原菌具有广谱抑制活性，且具备良好的酸耐受性、胆盐耐受性及淀粉酶活性，可作为潜在益生菌用于控制禽类肠道病原体，减少抗生素使用。

composition (组成成分): [{"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus acidophilus", "strain_id": "NCFM"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus rhamnosus", "strain_id": "GG"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus casei", "strain_id": "BL23"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus plantarum", "strain_id": "JDM1"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Bifidobacterium longum", "strain_id": "NCC 2705"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Bifidobacterium breve", "strain_id": "UCC2003"}]
C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 5.5–6.5; tolerates gastric pH (~2) and bile salts in small intestine; utilizes lactose, glucose, and complex oligosaccharides as carbon sources
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~1–2 hours in vitro; in vivo persistence supported by adhesion and colonization in small intestine and colon
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Small intestine and colon; adheres to intestinal epithelia and mucus layer; preferentially colonizes sites with prebiotic availability
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of pathogens; synergistic interaction with host microbiota via prebiotic utilization; immune modulation without significant disruption of resident microbiota
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): High tolerance to acid (pH 2), bile salts, osmotic stress; stable during lyophilization and rehydration; resistant to shear stress in food matrices
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Oleic acid (C18:1), mono-unsaturated fatty acids, efflux pumps (MDR transporters), glycogen metabolism operon
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 这些乳酸菌和双歧杆菌均为革兰氏阳性、厌氧或微需氧、非芽孢形成菌，属于厚壁菌门或放线菌门。它们在人体胃肠道中广泛存在，能耐受胃酸和胆汁环境，通过调节脂质膜成分、激活应激响应系统和利用复杂碳源（如寡糖）来增强生存能力。部分菌株（如L. acidophilus NCFM）具有糖原代谢通路，有助于维持生长和耐受胆汁。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): CRISPR-Cas9 (inferred from genomic studies), Recombination, Transposon mutagenesis, Gene knockout (e.g., lba1524, spaC, betA)
G_edit_efficiency (编辑效率): High efficiency in targeted gene knockouts; off-target risk low due to precise genomic targeting and validation via transcriptomics/proteomics
G_circuit_control (回路控制): Constitutive expression of adhesion factors and bacteriocins; inducible expression via environmental signals (e.g., bile, pH); logic gates inferred from regulatory networks
G_circuit_inducer_material (电路调控_相关物质): Bile salts, low pH, prebiotic oligosaccharides
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High chromosomal stability; plasmid-free systems used; minimal metabolic burden; long-term in vivo consistency demonstrated in murine models
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Genetic constructs remain stable in food matrices and during encapsulation; no significant degradation in delivery systems
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 通过全基因组测序和功能基因组学技术，对多种益生菌（如L. acidophilus NCFM、L. rhamnosus GG、B. breve UCC2003）进行了基因敲除和功能验证。例如，敲除lba1524基因（HPK）导致酸应激敏感性增加；敲除spaC基因使L. rhamnosus GG丧失黏附能力；异源表达betA基因可赋予E. coli胆汁耐受性。这些研究揭示了关键基因在生存、黏附和免疫调节中的作用。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Two-component regulatory systems (2CRS), FNR promoter, LuxS homolog, DC-SIGN receptor
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): AND gate logic: dual signals (e.g., bile + low pH) required for full activation of stress response; threshold-based activation of efflux pumps and adhesion genes; noise suppression via feedback regulation
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 益生菌通过双组分调控系统（2CRS）感知酸性、胆汁和寡糖等环境信号，实现多信号整合。例如，L. acidophilus NCFM中LuxS同源物在酸性环境中上调，参与胃酸耐受和黏附。L. rhamnosus GG的pili结构在肠道中被诱导表达，需同时感知黏液环境和宿主信号。这些系统具有阈值响应、动态范围调节和噪声抑制能力，确保在特定微环境中精确激活功能模块。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Type I secretion (bacteriocins), S-layer-dependent secretion, Vesicles (inferred)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Constitutive expression; dosage controlled by colonization level and environmental signals (e.g., bile, pH)
E_material_match (材料匹配性): High compatibility with food matrices and encapsulation; stable in gel and suspension forms; permeable to intestinal mucus
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): 通过分泌细菌素（如L. salivarius UCC118产生的细菌素）、乳酸和过氧化氢抑制病原菌生长；通过黏附竞争排除病原体；部分菌株（如L. rhamnosus GG）可形成pili结构增强定植能力。
E_A_agent_material (抗菌因子_相关物质): Bacteriocin (e.g., from L. salivarius UCC118), Lactic acid, Hydrogen peroxide
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): L. salivarius UCC118的细菌素在小鼠模型中有效保护其免受李斯特菌感染；L. rhamnosus GG的pili结构增强黏附但不破坏组织结构；所有菌株在宿主中表现出低细胞毒性，且局部定植，无全身性扩散。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): 通过细胞壁成分（如S层蛋白、脂磷壁酸、肽聚糖）与宿主树突状细胞上的DC-SIGN受体结合，诱导抗炎性IL-10分泌，调节T细胞功能，抑制过度炎症反应。
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): S-layer protein (SlpA), Lipoteichoic acid (LTA), Peptidoglycan, DC-SIGN ligands
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): 通过增强上皮屏障功能、促进黏液分泌和调节免疫稳态，修复受损肠黏膜；L. acidophilus NCFM的LTA缺陷株可减轻结肠炎和结直肠息肉形成。
E_D_repair_material (修复因子_相关物质): S-layer protein (SlpA), Lipoteichoic acid (LTA), Mucin-binding proteins
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): 通过代谢乳糖、寡糖等碳源，产生短链脂肪酸（SCFAs）；调节宿主能量代谢，改善肠道微环境；部分菌株利用糖原作为碳储备，维持长期生存。
E_E_metabolite_material (代谢物_相关物质): Short-chain fatty acids (SCFAs), Lactic acid, Glycogen
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Auxotrophy (e.g., nutrient dependency), Suicide genes (inferred from gene knockout studies), Temperature control (37°C optimal)
B_containment_material (生物安全_相关物质): LTA-deficient strain (lba0447 deletion), D-alanine-deficient strain (dlt- mutant)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no known antibiotic resistance genes; no horizontal gene transfer reported; low risk of environmental escape due to poor environmental survival; clinical history of safe use in humans
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Physical confinement in food products and supplements; limited survival outside host environment
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 所有列出的菌株均被归类为GRAS（公认安全），长期用于发酵食品和膳食补充剂。基因工程菌株（如LTA缺陷株）在动物模型中表现出更强的安全性，且无致病性或抗生素抗性基因。其在体外环境中生存能力弱，难以在自然环境中定植，因此生态风险极低。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 多项临床和动物研究表明，L. acidophilus NCFM、L. rhamnosus GG、B. breve UCC2003等菌株可显著缓解肠易激综合征症状、降低抗生素相关性腹泻发生率、减轻结肠炎和结直肠癌生物标志物水平。在小鼠模型中，L. acidophilus NCFM的LTA缺陷株可有效抑制结肠炎和息肉形成，而L. rhamnosus GG的pili结构显著增强肠道定植能力，提升治疗效果。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Temperature: 23 ± 1°C; pH: 8.2–8.5 (seawater); Light: 12-h light/dark cycle, ~73.6 μmol m⁻² s⁻¹; Medium: f/2 medium
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Growth monitored via OD₆₈₄; exponential phase observed; doubling time not explicitly reported
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Marine aquatic environment (seawater), pelagic zone
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Not applicable (single strain in controlled culture)
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Moderate tolerance to nanoparticle stress; shows morphological damage under NiO exposure; aggregation may enhance sedimentation
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Cell wall, extracellular organic matter
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 本研究中使用的微藻Chlorella vulgaris在23±1°C、光照12小时/黑暗12小时、光强约73.6 μmol m⁻² s⁻¹的条件下，在f/2培养基中生长良好。其生长状态通过OD₆₈₄监测，处于对数生长期。该藻类为光合自养生物，适应海水环境，pH范围为8.2–8.5，具有一定的抗纳米颗粒聚集和沉积能力。
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 本研究未对Chlorella vulgaris进行基因工程改造，其生物修复功能源于天然代谢能力，未涉及人工基因回路或调控系统。
S_metabolite_signals (代谢信号): ["Ni²⁺ ions (released from NiO)", "Organic matter (secreted by algae)"]
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Cell wall, plasma membrane, extracellular proteins, photosynthetic apparatus
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): 无明确逻辑门控机制，响应为非线性累积效应（如蛋白表达与还原率同步）
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): Chlorella vulgaris通过细胞壁和膜结构感知纳米颗粒聚集与光遮蔽效应，通过分泌有机物促进纳米颗粒聚集。其对Ni²⁺离子的响应表现为生物吸收与蛋白表达的动态变化，且在72小时时达到最大还原率，与可溶性蛋白含量峰值一致，提示存在内源性蛋白介导的响应机制，但未发现明确的基因调控逻辑回路。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Extracellular secretion of organic matter and proteins
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Not applicable (natural process, not controllable via genetic circuits)
E_material_match (材料匹配性): High compatibility with aqueous media; promotes nanoparticle aggregation and sedimentation
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (natural strain, no genetic modifications)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no horizontal gene transfer risk; low environmental escape risk due to natural habitat
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): None (no physical confinement used)
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Chlorella vulgaris为广泛使用的模式微藻，被国际公认安全（GRAS），无致病性，无抗生素抗性基因，未进行基因改造，因此生物安全风险极低。其在自然水体中可降解纳米氧化镍，且通过聚集和还原作用降低其毒性，具有环境友好性。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): Chlorella vulgaris在暴露于NiO纳米颗粒后，表现出显著的生物修复能力：加速纳米颗粒聚集与沉降，减少其在水体中的生物可利用性；同时将NiO还原为零价镍（Ni⁰），降低其致癌性和毒性。72小时时还原率最高，与可溶性蛋白含量峰值一致，表明其代谢活性参与了还原过程。该藻类在海洋环境中具有潜在的纳米污染生物修复应用前景。

composition (组成成分): [{"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus delbrueckii subsp. bulgaricus", "strain_id": "LB 3a, LB 10, LB 10a, LB 11, LB 12, LB 23, LB 39, LB 42, LB 42a, LB 80, LB 81, LB 86"}]
C_growth_conditions (生长条件): 37°C, 5% CO₂, pH 6.7–7.4, MRS broth with various sugars/sugar alcohols as sole carbon source
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Growth reached maximum density at 48 h; rapid growth observed within first 2–3 hours in glucose, fructose, lactose; strain-dependent doubling times
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Oral cavity (dental plaque, tooth surface)
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Potential to inhibit cariogenic pathogens like Streptococcus mutans; strain-specific interactions with oral biofilm components
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Stable in PBS wash, centrifugation, and storage at -80°C; no data on UV, drying, or shear stress
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该菌株为革兰氏阳性、专性同型发酵乳杆菌，适宜在37°C、5% CO₂条件下生长，以乳糖、葡萄糖、果糖为碳源时生长良好。部分菌株对蔗糖、木糖、阿拉伯糖、甘露醇、山梨醇等糖类不具代谢能力，表现出显著的菌株特异性。在口腔环境中，其生长与碳源密切相关，且在乳糖培养基中表现出最高蛋白表达水平。
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 本研究未涉及基因工程改造，所有分析基于天然菌株的代谢特性。未使用CRISPR、质粒或诱导系统等遗传工具。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): No specific sensor identified; metabolic activity inferred from growth curves
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No engineered logic gates or threshold control observed; natural metabolic regulation based on substrate availability
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 菌株对不同碳源的代谢能力由其天然代谢通路决定，无外源性调控逻辑。代谢活性表现为对特定糖类的依赖性，如乳糖、葡萄糖、果糖可被所有菌株利用，而蔗糖、木糖、糖醇等仅部分菌株可利用，体现天然的代谢选择性。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Passive secretion via cell wall and membrane; no engineered secretion systems reported
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Natural metabolic rate; no controllable output mechanism
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with MRS broth and PBS; no data on encapsulation or hydrogel compatibility
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): 通过竞争性抑制或代谢产物干扰，可能抑制S. mutans等致龋菌生长，但未直接测试其抗菌活性。
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 部分菌株（如LB 3a、LB 10）不能发酵蔗糖、木糖、糖醇等高致龋性糖类，表明其在口腔中不会产生大量酸性代谢物，降低龋齿风险。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): 通过调节细胞表面蛋白表达和黏附特性，可能影响宿主免疫反应，促进与口腔上皮细胞的相互作用。
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (no engineered kill switches or auxotrophy reported)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no horizontal gene transfer data; potential for oral tissue safety due to limited acid production from non-cariogenic sugars
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): None (no physical confinement described)
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 该菌株为食品级安全（GRAS）菌株，广泛用于酸奶生产。部分菌株不发酵蔗糖、木糖、糖醇等致龋糖类，表明其在口腔中不会导致酸性环境，降低龋齿风险。无基因工程改造，无生物安全风险。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 本研究为体外实验，未直接评估伤口愈合或疾病治疗效果。但结果显示，部分L. delbrueckii subsp. bulgaricus菌株具有不发酵致龋糖类的能力，且能调节细胞表面特性，提示其作为口腔益生菌候选者具有潜在安全性与功能潜力。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 5.5–6.5; tolerates gastric acid and bile salts; utilizes glucose and lactose as carbon sources
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~1.5–2 hours in vitro; colonization observed in piglet gut with persistence for up to 7 days post-supplementation
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Intestinal mucosa, particularly in the jejunum and colon of swine and poultry
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competes with pathogens (e.g., E. coli, Salmonella) for adhesion sites; promotes growth of beneficial bacteria such as Lactobacillus and Bifidobacterium
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to drying, lyophilization, and moderate shear stress; stable during feed pelleting and storage at room temperature
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Cell wall peptidoglycan and exopolysaccharides (EPS)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该菌株为兼性厌氧菌，可在37°C、pH 5.5–6.5条件下生长，耐受胃酸和胆盐，以葡萄糖和乳糖为碳源。在体外培养中 doubling time 约为1.5–2小时，在猪和禽类肠道中可定植并持续7天以上，主要定植于空肠和结肠黏膜，通过竞争性排斥病原体（如大肠杆菌、沙门氏菌）和促进有益菌（如乳酸杆菌和双歧杆菌）生长来调节肠道微生态平衡。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): CRISPR-Cas9 (in vitro), plasmid-based expression systems
G_edit_efficiency (编辑效率): High efficiency (>90%) in lab strains; low off-target risk due to high specificity of guide RNA
G_circuit_control (回路控制): Constitutive expression of mucin-stimulating proteins; inducible via pH-responsive promoters in some engineered variants
G_circuit_inducer_material (电路调控_相关物质): FNR promoter (hypoxia-responsive), p40 protein (from L. rhamnosus GG)
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): Chromosomal integration of key genes; plasmid loss rate <1% per generation; minimal metabolic burden observed
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in gel-based delivery systems and feed matrices; no significant degradation during encapsulation
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 通过CRISPR-Cas9技术对L. rhamnosus GG进行基因编辑，实现关键功能基因（如p40蛋白编码基因）的稳定整合与表达。利用pH响应型启动子（如FNR）实现对黏蛋白生成相关基因的时空调控，确保在肠道低氧和酸性环境下高效激活。该菌株在饲料和凝胶载体中均保持遗传稳定性，无显著代谢负担。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): FNR promoter (hypoxia sensor), MUC2 promoter (pH-responsive), DC-SIGN receptor (carbohydrate recognition)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): AND gate: requires both low pH and hypoxia for full activation; threshold-based response to lactate; noise suppression via feedback inhibition
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 该菌株通过FNR启动子感知肠道低氧环境，同时通过pH响应启动子感知酸性条件，仅在两者同时存在时启动黏蛋白MUC2的表达。此外，其表面DC-SIGN受体可识别宿主树突状细胞上的糖基化配体，实现免疫信号的双向传递。系统具备阈值响应机制，避免过度激活，且通过负反馈调节抑制噪声信号，确保在复杂肠道环境中精准响应。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Type I Secretion System (T1SS) for p40 protein; lysis for bacteriocin release
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent response; controlled by feed concentration and administration frequency
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with feed, gel, and encapsulated delivery systems; permeability allows mucosal interaction
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): 通过分泌氢过氧化物和细菌素直接杀灭病原体，同时竞争性排斥病原体在黏膜表面的附着位点，抑制生物膜形成。
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 在猪和禽类模型中，L. rhamnosus GG显著降低大肠杆菌和沙门氏菌载量，抑制生物膜形成，且未观察到对宿主细胞的显著毒性或肠道菌群紊乱。
E_B_mechanism_desc (产氧机制描述): 无氧生成功能，不参与氧代谢。
E_B_crit_evidence (标准B_依据): 该菌株无光依赖或非光依赖的氧气生成能力，不用于氧疗。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): 通过p40蛋白激活树突状细胞，促进IL-10和TGF-β分泌，调节Th1/Th2平衡，增强抗炎反应。
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): 诱导MUC2黏蛋白表达，促进杯状细胞增殖，增强肠道屏障功能，促进上皮再生。
E_D_repair_material (修复因子_相关物质): MUC2 mucin, Goblet cell growth factor
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Auxotrophy (leucine-dependent growth); kill-switch via temperature-sensitive plasmid
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Non-pathogenic; no antibiotic resistance genes detected; low risk of horizontal gene transfer; no environmental escape reported
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Effective physical confinement in feed matrix and intestinal mucus layer
B_risk_desc (风险描述): L. rhamnosus GG被列为GRAS（公认安全）菌株，无致病性，无抗生素抗性基因，水平基因转移风险极低。通过亮氨酸依赖性营养缺陷型和温度敏感型自杀开关实现生物防控，确保在环境中的安全性。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在猪和禽类模型中，L. rhamnosus GG显著降低肠道病原体载量，增强黏膜屏障功能，促进杯状细胞增殖和黏蛋白分泌，改善肠道免疫稳态，提高动物生长性能和抗病能力。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 5.5–6.5; tolerates physiological osmotic conditions; requires glucose and amino acids for growth
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~60–90 min in vitro; in vivo colonization shows stable persistence over 7 days in vaginal mucosa
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Vaginal mucosa, particularly in the epithelial layer and mucus layer
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of pathogenic bacteria (e.g., Gardnerella vaginalis, Prevotella spp.); promotes symbiosis with resident lactobacilli
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Moderate tolerance to drying and lyophilization; stable at room temperature for up to 14 days; resistant to shear stress during formulation
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Exopolysaccharides (EPS) produced by L. crispatus
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该菌株为专性厌氧-兼性厌氧菌，最适生长温度为37°C，pH 5.5–6.5，可在阴道黏膜上皮层和黏液层稳定定植，对干燥、冻干及剪切力具有中等耐受性，其胞外多糖有助于增强环境稳定性。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): CRISPR-Cas9 (for gene knockout), plasmid pVA838 (for gene expression)
G_edit_efficiency (编辑效率): High efficiency (>90%) with low off-target effects; verified by whole-genome sequencing
G_circuit_control (回路控制): Constitutive expression of lactate dehydrogenase and bacteriocin genes; inducible expression of mucus-binding protein via pH-responsive promoter
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): Chromosomal integration of key genes; plasmid loss rate <1% per generation; no detectable metabolic burden or evolutionary drift in vivo
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in alginate-based hydrogel matrix without significant gene expression loss
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 通过CRISPR-Cas9技术实现关键基因的敲除与整合，利用pVA838质粒实现基因表达，pH响应启动子驱动黏液结合蛋白的可控表达，确保在阴道酸性环境中特异性激活功能基因。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): FNR promoter (hypoxia), Lactate receptor (LldR), AI-2 receptor (LuxPQ)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): AND gate: requires low pH AND high lactate to activate bacteriocin production; threshold-based response to IL-1β
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 该系统采用AND逻辑门，仅在低pH与高乳酸同时存在时激活抗菌素产生；对IL-1β具有阈值响应，避免在正常组织中过度激活，实现精准响应炎症微环境。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Type I Secretion System (T1SS) and extracellular vesicles
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Constitutive baseline expression with pH-triggered amplification; dosage self-limited by nutrient availability
E_material_match (材料匹配性): High compatibility with alginate hydrogel; maintains viability and function for up to 14 days
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): 分泌乳酸和细菌素（如lactocin S），降低局部pH并直接杀伤病原菌，抑制Gardnerella vaginalis等生物膜形成
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 在体外模型中对G. vaginalis、S. agalactiae、E. coli等常见阴道病原体均有效，且在藻酸盐凝胶中未引起结构破坏或气体积累，细胞毒性试验显示对人阴道上皮细胞无显著损伤。
E_B_crit_evidence (标准B_依据): 未报道氧合功能，不适用于缺氧组织修复场景。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): 分泌IL-10和TGF-β，抑制过度炎症反应，调节Th17/Treg平衡，减轻阴道黏膜损伤
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): 分泌基质金属蛋白酶抑制剂（TIMP-1）和表皮生长因子（EGF），促进上皮再生和基底膜修复
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Auxotrophy (leucine-dependent growth); kill-switch via temperature-sensitive plasmid (pLac-λcI857)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Non-pathogenic; no antibiotic resistance genes detected; no horizontal gene transfer observed in co-culture with E. coli; low environmental escape risk due to auxotrophy
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Alginate hydrogel provides effective physical confinement; prevents systemic dissemination
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 该菌株为公认安全（GRAS）菌株，通过亮氨酸依赖性营养缺陷型和温度敏感型自杀开关实现生物防控，无致病性、耐药基因或基因水平转移风险，材料屏障有效防止其逃逸至环境。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在临床前模型中，使用该菌株的阴道制剂可显著降低细菌性阴道病复发率（从60%降至20%），促进阴道上皮修复，改善黏膜屏障功能，治疗周期内无严重不良反应。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal temperature: 37°C; pH: 4.5–5.5; Nutritional requirements: Glucose, glycogen, amino acids; Osmotic tolerance: Moderate; Bile tolerance: Low
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time: ~1.5–2 hours in vitro; In vivo homeostasis maintained under vaginal pH and nutrient conditions
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Vaginal epithelium, especially in healthy premenopausal women; Hypoxic niches during menstruation
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of BV-associated bacteria (e.g., Gardnerella vaginalis, Prevotella bivia); Symbiotic with host epithelial cells; Minimal disruption to other commensals
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to low pH, moderate osmotic stress, and short-term drying; Sensitive to high UV and shear stress; Lyophilization stability: Moderate
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Glycogen utilization genes, CRISPR-Cas systems
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Lactobacillus crispatus is a facultative anaerobe that thrives in the acidic vaginal environment (pH 4.5–5.5), utilizing glucose and glycogen as carbon sources. It exhibits rapid growth in vitro with a doubling time of ~1.5–2 hours and maintains stable colonization in the vaginal epithelium. It is particularly dominant in healthy women and shows resilience during hormonal fluctuations, though its abundance decreases during menstruation. It is sensitive to high shear and UV stress but survives lyophilization due to glycogen metabolism and CRISPR-based phage resistance.
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): CRISPR-Cas systems (observed in vaginal isolates), plasmid-based expression (inferred from genome analysis)
G_edit_efficiency (编辑效率): High efficiency in genome editing via CRISPR-Cas; Off-target risk: Low (due to conserved CRISPR arrays)
G_circuit_control (回路控制): Constitutive expression of lactic acid and D-lactic acid biosynthesis genes; No inducible circuits reported
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High chromosomal stability; Plasmid loss rate: Low; Metabolic burden: Minimal; Evolutionary drift: Low in stable niches
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in vaginal mucus and gel-like matrices; Compatible with mucosal delivery systems
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): Lactobacillus crispatus naturally possesses a large genome with high genetic plasticity, including mobile genetic elements and CRISPR-Cas systems. It exhibits strong chromosomal stability and minimal metabolic burden. Its constitutive expression of lactic acid biosynthesis genes enables sustained antimicrobial activity. No synthetic genetic circuits are reported, but its native regulatory systems are well-suited for natural function in the vaginal environment.
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): FNR promoter (hypoxia), D-lactate dehydrogenase (lactate sensing), glycogen phosphorylase (glycogen sensing)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Constitutive activation; No complex logic gates; Thresholds: pH < 5.5 triggers lactic acid production; Amplification: High via metabolic feedback
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): Lactobacillus crispatus senses hypoxia and low pH via FNR-like regulators, triggering lactic acid production. It detects glycogen and glucose via transporters and phosphorylases, enabling nutrient-responsive growth. It responds to host-derived proteases and cytokines (e.g., IL-8) through surface receptors, modulating immune signaling. The system operates via constitutive, threshold-based activation without synthetic logic gates, ensuring robust function in the vaginal niche.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Type I secretion (lactic acid), vesicles (metabolites), surface-associated proteins
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Constitutive; dosage regulated by growth rate and nutrient availability
E_material_match (材料匹配性): High compatibility with vaginal gels, hydrogels, and mucosal delivery systems
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Lactic acid production (especially D-lactic acid) inhibits E. coli, G. vaginalis, and other BV-associated bacteria; H2O2 production is minimal and ineffective in vivo.
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): L. crispatus ATCC 33197 inhibits E. coli in vitro; D-lactic acid at physiological concentrations (55–111 mM) inactivates BV-associated bacteria; No significant cytotoxicity to vaginal epithelial cells; No disruption of gel matrix in delivery systems.
E_B_mechanism_desc (产氧机制描述): Not applicable; L. crispatus is a facultative anaerobe and does not produce oxygen.
E_B_crit_evidence (标准B_依据): No oxygen production observed; Not applicable.
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Modulates TLR2/4 signaling, reduces IL-8 and MMP-8 expression, and enhances β-defensin 2/3 production in epithelial cells.
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): D-lactic acid, surface proteins (e.g., enolase), secreted metabolites
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): D-lactic acid inhibits EMMPRIN, reducing MMP-8 activity and protecting the vaginal epithelial barrier; promotes epithelial integrity.
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Regulates vaginal pH via lactic acid production; modulates host immune metabolism via cytokine signaling.
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Auxotrophy (glycogen dependency), CRISPR-Cas-based phage resistance
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; No known antibiotic resistance genes; No horizontal gene transfer observed; Low environmental escape risk due to niche specificity
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Effective physical confinement in vaginal mucus and gel matrices
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Lactobacillus crispatus is classified as GRAS (Generally Recognized As Safe). It is a natural resident of the human vagina with no known pathogenicity. It lacks antibiotic resistance genes and shows minimal risk of horizontal gene transfer. Its dependence on glycogen limits survival outside the vaginal niche. Physical confinement in gels and mucus further reduces escape risk.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): L. crispatus-dominated microbiota is associated with a 35% lower risk of HIV-1 RNA shedding, reduced preterm delivery, and lower incidence of STIs (HIV, HSV-2, HPV). It promotes epithelial barrier integrity, reduces inflammation, and enhances clearance of HPV lesions in pilot studies. In vitro, it inhibits E. coli and BV-associated bacteria via D-lactic acid. Longitudinal data show it is more stable than L. iners and less likely to transition to BV.

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal temperature: 37°C; pH: 4.5–5.5; Nutritional requirements: Glycogen, maltose, mannose; Osmotic tolerance: Moderate; Bile tolerance: Low
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time: ~2–3 hours in vitro; In vivo stability during transitional states; Less stable than L. crispatus
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Vaginal epithelium, especially during menstruation and transitional states; Often found in intermediate microbiota
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive with other lactobacilli; May facilitate BV transition; Overgrows during hormonal shifts; No strong symbiosis
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): High tolerance to pH fluctuations and glycogen availability; Low tolerance to UV and drying; Lyophilization stability: Low
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): CRISPR regions, ABC transporter permeases
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Lactobacillus iners is a facultative anaerobe with a small genome (~1.3 Mbp) and high adaptability. It thrives in transitional vaginal states, especially during menstruation, and is often dominant in women with intermediate or BV-like microbiota. It shows moderate growth in vitro but poor stability in long-term colonization. It lacks D-lactic acid production and relies on glycogen, maltose, and mannose for growth. It is sensitive to UV and drying but survives via CRISPR-based phage resistance and ABC transporters.
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): CRISPR-Cas systems (observed), transposon-based mutagenesis (inferred)
G_edit_efficiency (编辑效率): Moderate; Off-target risk: Low due to compact genome
G_circuit_control (回路控制): Constitutive expression of glycogen and sugar transporters; No synthetic circuits reported
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): Moderate chromosomal stability; Plasmid loss rate: High; Metabolic burden: Low; Evolutionary drift: High (rapid adaptation)
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in glycogen-rich gels; Less stable in low-glycogen environments
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): L. iners has a highly reduced genome with loss of many metabolic and regulatory genes. It relies on CRISPR-Cas for phage defense and ABC transporters for nutrient uptake. Its genome shows signs of rapid evolution, enabling adaptation to changing vaginal conditions. It lacks synthetic circuits but has constitutive expression of nutrient transporters, making it suitable for niche-specific delivery.
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Glycogen phosphorylase, maltose permease, mannose transporter, FNR-like regulators
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Constitutive activation; No complex logic; Thresholds: Glycogen > 10 μM triggers growth; Amplification: Moderate
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): L. iners senses glycogen, maltose, and mannose via specific transporters and phosphorylases. It responds to hypoxia via FNR-like regulators. It modulates immune signaling via surface proteins. The system operates via constitutive, nutrient-responsive activation without synthetic logic, allowing rapid adaptation to changing vaginal conditions.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Vesicles, surface-associated proteins (inerolysin)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Constitutive; dosage regulated by nutrient availability
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Moderate compatibility with glycogen-rich gels; Poor in low-glycogen environments
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Lacks D-lactic acid production; No significant antibacterial activity; May promote BV transition.
