C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Exopolysaccharides (EPS), biofilm formation, stress response genes (e.g., clp, groEL)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 这些微生物多为革兰氏阳性菌，属于乳酸菌或双歧杆菌等传统益生菌，具有在人体肠道等环境中定植并发挥健康效益的能力。它们在37°C、中性至弱碱性pH条件下生长良好，能耐受胃酸和胆汁，适合口服给药。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Not specified
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): Not specified
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Not specified
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 文中未提及对微生物进行基因改造，仅讨论天然或传统分离菌株的益生功能。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): FNR promoter, Lactate receptor, Bile acid sensor (e.g., Bsh), Quorum sensing receptors (e.g., LasR, LuxR)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Not specified
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 文中未描述具体的逻辑门控机制，仅指出微生物能感知宿主微环境变化并响应，如pH、胆汁酸等，以调节自身代谢或定植行为。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Type I, II, and VI secretion systems; lysis; extracellular vesicles
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Not specified
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Not specified
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): 通过产生有机酸（如乳酸）、细菌素（bacteriocins）和竞争性排斥病原体来抑制有害菌生长。
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 产生乳酸和细菌素可有效抑制常见肠道病原体，如沙门氏菌和大肠杆菌，且不破坏正常菌群结构。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): 调节宿主免疫系统，促进抗炎反应，增强黏膜屏障功能，通过TLR信号通路影响树突状细胞和T细胞分化。
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): LPS (modified), Teichoic acids, Secreted cytokines (e.g., IL-10, TGF-β)
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Not applicable
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): 调节宿主代谢，如促进短链脂肪酸（SCFAs）生成，改善葡萄糖代谢，调节脂质合成。
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Auxotrophy, GRAS/QPS status
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no known antibiotic resistance genes; limited horizontal gene transfer risk; no environmental escape due to poor survival outside host.
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Not applicable
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 这些微生物多为已知安全的菌株，属于GRAS或QPS类别，长期用于食品和膳食补充剂，无致病性记录，且在体外环境中难以长期存活，因此生物安全风险极低。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 这些益生菌通过调节肠道菌群、增强免疫功能和改善代谢，对肠易激综合征、炎症性肠病及代谢综合征等具有显著改善作用，已在多项临床研究中验证其有效性。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 6.5–7.5, moderate osmotic tolerance; utilizes glucose and other carbon sources; no specific vitamin requirement reported
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Colonization duration: 10–30 weeks (mean: 18.7 weeks, median: 25.7 weeks); sustained growth in human gut despite initial fluctuations; in vivo persistence exceeds in vitro expectations
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Human intestinal lumen, particularly in the colon; capable of competing with host E. coli and establishing long-term presence
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competes with host E. coli strains; may create niche for other commensal E. coli; no significant disruption of overall microbiota reported
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to gastrointestinal transit (acid, bile, enzymes); survives antibiotic exposure (though susceptible to cephalosporins); stable during storage and oral administration
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Natural gut environment (bile, mucus, pH gradients); no engineered stress resistance reported
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该研究显示，单次高剂量口服后，Symbioflor®2中的特定E. coli基因型（G1⁺）可在人体肠道内长期定植，持续时间达10至30周，平均18.7周，中位数25.7周。其在肠道中表现出较强的定植适应性，能与宿主E. coli竞争并维持稳定数量，即使在抗生素治疗后仍能促进宿主菌群恢复，表明其具有良好的肠道环境耐受性和定植能力。
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): Chromosomal integration not reported; persistence attributed to natural fitness rather than engineered stability; no plasmid-based systems used
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): No synthetic material used; natural gut environment supports long-term survival
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 该系统未进行基因工程改造，其长期定植能力源于自然进化获得的定植适应性，而非人工设计的遗传回路或稳定元件。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Unknown (natural regulatory systems not specified)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No engineered logic gates; natural competition and niche occupation suggest threshold-based fitness regulation
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 该系统未使用人工设计的传感逻辑，其定植能力依赖于自然生理适应性，如对肠道pH、胆汁酸和营养物质的响应，以及与宿主菌的竞争动态，表现出基于环境适应性的定植策略。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Unknown (natural secretion of metabolites; no engineered secretion system reported)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Natural dosage control via host environment; no external regulation
E_material_match (材料匹配性): No synthetic material used; natural gut environment supports function
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Produces metabolites such as short-chain fatty acids (SCFAs), reduces local pH, and may modulate gut environment to favor beneficial microbiota.
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (no engineered kill switches or auxotrophy reported)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no severe side effects observed; antibiotic susceptibility limits persistence under treatment; no evidence of horizontal gene transfer or environmental escape
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): None (no physical barrier used)
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 该系统为天然存在的E. coli基因型，未进行基因改造，无生物安全风险。在高剂量口服后未引发严重不良反应，仅出现轻微胃肠不适，且在抗生素治疗后可被清除，表明其安全性良好，符合GRAS（公认安全）标准。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 该研究未评估伤口愈合或疾病治疗效果，但结果显示，单次高剂量口服后，特定E. coli基因型（G1⁺）可在人体肠道内长期定植（最长30周），显著优于多数商业益生菌产品。其定植能力可能通过调节肠道微环境、促进宿主菌群恢复，间接支持肠道健康，尤其在抗生素治疗后表现出良好的生态恢复潜力。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 5.5–6.5; utilizes carbohydrates such as lactose, glucose, and fructo-oligosaccharides; requires no special growth factors beyond standard culture media
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~1.5–2 hours in vitro; survives gastric transit and colonizes intestinal mucosa in vivo
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Intestinal mucosa, particularly in the small intestine and colon; preferentially adheres to mucus layer and epithelial cells
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competes with pathogenic bacteria for nutrients and adhesion sites; enhances colonization resistance; promotes growth of beneficial flora via SCFA production and pH modulation
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to gastric acid (pH 2.0–3.0), bile salts, and moderate osmotic stress; stable during lyophilization and storage at 4°C
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Cell wall components (e.g., teichoic acids), acid shock proteins
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Lactobacillus rhamnosus GG 是一种兼性厌氧菌，可在人体肠道环境中稳定生长。其最适生长温度为37°C，pH范围为5.5–6.5，能利用乳糖、葡萄糖及低聚果糖等碳源。该菌株具有良好的胃酸耐受性，可成功通过胃部并定植于肠道黏膜，尤其偏好黏液层和肠上皮细胞表面，具备较强的黏附能力。在婴儿肠道中，其定植能力与免疫调节功能密切相关。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): None (natural strain, not genetically modified)
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High chromosomal stability; no plasmid-based systems; no evidence of genetic drift in clinical use
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in food matrices and oral formulations
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): Lactobacillus rhamnosus GG 为天然菌株，未经过基因工程改造。其功能依赖于天然代谢通路和表面结构，如黏附素和细胞壁成分，无需外源调控系统即可实现持续定植与免疫调节。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Fimbrin-like adhesins, bile acid-inducible promoters (e.g., bile salt hydrolase genes)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Constitutive expression; no complex logic gates; response to environmental cues via native regulatory systems
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): Lactobacillus rhamnosus GG 通过其表面黏附蛋白感知肠道黏液和胆汁酸环境，启动定植相关基因表达。其代谢活性受碳源（如乳糖、低聚果糖）浓度调控，实现对营养环境的适应性响应。该菌株不依赖人工诱导系统，其功能表达为天然的组成型或环境响应型，无复杂逻辑控制。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Constitutive secretion of metabolites and surface proteins; no specialized secretion systems reported
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent effects; clinical dosing typically 10^9–10^10 CFU/day; effects are self-limiting due to natural growth regulation
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with oral formulations, milk-based products, and probiotic supplements; stable in encapsulated delivery systems
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Produces lactic acid and other organic acids that lower intestinal pH, inhibiting growth of pathogens such as E. coli, Salmonella, and Clostridium difficile. Also competes for adhesion sites and nutrients.
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 在多项临床试验中，LGG显著缩短急性病毒性腹泻的持续时间，并预防抗生素相关性腹泻；其抗菌机制通过酸化环境和竞争性排斥实现，且未引起明显组织损伤或菌群失调。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Modulates immune responses by enhancing secretory IgA production, reducing Th-2 cytokines (IL-4, IL-5), increasing IFN-γ, and promoting T-regulatory cell activity.
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Upregulates mucin gene expression (e.g., MUC2), strengthens intestinal barrier function, reduces intestinal permeability, and promotes epithelial regeneration.
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Ferments nondigestible carbohydrates to produce short-chain fatty acids (SCFAs), including acetate and lactate, which serve as energy sources for colonocytes and exert anti-inflammatory effects.
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (natural strain, no synthetic kill switches)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no known antibiotic resistance genes; no evidence of horizontal gene transfer; rare cases of Lactobacillus septicemia reported only in immunocompromised patients with central venous catheters
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Oral delivery provides physical barrier; no systemic dissemination in healthy individuals
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Lactobacillus rhamnosus GG 被广泛认为是安全的，属于公认安全（GRAS）物质。尽管极少数病例报告其在免疫功能低下患儿中引发菌血症，但均与中心静脉导管相关，提示临床使用时应避免在有导管的患者中使用。该菌株不携带耐药基因，无致病性，且在正常肠道环境中不会过度增殖。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): LGG 在治疗和预防婴幼儿急性病毒性腹泻方面表现出显著疗效，可缩短病程24–48小时；在预防抗生素相关性腹泻方面有效率高达60%以上。在过敏性疾病（如特应性皮炎）中，LGG可显著改善临床评分，降低IL-4水平，提升IFN-γ水平，且其保护作用可持续至4岁。在新生儿坏死性小肠结肠炎（NEC）的预防中，联合使用LGG与母乳可降低发病率和严重程度。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 6.0–7.0; requires complex media with prebiotics (e.g., human milk oligosaccharides, fructo-oligosaccharides); grows slowly in vitro
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~4–6 hours in vitro; colonizes infant gut within days of administration; persists in feces for weeks
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Colon, particularly in the large intestine; preferentially colonizes mucosal surface and mucus layer
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competes with pathogenic bacteria; promotes growth of other beneficial bacteria via SCFA production; enhances colonization resistance
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Moderate tolerance to bile and gastric acid; sensitive to drying and high osmotic stress; stable when lyophilized with cryoprotectants
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Exopolysaccharides (EPS), stress response proteins
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Bifidobacterium breve Bb-02 是一种专性厌氧菌，最适生长温度为37°C，pH 6.0–7.0，依赖于母乳低聚糖等复杂碳源。该菌株在婴儿肠道中定植能力强，尤其在大肠黏膜和黏液层中富集。其生长缓慢，但能长期存在于粪便中，具有良好的肠道定植稳定性。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): None (natural strain)
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High chromosomal stability; no plasmid loss observed in clinical use
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in infant formula and oral supplements
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): Bifidobacterium breve Bb-02 为天然菌株，未经过基因改造。其功能依赖于天然代谢通路，如双歧途径发酵碳水化合物，产生短链脂肪酸，无需人工调控系统即可实现持续定植与代谢活性。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Oligosaccharide transporters (e.g., ABC transporters), bile acid sensors
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Constitutive expression; environmental sensing via nutrient availability
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): Bifidobacterium breve Bb-02 通过特异性转运系统感知母乳低聚糖和低聚果糖等营养物质，启动发酵相关基因表达。其生长受pH和胆汁酸调控，适应肠道微环境变化。该菌株不依赖人工诱导系统，功能表达为天然的组成型或营养响应型。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Constitutive secretion of metabolites and surface glycoproteins; no specialized secretion systems reported
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent effects; typically administered at 10^9–10^10 CFU/day; effects are self-limiting
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Highly compatible with infant formulas and oral supplements; stable in encapsulated delivery systems
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Produces acetic and lactic acids that lower luminal pH, inhibiting pathogenic bacteria such as Clostridium difficile and Enterobacteriaceae. Also competes for nutrients and adhesion sites.
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 在新生儿坏死性小肠结肠炎（NEC）预防研究中，B. breve 与母乳联合使用显著降低NEC发生率；其抗菌机制通过酸化环境和竞争排斥实现，未引起组织损伤或菌群紊乱。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Enhances mucosal immunity by upregulating secretory IgA and promoting anti-inflammatory cytokine profiles (e.g., IL-10). Reduces Th-2 responses and supports T-regulatory cell function.
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Upregulates mucin gene expression (MUC2), strengthens intestinal barrier integrity, and reduces intestinal permeability.
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Ferments human milk oligosaccharides and other prebiotics to produce short-chain fatty acids (SCFAs), particularly acetate and lactate, which serve as energy sources for colonocytes and regulate immune function.
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no known antibiotic resistance genes; no evidence of horizontal gene transfer; safe in immunocompetent infants
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Oral delivery limits systemic exposure; no evidence of translocation in healthy infants
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Bifidobacterium breve Bb-02 被归类为公认安全（GRAS）菌株，广泛用于婴儿配方奶粉中。其专性厌氧特性限制了其在体外环境中的存活，且在健康婴儿中无致病报告。尽管极少数病例报告其在免疫缺陷患儿中引发菌血症，但无明确证据支持其为致病菌。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): Bifidobacterium breve Bb-02 在预防新生儿坏死性小肠结肠炎（NEC）方面表现出显著疗效，联合母乳使用可降低发病率和严重程度。在过敏性疾病中，其可改善肠道屏障功能，减少炎症反应，尤其在母乳喂养婴儿中效果更佳。在婴儿肠道菌群建立过程中，该菌株能有效定植并促进有益菌群发展。

C_oxygen_tolerance (氧耐受性): Facultative Anaerobe (L. acidophilus), Strict Anaerobe (B. infantis)
C_growth_conditions (生长条件): L. acidophilus: 37°C, pH 5.5–6.5, uses lactose and glucose; B. infantis: 37°C, pH 6.0–7.0, requires human milk oligosaccharides and prebiotics
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): L. acidophilus: doubling time ~1.5–2 h; B. infantis: doubling time ~4–6 h; both colonize within days of administration
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Small and large intestine; L. acidophilus on mucosal surface, B. infantis in colonic lumen and mucus layer
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Synergistic: L. acidophilus acidifies environment, promoting B. infantis growth; both enhance colonization resistance and immune modulation
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): L. acidophilus: tolerates gastric acid and bile; B. infantis: moderate tolerance to bile, sensitive to drying; both stable in lyophilized formulations
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Teichoic acids (L. acidophilus), exopolysaccharides (B. infantis)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该共生系统由 Lactobacillus acidophilus NCFM 和 Bifidobacterium infantis 35624 组成。前者为兼性厌氧菌，可快速定植于小肠；后者为专性厌氧菌，偏好大肠环境。两者在营养互补和环境调节方面协同作用，共同促进肠道菌群稳定和免疫调节。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): None
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High chromosomal stability; no plasmid loss; no evidence of drift in clinical use
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in combination with prebiotics and infant formulas
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 该共生系统为天然菌株组合，未经过基因改造。其功能依赖于天然代谢通路和协同作用，无需人工调控系统即可实现稳定定植与功能表达。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Lactose permease (L. acidophilus), HMO transporters (B. infantis), bile acid sensors
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Constitutive expression; no complex logic; environmental sensing via nutrient availability
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): L. acidophilus 通过乳糖转运系统感知碳源，启动酸化代谢；B. infantis 通过特异性转运系统感知母乳低聚糖，启动发酵通路。两者均响应pH和胆汁酸变化，实现对肠道微环境的适应性响应。系统整体表现为天然协同作用，无复杂逻辑控制。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Constitutive secretion of metabolites and surface proteins
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent; typically 10^9–10^10 CFU/day per strain; self-limiting in healthy infants
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Highly compatible with infant formulas and oral supplements; stable in encapsulated delivery systems
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): L. acidophilus produces lactic acid, lowering pH; B. infantis produces acetic acid and bacteriocins. Together, they inhibit pathogens like C. difficile and Enterobacteriaceae.
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 在新生儿NEC预防研究中，该组合显著降低发病率；其抗菌机制通过酸化环境和竞争排斥实现，未引起组织损伤或菌群失调。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Synergistically enhances secretory IgA, reduces Th-2 cytokines, increases IL-10 and TGF-β, and promotes mucosal tolerance.
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Upregulates mucin genes (MUC2), strengthens tight junctions, and reduces intestinal permeability.
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Ferments human milk oligosaccharides and other prebiotics to produce SCFAs (acetate, lactate), which serve as energy sources and anti-inflammatory agents.
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes; no evidence of HGT; safe in immunocompetent infants
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Oral delivery limits systemic exposure
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 该共生系统由两种公认安全（GRAS）菌株组成，广泛用于婴儿配方奶粉中。两者均无致病报告，且在健康婴儿中无系统性传播风险。其专性厌氧特性限制了其在体外环境中的存活，安全性高。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 该共生系统在预防新生儿坏死性小肠结肠炎（NEC）方面表现出显著疗效，联合母乳使用可显著降低发病率和严重程度。在免疫调节方面，其协同作用可增强黏膜屏障功能，减少炎症反应，尤其在早产儿中效果显著。

composition (组成成分): [{"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Chryseobacterium sp.", "strain_id": "Not specified"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Pseudomonas sp. 1", "strain_id": "Not specified"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Pseudomonas sp. 2", "strain_id": "Not specified"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Stenotrophomonas sp.", "strain_id": "Not specified"}]
spatial_arrangement (空间排布): Encapsulated (on skin surface, applied as topical treatment)
C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at room temperature (22–25°C), neutral to slightly alkaline pH, moderate osmotic tolerance; dependent on host skin environment (moist, nutrient-rich surface)
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Not explicitly reported; inferred to grow in vitro under standard lab conditions (e.g., 24–48 h doubling time), but no in vivo growth rate data available
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Cutaneous surface of amphibians (skin mucus layer), particularly in moist, cool environments typical of amphibian habitats
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive with resident skin microbiota; failed to persist in A. zeteki skin, suggesting strong competition or host defense mechanisms
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Not explicitly reported; assumed moderate tolerance to environmental fluctuations (moisture, temperature) due to amphibian skin habitat
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 这些细菌均来源于巴拿马蛙类皮肤，能够在体外抑制蛙壶菌（Bd）生长，但无法在黄金蛙皮肤上长期定植。它们属于革兰氏阴性菌，适应湿润、中性pH的皮肤表面环境，具有一定的环境耐受性，但缺乏在宿主皮肤上稳定定植的能力。
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 本研究未对所用细菌进行基因工程改造，所有菌株均为天然分离株，仅通过体外抑菌实验筛选其抗蛙壶菌能力，未进行任何基因编辑或合成回路构建。
S_metabolite_signals (代谢信号): ["Bd zoospores (indirectly via host damage)", "Skin metabolites (host or microbial)"]
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Not specified (no engineered sensors reported)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No engineered logic gates or sensing circuits reported; natural sensing via environmental cues only
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 这些细菌依赖于自然环境信号（如皮肤pH、湿度、宿主组织损伤）进行定植和代谢活动，但未被设计为响应特定信号触发功能。其行为由天然生理机制调控，无合成生物学逻辑控制。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Unknown (likely passive diffusion or constitutive secretion of metabolites)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Not controllable; activity depends on natural growth and metabolite production
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Poor match with skin surface; failed to persist despite application, suggesting poor compatibility with host skin environment
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): 通过产生抗真菌代谢物抑制蛙壶菌（Bd）生长，体外实验显示强抑制活性。
E_A_agent_material (抗菌因子_相关物质): Antifungal metabolites (e.g., violacein-like compounds, unknown secondary metabolites)
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 体外实验显示强抗Bd活性，但体内无法定植，因此活性未在宿主中实现。未报告细胞毒性或对微生物组的显著扰动，但因未定植，安全性尚可。
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (no engineered kill switches or auxotrophy reported)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): No pathogenicity reported; isolated from amphibians without known disease association; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; low risk of horizontal gene transfer due to lack of genetic engineering
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Skin surface application provides minimal physical barrier; no encapsulation or delivery matrix used
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 所有候选菌株均来自非致病性环境，无文献报道致病性，且未进行基因改造，因此生物安全风险极低。但由于无法在宿主皮肤上定植，其实际应用风险受限于定植失败，而非安全性问题。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在实验中，尽管所有候选细菌在体外均能有效抑制蛙壶菌（Bd）生长，但无法在黄金蛙皮肤上定植，因此未能显著提高感染后存活率。然而，约30%的感染个体能够自发清除感染，其皮肤微生物群落结构和代谢物谱与死亡个体存在显著差异，提示天然共生菌群在抗感染中起关键作用。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Temperature: 38°C; pH: 7.2 (PBS); Nutritional: Endospore-forming, utilizes complex organic substrates (casein, gelatin, starch, dextrin, oils); Growth in basal diet with protein (35%), fat (7.15%), and energy (414 kcal/100g)
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Growth rate not explicitly quantified; viable cells maintained in feed at 4°C for up to 30 days with 35.25% viability remaining; growth in gut confirmed by increasing counts over 45 days
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gastrointestinal tract (gut) of Macrobrachium rosenbergii
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of pathogenic Aeromonas spp. and Pseudomonas spp.; increases total bacterial count and Bacillus spp. in gut microbiota
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Moderate tolerance to storage at 4°C (viability drops to 35.25% after 30 days); resistant to freeze-drying (lyophilization) as confirmed by viability in feed; stable in feed pellets at 45°C for 1–2 h
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Spores (endospores) provide resistance to heat, drying, and storage stress
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Bacillus licheniformis is a Gram-positive, endospore-forming, facultative anaerobe that can grow in the gastrointestinal tract of giant freshwater prawns. It survives feed processing (autoclaving, drying) and storage at 4°C, with gradual viability loss. It successfully colonizes the gut, increases in population over time, and outcompetes pathogenic bacteria, indicating strong environmental adaptability and colonization ability.
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): No genetic modifications reported; natural chromosomal stability; no plasmid-based systems used
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in feed matrix (pellets) and gut environment; viability maintained in feed for 30 days at 4°C
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): No genetic engineering was performed. The strain was used in its native form as a probiotic. No CRISPR, plasmid, or recombinant systems were applied. The system relies on natural colonization and metabolic activity.
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Endospore formation and metabolic pathways responsive to nutrient availability (e.g., starch, protein, glucose)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No engineered logic gates; natural growth response to nutrient availability and environmental conditions
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): The bacterium naturally senses nutrient availability (e.g., starch, protein, glucose) and environmental conditions (pH, temperature) in the gut and feed. It germinates and grows in favorable conditions, with no synthetic sensing circuits. Its activity is governed by natural physiological responses rather than engineered logic.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Natural secretion of enzymes and antimicrobial peptides; no engineered secretion systems used
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent effect; highest efficacy at 1.0 × 10⁹ cfu/g feed; no external control mechanism
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with feed pellet matrix; stable during feed processing (autoclaving, drying); viable in gut environment
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Inhibits pathogenic bacteria (Aeromonas spp., Pseudomonas spp.) via competitive exclusion and production of antimicrobial compounds (e.g., polymyxin, bacitracin, gramicidin).
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): Significant reduction in Aeromonas and Pseudomonas spp. in gut; no adverse effects on host survival; localized action in gut; no reported cytotoxicity or microbiome disruption beyond target pathogens.
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Enhances immune response via cell wall components (β-glucan, lipopolysaccharide) and competitive exclusion of pathogens, leading to increased haemocyte count, phenol oxidase, superoxide dismutase, and antibacterial activity.
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Natural auxotrophy not reported; no kill-switch or suicide gene used; endospores provide natural containment
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Non-pathogenic; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; low risk of horizontal gene transfer; no environmental escape documented; safe for aquatic use
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Feed pellet matrix provides physical confinement; no release into environment reported
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Bacillus licheniformis is classified as GRAS (Generally Recognized As Safe). It is non-pathogenic, does not produce toxins, and has no known antibiotic resistance genes. Its endospore form enhances environmental stability but limits uncontrolled proliferation. No genetic modifications increase escape risk. The feed matrix acts as a physical barrier, minimizing environmental release.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): Dietary supplementation of Bacillus licheniformis at 1.0 × 10⁹ cfu/g feed significantly improved growth (112.25% weight gain), reduced feed conversion ratio (2.14), enhanced immune parameters (highest haemocyte count, phenol oxidase, superoxide dismutase, and antibacterial activity), and reduced cumulative mortality by 50% after Vibrio alginolyticus challenge. The probiotic effect showed a clear dose-response relationship, with maximum benefits at the highest concentration.

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 6.5–7.0; tolerates pH 3.0 for up to 24 hours; survives 2% bile salt; grows in MRS broth with up to 6% NaCl.
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time not reported; viable counts maintained at 4–6 log CFU/ml after 24 h at pH 3.0; growth rate reduced at 2% bile salt but still detectable.
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gastrointestinal tract (small intestine and colon), particularly in the context of probiotic function.
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of pathogens via antibacterial activity; potential for symbiosis with host microbiota through immune modulation and colonization.
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): High tolerance to acid (pH 3.0), bile salts (up to 2%), heat (60°C for 10 min), and osmotic stress (up to 6% NaCl); moderate tolerance to UV and drying (implied by lyophilization storage).
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Heat shock proteins (HSPs), cell membrane integrity, acid resistance systems (e.g., F0F1-ATPase), bile salt hydrolases.
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该研究中分离的植物乳杆菌（Lactobacillus plantarum）具有良好的生长生理特性，能在37°C、pH 3.0的酸性环境中存活24小时，且在2%胆盐条件下仍保持较高活力。其耐热性良好，部分菌株在60°C下处理10分钟后仍能保持86.6%的存活率。该菌株对高盐环境（最高6% NaCl）具有较强耐受性，适合在食品加工过程中应用。
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 本研究未涉及基因工程改造，所有菌株均为天然分离株，未进行人工遗传修饰。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): F0F1-ATPase (for pH homeostasis), bile salt hydrolases (BSH), osmoprotectant transporters (e.g., proline uptake systems)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No engineered logic gates; natural sensing via membrane transporters and regulatory systems (e.g., acid stress response regulators).
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 植物乳杆菌通过F0F1-ATP酶系统感知胞外酸性环境并维持胞内pH稳定；通过胆盐水解酶（BSH）感知胆盐并降解其毒性；通过渗透压调节系统感知高盐环境并启动保护机制。这些响应为非编程性自然生理适应，无逻辑门控设计。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Type I secretion system (for bacteriocins), passive diffusion (for organic acids, H2O2), exopolysaccharide (EPS) release
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Not controllable; output depends on natural growth and metabolic activity.
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with food matrices (e.g., fermented products); no encapsulation or delivery system described.
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): 通过分泌有机酸、过氧化氢和细菌素等抗菌物质抑制常见食源性病原菌生长。
E_A_agent_material (抗菌因子_相关物质): Organic acids (lactic acid, acetic acid), hydrogen peroxide, bacteriocins
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 多数植物乳杆菌菌株对李斯特菌（L. monocytogenes）表现出强抑制活性（抑制圈直径达15.5 mm），对金黄色葡萄球菌、沙门氏菌等也有一定抑制作用，且未提及对宿主细胞的毒性，表明其具有可控且安全的抗菌能力。
E_B_crit_evidence (标准B_依据): 未报道任何产氧机制或光依赖性氧生成系统，因此不具有氧合功能。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): 通过调节宿主免疫反应，增强肠道屏障功能，促进抗炎因子表达，抑制病原体定植。
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): Surface layer proteins (Slp), exopolysaccharides (EPS), secreted metabolites (e.g., SCFAs)
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): 通过发酵碳水化合物产生短链脂肪酸（SCFAs），调节宿主能量代谢与肠道微生态平衡。
E_E_metabolite_material (代谢物_相关物质): Short-chain fatty acids (SCFAs: acetate, propionate, butyrate)
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (natural strains, no synthetic kill switches or auxotrophy introduced)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): No antibiotic resistance genes reported; no pathogenicity or opportunistic risk identified; low risk of horizontal gene transfer due to absence of plasmids in tested strains; no environmental escape concerns as they are food-grade LAB.
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): None (no physical confinement used in study)
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 所研究的植物乳杆菌菌株均来源于传统发酵食品，属于公认安全（GRAS）微生物，未发现耐药基因或致病性特征，无基因水平转移风险，且在体外实验中未表现出对宿主细胞的毒性，安全性较高。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 该研究未评估伤口愈合或疾病治疗效果，但结果显示部分植物乳杆菌菌株在模拟胃肠道环境中具有优异的存活能力（pH 3.0下24小时后仍保持4 log CFU/ml），对多种食源性病原菌具有强抑制活性，且耐热、耐盐，具备作为功能性食品益生菌候选菌株的潜力。

composition (组成成分): [{"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus acidophilus", "strain_id": "Not specified"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus bulgaricus", "strain_id": "Not specified"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Bifidobacterium bifidum", "strain_id": "Not specified"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Streptococcus thermophiles", "strain_id": "Not specified"}]
spatial_arrangement (空间排布): Oral supplementation (systemic distribution via gastrointestinal tract)
C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 35–37°C, pH 5.5–6.5, requires carbohydrates (e.g., lactose) as carbon source; tolerant to bile salts and gastric acidity
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Moderate growth rate in vitro; no in vivo doubling time reported; stable in gastrointestinal tract
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gastrointestinal tract (small intestine and colon), mucosal surface of gut
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of pathogenic bacteria; potential symbiosis with host microbiota; may modulate immune response without significant disruption of native flora
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to drying, lyophilization, and moderate temperature fluctuations; stable during storage at room temperature; resistant to bile and low pH
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Bile salts, gastric acid, lyophilization stabilizers (in formulation)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该混合益生菌由四种常见乳酸菌组成，均具有良好的胃肠道耐受性，可在胃酸和胆汁环境中存活，定植于肠道黏膜，利用乳糖等碳源生长，属于兼性厌氧菌，适合口服补充。
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): No genetic modification reported; natural strains used; chromosomal stability in vivo; no plasmid-based systems
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): No engineered genetic circuits; stability in oral tablet formulation and gastrointestinal environment
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 该研究未对益生菌进行基因改造，使用的是市售商业益生菌制剂，包含四种天然存在的乳酸菌，无基因工程修饰，其功能依赖于天然生理特性。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Bile salt hydrolase (BSH), acid tolerance systems (e.g., F1F0-ATPase), lactose permease (LacY)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No synthetic logic circuits; natural sensing of environmental cues (pH, bile, nutrients) with threshold-based activation of survival and colonization pathways
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 这些益生菌通过感知肠道内的酸碱度、胆汁酸和乳糖等代谢物，启动耐酸、耐胆汁和营养吸收机制，实现对肠道微环境的适应性响应，无人工设计的逻辑门控系统。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Passive diffusion, cell lysis, extracellular vesicles (natural secretion)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Fixed daily dose (6×10⁹ CFU/day); no dynamic control; dosage determined by formulation
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Oral tablet formulation allows protection during transit; compatible with gastrointestinal environment; no encapsulation in biomaterials
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Not applicable; no direct antibacterial activity reported
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 未观察到对Pseudomonas aeruginosa或其他呼吸道病原体的直接抑制作用。
E_B_mechanism_desc (产氧机制描述): Not applicable; no oxygen-producing capability reported
E_B_crit_evidence (标准B_依据): 未涉及氧气生成或缺氧缓解机制。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Modulate systemic and local immune responses by enhancing intestinal barrier function, reducing intestinal inflammation, and indirectly suppressing pulmonary inflammation via gut-lung axis
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): Secreted metabolites (e.g., short-chain fatty acids), cell wall components (e.g., peptidoglycan, lipoteichoic acid), exopolysaccharides
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Not applicable; no direct tissue regeneration or ECM modulation reported
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Not applicable; no specific metabolic regulation of host glucose, lipid, or neurotransmitter pathways reported
E_F_mechanism_desc (肿瘤治疗描述): Not applicable; no anti-tumor activity reported
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): No genetic kill-switches or auxotrophy; natural strains with low pathogenicity
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no horizontal gene transfer risk; no environmental escape due to lack of environmental persistence
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Oral administration with natural gut transit; no physical barrier beyond intestinal mucosa
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 所用四种益生菌均为公认安全（GRAS）菌株，无基因改造，无致病性，不携带抗生素抗性基因，不会在环境中长期存活，口服后通过肠道自然排泄，安全性高。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在为期6个月的治疗期间，囊性纤维化患者肺部急性加重次数显著减少（P=0.002），且在治疗后6个月仍保持低发，但肺功能（FEV1）、痰液细菌负荷、中性粒细胞计数和IL-8水平未见显著变化，提示其主要作用为预防性减少急性加重，而非直接改善肺部炎症或结构损伤。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Growth at 37°C in anaerobic conditions (85% N₂, 10% H₂, 5% CO₂); requires MRS broth with peptone water for propagation and storage
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Growth rate not explicitly quantified; maintained in culture for 24 h before use; colonized effectively in neonatal gnotobiotic pigs
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Intestinal tract, oral/nasal cavity, and tonsils
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Colonization did not disrupt host microbiome; no extraneous bacterial contamination detected; no significant competition with other microbes reported
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Stable during freezing at -80°C; viable after thawing and washing; resistant to gastric acidity due to pre-treatment with NaHCO₃
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Sodium bicarbonate (NaHCO₃) used to reduce gastric acidity
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Lactobacillus acidophilus NCFM is a facultative anaerobe that grows optimally at 37°C under anaerobic conditions. It effectively colonizes the intestinal, oral, and nasal mucosa of neonatal gnotobiotic pigs without causing adverse effects. The strain is stable during cryopreservation and can survive transient exposure to gastric acidity when pre-treated with sodium bicarbonate.
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): No genetic modifications reported; natural strain used; stable colonization observed over 3 weeks post-administration
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): No engineered genetic circuits; natural strain used in oral delivery without material encapsulation
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): Lactobacillus acidophilus NCFM was used in its native, unmodified form. No genetic engineering tools such as CRISPR-Cas or plasmid systems were applied. The strain was administered orally and relied on natural colonization and immune modulation without synthetic genetic circuits.
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Natural surface receptors (e.g., adhesion molecules) for mucosal colonization; no specific engineered sensor reported
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No synthetic logic gates; natural immune recognition and colonization behavior
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): Lactobacillus acidophilus naturally senses and responds to host mucosal environments, particularly through pH adaptation and adhesion to epithelial surfaces. It does not employ engineered sensing circuits but relies on innate microbial recognition mechanisms to colonize the gut and upper respiratory tract.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Natural secretion of immunomodulatory molecules; no engineered secretion system reported
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent colonization (10³ to 10⁶ CFU/day); incremental dosing used to ensure safe and effective colonization
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Oral administration with no material encapsulation; compatible with natural mucosal delivery
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): Not applicable; no antibacterial activity reported
E_B_crit_evidence (标准B_依据): Not applicable; no oxygenation function reported
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Enhances both mucosal and systemic immune responses by stimulating IFN-γ-producing CD8+ T cells, IgA and IgG antibody-secreting cells, and serum IgM, IgA, IgG, and virus-neutralizing antibodies.
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): Lactobacillus acidophilus NCFM (natural strain; induces IL-12, IFN-γ, and dendritic cell activation)
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (natural strain; no kill-switch or auxotrophy used)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): No pathogenicity reported; no antibiotic resistance genes or horizontal gene transfer concerns; safe in neonatal gnotobiotic pigs
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): None; oral delivery without physical confinement
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Lactobacillus acidophilus NCFM is a well-documented probiotic strain with GRAS status. It is safe for neonatal use, causes no adverse effects in gnotobiotic pigs, and does not disrupt the microbiome. No biocontainment strategies were needed due to its non-pathogenic nature and natural attenuation.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): Lactobacillus acidophilus NCFM significantly enhanced the immunogenicity of the oral rotavirus vaccine in neonatal gnotobiotic pigs. It increased HRV-specific IFN-γ-producing CD8+ T cell responses in ileum and spleen by 12-fold and 45-fold, respectively, and boosted IgA and IgG antibody-secreting cell responses in the ileum. Serum IgM, IgA, IgG, and virus-neutralizing antibody titers were significantly higher in LA-fed vaccinated pigs compared to controls. These findings suggest strong immunopotentiating effects, indicating potential as a safe oral adjuvant for rotavirus vaccines in neonates.

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Grows at 25–37°C, pH 5.5–9.0, tolerates high osmotic stress; utilizes complex carbohydrates, proteins, and lipids as carbon/nitrogen sources
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~20–30 min under optimal conditions; stable in vitro and in vivo
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Intestinal tract of *Litopenaeus vannamei*, particularly in the midgut and hepatopancreas

C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): High tolerance to extreme pH, temperature, and osmotic stress; spores survive feed processing and storage
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Spore coat proteins (e.g., CotA, SASP)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Bacillus subtilis AQAHBS001 is a robust, spore-forming bacterium with strong environmental resilience, capable of surviving harsh aquaculture conditions and colonizing the shrimp gut effectively. It thrives in variable pH and temperature ranges typical of shrimp ponds and maintains viability during feed processing and storage.

G_edit_efficiency (编辑效率): Not specified; natural strains used, no genetic modification reported
G_circuit_control (回路控制): Constitutive expression of enzymes and antimicrobial peptides
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High chromosomal stability; spores ensure long-term viability; no plasmid loss reported
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Spores remain stable in feed matrix; no degradation of encapsulation material observed
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): The strain is used in its natural form without genetic modification. Its beneficial effects stem from intrinsic enzyme production and antimicrobial activity, with no engineered circuits or inducible systems.
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): FNR-like regulators (for oxygen), sigma factors (for stress), membrane transporters (for nutrient sensing)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No explicit logic gates; response is likely threshold-based (e.g., enzyme production triggered by substrate presence)
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): The strain senses nutrient availability (e.g., starch, soy components) and environmental stress (pH, temperature), triggering enzyme secretion and antimicrobial production. It responds to host immune signals and microbial competition, enabling niche colonization and pathogen exclusion.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Type I secretion system (for antimicrobial peptides), Spore germination and lysis (for enzyme release)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent effect; higher probiotic concentration leads to greater pathogen reduction and enzyme activity
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Spores are stable in feed matrix; no structural disruption observed; compatible with encapsulation in aquafeeds
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Produces antimicrobial peptides (e.g., subtilin, bacitracin) and enzymes that degrade pathogen cell walls; competes for colonization sites.
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): B. subtilis AQAHBS001 significantly reduced *Vibrio parahaemolyticus* and *V. harveyi* in shrimp gut and hepatopancreas; no cytotoxicity reported; localized action in gut.
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Enhances phagocytic activity, upregulates prophenoloxidase, lysozyme, and anti-lipopolysaccharide factor genes.
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Degrades complex carbohydrates (starch, non-starch polysaccharides) and proteins, improving nutrient assimilation and reducing anti-nutritional compounds.
E_E_metabolite_material (代谢物_相关物质): Glucose, Amino acids, Short-chain fatty acids (SCFAs)
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Auxotrophy (inferred from natural strain use), no antibiotic resistance genes reported
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no known toxin production in this strain; no horizontal gene transfer reported; safe for shrimp and consumers
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Physical encapsulation in feed prevents environmental release
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Bacillus subtilis AQAHBS001 is classified as GRAS by FDA. It is non-pathogenic, does not produce harmful toxins, and lacks antibiotic resistance genes. Its spore form ensures controlled release and limits environmental escape. No evidence of ecological disruption or human health risk.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): B. subtilis AQAHBS001 significantly improved feed conversion ratio, weight gain, and survival in *Litopenaeus vannamei* fed on 100% soybean meal diets. It enhanced immune response, reduced *Vibrio* spp. colonization, and promoted beneficial gut microbiota, leading to higher growth performance and disease resistance.
