spatial_arrangement (空间排布): Encapsulated in feed or rearing water
C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Temperature: 25–37°C; pH: 6.0–7.5; Osmotic: Moderate tolerance; Nutrition: Requires carbohydrates, amino acids, vitamins; Carbon sources: Glucose, lactose, starch
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time: 20–30 min in vitro; Growth rate: High; In vivo homeostasis: Stable in fish gut microbiota
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gastrointestinal tract (GIT) of freshwater fish, particularly in the intestine and mucus layer
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of pathogens (e.g., Aeromonas hydrophila, Streptococcus spp.) via adhesion site competition and nutrient depletion; Symbiotic with host microbiota; Minimal disruption to native microbiome
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to moderate UV, shear stress, and drying; Stable during lyophilization and rehydration; Storage stability: 6–12 months at 4°C
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Spore formation (Bacillus spp.), cell wall integrity (Lactobacillus, Enterococcus), and yeast cell wall (Saccharomyces cerevisiae)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该多菌株益生菌系统由多种革兰氏阳性细菌和酵母组成，具有良好的生长生理特性。Bacillus 和 Lactobacillus 属在25–37°C、pH 6.0–7.5条件下生长迅速，可在鱼肠道中定植并维持稳定。其孢子形成能力赋予其对干燥、紫外线和剪切应力的耐受性，适合在饲料中长期储存。这些微生物在鱼肠道中通过竞争性排斥病原菌（如嗜水气单胞菌、链球菌）和调节免疫系统，发挥协同作用。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Plasmid-based expression systems (e.g., pUC19, pET vectors), CRISPR-Cas9 (in research strains), Recombination (for chromosomal integration)
G_edit_efficiency (编辑效率): High efficiency (>90%) in Bacillus and Lactobacillus; Off-target risk: Low in engineered strains
G_circuit_control (回路控制): Constitutive (e.g., P15A promoter), Inducible (e.g., IPTG, xylose), Logic AND Gate (e.g., dual promoter activation)
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High plasmid stability (copy number: 10–20); Chromosomal integration: Stable; Metabolic burden: Low; Evolutionary drift: Minimal in long-term in vivo trials
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Genetic circuits remain functional in feed matrix and water; No significant degradation of plasmid DNA during encapsulation
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 该系统主要依赖于天然菌株的遗传可塑性，通过质粒或染色体整合实现基因表达。常用P15A或T7启动子驱动目标基因表达，诱导型系统（如IPTG或木糖诱导）可实现可控表达。在饲料中封装后，基因元件保持稳定，未观察到显著丢失或功能丧失。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): FNR promoter (hypoxia), Lactate permease (lactate), P15A promoter (glucose), LasR (AHL), LuxS (AI-2)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): AND gate: Requires both hypoxia and lactate for activation; Threshold: 10^5 CFU/mL; Dynamic range: 10^4–10^8 CFU/mL; Noise suppression: Quorum sensing feedback loop
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 该系统通过FNR启动子感知低氧环境，同时通过乳酸转运蛋白感知乳酸积累，实现AND逻辑门控制。当两者同时存在时，启动效应基因表达。系统具有阈值响应机制，避免在低浓度信号下误激活。通过AI-2和AHL信号实现群体感应反馈，抑制噪声，确保在病灶区域精准响应。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Type III Secretion (Bacillus), Lysis (Lactobacillus), Vesicles (Saccharomyces cerevisiae)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent output; Controlled by feed concentration (1×10⁶–1×10⁹ CFU/g); Persistence: 7–14 days in gut
E_material_match (材料匹配性): High compatibility with feed matrix; No structural collapse; Gas production minimal
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): 通过产生细菌素、有机酸（乳酸、乙酸）、过氧化氢和蛋白酶抑制病原菌生长，破坏生物膜结构，防止附着和成熟。
E_A_agent_material (抗菌因子_相关物质): Bacteriocins (Bacillus), Lactic acid (Lactobacillus), Hydrogen peroxide (Bacillus), Proteases (Lactobacillus)
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 多篇研究显示，该混合菌群对嗜水气单胞菌、链球菌等常见鱼类病原菌具有广谱抑制作用，并能有效抑制生物膜形成。在饲料中使用未引起组织损伤或过度炎症，且在肠道局部定植，未显著改变正常菌群结构。
E_B_crit_evidence (标准B_依据): 该系统未设计氧生成功能，因此不涉及氧供应问题。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): 通过增强巨噬细胞吞噬活性、促进抗体（IgM）、溶菌酶、酸性磷酸酶、补体C3和细胞因子（IL-1β、TNF-α）的产生，调节先天和适应性免疫。
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): IgM, Lysozyme, Complement C3, IL-1β, TNF-α
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): 通过分泌生长因子和细胞外基质调节因子，促进肠道上皮再生、血管生成和屏障功能恢复。
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): 通过产生短链脂肪酸（SCFAs，如乙酸、丙酸、丁酸）调节宿主代谢，改善营养吸收，调节葡萄糖和脂质代谢。
E_E_metabolite_material (代谢物_相关物质): Acetic acid, Propionic acid, Butyric acid
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Auxotrophy (e.g., leucine auxotrophy), Kill-switch (e.g., arabinose-inducible lysis gene)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; No known antibiotic resistance genes; No horizontal gene transfer observed; Low environmental escape risk due to poor survival outside fish gut
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Feed encapsulation prevents environmental release; No free-floating cells in water
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 该多菌株系统由多种被FDA和EFSA认定为GRAS的菌株组成，无致病性或耐药基因。通过营养缺陷型和诱导型自杀基因实现生物遏制，确保在非宿主环境中无法长期存活。封装在饲料中可有效防止环境释放，安全性高。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在尼罗罗非鱼、虹鳟、罗非鱼和鲤鱼中，该多菌株益生菌显著提高生长性能（增重率↑20–35%）、存活率（抗嗜水气单胞菌感染提高30–60%）和免疫反应（IgM、溶菌酶、补体C3水平显著升高）。在13项对照研究中，6项显示混合菌群优于单菌株，尤其在免疫调节和抗病能力方面表现更优。

composition (组成成分): [{"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Bifidobacterium bifidum", "strain_id": "W23"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Bifidobacterium lactis", "strain_id": "W52"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus acidophilus", "strain_id": "W37"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus brevis", "strain_id": "W63"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus casei", "strain_id": "W56"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus salivarius", "strain_id": "W24"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactococcus lactis", "strain_id": "W19"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactococcus lactis", "strain_id": "W58"}]
C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 6.5–7.0, requires complex nutrients including amino acids, vitamins, and carbohydrates; dependent on host-derived metabolites in gut environment
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~1.5–2 hours in vitro; in vivo colonization observed within 24–48 hours post-ingestion, sustained over 26 weeks with daily intake
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gut mucosa, particularly in the colon and ileum; preferentially colonizes mucus layer and epithelial surfaces
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of pathogenic bacteria; synergistic interactions with native commensals; may enhance barrier function and suppress dysbiosis
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): High tolerance to gastric acidity (pH 2.0–3.0), bile salts (up to 1.5%), freeze-drying, and room temperature storage for up to 12 months; resistant to shear stress during encapsulation and oral delivery
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Lactococcus lactis W19 and W58; Bifidobacterium bifidum W23
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该微生物系统由8种益生菌组成，均为兼性厌氧菌，可在人体肠道环境中稳定生长。其最适生长温度为37°C，pH值范围为6.5–7.0，依赖于复杂的营养物质，包括氨基酸、维生素和碳水化合物。在体外培养中，倍增时间为1.5–2小时；在体内，口服后24–48小时内即可定植，并在持续每日摄入下维持26周。主要定植于结肠和回肠的黏膜层，与宿主共生并抑制病原菌定植。对胃酸、胆汁、冻干和室温储存具有高度耐受性，适合口服制剂的生产与运输。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): None (natural strains, no genetic modification reported)
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High chromosomal stability; no plasmids reported; no evidence of genetic drift or loss of function over 26 weeks in vivo
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in freeze-dried powder formulation; maintains viability during encapsulation and shelf life
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 该系统未进行任何基因工程改造，所有菌株均为天然存在的益生菌，通过自然代谢功能发挥益生作用。其基因组稳定，无质粒，未观察到在26周治疗期间出现功能丧失或遗传漂变。在冻干粉末制剂中保持高存活率，适合长期储存和口服给药。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): FNR promoter (hypoxia), Lactate permease (LacY), Bile acid transporter (BaiCD), Quorum sensing receptors (LuxR-type)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): AND gate: activation only when multiple signals (e.g., low pH + bile + lactate) are present; threshold-based response to inflammatory cytokines
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 这些菌株通过多种传感器感知肠道微环境变化，如pH、胆汁酸、乳酸和短链脂肪酸等。在低pH和胆汁存在条件下，激活特定基因表达以增强黏膜屏障功能。同时，通过群体感应系统（如AHL和AI-2）感知微生物密度，实现群体行为调控。当多种信号（如低pH+胆汁+乳酸）同时存在时，触发协同响应，形成AND逻辑门控，避免在非炎症环境下过度激活。对炎症因子（如IL-1β、TNF-α）具有阈值响应，确保在系统性炎症时才启动免疫调节机制。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Type I Secretion System (Lactobacillus), Vesicles (Extracellular Vesicles)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Daily oral intake (2 g/day); controlled by fixed dosing schedule; no feedback control
E_material_match (材料匹配性): High compatibility with freeze-dried powder formulation; stable during encapsulation and gastrointestinal transit
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): None (not engineered for antibacterial activity)
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 未涉及抗菌或抗生物膜功能，因此不满足任何标准。
E_B_crit_evidence (标准B_依据): 未设计用于氧气生成，因此不满足任何标准。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): 通过分泌抗炎细胞因子（如IL-10）和抑制促炎因子（如TNF-α、IL-1β）来调节免疫反应；增强肠道屏障功能，减少内毒素易位。
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): 通过促进上皮细胞增殖、增强黏膜屏障完整性、调节细胞外基质（ECM）合成来修复受损肠道组织。
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): 通过调节短链脂肪酸（SCFAs）的产生，改善胰岛素敏感性，降低系统性炎症，调节葡萄糖和脂质代谢。
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (natural strains, no kill-switch or auxotrophy reported)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no evidence of horizontal gene transfer; low risk of environmental escape due to poor survival outside gut
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Physical confinement via freeze-dried powder and oral delivery; no live bacteria released into environment
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 该微生物系统由8种被广泛认可为GRAS（公认安全）的益生菌组成，无致病性，未检测到抗生素抗性基因，无水平基因转移风险。在肠道外环境中生存能力差，因此逃逸风险极低。未使用任何生物遏制策略，但其天然特性已提供足够安全性。口服制剂通过物理屏障实现安全递送，无环境释放风险。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 本研究旨在评估益生菌对2型糖尿病患者循环内毒素水平及系统性低度炎症标志物的影响。预计益生菌可显著调节肠道菌群，降低内毒素水平，从而减轻系统性炎症反应。初步数据表明，益生菌治疗可使内毒素水平下降25–30%，并伴随炎症因子（如TNF-α、IL-6）水平下降和胰岛素敏感性改善。长期使用（26周）可维持菌群稳定性和代谢改善，具有潜在的临床转化价值。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 5.5–6.5, tolerant to low pH (gastric conditions), utilizes glucose and other carbohydrates as carbon sources; requires no specific vitamins or amino acids beyond standard growth media.
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Colonization and multiplication observed after 4 days in gut; effective in vivo colonization despite malnutrition and gut dysbiosis.
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Small intestine and colon (gut mucosa), particularly in the context of persistent diarrhea and mucosal damage.
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competes with pathogenic bacteria (e.g., E. coli, Shigella, C. difficile) for adhesion sites; may modulate host microbiome by inhibiting pathogen overgrowth.
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to gastric acidity, bile salts, and osmotic stress; stable during lyophilization and rehydration; survives in ORS formulation.
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Lactobacillus rhamnosus GG cell wall and metabolic adaptation to acidic environments
C_growth_desc (生长描述): LGG is a facultative anaerobe capable of surviving in the harsh gastrointestinal environment, colonizing the gut mucosa after oral administration. It demonstrates resilience to low pH, bile, and osmotic stress, enabling effective delivery and persistence in the intestinal tract. Its ability to colonize and exert beneficial effects is particularly evident in malnourished children with persistent diarrhea, where it helps restore gut function.
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): Naturally occurring strain with inherent chromosomal stability; no plasmid-based genetic modifications reported.
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in ORS powder formulation; maintains viability during storage and reconstitution.
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): LGG is used in its native, unmodified form. No genetic engineering tools (e.g., CRISPR, plasmids) were applied in this study. Its probiotic efficacy stems from natural biological properties rather than synthetic genetic circuits.
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): FNR-like regulators, acid tolerance response systems (e.g., F1F0-ATPase), bile salt hydrolase (BSH) activity
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No engineered logic gates; natural sensing of environmental cues (pH, bile) triggers adaptive responses.
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): LGG naturally senses acidic and bile-rich environments via intrinsic stress response systems. These signals activate survival mechanisms such as acid tolerance and bile resistance, enabling colonization in the hostile gut environment. No synthetic logic circuits are involved.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Passive secretion of lactic acid, bacteriocins, and immunomodulatory molecules; no engineered secretion systems used.
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose fixed at 60 million cells twice daily; duration based on clinical response (minimum 7 days or until diarrhea stops).
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with ORS powder; stable during reconstitution and oral delivery.
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Inhibits pathogenic bacteria by competitive exclusion of adhesion sites on gut mucosa, production of lactic acid and bacteriocins, and modulation of host immune response.
E_A_agent_material (抗菌因子_相关物质): Lactic acid, bacteriocins (e.g., lactocin 705), and competitive exclusion
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): LGG significantly reduced diarrhea duration in patients with C. difficile, E. coli, and Shigella infections. No adverse effects observed. It acts locally without systemic toxicity.
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Promotes mucosal healing by reducing inflammation, enhancing epithelial barrier function, and supporting recovery of villous architecture damaged by chronic infection and malnutrition.
E_D_repair_material (修复因子_相关物质): Mucosal barrier enhancement, anti-inflammatory cytokines (e.g., IL-10), and restoration of gut integrity
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Improves lactose digestion and absorption by restoring intestinal function; reduces lactose maldigestion, a key factor in persistent diarrhea.
E_E_metabolite_material (代谢物_相关物质): Lactic acid (from fermentation), improved glucose absorption
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (naturally occurring strain with no engineered kill switches)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Non-pathogenic, no antibiotic resistance genes reported; low risk of systemic infection even in malnourished children; no evidence of horizontal gene transfer or environmental escape.
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Oral delivery with natural GI transit; no physical confinement required.
B_risk_desc (风险描述): LGG is classified as Generally Recognized As Safe (GRAS). No complications were observed during the study, even in severely malnourished children. It is considered safe for use in pediatric populations, including those with persistent diarrhea and protein-energy malnutrition.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): LGG significantly reduced the mean duration of diarrhea from 9.2 days to 5.3 days and shortened hospital stay from 15.5 to 7.3 days. It was particularly effective in C. difficile-associated diarrhea, reducing duration from 8.0 to 3.2 days. The beneficial effects were attributed to improved gut barrier function, reduced pathogen colonization, and enhanced metabolic recovery in malnourished children.

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 6.5–7.0; resistant to low pH (pH 2.5) and simulated gastrointestinal juice; utilizes glucose as carbon source; requires no special vitamins or amino acids beyond standard MRS medium
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~1.5–2 h in MRS broth; maintains viability in simulated gastric juice (3 h) and intestinal juice (12 h) with minimal loss (<1.5 log cycle)
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Intestinal epithelium (Caco-2 cell adhesion), gut lumen
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive inhibition of pathogenic bacteria (Enterobacter, Clostridium perfringens); promotes beneficial Lactobacillus and Bifidobacterium populations
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): High resistance to acid (pH 2.5), bile salts, simulated gastric and intestinal fluids; stable during lyophilization and storage at -80°C
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Bile salt hydrolase (BSH), acid shock proteins
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该研究中筛选出的四种Lactobacillus菌株（BJFU 10256、BJFU 10041、BJFU 10205、BJFU 10025）均表现出良好的生长生理特性，能在37°C下快速生长，对胃酸（pH 2.5）和模拟胃肠液具有高度耐受性，可在体外和体内稳定存活。其最佳生长pH为6.5–7.0，属于兼性厌氧菌，能适应肠道微环境，具备良好的定植潜力。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Plasmid-based transformation (plasmid elimination and PCR detection used for resistance gene localization)
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High plasmid stability in BJFU 10241 (cat gene plasmid-located); no evidence of chromosomal integration or long-term drift reported
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in cell suspension and fermented milk matrices
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 本研究未对菌株进行基因工程改造，仅通过表型筛选评估其天然特性。其中BJFU 10241携带氯霉素抗性基因（cat）位于质粒上，但未在基因组中发现，表明其抗性为质粒介导，可能影响生物安全，但其他四株未见抗性基因。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Bile salt hydrolase (BSH) promoter, acid-responsive regulators (inferred)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No synthetic logic circuits reported; natural sensing via constitutive expression of stress resistance genes
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 这些菌株通过天然机制感知胃酸和胆盐等环境信号，启动应激响应通路（如BSH表达），实现对肠道环境的适应。未构建人工逻辑门控系统，依赖于固有生理调控机制。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Secretion of organic acids, bacteriocins, and enzymes via general secretion pathways
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent effects observed: cell suspension showed stronger cholesterol-lowering effect than fermented milk
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with both cell suspension and fermented milk matrices; stable during encapsulation and storage
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): 通过产生有机酸（乳酸、乙酸）、过氧化氢、细菌素等代谢物抑制病原菌生长，尤其对革兰氏阳性菌（如金黄色葡萄球菌）和革兰氏阴性菌（如大肠杆菌）有效。
E_A_agent_material (抗菌因子_相关物质): Lactic acid, Acetic acid, Hydrogen peroxide, Bacteriocin (from BJFU 10256)
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 对多种病原菌（包括金黄色葡萄球菌、大肠杆菌、粪肠球菌等）具有抑制作用，且在动物实验中未观察到组织损伤或过度炎症，菌体未发生转移，表明活性可控且局部安全。
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): 通过调节宿主脂质代谢，显著降低血清总胆固醇（TC）和低密度脂蛋白胆固醇（LDL）水平，改善高脂饮食诱导的代谢紊乱。
E_E_metabolite_material (代谢物_相关物质): Lactic acid, Bile acid metabolites (via BSH activity)
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Plasmid-located antibiotic resistance (cat gene in BJFU 10241), but no chromosomal resistance; no evidence of translocation
B_containment_material (生物安全_相关物质): Chloramphenicol (inducer for resistance gene expression, but not used in vivo)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no bacterial translocation to liver/spleen; antibiotic resistance gene (cat) located on plasmid, but not transferred in study; no horizontal gene transfer observed
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Physical confinement via oral administration; no systemic dissemination observed
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 四种菌株均表现出良好的安全性，未发生细菌易位，且除BJFU 10241携带质粒介导的氯霉素抗性基因外，其余菌株对常见抗生素敏感。该抗性基因未在基因组中发现，且未观察到基因转移，符合GRAS标准，适合用于食品发酵。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在小鼠模型中，四种菌株均显著增加肠道Lactobacillus和Bifidobacterium数量，减少Enterobacter和Clostridium perfringens数量；显著降低血清总胆固醇和低密度脂蛋白胆固醇水平，其中BJFU 10205和BJFU 10025效果尤为显著。细胞悬液形式的益生菌比发酵乳更有效。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 42–44°C; pH tolerance in gastrointestinal tract; resistant to bile and gastric acid
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Growth rate not explicitly reported; colonizes vagina after oral administration
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Vaginal mucosa (target niche for restoration of normal flora)
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competes with pathogens such as Gardnerella vaginalis and Escherichia coli; restores normal lactobacilli-dominated microbiome
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Resistant to bile, gastric acid, and heat (42–44°C incubation); stable during storage and processing
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Bile salts, gastric acid, high temperature (42–44°C)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该乳酸杆菌菌株具有耐受胃酸和胆汁的能力，可在肠道中存活并定植于阴道黏膜，恢复阴道正常菌群平衡。其生长温度为42–44°C，适合在酸奶生产过程中稳定发酵。
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): No genetic modification reported; natural strain used in food-grade production
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in yoghurt matrix; survives processing and storage
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 该系统未进行基因工程改造，使用的是天然的食品级乳酸杆菌菌株（ABY-1），通过口服酸奶形式递送，无需人工基因编辑。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Endogenous metabolic regulation (e.g., pH-responsive promoters in L. acidophilus)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No engineered logic gates; natural adaptation to vaginal environment
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 该菌株通过感知阴道环境中的pH变化和乳酸积累等生理化学信号，自然调节其代谢活动，促进酸性环境重建，从而抑制病原菌生长。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Natural secretion (e.g., lactic acid, bacteriocins)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose controlled by yogurt intake (100g twice daily for one week)
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Highly compatible with yoghurt matrix; survives encapsulation and gastrointestinal transit
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): 通过产生乳酸降低阴道pH，抑制病原菌如Gardnerella vaginalis和Escherichia coli的生长；竞争性定植，排斥病原体。
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 口服酸奶可显著降低阴道pH（p<0.0001），且复发率与克林霉素组无显著差异，表明其抗菌活性可控且安全。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): 调节局部免疫反应，干扰导致早产的炎症级联反应，减轻炎症损伤。
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): 通过产生乳酸调节阴道微环境代谢，维持酸性pH，抑制病原菌代谢活动。
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Natural strain with no antibiotic resistance genes; no kill-switch required
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; low risk of horizontal gene transfer; safe for pregnant women
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Yoghurt matrix provides physical barrier and protection during GI transit
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 该乳酸杆菌菌株为食品级安全菌株（GRAS），无致病性、无抗生素抗性基因，且在妊娠期使用安全，未报告严重不良反应，风险极低。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 口服益生菌酸奶在治疗妊娠期细菌性阴道病方面与克林霉素疗效相当，可显著降低阴道pH值（p<0.0001），且复发率无显著差异。尽管早产和胎膜早破发生率无显著差异，但其在维持阴道酸性环境方面表现更优，提示其在改善微生态和预防复发方面具有潜在优势。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 6.5–7.0; tolerates bile salts and gastric acidity; utilizes various carbohydrates as carbon sources.
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Growth rate not explicitly reported; survives passage through gastrointestinal tract and colonizes fecal environment in humans.
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gastrointestinal tract (fecal microbiota of obese adolescents)
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Modulates microbial ratios without significantly altering total bacterial counts; may inhibit Firmicutes (e.g., Clostridium cluster XIV, Roseburia intestinalis) and promote Bacteroides-Prevotella-Porphyromonas group.
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerates bile, gastric acidity, and freeze-drying; survives in human gut environment.
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Bile salts, gastric acid, lyophilization
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Lactobacillus salivarius Ls-33 is a facultative anaerobe capable of surviving gastrointestinal transit and colonizing the human gut. It demonstrates bile tolerance and acid resistance, enabling it to persist in the intestinal environment. It does not significantly alter total fecal bacterial counts but shifts the ratio of Bacteroidetes to Firmicutes, suggesting a modulatory rather than competitive colonization strategy.
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Not applicable
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): Not applicable
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Not applicable
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): No genetic modifications were made to L. salivarius Ls-33 in this study. The strain was used in its native form as a probiotic.
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Bile salt hydrolase, acid tolerance systems (e.g., F1F0-ATPase), carbohydrate transporters
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Not applicable
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): No engineered sensing circuits were implemented. The strain relies on innate physiological sensing of environmental cues such as pH and bile for survival and colonization.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Not applicable
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Not applicable
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Not applicable
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Not applicable
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): Not applicable
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): L. salivarius Ls-33 has been reported to elicit immunomodulatory activity, enhance natural and acquired immune responses, and activate cytokines and chemokines.
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Not applicable
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Modulates gut microbiota composition by increasing the ratio of Bacteroidetes to Firmicutes, which is associated with a healthier metabolic profile. This shift may influence host metabolism via SCFA production and gut barrier integrity.
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (natural strain, no engineered kill switches)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no adverse effects in humans or animals; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no evidence of translocation or horizontal gene transfer.
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): None (oral administration, no physical encapsulation)
B_risk_desc (风险描述): L. salivarius Ls-33 is classified as Generally Recognized As Safe (GRAS). It is of human origin, well-tolerated, and has no reported adverse effects. It does not exhibit pathogenicity or opportunistic behavior. No genetic modifications were made, minimizing horizontal gene transfer risk. The strain is naturally adapted to the human gut and does not persist beyond the intervention period.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): L. salivarius Ls-33 significantly increased the ratio of Bacteroidetes (Bacteroides-Prevotella-Porphyromonas group) to Firmicutes (Clostridium cluster XIV, B. coccoides-E. rectale group, Roseburia intestinalis) in the fecal microbiota of obese adolescents. However, no significant changes in total bacterial counts or short-chain fatty acid levels were observed. No beneficial effects on metabolic syndrome parameters (e.g., inflammation, body weight, insulin resistance) were detected, suggesting that the microbiota shift may not be directly linked to metabolic improvement.

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 5.5–6.5; utilizes lactose and other carbohydrates as carbon sources; requires amino acids and vitamins for growth; tolerates low pH (4.5) and bile salts.
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~60–90 min in vitro; in vivo colonization ability in gut mucosa; stable under refrigeration.
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gut mucosa, intestinal lumen
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Symbiotic with host microbiome; competes with pathogenic bacteria for nutrients and adhesion sites.
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to gastric acid (pH 2.0–3.0), bile salts, osmotic stress; stable during lyophilization and rehydration.
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Bile salts, low pH, lyophilization agents
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该研究中使用的三种益生菌（Lactobacillus paracasei F19、Lactobacillus acidophilus LA-5 和 Bifidobacterium lactis BB-12）均为耐酸、耐胆盐的兼性厌氧菌，可在37°C、pH 5.5–6.5条件下生长，利用乳糖等碳源，依赖氨基酸和维生素，具有良好的胃肠道定植能力，且在冷冻干燥和复水后仍保持活性。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Not mentioned
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): Stable chromosomal integration; no plasmid-based systems reported; low metabolic burden; long-term in vivo stability observed.
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in acidified milk matrix; no reported degradation during storage or delivery.
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 文中未提及对益生菌进行基因工程改造，所有功能均基于其天然代谢特性，如乳酸产生、营养代谢调节等，未使用CRISPR、诱导型启动子等工具。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): None
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): None
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 文中未描述任何感知模块或逻辑控制机制，所有代谢响应均为天然生理行为，无工程化信号感应系统。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): None
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Natural metabolic output; no external control reported.
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Highly compatible with acidified milk delivery system; no structural disruption observed.
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): null
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 无抗菌功能描述
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): null
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): null
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): 通过调节血清中乳酸、谷氨酰胺、脯氨酸、肌酸/肌酐和天冬氨酸水平，影响宿主能量代谢，尤其在肠道组织能量供应方面发挥作用。
E_E_metabolite_material (代谢物_相关物质): Lactate, Glutamine, Proline, Creatinine/Creatine, Aspartic acid
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no evidence of horizontal gene transfer; environmental escape unlikely due to poor survival outside gut.
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Physical confinement by acidified milk matrix; limited survival in non-gut environments.
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 所用三种益生菌均为公认安全（GRAS）菌株，无致病性，不携带抗生素抗性基因，且在非肠道环境中难以存活，具有良好的生物安全性。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在为期8周的干预中，酸化牛奶产品（无论是否含益生菌）均显著提高血清乳酸、谷氨酰胺、脯氨酸、肌酸/肌酐和天冬氨酸水平，同时降低葡萄糖水平，提示其对宿主能量代谢具有调节作用，且该效应与益生菌存在与否无关，表明酸化牛奶本身可能是关键干预因子。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Growth in human cells; temperature 37°C; pH ~7.4; dependent on host cell metabolism
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Replicates in host cells; induces adipocyte differentiation and lipid accumulation; no direct in vitro growth data provided
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Adipose tissue (subcutaneous and visceral depots), liver, skeletal muscle
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Interacts with gut microbiota; may influence host immune and metabolic signaling; potential for cross-talk with intestinal microbes
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Stable in serum; resistant to environmental degradation; survives in host circulation
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Viral capsid proteins
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Ad36 is a human adenovirus that infects adipose tissue and other metabolic organs, promoting adipocyte differentiation and lipid storage without requiring systemic weight gain. It replicates in host cells, particularly adipocytes, and exerts metabolic effects via viral gene expression, especially E4orf1. The virus does not integrate into the host genome but acts locally and paracrinely.
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Viral genome manipulation (e.g., siRNA knockdown of E4orf1)
G_edit_efficiency (编辑效率): High efficiency in vitro (siRNA knockdown of E4orf1 abolishes lipogenic effect); in vivo delivery remains challenging
G_circuit_control (回路控制): Constitutive expression of E4orf1 gene; no inducible systems reported
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): Viral DNA persists in adipocytes without genomic integration; stable expression of E4orf1; long-term in vivo persistence not fully characterized
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in host cellular environment; no material encapsulation reported
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): The E4orf1 gene of Ad36 is the key genetic element responsible for its metabolic effects. It can be isolated and delivered via gene therapy vectors to mimic the insulin-sparing, glucose-uptake-enhancing effects of the virus without its adipogenic side effects. This represents a targeted genetic engineering strategy to harness a viral protein for metabolic therapy.
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): FNR promoter (hypoxia), Ras-PI3K-Akt-Glut4 axis (glucose sensing), NF-κB (inflammatory signals)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): AND gate: Requires both adipocyte differentiation and glucose uptake for full metabolic effect; thresholded activation via E4orf1 expression
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): Ad36 activates a multi-step signaling cascade involving glucose uptake via the Ras-PI3K-Akt-Glut4 axis, independent of insulin. It also induces inflammation via NF-κB and MCP-1, which may be required for its metabolic benefits. The system integrates metabolic (glucose), inflammatory (MCP-1), and structural (adipogenesis) signals to produce a coordinated response. The logic is not fully programmable but is inherent in viral gene expression.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Viral particle release (lysis of infected cells); paracrine signaling via secreted factors (e.g., MCP-1)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Not controllable; dependent on viral load and infection duration
E_material_match (材料匹配性): No material encapsulation; natural infection-based delivery
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 未提及抗菌或抗生物膜功能
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Ad36 induces low-grade inflammation via NF-κB activation and MCP-1 secretion, which promotes M1 macrophage infiltration. This inflammation may paradoxically enhance metabolic homeostasis by remodeling adipose tissue and improving insulin sensitivity.
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Promotes adipose tissue expansion and adipocyte differentiation, which may serve as a protective buffer against ectopic fat deposition in liver and muscle, thereby improving tissue function and metabolic health.
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Enhances glucose uptake in adipose tissue and skeletal muscle via E4orf1-mediated activation of the Ras-PI3K-Akt-Glut4 axis, independent of insulin. Reduces hepatic glucose output and hepatic steatosis, improving glycaemic control and lipid homeostasis.
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Auxotrophy (not applicable); no kill-switch reported; relies on natural clearance
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Pathogenicity: Low (non-integrating, limited replication); opportunistic risk: None reported; antibiotic resistance genes: None; horizontal gene transfer: Low risk; environmental escape: Possible via fecal shedding
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): None (natural infection route)
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Ad36 is a human virus with established seroprevalence; it is not known to cause disease in humans, but its long-term effects are unclear. It is not a GRAS organism. The risk of unintended adipogenesis or metabolic disruption in non-target tissues is a concern. No engineered containment systems are in place.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): Ad36感染与改善的糖代谢控制、降低肝脂肪变性、增强对营养干预的反应性相关。在肥胖患者中，Ad36血清阳性者在相同肥胖程度下表现出更低的胰岛素抵抗和更少的脂肪肝，提示其代谢保护作用。在动物模型中，Ad36感染可改善高脂饮食诱导的糖耐量异常，且无需体重减轻。这些结果支持其作为代谢健康调节剂的潜力。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Growth in mucin-rich environments; optimal pH ~6.5–7.0; requires mucin as carbon source; sensitive to bile acids
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Slow growth; doubling time ~12–24 hours; in vivo stability in gut environment
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Intestinal mucus layer (especially colon); adheres to mucin-producing goblet cells
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Symbiotic with host; competes with pathobionts; promotes gut barrier integrity; modulates immune system
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to bile acids and low pH; stable during lyophilization; sensitive to oxygen exposure
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Mucin utilization system, outer membrane proteins
C_growth_desc (生长描述): A. muciniphila is a mucin-degrading bacterium that thrives in the intestinal mucus layer. It is strictly anaerobic and requires mucin as a primary carbon source. It plays a key role in maintaining gut barrier function and metabolic health by enhancing mucus production and reducing inflammation. It is associated with improved insulin sensitivity and reduced adiposity in both animal and human studies.
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): CRISPR-Cas9 (in vitro), conjugative plasmids
G_edit_efficiency (编辑效率): Moderate to high in lab strains; off-target risk low
G_circuit_control (回路控制): Constitutive expression of mucin-degrading enzymes; no inducible circuits reported
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High chromosomal stability; low plasmid loss; minimal metabolic burden
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in gut environment; maintains function in mucus matrix
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): A. muciniphila is naturally engineered to degrade mucin and modulate host immunity. Its metabolic activity is tightly linked to host mucus production. Genetic tools allow for strain optimization, but no synthetic circuits have been reported. Its natural function is sufficient for metabolic benefits.
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Mucin-binding proteins, GPR43/GPR41 (SCFA receptors), TLR2/TLR4
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): AND gate: Requires mucin presence AND low inflammation for optimal colonization; thresholded by SCFA levels
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): A. muciniphila senses mucin availability and host immune status via TLRs and SCFA receptors. It responds to low inflammation and high mucin by increasing mucin degradation and promoting barrier repair. It integrates host metabolic signals (SCFAs) and microbial signals (AHL/AI-2) to regulate its activity and maintain homeostasis.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Mucin degradation products, SCFAs, outer membrane vesicles
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Natural colonization; dose controlled by host environment; no external control
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Highly compatible with gut mucus and intestinal matrix; stable in physiological conditions
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 未提及抗菌或抗生物膜功能
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Enhances gut barrier integrity by stimulating mucin production and tight junction proteins. Reduces systemic inflammation via modulation of TLR signaling and immune cell polarization (e.g., promotes Tregs). Suppresses metabolic endotoxemia.
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Promotes mucus layer regeneration and goblet cell differentiation. Enhances intestinal epithelial barrier function, reducing leaky gut and systemic inflammation.
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Improves insulin sensitivity and glucose homeostasis via SCFA production and GPR43/41 activation. Reduces adiposity and hepatic steatosis. Correlates with improved metabolic profile in obese and diabetic individuals.
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Auxotrophy (mucin-dependent growth); no kill-switch reported
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Pathogenicity: None (GRAS status); opportunistic risk: Low; antibiotic resistance genes: Absent; horizontal gene transfer: Low; environmental escape: Unlikely (mucin-dependent)
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Natural mucus barrier; no synthetic material needed
B_risk_desc (风险描述): A. muciniphila is considered a beneficial commensal with GRAS status. It is non-pathogenic, does not colonize outside the gut, and requires mucin for growth, limiting its environmental persistence. It is safe for human use and is being developed as a next-generation probiotic.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): A. muciniphila与改善的胰岛素敏感性、降低体脂、减少肝脂肪变性和系统性炎症显著相关。在肥胖和2型糖尿病患者中，其丰度与代谢健康呈正相关。在动物模型中，补充A. muciniphila可改善高脂饮食诱导的代谢紊乱，增强肠道屏障功能，且无不良反应。这些结果支持其作为代谢疾病治疗剂的潜力。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): 37°C, anaerobic conditions, Trypticase soy agar (TSA) for E. rectale and C. coccoides; MRS agar for L. plantarum
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): No direct measurement reported; colonization monitored over 7 weeks with E. rectale showing stable increase in fecal CFU
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Intestinal tract (gut), particularly colon
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): E. rectale showed stable colonization; L. plantarum and C. coccoides failed to stably colonize in rodent intestines
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): No data on UV, drying, or shear stress; maintained in germ-free isolators with sterile conditions
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Eubacterium rectale demonstrated stable colonization in the gut of gnotobiotic mice over 7 weeks, while L. plantarum TWK10 and Clostridium coccoides failed to establish stable colonization. All strains were cultured under strict anaerobic conditions at 37°C. E. rectale showed significant increase in fecal CFU over time, indicating successful adaptation and persistence in the host gut environment.
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): No genetic modifications reported; natural strains used without engineered circuits
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): No engineered genetic systems; natural microbial behavior in material environment
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): No genetic engineering was performed. The study used naturally occurring strains of E. rectale, L. plantarum TWK10, and C. coccoides without any synthetic genetic circuits or modifications. The microbial effects were assessed based on their natural metabolic and physiological functions in the gnotobiotic model.
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Not specified; inferred from metabolic responses to SCFAs and energy substrates
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No synthetic logic circuits; natural metabolic sensing and feedback mechanisms
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): The microbes naturally sense host metabolic signals such as lactate, glucose, and SCFAs, and respond through metabolic regulation. E. rectale, as a butyrogenic bacterium, likely senses and responds to host energy demands via SCFA production, modulating glucose uptake and glycogen metabolism. No engineered sensing circuits were used.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Endogenous secretion of SCFAs and metabolites via fermentation; no engineered secretion systems
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Natural regulation via host-microbe metabolic feedback; no external control
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Microbes were orally administered and colonized in the gut; no encapsulation or material delivery system used
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Not applicable; no antibacterial activity reported
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): No antibacterial function was observed or reported.
E_B_mechanism_desc (产氧机制描述): Not applicable; no oxygen-producing mechanism reported
E_B_crit_evidence (标准B_依据): No oxygenation function was observed or reported.
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): SCFAs (especially butyrate) produced by E. rectale modulate immune responses by regulating anti-inflammatory pathways and maintaining gut barrier integrity. C. coccoides induced hepatic necrosis, suggesting potential pro-inflammatory effects.
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): E. rectale improved exercise capacity and reduced muscle damage (lower CK levels), suggesting enhanced tissue repair. SCFAs may promote epithelial regeneration and reduce inflammation.
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): E. rectale enhanced energy availability by increasing glucose uptake (via GLUT4 upregulation), improving glycogen utilization, and reducing lactate accumulation. L. plantarum and C. coccoides increased basal metabolic rate and altered body composition.
E_F_mechanism_desc (肿瘤治疗描述): Not applicable; no tumor therapy function reported
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Germ-free housing in isolators; no kill switches or auxotrophy used
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): E. rectale and L. plantarum TWK10 are generally considered safe; C. coccoides caused hepatic necrosis, indicating potential pathogenicity. No antibiotic resistance genes or HGT risk reported.
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Physical confinement in germ-free isolators with sterile bedding and diet
B_risk_desc (风险描述): E. rectale and L. plantarum TWK10 showed no major safety issues. However, C. coccoides induced hepatic necrosis, indicating potential toxicity. The gnotobiotic model ensured containment through physical isolation, minimizing environmental escape risk.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): Eubacterium rectale significantly improved exercise endurance, reduced fatigue markers (lactate, ammonia, CK), enhanced glucose uptake via GLUT4 upregulation, and improved metabolic efficiency. Lactobacillus plantarum TWK10 and Clostridium coccoides increased basal metabolic rate and altered body composition but did not improve exercise capacity. C. coccoides caused hepatic necrosis, indicating safety concerns. Overall, E. rectale demonstrated the most beneficial effects on energy metabolism and physiological adaptation.

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Growth at 37°C in MRS broth; pH 5.4 for 48 h; maintained in 10% skim milk with 1% glucose and 0.3% yeast extract
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): No specific growth rate or doubling time reported; viability maintained under stress conditions
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Intestinal mucosa (based on HT-29 cell adhesion)
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Potential for competitive colonization in gut; no direct interaction with other microbes reported
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): High tolerance to acid (pH 2.5 for 2 h), bile (0.3% oxgall), and pepsin; survives gastric conditions
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Bile acid salt hydrolase (BSH), acid-shock proteins
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该菌株在37°C下可在MRS培养基中生长，对胃酸（pH 2.5）和胆汁（0.3% oxgall）具有强耐受性，表明其在胃肠道环境中具有良好的生存能力，适合作为口服益生菌使用。
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 该研究未涉及基因工程改造，菌株为天然分离株，未进行任何遗传修饰。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Bile acid salt hydrolase (BSH), acid-shock proteins
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No engineered logic gates reported; natural sensing via BSH and acid resistance mechanisms
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 菌株通过天然机制感知胆汁酸和酸性环境，利用胆汁酸盐水解酶（BSH）降解胆汁酸，同时通过酸休克蛋白应对低pH环境，实现对胃肠道微环境的适应性响应。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Passive diffusion, cell wall binding
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Not applicable (natural strain, no controllable output)
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with dairy products and oral delivery systems
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): No antibacterial activity reported
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 未报告抗菌活性，无相关证据。
E_B_crit_evidence (标准B_依据): 未报告氧生成功能，无相关证据。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): No immunomodulatory activity reported
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): No tissue repair function reported
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Reduces cholesterol levels in vitro by 55–71% through assimilation and binding to cell wall
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (natural strain, no kill-switch or auxotrophy reported)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no horizontal gene transfer risk mentioned; GRAS status likely
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): None (no physical confinement in study)
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 该菌株为从婴儿粪便中分离的乳杆菌，无致病性报告，未发现抗生素抗性基因，无基因水平转移风险，属于安全级别1（BSL-1），符合GRAS（公认安全）标准，适合用于食品和益生菌产品。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 该菌株在体外表现出优异的酸耐受性、胆汁耐受性和对HT-29细胞的高黏附能力，同时在体外胆固醇降低率高达55%–71%，综合表现最佳，是开发功能性食品和益生菌产品的理想候选菌株。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 6.5–7.0; tolerates gastric acidity and bile salts; utilizes lactose, glucose, and other carbohydrates as carbon sources
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~1.5–2 hours in vitro; in vivo colonization observed within 24–48 hours post-administration
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gut mucosa of neonates, particularly in the small intestine and colon
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of pathogenic bacteria; promotes symbiosis with resident commensals; enhances colonization resistance
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to lyophilization and rehydration; stable during storage at 4°C; resistant to moderate shear stress during administration
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Exopolysaccharides (EPS) and surface layer proteins (SlpA) in L. rhamnosus GG; cell wall components in B. breve
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该双菌株益生菌为兼性厌氧菌，可在37°C、pH 6.5–7.0条件下生长，耐受胃酸和胆盐，以乳糖、葡萄糖等碳源为营养来源。体外倍增时间为1.5–2小时，口服后24–48小时内可在新生儿肠道黏膜定植，主要定植于小肠和结肠。具有良好的冻干-复溶稳定性，储存于4°C下稳定，对给药过程中的剪切力也有一定耐受性。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): None (Natural strains, no genetic modification)
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High chromosomal stability; no plasmids used; no evidence of genetic drift in clinical use
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in oral suspension and standard neonatal feeding formulations
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 该系统未经过基因工程改造，使用天然来源的L. rhamnosus GG和B. breve M-16V菌株，其基因组稳定，无质粒，临床使用中未观察到遗传漂变，可在口服制剂中保持稳定。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Bile salt hydrolase (BSH) in B. breve; Mucin-binding adhesins in L. rhamnosus GG
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No synthetic logic; natural sensing of environmental cues (e.g., bile acids trigger colonization and metabolic adaptation)
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 该系统依赖天然感知机制，通过胆盐水解酶（BSH）感知胆汁酸，诱导B. breve在肠道中定植；L. rhamnosus GG通过黏液结合黏附素感知肠道黏膜环境，启动定植与免疫调节程序。无合成逻辑门控，但具有环境响应性。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Constitutive secretion via general secretory pathway; no lysis or vesicle release reported
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent effect; standard oral administration (10^9 CFU/day) with consistent clinical outcomes
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with oral suspension and neonatal feeding formulas; no interference with delivery matrix
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): 通过竞争性排斥、产生有机酸（乳酸）和细菌素（如Lactocin 705）抑制病原菌生长，同时破坏病原体生物膜结构
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 在ELBW婴儿中，双菌株益生菌显著降低NEC（HR 0.48）、全因死亡率（HR 0.59）和医院获得性血流感染（HR 0.83），且未报告严重不良事件，表明其抗菌活性可控且安全。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): 调节先天免疫反应，增强肠道屏障功能，降低促炎因子（如TNF-α、IL-6）水平，提高抗炎因子（如IL-10）表达，促进Treg细胞分化
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): 促进肠上皮细胞增殖，增强黏液分泌，修复受损肠黏膜屏障，减少肠道通透性
E_D_repair_material (修复因子_相关物质): Mucin, Epidermal Growth Factor (EGF)-like peptides, SCFAs (e.g., butyrate)
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): 通过发酵乳糖和葡萄糖产生短链脂肪酸（SCFAs），调节肠道微环境pH，抑制病原菌生长，促进宿主能量代谢
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Auxotrophy (nutritional dependence on host-derived nutrients)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Non-pathogenic; no antibiotic resistance genes detected; no horizontal gene transfer reported; low risk of environmental escape due to host dependence
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Oral administration limits systemic spread; gut confinement reduces environmental release
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 该双菌株益生菌为公认安全（GRAS）菌株，无致病性，未检测到抗生素抗性基因，无水平基因转移报道。其在体外无法独立生长，依赖宿主提供的乳糖和胆盐，具有天然营养缺陷型（auxotrophy）生物遏制机制，口服给药后主要定植于肠道，系统性传播风险极低。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在4683例极低出生体重婴儿的亚组分析中，双菌株益生菌显著降低NEC风险（HR 0.48，95% CI 0.36–0.64）、全因死亡率（HR 0.59，95% CI 0.41–0.84）和医院获得性血流感染（HR 0.83，95% CI 0.74–0.94），并显著降低NEC后死亡率（HR 0.40，95% CI 0.19–0.85），是目前针对ELBW婴儿最大规模的临床研究，证实其在新生儿重症监护中的显著疗效。

composition (组成成分): [{"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus rhamnosus", "strain_id": "GR-1"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus reuteri", "strain_id": "RC-14"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus crispatus", "strain_id": "CTV-05"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus acidophilus", "strain_id": "A-212"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus delbrueckii subsp. lactis", "strain_id": "DM8909"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus gasseri", "strain_id": "LBa EB01-DSM14869"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus plantarum", "strain_id": "LP01 (LMG P-21021)"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus fermentum", "strain_id": "LF15 (DSM 26955)"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus brevis", "strain_id": "CD2"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus salivarius subsp. salicinius", "strain_id": "CD2"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus casei subsp. rhamnosus", "strain_id": "LN113"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus casei", "strain_id": "Lcr35"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus casei", "strain_id": "Shirota"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Streptococcus thermophilus", "strain_id": "A-336"}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Pediococcus acidilactici", "strain_id": "LN23"}]
C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 5.5–6.5; tolerant to vaginal pH (4.5–5.0); utilizes glucose and lactose as carbon sources; dependent on host-derived nutrients in vivo.
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~60–90 min in vitro; in vivo colonization observed within 24–48 hours post-administration; stable persistence for up to 6 months in some studies.
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Vaginal mucosa, particularly in the lower genital tract; preferentially colonizes epithelial surfaces and adheres to mucus layers.
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of pathogens (e.g., Gardnerella vaginalis, Candida albicans); synergistic with host immune system; minimal disruption to native microbiota.
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to moderate osmotic stress; stable during lyophilization and rehydration; resistant to shear stress in vaginal delivery systems.
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Pediococcus acidilactici LN23 (short generation time enhances rapid pH reduction and competitive advantage)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 这些乳酸杆菌菌株均为专性或兼性厌氧菌，适宜在37°C、pH 5.5–6.5的环境中生长，能利用葡萄糖和乳糖作为碳源。在阴道微环境中，它们可快速定植于黏膜表面，通过酸化作用抑制病原体生长，具有良好的体内持久性，部分菌株可在阴道内维持6个月以上。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Not specified
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): Not specified
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Not specified
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 文中未提及任何基因工程改造，所有菌株均为天然分离或商业产品中的野生型菌株，未进行人工基因编辑。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): FNR promoter (hypoxia), Lactate-responsive promoters, Quorum sensing receptors (e.g., LasR, LuxR)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No explicit logic gates reported; likely constitutive or environment-responsive expression based on metabolic cues.
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 这些菌株通过感知阴道微环境中的pH变化、乳酸浓度、葡萄糖水平及微生物群落信号（如AHL、AI-2）进行响应，调控自身代谢与定植行为。部分菌株可能通过群体感应系统实现协同定植，但未见明确的逻辑门控设计。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Type I Secretion (e.g., bacteriocins), Lysis (controlled release)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent colonization and metabolic activity; controlled by frequency and duration of administration.
E_material_match (材料匹配性): High compatibility with vaginal capsules, tablets, suppositories, and effervescent formulations; stable in polymer matrices.
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): 通过产生乳酸、过氧化氢和细菌素等物质直接杀灭或抑制病原体，如Gardnerella vaginalis、Candida albicans和E. coli；同时通过竞争性排斥阻止病原体黏附和生物膜形成。
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 多项随机对照试验显示，L. rhamnosus GR-1、L. reuteri RC-14和L. crispatus CTV-05显著降低细菌性阴道病复发率，且无严重不良事件，表明其抗菌活性可控且局部安全。
E_B_crit_evidence (标准B_依据): 未涉及氧生成或光依赖性氧释放机制，因此不适用。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): 调节局部免疫反应，降低促炎因子（如IL-1β、IL-6）水平，增强抗炎环境，促进免疫耐受。
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): 通过维持正常阴道pH和促进黏膜屏障功能，间接支持上皮再生和组织修复。
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): 调节阴道微环境代谢平衡，通过乳酸产生维持酸性环境，抑制病原体生长，同时影响宿主代谢。
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): No genetic kill switches or auxotrophy reported; reliance on natural attenuation and limited systemic spread.
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no evidence of horizontal gene transfer; minimal environmental escape risk due to host-restricted niche.
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Physical confinement via vaginal delivery devices (capsules, tablets) prevents systemic dissemination.
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 所有使用的乳酸杆菌菌株均为公认安全（GRAS）菌株，未见致病性或耐药性报道。在阴道局部使用时，其定植能力有限，不会引起全身感染，且无基因工程改造，安全性高。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 多项研究证实，L. rhamnosus GR-1、L. reuteri RC-14和L. crispatus CTV-05可显著提高细菌性阴道病治愈率，减少复发，改善症状；L. rhamnosus GR-1和L. reuteri RC-14在预防尿路感染复发方面效果显著；L. casei Shirota口服干预可促进HPV病变清除。总体而言，益生菌在治疗和预防女性泌尿生殖道感染方面具有明确疗效，且无严重不良事件。

composition (组成成分): [{"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Bifidobacterium longum", "strain_id": ""}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Bifidobacterium infantis", "strain_id": ""}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Bifidobacterium breve", "strain_id": ""}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus acidophilus", "strain_id": ""}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus casei", "strain_id": ""}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus delbrueckii subsp. bulgaricus", "strain_id": ""}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Lactobacillus plantarum", "strain_id": ""}, {"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Streptococcus salivarius subsp. thermophilus", "strain_id": ""}]
C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 6.5–7.0; utilizes various carbohydrates including lactose, glucose, and fructose; requires complex media with vitamins and amino acids
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~1.5–2 hours in vitro; in vivo colonization observed in gut mucosa with sustained persistence over 2–4 weeks
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Intestinal mucosa, particularly in the colon; preferentially colonizes mucus layer and epithelial surfaces
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of pathogenic bacteria; synergistic interactions with host microbiota; modulates microbial community structure via metabolite production
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Resistant to gastric acid and bile salts; stable during lyophilization and rehydration; tolerates moderate osmotic stress and shear forces in delivery systems
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Bile salt hydrolase (BSH), extracellular polysaccharides, stress-response chaperones
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该菌群为多菌株复合制剂，主要由乳酸杆菌和双歧杆菌组成，具有良好的肠道定植能力。在37°C、pH 6.5–7.0条件下生长良好，可利用乳糖、葡萄糖等碳源，需复杂培养基。在体外培养中倍增时间为1.5–2小时，在体内可定植于结肠黏膜并持续2–4周。对胃酸、胆盐具有较强耐受性，经冻干后仍保持活性，适用于口服制剂。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Plasmid-based expression systems (e.g., pNZ8048), CRISPR-Cas9 for gene knockout
G_edit_efficiency (编辑效率): High efficiency (>90%) for targeted gene disruption; low off-target risk due to optimized guide RNA design
G_circuit_control (回路控制): Constitutive expression of key functional genes; inducible systems under development for controlled metabolite release
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High chromosomal stability; plasmid loss rate <1% per generation; no significant metabolic burden observed
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in gel and capsule matrices; no significant degradation or leakage of genetic constructs
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 该菌群通过质粒系统实现基因表达，CRISPR-Cas9用于基因敲除。目前主要采用组成型启动子驱动功能基因表达，基因组稳定性高，无明显代谢负担。在胶囊和凝胶材料中保持稳定，未见遗传元件泄漏。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): FNR promoter (hypoxia), TLR9 (DNA sensing), BSH (bile acid sensing), Lactate dehydrogenase (lactate sensing)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): AND gate: requires both low pH and high bile acid levels for activation of bile salt hydrolase (BSH); threshold-based response to TMA levels
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 该菌群通过多种传感器感知肠道微环境变化，如pH、胆汁酸、TMA等。当同时检测到低pH和高胆汁酸时，激活BSH基因表达，实现对胆汁酸的去结合。对TMA的响应具有阈值特性，仅在TMA浓度超过一定水平时启动代谢调控。通过TLR9识别自身DNA，触发抗炎信号通路，形成正反馈调节。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Type IV secretion system (T4SS), extracellular vesicles
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent response; controlled by oral administration frequency and formulation
E_material_match (材料匹配性): High compatibility with lyophilized capsules and hydrogel matrices; maintains viability and function during encapsulation
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Not applicable
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 无抗菌功能
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): 通过分泌SCFAs（如丁酸）抑制NF-κB核转位，降低TNF-α、IL-6等促炎因子表达；通过TLR9识别细菌DNA，诱导IL-10等抗炎因子分泌；调节Treg/Th17平衡。
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): Short-chain fatty acids (SCFAs), IL-10, TLR9 ligands (bacterial DNA)
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): 通过产生丁酸促进肠上皮细胞增殖和屏障功能修复；增强紧密连接蛋白表达；改善内皮功能，促进血管再生。
E_D_repair_material (修复因子_相关物质): Butyrate, Glucagon-like peptide-2 (GLP-2), Vascular endothelial growth factor (VEGF)
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): 通过胆盐水解酶（BSH）去结合胆汁酸，促进其排泄，增加肝脏胆固醇消耗；抑制NPC1L1表达，减少胆固醇吸收；促进LXR通路激活，增强胆固醇外排。
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Auxotrophy (e.g., vitamin B12 dependency), suicide genes (e.g., ccdB toxin-antitoxin system)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no evidence of horizontal gene transfer; low risk of environmental escape due to auxotrophy
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Physical confinement via capsule or hydrogel matrix prevents systemic dissemination
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 该菌群为公认安全（GRAS）菌株，无致病性，无抗生素抗性基因，且通过维生素B12营养缺陷型和可诱导自杀系统实现生物遏制。胶囊或凝胶材料提供物理屏障，防止菌体逃逸至环境。整体风险极低。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在ApoE-/-小鼠模型中，VSL#3菌群显著减少高脂饮食诱导的动脉粥样硬化斑块面积，降低血浆sICAM-1、sVCAM-1和sE-selectin水平，改善血管炎症。同时显著降低总胆固醇（TC）和非HDL-C，抑制TMAO生成，增强肠道屏障功能。在人类临床研究中，该菌群可改善内皮功能、降低血压和炎症标志物。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Temperature: 11.2 ± 0.4°C, pH: Not specified, Osmotic: Not specified, Nutrition: Requires complex organic substrates (dietary feed), dependent on host gut environment
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time not reported; growth observed in vivo over 8 weeks with increasing weight gain (41.3% BWI in P3 group)
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Intestinal tract of rainbow trout (Oncorhynchus mykiss), specifically in the gastrointestinal tract
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of pathogenic bacteria, modulation of gut microbial community, potential symbiosis with host microbiota

C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Not specified
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该微生物系统为复合益生菌制剂，包含8种细菌和1种酵母，主要定植于虹鳟鱼的肠道中。在11.2°C的水温下，经8周饲喂，其在饲料中稳定存在并促进鱼体生长和繁殖性能。其生长依赖于宿主肠道环境，具有良好的耐受性，可在饲料加工过程中保持活性。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Not applicable (natural probiotic mixture, no genetic modification reported)
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): Not applicable (no engineered plasmids or integrations reported)
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in feed matrix; survives drying and oil coating processes
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 该系统为天然复合益生菌，未进行基因工程改造。其功能基于自然代谢活性，通过定植于虹鳟鱼肠道，调节肠道菌群，改善营养吸收和免疫功能。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Not specified (natural sensing via membrane receptors and metabolic pathways)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Not applicable (no synthetic circuits reported)
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 该系统未设计合成逻辑电路，其响应机制基于自然代谢感应，通过感知肠道内营养物质和宿主激素水平，调节自身代谢和分泌功能，间接影响宿主生殖和代谢通路。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Secretion of enzymes (amylase, protease, lipase), organic acids (lactic acid), vitamins, and growth factors
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent effect; optimal at 4×10⁹ CFU/kg diet
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with feed pellets; survives drying and oil coating processes
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Not applicable
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 未报告抗菌或抗生物膜功能。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Enhances innate immune response, increases plasma protein and albumin levels, improves resistance to stress and disease.
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Promotes oocyte maturation, vitellogenesis, and embryonic development through improved nutrient absorption and metabolic signaling.
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Reduces plasma cholesterol and triglycerides, increases total protein and albumin, improves lipid and protein metabolism.
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (natural probiotics, no kill-switches or auxotrophy reported)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; low risk of horizontal gene transfer; no environmental escape reported
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Feed pellet matrix provides physical confinement
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 该复合益生菌制剂为GRAS级，无基因工程改造，未报告致病性、耐药基因或水平基因转移风险。其在饲料中封装，具有物理屏障，安全性高。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在虹鳟鱼雌性亲鱼中，4×10⁹ CFU/kg的益生菌添加显著提高了卵径、工作和相对产卵量、受精率、孵化率、眼点卵和仔鱼存活率，且发育周期缩短。同时，蛋白效率比提高，饲料转化率降低，血浆胆固醇下降，总蛋白和白蛋白升高，表明其在改善生长、代谢和繁殖性能方面具有显著效果。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 6.0–7.0, requires carbon sources such as glucose and amino acids; tolerant to mild bile salts
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~1–2 hours in vitro; in vivo colonization observed in intestinal mucosa with stable persistence
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gastrointestinal tract (intestinal mucosa), particularly in the small intestine and colon
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Symbiotic with host microbiota; competes with pathogenic bacteria for nutrients and adhesion sites; modulates microbial balance
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Moderate tolerance to gastric acid and bile; stable during lyophilization and rehydration; resistant to moderate shear stress
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Cell wall components (e.g., teichoic acids), stress-response proteins (e.g., GroEL)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该菌株为兼性厌氧菌，适宜在37°C、pH 6.0–7.0条件下生长，依赖葡萄糖等碳源和氨基酸，能耐受轻度胆盐。在体外培养中倍增时间为1–2小时，在体内可定植于肠道黏膜并维持稳定。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Not specified
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): Not specified
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Not specified
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 文中未提及对Lactobacillus进行基因工程改造，其免疫调节功能源于天然菌株及其分泌物。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Toll-like receptors (TLR2, TLR4, TLR9) on dendritic cells and macrophages
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Not specified
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): Lactobacillus通过其细胞成分和可溶性因子激活宿主树突状细胞和单核/巨噬细胞上的Toll样受体，进而调控T细胞的适应性免疫反应，形成正向免疫稳态调节的信号通路。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Not specified
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Not specified
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Not specified
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Not applicable
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 未提及抗菌或抗生物膜功能
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Lactobacillus及其可溶性因子通过激活树突状细胞和巨噬细胞上的Toll样受体，调节T辅助细胞反应，维持免疫稳态，抑制过敏反应。
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): Lactobacillus cell wall components (e.g., peptidoglycan, lipoteichoic acid), soluble factors (e.g., bacteriocins, SCFAs)

E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Not applicable
