B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; low risk of horizontal gene transfer; no evidence of environmental escape
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Not applicable
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Lactobacillus属菌株被广泛认为是安全的GRAS（公认安全）微生物，常用于食品和益生制剂，无已知致病性，对宿主微生物组影响较小，风险极低。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 该菌株通过激活树突状细胞和巨噬细胞上的Toll样受体，调节T细胞免疫反应，有效维持免疫稳态，抑制过敏性疾病的发生，尤其在免疫系统发育早期具有显著的免疫调节作用。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Thermophilic (heat-tolerant), acid-tolerant, grows in standard poultry feed with no additional support; resistant to lyophilization and storage
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Growth promoted in broiler chickens; daily weight gain and food conversion ratio improved compared to control and antibiotic groups
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Intestinal tract (caecal microflora, as implied by probiotic function)
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of pathogens; modulates intestinal microflora (implied by probiotic effect)
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): High resistance to heat, lyophilization, and long-term storage (spore stability for 5 years); maintains viability in feed during storage
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Spores (50% of lyophilized biomass)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Bacillus coagulans CNCM I-1061 是一种非致病性、产孢、兼性厌氧、嗜热、耐酸的乳酸菌，具有较强的热稳定性和长期保存能力。其冻干粉在5年内活菌数仅下降20%-30%，而孢子数保持不变，适合作为饲料添加剂。
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): No genetic modification reported; natural strain used as probiotic
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in feed matrix without support; maintains viability during storage and feeding
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 该研究未对 Bacillus coagulans CNCM I-1061 进行基因工程改造，直接以天然菌体作为饲料添加剂使用，其益生功能源于其天然生理特性。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): L(+) lactic acid production (inherent metabolic trait)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No engineered logic gates; natural metabolic response to intestinal environment
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 该菌株通过其天然的耐酸性和嗜热性适应肠道环境，通过乳酸发酵调节肠道pH，间接抑制病原菌生长，无人工设计的传感逻辑电路。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Natural secretion (lactic acid, enzymes)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent: 6×10¹⁰ CFU/kg (days 1–7), 4×10⁹ CFU/kg (days 8–49)
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with feed matrix; stable in lyophilized powder without encapsulation support
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): 通过乳酸发酵降低肠道pH，抑制病原菌生长；竞争性占据肠道生态位，抑制有害微生物定植
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 乳酸降低肠道pH，抑制病原菌，且无显著毒性或微生物组紊乱报告；在鸡群中使用安全，未见不良反应。
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Natural non-pathogenic strain; no genetic kill switches or auxotrophy reported
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Non-pathogenic; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; low risk of horizontal gene transfer; no environmental escape concerns in poultry setting
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Feed matrix provides physical confinement
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Bacillus coagulans CNCM I-1061 被认定为GRAS（公认安全）菌株，无致病性，不携带抗生素抗性基因，且在鸡群中使用未见不良反应，安全性高。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在两个试验中，添加 Bacillus coagulans 的鸡群平均体重和日增重均显著高于对照组和抗生素组，且饲料转化率优于对照组。在第二试验中，其胴体重最高，且鸡冠发育良好比例达77%，表明其具有显著的促生长和健康改善作用。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Optimal growth at 37°C, pH 6.5–7.5, tolerant to bile salts and moderate osmotic stress; utilizes glucose and various amino acids as carbon sources
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Doubling time ~30–40 minutes in vitro; in vivo colonization observed in intestinal lumen with sustained persistence over 1 month
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Intestinal mucosa, particularly in the colon of IBD patients
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of pathogenic bacteria; no significant disruption of native microbiota; potential for symbiotic interaction with commensal flora
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Resistant to drying, moderate UV exposure, and lyophilization; stable during storage at 4°C for up to 6 months
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Enterococcus faecium L-3 cell wall and endospore-like structures
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该菌株为兼性厌氧菌，可在37°C、pH 6.5–7.5条件下生长，对胆盐和中等渗透压具有耐受性。在体外培养中，其倍增时间为30–40分钟；在体内可定植于结肠黏膜，持续存在长达1个月。
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Plasmid-based expression system (not specified), no genetic modification reported
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): High chromosomal stability; no plasmid loss observed during 1-month treatment; low metabolic burden
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Stable in oral capsule formulation; maintains viability during encapsulation and gastrointestinal transit
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 该菌株未经过基因改造，其功能依赖于天然代谢途径，通过定植于肠道发挥调节免疫和改善炎症性肠病的作用。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): FNR-like promoter (inferred from pH and oxygen sensing), bile acid-responsive regulators
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Threshold-based activation of anti-inflammatory pathways in response to local inflammation markers
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 该菌株通过感知肠道微环境中的pH变化、胆汁酸浓度及乳酸水平，结合宿主释放的细胞因子和蛋白酶信号，激活其抗炎机制，实现对炎症微环境的响应性调控。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Passive diffusion and cell lysis
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent effect; 3 dragees three times daily for 1 month; clinical response correlated with sustained delivery
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with oral capsule formulation; maintains viability during gastrointestinal transit
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Not applicable
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 未报告抗菌或抗生物膜功能
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Modulates immune response by reducing pro-inflammatory cytokines (e.g., TNF-α, IL-6) and enhancing regulatory T-cell activity
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): Enterococcus faecium L-3 cell wall components and secreted metabolites
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Promotes epithelial regeneration and mucosal barrier integrity through stimulation of growth factors and reduction of oxidative stress
E_D_repair_material (修复因子_相关物质): TGF-β, EGF-like factors (inferred from functional data)
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Not applicable
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Auxotrophy (not reported), no antibiotic resistance genes detected
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no reports of bacteremia or systemic infection; no horizontal gene transfer observed; safe in immunocompromised IBD patients
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Oral capsule provides physical confinement; limited survival beyond intestinal lumen
B_risk_desc (风险描述): Enterococcus faecium L-3被归类为GRAS（公认安全），在炎症性肠病患者中使用安全，未见严重不良事件。其天然耐药性低，无已知的致病基因或水平基因转移风险。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 联合美沙拉嗪治疗组在6个月时临床活动指数（CAI）为4.5±1.5分，内镜活动指数（EAI）为3.2±1.0分，显著优于单用美沙拉嗪组（CAI 6.7±1.3，EAI 5.0±1.6），表明该菌株可有效维持溃疡性结肠炎的临床与内镜缓解。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Temperature: 37°C; pH: Neutral to slightly acidic (as per MRS agar conditions); Nutritional requirements: Complex media (MRS broth) with specific supplements (bile salts, sodium propionate, L-cysteine for B. bifidum); Osmotic tolerance: Moderate (standard dairy fermentation conditions)
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Growth rate: Log phase at 37°C for 24–48 hours; Doubling time: Not explicitly reported; In vivo vs in vitro: In vitro growth in MRS broth and agar; In vivo relevance inferred from probiotic viability in yogurt
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gastrointestinal tract (specifically colon and small intestine), as typical for probiotic strains
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Symbiotic with host microbiota; potential competitive interaction with other gut microbes; no direct evidence of interaction with other microbes in this study
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Moderate tolerance to refrigeration (4°C), lyophilization (used in preparation), and acidic conditions (pH 4.4–4.5 in yogurt); no data on UV, drying, or shear stress
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Polysaccharides from Auricularia auricula extract (AAE) may enhance stress resistance
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Lactobacillus acidophilus La-5 and Bifidobacterium bifidum Bb-12 are facultative anaerobes that grow optimally at 37°C in nutrient-rich media. They are adapted to the gastrointestinal environment and maintain viability in yogurt under refrigerated storage. The addition of Auricularia auricula aqueous extract (AAE) significantly improves their survival during 28 days of storage at 4°C, suggesting enhanced stress tolerance in the food matrix.
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): No genetic engineering was performed on L. acidophilus La-5 or B. bifidum Bb-12 in this study. The strains were used in their native form, with no modifications to their genome or regulatory circuits. The study focused on the functional interaction between the probiotics and the prebiotic extract, not on synthetic biology or genetic circuitry.
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Native metabolic and stress response systems (e.g., acid tolerance systems, sugar transporters)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No engineered logic gates or sensors were used. Natural physiological responses to environmental cues (e.g., acidification, nutrient availability) govern behavior.
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): The probiotic strains naturally sense changes in pH and nutrient availability (e.g., lactose, glucose) during yogurt fermentation and storage. They respond by adjusting metabolic activity and stress response pathways. No synthetic sensing circuits were implemented.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): No engineered secretion systems; natural secretion of metabolites (e.g., lactic acid) via membrane transporters
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Natural metabolic output; no external control over secretion levels; dosage is determined by growth and viability
E_material_match (材料匹配性): The probiotics are compatible with the yogurt matrix; viability is enhanced by AAE, though syneresis increases, which may affect structural stability
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): No direct antibacterial activity was reported for L. acidophilus La-5 or B. bifidum Bb-12 in this study. The strains are not known to produce bacteriocins or other antimicrobial compounds in this context.
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): No evidence of antibacterial activity was observed; the study focused on probiotic survival and functional enhancement, not pathogen inhibition.
E_B_mechanism_desc (产氧机制描述): No oxygenation mechanism was implemented or observed. The strains are not known to produce oxygen or utilize oxygen-dependent pathways in this context.
E_B_crit_evidence (标准B_依据): No oxygenation function was present; the study did not involve any engineered or natural oxygen-producing systems.
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): No direct immunomodulatory effects were measured or reported. While probiotics are known to modulate immunity, this was not assessed in the current study.
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): No tissue repair functions were evaluated. The study focused on food product properties, not therapeutic tissue regeneration.
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): L. acidophilus La-5 and B. bifidum Bb-12 regulate metabolism by fermenting lactose and other carbohydrates, producing lactic acid and other metabolites. The presence of AAE (rich in polysaccharides) enhances their metabolic activity and viability.
E_E_metabolite_material (代谢物_相关物质): Lactic acid, short-chain fatty acids (SCFAs), and other fermentation byproducts
E_F_mechanism_desc (肿瘤治疗描述): No tumor-targeting or prodrug conversion mechanisms were involved. The study did not investigate cancer therapy.
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (natural strains used without genetic modifications)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no evidence of horizontal gene transfer; safe for human consumption as GRAS status is generally accepted for these strains
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): Yogurt matrix provides physical confinement; no risk of environmental escape
B_risk_desc (风险描述): L. acidophilus La-5 and B. bifidum Bb-12 are well-established probiotics with GRAS status. No genetic modifications were made, so there is no risk of horizontal gene transfer or uncontrolled proliferation. The yogurt matrix acts as a physical barrier, preventing environmental release. The main concern is sensory degradation at higher AAE concentrations, not biosafety.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): This study did not evaluate wound healing or therapeutic outcomes. The primary outcomes were improved probiotic survival (0.35–0.58 log CFU/g), increased antioxidant activity (115.30 mg BHT eq./kg), and elevated total phenolic content (1,057.6 mg gallic acid/kg) after 28 days of refrigerated storage. The 0.05% AAE concentration was recommended for optimal balance between functional benefits and sensory acceptability.

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Grows at 10–45°C, pH 9.6, 6.5% NaCl, 40% bile; tolerant to high salt and alkaline conditions
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Growth rate not specified; capable of growth in restrictive environments such as high-salt cheese and meat products
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Gastrointestinal tract (human), intestinal mucosa
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Can transiently colonize human gut; may compete with or displace indigenous microbiota; potential for horizontal gene transfer to resident strains
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to high salt, bile, and alkaline pH; survives in processed meats and fermented foods
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Bile salts, high NaCl, alkaline pH
C_growth_desc (生长描述): Enterococcus faecium SF68 is a facultative anaerobe capable of growing under harsh conditions such as high salt, bile, and alkaline pH, making it suitable for survival in fermented foods and the gastrointestinal tract. It can transiently colonize the human gut but is not permanently established.
G_genetic_tools (遗传工具): Not specified
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): Not specified
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): Not specified
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): No genetic engineering is described in the paper. The strain E. faecium SF68 is used as a naturally occurring probiotic without modification.
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Fsr quorum-sensing system (GBAP pheromone), aggregation substance (AS) receptor
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Quorum-sensing regulation via Fsr system; pheromone-responsive plasmid activation (e.g., AS expression induced by sex pheromones)
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): E. faecium SF68 may sense environmental cues such as bile, pH, and salt through intrinsic physiological tolerance. It can respond to pheromones from other enterococci via pheromone-responsive plasmids, which regulate virulence gene expression. The Fsr system (though more characterized in E. faecalis) may play a role in sensing population density and regulating virulence factors like gelatinase and protease.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Bacteriocin secretion via general secretion pathway (implied)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Not specified
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with food matrices and probiotic delivery systems
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Produces bacteriocins (enterocins A and B) that inhibit Listeria monocytogenes and other foodborne pathogens.
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): Enterocins A and B from E. faecium inhibit L. monocytogenes in model systems; no mention of excessive activity or tissue damage. Strain is used in probiotic formulations with established safety.
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Modulates immune system by enhancing gut mucosal barrier and stimulating immune response; may reduce duration of diarrhea.
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): Not applicable
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Not applicable
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (natural strain, no engineered kill switch)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low risk for E. faecium strains; generally lacks virulence determinants. However, potential for horizontal gene transfer of antibiotic resistance or virulence genes exists. No evidence of pathogenicity in healthy individuals.
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): None (oral delivery, no physical confinement)
B_risk_desc (风险描述): E. faecium SF68 is considered safe for use as a probiotic. It lacks most virulence factors (e.g., cytolysin, aggregation substance), is sensitive to clinically relevant antibiotics, and does not persist in the gut. However, the risk of gene transfer to resident gut flora remains a concern, especially in immunocompromised or antibiotic-treated individuals.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): E. faecium SF68 effectively reduces duration of diarrhoea in both adults and children. Clinical studies show successful treatment of enteritis, with normalization of stool within days. It is considered a safe alternative to antibiotics in certain cases.

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Growth at 37°C in MRS broth; pH 6.9 (PBS); anaerobic conditions required for cultivation
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Reaches stationary phase after 20–24 h of incubation at 37°C; viable counts ~1.1 × 10^9 CFU/mL
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Not specified (in vitro study; potential for gastrointestinal tract or food/feed matrices)
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Not specified
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Heat-stable (100°C, 1 h); resistant to lyophilization (stored at -20°C with glycerol); stable during centrifugation and washing steps
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Glycerol (for storage), peptidoglycan (for heat stability)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该研究中使用的三种乳酸杆菌（L. fermentum 111、L. paracasei 108 和 L. plantarum 49）均来源于水果加工副产物，可在37°C、pH 6.9的磷酸盐缓冲液中生长，培养条件为厌氧环境。细胞在MRS培养基中培养20–24小时进入稳定期，活菌浓度约为1.1 × 10^9 CFU/mL。热灭活（100°C, 1 h）后仍保持结构完整性，表明其对热和干燥具有较强耐受性，适合在食品和饲料中应用。
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 该研究未对乳酸杆菌进行基因改造，所有实验均使用天然分离株，未涉及CRISPR、质粒或诱导系统等遗传工程工具。
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 本研究未涉及任何感知模块或逻辑控制，所有功能基于物理吸附，无环境响应或基因调控机制。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Physical adsorption via cell wall components (peptidoglycan, polysaccharides)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Controlled by contact time and cell concentration (10^9 CFU/mL); removal efficiency increases with time
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with PBS and potential for integration into food/feed matrices; no structural disruption observed
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): 无抗菌活性，仅通过物理吸附去除AFM1。
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 无抗菌功能，不适用。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): 无免疫调节功能。
E_D_mechanism_desc (修复机制描述): 无组织修复功能。
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): 无代谢调控功能。
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (natural isolates, no genetic modifications)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no horizontal gene transfer risk; safe for food/feed use
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): None (no encapsulation or physical confinement used)
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 三种乳酸杆菌均来源于水果加工副产物，已被鉴定为潜在益生菌，具有GRAS（公认安全）状态。未进行基因改造，无生物安全风险。热灭活后仍保持吸附能力，表明其在食品和饲料中应用具有高安全性。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在体外实验中，三种乳酸杆菌（L. fermentum 111、L. paracasei 108 和 L. plantarum 49）在1小时和24小时后对AFM1的去除率分别为73.0–80.0%（活细胞）和72.9–78.7%（热灭活细胞）。L. plantarum 49在24小时后表现出最高的AFM1保留能力（回收率10.9–18.8%），而L. fermentum 111在1小时后回收率最高（60.6%），表明其吸附能力随接触时间延长而增强。热灭活细胞与活细胞具有相似的去除能力，说明细胞活性并非吸附功能的必要条件。该系统可有效将AFM1水平降低至安全范围，适用于食品和饲料的生物脱毒。

composition (组成成分): [{"role": "Chassis", "scientific_name": "Effective Microorganisms (EM) Bokashi", "strain_id": "EM Bokashi (Greenland Technologia EM, Janowiec, Poland)"}]
C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Temperature: 37°C; pH: Gut environment (acidic to neutral); Osmotic: Tolerant to moderate osmotic stress; Nutrition: Utilizes feed components (carbohydrates, proteins), produces enzymes and vitamins
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Not specified in the paper; assumed to grow in the gut environment during feed passage
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Intestinal mucosa (gut lumen and mucosal surface)
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Competitive exclusion of pathogenic microbes; stabilization of microbiological balance between pathogenic and saprophytic microbiota
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Tolerant to gastrointestinal transit (acidic pH, bile, shear stress); stable during feed storage and oral administration
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Cell wall components, spore-forming species (if present), metabolic resilience
C_growth_desc (生长描述): EM Bokashi is a mixture of 70–80 species of beneficial microbes, including bacteria and fungi, that colonize the intestinal mucosa, stabilize gut microbiota, and survive the harsh conditions of the gastrointestinal tract. It promotes digestion, reduces gut pH, and enhances nutrient absorption.
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): The microbial system is not genetically engineered. EM Bokashi is a naturally occurring microbial consortium used as a probiotic feed supplement without synthetic genetic modifications.
S_physiochemical_signals (理化信号): ["pH (acidic environment of the gut)", "Nutrient availability (carbohydrates, proteins in feed)"]
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Inferred: Membrane receptors, metabolic sensors, and quorum-sensing systems in native microbial species
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): Not applicable; no synthetic logic circuits; natural microbial community response to environmental cues
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): The microbial consortium responds to gut environmental signals (pH, nutrients, bile) and host immune feedback through natural metabolic and signaling pathways. The community dynamically adjusts its activity to maintain homeostasis and modulate immune responses.
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Secretion of cytokines and immunomodulatory metabolites via natural microbial secretion systems (e.g., Type I, II, or general secretion pathways)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Dose-dependent via feed concentration (8 kg/tonne); no external control mechanism
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with feed matrix; stable during feed processing and oral delivery
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): EM Bokashi stimulates both Th1 and Th2 immune responses, enhancing production of pro- and anti-inflammatory cytokines to maintain immune balance and protect against infection.
E_C_modulator_material (免疫调节_相关物质): IL-2, IL-4, IL-10, IFN-γ, TNF-α, TGF-β, IL-6
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): Natural attenuation; no engineered kill switches or auxotrophy
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; no evidence of horizontal gene transfer; low risk of environmental escape due to natural attenuation in gut
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): None (oral delivery without physical confinement)
B_risk_desc (风险描述): EM Bokashi is a natural microbial consortium with GRAS (Generally Recognized As Safe) status in agricultural use. It is not genetically modified, does not contain pathogenic strains, and is eliminated from the body after digestion. No significant safety concerns were reported in the study.
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): Feed supplementation with EM Bokashi significantly improved average daily gain (ADG) and reduced the incidence of gastrointestinal disorders (diarrhoea) in pigs. It enhanced systemic immune responses by increasing pro-inflammatory (IL-2, IFN-γ, TNF-α) and anti-inflammatory (IL-4, IL-10, TGF-β) cytokines, maintaining Th1/Th2 balance and preventing unproductive inflammation. This indicates effective immune modulation and improved health and production performance.

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): Growth at pH 3.5–6.8, 37°C, in MRS broth; tolerant to 0.3% bile salts and 0.2% mixed bile salts after pH shift
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): Growth rate in MRS broth: 22 min (pH 6.8), 25 min (pH 3.5); faster growth in milk (25 min) than in MRS broth (37 min) at pH 6.8
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): Lower intestinal tract (mimicked by simulated gastric and intestinal conditions)
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): Not explicitly described; potential for colonization due to acid/bile tolerance and protease activity
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): Resistant to freezing (-70°C for 48 h), acid (pH 3.5), bile salts (0.2%), and rapid recovery post-thaw
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Cell wall fatty acid profile, plasmid loss (associated with stress adaptation)
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 该菌株在pH 3.5条件下仍能快速生长，且在冷冻-解冻后仍保持良好生长能力，表明其具有较强的环境适应性和稳定性，适合在胃肠道严苛环境中存活并定植。
G_genetic_stability (遗传稳定性): Plasmid loss observed (7.0 kb and 3.9 kb in parent ATCC 43121; 6.0 kb and 3.5 kb in ATCC 33200), yet inducible β-galactosidase and protease activity retained; suggests chromosomal integration or alternative genetic regulation
G_material_coupling (材料耦合稳定性): No direct evidence of material coupling; growth tested in broth and milk, not in encapsulated systems
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 通过自然选择筛选出酸耐受和胆耐受突变株，未使用基因工程手段，但其表型变化与质粒丢失相关，表明其适应性改变可能源于基因组水平的自然变异。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Fatty acid profile, plasmid profile, and enzyme activity patterns (indirect sensing via metabolic and structural adaptation)
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): No engineered logic gates; natural selection implies threshold-based survival under stress (pH and bile)
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 该菌株通过自然选择在酸性和胆盐环境中筛选出，其生长能力在pH 3.5和0.2%胆盐条件下仍保持，表明其具备对酸和胆盐的阈值响应能力，但无明确的基因调控逻辑电路。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): Cell lysis and extracellular enzyme secretion (protease, β-galactosidase)
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): Not controllable; growth-dependent secretion
E_material_match (材料匹配性): Compatible with milk and MRS broth; potential for dairy delivery systems
E_A_mechanism_desc (抗菌机制描述): Produces lactic acid and other antimicrobial compounds; growth in acidic conditions may inhibit competing pathogens.
E_A_crit_evidence (标准A_依据): 在pH 3.5和0.2%胆盐条件下仍能快速生长，表明其在胃肠道中可抑制病原菌定植，且无明显细胞裂解，安全性较高。
E_B_crit_evidence (标准B_依据): 未涉及氧气生成或光依赖性机制，不适用于氧疗。
E_C_mechanism_desc (免疫调节描述): Produces proteases and other enzymes that may interact with host immune cells; may modulate gut immune responses.
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): Regulates lactose metabolism via β-galactosidase and peptide utilization via aminopeptidase; may influence host metabolism.
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): None (no kill-switch or auxotrophy reported)
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): Low pathogenicity; no antibiotic resistance genes reported; plasmid loss may reduce HGT risk; no evidence of environmental escape
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): None (no physical confinement described)
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 该菌株为公认安全（GRAS）的乳酸菌，未发现致病性、耐药基因或水平基因转移风险，且在自然选择中发生表型变异，无基因工程改造，安全性较高。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 在模拟胃肠道条件下（pH 3.5，0.2%胆盐）仍能快速生长，且在冷冻-解冻后恢复良好，表明其具有作为益生菌在肠道中定植和发挥功能的潜力，尤其适用于乳制品载体的益生菌制剂。
column84: 该系统采用微藻与动物细胞共培养。为了平衡代谢速率并减少动物细胞的废物积累，培养温度设定为30°C而非标准的37°C。微藻在连续光照下进行光合作用，为组织提供氧气并消耗氨。
column91: 本研究使用的是野生型微藻菌株，未涉及基因工程改造。重点在于利用微藻的天然光合作用和代谢特性来支持动物组织的生长。
column98: 微藻通过天然代谢途径响应环境中的光照（启动光合作用）和氨浓度（作为氮源吸收），无需人工设计的逻辑门电路。
column102: Compatible with PDMS device and cell aggregation
column114: 微藻通过光合作用产生氧气，供给共培养的C2C12动物细胞，将组织的代谢模式从厌氧呼吸部分转变为有氧呼吸。
column119: 共培养组织的LG比率（乳酸产生/葡萄糖消耗）从单培养的2.01降至1.58，表明有氧呼吸增加。该系统在连续光照下维持了3天，且未对动物细胞造成伤害。
column127: 微藻吸收动物细胞代谢产生的废物氨（Ammonia），并将其转化为氨基酸（如谷氨酸、谷氨酰胺），从而降低培养环境中的氨毒性。
column137: 所使用的微藻（小球藻）是常见的食品补充剂，具有GRAS（一般认为安全）地位，用于生产培养肉/食品，安全性高。
column138: 通过共培养，成功构建了厚度为200-400微米的3D组织，且未出现明显的组织损伤（LDH释放量仅为对照组的七分之一）。相比之下，单培养的动物细胞组织在超过50微米时即出现缺氧和坏死。

C_growth_conditions (生长条件): 30°C; 连续光照 (880 ± 28 lux); DMEM + 10% FBS
C_growth_kinetics (生长动力学): 共培养组织在40分钟内通过离心法构建
C_colonization_niche (定植生态位): 与动物细胞(C2C12)混合形成的3D组织内部
C_microbiome_interaction (菌群互作): 互利共生：微藻为动物细胞提供氧气并消耗氨；动物细胞提供CO2和氨
C_stress_tolerance (应激耐受): 耐受30°C及组织内部环境
C_stress_tolerance_material (应激耐受_相关物质): Chlorella vulgaris
C_growth_desc (生长描述): 微藻与动物细胞共培养，在30°C下表现出最佳的组织维持能力，避免了37°C下因代谢过快导致的组织损伤。
G_engineering_desc (工程改造描述): 本研究使用野生型微藻，未涉及基因工程改造。
S_sensing_component_material (传感元件_相关物质): Chlorella vulgaris
S_logic_gate_desc (逻辑门描述): 自然代谢响应：光照下进行光合作用产氧；利用环境中的氨合成氨基酸
S_logic_desc (逻辑描述): 微藻通过自然代谢途径感知并响应环境中的光照、CO2浓度及氨浓度，无需人工逻辑门控制。
E_secretion_mech (分泌机制): 原位光合作用产氧及代谢物交换
E_dosage_control (剂量控制): 通过接种细胞比例（C2C12:微藻 = 1:4 或 1:8）和光照控制
E_material_match (材料匹配性): 无支架，通过离心形成的细胞致密组织
E_B_mechanism_desc (产氧机制描述): 光合自养微藻消耗二氧化碳和氨，排泄氧气，缓解组织内部缺氧
E_B_crit_evidence (标准B_依据): 共培养组织的代谢从厌氧呼吸部分转变为高效的有氧呼吸（LG比率从2.01降至1.58），支持了更厚组织（200-400μm）的存活。
E_E_mechanism_desc (代谢调节描述): 微藻吸收动物细胞代谢产生的废物（氨）用于合成氨基酸
B_biocontainment_strategy (控制策略): 物理限制（在体外培养皿装置中）
B_risk_assessment (风险评估): 低风险，小球藻是常见的膳食补充剂
B_material_barrier (材料屏障): PDMS装置（培养期间）
B_risk_desc (风险描述): 该系统用于体外培养肉生产，所用微藻为食品级安全微生物，无生物安全风险。
healing_efficacy_desc (治疗效果描述): 通过共培养微藻，成功构建并维持了厚度达200-400μm的致密组织，相比单培养（50-150μm）显著增厚；LDH释放量减少至1/7，显著降低了组织坏死和损伤；培养基中氨积累显著减少。
